YALLIH-naqasuh yen Muusa rabek lakal, *YALLI, Muusa catoh luk yen Nuun-Yoosuwa lih yaabe.
*YALLI Yoosuwak iyyemii, «Muusay yi naqasuh yenehiyya rabeh immay, koo kee Israayil marak bical gacaay; Ordon weeqaytuk tabba xicay, woo anu Israayil marah ecee baaxo fan gexa.
Muusak akah exce innah, inkih tan baaxoy adda akak tabtoonu waytaanahiyya inkitanuuk siinih eceeh an.
Sin baaxo cuduud gabbi le qaxat raqta bacarih tan baaxok xabba haanamaay Lubnaan qaleelah amma 'yaanamaay, tohuk kalah kaadu Furaat kaxxa weeqaytuy ayrô-mawqat yanik xabba haanamaay, Ciitah yooboke marih baaxo edde anuk, Maditraaniyah Badat idiyya 'yaanam sinimi.
Tonna'mmay Yoosuwaw, atu addunyal tanim fan qeebil num kok mayaysaay; anu kaadu Muusa lih akah suge innah ko'lih aneyyo. Kok mabaxsimaay way koo macaba.
Anu sin kaxxa abbobtik, ‹Siinih aceeyyo› axcuk xagana keenih akah culeh suge baaxo tabbaxoonu waytan saaku ken abba akketto'mmay, a taamal digga xicaay agaagul akak cab» kaak iyye.
«A taamal digga xicaay, abba haytaamal agaagul akak cabba haay dudda luk ab. Yi naqasuh yen Muusa koh warse xinto intam inkih oggola num tik. Teetil enna 'taamak tu cabe'kal duudusaay; tonnal gexinnaan ikkel kullim gabal kok bicele.
Tama xinto elle tunkuttube kitab kulli waqdi kassitay mahawweenin. Bar kee laqoh kawis. Tama kitaabih addal tanim inkih duudussem keh nagay isik cubbus. Taham abtek kullim kol amqeleeh; kullim gabal akak bicta num akketto.
‹Agaagul akak cabay a taamal digga xic› 'yaanam amrih kol oobiseh; tama amri hawweene waytam kol tan. Anu *YALLAAY; ku Dagelta kinniyooh; elle gexinnaan ikkel ko'lih ani'mmay mameysitinaay; niya kok baxaqe waytay» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal Yoosuwa abbobtih yen marak iyyemii,
«Gexay ummatak, ‹Qusba-dabaaqah safarah bical gacaay, sakayi bicsita› inxica. ‹Sidiica ayrok lakal Ordon weeqaytuk tabba 'teenih *YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyya siinih yecee baaxo tabbixeeni'gidih gexetton› keenik inxica» keenik iyye.
Yoosuwa Manasseh yooboke marak garab kee Ruuben kee Gaadah yooboke marak iyyemii,
«Muusay YALLIH-naqasuh yenehiyya duma siinik iyyem mahawweenina. Iyyemii, ‹YALLI, Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqa aracal tan baaxoy away elle taniinihiyya dabaaqah siinih ecee› siinik iyyeh suge.
Awayah tu gactek gennaaqoh agabuuy xaylo kee laak litoonum inkih akkel elle caba. Takkay immay sin qaskaray qeebi silac gabat lehiyya Israayil maray toobokoh siinik yanihiyya cataana'gidih, Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-culma le kabut raqta baaxo raaqisaanam fanah foocat keenik gacca 'yeenih gexaanama.
Isinni tooboko cattaanam siinil tan. Siinik kaxxih YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyya keenih yecee baaxo guffu heenih tokkel nokka iyyaanam fanah qokol keenih takkeenimi. Tohuk gaba kaltan saaku, Ordon rasul ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta baaxoy YALLIH-naqasuh yen Muusa siinih yeceehiyya fanah aduuretton» 'yaanam keenik iyye.
Too waqdi oson Yoosuwak iyyeenimii, «Atu nek inxicca 'tem abennooh, atu nek gexa inte ikke gexenno» iyyen.
Kaadu qagseenih iyyeenimii, «Nanu Muusah amri kulli way elle oggolak sugne innal, ku amri kaadu oggolennooh; YALLAY ku Dagelta kinnihiyya, Muusa lih elle suge innal, ko'lih kaadu yanay.
Ku abbootan cina num kee atu axcinnaanim cina numul rabi amaatele. Abtaamat bisoh inxicaay agaagul akak cab» kaak iyyen.

Tohuk lakal Yoosuwa, Tikible-Golo deqsita aracak namma num gibah ruube. Farrintoh too namma numuk iyyemii, «Kanqaan baaxok axcihiiy Yeriko deqsitta magaala sasot rebsimak gexay gibitay gaca» iyye. Too namma num gexxeeh; woo magaala gufen waqdi, Racab deqsitta xiiqareh xiinah buxa gexeeniih; wokkel elle xiinen.
Too bar Yerikô-malik Israayil marak tu takkem gibah temeetem yoobbe.
Too waqdi Racabah farmo ruubeeh teetik iyyeemih, «Ku buxah addal yan mari inkih tan baaxo gibita'gidih yemeete mara'mmay, buxak ken eyyeeqay yol ken bah» iyye.
Too waqdi kaak intemii, «Sinam temeeteh sugte'mmay akak yemeeten ikke maaxiga. Tonna'mmay oson magaalah afa alfintaamak naharat ayro culte waqdi yi buxak gexen. Elle gexen qaxa maaxiga'mmay xayih lakat keenik gexxeenik ken aybeebexetton» keenik inte. Takkay immay Racab woo namma numuy gibah yemeetehiyya qari amol tan kafte talbi-qaalay sartan akak bicsaanahiyyah gubat ken tooqoreh raaqisse.
Malik mari magaalak ken goranah yewqe waqdi magaalah afa alfeenih. Sarrak malik mari woo gibâ-marih goranah Ordon weeqaytuk akak taban gitah amma 'yaanam fan gexe.
Tohuk lakal Racab woo gibâ-mari xiine'kal yanin waqdi qari amo keenil tewqeeh,
annah keenik inte. «YALLI a baaxo siinih yeceem aaxigeeh; kulli num sin meysih raba.
Isin Masrik gexxen saaku Qasa Badak tabten waqdi, YALLI Qasa Bad siinik foocat elle kafise inna noobbeh. Amoorâ-malikih nammayay Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta baaxol yenehiyyay migaaqah Sicon kee Qoog deqsitak yenehiyya elle qidden inna kaadu noobbeh.
Woh noobbe waqdi meysih afqado nel dub inte. YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyya qaran kee baaxo inkih xiinisam aaxigeh.
Tonna'mmay taway anu sin elle abbaxuk sugga exce innal, yi buxah marah toh abettoonumuh YALLIH-migaaqal yoh xiibittaanam siinik faxa.
Yi ina kee yi abbaay yi tooboko kee yi maqanxiixiiy ken buxah mara inkih qide waytaanamah xagana yoh cula. Sin marak, ‹Ken maqidina› inxica» keenik inte.
Osonuuy teetik iyyeenimih, «Nanu inxicci innam abe waynek, Yalli nee qiday. Nanu abak sugnem gersi marah warse waytek, YALLI a baaxo neh yacayu waa saaku koh amqennoomuh xagana koh culla» teetik iyyen.
Racab qari magaalat maroh yan gidaarat xakabuh yeneeh; sarrakaay woo mara akattat uxuyya hayteh qarik taagatak addah ken oobisse.
Too waqdi keenik inteemih, «Gexxan waqdi woo qaleela le baaxo gexa. Tokke gexe wayteenik, woo malik mari sin geele. Oson yaduureenim fan tokkel sidiica ayro sasot sugaay; tohuk lakal isinni gexoh gexxaasita» keenik inte.
Woo mari teetil gacseemih, «Afak nek teyyeeqe xagana koh duudusenno.
Tonna'mmay atu abtaamahaa, nanu sin magaala nabbixe'gidih namaate saaku, woo nee akattat toxeeh akak rubte taagatat qasa akatta astah uxuyay sug. Ku abba kee ku inaay ku tooboko kee kok ramad elli haa mara inkih isi buxal sugus.
Numuk teeni siinik afah eweqqa 'yeh rabe kaa tekkek, kaat yakku waa raba usuk isih isil baahem deqsitele. Tonna hinna'mmay, ku qarih addat yan marak numuk teenal tu baaheenik, toh nek way.
Takkay immay tahat numuk teena lih yabte koo tekkek, away afak nek teyyeeqe Yalla kee xagani qangara nee matabbixam ixig» teetik iyyen.
Is tahal ken lih bicteeh, sarrak ken rubsusseh. Oson gexxa 'yen waqdii, qasa akatta taagat caxxat toxee.
Teetik elle gexen ikkel qaleela fanah gexeeniih, wokkel yombooqoren. Malik maray ken lakal gexehiyya sidiica ayroh gide ken goranat sugen. Sarrak ken weenih Yeriko fan yuduuren.
Tohuk lakal taaxige gibâ-mari nammay qaleela-le-baaxok oobeeniih, weeqaytuk tabba 'yeenih Yoosuwa fan yuduuren. Too waqdi tikka 'tem inkih kaah warsen.
Sarrak iyyeenimih, «YALLI a baaxo inkih neh yeceem digga le. Macaay intek, wokkel enna 'ya mari inkih meysih bux nek haak raaqe» iyyen.

Too ayrok geeri ayro Yoosuwa kee raqqa 'te Israayil ummat inkih maaca dibroh ugutta 'teh woo dabqih elle sugen Tikible-Golo deqsita aracak gexeeniih; Ordon weeqaytuk tabaanam fanah weeqayti xaqul elle yinfiddigen.
Sidiica ayrok lakal Israayil makaabon kee saqolti, Israayil mari elle yinfiddige ikke fan yemeeteeniih;
too waqdi keenik iyyeenimih, «Seeka, YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyyah qahdi addat akak yan Sandug, quukah baahah tablen waqdi, litoonum ussukuqay ken kataata.
Isin a baaxo mataaxigaanaay gita oson sin aybulleelon. Takkay immay gexxan waqdi woo qahdih sandugul maxayyoowina. Woo sanduguk salaf le kabuk inki kiilomitrih gide akak exxeeray gexa» iyyen.
Yoosuwa a marak iyyemii, «Beera YALLI sin addal ablewaynuh tanim abam faxaah; tohih sabbatah taahirik gacay suga» keenik iyye.
Sarrak seekak, «Isin kaadu Qahdi-Sandug luk ummattak foocat gexa» iyye. Seeka usuk iyyem abte.
Tohuk lakal YALLI Yoosuwak annah iyye. «Anu a saaku abu waamak gexxaamah, Israayil mari kaxxa numuh koo abaluk raaqeleeh; anu Muusa lih akah suge innah ko'lih kaadu anim aaxigelon.
Qahdi-Sandug quukah tabbixe seekak, ‹Weeqaytu guftan waqdi ibah adda akak gacay, soola› keenik inxic» iyye.
Sarrak Yoosuwa kaadu ummattak annah iyye. «Amay YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyya iyyam ankacisa.
‹Waara Dagelti sin lih yaniih, isin bisoh gutuqak elle tamaateenimil Yalli Kanqaanah yooboke maraay, Ciitah yooboke maraay, Ciiwih yooboke mara kee Feriidah yooboke maraay, Girgaasah yooboke maraay, Amoorah yooboke mara kee Yabuusah yoobokeh mara inkih baaxok ayyaaqele. Waara Dagelti ne'lih yanim macal aaxigenno inteenik, YALLAY inkih yan baadak Amoytah yanihiyyah qahdih sandug Ordon weeqaytuk siinik foocak tabselon.
Israayil kedoy taban kee nammay takkehiyyak kulli kedok num-num doora.
Seekay inkih tan addunyah Dageltah yan YALLIH Qahdih Sandug quukah tabbixehiyya weeqaytuk tabta'gidih iba woo leeh addat hayta waqdi, Ordon weeqayti caxitak maraaqa. Too waqdi caxitak sugte lee inki aracal gaaboowele› siinik iyye» 'yaanam keenik iyye.
Too keenik iyyem buqre edde orbisan waktih addak teneeh; weeqayti kaxxa lee luk yen.
Tohuk lakal ummatta woo Ordon weeqaytuk tabaana'gidih elle sugen ikke cabeenih gexeeniih; too waqdi seeka, Qahdi-Sandug quukah abbaxuk, ummattak foocat taben. Seeka woo weeqaytih addat ibah culusse waqdi,
weeqayti lee caxitak maraaqinnaay, Xartan deqsita aracak darrel ten Adam deqsitta magaalal gaabowte. Rabe Bad deqsita bad fan caxitak sugte lee inkitanuuk tiggiriqeh. Too waqdi sinam inkih woo lee sinni kafin baaxol gexxeeh; seekay Qahdi-Sandug quukah tabbixehiyya, Ordon weeqaytuk gudey kafinuk raqtehiyyal, ummatta inkih taturra intam fan soolak sugte. Sinam inkih Yeriko deqsitta magaalah gariik Ordonuk tabte.

Inkih tan ummat Ordonuk tabte saaku, YALLI Yoosuwak iyyeemihii,
«Taban kee nammay takke kedok kulli kedok num-num door.
Hununuh too seeka soolak elle sugte Ordon weeqaytuk gudek taban kee namma xaa ugusa keenik inxic. Too xeet baahay, a bar elle tanfiddigoonu waytan ikkel haa keenik inxic» iyye.
Sarrak Yoosuwa taban kee namma numuy doorehiyyah seeceeh
annah keenik iyye. «YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyyah Qahdih-Sanduguk naharat Ordon fan gexa. Kulli num siinik Israayil kedoh migaaqal inki-inki xaa sunkul heeh baahay, a bar elle xintan ikkel haa.
A xeet ummatah YALLI abeemih kassis akkele. Sarra-yan-barah sin abuusi ‹Ah macah hayten xeetiiy?› 'yaanam siinik iyyoonu waan waqdi,
‹YALLIH-Qahdi-addat-akak-yan-Sandug Ordon weeqaytuk tabsen saaku, weeqayti lee solteeh; tonna leemiik a xeet kulli way Israayil marah akkel tekkeemih kassiisih heen xeeti› keenik inxica» iyye.
Too taban kee namma num, YALLI Yoosuwa akah amriseeh Yoosuwa kaadu ummat elle amrise innal, Ordon weeqaytih gudek taban kee namma xaa sunkul hayya heenih woo elle yanfidigoonu waan arac fan beenih tokkel heen. A taban kee namma xaa taban kee nammay takke Israayil kedoh loowol been.
Yoosuwa kaadu taban kee namma xaa Ordon gudel Qahdi-Sandug tabbixe seeka elle solta ikkel soolise. Woo xeet uxih a saaku fan tokkel yan.
YALLI Yoosuwah elle amrise innal, ummatta too taamak gaba kalla haytam fanah seeka wokkel elle soolak sugte. Tonnal Yoosuwa Muusa elle iyye'nnal abe.
Raqqa iyye mari weeqaytuk sissikuk tabe.
Sarrak ummatta inkih weeqaytuk woo qaxa tabte waqdi, YALLIH-Qahdih-Sandug tabbixe seeka woo marak foocat gexxe.
Muusa keenik elle iyye innal, Ruuben kedo kee Gaad kedoh yooboke mara kee Manassê-kedoh yooboke marak garabay qeebih bical gaceh sugehiyya gersi marak naharat gexen.
Morootom alfi yakke mari YALLIH foocal Yerikô-magaalah garil tan booxa fanah qeebi abaana'gidih gexen.
YALLI too saaku abem Israayil marih garil Yoosuwa kaxxa num abte. Oson Muusa assakaxxayuk elle suggu 'yen innal, Yoosuwa assakaxxayuk raaqen.
YALLI Yoosuwak, «Woo seekay yi Qahdih Sandug tabbixehiyyak, ‹Ordon weeqaytuk eweqa› 'yaanam inxic» iyye.
Yoosuwa toh keenih warse.
Seeka Ordon weeqaytuk akah tabte innaak, weeqayti kaxxa weeqah weeqe.
Ummatta Ordon weeqaytuk sanatak naharsi alsak tabanhaytoh ayrol tewqeeh; Gilgal deqsita aracay Yerikô-magaalak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqahiyyal yinfiddigen.
Too aracal Yoosuwa taban kee namma xaay Ordonuk baaheenihiyya soolise.
Sarrak Israayil marak iyyeemih, «Sarra yan barah sin abuusi, ‹A xeet akah hayteenim macaay?› iyye kaa tekkek,
Israayil mari Ordon weeqaytuk adda kafin baaxol elle taben inna keenih warisa.
YALLAY ni Dagelta kinnihiyya neh Qasa-bad akah kafise innah, siinih kaadu tabtaanam fan Ordon weeqaytu elle kafise inna keenih warisa.
Tahak gexxaamah baaxô-bagul enna 'ya mari YALLIH qandek leh gide aaxigeloonuuh; isin kaadu YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyyak daayiman meysitak xiinetton» keenik iyye.

Tikki 'ya Amoorah yooboke maray Ordonuk ayrô-culma le kabut raaqahiyya kee, Kanqaan amoytittey Maditraaniyah badih dariifal tanihiyya takkeemiik YALLI Ordon weeqaytu Israayil mari akak tabam fanah kafsem yoobben. Tohuk gexxaamah kaxxa meysi ken tibbixeeh, niya keenik radde.
Too saaku YALLI Yoosuwak iyyemii, «Af le xeet bicissa haay, Israayil mara edde salootis» kaak iyye.
Yoosuwa YALLI kaa akah amrissa hee innah abeeh; «Salot Kooma» deqsita aracal Israayil mara salootise.
YALLI toh akah iyyem, Israayil mari yakkeemiik Masrik yewqe saaku, labha inkih solot keenik luk ten. Sarrak morootom liggida woo bacarih tan baaxol sugen saaku, urru solootiseenih manannon. Too morootom liggidak ellecabot Masrik yewqen saaku qeebi caddo gufte labha Yallih amri cinteemih sabbatah inkih raben. YALLI dumah yan daban ken kaxxa abbobtik, «Siinih aceeyyo» axcuk xagana akah cule baaxoy mango leelwa kee qayso leeh kullim elle taabukehiyya, qeebi caddo gufte labhak, «Sin culi mahaa» 'yaanamal xiibiteh yen. Akah xiibite innah, culi ken mahanna.
Ken aftok ken xaylo culse. Too mari salot luk mananna'mmay, YALLI Yoosuwak, «Labha salootisa» akah iyyem tohu.
Salootuk gaba kaleenik sarra, tikki 'ta labha inkih salootuk urtam fan elle yinfiddigen aracal elle yeeden.
Sarrak YALLI Yoosuwak annah iyye. «A saaku Masril luk sugten qaybik sin kaleh» iyye. Too arac a saaku fan Gilgal deqsita. (Gilgal iyyaanam kalti iyyaanama.)
Israayil mari Yerikô-magaalah garil tan booxal Gilgal deqsita aracay elle yinfiddigeenil yanin waqdi, woo saaku edde sugen alsak taban kee fereyhaytoh ayrot carri waqla Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiid aben.
Ciggilta ayro qimbook Kanqaan baaxol tooboke daro yokmen. Too ayrot alen alo kee kamiir maleh bicsen gaqambo yokmen.
Manna deqsitta maaqo too ayrook wadir qaraanak oobak maraaqinna. Tohuk wadir Israayil mari manna akamuk maraaqinna. Too ayrook xabba haanam Kanqaan baaxol tooboke daro akamuk raaqen.
Ayrok teena Yoosuwa Yerikô-magaalak xayih yan aracal yan waqdi, garciik seef gabat le num isik foocal soolah yuble. Too waqdi Yoosuwa kaal yemeeteeh, «Atu ni qaskarih num kinnitoo, ni naqboytiitih num kinnito?» kaak iyye.
Woo numuuy, «Woo marak num hinniyo. Anu akkel YALLIH qaskarih abbah an» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Yoosuwa kay massakaxxah moyya baaxol xagga heeh, iyyemii, «Anu yi abbaw, ku naqasu kinniyok, maca yok aba intaah?» iyye.
YALLIH qaskarih abba kaak iyyeemih, «Naharak ama elle soltam taahirik yan aracak, ibak kabel eyyeq» kaak iyye. Yoosuwa too waqdi usuk kaak aba iyyem abe.

Yerikô-magaalak afa Israayil mari culaamak alifit teneeh; num akak yawqeeh culam duudak mananna.
YALLI Yoosuwak iyyemii, «Anu Yerikô-magaalaay tet malik kee teetil enna 'ta agiirah tan qaskar ku gabal heeyyo.
Koo kee ku qaskar lica ayroh gide, ayrol inki adda magaalak iro le kabuk woo qaxaak a qaxa mermeritetton.
Malcina seekiy maruw gaysak bicsen *baanta gabat lehiyya woo YALLIH Qahdih-Sanduguk foocat gexxaama. Malcinhaytoh ayro woo seeka baanta taagure waqdi, koo kee ku qaskarak takkeenimik woo magaalat malcina adda mermerita.
Sarrak baanta ayseede'kal waqla fan meqe gide xongolisaanama. Too anay taabben waqdi aki mari yakkeemiik xongolaama. Too waqdi woo magaalah gasoosa inkih addah addigillele. Tohuk lakal qaskar elle sugte'kkek takkeemiik magaala cultaama» kaak iyye.
Too yab yoobbek lakal, Yoosuwa seekah seeceh annah keenik iyye. «YALLIH-Qahdih-Sandug beyaay malcina seekiy maruw gaysak bicsen baanta lehiyya foocat isinnik haa. ‹Woo Qahdih Sanduguk foocat gexa› keenik inxica» iyye.
Sarrak Yoosuwa isi qaskarak, «Siinik garab woo Qahdih Sanduguk naharat gexxa seekak foocat gacak magaalat mermerita» keenik iyye.
Too waqdi Yoosuwa ken elle amrisa innal, fooci-qaskar, baanta taagure seekak foocat gexxeeh; ken lakat woo YALLIH Qahdih Sandug tabbixe seeka gacte. Woo seekah lakat kaadu qaskar ten. Tah elle takkeemil baanta aagaruk gexen.
Takkay immay Yoosuwa iyyeemih, «Anu siinik axce'kal num siinik xongole waay; num guduqqa siinik axce waay» keenik iyye.
Woo mari usuk iyyem abeeh; naharsi ayro, woo YALLIH Qahdih Sandug yabbixe mari inki adda magaalat mermerite. Tohuk gaba kalen waqdi elle yinfiddigen aracah yuduureeniih barak wokkel elle xiinen.
Woo ayrol katayta ayro Yoosuwa maaca dibroh ugteeh; qaskar kaaduuy duma Yoosuwa aba keenik elle iyye innal, nammeyhaytoh ayro kaadu naharat fooci-qaskar gacteeh; ken lakat kaadu malciin takke seekay malcina baanta taagure gacteeh; woo seekah lakat YALLIH Qahdih Sandug quukah tabbixe seeka gacte. YALLIH Qahdih Sandug tabbixe seekak ellecabot qaskar gacca 'teh magaalat mermeriten. Tah elle abaanamal baanta aagaruk yenen.
Too ayro inki adda magaalat mermeritta 'yeenih woo elle yinfiddigen arac fan yuduuren. Lica ayro fan tonnah abak sugen.
Malcinhaytoh ayro, ayro bukka 'te waqdi ugutta 'yeenih malcina adda teetit mermeriten. Too ayrok sah wohuk dumal malcina adda woo magaalat mermeriteenih masuginnon.
Malcinhaytoh adda mermeritta 'yeenih seeka woo baanta toogore waqdi, Yoosuwa isi marak, «YALLI a magaala siinih yeceek, xongola» iyye.
Sarrak kaadu iyyeemih, «A magaala kee tet addal tanim inkih YALLIH sadgatah bayisa. Racab deqsitta xiiqareh xiinah ten barra nanu gibah rubne mara neh tooqoreemih sabbatah, tet buxah mara kee tet maxagina.
Tonna'mmay woo bayissoonu waytan duyyek isinnih tu isinnih maraqsitina. Wohuk tu raaqisseenik, Israayil marah umaane kee baati baahettoonum ixiga.
Lakqo kee dahabaay, nacaas kee birtak bicsen duyye inkih YALLAH rikeek yan aracal haanam faxxintaah, Yallih im elle haan ikkel daanisaanam faxxinta» 'yaanamih amri keenil oobise.
Sarrak seeka baanta toogoreeh; too waqdi raqqa 'ye mari too baantah anay akah yoobbe innaak kaxxa xongoloh xongolen. Too waqdi magaalat maroh tan gasoosa tiddigilleh. Sarrak qaskar takkeemik woo magaala elle tan kooma fan yewqeeniih magaala yibbixen.
Magaalah addal suggu 'ye marak lab mara takkuu, say mara takku urru takku idoola takku inkih seefit qiden. Toh lih kaadu laay illi kee danoona qideenih.
Yoosuwa woo gibah ruubeh suge namma numuk iyyemii, «Woo xiiqareh xiinah tan barrah buxa gexay, xagana teetih akah culten innah tet kee tet buxah mara baaha» iyye.
Osonuuy gexeeniih Racab kee tet abba kee inaay, tet tooboko kee maqanxix kee raqqa 'ye tet buxah marak tu macabinnoonuy inkih baahen. Tet kee tet buxah mara inkih woo Israayil mari elle yinfiddigeh yen arac fanah beenih, rikeek yan aracal ken heen.
Tohuk lakal woo magaala kee tet addal sugga 'teemik dahab kee lakqooy nacaas kee birtak bicsen duyye kalihim inkih carariseenih. Too duyyeh tu gactek, bahha heenih YALLAH rikeek haan duyye elle daanisan aracal heen.
Yoosuwa, Racab kee teetih ramad elli haytam inkih rabak cateh. Woh akah abem is, usuk Yerikô-magaala fan gibah ruube namma num tooqoreh raaqisseh ten. Teetih ramad le mari a saaku fan Israayil baaxol yan.
Too saaku Yoosuwa keenik iyyemii, «Yerikô-magaala nammeyhaak xisu waa num YALLIH abaaro geele. A magaala xisa'gidih makaado hayu waa saaku, naharsi-baxa weeleeh; teetik alifu bicisu waa saaku, ellecabol kaah yooboke lab-baxa weele» 'yaanam digga luk keenih qaddoyse.
Too saaku tekkeemik gexxaamah YALLI Yoosuwâ-wakali yekkeeh; Yoosuwâ-migaq inkih tan baaxol yontoobbe.

YALLI Israayil marak, «Yerikô-magaalak baysi akak faxxiima duyye bayisaay; yoh rikeek baxsah heeh meqe duyye baxsah haa» 'yaanam iyyeh suge'mmay, woo amri moggoliminna. Qaakan deqsita num woo amri cineh sugeeh; tohuk gexxaamah YALLIH bagcarra Israayil mara gufte. Qaakan Karmi deqsita numih baxak teneeh, Dabdi deqsita numuk kaadu baxi baxak ten. Dara deqsita gulubuh aabakuk yen. Dara Yuuda deqsitta kedoh aabakuk yen.
Yoosuwa, Yerikô-magaalak tu yakke mara Qaay deqsitta magaala fan ruube. Qaay, Beetal deqsita aracak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta magaalaay; Beet-Awen deqsita aracak garil tan magaalak ten. Keenik iyyeemih, «Gexay Qaay magaala wagitaay baaxo elle tani'nna gibitay ama» keenik iyye. Gexeenih yuduuren waqdi,
yubleenimit yaabeeniih, annah iyyen. «Qaay magaala qunxaah, tet mabbuuxuh kulli num akah gexam mali. Namma alfi akki kee sidiica alfi yakke mari dibuk xiqele. Inkih tan qaskar gaaduh ruubaanam taqabik sah xiqtam malik maruubin» kaak iyyen.
Tohih sabbatah sidiica alfih num woo magaala tabbaxuh gexxe. Takkay immay wadirih ken gacsen.
Qaay mari magaalah afak keenit aben ardat boodooda elle tan arac fan ken baaheeniih; qaleek ayradduk ken elle oobisen ikkel, soddom kee lica num keenik qiden. Sarrak Israayil marak niya raddeeh, meysi ken tibbixe.
Too waqdi Yoosuwa abeh yan wariggah sara isik qanxiseeh; YALLIH Qahdih-Sanduguk foocal gommoh rade. Israayil makaabon kaadu toh abteeh; tokkel aben arka yaybulleeni'gidih amol siisa luk magrib tikki 'yam fan gommoh sugen.
Too waqdi Yoosuwa iyyeemih, «YALLAW, Mulki le Dageltaw, fiiruk Ordon weeqaytuk macah nee tabisse? Akke macah nee bahte? Amoorâ-marih gabal nee hayta'gidih nee maay bahte? Hay, nee bayissa'gidih nee maay bahte? Ahak Ordon weeqaytuk woo qaxal raqnam neh ayse rarte.
Taway Goytaw, Israayil mari naqboytiitik yoowweh yanik, anu maca abbasitu!
Kanqaan kee raqqa 'ye maray a baaxol yanihiyya inkih ta xaagu aabbeleeh; marot hayya nee heenih nakkeemiik nee qidelon. Isi migaaqih taagah yi Goytaw, tahak tuk teena ab» iyye.
Sarrak YALLI kaak iyyeemih, «Ugut. Baaxok bagul annah magacin.
Israayil mari dambi lem baaheeh; anu ‹Maabina› keenik excem abeenih ken lih hee qahdi makeenih. ‹Mabena› exce duyye garqeenih isinnih haysiten. Isinni duyyet yesgelleeniih too duyyek diraabah niimi iyyen.
Israayil mari naqboytiitit akah koysite weem tohih sabbata. Wadir wadirih keenik yoowweenih; toh akah keenit tekkem, keenit kaadu baatî-cokmi yekkeemih sabbata. Isinnih mahaysitinay bayisa siinik exce duyye bayse'kal, sin qaxat magaca.
Ugut. Away ummatta taahirroysaay yi foocah yamaateeni'gidih bical ken hay. ‹YALLAY sin doore Dagelta kinnihiyya, «Israayil ummatey, anu ‹Mabena› siinik exce duyye teddereenih immay, tamaham bayse'kal naqboytiitit makoysittan» siinik iyyah yanik, beera bical gaca› keenik inxic.
Maaca kedo-kedoh gacca xicay fooca fan ama keenik inxic. Too waqdi anu koo ayballayu waa kedo, gulub-gulubuh gacca 'yeenih yamaatoonay. Inki gulubuh yan maray anu koo ayballayu waahiyya, buxa kee buxâ-marah gacca 'yeenih fooca fan yamaatoonay. Buxâ-marah tittak yan maray anu koo ayballayu waahiyya kaadu, num-numuh gacca 'yeenih fooca fan yamaatoonay.
Sarrak anu koo ayballayu waa numuu, ‹Mabena› exce duyye bee num kinnim aaxigettooh; too waqdi kaa kee kay buxah mara kee usuk yedderem inkih cararisaanama. Israayilil qaybih tanim bahteeh yo'lih luk yen xagana bayissem too numu» iyye.
Too ayrok geeri ayro Yoosuwa Israayil mara kedo-kedoh hayya heeh fooca fan baahe. Yuudâ-kedo kaa yuybulleeh, ken gulubuh hayya heeh fooca fan ken xayyoose. Darâ-maray gulubuh tittak yanihiyya kaa yuybulle waqdi, tonnah kaadu, fooca fan ken xayyoose. Ken kaadu buxa kee buxâ-marah hayya heeh xayyoose. Sarrak Dabdî-buxah mara kaa yuybulle waqdi, kay buxah mara fooca fan xayyoose.
Too waqdi Dabdi deqsita numuk rade mara num numuh hayya heeh baahe. Sarrak Dabdik baxi baxah yen Qaakan deqsita numuy abbak Karmi akak iyyan numuk baxah yenehiyyak caxxi yewqe. «Tamah kaa» iyye.
Too waqdi Yoosuwa kaak iyyeemih, «Yi baxaw, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyah nabna faylisaay; kay foocal abteemit yab. Abba haytem taway yoh warisay yok maaqarin» kaak iyye.
Qaakan kaal gacsemii, «YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyal dambi lem bahtem yoo; toh numma.
Dannabah orbisne duyyeh addat qax-meqe Baabelon marih rarayto kee namma kiilo takke lakqo kee kiilok garab yakke dahab uble waqdi, ossokooteh innih haysite. Too duyye yi siraqih addat ubkuneh abbixe. Lakqo guba akak heeh abbixeeh, tokket daanah siinih sugele. Ta duyye elle beem tama'nna» iyye.
Too waqdi Yoosuwa kay siraq fanah sinam ruubeeh; woo mari arduk gexxa 'yeenih, woo duyyey Yalli isinnih mahaysitina axcuk amri akah yeceehiyya edde yubkune aracat geen waqdi hagga iyyen. Lakqo gersi duyyek gubat yooqoreh suge.
Woo mari woo duyye woo siraqih addak edde yubkuneh suge ikkek beyya heenih, Yoosuwa kee inkih yan Israayil marih gabal heen. Sarrak woo duyye YALLIH Qahdih Sanduguy YALLIH mano taybulleehiyyak foocal heen.
Yoosuwa kee raqqa 'ye Israayil mari inkih yakkeenimik Qaakan yibbixeenih, kaa'lih kaadu beeh suge lakqooy rarayto kee dahab edde yibbixen. Toh lih kaadu kay xaylooy kay laay kay danoonaay illiiy siraq kee kalah kaadu luk suggu 'yem inkih Gadaamâ Golo deqsitta golo fan been.
Sarrak Yoosuwa kaak annah iyye. «Annah tan umaane nel akah bahtem macaay? Away YALLI umaane kol oobisele» kaak iyye. Tohuk lakal ummatta inkih xeet kaat hayteeh, kaa qiddeh. Tonnah kaadu kay buxah mara xeetit qideeniih, kay buxah mara kee usuk edderra heem inkih carariseenih.
Amol kaak qalumuk fayya 'ta caddol xeet sittin bagul xiseeniih; woo xeet a saaku fan elle yan. Woo arac a saaku fanah migaaqah Gadaamâ Golo deqsita. Tohuk lakal YALLIH kaxxa bagcarra xamacteh.

Tohuk lakal YALLI Yoosuwak iyyemii, «Tikka 'ta qaskar gabat haay, woo Qaay fan gex. Mameysitinay niya kok baxaqe waytay, Qaay magaalah malik kee woo magaalal tan ummattak qeebih koo aysiiseyyo. Woo magaala kee baaxo sinim abeyyo.
Qaay magaala kee malikik, duma Yerikô-magaala kee tet malikik abba haytem abetto. Tonna'mmay magaalal geytoonu waytan duyye kee saq isinnih haysitetton. A magaala darreek gacca 'teeniih garciik abbixetton» kaak iyye.
Yoosuwa inkih tan qaskar luk Qaay magaala gexa'gidih bical gace. Qaskarak addak dooren marak soddom alfih num yeyyeeqeeh, barat ken ruube.
«Magaalak darret ombooqoraay; takkay immay kaxxam akak maxxeerina. Tet tabbaxoonuh bical gaca.
Too waqdi yoo kee yi mara magaalat xayyoowennooh; Qaay magaalah mari net yamaate waqdi, naharsi saaku akah abne innah, wadirih nenkeleelebeh kudenno.
Magaalak ken nayxeerem fan salafak nee ayraddelon. Duma akah abne innah keenik kudnam akkalelon.
Too waqdi isin edde tombooqoren aracak eweqqa 'teenih Qaay magaala abbixetton. YALLAY sin Dageltah yanihiyya a magaala siinih aceele.
Anu sin amrisaamah tet xabba haytan waqdi, YALLI sin akah amrise innal, gira teetit ruuba» keenik iyye.
Tohuk lakal Yoosuwa ken ruubeeh; osonuuy edde yambooqoroonu waan arac fan gexeeniih, tokkel Qaay magaalak ayrô-culma le kabul Qaay kee Beetalak fanal sasot sugen.
Yoosuwa woo bar woo elle yinfiddigen aracal elle xiine.
Maaca dibroh ugutta 'yeh qaskar gaaboyse. Sarrak kaa kee Israayil abbobti woo qaskar Qaay magaala fan been.
Kaa'lih tan qaskar woo magaala akak culan afa fanah yemeeteeniih; tokkel ken kee woo magaalak fanal yan dorrak kilbat le kabut raaqa aracal yinfiddigen.
Koona alfih qaskariita bahha heeh, Qaay magaala kee Beetal deqsitta magaalak fanal, Qaayak ayrô-culma le kabut raaqa aracal, raarisak akah sugan innah ken cabe.
Qaskarak mango exxa magaalak elle yinfiddigen aracak kilbat le kabut raaqa aracat qeebi abaana'gidih bical gacen. Raqqa 'ye mariiy Qaay magaalak ayrô-culma le kabut qeebi abuh bical gacen. Yoosuwa woo bar woo dorral elle xiine.
Qaay malik Yoosuwâ-mara yuble waqdi, sissikuk kullim bical hee. Kaa kee kay mara salafak ken yaataku waa mari yanim maaxaginnoonuy duma qeebi keenit elle aben Ordon weeqaytih kabu yemeeten.
Yoosuwa kee kay mara wadir wadirih kudak woo bacarih tan baaxo fan yaawweenim ceelen.
Too waqdi magaalah addal suggu 'ye marah, a marih lakal yardeeni'gidih seeco tekkeeh; Yoosuwak lakak elle yayraddeenimil magaalak axxeeruk yexxeeren.
Magaalah addal sugga 'te labha inkih, magaala luk ten gasoh afoofa fakimit cabba hayteeh, Israayil marih lakal dadahteeh; magaala dibuk raqte.
Too waqdi YALLI Yoosuwak iyyemii, «Ama gabat lito macaxu Qaay magaala fan esces. Ama magaala koh aceeyyok» kaak iyye. Yoosuwa YALLI kaak akah iyye innah, macaxu Qaay magaala fan yescesse.
Yoosuwa too macaxu too magaala fan akah yescesse innaak, sasot suge mari Qaay magaala fan arduk gexeenih yibbixeeniih, gira teetit ruuben.
Qaay mari wadirih wagga hee waqdi qeeriy qaraanat af le yublen. Too waqdi woo Israayil maray bacarih tan baaxo fan kudehiyya ken yabbixe'gidih wadir keenit yuduure. Tohih sabbatah akak yawqen faxo magennon.
Yoosuwa kee kay maraay, aki xaqut sugte ken qaskar magaala tibbixeeh gira edde ruubeenim yublen waqdi, wadirih uduurra 'yeenih Qaay mara seleenih.
Too waqdi woo Israayil maray magaala yibbixeh suge qeebit yengeleeh; tonna leemiik Israayil mari inkitanuuk marot ken hayya heeh sella ken hee.
Malikik kalih marak num asillimi mahannoonuuy; num keenik nuwwuk macabinnoonuy inkih ken qiden. Qaay malik xabba heenih Yoosuwal baahen.
Israayil mari, Qaay maray woo bacarih tan baaxo fanah ken yeyreddehiyya inkih woo bacaril qiden. Sarrak kaadu uduurra 'yeenih magaalah addal raaqe mara inkih selli heen.
Yoosuwa Qaay mara selli haanam fan woo macaxu Qaay fan ascassuk suge. Too ayrot agabu kee labhâ fanal taban kee namma alfi yakke maray Qaay magaalal suggu 'ye inkih selli heen.
Sarrak YALLI keenik elle iyye innal, wokkeh addal sugga 'ye saq kee duyye Israayil mari isih haysite.
Yoosuwa woo magaalat gira ruubeeh abur tet abe. Too arac uxih a saaku fan abuuruh yan.
Qaay malik caxak bagut takareeh, ogot kaa qide. Too caxah bagut carra fan takayrit suge. Ayro culte waqdi Yoosuwa, «Malik raysa caxak oobisa» iyye. Too waqdi kay raysa caxak oobiseenih magaalak afal qiden. Too aracal qalumuk fayya 'ta caddot xeet sittin bagul xisen. Woo xeet a saaku fan elle yan.
Tohuk lakal Yoosuwa Qeebal deqsitta qaleh amol, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyah sadgat elle aban arac bicse.
Woo arac Muusay YALLIH naqasuh yenehiyyal oobe Yallih amri elle yan kitab elle iyya innal bicse. Woo kitaabal Israayil marak YALLI iyyaamah, «Yoh sadgat elle aban arac bicissan waqdi, birtak bicsen mansafat ore ween xeetik bicisa» 'yaanam iyya. Tonnal too arac bicseenik lakal too aracal cado akak carrisan saqa sadgatah qiden. Amaanah-xiinaanamih-astah-aban-sadgoota kaadu tokkel aben.
Tohuk lakal Israayil marih foocal, Yoosuwa woo xeetik bagul, Yalli Muusal oobise amriy kitaabal yuktubehiyya qagisak yuktube.
Tohuk gaba kalen waqdi, Israayil mara kee ken abbobtiiy doolat-abbobtiiy cokmaaba kee ken addat suggu 'ye beedi inkih, woo YALLIH Qahdih Sandug isinnik fanal hayya heenih, Leewih seekat afkanuk foocal soolen. Sahdak garab keenik Geriidim deqsitta qalet darre cabba heeh sooleeh; aki garab kaadu tonnah Qeebal deqsitta qalet darre cabba heeh soole. Ken fanal YALLIH Qahdih Sandug abbaxuk ten seeka solte. YALLIH naqasuh yen Muusa addunyal yan saaku, «Yallih barkat edde geyan wakti gufa waqdi tonnah aba» 'yaanam keenik iyyeh yen.
Tonna leemiik Yoosuwa woo Yallih amri elle yan kitaabal yunkuttube Yallih amri inkih, barkat kee abaaroh agantah, too kitaabal elle tan innal, anay fayya haak keenih yikriye.
Muusal oobe amrik qangara cabe'kal, wokkel suggu 'ye marak urru kee agbi agantah num raaqe'kal akah yaabben innah yikriye. Allî-baaxoh maray ken addat suge kaadu edde yoobbe.

Israayil mari gee nasri, Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-culma le kabu raqqa 'ta amoytitiy qaleelah tan baaxo kee ayrô-culmat raqta mango koomaami le baaxol tanihiyya toobbe. Tonnah kaadu, Maditraaniyah badak afoofil tan gubbih tan baaxok xabba haanamaay Lubnaan baaxoh amma 'yaanam tan baaxoh amoytitte inkih ta yab toobbe. Tohum Ciita kee Amooraay Kanqaan kee Feriidaay Ciiwi kee Yabuusah yooboke marih amoytittek ten.
A mari inkih, inki aracal mododeenih, Israayil kee Yoosuwat qeebi abaana'gidih, qaskarak loonum sitta fan gacsen.
Takkay immay Gibqon deqsitta baaxoh maray Ciiwih yoobokehiyya Yoosuwa Yeriko kee Qaay magaalal baahem yoobbeenih sugen.
Tonna leemiik qeebi hinna'mmay kaa duquurusaanamal malsen. Tembexe giriibat tan daro kee dambiyo le sooriitit heen qinab kamri danoonal eerra heenih ken fan yemeeten.
Labha kaadu qanxixe sarat gacca 'yeenih ibat kaadu yembexe kabel hayya heenih keenil yemeeten. Kaffa 'teh orongoobitte gaqambo kaadu gabat luk yemeeten.
Sarrak Yoosuwa elle yinfiddige ikke fan yemeeteeniih; tokkel Yoosuwa kee Israayil marak iyyeenimih, «Xer baaxok yemeete mara kinninooh, qalla siinit haysinnam fanxa» keenik iyyen.
Too waqdi Israayil mari keenil gacsemii, «A xayi aracak yemeete mara kinnitoonum keh, macak naaxigeh nan. Qalla siinit mannal hayna?» keenik iyyen.
Too waqdi Yoosuwak iyyeenimih, «Nanu siinih taaminna'gidih yemeete mara kinnino» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi Yoosuwa, «Isin maa mara kinnitoonuuh, akak temeeteenim ankeey?» keenik iyye.
Oson too waqdi kaak iyyeenimii, «Nanu YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyyah xaagu noobbeh xer ikkek nemeete. YALLI Masril abba heem inkih noobbeh.
Wohuk kalah YALLI, Amoorah yooboke namma amoytay Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta baaxoh amoytittek yenehiyyak abem noobbeh. Tohum Sicon deqsitak yen malikiy Cesbon deqsitak ten magaalal yenehiyya kee Qoog deqsitak yen malikiy Basan deqsitta baaxol, Qastarot deqsitta magaalal yenehiyyak ten.
Too waqdi ni idoola kee ni baaxol enna 'ya mari inkih, ‹Safarah sakayi haysitay Israayil marah fanah gexaay, keenit ongoorowa› 'yaanam nek iyyen. Kaadu ‹Ken taamat gacaay qalla ken lih haysita› nek iyyen.
Ama tablen gaqambo, siinit nangoorowe'gidih, safarah ninni baaxok ugunne saaku alasneeh; a saaku akah tablen innah, kaffa 'teh ugguqawteh tan.
A qinab kamri edde yan soorit keewoh qinab kamrik kibne saaku qusbuk yen. Awayah tu gactekiiy akah tablen innah qanxixeh yan. Sara kee kabel abneh nan xer safarak gexxaamah nek yembexeh» iyyen.
Sarrak baahen maaqok tu takkem Israayil marah yeceeniih; Israayil mari woo maaqo haysiteh immay fayu YALLA messerinnon.
Yoosuwa qalla ken lih haysiteeh; yanoonay ken iyye. Israayil marih abbobti Yalla-kee-xagana ken lih haysitteeh; keenil make waanamih xagana keenih culen.
A qalla haysiteenimih sidiica ayro suggu 'yeenik lakal, a mari keenik garit tan baaxoh mara kinnoonum yeexegeenih.
Too waqdi Israayil mari safarah ugteeh; sidiica ayrok lakal, Gibqon mari elle suge magaalooli gufen. Woo magaaloolih migaq Gibqon kee Kafiira kee Beerot kee Kiryat-Yaqaarim deqsitta magaaloolik ten.
Tonna'mmay Israayil marih abbobti Gibqon marah YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyah migaaqal culen Yalla-kee-xagna kassiteeniih; tohoysa ken qidaanam keenih mabicinna. Tohih sabbatah Israayil mari yakkeenimiik, «Ah macah takke?» 'yaanamah Israayil abbobtil daqwat aben.
Israayil abbobti keenik inteemih, «Nanu YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyah migaaqal Yalla-kee-xagna keenih culleeh; tonna leemiik tu keenil bahnam madudna.
Too Yalla kee xaganih sabbatah, yanoonay ken innam nel tan. Yanoonay ken axce waynek, Yalli akah nee digaalele.
Yanoonay immay, boco neh aggile loonuuh, lee kaadu xaanuh neh baahelon» 'yaanam iyyeeniih; tohul malsen.
Tohuk lakal Yoosuwa, «Gibqon mara yol baaha» iyyeeh; ken baahen waqdi, «Akkel xayi aracal taniiniih, xer baaxok nemeete 'yaanam macah nek inteeniih, nee macah duquurussen?
Yi Dagelti sin abaareeh; woo abaaroh sabbatah isin ahaysa boco yaggileeh, lee weeroh, yi Dagelta elle yaqbuden taahirik yan aracah bahta naqoosa akkettoonum ixiga» keenik iyye.
Oson too waqdi iyyeenimii, «Tah innem kinni. Tah akah innem, YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyya isin bisoh gutuqak elle tamaateenimil, a inkih tan baaxo siinih yeceeh; tet addal yan mara qiddaana'gidih, isi naqasuh yen Muusa amrisem noobbeeh; toh numma kinnim neexegeh. Tohuh siinik meysinneh sugneemih sabbatah inne. Ninni roocih meysitak sugne.
Taway nanu edde nanim sin gubak tanih tanikii, siinit ceelinnaanim nek abbaasita» iyyen.
Tohuk lakal Yoosuwa amo keenik dacriseeh; Israayil marak, «Ken maqidina» iyye.
Takkay immay naqoosa ken abe. Israayil mara kee YALLAH sadgat elle aban aracih bocô-diglo kee leê-weerot ken hee. Oson a saaku fan YALLI isi qibaadah doore aracal too taamat yanin.

Yarusalaam malikiy Adoonixedek deqsitak yenehiyya Yoosuwa Qaay deqsitta magaala yibbixeeh teetil suge mara inkitanuuk bayseeh tet malik kaadu qidem yoobbeh. Yeriko deqsitta magaalak kaadu tonnah abem yoobbeh. Toh lih kaadu Gibqon mari Israayil mara lih qalla haysiteenih ken addat yaniinim yoobbe.
Taham kaa kee kay maral kaxxa warigga tekke. Warigga keenil akah tekkem, Gibqon deqsitta magaala Qaay magaalak nabuk teneeh; malikwa luk ten magaaloolik kaxxih kaxxa magaalak ten. Teetil yen mari kaadu qeebil agiirak yenek, Israayil marak qeebih macah gacen iyyaanamak ten.
Sarrak ta malikii, Cebron deqsitta magaalal malikih yen Hooham kee Yarmut deqsitta magaalal malikih yen Firam kee Laakis deqsitta magaalal malikih yen Yafiyaq kee Qeglon deqsitta magaalal malikih yen Dabiirih farmo ruubeeh, keenik iyyemii:
«Gibqon magaalah mari Israayil mara kee Yoosuwa lih biceenih yaniinik, ken nabbixe'gidih amay yoo cata» keenik iyye.
Too waqdi too koona malikiy Amoorah yoobokehiyya elle hayta qaskar esgelli heenih, Gibqon magaalat maro hayya heenih, qeebi aben.
Too waqdi Gibqon mari Gilgal deqsita aracal yan Yoosuwah farmo ruubeeniih, iyyeenimii, «Ni amoytaw, Amoorâ malikway woo qaleelak tan baaxol tanihiyya takkeemiik lon qaskar inkih gaabossa heenih qeebi net abeenik, net takkeemik tibba maxcinay xayuk amay nee cata» kaak iyyen.
Toh yoobbe waqdi Yoosuwaa, dooren qaskar kee raqqa 'te qaskar inkih luk gexe.
Too waqdi YALLI Yoosuwak iyyemii, «Anu nasri koh aceeh ani'mmay, keenik mameysitin. Keenik num kot makoysitak» kaak iyye.
Yoosuwa kee inkih tan kay qaskar inkih yan bar Gilgalaak Gibqon fan gexak xinna 'yeenih Amoorâ-marat garciik qeebi aben.
Gibqoonul YALLI, Israayil marih foocal, Amoorâ-mara fixixiseeh, qeebit akah baditan innah keenik abe. Too waqdi YALLI ken catak, woo qalek akak taban gitak keenit aben ardah Beet-Coron deqsitta magaala fan ken baahen. Qadeeka kee Makkeda deqsitta namma magaalak gabbi qaxa raaqa arac fan gital ken qidak ken baahen.
Amoorâ-mari Israayil marak woo qalek ooban waqdi, akak taban gitak kudak oobak sugen waqdi, YALLI kaxxa arroqle keenil ruubeeh; too arroqle Qadeeka guffa haanam fan keenil radak sugte. Israayil marih gabat tembexeemik, too arroqle qiddem tembegge.
Too ayro YALLI Israayil mara Amoorâ-marak yiysiise waqdi, Yoosuwa YALLA lih yaabeeh; Israayil mari elle yani'kkel iyyemii,
«Ayroy, Gibqon magaalah amol idiy.
Alsay, Ayyaalon dorrih amol idiy» iyye.
Too waqdi ayro kee alsa, Israayil mari naqboytiitik iissa 'yam fan, angayye'kal inki aracal elle sugte. Aham elle tekke inni Yaasar deqsita kitaabih addal yan. Inkih tan ayro, ayro kore'kal qaraanak gudel inki aracal teede.
Too ayroh innah, YALLI sahdayti yab edde oggole ayro duma masuginnaay a saaku makkinna. YALLI too ayro Israayil marih qaxak gacca 'yeh qeebi abe.
Qeebi gaba kale waqdi, Yoosuwa kee kay qaskar Gilgal deqsita aracal elle yinfiddigen ikke fan yuduuren.
Woo koona malik faxe innalaay, Makkeda deqsita aracal gablah addat uqurat raaqeenim timixxige.
Too waqdi ken yuble num Yoosuwah ken warse.
Yoosuwa iyyemii, «Kaxxa xaa bahha haay woo gabla akak culan afal haa. Tokket dacayrih sahda haa.
YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyya keenik sin yiysiiseh yanik, isinnihiiy wokkel maadayinay darre le kabuk naqboytiitit qeebi aba. Ken magaalooli fanah aduure ken kala» keenik iyye.
Dago maray isinni magaaloolik gasoosa fanah wadbitehiyyak kalih mara Yoosuwa kee kay qaskar selli hayte.
Sarrak Yoosuwâ mari Makkeda deqsita aracay elle yinfiddigeenihiyya fan amaanah kaal yuduuren.
Tohuk wadir woo rasul Israayil marat afak guduqqa iyyaanam yalliile num maraaqinna.
Yoosuwa, «Gexay woo gablah afat yan xaa kalla haay woo koona malikiy wokket yanihiyya eyyeeqay yol baaha» iyye.
Too waqdi woo gabla fakeeniih; Yarusalaam malikiiy, Cebron malik kee Yarmut malikiiy, Laakis kee Qeglon malikwa wokkek bukka heenih Yoosuwal baahen.
Sarrak Yoosuwa Israayil qaskarah inkih seeceeh, sarrak qaskar abbobtiy kaa'lih gexxeh sugtehiyyak, «Amay a malikwak fillat ibah iqita» iyye. Oson too way fillat keenik taqqa iyyen.
Tohuk gaba kalen waqdi qaskar abbobtik, «YALLI naqboytiitik inkih tamah sin elle yaysiisu waa innak, mameysitinaay niya haysita. A taamal digga xicay agaagul akak caba» keenik iyye.
Sarrak Yoosuwa woo koona malik inkih qideek lakal, yakken konooyuk koona caxat ken takre. Oson woo cooxih bagut ayro culla 'tam fan takayrut sugen.
Ayro cultek lakal woo cooxih baguk ken ginaada oobiseenih, woo duma edde yombooqoreenih sugen gablah addat ken qiden. Sarrak woo gablak afa kaxxa xeetit alfen. Woo xeet a saaku fan elle yan.
Tohuk lakal Yoosuwa Makkeda deqsitta magaalat qeebi abeeh, tet kee tet malik woo qeebit yibbixe. Too magaalal suggu 'ye mara seleh. Num nuwwuk keenik macabinna. Makkedah malikik woo Yerikô-malikik abba heem abe.
Tohuk lakal Yoosuwa kee kay qaskar Makkedak bisoh Libna fan safareeniih Libnat kaadu qeebi aben.
YALLI kaadu too magaala kee tet malikik qeebil ken yiysiiseh. Too magaalal suggu 'ye marak num macabinnoonuy inkih selli heen. Tet malikik kaadu woo Yerikô-malikik abba heenim aben.
Tohuk lakal Yoosuwa kee kay qaskar Libnâ-magaalak Laakis deqsitta magaala fan gexeeniih woo magaalat maro hayya heenih qeebi aben.
Qeebi qimbiseenimik nammayhaytoh ayro, YALLI Laakis magaalah marak qeebil ken yiysiiseh. Hununuh too Libnak magaalal akah abba heen innal, num cabe'kal magaalah addal suggu 'ye mara inkih qiden.
Geser malikiy migaaqah Hooram deqsitak yenehiyya Laakis magaalah marih catoh yemeete. Takkay immay kaa kee kay qaskarak kaadu qeebih yeyseenih, num keenik nuwwuk macabinnoonuy inkih ken qiden.
Tohuk gaba kaleenik lakal, Laakis deqsitta magaalak Qeglon deqsitta magaala fan gexen. Too magaala gufen waqdi, marot tet hayyay, qeebi teetit aben.
Too ayrot edde tet yibbixen. Too yibbixen ayrot edde Laakis magaalah marak akah aben innah, num keenik cabe'kal sella ken heen.
Tokkek gaba kalen waqdi, Yoosuwa kee kay qaskar Qeglon magaalak Cebron deqsitta magaalay qaleela le baaxol tanihiyya fan gexen. Too magaalat kaadu qeebi abeenih
sarrak tet yibbixeenih. Too waqdi tet malik kee woo magaalal suggu 'ye mara inkih qiden. Toh lih kaadu woo magaalah dariifal ten gaandoodi bayseeniih; addal akak suge mara kaadu seleenih. Yoosuwa too magaalak hununuh Qeglon magaalak akah abba hee innah, inkitanuuk tet bayisaanamal gaba kale. Teetil suge marak num macabinnay selli hee.
Tohuk lakal Yoosuwa kee kay qaskar wadir Dabiir magaala fan gacteeh, qeebi teetit aben.
Sarrak tet kee tet malik kee tet garil sugga 'te gaandoodih agantah inkih yibbixen. Tokkel suggu 'ye mara qideenih. Yoosuwa Dabiir magaalah mara kee tet malikik Cebron kee Libnâ-magaalah mara kee malikwak abba heem abe.
Yoosuwa too baaxooxah marak inkih yeyseh. Woo qaleelah tan baaxoh malikwak yeyseeh; ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta qalê-ragidit tan baaxooxa kee, tonnah kaadu, ayrô-culmat raqta mango koomaami le baaxooy, tonnah kaadu, woo bacarih tan baaxoy gabbi le qaxat raqtahiyyal suggu 'ye marak inkih yeyse. Too baaxooxal suggu 'ye marak num macabinnay ufuy elle haytam inkih qide. Tah amrissem, YALLAY Israayil doore Dageltah yanihiyya.
Yoosuwa Kaadis-Barniqa deqsita aracay gabbi le qaxat raaqak xabba haanamaay Gaadak baddi afah amma 'yaanam takke baaxot inkih gaadu abe. Toh lih kaadu Gosen deqsita baaxok xabba haanamaay Gibqon magaalah amma 'yaanamih agantah isi gubah gacse.
Yoosuwa a gid takke baaxo kee teetil yan mara kee malikwak edde yeysem, inki adda abe gaaduk ten. Wohim akah tekkem, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya ken lih yeneeh; taham akah tekkem tohu.
Tohuk gaba kalen waqdi, Yoosuwa kee kay qaskar woo elle yinfiddigeenih yenen aracay Gilgal deqsita fan yuduuren.

Israayil mari qeebil gee iisa, malik Yaabin deqsita malikiy Caxor deqsitta magaalal yenehiyya yoobbe. Too waqdi malik Yobab deqsita malikiy Madon deqsitta magaalal yenehiyya kee, Simron kee Aksaf deqsitta magaaloolih malikwa kee,
tonnah kaadu, kilbat le kabuk woo qaleelah tan baaxol malikwah yen mara kee, Galiil deqsita badak gabbi qaxak Ordon weeqaytih qaxat raqta baaxoh malikwa kee, mango koomaami le baaxo kee Door deqsitta magaalah xaqul tan baaxoy baddi afal tanihiyyah malikwah inkih farmo ruube.
Qagteh kaadu, Kanqaan baaxoh maray ayrô-culma kee ayrô-mawqat raaqahiyya kee, Amoorah yooboke maraay, Ciitah yooboke maraay, Feriidah yooboke maraay, Yabuusah yooboke maray woo qaleelah tan baaxol guubuh yenehiyya kee, tonnah kaadu, Ciiwih yooboke maray Cermon qaleh ragidil Mixfa deqsitta baaxol guubuh yenehiyyah edde farmo ruube.
Too mari inkih tan qaskaray mangah baddi afih qiddeytih gide takkehiyya luk yemeeten. Toh lih kaadu mango faariisa kee faaris beyta gaariira luk yemeeten.
Too amoytitte kee ken qaskar tikka 'yaanamaak Israayil marat qeebi akak aboonu waan Meerom weeqaytu deqsita aracal yinfiddigen.
Too waqdi YALLI Yoosuwak iyyemii, «Keenik mameysitin. Ah yoo YALLAAY; beera ta uddur, Israayil marih foocal, tikka 'yaanamaak sella ken heeh sugeyyo. Tohuk lakal faaris-gaariira keenik cararisettoonuuh, faariisak arqo keenik argiqetton» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal Yoosuwa kee kay qaskar Meerom weeqaytul too mara garciik yanin waqdi, qeebi keenit aben.
YALLI Israayil mara qeebil keenik yiysiiseh, ken gabal ken hee. Israayil mari Misrafot-Mayim kee Sayda deqsitta baaxo fan ken ayradduk been. Tohuk kalah kaadu Mixfâ Golo deqsitta baaxoy ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqtahiyyah amma 'yaanam fan xiiriyak ken been. A maray Israayilik naqboytiitih yenehiyya saabo cabba haam fanah qeebi gexak suge.
Yoosuwa YALLI a marak aba iyyeh kaa elle amrissa hee innal, faariisak keenik arqo yirgiqeeh gaariirat gira ruube.
Too saaku Caxor deqsitta magaalal yen malik, Caxor magaalah dariifal enna 'ta baaxol inkih ackamuk yen. Edde sugen carbik gaba kalla heen waqdi, Yoosuwa kee kay mara Caxor magaala yabbixeeni'gidih gexen. Magaala yibbixeeniih, teetil suge malik qideenih. Wokkel suggu 'ye marak num macabinnoonuy seefit selen. Magaala kaadu carriseenih.
Yoosuwa amoytitte elle sugte magaalooli kee woo magaaloolih malikwa inkih yibbixeeh; Muusay YALLIH naqasuh yenehiyya elle inxicca 'ye innal, tokkel suggu 'ye mara inkih qideenih.
Takkay immay woo fayya 'ta'kkel ten magaaloolik Caxor deqsitta magaalay Yoosuwa gira edde ruubehiyyak kalihim macarrisinnon.
Israayil mari woo yibbixen magaaloolil sugga 'te meqe duyye kee saqak tu macabinnoonuy isinnih beeten. Ummattakaay tu macabinnoonuy inkih qiden.
YALLI ah abaana'gidih, amri Muusal oobiseeh; Muusa kaaduuy woo amri Yoosuwah warseeh; Yoosuwa too amri duuduseh. Yoosuwa, YALLI Muusa amrissa heem inkih yugdube.
Yoosuwa baaxo inkih yibbixe. Qaleela le rasu kee, mango koomaami le rasu kee, tikki 'ta Gosen deqsitta baaxo kee, Gosenik gabbi-qaxat raqta baaxoy bacarih tani kee, Ordon weeqaytih agantah yibbixeh.
A baaxo xexxaarah Calak deqsitta qaley Edom baaxoh garit tanik xabba haanamaay Baqal-Gaad deqsita aracay Lubnaan-Daqaral yanihiyyah amma 'yaanam fanah xexxar kee nabnah akkuk ten. Lubnaan-Daqar Cermon qalek ragidit raaqa. Yoosuwa ta baaxooxah amoytittet qeebi mango wakti fanah abak suge. Takkay immay inkih qeebit ken yibbixeeh ken qide.
Israayil mara lih qalla haysittem, dibuk Gibqon magaalah marak teneeh; too magaalal Ciiwi deqsita marak tu takkem ten. Raqqa 'ye mara inkih edde yibbixeenim carbik ten.
YALLI a mari inkitanuuk Israayil marih gabat akah yambaxeeniih; Israayil mari saabo ken akah cabsiisa innah, Israayil marih qeebit ken ugse. YALLI dumaak, «A marah maracmatina; qeebit selli hee ikkal macabina» 'yaanam Muusa amriseh yen.
Too saaku Yoosuwa gexxa 'yeh woo qaleelah tan baaxok Cebron kee Dabiir kee Qanab deqsitta magaalooli kee, tonnah kaadu, Yuuda kee Israayilik qaleelah tan baaxol sugga 'ye Qanaakim deqsita xeeruk yen marih nasab bayseh. Yoosuwa too mari elle yen magaalooli kee ken amoh bayse.
Israayil baaxoh bagul Qanaakim deqsita marak num maraaqinna. Dago mari keenik Gaada kee Gat kee Asdood deqsitta magaaloolil raaqe.
Tonnal YALLI Muusa akah amrise innal, Yoosuwa woo baaxo yibbixeh. Yoosuwa woo baaxo Israayil marah ikoytah yeceeh; kulli kedohuuy exxa-exxah keenih kure. Kulli kedoh ken gufa ken xexxar keenih yecee. Too ayrok wadir ummatta carbik toffoofeh raqte.

Muusa yen saaku, Israayil mari Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabuk Arnon Golo deqsita arac kee Cermon deqsitta qale fanat tan baaxo qeebit yibbixen. Tonnal Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta baaxo ken baaxo tekke. Too baaxol suge namma malik yibbixen.
A namma malikik, malikik teeni migaaqah Sicon deqsitak yeneeh; malikih elle yenem, Amoorâ-marih baaxok ten. Too malik dabaaqah elle yenem, Cesbon deqsitta magaalak ten. Gilqad rasuk garab kay xintoh yen. Tohumuu, Arnon Golo deqsita aracak arut tan Qarooqer deqsitta magaala kee woo goloh gudel tan gersi magaalak xabba haanamaay Yabbok weeqaytuy Qammon marih cuduuduh yanihiyya edde anuk tan baaxo gufak ten.
Cuduud kaak Ordon weeqaytuk Galiil badak xabba haanamaay gabbi-qaxak Rabe Bad deqsita bad fanah gufak yen. Tohuk kalah Rabe Bad deqsita badak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta baaxok Beet-Yasimot deqsitta magaala kee Fisgâ qale deqsitta qaleh fanal enna 'ta baaxo inkih kay baaxot raaqak ten.
Tonnah kaadu malik Qoog deqsita malikiy Qastarot kee Adraqi deqsitta namma magaalal dabaaqah yenehiyyak yeyseenih. Kay baaxo Basan deqsitak ten. A malikii, Rafaayim akak axcuk yenen marak saaboh raaqe numuk yen.
Too num malikih elle yenemii, inkih yan Basan rasuy Gasur kee Maqka deqsitta baaxooxah cuduuduh amma 'yaanam takke baaxo kee Cermon qale kee Salka deqsitta baaxok ten. Tohuk kalah Gilqad rasuk garab kayimik ten. Tohumuu Sicon deqsita malikiy Cesbon magaalal yenehiyyah baaxoh cuduuduh amma 'yaanam tan baaxo.
Ta namma malikik qeebil iissa 'teh baaxo keenik raaqissem, Muusa kee Israayil ummatak ten. YALLIH naqasuh yen Muusa a baaxo Ruuben kee Gaad deqsitta namma kedo kee, Manasse deqsitta kedok kaadu garab yakke marah keefeeh, ikoytah keenih yecee.
Yoosuwa kee Israayil ummat kaadu Ordonuk ayrô-culma le kabut raqta baaxo yibbixen. Tohumuu, Baqal-Gaad magaalay Lubnaan Golol tanihiyyak xabba haanamaay Calak qaley Edom marih cuduudut xayuk raqtahiyyah amma 'yaanam tan baaxol, malikwah suggu 'ye mara inkih selli heen. Yoosuwa too baaxo Israayil marah kedo kedol kurra heeh, kulli way ikoytah takke'gidih keenih yecee.
Yoosuwa ta marah kure baaxotuu, qaleela le baaxo kee ayrô-culma le kabut raqta baaxoy koomaami mangohiyya kee, Ordon weeqaytu kee kay dariifal tan baaxoy koomaami mangohiyya kee, bacarih tan baaxoy ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqtahiyya kee, bakarroyti baaxoy gabbi qaxat raqtahiyya edde ten. Ta baaxol dabaaqah sugtem, Ciita kee Amooraay Kanqaan kee Feriidaay Ciiwi kee Yabuusah yooboke marak ten.
Israayil mari qeebit baaxo akak raaqisem: Yeriko deqsitta magaalal yen malik kee, Qaay deqsitta magaalay Beetal deqsitta magaalah xaqul yenehiyyal yen malikiiy,
Yarusalaam deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy Cebron deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy
Yarmut deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy Laakis deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy
Qeglon deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy Geser deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy
Dabiir deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy Geder deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy
Corma deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy Qarad deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy
Libna deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy Qadullam deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy
Makkeda deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy Beetal deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy
Taffuwac deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy Ceefar deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy
Afeek deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy Lassaron deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy
Madon deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy Caxor deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy
Simron-Maron deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy Aksaf deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy
Taqnak deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy Magiddo deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy
Kedes deqsitta magaalal yen malikiiy, Karmel deqsita aracih xaqul tan magaalay migaaqah Yoknaqam deqsittahiyyal yen malikiiy,
Door deqsitta magaalay baddi-afal tanil yen malikiiy, Galiil baaxol tan magaalay Goyim deqsittahiyyal yen malik kee,
Tirxa deqsitta magaalal yen malik akkuk yenen. Tittat soddom kee inki malik akkuk yenen.

Yoosuwa kaxxam idooliteh yan saaku YALLI kaak iyyeemih, «Atu a saaku idoolitteh tani'mmay, ahak sarra uxih mango baaxoy tabbixoonu waytaanahiyya raqteh tan.
Inkih yan *Filistiin rasu kee Gasur deqsitta baaxo kee, gabbi-qaxat raqta baaxoy Qawwim deqsita mari elle yani uxih mabbux mali. Tohum, Sicor dabba deqsita aracay Masri cuduudul geytimahiyyak xabba haanamaay kilbat le kabuk Ekron cuduuduh amma 'yaanam tan baaxo kee, Filistiin malikwa elle tan Gaada kee Asdood kee Askalon kee Gat kee Ekron deqsitta magaaloolik ten. A baaxoy Kanqaanal yaaxigeenihiyya inkih uxih mabbux mali.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, Maqara deqsitta magaalay Sayda deqsita mari dabaaqah elle yanik xabba haanamaay Afeek deqsitta magaalay Amoorâ-marih cuduudut raqtahiyya fan tan baaxo mabbaxinniton.
Gabal deqsita marih baaxo mabbaxinniton. Ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqa Lubnaan rasu kaadu uxih mabbaxinniton. Tohumuu, Baqal-Gaad magaalay Cermon qalek gabbi qaxat raqtahiyyak xabba haanamaay Camat deqsita daabah amma 'yaanam tan baaxok ten.
Abbixe'kal tanin baaxot, Sayda akak iyyan marih baaxo edde tan. Tohumuu, qaleela le baaxoy Lubnaan qaleela kee Misrafot-Mayim deqsita aracal fanal geytimtahiyyak ten. Israayil mari gutuqak fooca fanah elle yamaateenimil, anu a mara baaxok ayyaaqeyyo. Tonna'mmay ta baaxoy anu keenih abbaxu waahiyya atu a waqdiik keenih ixigaay ken xexxar keenih waris.
Tama baaxo Israayilik sagla kedo kee Manasseh yooboke marak kedok garabay raaqehiyyah a waqdiik ixigaay ken xexxar keenih waris» kaak iyye.
Ruuben kee Gaad kee Manasseh yooboke marak garabah, YALLIH naqasuh yen Muusa, dumal elle, baaxo kureh suge. Tohumuu, Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqa aracak ten.
Cuduud keenik Qarooqer magaalay Arnon golok amol tanihiyya fanah gufak yen. Woo golok gudet tan magaala kee Medaba kee Dibon deqsitta mandarwak fanal tan booxah tan baaxo inkih ken baaxo tekke.
Tohuk kalah cuduud keenik Qammon marih baaxok cuduud edde idiyya iyya ikke fanah gufak yen. Amoorâ-malikiy Sicon deqsitak yeneeh dabaaqah Cesbon deqsitta magaalal sugehiyya elle ackamuk yen magaaloolih agantah keenih kure.
Gilqad rasu kee Gasur kee Maqka kee Cermon qaleh dariifal enna 'ta baaxo kee, Basan deqsitta baaxok Salka deqsitta magaalah amma 'yaanam tan baaxo Muusa inkih keenih yecee.
Qoog deqsita malikiy Qastarot kee Adraqi deqsitta namma magaalal abbah sugehiyya malikih elle suggu 'ye baaxoy Basan deqsittahiyya inkih kenim tekke. A malikii, Rafaayim akak axcuk yenen marak saaboh raaqe numuk yen. Muusa kee Israayil mari, Gasur kee Maqka deqsita maray a saaku fanah wokkel elle yanihiyyak kalih marak qeebil yeyseeniih; baaxok ken eyyeqqaay baaxo keenik raaqissa heen.
Muusa Leewih yooboke marah baaxo maacanna. Toh akah abemii, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya Muusak iyyemii, «Leewih yooboke mari cado akak carrisan sadgatay yoh abaanahiyyak raqtem baaxoh aftok keenih ixig» 'yaanam iyyeh yen.
Muusa Ruubenik rade marah kulli gulubuh mangah yakkeenih gidel baaxo yecee.
Baaxo keenik Arnon golok amol tan magaalay Qarooqer deqsittahiyyak xabba haanamaay woo golok gudel tan magaala kee Medaba deqsitta magaalak dariifal tan booxaaxah tan baaxo inkih kenimik ten.
Cesbon deqsitta magaala kee tet dariifal tan magaalooliy booxaaxah tan baaxo geytimtahiyya kenim tekke. Tohumuu, Dibon kee Baamot-Baqal kee Beet-Baqal-Maqam kee
Yahax kee Kadeemot kee Mefaqat kee
Kiryatyim kee Sibma kee, Xeret-Sacar deqsitta magaalay daqar addal tan koomah amol tanihiyya kee,
Beet-Faqor kee inkih tan Fisgâ-qale kee, Beet-Yasimot deqsitta magaalah agantah keenih yecee.
Booxal-enna 'ta magaalooli kee Malik-Sicon malikih elle enna axcuk yen baaxo keenih yecee. Sicon Amoorâ-marih malikik yeneeh; dabqah Cesbon magaalal suge. Muusa ta malik kee Miidiyan marih abbobtik inkih yeyseh, baaxo keenik raaqise. Too maray Sicon gubal abbootan luk yenehiyya migaaqah Awi kee Rekem kee Xuur kee Cuur kee Rebaq deqsitak yenen.
Israayil mari qide marih addat ramli qidak suge Balqam deqsita num edde yen. Balqam abba Baqor deqsita numuk ten.
Ruubenih yooboke marih baaxo ayrô-culma le kabuk cuduuduh Ordon gufak ten. Ruubenik rade marah gulub-gulubuh yeceen magaalooli kee gaandoodi tama gidek ten.
Wohuk kalah kaadu, Muusa Gaadah yooboke marah baaxo yeceeh; too baaxo Ruubenih yecee baaxok kilbat le qaxat raqta baaxok ten.
Yaqder deqsitta magaala kee, Gilqadal enna 'ta magaalooli kee, Qammon marih baaxok Qarooqer deqsitta magaalay Rabba deqsitta magaalak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqtahiyyah amma 'yaanam takke baaxo inkih too kedoh yecee.
Rasi keenik Cesbon magaalak Raamot-Mixfa kee Batonim deqsitta namma magaalak fan akkuk yeneeh; tonnah kaadu, Macanaayim deqsitta magaalak xabba haanamaay Lodabar deqsita aracah amma 'yaanam tan baaxo inkih kenim tekke.
Cesbon magaalal yen malik Sicon baaxok raqqa 'tem inkih keenih yecee. Ayrô-culma le kabuk cuduud keenik Ordon weeqaytih garil tan baaxoy Galiil badah amma 'yaanam fan takkehiyya gufak yen. Ordon weeqaytih dariifal tan magaaloolik Beet-Haram kee Beet-Nimra kee Sukkot kee Safon kenim tekke.
Gaadah yooboke marah gulub-gulubuh yeceen magaalooli kee gaandoodi tama gidek ten.
Muusa, Manasseh yooboke marak kedok garabah Macanaayim deqsitta magaalak kilbat le kabuk tan baaxo yeceeh yen. Tohumuu, inkih yan Basan rasu kee, woo baaxol sugte lactam magaalay Yaaqir wohuk naharat qeebit yibbixeh sugehiyya inkih keenih yecee. Tohuk dumal a baaxok abbah sugtem, Qoog deqsita maliki.
Tonnah kaadu, Gilqad rasuk garab takke baaxo kee, Qastarot kee Adraqi deqsitta namma magaalay Qoog deqsita malik dabaaqah elle yene kenim abe. Ta baaxoy tikki 'tahiyya inkih Manasse-Makirik rade marak garabah yecee.
Muusa, Mooyab rasul gubbih yan aracal, baaxo ummatah elle kurem, tama innak ten. Too arac Yerikô-magaala kee Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le qaxat raaqa aracak ten.
Takkay immay Leewih yooboke marah baaxo maacanna. YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya kaak iyyemii, «Leewih yooboke mari, baaxoh aftok yoh baahan sadgat ikoytah lon» 'yaanam iyyeh yeneeh; tohuk gexxaamah keenih maacannon.

Kanqaan rasuk Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-culma le kabut raqta baaxo Israayil marah elle yeceen innat yabna. Sek Alqedar kee Nuun-Yoosuwa kee Israayil makaabon a baaxo Israayilih yooboke marah kuren.
YALLI dumaak Muusak iyyemii, «Israayilik sagla kedo kee garabah baaxo teceen waqdi, saami caxxa elle qidak
Muusa, Ordonuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta baaxo dumaak Israayilik nammay takke kedo kee sidochaytô kedok garabah kureh yen. Muusa, Leewih yooboke mara baaxok cabeh. Baaxo magennoonu'mmay, dabaaqah elle gacan magaalooli kee, lac elle yayloolen baaxo keenih yecee. Yuusufuk rade mari namma ikkel baxsimeh yen. Tohum Manasse kee Efrayim deqsitta kedok ten. Uxih sagla kedo kee garab baaxo gee'kal akah raqtem, tohih sabbata.
YALLI, Muusak, «Israayil ummatah baaxo ucuya» elle iyye innal, Israayil mari keenih kure.
Israayil mari Gilgal deqsita aracal yan waqdi, Yuudah tooboke labha Yoosuwal temeete. Too marak numuk teeni Yafunnê-Kaalib deqsita numuy Keniida deqsita gulubuh yaabukehiyyak ten. Too num kaak iyyemii, «Koo kee yi giddinaamak Kaades-Barniqa deqsita aracal nan saaku, YALLIH numuh yen Muusak iyyem taaxigeh.
YALLIH naqasuh yen Muusa, a baaxo gibiteh amaate'gidih yoo ruube saaku, barak morootom karmat en. Too saaku gibah gexeh elle uduure ikkel, dirab sinni nummâ-xaagu gabat baahe.
Yo'lih gexe mari sinam akak meysitta xaagu gabat baahen. Yoh tu gactek, YALLAY yi Dagelta kinnihiyyah yaabal digga exceeh baguuk kibaal kaal hee.
Too saaku Muusa yok iyyeemih, ‹Baguuk YALLAL kibaal hayteemih sabbatah, usuk atu ibah adda akak gacteh temeete baaxo koh aceele. Too baaxo koo kee ku buxah marih ikoytah raaqele› axcuk xiibite.
YALLI Muusak woh iyyeemiiy akke morootom kee koona liggidi nel gaceh yani'mmay, qandeh Muusa gibah yoo rubbu hee saakih innal an. A saaku barak bacra-taban kee koona karmat ani'mmay, Israayil ummat bacarih tan baaxol meekitak ten sanoota inkih, YALLI elle inxicca iyye innal, kuwwat kee xagarak nagay yoo yabbixe. A saaku fanah carbik baysam mayyu; wohuk kalah abaanam tenek, caylah akah ene'nnah an.
Tonna'mmay ta saaku kok faxaamahaa, woo saaku gibak elle nuduure ikkel, YALLI ‹Koh aceeyyo› axcuk qahdi yoh akah cule baaxoy qaleela mangohiyya yoh taceem kok faxa. Qanaakim akak iyyan maray kaxxa masu kee xexxar lehiyya buxah elle yanim, tokke kinnim, gibah genxe saakuuk atu isih toobbeh ten. Too mari elle yan magaalat maroh gasoosa tan. YALLI yoo elle cateleeh; anu qeebit baaxok ken ayyaaqeyyo'mmay, ken baaxo yoh ucuy» 'yaanam iyye.
Yoosuwa, Kaalibih dooqa abba heek gamadal, Cebron magaala ikoytah kaah yeexege.
Too magaala ta saaku fan Kaalibik rade mari ikoytah leeh; Kaalib YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyal baguuk kibaal heeh kay yab digga luk duuduse numuk yeneemih sabbatah, YALLI ta magaala ikoytah kaah yecee.
A magaala Kaalib carbit raaqissa haamak dumal, migaaqah Arbaq magaala teetik axcuk yenen. Arbaq deqsitak yen num Qanaakim deqsita marak kaxxa numuk ten. Tohuk lakal ummatta carbik toffoofeh raqte.

Yuudak rade mari baaxok isi xexxar geeh. Geen baaxo mangah akkuk tenem magideey inteenik, bacarih tan baaxok Xiin deqsita aracay gabbi-qaxak xer exxat raqqa 'yahiyya fan gufak ten. Tohumuu, Edom marih cuduud edde yaade ikkek ten.
Gabbi-qaxat cuduud edde aadayuk yenem, Rabe Bad deqsita badak gabbi-qaxa raqta exxa.
Tokkeek cuduud Igix-le-Daaba deqsita aracak gabbi-qaxa le kabuk gacca 'yeh, Xiin deqsita bacarih tan baaxo fan guffa haak, Kaadis-Barniqa deqsitta magaalak gabbi-qaxat raqta baaxo gufak yen. Tokkek cuduud keenik Cesram deqsitta magaalak adda gacca 'yeh Addar deqsitta magaala maadak yen. Tokkeek kaadu Karkaq deqsitta magaala fanah makka 'yah
bisoh Qaxmon deqsitta magaalah amma 'yaanam fan gufak yen. Tokkeek kaadu Masri cuduudul yan daqar katayak, Maditraaniyah bad fan guffa hayta baaxo inkih kenimik ten.
«Israayil maraw, gabbi-qaxal sin baaxoh cuduud tonnal sugele».
Ayrô-mawqa le kabuk cuduud keenik Rabe badah yen.
Kilbat le kabuk cuduud keenik akah qimbisem, Ordon weeqayti Rabe Badal edde yaade ikke.
Tokkeek Beet-Cogla deqsita arac fan maadda haak lakal, Beet-Qaraba deqsita aracak kilbat le kabuk gacca 'yeh, Bohan-Xaa deqsita xaa elle yen arac fan gufak yen. Bohan, Ruuben-baxaay; a arac kay migaaqal muggaaqisen.
Tokkek bisoh gexak raaqaah Gadaamâ Golo deqsitta golok Dabiir deqsita arac fan gufak yen. Tokkeek kilbat fanah makka 'ta waqdi, Gilgal deqsitta magaalay Adummim Daaba deqsita aracat foocah raqtahiyya fan gufa. Adummim Daaba golok gabbi-qaxat raqta. Tokkeek bisoh gexak, Qensemes buyyi deqsita buyyiik bukka 'ta waqdi, Qenrogel deqsita arac gufa.
Too aracaak Hinnom-Golok qaxa-qaxa gacca 'yah, gabbi-qaxak Yarusalaam deqsitta magaalay Yabuusâ mari elle yanihiyya fan gufa. Tokkeek cuduud keenikii, Hinnom deqsitta golok ayrô-culma le kabut raqta koomah amoh amma 'yaanam guffa haah, tokket yaade. Tohumuu, Refaayim Golo deqsitta golo kilbat le kabuk edde taadee aracak ten.
Tokkek xabba haanam cuduud keenik Neftowa deqsita buyyik bisoh gexak Qefron qaleh xaqul tan magaaloolih amma 'yaanam fan gufe. Tokkeek Baqala deqsitta magaalay a saaku Kiryat-Yaqaarim deqsittahiyya fan makka 'yaah;
tokkeek Baqala magaalak ayrô-culmat raqta baaxo gexxa 'tam gexakaa, Edom rasuk qaleela mango arac fan gufa. Tokkeek cuduud keenik Yaqarim qaley a saaku Kasaalon deqsittahiyyak kilbat fan gexak raaqa. Too qalek obba 'yaah Beet-Semes magaalak bisoh gexak Timna deqsitta magaalal yamaate.
Tokkeek cuduud keenik Ekron magaalak kilbat le kabut raqta qale fan bacakkuh gexxa 'yaah, Sikkaron deqsitta magaalak Baqala deqsitta qaleh xaquk taturra 'yaah bisoh Yabneel deqsita arac fan yamaate. Cuduud keenik Maditraaniyah badat yaade.
Ayrô-culma le kabuk cuduud keenik Maditraaniyah badah yen.
Yuudak rade mara baaxok guftem ta gidek ten.
YALLI Yoosuwa elle amrise innal, Yuudâ-baaxok tu takkem Yafunnê-Kaalibih yecee. Arbaq deqsita numuy Qanak deqsita mari akak radehiyyah migaaqal xisen magaalay migaaqah Cebron akak iyyaanahiyya Kaalibih yecee.
Qanakak-rade marak Sesay kee Aciiman kee Talmayi deqsita sidooca gulub too magaalal dabaaqah suge. Kaalib too mara inkih too magaalak yeyyeeqe.
Tokkeek Dabiir deqsitta magaalal yan mara yabbixe'gidih gexe. Too dabaanal ta magaala migaaqah Kiryat-Sefer deqsitak ten.
Kaalib iyyemii, «Kiryat-Sefer qeebit yabbaxu waa numuh inni baxáy Qaksa deqsitta digibih aceeyyo» iyye.
Toh yoobbe waqdi Kaalib-toobokoytih-baxay migaaqah Qotniyel deqsitahiyya woo magaala yibbixe. Too waqdi Kaalib isi baxá Qaksa digibih kaah yecee.
Digib yekke saaku, qibna qaruusuk inteemih, «Yi abbak baqurê-baaxo neh acuya innek, maca le?» kaak inte.
Qibna edde sugte dananak obba 'teh abba fan temeete. Abba, «Maca faxxa, yi baxáy?» teetik iyye.
Too waqdi, «Yi abbaw, barkatah, lee le baaxo yoh teceem kok faxa. Duma atu yoh tecee baaxo lee elle tan baaxo hinnak, lee le baaxo yoh ucuy» kaak inte. Too waqdi Kaalib daga raaqa buyyi kee guba raaqa buyyi teetih yecee.
Yuudah yooboke marah yeceen baaxo ah teeti.
Gabbi-qaxat raqqa 'ta magaalooliy Edom rasut cuduuduh raqqa 'tay keenih yeceenihiyya: Kabxaqel kee Qeeder kee Yagur kee
Kiina kee Dimoona kee Qadqada kee
Kedes kee Caxor kee Yitnan kee
Diif kee Teelem kee Baqlot kee
Caxor-Hadatta kee, Karyot-Cesramay Caxor kaadu akak iyyaana kee,
Amam kee Samaq kee Molada kee
Caxar-Gadda kee Cesmon kee Beet-Falat kee
Caxar-Suqal kee Bersabaq kee Bidyotya kee
Baqala kee Qiyim kee Qexem kee
Eltolad kee Kasil kee Corma kee
Xiklag kee Madmanna kee Sansanna kee
Labayot kee Silhim kee Qayin kee Rimmon deqsitta magaalooli ken maadde. Tittat labaatanna kee sagla magaala ken maadde. Tohuk kalah ta magaaloolik dariifal enna 'ta gaandoodi inkih kenim tekke.
Mango koomaami le baaxol raqqa 'ta magaalooliy keenih yeceenihiyya ah teeti. Estool kee Xorqa kee Asna kee
Danowac kee Qen-Gannim kee Taffuwac kee Qenam kee
Yarmut kee Qadullam kee Sooko kee Qadeeka kee
Saqrayim kee Qaditayim kee Gadeera kee Gadrotayim deqsitta magaalooli inkih kenim tekke. Ta magaalooli elle tenem, qaleela-ragidik ten. Tittat taban kee affara magaala akkuk teneeh; ta magaaloolik sah xaqul tan gaandoodi kaadu kenim tekke.
Tohuk kalah kaadu Xanaan kee Cadaasa kee Migdalgad kee
Dilqan kee Mixfa kee Yoktaqel kee
Laakis kee Boxkat kee Qeglon kee
Kabbon kee Lacmam kee Kitlis kee
Gadeerot kee Beet-Dagon kee Naqma kee Makkeda deqsitta magaalooli inkih kenim tekke. Tittat taban kee lica magaala akkuk teneeh; toh lih kaadu woo magaaloolik dariifal sugga 'te gaandoodi inkih kenim tekke.
Tohuk kalah kaadu Libna kee Qeter kee Qasan kee
Yiftac kee Asna kee Naxib kee
Kaqiila kee Akdib kee Mareesa deqsitta magaalooli inkih kenim tekke. Toh tittat sagla magaalak ten. Toh lih kaadu woo magaaloolik dariifal sugga 'te gaandoodi inkih kenim tekke.
Ekron kee tet dariifal tan magaalooli kee gaandoodiiy
tonnah kaadu Ekron magaalak xabba haanamaay Maditraaniyah badah amma 'yaanam tan magaalooliy Asdood deqsitta magaalak xayi ikkel sugga 'tehiyya inkih kenim tekke.
Gaada kee Asdood deqsitta namma magaala kee tet dariifal tan magaalooli kee gaandoodiy Masri cuduudul yan daqar kee Maditraaniyah badak afah amma 'yaanam tanihiyya inkih kenim tekke.
Qaleela le baaxol sugte Saamir kee Yattir kee Sooko kee
Danna kee, Kiryat-Seferiy kaadu Dabiir akak iyyaana kee,
Qanab kee Estamowaq kee Qanim kee
Gosen kee Colon kee Giilo deqsitta magaalooli kenim tekke. Toh tittat taban kee inki magaalak ten. Toh lih kaadu woo magaaloolik dariifal sugga 'te gaandoodi inkih kenim tekke.
Tohuk kalah kaadu Arab kee Duuma kee Esqan kee
Yanim kee Beet-Taffuwac kee Afeeka kee
Cumta kee Cebron kee Xiqor deqsitta magaalooli kenim akkuk ten. Tittat sagaal akkuk ten. Tohuk kalah woo magaaloolih dariifal tan gaandoodi kaadu kenim tekke.
Tohuk kalah kaadu Maqon kee Karmel kee Diif kee Yutta kee
Yidraqel kee Yokdaqam kee Danowac kee
Kayin kee Gibqa kee Timna deqsitta tabna magaala kenim tekke. Too magaaloolik kalah a magaaloolih dariifal enna 'ta gaandoodi kaadu kenim tekke.
Tonnah kaadu Calcul kee Beet-Xur kee Gador kee
Maqrat kee Beet-Qanot kee Eltakon deqsitta magaalooli kenim tekke. Toh tittat lica magaala tekke. Toh lih kaadu woo magaaloolik dariifal sugga 'te gaandoodi inkih kenim tekke.
Kiryat-Baqalay a saaku Kiryat-Yaqaarim deqsitta kee Rabba deqsitta namma magaala kenim tekke. Toh lih kaadu woo namma magaalah dariifal sugga 'te gaandoodi inkih kenim tekke.
Bacarih tan baaxol Beet-Qaraba kee Middin kee Sakaaka kee
Nibsan kee Qasbo-le-Magaala kee Qengeedi deqsitta lica magaala kenim tekke. Tohuk kalah woo magaaloolih dariifal sugga 'te gaandoodi kaadu kenim tekke.
Tonna'mmay Yuudah yooboke mari Yarusalaam addal yen Yabuusa deqsita mara woo magaalah addak yayyaaqoonu maduudinnon. A saaku fanah woo mari woo magaalal ken lih dabaaqah yanin.

Yuusufuk rade marah yeceen baaxok gabbi-qaxal yan cuduud Yeriko deqsitta magaalay Ordon weeqaytut xayuk raqtahiyyak qimbisa. Yerikô magaalak buyyitte elle tene'kkeek bacarih tan baaxol gacca 'yeh qaleela mango aracak Beetal deqsitta magaalah amma 'yaanam fan gufak yen.
Beetal deqsitta magaalaak bacakkuh Luud deqsitta magaala fanah gexaah; wokkek cuduud keenik bisoh tabba 'yaah Qataarot-Addar deqsitta magaalay Qarka deqsita mari elle yanihiyya fan maada.
Tokkeek gabbi-qaxal yan cuduud keenik Yafleeti deqsita mari elle yan baaxok ayrô-culma le kabut raqta baaxok Guba-raqta-Beet-Coron deqsitta magaala fan gacca 'yaah Geser deqsitta magaala gufa. Wokkek bisoh tabba 'yaah Maditraaniyah Badat yaadee.
Taham Yuusufuk radde namma kedoy Efrayim kee Manasse deqsittahiyyah yeceen baaxo.
Takkay immay a namma kedoh elle kuren inni ah kaana. Efrayim-kedoh yeceen baaxo ah teeti. Gabbi-qaxat raaqa cuduud keenik Qataarot-Addar deqsitta magaalak Daga-raqta-Beet-Coron deqsitta magaala fan gacca 'yaah;
tokkeek Maditraaniyah Badat yaadee. Kilbat le kabuk cuduuduh keenit qimbisam, Taanat-Siilo deqsitta magaalak ten. Tokkeek ayrô-mawqa le kabu fan gexak, Mikmata deqsitta magaala fanah makka 'yaah Kaana deqsita daqar katayak Maditraaniyah Badat idiyya 'ya. Ayrô-mawqa le kabuk cuduuduh keenit qimbisam, Mikmata deqsitta magaalak ten. Tokkeek Taanat-Siilo deqsitta magaala fanah makka 'yaah Yanowac kee Qataarot kee Naqra deqsitta magaalooli fanah yamaate. Tohuk wadir Yerikô magaala fan guffa haah Ordon weeqaytut yaadee. Too kabuk cuduud tokket keenik yaade. Taham Efrayim deqsitta kedoh yeceen baaxo. Tonnah kaadu Efrayimih yooboke marah Manasseh baaxot raqta magaalooli kee gaandoodii, Yoosuwa keenih yecee.
Efrayimih yooboke mari Kanqaan deqsita maray Geser deqsitta magaalal sugehiyya wokkek mayyaaqinnoonuy, yanoonay ken iyyen. Takkay immay isinni naqoosah ken haysitteeniih; ta saaku fanah too naqoosah yanin.

Yuusufuk naharsi-baxay Manasse deqsitahiyyak rade marah yeceen baaxo ah teeti. Manassek naharsi-baxi Makir deqsitak yen. Makir Gilqad xale. Makir carbil yimixxige celemik ten. Tonna leemiik Muusa Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta Gilqad kee Basan deqsitta baaxo Makirik rade marah yeceeh suge.
Yoosuwa wohuk kalah yan maray Manasseh yoobokehiyyah Ordonuk ayrô-culma le kabut raqta baaxol ken xexxar keenih yecee. Manassek too baaxo akah yeceenim maa maraay itteenikii, Abiqeder kee Ceelek kee Asriil kee Seekem kee Ceefar kee Samiidaq deqsitta labhak rade marak ten. Too labha yakkeenimiik Yuusuf-Manassek rade marak yenen. Kulli num keenik isi kedoh exxak abbah yen.
Manassek baxi baxah yan Gilqad lab baxa xaleeh; too num migaaqah Ceefar deqsitak yen. Ceefar kaadu Xalofcad deqsita baxa xale. Xalofcad say xaylo akke waytek, lab xaylo maxalinna. Too urri migaaqah Macla kee Noqa kee Cogla kee Milka kee Tirxa deqsitak yenen.
Too urri sek Alqedar kee Yoosuwa kee abbobtih yen mara fan gexen. Iyyeenimii, «Duma YALLI Muusakaa, ‹Xalofcad xayloh oson akah yooboken kedoh tacayu wayta baaxok ken xexxar keenih baxissa haay ucuy› 'yaanam iyyeh suge» kaak iyyen.
Yoosuwa, Manassek rade marak labhak kaxxih a sayyoh baaxo yeceemih sabbatah, Manasseh yooboke mari Ordonuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqa Gilqad kee Basan rasuy duma ken maadehiyyak kalah ossotinah tabna exxa baaxok Ordonuk ayrô-culma le kabul geen.
Ordonuk ayrô-culma le kabul Manasseh yooboke marah tontocowwe baaxo, Aaser deqsitta kedoh yeceen baaxok xabba haanamaay Mikmata deqsitta magaalay Seekem magaalak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqtahiyyah amma 'yaanam tan ikke fanah gufak ten. Tokkeek cuduud keenik gabbi qaxak Qen-Taffuwac deqsitta magaala fan guffa haak yen.
Taffuwac dariifal tan baaxo Manasseh im tekke. Takkay immay Taffuwac magaalay cuduudut raqtahiyya Efrayimik rade marih baaxo tekke.
Cuduud tokkeek Kaana deqsita daqar katayak Maditraaniyah Badat yeede. Too daqaarak gabbi-qaxat raqta baaxol Efrayim kedo geyte magaalooli Manassê-kedoh yeceen baaxo fanat raqte. Manassek cuduud daqaarak kilbat le kabi gexxa 'yam gexak Maditraaniyah bad guffa haak yeneeh; tokket edde aadayuk yen.
Efrayim kee Manasseh yeceen baaxok ayrô-culma le kabul, Maditraaniyah bad cuduuduh keenik raaqa. Efrayim geen baaxo gabbi-qaxa raqtaah; Manasse geen baaxo kilbat le kabu raqta. Manassek kilbat le kabul cuduud keenik Aaser deqsitta kedo le baaxo gufak yeneeh; ayrô-mawqa le kabul Issakar deqsitta kedo le baaxot aadayuk yen.
Issakar kee Aaser geen baaxol, Manasseh yeceen magaalooli ah teeti. Beet-San kee Yiblaqam kee, Door deqsitta magaalay baddi afal tanihiyya kee, Qendor kee Taqnak kee Magiddo kee ken dariifal enna 'ta gaandoodi inkih kenim tekke.
Takkay immay Manasseh yooboke mari too magaaloolil suge mara wokkek yayyaaqoonu yeffereenih. Tohum Kanqaan marak ten. Too mari too magaaloolil elle raaqen.
Israayil mari sarrah qande baahak baaheeniih; tohuh ken mayyaaqinnoonuy, isinni naqoosa ken aben.
Yuusufuk rade mari Yoosuwal yemeeteeh kaak iyyeemihii, «Baaxok dibuk inki exxâ-baxa neh akah teceem macaay? YALLI barkat net heeh nee yeymeggeeh kaxxam manginok» kaak iyyen.
Yoosuwa keenil gacseemih, «Kaxxam temeggeeniih Efrayim rasuk qaleela mango exxa siinik daggowtek, wonnal Feriidah yooboke mara kee Rafaayim akak iyyan marih baaxoy garboh tanihiyya gexaay too garbo irgiqqa haay booxa abba haay elle gaca» keenik iyye.
Too waqdi Yuusufuk radde Efrayim kee Manasseh yooboke mari Yoosuwak iyyeemih, «Qaleela le baaxo nek qunxaah; takkay immay Kanqaan maray booxaaxah tan baaxol yanihiyya birtak bicsen gaariiray carbi edde abaanahiyya lon. Too mari elle yanim, Beet-San deqsitta magaala kee tet dariifal tan gaandoodi kee tonnah Yidraqel-Daqar deqsita aracak ten» kaak iyyen.
Yoosuwa, Efrayim kee Manasseh yooboke marak garabak iyyemii, «Isin mango mara kinnitoonuuh; kaadu celeemah yan mara kinnitoonuuh away geyteenimit ossotinah baaxo geetton.
Qaleela mango baaxo siinih antacawwimele. Garboh tani'mmay caxa akak irgiqqaay booxah cabba haay a exxaay woo exxa akak isinnih haysita. Wokkel yan Kanqaan mari carbi gaariiray birtak abeenihiyya loonuuh celeemah yaniinih immay, qeebit ken ayyaaqetton» keenik iyye.

Baaxo qeebit yibbixeenik lakal, inkih tan Israayil ummat Siilo deqsitta magaalal gaaboowen. Tokkel Yallih Nabnah-Siraq soolisen.
Israayil ummatak baaxo gee wayteemik uxih malcina kedo ten.
Yoosuwa Israayil marak iyyeemih, «YALLAY isin akak radden sin kaxxa abbobti doorehiyya siinih yecee baaxo bee'kkal annaak maay raqtan?
Yuudah yooboke mari baaxok isi xexxar gabbi-qaxat raaqa rasul geeh yan. Yuusufuk rade mari kaadu isi xexxar kilbat le kabul raqta baaxol geeh yanik, isin baaxo uxih gee'kal tan malcina kedokuu, kulli kedo sidooca num doorru hayteh yi fanah siinik bahtay. Too mara ahak sarra yabbaxoonu waan baaxo fanah ruubeyyo. Elle gexoonu waan baaxol keenit bicta baaxo xexxar kee bagu kee elle tan innih, adda akak wagga heenih amaatelon. Malcina exxah kurra heenih yi fanah baahoonay. Tohuk lakal saami caxxa keenih elle qideyyooh; kulli numuh saami caxxal tewqe baaxo YALLI kaah faxe baaxo kinnim yaaxagay.
Leewih yooboke marah tu gactek, too mari sin lih baaxo mageyaay; oson baaxoh aftok taamah loonum, YALLIH seekah anuk YALLIH taamat gacaanama. Gaad kee Ruuben kee Manassek ayrô-mawqat raqta exxa isi xexxar baaxok geyteh. Too baaxo naharal elle Muusay YALLIH naqasuh yenehiyya keenih yeceeh suge baaxo kinni» 'yaanam iyye.
Woo maray dooreenihiyya Yoosuwa fan yemeeteh. Too waqdi Yoosuwa keenik iyyeemihii, «Ama siinih niyaaten baaxoh addat gexam gexa. Baaxo elle tan inna uktubba haay yol baaha. Toh bahtan waqdi, baaxol saami caxxa siinih elle qida inna YALLA essereyyo» keenik iyye. Too mari gexeeh woo baaxo gexam gexak adda akak wagittaay malcina exxal kurra heenih yemeeten. Baaxok kulli exxat magaaloolik tanim uktubba heenih yemeeten. Tokkeek Siilo deqsitta magaalal yen ken ruube Yoosuwa fan yemeete.
Yoosuwa saami caxxal YALLI keenih loowe baaxo yable'gidih, saami caxxa qide. Tohuk lakal saami caxxal keenih tewqe baaxoo, baaxo geeh suge wayte kedoodah yecee.
Yalli saami caxxal naharak yeyyeeqe baaxo akah tontocowwem, Benyam kedoh yooboke mara. Too mara gufte baaxo Yuuda kee Yuusufuk rade marih baaxok fanal ten.
Kilbat le kabuk baaxok cuduud akak ugutam, Ordonuk teneeh; tokkeek kilbat le kabuk Yerikô-magaalak bacakkuh ayrô-culma le kabut tan baaxoy qaleela mangohiyyak gacca 'yah, Beet-Awen deqsitta magaalak xaquk tan bacarih tan baaxoh amma 'yaanam tikka 'ya rasi inkih kenim yekke.
Tokkeek cuduud keenik Luud deqsitta magaalay a saaku Beetal deqsittahiyyak gabbi-qaxal tan ullullu fan guffa haa. Tokkeek Qataarot-Addar deqsitta magaala fan gufa. Too magaala elle tanim, Guba-raqta-Beet-Coron deqsitta magaalak gabbi-qaxat raqta qaleh amo.
Tokkeek cuduud keenik gersi kaalib fanah yufkune. Tohumuu, ta qalek ayrô-culma le kabut raqta exxak gabbi-qaxa fan makka 'taah; tokkeek Kiryat-Baqal deqsitta magaalay a saaku Kiryat-Yaqaarim deqsittahiyya fan gexxa. Tohum Yuudâ-rasul geytimta magaala. Taham ayrô-culma le kabuk cuduud keenik edde yaadee ikkek ten.
Gabbi-qaxat raaqa cuduud keenik Kiryat-Yaqaarim deqsitta magaalak qimbisaah; tokkeek Neftowa deqsitta buyyitte fanah gufa.
Tokkeek cuduud keenik Refaayim Golo deqsitta golok kilbat le kabut raqta qaley Hinnom Golo akak amballayuk raqtahiyya fanah ooba. Tokkeek Hinnom Goloh addal gacca 'yeh Yarusalaam amot akak raqta qalel gabbi-qaxal tan ullulluk Qenrogel deqsita buyyi fanah yamaate.
Tokkeek cuduud keenik kilbat le kabul Qensemes deqsita arac fanah yamaate. Tokkeek Gallot deqsitta magaalay Adummim Daaba deqsita aracat foocah afkunuk raaqahiyya fanah yamaate. Tokkeek cuduud Bohan-Xaa deqsita xaa fan gufa. Bohan, Ruuben-baxaay; a xaa kay migaaqal muggaaqisen.
Tokkeek cuduud keenik Ordon weeqaytu akak ubulla haan koomaamik kilbat le kabuk gacca 'yah, Ordon daqaarih addal obba 'yah,
Beet-Cogla deqsita arac elle yan qalek kilbat le kabuk tabba 'yah, Rabe Bad deqsita badat Ordon weeqayti edde yaade ikke fanah gufa. Tohuu, gabbi-qaxak cuduud keenik gufah gide.
Ordon keenik ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqa. Benyam kedoh yeceenim too baaxooy; tohumuu, ken baaxoh cuduudut raqta.
Benyaamah yooboke marah magaalak yeceenim ah teeti: Yeriko kee Beet-Cogla kee Qemekkaxix kee
Beet-Qaraba kee Xamaraayim kee Beetal kee
Qawwim kee Faara kee Qofra kee
Kafar-Qammonay kee Qofni kee Gabaq deqsitta magaalooliy tittat taban kee nammay takkehiyya keenih yeceen. Too magaaloolih dariifal ten gaandoodi kaadu keenih yeceen.
Tohuk kalah kaadu Gibqon kee Raama kee Beerot kee
Mixfa kee Kafiira kee Mooxa kee
Rekem kee Yirfeel kee Tarla kee
Xelaq kee Eelef kee, Yaabus deqsitta magaalay sarra Yarusalaamal muggaaqiseenihiyya kee, Gibqa kee Kiryat-Yaqaarim akkuk ten. Too magaalooli tittat taban kee affara magaala akkuk ten. Tohuk kalah too magaaloolih dariifal tan gaandoodi kenim tekke. Benyaamah rade mari gee baaxo mangah too gide akkuk ten.

Yalli saami caxxal nammayhaak yeyyeeqe baaxo akah tontocowwem, Simqaan kedoh yooboke marak ten. Too marih baaxo Yuudâ-kedoh yeceen baaxoh addal ten.
Keenih yeceen magaalooli ah teeti. Bersabaq kee Sabaq kee Molada kee
Haxar-Suqal kee Baala kee Qexem kee
Eltolad kee Batul kee Corma kee
Xiklag kee Beet-Markabot kee Caxar-Suusa kee
