Beet-Labayot kee Saruucen deqsitta magaalooli akkuk ten. Tittat taban kee sidiica magaala akkuk ten. Too magaaloolih dariifal tan gaandoodi kaadu kenim tekke.
Tohuk kalah kaadu affara magaala kee woo affara magaalah dariifal tan gaandoodi inkih kenim tekke. Too affara magaala maa magaala inteenik, Qayin kee Rimmon kee Qeter kee Qasan deqsitta magaaloolik ten.
A magaaloolih dariifal tan gaandoodik gabbi-qaxat raqta Baqalat-Beer deqsitta magaalay kaadu Raama akak iyyaanahiyyah amma 'yaanam keenih yeceen.
Yoosuwa, Yuudah yeceeh suge baaxo kaxxam manguk teneemih sabbatah, ken baaxok exxak teena Simqaan marah yecee.
Yalli saami caxxal sidochaak yeyyeeqe baaxo akah yeceenim, Dablon deqsitta kedok ten. Too mari baaxok gee exxa Saarid deqsitta magaala guffa hayta baaxok ten.
Tokkeek cuduud keenik ayrô-culma fanah gexak Marqala deqsitta magaalak Dabbaset deqsitta magaala gacca 'yeh Yoknaqam deqsitta magaalak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta golo guffa haak yen.
Saarid magaalak cuduud keenik ayrô-mawqa le kabul Kislot-Taabor deqsita rasih cuduuduh amma 'yeh; tokkeek kaadu Dabrat magaala kee Yafiyaq deqsitta magaala gufe.
Tokkeek ayrô-mawqa le kabuk Gat-Ceefar kee Ektaxin deqsitta namma magaala guffa haa. Tokkeek Rimmon deqsitta magaalak gacca 'yah Neeqa deqsitta magaala fan gufa.
Kilbat le kabuk cuduud keenik Cannaton deqsitta magaala fan makka 'yah Yiftacel Golo deqsitta golot yaade.
Too baaxoh addal tan magaalooli tittat magaaloolik taban kee namma magaala kee woo magaalah dariifal tan gaandoodi kinni. Kattat kee Nahlal kee Simron kee Yidla kee Beetlacam deqsitta magaalooli too taban kee namma magaalat loowoh anuk ten.
Ta magaalooli kee a magaaloolih dariifal tan gaandoodi inkih Dablon kedoh im tekke.
Yalli saami caxxal fereyhaak yeyyeeqe baaxo akah yeceenim, Issakar deqsitta kedo kinni.
Keenih yeceen magaalooli ah teeti: Yidraqel kee Kasullot kee Suunem kee
Cafrayim kee Siiyon kee Anacrat kee
Rabbit kee Kisyon kee Aabex kee
Remet kee Qen-Gannim kee Qen-Hadda kee Beet-Faxxaxa.
Kilbat le kabul cuduud keenik Taabor deqsitta qalek Sacsiima kee Beet-Semes deqsitta magaalak tabba 'yeh ayrô-mawqa le kabul Ordon weeqaytut idiyya axcuk yen. A marih magaala tittat taban kee lica magaala akkuk ten. Toh lih kaadu woo magaaloolih dariifal tan gaandoodi edde anuk keenih yeceen.
Yoosuwa ta baaxo kee tet addal tan magaalooli kee gaandoodi inkih Issakar deqsitta kedoh yecee.
Yalli saami caxxal konoyhaak yeyyeeqe baaxo akah yeceenim, Aaser deqsitta kedok ten.
Too baaxoy keenih yeceenihiyyah addal Celkat kee Cali kee Beten kee Aksaf kee
Allam-melek kee Qamqad kee Misyal deqsitta magaalooli ten. Ayrô-culma le kabuk Karmel kee Sicor-Libnat deqsitta namma magaala guffa haak ten.
Cuduud keenik ayrô-mawqa fanah makita waqdi, Beet-Dagon deqsitta magaalaak Dablon kedoh yeceen baaxo kee Yiftacel Golo deqsitta golok adda gacca 'yah Beet-Qeemek kee Naqiyel deqsitta namma magaalay kilbat le kabut raqtahiyya fanah guffa haa. Tokkeek baaxo keenik kilbat le kabu fanah Kabul kee
Qabdon kee Racob kee Cammon kee Kaana deqsitta magaalooliik Sayda deqsitta magaalah amma 'yaanam takke.
Tokkeek cuduud keenik Raama deqsitta magaala fan makka 'yah Suur deqsitta magaalay gasot maroh tanihiyya fan gufa. Tokkeek kaadu Coosa deqsitta magaala fan makka 'yah Maditraaniyah Badat idiyya 'ya. Maclab kee Akdib kee
Qumma kee Afeek kee Racob deqsitta magaalooli edde anuk, tittat ta magaalooliy labaatanna kee namma magaala takke kee, tohu lih kaadu ken dariifal tan gaandoodih agantah inkih Aaser kedoh im tekke.
Yalli saami caxxal leceyhaak yeyyeeqe baaxo akah yeceenim, Naftaali deqsitta kedok ten.
Too marak cuduud Celef deqsitta magaalak qimbisaah Xaqnannim deqsitta magaalah garil tan kaxxa caxa fan guffa haa. Tokkeek Adami-Nekeb kee Yabneel deqsitta namma magaalaak Lakkum deqsitta magaala guffa haah, tokkeek Ordon weeqaytut yaadee.
Naftaalik gabbi-qaxa raaqa cuduud Ordon weeqaytuk qimbisaah; tokkeek ayrô culma kabul Adnot magaalay Tabor qaleh xaqul tanihiyya fan gufa. Tokkeek cuduud keenik kilbat le kabu fanah makka 'yah ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqa Dablon cuduud gexam gexak Cukkok deqsitta magaala guffa haa. Tokkeek cuduud keenik ayrô-culma fan gexak, Dablonuk kilbat le kabut raaqa cuduud inkih gexam gexa. Ayrô-culma le kabuk Aaser baaxo keenik raqta. Ordon weeqayti ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqa.
Gaso maroh edde tan magaaloolik keenih yeceenim, Xiddim kee Seer kee Cammat kee Rakkat kee Kinneret kee
Adaama kee Raama kee Caxor kee
Kedes kee Adraqi kee Qen-Caxor kee
Yiron kee Migdalel kee Corem kee Beet-Qanat kee Beet-Semes deqsitta magaalooliy taban kee sagaala takke kee, a magaaloolih dariifal tan gaandoodih agantah keenih yeceen.
Ta magaalooli kee tet dariifal tan gaandoodi kee baaxo inkih Naftaalî-kedoh im tekke.
Yalli saami caxxal malciinhaak yeyyeeqe baaxo akah yeceenim, Daan deqsitta kedo.
Baaxo keenik Xorqa kee Estool kee Qirsemes kee
Saqlabbin kee Ayyalon kee Yitla kee
Ilon kee Timnaq kee Ekron kee
Eltakee kee Gibbaton kee Baqalat kee
Yahud kee Banibarak kee Gat-Rimmon kee
Meyarkon kee Rakkon kee Yaffa deqsitta baaxol enna 'ta arooca inkih kenimi.
Ta magaalooli kee tet dariifal tan gaandoodi inkih Daan kedoh yeceen baaxol ten.
Takkay immay naqboytit tohuk lakal Daan marak baaxo beenih. Too waqdi Daan mari Laysa deqsitta magaala gexxa 'yeh qeebit yibbixen. Teetil suge mara seleeniih, magaala isinnih raqsiten. Tokkel nookeeniih, magaalak migaq korissa heeniih, isinnim aben. Migaaqah ken kedo akak radde Daan deqsita numul heen.
Ta baaxo Israayil marah inkih kurra heenih gaba kalla heen waqdi, Yoosuwah usuk elle faxe ikkel baaxo kaah yeceen.
YALLI elle iyye innal, usuk isih elle essere aracal baaxo kaah yeceen. Usuk faxem, qaleela le Efrayim rasuk Timnat-Serac deqsitta magaalak ten. Too magaala kaah yeceen. Usuk woo magaala nammeyhaak xisak uqusbussa heeh dabaaqah elle gace.
Sek Alqedar kee Nuun-Yoosuwa kee Israayil makaabon Siilô magaalal Israayil-kedoodah baaxo kurra heen. Tokkel Yallih Nabnah-Siraqak culmal, saami caxxa keenih qidak, woo saami caxxal YALLI akah iyye numuh acayuk, baaxo tonnal keenih yeceen.

YALLI Muusa suge saaku kaak iyyeemih, «Num qide num megloh gexu waa magaalooli faxxiimele. Garcik num gabat akak rabe num, gabat kaak rabe numih ramaday caneh kaa qidam faxahiyyak too magaalooli fanah megloh gexele» kaak iyyeh suge. Tonna leemiik YALLI taway Yoosuwak iyyeemih, «Israayil ummatak intaamah, too magaalooliy num megloh gexu waahiyya doorittaanama.
A magaaloolik tiyak teena fanah num gabat akak rabe num megloh gexa waqdi, naharak, elle yamaate magaalak afal yan aracay cokmi aba mari elle yanihiyya fanah gexaama. Tokkel, magaalah abbobtih yan marah tikka 'tem warsaama. Toh kaak oobba haan waqdi, magaalah adda culay kaa iyyaanamaay, elle yaadayu waa arac kaah yeceenimi.
Caneh kaa gorrisa num tokke fanah lakal kaak yemeetek, magaalah abbobtih yan mari too numul kaa ecee waama. Rabe num gabat kaak akah rabem, garciiy aaxaguk abem akke waak, magaalâ-mari amo kaak dacrisaama.
Magaalal yan mari cokmi abaama. Umaaneh abem kinnim kaal geytime wayteeh cube'kal garciik num gabat akak rabe num yekkek, tonnal, too megloh yemeete magaalal elle, tah tekke saaku suge kaxxa sek addunyal yanim fanah sugaama. Too sek rabek lakal, isi baaxoy megloh akak kudehiyya fanah yaduureemih tu mali» 'yaanam iyye.
Toh yoobbe waqdi, Israayil mari lica magaala dooren. A leceeyik sidoc Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-culma le kabut raaqak yeneeh; aki sidoc ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqak yen. Ayrô-culma le kabut dooreenim, Naftaali deqsitta kedoh qaleela le baaxok Galiil rasul ten magaalay Kedes deqsittahiyya kee, Efrayim kedoh qaleela mango aracal ten Seekem deqsitta magaala kee, Yuudâ-rasuk qaleela mango baaxol tan Kiryat-Arbaq deqsitta magaalay a saaku Cebron deqsitta. Ayrô-mawqa le kabut dooreenim, Ruuben kedo le baaxol tan Bexer deqsitta magaalay bacarih tan baaxol gudel tanihiyya kee, Gaad deqsitta kedo le baaxol tan Raamot magaalay Gilqad rasul tanihiyya kee, Manasse deqsitta kedo le baaxol tan Goolan deqsitta magaalay Basan rasul geytintahiyya.
Ta magaalooli akah dooreenim, Israayilih yooboke num takkuu, hinnay kaadu, allî-baaxoh numuy ken addal yanihiyya takku, megloh eleetitaana'gidih, keenih dooren. Cube'kal garciik num gabat akak rabe num, caneh kaa gorrisa numuk too magaala fanah megloh kudam kaal tan. Umaaneh abem kaal geytimma axce'kal, caneh kaa gorrisa numih gabat rabe kaa kalaanama.

Leewî-kedok abbobtih yen mari, Sek Alqedar kee Nuun-Yoosuwa kee Israayil kedoodak kulli kedoh abba elle yan ikke fan yemeeten.
Toh elle tekkem, Kanqaan baaxol geytimta Siloc deqsitta magaalak ten. Yemeeten waqdi keenik iyyeenimih, «YALLI Muusak, ‹Leewih yooboke marah dabaaqah elle gacan magaalooli kee, lacti malaalah baaxoy dariifal tanihiyya keenih ucuy› 'yaanam iyyeh yeneeh; too baaxo ta saaku neh taceenimi» 'yaanam iyyen.
Toh keenik iyyen waqdi, Israayilih yooboke mari, YALLI elle iyye innal, Leewih yooboke marah isinni magaaloolik tu takkem kee lacti malaalah baaxoy dariifal tanihiyya keenih yeceen.
Saami caxxa qidak magaalooli yeceen. Leewî-kedok naharak baaxo geytem, Kohat deqsita gulubuk ten. Yuuda kee Simqaan kee Benyam gufte baaxok taban kee sidiica magaala Sek Haaruunuk rade marah yeceen.
Kohat-gulubuk, Haaruunuk rade marak kalih marah, Efrayim kee Daan kee Ordonuk ayrô-culma le kabut raqta Manasseh baaxok tabna magaala keenih yeceen.
Gerson deqsita gulubuh, Issakar kee Aaser kee Naftaali kee Ordonuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut yan Basan rasut raqta Manasseh marak, taban kee sidiica magaala takkem keenih yeceen.
Maraari deqsita gulubuh yeceenim, taban kee namma magaalaay; akak yeceenim, Ruuben kee Gaad kee Dablon deqsitta kedoodah baaxok ten.
YALLI dumaak Muusak, «Leewih yooboke marah magaalooli kee lacti malaalah baaxoy dariifal tanihiyya ucuya» elle iyyeh suge innal, Israayil mari keenih yecee. Elle yeceenim, saami caxxa qidiyyak ten.
Naharak baaxo akah yeceenim, Kohat deqsita gulubuy Leewi akak iyyan numuk radehiyyak Haaruunuk rade marak ten. A magaalooli akak beenim, Yuuda kee Simqaan deqsitta kedoodak ten.
Naharak Kiryat-Arbaq deqsitta magaala keenih yeceen. A magaala elle muggaaqiseenim, Arbaq akak iyyan numuy Qanak deqsitta kedo akak raddehiyya. Woo magaala a saaku Cebron deqsitta. Cebron magaala elle tanim, qaleela mango Yuudâ rasuuy; tet lih lacti malaalah baaxoy dariifal tanihiyya kaadu keenih yeceen.
Tonna'mmay woo magaala deraafil ten baqurê-baaxo kee tet dariifal ten gaandoodi Yafunnê baxa Kaalibih naharal elle yeceenih sugen.
Sek Haaruunuk rade marah yeceen baaxo, Cebron magaalay meglô-magaalah tanihiyyak kalahaa, Libna kee
Yattir kee Estamowaq kee
Colon kee Dabiir kee
Qayin kee Yutta kee Beet-Semes deqsitta magaalooli. Tittat Yuuda kee Simqaan magaaloolik sagla magaala kee too magaaloolih dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo keenih yeceen.
Benyam kedok affara magaala keenih yeceen. Toh maa affara magaalaay itteenikii, Gibqon kee Gabaq kee Qanatot kee Qalmon deqsitta magaalooli kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo keenih yeceen.
Tittat taban kee sidiica magaala kee lacti malaalah baaxoy dariifal tanihiyya keenih yeceen.
Leewik rade marak Kohat-gulubuh Efrayim magaaloolik tu takkem keenih yeceen.
Affara magaala keenih yeceen. Tohumuu, qaleela le baaxol tan Seekem magaalay megloh aleelitaanahiyya kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxooy; Geser kee Kibxayim kee Beet-Coron deqsitta magaalooli kee lacti malaalah baaxoy woo magaaloolih dariifal tanihiyya inkih keenih yeceen.
Daanah yooboke marih baaxok affara magaala keenih yeceen. Eltakee kee Gibbaton kee Ayyalon kee Gat-Rimmon deqsitta magaalooli kee, lacti malaalah baaxoy woo magaaloolih dariifal tanihiyya inkih keenih yeceen.
Manassek Ordonuk ayrô-culma le kabul tan baaxok namma magaala keenih yeceen. Tohuu, Taqnak kee Gat-Rimmon deqsitta namma magaala kee woo namma magaalah dariifal tan lacti qaysoh arac keenih yeceen.
Leewik rade marak Kohat-gulubuh, tittat tabna magaala kee lac elle yayloolen baaxoy woo magaaloolih xaqul tanihiyya keenih yeceen.
Tonnah kaadu Leewih yooboke marak Gerson deqsita gulubuk rade marah, Manasse deqsitta kedoy Ordonuk ayrô-mawqat raqtahiyyak namma magaala keenih yeceen. Tohumuu, Basan-rasul geytimta Goolan deqsitta magaalay megloh heenihiyya kee Baqestara deqsitta magaala kee lacti malaalah baaxoy woo magaaloolih dariifal tanihiyya inkih keenih yeceen.
Issakar-kedok affara magaala keenih yeceen. Tohumuu, Kisyon kee Dabrat kee Yarmut kee Qen-Gannim kee, lacti malaalah baaxoy woo magaaloolih dariifal tanihiyya inkih keenih yeceen.
Aaser-kedok affara magaala keenih yeceen. Tohumuu, Misyal kee Qabdon kee Celkat kee Racob deqsitta affara magaala keenih yeceen. Lacti malaalah baaxoy woo magaaloolih dariifal tanihiyya inkih keenih yeceen.
Naftaalî-kedok sidiica magaala keenih yeceen. Galiil addal ten magaalay Kedes deqsittahiyyay megloh aleelitaanahiyya kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo kee, Cammot Door kee Kartan deqsitta magaalooli kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo inkih keenih yeceen.
Tonnal Gerson-gulubuh tittat taban kee sidiica magaala kee woo magaaloolih dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo keenih yeceen.
Leewî-kedok wohuk raaqe maray Maraari-gulubuk radehiyya Dablonuk affara magaala keenih yeceen. Tohumuu, Yoknaqam kee Karta kee Dimna kee Nahlal kee woo magaaloolih dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo keenih yeceen.
Ruuben rasuk affara magaala keenih yeceen. Tohumuu, Bexer kee Yahax kee Kadeemot kee Mefaqat kee too magaaloolih dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo keenih yeceen.
Gaad-kedok affara magaala keenih yeceen. Tohumuu, Gilqad rasul tan Raamot magaalay megloh heenihiyya kee Macanaayim kee Cesbon kee Yaqder kee woo magaaloolih dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo inkih keenih yeceen.
Tonnal Maraari-gulubuh taban kee namma magaala kee a taban kee namma magaalah dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo keenih yeceen.
Tittat Israayil marih baaxok morootom kee bacra magaala kee woo magaaloolih dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo Leewî-kedoh yeceen.
YALLI, Israayil ummat akak radde ken kaxxa abbobtik, «Siinih aceeyyo» iyyeh kaxxa xagana akah cule baaxo, oson rabeenik sarra keenik rade marah yecee. Israayil ummat too baaxo tibbixe saaku teetil nooken.
YALLI too baaxol, duma ken kaxxa abbobtik elle iyye innal, yakkeenimiik amaanah ken xiinise. Keenik naqboytiitih yen marah qeebih aabbuk manannon. Woh akah takku duddem, YALLI Israayil marak qaduwwi ayse waa'gidih, ken catak mayso keenih acayuk yen.
YALLI Israayil marah abeyyo axcuk xagana akah culeemik tu keenil mamakinnay, inkih keenih duuduse.

Sarrak Yoosuwa Ruuben deqsitta kedo kee Gaad deqsitta kedo kee Manassê-kedok garabah inkih seeco abe.
Too mari too seecoy usuk keenih abel gaabooweeh, too waqdi keenik iyyeemih, «YALLIH naqasuh yen Muusa siinik iyyeh cabem duudusseeniih, anu siinik, ‹Aba› excem inkih abteenih.
Taham fanah, isinni toobokoy Israayilih tooboke elle cabteenim manton. YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyyak oobe amri meqe innal duudussen.
YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyya kaadu isih cule xagana siinih duudusseeh; Israayil maray sin toobokoh yanihiyyah amaan yecee. Duma YALLIH naqasuh yen Muusa, Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta baaxoy qeebit nibbixehiyya siinih yeceeh yen. Tahaysa too baaxol tan sin dabqa fanah uduura.
YALLIH naqasuh yen Muusa siinih warse xintoy YALLAK temeetehiyyal tanim siinik intam abaay tohul digga inxica. YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyya ikcina. Usuk faxam aba. Kay xinto aba inxicca intam inkih aba. Imaan dibuk kaal haa. Dudda haytaanam kee niyak elle haytaanamaak kay qibaadat gaca» keenik iyye.
Sarrak oson isinni buxah gexoh ugten waqdi, dooqa keenih abba heeh, sarrak keenik iyyemii, «Buxa fan gexxan way mango laay lakqo kee dahabaay nacaas kee biriita kee mango sartan luk aduurettoonu'mmay, naqaboytiitik dannabah orbisseenim isinni kedo lih haysita» keenik iyye. Sarrak too mari isi buxa fan gexe.
Muusa isih, addunyal yen saaku, Manasseh yooboke marak abxah Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta baaxo yeceeh yen. Raaqe garabah, aki kedooday woo baaxol tani luk, Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-culma le kabut raqta baaxo Yoosuwa keenih yecee.
Ruuben kee Gaad kee garab yakke Manasseh yooboke mari isi baaxo fan tonnal yuduuren. Raqte Israayilih yooboke mara Kanqaan rasuk Siilo deqsita aracal elle cabeeniih; isinnih isinni baaxoy Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta fan gexen. Ken baaxo migaaqah Gilqad deqsitak ten. Too baaxoh keenih teceem Muusak teneeh; Muusak keenih ucuya intem YALLA.
Too mari Gallot deqsita aracay Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-culma le kabut raaqahiyya gufen waqdi, weeqayti garil kaxxam naba aracay sadgat elle abaana bicsen.
Israayil marak raaqe mari, «Tawayii, Ruuben kee Gaad kee garab yakke Manasseh kedo nee le kabut raaqa Ordon weeqaytih garil Gallot deqsita baaxol sadgat elle aban arac bicsen» yoobbe waqdi,
Siilo deqsita aracal gaabooweeniih, qeebi keenit abaanamal malseeni'mmay,
tohuk naharat, Alqedar-Fincas deqsita numuy seekih yanihiyya ken fan ruuben.
Kaa'lih tabna makaabantu ruuben. Too tabna makaabantu num numuh akak dooreenim ayrô-culma le kabut raqta kedoodah addak ten. Kulli num keenik isi gulubuk abbah yen.
Too mari Ruuben kee Gaad kee ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta Manasseh yooboke maray Gilqad rasul yanihiyya fan yemeeteeniih;
keenik iyyeenimih, «Nanu YALLIH mara kinnuk siinik innaamah; Israayil ummat doore Dageltal annah tanim akah bahteenim macaay? Sadgat elle aban arac isinni taagah xisseeniih YALLIH amri cinteenim hinna? YALLIH amri katattoonu cinteenih.
Duma Faqor deqsita aracal edde asne dambi kassa mahaytaanaa? YALLI too saaku, too dambih sabbatah, sahdat tabantabta dalka net ruubem hawwentaanaa? A saaku fanah too dambik mataahirroowinnino. Hay, toh nee madudda 'yaanama inna, away gersi umaanet akah asseenim?
Kay amri macinina. A saaku kay amri cinten sin tekkek, beera kay naqbi inkih tan Israayil ummatal oobelem ixiga.
Sin baaxo qibaada elle aban baaxo akke waytek, amay nanu elle nan baaxol ne'lih gacaay, tokkel YALLIH Qibaadah-Siraq elle yan aracal kaa uqbuda. Takkay immay YALLAY nee doorehiyyah dumaak xisne aracay sadgat elle abnahiyyak kalih aracay sadgat elle abaana mahaysitina. Toh abteenik, YALLIH yab cina mara akkettoonuuh nek kaadu naqboytit akketton.
Darâ baxi Qaakan Yallih amri cinna heeh, YALLI bayisa keenik iyye duyyey bayse muquk tenehiyya isih dansiteh suge saaku, Yallih naqabut dibuk kaay wohut asehiyya hinna'mmay, inkih tan Israayil ummat biyaakittem mataaxigaanaa?» keenik iyyen.
Sarrak too yaabal Ruuben kee Gaad kee, tonnah kaadu, Manassê-kedok garabah yooboke mari gacseemihii,
«Mulki lem inki Dagelta; YALLI kaa. Nanu a arac akah xisnem, usuk isih nek yaaxigeeh; isin kaadu neh taaxigeenim siinik fanxa. YALLA cinneeh kay qahdi makka haynek, isin nee qiddaasita.
YALLA cinna hayneh a arac ninnih fanxeemih xisne nee tekkeeh, cado akak carrisna saq elle qide kee amaanah xiinaanamih astah aban sadgat elle abe kee, hinnay kaadu, sadgatah bahne daro garil akak nakme'gidih xisneh nenek, YALLI isih nee akah digaalele.
Nanu a arac akah haynem tohuk tu hinna. A arac akah haynem macaay itteenikii, beera yan saakuh, sin ramad, ‹Isin Ruuben kee Gaadah yooboke maraw, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinni dumaak nee kee sin baaxok fanal cuduuduh Ordon weeqaytu neh hee way, kaat maca liton?› axcuk, sarrak nek radu waa mara YALLA aqbude kalaanam takkeh.
Aham sin kee nee kee sarrî-dabaanah nek radu waa marah, nanu, YALLA yaqbudeeh YALLIH Qibaadah-Siraqih garil kulli qaynatih sadgat abaah, tooboko lih YALLA yaqbude mara kinninoomih astah, sin kee ni fanal yani'gidih, hayne arac ikkal, YALLA cinna hayneh sadgat a aracah abna'gidih mahannino. Tonnal sin ramad ni ramadak, ‹Isin YALLI doore mara hinniton› iyyaanam matakka» iyyen.
Kaadu qagseenih iyyeenimih, «Taham akkuk maacissa 'teeh, siinik radu waa mari ah inxicca 'yek, tonnal ni ramad, ‹Nanu akak radne ni kaxxa abbobti bicisse arac wagitay, YALLAH sadgat elle aban aracih bis lek. A arac akah bicseenim, sadgat elle aboonu hinnaay sadgat akak carrisan saq elle qidaana'gidih maxisinnoonuuy, sin kee ni marih fanal asta yakke'gidik ten› axceloonu 'yaanam niyal hayya hayneh xisne» 'yaanam iyyen.
Yab tokket mayseedinnoonuy, bisoh beyak iyyeenimih, «Toh edde niyaatak abneemi'mmay, YALLIH yab cine kee a aracay xisnehiyyal cado akak carrisan sadgat abennooh, daro sadgatah tokke baahenno 'yaanamah mahannino. YALLIH Qibaadah-Siraqih foocal yan aracay sadgat elle abaanahiyyak kalih aracay YALLA kinni ni Dageltih sadgat elle abaanahiyya xisaanam iyyi abu duudaah?» iyyen.
Oson too yaabak gaba kalen waqdi, Sek Fincas kee kaa'lih temeete kedoh abbobti Ruuben kee Gaad kee Manassek ayrô-mawqat raqta exxa edde yabte yab yoobbeenih, ken yaabat haanam magennon.
Sek Alqedar baxi sek Fincas keenil gacseemih, «YALLI ne'lih yanim digga hayna. YALLIH yab cine wayteenim taway siinik neexegeh. Tonnal isin YALLIH digaalak Israayil ummat catteenih» iyye.
Too yaabak gaba kalen waqdi, yemeete mari Gilqad deqsitta baaxol Ruuben kee Gaadah yooboke mari keenil gacsem Israayil maray ken ruubehiyyah warsaana'gidih, isinni baaxo Kanqaan fanah yuduuren.
Baaxo gufen waqdi, elle gexen mari keenik iyyem keenih warsen. Israayil mari ah yoobbe waqdi, ruffu 'yeeh Yallah fayla gacsen. Tohuk wadir ken kee Ruuben kee Gaadah yooboke marih fanal rade raare qeebiy a marat abenno iyyeenih sugeenihiyya tokket yeede.
Ruuben kee Gaad mari, ‹Astah sin kee ni fanal yani'gidih xisne arac YALLI ni Dagelta kinniimih sumaq akkele» 'yaanam iyyen. Tohuk gexxaamah woo aracak migaaqah «Sumaaqa» 'yaanam iyyen.

YALLI Israayil mara naqboytiitik amaan abek lakal, mango wakti tatreeh; Yoosuwa kaxxam idoolite.
Tonna-leemiik Israayilik idoolaay kedoh abbobtiiy cokmaaba kee ummattâ qaskarih abbobtih inkih seeceeh, keenik iyyeemih, «Anu kaxxam idooliteh an.
YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyya sin taagah a baaxo akak tibbixen marak inkih abem tubleenih. YALLI sin taagah a marat qeebi abem tubleenih.
Ordon weeqaytuk xabba haanamaay Maditraaniyah badah amma 'yaanam tan baaxo sin marah eceeh an. Qeebil akak iissa 'ne marih baaxo siinih eceeh aniih; uxih qeebi edde abe wayten marih baaxo kaadu, siinih eceeh an.
YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyya, sin yabloonu waan waqdi akah kudan innah keenik abele. Ken baaxok siinih ayyaaqele. YALLI qahdi siinih akah cule innah, ken baaxo sinim abele.
Tonna'mmay Yallih xinto elle tan Muusal obte kitaabal unkuttubba intem digga luk abtaanam siinil tan. Too kitab inxicca 'tam inkih duudussaanam siinil tan.
Tonnah kaadu a sin addat raaqeh yan mara lih magacinaay; oson migaq akak xagan isinni gabak bicsen duyyey yalla akak iyyaanahiyyah migaq ken lih maxagina. Tohimih migaaqal nadri maculina. Too duyye maqbudinaay qibaadah gommoh akah maradina.
A saaku fanah YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyya imaan digga luk akah sugten innah, uxih imaan dibuk kaal haa.
YALLI isin bisoh gutuqak elle gexxaanamal, kaxxam nabaah qande le doolatwa baaxok yeyyeeqe. Num siinit makoysitinna.
YALLI isih xagana siinih elle culla 'ye innal, qeebi isih siinih abeeh; tonna-leemiik sin marak inki num keenik alfi num yeyredde.
Wohoysaay YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyya ikcinaay tohul digga 'xica. Toh sin taagah siinik axceemi.
Isinni Dageltal imaan hee wayteeniih woo sin addat raaqe marat tengeleenih keenik rihimteenik,
tonnal YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyya a mara baaxok siinih mayayyaaqa. Takkay immay ta mari edde raddoonu waytan oflo siinil akkelon. Keetalat yoogoren numih xiiroonuh daleh inna siinil akkelon. Intih addat rade keenah gide siinil akkelon. A niqmatah tan baaxoy YALLI siinih yeceehiyyah inki num cabba haytaanam fan tamah siinit akkuk sugele.
«Awayah tu gactek, yot rabi wakti xayyooweh yaniih; siinik kulli num isi afqado kee kasal, YALLI aceeyyo axcuk xagana siinih akah cule niqmat siinih yeceem tableenih tanin. Usuk xagana siinih akah culla 'yeemik tu siinil mamakinnay siinih duuduseh.
Takkay immay YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyya too xagana akah culla 'yem tiya-tiyah siinih elle duuduse innal, tonnah kaadu, kay yab cinna hayteenik, siinil baaheyyo iyye umaanek tu cabe'kal siinil baahelem ixiga. A baaxok bayetton.
Usuk xagura siinik iyye kay xinto xagure wayteeniih, tonnah kaadu, YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyya maaqilla hayteenih, deedaltamay yalla axcuk yaqbudeenihiyya tuqbudeenik, wohih taamat gacteenik, YALLI isi bagcarrat sin digaaleleeh; away siinih yecee niqmatah tan baaxol num siinik maraaqa» keenik iyye.

Yoosuwa Seekem deqsita aracal Israayilik rade mara inkih gaaboyse. Tokkel idoola kee kedoh abbobtiiy cokmaaba kee ummattâ qaskarih abbobtih inkih seeco abeeh; oson Yallih Qibaadah Siraqih foocal gaaboowen.
Too waqdi Yoosuwa keenik iyyemii, «YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinni siinik iyyaamah, ‹Dumah yan saaku sin kaxxa abbobti Furaat weeqaytuk woo qaxal guubuh yeneeniih; too dabaanal deedaltamay Yalla iyyeenihiyya aqbuduk yenen. Toh abak teneemik numuk teeni Abraahim kee Nacor abba Terac deqsita numuk ten.
Sarrak anu sin kaxxa-abba Abraahim Furaat weeqaytuk daga le kabu raqta baaxok beyya heeh inkih tan Kanqaan baaxo kaa miraacise. Tokkel mango abuusih abba kaa abe. Kaadu Iscaak kaah ecee.
Iscaakah Yaqkuub kee Qiiso ecee. Qiisoh ikoytah woo qaleela le baaxoy Edom deqsittahiyya ecee. Yaqkuub kee kay xaylo Masri fan gexxe.
Sarrî daban Muusa kee Haaruun ruubeeh; Masril gibdi umaane ruubeeh sin Masrik eyyeeqe.
Sin kaxxa abbobti Masrik eyyeeqe saaku, Masri mari gaariiray faroosat giitak beyaana kee qeebi faariisa luk lakak ken katayen.
catoh yoo kallacen. Anu too waqdi ken kee Masri marih fanat dite qide. Qasa-bad Masri marih amo buulla heeh ken akah yanxuqe innah abe. Anu Masri marak abem isin isinnih taaxigeenih.
« ‹Woo bacarih tan baaxol mango sanat sugten.
Sarrak Amoorâ-marih-baaxoy Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqahiyya fanah sin baahe. Wokkeh mari qeebi siinit abeh immay keenik sin iysiiseh. Baaxo keenik beyteeniih isin bisoh gutuqak elle tamaateenimil ken bayseh.
Sarrak Mooyab malikiy migaaqah Baalak deqsitak yeneeh abbak migaaqah Xiffor akak axcuk yenehiyya qeebi siinit abaamal malse. Usuk Baqor-Balqamah farmo ruubeeh «Ken abaara» 'yaanam kaak iyye.
Takkay immay woo numuk, a marat abta abaaro kok moggola exceeh; too waqdi Balqam dooqa siinih abe. Tonna-leemiik Baalakak anu innih sin cate.
Tokkeek Ordon weeqaytuk tabba 'teenih Yeriko fan temeeten. Yerikô-magaalah mari qeebi siinit abeeh; keenik qeebil sin iysiiseh. Amoorâ-mara kee Feriidâ-mara kee Kanqaan-maraay Ciita kee Girgaasâ-maraay Ciiwi kee Yabuusâ-mari kaadu qeebi siinit abe. Takkay immay keenik inkih qeebil sin iysiiseh.
Woo namma Amoorâ-malik a baaxok ayyaaqe'gidih, isin bisoh gutuqak elle tamaateenimil, gadaamah addat ken hee. Sin gayse kee gaysê-baxi keenil baahem mali.
Abqure wayten baaxo kee xise wayten magaala siinih teceem yoo. A saaku anu siinih ecee baaxol nookten. Isinni gabak aysubuke wayten qinab cooxih xaylo kee *daytuun cooxih xaylo takmen› 'yaanam YALLI siinik iyya» keenik iyye.
Yoosuwa qagseh keenik iyyemii, «Hay, taway, YALLAK meysitaay imaan kaal hayya haay, isinni afqadook kay qibaadat gaca. Sin kaxxa abbobti Furaat weeqaytuk woo qaxa kee Masril, Yallih aftok aqbuduk sugte duyyeeya maqbudinay, wonnah baaxot qida. Dibuk YALLA uqbuda.
YALLA taqbudeenim faxe wayteenik, ta saakut edde taqbudoonu waytaanam yoo iysixxiga. Yalla aqbude wayteenik, wonnal isin akak radden sin kaxxa abbobti Mesbotaamiyah rasul sugte saaku aqbuduk ten duyyeeya akke kee, hinnay kaadu, away elle tanin baaxol Amoorâ mari aqbuduk suge duyye doortaanama. Yoo kee yi buxah maraay yi buxal taamita marah tu gactekiiy nanu YALLA aqbudenno» keenik iyye.
Ummatta too waqdi kaal gacisseemih, «Tahaysa YALLA cabba hayneh kalah naqbudu waytam mannu. Toh inkinnah nacsubem hinna.
Nee kee ni abbobti Masrih addal edde sugne naqoosinnak nee teyyeeqem, YALLAY ni Dagelta kinni. Usuk abba hee ablewaynu ninni intih nuble. Elle genxe rasul sahdak adda gacneh elle genxaamal nee dacrissem kaa.
A baaxol kaadu bisoh elle genxaamal, YALLI Amoorâ-maray akkel sugehiyya baaxok yeyyeeqeh. Tonna leemiik koo kee ku buxa elle abtan innal, nanu kaadu YALLA aqbudenno. Ni Dagelti kaa» iyyen.
Yoosuwa keenil gacseemih, «Toh meqeh immay, YALLA taqbudeenim gibdi. YALLI *kudduusuk yan Yallaay; Yalla akke sinnim Yalla axcuk kaat missoosaanam maqansiisa. Kaa cinna hayteenih dambit asa mara takkoonu waan waqdi, usuk toh siinit macaba.
Kaa cabba hayteenih marin mari yaqbudem tuqbudeenik, gaba siinil qideeh sin digaalele. Duma siinih maquk sugaamah, sin baysele» keenik iyye.
Too waqdi ummatta Yoosuwal gacissemii, «Aleeyyah, nanu YALLA aqbudenno» iyyen.
Yoosuwa keenik iyyeemih, «Hay, tonnal, tahaysa isin YALLA taqbudoonuh kaa doorteenimih sumaq isinnih isinnil akketton» keenik iyye.
Osonuuy, «Yeey, meqeh; ninnih ninnil sumaq akkenno» iyyen.
«Hay, tonnal, ama gabat liton marin mari yaqbude xeet kee coox wonnah qidaay; imaan YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyal digga haa» iyye.
Ummatta sarrak Yoosuwak inteemih, «Nanu dubuk YALLAY ni Dagelta kinnihiyya aqbudennooh usuk aba iyyem abenno» iyyen.
Yoosuwa too saaku YALLIH aftok ummatta lih bica abeeh; tokkel Seekem deqsita aracal kataatoonu waan xinto kee amri keenih warse.
Yoosuwa too xinto kee amri Yallih xintoh kitaabih addal yuktube. Kaxxa xaa bahha heeh YALLA elle yaqbuden aracak xaqul tan garsah gubal hee.
Tohuk lakal Yoosuwa inkih tan ummattak iyyeemih, «A xaa wagita. A xaahi ni sumaq akkele. A xaahi YALLI ne'lih yaabe yab inkih yoobbeh. Tonna-leemiik YALLA kinni sin Dagelti niqbam abe waytaana'gidih, a xaahi sumaq siinil akkele» iyye.
Sarrak Yoosuwa too yaabak gaba kale waqdi ummattak, «Ahaysa gexxaasita» iyyeeh; too waqdi kulli num keenik isi aracah yuduure.
Tohuk lakal Nuun-Yoosuway YALLIH naqasuh yenehiyya qumrik bool kee tabna karmat yan saaku rabe.
Efrayim rasuk qaleelah tan baaxol, Gaqas deqsitta qalek kilbat le kabut raqta Timnat-Serac deqsitta magaalay Israayil mari kaah yeceeh sugehiyyal kaa yoogoqen.
Israayil mari Yoosuwa yanim fanah, YALLA aqbuduk sugeeniih; sarrak usuk rabek sarra kaadu woo kedoh abbobtiy YALLI Israayil marah abem isih tublehiyya tanim fanah, YALLA aqbuduk sugen.
Yuusuf ginaaday Israayil mari Masrik baahehiyya Seekem deqsita aracal yoogoqen. Woo arac Yaqkuub, Camor xaylok bool garsih xaame aracak ten. Camor, Seekem abbak ten. A baaxo Yuusuf abuusi nagre.
Haaruun baxi Alqedar kaadu rabeeh; Gibqa deqsitta magaalal kaa yoogoqen. A arac Efrayim rasuk qaleelah tan baaxol geytima aracay kay baxa Fincasah yeceenihiyyak ten.

Yoosuwa rabek lakal Israayil mari *YALLAK iyyeemih, «*YALLAW, Kanqaan baaxo naharak nek tabbaxu waytam iyyay?» iyyen.
*YALLI too yaabal keenil gacseemih, «Yuudah yooboke mari gexxa 'yeh yabbixeemi; a baaxo akah acayu waam keeni» iyye.
Sarrak qeebi gexoh bical gacen waqdi, Yuudah yooboke mari Simqaanah yooboke marak iyyeemih, «A saaku qeebih ne'lih gexaay; sin saaku kaadu baaxo tabbixeeni'gidih gexxan waqdi, sin lih gexennooh sin gaaduk maraqna» keenik iyyen. Simqaan mari toh keenik macininnay, meqeh, iyyeeniih;
tonna-leemiik Simqaanah yooboke mari too gaaduh ken lih gexen. YALLI too qeebil nasri keenih yeceeh, Kanqaan kee Feriidah yooboke marak yeyseenih. Bedek deqsita aracal tabna alfih numuk yeysen.
Adoonibedek wokkel geeniih qeebi kaat aben. Tonnal Kanqaan kee Feriidah yooboke marak yeysen.
Adoonibedek keenik kudeeh; takkay immay lakak kaa ayradduk suggu 'yeenih ellecabol kaa yibbixeeniih, iba kee gabak kaxxa-gili kaak kalen.
Sarrak Adoonibedek iyyeemih, «Malcina tabanih malikiy iba kee gabak kaxxa-gili akak kalehiyya anu maaqo elle akme miizih gubal yok radda maaqoh buluula onkoysak akamuk yeneeni'mmay; anu keenil baahem a saaku Yalli yok gacseh yan» 'yaanam iyye. Sarrak woo num Yarusalaam magaala fan beeniih; tokkel rabe.
Yuudah yooboke mari Yarusalaam magaalat qeebi abeenih, woo magaala woo qeebit yibbixen. Magaalal suge mara qideeniih, magaalat gira ruuben.
Tohuk lakal qaleela mango rasu kee mango koomaami le baaxo kee gabbi-qaxat raqta baaxoy bacarih tanil dabaaqah yen Kanqaanah yooboke marah gaaduh gexen.
Sarrak kaadu Kanqaan maray Cebron magaalal sugehiyyah gaaden. Cebron magaala too saaku Kiryat-Arbaq deqsitak ten. Tokkel Sesay kee Aciiman kee Talmayi deqsita sidiica gulubuh anuk yeneeniih; Yuudâ-mari qeebil keenik yeyseh.
Tokkeek gexeeniih kaadu Dabiir deqsitta magaala fan gaaden. Too magaalak too saaku migaaqah Kiryat-Sefer axcuk yenen.
Gaaduh elle gexen ikkel, ken addak migaaqah Kaalib deqsita num iyyeemih, «Kiryat-Sefer qeebit yabbaxu waa numuh inni baxáy Qaksa deqsitta digibih aceeyyo» iyye.
Toh yoobbe waqdi Kaalib-toobokoytih-baxay migaaqah Qotniyel deqsitahiyya woo magaala yibbixe. Too waqdi Kaalib isi baxá Qaksa digibih kaah yecee.
Digib yekke saaku, qibna qaruusuk inteemih, «Yi abbak baqurê-baaxo neh acuya innek, maca le?» kaak inte.
Qibna edde sugte danan amok obba 'teh, abba fanah temeete. Too waqdi tet abba, «Maca faxxa, yi baxáy?» teetik iyye.
Is kaak inteemih, «Yi abbaw, barkatah, lee le baaxo yoh teceem kok faxa. Duma atu yoh tecee baaxo lee elle tan baaxo hinnak, lee le baaxo yoh ucuy» kaak inte. Toh kaak inte waqdi, daga raaqa buyyi kee guba raaqa buyyi teetih yecee.
Keena deqsita maray Muusak ballah yanihiyya, Yuudâ mara lih, Nakli le Magaalay Yeriko deqsittahiyyak gabbi-qaxal Yuudâ-baaxok bacarih tan baaxoy migaaqah Qarad deqsittahiyya fanah yemeeten. Tokkel suge mara lih dabqah gacen.
Yuudah yooboke mari Simqaan-mara lih gacca 'yeh Kanqaan maray Dafat deqsitta magaalal sugehiyya gaaden. Qeebil too marak yeyseenih. Magaala abaareeniih; tet bayseenik sarra, woo aracak migaaqah Corma teetik iyyen. Maqna akak baati 'yaanamah tamaate.
Yuudah yooboke mari kaadu Gaada kee Askalon kee Ekron deqsitta magaalooli kee too magaaloolih dariifal tan baaxo yibbixen.
YALLI Yuudah yooboke mara cateeh; qaleela mango baaxol yen mara wokkek xiiriyeenih, ken baaxol gacen. Takkay immay baddi dariifal yen mari biriitak bicsen gaariira luk yeneeniih; tohih sabbatah Yuudâ mari keenik iissa 'yeh baaxok ken yayyaaqem maduudinnon.
Muusa ken elle amrissa hee innal, Cebron-magaala Kaalibih yeceen. Kaalib duma woo magaalah adda sugte Qanak deqsitta kedoy sidooca gulubuk raddehiyya tokkek yeyyeeqe.
Benyam marah tu gactek, Yabuusah yooboke maray Yarusalaam addal sugehiyya woo magaala yibbixen saaku mayyaaqinnon. Tonna-leemiik Yabuusâ-mari, Benyam-mara lih too magaalal elle raaqen.
Efrayim kee Manasseh yooboke mari, Beetal deqsitta magaalay dumah Luud deqsitak tenehiyya yabbixeenim faxen. YALLI woo gaadul ken cateh. Sinam gibah woo magaala fan ruubeeniih;
a mari magaala gufe waqdi, wokkek num awaquk keenih suge. Woo numuk iyyeenimih, «Kol bahnam mannuk, a magaala akak cula'kke nee uybulluyey» kaak iyyen.
Too num toh ken yuybulleeh; tohuk wadir Efrayim kee Manasseh yooboke mari too magaala gaadeeniih, magaalal suggu 'ye mara inkih qiden. Too numuy magaala elle culan inna keenih warse kee, kay buxah marak kalih mara qideenih num macabinnon.
Too num sarra Ciitâ baaxo fan gexeeh, tokkel magaala xiseeh, woo magaalak migaaqah Luud iyye. Ta saaku fanah too magaala migaaqah Luud deqsitta.
Manasseh yooboke mari, Beet-Saqan kee Taqnak kee Door kee Yiblaqam kee Magiddo kee wohih dariifal tan gaandoodil suggu 'ye mara mayyaaqinnon. Kanqaan mari tokkel elle raaqe.
Sarrak Israayil-mari qande baahak elle baahaamal, ken dirkisak isinni taamah mara ken aben. Takkay immay baaxok ken mayyaaqinnoonuy, yanoonay ken iyyen.
Efrayim mari kaadu Kanqaan maray Geser deqsitta magaalal sugehiyya mayyaaqinnoonuy, elle yanoonay ken iyyeeniih; too mari too magaalal elle ken lih raaqe.
Dablon mari kaadu Kitron kee Nahlol deqsitta namma magaalal suge Kanqaan mara mayyaaqinnoonuy, yanoonay iyyen. Takkay immay dirkih isinni taamah mara ken abeeniih; keenih taamitak elle raaqen.
Aaser mari kaadu Qakko kee Sayda kee Aclab kee Akdib kee Celba kee Afeek kee Racob deqsitta magaaloolil suge mara mayyaaqinnoonuy, yanoonay ken iyyen.
Woo baaxoh yooboke Kanqaan mara baaxok mayyaaqinnoonuuy; tonna-leemiik too mari too magaaloolil ken lih anuk yenen.
Naftaali kaadu Beet-Semes kee Beet-Qanat deqsitta namma magaalal suge mara mayyaaqinnoonuuy, yanoonay ken iyyen. Too kedo woo baaxoh yooboke Kanqaan mara cabeenih mayyaaqinnoonu'mmay, isinni taamah ken dirkisak isinni taamah mara ken aben.
Amoorah yooboke mari, Daan-mara qaleela mango baaxo fanah dirkih ken gacseeniih, tokkeek addah booxaaxih tan baaxo fanah oobe ken kalen.
Amoorah yooboke mari Ceres deqsitta Qale kee Ayyaalon kee Saqalbim deqsita aracal elle raaqen. Takkay immay Efrayim kee Manasseh yooboke mari reedah amol keenik gacca 'yeenih, ken dirkisak isinni taamat ken heen.
Amoorâ-marih cuduud, kilbat le kabul Silaq deqsita aracak Igix le Daaba deqsita arac fan beyak raaqa.

YALLIH malaykatti Gilgal akak iyyan aracaak, Bokim deqsita arac yemeeteeh, tokkel Israayil marak annah iyye. «Masrik sin eyyeqqa heeh sin kaxxa abbobtik, ‹Siinih aceeyyo› exceh xagana akah cule baaxo fan sin baahe. ‹Anu sin lih haysite bical sin mamaka'mmay,
isin kaadu a baaxol yan mara lih hebeltô-bica mahaysitina. Oson sadgat elle aban mansafitte bututtukka haa› 'yaanam siinik exceh en. Takkay immay anu siinik excem maabinnitoonuuy; maabina siinik excem abten. Hay, ceele-waytam abten!
Taway siinik axcemii, Anu ahaysa isin ken gutuqak bahtaanamah, a mara baaxok siinih mayyaaqa. Oson naqboytit siinik akkelon. Oson yaqbuden duyyeeya ofloy edde radaanahiyya siinil akkelon» iyye.
YALLIH malaykatti ah iyye waqdi, inkih tan Israayil ummatta weqteh.
Too aracak Bokim
Yoosuwa Israayil marak iyyeemih, «Ahaysa gexxaasita» iyyeeh; too waqdi kulli num keenik kaah yeceen baaxol gace.
Yoosuwa suggu 'yem fanah Israayil mari YALLA aqbuduk suge. Usuk rabek sarra kinni way, YALLI Israayil ummatah abe kaxxa abina isih yuble mari addunyal suggu 'yem fanah, YALLA aqbuduk sugen.
Núun-Yoosuway YALLIH naqasuh yene qumrik bool kee tabna liggidat yan saaku rabe.
Baaxok kaa elle yoogoqeenim, qaleela le Efrayim rasul sugta Timnat-Ceeres deqsita magaalay kaah yeceenihiyya. Too arac Gaqas-qalek kilbat le kabut raaqa.
Woo saaku sugga 'te kay ado inkih rabteeh; sarra temeete ado YALLA kee YALLI Israayilih abba heem inkih hawwenteh.
Tohuk lakal Israayil mari YALLIH garil dambi lem abak maacisen. Yalla cabba heenih Baqal deqsittaamay Yallih innah yaqbudeenihiyyah qibaadat gacen.
YALLAY ken kaxxa abbobti dooreh Masrik ken eyyeqqa heehiyya yaqbudeenim cabeenih, ken dariifal yan mari Yalla akak iyyaamay yaqbudehiyyah qibaadat ken lih gacen. Too duyyeh qibaadah gommoh radaanam baaheeniih, YALLIH naqabu isinnil oobisen.
Too mari YALLA cinna heeh, Baqal kee Qastarot akak iyyan duyyeh qibaadat gacen.
Toh keenik yuble waqdi, YALLI bagcarriteeh; umeynit buxaaxi keenik akah bubta'nnah abe. Dariifal keenik sugga 'te naqboytit caylah keenik yiysiiseh. Naqboytiitit koysitoonu yeffereenih.
Carbih gexinnaan waqdi, YALLI akah inxicca 'ye innah, abinnaan carbil ken gacsiisak yen. Tonna-leemiik kaxxa gibdaabinat yenen.
Tohuk lakal YALLI a marih gabak ken yayyaaqu waa makaabon keenih yecee.
Takkay immay too makaabonuy Yalli keenih heehiyyah yab cinak sugen. Ken kaxxa abbobti YALLAL luk ten imaan cabeeniih; Yallih aftok duyyeeyâ-qibaada faxeeniih, too duyyeeyah qibaadah gommoh raden. Ken kaxxa abbobti YALLI iyyem abak yeneeni'mmay, ta ado Yallih yab cinteh.
Sinam keenit xukkuttaah ken biyaakan waqdi, YALLAL weeqah hayya haak yenen. Too waqdi YALLI keenih xuwaawak yeneeh; makaabantu doorru haak yeneeh, too makaabanti addunyal yanim fanah kaa catakaay, woo makaabantih gabat Israayil mari qaduwwik akah yayse'nnah abak suge.
Woo makaabonuy Yalli keenih heehiyya rabtek wadir, duma ken kaxxa abbobti abak sugte uma-taamak lafitta 'ta uma-taama abak yenen. Yalla cabba heenih duyyeeya yaqbudeenim dumak laffa haak abak yenen. «Ninnih fanxem abenno» axcuk, uma-gita cabaanam cineenih.
YALLI toh yable waqdi, kulli way bagcarritak yeneeh, «A mari yi yab cineeh, anu ken kaxxa abbobti lih hee Yalla-kee-xaganal digga iyyoonu cineenih.
Tahaysa, Yoosuwak wadir baaxol raaqe mara, Israayil mari ken gutuqak baahaanamah baaxok keenih mayyaaqa.
Immay uxih ahak-sarra, a mara baaxoh addal elle raaqisam faxaah; too waqdi Israayil mari, duma ken kaxxa abbobti akah abak tene'nnah, yoo katayaanam kee, wonna hinna'mmay, yoo cinaanam keenik ableyyo» iyye.
Tonna-leemiik YALLI elle iyye'nnal, too mara xayi baaxok maxiiriyinnaay baaxol ken raaqiseeh; Yoosuwa addunyal yen saaku, a marak inkih, Israayil mara qeebil maysiisinna.

YALLI makkook, Israayil mari baaxo akak qeebit yibbixe mara, keenik yibbixen baaxol elle raaqise. Toh akah abemii, Kanqaan rasut Israayil mari baaxo yabbixe'gidih abe gaadut, woo saaku suge wee maray Israayilih yoobokehiyya yaqiyyire'gidih abe.
Ken akah yaqiyyireemik sabab macaay itteenikii, Israayilik-gamaddi-adoy qeebi able waytehiyya qeebi baritta'gidih abe.
Yallih fayxih baaxol raqtemii, Filistiinik koona magaalal yen mara kee, wohuk kalah, Kanqaanah yooboke maraay Saydâ mara kee, tonnah kaadu, Ciiwih yooboke marak ten. Ciiwî mari Lubnaan qaleelak Baqal Cermon deqsitta qaleh ragidik xabba haanamay Camat deqsita daabah amma 'yaanam tan baaxol yen marak ten.
Israayil mari, YALLI Muusal oobise xintoy Muusa a saaku tan adoh kaxxa abbobtik kataata iyyehiyya, YALLI elle iyye innal, kataataanam kee cinaanam keenik yable'gidih, Yalli a mari ken addal yanay iyye.
Sarrak, Israayil mari, Kanqaan-maraay Ciitâ-maraay Amoorâ-maraay Feriidâ-maraay Ciiwî-mara kee Yabuusâ-mara lih ken baaxol dabqih gacen.
Say xaylo rihimih keenik abiteeniih, isinni xaylo kaadu rihimih keenih yeceen. Tohuk kalah, oson aqbuduk sugen duyyeeya ken lih yuqbuden.
Israayil-mari isi Dagelta hawwenna heeh, Baqal kee Aseera deqsittaamay woo mari Yallih aftok aqbuduk sugehiyya ken lih yuqbuden. Tohum YALLIH garil dambik keenil loowinte.
Tohuk gexxaamah, YALLIH bagcarra keenil obteeh, Kusan-Risqatayim akak iyyan malikiy Mesbotaamiyal dardaarehiyya qeebih keenik iysissa heeh reedah amol keenik hee. Israayil mari bacra sanat kay gubat gace.
Sarrak Israayil mari weeqah YALLAL hayya heen. YALLI too waqdi ta malikih gabak currih ken yayyaaqu waa num keenih ruube. Tohumuu, Qotniyel deqsita numuk ten. Qotniyel Kanad baxak ten. Kanad, Kaalibik qunxa toobokoytak ten.
YALLIH *Roocaaniyya kaal obteeh; too waqdi Israayil ummatak abba yekke. Sarrak Mesbotaamiyah malikiy Kusan-Risqatayim deqsitehiyyah gaaduh gexeeh, YALLI too malikik qeebil kaa yiysiiseh.
Tohuk lakal morootom sanatih gide woo baaxol amaan gace. Sarrak Qotniyelil Yallih amri yemeete.
Israayil mari isi uma taamat qagteeh; too uma-taama YALLIH garil dambih keenil loowinte. Oson too umaane abeenimih sabbatah, YALLI, Qeglon deqsita malikiy Mooyab rasul malikih yenehiyyah qande yeceeh keenik yiysiise.
Qeglon, Qammon-mara kee Qamaalek-mara isi mara lih hayya heeh, gaaduh keenih yemeeteeh, too gaadul Yeriko deqsitta magaalay bagul le migaaqah Nakiila le Magaala deqsitak sugte keenik yibbixe.
Ta malik taban kee bacra sanatah Israayil isi milkih abbaxuk suge.
Takkay immay YALLAL weeqah hayya heen waqdi, YALLI ahak currih ken yayyaaqu waa num keenih hee. Tohuu, Benyaamah yooboke Gerá-Eehud deqsita guralik yen num yen. Israayil mari gabal kaak gabbara hayya heenih malik fanah kaa ruuben.
Eehud inki cusulih gide takke namma-af leh tan gile bicissa heeh luk gexe. Too gile migdi tattabak bagul isik uxuyya heeh, amol saro akak heeh gexe.
Too gabbara gabat hayya heeh malik fan yemeete. Malik Qeglon kaxxa gabul luk yen.
Eehud a gabbaray baahehiyya kaah yeceek lakal a gabbara quukah baahe marak, «Isin ahaysa gabbara wadbisseenik isinni baaxo uduura» iyye.
Toh inxicca 'yeh isih Gilgal deqsita aracih garil tan oren-xaak gufeh sugek wadir malik fanah yuduureeh, malikik iyyeemih, «Malikow, koh warsam faxa sirri liyo» iyye.
Too waqdi malik isi marak, «Ahaysa akke dibuk neh caba hay» iyye. Too waqdi too mari inkih afah yewqe.
Too waqdi malik isi qari amol xisen xabca le qarik addal yen. Eehud malik fan xayyowwa 'yeeh, «Yallak koh temeete farmo koh abbixe» iyye. Toh yoobbe waqdi malik solla 'ye.
Migdal tikiyat luk suge gile guri gabah siibba heeh, taaxige malikik bagut culussa hee.
Too gile bagut daabáh kaak amma 'teeh, buucusuk kaak tewqe. Gile baguk kaak mayyaaqinnay edde cabeeh; too waqdi malikik bagi-xayti taaxige giley daabáh kaat cultehiyyak bagul uduurra 'ye.
Sarrak qarik yewqeh xabca le qari maftacat aliffa heeh isih gexe.
Malik taamat yan mari yemeete waqdi, qari irok maftacat alifih keenih suge. Takkay immay malik qari addal bagi daacot udurrutem yekkelen.
Sarrak afal kaa qambaalak udurruteenih immay qari fake weem yublen waqdi, maftac bahha heenih faken. Faken waqdi ken malik qari-baaxak-bagul qangalayluh radeh yaniih, rabeh keenih suge.
Eehud too waqdi, oson qari afal kaa qambaalaanah gide direh suge. Oren-xaak tabba 'yeh, Seeqira deqsita arac gufeh yen.
Qaleela le Efrayim rasu gufe waqdi Israayil marah *baanta yoogoreeh, «Ummatey carbih uguta» iyye. Too mari yemeete waqdi, qaleelâ baguy dabaqah elle sugeenik foocat gacca 'yeh ken bee.
Keenik iyyeemih, «YALLI Mooyab marak qeebil sin yaysiisu waah yani'mmay yoo kataya» iyye. Kaa katayeeniih, Mooyab mari Ordon weeqaytuuk gacca 'yeenih akak tabe raaren arac keenik yibbixen. Tokkel suggu 'yeenih num keenik tabe kalen.
Too ayro Mooyab-qaskaray carbil nagay timixxigehiyyak tabna alfih num qiden. Inki num asillimi keenik mahannon.
Too ayro Mooyab-marak qeebil yeyseeniih; baaxo tohuk wadir bacra-tabanih sanatah amaan tekke.
Eehud lakal Israayil mara cattem, Qanát-Samgar deqsita numuk ten. Usuk Filistiin marak laca boolih num, laa edde dacrisan af le birtat qide.

Eehud deqsita makaabanti rabek wadir, Israayil mari qagteeh YALLIH garil dambi lem baahe.
Tohuk gexxaamah YALLI, Yaabin deqsita malikiy Kanqaanah yoobokehiyyay Caxor magaala xiinisak yenehiyyak carbil ken gacsiiseeh kay gabat ken yiysibixe. A malikih qaskarih abba, Sisra deqsita numuy Carooset-Goyim deqsitta magaalal guubuh yenehiyyak ten.
Yaabin sagla-boolih gaariy biriitak bicseenihiyya luk yeneeh; Israayil mara labaatanni sanat racmatta sinni uma xintot abbaxuk yen. Sarrak Israayil-mari YALLAL weeqak catoh kaa kallacen.
Too saaku Deboora deqsitta barray Laffidot deqsita num abbaxuk yenehiyya nabih teneeh; Israayil marak kaadu makaabantok ten.
Ta barra qaleela-le-Efrayim-baaxok Raama kee Beetal deqsita aracak fanal ten nakliitâ-caxak gubal daffa 'tah cokmaabak ten. Tonnal too nakliita, Deboorâ-nakliita iyyen. Israayil mari cakki goranah tet fan gexak yen.
Ayrok teena Abinqám-Barak deqsita numuy Naftaali deqsitta baaxol tan Kedes deqsitta magaalal guubuh yenehiyyah farmo rubte. Farmoh kaak inteemih, «YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya amri kol oobiseh kok iyyeemih, ‹Naftaali kee Dablonuk tabna alfi yakke mara baahay Taabor qale fan ken bey.
Too waqdi Yaabin qaskarih abbah yan Sisra baaheyyooh; usukuuy Kisyon deqsita weeqaytih garil qeebi kot abele. Usuk isi gaariira kee qaskar luk amaatele'mmay, qeebil atu kaak aysetto› 'yaanam YALLI kok iyye» kaak inte.
Barak ahal teetil gacsemii, «Atu yo'lih gexxek gexeyyooh, atu yo'lih gexe waytek magexa» 'yaanam teetik iyye.
Too waqdi is kaak inteemih, «Meqeh hay, ko'lih gexeyyo'mmay, anu sin lih gexek, qeebil geynu wayna iisa barrah migaaqah orbele ikkah, ku migaaqah orbe waytam taaxigeemi. YALLI Sisra barrâ-gabat heele» kaak inte. Toh inxicca 'teeh Deboora Kedes fan Barak lih gexxe.
Barak, Dablon kee Naftaalih yooboke marah Kedes fan seeco abeeh; too waqdi tabna alfih num kaa kataye. Deboora kaadu kaa'lih gexxe.
Toh tekke saaku, Ceebar deqsita numuy Keena deqsitta kedoh yoobokehiyya, Kedes deqsitta magaalah xaqul yan aracay Xaqnannim deqsitahiyyal toobokeh ten garsah garil isi siraq bahha heeh sooliseh yen. Too num Cobab deqsita numuy Muusak balluh yenehiyyak radde Keena deqsitta kedoh aabakuk yeneeh; takkay immay keenik baxsimma 'yeeh, isi siraq dibuk tani'kkel heeh yen.
Sisra, Barak Taabor-qale yewqem yoobbe waqdi,
isi sagla boolih gaariy biriitak bicseeniy faariisat giitak beyaana kee isi marah inkih seece. Carooset-Goyim deqsita aracaak Kisyon-weeqaytu fan ken bee.
Too waqdi Deboora Barakak inteemih, «YALLI koo miraacisah yanik gex. A saaku YALLI Sisrak qeebil koo aysiisele» kaak inte. Too waqdi Barak, Taabor-qalek tabna alfi takke qaskar luk oobe.
Barak isi qaskar luk ken yabbixuh yemeete waqdi, YALLI, Sisra kee kay gaariiray biriitak bicseenihiyya kee kay marat badit qide. Too waqdi Sisra isi gaarih amok oobeh ibay ibah yoowwe.
Barak, gaariira kee qaskar Carooset-Goyim fan ayradduk ken bee. Sisrâ-qaskar takkeemiik tembexeeh; inki num kinni way keenik maraaqinna.
Sisra, Yaqel deqsitta barray Ceebar deqsita num abbaxuk yenehiyyah siraq fan kude. Ceebar Keena deqsitta kedoh yooboke numuk ten. Woo num woh akah abem, Malik-Yaabin Ceebar-buxah-mara lih meqe qalla luk yeneemih sabbata.
Yaqel afal kaah matarteeh kaak inteemih, «Yi qammow, amaay yi siraqih addal mameysitinay culey» kaak inte. Too waqdi usuk woo siraqih adda culeeh; isiiy woo siraaqak golik addat kaa tooqore.
Tohuk lakal, «Ku maganah bakaaritah anik, maqab lee yoh acuy» teetik iyye. Is too waqdi canti-koxxak af fakka hayteeh can kaah tecee. Sarrakaay edde suge aracat kaa gacisse.
Tohuk lakal usuk teetik iyyeemih, «Siraaqak afal soolaay; ‹Akke num maay yemeete?› kok iyyeenik, ‹Mamattinna› inxic» teetik iyye.
Sarrak kaxxam cawaleh yeneeh kaxxa xiinit yan waqdi, Yaqel maataka kee siraq edde daabisan birta gabat hayya hayteh, caatih kaa fan amma 'teh, siraq edde daabisan birta moyyak tattabat kaak muddeh; too birti baaxo guffu haam fan dagaak maatakat aatakuk kaa qidde.
Barak, Sisrâ-goranah yemeete waqdi, Yaqel afah bukku 'teh kaah garayteeh kaak inteemih, «Atu gorrissa num koo aybulleeyyok, annah am» kaak inte. Too waqdi usuk tet lih woo siraq adda culeeh; tokkeh addal Sisray rabeeh baaxol radey moyyat akak siraq edde daabisan birti culah akak yanihiyya kaah suge.
Too saaku Yalli Israayil-mara Kanqaan-malikih yen Yaabinik yiysiiseh.
Bisoh kaa gutuqak gutuqak, ellecabol kaa bayseenih.

Too saaku Deboora kee Abinqám-Barak a saare abte:
«Israayil mari qeebit baguuk ugte;
ummatta ruffu axcuk qeebit isinni fayxik ugten.
Tonna-leemiik YALLA fayla taafay!
Isin, malikwak, ankacisa!
Baaxoh abbobtik, cubbusa.
YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyah
faylah argideyyo; kaa saariseyyo.
YALLAW, Seeqir qaleela cabteh gexxe saaku,
Edom deqsita rasuk tewqe saaku,
baaxo tengeyyeeh qaraanak rob radeh;
qamburreh addak lee caxitte.
Qaleeli YALLAY Siinâ-qale yamlikeh foocal axaxiteh
YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnih foocal axaxiteh.
Qanát-Samgar deqsita numih saaku,
Yaqel deqsitta say-numih saaku,
arho woo baaxoh adda gexak masuginna.
Gexenti uqurat xaqu akak gacak sugen.
Debooray, atu tamaatem fan Israayil baaxol
gaandoodiy sinam akak teerrel,
atu amma 'tam fan mandar-taameenit ween.
Sarrak atu temeeteeh ina keenih tekke.
Israayil mari Yalla akke sinnim yuqbudeh;
too saaku woo baaxol qeebi gace.
Morootom alfi yakke Israayil marat
gob kee macaxu gabat le num mananna.
Yi afqado Israayil qaskarih abbobti lih tan;
isi fayxiik qeebi abe mara lih yok tan.
YALLA fayla taafay!
Isin qado danoonah amot kooril yan maraw,
isin kaadu faxxen ikke ibah gexa maraw,
ankacisaay; ahamat yaaba.
Qeelaali deraafil yan butta yakke mari
YALLIH iisat afracuk yaabanaah
Israayil mari yeyseemit yaaban.
Tohuk lakal YALLI ummatta elle sugte magaaloolik
butta akkuk gexxe.
Ugut Debooray, ugut!
Tirtirisak nee bey!
Abinqam baxa Barakow, bisoh gexay,
seewah orbissa mara gabat bey.
Sarrak imaan le mari isinni abbobtil yemeeten;
YALLIH mari qeebi aba'gidih, bical gacca 'yeenih yol yemeeten.
Qamaalekih yooboke marak iisa gee maray
Efrayimih yoobokehiyya isi baaxok yemeeten;
Benyam kedoh yooboke marih lakat yemeeten.
Qaskar amrissa abbobti Makirik temeete.
Qeebi foocat tan qaskar Dablon baaxok temeete.
Issakar-kedoh tooboke kedoh abbobti
Deboora lih temeete.
Issakarah yooboke mari Barak-gubat gace.
Oson woo dorrih adda kaa katayak ooben.
Takkay immay Ruuben-kedo baxsinteh;
gexaanam kee raaqaanam yeegemeenih.
Oson illi lih akah raaqeenim macak tan kaa?
Illi-loyni illih aba seeco yaabbeeni'gidi innaa?
Ruuben-kedo baxsinteh;
gexaanam kee raaqaanam yeegemeenih.
Gilqad-rasul daffeyta kedooda
Ordonuk ayrô-mawqa le kabul elle teede.
Daan-kedo doonikit edde raqte.
Aaser-kedo baddi afal elle teede;
baddi afih dariifal elle raaqen.
Dablon kee Naftaalih yooboke mari
carbi-booxa yemeeteeniih
‹Faxem net takke way carbi abenno› iyyen.
Taqnak deqsita aracal Magiddo deqsita illaltih garil
malikwa temeeteh qeebi abte.
Kanqaan baaxoh malikwa qeebi abte.
Takkay immay oson lakqo mabennon.
Cutuuka qaraanaak qeebi abte;
cutuuka qaraanal yan isi gita gexak
Sisrat qeebi abte.
Kisyon daqaarak yemeete weeqi duufut ken bee;
Kisyon weeqaytuy weeqahiyya ken bayse.
Gaaduh gexeyyo! Digga xica!
Tohuk lakal faariisa xoxobak temeete.
Woo faariisah ibitteek radda xongolo kakkaqô xaw telle.
YALLIH malaykatti, ‹Meerod abaara› 'yaanam iyye.
‹Wokkel enna 'ya mari mamattinnaay
YALLIH xaqut gacaana'gidih mamattinnon.
Kay qaskaray kay qeebi abta makkinnon;
tonna leemik uma'nna ken abaara› 'yaanam iyye.
Agabuk inkih fuli barkat edde heem Yaqeli;
barkat lem, Keenah yooboke Ceebar yabbixe barra.
Dabaaqah siraq addal yan agabuk
is inkih yayse barkat le barra.
Sisra lee essere waqdi is can kaah tecee.
Meqe marah maaqo elle baahan mingilil
qitti can kaah bahte.
Siraq edde daabisan birta guri-gabat hayte;
taamâ-marih maatakat migdi-gabat hayte.
Sisrâ-moyya edde muddeeh, tiggiggile;
moyyak tattabat kaak muddeh.
Namma gulubuh radeeh yinnikisseh
teetik foocal qangalaylut raaqe;
baaxok bagul radeeh edde rabe.
Sisrah ina taagataak wagitte;
taagat boohaahik addak wagitte.
Too waqdi itteemihii:
‹Faras-gaari kaak macah udurrute?
Kay faroosa xayih akah amaate waytam macaay?›
'yaanam axcuk waagisse.
Tu-taaxagoh yan agbi yab teetil gacseeh;
is kaadu qagamqagitak isi bagut tucsubeemih,
‹Boylah orbisoonu waanamih goranat yanin keeni;
baxuwwa takkuu, hinnay kaadu nammayay,
qaskarah yacoonu waanah goranat yanin keeni.
Nabam meqe saray Sisra yacoonu waanah
goranat yanin keeni.
Fillah qaxa yeymeeqen bila baahaana'gidih
goranat yanin keeni.
Fillah bilen saro goranat yanin keeni›
'yaanam isi bagul tucsube.
YALLAW, ku naqboytit ta marih rabah rabtay.
Ku kacnoytit tawqe ayroh innah ifay»
'yaanam axcuk saare aben.
Tohuk lakal morootom sanatih gide woo baaxol amaan gace.

Israayil mari fiirik geerah dambi lem YALLAL baahen. Tohuk gexxaamah YALLI malcina sanatah Miidiyan-mara abbootanah amol keenik hee.
Miidiyan mari caylah Israayil marak lafitak yen. Tonna-leemiik Israayil mari qaleeli-amol gabla kee kalah tan aroocay amô-reebu let yombooqoren.
Israayil mari buqreh dariyyu qidinnaan waqdi, Miidiyan-mari, Qamaalek-mara kee ayrô-mawqa le kabul yan mara lih gacca 'yeenih qeebih keenit abak ken abbaxuk yenen.
Oson elle yanin arac guubuh haysitta heenih, Gaada deqsitta magaalâ fan guffa hayta baaxol yuysubukeenim keenik bayisak yenen. Illi kee laay danoonak elli haanam inkih dannabah keenik been. Edde adoobitaanamak tu keenih macabinnon.
Tonnal laa kee sirooqa gabat luk mangah qanayti gide akkuk yemeeten. Ken kee ken gaali ixximâ-mangah loowimak mananna. Israayil baaxo amma 'yeenih baaxol sugga 'tem inkih keenik bayisak sugeeniih;
tonna-leemiik Israayil mari baacak gexxaamah, YALLAH deero abe.
Israayil mari YALLI Miidiyan marak ken cata'gidih kaal weeqen waqdi,
YALLI nabi keenih ruubeeh, woo nabi YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyak farmo keenih baahe. Woo farmo intaamah, «Anu isin naqoosah elle sugten Masrik sin eyyeeqeh,
Masri mara kee a baaxol yan maray qeebi siinit abehiyyak sin cateh. Isin ken gutuqak temeeten waqdi wadirih ken kudseeh ken baaxo siinih ecee.
‹Sin Dagelta yoo YALLAAY; ama away isin baaxol akak tanin Amoorâ-mari yalla 'yeenih yaqbudeenim maqbudina› 'yaanam siinik exceh suge. Isiniiy woo yaabat maqal yok mahanniton 'yaanam iyye» keenik iyye.
Tohuk lakal YALLIH malaykatti Qofra deqsitta magaala fan yemeeteeh; wokkel garsâ-gubal daffee. Woo caxa luk tenem, Yoqas deqsita numuy Abiqeder marak radek ten. Kay baxi Gidqoon, Miidiyan-mari kaa akah able waa'nnah, qinab caxah maqab elle bicsan aracal kamadii kee caffa tittat anfiyak suge.
Too waqdi YALLIH malaykatti tokkel kaah yumbulleeh, kaak iyyemii, «Qande le agirow, YALLI ko'lih yan» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Gidqoon YALLIH malaykattuk iyyeemih, «YALLI ne'lih yenek, annah tanim net akah takkem maca kot celta, yi amoytaw?» kaak iyye. «Ni kaxxa abbobti neh warisseh sugte qagabah taniimiy YALLI abeh iyyeenihiyya kee, Masrik ken elle yeyyeeqe'nnay neh warseenihiyya maca tekke? YALLI maqal net aalle cineeh; Miidiyan marih xukkot yan mara nee abe» iyye.
Tohuk lakal YALLI kaa fan wagteh kaak iyyeemih, «Koo rubtam yook, caylak litoh gide koo xiqtah tanik, gex. Israayil mara Miidiyan marih xukkok cat» iyye.
Too waqdi Gidqoon iyyemii, «Yi amoytaw, anu Israayil mannal catah an? Manassek, anu akak an exxa, kedok inkih boolah gacca 'ya maraay; anu kaadu inni buxah marak inkih gaca num kinniyo way, mannal ken catah an?» iyye.
YALLI kaadu kaak iyyeemih, «Anu koo cateyyooh; tonnal abtu duudetto. Miidiyan mari qandek inki numih gide kol mayallaay; bututtukka ken heetto» kaak iyye.
Gidqoon too waqdi iyyeemih, «Atu yoo faxxe koo tekkek, Yalla kinnitoomih astah tuk teena yoo uybulluyaay,
ku maganah sadgatah maaqo baaham fan magexin» iyye.
YALLI kaak iyyeemih, «Atu tamaatem fan elle sugeyyo» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Gidqoon isi buxa gexxa 'yeeh girgirru usgudda heeh alayse. Sarrak bululuk tabna kiilo takkem bahha heeh kamiir edde asgalle'kal gaqambo akak bicse. Alayse cado kafaqat hayya heeh, saalooy distit hayya heeh, garsâ-caxah gubah sadgatah kaah baahe.
Too waqdi malaykatti kaak iyyeemih, «Ama cado kee gaqambo a xixxaqak amol haay; saalooy amol kaak cax» kaak iyye. Gidqoon tonnah abe.
Tohuk lakal YALLIH malaykatti amma 'yeh, woo cado kee gaqambo, gabat abbaxuk suge caxxah xage. Woo xixxaqak gira tewqeeh cado kee gaqambo cararte. Tohuk lakal malaykatti qelliteh.
Gidqoon too waqdi, yublem YALLIH malaykattu kinnim yeexege. Sarrak wariggat iyyeemih, «YALLAW, Mulki le Dageltaw, ku malaykattu fooca kee foocah ubleh an!» iyye.
YALLI kaak iyyeemih, «Wagri ko'lih yanay. Marabtak, mameysitin» kaak iyye.
Tokkel Gidqoon YALLIH migaaqal sadgat elle aban arac bicse. Too aracak migaaqah ‹Wagri YALLAT yan› 'yaanam iyye. Woo aracay sadgat elle abehiyya a saaku fan Qofra deqsita aracal yan. Qofra, Abiqeder gulub guubuh le aracak ten.
Too bar YALLI Gidqoonuk iyyeemih, «Ku abbah awurwak nammeyhaytoh awuruy malcina karmat yanihiyya bahha haay; ku abba Baqal deqsittaamah sadgat elle aba mansaf butukka hay; tohuk lakal Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah soolisen gurmudday Baqal-mansafak garit yanihiyya kaadu butukka hay.
Tohuk lakal a koomah amol, meqe'nnal heen xeetik, YALLAY ku Dagelta kinnihiyyah sadgat elle aban arac bicis. Malcina karmat yan awur bahha haay, cado akak carrisan sadgatah, woo Aseera deqsitta gurmuddak tiddigille bocol cararis» kaak iyye.
Gidqoon taamâ-marak taban yakke mara gabat hayya heeh YALLI kaak aba inxicca 'yem abe. Isi ahli kee magaalâ-marih meysih aham laqo abu meysiteeh barat abe.
Kataya maaca magaalâ-mari maaca dibroh uguttu iyyeenih yemeeten waqdi, woo Baqal deqsittaamay yalla 'yeenih yaqbudeenihiyyah bicsen mansaf kee, Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah soolisen gurmudda bututtukka heenih sugen. Malcina sanatat yan awur qusbih bicsen sadgat-aracih bagul usgudda heenih cado akak carariseenih keenih sugen.
Oson tah yublen waqdi, «Ah abtem iyyaay?» tittak iyyen. Sarrak ah abe marih goranat gaceeniih; too waqdi Yoqas baxi Gidqoon aham abeemit raden.
Too waqdi oson Yoqasak iyyeenimih, «Ku baxi Baqalah bicissa hayne mansaf nek yiggileh yaniih; woo mansafak garit bicisneh sugne Aseerah hayne gurmudda kaadu bututtukka nek heeh yanikiiy, ah kaat macabnaay kaa qidenno'mmay, ni fanah kaa bah» iyyen.
Too waqdi Yoqas, naqabu afqadot hayya hee maray kaa fan yemeetek, «Away isin akah yabtaanam Baqal maay kinni? Kay aftok yabtaana innaa? Kay aftok yaabinnaan num, maaci maacisaamak naharal, rabeh maacisele. Baqal yalla yekkek, isi aftok isih yaabitay, tiddigillem kay mansafak» iyye.
Too saakuk wadir, Gidqoonuk Yarubbaqal
Tohuk lakal Miidiyan kee Qamaalek kee ayrô-mawqa le kabu ten baaxol eneyya 'ya mari inkih tittal gaabowwa 'yeh, Ordon weeqaytuk gacca 'yeenih Yidraqel-Daqaral yinfiddigen.
YALLIH *Roocaaniyya Gidqoonul obteeh; usukuuy Abiqederik rade mari kaa elle kataata'gidih, *baanta keenih yoogore.
Manasseh yooboke maray Ordon weeqaytuk namma gambil yanihiyyah mari inkih kaa kataata'gidih, farmo keenih ruube. «Anu fooreh immay yoo kataya» 'yaanam keenih ruube. Aaser kee Dablon kee Naftaalih yooboke marah inkih farmo ruube, «Amay yoo kataya» 'yaanam keenih ruube. Oson too way kaal yemeeten.
Tohuk lakal Gidqoon Yallak iyyeemih, «Atu, ‹Israayil ku gabat cateyyo› yok inte.
Hay meqek, anu woo burri-cabuub elle afiile'kkel, idak yirgiqen xagor heeyyo. Maaca too xagoorih xagaral naafu macsissaay baaxo kafinuk macsisse tet tekkek, tonnal atu Israayil mara yi gabat cattam faxxam aaxigeyyo» iyye.
Hununuh too usuk inxicca 'yem tekke. Gidqoon nammeyhaytô-saaku maaca ugte waqdi, woo xagor uxmumma heeh; too waqdi wokkek caxte naafi sacni leek kibba hee.
Tohuk lakal Gidqoon Yallak iyyeemih, «Dagooh gide yaabat qagitu waak, Yallaw, yoo isi naqabuk yoo cat. Inki adda dagoorul kaadu gabbatu waak, away kaadu xagor kafisaay baaxo uynannos» iyye.
Too bar Yalli toh abeh. Too barih maaca xagor kafinuk maaciseeh; baaxooy naafu luk uynuk maacisse.

Gidqoonuy Yarubbaqal yaaxigeenihiyya kee, kay mara inkih, yakkeenimiik maaca ugutta 'yeeniih Carod-buyyih garil yinfiddigen. Miidiyan mari keenik kilbat le kabut raaqa daqaaray Moore deqsitta koomak garil yanihiyyal gacen.
Tohuk lakal YALLI Gidqoonuk iyyeemih, «Atu lito mari mangoh; a axxul le mari inkih carbit engellaay woo carbil eessa iyyeh ken tekkek, isinni mangah geen iisa keenit ceelele ikkal, anu keenih ecee iisa keenit maceltaay; galto yoh elle magacsan.
Tonna-leemiik keenik intaamah, ‹Nanu a Gilqad qalel elle aadenno'mmay, meysita num siinit yenek, wadirih isi buxa fan yaduuray› keenik inxic» iyye. Usuk toh keenik iyye waqdi, labaatanna kee namma alfih num yuduureeh; tabna alfih num elle raaqe.
Tohuk lakal YALLI Gidqoonuk iyyeemih, «Uxih sinam kok mangohuk, lee elle tani'kke fan ken beyaay; anu wokkel ken koh tittak baxseyyo. Anu ‹Ama num ko'lih gexay xic› akak axce num ko'lih gexay inxicaay, ‹Ama num ko'lih gexe waay› akak axce num isi'lih gexe kal» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal Gidqoon woo mara lee fanah beeh; YALLI too waqdi kaak iyyeemih, «Lee gabal yaaqube mara kee, gulubuh gacca 'yeh afah elle radeh yaaqube mara tittak baxis» kaak iyye.
Tokkel lee gabah kumusak yooqobe mari sidiica boolih gid yekkeeh; raqqa 'ye marah tu gactek, yakkeemiik gulubuh gacca 'yeh afah elle radak yooqobe.
Too waqdi YALLI Gidqoonuk iyyeemih, «A sidiica boolih numuy lee gabah kumusak aaqabuk sugeenihiyyah gabat, Miidiyan marak sin aysiiseyyok, raqqa 'ye marak inkih buxah uduura inxic» iyye.
Too waqdi Gidqoon woo sidiica boolih numuk kalih mara buxah ruube. A sidiica boolih num, woo mari gabat luk suge sakayi kee *baantooti keenik raaqisen. Miidiyan mari, oson elle yanin aracak gubat raaqa daqaaral yinfiddigen.
Too bar YALLI Gidqoonuk, «Ugutaay gexay qeebi keenit abay; elle yanin arac keenik ibbix. Anu keenik koo aysiiseyyok» kaak iyye.
«Takkay immay ken tabbixeemik meysittek, oson elle yinfiddigen ikke fan, koh taamita numuy Fuura deqsitahiyya luk gex.
Tokke guftu wayta waqdi oson iyyaanam aabbettooh; too waqdi mameysittay niya kot gaceleeh, ken abbixetto» kaak iyye. Tonna-leemiik Gidqoon kee kaah taamitak yen Fuura, naqboytit elle tan arac fan gexeeniih; garih akak amma 'yen.
Miidiyan kee Qamaalek kee ayrô-mawqa le kabu ten baaxol eneyya 'ya mari, woo daqaarih addal, mangah qanayti gide akkuk yeneeh; kulli'kkel cakakka 'yen. Baddi-afal qiddeyti mangah yakkeh gide yakke gaala luk yenen.
Gidqoon wokke gufe waqdi, kataysa, isi kataysah soono warisah yoobbe. Woo kataysa kataysak iyyemii, «Gabru deqsitta darok bicsen gaqamboyta kombobbolitak amma 'teh elle nanfiddige aracal yan siraaqal radde. Too waqdi woo siraq qanxixeeh baaxok bagul deerih rade» kaak iyye.
Kay kataysay woo soono akah warse kaak iyyemii, «Wohuu, Israayilih yooboke Gidqoon deqsita numih seefi. Tohu'kkal, gersim makkalin. Yoqás-Gidqoon seef kinni. Yalli Miidiyan mara kee inkih tan ni qaskarak kaa yiysiiseh yan» axcuk, soonok maqna kaah yifdige.
Gidqoon a numih soono kee woo soonoh maqna yoobbe waqdi, gulubuh gacca 'yeh isi Dageltah candu gacse. Tohuk lakal Gidqoon woo Israayil mari yinfiddige ikke fan yuduureeh iyyeemih, «Uguta! Uguta! YALLI Miidiyan-marak sin yiysiiseh yanik uguta» axcuk anay fayya haak yaabe.
Too waqdi isi maray sidiica bool yakkehiyya sidiica ikkel kurra heeh, sarrak kulli numuh *baanta kee, addat ifoyti akak yan buuti yecee.
Tohuk lakal keenik iyyemii, «Anu, woo oson elle yinfiddigen aracak gari maada waqdi, anu abam wagitaay, toh aba.
Yoo kee yo'lih yan marak kulli numuy isi baanta nek yaagure waqdi, isin kaadu, woo oson elle yinfiddigen ikkek dariifaak, kulli num siinik isi baanta yaaguray. Too waqdi, anay fayya haak, ‹Ah YALLA kee Gidqoon cormatah abna carbi› inxica» keenik iyye.
Gidqoon kee kay mara barak gudet xayi waqla, woo dacayrih sugte qaskar dacayri aracak kattek sarra dagoom sugeenih, woo mari elle yinfiddige aracat xayyoowen. Tohuk lakal baanta yoogoreeniih woo buutittey gabat luk sugeenihiyya yiggiggileenih.
Aki namma butta kaadu too oson abeenim abte. Sarrak yakkeenimiik guri gabat ifoyta heeniih migdi gabat baanta luk, anay fayya haak, «Ah YALLA kee Gidqoon seefi!» iyyen.
Kulli num keenik woo mari elle yinfiddige aracih deraafil soolol gace. Too waqdi taaxige-mari yakkeemiik deero abak kuden.
Gidqoon mari yakkeemiik sidiica boolih baanta yoogoren waqdi, YALLI, Miidiyan mara qeebi tittat ken yuyfukuneeh, seefit titta qiden. Too mari tokkeek aben kudmah, Dareeda deqsita rasuk Beet-Sitta deqsitta magaala kee, Aabil-Macoola deqsitta magaala dariifal tan baaxoy Tabaaqot deqsitta magaalat xayuk raqtahiyya fan yoowwen.
Tohuk lakal Naftaali kee Aaserih yooboke mara kee Manassê-kedok namma exxa elle tan baaxoh inkih seeco abeeniih; oson too waqdi Miidiyan mara lakal ayradduk xiiriyya heen.
Too waqdi Gidqoon, Efrayim baaxok qaleela mango rakaakayal tan Efrayimih yooboke marah farmo ruube. Keenik iyyeemih, «Miidiyan marat qeebi abtaana'gidih ama. Ordon weeqaytuk Beet-Baara fan, lee le arooca inkih tabe ken kaltaana'gidih, amaay qeebi keenit aba» 'yaanam keenih ruube. Inkih yan Efrayimih yooboke marih seeco abeeniih; too seecol Efrayim mari Ordon weeqaytuk Beet-Baara fan enna 'ya lee le arooca yibbixen.
Too gaadul Miidiyan abbobtih nammay yibbixen. Too namma abbay yibbixeenihiyya migaaqah Qoreb kee Deeb deqsitak yenen. Qoreb deqsita num Qoreb-xixxaqih garil qiden. Deeb kaadu qinab kamri elle bicsan Deeb deqsita aracal qiden. Miidiyan mara lakak ayradduk baaxo cabsiiseeniih; Qoreb kee Deeb moyya irgiqqa heenih Gidqoon fan baahen. Usuk too waqdi Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabul keenih suge.

Tohuk lakal Efrayim mari Gidqoonuk iyyeemih, «Atu Miidiyan mara lih qeebi abta'gidih gexxe way, neh macah seece wayte? Annah tanim nel akah bahtem macaay?» axcuk kaxxam kaa yessecekken.
Usuk too waqdi keenik iyyemii, «Anu abem isin abteenimih gide takkem hinna. Isin inkih yan Efrayim marak abteenim, ni mari yakkeemiik abeemik fula le.
Yallih caylah woo namma Miidiyan abbobtiy migaaqah Qoreb kee Deeb deqsitak tenehiyya qiddem siini. Anu woo gid takkeemih maca abe?» keenik iyye. Usuk ah keenik iyye waqdi, abeenih sugen bagcarrak afqado keenik xamacca 'te.
Too waqdi Gidqoon kee woo sidiica boolih num Ordon weeqaytuk woo qaxa fan tabeenih yenen. Too waqdi cawaleenih yeneeni'mmay, uxih naqboytit lakak ayradduk yenen.
Sukkot deqsita arac gufen waqdi, Gidqoon woo magaalah marak iyyeemih, «Sinam yok cawalteh qululteh tanik, sin maganak a marah gaqambo telleenik ken yoh waday; akah genxam, Debac kee Xalmunna deqsita namma malikiy Miidiyanah yoobokehiyyah gaaduuy; nibbixeh ken bahna'gidih genxa'mmay gaqamboh tu telleenik, a mara yoh wada» iyye.
Too waqdi Sukkot-abbobti kaal gacisseemih, «Ahaydumah abbixe'kal tan Debac kee Xalmunnah, away ku qaskarah gaqambo nee essertaa?» kaak iyyen.
Too qangaral keenil gacsemii, « ‹Meqeh hay maca le! YALLI Debac kee Xalmunna yi gabal hayu waa saaku, keenan kee tiqir le coox tu elle ane sinni ardik bahha heeh, sin aagureyyo» keenik iyye.
Sarrak Fanyel fan bisoh gexeeh, wokkel suge marak kaadu woo marak iyyem iyye. Takkay immay too mari kaadu, too Sukkot-mari kaak iyyem kaal gacse.
Too way keenik iyyemii, «Iisa luk adaaru waa saaku, amo xer qari siinik bututtukka heeyyo» keenik iyye.
Debac kee Xalmunna, Karkor deqsita aracal isinni qaskar lih yenen. Woo ayrô-mawqa le kabuk temeete qaskarak taban kee koona alfih num elle raqte. Bool kee labaatanni alfih qaskariiti rabeh.
Gidqoon, Nobac kee Yogbaha deqsitta aroocak ayrô-mawqa le kabul yan gitay arho edde gacak gexehiyya katayak, ken qaskaray cube waak sugtehiyya garciik yibbixe.
Too waqdi Miidiyan marih namma malikiy Debac kee Xalmunna deqsitak tenehiyya kuddeh. Takkay immay Gidqoon lakak ken yeyreddeeh sarrak ken yibbixe. Toh tuble waqdi ken qaskar abtam waagisseeh, inkih qaxxaagiteenih.
Gidqoon qeebi-booxak Ceres deqsita daabaak amaatuk suge waqdi,
Sukkotuk yemeete numuy furraynuh yene yibbixeh, essero kaat abe. A num Sukkot-makaabonuk malcina-taban kee malcina numih migaq yuktubeh kaah yecee.
Sarrak Gidqoon woo Sukkot mara fan gexeeh keenik iyyeemih, «Duma maaqo qaskarah yoh cinteenim maay kassittan? Debac kee Xalmunna abbixe'kal, qaskaral maaqo yok kalitteenih. Yi qaskar tecleh tene'mmay, Debac kee Xalmunna away baaheh an» keenik iyye.
Tohuk lakal keenaani kee tiqir le coox tu elle ane sinni ardik bahha heeh, woo Sukkot-makaabon edde yoogore.
Sarrak Fanyel deqsitta magaalal yen amo xer qari keenik yiggileeh woo magaalal ten labha qide.
Tohuk lakal Debac kee Xalmunnak iyyeemih, «Taabor deqsita aracal qidden marih xaagu baahay» keenik iyye.
Osonuuy kaak iyyeenimih, «Too mari koo ceelak yeneeh; kulli num keenik malik baxih ceelo luk yen» kaak iyyen.
Gidqoon too waqdi keenik iyyeemih, «Too mari yi toobokooy, yi-ina yo'lih xalte xaylo. Waara-YALLIH migaaqal xiibitah ani'mmay; ken qide'kal sugtaanamal, a saaku sin wade raare» keenik iyye.
Sarrak Yeter deqsita kay baxay barah xaylok nabuk yenehiyyak, «Gexay ken qid» iyye. Awkiiy bar qunxuk yeneeh, namma kalbiteeh seef masiibinna.
Too waqdi Debac kee Xalmunna Gidqoonuk annah inte. «Labhâ-taama abtam labhaytuk, amay isih nee qid» kaak iyyen. Too waqdi Gidqoon ken qideeh; ken gaalih fillat bilqah heenih sugen bilâ-duyye beeh.
Sarrak Israayil mari Gidqoonuk, «Miidiyan marak nee catteeh; tonna-leemiik atu ni amoyta tikaay; ku lakal kaadu ku baxa kee ku baxih baxa ni amoytit akkele» kaak iyyen.
Usukuuy keenik iyyeemih, «Yoo kee yi baxak sin amoyta num mayakka. Sin amoyti YALLA» keenik iyye.
Qagseh kaadu keenik iyyeemih, «Anu inki tiya sin esseru waak: ama beyten aytî-dahooba baahay» keenik iyye. Miidiyan-mari Ismaaqilik rade maraay; aytî-dahooba luk yenen.
Osonuuy, «Meqeh, kol gacsenno; koo manakeelefa» kaak iyyen. Sarrak saro fidissa heenih kulli numuuy keenik beeh suge aytî-dahab woo saroh bagul qide.
Oson too waqdi, qax-meqe duyye kee fillat haan bilaay woo Miidiyan malikwa luk ten qasdiimin sara kee gaali fillat luk yen bilâ-duyye sinnim, Gidqoonul yeceen aytî-dahab dibuk labaatanni kiilo yekke.
Sarrak Gidqoon woo dahabak rikek tan ceelo bicissi heeh isih elle yooboke Qofra deqsitta magaalal hee. Sarrak Israayil mari Yalla cabeeniih woo ceelo yuqbuden. Taham Gidqoon kee kay buxah maral edde radoonu waan ofloh innah tanim tekke.
Miidiyan mari qeebil Israayil marak gaceeh; tohuk wadir gandi keenil akkuk maraaqinnon. Gidqoon rabba 'yam fan woo baaxol morootom karmah gide wagri gace.
Gidqoon isi baaxo yuduureeh wokkel elle yeede.
Mango agabu luk yeneemih sabbatah, xaylok malcina-tabanih gide luk yen.
Seekem deqsita aracal kaadu sirriyya elle yabbixe barra luk yen. A barra lab-baxa kaah xalte. Woo awkak migaaqah Abimalik iyye.
Yoqas baxi Gidqoon idoolite saaku rabeeh; kay abbay Yoqas deqsita elle yoogoqeenih sugen aracal kaa yoogoqen. Woo magaq elle yekkem, Qofra magaalaay; Qofra, Abiqeder kedoh mari elle yen magaalak ten.
Gidqoon rabek lakal, Israayil mari Yallal luk yenen imaan dumak kaxxih kaadu agaaguluseenih, Baqal deqsittam yuqbuden. Bica-edde-aben-Baqal yallah haysiten.
YALLAY ken Dageltah yaniih kulli naqboytiitiy marot ken abbaxuk sugehiyyak ken catehiyya cabeenih.
Gidqoonuy woo gid takke maqaane inkih keenih abehiyyah buxâ-marah galto magacsinnon.

Gidqoón-Abimalik, Seekem deqsitta magaalay kay abiino elle tanihiyya fan gexe.
Too marak iyyemii, «Seekem-marak intaanamahaa: ‹Gidqoon xaylok malcina-taban inkih, abbobti siinik yakkeenim siinih taysem kee, wonna hinna'mmay, kay xaylok inki num siinik abba yakkem siinih taysem doorita› keenik inxica» iyye. Qagissa heeh keenik iyyeemih, «Macaa, yi tiyah tu gactek, akah taaxigen innah, anu sin qabalaay sin nabsi kinniyo» iyye.
Kay inah tooboko, «Kok naabbeh nan» 'yaanam kaal gacseeniih; sarrak Seekem marah usuk iyyem warsen. Too mari too yab yoobbe waqdi, Abimalik abbah haysitaanam dooriten. «Abimalik ni ramadaay abbah kaa haysinna» iyyen.
Sarrak Bica-edde-aben-Baqal elle yaqbuden qarik, garaasak malcina-taban beyya heenih kaah yeceen. Usuk ta lakqot qamallittey sinam inkim akak intehiyya xaamma heeh is lih ken hee.
Tokkek Qofra akak iyyan magaalal tan abbah-xaylo fan gexeeh, too magaalal yen xaahih amol malcina-taban tooboko inkih yusguude. Takkay immay barah inkih keenik qunxuk yen toobokoytay migaaqah Yootam deqsitahiyya yombooqoreh raaqe.
Sarrî-saaku Seekem kee Beet-Millo deqsitta magaalah mari titta geyya heeh, Seekemil qamiddi garil tan garsah gubal Abimalik reediseeniih, malik kaa aben.
Yootam tah yoobbe waqdi, Geriidim deqsitta qaleh amol bukka 'yeeh, deero abe. Iyyeemih, «Seekem maraw! Yalli sin yab yaabbuk yoo oobbeyay.
Dumah yan saaku caxa akak inxicca 'yaanam titta geyya hayteeh, ‹Malik doorinnay› iyyen. Malikih haysitaanam faxeenim *daytuun-caxak teneeh; too caxak, ‹Daytuun caxay, atu ni malik tik› iyyen.
Too caxa tohuk keenil gacissemii, ‹Mango yallitte kee ummat yaynabe nabam meqe saliid akak bicsen xalay cabba heeh, malik akkem yoh mabicta› 'yaanam inte iyyan.
Too caxa toh keenil gacisse waqdi, *sublal yemeeteeniih, ‹Malik neh tik› teetik iyyen.
Subla kaadu keenil gacissemii, ‹Abah an xalayay tamu meqehiyya cabba heeh, malik akkem yoh mabicta› 'yaanam inte.
Subla toh keenil gacisse waqdi, qinab xalta caxal yemeeteeniih, ‹Malik neh tik› teetik iyyen.
Too caxa kaadu keenik inteemih, ‹Malik akke'gidih, qinabak bicsen maqabay mango yallitte kee ummat ruffa haahiyya cabba heeh siinil reedam mabicsa› keenik inte iyyan.
Sarrak ellecabol tikka 'yaanamaak waaqexxol yemeeteeniih, ‹Atu malik neh tikeey» teetik iyyen.
Too waaqexxo keenil gacisseemih, ‹Isin baguuk isinni malikih yoo doorteenik, tonnal amaay a yi silaaloh gubal gaca. Tah cinten sin tekkek, yi ludway keenan lehiyyak habug inta gira awqeleeh, too gira Lubnaan rasul tan sariida cararisele› keenik inte iyyan.
«Hay, taway siinik axcemii: Abimalikit abten dooro gitak taniimiy baguuk abteenihiyya kinnii? Gidqoon siinih xiqem kassa haak, kay buxah marah usuk abeemil galto gacisseenii?
Yi abba sin aftoh Miidiyan marat qeebi abem kassa maay haytan? Miidiyan marak sin cata'gidih, isi roocih maca yot akkele axce'kal, sin taagah qeebi abak sugek; toh taaxigeenii?
A saaku kay qaduwwik maacisseenih; siinih abe maqaaneh galtoh kay xayloh malcina-taban inki xaahih amol qiddeenih; Abimalik sin xiinisu waa malikih reedissen. Toh akah abteenim, Abimalikiy y'abba kaddaamah tan barrat xalehiyya sin absumak sugeemih abten.
Ta saaku Gidqoon kee kay buxah marak abteenim gitah taniimiy baguuk abteenihiyya tekkek, Abimalik siinih meqe num yakkay; isin kaadu meqe mara kaah tika.
Toh akke waytek, Seekem kee Beet-Millol yan maraw, Abimalik tewqe giray habug inta sin cararissay. Siinik tewqe gira kaadu kaa cararissay» iyye.
Toh inxicca 'yeeh isi abbah baxak meysiteemih sabbatah, Yootam kudeeh Beer deqsitta magaala fan yoowweh elle daffee.
Abimalik sidiica sanat Israayil marak abbah suge.
Tohuk lakal Yalli, Abimalik kee Seekem marih fanat tittin way ruubeeh; tohuk gexxaamah kaat makoyteenih.
Ah akah tekkemii: Abimalik kee Seekem maray kay toobokoh malcina-tabanih qidiyyal kaa agiirisehiyyak, Yalli wohih cane gacsa'gidi.
Seekem mari, Abimalik biyaakisaana'gidih, sinam qaleelah amol raarisak akah sugan innah ruubeeniih; too mari gitah tokkek gaceh gexinnaan marak duyye radak sugen. Abimalikih toh warsen.
Too dabaanal, Qebéd-Gaqal akak iyyan num isi tooboko is lih hayya heeh, elle suge baaxook Seekem magaala yemeete. Seekem magaalah mari kaa gee waqdi, kaxxam tu neh xiqele 'yaanamah niya kaal heen.
Qinab xala cooxih adda gexeeniih, qinab ifiillaay qinab kamri akak bicissa heenik lakal, isinnih elle yaaminen yallah lon duyyeh qibaada elle abaana'gidih bicsen qari gexeeniih, tokkel yokmeeniih, yooqoben. Abimalik baaheemil kaa abaarak kaat yaaben.
Gaqal iyyeemih, «Nanu Seekem magaalal yan marak, mannah yan marak nanih nan, labhay! Abimalik gubat akah gacnam macaay? Usuk iyyaay, nanu iyya? Gidqoon baxih gubat akah gacnam mannu. Dabul kaa oggolayik, nanu macah kaa oggola? Labhay Abimalik hinnak, isin akak radden sin kaxxa abbah Camor madqa kataata» iyye.
Qagissa heeh, «Woyyow, a marak foocat tanim yoo akkinnay! Kamba Abimalik bayisak en. ‹Yoo takkeemil eweqay, qaskarak litom baahay, tilliilek qeebih am› kaak axcuk en» iyye.
A yab yoobbe waqdi, Seekem magaalah abbah yen Dabul kaxxam yinqibeeh,
sarrak Abimalikiy Aruuma deqsitta'kkel yanihiyyah farmo ruube. Kaak iyyeemih, «Qebéd-Gaqal kee kay tooboko Seekem magaalal taniih; ta mari magaala koo culi haam mafaxa'mmay,
is kee isi marah barat kuulla inxicay buqreh addat ombooqoray xin.
Saaku ayro bililiq itta waqdi, ugutta inxicay magaala garciik warar. Gaqal kee kay mara qeebi siinit abta'gidih tamaatu wayta waqdi, nagay tan utkah ken utuk» 'yaanam farmoh kaah ruube.
Usuk kaak elle inxicca 'ye innal, Abimalik kee kay mara barat kuulla 'yeeniih, Seekem magaalak iroh tani'kkel affara aracal kurrumma 'yeeniih reebu le ikket xiinen.
Saaku Gaqal kee kay mara magaalah afal soolah yublen waqdi, uqrat edde sugen aracak yewqeenih.
Too waqdi Gaqal ken yubleeh, Dabuluy magaalah abbah yanihiyyak, iyyeemih, «Dabulow tablee! Qaleh amok sinam obta bas!» iyye.
Dabul kaak iyyemii, «Aleey! Woh sinam hinna; qaleh amoh silaala ikkal» kaak iyye.
Gaqalaay, «Kee baleey, tamah sinaamak sugele wagitey. Sinaamak garab qalek fan gaca gitak adda-adda yamaatem matablaa! Marak garab kaadu, faal elle qidan garsah xaquk gaceenih yamaateenim matablaa?» kaak iyye.
Sarrak Dabul kaak iyyeemih, «Hay, taway, kaxxa tirtiray abak sugte manke kok gexxe? ‹Kay gubat akah gacnam macaay› akak axcuk sugtem, tama numu. ‹Tu'mara hinna› akak axcuk sugtem, tama marak; taway gexay koosit» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Gaqal Seekem magaalah mara qeebih magaalah addak yeyyeeqeeh; Abimalik marat qeebi abe.
Gaqal qeebil gaceeh, Abimalik lakak kaa yeyredde. Gaqal marak tu takkem naharsi qeebit muddumteeh; mangom kaadu Seekem magaala edde culan afa fan lakak ken elle yayraddeenimil muddumte.
Tohuk wadir Abimalik, Aruuma deqsita arac yuduure. Dabul, Gaqal kee kay tooboko wadiriik akah gace waan xiiriyoh Seekem magaalak ken xiiriye.
Nammeyhaytoh ayro Abimalik, «Seekem mari buqre abaana'gidih gexan» 'yaanam yoobbe.
Too waqdi isi mara sidiica aracal kurra heeh, buqreh addat ken sasise. Sinaamay magaalak tawqe yuble waqdi, edde sasak sugen aracak qeebih yewqen.
Abimalik kee kay mara magaalah afa tabbixe'gidih terde waqdi, aki namma'kkel suge mari buqreh addal suge mara selli heeniih; num keenik macabinnon.
Qeebi inkih tan ayro gexak ase. Sarrak Abimalik magaala yibbixeeh teetil suge mara qideh. Magaala bututtukka heeh sarrak qasboh tan bullaaqe gacissa elle hee.
Seekem magaalah kaxxa maritteeta a xaagu geen waqdi, Baqalay-Bica-edde-abeenihiyya elle yaqbuden qarih addat reebu le qari amô-qellah culen.
Abimalik a xaagu keenik gee waqdi, Xalmon deqsitta qale fanah isi maray gabat godma lehiyya luk gexe. Tokkel caxak luud yirgiqeeh, too luud sunkul isik hee. Isi marak, «Isissikay tama anu abem aba» keenik iyye.
