Toh keenik iyye waqdi kulli num luud keenik irgiqqa heeh, Abimalik katayen. Too duyyey sunkul baaheenihiyya taaxige mari amô-qellah edde culen aracal tittak bagul heen. Sarrak gira edde ruuben. Tokkeh addat alfi akkuk sugte labha kee agabu inkih edde cararte.
Tokkek Abimalik Teebex deqsitta magaala fan gexe. Too magaala marot hayya heeh yibbixe.
Takkay immay too magaalah addal amo-xer-qariy kaxxa reebu lehiyya yen. Labhayti yenek barra tenek baaxoh abbobti tenek amo edde qellisaana'gidih too qari fan kuden. Qari addak isinnit aliffa heeniih, amol bukka 'yen.
Abimalik woo qariy amo xeerihiyya yabbixe'gidih yemeeteeh; qarik afa gira edde ruuba'gidih xayyoowe waqdi,
amol sugte barra eceyya dagaak kaal qidde. Too eceyya moyya lafa kaluwwa kaak hayte.
Too waqdi kay silac abbaxuk suge furraynuh sissikuk secca 'yeeh, «Barra kaa qidde 'yaanamih migaq innit macabak, ama tabbixe seefit yoo qid» kaak iyye. Taaxige furraynii, xagarat kaak seef heeh kaa qide.
Israayil mari Abimalik rabem yismiten waqdi, yakkeenimiik isinni buxaaxi fanah yuduuren.
Yalli Abimalik abe umaane tama'nnal kaak gacse. Isi abbah xaylok malcina-taban qideeh; toh Yalli kaak gacseh.
Seekem marih umaane kaadu keenit macabinnaay; Gidqóon-Yootan, «Amah siinit maraqta» axcuk edde yaabe abaaro keenit maraaqinna.

Abimalik rabek lakal, Fuuwâ-baxi Toolaq, Israayil isi naqboytitteh gabak yayyaaqe'gidih yemeete. Toolaq Doodô-baxih baxak ten. Akah aabakuk yenem, Issakar deqsitta kedok teneeh; guubuh elle sugem, Saamir deqsita aracay Efrayim baaxok qaleela le kabut raaqa rakaakayal yenehiyya.
Usuk labaatanna kee sidiica sanatah Israayil-abbah suge. Rabe saaku Saamir deqsita aracal kaa yoogoqen.
Toolaqak lakal Yaaqir ciggiile. Yaaqir elle yoobokem, Gilqad deqsitta baaxol ten. Labaatanna kee namma sanatah Israayil abbah suge.
Soddom dananak amot gexxa lab-xaylok soddom luk yen. Oson kaadu Gilqad rakaakayal soddom magaala luk yenen. Woo magaalooli a saaku fan Yaaqir-magaalooli deqsitta.
Yaaqir elle rabeeh elle yoogoqeenim, Kamoonu.
Israayil mari fiiruk geerah Baqal kee Qastarot deqsittam aqbuduk yeneeh; tonnah kaadu, Suuriya kee Saydaay Mooyab kee Qammon kee Filistiin mari yalla 'yeh yaqbude duyye aqbuduk yeneeniih; tohih sabbatah YALLAL dambi lem baahen. Oson YALLA hawweeneeniih kaa yaqbudeenim cabeenih.
Tonna-leemiik YALLI ken yinqibeeh; tohih sabbatah Filistiin kee Qammon mari qeebih keenik iysissa heeh reedah amol keenik hee.
Taban kee bacra sanatah, Amoorâ-baaxok Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqa Gilqad deqsita rakaakayal, tikki 'ya Israayil marat xukkuteeniih xakaake ken kalen.
Qammon-mari kaadu, Yuuda kee Benyam kee Efrayim kedoodat qeebi abaana'gidih, Ordon keenil taben. Israayil mari kaxxa gadaamah addat suge.
Too waqdi Israayil mari, YALLAL weeqeeh iyyeemihii, «YALLAW, kooy ni Dagelta kinnihiyya cabneh; Baqal akak iyyeenim nuqbudeeh dambi lem kol bahneh nan» iyyen.
Too waqdi YALLI keenik iyyeemih, «Duma yan saaku Masri mara kee Amoorah maraay Qammon maraay Filistiin mara kee
Saydâ maraay Qamaalek kee Maqon mari siinit xukkutak suge. Tohuk yol weqteeniih; anu too waqdi oson siinit abak sugen xukkok sin cateh.
Hay, yooy toh siinih abah yanihiyya cabba hayteenih xeet kee cooxuk bicsen tumammeh qibaadat gacteenik, tahak wadir tu siinit takkeemih sin macataay;
isin isinnih dooritten duyyeeyay taqbudeenihiyyal weeqa. Gadaama sin tabbixe way too duyyey taqbudeenihiyya sin cattay» keenik iyye.
Israayil mari too waqdi YALLAK iyyemii, «Nanu dambi lem bahneeh; sarrak faxxem nek ab immay, awayih ibak a umaanek nee cat» kaak iyye.
Sarrak aqbuduk sugen duyye baaxot qideenih, YALLA yuqbuden. YALLI Israayil marat yakke gibdaabina qansiise cineh.
Sarrak Qammon mari qeebih bical gaceeh; Gilqad deqsita aracal yinfiddigen. Israayil mari kaadu titta lih gacca 'yeh yemeeteeh, Gilqad rakaakayak Mixfa deqsita aracal yinfiddigen.
Tohuk lakal Gilqadal ten Israayil-kedoh-abbobti titta esserteemih, «Qammon mara lih abnu wayna qeebik foocat iyyi neh gacelee? Ta qeebik foocat gacinnaan num Gilqadal enna 'ya marih abba akkele» iyyen.

Yeftacay Gilqad rasul yoobokehiyya, agiruk yan qaskartuk yeneeh; kaak inaay xiiqareh xiinak ten. Kay abbay Gilqad deqsitehiyya isi barrat xale lab-xaylo luk yen. Oson yemben saakuu, Yeftac buxak caylah xiiriyen.
Kaak iyyeenimih, «Atu gersi barrah baxa kinnitoomih sabbatah, ni abbah nagra maculta» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi Yeftac isi toobokok kudeeh; dabqih Toob deqsita aracal gace. Tokkel qamallitte kaa tossokooteeh, kay mara yekken.
Waqlaak wadiril Qammon-mari, Israayil-marat qeebi aba'gidih gexe.
Tah tekke waqdi, Gilqad baaxol yan makaabon Toob-rakaakayak Yeftac baahaana'gidih gexen.
Kaak iyyeenimii, «Amay Qammon marat qeebi abna'gidih, atu foocat nek gac» kaak iyyen.
Yeftac annah keenik iyye: «Kaxxam yoo tinqibeeniih yi abbah buxak dirkih yoo teyyeeqen way, away gadaama sin tibbixeemih yol temeeteenii?» keenik iyye.
Oson Yeftacak annah iyyen: «Nanu away kol naduureeh; toh akah abnam, ne'lih gexxeh Qammon marat qeebi abna waqdi Gilqad marak inkih nee miraacissam kok fanxaamih sabbata» kaak iyyen.
Yeftac keenik iyyeemih, «Away qeebih yi baaxo yoo gacisseeniih YALLI a marak nee yiysiise kaa tekkek, anu sin abba akkeyyo» keenik iyye.
Oson too waqdi ahal kaal gacseenimih, «YALLI ni sumaq yakkay; tahak cinnam mannu» iyyen.
Tohuk lakal Yeftac Gilqad-makaabon lih gexeeh; too waqdi Gilqad-mari isinni amoyta kee qaskar-abba kaa aben. Yeftac Mixfa deqsita aracal YALLIH garil ama qangara nammeyhaak qagse.
Tohuk lakal Yeftac Qammon-malik fan farmo ruubeeh iyyeemih, «Ne'lih koo taysammem macaay? Baaxo nek akah buubtam faxxam macaa?» kaak iyye.
Qammon malik kaal gacseemih, «Israayil-mari Masrik yewqe saaku, Arnon weeqaytuk xabba haanamaay Yabbok weeqaytuh amma 'yaanam kee Ordon weeqaytuh amma 'yaanam takke baaxo yok beeniih; awayah tu gactekiiy, woo baaxo qeebi edde akke'kkalah yoh gacsaanama» iyye.
Yeftac woo Qammon-malikih yaabal qagseh, gacse yab farmô-marat heeh ruubeeh iyyeemih,
«Israayil-mari, Mooyab kee Qammon deqsitta baaxok tu mabenna. Tu elle tekkem anna.
Israayil-mari Masrik gexe saaku, bacarih tan baaxook gacca 'yeenih Agba deqsitta Qasa badih caraatak Kaadis fan yemeeten.
Tohuk lakal wokkek gaceenih gexoonuh ruksat keenih yecee'gid Edom malikil farmô-mara ruuben. Edom malikiiy ruksat keenil cineh. Qagteenih kaadu Mooyab malikil ruksat esseren. Takkay immay keenik num ruksat keenil cineh. Tonna-leemiik Israayil-mari Kaadis deqsita aracal elle yeede.
Sarrak woo bacarih tan baaxook gacca 'yeenih, Edom kee Mooyab baaxok deraafit makitak, Mooyabak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqa rakaakay gufen. Woo arac Arnon weeqaytuk gersi qaxat raaqa araca. Tokkel elle yinfiddigeeni'kkal, Arnoonuk bisoh matatrinnon. Woh akah abeenim, wohuk biso Mooyab marih cuduuduk ten.
Tohuk lakal Israayil mari, Sicon deqsita Amoorâ-malikiy Cesbon magaalal yeneh farmo ruubeeniih kaak iyyeenimih, ‹Ku baaxok gacca inneh ninni baaxo genxam fanxak, ruksat neh maay tecee?› kaak iyyen.
Takkay immay Sicon gexe ken kaleh. Qaskarak elli haam inkih gaabossa heeh, Yahax deqsita aracal gacca 'yeh, tokkeek qeebi keenit abe.
YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya Israayil mara Sicon kee Sicon qaskarak qeebil yiysiiseh. Too waqdi Israayil mari, Amoorâ-maray wokkel sugehiyyak baaxo inkih bukkuseenih.
Oson Amoorâ-mari luk suge baaxok, Arnon weeqaytuk xabba haanamaay Yabbok weeqaytuh amma 'yaanam kee, tonnah kaadu, woo bacarih tan baaxok xabba haanamaay Ordon weeqaytuh amma 'yaanam takke baaxo keenik yibbixen.
Tonnal YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya isi mara catak, Amoorâ-mara wokkek yeyyeeqeh, ken baaxo isi marih im abe. Hay, ta baaxo gacissaanam faxxaana'nnaa?
Isin yallah liton Kamos siinih yeceemil elle isbira. Nanu kaadu YALLAY ni Dagelta kinnihiyya neh yecee baaxol dabaaqah sugenno.
Mooyab malikih yen Baalakay abba akak Xiffor deqsitak yenehiyyak taysem isik maay takkale? Too malik way Israayil marih qeebih gexe saaku luk masuginna.
Israayil mari sidiica boolih sanatah Cesbon kee Qarooqer deqsitta magaalooli kee, woo aroocah dariifal tan mandarwa yibbixeenih sugeeniih; kalah kaadu Arnon weeqaytih dariifal sugga 'te magaalooli yibbixeenih yeneenik, hay, a gideey a gideh woo baaxooxa macah gacse wayten?
Anu qellat lem siinil mabaahinniyo'mmay, isin taway qeebi yot abtaanaah qellat lem yol bahtaanam faxxan. YALLI qadli le Dageltaay; a saaku Israayil-mara kee Qammon-marak gitat ane waa mara aybulleele» 'yaanam farmoh kaah ruube.
Takkay immay Qammon-malik Yeftac ruube farmot maqal mahaysitinna.
Tohuk lakal YALLIH *Roocaaniyya Yeftacal obteeh; too waqdi usuk Gilqad kee Manassê rasu fan gexam gexeeh, sarrak Mixfa deqsitta magaalay Gilqad rasul geytintahiyyah uduurra 'yeh Qammon-marih baaxo fan bisoh gexe.
Woo waqdi Yeftac YALLAH nadri culeh iyyemii, «Qammon-marak qeebil yoo tiysiisek, iisa luk inni buxah aduuru waa saaku, yi buxal yot matra'gidih qarik naharat awqinnaan im ku migaaqal sadgatah qideyyo» iyye.
Yeftac Qammon-marat qeebi aba'gidih gexeeh; YALLI woo qeebil iisa kaah yecee.
Qarooqerik xabba haanamaay Aabil-Karaamimih amma 'yaanam fan, Minnit deqsita rakaakayih dariifal enna 'ta baaxooxa kee, wohiital tan labaatanni magaala fan, aagaruk ken baahe. Tokkel Israayil-mari bakka ken heeh keenik yeyse.
Yeftac, Mixfal ten isi buxah yuduure saaku, kay baxá karambo aagarukuuy argaduk kaah garayte. Is usuk dibuk le baxák ten. Teetik sa xaylo maxalinna.
Usuk tet yuble waqdi baguuk teetih qaadeeh sara isik qanxiseh iyyeemih, «Yi baxáy, afqado yok dananisseeh niya yok tiggilek ah macaa? YALLAH cule nadri liyooh too nadri mamaka» iyye.
Too waqdi is annah kaak inte. «YALLAH nadri akah culteemiy teetik abeyyo intehiyya tellekii, yok ab ikkal mabagbaggoowin; YALLI Qammon-maray naqboytiitih kok yanik, cane koh gacsehik» kaak inte.
Kaadu qagisseh kaak inteemih, «Yoh abtaamahaa: namma alsih gide waktik yoh ucuy. Fiqma lih qaleelat meekitak bikrit anih rabu waamih rookah rookita'gidih, toh yoh ab» kaak inte.
Usuk too waqdi, «Gex hay, yi baxáy» teetik iyye. Tohuk lakal tet kee tet fiqma woo qaleela tewqeeh wokkel rookiteenih. Woo rooka akah abeenim, is digibe'kalaay xale'kal rabelem yeexegeenimih sabbata.
Namma alsak lakal isi abbal tuduureeh, too waqdi usuk Yallah nadri akah culem abeh. Tonna-leemiik is bikirit tan baxuwwah anih rabte.
Israayil marih qaadal, kulli sanatal affara ayro, qunxa baxuw Yeftac-baxáh rookah buxak bacakku gexxa 'yaanah rookitan. Too qaada akak raqtem tokke.

Efrayim mari qeebih bical gace. Ordon weeqaytuk tabba 'yeenih Xafon deqsitta magaala fan yemeeten. Tokkel Yeftacak iyyeenimih, «Qammon marat qeebi abta'gidih gexxe waqdi, qeebih ne'lih gexa 'yaanam nek axce'kal, nee cabba hayteh akah gexxem macaay? Addat akak tan qari amok kol cararise wayya haynek, abletto» kaak iyyen.
Yeftac keenik iyyeemih, «Yoo kee yi mara, Qammon-mara lih kaxxa tittin way luk sugneeh; too saaku siinih seeceh suge'mmay yoh mamatrinniton.
Catoh amaate yoh wayteenim uble waqdi, ‹Ahaysa faxem yot takkay› exceeh, qeebi keenit aba'gidih cuduud keenil tabe. YALLI too qeebil keenik yoo yiysiiseh. Tu elle tekkem tonna'mmay, taway isin qeebi yot abtaanam akah faxxaanam maaxiga» iyye.
Sarrak Yeftac Gilqad marah secca 'yeeh, Efrayim marat qeebi abe. Too qeebil keenik yeyseh. Efrayim mari dumah yan saaku Gilqad marak, «Gilqad maraw, isin Manasse kee Efrayim maray kudeenihiyya kinniton» 'yaanam iyyeenih yenen. Tohuk gexxaamah qeebi keenit aben.
Efrayim-mari akak kuda gita yabbixeeni'gidih, Gilqad-mari Ordon weeqaytuk akak taben afa keenik yibbixen. Efrayim-mari tokkek tabam faxa waqdi, Gilqad-mari tabeenak afal keenih suggu 'yeh, kulli numuk, «Efrayim num maay kinnito?» kaak axcuk sugen. «Aleey hinniyo» iyyekii,
«Hay, ‹Shibbolet› inxicey» kaak axcuk sugen. Takkay immay hununuh tonnah axce wayya heeh, «Sibbolet» iyye kaa tekkek, Efrayim num kinnim elle kaak aaxaguk yenen. Too waqdi xabba kaa heeniih, Ordon weeqaytu akak taban tabeenal elle kaa qidak yenen. Tonnah abak too saaku Efrayim marak morootom kee namma alfih num rabe.
Yeftac Israayil marak makaabantuh lica sanat suge. Sarrak rabe saaku, Gilqad rasuy elle yoobokehiyyal kaa yoogoqen.
Usuk rabek lakal Ibxan deqsita numuy Beetlacamal yoobokehiyya Israayil marih makaabantu yekke.
Too num xaylok lab xayloh soddom kee, say xayloh soddom luk yen. Say-xaylo isi gulub hinna'mmay, aki marah rihimih yeceeh; lab-xaylo kaadu aki gulubuh rihmise. Ibxan Israayil ummatak malcina sanat abbah sugeeh,
rabe saaku Beetlacamal kaa yoogoqen.
Kay lakal Eelon deqsita numuy Dablon kedoh yoobokehiyya tabna sanatah Israayil marih makaabantu yekke.
Rabe saaku Ayyaalon deqsitta magaalay Dablon marih rasul tenehiyyal kaa yoogoqen.
Kay lakal Qabdon deqsita num makaabantu yekke. Qabdon Hillel deqsita numih baxak teneeh; Firqaton deqsitta magaalal yooboke.
Qabdon lab-xaylok morootom luk yeneeh; xaylô-xaylok kaadu lab-xaylok soddom luk yen. Kay xaylo kee xaylô-xaylo gexxa way malcina-tabanih dananal gexak yenen. Bacra sanat Israayil abbah sugeeh;
sarrak rabe saaku, Efrayim rasul Qamaalek mari elle yen qaleela mango baaxol, Firqaton deqsitta magaalal, kaa yoogoqen.

Israayil mari kaadu qagitak YALLIH garil dambi takkem baahen. Tohuk gexxaamah YALLI morootom sanatah Filistiin-mara abbootanah amol keenik hee.
Too dabaanal Xorqa deqsita aracal yooboke Manowac migaq le num yen. Usuk akah yoobokem Daan deqsitta kedok ten. Barra kaak maxalaytok ten.
YALLIH malaykatti teetih yumbulleeh teetik iyyeemih, «Maxalaytoh sugteeh, ahayduma xalteh masuginnito'mmay, ahaysa xayih aadiqettoh lab-baxa xaletto.
Qinabak bicsen kamri yenekiiy, hinnay kaadu, wohuk kalah taniimih sahda iskirissa haytahiyyak tu maaqabin; caraamak tan maaqo kaadu makmin.
Baxi koh yaabuku waa saaku xagorta kaak margaqin. Macaay intek, ubukka 'ye ayrook xabba haanam, *Qahdi-culeyna yekke marih innah, dibuk Yallih taamat gaceleeh, Israayil mara Filistiin marih gabak yayyaaqem qimbisele» teetik iyye.
Tohuk lakal woo barra gexxeeh isi baqalak itteemihii, «Yallih num yol yemeeteeh ceelok Yallih malaykattu ceelak yeneeh; kaa uble waqdi, meysi yot culte. Anu usuk akak yemeete'kke kaa messeriyyo; usuk kaaduuy isi migaq yoh mawarsinna.
Takkay immay, ‹Aadiqettooh lab baxa xaletto immayii, qinabak bicsen kamri kee sahda iskirissa haytaamak tu maaqabin. Caraamak tan maaqo makmin› 'yaanam yok iyye. Qagissa heeh kaadu yok iyyeemihii, ‹Yaabuku waa awki addunyal yanim fanah, Qahdi-culeyna yekke marih innah, dibuk Yallih taamat gacele› yok iyye» inte.
Tohuk lakal Manowac YALLA kallaceeh dooqa abeeh, iyyeemihii, «Goytaw, ku maganak atu rubte ku numuu, awki yaabuke saaku abnu waynam neh warsa'gidih, nel kaa gacis. Yi Goytaw, nel kaa gacis» iyye.
Yalli Manowac abe dooqa kaah duuduseeh; woo barra buqreh addal daffeynal tan waqdi, Yallih malaykatti teetil yuduureh. Too waqdi tet baqli Manowac tet lih masuginna.
Tonna leemiik isi baqalal sissikuk arduk gexxa inteeh, «Woo saaku yol yemeete num qagteh yoh yumbulleeh» kaak inte.
Too waqdi Manowac ugutta 'yeh tet kataye. Woo numul amma 'yeh, «Ama barra lih yaabak sugtem koo maay kinni?» kaak iyye.
Woo numuuy, «Yeey, yoo kinnih» kaak iyye.
«Meqeh hayik, atu intem nummak maacissa saaku, awki maca abam tayseeh; yanbe saaku kaadu maca abam tayse?» iyye.
Too waqdi YALLIH malaykatti kaak iyyeemih, «Naharak ku barrak anu aba excem inkih abtam teetil tan.
Qinab caxah xaylo akme waytaama; qinabak bicsen kamri kee sahda iskirissa haytaamak tu aaqube waytaama. Caraamak tan maaqo akme waytaama. Tet amrissa heem inkih abtam teetil tan» iyye.
Manowac usuk YALLIH malaykattu kinnim maaxaginnay; tohih sabbatah iyyeemih, «Ku maganah magexinay sug; girgirru koh qidnu waynak» kaak iyye.
Takkay immay malaykatti iyyeemih, «Anu aadeemih sin maaqo makma'mmay; lac qiddam faxxek, YALLIH sadgatah qidaay cado akak cararis» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Manowac iyyemii, «Atu intem nummawta saaku, koo nassakaxxe'gidih, ku migaq neh waris» kaak iyye.
Malaykatti too waqdi, «Yi migaaqat maca wayta? Yi migaq edde radan migaq hinnak» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Manowac girgirri-baxa kee daro gabat hayya heeh; YALLAY qajiibih tanim abahiyyah sadgat abaana'gidih, xixxaqak bagul cararise. Manowac kee kay barra elle wagitak yenen waqdi,
woo malaykattu YALLAH qiden sadgat elle cararisan aracak habug inta girah addat qaran fan awaqih yublen. Too waqdi kaa kee kay barra baaxol afah radde.
Manowac kee kay barra nammeyhaak woo malaykattu abaluk maraaqinnon. Sarrak Manowac kaa'lih yaabak sugtem, YALLIH malaykattu kinnim yeexegeh.
Tohuk lakal isi barrak iyyeemih, «Yalla ubulla hayneh nagay maraqnaay rabennom digga le» teetik iyye.
Kay barra annah kaak inte. «YALLI nee qidam faxaamal, abne sadgat nek oggolak manannaay, away nee yuybulleem kee away neh warsem neh warisak mananna» kaak inte.
Sarrak a barra lab-baxa xalteeh, migaaqah Samsoon kaak inte. Yooboke awki dadle saaku, YALLI isi maqaane kaat hee.
Usuk Daan-Mafdaga deqsita aracay Xorqa kee Estooluk fanal yanihiyyal yan saaku, YALLIH *Roocaaniyya maqar kaat hayte.

Ayrok teena Samsoon Timna deqsitta magaala gexeeh; inki Filistiinih tooboke baxuwwa yuble.
Wokkeek buxah yuduure waqdi isi abba kee inak annah iyye. «Timnal kalbi yok beyte Filistiinih tooboke baxuwwa taniih; tet abitam faxak, gexay tet yoh essera» keenik iyye.
Kay ina kee abba kaak inteemih, «Rihimih woo *Filistiin-maray diini-maleelah yanihiyya fan maca koo beyta? Akkel isi gulubih addal, hinnay kaadu, ni marih addal baxuwwa waytee?» kaak iyyen.
Samsoon isi abbak iyyeemih, «Anu yoh bahtam kok faxam, too awkáay; yikcineh» kaak iyye.
Kay xaleena aham kaa absissam, YALLA kinnim maaxaginnaay; YALLI Filistiin-maral umaane baaham faxak yen. Too dabaanal Filistiin-mari Israayil-marak reedah amol yenen.
Tonna leemiik Samsoon, abba kee ina lih, Timna deqsitta magaala safarah gexen. Qinab cooxih addak gaceeh gexak suge waqdi, cunxusa lubak garadah yoobbe.
Too waqdi garciik Yallih Roocaaniyya qande kaat hayteeh; gab-qassih anuk, mooti innah, too lubak namma ikkel kure. Takkay immay aham abem isi ina kee abbah mawarsinna.
Sarrak gexeh woo awká lih walaleeh; too waqdi tet yikcineh.
Waqlaak wadiril Samsoon tet abita'gidih yuduure waqdi, woo duma qideh cabe lubak wagta'gidih, gexak suge gita cabba heeh wokke fan daggaawe. Sarrak woo lubaakay rabehiyyah addat diidaale xalteh malab haytem yuble.
Too waqdi woo malabak gabah kumussa heeh elle gexaamal akamuk gexe. Ina kee abba gari guffu hee waqdi ken xaqmiseh. Takkay immay rabe lubaakih xagarih addak yeyyeeqe malab kinnim keenih mawarsinna.
Tohuk lakal kay abba woo baxuwwah buxa gexeeh; too waqdi Samsoon qarussoh wokkel xigla abe. Taham furrayna woo baaxol qaadah luk ten.
Filistiin-mari kaa yuble waqdi, soddom furraynu wakalih kaah yeceen.
Ayrok teena Samsoon annah keenik iyye. «Ixig-ixiga sin esseru waa. A ixig-ixigak maqna, digib gaba kale'kal malcina ayroh addat yoh warisseenik, soddom dallaabiyay *baftak bicseeni kee, kulli numuh kaadu guba kee dagak dudda sin haa sartan yol yan. Tonna hinna'mmay, ta ixig-ixiga afdige wayteenik, too gide siinil tan» keenik iyye.
Osonuu, «Lito ixig-ixiga hay baahey, naabbu waynak» kaak iyyen.
«Takmeemih afak, yakmeenim tewqeeh;
celem afak, salfa lem tewqe. Toh ixigay» keenik iyye.
Sidiica ayroh gide a ixig-ixiga yafdige num keenit waytimeh.
Fereyhaytoh ayro taaxige mari Samsoon barrak iyyeemih, «Ku baqala ayrissa haay, a ixig-ixigah maqna kaak neh eyyeq. Woh abe waytek, ku abbah qarit gira ruubennooh koo woo qarih addat cararisenno. Macaa, koo kee ku baqala buxal xigla neh akah abteenim nee raddaana'gidi maay kinni?» teetik iyyen.
Too waqdi Samsoon barra weeqah sinkibitak kaa fan temeeteh, «Atu yoo makicintoy yoo niqibtom kok ableh an. Yi mara esserte ixig-ixigak maca yoh mawarsinnito?» axcuk sinkibo hayya hayte.
Usuk too waqdi, «Anu maqna akak inni abba kee inah mawarsinniyok, koh macah warsaah?» teetik iyye.
A ixig-ixigak maqna teetih warse weemih, woo digibih bicsen xigla gaba kalla haytam fan, malcina ayro fan weeqak sugte. Ellecabol, «Yoh waris» 'yaanamak af tayseedeyu cinte waqdi, maqna teetih akak warseh. Is too waqdi tohim Filistiin-marah warisseh.
Sarrak woo magaalah mari malcinhaytoh ayro Samsoon elle xiina qarih adda culaamak dumal, kaal yemeeteeniih annah kaak iyyen.
«Malabak tamuh tayseemih maca tan?
Lubaakak qandeh tayseemih maca tan?» kaak iyyen.
Toh yoobbe waqdi Samsoon keenik iyyeemih,
«Yi dahalto lih abquruk suge waytaanamal,
a ixig-ixiga awayiik afdiguk mananniton» keenik iyye.
Too waqdi YALLIH Roocaaniyya cayla kaat hayteeh; Askalon deqsita arac fan gexxa 'yeh, soddom num qiddaay sara keenik kalla heeh, oson luk sugen qax-meqe sara woo ixig-ixiga yifdige marah yeceeh. Takkay immay tekkeemih naqabu xagarat luk isi abbah buxah yuduure.
Tohuk lakal kay barra, kay qarus-maqanxa yekke numuh yeceen.

Waqlak wadir Samsoon girgirru gabat hayya heeh, kamadi edde orbisan waktit, isi barrat boysita'gidih gexe. Wokke gufe waqdi tet abbak, «Inni barral xinti qari culam faxa» iyye.
Tet abba cule kaa kaleeh kaak iyyeemih,
«Anu atu tet faxe waytam ekkeleeh ku kataysah tet ecee'mmay, tet maqanxáy barah teetik qunxahiyya qaxah teetik tayseh tanik, teetil raq» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Samsoon kaal gacseemih, «Tahaysaay Filistiin mari yi gabat biyaakitta 'ye kaa tekkek, tohut yoo asissem sin kinnim ixiga» iyye.
Sarrakaay gexxa 'yeeh sidiica boolih wakri yibbixe. Woo wakaara nammay nammeyah hayya heeh geera tittat keenik yoxee. Woo geerak kuntubbat keenik kafin qaysoyta yoxee.
Sarrak woo geerat keenik yoxee qaysot gira ruubeeh; woo wakaara woo gira luk, tooboke kamadih addat keenik ruube. Too gira dibuk yirgiqen kamadi hinna'mmay, argiqe'kah sugen kamadi keenik selli hayte. Toh lih kaadu, qinab xale coox kee *daytuun xale cooxih agantah keenik cararisseh.
Filistiin-mari ah abtem kinni mara esseren waqdi, ah abtem Samsoon kinnim yeexegeenih; akah abem kaadu, balli kaak barra Samsoon kataysah yeceemih abem yeexegen. Kay balli Timna deqsitta magaalah numuk ten. Tonna-leemiik Filistiin-mari gexxa 'yeh, woo barra kee tet abba carrisen.
Sarrak Samsoon keenik iyyeemih, «Sin taama tah teetii? Ahamih cane siinik gacse'kal, aade waamah xiibitah» keenik iyye.
Tohuk lakal caylah ken yibbixeeh mango mara keenik qide. Sarrak gexeeh Qetam deqsitta boolok bagut tan gablah addat yombooqore.
Tohuk lakal Filistiin-mari qeebih gexeeh, Yuudâ-rasul yinfiddigen. Sarrak Laci deqsitta magaala wararen.
Yuudâ-marih labhay, «Macah nee gaaddan?» keenik iyye.
Osonuuy, «Nanu Samsoon casbit hayya hayneh too nel bahha heem kaal bahnam fanxa» keenik iyyen.
Too waqdi Yuudâ-marak sidiica alfih num woo Qetam qalek boolok bagut tan gabla fan gexeeniih, Samsoonuk, «Filistiin-mari ni amol yanim mataaxiga innaa? Annah tanim macah nel bahte?» kaak iyyen.
Usuk keenik iyyemii, «Oson yol baaheenim keenil baahe» keenik iyye.
Too waqdi kaak iyyeenimih, «Nanu akke akah nemeetem, uxuyya koo hayneh ken gabal koo hayna'gidik, gablak eweq» kaak iyyen.
Usuk keenik iyyemii, «Isin isinnih yoo qide waytaanamih xagna yoh cula» keenik iyye.
Osonuuy, «Aleey, koo maxagnaay uxuyyu koo hayneh ken gabal koo heenno ikkal, koo qide waynaamah xagana koh culla» kaak iyyen. Sarrak qusba akootak nammay tittat uxuyya heenih kaa edde yoxeeniih edde suge gablak kaa yeyyeeqeenih axawat kaa ruuben.
Laci deqsita arac yemeete waqdi, Filistiin mari waxxaq axcuk arduk kaa fan yemeete. Garciik YALLIH *Roocaaniyya cayla kaat hayteeh, too waqdi caray kee mogoyut axawah kaak suge namma akat gira tokme tafulta elle yargiqen gurral yirgiqe.
Sarrak xayi wakti rabe dananih qangabbi-lafa geeh, qununna 'yeh woo qangabbi yakkuqeeh, too lafat alfi num qide.
Too waqdi tirtiriseeh,
«Rabe dananih qangabbit alfi num qide.
Danan lafat alfi num qide.
Raysa tittin bagul keenik hee» axcuk tirtirise.
Tohuk lakal danan-qangabbi wonnah baaxot qide. Aham elle tekke arac migaaqah Ramat-Laci
Sarrak Samsoon kaxxam bakaariteeh; too waqdi YALLAL weeqeeh iyyemii, «A gid takke qande yoh teceeh iisa yoh tecee. Takkay immay bakaarah rabam faxaah, a diini-maleelah tan *Filistiin yoo tabbixem faxxa, YALLAW» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Yalli Laci deqsita aracal baaxo boohayseeh tokkek lee tewqe. Samsoon too leek yooqobeeh, too waqdi nagay yekke. Too buyyik migaaqah Qen-Cakkoore
Filistiin mari baaxol ackumuk yen dabaanal, too baaxol Samsoon Israayil mara miraacisak labaatanni sanat suge.

Ayrok teena Samsoon Gaada deqsitta magaala gexe. Tokkel xiiqareh-xiina geeh tet lih xiine.
Gaadâ-mari Samsoon woo magaalal yaniimih xaagu geen waqdi, woo arac marot hayya heenih, yawqem fan woo magaalak culmeynal inkih yan bar kaa qambaalak xiinen. «Maaci maacisam fan elle kaa qambaalennooh; yamaate waqdi, kaa qidenno» 'yaanam isinni niyal hayya heenih inkih yan bar tibba axcuk sugen.
Takkay immay Samsoon woo barra lih xiinit sugem, inkih yan bar hinna'mmay barak gudek ten. Sarrak ugutta 'yeeh woo magaalak culmeynah yemeeteeh; too waqdi woo gasoh alif kee alfinti cooxuuy mafaatic inkih kalla heeh, wohim inkih sunkut hayya heeh, Cebron magaala akak tambulle qaleh amo fan luk yewqe.
Tohuk lakal Samsoon Soorek deqsitta golol ten Daliila deqsitta barra yikcine.
Sarrak woo konooy akkuk ten Filistiin-malikwa woo barral gexxeh, teetik iyyeenimih, «Samsoon celem akah yekkeemik adda baritaay, elle yekke innah ayrissa kaa haay, sirri kaak eyyeq. Tuxxiq sinni num kaa ab. Too sirri geyya hayta waqdi, net akah koysite waa'nnah uxuyya kaa heenno. Toh abtek, nakke konooyuk kulli num nek alfi kee bool garsi koh aceele» teetik iyyen.
Too barray toh toobbehiyya Samsoonuk intemii, «Ku maganak annah yan celem elle tekkem mannaay? Numuk teeni uxuyya koo heeh akah koysite wayta'nnah kok abam faxek, mannah kok abaah?» kaak inte.
«Malcina qusba qarumuy kafe weehiyyat yoo toxeek, tonnal sinam akah boolatta'nnah, boolaateyyo» teetik iyye.
Toh yok iyyem keenik inte waqdi, Filistiin malikwa malcina qusba qarumuy kafe weehiyya bahha heenih teetil yeceen. Is too waqdi woo qarumut Samsoon kariqqa hayte.
Too qarik gersi golih addat tet qambaala mari yen. Is too waqdi anay fayya haak, «Samsoonow, Filistiin-mari kot yemeeteh» inte. Takkay immay usuk woo waqdi woo qarum, gira tafulwat gexxa waqdi duufut elle taggiriqe'nnal, yirgiqe. Tah yublen waqdi, ta numih qande akak tani'kke waagiseenih.
Sarrak Daliila kaak inteemih, «Atu away yoo duquurusseeh numma yoh mawarsinnitok, ku maganak koo yaxoonu elle duudaanam mannay?» kaak inte.
«Duma hebeltohim edde axee ween akootat yoo yoxeenik, sinam bis aalleyyo» teetik iyye.
Daliila qusba akoota bahha hayteh edde kaa toxee. Sarrakaay, «Samsoonow, Filistiin mari kot yemeeteh!» kaak inte. Sahda too qarik gersi golih addat tet qambaalak sugte. Too waqdi usuk woo akoota woo waqdiik gabak isik, tafulti innal, yirgiqe.
Sarrak Daliila Samsoonuk annah inte: «Atu uxih yoo duquurussah taniih, nummat yo'lih mayabta. Koo elle yaxoonu duudan inna macah yoh mawarissa?» kaak inte.
Usuk too waqdi annah teetik iyye: «Yok malcina xagorta kee tafulwa tittat sookka haytek lakal, edde yaxcixen mudeynat digga haytek, wonnal sinam bis aalleyyo» iyye.
Too waqdi xin kaat yamaate'gidih, kaa soocarteeh; xin kaat yemeete waqdi, malcina xagorta kaak tafulwa luk sookteh. Sarrak mudeynat digga hayte. Too waqdi anay fayya haak, «Samsoonow, Filistiin mari kot yemeeteh» inte. Takkay immay Samsoon ugte waqdi xagorta sookok isik kaleh.
Tohuk lakal kaak inteemih, «Atu yoo makicintok, ‹Koo kiciyyoh› macah yok inta? Sidiica waqdi yoo duquurusseeh; uxih celem akah tekkem yoh mawarsinnito» kaak inte.
Taham kulli ayro kaa esserteeh; usuk a esseroy kulli way kaat abtahiyyak taqabeh. Mangom sabri yaallu maxiqinna.
Sarrak ellecabol numma teetih warse. Teetik iyyeemih, «Amô-xagorti yok inkinnah makalinnon. Ooboke saakuk xabba haanam, *Qahdi-culeyna yekke marih innah,
Daliila nummat tet lih yaabem teexege waqdi, woo Filistiin malikwah farmo rubteeh inteemih, «Away nummat yo'lih yaabek, inki adda qagitay ama» keenik inte. Oson too waqdi yuduureeniih woo maalu gabat luk yemeeten.
Daliila Samsoon gurumbal isik hayya hayteh, xiina'gidih kaa saacorteeh; sarrak Samsoonuk malcina xagorta amok kaak yargaqu waa numuh secte. Woo num woo xagor kaak yirgiqeh. Tohuk lakal usuk luk yen qande cabeh. Tonnal kaa boolasseeh luk yen cayla kaak beyte.
Sarrak anay fayya haak, «Samsoonow, Filistiin mari kot yemeeteh» inte. Too waqdi usuk xiinik ugteeh; dumaak akah abak suge'nnah, ugutta 'yeh daqaarimma axcelem yekkeleeh; YALLI wakalih kaa'lih mayanim maaxaginna.
Filistiin mari kaa yibbixeeh, namma inti kaak yeyyeeqeenih. Gaada deqsita arac kaa beeniih, tokkel nacaasak bicsen silsilatat kaa yoxeen. Casbit kaa heeniih daro eceyyal kaa riysiisen.
Amo xagorti sarrak kaah yembeh.
Filistiin malikwa yallah loonumuy migaaqah Dagon akak iyyaanahiyyah kaxxa sadgat abaana'gidiiy woo ayro yassakaxxeeni'gidih, inkih aracal gaaboowen. Too waqdi qadar abeeniih woo qadarah iyyeenimih, «Ni yalli naqboytah suge numuk nee yiysiiseh» iyyen.
Too waqdi kaxxam yifriceeniih, sarrak «Samsoon nee yaysussuule'gidih kaah neh seeca» iyyen. Oson casbik kaa yeyyeeqen waqdi, ken akah yaysussuule innah kaa absiisen. Kaa yublen waqdi oson yallah lon duyye fayliseeniih, iyyeenimih, «Ni yalli, ni baaxo bayseeh mango mara nek qide numuk nee yiysiiseh» axcuk saare aben. Sarrak qamidwak fanat kaa soolisen.
Samsoon too waqdi gabal kaa beyak suge awkak iyyeemih, «Qarik amo xagta qamidwa gabah xagay yoo inxic, elle qekitam faxak» iyye.
Woo qarih addal agabu kee labhak mangom gaabowteh ten. Filistiin koona malik kaadu wokkel ten. Woo qarik amol kaadu sidiica alfih num yen. Too mari Samsoon ken elle yaysussuule inna wagtaana'gidih yemeeteenih yenen.
Too waqdi Samsoon dooqa abeeh, woo dooqah iyyeemih, «YALLAW, Mulki le Dageltaw, ku maganak yoo kassa hay. Yallaw, ku maganak a Filistiin maray namma inti yok yeyyeeqek cane gacsa'gidih, inki adda qande yot hay» iyye.
Sarrak fanti namma qamidduy woo qarik amo gufahiyyak tiyaay gabah xabba heeh gutuqe.
Too waqdi anay fayya haak, «Filistiin mara duufut beeh rabam tu hinna» iyye. Sarrak woo qari qandek leemiik gutuqeeh; too waqdi woo qari woo koona malik kee raqqa 'ye maral inkih rade. Samsoon Filistiin marak addunyal yen saaku qideemik fula, rabe saaku qide.
Kay tooboko kee kay buxah mara kay raysa woo aracak beyta'gidih temeete. Kay raysa beeniih kay abbay Manowac deqsitah kabrit kaa yoogoqen. Woo kabri Xorqa kee Estool deqsita aracak fanal yan. Samsoon labaatanna karmah Israayilik makaabantuh suge.

Dumah yan saaku Miika deqsita num suge. Too num dabqah Efrayim rasuk qaleela mango baaxol suge.
Too num ayrok teena alfi kee bool garsi inak garqoh bee. Sarrak inak iyyemii, «Yi inay, woo lakqo garqoh kok bee num abaarah koo oobbeh en. Takkay immay lakqo kok beytem yooy, koh gacsahak, ayka» iyye.
Kay ina toh toobbe waqdi, «Yi baxaw, YALLI barkat kot haay» kaak inte.
Too lakqo isi inah gacseeh; too waqdi is intemii, «Yi baxa cata'gidih, a lakqo YALLIH sadgatah aceem yol tan. Tonna leemiik a lakqok yaqbuden duyyeeya bicsiiseyyo. Awayah tu gactek, lakqo gacsah koh aceeyyo» inte.
Takkay immay usuk beeh suge taaxige lakqo inal gacse. Kay ina woo lakqok namma boolih garsi beyya hayteeh, lakqok duyye bicsa naggaaral tecee. Too num woo lakqok yaqbuden duyyeeya bicse. Sarrak too duyyeeyay yaqbudeenihiyya Miika buxal heen.
Miika qibaada elle aba arac luk yen. Yaqbuden duyyey gabak bicseenihiyya kee, rikeek tan saroy sek haysita buxal luk yen. Too duyyey yaqbudeenihiyyah garil gacu waa seekih isi baxa hee.
Too dabaanal Israayil rasul malik manannaay; tonna-leemiik kulli num isih faxem abbaasitak yen.
Too dabaanal kaadu Leewih yooboke furrayni Beetlacam deqsitta magaalay Yuudâ rasul geytintahiyyal dabqah suge.
Sarrak woo magaala cabba heeh, dabqah elle gaca ikkeh goranah safare. Ellecaboh Efrayim rasuk qaleela le aracal tan Miikâ-buxa yemeete.
Buxa elle yemeete'kkel, Miika, «Manni kabuk temeete?» kaak iyye.
«Anu Leewih yooboke num kinniyooh, akak emeetem Yuudâ rasuk Beetlacam magaala. Tonna'mmay awayii, buxah elle gaca'kkeh goranah safarah an» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Miika, «Wonnal akkel buxah yo'lih gacaay; fayu yoh aceettooh, sek yoh akketto. Wohoysa, sanatal tabna garsi koh aaxigeyyooh, sartan kee maaqô tiyak kaadu yoo lito» kaak iyye.
«Meqeh hay» iyye. Sarrak baxi gide kaah yekke.
Miika sek kaa abeh, isi buxal kaa abbaxuk yen.
Miika isi niyal, «Leewih yooboke sek geek wadir, YALLI kullim gabal yok aymaaqele» iyye.

Too dabaanal Israayil mari malik luk mananna. Israayilik Daan-kedoh yooboke mari, Israayil mari inkih baaxo elle gee'kkel, baaxo gee'kal yeneeniih; tohuk gexxaamah yabbixen baaxoh goranat gacen.
Sarrak kedoh addak doorru heen koona num guubuh elle gacoonu waan baaxo gibteenih yamaateeni'gidih, Xorqa kee Estool deqsitta namma magaalak ken ruuben. Keenik iyyeenimih, «Gexay baaxo elle tan gurra wagga haay ama» axcuk, giba elle aban inna escessa ken heenih, ken ruuben. Efrayim rasuk qaleela le arac yemeeteeniih tokkel Miikâ-buxa culen.
Woo buxal keenih suge furraynuy Leewih yoobokehiyya, elle yooboke'kkel yaabal kaak yeexegeeniih, kaal amma 'yeeniih, «Akkel maca abtaah? Iyyi koo baaheeh?» kaak iyyen.
«Akkel Miika lih aniih, ‹Yi buxal gacaay sek yoh tik, wohul galto koh aaxigeyyo› yok iyyeeh; wohul titta geyneh. Wonna leemiik akkel kaa'lih an» keenik iyye.
«Hay tonnal, abnah nan safar nel yamqem kee amqe waam Yalla neh esserey» kaak iyyen.
«Akah sakkittaanam manton. Abtan safaral YALLI sin dacriselek, gexa» keenik iyye.
Toh keenik inxicca 'ye waqdi, woo koona num Laysâ-magaala fanah safarte. Too magaala gufen waqdi, magaala yubleeniih; magaalal yan mari hammi sinnim amaanah elle xiinan inna keenik yismiteenih. Saydâ-marak kaxxih, a magaalal yan mari amaanah yeneeniih; ken xagtam mananna. Oson kaadu xagtan mara luk manannon. Mano keenil muquk teneeh; faxxa haanam inkih luk yenen. Laysâ-magaala, Saydâ marih magaalak xeeruk raaqak teneeh; hebeltô-mara luk heen bica kee qalla luk manannon.
Gibah ruuben mari yuduure saaku, ken ruube ken baaxoh mari xaagu keenik abeeh, «Maca tubleenih temeeten?» keenik iyyen.
«Akah genxe baaxo nubleeh, meqe baaxoy niqmatak tanihiyyak ten. Akkel foyyah daffeyna ikkalahaa, away sissikuk genxek, baaxo keenik raaqisennok, ugutay labhay nee beya.
Wokke guftoonu waytan waqdi ablettoonu'mmay, qeebi net akkeleh bical yan marak masugan. Sin yablen way sin madereeman. Baaxo kaadu kaxxa baaxoy num faxxa haam elle geyahiyya. A baaxo Yalli siinih loowe baaxok, ugutay raaqisa» iyyen.
Too saaku toh yoobben waqdi, kedok lica boolih num Xorqa kee Estooluk gaaduh gexen.
Gaaduh daqaarimeeniih, Yuudâ-rasul Kiryat-Yaqaarim deqsita magaalak ayrô-culma le kabuk raaqe aracal yinfiddigen. Too aracak ta saaku fanah migaaqah Daan-Mafdaga 'yaanam iyyan.
Tokkeek gexeeniih, qaleela mango Efrayim baaxol gacak, Miikâ-qari elle geytima arac yemeeten.
Duma Laysâ-magaala gibah gexeh suge koona num, gaaduh yemeete marak iyyeenimih, «A qarwak qarik teenal lakqok bicsen ceeloy yaqbudeenihiyya tan. Tohuk kalah aki duyyey yaqbudeenihiyya kee rikeek tan saroy sek haysita elle tanik, tahak maca abnam tayse?» iyyen.
Toh keenik inxicca 'yeenih wadir enkeleelebba 'yeenih Miikâ-qari fan gexen. Tokkel taaxige furraynuy Leewih yooboke geen waqdi, salaamatta kaah abba heeniih, «Mannah tan hay!» kaak iyyen.
Oson too xaagu kaak aban waqdi, lica boolih qaskariitay gaaduh gexxahiyya silac gabat luk qarik afal soolak sugte.
Sarrak a koona num qari culeeniih, taaxige ceeloy lakqok bicseenihiyya kee, wohuk kalah tan duyye yaqbudeenihiyya kee rikeek tan saroy sek haysita gabat luk yewqen. Sek too waqdi qari-afal too qaskar luk raaqe.
Qari adda culla 'yeenih, gabat oren duyyey yaqbudeenihiyya kee taahirik-tan-duyye akak iyyan duyye beyah ken yuble waqdi, taaxige sek, «Labhay, abtaanam macaa?» keenik iyye.
«Tibba 'xic bas; qangara guduqqa maxcin» kaak iyyen. Sarrak kaak iyyeenimih, «Sek neh akkettok, ne'lih am. Inki numih sek takkeemik, Israayil-kedoodak inkih tan Daan kedoh sek takkem koh taysek, ne'lih gex» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi sek farcaan yekkeeh, taahirik tan duyye akak iyyan duyye gabat hayya heeh, ken lih gexe.
Sarrak isinni xaylooy, lac kee duyyek elli haanam foocat isinnik hayya heenih isinni gexoh gexen.
Ta mari yexxeereenik sarra, Miika cuggaanê-marah deero abba heeh, qeebi keenit abaana'gidih, lakak ken kataaten. Sarrak ken yeybeebexeeniih,
qandek xongolak keenit karaaraqen.
Daan mari enkeleelebba 'yeeh, Miikak «Ah macaay waytam? Sinaamak a gide takke butta lakak nee akah kataytam macaay?» kaak iyyen.
«Yaa? Maca waytaanaa yok intaanaa? Sek kee bicsiteh an yallitte inkih yok beyten way, maca waytan mannal yok intan? Maca luk raaqeh?» 'yaanam keenik iyye.
Too waqdi kaak iyyeenimii, «Numow, gabat nek rabtam faxe waytek, qangara mayaabinay tibba 'xicay, uduur. Sarrak naqabu le mari net yaniih, too mari koo kee ku buxah marat qeebi abelon; num siinik macabaanay sella sin haanam koh mataysak, tibba 'xicay gex» kaak iyyeeniih;
isinni gexoh gexen. Miika qandeh ken duude waam ubulla isik hee waqdi, isi buxa fan yuduure.
Sarrak Daan-mari, Miika luk suge duyyey yaqbudeenihiyya kee buxal luk suge sek gabat hayya heeniih, abak sugen safarah Laysa gaaduh gexen. Tokke gufen waqdi Laysâ-maray amaanah yaniih toobbe kee tublek tu-xaagu sinnihiyyat qeebi aben. Magaalal suggu 'ye mara qideeniih, sarrak magaala carriseenih.
Laysâ-mari ken cata mara magennon. Akah weenim, Saydâ-magaala xeri'kkel keenik raaqak ten. Sinam lih kaadu hebeltô-qalla luk manannon. Sarrak cararisen magaala nammeyhaak xissitta haysiteenih isinnih elle gacen. Laysâ-magaalaa, Beet-Racob deqsita daqaaral ten.
Magaalak migaaqah Daana iyyen. Daan ken kaxxa abbah migaaqaay Yaqkuubuk baxak ten.
Taaxige ceeloy lakqok bicseenihiyya yaqbudeeni'gidih soolisen. Muusak baxi baxah yen Gersóm-Yonaatan deqsita num Daan marih seekih yeneeh; usuk rabek wadir kaak rade mari, Daan mara marin baaxo seewah beyya haanam fanah ken seekah sugen.
Yalla elle yaqbuden siraq Siilo deqsita aracal udduruk suggu 'yem, a ceeloy duma Miika luk sugehiyya kaadu Daan magaalal elle sugte.

Israayil mari malik luk suge wee dabaanal, uli Leewih yooboke num yen. Too num Efrayim-rasuk qaleela le baaxok darre le kabut raqta baaxol buxah yen. Too num Yuudâ-rasul geytinta Beetlacam-magaalak, caggoytâ-gubih caggoyta kaah takke'gidih, baxuwwa bee.
Sarrak a barra kaa'lih gexsite cinteeh; naqabut abbâ-buxa fan tuduure. Tokkel abbâ-buxal affara alsa sugte.
Affara alsak lakal, tet baqli tet fan gexxa 'yeh tet lih yabba 'yeh, buxah tet gacsaamal malse. Too waqdi isi taamah num haysitta heeh, danoonâ nammayal koori hayya heeh, tet fan gexe. Awká elle tan buxa yemeeten waqdi awká, «Buxa cula» keenik inteeh; sarrak awkáh abba ken yuble waqdi, kaxxa salaamatta keenih abe.
«Buxal qibnaytiinoh sidooca ayro suge wayteenik, sin maruuba» 'yaanam iyyeeh; sidooca ayro qibnaytiinoh isi buxa elle ken sugse.
Fereyhaytoh ayro saaku dibrot ugutta 'yeenih gexaana'gidih bical gacen. Awkáh abbah tu gactek, iyyeemih, «Naharak maaqo afah xag. Kot amqeleeh gexo sarrak abettok» kaak iyye.
Balli, «Meqeh hay» iyyeeh, sarrak maaqo baahen waqdi nammayak daffa 'yeenih yokmeeniih, yooqoben. Tohuk gaba kalen waqdi, kay balli qagseh kaak iyyeemih, «Ahaysa magexinay ku maganah farcitaay elle ne'lih xin» kaak iyye.
Leewih yooboke num gexoh ugteh immay, balli kaat qagamqagseh, «Ahaysa ne'lih xin, saaku gexettok» kaak iyyeeh; ellecabol elle xiine.
Konoyhaytoh ayro saaku dibroh ugutta 'yeh gexam faxa waqdi, awkáh abba kaak iyyeemih, «Naharak ku maganah tuk teena afah xagey gexo carra abettok» kaak iyye. Sarrak ballu kee ballu maaqo daffa 'te titta lih tokme.
Too ayrot edde waqlak wadir, ballu kee kay barra kee isi taamah num gexoh ugutteeh; too waqdi balli iyyemii, «Ayro korteh bari yakkem faxam matablaana? Ahaysa bari siinit akkelek, magexinay elle xinna 'xicay, beera saaku dibrot ugutta 'teenih gexetton» kaak iyye.
Too bar tokkel xiinaanam kaal tigibdiyeeh, tohuk gexxaamah kaa kee kay barraay kay taamah num, namma dananay koori elle heenihiyya luk daqaarimen. Sarrak magrib radam faxa waqdi, Yaabus deqsitta magaalay sarra Yarusalaamal muggaaqiseenihiyya gufen. Too waqdi isi taamah num, «Ahaysa a Yabuusâ-marih magaalal xinna'gidih daggawnu wayna» kaak iyye.
Usuk lih yan num iyyemii, «Aleey, marin marih magaala kee Israayilih aabuke wee marih buxaaxi maculla. Dagoom bisoh gexxa inna waqdi, Gibqa akkiiy Raama magaala gufe akkennooh; too namma magaalak magaalak teenal xiinenno» iyye.
Yaabus magaalak tatreeniih, ayro culla 'te waqdi Gibqâ-magaalay Benyam rasul tanihiyya fan yemeeten.
Gexak sugen gitaak magaala fanah daggaawen. Magaala guffu heen waqdi, magaalak gudey sinam gitah gexxaah gactahiyyal daffa 'yen. «Buxal ne'lih xiina» iyya mara magennon.
Oson tokkel yanin waqdi, idaltuh yan numuy taamak orbahiyya keenil yemeete. A idalti aslik Efrayim numuk yene'mmay, woo saaku buxah woo magaalal yen. A magaala lem Benyam marak ten.
A idalti magaalak gudel ken yuble waqdi keenil yemeeteeh, «Ankek temeeteeniih, anni baaxo fanah gexxaanaah?» keenik iyye.
«Elle sugnem, Yuudâ-rasuk Beetlacam magaalaay; away genxam, ninni baaxo. Baaxo nek Efrayim rasuk qaleela mango exxay xeeruk raqtahiyyal tan» kaak iyye. «Beetlacam fan gexeeh, away inni buxa fan gacah an. Nakme'gidih gaqambooy, maqabah qinab kamri linooh, danoonâ-qayso kinni way ninnih linoh immay, xiinih buxah nee beya mara nableh manan» iyye.
Too waqdi idalti keenik iyyeemih, «Arciba hay, yi buxah sin beyak» keenik iyye. «Akkel magaalak gudel maxiininay, yi buxah amaay faxxaanamah arciba» keenik iyye.
«Marcaba hay» iyyeeniih, ugutta 'yeenih kay buxah kaa'lih gexen. Tokkel danoonah qayso keenih qidda heeh; sarrak iba kaqliseenih, maaqo kee maqab xagen.
Tonnal farcatat yanin waqdi, magaalah addal tan labhay taama akak toomehiyya garciik qari keenik marot heen. Qari afa keenil kaxxam yoogoren. Qari le numuk, «Ama ku buxa yemeete num annah afah nel eyyeq; fido kaat fanxa'gidih neh kaa eyyeq» iyyen.
Qari le num afah keenil bukka 'yeh, «Kata maxcina. Yi toobokoy, annah tan qax-umaaneh tanim maxcina. A num yi qibnaytuk, kata bas.
Faxxeenik, akkel kay barra kee yi baxáy bikirit tanihiyya taniih, afah siinih ayyaaqeyyok, ken lih xiinaay faxxeenim keenik aba. A numuh tu gactek, aham maxcinaay a qax-umaanek raaqa» keenik iyye.
Yab kaak cinaanam yuble waqdi, qibnaytuh yan numuu, isi barray caggoytâ-gubih caggoytah lehiyya beyya heeh foocal keenik hayya heeh cabe. Taaxige mari inkih yan bar caylisakaay, waqdiiy num tet ciggiilakaay, isinnih elle faxen innal fido teetit faxak xinna 'yeenih saaku fan luk tet maacisen.
Saaku maaci maacise waqdi tet ruuben. Is idalti-qariy tet baqli edde yenehiyyah afal tinnikisseh maacisse.
Maaca tet baqli gexoh ugutta 'yeh, afah bukka 'ye waqdi, kay barray qarik afat gaba ruubuumut lehiyya, yuble.
Too waqdi, «Ugutay nee bey, genxu waynak» teetik iyye. Yab kaal gacse wayte waqdi, dananal tabtabbih tet hayya heeh, daqaarimma 'ye.
Buxa guffu heeh qari culla 'ye waqdi, gile luk yewqeeh, isi barray rabtehiyya too gilet taban kee namma maasayyal irgiggiqqa heeh, kulli exxa Israayil kedoy taban kee nammay takkehiyya fanah ruube.
Israayil mari tah yuble waqdi, «Ah Masrik newqeemih nubleeh noobbem hinnak. Ah macak tanih tan? Ahak tuk teena axcee kee abe nakkem tayse. Tibba axce waynay» iyyen.

Tah yoobbe mari, Israayil mari elle eneyya 'ya ikkek, Gilqad rasul elle suge marih agantah, num maraaqinnay, inkih yakkeenimik Mixfa deqsita aracal YALLIH foocal gaaboowen.
Too aracal too saaku, Yallih marih gaabownay tekkehiyyal Israayil marak kedoh abbobtik num maraaqinnaay, affara boolih alfih numuy seefwa tittikiyehiyya inkih temeete.
Benyaamah yooboke marah tu gactek, Israayilih ubukka 'teemik keenik kalih mari Mixfal kobxem yoobbeenih immay, oson magexinnon.
Yemeete mari, «Taway tekkem macaay? A umaane elle tekke'nna naabbem fanxa» iyyen.
Leewih yooboke numuy barra uma-taamat akak qideenihiyya iyyemii, «Yoo kee yi barray caggoytâ-gubih barrah liyohiyya barak elle xinna'gidih, Gibqâ-magaalay Benyam rasul geytintahiyya fanah gexak nemeete.
Gibqâ-mari qeebi yot aba'gidih bar yemeeteeh, addal akak an qarit maro heen. Naharak yoo qidaanam faxeeniih, sarra yoo cabba heenih yi barra cayliseeniih woo caylisut edde rabte.
Sarra tet ginaada beeh irgiggiqqa heeh Israayil mari elle eneyya 'ya ikke exxa-exxa keenih ruube. A umaane abe mari, uma-taamay caraamak tanihiyya ni addal abe mara kinnon.
Ta saaku ta'kkel gaaboowe marak inkih, Israayilih yooboke mara kinnitoonuuh aham ubulaay; akak intaanam siinil cabah an» iyye.
Sugga 'ye mari inkih inki afat, «Ahak tuk teena abe'kal, buxah num nek mayaduurak, abnaamat yabnay» iyyen. «Gibqâ-magaalat qeebi abu waa maral saami caxxa qidnaamaay, saami caxxi elle yewqe mara rubnaama.
Israayil xaylok tabanhaytoh af, gaaduh gexa marah leek maaqo baahaanamaay; wohuk raqqa 'ye mara Gibqâ-magaalal yan maray a umâ-yabulit asehiyya digaala'gidih genxaama» 'yaanam iyyen.
Tohul yakkeenimiik titta geeniih; Gibqâ-magaalah-mara digaalaanamat caben.
Sarrakaa, inkih yan Benyam rasu fan farmo ruubeeniih, iyyeenimii, «A sin addal tekke umaanek maca inteenih?
Away ama umeynit rabi digaalah digaalla'gidiiy Israayil rasuk Yalli niqba taama bayisna'gidih, xabba ken haay nel ken ruuba» 'yaanam keenih ruuben.
Takkay immay Benyam a farmoy ken toobokoh tan Israayil ummat keenih rubtet maqal mahaysitinnon.
Sarrak inkih tan Benyam magaaloolik gaabowwa 'yeenih Israayil marat qeebi abaana'gidih, Gibqâ-magaalal gaaboowen.
Too ayrot labaatanna kee lica alfih qaskariita isinni magaaloolih addak gaaboysak tokkel kobxisen. Too marak kalah kaadu, dibuk Gibqâ-magaalal yooboke marak malcina boolih numuy nagay qaskariino lehiyya doorru heenih baahen.
Too maray gaaboowehiyyak inkih malcina boolih num qeebi guri-gabah abak yen. Keenik kulli num qalaamah wanxefit ruube xaa hoxisak mananna.
Raqqa 'ye Israayil mari is le kabuk, affara boolih alfi qaskariitay nagay tan qaskariinô-baritto lehiyya qeebih keenih bical heen.
Sarraa, Israayil mari Beetal deqsitta magaalal
Too waqdi YALLIH garik, «Naharak gaaduh Yuudah yooboke mari gexay» inta qangara temeete.
Yalli toh keenik iyyek lakal, nammayhaytô saaku baaxo maacissa 'te waqdi, qeebih keenih gexeeniih; gaaduh gexxe qaskar Gibqâ-magaalah garil tinfiddige.
Sarrakaa, Benyam marat fooca kee foocah gacca 'yeenih qeebih bicsiten.
Benyam mari magaalah addak yewqeeh, too ayrot edde Israayil-qaskarak labaatanna kee namma alfih num qiden.
Toh keenit tekke waqdi, Israayil mari qibaada elle aban arac gexxa 'yeeniih, bari tikka 'yam fanah YALLAL weeqak sugen. Sarrakaa, YALLA fan essero xayyoosen. Iyyeenimihii, «Benyam maray ni toobokoh yanih qeebih genxuu magenxu, YALLAW?» iyyen.
YALLAKAA, «Yeey, qeebi keenit aba» inta qangara temeete. Too waqdi niya keenit gacteeh, edde ugteeniih, duma akah aben innah, qeebi keenit abaana'gidih, dumih aracal bical gacen.
Nammeyhaytoh ayro qeebil gaba qideeniih,
too waqdi Benyam-mari kaadu nammayhaak magaalak bukka 'yeeniih, taban kee bacra alfih qaskariitay nagay tan qaskariino lehiyya qeebit keenik qiden.
Israayil mari tah yuble waqdi, kaxxa qaadiyyah qaadeeniih Beetal fan gexxa 'yeenih, tokkel daffa 'yeenih YALLAL weeqak asen. Too ayro bari tikka 'yam fanah maaqo afah maxaginnon. Tokkel too ayro YALLAH cado akak cararisan sadgat kee amaanah xiinaanamih astah aban sadgat aben.
Too saaku Yallih-Qahdih-Sandug Beetalal teneeh; seekih tenem, Haaruun baxih baxa Fincasak ten. Fincas abba Alqedara. Sarrak Israayil ummat kaadu qagitteh, «YALLAW, Benyam marih qeebit qagitnoh innaa? Maqagitnuu?» iyyen.
YALLIH kabuk, «Gexay beera qeebit qagita, keenik sin aysiiseyyok» inta qangara temeete.
Tohuk wadir Israayil mari qeebih gexeeh, Gibqâ-magaalat amô-reebu le aracat sasot sugu waa mara heen.
Sidochaytoh ayro dumak kaxxih Gibqâ-magaalah garil fooca kee foocah gacca 'yeenih qeebih bical gacen.
Too waqdi Benyam mari qeebih magaalak yewqeeh; Beetal-magaala fan gexa gita kee Gibqâ-magaala fan gexa gita Israayil qaskar lakak ayraradduk gexen. Dumak kaxxih Israayilik tu yakke mara booxal qiden. Too qeebit Israayilik soddom num qiden.
Too waqdi, «Dumak kaxxih a saaku kaadu ken selleh» iyyen.
Takkay immay Israayil mari, Benyam mari magaalak ken lakak awaquk gital akah ooban innah wadir hirgimeenih kudaanam ceelaanamal malsen.
Sarrak Israayil-kaxxa-qande Baqal-Tamaari deqsita aracal koboxxa 'yeenih hortal gacen waqdi, Gibqâ-magaalal sasot-sugte-qande edde sugte ikkek tewqe.
Tonnal Israayil marih addak doorru heenih baahen tabna alfih num, Gibqâ-magaala tabbixe'gidih foocah teetik yemeeten waqdi, uma-qeebi yekke. Benyam-mari baatih gexam isik maballinna'mmay,
too ayro YALLI Israayil mara Benyam marak yiysiiseh. Israayil mari labaatanna kee koona alfi kee bool qaskariita keenik qide.
Benyam mari, gacu waam isinnik yublen.
Kaxxa qaskar Benyam marak wadir akah hirgimeenimii, Gibqâ-garil sasot caben qaskar Benyam mari ken lakat arduk yamaatem tuble waqdi, ciggilla heenih qeebi abeloonum aaxaguk yeneeniih, tohuh aben.
Sasot suge mari magaala fan yerdeeniih sinaamak sugga 'tem inkih qiden.
Israayil-qandek-sasot-tan-qande kee kalah tan kaxxa-qande fanal asta tittah heenih yenen. Sasot tan qaskar inteemih, «Magaalak kaxxa qer awaqih tablen waqdi
wadir enkeleelebba 'xicay qeebit cula» iyyen.
Benyam marah tu gactek, Israayil marak soddom num qiden waqdi, «Dumak kaxxih ken selleh» 'yaanamal kaxxam tirtirisen.
Sarrak qer qamburreh innah qaran dagaak yewqe waqdi, Benyam mari wadir wagga heeh inkih tan magaalat gira habug axcih yublen.
Too waqdi Israayil mari wadir uduurra 'yeh qeebi keenit abe. Benyam marat warigga raddeeh, yambaxoonu waanam isinnik yublen.
Qeebik addak kudeeniih booxah tan baaxo fan kuden. Takkay immay asillimi ken mahannoonuuy, kaxxa qaskar kee magaalah addak awaquk sugte qaskarih namma fanal yembexen.
Raqtem nammâ fanal hayya heenih Gibqak ayrô-mawqa le kabu raaqa arac fanah ayradduk baahen. Mangom gital elle keenik selen.
Benyam qaskarak dooren labhak taban kee bacra alfih num qiden.
Wohuk raqtem wadir tendebbeeh; Rimmon-Xaa akak iyyan arac fan yemeeten. Koona alfih num gital keenik qiden. Akim keenik Israayil mari Gidqom-magaala fan ayradduk baaheeh, namma alfih num keenik qiden.
Too ayrot Benyaamak agiirah ten qaskarak tittat labaatanna kee koona alfih num rabe.
Lica boolih num faxe innalaay yisillimeeh; too mari Rimmon Xaa akak iyyan aracay sinam elle ane sinnihiyya fanah kuden. Tokkel affara alsa sugen.
Israayil-mari uduurra 'yeh, Benyam marak raqteemik awka macabinnon; lab num maxcinnon barra maxcinnoonuy selli heen. Magaalal sugteemik lac kee buxah addah alluwwa agantah selli heen. Tohiital sugga 'te magaaloolik tu macabinnoonuy kaadu inkih cararisen.

Israayil-mari qeebi abak naharat, Mixfal gaabowwa 'yeeh Yallah kaxxa qahdi culeenih yenen. Iyyeenimii, «Yallaw, Benyam marah rihimih ninni say-xaylo acee waynaamah xiibinna» iyyeenih yenen.
Tohuk gexxaamah sarrî-saaku Beetal fan gexxa 'yeenih inkih tan ayro Yallal weeqakaay kaxxa boogeh boogisak asen.
«YALLAW, Israayil doore Dageltaw, a saaku Benyam maray Israayilih yoobokehiyya akah bayam macaay?» iyyen.
Ciggilta ayro maaca dibrot sadgat elle aban arac bicissa heeniih, cado akak carrisan saq sadgatah woo aracih amol carriseeniih, tonnah kaadu amaanah xiinaanamih astah aban sadgat tokkel aben.
Sarrak iyyeenimih, «Israayil marak Mixfa fanah YALLIH foocal gaabownah amaate wee mari maay yan?» iyyen. Toh akah iyyeenim, Mixfa amaate wee num qideloonumul xiiba culeenih yenen.
Tonna'mmay Israayil-mari Benyam-maray keenih yoobokehiyyah away kaxxam qaaden. Iyyeenimih, «Israayil isi qammih xaylo wayteeh,
away nanu say-xaylo keenih abe waynaamal YALLIH garil xiibinneh nanik, a raaqe marah rihimih agabu ankek geynah nan?» tittak iyyen.
Sarrakaa, «Gaabownah arac amaate wayteeh, daffeynat angale waytem maa maraay?» axcuk titta esseren. Gilqad rasuk Yaabes magaalal yen mari amaate weenimil titta geen.
Too mari amaate weem elle yeexegeenimii, yemeete mara kee raaqe mara tittak yaaxagoonuh sinaamah migaaqal seecen waqdi, Yaabes mari kaaye'kal raaqe. Too waqdi yeexegen. Amaate weenim keenik yeexegen.
Gaabowwa 'ye marii, titta geyya heeh, taban kee namma alfih qaskariitay agiirah yanihiyya qeebih keenih ruuben. Iyyeenimih, «Gexay Yaabes magaalal sugu waa marak agabu kee urri agantah num macabinay inkih qida.
Lab-mara inkih qida. Bikirit tan baxuwwak kalih agabuk tu macabinay sela» keenik iyyen.
Too mari Yaabes magaalal bikirit yan baxuuwuk affara boolih baxuwwa geen. Too baxuw Siilo fan baahen. Siilo Kanqaan magaalak ten.
Sarraa, too maray gaaboowehiyya Rimmon-Xaa deqsita aracal yen Benyam marah farmo ruubeeniih, «Ahaysa qeebi siinit abtam matanak, aytikuma» keenik iyyen.
Tohuk lakal Benyam mari isi baaxo fan yuduure. Elle yemeete'kkel, Yaabes magaalak baahen baxuuwuy bikirit yanihiyya rihimih keenih yeceen. Takkay immay too baxuw mangah ken dudda mahannaay; tonna-leemiik tu keenik rihim maleh raqte.
Tonna'mmay Israayil marii, YALLI Benyam maray ken abbah saqlih xayloh taniih duma agleh keenit sugtehiyya keenik baxsem yublen waqdii, kaxxam akah qaaden.
Tohuk gexxaamah Israayil-maray gaaboowehiyya iyyemii, «Benyam kedot ahak wadir agbi maraaqinnak, away rihimih agabu gee'kal, raaqe marah agabu ankek bahnah nan?
Israayil mari baxambaxisimam mameqek maca tayse? Ahaysa carbik raaqeh yan marah tuk teena abnam nek faxxinta.
Nanu ninni say-xaylo keenih acee waynaah; rihimih xaylo keenih acayinnaan numul Yallih abaaro obtay 'yaanam inneh nanik, maca abnam tayse?» axcuk mala tittal baahen.
Sarrak cubbussa heen waqdi, Siilô magaalal kulli sanatal YALLIH qiidih edde asan ayro xayyowteh tanim kassa heen. Siilô-magaala Beetal deqsitta magaalak kilbat le kabut raaqak teneeh, Leboonâ-magaalak kaadu gabbi-qaxat raaqak ten. Beetal kee Seekem magaalak fan gexa gitak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqak ten.
A qiidih ayro xayyowtem kassitta heen waqdi, Benyam marak, «Naharak gexxa 'xicay qiid yakku waa ayro qinab xala cooxih addat ombooqoray suga.
Siilô magaalah baxuw qiddi farcatah digiraana'gidih awqeloonuk, wagitak ken sugga 'xicay. Too waqdi coox addak eweqa; ken fan gexxa xicay, kulli numuuy isih faxe baxuwwa dirkih beetaama; isinni baaxo fan luk kuda.
Sarraa, toobokoyta akkiiy abba akki sikyatah nel yemeete kaa tekkeeh, ‹Baxuuwuy dirkih nek beenihiyya neh gacisa keenik inxica› nek iyyeenikii, keenik innaamah, ‹Seewah siinik morbisinninooy; geerak kaadu isin makkok rihimih keenih maabinnitoonuy; isinni malal geenim loonu. Tonna-leemiik Yallih garil duma abten xiibah aham dambik siinil maloowintak, sinam tanay inxica› 'yaanam nanu keenik axcenno» keenik iyyen. Tonna leemiik elle aboonu waan inna keenih warissa heenih ken ruuben.
Too mari gexeeh keenik elle inxicca 'yen innal aben. Kulli numuuy digirak suge baxuuwuk baxuwwa-baxuwwal qawwa heenih luk kuden. Too baxuw isinni baaxo beeniih; finqitteh sugte magaala wadir nammeyhaak xisen. Tohuk wadir dabaaqah tokkel gacen.
Sarrak gaaboowe marak numuuy isi baaxo kee isi ahli kee kedo fanah yuduure.
Too dabaanal Israayil addal malik manannaay; tonna-leemiik kulli num isih faxem abbaasitak yen.

Makaabon Israayil baaxol dardaarak ten saaku, Israayil baaxol qulul rade. Too waqdi Alimelek deqsita num, lab-xayloh nammay kee barra gabat hayya heeh, Yuudâ-baaxok Beetlacam deqsitta magaalak Mooyab deqsita marih baaxo fan dulah gexe. Kay barra migaaqah Noqmi deqsitak ten. Teetik lab xayloh nammay kaadu migaaqah Maclon kee Kilyon deqsitak yenen. Alimelek akah yoobokem, Efrat deqsitta gulubuk ten.
Alimelek elle gexe baaxol waqlak wadir rabeh. Too waqdi kay barra xaylo nammay lih dibuk raqte.
Sarrak tet xaylo Mooyabah yooboke baxuuwul digiben. Woo baxuuwuk tiyak teena migaaqah Qorfa deqsitak teneeh; akitto Ruut deqsitak ten. Tabna sanatak lakal
Maclon kee Kilyon kaadu rabteh. Noqmi-baqla kee tet xaylo inkih rabteh; is dibuk raqte.
Waqlak wadir Noqmi, YALLI isi marat barkat heeh baaxol mango daro tooboke 'yaanam toobbe. Too waqdi isi xayloh agabu kee isih Mooyab-baaxo cabteh gexxam faxak ten.
Sarrak Yuudâ-baaxo fan gacaana'gidih safarah ugteenih; Yuudâ-baaxo fanah aban gexoh gitat yanin waqdi,
keenik inteemih, «Isin isinni inonti fan uduuraay; yoo kee isinni baqoltih maquk akah sugten innah, YALLI siinih yamqay.
YALLI, digibeeh buxa le mara sin abay» keenik inte. Sarrak fugga ken hayteeh, «Salaamata» keenik inte.
Too waqdi tet xayloh agbi weeqah hayya heeh,
«Nanu ku mara fan ko'lih gexenno'kkal, kok maraqna» teetik iyyen.
Noqmi keenik intemii, «Yi xayloy uduuraay, yo'lih magexina. Anu ahaksa sin cigissa xaylo maxalak,
isinni buxah uduura. Ahaksa digibeh xaylo xalam faxaamah; idooliteh ikkal digib mageya. Anu digib niya luk sugam takke-way, a barat digibeh xaylo xaleh,
ahaksa yi xaylo catteh sin abittam fan maay qambaltan? Ken taagah digibik tabboodeenim maay faxxan? Kata, yi xayloy, ah takkem hinnam taaxigeenih. YALLI yoh maqaane maloowinaay, tekkem siinik yol gibdi» keenik inte.
Toh keenik inte waqdi kaadu oson weeqeenih. Sarrak Qorfa isi ballo fugga hayteeh, salaamata teetik inteh isi buxah tuduure. Ruutuuy teetik baxsime cinteh, elle raqte.
Too waqdi tet ballo teetik inteemih, «Qorfa isi baaxo kee isi taqbudem fan taduureh tanik, atu kaadu uduur» teetik inte.
Ruut teetik inteemih, «Annah tanim yok maxcin. Atu gexinnaan ikke ko'lih gexeyyok, anay yoo inxic» teetik inte. «Atu dabqah elle gacinnaan baaxol ko'lih gaceyyo. Ku mari yi maraay; ku Dagelti yi Dagelta.
Rabi yok, atu elle rabtu wayta ikkel akkeleeh; magaq yok ku magaqa lih gacele. Koo dibuk cabaanamak, YALLIH digaala yot takkem tayse. Rabak sarra tittak nee baxissam matana» teetik inte.
Sarrak Noqmi Ruut teetik raaqe waytam tuble waqdi, teetik intem maliiy, is lih tanay tet inte.
Wohuk wadirih abak sugen safarah sitta luk Beetlacam magaala fanah haysiten. Beetlacam gufen waqdi sinam ken tubleeh, woh kaxxam waagisse. Wokkel suge agbi, «Ah nummah Noqmii?» iyyen.
Isiiy, «Yalli mano yot qeero bahsiisek, Noqmi yok maxcinay Maara
Anu akkek gexe saaku kullim luk gexeeh, a saakuy YALLI a baaxo yoo gacsehiyya gaba foyyah luk uduure. YALLI gadaama kee baaca inkih yol ruube way, Noqmi macah yok intan?» keenik inte.
Noqmi, too caalatal, tet-baxih-gubnah tan Ruutuy Mooyab marah tooboke gabat luk Beetlacam fan tuduure. Oson Beetlacam gufen saaku, gabru deqsitta daroh orbah taama qimbisseh keenih sugte.

Noqmi-baqalah yen Alimelekih ramad le numuy migaaqah Booqas deqsitahiyya suge. Usuk gaddalih yan numuy sinam yab akak taabbehiyyak ten.
Ayrok teena Ruut tet balloh tan Noqmik, «Daro orbisa mari cabe daro afiile'gidih, buqre fan gexay yoo m'itta?» teetik inte. «Wokkel marak teeni edde taamitam yoh aceelem digga haak» teetik inte.
Too waqdi Noqmi, «Gex hay, yi baxáy» teetik inte.
Ruut buqreh adda gexxeeh; tokkel daro orbisa mari cabem gaabossa'gidih, sinaamak darre-darret gexxe. Nasiibih woh elle abak sugtem, tet baqalah ramad le numuy Booqas deqsitahiyyah buqreh adda.
Waqlak wadir Booqas Beetlacamak yemeeteeh, taamâ-marah salaamatta abe. «YALLI sin lih yanay» iyye.
Osonuuy, «YALLI barkat kot haay» kaak iyyen.
Sarrak Booqas taamak abbah yan numuk, «A qunxa barra iyyin barray?» iyye.
Woo numuuy, «Ama barra Mooyab-baaxok Noqmi lih temeete barraay; ‹Sinam cabte daro afiilu waa› yok itteehiiy, akkeey saakuh taamat tan. Away inki adda silaalal ufuy rubbu hayteh immay, akkeey saakuh taamat tan» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Booqas Ruutuk annah iyye. «Anu fayu koh acayu waak. Ta buqreek kalih buqreerah addah darô-mafaalah magexinay; akkel yan say-mara lih taamit.
Sahda daro elle orbissa ikke wagitey, agbi darok raqtem yafiile waqdi ken lih gex. Yi labhak, ‹Tet maxagina›, 'yaanam exceh an. Bakaaritta waqdi kaadu gexxa 'xicay, oson kiben gacloolik aqub» teetik iyye.
Ruut qansa teetik baaxo xagtam fanah massakaxxah qununna 'teeh, Booqasak annah inte. «Yooy marin baaxoh barrah yanihiyyah a gideh maqaaneh macah taqabta?» kaak inte.
Usuk too waqdi teetil gacseemih, «Atu ku baqli rabba 'yeemiy akke, isi balloh abtem yoh warseeniih; isi inaay isi abba kee isi baaxo cabba hayteh, aaxige wayta marih adda elle temeete inna oobbeh.
Atu abteemih galto YALLI koh yacaay; catoh elle temeete YALLAY Israayil ummatta doorehiyya dudda le galto koh yacaay» teetik iyye.
Is too waqdi, «Yi qammow, yooy ku buxal taamita agbih gide kinni way akke waahiyya lih meqe yaabah yabteeh, ruffu yoo hayteeh, yoh temqeh» inte.
Qeerô-kaloh-waqla tekke waqdi, Booqas Ruutuk annah iyye. «Gaqambô-rike luk annah amaay a saalot kumus» teetik iyye. Is too waqdi amma inteh taamâ-mara lih daffeyteeh; sarrak Booqas alen alo teetih yecee. Too maaqok cayya 'tam fan tokmeeh, geera elle cabte.
Sarrak darô-mafaalah ugutte waqdi, Booqas taamâ-marak iyyeemih, «Tifiilen daroy axaw axawah tabbixeenihiyyah garik, faxxeh gide tafiilay tet inxicaay, woo axaw axawah tabbixen darok kaadu tu-tu siibay teetih eyyeeqay, bettay tet inxica. Num teetit yaabe waay» keenik iyye.
Ruut abak sugte darô-mafaala nagay abteeh, carri tikka 'yam fan afiiluk sugte. Sarrak woo qaalak luuqusak asse. Daro keexxe waqdi, tittat kiisik garab tekke.
Tohuk lakal magaala fan tuduureeh, darok gaabosseh gide isi ballo tuybulle. Qeerô-kalok raaqe geera kaadu teetih tecee.
Too waqdi Noqmi teetik inteemih, «Darok a gide elle tifiilem ankeey? Koh a taama yecee numut Yalli barkat haayik, elle taamitak assem iyyin buqreey?» teetik inte.
Ruut elle taamitak sugte arac teetih warisseeh, «A saaku buqrel akak taamitak sugem, Booqas deqsita numu» teetik inte.
Noqmi inteemih, «Booqasat YALLI barkat haay. YALLI addunyal-yan-mara kee rabe-marah inkih cule qahdi keenil mamakam ableh. Booqas nek ramadaay; ni cegsi elle yamaate marak numuk teeni kaa» teetik inte.
Too waqdi Ruut inteemih, «Wohuk tayseemih, ‹Darô-fiila gaba kalla haytam fanah yi taamah mara lih taamit› yok iyye» inte.
Too waqdi Noqmi annah teetik inte. «Nummah, yi baxáy, Booqas-buqret taamita agabu lih taamittam meqeeh; aki arac gexxek koo xagitaanam takkeh» teetik inte.
Tonna leemiik Ruut wokkel Booqas buqret taamita agbi elle yan ikkel, kamadi kee gabru deqsitta daro mafaalak gaba kalla haytam fanah, taamitak sugte. Dabqih isi ballo lih sugte.

Ayrok teena Noqmi Ruutuk annah inte. «Ahaysa, atu isi buxa le barra takke'gidih, baqala koh gorrisam meqe» teetik inte.
«Atu taamah agabu lih akak taamitak sugte Booqas nek ramadah yan numu. Taway abtamaa: a bar usuk caffalik caffa kee daro tittak baxsele.
Too waqdi atu kaqalla 'xicaay qatri isil caxxaay meqe sarat gacca 'xic. Tokkek usuk too caffali daro kee caffa tittak elle baxsa ikke fan gex. Sarrak usuk makum kee maqubuk gaba kalla haam fan wokke temeetem isik maysaxxagin.
Qaxah gacam wagitak suggu 'xicay inaaqitem table waqdi, edde yumbuduude saro ibak kaak cankaffa haay ibi-gubgubat kaak inaaqit. Too waqdi abtu waytam usuk koh warsele» teetik inte.
Ruutuuy isi ballok, «Meqeh hay, atu ab axcinnaanim inkih abeyyo» teetik inte.
Too waqdi daro kee caffa tittak elle baxsan arac gexxeeh, tokkel tet ballo ab teetik inxicci 'tem inkih abte.
Booqas makmo kee maqubuk gaba kalla hee waqdi xagar kaak ruffu iyye. Sarrak tittak bagul kobxisen caffali daroh xaquk xiina'gidih qaxah gacca 'ye. Too waqdi Ruut raarisak amma 'teh edde yumbuduude saro ibak kaak cankaffa hayteh ibi gubgubat kaak inaaqitte.
Booqas barak gude tuk wariggiteh; ugte waqdi barra ibak gubat kaak tanim yuble.
Too waqdi «Atu iyyaay?» teetik iyye.
Is inteemih, «Ah yoo Ruutuuy; yi cigsi elle yamaatem koohuk, yoo cigis» kaak inte.
Too waqdi Booqas teetik iyyemii, «Yi baxáy, YALLI barkat kot haay. Atu away abte maqaane duma abte maqaanek tayseh. Gadda alle kee baaca alle yakken immay, furraynâ-lakat magexinnito.
Away yi baxáy, ayti kibba haysit; atu faxxem koh abeyyok» teetik iyye. «A magaalal sinam inkih atu kas le barra kinnitom kok yaaxigeenih.
Anu nummah xayi ramad kinniyoh immay, yok xayi numuy cigsi elle yamaatehiyya yan.
Tonna leemiik a barak akkel elle xiinaay; maaca woo num ku cigso oggolek, oggolaah; usuk oggole edde weemit YALLAY waarahiyyah migaaqal koh xiibitaah anu innih koo cigseyyo» teetik iyye.
Woo barak, ibi-gubgubat kaak xinteeh, maaca num tet able waa waqdi ugutte. Too waqdi teetik iyyeemih, «Atu a arac temeetem num aaxige waam faxxinta» iyye.
Kaadu qagseh iyyeemih, «Ama amô-saro kalay annah xayyoosay fidisey» teetik iyye. Woo saro kaal xayyosse waqdi, gabru deqsitta darok laca keexo takkem woo sarol teetih hayya heeh, quukah fillal teetik hee. Tohuk lakal magaala fan gexe.
Ruut, ballo fan tuduure waqdi tet ballo teetik inteemih, «Yi baxáy, caagid koh bicee?» teetik inte.
Too waqdi Ruut, Booqas teetih abba heem kee teetik iyyem inkih teetih warisseeh,
kaadu inteemih, «Koo fan gabâ-foyya luk gacaamak, ‹Gabru deqsitta daro gabat luk gex› yok iyyeeh; a daro ah teetiiy, inkih yoh yecee» teetik inte.
Too waqdi Noqmi teetik inteemih, «Tahaysa taham elle takke inna nable fanah sabri abit. Booqas aham bicse'kal maxiinak» teetik inte.

Booqas magaalah culmal daffeyna elle aban arac gexeeh, wokkel daffee. Too waqdi Alimelekik xayi ramadah yan numuy Booqas edde yaabeh sugehiyya wokke yemeete. Booqas kaa yuble waqdi, «Annah amey akkel daffey» kaak iyye. Too waqdi woo num yemeeteh wokkel daffee.
Sarrak Booqas magaalah idoolah yan tabna numuh kaadu seeceeh, «Akkel daffeya» iyyeeh; too waqdi woo mari kaadu wokkel daffee.
Tohuk lakal woo numuk iyyeemih, «Noqmi away Mooyab rasuk tuduureeh, neh ramad luk yen Alimelek baaxo taylammem faxxaah;
atu wohim taaxigem faxxintam yot celta. Hay tonnal, faxxek, a maray akkel daffeyah yanihiyyah foocal xaamitaay, faxe waytek kaadu, ken foocal ‹Mafaxa› inxic. Macaay intek, a baaxo xaamaanamih cakki naharat elle yamaatem kooy; ku lakal elle yamaatem yoo» kaak iyye.
Woo num woo waqdi, «Meqeh hay, anu xaameyyo» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Booqas kaak iyyeemih, «Nabam meqe hay. Noqmik woo baaxo xaamta waqdi, baaxo Alimelek-buxah-mari akah nagra innah, Ruutuy gubnah tanihiyya kaadu cigissam kol tan. Tonnal rabe numih ikoyta kee migaq baye kaletto» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi woo num, «Nagra yi xaylol akak amaate waytek, wonnalaay, atu xaamite waytek, anu a baaxoh limok raaqah an» kaak iyye.
Too dabaanal duyye aylammee kee duyye-duyyet milaage yakken waqdi, aylammee kee milaage yakke num ibak kabella eyyeqqa heeh xaama numul yeceem, Israayil marih qaadah luk yen. Too kabella yeyyeeqeenik wadir, caagid gaba kalem elle aaxaguk yenen.
Tonnal woo num Booqasak, «Atu xaamit» iyyeeh, ibak kabella eyyeqqa heeh, Booqasal yecee.
Too waqdi Booqas magaalah idoola kee wokkel suggu 'ye marak inkih iyyeemih, «A saaku Alimelek kee kay xayloy Kilyon kee Maclon deqsitte, luk sugga 'tem inkih Noqmi-gabak xaamaamih sumaq siini.
Toh lih kaadu Ruutuy Mooyabah toobokeeh Maclon abbaxuk suge yi barra tekkeeh; yi lakal aham Alimelek buxah mari nagrele. Kay buxah mari kay nagrak mayawqa. Tohul ta saaku sumaaqah tanim siini» iyye.
Tokkel sugte magaalah idoola kee raqqa 'ye mari inkih iyyeemih, «Nanu a saaku tekkeemih sumaq kinninoh. Digibte barra, Raacel kee Liyay Israayil ummatta akak raddehiyya innah YALLI tet abay. Efrata-gulubuk inkih gaddali koo abay; Beetlacam magaalal kaadu migaq-gexxo le num koo abay.
A barrat YALLI koh yecee xaylo, Yuuda kee Tamaari fanak yooboke Fares deqsita numih xaylo tekkem yakkoonay» axcuk dooqa kaah aben.
Tohuk lakal Booqas, Ruut abiteh buxah tet bee. YALLI bagut baxa teetik heeh, lab baxa kaah xalte.
Too waqdi agbi Noqmik annah iyye. «YALLA fayla taafay! A saaku YALLI amo akak wagitta lab-baxa koh yecee. Yooboke awki Israayil rasul migaq-gexxo le num yakkay.
Ruut koo kicnaah, malcina lab-baxi xiqaamak fula koh xiqte. Away absuma koh bahteeh; a absumi idoolinnal ruffu koo heeleeh, qande kot heele» teetik iyyen.
Noqmi yooboke awka tukkuqeh, gurumbal isik hayya hayteeh, amo kaak wagitte.
Cuggaaneh agbi inkih, «Noqmih lab-baxi yooboke» iyyen.
Yooboke awkak migaaqah Yoobad iyyen. Yoobad Yiisa xale; Yiisa kaadu Malik Dawud xale.
Fares, Cesram xaleeh, Cesramaay Raam xale. Raam Qamnadab xaleeh, Qamnadab Nacson xale. Nacson Salmon xaleeh, Salmon Booqas xaleeh, Booqas Yoobad xaleeh, Yoobad Yiisa xaleeh, Yiisa Dawud xale.

Elkaana akak iyyan num yen. Woo num Efrayim kedoh aabakuk yeneeh; dabqah Efrayim rasuk qaleela mango aracal geytinta magaalay Raama deqsittahiyyal yen. Abba kaak Yaroocam deqsitak yen. Yaroocam abba Aliihu deqsita numuk ten. Elkaana Aliihuk baxi baxak ten. Efrayim kedok Xuuf deqsita gulubuk Toocu deqsita buxah marat raaqak yen.
Elkaana namma barra luk yen. A namma barra migaaqah Canna kee Faninna deqsitak ten. Faninna xaylo luk ten. Canna xaylo luk mananna.
Kulli sanatal Elkaana, Raama akak iyyan baaxook, Siilo deqsitta magaala fan, YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya yaqbude'gidiiy kay sadgat aba'gidih, amaatuk yen. Tokkel Qeli deqsita numih xayloy migooqah Cofni kee Fincas deqsittahiyya YALLIH seekah yenen.
Elkaana tokkel Yallih sadgat abinnaan waqdi, cadok inki exxa Faninna acayuk yeneeh, aki exxak tet xayloh tiyahaay rike-rike acayuk yen.
Elkaana, Canna kaxxam kicinuk yeneh; tohuk gexxaamah cadoytak namma ikke teetih acayuk yene'mmay, YALLI xalay teetih yeceeh mananna.
Faninna, caggoyta teetik xaylo malim aaxaguk, aaminnaanim teetil baahak, is anqibinnaanim teetik abak ten.
Kulli-way tannah tanim teetil baahak mango sanoota sugte. YALLA elle yaqbuden arac gexinnaan waqdi, Faninna, is anqibinnaanim teetik abak teneeh; too waqdi Canna weeqah hayya haytah maaqo edde cinak ten.
Tet baqli too waqdi, «Cannay, macah weqtaah? Maaqo macah cinta? Kulli way, akah weqweqsintam macaay? Lab-xayloh tabanak yoo lito way, maca wayta?» teetik axcuk yen.
Ayrok teena Siilol YALLA-elle-yaqbuden-qaril akamuk sugen maaqok gaba kalen waqdi, Canna ugutta 'teh bagi teetik ankakammuk YALLAL weqte. Too waqdi Qeli deqsita sek, Qibaadâ-Qarih albaabih garil sirbiyal daffeyak suge.
Canna YALLAH nadri culte. Inteemih, «YALLAW, Nabaamak Naba Dageltaw, yooy ku naqaso kinnihiyya ubuleey! Yi ceya ubuleey! Inti yol hayis! Yoo mamaaqilin. Yi Goytaw, lab-baxa yoh teceek, rabba 'yam fan ku taamat kaa heeyyooh, amo kaak mamoolay, taabakay axceyyo» 'yaanam axcuk YALLAH nadri culte.
Canna mango uddur fan isi bagut YALLA kallacak tutuc axcuk sugte waqdi, Qeli tet yubleh, wagga tet hee. Too waqdi sokto asgayyih tet yuble waqdi sikrat yekkeleeh,
«A gide macah taskireeh? Katay ahaysa qinab kamri maaqabin» teetik iyye.
Is too waqdi kaak inteemih, «Yi saqalow, sikrat mayyu. Maskirinniyo. Cisaabah bagi akak yankakamme barra kinniyooh, liyoh an ceya YALLAH warsitah kaa kallacak suge.
Uma-taamat assa barra yoo makkalin. Liyoh an biyak kee cisaabah Yalla kallacitak suge ikkal» kaak inte.
Qeli too waqdi, «Muquk gex hay! Israayil doore Dagelti atu faxxem koh abay» teetik iyye.
Is kaadu, «Kulli way yoh meqem ku bagut gactay» kaak inte. Sarrak gexxeeh maaqo xagteeh, tohuk wadir cisab teetik kateh.
Ciggilta ayro Elkaana kee kay buxah mara maaca dibroh ugutta yeenih YALLA yuqbudeenih. Sarrak Raamal tan isinni buxa fan gexen. Elkaana Canna lih xiineeh, YALLI is kaa akah kallactem teetih duuduseh.
YALLI, bagut lab-baxa teetih hee. Too awki yoobokeh; migaaqah Samuwel
Elkaana kee kay buxah mara, sanatal aban sadgat kee, kalah kaadu YALLAH nadri akah aben sadgat abaana'gidih, Siilo edde gexan uddur yemeete.
Takkay immay too saaku Canna kaa'lih magexinna. Kaak intemii, «Awka anguk ayyaaqe saaku, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari kaa beyyooh; tokkel qumri kaak yanim fan elle sugele» inte.
Elkaana teetil gacseemih, «Nabam meqeemi. Taysem kot ceelinnaanim ab. Awka anguk tayyaaqem fanah buxal sug. YALLAH culte nadri YALLI duudusi koo haay» teetik iyye. Sarrak Canna isi baxih amo wagitak buxal elle raqte.
Sarrak anguk kaa mollasse saaku, Siilo fan kaa beyte. Gabat kaadu sidooca karmat yan awur kee, darok tabna kiilo kee, qinabak bicsen kamrik kibuk yan saar luk gexxe. Samuwel Siilol yan YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari fan been saaku qunxuk yen.
Awur yusguudeenik lakal, awka Qeli fan been.
Too waqdi Canna Qelik intemii, «Yi Saqalow, yoo maay taaxigeeh? Anu duma akkel solla exceh YALLA kallacak ten barra kinniyo.
Too saaku YALLAK, ‹Baxa yoh ucuy›, axcuk sugeeh; woo baxi amah kaay; YALLI yoh yeceeh;
anu kaadu YALLIH num yakke'gidih, kaa aceeh an. Qumri kaak yanim fan YALLIH taamat gacele» inte. Usuk tokkel YALLA yuqbude.

Canna YALLA faylisak inteemih,
«Anu rufto akak liyom YALLA.
YALLI yoh abe maqaanek gexxaamah qande baaheh,
yoo niqibuk suge maral usuuleh.
YALLI yoh abe maqaaneh kaxxam ruffu axce.
YALLAY taahirik yanik sah yalli mayan.
YALLIH bis lem matan.
Nee dacrissam Yalla; kaak sa reebu mannu.
Sinaamey, hida caba.
Kaxxiina xagarat hayya hayteenih mayaabina.
YALLI kullim yaaxige Dagelta kinni;
ummatta abba haytaamal inkih mekla.
Celeemah tan qaskarak gaysê-baxi yiddigilleh.
Qamal maleela qande geyte.
Duma cayit suge mari qululut yanih,
a saaku maaqô-goranah marin taamat taqabit yanin.
Qululut suge mari qulul cabeh.
Maxalaytoh sugte barra malciin xalteh;
mango xaylo luk sugte barra foyyah raqte.
Qiddam YALLAAY; waddam YALLA.
Sahda akeera rubtam kaa;
rooci sahdat haytam kaa.
Gaddaleela sinam abtaah baacoytit sinam abtam kaa.
Marak teena fayya haah;
marak teena ramma haa.
Baacoytiitih suge mara caysah
tu maleela gaddalisah.
Malik xaylot ken missoysa;
kaxxa marat ken missoysa.
Baaxo elle tan rakiibo YALLIH imi;
baad woo rakiiboh-bagul xise.
Kaal teemenem dacrissam kaa;
uma mari dite-gadda yakke.
Sahdayti nasri akah geyam isih le qande hinna.
YALLI isi naqboytit foyyisele;
Kulliimik daga raaqa Dagelti qaraanak keenit kaayele.
YALLI inkih tan addunyal ackumele.
Isi malikit qande heeleeh;
isih doore malikih nasri aceele» 'yaanam inte.
Tohuk lakal Elkaana Raamal tan isi buxa fan yuduure. Takkay immay Samuweliy awki baxah yani wokkel Qeli deqsita seekil kaa caben. Tokkel, Qeli deqsita sek aba kaak iyyam abak, YALLIH taamat gace.
Qeli qamal-uma xaylo luk yen. Kay xaylo YALLAT baaqid luk manannaay, hinnay kaadu YALLAH-aban-sadgatak seekah yaceen aftot baaqid luk manannon. Num sadgat aba'gidih wokke yamaate waqdi, ken taamah afat yan num sidiica af le malkaqay cado edde mudaanahiyya luk amma 'yaah,
cado addat akak alaysan buutik cado edde ayyaaquk yen. Sarrak too malkaqat awqinnaan cadoyta seekah acayuk yenen. Siilo fanah Yallih qibaadah yamaate marak, seeka cado elle beyak tenem tonnak ten.
Qeli-xayloy seekah tanihiyyak afat yen numu, too umaane dibuk hinnay, sadgatah qiden lac yasguudeh yan numuk, xayta kalla heeh carrise'kal yan waqdi, «Sek alaysen cado kok moggolak, solal kaah alaysa'gidih qasa cadoyta rike bah» axcuk yen.
Woo num, «Naharak gitah tanim abnay xicaay; xayta carrisneek lakal, isih faxxem beettok sug» kaak iyye kaa tekkek, «Aleey aleey! Awayiik yol ucuy; acee waytek dirkih beeyyo» axcuk yen.
Ta dambiy Qeli-xaylo abtahiyya YALLIH garil kaxxam gibduk ten. Oson ummatta YALLAH abta sadgat burutak yenen.
Toh tekke way Samuwel awkah yeneeh, *baftak bicsen kameesit gacca 'yeh, YALLIH taama abak yen.
Kay ina, kulli sanatal tet baqli sadgat aba'gidih gexa waqdi, kaa'lih gexak teneeh; too waqdi baxah qunxa kames baxay xagarat culsah haanahiyya bicisseh gabat hayya hayteh kaah beyak ten.
Too waqdi Qeli Elkaana kee Cannah dooqa abak yeneeh; Elkaanak, «YALLI a barrat a awkay YALLIH taamat hayteenihiyyah aftok, gersi xaylo koh yacaay» axcuk yen. Tohuk lakal isinni buxah gexak yenen.
YALLI Cannat barkat heeh, gersi lab-xayloh sidoc kee say-xayloh nammay xalte. Samuweliy awkah yanihiyya YALLIH taama elle aba aracal elle ambuk yembe.
Qeli kaxxam idoolite saaku, kay xaylo Israayil marak abtam yoobbeh; gersim hinna'mmay, Yallih Nabnah-Siraqih afal taamitah yan agabu'lih xiinaanam keenik yoobbeh yen.
Toh yoobbe waqdi keenik iyyeemih, «Annah tanim macah abtan? Isin abtan umaane kulli mari yoh warisak, yi xayloy annah tanim maabina. YALLIH marih garil siinik yan xaagi meqe xaagu hinna.
Num numul umam baahek, woo umaanek YALLI kaa catam takkeh, immay, YALLAL dambi lem baahe num YALLIH digaalak iyyi cata? Maabina, yi xayloy» keenik iyye.
Takkay immay YALLI uma raba keenih faxeemih sabbatah, abba yab moggolinnon.
Samuweliy awkah yanihiyya ambuk elle yambeemil, YALLA kee ummatta kacanu gee.
Ayrok teena Yallih-num Qeli fan yemeeteeh, Yallak baahe farmo kaah warse. Kaak iyyeemih, «YALLI kok iyyaamah, ‹Ku buxah mara Masri-marih naqoosah ten saaku, Haaruunuh umbulle.
Yi taamat gacak, yoh aban sadgatah baahan saqa elle qidan aracal sadgatah baahan saqa yasguudeenim kee, yoo elle yaqbuden aracal qerto ruubaanam kee, rikeek tan saroy sek haysitahiyyat gacca 'yeenih fayu yol esseraana'gidih, inkih tan Israayil ummatih addak yi seeka ken abe. Israayil ummat yoh carrisan sadgatih cadok exxa kenim takkay› 'yaanam exce.
Hay tonnal, yi mari yoh baaha sadgatah koo kee ku xaylo inti macah rubtan? Sugay, atu yok isi xaylo mannal tassakaxxeeh? Yi mari baahah yan sadgatih cadok aysinnaan exxah adoobat gabulteenim siinik able waam makkalina.
Yoo YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya, ku buxah marak atu akak radde gulubut yan mari qumri keenik yanim fan yi taamah taamitta seeka akkelon 'yaanamal, duma xagana keenih culeh suge. Awayah tu gactek, woo xagni bagul keenih maan. Yoo yaynabe mara aynabeyyoh, yoo buri intit yable mara buri intit ableyyo.
Taway nagay yoo ankacisay raq. Ku buxah marih addat bar naba num akah ane waa innah, atu akah tooboke kedoh exxa kee ku buxah marak furrayna qunxih cabaariseyyo. Toh edde abu waa wakti yemeeteh.
Israayiliy ku abbah saqlih xayloh tanihiyyah abu waa maqaane tabalu wayta waqdi aysinettooh, yi aracat tekkem tabalu wayta waqdi bagi kok cararele. Ku buxah mari tahak wadir qumrih idoolitta 'yaanam fan masugan.
Kok rade marak inki baxay yoo yakdumu waahiyya sugeleeh; takkay immay inti weeleeh, niya kaak addigillele. Kok rade mari inkih uma rabah rabele.
Ku xaylo Cofni kee Fincas nammeyak inki ayroh addat rabelon. Too waqdi anu inxicca excem numma kinnim aaxigetto.
Imaan yol le numuy anu aba axcem abahiyya seekih heeyyo. Too seekik ramad raaqele. Too ramad anu dooru waa malik lih gacca 'yeh, yoh taamitele.
Kok rade marak saaboh raaqinnaan mari a seekiy anu dooru waahiyyah durruyyatal lakqo kee maaqô-kallacih gexele. «Labhay, maaqô-gide edde geyna taamat nee haa; sin akdumennok», axcuk ken kallacelon 'yaanam kok axce› » kaak iyye.

Samuweliy awkah yanihiyya Qeli-gubal anuk, YALLIH taamat yen. Too dabaanal YALLAK tamaate farmo daguk teneeh; kaak ooba wacyi kaadu daguk yen.
Qeli intik boolaatak yen. Barak teena isi aracal xiinit yen waqdi,
Samuwel kaadu YALLIH Qibaadah-Qariy Yallih Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug elle yanihiyyal xiinit yen. Too bar faanus baruge'kal yan waqdi,
YALLI Samuwelih seeceh, «Samuwelow! Samuwelow!» kaak iyye. Samuweliiy, «Eeh! Ah yoo» axcuk,
arduk Qeli fanah gexe. «Yoh secteh; ah yoo» iyye.
Qeliiy, «Aleey, anu koh maseeciyyok, gexay isi xiinih uduur» kaak iyye. Samuwel xiinih yuduure.
YALLI kaadu qagseh kaah seeceh, «Samuwelow!» iyye. Too waqdi kaadu ugutta 'yeh, Qeli fan gexeeh, «Ah yoo; yoh secteh emeeteh» iyye.
Qeli kaadu iyyeemih, «Yi baxaw, anu koh maseecinniyok, gexay inaaqit» kaak iyye.
Samuwel ahaydumah qunxa numuk yeneeh, YALLA aaxaguk manannaay; tohuk gexxaamah a seeco YALLIH seeco kinnim maaxaginna.
YALLI sidochaytoh uddur kaadu qagseh, «Samuwelow» axcuk kaah seece. Too waqdi ugutta 'yeh Qeli fan gexeeh, «Yoh secteeh, ah yoo» iyye.
Too waqdiiy Qeli kaah sectem YALLA kinnim yeexegeh,
Samuwelik iyyeemih, «Gexay away isi xiinih uduuraay, ahak wadir koh seecek, ‹YALLAW, ah yoo ku naqasu. Koo ankacisah anik, maca abooh?› inxic» kaak iyye. Samuwel qarkayto fan xiinih yuduure.
YALLI amma 'yeh wokkel sooleeh, duma seecak akah suge'nnah, «Samuwelow, Samuwelow» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Samuwel, «Yoo ku naqsi koo ankacisah yanik, maca aboo?» iyye.
YALLI kaak iyyeemih, «Israayil ummattal, ayrok teena kaxxam umaamay sahda taabbu wayta waqdi akak wariggittu waytahiyya baaheyyo.
Too ayro Qeli buxah maral, duma keenil baaheyyo inxicca exceh sugeemik tu macabaay inxicca excem inkih keenik abeyyo.
Kay maral oobisu waa digaala ahak wadir ken amol tanim dumaak kaah warseh. Ken akah digaalu waam, kay xaylo yi migaq akke sinni migaq yoh abteemih sabbata. Qeli kay xaylo aham abtam aaxaguk yene'mmay, maabina keenik maxcinna.
A dambi, faxe sadgat abaanamahaay faxe mattaco yeceenimih ahak wadir daayiman keenit cabe waamah kaah xiibiteh en» iyye.
Tohuk wadir, Samuwel maaca fan inaaqitak suge. Sarrak ugutta 'yeh, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarik afa fakeh. Samuwel woo yuble wacyi Qelih warsaamak meysiteh.
Takkay immay Qeli, «Yi Samuwelow yaah!» iyye.
Samuwel, «Eeh, ah yoo» iyye.
Too waqdi Qeli, «Yalli maca kok iyye? Kok iyyeemik tu yok maaqurin. Yok uqurra haytek, Yalli kot cabe way» kaak iyye.
