Samuwel Yalli kaak inxicca 'yeemik tu kaak maaqurinnay inkih kaah warse. Too waqdi Qeli iyyeemih, «Usuk YALLAK, kay intit taysem abay» iyye.
Samuwel ambuk elle yambeemil YALLI kaa'lih yeneeh, Samuwel, ‹Akkele› akak iyyem inkih akkuk maacisse.
Sarrak Israayil mari kulli kabuk inkih yakkeemiik, Samuwel YALLIH nabi kinnim yeexegeenih.
YALLI Siilo deqsita aracal Samuwelih amballayuk, kaa'lih yaabak yen.

Samuwel, YALLI kaa'lih yaabe yab Israayil ummattah warisak yen.
Too dabaanal *Filistiin-mari Israayilit qeebi abaana'gidih ugten. Israayil-mari Eeben-Qeder deqsita aracal yinfiddigeeniih; Filistiin-mariiy Afeek deqsita aracal yinfiddigen.
Filistiin mari qeebi keenit abeeh; kaxxa qeebi ken fanal akkuk sugek lakal, Filistiin mari qeebil keenik yeyseeh, too qeebil Israayilik affara alfih num qiden.
Israayilik rabak raaqe mari isinni aracah yuduuren waqdi, Israayil makaabon inteemih, «YALLI a saaku Filistiin mara qeebil nek akah yiysiisem macak tan kaay? Siilo fan gexxa inneh, YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug bahnaama. Toh abnek, YALLI ne'lih aneleeh, ni naqboytiitik nee aysiisele» 'yaanam iyyen.
Sarrak Nabaamak Naba YALLAY korsi akak galwa-leemik daga le kabu raqtehiyyak Qahdih-Sandug baahu waa mara Siilo fan ruuben. Qeli xayloh nammeyay migaaqah Cofni kee Fincas deqsittahiyya woo sandug baahe mara lih yemeeten.
Woo sandug baahen waqdi Israayil mari farcik gexxaamah baaxo edde engeyya inta xongoloh xongolen.
Filistiin mari a xongolo yoobbe waqdi iyyeenimih, «Qibraan marih aracal radda xongolo ankacisay, a xongolo macâ-xongolok tan teetiiy?» iyyen. Sarrak YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug baaheenim yoobben waqdi,
Filistiin mari meysiteeh, «A warsan Yalli ken aracah yemeeteh yan! Hay, ni'kke tekkeh matanaa wohoysa! Ahaay dumah annah tanim net makkinna.
Ta way ta celeemah tan yallittek iyyi nee catele? Kamba tu nee tibbixeh tan! Aham duma Masri mara woo bacarih tan baaxol selte yallitte hinnaa!
Bas, Filistiin maraw, agiira tika! Qeebil agiira akke wayteenik, oson ni naqoosah akah sugen innah, nanu kaadu ken naqoosa akkennom ixiga. Qeebil labha tikay maboolaatina bas» tittak iyyen.
Sarrak qeebi rade waqdi, Filistiin mari Israayil marat kaxxa qeebi abeeh; Israayil mari isinni buxa fan yoowwen. Too saaku Israayil marak mangom tembexe. Israayilik soddom alfih qaskariiti rabe.
Yallih Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug yintixibbixeeh; Qeli xayloh nammey Cofni kee Fincas too qeebit rabte.
Benyam kedoh yooboke numuy woo qeebik yisillimehiyya tokkek arduk, Siilô magaala fan too ayrot edde yemeete. Tekkeemih abeh yan rookah gital sara isik qanxiseh yeneeh, amol kaadu siisa luk yen.
Woo num magaala gufe waqdi, Qeli, Yallih Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug gexeemih meysitak sugeeh; xaaguh giti-xaqul korsil daffeyak suge. Taaxige num tikka 'tem magaalâ-marah warse waqdi, inkih tan magaalal kaxxa booge radde.
Qeli ta weeqa yoobbe waqdi, «Sugay, a aabbem macâ-xongolooy?» iyye. Usuk toh inxicca 'ye waqdi, xaagu baahe num sissikuk Qeli fanah yemeete.
Qeli qumrik sagla-taban kee bacaarat yeneeh, namma inti weeh yen.
Xaagu baahe num kaal yemeeteeh, «Carbi elle yekke ikkek ta saaku emeeteeh, akak kudeh emeetem too carbi» kaak iyye. Qeli kaak iyyemii, «Hay yi baxaw, tekkem yoh warisey, xaagi macaay?» kaak iyye.
Xaagu baahe num, «Israayilik mango mari rabeeh, raqtem kuddeh. Ku xayloh nammay too qeebit rabte. Yallih-qahdi edde yan Sandug yibbixeenih dannabah been» kaak iyye.
«Yallih-Qahdih-Sandug beenih» kaak iyye waqdi, elle suge korsik magaala akak culan afah garil deerih rade. Idoolinni kaat yemeeteh yeneeh, xagar kaak kaadu gabuleh yeneeh; filli kaak yiddigilleh, edde rabe. Israayil mara morootom sanatah miraaciseh suge.
Qeli-baxay Fincas deqsitahiyyak barra soolimah teneeh; xalay teetit xayyooweh yen. Is Yallih Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug yintixibbixeeh, tet ballu kee baqala rabtem toobbe waqdi, lacawat raddeh xalteh.
Too waqdi rabi teetit xayyoowem yublen waqdi, woo tet xalisak suge agbi, «Mameysitin lab baxa xaltek» teetik iyye. Takkay immay is aham maabbinnay tu elle magacisinna.
Tonna'mmay sarrak qandeh yabteeh, «Yallih Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug beenik wadir, nabna Israayil rasuk teerreh» axcuk, yooboke awkak migaaqah «Ikabod» inte. Tohuk maqna nabna Israayilik teerreh 'yaanama. Toh akah intem Yallih Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug kee tet ballu kee baqala rabtem toobbeh teneeh, tohuh inte.

Filistiin mari Yallih Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug Eben-Qeder deqsita aracak isinni magaala fan been. Ken magaala migaaqah Asdood deqsitak ten.
Too magaalal Daagon migaq akah aban duyyey yaqbudeenihiyyah qibaada elle abaana'gidih bicsen qari yen. Yallih Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug bahha heenih, woo Daagon akak iyyaanamih ceeloy yaqbudeenihiyyak xaqut missossa heenih caben.
Maaca dibroh yemeeten waqdi, oson Daagon akak iyyaanamay yaqbudeenihiyya, YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sanduguk foocal gommoh raddeh keenih sugte. Ugussa heenih, elle suge ikkel akah suge innah, soolissa heenih caben.
Nammeyhaytoh ayro kaadu yemeeten waqdi, woo ceelo gaboobi kee amo keenih luk masuginnaay; YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sanduguk foocal raddeh keenih sugte. Amo kee namma gaba akak tiddigilleh sugteeh, Daagon qibaadah bicsen qari akak culan afal raddeh keenih sugte.
Tohuk gexxaamah a saaku fan, woo Daagon seeka kee woo Asdood magaalal enna 'ya maray kaa yaqbudehiyya, woo aracat ibah mayaaqitaanaay amo akak makoran.
YALLI, Asdood mara kee keenik dariifal tan baaxol yen mara gibdi digaalah digaaleeh, cunxo keenil ruube. Ken digaaleeh, laahi-baxxi biyak keenit ruube.
Oson ahat raden waqdi iyyeenimii, «Israayil doore Dagelti, nee kee ni yalla Daagon digaalah yaniih, neh yaabbeh mayanak, Yallih-Qahdih-Sandug rubnam tayse» iyyen.
Tohuk lakal woo Filistiin baaxok koona malikih seeco aben. Gaaboowen waqdi keenik iyyeenimii, «Israayil doore Dageltih-qahdi addat akak yan Sanduguk maca abnooh?» iyyen. Osonuuy, «Gat magaala fan beya» iyyen. Gat kaadu Filistiin magaalak ten.
Too magaala been waqdi, YALLI kaadu woo magaalat kaxxa ceya ruubeeh, idoola kee furraynat inkih laahi-baxxi dalka keenil oobise. Gibdi cunxo ken tibbixeh, adaadareenih.
Tohih sabbatah woo sandug woo magaalak Ekron deqsita magaala fan ruuben. Ekron kaadu Filistiin magaalak ten. Too sandug tokke baahen waqdi, woo magaalah mari, «A mari nee qida'gidih, a Israayil doore Dageltih-Sandug nee fan baahaanah yanin» iyyeenih, uma-xaw keenit xaawen.
Sarrak qagseenih woo Filistiin malikwah farmo ruubeeniih iyyeenimii, «A Sanduguy Israayil doore Dageltih-qahdi addat akak yanihiyya nee kee ni buxah mara akah ambaxe wayna'nnah, elle suggu 'ye ikke fan gacisa» iyyen. Yalli gibdi digaalah ken digaaleeh; tohuk gexxaamah inkih tan magaalah mari abam waagiseh qaxxaagiteenih.
Woo dalkah rabe wee marih agantah a laahi-baxxi biyak luk yeneenih, ken xongolo kee weeqi qaran fan gufe.

YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug *Filistiin rasul malcina alsih gide sugeek lakal,
Filistiin mari isinni seeka kee baab-abeenitih seeco abeenih keenik iyyeenimii, «YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sanduguk maca abnooh? Akak baahen aracah gacisna waqdi, woo sandug lih maca hayneh rubnooh?» iyyen.
Too waqdi too mari keenil gacsemii, «Israayil doore Dageltih-qahdi addat akak yan Sandug gacissan waqdi, abten dambik qafu geytaana'gidih, mattaco lih hayteenih rubtaanama. A Qahdih-Sandug foyyah gexam mameqe. Mattaco lih hayteenih rubteenik, dalkak urettoonuh, sin akah digaalak sugem kinnim aaxigetton» keenik iyyen.
Oson, «Hay, abne dambik qafu geyna'gidih, mannah tan mattaco kaah rubnooh?» iyyen.
Too mari keenil gacseemih, «Laahi-baxxi ceelok bicsen koona dahab kee, hantuuti ceelok bicsen koona dahab bicisa. Woo konooyuk kulli tiiy Filistiin baaxoh koona malikih migaaqak loowimele. Sin kee Filistiin koona malikil raddem inki bala.
A laahi-baxxa kee hantuutay baaxo siinik bayissak sugehiyyah ceelo bicissaanam meqeeh, Israayil doore Dagelta kaadu tassakaxxeenim meqe. Usuk sin kee sin yallitte kee sin baaxok digaala yayseedem takkeh.
Isin Masri malik kee Masri marih innah, yab cine mara makkina. Israayil-mari Masrik eweqqa 'yam fan, Yalli Masri-mara elle duquurusak suge inna, kassa haa.
Hay taway, gaari kee ahaydumah buqre edde abe ween namma sagay qunxa xaylo lehiyya baaha. Woo namma saga beyay woo gaarit uxuya. Woo laahih xaylo saq edde haan aracah gacisa.
YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug baahay, woo gaarih amot haa. Woo abten dambik cabsu geytaana'gidih rubtan dahabak bicsen laahi-baxxa kee hantuuti ceelo edde tan sandug, Qahdih-Sandugih xaqut haa. Tohuk gaba kalla haytan waqdi gaari isih gexxay inxica.
Gexxa waqdi wagitak raaqa. Too waqdi Beet-Semes magaala fan gexxam tubleenik, woo bala nel rubtem Israayil YALLA kinnim elle ixigaay; wonna hinna'mmay, wokke fan gexe waytek, usuk nel ruubem hinnay, isih nel tekkem kinnim elle aaxigenno» keenik iyyen.
Oson too mari keenik akah inxicca iyye innah aben. Namma sagay qunxa xaylo lehiyya bahha heenih woo gaarit yoxeen. Laahi-xaylooy beyya heenih saq edde haan gasot heen.
YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug kee, hantuuta kee laahi-bexxi ceelok bicsen dahab addat akak yan sandug woo gaarih amol heen.
Too waqdi too gaari woo kabul magexinnaay, a kabul magexinnay, gita xabba hayteh, Beet-Semes fan gexxe. A laahi elle gexaamal garadak gexe. Too waqdi Filistiin koona malik Beet-Semes magaalah caddoh amma 'yaanam fan lakal keenik gexen.
Beet-Semes magaalah mari YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug temeete waqdi, goloh addal tooboke darok kamadi orbisak sugen. Garciik, wonnah wagga heen waqdi, Qahdih-Sandug yublen. A sandug elle tamaate inna yublen waqdi ruffa iyyen.
A gaari, Yoosuwa deqsita numuy dabqih Beet-Semes magaalal yenehiyyah buqre fan amma inteeh, tokkel yen kaxxa xixxaqih garil solla inte. Too waqdi woo mari woo cooxuk bicsen gaari godmat yirgiggiqeeniih, woo laahih nammay sadgatah qiden. Cado akak YALLAH sadgatah cararisen.
Tohuk lakal Leewih yooboke mari YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug kee, dahabay laahi-baxxa kee hantuuti-ceeloh gurral bicseenihiyya addat akak yan sandug beyya heenih woo kaxxa xixxaqih bagul heen. Tokkel too ayro woo magaalah mari, cado akak cararisan sadgoota kee aki sadgoota YALLAH aben.
Filistiin koona malik, a mari ah abe waqdi ken wagitak sugeeh, sarrakaay too ayrot edde Ekron fanah yuduuren.
Filistiin mari a koona dahabay laahi-baxxi-ceelok bicseenihiyya akah ruubeenim, Asdood kee Gat kee Askalon kee Gaada kee Ekron deqsitta magaaloolih mari abe dambik qafu geyaana'gidik ten.
Woo hantuuti ceelok bicsen dahooba kaadu akah ruubeenim, woo koona malik abbah akak tan magaalooli migaaqal tiya tiyah bicseenimih sabbata. Oson abbobtih akak yeneenim, gaso maroh edde tan magaalooli kee gaso sinni gaandoodiy Filistiin rasul geytimtahiyya. Woo kaxxa xixxaqay Beet-Semes magaalal Yoosuwa deqsita numih buqreh addal woo saaku YALLIH Qahdih-Sandug bagul akak heenihiyya, woo saaku tekkeemih sumaaqah, a saaku fan wokkel elle yan.
Beet-Semes mari woo Sanduguy YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yanihiyyah adda wagten waqdi, YALLI malcina-tabanih num keenik qide. YALLI a axxul le mara keenik qideemih, wokkeh mari rookiteh.
Tohuk gexxaamah Beet-Semes mari iyyemii, «YALLAY *kudduusuk yan Yallah yanihiyyah foocal, iyyi soolu duudaah? Ninnik kaa nayxeeri'gidih, manke kaa rubnaah?» iyyen.
Kiryat-Yaqaarim marah fan farmo ruubeeniih iyyeenimii, «Filistiin mari YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug gacseenihik, amay beya» keenik iyyen.

Toh yoobbe waqdi Kiryat-Yaqaarim mari yemeeteh, woo sanduguy YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yani beeniih, Abinadab deqsita numih buxah been. Abinadab guubuh koomah amol yen. Kay baxay migaaqah Alqedar deqsitak yenehiyya, woo sandugih dacayrit akah gaca'nnah, YALLIH garil taahirik yan num kaa aben.
YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug Kiryat-Yaqaarim addal mango wakti suge. Labaatanni sanatih gide wokkel suge. Ta sandug wokkel suggu 'yem fanah, Israayil mari weeqak, YALLAL gacaanam faxak sugen.
Sarrak Samuwel Israayil marak annah iyye, «YALLAL baguuk taduureenim faxxeenik, a duyyeeyay gersi mari yalla 'yeh yaqbudehiyya kee, yalla akak intan Qastarot akak iyyaanamih ceeloy gabat litoonuhiyya wonnah qida. Dudda haytaanam kee, niyak elli haytaanamaak, YALLAL gactaanamaay dibuk kaa uqbuda. Filistiin marih gabak sin cattu waytam, inki Dagelta» keenik iyye.
Toh oggoleeniih, aqbuduk sugen Qastarot akak iyyan duyye kee Baqal akak iyyan duyyeeyay aqbuduk sugeenihiyyak raaqeenih, YALLIH qibaadah gacen.
Tohuk lakal Samuwel, «Mixfa deqsita aracal YALLA siinih kallaca'gidih, wokkel gaaboowa» iyye.
Oson too waqdi yakkeenimiik wokkel gaaboowen. Lee quleenih, YALLAH mattaco takke'gidih woo lee baaxol caxen. Sarrak too ayro soomuh asen. «YALLAW, dambi lem kol bahneh nan» iyyen. Samuwel makaabantu yekkeh; Israayil fanal sittin-way rada waqdi keenik elle kalak yenem, Mixfa deqsitta magaalak ten.
Filistiin-mari Israayil-mari Mixfal gaaboowem yoobben waqdi, Filistiin koona malik is kee isi marah qeebi keenit abaana'gidih gexen. Israayil mari ah yoobbe waqdi meysiteh.
Too waqdi Samuwelik, «YALLAY ni Dageltah yani, Filistiin-marak nee cata'gidih neh xaqtam macabin» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi Samuwel anaqtu qideeh, woo anaqtu elle yani'nnaak YALLIH sadgatah cararise. Sarrak YALLI Israayil ummatah nasri yecee'gidih dooqa abe. YALLI too dooqa kaah oggoleh.
Samuwel Yallih sadgatih abittot yan waqdi, Filistiin-mari ken yabbixe'gidih keenit xayyooweh yen. Too waqdi YALLI qaraanaak kakkaqo keenil ruube. Too waqdi aben wariggah fixixeenih, mariiy kabul keenik gexe. Toh yublen waqdi, Israayil mari Mixfa deqsita aracaak keenit aben ardat Beet-Kaar deqsitta magaala fan ken baahen. Gital mango mara keenik qideenih, keenik yayseenih.
Tohuk lakal Samuwel xaa bahha heeh, Mixfa kee Seen deqsita aracak fanal soolise. Too waqdi iyyeemih, «YALLI ta udduruh amma 'yaanam nee cateeh; tonna leemik ahaysa a xaak migaaqah ‹Catô-xaa› deqsitele» iyye.
Israayil-mari qeebil Filistiin-marak yeyseeh, Samuwel sugem fan Filistiin-mari Israayil baaxo culak masuginna.
Filistiin-mari yibbixe magaalooliy Ekron magaala kee Gat magaalah fanal tanihiyya Israayil marah gacseenih, keenik beenih sugen baaxo inkih gacseenih. Israayil kee Amoora deqsita marih fanat kaadu wagri gace.
Samuwel suggu 'yam fanah Israayil makaabantuh suge.
Kulli sanatal Beetal kee Gilgal kee Mixfa fan gexak sugeh, too baaxooxal titta waak suge mara bicisak suge.
Tokkeek Raamal tan isi buxa fan adaaruk yen. Tokkel kaadu titta wee marih fan mekelak yen. Raamal YALLAH sadgat elle aban arac bicse.

Samuwel idoolite saaku Israayilil isi xaylo cokmaabah hee.
Kay xayloh nammayak naba awki migaaqah Ayyuqel deqsitak yeneeh, qunxa awki Abiyya deqsitak yen. Oson Bersabaq deqsitta magaalal cokmaabah yenen.
Tonna'mmay, oson isinni abbah gita kataata marak manannon. Lakqô-fayxi kaxxam luk yenen. Tonna-leemiik sahdak guqul beyak yeneeniih, ummattah yab gitah meklak manannon.
Sarrak Israayilik saqoltih yan mari gaabowwa 'yeh, Samuweliy Raamal yanihiyya fan gexen.
Too waqdi kaak iyyeenimii, «Atu ahaysa idoolitak idoolittah taniih; ku xaylo kaadu atu abak tenem abtah matanak, ahaysa kulli baaxoh mari malik akah le innah, neh kaadu malik reedis» kaak iyyen.
Takkay immay Samuwel oson, «Malikih num neh reedis» kaak iyyen waqdi, tohut ruffa maxcinna. Tonna-leemiik YALLA kallace.
YALLI too waqdi annah kaak iyye, «Ummatta kok axcinnaanim oobbey! Cinaanam koo hinna yoo ikkal.
Masri baaxok ken eyyeeqeemiiy akke yoo cabba heenih yi aftok amixxige waytam aqbuduk sugen. Away kok abaanam yok dumaak abak sugeenimi.
Tonna'mmay iyyaanam keenik oobbeyaay numma keenil acuy. Ken malikwa ken elle xiinissu wayta innak adda nagay keenih waris» kaak iyye.
Sarrak Samuwel woo maray malik neh reedis kaak iyyehiyyah YALLI kaak inxicca 'yem inkih warse.
Ken malik ken elle xiinisu waa inna keenih warseeh; iyyemii, «Xaylo siinik isi qaskarah heele. Garab keenik usuk qeebi edde aba gaariirah taamat gaceleeh, garab kaadu faras amok qeebi abta qaskar akkele. Aki garab kaadu usuk qeebih gexa way amot akak yan gaariirah foocat ardelon.
Tonnah kaadu, sahdak tu takkem alfi takke qaskarih abbobtih heele. Aki mara tonnah kontom takke qaskarak abbobtih heele. Sin xaylo kay buqre abqurele; kay buqrek daro orbisele. Kay silaacih-bicsat gacele; kay gaariirah-duyyeeya oson bicselon.
Say xaylo siinik kay qatrih bicsat gacele; kay saalo oson bicselon; kay maaqo kaadu oson alayselon.
Tayse buqre kee qinab kee *daytuun xala coox elle taysubuken baaxo siinik beeleeh, doolatak fayya 'ta abbobtih aceele.
Buqrek orobta darok tabanhaytoh af kee, qinab xaylok kaadu tabanhaytoh af siinik beyya heeh, doolat-abbobti kee qaskar abbobtih aceele.
Siinih taamita marak labim kee sayimiiy, sin labhak qande le labha kee, sin danoonak tayse danoona siinik beeleeh, isi taamat heele.
Liton saqak tabanhaytoh af isih haysitele. Isin 'sinnih kay naqoosa akketton.
Toh isinnih ubulla haytan saaku, isinnih dooritten malik siinil baaheemit yaabetton. Takkay immay YALLI too geyto siinik moggola» 'yaanam keenik iyyeeh, malik keenil baahu waamih adda keenih warseh.
Ummatta Samuwel ken lih yaabe yaabat maqal mahaysitinnoonuuy, «Aleeyyah! Woh tu hinna. Nanu malik fanxa bas» iyyen.
«Gersi baaxoh marak kaxxih ni amol gaca malikiy qeebi yakke waqdi gaaduh nee beyah carbi nee absiisahiyya fanxa» iyyen.
Samuwel oson kaak inxicca iyyeenim ankacisak suggu 'yeh, sarrak wohim YALLAH warse.
YALLI kaak iyyeemih, «Oson faxaanam keenih abaay malik keenih reedis» kaak iyye. Too waqdi Samuwel keenik iyyeemih, «Ahaysa inteenim oobbehik, isinni buxah uduura» iyye.

Gaddalih yan numuy sahda yab akak taabbehiyyay migaaqah Kees deqsita yeneeh; usuk akah yoobokem, Benyam kedok ten. Kees Abiiyel deqsita numuk baxak teneeh; Xaaror deqsita numuk kaadu baxi baxak ten. Afiyác-Bakorat deqsita gulubuh aabakuk yen.
Usuk lab-baxay migaaqah Saawul deqsitahiyya luk yen. A awki xagar maqaane kee furrayniino luk yeneeh; xexxaarah kaa aleltam Israayil addal mananna.
Keesik okaale cerritteh morbinna. Too waqdi Kees Saawuluk, «Taamâ-marak numuk teena is lih hayya haay, okaaley bayte gorris» kaak iyye.
Num wakalih is lih hayya heeh, qaleela le Efrayim baaxo kee Saliisa deqsita baaxo fan gexen. Tokkel woo okaale magennon. Tokkeek Saqlim deqsita aracal kaadu gorriseeniih magennon. Sarrak Benyam baaxo akah gexeenih gorriseeniih, tokkel kaadu magennon.
Tohuk wadirii Xuuf deqsita baaxoh yemeeten waqdi, Saawul wakalih kaa'lih yan kay taamat yan numuk, «Yi abba nee weeki, okaale hinnaay ni-amoh cisab kaa abbixelek, ahaysa buxah nee gacis» kaak iyye.
Kaa'lih yan num, «Sug! Ama magaalal Yallih numuy kaxxam yassakaxxeenihiyya yaniih, usuk akkele inxicca 'yem inkih takkek, kaa fan nee bey; usuk okaale elle geyna'kke neh warsam takkek» iyye.
Saawul, «Kaal genxa waqdi maca kaah aceenno? Olot luk sugne maaqo tembexeeh, Yallih numul foyyâ-gabah genxam mameqek, gabat tu maay lino?» iyye.
Kay taamat yan numuu, «Lakqok dagoom gabat abbixeeh; woo lakqo kaah aceenno. Too waqdi woo okaale elle geynu wayna ikke neh warsele» iyye.
«Ah meqe yaabak, nee bey hay» iyye. Too waqdi woo Yallih num elle yani'kke fan gexen. Woo magaala elle tan koomah amo awaquk sugen waqdi, lee baaha'gidih gexa baxuw keenit yongoorowe. Woo baxuuwuk, «Tu-yaaxigi magaalal elle yanii?» iyyen.
Woo dabaanal Israayil baaxol nabik ‹Tu-yaaxigi› axcuk yeneenih, num Yallal tuk teena esseram faxek, ‹Tu-yaaxigil nee bey› axcuk yenen.
Woo baxuwuuy, «Yeey yanih, away siinik foocat gexe. Sissikuk gexxeenik, kaa gee liton. Magaala akah culten innaak kaa geetton. A saaku ummatta Yallih migaaqal sadgat elle aban aracal sadgat abeloonuuh; tohih sabbatah usuk magaala yemeete. Woo arac akah seecen mari, usuk amma 'yeh dooqa abe'kal, woo sadgatih maaqo mayakman. Taway gexxeenik, maaqo makumuh woo sadgat elle aban qale awqe'kal siinih sugele» keenik iyyen.
Saawul kee kay taamat yen num woo magaala fan gexan waqdi, Samuwel woo sadgat elle aban arac fan gexa'gidih, ken fanah amaatih yublen.
Naharsi ayro YALLI Samuwelik,
«Beera ta uddur Benyam kedoh yaabuke num kol ruubeyyok, Israayil amoyta yakke'gidih kaa uskut. Usuk Filistiin marih gabak Israayil catele. Yi mari abe biyak kee catô-goranah aben weeqa keenik oobbeh an» 'yaanam iyyeh yen.
Away kaadu Samuwel Saawulut radda 'ye waqdi, YALLI annah kaak iyye, «Amah koh warse numuuy; yi mara xiinissu waytam kaa» kaak iyye.
Sarrak Saawul Samuwel fan amma 'yeh, « ‹Tu-yaaxigi› elle yanim mankeey?» kaak iyye. Too waqdi Samuwel gasoh afal suge.
Samuweliiy, «Tu-yaaxigi ah yoo» kaak iyye. «Woo sadgat elle aban arac yok naharat gexay suga. A saaku sin nammayak maaqo yo'lih akmetton. Beera saaku, lito esseroora koh gacsek wadir, isinni gexoh gexetton.
Woo sidiica ayrok duma baateh sugte okaaleh tu gactek, woo okaaleh macisabbootin; geytintehik» kaak inxicca 'yeh; tonna luk kaadu kaak iyyeemih, «Israayil mari kaxxam faxam miyyaay? Israayil mari faxam koo. Koo kee ku abbah buxah mara» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Saawul iyyemii, «Anu akah aabukem, Benyam kedoy Israayilil enna 'ta kedoodak inkih dagohiyya. Yi buxah mari kaadu woo kedok inkih gaca mara kinni waqdi, annah yan yaabah mannah yo'lih yabtaa?» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal Samuwel, Saawul kee kay taamat yan num adda naba qari culussa heeh, kaxxa-kaxxa maray soddom yakkehiyya elle daffeya aracal miizik naharsi aracal ken hee.
Sarrak woo nabsi bicsa numuk, «Woo rikeek haa kok exce cadoytah exxa baahey» kaak iyye.
Maaqo bicsa num lak bahha heeh, Saawuluk foocal hee. Too waqdi Samuwel, «Ah koh daanat sugte cadoytak ukum. A cadoytah exxa, a saaku a qibina lih akkel takme'gidih, koh raaqiseh suge» kaak iyye. Too ayro Saawul maaqo Samuwel lih xage.
Sarrak too aracak magaala gexen. Samuwel isi buxal qarik amo
Maaci ifu rubbu hee waqdi, Samuwel, Saawuluy qari amol yanihiyyah seece. Kaak iyyeemih, «Ahaysa isi buxa gexxa'gidih ugut» kaak iyye. Saawul gexoh bical gaceeh; too waqdi afa fanah Samuwel kaa'lih gexe.
Sarrak magaalak afa fanah titta lih gexak sugen waqdi, Samuwel Saawuluk iyyeemih, «Taamâ-numuk, ‹Nek foocat warrayay suga› inxic» iyye. Taamâ-num gexek lakal, Samuwel, «Akkel yo'lih aadetto. Yallih farmoy koh warsam faxa liyok» kaak iyye.

Tohuk lakal Samuwel caxâ xaylok bicsen saliid* (zeyti) edde yan karaarat bahha heeh Saawuluk amol caxe. Sarrak fugga kaa heeh kaak iyyeemih, «YALLI, Israayiliy isi mara abehiyyah amoyta takke'gidih, koo yuskute. Atu kay mara naqboytiitik dacrisettooh, ken catetto. YALLI Israayil amoyta takke'gidih koo doorem elle taaxagu waytam macaay intek,
a saaku yok elle gexxa ikkel, Benyam baaxok Xelxac deqsita aracal yan Raacel kabrih garil, namma num koh sugele. Too namma num, ‹Atu gorrisak sugte okaale geytinteh immay ku abba okaaleh cisab maliy, koh cisabbootaah, «Baxi yok bayeh yanik, maca aboo?» iyya› 'yaanam kok axcelon.
Tokkek gexettooh, Taabor deqsita aracak woo kaxxam naba caxa elle tani ikke fan amaatetto. Tokkel sidiica numuy Beetal deqsita arac fan Yallah sadgat abaana'gidih gexxahiyya geetto. Too marak numuk teeni girgirwak sidoc beyak koh sugele; aki num sidooca gaqamboyta luk sugele; sidochaytô-numuuy qinab kamrik kibuk yan saar gabat luk koh sugele.
Too waqdi salaamatta koh abeloonuuh, sarrak namma gaqamboyta koh aceeloonuuh; beetetto.
Tohuk lakal Gibqa-Eelohim deqsitta magaalay Filistiin-qaskar elle tinfidiggeh tanihiyya fan amaatetto. Too magaalak culmal butta takke nabuwway Yallih sadgat elle aban koomak roorul obtahiyyat garayetto. A nabuwwa *begena kee karambooy fooxima kee kirar aagarukuuy argadukuuy nabuwwah innah yaabakaay xongolak koh sugelon.
Too waqdi garciik YALLIH *Roocaaniyya isi milkih koo heeleeh, atu woo oson diinih aban rigdot ken lih angaletto. Atu kaadu keenik kaxxih nabuwwah innah yaabetto. Too waqdi akah suge wayte num akketto.
Taham tikka 'tek wadir, Yalli ko'lih aneleeh; kot ceelinnaanim abetto.
Tokkek Gilgal magaala fan yok naharat amaatetto. Too magaalal anu kot angooroweyyooh, cado akak carrisan sadgat Yallah abeyyooh, tonnah kaadu, amaanah xiinaanamih astah aban sadgat Yallah abeyyo. Anu amma exceh abtu waytam koh warsam fan, malcina ayroh tokkel sugetto» kaak iyye.
Saawul Samuwel garik daqaarima'gidih enkeleelebba 'ye waqdi, Yalli Saawuluh qusba afqado yecee. Samuwel kaak inxicca 'yem inkih too ayrot edde tekke.
Saawul kee kay taamat yan num Gibqat gufte waqdi, butta takke nabuwwa kaat garayte. Too waqdi Yallih-Roocaaniyya isi milkih kaa hayte. Sarrak usuk, oson aban diini rigdot ken lih yengeleeh, keenik kaxxih nabuwwah innah yaabe.
Duma kaa aaxaguk yen mari, ah abah kaa yublen waqdi, «Kees baxat tekkem macaa? Labhay, Saawuluuy kinni way nabi yekke kunna!» tittak iyyen.
Wokkel suge num, «A tablen nabuwwak abba iyyaay?» iyye. «Saawuluuy kinni way nabi yekke kunna!» inta maxco tokkek raqte.
Sarrak Saawul woo diini rigdo kee nabuwwah innah abe yab gaba kale waqdi, koomah amol yan aracay Yallah sadgat elle abaanahiyya fan gexe.
Saawul-qammi, Saawul kee kay taamat yan num yuble waqdi, «Anke gexxeenih sugten?» keenik iyye.
Saawuluuy, «Okaale goranat sugne'mmay waynehiiy, Samuwelih warisna'gidih kaal genxe» iyye.
Kay qammi, «Hay, Samuwel maca kok iyye?» kaak iyye.
«Samuwel ‹Okaale geytinteh› nek iyye» kaak iyye. Samuwel «Malik akketto» kaak iyyem qammih mawarsinna.
Samuwel, ummattah inkih Mixfa deqsita aracal, YALLI iyyem ankacisaana'gidih, seeco abe.
Too mari gaaboowe waqdi keenik iyyemii, «YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya siinik iyyamaa, ‹Masrik sin eyyeeqeeh, Masri mara kee raqqa 'ye maray siinit xukkutak sugehiyyak sin wade› siinik iyyah yan» keenik iyye.
Samuwel qagisak keenik iyyeemih, «Kulli gadaama kee taqabik sin teyyeeqem, sin Dagelta. Takkay immay a saaku kaa cinteenih, Malik neh reedis 'yaanam yok inten. Faxxaanam toh tekkek, kedo-kedo kee gulub kee gulubuh gacca 'xicay YALLIH qibaadah-arac xayyoowa» keenik iyye.
Tohuk lakal Samuwel kulli kedo qibaada-arac fan bahsiise. Too waqdi YALLI Benyam kedo gersi kedoodak addaak doore.
Sarrak Samuwel Benyam kedoh yooboke mara qibaada-aracah bahsiise. YALLI ken addak Matri deqsita gulubut raaqa mara doore. Too mari fooca fanah yemeete waqdi, ken addak kaadu Kees baxa Saawul doore. Too waqdi ummatta kaa fan wagitteeh kaa wayte waqdi,
YALLAK, «YALLAW, uxih raaqe num maay yan?» iyyen.
YALLI, «Saawul woh kaana. Woo buulok darret tombooqoreh tanim kaa» keenik iyye.
Too waqdi arduk gexxa 'yeenih ummatta foocah kaa baahen. Tikki 'ta ummattak inkih xexxaarah amo gexak raaqe.
Sarrak Samuwel ummattak iyyemii, «YALLI doorem tama numuuy; kay xaqan le num ni addat mayan» keenik iyye.
Sarrak ummatta inkih anay fayya haak, «Ani haay malik! Ani haay malik!» iyyen.
Tohuk lakal Samuwel ummattah inkih, malik le cakki kee ummatta kaadu kaal le cakki warseh. Gaba kalla hee waqdi, keenih warsem kitaabal uktubba heeh, woo kitab taahirik yan aracat daanise. Tohuk gaba kale waqdi kulli numuk, «Ahaysa isinni buxah uduura» iyye.
Sarrak Saawul Gibqa deqsita magaalal tan isi buxa fan yuduure. Too waqdi cayla leelah yan maray Yalli Saawul cataanamih fayxi edde heehiyya kaa'lih gexe.
Takkay immay dago maray umaane ugsam faxahiyya yen. Too mari, «A num-baxi maca neh xiqele?» 'yaanam axcuk kaa burteenih, tohuk gexxaamah mattaco kaah mabaahinnon. Saawuluh tu gactek, oson abeenimit baaqid mahaysitinna.

Alsak wadiril Qammon-malikiy Nacas deqsitahiyya Gilqad-rasuk Yaabes-deqsitta-magaala yabbixe'gidih gexeeh maro teetit hee. Yaabes-magaala elle tenem, Gilqad deqsitta baaxok ten. Yaabes-mari Nacasak iyyemii, «Amoytiinuh koo oggoleh immay ninni kee ku fanal bica abnaama» kaak iyyen.
Nacas keenil gacsemii, «Bica sin lih abeyyo'mmay, elle bicnu waynam inki tiya. Tohumu kulli numuk migdi inti siinik siibba heeh, inkih yan Israayil mara qawratak qidaamih tiyal sin lih biceyyo» keenik iyye.
Too waqdi Yaabes magaalah abbobti kaak intemii, «Inkih tan Israayil baaxoh farmo rubnam fan, malcina ayroh gide neh sugaay; too malcina ayrot catoh num neh amaate wayya heek, too atu inteemit orbenno» kaak iyyen.
Tohuk lakal farmoh sinam ruubeeniih; woo mari, Gibqâ-magaalay Saawul elle yanihiyya fan yemeeteenih, woo xaagu sinaamah warsen. Too xaagu yoobben waqdi, ummatta inkih kaxxam boogisseh.
Saawul buqreh addak awur gabat hayya heeh amaatuk suge. Too waqdi, «Maca tekkeeh? Sinam akah weqtam macaay?» iyye. Too waqdi Yaabesik yemeete mari baahe xaagu kaah warsen.
Saawul tah yoobbe waqdi, Yallih *Roocaaniyya isi milkih kaa hayya hayteeh, too waqdi bagcarrite.
Sarrak namma awur bahha heeh exxa-exxah kuramkurra hee. Tohuk lakal farmoh ruube marak, «A exxaaxi inkih tan Israayil baaxoh mara fan beyaay; ‹Samuwel kee Saawul lih gaaduh gexe wayu waa numih awurwat tama'nnah tanim akkele'mmay, maraaqina› keenik inxica» iyye.
Tohuk lakal YALLI Israayil marat cunxo ruubeeh; too meysih num keenik maraaqinnay, yakkeenimiik inkih yemeeten.
Israayil baaxok sidooca boolih alfih num yemeeteeh, Yuudâ-baaxok kaadu soddom alfih num temeete. Too waqdi too yemeete mara, Saawul, Bedek deqsita aracal gaaboyse.
Sarrak woo gaaboowe mari, Yaabes-magaalak farmoh yemeete marak iyyeenimii, «Beera wallaqenta, sin wadenno siinik iyyen, inxica» keenik iyyen. Sarrak Yaabes-magaalah mari a farmo yoobbeeh, too waqdi kaxxam ruffa iyyen.
Sarrak Nacasak iyyeenimih, «Beerak wadir ku gubah orbennoh, isih faxxem nek abetto» kaak iyyen.
Too bar Saawul isi mara sidiica afah hayya heeh, saaku maaci maacise waqdi, Qammon mari elle yani'kke fan gexeenih qeebi keenit aben. Too qeebit wallaqenta ken seleenih sugen. Rabak raqtem keenik fixixxeeh; kulli numuy isi kabul keenik kude.
Tohuk gaba kalen waqdi Israayil mari, Samuwelil yemeeteh; iyyeenimii, «Saawul malik nek mayakka iyye mari ankel yan? Too mara ni gabal hayis; ken qidennok» iyyen.
Saawul too waqdi iyyemii, «A saaki YALLI Israayil edde wade ayro ikkal, numul raba manackuma» iyye.
Samuwel kaadu qagseh keenik iyyemii, «Gilgal fan genxay 'xicaay, wokkel nammeyhaak Saawul ni malik kinnim diggosnay» iyye.
Too waqdi yakkeenimik Gilgal fan gexen. Tokkel woo taahirik yen aracal, Saawul ken malik kinnim diggoysen. Sarrak amaanah xiinaanamih astah aban sadgat YALLAH aben. Saawul kee raqqa 'ye Israayil mari inkih too ayro tekkem yessekexxeenih.

Tohuk gaba kalen waqdi, Samuwel Israayil marak iyyemii, «Isin, ‹Ab› yok inteenim abeeh, sin xiinisu waa malik siinih reediseh.
Malik taway geyteeniih, sin miraacisa'gidih gabat sin le. Yoh tu gactek idooliteh amô qidi baaheh ani'mmay, yi xaylo sin lih tan. Furrayniinooy aham fan miraacah siinik suge.
A tableenim yooy; qellat celtaamak tu siinil baaheh sugek, YALLA kee YALLI doore malikih garil yol haysita. Awur akkiiy danan akki akak bee num yenek, hinnay kaadu, ayrise kee hinnay edde xukkuteh suge num yenek, hinnay kaadu, guqul akak bee num yeneeh, tahak tuk teena elle baahe num yenek, yot haysitay kaah mekleyyok» iyye.
Too waqdi ummatta, «Aleey! Atu nee elle ayrissem mantuuy net abte xukko mantu. Numuk kaadu nek beytem mantu» kaak iyyen.
Samuwel too waqdi keenik iyyemii, «Meqeh hay! Tonnal tu yol gee wayteenimih a saaku YALLA kee YALLI doore malik ni sumaq takkay» keenik iyye.
Oson too waqdi, «Meqeh. YALLA kee YALLI doore malik nel sumaaqittay» kaak iyyen.
Samuwel qagseh keenik iyyemii, «YALLAY Muusa kee Haaruun sin kaxxa abbobti Masrik yayyaaqeeni'gidih doorehiyya sumaq yekke.
Taway isin ama elle tanin ikkel elle soolaay; anu YALLI sin kee sin kaxxa abbobtik rooci cata'gidih abe kaxxa taama elle abe'nna, kassis siinih abak, YALLIH foocal geyto siinit haysitam faxam liyo.
Yaqkuub kee kay buxah mara Masri gexxe saaku, Masri mari keenit xukkutak sugeeh, too waqdi sin kaxxa abbobti catoh YALLAL weqte. YALLI Muusa kee Haarun keenih ruube. Oson Masrik eyyeqqa ken heeniih, a saaku isin elle tanin baaxol ken nookisen.
Takkay immay sin kaxxa abbobti isinni Dagelta hawwenteh. Tohih sabbatah YALLI, Caxor-magaalah qaskarih abbay Sisra deqsita keenit abe qeebil woo marak ken gacsiiseh. Tonnah kaadu, Filistiin mara kee Mooyab marih malik keenit abte qeebil woo marak ken gacsiiseh.
Too waqdi YALLAL cato essereeniih iyyeenimii, ‹YALLAW, ku garil dambi lem bahne. Koo cabba hayneh, Baqal kee Qastarot deqsittam ku aftok nuqbude. Taway naqboytiitik nee cataay; ahaysa koo aqbudenno› iyyen.
YALLI too waqdi Gidqoon kee Barak kee Yeftac ruubeeh, ellecabol yoo ruube. Kulli num naqboytiitik sin cateeh; tohuk gexxaamah amaanah xinten.
Takkay immay Qammon rasul malikih yen numuy migaaqah Nacas deqsitahiyya sin yabbixu waam tublen waqdi, YALLIH malikannu cinteenih, ‹Nee xiinisa malik neh reedis› yok inten.
«Taway isin doorten malik amah kaa. Isin faxxeeniih YALLI kaa siinih yecee.
YALLAK meysitteeniih, kaa tuqbudeeniih, kay amri duudusseenih, kay xinto cine wayteenih, tonnah kaadu, sin kee sin amol reeda malik YALLA kinni sin Dageltih gita kataya mara tekkeenik, kullim siinil amqele.
Tonna hinna'mmay, YALLIH yab aabbe wayteeniih kay amri cinteenik, tonnal YALLI sin kee sin malikil inkih umam baahele.
Toh too tiyaay; taway elle tanin ikkel elle soola. YALLI abu waa kay kaxxa abitto abletton.
Away edde nanim rob edde yamaate wakti hinna'mmay, taway anu YALLA esserak, ‹YALLAW, kakkaqo kee rob rub› axceyyooh; YALLI too waqdi kakkaqo kee rob ruubele. Tah takku wayta waqdi YALLAK, ‹Malik neh reedis› inteeniih, tohul YALLAL dambi lem bahteenim isinnik aaxigetton» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Samuwel YALLA kallaceeh, too ayrot edde YALLI kakkaqo kee rob ruube. Too waqdi ummatta inkih YALLA kee Samuwelik meysitteh.
Sarrak Samuwelik, «Rabe wayna'gidih ku maganah ku Dagelta neh kallac. Duma abne dambik kalah kaadu, ‹Malik neh reedis› YALLAK inne waqdi, YALLIH garil dambi lem bahnem away ninnik neexege» iyyen.
Samuwel keenik iyyemii, «Umaanek mangoomut asseeni'mmay, tohuh mameysitinaay, YALLAK maxxeerinaay, inkih tan afqadook kay taamah taamita.
Gabak bicsen duyyey tu akke waytaah tu xiqe sinnihiyya maqbudina. Tu xiqe wayta duyye, umaane siinit takke way, siinih xiqtam mali.
YALLI isih, isi mara sin abuh sin dooreh, tohuk gexxaamah isi nabnah taagah sin macina.
Yoh tu gactek, kulli way dooqa siinih abeyyo. Dooqa siinih abe waam YALLAL dambi baaheemik loowinta. Tonnah kaadu abeh meqem kee gitah tanim sin barseyyo.
YALLIH amri oobbeya! Isinni afqadook kay taamat gaca. Duma siinih abem kassita.
Dambit bisoh inteenik, sin kee sin malik inkih bayselem ixiga» keenik iyye.

Saawul malik yekke saaku, barak soddom karmat yeneeh, Israayil ummattak morootom kee namma liggida
Saawul Israayilik sidiica alfih num dooreeh; woo sidiica alfik namma alfih num Beetal deqsitta baaxoy mango qaleela lek Mikmas deqsita aracal is lih raaqise. Alfi num kaadu Benyam rasul ten Gibqa deqsitta magaala fan isi baxay migaaqah Yonaatan deqsitahiyya lih ruube. Raqqa 'ye mara buxah ruube.
Yonaatan Gabaq deqsitta magaalal yan Filistiin qaskarak dago marat qeebi abeh keenik yeyse. Filistiin mari toh yoobbeh. Tohuk lakal Saawul iyyeemih, «Inkih tan Qibraan ummattah *baanta uguraay tekkem keenih warisa» axcuk, farmoytitte ruube.
Tonnal, Saawul Filistiin-marak dago qandet qeebi abeh keenik yeyseeh; tohuk gexxaamah woo mari ken niqbam, Israayil-mari yoobbeh. Tonna-leemik Gilgal deqsita aracal Saawulut yengelen.
Filistiin mari Israayil marat qeebi aba'gidih gaaboowe. Qeebi edde aban gaariirak soddom alfi takkem luk yenen. Laca alfi takke labhay faaris amok qeebi abta luk yenen. Kalah ten qaskar keenik mangah qadad luk manannaay mangah qiddeyti axxul luk yenen. Too macaxi Mikmas deqsita aracay Beet-Awen deqsitta'kkek ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqtal yinfiddigen.
Israayil mari isinni adda yuble waqdi, taysem kinnim waagiseenih; keenik garab gabla kee garbo elle tani'kkeh addat yombooqoren. Raaqe garab kaadu xaluuqâ fanat culeeh, dagen arooca kee qelwah addat yombooqoren.
Aki mari keenik kaadu Ordon weeqaytuk gacca 'yeenih Gaad kee Gilqad deqsita arac fan gexen. Saawul toh tekke waqdi Gilgalal yeneeh, kaa'lih yen mari meysih axaxitak yen.
Saawul, Samuwel kaak akah iyye innah malcina ayro kaa qambaalak suge. Takkay immay Samuwel woo malcina ayrot mamatto. Kaa'lih sugte ummatta tiya tiyal kaa cabteh gexxe.
Too waqdi Saawul iyyeemih, «Yallah carrisan sadgat kee, amaanah xiinaanamih astah aban sadgatah qida'gidih saq yol baaha» iyye. Woo cararisan sadgat abba heeh,
gaba kalam faxa waqdi, Samuwel yemeete. Too waqdi Saawul kaah garayeh kaa arcibiseh.
Sarrak Samuwel, «A abtem macaa?» kaak iyye.
Saawul too waqdi kaak iyyemii, «Ummatta dibuk yoo cabteh gexxeeh; atu kaadu, ‹Amaateyyo› elle inte waqla mamattinnito. Toh lih kaadu, Filistiin mari Mikmas deqsita aracal gaaboowiyyat yaniih,
too mari a Gilgal deqsita aracal yoo yabbixoonu waanah yanin 'yaanam ucsube. Tonna-leemik YALLIH barkat geya'gidih tu maabinnino 'yaanam axcuk, sadgat abaamat dirkih emeete» iyye.
Samuwel kaak iyyeemih, «Away abtem duquurâ-taama way! YALLAY ku Dageltah yanihiyya kok aba iyyem maabinnito. Kay amri oggoltaamal, rabba 'tam fanah malikih sugak teneeh; ku lakal kok rade mari Israayil malikwah gacak yen.
Awayah tu gactek, ku abbootanni tama'kket edde yaade. Macaay intek, atu kay amri cinteh. YALLI isih faxa num geeleeh isi marih abbah isih kaa heele» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Samuwel Gilgal cabeh isi gexoh gexe. Raaqe mariiy Saawul isi qaskarat yangalem fan kaa katayak sugen. Gilgalak Benyam kedoh baaxol tan magaalay Gibqa deqsittahiyya fanah gexen.
Saawul isi qaskar loowe waqdi, laca boolih num yekken.
Sarrak Saawul kee kay baxa Yonaatan kee ken mara Benyam baaxok Gabaq deqsita aracal yinfiddigen. Filistiin-mariiy elle yinfiddigem Mikmas deqsita aracak ten.
Filistiin-mari gaaduh sidooca exxah gacca 'yeenih yewqen. Exxak teena Suqal baaxok Qofra deqsita arac fan gexxe.
Aki mari Beet-Coron fan gexen. Aki exxa kaadu Xiboyim-golo kee woo bacarih tan baaxo akak yablen ikke fan gexen.
Israayil marih addat biriita bicsa mari mananna. Woh akah tekkem, Filistiin mari Qibraan mara seef kee macaxu abaanamak waaseenih yenen.
Tonna-leemik Israayil mari buqre edde yabquren biriita kee, wayxiqa edde kalan biriita kee, godma kee maayta arbaqaana'gidih (samlisaana'gidih), Filistiin-mara fan gexak yenen.
Godma kee saq edde dacrisan af le birta keenih arbaqoonuh, gabah cawalah inki garsi keenik beyak yenen. Buqre edde aban biriita arbaqoonuh, namma garsi keenik beyak yenen.
Tohuk gexxaamah qeebi yekke ayro, Israayil-qaskarak Saawul kee kay baxa Yonaatanak kalih marak seef kee macaxu lem mananna.
Filistiin-mari Mikmas deqsitta daaba qallalle ruuben.

Ayrok teena Yonaatan, furraynuh yan numuy silac kaah abbaxuk sugehiyyak, «Filistiin mari elle yani'kke fan nee bey» iyye. Takkay immay too gexo isi abbah mawarsinna.
Kay abba woo saaku Migroon deqsita aracal rummaantô caxah gubal yinfiddigeh yen. Migroon deqsita arac Gibqâ-magaala kaxxam xeeruk mananna. Saawul lih laca boolih num yen.
Aciiya deqsita sek rikeek tan saroy dibuk sek haysitahiyya
Yonaatan Filistiin mara fan gexe waqdi, gitah akak gace daabal namma boolo sugte. Woo namma boolok, boolok teena akak tenem gitak a exxal teneeh, boolok teena aki exxal ten. Woo boolok tiyak teena Boxex deqsitak ten; aki boolooy Sene deqsitak ten.
Tiyak teena akak taban gitak kilbat le kabuk teneeh, Mikmasak foocah raaqak ten. Aki boolooy gabbi qaxat Gabaq deqsitta magaalat foocah raaqak ten.
Yonaatan woo furraynuy kaa'lih yanik iyyemii, «A *Filistiiniy diini-maleelah tanihiyya elle tani'kke fan nee bey. YALLI nee catam takkehik, dagnah faxeh gide nakke'mmay YALLI isih faxek, keenik nee aysiisele» iyye.
Too waqdi woo furrayni kaak iyyemii, «Anu, atu abtam faxxa haytam, ko'lih abeyyooh, kok mabaxsima» kaak iyye.
Yonaatan, «Meqeh hay! Tonnal woo Filistiin-mari nee yable'gidih ken fan nee bey. Nee ubulla haan waqdi,
‹Elle tanin ikkel elle idiya› nek iyyeenik, gufne aracal elle aadenno.
Hinna'mmay, ‹Ni fanah ama› nek iyyeenik, tonnal ken fan gexenno. YALLI keenik nee aysiiselem elle naaxagu waynam tonna» iyye.
Sarrak Filistiin-mari ken akah yable innah aben. Too waqdi Filistiin-mari, «Wagga! Qibraan marak tu takkem edde yombooqoreenih sugen boodoodak away yawqeenih yanin» iyyen.
Sarrak Yonaatan kee kaa'lih yan furraynuh seeceenih, «Siinih warisnam fanxam linok, annah nel ama» keenik iyyen.
Too waqdi Yonaatan is lih yen furraynuk, «Yoo katay; YALLI keenik nee yiysiiseh yanik» iyye.
Yonaatan naharak edde suge aracak yewqeeh, oson elle yanin ikke fan gulubuh gexe. Furrayni salafak kaa kataye. Ken guffu heen waqdi, Yonaatan Filistiin-marat qeebi abeeh, niksoh baaxot ken hee. Too waqdi kaa'lih yen furrayni usuk yinkise mara tiya tiyal qide.
Naharak keenit aben atkat, Yonaatan kee furraynu, dagoh gide takke baaxol labaatanna yakke mara keenik qiden.
Barril yanoonuu, carbi booxal yanoonu, *Filistiin qaskaray qarwat sugtet kaadu cunxoh axaxo keenit hayte. Tohut yanin waqdi baaxo edde tengeyyeh. Too saaku too marat Yalli badit kee meysi ruube.
Saawuluk dacayrih yan maray Benyam baaxok Gibqa deqsita aracal sugehiyya Filistiin-maray kinni'nna waagisay kudahiyya yublen.
Too waqdi Saawul isi marak iyyemii, «Qaskar inki aracal gaaboysaay yakkeenih gide keenik loowa. Ane waa num wagita» iyye. Qaskar loowen waqdi, Yonaatan kee woo furraynuh yan numuy kay silac abbaxuk suge deedaltam yublen.
Sarrak Saawul Aciiya deqsita numuy seekih yanik, «Yallih Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug bah» iyye. Too ayro, Yallih Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug Israayil qaskar elle tinfiddigeh ten aracal yen.
Too sandug baahan waqdi, Filistiin-mari waxqaxitak suge. Waxqaxitiyyah waqdiik waqdi lafitak laften. Too waqdi Saawul seekik, «Ahaysa ama sandug yanay inxic» iyye.
Sarrak kaa kee kay qaskar, Filistiin-maray inkitanuuk baditeeh isinni kee isinnih qeebi tittat abahiyya fan gexen.
Qibraan-maray duma isi mara cabba heeh, Filistiin-mara lih sugehiyya too saaku ken cabeh, isi mara fan yuduure. Saawul kee Yonaatan marat yengelen.
Gersi maray kaadu Efrayim qaleelat sasak sugehiyya Filistiin-mari bukeenim yoobbeeniih, tonna-leemik Saawul kee Yonaatan lih gacca 'yeenih, Filistiin-marat qeebi aben.
Beet-Awen deqsita aracak taturra 'yaanam fan qeebi keenit abak sugen. Too ayro YALLI Israayil mara tonnal cate.
Takkay immay too ayro Israayil-mari qululuk gexxaamah boolaateh yen. Toh akah tekkem Saawul, «A saaku naqboytiitik cane gacse'kal, maaqo xaginnaan numul abaaro obtay» 'yaanamal maaqo akme waanamih amri keenil oobiseh ken xibsiiseh yen. Tohuk gexxaamah inkih tan ayro qululut asen.
Sarrak yakkeenimiik mango coox elle yan aracah yemeeten. Woo cooxuk ooba malab baaxol tif axcuk yen. Takkay immay Saawul keenit abe xiibah meysih num keenik woo malabak maxaqaminna.
Yonaatanah tu gactek, kay abba, «A saaku maaqo akminnaan numul abaaro obtay» iyyem yoobbeh mananna. Tonna-leemiik gabat abbaxuk suge caxxa woo malab edde yan gorrat rubbu heeh malab yeyyeeqeeh, yokme. Too waqdi namma inti kaak fakkinteh.
Sarrak numuk teeni kaak iyyemii, «Ku abba, ‹A saaku maaqo afah xaginnaan numul abaaro oobele› iyyeh, nee meysiise. Tonna-leemik qululuk gexxaamah maqar cabneh» iyye.
Yonaatan too waqdi iyyemii, «Yi abba ni maral baahem kaxxam umaamak tanih tan. Anu away malabak tu'baxa okmeemih namma inti yok fakkintem maay tablen?
Ni mari naqboytiitik yeyse waqdi, naqboytit gabat luk sugte maaqo yakmeenimil qululuk nagay akkuk yeneenih, Filistiin-marak kaxxam qidak yenen» iyye.
Too saaku Israayil-mari Filistiin-marak yeyseeh. Mikmas deqsita aracak xabba haanamaay Ayyaalon deqsita aracah amma 'yaanam qeebi keenit abak yemeeten. Too waqdi satqiteenih kaxxam boolaaten.
Tonna-leemik naqboytiitik dannabah been illi kee laa tokkel elle yusguuden. Cado akak qabala luk yokmen.
Saawuluh toh warseeniih, «A mari cado qabala lih yakmeeh, YALLIH garil dambi leemit asaanam maay tablee?» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi Saawul woh abe marak, «Isin Yallih-qahdi makteenih, makoleela kinniton» axcuk keenit xongole. Sarrak, ‹Kaxxa xaa akke yoh baaha» iyye.
Kaadu qagseh iyyemii, «Inkih tan ummatta fan gexay, ‹Isinni laa kee illi akke baaha› keenik inxica. Baahoonu waan waqdi akkel elle usgudda haay ukuma. Ahak wadir qabal addat akak yan cado makminaay, YALLAL dambi lem mabaahina› keenik inxica» iyye. Too bar yakkeenimik laa baaheeniih wokkel yusguuden.
Sarrak Saawul YALLAH sadgat elle aban arac bicse. Duma YALLAH sadgat elle aban arac bicseh masuginna.
Tohuk lakal Saawul isi marak iyyemii, «Barat edde gexxa inneh, Filistiin-mara gaadnay ayro bukka 'tam fan buubak ken sugnay, num keenik wade'kal sella ken haynay» iyye.
Ummatta too waqdi, «Atu tayseh axcinnaanim abenno» iyyen.
Takkay immay sek iyyemii, «Naharak Yallal fayu esserray» iyye.
Too waqdi Saawul Yallak, «Filistiin-marat qeebi abnek, iisa neh acee mantuu?» iyye. Yalli too ayro tu kaal magacisinna.
Too waqdi Saawul qaskar abbobtik, «Annah yol amay, dambi abe mari yenek, ken nayyaaqeemi» iyye.
«Waara YALLAY Israayil-marah nasri yeceehiyyal xiibitah ani'mmay, yi baxa Yonaatan takke way, a saaku qellat luk sugu waa numul rabi amaatele» iyye. Toh iyye waqdi, num tu kaal magacisinna.
Tohuk lakal Saawul iyyemii, «Kulli num siinik wokkel soolay 'xica. Yoo kee yi baxa Yonaatan akkel soolenno» iyye.
Oson, «Kot meqem ceelinnaanim ab» iyyen.
Tohuk lakal Saawul YALLAK iyyemii, «YALLAW, Israayil doore Dageltaw, a saaku dooqak raddi macah yoh gacse wayte? A taahirik yan xaal tuk teena yol gacis. Qellat lem yoo kee Yonaataanak numuk teena tekkek, *Urim migaaqal eyyeeqaay; hinnay ku maray Israayilih yoobokehiyya tekkek, *Tummim migaaqal eyyeq» iyye. Too waqdi Saawul kee Yonaatan 'yaanam tewqe. Tonna-leemiik ummatta too qellatat ane waytam tumbulle.
Sarrak kaadu Saawul, «Yoo kee yi baxak qellat le num baxis» iyye. Too waqdi «Yonaatan» 'yaanam tewqe.
Sarrak Saawul, «Abtem macaay?» kaak iyye.
Yonaatan, «Gabat abbaxuk suge caxxat dago malab-baxa kumussa heeh okme. Ah yooy rabah bical an» iyye.
Too waqdi Saawul kaak iyyemii, «Raba kol ackume wayya heek, Yalli yot cabe waay!» kaak iyye.
Takkay immay ummatta intemii, «Yonaatanay Israayil marah qeebil a xaqan le nasri orbisehiyyal rabi yamaate'nnaa? Matakka. Amok xagorti kaak kate waamah, waara YALLIH migaaqal xiibinna. A saaku usuk orbise iisa akah geem Yallih cato» iyyen. Tonnal too ummatta Yonaatan rabak catteh.
Tohuk lakal Saawul Filistiin-mara xakaake kalaanamak yeedeeh; Filistiin mari isi baaxo fan wadir gace.
Saawul Israayil malik tikka 'yeemih kulli ikkel naqboytiitih isik enna 'ya marat qeebi abak suge. Mooyab-maraay Qammon-maraay Edom-maraay, tonnah kaadu, Xooba kee Filistiin-malikwat inkih qeebi abak suge. Qeebi lih abinnaan marak iisa orbisak yen.
Qamaalek-marat kinni way maqar le qeebil keenik yeyseh. Israayil mara abbixe raarra hee marih gabak cateh.
Saawuluk lab-xaylo Yonaatan kee Iswi kee Malkisuwaq deqsitak ten. Say-xayloh migaq kaak Meerab kee Miikal deqsitak ten. Meerab Miikal naharat teneeh, Miikal karmah teetik qunxuk ten.
Kay barra migaaqah Acinooqam deqsitak ten. Acinooqam, Acimqax deqsita numih baxák ten. Kay qaskarih abbah tenem, Abner deqsita numuk ten. Usuk Saawuluk qammih-baxak ten. Abba kaak Ner deqsita numuk ten. Ner Saawuluk qammik ten.
Saawul-abba Kees kee Abner-abba Ner inkih, Abiiyel deqsita numih xaylok ten.
Saawul suggu 'yem fan Filistiin mara luk kaxxa qeebi abe. Qeebil agiru akkiiy celem akki akkinnaan num yable waqdi, isi qaskarat asgalluk yen.

Samuwel Saawuluk iyyemii, «Dumah yan saaku, YALLI, isi maray Israayilih yoobokehiyyak malik takke'gidih koo askute'gidih yoo dooreeh, ku fanah yoo ruube. Taway YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya kok iyyam ah teetik, oobbey. ‹Qamaalek-mari sin kaxxa abbobti Masrik temeete saaku, qaduwwi keenil yekken. Tohuk gexxaamah, anu ken digaalam faxak,
gexay qeebit ken ibbixaay, elli haanam keenik bayis. Labha kee agabuuy, urru kee salaadah yan qunxa urru inkih sella keenik hay. Laa kee illiiy, gaala kee danoonak tu macabinay keenik qid› kok iyya» kaak iyye.
Saawul qaskarak luk suggu 'yeemih seeco abeeh; Teleem deqsita aracal yakkeenih gide keenik wagte. Israayil rasuk temeete qaskar namma boolih alfi tekke. Yuudâ-baaxok temeete qaskar tabna alfih num tekke.
Tohuk lakal Saawul Qamaalek-marih-magaala fanah yemeeteeh, tokkel goloh addat raarisak keenih suge.
Tokkek Keena-deqsitta-kedoh yooboke marah farmo ruube. Keena-kaxxa-abbobti, Israayil-mari Masrik yemeete saaku keenih yemqeenih yenen. Tohuk gexxaamah farmo keenih ruubeeh, iyyemii, «Qamaalek-marat qeebi abnam fanxa'mmay, ken lih masuginay, waalih keenik gaca. Isin meqem-bar-leela kinnitoonuuh, gabat nek rabtaanam siinik mafanxa» 'yaanam keenih ruube. Keenâ-mari too farmo gee waqdi, ken cabeh gexe.
Saawul, Cawiila deqsita aracak Sur deqsita aracay Masrik ayrô-mawqat raaqahiyyah amma 'yaanam, qeebi keenit abeeh keenik yeyseh.
Qamaalek-marih-malikih-yen-Agag, rooci luk yibbixeeniih, raqqa 'ye mara num keenik cabe'kal sella ken hee.
Takkay immay Saawul kee kay qaskar woo malik kee, laa kee illik taysem kee, xagar meqe daheela kee illi-xaylo sella mahannoonuy, Qamaalek marak dannabah orbisen. Boola leeh, tuxxiq sinnim akak yublen lac mabennoonuy sella ken hee.
Too waqdi YALLI Samuwelik iyyeemih,
«Saawul malikih heemih away nadaamitah an. Yoo cineeh yi yab cineh» kaak iyye. Toh Samuwelit kaxxam toomeh, too waqdi inkih yan bar YALLA kallacak xiine.
Maaci maacise waqdi ugutta 'yeh Saawul goranah gexe. Sarrak Samuwelik, «Saawul Karmel fan gexe» 'yaanam iyyen. «Usuk wokkel kaa elle kassitan isi ceelo bicsiise. Sarrak Gilgal fan gexe» kaak iyyen.
Samuwel, Saawul elle yani'kke yemeeteeh; Saawul kaa yuble waqdi, «Samuwelow, YALLI barkat kot haay» axcuk salaamatta kaah abek lakal, «YALLI yok ‹Aba› iyyem duuduseh» kaak iyye.
Samuwel too waqdi, «Hay, anay akak aabbe laa kee illi ankek temeete?» kaak iyye.
Saawul tohul kaal gacsemii, «Amah yi mari Qamaalek marak beemi. Laa kee illik taysem YALLAY ku Dageltah yanih sadgat abna'gidih raaqisne. Wohuk raqtemiiy inkih selli hayne» iyye.
Samuwel, ‹Kalay tibba 'xic; woo yab hinnak. YALLI bir yok iyyem koh warisu waak, oobbey» kaak iyye.
Saawul, «Yoh waris hay» iyye.
Samuwel kaak iyyemii, «Atu qunxa numuh is tubleh immay Israayilil tan kedoodak inkih mirac tekke. YALLI Israayil-malik takke'gidih, koo yuskuteeh koo dooreh.
Woo Qamaalek maray dambileela kinni bayissa'gidih amri koh yeceeh, ‹Ken bayis› 'yaanam kok iyye. ‹Inkih sella ken haytam fanah qeebi keenit ab› kok iyye.
Hay tonnal, kay amri macah cinte? YALLAL dambi lem bahha hayteh, dannaba orbissa'gidih qataatakte. Tahat akah assem macaa?» kaak iyye.
Saawul iyyemii, «YALLIH amri macininniyo. Usuk yok akah iyye innah qeebih gexeeh, Malik-Agag gabat baahe. Qamaalek-mara inkih selli hee.
Tonna'mmay yi mari inki adda Yallah tontocowweemik illi kee laak tayseemiy selli hay iyyeenihiyya dannabah beenih; Gilgalal ku Dageltih sadgatah qidaana'gidih akke baahen» iyye.
Samuwel iyyemii, «Hay meqehik, YALLI, amri kaak oggolaanam kee, kay sadgatah saqa qidaanamak macah lafitam kot celtaa? YALLIH garil kay sadgatah gabul le maruw qidaanamak, usuk iyyem abaanaah kay yaabat maqal haanam muxxo le.
Kay amri cinaanam baab-abittol yaamineenimih gide dambik le. Kaxxa-mariinoh, YALLA cabba heenih xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeeya yaqbudeenimih gide dambik le. Tonnal atu YALLA cinteeh, YALLI kaadu Israayil ummatih amoytiinu koh cineh» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Saawul, «Anu nummah dambit aseh an» iyye. «Anu YALLIH amri cineeh, atu yoh tescesse gita makatayinniyo. Inni marak meysiteemih sabbatah, oson faxeenim abe.
Takkay immay away koo kallacaamah, abe dambi yol cabay, YALLA aqbude'gidih yo'lih uduur» kaak iyye.
Samuwel kaal gacseemih, «Ko'lih maaduura. Atu YALLIH amri cinteeh; YALLI tahaysa Israayil marih amoytiinu kok kaleh» kaak iyye.
Sarrak Samuwel gexoh enkeleelebba 'ye waqdi, Saawul saro kaak yibbixe. Woo saro qanxixxeh.
Too waqdi Samuwel annah kaak iyye. «YALLI a saaku Israayil ummatih amoytiinu kok kaleh, gersi numuy kok yaysehiyyah yecee.
Waara YALLAY Israayil doorehiyya diraabat mayaabaay iyyeemit mayaduura. YALLI, sahdayti innah, waqdiiy tu m'iyya» kaak iyye.
Saawul, «Anu dambi leemit aseh anik bas, away akim isih raqtuh, Israayil-makaabon kee ummatih foocal yoo essekexxeyaay YALLAY ku Dagelta kinni aqbude'gidih yo'lih uduur» kaak iyye.
Sarrak Samuwel kaa'lih yuduureeh, Saawul YALLA yuqbudeh.
Tohuk lakal Samuwel iyyemii, «Ama Qamaalek marih malik annah yol baaha» iyye. Agag, «Baaha kaa» iyyeenim yoobbe waqdi, ahaysa malik yoh akah seecam rabak tan kaa hinna 'yaanam isi niyal luk yemeete.
Kaa baahen waqdi Samuwel kaak iyyemii, «Ku seef mango inonti xaylo maleh akah cabe'nnah, ku ina a saaku kaadu baxa maleh raaqele» kaak iyye. Sarrak YALLA elle yaqbuden aracay Gilgalal yanik foocal exxa-exxah kaa kure.
Sarrak Samuwel Raama fan gexe. Malik-Saawul Gibqal tan isi buxa fan yuduure.
Samuwel too ayrok wadir Saawul abaluk maraaqinna. Takkay immay kaat tekkeemih tiyak kaxxam kaah qaade. YALLI kaadu Saawul Israayil-malik abeemit nadaamiteh.

YALLI Samuwelik annah iyye. «Anu ahak wadir malik yakkem kaak mafaxak, atu Saawuluh akah qaaddam macaay? Away caxâ-xaylok bicsen *saliid (zeyti) gabat haay Beetlacam deqsitta magaalal yan Yiisa deqsita numih buxa gex. Kay xaylok tiik teena malik abuh dooreh an» kaak iyye.
Samuwel YALLAL gacseemih, «Saawul ah yoobbek yoo qidelek, ah mannal abu duudah?» iyye.
YALLI too waqdi annah kaak iyye. «Dahalto gabat luk gexaay, ‹YALLAH sadgat aba'gidih emeete› inxic» kaak iyye.
«Woo sadgat arac yamaate'gidih Yiisah seecaay, too waqdi abtu waytam anu koh warseyyo. Anu koh warisu waa num malik yakke'gidih amo kaak askutetto» kaak iyye.
Samuwel YALLI kaak aba elle iyye'nnal abeeh, Beetlacam magaala gexe. Tokkel too magaalah-abbobti, Samuwel tuble waqdi, wariggitteh intemii, «Ni abbaw, akah temeetem nagayna innaa?» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi usuk keenil gacseemih, «Anu akke akah emeetem nagaynaay; YALLAH sadgat aba'gidih emeete. Isin isinni taahirroysay wokke fan yo'lih gexa» keenik iyye. Kalah kaadu Yiisa kee kay xaylok kaadu «Isinni taahirroysay woo sadgat arac fan ama» iyye.
Yiisa kee kay xaylo woo sadgat-arac temeete waqdi, Samuwel Yiisâ-xaylok tiik teenay Aliyab deqsita yuble waqdi, «YALLI malikih doorem ta numu» 'yaanam isi bagih addat yuscube.
YALLIIY Samuwelik annah iyye. «Anu doore num a num hinna. Woo num xeeriih qaxmeqe numu. Takkay immay qax-maqaane kee xexxaarat tu kaak mawan. Anu sahda kinni mara elle aaxigem, sahda sahda elle taaxige gurra hinna. Sahda, sahdak irô-xagar wagittaah; yoh tu gactek, sahdayti nummaak kinni num kaak wagita» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Yiisa Abinadab deqsita baxah seeceh, Samuwelil kaa baaheh. Samuweliiy, «YALLI a awka kaadu madoorinna» iyye.
Yiisa kaadu Samma deqsita baxa baaheeh; Samuwel, «A awka kaadu YALLI madoorinna» kaak iyye.
Tonnal Yiisa, xaylok malciin inkih kaal baaheeh; Samuweliiy, «YALLI a urruk num madoorinna» kaak iyye.
Sarrak Samuwel Yiisak, «Ahak kalah gersi xaylo maay lito?» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Yiisa, «Urruk inkih qunxa awki yanih immay afal illi dacayrit yan» kaak iyye.
Samuweliiy, «Gexay ama kaak inxic. Usuk amaate'kal, sadgat mabnak» kaak iyye.
Tohuk gexxaamah Yiisa kay xaylok inkih qunxa baxay Dawud deqsitak yeneh farmo ruube. Dawud furrayniinot meqe xagar kee qax-maqaane inkih luk yen. Too waqdi YALLI Samuwelik, «Anu doore num tamah kaak, amol sukuti kaak hayis» iyye.
Samuweliiy Dawud toobokoh foocal saliidit amo kaak yuskute. Too waqdiik YALLI Dawudul isi *Roocaaniyya oobiseeh; too saakuk xabba haanam YALLIH Roocaaniyya kaa'lih ten. Tohuk lakal Samuwel Raama fan yuduure.
YALLIH Roocaaniyya Saawul xagarak gexxeeh; YALLI kaal ruube ginni kaa biyaakeh.
Buxal kaah taamita mari tah yuble waqdi, kaak iyyemii, «Yalli kol ruube ginni koo biyaakah yanik,
baaha nek intek, *begena nagay yaagure num koh bahnu wayna. Yalli kol ruube ginni bahta waqdi, too num too begenal koo sahhaloyseleeh; too waqdi cabettooh nagay akketto» kaak iyyen.
Saawul toh yoobbe waqdi, «Gexay nagay digir yaaxige num yoh baaha» iyye.
Tokkel suge marak numuk teeni iyyeemih, «Beetlacam yan Yiisa deqsita num gadah yaaguren duyye yaagure baxa le. Too awki qaxti maqaane kee agiranna inkih leeh, qaskariinok bayisam maliiy, yab kaadu nagay yaaxige. YALLI kaadu kaa'lih yan» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Saawul Yiisa fan farmo ruubeeh, iyyeemih, «Ama ku baxay illit dacayrih yanihiyya yoo fan rub» 'yaanam farmoh kaah ruube.
Toh yoobbe waqdi, Yiisa gaqambo kee qinabak bicsen kamri edde yan saar elle yaarru waa oklo merrah kaah ucuyya heeh, girgirruy gabat beyu waa kaadu ucuyya heeh kaa ruube.
Dawud Saawul fan yemeeteeh, too waqdi kay taamat gace. Saawul Dawud kaxxam yikcineeh, isi silac yakkuqe num kaa abe.
Ayrok teena Saawul Yiisah farmo ruubeeh iyyeemih, «Dawud ossokooteh aniih; inni taamat kaa haam faxak, atu ruksat kaah aceetto» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Yalli Saawulil ginni ruubinnaan waqdi, Dawud taaxige begena gabat hayya heeh aagaruk kaah yen. Toh Saawul sahhaloysak teneeh; too waqdi ginni kaa cabak yeneeh, nagay akkuk yen.

Filistiin mari Yuudâ-rasul geytinta Sooko deqsitta mandaral gaaboowe. Efes-Dammin deqsita aracay Sooko kee Qadeeka fanat geytimahiyyal yinfiddigen.
Malik Saawul kee Israayil qaskar qeebih bical gacca 'yeenih Eela deqsitta golol yinfiddigen.
Filistiin mari woo golok kabuk teenal qalel rooruh gaceeh; aki kabul Israayil mari qalel rooruh gaceeh, fanat golo keenik raqte.
Filistiin qaskarak addak Golyaad deqsita celem bukka 'yeeh, Israayil qaskarih addak qeebi kaa'lih aba num yanim keh essere. A num Gat deqsitta magaalal yoobokeh yeneeh, xexxaarah lica cusul kee garab akkuk yeneeh, isik edde waasan nacaasak bicsen kameesiy qilsah kontom kee malcina kiilo yakkehiyya kee, amo edde dacrisan nacaasak bicsen kalabtat sartanah yen.
Ibitte kaak nacaasak bicsen carbi silaacak isinni edde dacrisan sartanat sartanah ten. Tohuk kalah kaadu, nacaasak bicsen macaxuy xer rikel qidaana sunkut luk yen.
Kalah kaadu, lafudda le caxxi macaxu luk yen. A macaxuk af malcina kiilo yakke birtak bicseenih yenen. Aki qaskariiti foocat kay gob gabat hayya heeh kaak gexak yen.
Golyaad sollu 'yeh, Israayil qaskarak, «Isin Saawul marah tanin; anuuy Filistiin-celeemak numuk teena kinniyo. Away isin qeebi nummah duudettoonum siinit celta? Duudettoonum siinit celtek, yo'lih yaame'gidih, sin marak numuk teena ruuba.
Yok yeyseh yoo qidek, nanu sin naqoosa akkenno. Takkay immay kaak eyseeh kaa qidek, isin ni naqoosa akketton.
Taway hay, Israayil qaskarey, qeebi yo'lih abu waa num siinit yenek, yawqay» iyye.
Saawul kee kay qaskar Golyaad yab toobbe waqdi, warigga keenit raddeeh; kaxxa cunxo ken tibbixe.
Dawud Efrat deqsita gulubuh gacisa; Yiisa deqsita numih baxak ten. Elle yoobokem, Yuudâ rasul tan Beetlacam-magaala. Yiisa lab xaylok bacaar luk yeneeh, Saawul malikih yen dabaanal Yiisa barak idoolite numuh yen.
Xaylok sidoc kaak Saawul lih carbi booxa fan gexeh yen. Saqalah keenik tenem Aliyabaay; Aliyabal kataytam Abinadabak ten. Abinadabal kataytam Samma deqsita awkak ten.
Dawud keenik inkih barah qunxa salafti-baxak ten.
Qeebi elle yakku waa aracaak, wadir illi elle dacrisa arac fan gexak gacak yen.
Golyaad, morootom ayroh gide inki ayro namma adda carra kee saaku, «Siinik qeebih-booxal yoh obtam iyya?» axcuk, hiddoowak keenil suge.
Ayrok teena Yiisa Dawuduk iyyeemih, «Alen alok tabna kiilo takkem kee, a tabna gaqambo sissikuk beyay, ku toobokoy woo aracal tanihiyyah bey.
Qittak a tabna koxxa kaadu beyay, alfi-abbah yan numuh aceetto. Ku tooboko akah tani'nna wagga haay; tamaate waqdi ken tubleeh nagay yaniinimih asta gabat bah.
Malik Saawul kee ku tooboko gersi Israayil mari inkih Eelâ-golol Filistiin marih qeebit yanin» kaak iyye.
Dawud maaca dibroh ugutta 'yeeh, illit gersi mara cabba heeh, kay abba kaah elle warse innal, usuk kaal yecee maaqo gabat hayya heeh gexe. Dawud, Israayil mari carbi booxa fanah gexaah, qeebi tirtirisan waqdi, yemeete.
Filistiin mara kee Israayil marak kulli mariiy fooca kee foocah sittat gacca 'yeenih, qeebi-arac yibbixeenih yenen.
Dawud kaal ruuben maaqo, maaqoh afat yen numul cabba heeh, qeebi elle yakkem faxa'kke fan yerdeh toobokot yongooroweeh, salaamatta keenih abe.
Usuk too yaabat ken lih yaaba waqdi, Golyaad elle suge aracak bisoh taturra 'yeh, dumaak akah iyyeh suge innah, Israayil qaskarak away kaadu, «Yo'lih taameenim maay duddan?» iyye. Dawud tah kaak yoobbe.
Israayil mari Golyaad yuble waqdi, cunxo gexxaamah kudeenih.
Sittak iyyeenimih, «A num Israayil mara elle bursuta'nna ubula» iyyen. «Malik Saawul a num qidu waa numuh kaxxa acwa aceeleeh, kaadu isi baxá digibih kaah abele. Kay buxah marak gabbara mabeya» sittak iyyen.
Dawud isi garil suge marak iyyeemih, «A Filistiin num qideh, Israayil mara a migaq-sinnak currih yayyaaqu waa numuh maca aceelon? A Filistiiniitih diini mali fiiruk iyya yekke waqdiiy; waara Yallih qaskarat qeebi aba'gid akah yemeetem?» iyye.
Too waqdi oson Golyaad qidu waa numuh aboonu waanam kaah warsen.
Aliyab deqsita numuy Dawuduk saqalah yene Dawud sinam lih yaabah yoobbe waqdi, kaat bagcarriteh kaak iyyeemih, «Atu akkel maca abta? Woo bacarih tan baaxol dibuk raaqe illit dacayrih iyyi raaqe? A kaxxam isit yakkalow! Afqadot uma cisab litom aaxigeh. Qeebi wagitta'gidih temeete inna?» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud saqalak iyyemii, «Away maca baaheeh? Essero kinni way esseram maduuda innaa?» kaak iyye.
Kaadu gersi num fan gexeeh, naharak esserem kaa essere. Esserinnaan num naharsi mari iyyem kaak iyye.
Inkinki mari Dawud iyyem yoobbeeniih, wohim Saawuluh warsen. Saawul too waqdi Dawuduh farmo ruube.
Dawud kay fan yemeete waqdi, Saawuluk, «Yi amoytaw, a Filistiin-numuk faxe num meysite waama. Anu away gexeh qeebi kaat abeyyo» iyye.
Saawuluuy, «Aleey, atu awkaay; usuk furraynu tikki 'yeemiiy a saaku fan carbit yan num kinnuk, qeebi kaat abtam madudda» kaak iyye.
Dawuduuy, «Yi amoytaw, anu yi abbah illi dacrisaah; lubak akkiiy, hinnay kaadu, gersi alluwwa woo illik anaqto beytek,
lakat eredda akak exceh woo anaqto raaqisa. Woo lubak yakku, hinnay kaadu, faxe ala takkeemih yoo fan yenkeleebe kaa tekkek, katlal xabba kaak heeh aatakuk kaa qidak suge.
Lubokwa kee gersi alluwwa qideeh; a Filistiin-numuy diini aalle waah, waara Yallih qaskarih migaq baysahiyyak toh abeyyo.
YALLAY lubokwa kee gersi alluwwak yoo catehiyya a Filistiin numuk yoo catele» iyye.
Saawuluuy, «Meqeh hay, YALLI ko'lih yanayak gex» kaak iyye.
Sarrak qeebik isinni edde reebisan biriitak bicsen sartan xagarat haa'gidih kaah yeceeh, amo edde dacrisan nacaasak bicsen kalabta kaah yecee.
Too waqdi Dawud Saawul seef woo qeebik isinni edde reebisan biriitak bicsen xagarat haan sartanak bagul hayya heeh, ibah gexam gabbate. Takkay immay duma a gid takke duyye akkuqe weemih sabbatah, gexam yeffereh. Too waqdi Saawuluk, «A gid takke duyye luk qeebi abam maduuda. Ahayduma a gid takke duyye ukkuqeh maaxiga» iyye. Sarrak too duyye isik kaleeh,
saq dacrisa waqdi gabat haak suge caxxa hirgitta heeh, sarrak buyyi-garik saytun xeetik konooy ukkuqqu heeh, oloh addat hee. Sarrakaay wanxef bicsitti heeh, Golyaadat qeebi aba'gidih gexe.
Woo Filistiin-numuh tu gactek, gob kaah yakkuqe numuy foocat kaak gexahiyya lih Dawud fan yemeete.
Sarrak Dawud nagay yismiteek ellecabol kaxxam kaa bursute. Macaay inteenik, Dawud qunxa numuy meqe xagar le kinnim kaak yuble.
Too waqdi Dawuduk iyyemii, «Amah maca akak abta caxxay? Yoo kuta maay takkale?» kaak iyyeeh, yalla iyyeh yaqbude duyyeh migaq xagga heeh kaa abaare.
Sarrakaay Dawuduk, «Qeebi yo'lih abtuh am. Raysa kok guma kee alluwwâ-cado abeyyok» iyye.
Too waqdi Dawuduuy, «Atu seefiiy macaxu kee xer rikel qidan af le birta macaxu haysitteh temeete. Yoh tu gactek, Israayil qaskaray atu bursuttehiyyah Dageltih migaaqal emeete. Usuk YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya.
Ta saaku YALLI yi gabah addat koo heele. Anu kok qeebih ayseyyooh, moyya kok kaleyyo. Filistiin marih raysi guma kee alluwwâ-gadda akkele. Tohuk wadir Israayil mari Yalla lem baadal yan mari inkih aabbele.
Akkel yan mari kaadu YALLI isi mara cata'gidih seef kee macaxu faxe waam ablelon. Qeebil taysu waytam YALLAAY; takkeenimik ni gabat sin heele» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal Golyaad Dawud fanah kaadu bisoh gexeeh, Dawud kaadu *Filistiin macaxi elle yani'kke fan Golyaadat qeebi aba'gidih sissikuk ereddi 'yeh, fooca fan gexe.
Too waqdi olot gaba rubbu heeh, xaa eyyeqqa heeh woo xaa Golyaadat hee. Woo xaa qansat kaak rade. Too waqdi moyyâ-lafa kaak tiddigilleh baaxol afah rade.
Tonnal Dawud seef sinnuk, wanxef kee xaat Golyaadak yeyseh.
Sarrak arduk kaa fan gexeeh, amol kaak sollu 'yeeh, kay seef siibba heeh, moyya kaak edde yirgiqeh kaa qide.
Filistiin mari Golyaad rabem yuble waqdi inkih kuden.
Israayil kee Yuudâ-mariiy deero abak lakat keenik arduk, Gat deqsitta magaalah culmeyna kee Ekron deqsitta magaalah culmeyna guffa haanam fan ken yeyredden. Filistiin-mari Saqrayimik Gat kee Ekron fan gexa gital tinnikissem kee madallah raqtem yekken.
Israayil mari wokkek yuduure waqdi, Filistiin mari qeebih elle yinfiddigeh suge aracal caben duyye keenik buuben.
Dawud Golyaad-moyya Yarusalaam fan beeh, kay silac gabat luk raaqeeh, isi siraqih addal hee.
Saawul naharak Dawud Golyaadat qeebi aba'gidih gexah yuble waqdi, qaskarak abbah yen numuy migaaqah Abner deqsitahiyyak, «A awki iyyin baxay?» axcuk essereh yen.
Woo numuy, «Yi amoytaw, anu maaxiga» 'yaanam kaal gacse.
Malikiiy, «Hay, gexay esseray amey» kaak iyye.
Sarra Dawud Golyaad qidda heek wadir yuduure waqdi, Abner Saawul fan kaa bee. Dawud too waqdi Golyaad-moyya gabat abbaxuk yen.
Kaa baahen waqdi Saawul kaa essereeh, «Furraynow, iyyin baxa kinnito?» kaak iyye.
Dawud, «Anu ku naqasuh yan Yiisay Beetlacamal yoobokehiyyah baxa kinniyo» kaak iyye.

Saawul Dawud lih abak suge yaabak gaba kalla hee waqdi, Saawul-baxay Yonaatan migaq luk yenehiyya Dawud kaxxam yossokoote. Isi nabsih kacanuh luk yen inna, kaah yesselle.
Too saakuk wadir Saawul, Dawud isi buxal daffeyseeh, kay abbah-buxa aduuri kaa mahanna.
Yonaatan Dawudut abeh yan assakootiyyak gexxaamah, aggiriqe sinni fantaaxaw itta luk haysiten.
Yonaatan isih luk suge dallaabiya kee qeebik isinni edde reebisan biriitak bicsen sartanaay seefiiy gaysê-baxa kee bagi-qarum inkih kaah yecee.
Dawud, Saawul kaa akah ruubinnaan taama gabal kaah bicca 'teh adaaruk yen. Tonna-leemiik Saawul qaskarak exxak teenah abba kaa abe. Tohuk gexxaamah Saawul qaskarih abbobti kee raqqa 'ye mari inkih ruffa iyye.
Dawud, Filistiin-num qidda heeh amaatuk sugeeh; qaskar kaadu buxa fan elle amaatuk sugte ikkel, Israayil magaaloolik yemeete agbi gad abakaay argaduk karambo kee aki duyye aagaruk, Malik-Saawuluh matren.
Too agbi gadah,
«Saawul mango alfi yakke mara qide'mmay
Dawud mango tabanih alfih num qide» iyyen.
Saawul tah yoobbe waqdi, faxe cineeh kaxxam bagcarrite. «A agbi yok dibuk mango alfih num qide iyyaanaah, Dawuduk mango tabanih alfih num qide iyyeenim hinnaa? Yi lakal malik kaa abaanam faxaanam hinna?» iyye.
Tohuk gexxaamah kuuxewaynaan kee dareemu Dawuduh afqadot hee.
Nammayhaytoh ayro garciik Yalli ruube ginni Saawulut culeeh xagar kaak yimlikeh. Isi qarih addal cissit ane sinni numih innah gabaak yaabe. Too waqdi Dawud kulli saaku akah abak yene'nnah *begena aagaruk kaa sahhaloysam yekkele waqdi, Saawul, «A gabat abbixe macaxuh kaat heeh gidaarat kaa maay xakbiso?» 'yaanam kaal temeete. Tohuk lakal woo macaxu namma adda kaat haa'gidih qide. Dawuduh tu gactek, namma adda inkih walel is raaqise.
Too ayrok wadir Saawul, YALLI isi cabeeh Dawud lih yanim yubleeh, Dawuduk meysitak raaqe.
Tonna-leemik isi buxak beyya kaa heeh, alfi takke qaskarak abba kaa abe. Dawud isi marak foocat gacca 'yeh carbi-booxa fan ken bee.
YALLI Dawud lih yeneemih sabbatah, Dawud abba hannaanim gabal kaah bicak ten.
Saawul Dawuduh gabal kullim bictam yuble waqdi, meysih dumak lafteh.
Takkay immay kaak kalih maray Israayil kee Yuudâ rasul yenehiyya inkih, carbi aben waqdi Dawud ken miraaciseemih sabbatah, kaa yikcinen.
Ayrok teena Saawul Dawuduk iyyeemih, «Inni baxá digibih koh abam faxa. Awkák migaq Meeraba. Tonna'mmay inni baxá koh abaamak dumalaa, agiruh yan qaskariitay digga le takkeemiiy, YALLIH migaaqal abna carbi abettoomul, koo kee yoo naharak titta geynam meqe» kaak iyye. Saawul woh akah iyyemii, tonnal Filistiin mari carbil kaa qideleeh isih kaa qidaamak ken gabat kaa qidsiisa'gidik ten.
Dawud, «Tu'loowot yan num hinniyooy; malik ballu yakkeenim caddik gufa num makka» iyye.
Takkay immay Saawuluu, Dawuduk, Meerab rihimih koh abeyyo edde iyye waktit, kaa hinna'mmay, Mecuyaal deqsitta baaxok yemeete Qadriyel deqsita numuh tet abe.
Saawuluk gersi baxáy Miikal deqsittahiyya Dawud tikcine. Saawul woh yoobbe waqdi nabam yossokoote.
Ahaysa, «Miikal kaah abeyyooh, tet gabat oflot akah rada innah, kaak abeyyo. Ellecaboh Filistiin marih gabat rabele» 'yaanam isi bagul yuscube. Tohuk lakal Dawuduk qagseh iyyeemih, «Ballu yok akkettooh baxá koh abeyyo» kaak iyye.
Kay gubal taamat yan marak, «Dibuk tani ikkel, ‹Malik koo yossokooteh; kay gubal taamita mari kaadu koo kicnaah; malikil kay baxá Miikal koh digbisa'gidih, macah essere wayta? A nasiib isik maruubitin› kaak inxica» iyye.
Too mari Saawul keenik akah inxicca 'ye innah kaak iyyen. Usuk too waqdi keenil gacseemih, «Yi innah yan miskintuy tu'loowot suge weehiyyal malik ballu yakkeenim kaxxaama» iyye.
Too waqdi woo mari Dawud keenil gacsem gexeenih Saawuluh warse.
Tohuk lakal Saawul kaadu too maral farmo kaah ruubeeh iyyeemih, «Malik, ‹Isi baxál alkumuh bool yakke Filistiin mara qidda hay labiinak kombor-arab kalla haay yoh keenik bah. Tohuk sah kok faxam mayyuk, tohum ni naqboytiitih digaala akkele, kok iyyah yan› inxicay kaah warisa» 'yaanamih farmo kaah ruube. Saawul toh kaa elle qidsiisa'gidih iyyeemik ten.
Saawul gubal taamita kay doolatih maray farmo elle ruubehiyya a farmo Dawuduh warsen. Dawud ah yoobbe waqdi yifriceeh, Saawul ballu yakkem yossokooteh. Digib yakkeemik naharat,
Dawud kee kay mara gexxeeh; Filistiin marak namma bool num qideenih yemeeten. Kombor-arooba bahha heeh, malikik foocal lowwa heeh, namma bool duudussa kaal hee. Tohuk wadir, Saawul is baxá rihimih kaah yecee.
Too waqdi Saawul, YALLI Dawud lih yanim yeexegeeh, kay baxá kaa kicnam digga hee.
Tohuk gexxaamah Dawuduk kaxxa meysih meysiteeh, rabba 'yam fan naqboytah kaak suge.
Filistiin-mari too dabanal Israayil-marah gaaduh gexakaay qeebi keenit abak sugen. Too qeebil inkih, gersi qaskar abbobti hinna'mmay, Dawud keenil ansaruk yen. Tohuk gexxaamah kay migaq kulli ikkel yontoobbe.

Saawul, isi baxa Yonaatan kee kay gubal taamita marah inkih Dawud qidam faxam warse. Yonaatan Dawud kaxxam kicinuk yeneeh;
tonna-leemik Dawuduk, «Yi abba koo qidam faxak, beera cubbi macabin; aracak teenat qellitay edde idiy.
Atu uqurat edde tani ikkeh gari amma inna waqdi, yi abbah foocal sollu exceh ku giddinaamat kaa'lih yaabeyyooh; iyyam yellek, koo aysixxigeyyo» kaak iyye.
Sarrak Yonaatan abbâ garil Dawud kaxxam fayliseeh, «Malikow, Dawuduy ku naqasuh yani, umaane takkeemih kol baahem málik, umam kaak maabin. Koh kaxxa cato takkeemik sah, kol baahem málik, yanay kaa inxic.
Yot maca akkele axce'kal Golyaadat qeebi abeh qideeh; YALLI Israayilih nasri edde yecee. Woo marak neyse saaku, atu isih ruffa intek, a saaku, Dawuduy tuh umaane baahe weel umam akah bahtam faxxaah, sabab maleh kaa akah qiddam faxxam macaay?» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Saawul Yonaatan kaak iyyem numma kinnim yubleeh, «Tahaysa Dawud qide waamah YALLIH migaaqal xiibitah» iyye.
Toh yoobbe waqdi, Yonaatan Dawuduh seeceeh, kay abba iyyem kaah warseh. Sarrak Saawul fan kaa baaheeh, dumaak edde suge kay taamah kaa gacse.
Qeebi kaadu qagteeh; too waqdi Dawud carbi-booxa fan gexe. Tokkel Dawud Filistiin marat kaxxa qeebiy edde kudaanahiyya, keenit abe.
Ayrok teena YALLI Saawulut ginni ruubeeh; too ginni xagar kaak yimlikeh. Too waqdi buxah addal macaxu gabat luk daffeyak suge. Dawud wokkel *begena digirak suge.
Saawul too waqdi macaxu kaat haa'gidih kaa fan qide. Takkay immay Dawud woo macaxuk walel isi raaqiseeh; macaxi kaak tatreh gidaarat kareerak raqqa 'ye. Too waqdi Dawud too bar kudeh gexe.
Too barat edde, Saawul Dawud buxal yanim keh wagtaana'gidih, sinam ruube. «A barat edde yanim keh wagga haay, buxal sugek, saaku qiday kaa caba» iyye. Dawud barra Miikal baqalak inteemih, «Ta baraak kude waytek, beera koo qideloonum ixig» kaak inte.
Too waqdi qarik amok taagatak kaa oobisse. Tokkek kudeh gexe.
Tohuk lakal buxah addal qibaadah luk sugte gabak bicsen ceelo bahha hayteeh qarkaytô-bagul hayya hayteh, too ceelo sarot uybududda hayteek lakal, amô-ginah wadar dagooruk bicsen barkuma akah hayte.
Saawul ruube mari yemeete waqdi, Miikal, «Dawud lakmisah qarkaytô-bagul yan» keenik inte.
Too mari Saawuluh toh warse waqdi, Saawul keenik iyyeemih, «Gexay isinni intih ubula. Lakmisak sugek, ukkuqqa kaa haay akke kaa baaha; anu kaa qideyyok» keenik iyye.
Too mari Dawud buxah yuduureeh; qari culeenih wagten waqdi, gabak bicsen ceelo kee wadar xagooruk bicsen barkuma qarkaytô-bagul keenih sugte.
Toh Saawuluh warsen waqdi, Miikalak, «Ama» iyyeh farmo ruube. Is temeete waqdi, Miikalak, «Atu yoo akah ayrisseeh naqboyta yok akah rubtem macaa?» teetik iyye.
Is kaal gacisseemih, « ‹Yoo ruube waytek, koo qideyyo› yok iyyeeh; too waqdi kaa ruube» inte.
Toh inkih tekke waqdi, Dawud kudeh, Saamuweliy Raama magaalal yanihiyya fan gexe. Tokkel Saawul kaal bahha heem inkih kaah warse. Tohuk lakal Dawud kee Samuwel Nayot deqsita arac fan gexeenih wokkel elle yeeden.
Sarrak Saawul, Dawud Nayot deqsita aracay Raamal geytimahiyyal yani 'yaanam yoobbe.
Too waqdi kaa yaxayu waa mara kaah ruube. Woo mari, Samuwel foocat akak yan nabuwway butta takkeey nabuwwah innah yabtah xongoltahiyya yublen. Yallak keenil obte *Roocaaniyya too mara kaadu timlikeeh, too waqdi Saawul ruube mari woo marat yengeleeh, kaadu nabuwwah innah yaabakaay xongolak yenen.
Saawul toh yoobbe waqdi gersi mara ruube. Too mari kaadu naharsi marak kaxxih too marat yengeleeniih, nabuwwah innah yaabakaay xongolak yenen. Kaadu sidochaytô gabah sinam kaah ruubeeh too mari kaadu dumî-mari abem abe.
Ellecabol isih Raamâ-magaala fan yemeete. Seku deqsita aracal yen kaxxam naba qeela gufe waqdi, Samuwel kee Dawud elle tani'kke wokkel suge marak essere. Too mari, «Samuwel kee Dawud Nayotul tan» kaak iyyen.
Usuk wokke gexak elle suge'kkel, Yallih-Roocaaniyya kaa kaadu timlikeeh, Nayot guffa haam fan nabuwwah innah yaabakaay xongolak Nayot fan yemeete.
Tokkel gersi marak kaxxih dallaabiyay edde suge isik kalla heeh Samuwel foocal nabuwwah innah yaabakaay xongolak yen. Laqo kee bar inkih tonnal inaaqat suge. «Saawuluuy kinni way nabi yekke kunna!» 'yaanamih missili tokkek raaqe.

Tohuk lakal Dawud Nayot deqsita aracay Raamal geytimahiyya cabeh, megloh Yonaatan fan yemeete. Yonaatanak iyyeemih, «Baahem macaay? Sugay! Baahem mannah yan biilu? Ku abba yoo akah qidam faxam macaay? Maca kaal baaheeh?» iyye.
Yonaatan kaak iyyeemih, «Aleey! Koo qiddam matan. Yi abba qunxa caagid takku, kaxxa caagid takku, yok yaaqurem mali. Koo qidam faxaamal yok aaqaruk mananna. Koo akah qidam mali» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud kaak iyyemii, «Ku abba atu yoo kicintom yaaxigeeh, yok abu waam koh mawarisa. Macaay intek, yoo qidam faxam koh warsek, kaxxam yoh qaadettom kok yaaxigeh. Tonna'mmay ku abba xayi wakti yoo qideleemih, YALLAY waarahiyyah migaaqal xiibita» iyye.
Yonaatan kaak iyyeemih, «Hay tonnal, anu, atu faxxa hannaanim koh abeyyo» iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud kaak iyyeemih, «Beeri alsak biloy qiidih edde asaanahiyya kinnuk, malik lih maaqo edde akme ayro. Tonna'mmay kot bictek, beecih-carra fan tokke maamaataay buqreh addat sasot sugeyyo.
Ku abba maaqo elle yakmen aracal yoo wayu waa waqdi, ‹Dawud manke gexe?› iyyek, ‹Buxâ-mara lih qiidih asam faxaah; kulli sanatal buxâ-mara lih sadgat edde abna ayrooy, gexam faxak ruksat yoh ucuy›, iyyeeh, ‹Ruksat anu kaah ecee› yoh inxic.
Toh inta waqdi, ‹Meqeh hay› kok iyyek, yoo maxagam elle aaxigenno. Hinna'mmay yanqibem tublek, tonnal umam yol baaham faxam elle aaxigetto.
Ku maganah yi taagah tamaham ugdubba haay, yoh culte Yalla-kee-xagana mamakin. Qellat yot tublek, ku abba fan yoo mabenay, isih yoo qiddisit» kaak iyye.
Yonaatan kaal gacseemih, «Annah tanim inkinnah macsubin. Yi abba umam kol baaham faxam aaxaginniyoy, koh warisak en» kaak iyye.
Dawud iyyeemih, «Hay meqek, ku abbah atu ah warissa waqdi yinqibe kaa tekkek, iyyi yoh warsele?» iyye.
Too waqdi Yonaatan, «Woo buqreh adda nee bey» kaak iyye. Tokke titta lih gexen.
Sarrak Yonaatan Dawuduk iyyeemih, «YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinni ni sumaq yakkay. Beera hununuh ta uddur kee beeca kaadu yi abba lih yaabeyyo. Ku giddinaamak meqem koh yacsubem ublek, farmo koh ruubeyyo.
Umam kol baahu waam faxam ublek, kaadu koo aysixxigeyyo. Koo aysixxige weeh, amaanah akah tasillime innah abe week, YALLI uma rabah yoo qiday. Toh too tiya. Taway kok axcemii, YALLI duma yi abba lih akah suge innah, ko'lih yanay, ku qaxa yakkay.
Gersi tiyak kaadu kok axcemii, addunyal anim fanah yoo mahawweeninay, YALLI sinaamah akah muquk suge'nnah, atu kaadu meqem yoh ab. Rabe yoo tekkek, yi buxah mara mahawweeninay, meqem keenih ab. YALLI ku naqboytit baysa saaku, ni fanal yan Yalla-kee-xagani baye waama. Too Yalla-kee-xagana maktek, YALLIH digaala kol obtay» iyye.
Yonaatan Dawuduh isi nabsih kacanuh yassalle inna assalluk yen. Tohuk gexxaamah Dawud isil make waa'gidih, fiiruk geerah xibsiise.
Tohuk lakal kaak iyyeemih, «Beeri alsih biloh qiid kinnuk, maaqo elle yakmen aracal geytime waytek, ku raqti maqellitta.
Beeca raqtek, wonnal inkinnah raqtem meqe'nnah aaxigelon. Tonna-kinnuk woo duma edde tombooqore arac gexay, tokkel xaluuqah addat ombooqor» iyye.
Sarrak kaadu iyyemii, «Awka inni lih baaheyyooh, too awka atu edde tombooqore ikke fan ruubeyyo. Qalaama aba numih innah, sidiica adda gaysê-baxa atu edde tani ikkeh ruubam celsiisak, kok xaqut xaqut qideyyo. Too waqdi awkak, ‹Gaysê-baxi ku xaqut radek, bah› axcih yoo toobbek, tonnal, YALLAY waarahiyyah migaaqal koo xiibita'mmay, nagayna tanim elle aaxigettooh, edde tombooqore ikkek awqetto.
Tonna hinna'mmay awkak, ‹Gaysê-baxi edde radem kok xer ikke› 'yaanam exce yoo tekkek, tonnal nagayna matanam elle aaxigettooh, YALLI tasillimem kok faxam elle aaxigetto» kaak iyye.
«Koo kee yoo tittah culle Yalla-kee-xaganah tu gactek, tet way make waa mara YALLI nee abay» iyye.
Yonaatan toh iyyek lakal, Dawud gexeh woo aracat yombooqore. Saawuluu, alsi edde bila qiidih edde asan ayro, maaqo elle bicsan arac yemeete.
Sarrak gidaarat xayi aracay dumaak elle daffeyak yenehiyyal daffee. Yonaatan abbak foocal daffee; Abner kay xaquuk daffa 'ye. Dawud elle daffeyak yen arac foyyah raaqe.
Too waqdi Saawul, Dawud akah amaate weem, taahirik ane wee kee tuk teena kaat tekke teeti 'yaanamah too saaku tu maxacco.
Takkay immay too qiidih edde asan nammeyhaytoh ayro, Dawud elle daffeyak yen arac kaadu foyyah yanim yuble waqdi, Yonaatanak, «Yiisâ-baxi kimal akah amaaate weeh, a saaku kaadu akah amaate weem macaay?» iyye.
Yonaatan kaak iyyeemih, «Dawud akak amaate weem, ‹Buxâ-mari yok Beetlacam magaalal sadgat abam faxaah too sadgatak yi saqal, ‹Maraaqin› yok iyyek, yi kataysa tekkek ku maganak buxâ-marat boysita'gidih yoo rub› axcuk yoo kallaceeh, Beetlacam fan gexe. Akah amaate weem tohu» iyye.
Too waqdi Saawul Yonaatanat kaxxam bagcarriteeh, «Kee ilmoytow, Yiisâ-baxa qaxat gacteeh, is kee isi ina qawratak qida num tekkem away kok ableh an.
Yiisâ-baxi addunyal yanim fanah, a baaxoh malik matakkam mataaxiga inna? Away gexay akke kaa bah. Rabi kaal yamaatek» iyye.
Yonaatan abbal gacseemih, «Maca baaheeh macal raba?» iyye.
Toh iyye waqdi Saawul, Yonaatan qidam faxeeh, macaxu kaa fan qide. Tonnal, Yonaatan isi abba Dawud qidam faxam yeexege.
Tohuk gexxaamah Yonaatan maaqoh amok naqabut ugteh gexeeh, inkih tan ayro tu xage'kal ase. Toh alsi biloh qiidih edde asen ayrok nammeyhaytoh ayrok ten. Too naqabuh akah yenneqebbem, kay abba Dawudut abeh yan xaafu kee ceele-waytik ten.
Too ayrol ciggilta ayro, kaa kee Dawud duma abte bicih xagnah, Dawud elle yan arac awka gabat hayya heeh gexe.
Too awkak iyyeemih, «Taway wokke fan gexay, anu qidu waa gaysê-xaylo gorrisetto» iyye. Taaxige awki arduk gexe waqdi, Yonaatan gaysê-baxa kaak dagah amot qide.
Awki gaysê-baxi elle rade arac yemeete waqdi, Yonaatan anay fayya haak, «Gaysê-baxi kok daga yanik,
ama'kkel masoolinay, isissikay am» iyye. Too waqdi taaxige awki gaysê-baxa ukkuqqa heeh,
tah akah takkem kinnim aaxige'kal, Yonaatan fan yuduure. Taham akah tekkem, Yonaatan kee Dawuduk kalih mari aaxaguk mananna.
Tohuk lakal Yonaatan awkak, «A silac gabat beyay magaala uduur» iyye.
Awki gexek lakal, Dawud sasot edde suge xaluuqah addak yewqeeh, assakaxxiyyah gulubuh gacca 'yeh sidiica adda gommoh rade. Too waqdi Yonaatan kee kaa titta fugutteh, numuuy numul weeqah hayya hee. Dawuduk afqado Yonaatan kaak baxsimam xiqe cinteeh, Yonaatanak muxxi biyaakite.
