Yonaatan Dawuduk annah iyye, «Amaan ko'lih yanay. Yoo kee koo kee nek rade marii, nanu abne Yalla-kee-xagana bayse waa mara YALLI ken abay nee abay» iyye. Tohuk lakal Dawud gexeeh, Yonaatan magaala fanah yuduure.

Dawud Acimalek deqsita seekiy dabqah Noob deqsita aracal yenehiyya fan gexe. Acimalek kaa yuble waqdi kaah garaya'gidih meysih axaxitak afah yewqe. Too waqdi kaak iyyemii, «Wakali maleh dibuk macah temeete?» iyye.
Dawud iyyeemih, «Malik caagidih emeete'mmay, anu akah emeete taama kee abam faxam malik, ‹Numuh mawarisin› yok iyyeh yan. Yi marah tu gactek keenit elle angaarawu waa arac keenih heeh anik,
maaqoh xagaanamah tu maay tan? Koona gaqamboyta tellek, yoh acuyaay; alle waytek, allinnaanim bah» iyye.
«Anu taahirroysen-gaqamboyta akke waytek, kulli num yakme gaqambo mayyu. Taahirroysen-gaqamboyta ku mari a dabaanah agabut fido faxeenih ane weeniih taahirih yanin ken tekkek, koh aceeyyo» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud kaal gacseemih, «Yi mari taturteh tan dago ayroorak xabba haanam taahirik yan. A saaku a gid yakke caagidih ugunne hinnaay, yi mari dago taamah gexa saaku kinni way taahirik gacan» iyye.
Too waqdi woo sek miizil naharak sugte gaqamboyta kalla heeh, laqin gaqamboytay woo waqdi alayseenihiyya heeh suge. Woo miizik kaleh suge gaqamboyta kaah yecee. Sek too gaqamboytay taahirik tanik sah gaqambo luk masuginna.
Too saaku Saawul saqih dacayrit yen marak abbah yen numuy migaaqah Doweg deqsitahiyya, diini gital tanim duudusa'gidih, wokke yemeeteh suge.
Too waqdi Dawud Acimalekik iyyeemih, «Malik amrih sissikuk ugteeh, silaacak tu gabat mabaahinniyooy, seef kinni way cabeh emeeteh ani'mmay, silaacak macaxu takku seef takku tabbixem baahey» kaak iyye.
Acimalek kaak iyyeemih, «Silaacak Golyaaday duma atu Eelâ-golol qiddehiyyak raaqe seef yo'lih yan. Too silac rikeek tan saroy sek haysitahiyyak darrek sarat cibuh yanik, faxxek beetit. Kaak sah akkel silac mabbixak» kaak iyye.
Dawud iyyeemih, «Wohoysa woo silac annah yoh bah; kaak yayse silac rikel mayanak» iyye.
Dawud Malik-Saawuluk too saaku tonnal kudeeh, sarrak Gat-magaalal reede malikiy migaaqah Aakis deqsitahiyya fan gexe.
Too malikih gubal taamitak yen mari malikik iyyeemih, «Ah Dawuduy isi baaxol malikih yenehiyya hinnaa? Agbi,
‹Saawul mango alfi yakke mara qide'mmay
Dawud mango tabanih alfih num qide›
akah iyyeeh gad akah abe num hinnaa?» iyyen.
Ta mari yaabe yab Dawudut kaxxa bagi way qideeh, malik Aakisik kaxxam cunxite.
Tonna leemik oson kay dariifal yaniinim yuble waqdi, cissit ane waa num ceelak yeneeh, cabboote numih innah gacak yen. Ken gabat yen way, qarik afal fiirisak yeneeh, isi afak laguuda debenil isik caxak yen.
Aakis toh yuble waqdi, «A num cabboote num kinnim maay able waytan?
Yi buxal cabu leela isih kibuk tan way, taway ta num akah bahteenim macaa? Ossotinah gersi cabuliy buxal amaan yoo waysiisu waah foocal yok ceele waytam abu waahiyya yoh bahteenii?» keenik iyye.

Dawud Gat magaalak gexeeh Qadullum deqsitta gablat yombooqore. Kay tooboko kee kay buxah mari a xaagu gee waqdi, kaa fan yemeeten.
Gibdaabini elle suge mara kee, mago edde sugte mara kee, ruffa alle wannaan mari inkih kaa fan yemeete. Too mari tittat affara boolih num yekkeeniih, Dawud abbah keenik gace.
Dawud tokkek Mixfa deqsitta magaalay Mooyab rasul tanihiyya fanah gexe. Tokkel Mooyab malikik iyyeemih, «Ku maganah anu innih Yalli yoh loowam geyam fanah, yi ina kee yi abba ko'lih sugtay 'xic» iyye.
Dawud amô-reebu le aracat aqurat sugga 'yam fanah, kay xaleena too Mooyab malikih buxal sugte.
Ayrok teena Nabi Gaad Dawudul yemeeteeh kaak iyyeemih, «A aracay amô-reebu lel mambooroqinay, Yuudâ rasu fan gex» kaak iyye. Too waqdi Dawud Ceret deqsitta garbo fanah gexe.
Ayrok teena Saawul, Gibqâ-magaalal tan koomal tan saagantoh gubal, macaxu gabat leeh daffeyaah, kay qaskarih abbobti kaadu kay xaqul daffeyak elle sugte ikkel, Dawud kee kay qaskar geytinteh, 'yaanamih xaaguh yoobbe.
Too waqdi qaskar abbobtik iyyeemih, «Isin, Benyam maraw! Dawud takkeenimik inkih baqurê-baaxo kee, qinab elle taysubuken baaxo siinih aceelem maay takkalen? Hinnay kaadu isi qaskarak abbobti sin abelem maay takkalen?
Titta yol akah geyteenim, tohih akkal maay kinni? Sammok xale baxi, Yiisâ-baxih qaxa yok gacam tubleenih, num siinik yoh mawarsinna. Yiisâ-baxay yi marak numuk teenah yanihiyya a saaku yi qidimih raarisiyyat yoh yanim abalihiiy, sammok xale baxi yi amot kaa heem abalih, tahat maqal haysite num siinit mayanaay yoh warse num siinit mayan» iyye.
Doweg too waqdi Saawul qaskar lih soolak sugeeh iyyeemih, «Anu Yiisâ-baxi, Noob magaalal Aciitúb-Acimalek fan gexah ubleh.
Sek-Acimalek kaah fayu YALLAL essereeh sarrak maaqo kee Golyaad-seef kaah acayih inni intih uble» iyye.
Toh yoobbe waqdi Saawul, Sek-Acimalek kee kaah ramad elle hayta seekay Noob deqsita aracal sugga 'teh inkih farmo ruube. Too waqdi too mari inkih kaal yemeete.
Sarrak Saawul Acimalekik iyyeemih, «Acimalekow, taabbeh inna?» iyye.
Acimalek, «Aabbeh, yi amoytaw!»
«Hay toobbek, koo kee Yiisâ-baxi yi umaanel akah malisseenim maca? Kaah maaqo kee seef akah teceem macaa? Yallal fayu kaah akah essertem macaa? Usuk a saaku naqboyta yok yekkeeh, yi qidimih raarot yoh yanik» iyye.
Acimalek kaak iyyemii, «Lito qaskar abbobtih addat Dawud gide diggak le num mayana. Toh lih kaadu balluh kok yaniih, ku dacayrit tan qaskarak inkih abbah tanim kaa. Tohuk kalah kaadu ku buxah addal kulli num kaa yassakaxxe.
Anu Yallal fayu kaah akah esserem dibuk too saaku hinna. Yok abtu waytaamal malissah akak inte qaadah tu gactek, yi malikow, yoo kee yi mara tohuk naaxigem mannuk, toh nel mahaysin» kaak iyye.
Malik too waqdi kaak iyyeemih, «Acimalekow, koo kee koh ramad elli haa maral inkih rabi yamaateh yan» iyye.
Sarrak kaat dacayrih tan qaskaray soltahiyyak, «YALLIH seeka Dawud lih gacca 'teh yok aboonu waanamal malisseeh, Dawud kudam abalih yoh mawarsinnoonuy tibba iyyeenimih ken qida» iyye. Takkay immay kay qaskarak num YALLIH seekal qidimih gaba ruube cineh.
Toh yuble waqdi Saawul Dowegik, «Atu ken qid» iyye. Too waqdi Doweg too seeka inkih qide. Too ayroh addat Doweg bacra-taban kee koona sek qide.
Tohuk lakal Saawul, «Noob-magaalay seeka dabaaqah elle sugtehiyyal sugte labha kee agabuuy salaadaay qunxa urruuy laay illi kee danoonak tu macabinay inkih qida» iyyeh amri yecee. Tohim inkih qiden.
Takkay immay Sek-Acimalek baxay migaaqah Abiyataar deqsitak yenehiyya kudeh Dawud fan yemeete.
Saawul YALLIH seeka qidem kaah warse.
Toh yoobbe waqdi Dawud kaak iyyemii, «Anu woo ayro Doweg wokkel uble waqdiik Saawuluh warselem eexegeh. Tonna'mmay ku maray rabba 'yehiyya abe rabih sabab tekkem yoo'mmay,
ahak wadir mameysitinaay yo'lih idiy. Ahaysa yoo qidam faxa num koo qidam faxa. Yo'lih amaanah xiinetto» kaak iyye.

Dawud Filistiin mari Kaqiilâ-magaalat qeebi abaanaah, qusbih orbisen daro buubeenih 'yaanam yoobbe waqdi,
YALLA essereeh, «YALLAW, gexeh a marat qeebi maay aboo?» iyye.
YALLI, «Gexay qeebi keenit abaay, Kaqiilâ-magaalah mara wad» kaak iyye.
Dawud mari, «A elle nan Yuudâ rasul elle abnah nan meysi nee xiqtak, taway kaadu Filistiin qaskar elle tan baaxo maca nee beyta? Wonni mankeh nee baahu waah yan?» iyyen.
Too waqdi Dawud kaadu qagseh YALLAL fayu essere. YALLI kaadu qagseh, «Gexay Kaqiilâ-mara wad; Filistiin marak anu koo aysiiseyyok» kaak iyye.
Tonnalaa, Dawud kee kay mara Kaqiila fan gexxeeh, Filistiin marat qeebi aben. Filistiinik mango mara qideeniih saq kaadu keenik buubeenih, Kaqiilal yan magaalah mara tonnal waden.
Acimalék-Abiyataar kudeh Dawuduy Kaqiilal yanihiyya fan yemeete saaku, Yallih seeka xagarat hayta saroy rikeek tanihiyya gabat baaheh suge.
Saawul, Dawud Kaqiilal yanim yoobbe waqdi iyyeemih, «Dawud Kaqiilâ-magaalay gaso maroh edde taniih megdebwa afal akak tanihiyyah addal yenek, wohoysa oflot isih is heeh mayana! Yalli yi gabat kaa haam faxah yan» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Saawul isi qaskarah seeco abeeh, «Carbih ugutaay Kaqiilâ-magaala fan gexxa inteenih Dawud kee kay marat maro hayisa» iyye.
Dawud, Saawul kaa yabbixe'gidih malsam yoobbe waqdi, Sek-Abiyataarak, «Ama Yallih seeka haysitta saroy rikeek tanihiyya
Sarrak iyyeemih, «YALLAW, Israayil ummatta doore Dageltaw, yooy ku naqasuh yanihiyyah sabbatah, Saawul Kaqiilâ-magaala bayisam faxa 'yaanam oobbek,
Kaqiilâ-mari Saawul gabal yoo maay heele? Saawul nummah, akah iyyen innah, maay amaatele? YALLAW, Israayil doore Dageltaw, aham yoh warissa'gidih, koo kallacah an» iyye.
YALLI too waqdi, «Saawul amaatele» kaak iyye.
Dawud kaadu qagseh YALLA essereeh, «Hay Kaqiilâ-magaalah mari Saawul gabal yoo kee yi mara maay heele?» iyye.
YALLI, «Yeey, sin heelon» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud kee kay maray mangah lica boolih num akkuk sugtehiyya foorteh. Elle gexen ikkel inki aracal maadayinnoonuy aracak arac gexen. Saawul, Dawud Kaqiilak kudeh gexe, 'yaanam yoobbe waqdi kaa makataatinna.
Dawud Diif deqsitta baaxoy sinam elle dagohiyyak qaleela le kabut yombooqoreeh tokkel elle yeede. Saawul kulli way kaa gorrisak yene'mmay, Yalli kay gabal kaa mahanna.
Dawud uqrat edde yan aracay Cores deqsitahiyyaak, Saawul kaa qida'gidih goranat kaak yanim yoobbeh.
Dawud too aracal yan waqdi,
Yonaatan kaal yemeeteeh, «Aytikum! Edde tanim, Yallih dacayrik!
Yi abba tu kol mabaahak, mameysitin. Yi abba Israayil-malik takku waytam koo kinnim yeexegeeh, anu reedah ku gubal gacu waam yismiteh yanik» kaak iyye.
Ken nammay too waqdi YALLIH migaaqal kataysis akkeloonumuh xagana tittah culen. Sarrak Yonaatan isi buxah yuduureeh, Dawud Cores rasul elle raaqe.
Diif deqsita aracak tu'baxa yakke mari, Saawuluy Gibqâ-rasul yanihiyya fan yemeeteeniih iyyeenimihii, «Dawud ni rasuk Cores deqsita aracay amô-reebu ley Cakiilâ-qaleh amol yanihiyyat uqurat yan. Tohum Yasimon deqsita aracak gabbi-qaxat raqta baaxo.
Ni malikow, atu isih faxinnaan saaku amaay, kaa ku gabal haanam nel cab» kaak iyyen.
Saawul keenik iyyeemih, «Yoh abteenimih YALLI barkat siinit haay!
Away qagitay gexaay elle yan arac kee, kaa yuble mara digga haa. Makreena kinnim kaak oobbeh aniih,
tonna-leemik hununuh edde yambooqore arooca ismitta kaak hay yol ama. Sarrak anu innih sin lih gexeyyooh; uxih rakaakayal yan kaa tekkek, inkih tan Yuudâ kedoh addak riket kaa macaba» iyye.
Sarrak too mari Saawuluk naharat Diif fan gexe. Too saaku Dawud kee kay mara Maqon deqsita bacariy Yasimon deqsita aracak gabbi-qaxat raaqahiyyal yenen.
Saawul kee kay mara Dawud goranah gexxeeh, Dawud toh yoobbeh. Too waqdi xaluuqa le qaley Maqon deqsita bacaril geytimtahiyya fan gexeeh, tokkel elle yeede. Saawul toh yoobbe waqdi lakat kaak gexe.
Dawud kee Dawud mari, Saawul kee kay mari ken edde gorrisa qalek gersi kabut yeneenih, keenik kudak yenen. Saawul kee Saawul mari ken yabbixe'gidih gita keenik uxuyya haam faxak suge waqdi,
farmô-num yemeeteeh, Saawuluk iyyeemih, «Filistiin-mari baaxo buubehik, xayuk am» kaak iyye.
Toh yoobbe waqdi Saawul, Dawud qeebi hinna'mmay, Filistiin marih qeebih gexe. Too aracak too saakuk wadir migaaqah, «Kalkaala-Kooma» iyyen.
Dawud tohuk lakal Qengeedi deqsita rasu fan gexeeh, tokkel amô-reebu le aroocal uqurat suge.

Saawul Filistiin marih qeebik yuduure saaku, Dawud Qengeedi deqsita rasul sinam elle dago baaxol yani 'yaanam kaak iyyen.
Toh yoobbe waqdi Saawul Israayil qaskarih addak doorru hee sidiica alfih num gabat hayya heeh, Dawud kee Dawud marih goranah «Sarâ-xixxooqa» deqsita arac fan gexe.
Illi-gasoosat xayi gablay giti qaxal tanihiyya fan yemeeteeh, daaco aba'gidih too gablah adda cule. Dawud kee Dawud mara too gablak iqiyal culteh ten.
Too waqdi Dawud mari iyyeemih, «Ta ayro YALLI, ‹Faxxem akak abittuh, ku naqaboyta ku gabal heeyyo› 'yaanam kok akak iyye ayrok tanih tan» iyyen. Sarrak Dawud sasot amma 'yeh Saawul culsah edde yan kameesik exxâ-baxa yirgiqe.
Toh abek lakal, umam abem kay xagar kaah warseeh, tohih sabbatah
isi marak iyyeemih, «Yi amoytay YALLI malik abehiyyal umam baahaamak YALLI yoo catay. YALLI doore malik kinnimih sabbatah, dagoohim-baxa kinni way kaal baahe waam faxxinta» iyye.
Dawud toh iyye waqdi, kay mari kay yaabal umam Saawulul baahaanamak raaqeenih, umam kaal baahe ken kaleh.
Saawul uguttu 'yeh woo gablak yewqeeh isi gexoh gexe.
Tohuk lakal Dawud kay lakat eweqqa 'yeh, «Amoytaw» kaak iyye. Saawul salafah wagga hee waqdi, Dawud kay assakaxxiyyah qansah baaxo xagam fan qununna 'ye.
Sarrak kaak iyyeemih, «Kot yoo yaysamme maray ‹Dawud umam kol baaham faxa› iyyahiyyah yab macah taabbe?
Koo qidam faxaamal away a gablah addat YALLI yi gabal koo heeh suge. Yi marak garab, ‹Taway kaa qid› yok iyyeeni'mmay afqado yok xiqtu cinteeh, ‹Anu inni amoyta maqida. YALLI doore amoytal qidimih gaba maruuba› keenik exce.
Kameesik exxâ-baxa kok irgiqeeh, woo exxa ah teetiy gabat abbixe. Koo qidam niyat luk sugaamal, too way koo qidak en. Koo qidaamih fayxi alle waam tahal yok ixig. Yooy tu kol baahe weehiyyah qidimih yoo gorrisak takke fan temeetem koo.
Koo kee yok qellatat yan num YALLI yabalay. Dagooh nabam kol baahe weemih sabbatah, atu yol bahtah taniimih YALLI koo digaalele'mmay, anu innih koo maxaga.
Dumî-mari missilah, ‹Uma marak umam tawqe› 'yaanam axcuk neh sugen. Tonna-leemik anu innih koo maxaga.
Meqehik, Israayil malikow, a qiddam faxxam kinni num maay table? Xakaake kaltam kinni num isik table? Rabe kutak ayse sinni kannaadi gideh yan numu.
YALLI koo kee yok qellat le num ableleeh, qellat edde yan numul nek meklele. Yot takkem ableleeh, tuk teena akak axcele; ku gabak yoo ayyaaqele» kaak iyye.
Dawud ta yaabak gaba kale waqdi Saawul, «Yi Dawudow, ah koo?» iyye. Sarrak kaxxam weeqeh, iyyeemih,
«Atu intam nummaay; anu edde anim qellata. Anu umam kol baahem abalih, atu meqem yoh abak sugte.
Yoh abba hayte maqaane yoh warisseh nummah. YALLI ku gabah gubah yoo gacse waqdi, yoo maqidinnito.
Gabah addat kaak rade naqboytal tu baahe'kah rubtam iyyay? A saaku yoh abte maqaaneh galto YALLI koh gacisay.
Atu Israayil malik akkettooh; Israayil mari ku xintoh gubat xiinelem a saaku eexegeh.
Tonna'mmay yi migaq kee yok radda 'ye marih migaq akah hawwensime waa innah, yi mara xage waytaamah, YALLIH migaaqal qahdi yoh cul» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi too xagana kaah culeh.
Tohuk lakal Saawul isi buxah yuduureeh; Dawud kee kay mara taaxige uqurah edde sugen arac fanah yuduuren.

Samuwel rabeeh too saaku Israayil mari yakkeemiik kay taqdiyyah yemeeteeniih too aracal kaah rookiten. Sarrak kay raysa Raama deqsita aracay usuk dabqah elle sugehiyyal kaa yoogoqen.
Tohuk lakal Dawud Faaran deqsitta baaxoy sinam elle dagohiyya fan gexe.
Kaalib deqsita gulubuh yooboke numuy migaaqah Nabal deqsitahiyya yen. Too num gaddalih yan numuk teneeh, wadarak alfi takkem luk yeneeh, sidiica alfi yakke illi luk yen. Dabqi kaak Maqonul sugeeh, Karmel deqsita aracal baaxo luk yen. Kay barra migaaqah Abiigal deqsitak ten. Is qax-maqaane kee bagi-cubbi le barrak ten. Tet baqalah tu gactek, cillaale kee qaduwwi luk yen.
Ayrok teena Nabal isi illik xagor kalak suge.
Dawud toh yoobbe waqdi, sinam elle dago baaxoy elle sugehiyyak tabna furraynul Karmel deqsita arac fan farmo ruube. Farmoh ruube marak iyyeemih, «Karmelil yan Nabal fan gexaay, naharak yi migaaqal salaamatta kaal qida.
Intaanamah, ‹Ku qumri yaxxeeray. Koo kee ku buxah mara kee ku ahlih qaafiyat yacaay iyye› inxica.
‹Illik xagor koh kala mara ko'lih yanim 'yaanam oobbe. Duma ama'kkel sugne saaku, ku saqih loynitte ne'lih sugteeh, too saaku meqe'nnal ken abbaxuk sugnem koh warisa nek iyye. Tonnah kaadu, Karmelil suggu inneemih midirik tu keenik bayi mahanninom kaah warisa nek iyye› inxica.
‹Tohimih digga faxxek, ken esseraay oson koh warselon. Tonna'mmay edde nemeetem qiddi ayrok tanih tanik, qibnaytiinoh nee arcibisaay duddam yooy ku baxah yani kee ku masaakiinay kol ruubehiyyah tama maral neh rub kok iyye› kaak inxica» iyye.
Dawud mari, too farmoy usuk keenil ruubehiyya Nabalah warseenih, keenil gacsam yaabbeeni'gidih kaa qambaalen.
Sarrak Nabal iyyeemih, «Sugay, anu Dawud akak iyyan num inkinnah maabbiyo. Yiisâ-baxa akak intaanam iyyaay? Axayyu is yeddere marak kudda naqoosa isih waktiik temeggeh tanik!
Gaqambo kee lee kee, illik xagor yoh kala marah usguude saq, ken cabba heeh, akak yemeeten ikke akak aaxige waa marah macah acee?» iyye.
Dawud farmoh ruube mari Dawud fanah yuduureeh, usuk ken elle ruube num keenil gacsem kaah warsen.
Toh yoobbe waqdi Dawud isi marak, «Seef ittikiya» iyyeeh, isih isi seef ittikiyya heeh, affara boolih num is lih hayyaay, namma boolih numuy maaqoh amo wagtu waa wokkel elle cabba heeh daqaarime.
Nabal lih taamita marak tiyak teeni, Nabal-barray migaaqah Abiigal deqsittahiyya fanah gexxa 'yeh iyyemii, «Dawud woo sinam elle dago baaxok ni abbah farmo kee salaamatta ruubeeh, usuk too salaamattal xaafu kaal gacsem toobbee?
Dawud kee kay mara neh maquk sugteeh taqabi takkem nel mabaahinnon. Ken lih sugne saaku luk suggu inneemik tu nek magarqiminna.
Bar kee laqoh amo nek wagitak sugen. Ken lih nan way saqak amo neh wagitak sugen.
Tonna'mmay tamahak tuk teena abtam tayse. Tah ni abba kee kay mara kaxxam uma ikkeh bahtu waytaama. Ni abba uma numuuy; sahda kaa'lih yabta yab mayaabba» teetik iyye.
Toh toobbe waqdi, Abiigal namma boolih gaqamboyta kee, namma saaray qinabak bicsen kamrik kibuk yaniiy, illik konooyuy tusguudeh solal alassehiyyaay, alok koona kafaqaay, kafsen qinab-xaylok bool gaqamboyta kee, sublâ-xayloy kafseenihiyyak namma boolih gaqamboyta sissikuk danoonal eerra hayteh,
teetih taamita marak, «Isin yok naharat gexay suga; anu sin kataateyyok» inte. Takkay immay isi baqalah gexo mawarsinna.
Sarrak too duyye danoonal eerra hayteh qale tawqem faxxa waqdi, Dawud kee kay maray tet fan amaatuk sugehiyya gital teetit garayen.
Too waqdi Dawud isi bagul, «Taway anu ta numih dabaq bacarih tan baaxol akah dacrisak sugem macâ sabbata? Usuk luk suggu 'yeemik tu garaqi mahanninooy, taway anu kaah abe catoh galtoh tah yol gacsa.
Maaci maacisaamak naharal kay marak num cabe'kal selli hee week, Yalli faxe umaane yol baahay!» 'yaanam isi bagul axcuk suge.
Abiigal Dawud tuble waqdi, danan elle cabba hayteh gexxeeh, kay massakaxxah baaxok bagul qansah baaxo xagtam fanah Dawuduk ibi gubal qununte. Too waqdi inteemih, «Yi abbaw, axcem yok oobbey. Usuk baahem yol cab.
Nabal kol baahem bagut kaah mahan; yaaxigem le num hinnak. Nabal akak iyyaanam duquruuy; kay migaq kay taamah bis le. Atu rubte ku mari yemeete saaku, anu wokkel masuginniyo.
Away naqboytiitik cane gacse kee qide takkeemik koo waassam YALLA. Kol umam bahha haa mari, Nabal innah diggalsimeleemih YALLAY waarahiyyah migaq kee ku manol xiibita.
Ku maganak away koh baahe duyye yok ibbixaay ku marah ucuy.
Anu baahe qellat eellek, qafu yoh ab. Atu abtam YALLI kok aba iyye carbi kinniimih sabbatah, koo kee kok raddem inkih malikwa akketton. Addunyâ bagul tanim fanah, umaane elle geytinta num akke koo kalay.
Qeebi kot abam faxaah koo qidam faxa num yenek, YALLAY ku Dageltah yanihiyya koo dacrisele. Num kicna duyye elle dacrisa innal, YALLI koo dacrisele. YALLI ku naqboytit wanxefit xeet elle qidan innal qidele.
YALLI koh abeyyo iyyeh xagana koh akah culem koh abu waah, Israayilik malik koo abu waa saaku,
sabab maleh sahda qide kee kol yoysommeenimih ken digaalteh sugtaamal, toh nadaama kol akkuk ten. Tonna'mmay YALLI barkat kot hayu waa saaku, ku maganah yi abbaw, yoo mahawweenin» kaak inte.
Too waqdi Dawud teetik iyyemii, «YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinni fayla taafay! A saaku yot matarta'gidih koo ruube.
Atu a saaku umaanet ase yoo kalteeh, inni kasal sahdat abam faxak suge digaalak yoo raaqisse. YALLI koh yecee kasat yoh abte maqaanel barkat kot haay.
YALLI yi gabat biyaakiti sin mahanna. Tonna'mmay atu sissikuk yot matre waytaamal, beera saaku sin labhak num cabe'kal sele raareemih, waara YALLAY Israayil ummatta doorehiyyah migaaqal xiibita» teetik iyye.
Sarrak gabat mattacoh kaah bahte duyye teetik oggoleeh, «Intem kok oobbeeh, koh oggoleh. Ahaysa amaanah buxah uduuray mameysitin» teetik iyye.
Tohuk wadir Abiigal, Nabal fan tuduureeh; elle tuduure ikkel kaxxa xiglah addat sugeeh, iskirra 'yeh kaxxa farcit suge. Too ayro yab kaa'lih maabinnaay,
nammeyhaytoh ayro sikratak cissi geem ubulla hayte waqdi, tikka 'tem inkih kaah warisse. Toh yoobbe waqdi lubbi kaal yeedeeh, caxxi innah kafe.
Tabna ayroh gide suggu 'yek sa, YALLIH utkah yumuttukkeeh rabeh.
Dawud Nabal raba yoobbeeh, too waqdi iyyeemih, «Yooy kay naqasuh yanil ceele waytam baahe numul umam yoo baahe kaleeh yi aftok isih kaa digaale YALLA fayla taafay. Nabal baahe umaaneh YALLI kaa digaaleh» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Dawud Abiigal rihimih abita'gidih, isi mara teetil ruube.
Dawud mari Abiigalay Karmel deqsita aracal tanihiyya fan gexeeniih, tokkel teetik iyyeenimih, «Dawud rihimih koh abitam faxak, yoo fan am kok iyyah yan» teetik iyyen.
Abiigal baaxô bagul qununna 'teh inteemih, «Anu kay naqasoy kay gubal yan marih ibitte kaqlissuh bical tani kinniyo» inte.
Sarrak sissikuk ugutta 'teh dananal gacca 'teh, usuk ruube mara lih Dawud fanah gexxe. Teetih taamitak sugte koona barra tet lih gexxe. Is kaal temeeteeh, tohuk wadir kay barra tekke.
Dawud teetik dumal Acinooqam deqsitta barra Yidraqel magaalal toobokehiyya barrah luk suge. Sarra Abiigal temeete waqdi, tet kaadu caggoytah haysite.
Too saaku Saawul isi baxá Miikalay Dawuduh abeh sugehiyya Laysá-Faltih yeceeh suge. Falti, Gallim deqsitta magaalah numuk ten.

Diif-rasih-mari Saawuluy Gibqa deqsita aracal yanihiyya fan yemeeteenih iyyeenimih, «Dawud, Cakiilâ-qaley Yasimon deqsita aracak foocah tanihiyyal yan» kaak iyyen.
Toh yoobbe waqdi qaskarak addak doorru hee sidiica alfih num gabat luk, Diif-rasuy sinam elle dagohiyyal Dawud gorrisa'gidih gexe.
Cakiila deqsitta qaley Yasimon deqsita aracak foocah raqtahiyyal giti qaxal yinfiddigen. Dawud elle suge ikkek mangayyinnay elle yeede. Saawul kay goranah yemeetem yoobbe waqdi,
gibah sinam ruubeeh, too mari Saawul yanim yismiteenih yemeeten.
Too xaagu gee waqdi xayuk ugutta 'yeh Saawul elle yinfiddige arac fan gexe. Saawul kee kay qaskarih abbay migaaqah Nér-Abner deqsitak yenehiyya xiinit elle yan arac yuble. Saawul elle yinfiddigen aracal qaskaray maroh kaat tanik addal xiinit yanim yuble.
Too waqdi Dawud Acimalek deqsita numuy Ciitâ-marah yooboke kee Abiisay deqsita numuy ina Yowab deqsita num lih luk yenehiyyak, «Sin nammayak Saawul xiinit elle yan arac yo'lih gexxu waytam iyya?» iyye.
Abiisay too waqdi, «Anu gexeyyo» iyye. Abiisay Yowab toobokoytah yen. Ina keenik Dawud annak ten. Tet migaq Xaruyak ten.
Too bar Dawud kee Abiisay Saawul elle yan arac culeeniih, too waqdi Saawuluy elle yinfiddigen aracak gudel xiinit yanihiyya yublen. Kay macaxi kaak amô-ginat baaxot mudumuh yen. Abner kee usuk abbah akak yan qaskar Saawul deraafil xiinit ten.
Abiisay too waqdi Dawuduk iyyemii, «Ta bar Yalli ku naqboyta gabah addat kok qideh yanik, inki adda a abbixe macaxut kaa mudeh baaxot kaa xakbisay yoo m'intaa? Inki addah mudumut edde kaa qideyyok» iyye.
Dawud iyyeemih, «YALLI isih doore malikil umam baahe mara digaala YALLAK, umam kaal mabaahin!
Tonna'mmay YALLI Saawul amrih qide kee carbit qide akkeleemih YALLAY waarahiyyah migaaqal xiibita. YALLI isih kaa aatukeleh immay,
YALLI isih malik abe num qidaamak yoo waaseh. Leeh afleyta kee macaxu kaak luk genxay» iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud leeh afleyta kee macaxuy amô-ginat kaak sugehiyya luk kaak gexe. Oson abeenim tublem matan. YALLI kaxxa xin keenil ruubeeh; tonna-leemik Saawul kee kay qaskar inkih xiinit kaarisak elle raqte.
Sarrak Dawud woo golok addah obba 'yeh wonnah waqinah raqta qaleh amol eweqqa 'ye waqdi,
Saawul qaskar kee Abner deero abeeh, «Abnerow! Abnerow! Axcem yok oobbeey» iyye.
Abner too deero yoobbe waqdi, «Sugay deero abtaah malik xiine kaltam iyyay?» iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud kaak iyyeemih, «Abnerow, sugay, atu Israayil rasul labhaytiino edde taadee num hinnitoo? Malikiy amoytah kok yanihiyya macah dacrise waytaah? Ku amoyta qida'gidih num taway isin elle tinfiddigen arac culeh suge.
Edde tan taamak boolatteh! Kee yaalo! Koo kee ku qaskar YALLI doore malik madacrisinniton. Tohuk gexxaamah rabi siinil yamaate. Taway meqehik, wagga hay! Malik macaxi ankel yanih? Kay amô-ginat ten leeh afleyta ankel tani?» iyye.
Too waqdi Saawul, Dawud anayal yeexegeeh, «Yi Dawudow, ah koo?» iyye.
Dawud «Ah yoo kinnih, yi amoytaw.
Yi amoytaw, yooy ku naqasuh yanihiyya akah xakaake kaltam macaay? Maca kol baaheeh? Mannah yan biilu baaheeh?
Malikow, axcem yok oobbey. Yi amot koo haytem YALLA tekkek, kaah sadgat abnay nek oggolay. Hinna'mmay sahda koo edde asissam tekkek, too maral YALLIH abaaro obtay. Ta mari YALLI doore baaxok yoo yeyyeeqeeh marin baaxoy Yallih aftok gabak bicsen duyye uqbud yok elle iyyaanal yoo heen.
Yoh tu gactek, YALLA elle aqbude waan baaxol rabam mafaxa. Tonnah tanim yol mabaahin. Israayil malik yooy kannaadi bis lehiyya akah qidam faxaamak sabab macaay? Ali innah admoh lakak yoo akah tayraddem maca?» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Saawul kaal gacseemih, «Umam baaheh anik, yi Dawudow, ahaysa uduur. A bar rooci yok waddek sa, kol umam baahaanamat maqagita. Duquruk sugtem yoo. Kaxxam umam baahe» iyye.
Dawud kaal gacseemih, «Ku macaxi ah kaana, amoytaw. Ku marak numuk teena akah rub.
Digga iyyeeh cakkit tanim aba num YALLAK galto mawaa. A saaku YALLI yi gabah gubat koo qideh suge'mmay, kooy YALLI malik abehiyyal umam mabaahinniyo.
A saaku anu ku rooci elle wade innal, YALLI kaadu yi rooci waday; gadaamak yoo yayyaaqay» iyye.
Saawul kaak iyyeemih, «Yalli barkat kot haay, yi baxaw! Abba haytam gabal kok bicele» iyye. Tohuk lakal, Dawud isi gexoh gexeeh; Saawul buxah yuduure.

Dawud isi bagul, «Ta xayyu kinni ayro maaxiga'mmay, Saawul ayrok teena yoo qide'kal maraaqa. Hay tohuk maca abam meqe? Filistiin rasu fan gexaama. Tokke gexem yoobbek, Israayil baaxol yoo gorrisaamak raaqele. Tohuk wadir yoo elle qida'nna mageya» 'yaanam isi bagul yucsube.
Tohuk wadir Dawud kee kaa'lih yen maray laca boolih num yekkehiyya Maqók-Aakis deqsita malikiy Gat-rasul malikih yanihiyya fan gexen.
Dawud kee kay mara tokkel Malik-Aakis luk, Gat magaalal dabaaqah gacen. Kulli num buxâ-mara gabat luk yeneeh, Dawud namma barra kaa'lih ten. Too agbi, Acinooqamay Yidraqel magaalal tooboke kee Nabalak raqte Abiigalay Karmelil tooboke.
Saawul, Dawud Gat fan gexem yoobbe waqdi, kay goranak raaqeh.
Dawud Aakisik iyyeemih, «Nummah yi kataysa tekkek, ku maganak dabaaqah mandarak tiyak teenal elle gaca arac yoh ucuy. Anu ko'lih inaytâ-magaalal gacam yok mafaxxintak» iyye.
Aakis too saaku Xiklag deqsitta magaala kaah yecee. Woo magaala woo ayrok wadir Yuudâ-malikwah im tekke.
Dawud Filistiin rasul taban kee lica alsa suge.
Too dabaanal Dawud kee kay mara Gasur kee Gixxa kee Qamaalek maray dumaak woo baaxol elle sugehiyya buubak sugen. Ta mari Sur deqsita rasuk xabba haanamaay Masrih amma 'yaanam tan baaxol, dumî dabaanal guubuh elle sugen.
Dawud ta baaxot qeebi aba'gidih amaatinnaan saaku, agabu kee labha inkih keenik qidakaay, laay illiiy gaala kee danoona dannabah keenik orbisak suge. Xagar sarih agantah keenik beyak suge. Sarrak Aakis fanah amaatinnaan waqdi,
Aakis, «A saaku gaaduh gexxem ankeey?» kaak iyya waqdi, Dawud, «Yuudâ rasuk gabbi-qaxat raqta baaxol suge» axce kee, «Yeracmaqil kedok gabbi-qaxat raqta baaxol suge» axciiy, hinnay kaadu, «Keena kedok gabbi-qaxat raqta baaxo gexeh suge» axce akkuk yen.
Kaa kee kay mari qeebi aba'gidih elle gexen baaxok, sinam Gat fan gexxa 'teh keenit tekkem warsaanamak, agabu kee labha keenik qidak yenen. Dawud Filistiin-rasul suggu 'yem fanah toh abak suge.
Takkay immay Aakis kaa yeemeneeh isi bagul, «Kay mari kaa niqbah yanik, addunyal yanim fan inni taamat kaa hayu waa» iyye.

Too ayrooral Filistiin-mari Israayilit qeebi aba'gidih qaskarak elli haanam gaaboysen. Sarrak Aakis Dawuduk iyyemii, «Koo kee ku mara yi qaxat gacca 'teenih qeebi abettoonum taaxigem hinnaa?» iyye.
Dawuduu, «Yeey macah iginno. Yooy ku taamat yani abu waam isih abletto» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Aakis, «Meqeh hay; tonnal atu anim fan yot dacayrih gacetto» kaak iyye.
Samuwel rabeemih waqla taturte. Israayil mari inkih too saaku kay rabah rookite. Magaqah elle yooboke Raamah magaalal kaa heen. Takkay immay Samuwel yen saaku, Saawul ginnili kee kalluwalley Israayilil sugga 'tehiyya baaxok dirkih yeyyeeqeh yen.
Filistiin qaskar gaabowwa 'teh temeeteeh, Suunem deqsita aracal yinfiddigen. Saawul isi qaskar gaabossa heeh, Gilbowaq deqsitta qaleh xaqul yinfiddigen.
Saawul Filistiin qaskar yuble waqdi wariggiteh, meysih axaxiteh.
Too waqdi, «YALLAW, maca aboo?» axcuk, YALLAL fayu essere. YALLI tu kaal magacisinna. Soonol kaal gacsem maliiy, hinnay kaadu, *Urim kee Tummim kabuk kaal gacsem maliiy, nabuwwâ kabuk kaal gacsem mali.
Sarrak Saawul kay gubal yan marak, «Kalluwalle elle tani ikke yoh gorrisa; teetil gexeh fayu tet esseram faxak» iyye.
Too mari, «Inki barra Endor deqsita aracal tan» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi Saawul fooca isik qellissa heeh aki sarat gacca 'yeh, ditet isi marak namma num is lih hayya heeh, kalluwallel fayu essera'gidih gexe.
Kalluwan le barrak, «Kalluwaanal fayu yoh esseraay, takku waytam yoh waris. Anu migaq akak xagu waa numih roocaaniyyah sec» iyye.
Kalluwan le barra kaak intemii, «Malik-Saawul abem maabbitoo macaa? Ginnili kee kalluwalle baaxoh addak dirkih yeyyeeqem toobbe koo. Toh toobbek, oflot yoo maqidinaay malik gabat yoo maqidsiisinay ahak raq» kaak inte.
Too waqdi Saawul qahdi teetih cule. «YALLAY waarahiyyah migaaqal xiibitaah, ah abteemih akah madiggalsinta» teetik iyye.
Kalluwan le barra, «Hay, iyyah koh seeco?» kaak inte.
Usukuuy, «Samuwelih yoh sec» teetik iyye.
Woo barra Samuwel tuble waqdi deero abteeh, Saawuluk, «Numow, yoo akah ayrissam macaa? Atu Malik-Saawul kinnito way!» kaak inte.
Malik Saawul, «Mameysitinaay, away tublem macaay?» teetik iyye.
Kaak inteemih, «Roocaaniyya baaxoh addak awaqih uble» inte.
«Ma ceelo luk teneh?» teetik iyye.
Isiiy, «Idaltuh yan numuy rarayto xagarat lehiyyak ten» kaak inte.
Too waqdi Saawul tohum Samuwel kinnim yeexegeeh, kay massakaxxah baaxok bagul gommoh rade.
Sarrak Samuwel Saawuluk annah iyye, «Aade macah yoo kaltaah, addunya macah yoo gacissa?» kaak iyye.
Saawul iyyemii, «Anu kaxxa gadaamah addat an. Filistiin mari qeebit yoo yabbixe. Yalli yo'lih mayanaay, soonol tu yol gacisu cineeh, hinnay kaadu, nabuwwâ kabuk yol gacsam aalle cineh. Tonna-leemik abeh meqem yoh warissa'gidih koh seece» 'yaanam kaak iyye.
Samuwel kaak iyyeemih, «YALLI koo cabeeh naqboyta kok yekkem teexegek, hay yoh macah secte?» kaak iyye.
Qagseh iyyemii, «YALLI kot abu waam dumaak yoh warseh sugeeh, taway kot abem tohu: amoytiinu kok beeh Dawuduh yecee.
Atu YALLIH amri cinteeh Qamaalek mara kee oson luk suggu 'yeenim inkih mabaysinnito. YALLI away ah kol akah baaham, tohih sabbata.
Koo kee Israayil mara Filistiin marih gabal hee. Beera koo kee ku xaylo yo'lih gacetton. YALLI Israayil qaskar Filistiin marih gabal heele» 'yaanam iyye.
Toh yoobbeemih wariggah, Saawul yinnikisseeh baaxok bagul qangalaalah raaqe. Too ayro laqo kee barah maaqo afah maxaginnaay, tonna-leemik boolaateh yen.
Taaxige kalluwan le barra kaal temeeteeh wariggat yanim kaak tubleh. Too waqdi kaak intemii, «Ku maganah, amoytaw, atu yok aba intem abeeh, inni rooci oflot hee raare.
Taway atu kaadu ku maganah anu kok ab axcem oobbey. Maaqo koh bicisu waak, safar akah affare wayta'nnah, takmeemi» kaak inte.
Saawul teetik cineeh, «Maaqo makma» teetik iyye. Takkay immay kaa'lih yen mari kaadu maaqo yakme'gidih kaa kallacen. Sarrak oggoleeh baaxok ugutta 'yeh qarkaytol daffee.
Taaxige barra sissikuk gexxa 'teh, buxah addat le mulkuqusse dahalto kaah qidde. Sarrak buluula arqussa hayteh, kamiir sinni gaqambo akak bicisse.
Too maaqo Saawul kee kay marih foocal xayyossek lakal, yokmeenih, sarrak too barat edde gexen.

Filistiin-mari qaskarak elli haanam Afeek deqsita aracal gaaboysen. Israayil-mari kaadu, Yidraqel-Daqar deqsita aracal yan buyyil yinfiddigen.
Filistiin malikwa kee ken mari bool-bool kee alfi-alfih gacca 'yeenih fooren. Dawud kee kay maraay keenik salafat Malik-Aakis lih gexen.
Filistiin qaskarih abbobti Dawud kee kay qaskar tuble waqdi, «Sugay, a saaku a Qibraan-mari akkel abam macaa?» iyyen.
Too waqdi Aakis keenik iyyemii, «A num mataaxigaana? Aham Saawul qaskarak abbah yen Dawudu. Away yi fanah yemeeteemih waqla leh immay, aham fanah umaaneh kaat geem mayyu» iyye.
Filistiin qaskar abbobti bagcarritteh kaak inteemih, «Ama num nek raaqay inxicaay, elle suge magaala fan gaca kaak inxic. Ne'lih qeebih gexe waama. Qeebi rada waqdi qeebi wadir net aba way manaaxiga. Lih suge num kaa yakcine'gidiiy kaat wagra'gidih, ni mara qidam takkeh. Kay amoyti kaat wagraamak, kaah taysem matan» iyyen.
Qagseenih iyyeenimih, « A num,
‹Saawul mango alfi yakke mara qide'mmay
Dawud mango tabanih alfih num qide›
akah iyyeeh agbi gad kee rigdo akah abe Dawud kinnim hawwentaa?» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi Aakis Dawuduh seeceeh kaak iyyeemih, «Atu aamanti le numuh yok sugteemih YALLAY waarahiyyal xiibita. Yi fanah amma 'teemiy a saaku fanah kok uble qellat mayyu. Tonna-leemik yo'lih gexxaah qeebit tangalem kok faxak en. Takkay immay yo'lih tan malikwa woo tiya yok moggolinna.
Tonna-leemik ahaysa uduuraay muquk gexaay; oson niqboonumuk tu maabin» kaak iyye.
Dawud too waqdi iyyemii, «Yi amoytaw, qellatah maca baahe? Atu akah inta innah, ku taamat gacca exceemiiy akke hebeltô qellat yot gee waytek wadir, kooy yi amoytah yanihiyya lih gexxa exceh ku naqboytiitit qeebi abe akah wayya haa macaay?» iyye.
Aakis kaal gacsemii, «Anu tohut haam mayyu. Yallih malaykattih innah koo able ikkal. Takkay immay Filistiin qaskar abbobti, ‹Usuk carbi booxa ne'lih gexe waama› yok iyyeeniih,
tonna'mmay taway, koo kee ku maray ko'lih yemeetek inkih abtaanam, beera dibroh ugutta 'xicay ayro liliq inta waqdi gexa» keenik iyye.
Dawud kee kay mara nammeyhaytoh ayro dibrot ugutta 'yeenih Filistiin baaxo madaarah gexen. Filistiin-mari Yidraqel fan gexe.

Namma ayrok lakal Dawud kee kay mara Xiklag magaala gufte. Qamaalek-mari gabbi-qaxat raqta Yuudâ-baaxo gaadeeniih Xiklag-magaala yibbixen. Woo magaala carriseeniih, agabu kee xaylo inkih yibbixen. Sugga 'teemik num maqidinnoonuy seewah gabat luk gexen.
Dawud kee kay mara Xiklag gufen waqdi, woo magaala keenih cararteh sugteeh, ken agabu kee xaylo seewah beenih sugen.
Toh yublen waqdi, Dawud kee kay mara weqteeh, weeqak cawalla 'yaanam fan boogisak sugen.
Dawuduk namma barray migaaqah Acinooqam kee Abiigal deqsittahiyya been marat seewah beenih sugen.
Dawud maray xaylo seewah akak beenihiyya kaxxam bagcarriteenih yeneenih; Dawud xeetit qidaanam faxak yenen. Tonna-leemik kaxxa gadaama Dawud tibbixe. Takkay immay YALLAY kay Dagelta kinnihiyya kaa cateh, agiirite.
Too waqdi Dawud Acimalek baxa sek Abiyataarak, «Ama rikeek tan saroy YALLI faxam elle yaaxigeenihiyya yol baahey» kaak iyye. Abiyataar woo saro kaal baahe.
Sarrak Dawud YALLA essereemih, «A gaadileh lakat maay gexo? Gexek ken abbixeyyo'nnaa?» iyye.
YALLI kaal gacsemii, «Lakat keenik gex. Ken abbixettooh seewah been mara catettok» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud isi maray mangah lica bool yakkehiyya luk fooreeh; sarrak Basor deqsitta golo gufen waqdi, keenik tu takkem wokkel elle raqte.
Dawud raaqe affara boolih num lih gexeeh; namma boolih num taqbi gexxaamah woo golok bisoh tabaanam yefferen.
Dawud lih bisoh gexe mari Masrih yooboke awka barril geeniih, woo awka Dawud fan baahen. Sarrak gaqambo kee lee kaah yeceen.
Toh lih kaadu sublâ-xayloy kafseeni kee qinab-xayloy kafseenihiyya kaah yeceen. Tohim yokmek lakal, inti kaak fakkinteh. Inkih tan sidiica ayro lee kee maaqok tu afah baaheh masuginna.
Sarrak Dawud woo awkak, «Koo lem iyyaay? Mankeh num kinnitooh?» kaak iyye.
Awkiiy, «Anu Masri-num kinniyo. Qamaalek-marih-naqasu kinniyo» iyye. «Anu lakmisak sugeemih sabbatah, yi abbah yan num sidooca ayrok duma yoo cabeh gexe.
Yuudâ-baaxok gabbi-qaxat raqta baaxoy Kereet mari elle yani gaadneeh, kaadu Kaalib deqsita gulubih baaxo gaadneh, Xiklag-magaala cararisneh» iyye.
Dawud too waqdi, «Hay woo gaadile fan yoo beettoo?» kaak iyye.
Awki kaal gacsemii, «Yallih migaaqal yoo qide waytuuy, hinnay kaadu, yi abbah gabal yoo hee waytuh Yalla-kee-xagana yoh cultek, ken fan sin beeyyo» kaak iyye.
Sarrak woo awki Dawud wokke fan bee.
Taaxige gaadileey Filistiin kee Yuudâ marak mango duyye buubeenih yeneeniih; tohih sabbatah fixixih kulli aracal makmo kee maaqabat yenen.
Dawud nammeyhaytoh ayro carri tikka 'yam fanah qeebi keenit abak sugeeh, sarrak ken yibbixeh. Affara boolih furraynuy gaali amot sugtehiyyak kalih marak num maasilliminna.
Dawud Qamaalek mari beyya heemik isi namma barrah agantah
tu keenit maruubinnay raaqiseh. Tonna-leemik kaa kee kay mari isinnim dudda luk geen. Dawud isi marak seewah beenih sugen lab-xaylo kee say xaylo raaqiseh. Keenik buubeenih sugeenimik tu keenit maruubinnaay raaqise.
Illiiy wadar kee laa keenik gacseenih. Too waqdi Dawud mari keenik been midir foocat isinnik hayya heenih lakak katayen. Too waqdi, «Aham Dawud imi» iyyen.
Tohuk lakal woo namma boolih numuy kaxxam tecleh tenehiyya keenik elle raqte'kke fan yuduuren. Woo namma boolih num elle raqteh tenem, Basor deqsitta golok ten. Oson Dawud kee kay marah matraana'gidih ken fan yemeeten. Too waqdi Dawud keenih garayeeh salaamatta keenih abe.
Sarrak uli maray Dawud lih gexeh sugehiyyay bagi-umaane kee tuxxiq sinna inkih lehiyya annah inte. «A mari ne'lih magexinnaay; tonna-leemik away dannabah bahne saqak tu keenih manaca. Isinni xaylo kee agabuy seewah keenik beenih sugeenihiyya beeteenih gexxaasitoonay» iyyen.
Takkay immay Dawud keenik iyyemii, «Yi toobokoy, YALLI neh yeceemih bagul annah tanim abnam mabicta. YALLI nee amaanah raaqissaay nee buube marak iysiissa nee hee.
Isin intaanam oggoltam matan. Kulli numuh inki gidel kurenno. Sakayi dacrisak raaqe mari woo carbi-booxa gexe mari geeh gide ken lih geele» 'yaanam keenil gacse.
Dawud tohuk wadir tohum qaada abeeh; tohuk wadir Israayil-mari tohim qaadah haysite.
Dawud Xiklag-magaala yuduure waqdi, dannabah orbisen duyyek tu takkem kataysis kee Yuudâ-makaaboonuh afti farmo lih hayya heeh ruube. «YALLIH naqboytiitik buubneh bahne duyye mattacoh siinih rubna» 'yaanam iyye.
A farmo Beetalal yan marah ruubeeh, Yuudâ-rasuk gabbi-qaxat raqta Raamot magaalal yan mara kee, Yattir magaalal yan maraay, Qarooqer kee Sifmotuuy Estamowaq kee Raakalal yan marah inkih too mattaco ruube. Tohuk kalah kaadu, Yeracmaqil deqsita gulub kee Keena deqsitta kedooy, Corma kee Borasan kee Qatak kee Cebron deqsitta magaalal yan marah inkih woo mattaco ruube. Too mattaco kaa kee kay mara ibah elle gexxa 'te baaxoh marah inkih yecee.

Filistiin mari Gilbowaq deqsitta qalel Israayil marat qeebi aben. Too qeebit Israayil marak mangom rabteeh wohuk raqtem toowweh. Yoowwe marat Saawul deqsita Israayil malik kee kay xaylo edde ten. Takkay immay lakak ken ayradduk exbeebexxa ken heenih, Saawul lab xaylok Yonaatan kee Abinadab kee Malkisuwaq deqsitta labha qiden.
Woo saakih qeebi Saawul akak yan kabul kaxxam qilsuk yen. Tonna leemik Filistiin qaskar rubteh tan gaysê-baxat Saawul uma'nnah mudduumeeh madaluh raaqe.
Too waqdi silac kaah akkuquk suge furraynuh yan numuk, «A diini-maleelah tan Filistiin ummatta yoo qiddeh yol tirtirissaamak, ama tikyat lito seefit yoo qid» kaak iyye. Takkay immay woo furrayni seefit kaa qidu meysih yeffereh. Toh yuble waqdi Saawul isi seef siibba heeh is edde qide.
Taaxige furrayni Saawul rabem yuble waqdi, usuk kaadu isi seef siibeh isit heeh edde rabe.
Saawul kee furraynu tonnal rabteeh, kay xayloh sidoc kaadu too ayrot rabe. Saawul mari titta lih too ayrot rabe.
Israayil maray Yidraqel-Daqarak woo qaxa raqta baaxo kee, Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta baaxol yeneenihiyya, qaskar kuddeh Saawul kee xaylo kaadu qideenih, 'yaanam yoobben. Too waqdi isinni magaalooli cabba heenih kuden. Sarrak Filistiin-mari yemeeteh woo magaalooli keenik yibbixen.
Qeebi gaba kalek lakal, ciggilta ayro, Filistiin mari qeebit rabe marak duyye seelebaana'gidih yemeeten waqdi, Saawul kee kay xayloh sidocuy Gilbowaq-qaleh amol qangalaalot tanihiyya keenih sugte.
Too waqdi Saawuluk moyya yirgiqeeniih, seef kee birtak bicsen duyyey xagarat mudum waasoh haanahiyya kaak seelebeenih. Yalla 'yeenih yaqbuden duyyeeyay sahda gabak bicissehiyya elle yaqbuden qaril yan mara kee, isinni ummatah a xaagu warisu waa mara ruuben. Too mari ta xaagu beya'gidih gexeeh, a xaagu ummatat qiden.
Sarrak Saawul silac Qastarot deqsittaamay Yallih aftok yaqbudeenihiyyah qibaada elle abaana'gidih xisen qarik addal heen. Raysa kaak Beet-San deqsitta magaalat maroh tan gasok bagut xakbisen.
Gilqad rasuk Yaabes magaalal yan mari, Filistiin-mari Saawuluk abem yoobbe waqdi,
keenik addak agiirah yan mari inkih yan bar Beet-San gufaana'gidih gexak xiinen. Wokke gufen waqdi, Saawul kee Saawul xayloh raysa gidaar baguk oobiseenih, Yaabes-magaala fan beeniih, tokkel carrisen.
Sarrak woo carrisen raysak raqte lafoofi gaabossa heeniih, woo magaalah addal ten saagantô gubal yoogoqen. Tohuk gaba kalla heen waqdi, kay rabih rookah malcina ayro soomuh asen.

Saawul rabek sarra, Dawud Qamaalek marak edde yeyse qeebik yuduureeh; Xiklag deqsita aracal namma ayro suge.
Nammayhaytoh ayrok wadiril furraynuh yan awkii, Saawul macaxi mafdagah luk suge aracak, amol siisa heeh rookak gexxaamah sara isik qanxiseh, yemeete. Dawud fanah yemeeteeh kay assakaxxiyyah qansah baaxo xagam fan baaxok bagul qununna 'ye.
Too waqdi Dawud, «Ankek temeeteeh?» kaak iyye.
Too awki iyyeemih, «Israayil mari macaxi mafdagah le aracak kudeh emeete» iyye.
Dawud, «Hay, xaagi macaay?» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi awki kaak iyyeemih, «Qaskar carbik kuddeh immay mango mari edde rabe. Saawul kee kay baxa Yonaatan kaadu too qeebit rabte» iyye.
Too xaagu yoobbe waqdi Dawud kaak iyyeemih, «Atu Saawul kee Yonaatan rabtem mannal tuble?» iyye.
Awki kaal gacseemih, «Gilbowaq qaleh amol suge waqdi, Saawul macaxul qekuh yaniih, naqboytit carbi edde aban gaariira kee faariisah amot gacca 'teh kaa fan amaatuk sugtem uble.
Tohuk lakal Saawul annah wagga hee waqdi, yoo yubleeh yoh seece. Too waqdi kaa fan emeete. Emeete waqdi,
‹Maa mari num kinnito?› yok iyye. Qamaalekih-yooboke-num kinniyom kaah warse.
Too waqdi yok iyyeemih, ‹Kaxxam mudduumeh rabam faxak, annah yol amay yoo qid› yok iyye.
Too waqdi rabi kaat xayim ubleeh, too waqdiik yinnikisseh rabu waam eexegeeh, kaal amma exceh kaa qideh. Amot luk suge dardaarinni-kalabta amok kaak kaleeh, kaadu carayat luk suge sookoyta kaak kalla heeh, yi amoytaw, ku fanah baahe» iyye.
Dawud toh yoobbe waqdi, kaxxam qaadeeh sara isik edde qanxise. Kay mari kaadu toh abe.
Sarrak kaxxa rookah rookiteenih weeqeenih, magrib tikka 'yam fanah, Saawul kee Saawul baxih raba kee Israayil mara kee YALLIH qaskaray qeebit rabtehiyyah rookah soomuh asen.
Dawud xaagu baahe awkak, «Ankeh num kinnito?» iyye.
Woo awkiiy «Yi abba Qamaalekih yooboke numuuy; dabqah elle nanim ku baaxo» iyye.
Dawud qagseh kaak iyyeemih, «Hay meqek, atu YALLI doore malik elle qiddu tilliilem manna?» kaak iyye. Sarra Dawud, «Abte umaane kol tuduureh, isih abte umaaneh isih warisseeh, YALLI doore malik, ‹Anu qide› 'yaanam inte» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi isi marih numuh secca 'yeh, «A awka qid!» iyye. Woo num kaa yootokeeh awki edde rabe.
Sarrak Dawud Saawul kee Yonaatan arkah boogiseeh iyyeemih,
«Israayiley, sin agiira elle tembexem,
sin abbobtiiy sin miracwa elle rabtemii,
sin baaxok qaleh amoy qeebi elle abeeni.
Agiirah ten labha rabteeh carbi beete.
Ken raba Filistiin-baaxol mawarsina.
Rabat keenik Gat magaalal mayaabinaay
Askeloonul gitak addal mawarsina.
Filistiin agbih qangaasal nee maabina.
Yalla sinniih diini sinni ken say xaylo,
nel africeey nel asuule ken kallaama.
«Gilbowaq qaleelaw, rob siinil rade waay!
Rob kee buqre ken booxaaxal able waynay.
A abaaro akah axceemih akah abamaa,
agiira le goobwa wanna maleh raqte.
Tohum qax-umaane kinnih waaga mali.
Saawuluk gob saliid duugo geyah mayan.
Yonaatan luk yen macaxi numut radek,
wadak manannaay; radek, qidak yene'kkal.
Cayla-leelah yen kay naqboytit qidak yen.
Saawul-seef selli hee week wadak mananna.
«Nanu Saawul kee baxi tiyat yabba innek,
addunyal anuk maqaane luk sugeenih;
addunyal anuk sahda ken kicinuk ten.
Rabal kaadu titta lih waklisak raben.
Sissikaaneh tikoh inna luk sugeeniih;
maqarah kaadu lubak inna luk yenen.
«Israayilih tooboke sayyoy oobbeyay!
Inkih boogisay rookita, Saawul rabah.
Qasa sara sin sarissem, Saawuluk ten.
Bilqah haak sugten bilaali kee dahabat,
sin bilqissem, Saawuluk ten; toh ixiga.
«Agiirah ten labha rabteeh carbi beeteeh,
Yonaatan raysi qaleh amol fidut yen.
Toobokoyta Yonaatanaw, yi kacnoytaw,
meqe qalla yo'lih luk ten; yoh muquk ten.
Atu afqadook yoh abtaah, yoh lito kacni
say numuh aban kacanuk aysuk raaqa.
Koh rookitak weeqah an, yi Yonaatanaw.
«Agiirah ten labha rabteeh carbi beeteeh,
ken silaacay luk sugeeni foyya yekke»
'yaanam axcuk keenih boogise. Sarrak Dawud ta arkah abe booge Yuudâ-rasih-marak, «Aliilih barita» iyye. Ta booge tunkuttubeeh, Yaasar deqsita kitaabih addal tan.

Waqlak wadir Dawud YALLAK, «YALLAW, Yuudâ-rasul tan magaaloolik tiyak teena fan maay gexo?» iyye.
YALLI, «Gexay daffey» kaak iyye.
Dawud, «Anni magaala fan gexo?» iyye.
YALLI «Cebron-magaala fan gex» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud Cebron-magaala fan gexeeh ginnaaqot le namma barra gabat bee. Gabat beem, Acinooqamay Yidraqelil tooboke kee, Nabalay Karmelil dabqah yenehiyyak raqte Abiigalak ten.
Tonnah kaadu, kaa'lih yen mara kee woo marih buxah mara gabat bee. Sarrak dabaaqah Cebron-magaalah xaqul tan magaaloolil gacen.
Yuudâ-mari Cebron kaal yemeeteeh, Dawud yuskuteenih isinni malik kaa aben.
Gilqad rasul ten Yaabes deqsitta magaalah mari Saawul yoogoqeh 'yaanam yoobbe waqdi,
Dawud tokke farmoh sinam ruube. Iyyeemih, «Isinni malik toogoqeeniih, digga le mara tekken. Tohuh YALLI barkat siinit haay.
YALLIH maqaane sin taafay; YALLI wakali siinih yakkay. Isin abten meqe taamak gexxaamah anu kaadu siinih amqeyyo.
Malikih siinik suge Saawul rabeh; yoh tu gactek, Yuudak rade mari isinni malik yoo abe. Taway siinik axceemih, agiira takkeeniih meysi cabtaanam siinil tan» inta farmo keenih ruube.
Dawud too farmo ruube saaku, Ner deqsita numih-baxay migaaqah Abner deqsitak yeneeh Saawul qaskarak abbah yenehiyya, Malik-Saawul xale Isboset deqsita num Ordon Weeqaytuk tabissi kaa heeh, Macnaayim deqsitta magaala fan kaa baahe.
Tokkel Abner, Gilqad kee Aaser kee Yidraqel kee Efrayim kee Benyam rasu kee inkih yan Israayilik malik kaa abe.
Isboset malik yekke saaku, qumrik morootumut yeneeh; malikih sugem namma sanatih gidek ten.
Yuudak rade mari, kaa hinna'mmay Dawud lih gace.
Dawud Cebron deqsitta magaalal malcina sanat kee garab malikih keenik suge.
Ayrok teena Abner kee Isboset gubal taamitak yen mari Macnaayim deqsitta magaalak, Gibqon deqsitta magaala fan gexen.
Xaruya deqsitta barrah baxay migaaqah Yowab deqsitahiyya kee, wohuk kalah tan labhay Dawud qaskarih abbobtih tenehiyya kaadu Gibqon fan gexen. Yowab, Dawud qaxat yen. Tokkel yan doral yongoorowen. Too dorak mariiy qaxal daffee.
Sarrak Abner Yowabak iyyeemih, «Sin mara kee ni marih addak furraynah tan qaskar doorru hayneh qeebih yayse mara nable'gidih tittat ken rubnay» iyye.
Yowab, «Meqeh hay» kaak iyye.
Too waqdii Isboset kee Benyam kedoh afak taban kee namma num dooreeniih, too taban kee namma num Dawud marak taban kee namma numut qeebih ruuben.
Kulli num isi numuk moyya xabba heeh, gileh salcet hee. Dawud mara kee gersi mari inkih baaxok bagul afah radeenih, edde raben. Tohuk gexxaamah too arac migaaqah «Gileela-Booxa» deqsitak raaqe.
Tohuk lakal kaxxa qeebi ken fanal yekkeeh; too qeebil Abner kee Israayil mari, Dawud marak gaceh.
Xaruyâ-xayloh sidoocuk Yowab kee Abiisay kee Qasahel tokkel sugte. Qasahel ardah segeeri gidek teneeh,
Abner yaybeebexe'gidih lakat kaak arduk gexe.
Abner wadir wagga hee waqdi, Qasahel kaa yabbixe'gidih lakak kaa yayraddem yuble. Too waqdi, «Ah koo Qasahelow?» kaak iyye.
«Yeey, Abnerow, yoo kinnih» kaak iyye.
«Kat, maabin. Lakak yoo mayraddin. Qaskarak numuk teena lakat eredaay faxxam kaak beet» iyye. Qasahel kay yab cineh lakak kaa yeyredde.
Abner kaadu qagseh, «Maabinay, yok raq! Gabat yok marabin. Koo qidda heeh ku toobokoyta Yowab fooca elle able inna luk maraaqak, yok raq» iyye.
Qasahel lakak kaak raaqu cineeh; too waqdi Abner gabat abbaxuk suge macaxih-dibaaro bagut kaak hee. Too macaxi darre le kabuk kaak yewqe. Qasahel baaxok bagul radeh edde rabe. Kay raysi qangalaylut elle yani'kke gufe mari tokkel elle sooleeh elle yeede.
Yowab kee Abiisay Abner lakat gexxe. Bari yekke waqdi, Amma deqsitta qale fan yemeeten. Amma deqsitta qale, Giyac deqsita aracak xaqut raqta qaley Gibqon rasuk sinam elle dago baaxo fan beya gitih xaqul geytinta.
Benyam-kedoh qallalle Abner hawah temeeteeh, qaleh amok qeebih bical gacte.
Abner Yowabah seeceeh iyyeemih, «A qeebik aade waynay inte inna? Aham ellecabol maqaanet macabta'mmay, ahaysa ku marak yoo makatayinay uduura intam aysuk manannaa? Maabinay yok raaqa. Kee yaalo! Akah nanim inki baaxoh marak» iyye.
Yowab too waqdi kaal gacseemih, «Yallay waara yok yaaxigeeh away yaabe wannitoy, yi mari maaci maacissa 'yam fanah lakak sin ayradduk suge raare» iyye.
Sarrak Yowab isi marak, «Ahaysa soola» 'yaanamih astah *baanta yoogore. Qeebi tohuk wadir sooleh.
Too bar Abner kee kay mara Macnaayim magaala gufaana'gidih kuulak xiinen. Ordon weeqaytuk qaxa gexeeniih, barat edde too weeqaytuk tabeeniih, saaku gexak maaciseeniih, sarrak too ayrot edde Macnaayim magaala gufen.
Qeebi yeedeek wadir Yowab isi mara inki ikkel gaaboyse waqdi, Qasahel sinnuk taban kee sagla num keenik waytimak suge.
Abner-maray Benyaamah yoobokehiyyak sidiica bool kee lactam num qideenih sugen.
Yowab kee kay mara Qasahel-lafa Beetlacam fan beeniih, tokkel kay buxah marih *kabrit kaa yoogoqen. Isinnihiiy inkih yan bar kuulak xinna 'yeenih, saaku maaci maacisam faxa waqdi, Cebron-magaala yimbiden.

Saawuluk raaqe buxah marih kabu yan mara kee, Dawud kabu yan marih fanat yakke qeebi mango sanootah akkuk suge. Dawud caylah aysuk yeyseeh; kay naqboytit boolaatak boolatte.
Dawud Cebroonul lab-xaylok leceey xale. Naharsi-baxi kaak migaaqah Amnon deqsitak yen. Too awki inak Acinooqam deqsitta barrah baxak ten. Kay ina elle toobokem, Yidraqel deqsitta magaalak ten.
Nammeyhaak xale baxi kaak migaaqah Kilab deqsitak yen. Too awkih ina kaadu Abiigal deqsitta barrak ten. Ta barra kaak dumal Nabal deqsita numuy Karmel deqsita aracal dabqah yenehiyya abbaxuk yen. Usuk rabe saaku gubnah elle raqte ikkel Dawud tet abite. Sidochaytô-baxi kaak migaaqah Absalaam deqsitak yen. Ta awkih ina kaadu Maqka deqsitta barrak ten. Tet abba Gasur deqsitta baaxoh malikik yeneeh; migaaqah Talmayi kaak axcuk yenen.
Fereyhaytô-baxi migaaqah Qadoona deqsitak yen. Kay ina migaaqah Caggit deqsitak ten. Konoyhaytô-baxi kaak Safatya deqsitak yen. Ta awkih ina Abiital deqsitta barrak ten.
Laceyhaytô-baxi kaadu Yitraqam deqsitak yen. Too awkih ina Qegla deqsitta barrak ten. Ta lica awki inkih elle yoobokem, Cebron deqsitta magaalak ten.
Saawul kee Dawud marih fanal qeebi bisoh gexak elle gexaamal, Saawul marih addat Abner qandeh aysuk yeyse.
Saawuluk raqte gubnay migaaqah Ayyá-Rixfa deqsittahiyyak ten. Too barra Saawul caggoh gubih caggoytak ten. Ayrok teena, Isboset deqsita Saawuluk raaqe baxi Abnerik malkite. Iyyemii, «Yi abbak raqte barra akah caraamissam macaay?» kaak iyye.
Abner toh yoobbe waqdi bagcarriteeh iyyeemih, «Kutay waqdiiy numut taba yoo maay takkale?» iyye. Kaadu qagseh iyyemii, «Ta saaku fanah ku abbak raaqe buxah mara kee kay ahli kee kay kataysis lih baguuk an. Dawud marak taham fanah gaci sin mahanniyo. Yooy tohut yanik atu a saaku, ‹Abner yi abbak raqte barrat fido faxe› 'yaanam yol haytaa?
YALLI duma Dawuduk, ‹Saawul kee Saawul-xaylok dardaarinna beyya heeh ku gabal heeyyo. Israayil kee Yuudâ rasuk inkih malik koo abeyyo› 'yaanam iyyeh yen. Anu taham inni gabal duudussa hee week, Yalli yoo bayisay» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Isboset qangara kaal magacsinnaay kaak meysiteh raaqe.
Sarrak Abner Dawuduy woo saaku Cebron deqsita aracal guubuh yenehiyya fanah farmo ruube. Iyyeemih, «A baaxo xiinisu waa abba tanim iyya takkale? Yo'lih bica haysitaay, tonnal inkih yan Israayil rasih marak koo aysiiseyyooh, ku qaxat ken raaqiseyyo» 'yaanamih farmo kaah ruube.
Too farmol Dawud kaak iyyeemih, «Meqeh, bica ko'lih abeyyo'mmay, naharak inki tiyal titta geynaama. Toh maa tiyaay intek, yi fan tamaate saaku Saawul baxá Miikal gabat yoh bahtaama» 'yaanam kaal gacse.
Isboset kaadu farmo ruubeeh iyyeemih, «Rihimih Filistiin marak bool numih komborih arab elle ecee Miikal yoh gacis. Miikal yi barrak, yoh gacis» kaak iyye.
Toh yoobbe waqdi Isboset tet abbaxuk suge numuy migaaqah Laysá-Faltiyel deqsitak yenehiyyah farmo rubbu heeh bahsiise.
Faltiyel, barra kaak Bacurim deqsitta magaala guffa haytam fanah weeqak tet katayak suge. Sarrak Abner, «Gexay, isi buxah uduur» kaak iyye waqdi yuduure.
Abner Israayil-abbobti fanah gexeeh keenik iyyeemih, «Dawud malik siinik yakkem mango sanootah faxxeenih sugteenik,
taway too nasiib geyteenihik, isinnik maruubina. YALLI duma Dawuduk iyyemii, ‹Dawuduy yi naqasuh yanih gabat Israayil ummattay yi ummattah tanihiyya Filistiin-mara kee kalah tan naqboytiitik ayyaaqeyyo› iyyeh yenek, ta saaku kaa doorita» keenik iyye.
Abner kaadu Benyam kedo lih too qaadat yaabeh. Sarrak Israayil marak tu cabe'kal, Benyam kedoh agantah edde cabtem, Dawuduh warsa'gidih, Cebron fanah gexe.
Abner labaatanni num wakalih is lih hayya heeh yemeete. Too saaku Dawud kaxxa qibnaytiino kaah abe.
Abner kaak iyyemii, «Taway Israayil mara ku gabah gacsa'gidih gexu waa. Oson ko'lih bica haysiteloonuh isinni malik koo abelon. Too waqdi faxak sugtem geettooh inkih tan baaxoh amoyta akketto» kaak iyye. Too waqdi Dawud num kaa xage waamih digga kaah warseh muquk kaa ruube.
Tohuk lakal Yowab kee gersi qaskar abbobti akah gexxeh sugte gaaduk tuduureeh, mango duyye dannabah gabat baahen. Cebron fan yemeeten waqdi, Dawud amaanah kaa ruubeemih sabbatah, Abner Cebroonul masuginna.
Yowab kee kaa'lih gexxe qaskar temeete waqdi, Abner malikil yemeeteeh malik amaanah kaa ruube 'yaanam yoobben.
Too waqdi Yowab malikil gexeeh iyyemii, «A abtem macaa? Abner kol yemeete waqdi, Gexay, kaa intee? Akke akah yemeetem, koo duquurusa'gidiiy atu gexxa'kke kee atu abtam wagta'gidi. Atu isih kinni num kaak taaxige way, anni'nnal gexay kaa inte?» iyye.
Yowab sarrak Dawud garik gexeeh, Abner lakat farmo ruube. Farmoh ruuben mari Abner Siira deqsita qeelih garik baahen. Dawuduh tu gactek, toh maabbinna.
Abner Cebron-magaalah-culmeyna gufe waqdi, Yowab giti qaxa garayah kaa beyam cella heeh gile bagut kaak hee. Abner, duma Yowab toobokoytay Qasahel deqsita qideh sugeemih sabbatah, tonnal rabe.
Dawud woh yoobbe waqdi, «Yoo kee yi mara Abner rabat gaba alle waynam YALLI neh yaaxigeh.
Abner-biili Yowab kee kay buxah mara yabbaxay. Boda kee baras kay durruyyat cabe waytay, caxxal rekitak gexa num keenit waytime waay. Carbi kee qulul ken cabe waytay» iyye.
Yowab kee kay toobokoyta Abiisay, Abner qiddeeh; akah kaa qideenim, Gibqon rasul yekke carbit toobokoyta keenik qideh sugeemih sabbata.
Tohuk lakal Dawud Yowab kee raqqa 'ye maray kaa'lih sugehiyyak, «Sara isinnik qanxisaay qabuudut gacaay Abner rabah rookita» iyye. Too saaku Malik Dawud isih ginaadak lakat gacca 'yeh gexe.
Sarrak lafa Cebron-magaalal yoogoqeeniih; too waqdi malik kaxxam weeqeeh; kay lakat ummatta inkih weqte.
Dawud weeqe waqdi, weeqah iyyeemih,
«Abner siftayti'nnah rabeh yan.
Too umaane faxxiimak mananna.
Gaboobi kaak toxeem manannaay;
iba kaak toxeem mananna'mmay,
umeynit qidde numih innal,
kaa qideenih; rooci kaak yewqe.
Usuk siftayti gurral rabe»
xarraqitak iyye. Too waqdi tokkel suge mari kaadu weeqeh.
Tohuk lakal tokkel suggu 'ye mari Dawudul yemeeteeh, «Ayro tan way maaqo ukumey» 'yeenih kaa kallacen. Takkay immay Dawud, «Yalli yoo qiday, bari yakkeemik naharat maaqo akme waamah» axcuk xiibite.
Toh keenik iyye waqdi, kaak yossokooteeniih; usuk abinnaan taama yikcineenih yenen.
Tohuk gexxaamah Dawud mara kee Israayil rasul suggu 'ye mari inkih Dawud Abner-rabat gaba aalle waam yeexegeenih.
Sarrak Dawud isi ummattak iyyemii, «A saaku Israayil rasul rabe num misliiy kaxxa num kinnim mataaxigaanaa?
Anu a saaku Yalli doore malik kinniyoh immay, boolaatem innik ableh an. Xaruyâ-xaylo yab yok taabbu cinteh; umam abe numul YALLI umam baahay» iyye.

Saawul baxi Isboset, Abner Cebron magaalal qideeni 'yaanam yoobbe waqdi, meysi kaat hayteeh, inkih yan Israayil mari kaadu wariggiteh.
Saawuluk raaqe baxi, kay gaadile warar abte waqdi, naqboytiitik midir buubte qaskar-abbobtik nammay luk yen. Ta qaskar abbobtih nammay migaaqah Baqna kee Rekab deqsitak yenen. Namma toobokoytak yeneenih; akah yoobokeenim, Benyam kedok ten. Ken abba Rimmon deqsita numuk teneeh, Beerot deqsitta magaalal dabqah yen. Beerot, Benyam kedo dabaaqah elle sugte magaalak ten.
Dumah teetil dabaaqah suge mari tet cabeh, Gittayim deqsitta magaala fan kuden. Tohuk wadir tokkel elle guubuh gacen.
Yonaatanak baxi raaqeeh, too awki namma ibak qelela luk yen. Abba kee kaxxa abba Saawul raba Yidraqel magaalak baahen saaku, barak koona karmat suge. Ibak elle biyaakitem, a xaagu toobbe waqdi, kaa abbaxuk sugte barra kaa tukkuqeh kudak sugte waqdi gabak teetik yuftuceeh, baaxol rade. Tohuk wadir namma ibak qelela luk raaqe. Migaaqah Mafiboset deqsitak yen.
Ayrok teena taaxige gaadileh abbobtih yen toobokoh nammay Isboset buxah gexen. Isboset laqo buxal silaalita waqdi yemeeten.
Qari afal kamadi faxak yemeete mara cella heenih Isboset elle yan qarik addal raden. Qari adda culen waqdi, Isboset qarkaytok bagul xiinit keenih suge. Too waqdi gile bagut kaak heenih kaa qideenih, isinnih salakka 'yeenih gexen. Moyya kaak kalla heenih gabat luk gexen. Inkih yan bar Ordon golok adda gacca 'yeenih kuulak xiinen.
Sarrak yirgiqen moyyay gabat baaheenihiyya Malik Dawuduy Cebron magaalal sugehiyyal yeceen. Too waqdi kaak iyyeenimih, «Saawuluy kok naqboytah sugeeh koo qidam faxak sugehiyyah baxih moyya bahneh, amah teetiiy; tonna'mmay ni amoytaw, YALLI, Saawul kee Saawul buxah marak cane koh gacsem ta saaku!» iyyen.
Too waqdi Dawud keenik iyyemii, «Duma Xiklag-magaalal suge saaku, Saawul-raba baahe num meqe xaagu yoh baahem akkaluk yemeete'mmay, too num xabba heeh, ‹Kaa qida› exceeh kaa qideenih. Usuk baahem yekkele meqe xaagih galtoh toh kaah abe. Hay, isin tu baahe wee numuy isi buxah addal xiinit yanil culla 'teenih kaa qiden. Annah tan umaane abten waqdi, siinil baahu waam mannah tanim siinit celtaa? Ta numut abten rabih caneh addunyâ bagul sin cabe waamah, waara YALLAY mango umaanek yoo catehiyyah migaaqal siinih xiibita» keenik iyye.
Tohuk lakal isi qaskarak, «A namma num qida» 'yaanamih amri yecee. Too qaskar Rekab kee Baqna qiddeeh, iba kee gaba keenik kalla heenih raaqe xagar magaalah addal yen dorih garil keenik takaren. Isboset-moyyaay beyya heenih too magaalal yen Abner-kabrih addat yoogoqen.

Tohuk lakal inkih tan Israayil kedooda Dawudul temeeteeh, kaak iyyeenimih, «Nanu ku lafaay, ku cadoyta kinninooh;
duma Saawul suge saaku carbi yakke way, ni marih foocat sugtem kook ten. YALLI kaadu isi mara miraacisah dacrisa abba koo abeleemih qahdi koh culeh yen» kaak iyyen.
Israayilik saqoltih yan mari toh axcuk Cebroonul kaal yemeeten saaku, Dawud kee Israayil ummatak saqoltih yen mari YALLIH foocal xagana tittah culen. Sarrak kaa yuskuteeniih; usuk tohuk wadir Israayil malik yekke.
Dawud malik yekke saaku qumrik soddomut yen. Sarrak malikih morootom sanat suge.
Cebron-magaalal suge saaku, Yuudâ-marak malcina sanat kee lica alsa malikih suge. Yarusalaam magaalal Israayil kee Yuudak inkih, soddom kee sidooca sanat malikih suge. Toh tittat morootom sanatah tamaate.
Dawud naharak Yarusalaam magaalal yabbaxu waa saaku, wokkel guubuh suge Yabuusa deqsita mari woo magaala qeebil keenik raaqiselem makkalinnoonuuy; tohuk gexxaamah kaak iyyeenimih, «A magaala cultu madudda. A magaalal taniimik dibuk inti-maleela kee iba-maleela kinni way koo culi mahayta» kaak iyyen.
Dawuduh tu gactek, Siyon qalel sugte megdebwa keenik raaqiseeh; tohuk wadir migaaqah Dawud-Magaala deqsitte.
Yarusalaam magaalah adda culta lee elle bicseenim, boolok addak boohaysen gablah innah yan aracay lee adda akak darah obtahiyya bicseenih yeneeniih; too lee magaalat maroh tan gasoh guba gacca 'teh too gablah addaak edde taade qeela fanah darah oobak ten. Dawud Yarusalaam magaala yibbixe saaku iyyeemih, «Yabuusâ maray inti maleela kee iba maleela akak iyyaanahiyya yi gide yanqibe num siinit yenek, woo leek adda gacca 'xicay gexay, woo maray yi naqboytiitih yanihiyya qida» iyye. Too ayrok wadir, «Inti-maleela kee iba-maleela qari cultu madudda» 'yaanam yaabah raqte.
Megdebwa teetik yibbixeenik wadir, Dawud dabqah teetil gaceeh, «Dawud-Magaala» 'yaanam migaaqah teetih yeyyeeqen. Naharak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta baaxoy ramma luk sugte missoysak baahak, tet dariifal magaala xisen.
YALLAY Nabaamak Naba Dagelta kinnihiyya Dawud lih yeneeh; tonna-leemik Dawud qandeh ayrook ayro aysuk yeyse.
Suur malikih yen Curam, doolat-abbobti Dawud fan ruube. Woo mara luk, sariidâ-coox kee, naggaarinnah cooxuk duyye bicsa mara kee, xeet-qarwah-xiso yaaxige mara, Dawuduh malik elle gaca qari xisaana'gidih, ruube. Too mari too qari kaah xise.
Dawuduuy, YALLI Israayil malik kaa abeeh, kay dardaarinna Israayil marih taagah fayya heem yeexegeh.
Cebron magaalak Yarusalaam fanah buxa yeyseerrek wadir, Dawud mango agabu caggoh luk yeneeh, tonnah kaadu, caggô-gubbih caggoh nikaacat le agabuk mangom luk yen. Lab-xaylok kee say-xaylok mangom xale.
Yarusalaam magaalal lab-xaylok xalem, Sammuqa kee Soobab kee Naatan kee Suleeman kee
Yibcar kee Alisuwaq kee Nefeg kee Yafiyaq kee
Alisamaq kee Elyadaq kee Elifalatak ten.
*Filistiin-mari Dawud malik yekke 'yaanam yoobben waqdi, mango qaskar haysitta heenih kay mabbuuxuh gexen. Dawud toh yoobbe waqdi, sasoh meqe arac elle geya'kke fan gexe.
Filistiin-mari Refaayim Golo deqsitta golo gufen waqdi elle yinfiddigen.
Dawud YALLAK fayu essereeh, «YALLAW, Filistiin-marat qeebi maay aboo? Qeebi keenit abek, nasri yoh maay acee litoo?» axcuk Yallal essero essere.
YALLI kaal gacseemih, «Yeeyik, keenik koo aysiiseyyok, gexay qeebi keenit ab» 'yaanam kaal gacse.
Too waqdi Dawud Baqal-Faraadim fan gexeeh, qeebi keenit abeeh, tokkel keenik yeyseh. Sarrak iyyemii, «YALLI yi naqboytit weeqi innah duufut bee» iyye. Tohuk gexxaamah too aracak migaaqah Baqal-Faraadim
Filistiin-mari kude waqdi, Yallih aftok aqbuduk sugen duyye elle cabeenih kuden. Sarra too duyye Dawud mari gabat luk gexen.
Filistiin-mari kaadu qagteh yemeeteeh Refaayim-Golol yinfiddigen.
Too waqdi Dawud kaadu qagseh YALLAK, «Maca aboo?» iyye. YALLI kaak iyyeemih, «Away elle tani'kkeek qeebi keenit maabinay; darre le kabuk maro keenit hayya haay, woo coox elle yani'kkeek qeebi abta'gidih bical gac.
Tokkek coox amook ibi maaqattah anay kol radu waa waqdi, qeebih gaba qid. Macaay intek, Filistiin-marak tayse'gidih, foocat anu kok gaceyyo» iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud YALLI kaak ab elle inxicca 'ye innal abe. Tohuk gexxaamah, Filistiin-mara Gabaq-rasuk xabba haanamaay Geser-rasuh amma 'yaanam salafak xiiriyak been.

Dawud kaadu qagseh Israayil rasul tan qaskarih addak soddom alfih qaskariitay doorehiyyak
foocat gacca 'yeh, Yallih Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug, Baqla deqsita aracay Yuudâ rasul yanihiyyak baaha'gidih, gexe. Woo Sandug migaq akak lem, Nabaamak Naba YALLAY dardaarinni-korsi akak galwa leemik daga le kabu raqtahiyya.
Woo Sandug, Abinadab deqsita numuy qaleh amol buxa luk yenehiyyah qarih addal suge. Tokkek beyya heenih qusba gaariy awurwa giitak beytahiyyal hayya heenih been. Abinadab xayloy migaaqah Qudda kee Acyo deqsitak tenehiyya woo gaari miraacisak teneeh; Acyo keenik foocat gacca 'yeh gexe.
Too waqdi Dawud kee Israayil ummattak wokkel sugga 'tem inkih, gital YALLIH massakaxxah kaa saarisakaay argaduk gexxe. *Begena kee kiraraay karambo kee giyaagib kee kakac inta duyye aagarukuuy YALLA saarisak yirgiden.
Nakon deqsita num luk suge aracay darok caffa elle baxsaanahiyya gufen waqdi, Yallih Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug elle yan gaari beyak sugte awurwa tondofoofoleh. Too waqdi Qudda deqsita num Sandug radaamak gabah yibbixeeh rade kaleh.
YALLI too waqdi bagcarriteeh; toh Quddah raba xalte. Ta rabi kaa akah yibbixem, Yallat luk suge baaqid sinna. Qudda tokkel elle, Yallih Qahdi addat akak yan Sanduguk garit rabe.
Dawud, YALLI bagcarriteh Qudda digaalem yuble waqdi, yinqibeh. Tohuk wadir too aracak Fares-Qudda
Too ayro Dawud YALLAK meysitak raaqeeh; «Ahaysa, YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug yi magaala fan beyam matakka» iyye.
Woo Sandug Yarusalaam magaala beyam mafaxinnaay, sarrak gexak suge gitak wadir enkeleelebba 'yeh, Yoobad-Edom deqsita numuy Gat deqsitta magaalal yoobokehiyyah buxa fan bee.
Too numih buxal too Sandug sidiica alsa suge. YALLI Yoobad-Edom kee kay buxah marat inkih barkat hee.
Malik Dawud Yallih Qahdi addat akak yan Sanduguk gexxaamah, YALLI Yoobad-Edom kee kay buxah marat barkat hee 'yaanam yoobbe waqdi, gexeh, woo Sandug Yarusalaam fan baahe. Gital too Sandugih-bahti kaxxam assakaxxayuk africuk yemeeten.
YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug quukah yabbixe mari, lica maaqattah gide foocah gexxa iyyen waqdi, Dawud, «Idiya» keenik iyyeeh, yeeden. Too waqdi Yallih migaaqal sadgatah awur kee nagay mulkuqusen rugaytu yusguude.
Sarrak Dawud, *baftak bicsen footay rikek tanihiyya ittikiyya heeh, YALLIH massakaxxah quuruk leemik yirgide.
Tonnal kaa kee Israayil ummat YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug qililisakaay *baanta aagaruk farcatat Yarusalaam fan baahen.
Sandug Yarusalaam magaala culsan waqdi, Saawuluk raqte baxáy, migaaqah Miikal deqsitak teneeh Dawud abbaxuk yenehiyya, taagatak afah wagga hayte. Too waqdi tet baqalay YALLIH massakaxxah wonnak annah kaqitaah, taahirik tan rigdoh yargidehiyya tuble. Toh tuble waqdi, «Ah tu'numuk tanih matan» 'yaanam niyal hayteeh kaa burutteh.
Sarrak Sandug baaheeniih, Dawud dumaak Sandug elle hoonuh sooliseh suge siraqih addat heen. Tohuk wadir Dawud YALLIH sadgatah cado akak carrisan saq qideeh, kaadu amaanah xiinaanamih asta takke'gidih YALLAH sadgat abe.
Dawud sadgatak gaba kalla hee waqdi, YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyyah migaaqal, tokkel suge marah inkih dooqa abe.
Sarrak Israayil marak lab-mara kee say marah inkih, gaqamboh ikke kee solal alaysen cadoh ikke kee, kafsen qinab-xaylok tu'baxa takkem keenih keefe. Tohuk gaba kaleenik lakal, kulli num isi buxah keenik gexe.
Sarrak Dawud isi buxah marah dooqa aba'gidih yemeete waqdi, Miikal qari afal kaah garayteeh, too waqdi kaak intemii, «Kamba a saaku Israayil amoytaw, kaxxam migaq is teymeeqe! Isi gubal taamita marih baxuuwuy ken naqoosah yanihiyyah foocal, duqur innah qasunuk is hayya hayteeh; kamba migaq is teymeeqeh!» kaak inte.
Dawud teetil gacseemih, «YALLAY ku abba kee ku tooboko kalla heeh Israayil malikih yoo heehiyyah massakaxxah argaduk sugem numma. YALLIH massakaxxah uxih argideyyo.
Anu wohuk muxxi abeyyooh, inni migaq aysammeyyo'mmay, ta baxuuwih intit kaxxa numuk loowimeyyo» teetik iyye.
Saawul-baxá Miikal maxalayto tekke.

Malik Dawud buxah isi qaril yeneeh; YALLI kaadu naqboytiitik inkih amaanah kaa abbaxuk yen.
Ayrok teena Dawud, Nabi Naatanak iyyeemih, «Anu akkel, akah table'nnah, innih sariidâ-cooxuk bicsen qarih addal ani'mmay, Yallih Qahdih Sandug uxih siraq addat yanik; ahak maca abam taysee?» iyye.
Too waqdi Naatan kaal gacsemii, «YALLI lih yanim kook; kot ceelinnaanim ab» kaak iyye.
Takkay immay too bar YALLI Naatan lih yaabeeh iyyeemih,
«Gexay yi naqasu Dawuduk intaamah, ‹YALLI, «Anu addat akak gacu waa qari yoh xissu waytam koo hinna» kok iyyah yan› kaak inxic.
‹Israayil mara Masrik eyyeeqeemiiy akke fanah qarit magaciyyo. Kulli way siraq addat sugeeh, aracaak arac too siraaqat gexak suge.
Israayil mara lih mango safar abe'mmay, ahaydumah Israayil abbobtiy innih reedisehiyyak, «Qibaadâ-Qariy sariidak bicseenihiyya macah yoh bicise waytan?» akak exce abba mayyu›.
«Tonna'mmay taway yi naqasu Dawuduk intaamah, ‹YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya kok iyyaamah, Edde sugte illi duwak kalla koo heeh, Israayil ummattak inkih abba koo abe.
Atu gexinnaan ikke ko'lih gexak suge. Atu fooca fanah akah gutuqta'nnah, naqboytiitik qeebil koo aysiisuk suge. Uxih a addunyah bagul kaxxa migaq-gexxo le marak kaxxihii, kaxxa migaq kot heeyyo.
Israayil ummattay inni mara abehiyya, sinam keenit xukkute'kal, elle gacoonu waan aracal ken nookiseh an. A baaxo culeenim kee akke fan umeynit qeebi keenit abak sugte'mmay, ahak wadir woh gaba kalele. Koo kaadu naqboytiitik amaanah raaqiseyyooh, buxa innih koh xiseyyooh, ramad kok aymaggeyyo.
Atu rabtaah isi kaxxa abbobti lih tamoogoqu wayta saaku, ku xaylok numuk teena malikih heeyyooh, kay reeda qande bahsiiseyyo.
Qibaadâ-Qari yoh xissu waytam, ku xaylok too numu. Kay reeda baxak baxal akah raqta'nnah abeyyo.
Anu innih abba kaah akkeyyooh; usuk kaadu baxi gideh yok gacele. Umam abah kaa ublek, abba baxa elle digaala'nnal kaa digaaleyyo ikkal,
Saawuluy atu arac akak raaqissehiyyak akah abe'nnah, abak suge cato kaak margiqa.
Ramad kok mabayaay, ku ramad kee ku doolat elle raaqeleeh, kulli way waarele› kaak inxic» iyye.
Sarrak Naatan amma 'yeh Dawuduh YALLI ta wacyil kaak iyyem warse.
Tohuk lakal Malik Dawud siraq adday YALLA-elle-yaqbudeenihiyya culla 'yeeh, tokkel daffa 'yeh fayla kee dooqa abe. Iyyeemih, «YALLAW, Mulki le Dageltaw, anu a axxul le maqaaney yoh abtehiyya geyam caddik le num hinniyo. Yoo kee yi buxah marak atu neh abteh tan maqaane, ni caddik fulta maqaane.
YALLAW, Mulki le Dageltaw, a saaku inkinnah duma neh abteh sugte maqaanek giffa 'ta maqaane neh abte. Yi ramadah kaadu sarrî dabaanal abtu waytaamat yabteh. Sahdaytu luk haysitta angaaraw tama'nnak tanih tan!
Yooy ku naqasuh yanihiyya isih taaxigehik, anu maca axco!
Aham, atu xagnisseeh isih yoh faxxeemiy yoh abtu waytaama. Tah inkih yoh akah abtam, ku gita yoo barissa'gidi.
YALLAW, Mulki le Dageltaw, ku nabna celtam matan. Ku bis lem matan. Yalli dibuk koo kinnim dumaak aaxaguk sugne. Yalli dibuk kooy; kok sah Yalli mayana.
Israayil ummattay isi mara abta'gidih naqoosinnak teyyeeqehiyyah bis le doolat addunyâ-bagul matan. Atu keenih abte kaxxa taama ku migaq addunyâ-bagul fayya hayte. Ku maray duma Masril edde suge naqoosinnak teyyeeqehiyya, qeebil bisoh gutuqak elle yamaateenimil, ken taagah wokkel suge mara baaxok teyyeeqeeh, Yalla 'yeenih aqbuduk sugen duyye baaxok kalteh.
YALLAW, Israayil mara isi maray way ayxeere waytahiyya abteeh; atu isih Dagelta keenih tekke.
«Dagelta kinni YALLAW, yooy ku naqasu kinni kee yi marah culte xagana xagur. Abeyyo intem neh ab.
Tonnal ku migaq antaabbeleeh; sahda inkih, ‹YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya Israayil ummatak amol yan› 'yaanam axcele. Yi dardaarinna kaadu baxak baxal ku foocal raaqa dardaarinnay baye waahiyya abetto.
YALLAW, Israayil dooreh, Nabaamak Naba Dageltaw, ‹Buxa innih koh xiseyyooh, ramad kok aymaggeyyo› 'yaanam yok inte. Tonna-leemiik a dooqa edde aba niya yot gacte.
«YALLAW, Mulki le Dageltaw, atu Yalla kinnito. Yooy ku naqasu kinnihiyyah muxxo le xagana culteh tani'mmay, ku qangara digga le qangara kinnim aaxigeh.
Yok radda inteemih reeda baxak baxal akah raqta innah, isi barkat keenit hay. YALLAW, Mulki le Dageltaw, tah kaadu atu isih xagana akah culteemi. Tonna-leemiik, atu elle inte innal, yooy ku naqasuh yanik radda 'ya marat barkat kulli way heettom aaxigeh» 'yaanam iyye.

Waqla suggu 'yeenik lakal, Malik-Dawud Filistiin-marat qeebih qagteeh keenik yeyseh. Elle sugen baaxo keenik raaqiseh, abbootan keenik kale.
Tohuk lakal kaadu Mooyab marak yeyseh. Sarrak carbit yibbixe mara baaxok bagul deerih ken hayya heeh, akatal ken kiyassa heeh, sidoc-sidoc yakke marih addak namma-namma num keenik beyak ken qide. Tohuk wadir Mooyab-mari kay gabat gaceh, gabbara kaah acayuk yenen.
Sarrak kaadu Suuriyah rasuk Xooba deqsita aracal malikih suge Hadad-Qeder deqsita numuy Racob deqsita numih baxak yenehiyyat qeebi abeeh kaak yeyseh. Hadad-Qeder, Furaat weeqaytuk daga raqta exxat raqta baaxo gacsa'gidih, gexak suge waqdi,
Dawud alfi kee malcina boolih qaskaritay faras amok qeebi aba kee, ibi qaskarak labaatanni alfih num kaak yibbixe. Woo faarisik bool takkem gaari edde beyaana'gidih raaqiseeh, raqqa 'te faariisak xukcuunul yiggileeh iba waysiise.
Dabaaqah Damaskol yen Suuriyah mari, Malik Hadad-Qeder catoh qaskar ruubeeniih; Dawud qeebil labaatanna kee namma alfih takke qaskar keenik qide.
Sarrak Damaskoh-rasih addal isi qaskar hee. Tohuk wadir too mari kay gubat gaceeh gabbara kaah agdayuk raaqe.
Dawud qeebi elle abinnaan ikkel YALLI nasri kaah yecee.
Malik Hadad-Qeder gubal ten doolat abbobti luk sugte mango goobuy dahabak bicseenihiyya carbit keenik raaqiseeh, too gooba Yarusalaam magaala fan guure.
Kalah kaadu, Hadad-Qeder abbah elle suge namma magaalay Betac kee Berootay deqsittahiyyak mango nacaas bee.
Sarrak Hamat-rasul yen malikiy Tooqi deqsitahiyya, Dawud, Hadad-Qeder qaskarak inkih yeyseh 'yaanam yoobbe waqdi,
isi baxay migaaqah Yooram deqsitahiyya kaal ruube. Too baxak iyyeemih, «Naharak, ‹Salaamata kok iyye› kaak inxicaay, sarrak ‹Unkaq kok iyyeh, Hadad-Qederik qeebil teyseemi kok iyye› kaak inxic. A duyyey dahab kee lakqo kee nacaasak bicseenihiyya gabat kaah beyaay, ‹Mattacoh koh ruube› kaak inxic» iyye. Hadad-Qeder mango waqdi Tooqi deqsita malikit qeebi abak suge.
Malik Dawud too duyyey too malik kaah ruubehiyya YALLIH qibaadah tuxxiiqit elle assa innah abe. Tohuk kalah Edom kee Mooyab kee Qammon kee Filistiin kee Qamaalek deqsita maray qeebil akak yeysehiyyak dannabah orbise dahab kee lakqo, ta duyye lih hayya heeh, YALLIH qibaadah tuxxiqit elle assa innah abe.
Qasbô-Golo deqsita aracal Edom marak taban kee bacra alfih num qidda heeh yuduurek wadir, migaq kaak antaabbuk yontoobbe.
Sarrak inkih yan Edom rasul isi qaskar hee. Tokkel suggu 'ye mari kay gubat gace. Dawud elle gexinnaan ikkel abinnaan qeebil, YALLI nasri kaah acayuk yen.
Tonnal Dawud inkih yan Israayil rasuk amoyta yekkeeh, abbah akak yan mara inkih cakki kee qadaalatat xiinisak suge.
Yowabay Xaruya deqsitta barrah baxak yenehiyya qaskarak inkih abbah yen. Aciilúd-Yacoosafat deqsita num tikka intem yaktube numuk ten.
Aciitúb-Saaduk deqsita num kee Abiyatáar-Acimalek diini abbootan luk yenen. Seraaya deqsita num kaadu malikik kutbe-abeenah yen.
Yoyadáq-Banaaya Dawudut dacayrih tan qaskarih

Ayrok teena Dawud iyyeemih, «Malik Saawul buxah mari, tanim maay le? Yeneenik, ken catam faxa. Woh akah axcem, Yonaatan yok kataysak yen» iyye.
Saawul buxah mari, Xiba deqsita taamâ-num luk yeneenih, Malik Dawud too numuh farmo ruube. Sarrak Xiba yemeete waqdi, Malik Dawud, «Atu Xiba innaa?» kaak iyye.
Usukuuy, «Yeey, Xiba kinniyoh» kaak iyye.
Malik Dawud too waqdi kaak iyyemii, «Saawul buxah marak tu tenek, yoh warisey. Keenik tu tenek, Yalli yoo akah cate'nnah, anu kaadu ken catam faxak» iyye.
Xiba annah kaak iyye, «Yonaatanay Saawul baxah yenek lab-baxi raaqeh; usuk iba-maliiy migaaqah Mafiboset deqsita» kaak iyye.
Malik Dawuduuy, «Usuk ankel yan hay?» kaak iyye.
Xiba, «Qammiyél-Makir deqsita num lih, Lodabar deqsita mandaral yan» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Malik Dawud Mafibosetih farmo ruube.
Mafiboset yemeete waqdi, Dawudut abeh yan assakaxxiyyah, foocal qansah baaxo xagam fan qununna 'ye. Dawud, «Mafiboset akak 'yaanam koo?» kaak iyye.
Usukuuy, «Yeey, yi amoytaw» iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud kaak iyyem leh: «Yok mameysitin. Ku abba yok kaxxa kataysak sugeemih sabbatah, koo catam faxak. Ku kaxxa-abba Saawul luk suggu 'ye baaxo inkih koh gacseyyo. Atu kaadu a saakuuk xabba haanam yi buxal adoobittaama» kaak iyye.
Mafiboset qagteh qansah baaxo xagam fan qununna 'yeh, «Gadda gey, yi amoytaw» iyye. «A yooy rabe kuti bis le kassitteemih, gadda gey» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Malik Dawud Xibah nammeyhaak seeceeh, annah kaak iyye. «Mafibosetih malik Saawul buxah mari luk suggu 'yem inkih aceeh an» iyye.
«Kooy ku xaylo kee koh taamita marak inkih kay baaxo abqurettoonuuh, kay daro afiiletton. Tonnal kay buxah mari maaqo geele. Mafibosetih tu gactek, usuk kulli way yi buxal adoobitele» kaak iyye.
Xiba, «Meqeh yi amoytaw, atu yok intem abeyyo» iyye. Xiba lab-xaylok taban kee konooy luk yeneeh, kaah taamita marak labaatanna takkem luk yen.
Tohuk lakal Mafiboset malik buxal hununuh too malik xaylo takme maaqo akamuk yen. Xiba kee kay buxah mara Mafibosetih taamiteenih, baaxo kaah yubquren. Mafiboset maaqoh malik buxal gaceemih sabbatah, Yarusalaamal elle yeede. Kaak namma ibi inkih diglo luk yen. Usuk Miika deqsita lab-baxa luk yen.

Waqla suggu 'yeenik lakal, Qammon rasih malikih yen Nacas rabeeh; kay baxay migaaqah Cannun akak iyyaanahiyya kay aracal malik yekke.
Dawud too malikih raba yoobbe waqdi, «Usuk meqem yoh abeemih, anu away kaadu kay baxah amqeyyo» iyye. Sarrak kaah le bagi maqaane kaah warisu waa mara Nacas baxah farmo ruube.
Too mari Qammon deqsitta baaxo gufe waqdi,
Qammon marih abbobti malikik inteemih, «Amoytaw, away Dawud a mara akah ruubem, nummah ku abbah assakaxxiyyah kot celtaa? Ku abbah taqdiyyah ken maruubinnay; sarrak qeebil nek akah yayse innah, ni magaala elle tani'nna gibittaay cubbussa heenih gexaana'gidi» kaak iyyen.
Cannun too yab yoobbe waqdi, Malik Dawud ruube marak debenik gambi mollaay, sartanay edde sugeenihiyya xiiqarel keenik qanxissa heeh ken xiiriye.
Too marat toh tekke waqdi, isinni baaxol woo ceelot yaduureenim kaxxa wacarriy keenil tekke. Dawud a xaagu yoobbe waqdi, «Annah buxa fanah maaduurinay, deben siinih ubukka 'yam fanah Yerikô-magaalal suga» 'yaanam keenih ruube.
Sarrak Qammon mari, Dawud naqabu xaamiteenim isinnik yeexegen. Tohuk gexxaamah, Suuriyah baaxok Beet-Racob kee Xooba deqsitta namma rakaakayak labaatanni alfi qaskariita lakqot bahsiisen. Tonnah kaadu, Toob rasuk taban kee namma alfi qaskariita kee, Maqka deqsitta baaxoh malik kee alfi qaskariita lakqot bahsiisen.
Dawud tah yoobbeeh, too waqdi qeebi keenit aba'gidih, elli haah yan qaskarak Yowab foocat hayya heeh ruube.
Qammon-mari qeebih fooreeh, inaytâ-magaalah keenik tan Rabba deqsitta magaalak culmeynat qeebi akak aboonu waan aracal gacen. Suuriya kee Toob kee Maqkah marah tu gactek, magaalak irol yan arac yibbixen.
Tohuk lakal Yowab, naqboytit-qaskar fooca kee salafak gacca 'teh qeebi keenit abtu waytam yuble waqdi, Israayil qaskarak inkih tayse qaskar doorru heeh, Suuriyah qaskarat fooca kee foocah eyseddi hee.
Raqqa 'te qaskarak Abiisay deqsita kay toobokoyta abbah akak hayya heeh, Qammon-qaskarat foocah raaqa arac ken yiysibixe.
Too waqdi Yowab toobokoytak iyyemii, «Suuriyah mari qeebil yok yaysem tublek, catoh yoh amaatetto. Qammon mari kok yaysem ublek, catoh anu koh amaateyyo» iyye.
Kaadu qagseh kaak iyyeemih, «Agiru tikay digga xic. Ninni mara kee ni Dageltih magaalah nagay yan qeebi abnaama. Ellecabol YALLI isih loowem akkele» iyye.
Yowab kee kay mara qeebih dadahte waqdi, Suuriyah mari kudeh.
Suuriyah mara kudah yublen waqdi, Qammon mari kaadu Abiisayak yoowweeh, magaalah adda culen. Toh yuble waqdi Yowab Qammon marih qeebik raaqeh, Yarusalaam fan yuduure.
Suuriyah mari Israayil-marak gaceenim isinnik yublen waqdi, qaskarak elli haanamah seeco aben.
Malik Hadad-Qeder, Suuriyah maray Furaatak darre le kabul sugehiyyah seeco abe. Too mari Ceelam deqsita arac fan yemeeten. Qaskar abbah keenik tenem, Soobak deqsita numuk ten. Soobak Xooba rasul malikih yan Hadad-Qeder qaskarak abbah yan numuk ten.
Malik Dawud ta xaagu elle gee'kkel, Israayil qaskar gaabossa heeh Ordon weeqaytuk woo qaxa raqta exxal Suuriyah qaskarat fooca kee foocah gacca 'yeenih qeebi elle aban arac ken yibbixsiise. Tohuk lakal qeebi radeeh,
sarra, Suuriyah qaskar wadir-wadirih toowwe. Too waqdi Dawud kee kay mari, Suuriyah qaskarak malcina boolih numuy gaari farasak qeebi abahiyya kee, morootom alfih qaskariitay faaris amok qeebi abahiyya qiden. Soobak deqsita numuy keenik qaskar abbah yenehiyya xaaguqal raaqeeh, sarrak carbi booxal elle rabe.
Malik Hadad-Qeder gubat sugte malikwa Israayil mari carbil keenik yeysem yoobben waqdi, ken lih bica haysiteeniih ken gabah gacen. Tohuk wadir Suuriyah-mari Qammon-mara carbil cataanamak raaqen.

Ciggiila sugum adday dardorti xeflih qeebih edde gexxahiyyat, Dawud, Yowab kee kalah tan qaskar abbobti kee Israayil qaskar qeebih ruube. Oson Qammon maral umam baaheenih, qaskarak qeebih yeyseeniih; Rabbay inaytâ-magaalah keenik tenehiyya maraasiyya heenih yabbixeenim faxen. Dawud isih magexinnay, Yarusalaam magaalal elle raaqe.
