Ayrok teena Dawud carra waqlat xiinik ugutta 'yeh, isi qarih amol yewqe. Wokkel booxah yan aracal wonnak annah gexak suge waqdi, barra kaqalah yuble. A barra kaxxam qax muquk ten.
Tonna leemiik malik is kinni sahdayto yaaxigem faxe. Too waqdi farmoh num ruubeeh, woo num, «Tet migaq Batsabaqa. Abba teetik Alyamaay; tet ginnaaqot tabbixem, Uriyya deqsita numuy Ciitah yoobokehiyya» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud tet baahu waa mara ruubeeh, woo mari gexeh tet baahe. Tohuk lakal Dawud fido teetit faxe. Isiiy wasaktuk too waqdi kaqalteh sugteh. Sarrak isi buxah gexxe.
Waqlak wadir teedeqem isik tubleeh, wohim Dawuduh warissa'gidih farmo kaah rubte.
Toh yoobbe waqdi Dawud gaadi abbah yen Yowabak, «Ciitah yooboke Uriyya yoo fan rub» 'yaanamih farmo ruube. Yowab too farmo kaa gufte waqdi, Uriyya kaa fan ruube.
Uriyya yemeete waqdi, Dawud xaagu kaak abeeh, «Yowab kee qaskar mannah taniih? Carbi manna siinil leeh?» iyye.
Too xaaguk gaba kale waqdi, «Ahaysa, isi buxah gexay cawalak iba kaqalsitay offof» kaak iyye. Uriyya malik buxak yewqeh gexe waqdi, Dawud, buxah mattaco lakal kaak ruube.
Takkay immay Uriyya buxah magexinnay, malik gasol dacayrih tan qaskar elle xinta aracal ken lih xiine.
Dawud Uriyya buxah gexe weem yoobbe waqdi, kaah secca 'yeh, «Mango waktih buxal masugittok, buxah macah gexe wayte?» kaak iyye.
Uriyya kaal gacseemih, «Israayil kee Yuudâ mari qeebi booxal yaniih, Qahdih-Sandug kaadu wokkel ken lih yaniih, tonnah kaadu, carbi abbah yok yan Yowab kee, kay gubal tan qaskar abbobti gubbik bagul tan way, maaqo kee maqubuh buxah gexaah, inni barra lih xiinam anni'nnah abaah? Yi amoytaw, tannah taniimit ase wayu waamah ku gabal xiibita» 'yaanam iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud, «Hay, wonnal a saaku akkel elle assa inteh, xinna maacissa intek wadir, beera woo carbi booxa fan koo ruubeyyo» 'yaanam kaak iyye. Tohuk gexxaamah Uriyya woo saaku kee bar elle aseeh elle xiine.
Too waqdiiy Dawud afxagoh kaa arcibiseh kaa yiskirise. Takkay immay too bar kaadu xiinih buxa morbinnay, malik gasot dacayrih tan qaskarih aracal xiine.
Maaci maacise waqdi Dawud Yowabah yuktube warkat kaal yeceeh, «Tama warkat Yowabal bey» kaak iyye.
Yowabah yuktube farmô-warkat annah axcuk ten. «Qeebi rada waqdi, Uriyya qeebi elle qilsim table ikket qaskarak foocat kaa hay. Too waqdi qeebit akah raba'nnah edde kaa cabba haay, isinnih wadir kaak iissa 'xica» 'yaanam heeh yen.
Tohuk lakal Yowab kee qaskar magaala tabbixe'gidih maro magaalat haan waqdi, Uriyya, qaduwwi-qaskaray kaxxa agiirah tanihiyya edde ten aracat kaa hee.
Tokkel qeebi rade waqdii, qaduwwi-qaskar edde sugte aracak eweqqa 'teeh, Yowab-qaskarat qeebi abte. Too waqdi Israayil qaskarak tu takkem rabteeh; too marih addat Uriyya kaadu edde rabe.
Tohuk lakal Yowab woo qeebi elle yekke'nna warissa farmo Dawuduh ruube.
Woo farmo elle ruube numuk iyyeemih, «Carbi elle tikka 'ye'nna Dawuduh warissu wayta waqdi,
Dawud bagcarritta 'yeh, ‹Magaalat kaxxam xayyowwa 'teenih qeebi akah abteenim macaa? Magaalak gidaarat xaquh gacca 'yeenih gaysê-baxat siinit heeloonum mannal teegemen?
Duma Abimalik elle qiden inna kassa mahannitoonuu? Barra Teebex deqsita aracal gidaar amook eceyya kaat hayteeh, too eceyyat edde rabe.
Farmoh ruuben num Dawud fan yemeeteeh, Yowab kaak elle inxicca 'ye'nnal, carbi elle yekke'nna kaah warse.
Iyyeemih, «Qammon qaskar qandeh nek umuk sugteeh, qado-booxal nee yabbaxoonuh fooca kee foocah net yemeeten. Takkay immay wadir, akak yemeeten magaalak culma fanah, xiiriyak ken gacisne.
Sarrakaay magaalat maroh tan gidaaraak gaysê-xaylo net heeniih, qaskar abbobtik tu nek qiden. Uriyyay ku qaskariitah yenehiyya qiden marat qiden» iyye.
Toh yoobbe waqdi, Dawud kaak iyyeemih, «Yowabak ‹Aytikum› inxicaay, ‹Tekkeemit masakkitin. Qeebi yakke waqdi qeebit rabu waa num, num mayaaxiga. Away qeebit quuruk culaay, magaala ibbixa› 'yaanam kaak inxic» iyye.
Batsabaq tet baqli rabem toobbe waqdi, arka tet tibbixe.
Rookak gaba kalte waqdi, Dawud, «Yi qari am» 'yaanamih farmo teetih ruube. Sarrak digibih tet abiteeh, lab-baxa kaah xalte. Takkay immay YALLI Dawud abem yinqibeh.

YALLI, Dawud abem yinqibeemih sabbatah, nabi Naatan kaa fan ruube. Naatan kaa fan yemeeteh, kaak iyyemii, «Namma num inki magaalal tene iyyen. Numuk teeni keenik gaddalih yeneeh, akitti baacoytak yene iyyen.
Gaddalih yan num mango illi kee laa luk yen.
Baacoytah yan numuh tu gactek, inki anaqtoy xaamite luk yene iyyen. Too num too anaqto, baxáh innal, amo akak wagitak isi buxal isi xaylo lih tet yeynebe. Maaqok isih yakme maaqo is lih tet adoobisak, isih elle yaaqube kobbaayak lee tet afaquk tet qarisak yene iyyen. Xiin kinni-way amô-ginah isi carayal tet xiinisak yene iyyen. Hununuh kacanuh sammok xalen baxáh gide teetih assalluk yene iyyen.
Ayrok teena qibnayti gaddali buxa yemeete. Taaxige gaddali, yemeete qibnaytuh isi saqak lac qidam cabba heeh, taaxige miskinti-anaqto beyya heeh qibnaytuh yusguude.»
Naatan tama ceelallo kaah warissa hee waqdi, Dawud a gaddali abem yoobbe waqdi kaxxam bagcarrite. Iyyeemih, «YALLAY waarahiyyah nabnal xiibitaah, tah rabi akah yaguude numuk tanih tan» iyye.
«Racmat sinnih annah tan umaane abek wadir, beyyi heemih gide affara adda yagdiyem kaal tan» iyye.
Too waqdi Naatan kaak iyyeemih, «Hay, tonnah tanim abtem koo!» kaak iyye. Qagseh, «YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyak farmo koh abbixe. YALLI kok iyyaamah, ‹Israayil malik takke'gidih koo dooreeh, Saawul kol baahe raareemik innih koo cateeh,
kay midir kee kay agabu koh ecee. Yuuda kee Israayil rasuk inkih malik koo abe. Aham koo xiqe wannah, namma adda a gid takkem uxih koh osise raare.
Hay, yi amri cinna hayteh makkook isi amril taamitte. Yi garil annah tan gacta taamat akah assem macaay? Uriyya qiddem Qammon mara'mmay, wohim elle takke'nna bicissem koo. Uriyya barra isih haysitte.
Yoo hawwenna hayteh, Uriyyâ-barra isih abitteemih sabbatah, ku ramad carbi gadda akkele› 'yaanam YALLI kok iyya.
Qagseh kaadu kok iyyaamah, ‹Ku buxah marak addak umaane koo abbixele. Isi namma intih abalih, ku agabu kok kalla heeh, kol xayi numih gabal heeyyo. Too num qado-laqo sahdak foocal fido keenit faxele.
Atu abte umaane uqurat abte'mmay, anu taway kok axcem gubbik bagul inkih yan Israayil mari elle yable'kkel kot absiiseyyo› 'yaanam YALLI kok iyya» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud nabi Naatanak iyyeemih, «Anu nummah YALLAL dambi baahe» iyye.
Sarrak Naatan annah iyye. «YALLI dambik qafu koh iyyeh raba mabta.
Takkay immay away abteemil YALLA bursutteemih sabbatah, away xalte baxi kok rabele» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Naatan isi buxah gexe.
YALLI, Uriyyâ-barra Dawuduh xalte baxat lakima ruube.
Too waqdi Dawud, baxi kaah qaffoota'gidih, Yalla kallace. Maaqo afah xagu cineeh, kulli bar isi qari culla 'yeh qarik baaxal deerih gacca 'yeh, elle maaca fan sugak yen.
Buxal kaxxa taamat yen maray kaal xayuk raaqak yenehiyya kaal gexak, «Ahaysa ugutay akkek kat» 'yaanam kaak axcuk yeneeniih, woo aracak kaa ugsaanam faxak yenen. Takkay immay usuk toh keenik mango adda cineeh, maaqo kaadu ken lih akamuk mananna.
Ayyaamak lakal woo awki rabeeh, too waqdi kay buxal taamat yen mari woh kaah warsaamak meysiteh. Oson sittak iyyeenimih, «Awkal rooci anih, kaal lih yabnem oggolak masuginnak, away ‹Baxi kok rabe› 'yaanam kaak innek, abu waam iyyi yaaxigeh yaniih? Ah kaah warisnek, tuk teena isil baaham takkeh» iyyen.
Dawuduh tu gactek, tutuc axcih ken yuble waqdi, awki rabem yeexegeeh, «Awki maay rabee?» keenik iyye.
«Yeey, rabeh» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi Dawud woo elle suge qari-baaxak ugteeh, kaqalla 'yeh amo filla heek lakal, edde suge sarak katta 'yeh meqe sarat gace. Tohuk lakal YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril YALLA yaqbude'gidih gexeeh, tokkel YALLA yuqbude. Sarrak isi buxah yuduureeh, buxa gufe waqdi, «Maaqo yoh baaha» iyyeeh, maaqo kaah baaheeniih; yokme.
Kay buxal taamat yen mari ah yuble waqdi kaak iyyemii, «Awkal rooci yen saaku kaah weeqakaay, maaqo cinak sugteh; awayay awki rabehiyya ugutta 'teh maaqo akah takmem waagisnehik macaay?» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi keenil gacsemii, «Nummah awki rabe'kah yen saaku maaqok soomuh gaceh weeqeh; woh akah abem, ‹YALLI yoh racmateleeh, awka rabak yoh catam takkeh› 'yaanam bagut ascubuk suge.
Awayah tu gactek, awki rabeh yanik, macah maaqo cinaah? Rabak kaa gacsam maay duudaa? Ahaysa anu kaa fan gexeyyo ikkal, usuk yol magaca» 'yaanam iyye.
Tohuk lakal Dawud isi barray Batsabaq deqsitta, baxi raba akah hawwenta'nnah, tet ruffa haamat gaceeh, fido teetit faxe. Is bagut kaah haysitteeh, lab-baxa kaah xalte. Dawud woo baxak migaaqah Suleeman iyye. YALLI woo awka yikcineeh,
nabi Naatanak iyyeemih, «Ama yooboke awkak migaaqah Yadidya inxic» 'yaanam iyye. Wohuk maqna YALLI yikcine numu 'yaanama. A migaq, YALLI kaa yikcineemih sabbatah kaah yeyyeeqe migaaqa.
Tohut yanin waqdi Yowab, Qammon-marak inaytâ-magaalah gaadut yeneeh, malik elle suge caafat teetik yibbixe.
Too waqdi Dawuduh farmo ruubeeh iyyeemih, «Rabbâ-magaalak leeh arac ibbixeh gabat raaqiseh ani'mmay,
taway qaskarak raqqa 'tem gaabossa hay magaala tabbixe'gidih am. Anu a magaala usuk raaqise yok 'yaanam mafaxak, amay isih ibbix» 'yaanam kaah ruube.
Dawud too farmo yoobbe waqdi, qaskarak elli haam gaabossa heeh Rabbâ-magaala fan gexe. Too magaalat qeebi abeeh yibbixeh.
Qammon mari yalla iyyeh aqbuduk suge Milkom deqsitta ceeloh amot suge dahabak bicsen kalabta bee. Too kalabta miizaanal heen waqdi, qilsah soddom kee koona kiilo akkuk ten. Woo kalabtah bagul bilqah qax-meqe xaa yeneeh; Dawud too xaa beyya heeh isi kalabtah addat hee.
Magaalal suggu 'ye mara yeyyeeqeeh, miisaar kee maataka kee godmat daadur bicisa keenik iyyeh ken dirkise.

Toh tekkek wadir waqla gexxe. Dawud baxi Absalaam digibe wayte qax-meqe maqanxá luk yen. A awká migaaqah Tamaari deqsitak ten. Dawuduk gersi baxay Amnon deqsitahiyya Tamaari yikcine.
Kaxxam tet yikcineeh, tet kacanuh lakimah aracal gace. Tamaari bikrit teneeh; tonna-leemik Amnon tet geelem makkalinnaay, tohuu biyak kaal tekke.
Takkay immay Amnon, Yonadab deqsita qammih-baxa kataysah luk yen. Yonadab-abba, Simqa deqsita Dawud saqalak ten. A qammih baxi kaxxa cubbi kee wale luk yen.
Qammih baxak iyyeemih, «Ale yaalo! Malik baxah tan way, kulli saaku cisab kol takkem macaay? Sugay tanim macaay? Yoh warisey» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Amnon, «Toh kinnim koh warisu waah, yi abbah baxa Absalaama lih ina kee abba le Tamaari deqsitta awkáh kacani yoo yibbixe» kaak iyye.
Yonadab too waqdi kaak iyyemii, «Tonnal abtam hay! Gexxa 'xicay qarkaytol qaxah gacay lakmissam cel. K'abba kot boysita'gidih yamaate waqdi, kaak intaamah, ‹Ku maganak, yi maqanxá Tamaari maaqo yoh abta'gidih yoh rub. Anu tet elle able'kkel, is maaqo yoh bicissaah, isih afat yoh haytam teetik faxak, tet yoh rub› kaak inxic» iyye.
Amnon «Meqeh» kaak iyyeeh; kataysa kaa elle yescesse'nnal, lakmisam cella heeh qarkaytol gace.
Malik tah yoobbe waqdi, kaat boysita'gidih gexe. Kaal yemeete waqdi, abbak iyyemii, «Ku maganak Tamaari maaqo yoh abta'gidiiy anu tet elle able'kkel isi gabak yoh bicisse gaqamboytay kaxxam meqehiyya isih afat yoh haytam faxak, tet yoh rub» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Tamaari Malik-Dawud buxal sugteeh; farmo teetih ruube. Teetik iyyeemih, «Amnon-buxa gexay, maaqo atu kaah bicis» teetik iyye.
Too waqdi is Amnon fan gexxeeh; tokkel usuk qarkaytô bagul qaxah teetih suge. Too waqdi arquseenih sugen qagina bahha hayteh arqusseeh, sarrak usuk tet elle yable'kkel gacca inteh gaqambo kaah bicisse. Woo gaqambo alassa hayteh,
usuk yakme'gidih distik eyyeqqa hayteh kaah bahte. Takkay immay usuk yakamu cineh. Too waqdi kaa'lih yen marak inkih, «Gexa» iyye. Too mari inkih gexe.
Too waqdi teetik iyyemii, «Ama gaqambo a qarkayto fan annah yoh baahay, isi gabaak afat yoh hay» teetik iyye. Gaqamboyta ugussa hayteh kaa fan bahte waqdi, xabba tet heeh is fanah hirigga tet heeh, «Amay a qarkaytol yo'lih gac» teetik iyye.
Too waqdi kaak intemii, «Kat bas qaybih tanim maxcin, yi toobokoytaw! Tahah yoo madirkisin. Tah Israayil addal abeh umaamak kat. Uma-taamah yoo magorrisin» kaak inte.
Qagisseh, kaak inteemih, «Ah yot tikka 'teh, elle raaqa'kke mayyuuy; atu kaadu ahat assek, Israayil rasul qaybit radettom ixigay. Ahamat assaamak, ku maganak malik lih yaabay. ‹Tet yoh ab› intek, yoo koh abelek, ku maganak ahak raq» kaak inte.
Usuk tet yaabat baaqid mahanna. Caylah teetih aabbuk manannaay, tonna-leemiik teetik yeyseh tet cayliseh.
Tet geek lakal uma'nnah tet yinqibe. Duma kacanuh teetih assalluk suge'nna, naqabuh teetih yesselle. «Kat ugutay, buxak yok eweq» teetik iyye.
Is kaak intemii, «Magexa. Away yoo ruubaanam, yol bahteh tan umaanek lafitta umaane kol akkelem ixig» kaak inte.
Takkay immay Amnon tet yaabat baaqid mahannay,
buxal kaah taamita numuh secca 'yeh, «A barra foocak yok kal. Wonnah afah tet eyyeeqay qari teetit alif» kaak iyye.
Tama num afah gutuqak tet yeyyeeqeeh, qari addak teetit alfe.
Too waqdi Tamaari xer kameesiy namma gaba xeerihiyya xagarat luk ten. Woo dabaanal wonnah yan sartan haytam, digibe wayte malik xaylok ten.
Tohuk lakal Tamaari gombod amol isik caxxeeh xagarat le kames qanxisseeh foocal namma gaba isik hayya hayteh weeqak gexxe.
Tet toobokoyti Absalaam ah yuble waqdi iyyemii, «Amnon koo maay caylisee? Yi maqanxáy, bas, ahimih manneeqebbin. Usuk abba ko'lih le ku toobokoyta'mmay, aham atu gersi marah mawarisin» teetik iyye. Tohuk wadir Tamaari Absalaam buxal gacteeh, tokkel teetit tekkeemih dibuukitteh, maxhaxxeh.
Malik Dawud ah yoobbe waqdi, kaxxam bagcarrite.
Absalaam kaadu Amnon kay maqanxá cayliseemih sabbatah, kaxxam kaa yinqibeeh, afti yab kinni way kaa'lih luk mananna.
Namma sanatak lakal, Absalaam Baqal-Caxor deqsita aracal illik xagor kalam faxe. Baqal-Caxor, Efrayim magaalal xayi aracak ten. Too ayrot malik xaylok, «Num raaqe waay tokkel qibnaytiino siinih abak yol ama» iyye.
Dawud fan gexeeh kaak iyyemii, «Illik xagor kalam faxak, woo ayro koo kee ku gubal taamitta doolat abbobtik wokke qibnaytiinoh yol amaatetton» kaak iyye.
«Aleey, yi baxaw, nanu inkih woo arac nakkeemiik nemeetek, wonni qibnaytiinol koo biyaakele» kaak iyye.
Absalaamah tu gactek, kaat qagamqagseh, «Tamaateenim meqe, yi abbaw» iyye. Malik, «Aleey yi baxaw, neh mataqabin immay abtam kol tamqay» iyye.
Absalaam too waqdi abbak iyyemii, «Hay meqek, ahaysa bas Amnon yamaatay inxic» kaak iyye.
Malik Dawuduuy, «Kaa akah sectam faxxam macaay?» iyye.
Takkay immay Absalaam qagamqagisak, «Kaa faxa» axcuk kaa kallace. Sarrak Dawud Amnon kee kay tooboko inkih wokke gexxam keenih oggoleh.
Tohuk lakal Absalaam malikih taguude xigla bicse.
Kay taamat yan marak iyyemii, «Amnon kaxxam yaskirem tablen waqdi, cubbusak suggu 'xicay; anu amri siinih aceeyyok, isin kaa qida. Mameysitina. ‹Macah kaa qiddeeniih?› siinik iyya mari yenek, yoo liton. Labha tikaay, tamahal namma kalbi mahana» keenik iyye.
Absalaam taamat yen mari, usuk keenik elle inxicci iyye'nnal, Amnon qideenih. Too waqdi raqte toobokok kulli numuuy isi bakilit koreh kude.
Oson buxa gufe'kal gitat yanin waqdi, Dawuduk iyyeenimih, «Absalaam, xaylo kok qideeh ku xaylok num maraaqinna» iyyen.
Too waqdi malik sollu 'yeh sartan isik qanxiseeh, qari-baaxal afah rade. Kay buxal taamita kay mari kaadu sara isik qanxise.
Too waqdi kay saqlih baxi Yonadab kaak iyyemii, «Malikow, oson ku xaylo inkih maqidinnoonuy, rabtem dibuk Amnoonu. Absalaam ahat asu waam, Amnon kay maqanxá Tamaari caylise saakuuk foocal qellisak mananna.
Tonna'mmayii xaylo inkih kok qideenih iyya marih xaagu maabbin. Rabtem dibuk Amnoonu» kaak iyye.
Oson tohut yanin waqdii, Absalaam woo arac cabeh kude. Sarrakaay dacayrih suge qaskariiti butta yakke mari Coronyim qaleh gitaak amaatih yuble. Too waqdi woo qaskariiti malikil gexeeh yublem kaah warse.
Yonadab Dawuduk iyyemii, «Too tamaatem, ku xaylooy; oson amaate loonu 'yaanam kok exceh suge» kaak iyye.
Yonadab tah inxicci 'yeh gaba kale waqdi, Dawud xaylo temeeteh. Kaxxam boogisak qari culen. Dawud kee kay gubal taamita doolat mari too waqdi kaadu inkih weeqah hayya heen.
Absalaamah tu gactek, Qammihud baxa Talmayi
Wohuk elle ugte'kkel, Absalaam maxhax kaa yibbixe.

Yowab, Malik Dawud Absalaam waytik gexxaamah kaxxa maxhax yibbixem yuble waqdi,
kaxxam bagi cubbi le barray dabqah Takooqa deqsitta magaalal tenehiyya kaa fan ruube. Woo barrak iyyemii, «Dawud fan gex. Gexxa way rookat sugte barra ceelay, qatri mahaysitinay, mango udduruh rookitak sugte barra ceelay kaal gex. Sarrak kaa fan tamaate waqdi, anu taway kok elle inxicca axce'nnal kaak axcetto» teetik iyyeeh, intu waytam warissa teetih heeh tet ruube.
Too yaabal taaxige barra malikil gexxeeh, kay massakaxxah baaxo qansah xagtam fanah qununna inte. Sarrak, «Yi malikow, ku cato faxak emeete» inte.
Malik Dawud, «Catoh maca faxak temeeteeh?» teetik iyye.
Too waqdi kaak intemii, «Yi amoytaw, yi baqli rabeh yaniih, gubna kinniyo.
Lab xayloh nammay luk suge. Too urri, ken kalkaala mari elle deedala arac, qeebih titta beeniih; tiyak teeni too qeebit yok rabe.
Taway hay, yi amoytaw, yi mari inkih qaduwwi yok yekken. ‹Awka qide awka caneh qidna'gidih nel kaa bah› yok iyyen. Ta awkay raaqehiyya keenil eceek, baxa maleh raaqu waah aniih, inki baxay niyah luk sugehiyya yok qidaanam faxan. Ken abba ramad maleh cabaanam faxaana'mmay, tahak tuk teena yoh inta'gidih kol emeete» inte.
Too waqdi malik teetik iyyeemih, «Atu isi buxah uduuraay; a caagid anu innih bicseyyo» teetik iyye.
Barra kaak intemii, «Atu abba haytaamah qellat yoo kee yi buxah maral gacay. Qellatah koo kee ku buxah mara akak barih raaqetton» inte.
Too waqdi malik qagseh teetik iyyeemih, «Koo meysiisa mari yenek, yol baahaay, wadiriik koo mataqbisan» iyye.
Is kaadu qagisseh kaak inteemih, «Yi malikow, raaqe baxa caneh yok qidam faxa numuk uma biilu yoo catettoomuh, YALLAY ku Dageltah yanih migaaqal xagna yoh acuy» kaak inte.
Dawud teetik iyyeemih, «Ku baxal dagoohim baxa kinni way num baahu alliile wayu waamah, YALLAY waarahiyyah migaaqal koh xiibita» teetik iyye.
Too waqdi kaak intemii, «Inki qangara ko'lih yaabu waa, yi malikow» inte.
«Meqehik, yaabit» teetik iyye.
Too waqdi kaak intemii, «Atu annah yan qellat Yallih maral macah bahtee? Isi baxay marin baaxol yanihiyyak uduura maxcinnito. Away inteemil isih isil mekeltem deqsitta.
Nanu, caxitte lee innal, wadir manaduuraay inkih rabah nan. Takkay immay Yalli marin baaxo megloh gexe num elle yaduure gurra kaah bicsa'kkal, kaa maqida.
Taway hay, yi malikow, ummat yoo meysisseemih sabbatah, kol emeete. Yoh tu gactek, malik yi yab oggole le 'yaanam niyal hee.
Anu axcem aabbeleeh, yi baxa qidam faxa numuy Yalli neh yecee baaxok nee yayyaaqem faxahiyyak nee catele 'yaanamah niya kol heeh emeete» inte.
Qagisseh kaadu intemii, «Yi malikow, atu Yallih malaykattih gideey, umam kee meqem tittak baxissu dudda. Tonna-leemik, malik yoh culu waa xagni yoo catele, 'yaanam inni afqadol heeh emeete. YALLAY ku Dagelti kinni ku qaxa yakkay!» inte.
Too waqdi malik teetik iyyemii, «Inki qangara koo esseru waak, nummat yo'lih yaabe mantuu?» teetik iyye.
«Yi malikow, faxxa haytam yoo esserit» kaak inte.
Teetik iyyemii, «Aham kok inxica intem Yowab maay kinnii?» iyye.
Too waqdi barra kaak intemii, «Away atu yol esserta esserok elle asillime'nna mayyu. Aham yok inxica intem kaa kinniimih ku gabal xiibita. Ta yab afat yok haytem kaa kinnih» inte.
Qagisseh intemii, «Yowab tah akah abem, away yan caalat gitah gacsa'gidi. Yi malikow, kasah Yallih malaykah inna litoh takku waytam taaxigeh» inte.
Sarrak, malik Yowabah secca 'yeh; yemeete waqdi, kaak iyyeemih, «Atu faxxem takkayik, gexay Absalaam bah» kaak iyye.
Yowab malik-massakaxxah baaxok bagul qununna iyye. Sarrak malikih dooqa abe. «Yi malikow, koo esserem yoh oggolteemih sabbatah, ku intit kaxxa num ekkem aaxigeh» iyye.
Waqalak wadir kaa baaha'gidih, Gasur fan gexeeh; Absalaam gabat hayya heeh wadir Yarusalaam fan yuduure.
Takkay immay kaa baahen waqdi, malik iyyemii, «Absalaam isi buxal gacaama; yi inti kay inti able waytaama» iyye. Tohuk gexxaamah Absalaam dabqah isi buxal gaceeh, too ayrook wadir abbat mangoorowinna.
Israayil baaxol qax-maqaaneh Absalaam innah yan num mananna. Amok xagortaay ibak lifiqih amma 'yaanam cooca luk mananna.
Amô-xagorti kaak kaxxam manguk yeneeh, sanatal inki adda tet argaquk yen. Xagorti kaak kaxxam yanbeh yaxxeere waqdi, qilsah namma kiilok fula akkuk yen. Woh elle timixxigem, woo dabaanal malik buxal qilsi duyye elle keexak sugen miizaanak ten.
Absalaam lab-xayloh sidoc kee say-baxá luk yen. Baxá migaaqah Tamaari deqsitak ten. Is kaxxam qax-muquk ten.
Absalaam malikih ambullee'kal namma sanat Yarusalaamal suge.
Sarrak, Yowab fanah farmo ruubeeh, «Yi abba fanah farmo kol ruuba'gidih yoo guf» 'yaanam kaah ruube. Takkay immay Yowab kaal mamatto. Absalaam kaadu qagseh gersi farmo kaah ruube. Yowab kaadu too farmol maamattinna.
Too waqdi Absalaam is lih taamita taamat le marak iyyemii, «A yi buqrek garit tanim, Yowab buqreey; gabru deqsitta daro kaah yoobokeh yanik, gexay gira kaak edde ruuba» keenik iyye. Oson gexeenih woo buqret gira ruuben.
Too waqdi Yowab Absalaamal yemeeteeh kaak iyyemii, «Ku mari buqret gira yok akah ruubem macaay?» kaak iyye.
Absalaam kaal gacsemii, «Anu ama 'yaanamih farmo koh ruubeeh mamattito. Tohuk gexxaamah, ‹Gira edde ruuba› keenik exce. Malikil gexxa 'teh, anu Gasuruk akke fan akah emeetem, yoh kaak essertam kok faxe. A baaxo amaateemik, wokkel elle aadem yoh aysuk ten» kaak iyye. Yab tokket mayseedinnay bisoh beeh, iyyemii, «Away malikit angoorowem faxak, kaat elle angoorowe'nna yoh bicis. Hoxissem yoo tekkek, usuk raba yol yackumay» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Yowab Malik-Dawudul gexeeh, Absalaam kaak inxicca iyyem kaah warseh. Too waqdi malik, Absalaamah ama 'yaanamih farmo ruube. Absalaam kaal yemeeteeh qansa kaak baaxo xagtam fan massakaxxah qunuune. Malikiiy fugga kaa heeh kaa arcibiseh.

Tohuk lakal Absalaam faariisa kee faariisat giitak beyan gaari bicsiteeh, toh lih kaadu kontom yakke maray dacayrih kaat gacu waahiyya haysite.
Saaku-saaku dibroh ugutta 'yah, magaalak akak yawqen giti afal soolak suggu 'yah, wokke malikil cokmi goranah amaatinnaan marah seecak yen. «Mankek temeeteenih? Maa kedoh toobokeenih?» keenik axcuk yen.
Woo mari akak yemeete'kke kaah warsa waqdi, «Tableeni labhay! Yab siinih iyyah yani'mmay, malik isi aftok hee maray yab siinih gitat abu waahiyya mayan» keenik axcuk yen.
Yab tohut aysaadayuk manannaay, axcuk yeneemih, «A saaku anu cokmaabak sugiyyoy, abaluk tenen. Sarrak tu waa num yanuu, tu edde tekke num yanuu, yi fanah siinik yamaatay, anu yab qadlit keenih kureyyok» 'yaanam keenik axcuk yen.
Sahda kaal tamaateeh, assakaxxiyyah amo ramma kaah haanam faxan waqdi, keenik yookomeh matarra keenih iyyah aliilit ken xabba haak ken fugutak yen.
Absalaam kulli Israayilih yooboke numuy malik yab keenih kura'gidih malikil yemeetehiyyak tonnah abak yen. Tonnal mango mara isi qaxat hee.
Absalaam affara sanatih gide wonnah abak sugeek lakal, malikik annah iyye. «Anu Suuriyal Gasur deqsitta magaalal en saaku YALLAK, «YALLAW, Yarusalaam yoo gacissek, Cebron-magaalal koo aqbudeyyo 'yaanamal YALLAH nadri culeh en. Tonna leemik YALLAH cule nadri aba'gidih gexam faxak, yoo rub» kaak iyye.
Malik Dawud, «Wagri ko'lih yanayik, gex» kaak iyye. Too waqdi Absalaam Cebron fan gexe.
Takkay immay wokke gufe waqdi, Israayilih ubukka 'ye marah inkih farmo ruubeh iyyemii, «Baantah anay taabben waqdi, anay fayya haay, ‹Absalaam Cebron-magaalal malik yekke› inxica» keenik iyye.
Absalaam, yo'lih gexa akak iyye maray Yarusalaamak Cebron magaala fan kaa'lih gexehiyya namma boolih gide akkuk yen. A mari usuk isi bagul malsem aaxaguk manannaay, tu aaxige'kal kaa'lih gexen.
Usuk sadgat kabuk teenak abeeh, kabuk teenak kaadu Giilô-magaalal yan Acitoofal deqsita numuy Malik Dawuduh fayu acayuk yenehiyyah farmo ruube. Waqlak wadir malikil malsen mala digga baahak bahteeh; Absalaam kataata mari amagguk yemegge.
Num Dawuduh farmo baaheeh, kaak iyyemii, «Israayil mari Absalaamak, ‹Ku kabut gacennooh ko'lih rabenno› 'yaanam axcuk yenen» iyye.
Too xaagu gee waqdi, Dawud, kay gubal taamita maray Yarusalaam addal yanik iyyemii, «Absalaamak nasillimeemi. Xayuk ugutay nee beya. Woh abe waynek, kaa kee kay mari amaateleeh, num macabaanaay, magaalal sugu waa mara inkih selelon» keenik iyye.
Too mari, «Amoytaw, atu nek aba intem abenno. Meqeh» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi malik, kay gubal taamita doolat mara kee isi buxah mara gabat hayya heeh, daqaarime. Kay caggoh gubih caggoh nikaacat yabbixe agabuk taban buxa dacrisa'gidih elle cabe.
Malik kee kay mara magaalak eweqqa 'yeenih ellecabot yen qari gufen waqdi sollu iyyen.
Kay gubal taamita mari kaadu sollu 'ye. Too waqdi kaat dacayrih tan qaskar kaal taturteh foorte. Sarrak laca boolih numuy duma Gat-magaalak kaa'lih temeeteh sugtehiyya kaadu kaal taturteh gexxe.
Malik Dawuduu, Ittay deqsita numuy Gatak yemeete marih abbah yenehiyyak iyyemii, «Atu ne'lih magexinay uduur. Kimal yemeete qibnaytu kinnito ikkal, anu innih gexa'kke maaxigak, inni lih koo mameekisa. Qusba malik lih baaxol elle raq. Isi mara gabat beyaay uduur. YALLIH maqaane koo taafay; YALLI wakali koh yakkay» kaak iyye.
Ittay kaal gacseemih, «Gexinnaan ikke ko'lih gexeyyooh, rabtek ko'lih rabeyyoomuh, YALLAY waarahiyyah migaq kee ku manol xiibita» iyye.
Too waqdi malik kaak iyyemii, «Meqeh hay, wohoysa titta lih gexenno» kaak iyye. Too waqdi Ittay is kee isi mara kee buxâ-mara luk foore.
Dawud kataata mari foore waqdi, ummatta weqteh. Sarrak Dawud kee Dawud-mara Kidroon deqsita buyyik sinam elle dago baaxo fanah haysiten.
Sek-Saaduk kee Leewih yooboke maray Yallih Qahdih Sandug akkuquk baaheenihiyya kaadu yemeeten. Woo Sandug daffessi heeniih, magaalak sahda inkih taturtam fanah akkuqe'kal sugen. Sek-Abiyataar kaadu wokkel ken lih suge.
Tohuk lakal malik Saadukuk iyyemii, «Qahdi-Sandug magaala fan gacis. YALLI meqem yoh faxek, tet able'gidih is elle yok raqta arac ayrok teena yoo gacsele.
Usuk yoo faxe week, isih faxem yok abbaasitu waa kaak; Qahdih-Sandug gacis» kaak iyye.
Tohut macabinnay kaadu qagseh Saadukuk, «Koo kee Abiyataar, ku baxa Acimqax kee Abiyataar baxa Yonaatan gabat beyay uduura. Amaan sin lih yanay.
Yi tiyah tu gactek, isin tu elle tani'nnih farmo yoh rubtaanam fanah, bacarih tan baaxol Ordon weeqaytu akak taban tabeenah garil sugeyyo» iyye.
Too waqdi Saaduk kee Abiyataar, Qahdih-Sandug wadir Yarusalaam fan gacisseeh, tokkel elle yeeden.
Dawud ‹Madeera-li Qale› deqsitak ten qale boogisak yewqe. Too waqdi ib-qassih yeneeh, amot saro heeh yen. Kaa'lih yen mari yakkeemiik kaak kaxxih amô-sara isik hayya heeh, woo qale kaa'lih boogisak yewqen.
Dawud, «Acitoofal Absalaam marat yengele» 'yaanam yoobbe waqdi, YALLA kallaceeh, iyyemii, «YALLAW, Acitoofal fayu foyya ab» iyye.
Dawud qaleh amoy Yalla elle yaqbudeeni gufe waqdi, aamanuk yen kataysay migaaqah Cusaay deqsitaah, Qarka deqsita gulubuh aabakuk yenehiyya gee. Cusaay Dawudut tekkeemih sara isik qanxiseh yeneeh, amol ballaaqe luk yemeete.
Dawud too waqdi kaak iyyeemih, «Akkel yo'lih gactaamah yoh xiqtam mantu.
Takkay immay Absalaam fan uduuraay, kaak intamaa, ‹Anu ku abba digga luk taamitak akah suge'nnah, koh kaadu taamiteyyo› kaak inxic. Tonnal Acitoofal yecee fayu oggole ken kaletto.
Sek Saaduk kee Sek Abiyataar wokkel taniih; Absalaamak aabbinnaan xaagu too seekah waris.
Acimqax kee Yonaatan deqsitta ken xayloh nammay wokkel yaniih; xaaguk geyya haanam keenil yoh ruubeloonuk, keenih waris. Toh kaxxam yoh xiqele» kaak iyye.
Cusaay toh kaak oggoleeh, too waqdi woo magaala fan yuduure. Absalaam kee kaak, mariiy kabuk magaala inki adda culen.

Dawud qaleh amook, qunxuum addah ooba waqdi, garciik Xibat yongoorowe. Xiba Mafibosetih taamita numuk ten. Xiba, namma boolih gaqamboyta kee, kafsen qinab-xaylok bool gaqamboyta kee, bool yakke caxâ-miru kee qinabak bicsen kamrik kiben saar, koori le danoonak nammayay cixut yabbixehiyyal eerra heeh baahe.
Malik Dawud, «Ahak inkih maca abta'gidih bahte?» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Xiba kaal gacseemih, «A danoona ku buxah mari edde gexa'gidih baaheeh, gaqambo kee caxâ-miru labha takme'gidih keenih baahe. Qinabak bicsen kamri, bakarroytah tan baaxol gexok cawalan waqdi, yaaqubeeni'gidih keenih baahe» iyye.
Malik Dawud, «Ku abbah baxih baxi maca abe?» iyye.
«Usuk Yarusalaamal elle raaqe. Akah raaqem, ‹Israayil mari yi kaxxa abbah dardaarinna yoh gacsele› 'yaanam niyal heeh, tohuh raaqe» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi malik, Xibak iyyemii, «Mafiboset luk suggu 'yem inkih kuumu» kaak iyye.
Xiba too waqdi, «Anu ku naqasu kinniyok, koo ruffa haa num yoo abay» iyye.
Malik Dawud Bacurim gufe waqdi, Simqi deqsita num kaah garaye. Simqi Saawuluh ramad luk yeneeh; kaak abba Gera deqsita numuk ten. Usuk Malik Dawud yuble waqdi kaa abaareh.
Kaa kee doolat maray kay gubal yanihiyyat xeet hee. Dacayrih tan qaskar kee kay mara Dawud maraasiyot abbaxuk tene'mmay, too num tohuk mameysitinnay, xeet keenit hee.
Tohul macabinnay, «Kee gex wonnah! Gex wonnah biileenaw, sarreenaw!
Saawul luk suge amoytiinu isih haysitteeh, kay buxah marak mangom qiddeeh; away YALLI koo akah digaalam wohu. YALLI atu luk sugte amoytiinu ku baxa Absalaamah yecee. Biileena kinnitok, a gibdaabini kot yekke» axcuk, xaafu kee abaaro inkih kaat abe.
Abiisay deqsita num ah yuble waqdi, Dawuduk, «Yi amoytaw, a kuta is xaafi macah haytaa? Gexeh moyya kaak kalay yoo m'inta?» kaak iyye. Abiisay-ina Xaruya deqsitta barrak ten.
Malik too waqdi Abiisay kee kay saqalah yan Yowabak iyyemii, «Xaruyâ-xayloy, ah sin wagitta qaada hinna. Usuk YALLI kaak yot aba iyye xaafu yot abbaasitaamah, YALLI ah macah kaak aba, intu talliilem miyyaay?» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Dawud Abiisay kee kay gubal taamita doolat marak iyyemii, «Inni sammok xale baxi yoo qidam faxa way, isin a numih xaafu macah waagissan? A xaafu kay afat haytem YALLA. Tonna-leemik yanay kaa inxicaay, aba xaafu abitay kaa 'xica.
YALLI yot tekke umaane yubleh, a umaaneh aftok maqaane yol oobisam takkeh» keenik iyye.
Tohuk lakal Dawud kee kay mara abak sugen gexoh gexen. Simqih tu gactek, oson gexan qalek ragidik iroh raqqa iyyeh ken katayak, xaafu kee abaaro keenit abakaay, xeet keenit haakaay bullaaqe keenit rifak suge.
Dawud kee kay mara Ordon weeqaytu gufte waqdi, kaxxam cawaleenih yeneeniih; tonna-leemik tokkel elle yoffoofen.
Absalaam kee kaa'lih suge mara inkih Yarusalaam magaala culte. Acitoofal kaadu woo magaala ken lih cule.
Dawuduk kaxxa kataysah yen Cusaay deqsita num Absalaam yuble waqdi, anay fayya haak, «Ani hay malik. Ani haay malik» iyye.
Absalaam toh yoobbe waqdi, «Dawud kaxxam koo aamanuk yen way, kaal maktee? Kaa'lih macah gexe wayteeh?» kaak iyye.
Cusaay kaal gacsemii, «Woh mannal takkee? Anu YALLI dooreeh, a mara kee inkih tan Israayil-ummatta doorte num lih an. Anu ko'lih gaceyyo.
Yok amol suge numih baxa taamite week, wohoysa iyya taamitam takkalee? Ku abba taamitak akah suge'nnah, koo taamiteyyo» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal Absalaam Acitoofal fan ufkunna 'yeh, «Away akkel maca abnam tayseeh? Macal nee fayissaah?» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Acitoofal kaal gacsemii, «Gexay ku abba caggô gubih caggoh nikaacat yabbixe agabuy isi qarit dacayrih cabehiyyat fido fax. Tonnal Israayil baaxol eneyya 'ya mari inkih, ku abbak naqboyta isik abtem aaxigeloonuuh; koo kataya mari kaadu wonnal agiiritele» iyye.
Too fayu kaak yukkuqeeh; sarrak Absalaamah malik qarik amol siraq heeniih, kulli num kaa akak yable'kkel, Absalaam woo siraq culla 'yeh abbah caggot fido faxeh.
Woo dabaanal sahda Acitoofal fayuh aba axcinnaanim Yalli afat kaak hee yab akkaluk yenen. Duma Dawud toh akkaluk yeneeh; Absalaam kaadu toh yekkele.

Tohuk lakal Acitoofal Absalaamak iyyemii, «Kot bictek, taban kee namma alfih num doorru heeh, a bar Dawud lakat gexeyyo.
Usuk yecleh niya kaak radda waqdi, qeebi kaat abeyyo. Too waqdi meysi kaa abbixeleeh; kay mari yakkeenimiik kudele. Tonnal malik qideyyooh,
kay mara inkih ku gubal heeyyo. Woo num rabam yablen waqdi, tonnal raqqa 'ye mari inkih ku fan yaduurem elle aaxigetto. Keenik num biyaakite'kal aduurele» iyye.
Ta fayi Absalaam kee Israayil abbobtit inkih meqe-fayu ceele.
Too waqdi Absalaam iyyemii, «Away Cusaayah seecay, usuk iyyam kaadu ankacisnu waynak» iyye.
Cusaay yemeete waqdi Absalaam kaak iyyemii, «Acitoofal fayuh tamah nek iyyek, usuk aba iyyem abnu innaa cinnuu? Kay fayu maabbina intek, kaadu abeh meqem neh waris» kaak iyye.
Cusaay kaal gacsemii, «Acitoofal ta saaku koh yecee fayi meqe fayuk tanih matan.
Macaay intek, ku abba kee kay mara qeebil celeema kinnoonum atu isih taaxigeeh; qeebit culla 'yeenik wadir baxa akak been say-kabqih (wacroh) bis lon. Eddeey edde ku abba qeebi elle aban inna nagay yaaxigeeh; tonna kinnuk a baraa, qaskar elle tani'kkel maxiina.
Away kinni-way gabla akke kee, hinnay kaadu, aracak teenat yombooqoreh yan kaana. Dawud ku mara qeebit yabbaxu waah, keenik dago mara qidu waa waqdi, sahda woo xaagu taabbu wayta waqdi, ku mari gaceh 'yaanam axcelon.
Ku abba kaxxa qaskariitaay, kay mari celeema kinnim, Israayil mari inkih yaaxigeeh; tonna-leemiik, a xaagu yaabboonu waan waqdii, woo kaxxa agiiray lubak innah cunxo sinni kinni-way meysitele.
Tonna leemiik, anu innih kasah kok axceemih: Israayil maray mangah qiddeyti inna lehiyya Israayil baaxok woo exxaay a exxak inki'kkel gaabossu haysay, gaaduh isih foocat keenik gacca 'xicaay ken bey.
Tonnal too gide yakke mara luk, Dawud riket macabnaay; kaat takku waytaamih xaagu aalle'kal, garciik kaa abbixenno. Kaa kee kay marak num maraaqay keenik aysenno.
Magaala fan kudu waam nublek, ni mari akoota baaheleeh, woo akootat woo magaala hirigak ragidiik siibba hayneh goloh addat tet qidenno. Woo magaala elle tan qaleh amol inki xaa kinni-way maraaqa» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Absalaam kee Israayil mari yakkeemiik, «Acitoofal-fayuk, Cusaay-fayi yayseh yan» iyyen. YALLI woh akah abemii, Acitoofal baahe meqe-fayu kataate waana'gidiiy Absalaamal bala obta'gidi.
Tohuk lakal Cusaay, sek-Saaduk kee sek-Abiyataar fan gexeeh; tokkelii, Acitoofal Absalaamah yeceeh suge fayu keenih warseeh, usuk kaadu is le kabuk kaah yecee fayu kaadu keenih warse.
Sarrak keenik iyyeemih, «Taway xayuk sissikuk Dawuduh farmo ruuba. ‹Ama Ordon weeqaytu akak taban tabeenal ta bar maxiininay, ta barat edde Ordonuk tabay maacisa. Tonnal koo kee ku mara mabbux kee rabak cattiimettoonu› 'yaanam farmoh keenih ruuba» iyye.
Abiyataar-baxay migaaqah Yonaatan deqsitak yenehiyya kee Saaduk-baxay migaaqah Acimqax deqsitak yenehiyya Qenrogel deqsita buyyiy Yarusalaam-magaalak dago xexxar baxa le ikkel yanihiyyah garil gaceenih yenen. Wokkel akah gaceenim, woo magaala sahda ken abalih culaanamih meysik ten. Buxah addal taamitta baxuwwa keenil amma 'taah tikki 'tam kulli waqdi keenih warisak ten. Oson kaadu tohim kulli waqdi Malik Dawud fanah gexak kaah warisak yenen.
Tah iyyan saaku, awki ken yubleeh; too awki ken yublem Absalaamah warse. Toh yeexegen waqdi, sissikuk gexeeniih, Bacurim deqsita aracal uli numih buxat yombooqoren. Woo numih buxah daaratal qeeli yeneeh; woo qeelih addat yombooqoren.
Qari luk yen numih barra alfenta bahha hayteeh woo qeelak afa edde alifte. Sarrak woo alifih bagul, num akah edde rade waa'nnah, daro caxxeh cabte.
Tohuk lakal Absalaam gubal taamita mari woo buxah yemeeteeh, buxal sugte barrak, «Acimqax kee Yonaatan maca abteeh?» iyyen.
Isiiy, «Darak tabba iyyen» keenik inte. Tokke ken goranah gexeeniih immay magennoonuuy; tonna-leemik Yarusalaam fan yuduuren.
Oson gexxa iyyen waqdi, Acimqax kee Yonaatan qeeli addak yewqeenih Dawud fanah gexen. Tokkel tekkem kaah warsen. Acitoofal kaah malse mala Dawuduh warseeniih, kaak iyyeenimih, «Isissikay ugutaay weeqaytuk taba» kaak iyyen.
Dawud kee kay mara gexoh bical gaceenih sarrak fooreenih. Maaci ifu ruube waqdi, yakkeenimiik inkih Ordon weeqaytuk tabeenih sugen.
Acitoofal kay fayu oggole weenim yuble waqdi, isi dananal koori hayya heeh, isi magaala yuduure. Isi buxal, buxah addah caagid bicseek lakal, ogot is qide. Sarrak magaqah kay buxah mara edde haak sugen aracat kaa heen.
Absalaam kee Israayil-mara Ordon-weeqaytuk tabte waqdi, Dawud Macanaayim deqsitta magaala gufeh suge.
Absalaam, qaskar-abbootan Yowab aftok, Qamaasa deqsita numuh yeceeh yen. Qamaasa, Yeter deqsita numih baxak ten. Kedok, Ismaaqilto deqsita marah
Absalaam kee kay mara Gilqad deqsita aracal tinfiddige.
Dawud Macanaayim gufe waqdi, Qammon rasul tan Rabba deqsitta magaalal yooboke Soobi deqsita numut yongoorowe. Soobi Nacas deqsita numih baxak ten. Kalah kaadu, Makir deqsita numuy Qammiyel deqsita num xalehiyyay Lodabar deqsitta magaalal yooboke kee, Bardillay deqsita numuy Gilqad deqsitta rasuk Rogalim magaalal yoobokehiyyat yongoorowe.
Too mari sacnitte kee kallak bicsen buutiiy, xiinih elle xiinan duyye kee maaqo Dawud kee Dawud marah baahen. Maaqok keenih baaheenim: kamadiiy gabru deqsitta darooy riyen darooy, alooy missiriiy fuuluuy malabaay lab-qittaay, hobbo kee illik ten. A mari, Dawud kee Dawud mara safarah akak yemeeteenim bakarroytah tan baaxo kinnuk, bakaraay qulul kee cawal luk yemeeteenim yeexegeenih.

Dawud isi mara gaaboyseeh, alfitteh abbobti kee boolitteh abbobti ken amol hee.
Tohuk lakal sidiica gexoh ken kurra heeh, naharsi gexok qaskar abbah Yowab heeh, gersi gexok qaskar abbah kay toobokoyta Abiisay heeh, sidochaytô gexok qaskar abbah Ittay heek lakal, «Anu sin lih gexeyyo» keenik iyye.
Osonuuy, «Atu ne'lih gexxam mafaxxinta. Nanu inkih wadir naduureh, nek garab raba way, naqboytiitil tu hinna. Koh tu gactekiiy, nek tabna alfih numih gide kot taniimih sabbatah, atu a magaalal elle raqteh, ama'kkek cato neh rubtam tayse» kaak iyye.
«Hay, siinit aysinnaanim abeyyo» keenik iyye. Tohuk lakal kay mari alfi-alfi kee bool-boolul buttâ-buttal gacca 'yeenih fooren waqdi, woo magaalah gasok afat tattabak teenaak sollu 'yeh,
Yowab kee Abiisay kee Ittayah inkih amri yeceeh, keenik iyyemii, «Yi taagah qunxa-Absalaamal tu mabaahina» iyye. Qaskar tikki 'taamak Dawud a amri acayih toobbeh.
Tohuk lakal Dawud-qaskar Israayil-marih qeebih, qeebi-booxa fan gexxeeh; Efrayim deqsitta garbol qeebi keenit aben.
Dawud-mari Israayil-marak qeebih yayseh. Kaxxa nasri keenil geen. Woo ayroh addal labaatanna alfih num keenik rabe.
Woo qeebi barri baaxol inkih yekke. Too saaku garboh addat rabe mari, seefit rabe marak manguk yen.
Absalaam garciik Dawud marat matre waqdi, bakil amot sugeeh; woo bakil arduk kaxxa caxah guba kaa culusse. Too waqdi amo kaak woo caxak fallakka le aracat culte. Amot akak suge bakil isih kaak gexxeeh; usuk woo caxah fallakkat edde wanxexxeelak raaqe.
Dawud marih num kaa yubleeh, too waqdi gexxa 'yeh, Yowabak, «Absalaam kaxxa caxat wanxexxeelah uble» iyye.
Yowab too waqdi kaal gacsemii, «Kaa tublek, macah kaa qide wayteeh? Kaa qiddaamal lakqok tabna garsi kee bagi-qarum koh acayuk en» iyye.
Takkay immay woo num kaak iyyemii, «Lakqok alfi garsi yoh teceemih, anu malik baxa feerah xagak mananniyo. Malikii, nanu inkih elle nan ikkel, koo kee Abiisay kee Ittayak, ‹Yi taagah qunxa-Absalaamal tu mabaahina› 'yaanam siinik axcih noobbe.
Hay, tonnal anu malik yab cinna heeh, Absalaam qidek, malikik tu qellitak manannaay, woh aabbe'kal maraaqa. Sarrak kaak atu yoo macatta» kaak iyye.
Yowab too waqdi iyyemii, «Anu ku yaabat wakti akah ruubam mayyu» inxicca 'yeh, sidiica macaxu luk foore. Too waqdi Absalaamay rooci edde yaniy caxat wanxexxeelih yanit, itta katassa heeh, woo sidiica macaxu afqadot kaak hee.
Too waqdi taban takke qaskaray Yowab silac akkuquk tenehiyya Absalaamat woo macaxwa tikiq-tikiq heenih kaa qiden.
Tohuk lakal Yowab, qeebi gaba kalem elle tamixxige'gidih, «*Baanta ugura» iyye. Too baanta tumuggure waqdi, kay qaskar Israayil mara yayraddeenim cabeenih, kaal yuduuren.
Sarrak Absalaam raysa beeniih, garboh addal tan kaxxa boodot qiden. Tohuk lakal woo boodo xeetik kibeenih, waydal gurral bicsen. Toh tekke waqdi Israayil mari yakkeemik mariiy isi buxa fanah kude.
Absalaam migaq kaak elle xagan baxa luk masuginnaay; tohuk gexxaamah addunyâ bagul yan saaku, ‹Malik Golo› deqsita aracal kaa elle kassitan qamiddu bicsiise. Too qamidduk migaaqah ‹Absalaam qamiddu› iyye. A saaku fanah too qamiddu Absalaam kassitih qamiddul yaaxigen.
Saaduk baxi Acimqax Yowabak iyyeemih, «Malik fanah arduk gexxa exceh, YALLI naqboytiitik kaa catem kaah warisu waak, gexu yoo cab» iyye.
Yowab too waqdi kaal gacseemih, «Atu xaagu warissu waytam a saaku hinnay, gersi saaku. A saaku malikik baxi rabe ikkal, atu kaah mawarissa» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal Yowab Kuusuh yooboke numuk iyyemii, «Gexay malikih isi intih tublem waris» kaak iyye. Too waqdi woo num kay massakaxxah qununna yeeh, sarrak kaa akah ruuben farmo warsa'gidih arduk gexe.
Acimqax qagisak Yowabak iyyemii, «Faxem edde takkeemih a xaagu anu beyam taysek, beyay yoo inxic» iyye.
Yowab kaak iyyemii, «Yi baxaw, atu a xaagu beytam akah faxxam macaay, galtoh edde geytu waytam mantuk» kaak iyye.
Acimqax iyyemii, «Faxem edde takkeemih, xaagu warsa'gidih gexam faxa» kaak iyye.
Yowab, «Woysa gex hay» kaak iyye. Too waqdi arduk Ordon-golok adda gacca 'yeh Kuusuh yooboke numuk yookomeh Dawudul yemeete.
Dawud, magaala akak culan afa kee, magaalak akak yawqen afak fanal yan aracal, daffeynat suge. Dacayrih yan numuy magaalak gasoh culmeynah amol yewqeh sugehiyya wonna wagga hee waqdi, dibuk yarde numuy kaa fanah yamaatehiyya yuble.
Too waqdi addah bossa 'yeh malikih seeceh, «Dibuk yan numuy nee fanah yarde ableh an» iyye.
Malik iyyeemih, «Dibuk yan num tekkek, meqe-farmo gabat baaha kaana» iyye. Taaxige num xayyoowak xayyoowe.
Sarrak dacayrih yan num kaadu gersi numuy dibuk arduk yamaatehiyya yuble. Gasoh afat dacayrih yan numuk iyyemii, «Gersi numuy yarde yamaatem maay tablee?» iyye.
Malik kaadu iyyemii, «Tama num kaadu meqe-xaagu baaha numu» iyye.
Dacayrih yan num iyyemii, «Naharat yan num, Acimqad arda leh yan» iyye.
Too waqdi malik iyyeemih, «Usuk meqe numuuy; meqe xaagu baaha kaana» iyye.
Acimqax anay fayya haak, «Malikow, keenik neyseh» iyyeeh; kaak foocal kay massakaxxah qansah baaxo xagam fan qununna 'yeeh, sarrak iyyeemih, «YALLAY ku Dagelta kinnihiyyay qeebi kot abak suge marak koo yiysiisehiyya fayla taafay, yi malikow» iyye.
Too waqdi malik, «Qunxa Absalaam nagay raaqee?» iyye.
«Ku qaskarak abbah yan Yowab yoo ruube waqdi, mango waxxaqa kee deero radak yok raqte'mmay, kinnim aaxige'kal emeete» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi malik, «Meqek, woo kabuk sol» kaak iyye.
Sarrak Kuusuh aabakuk yen num yemeeteeh, malik Dawuduk, «Yi amoytaw, meqe xaagu koh abbixe. YALLI a saaku qeebi kot abam faxak suge marak koo yiysiiseh, umaane abe waytem kok qaddoyseh» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Malik Dawud, «Qunxa Absalaam hay nagay raaqee?» kaak iyye.
Kuusuh yooboke numuuy, «Kaat tekkem ku naqboytit kee kot qeebi abam faxe marat takkeemil maquk ten» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi malik wariggiteeh, woo magaalak akak yawqen gasok amol yan qaril eweqqa 'yeh weeqe. «Yi Absalaamow! Yi Absalaamow! Woyyow, ku aftok anu rabiyyoy! Woyyow ku aftok anu rabiyyoy! Yi Absalaamow!» iyye.

Malik Dawud, Absalaam rabih weeqa kee rookah addat yan waqdi, Yowab toh yoobbeh.
Too ayro kaadu Dawud-qaskar, Dawud isi baxih rookat yani 'yaanam yoobben. Tohuk gexxaamah abe raaren farci-maysoh aftok cisabbootak asen.
Qeebil boolatte qaskaray qaybi yibbixeh innah, magaala culen waqdi, tibbat culen.
Malik Dawud foocal gaba hayya heeh boogiseeh, «Yi baxaw, yi Absalaamow, woyyow, yi baxaw, woyyow, yi baxaw» iyye.
Too waqdi Yowab malikil gexxa 'yeh kaak iyyeemih, «A saaku isi qaskaray rooci kot catteeh, xaylo kee agabu koh catehiyya qaybik qidde.
Isi niqba mara kicnaah, isi kicna mara niqba numuk tantoh tan. A qaskar kee qaskar abbobti tuh alle waytam kok geyneh. Nanu nakkeemiik rabnaah, Absalaam koh raaqaamal, ruffa axce rartem, kamba kok ableh an.
Meqehik, away ugutaay, a qaskarak aytikuma inxic. Toh abe waytek, ta'kkel beera num ko'lih raaqe wayu waamah, YALLIH migaaqal xiibita. Tahak gacta balay koo tabbixehiyya matan. Qunxaaneey takke kot tikka 'teemik inkih, tah koo lafele» kaak iyye.
Toh kaak iyye waqdi, Malik Dawud ugutta 'yeh magaalah afa fan gexeh tokkel daffee. «Malik magaalah afal daffeyak yen» 'yaanam yoobben waqdi, kay qaskar kaal temeeteeh, maraasiyot kaa hayte.
Oson tohut yanin waqdi, Israayil mari yakkeemik mariiy isi buxah keenik kudeh yen.
Takkay immay tohuk lakal Israayil mari kaxxam agaaradeeh, «Maca tayse hay labhay?» tittak iyyen. «Malik Dawud naqboytiitik nee cateeh, Filistiin marak nee cateh immay, qusbih Absalaamak kudeh, baaxo cabeh suge.
Nanu Absalaam malik yakke'gidih nuskuteh sugne. Takkay immay usuk carbit rabeh. Tonna-leemiik away numuk teeni gexeh, Malik Dawud macah gace waah?» 'yaanamih mala baahen.
Israayil mari sittak iyyeemih xaagi Malik Dawud gufe. Too waqdi Saaduk kee Abiyataar deqsitta seeka farmoh ruubeeh, keenik iyyemii, «Yuudah abbobtik intaanamah, ‹Isin kullim gaba kaltek sarra yoo cata mara macah tekken?
Ramadah yok taniinih, yi cadoyta kinniton way, yoo gacsaanamih tiyal kulli marak ellecabot macah gactan?› keenik inxica» iyye.
Kaadu qagseh iyyeemih, «Qamaasak intaanamah, ‹Atu ramad yok kinnito. Ahak wadir Yowab le qaskar-abbootanna koh aceeyyo. Tah abe week, Yallih-bala yol obtay› iyye kaak inxica» keenik iyye.
Dawud-qangara Yuudâ-baaxol yan marak inkih kalbi xabbacosse. Oson too waqdi, is kee isi gubal taamita doolat mara lih, «Uduur» 'yaanamih farmo kaah ruuben.
Malik Dawud yaduure'gidih Ordon weeqaytu gufe. Yuudâ-mari Gilgal deqsita aracal gaaboowe. Weeqaytuk tabissi kaa haana'gidih, woo qaxa fan kaa'lih gexen.
Tonnah kaadu Benyaamah yooboke Gerá-Simqi deqsita numuy Bacurim deqsita aracal sugehiyya Malik Dawudut garaya'gidih, Ordon fan sissikuk gexe.
Usuk alfi yakke maray Benyaamah yooboke is luk abbaxuk yen. Saawul buxah marih taamat yen Xiba deqsita num kaadu, xaylok taban kee konooy kee, labaatanna yakke taama mara lih yemeeteeh, Ordonul malikik naharat gufe.
Tokkel malik lih yan mara lih wakalih gacca 'yeenih, malik keenik aba iyyem abaana'gidih, Ordon-weeqaytuuk taturra kaa'lih iyyen.
Malik woo weeqaytuk tabam faxa waqdi, Simqi malikik foocal gulubuh radeh iyyemii,
«Yi amoytaw, woo Yarusalaamak gexxe saaku baahe umaanek, ku maganak, qafu yoh ab. Ahak wadir tohih naqabu bagut yoh mahaanay tuh maallin.
Yi amoytaw, dambi lem baahem innik eexegeeh; a saaku kilbat le kabut raqta kedooday Yuusuf xaqut tanihiyyak naharat kot matra'gidih akah emeetem, tohu» iyye.
Too waqdi Xaruyá-Abiisay yaabeeh, iyyeemih, «Simqi YALLI malikih doore num xaafeemih sabbatah, rabi kaal yamaate» iyye.
Dawud, Abiisay kee kay saqalah yan Yowabak iyyemii, «Xaruyâ-xayloy, ah sin wagitta qaada hinna. Isin umaanet yoo culussaanam maay faxxan? Away Israayil-malik yoo kinniimih sabbatah, a saaku Israayil-marak numul rabi cokmi magaca» iyye.
Too waqdi Simqik iyyeemih, «Koo qide waamah koh xiibitah» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal Saawuluk baxi baxah yen Mafiboset kaadu malikit yangoorowe'gidih yemeete. Mafiboset malik gexxa 'yeemiiy amaanah uduurra 'yam fanah, iba kaqliseh manannaay deben isik mooleh mananna. Xagaral le sara kaadu kaqliseh mananna.
Yarusalaamak yemeeteeh malik fan gexeeh kaat yongoorowe waqdi, malik kaak iyyemii, «Mafibosetow, yo'lih magexinnitok, maca geytee?» iyye.
Mafiboset too waqdi kaal gacseemih, «Atu akah table'nnah, anu namma ibak aymite numuh aniih; yoh taamita Xiba deqsita numuk, ‹Malik lih gexam faxak, dananal koori yoh hay› exce waqdi, woo num yoo ganeeh; ku garil kaadu anu edde ane waam yol hee. Tonna'mmay atu Yallih malaykattih bis litok, cakki kot ceelinnaanim ab.
Yi marah inkih, rabak sah taguudem matan. Takkay immay yooy, isih akminnaanim is lih adoobisak sugte. Tahaysa yok raqteemiy yoh ab axcuk koo essera mayyu» iyye.
Malik kaal gacseemih, «Ahaysa yabti-mangah faxxintam matanak, Saawuluk raqte buqreh baaxo koo kee Xibak kurraasita» kaak iyye.
Mafiboset tohul gacseemih, «Wohim Xiba inkih haysitay; yoh atu muquk tuduurem yoo xiqtah» iyye.
Gilqad rasul yooboke Bardillay deqsita num, Rogalim deqsita aracak yemeete. Akah yemeetem, wakalih kaa'lih gacca 'yeh Ordon weeqaytuuk taturra kaa'lih iyya'gidi.
Bardillay kaxxam bar naba numuk teneeh bacra-tabanih sanat luk suge. Kaadu kaxxa gaddalik teneeh, malik Macanaayim rasul yen saaku maaqo kaah baahak suge.
Malik kaak iyyemii, «Yarusalaam fan yo'lih gexaay; wokkel amo kok wagteyyok» iyye.
Bardillay iyyemii, «Ahaksa mangoomuh sugu waam mayyuuy, tohoysa Yarusalaam fan ko'lih akah gexam mayyu.
Qumrik bacra-tabanat aniih, meqem kee umam maceda. Akme maaqok tamu mabla. Aaqubeemik tamu mabla. Gad abaanamah ayti yok mataabba. Tohuk gexxaamah, ko'lih gexaamah quuka kol akkeemik sa, koh xiqam mayyu.
Anu kaadu koh xiqeemiy galtoh kot akah qaaga mayyu. Away dagoh gide Ordon weeqaytuk bisoh tabissa koo heeh cabeyyooh,
tohuk wadir inni buxah aduurem tayse. Raba inni buxal abah, magaqah inni xaleenah *kabrit gacam yoh tayse. Yi aftok Kimham yaniih, yi aftok kaa gabat beetaay, buxa guftan waqdi isit ceelinnaanim kaah abetto» iyye.
Malik kaak iyyeemih, «Meqeh hay, inni lih kaa beeyyooh, atu axcinnaanim kaah abeyyo. Koh kaadu atu ah faxa akak intam koh abeyyo» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Dawud kee Dawud mara Ordonuk tabteh. Too waqdi Dawud, Bardillay fugga heeh sarrak dooqa kaah abe. Bardillay isi buxah yuduure.
Malik Dawud Gilgal fan gexe. Kimham kaadu kaa'lih gexe. Yuudâ-qaskar takkeemiik Ordon weeqaytuk tabissa kaa hayteh, Israayil qaskarak garab kaa'lih tabte. Tonnal, Gilgal yemeeten.
Sarrak Israayil-mari yakkeenimiik kaal yemeeteenih kaak iyyeenimih, «Malikow, Yuudah ummattay nek toobokoh tanihiyya koo kee ku buxah mara kee ku mara akah nek beyaanam macaay? Ordon weeqaytuk koo baahaanamih cakki, dibuk isinnih loonum akah ceelaanam macaay?» iyyen.
Too waqdi Yuudâ-mari tohul keenil gacsemii, «Nanu woh akah abnem, malik neh xayi ramad lem aaxaguk neneeh, tohuh abne. Tohoysa malikik nokmem mannuuy, gabak neh abem mali. Hay labhay, siinit toomem macaa?» keenik iyyen.
Too yaabal Israayil mari kaadu keenil gacseemih, «Malik Dawud siinih yoobokem numma'mmay, siinik tabna afa lino. Too tiyal nee burutteeniih, woo tiya siinik wayna. Geerak kaadu, ‹Malik neh yaduuray!› 'yaanam naharat intem, neey; a saaku mangom luk nene'mmay, woh neh teexegeenih matan» 'yaanam iyyen. Too yaabal Yuudâ-mari gibdi qangara keenil gacse.

Too waqdi umaanek abbah yan numuy migaaqah Bikrí-Sabaq deqsitaah kedok Benyaamah yoobokehiyya Gilgal magaalal suge. Too num baanta yoogoreeh anay fayya haak, «Israayil maraw, Dawud neh yakkem mali. Yiisâ-baxi Dawud ni num hinnak, kulli num isi buxah siinik yaduuray» iyye.
Too waqdi Israayil mari yakkeemiik Dawud cabeh Sabaq lih gexen. Yuudâ-marah tu gactek elle raaqeeh; Ordonuk xabba haanamaay Yarusalaam magaalah amma 'yaanam kaa'lih yemeeten.
Dawud isi qariy Yarusalaamal yanihiyya gufe waqdi, caggô-gubih caggoh nikaacat abbaxuk yen tabna barray qarit dacayrih cabeh sugehiyyat dacayrih sinam hee. Faxxa haanam tokkeek keenih abak yene'mmay, fido keenit faxak manannaay; dibuk tani ikket ken abbaxuk yen. Too agbi rabba 'yam fanah gubun gurrah sugen.
Malik Dawud, Qamaasa deqsita numuk iyyemii, «Yuudâ qaskarah inkih seecaay, sidiica ayrok naharat gabat ken bah» iyye.
Qamaasa keenih seeca'gidih gexe'mmay, malik uduura kaak elle iyye waktil maaduurinna.
Too waqdi Dawud Abiisayak iyyemii, «Away Absalaam nel baaheh sugeemik, Sabaq nel baahu waam lafitta. Awayiik yi qaskar gabat hayya haay lakat kaak gex. Toh abe waynek, gaso maroh edde tan magaaloolit culla 'yeh ambooqorele» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Abiisay, Yowab-mara kee malikit dacayrih tan qaskar kee celeemah tan qaskar gabat hayya heeh, Yarusalaam magaalak Sabaq lakat gexe.
Gibqon magaalak ‹Kaxxa Boolo› deqsitta ikke gufen waqdi, Qamaasa geen. Too waqdi Yowab qeebih tikiyal sugeeh, sibat yan seefiy bagi qarumut axawah yani, bagul tikiyal luk suge. Bisoh kaa fan gexak suge waqdi, too seef sibak kaak rade.
Yowab Qamaasa gee waqdi, afak, «Yi kataysaw, mannah tan?» kaak inxicca 'yeh, kaa fugutam cella heeh, migdi gabah deben kaak yibbixe.
Qamaasa, Yowab guri gabat le seef yubleh masuginnaay; tohuk gexxaamah, cubbi kaak maabitinna. Yowab gabat abbaxuk suge seef bagut kaak hee. Too waqdi ulqi baaxol kaak rade. Too waqdiik rooci kaak yewqem yublek wadir, kaat qagtam mafaxinna.
Tohuk lakal Yowab kee kay toobokoyta Abiisay, Sabaq elle yani ikke oysitak gexen.
Yowab qaskarak numuk teeni, Qamasâ-raysak garil sollu 'yeh, Yowab kee Dawud kataata marak, «Yowab lakat gexa» 'yaanam axcuk anay fayya haak yaabe.
Qamaasâ-raysay qabalat tutlukehiyya tokkel elle qangalaylut teneeh; ama qaskariiti kulli num a raysa yasseleeleqem yuble waqdi, giti addak hirriigisak deebol eyyeqqa heeh xagaral saro akak hee.
Too raysa gitak kaleenik wadir, kulli num Yowab lih gacca 'yeh, Sabaq lakat gexe.
Sabaq Israayilih ubukka 'te kedoodah baaxok adda gacca 'yeh, Aabil-Beet-Maqka deqsitta magaala fanah yemeete. Bikri-gulub inkih magaalak irol gaabowwa 'yeenih, sarra magaala sitta lih culen.
Sarrak Yowab mari, «Sabaq kee kay mara too magaalal tani» 'yaanam yoobben waqdi, tokke fanah gexeeniih, magaala marot heen. Too magaalat maroh tan gasot xakabih ballaaqe tittak bagul heen. Gaso edde yaggilen gutqeenat magaalat maroh tan gasoosi yaggileenim faxen waqdi,
woo magaalah addak kasloytah tan barra, magaalat maroh tan gasok afal yan marah secteeh, «Afal yan maraw! Ama'kkel Yowab yenek, kaa'lih yaabam faxak, ‹Akke am› kaak inxica» inte.
Yowab teetil gexeeh, too waqdi, «Yowab akak 'yaanam koo kinnii?» kaak inte.
Yowab, «Yoo kinnih» teetik iyye.
«Hay, kok axcem yok oobbey» kaak inte.
Yowab, «Meqek, maca intam faxxa?» teetik iyye.
Too waqdi kaak inteemih, «Dumî dabaanal, ‹Waagisseenimih af Aabil-magaalal geyan› axcuk neh sugeeniih, tu waagise mari a magaala amaatuk suge.
A magaalah mari Israayil addal amaan kee digga le mara. Ni magaala Israayil addal kaxxa tuxxiq le magaala. Hay, tonnal, nee akah bayissam faxxam macaa? YALLIH magaala bayissam akah faxxam macaa?» kaak inte.
«Aleey, toh inkinnah acsubem hinna. Anu sin magaala baysa num hinniyo.
Toh niyat mayyu. Bikrí-Sabaq deqsita numuy qaleela le Efrayim rasul yaabukehiyya Malik Dawuduk saduh gace. Too num fanxaah; kaa gabal nek hayteenik, magaalak siinik awqenno» teetik iyye.
Too waqdi woo barra kaal gacissemii, «Moyya kaak a gasook siinih qidenno» inte.
Sarrak magaalal yan mara fan gexxeeh, a mala keenil bahte. Too mari Sabaqak moyya irgiqqa heenih gasoh amook Yowabah qiden. Too waqdi Yowab is marah, ahaysa a magaalak nee beya 'yaanamih astah baanta heeh; too baantah anay yoobben waqdi, isinni buxa fan yuduuren. Yowab Malik-Dawuduy Yarusalaamal yanihiyya fan gexe.
Yowab, Israayil qaskarah abbah yen. Yoyadáq-Banaaya kaadu Dawudut dacayrih tan qaskarak abbah yen. Woo qaskar marin marak ten.
Adoniiram dirkih-tamsiisan-xooquh-xiinah abbah yen. Aciilúd-Yacoosafat kaadu tikka intem yaktube numuk ten.
Sawa kutbe-abeenah yen. Saaduk kee Abiyataar diini abbobtik ten.
Yaaqir magaalal yooboke Qiira kaadu Dawud garil daffeya seekik ten.

Dawud malikih suge dabaanal qulul radeeh, woo qulul sidooca sanat suge. Too qululih sabbatah Malik Dawud YALLAL fayu essere. YALLI kaak iyyeemih, «Saawul kee kay buxah marat biili yan. Sahday qideeni biili uxih keenit yan. Qideenim Gibqon mara. Rob siinih akah rade waam tohu» kaak iyye.
Gibqon mari Israayilih yooboke mara hinnoonuuy, Amoorah yooboke dago maray Israayil mari duma, ‹Sin maxagnay amo siinik dacrisenno› axcuk qahdi akah culeenihiyyak ten.
Too waqdi Dawud Gibqon marah seeceeh keenik iyyemii, «YALLI doore marah dooqa abtaana'gidih, Saawul siinil baahe baatilik sin aymaaqem faxak, macal sin aymaaqooh?» keenik iyye.
Oson kaal gacseenimih, «Saawul kee kay buxah mara nel bahtem dahab kee lakqoh akak yamqeenim hinnaay, baatam hinna. Takkay immay toh net tekke inneh, Israayil mara qidnam niyat mannu» iyyen.
Dawud, «Hay labhay, tonnal elle tamqeenim yoh warisay» keenik iyye.
Oson iyyeenimih, «Saawul nakkeemik sella nee heeh saabo nee cabsiisam faxe.
Taway nanu kaadu fanxam, Saawuluk rade marak labhâ-malciin gabal nek haytaama. Too mara, Gibqâ-magaalay duma YALLI malikih dooreh suge Saawul buxa elle luk sugehiyyak addal, YALLIH foocal takayrit ken qidnam fanxa» iyyen.
Malik Dawud, «Too malcina num siinil aceeyyo, hay» keenik iyye.
Takkay immay kaa kee Yonaatan luk ten Yalla-kee-xaganih sabbatah, Yonaatanak raaqe baxay Mafiboset deqsitahiyya keenil maacannaay raaqiseh.
Armooni kee Mafiboset deqsitta labhay Saawul Ayyâ-baxá Rixfa deqsitta barrat xalehiyya kee, Saawul baxáy Meerab deqsitak tenehiyyah koona baxa beyya heeh gabal keenik hee. Meerab a koona baxa akah xaltem, Bardilláy-Qadriyel deqsita numuk ten. Woo num elle yoobokem, Macoola deqsita araca.
Dawud ta mara Gibqon marih gabal heeh; too mari qaleh amo beyya ken heeniih, tokkel YALLIH foocal ogot ken qiden. Ta malcina num titta lih qiden. Ken qideenim, yubqureenim edde orbisan waktil gabru deqsitta daro edde orobtam faxxa udduruk ten.
Saawuluk raqte gubnay Rixfa deqsitta, rabe marih ginaada takayruh elle tani ikkel, xixxaq amol qabudda fidissa hayteh elle gacteeh, daro edde orbisan waktik xabba haanamaay rob edde yamaate wakti guffa haam fanah, elle sugte. Laqo-laqo woo raysa qambil kee guma takmeemik dacrisak teneeh, bar-bar alluwwa takmeemik dacrisak ten.
Dawud Rixfa abtam yoobbe waqdi,
Gilqad rasul tan Yaabes-magaalal yan mara fan gexxa 'yeh, Saawul kee Saawul baxa Yonaatan lafa baaheh. Gilqad mari Saawul kee baxi lafa akak baaheenim, Filistiin-mari Gilbowaq-qaleh amol ken qide saaku, elle ken takareh suge Beet-San deqsitta magaalak gudek teneeh; tokkek garqeenih baahen. Filistiin-mari Saawul kee kay baxa Yonaatan qidda heenik lakal, lafa keenik too magaalal takreenih yenen.
Sarrak Dawuduu, Saawul kee Yonaatan lafa kee woo malcina numuy takayrut sugtehiyyah lafa bahha heeh, inki aracal gaaboyse.
Sarrak Dawud mari, Saawul kee kay baxih lafa beyya heenih, Malik Dawud keenik aba elle inxicca 'ye innal, Saawul abbay Kees deqsitak yene edde yoogoqen *kabrit yoogoqen. Too kabri Xelaq deqsita rasuy Benyam kedo guubuh elle tenehiyyal geytima. Tohuk gaba kaleenik wadirii, oson isinni baaxoh aban dooqa Yalli keenik oggolak raaqe.
Filistiin kee Israayil marih fanal kaadu qeebi qagteeh, Dawud kee kay mara too qeebih gexxe. Sarrak Filistiin marat qeebi abeenih; qeebi addat Dawud yecleh.
Too qeebit Yisbebanob deqsita numuy kaxxam masu lehiyya yen. Too num sidooca kiilo kee garab yakke macaxuy nacaasak bicseeni gabat abbaxuk sugeeh, qusba seef kaadu bagul luk sugeeh, qeebi addat Dawud qidam faxe.
Takkay immay Xaruyá-Abiisay Dawud catoh yemeeteeh, taaxige masu naba numut atka abeeh edde kaa qide. Tahak wadir Dawuduk, «Qeebih ne'lih gexe waytaamah neh xiibit» iyyeeniih kaa xibsiisen. Sarrak kaak iyyeenimih, «Kibaal elle linom, kooy; koo waynam mafanxak, gaaduh genxa waqdi buxal elle raq» kaak iyyen.
Tohuk lakal Goob deqsita aracal, Filistiin mara kee ken fanal kaadu qeebi rade. Too qeebil Cuusâ-magaalal yooboke Sibkay deqsita num, Saf deqsita masu nabin num qide.
Tonnah kaadu, ken kee Filistiin marih fanal Goob deqsita aracal gersi qeebi radeeh, Yaaqír-Elcanan deqsita numuy Beetlacam magaalal yoobokehiyya Golyaad deqsita numuy Gat-magaalal yoobokehiyya qide. Too numih macaxi kaxxa masu luk yen.
Gat-magaalal kaadu gersi qeebi radeeh; too qeebit kaxxam masu le numuy qeebi kicna suge. Gabak kulli gabat laca feera luk yeneeh, namma ibak kulli ibat laca feera luk yen.
Too num Israayil ummatta kaxxam bursute. Sarra Dawuduk saqalah yen Samma baxaay Yonaatan akak axcuk yeneenihiyya kaa qide.
Ta affara numuy Dawud kee Dawud qaskarih gabat rabtehiyya, Gat deqsitta magaalal yooboke marak teneeh; masi nabna lagok luk yenen.

YALLII, Saawul kee Saawuluk kalah Dawuduk naqboytiitih yen marak, Dawud cateh; tohuk gexxaamah Dawud YALLA saarise.
Saareh iyyeemih,
Qaley wadbitaana,
yoh tekkem, YALLAK ten.
Reebuh liyom YALLA;
usuk yi wadeena.
Yi Goyti yi reebu;
amaan akak geya.
Gob innah yoo gamsa.
Umaanek dacayriiy,
wadeenah liyom kaa.
YALLAW, umaane kee
qeebik yoo waddam koo.
Yi Goyti yi reebu.
YALLAH seeca waqdi,
naqboytak yoo wada.
Candi kaah yaguude.
Rabi yot xayyooweh,
maraasiyot yoo hee;
baati yoo raarisse.
Rabi yot xayyoowe,
rabi oflot yoo qide.
«Akeera oobah» exce.
Gadaamal kaah seece;
«YALLAW! YALLAW!» exce.
Kay Qibaadah-Qarik,
yi kallaci yoobbe.
Yalli bagcarriteeh;
baaxo dillibitteh.
Qaranwak makroori
tengeyyeh axaxxeh.
Yalli bagcarrite.
Habug inta gira
awaqih kaak tumbulle.
Sahda takme xibcin
kay afak tewqeh ten.
Kay sanak yewqe qer
gayran ceelak yewqe.
Qaran baxissa heeh,
dagaak addah oobe.
Ibak xibqih addat,
qamburre kaak teneeh;
kaxxa gaanib gace.
Galwa leemih amol,
ken xoxbisak gexe.
Caacayat yumbulleh;
caacay galwat kaa bee;
sissikaanet kaa bee.
Qamburre dariifa,
Yalla maraasiyte.
Tembegge qamburrey
addat quukah rob le,
Yalla maraasiyte.
Cankaxay bixiq 'ya
Yallih foocat yanik,
bolok iyya xibcin
habugga iffa iyyeh yen.
Dagelti-xongolo
qaraanak tontoobbe.
Kakkaqô-xaw xaawe.
Ruube gaysê-baxi,
naqboytiitit radeeh,
fixixissa ken hee.
Yalli ruube cankax,
baaxok ken xiiriye.
YALLI bagcarriteeh,
naqboytit yinqibe.
Bad elle suge'kke,
booxa tekkeh raqte.
Baaxo korte waqdi,
makra gubbil raqte.
Qaraanak yoo eleele,
gabal yoo yibbixeeh,
badak yoo yeyyeeqe.
Naqboytak yoo cateeh,
ken gabak yoo wade.
Anu effere marak,
yi Goyti yoo cate.
Gadaamite saaku
sahda yoo dadahte.
Too way kay cato gee.
Yi Goyti yoo wade.
Yot abe kacanut
naqboytak yoo wade.
Kaxxa amaan yoh yeceeh,
meqe aracal yoo hee.
Cakkik tanim abaah,
tohul galto geya.
Umaanet maasiyyooy
tohul barkat yot hee.
YALLI aba iyyem abe;
kay yab maciniyyo;
Yalla mamakiyyo.
Kay yab essekexxeeh,
aba iyyem oggole;
cine saaku mayyu.
Qellatak tu mayyum,
usuk yok yaaxigeh.
Qellatak waasimaah;
tohum yok yaaxigeh.
Cakkik tanim abaah,
tohuh galto geya.
Galto YALLAK geya.
Umaane sinniyom
YALLI yok yaaxigeh.
Kol digga 'ye marah,
digga litoh, Yallaw.
Qellat sinni marah,
kaxxam miqto, YALLAW.
Baguuk koh qaddoowaah
gita gexa marah
bagi-xabca lito.
Mako leh yan mara,
mako gacissa atu.
Kaxxiinita mara,
ramma hayta'gidih
wagga hayta, YALLAW.
Is rammisa marak
rooci waddah, Yallaw.
Ifu yok kinnito.
YALLAW, yi Dageltaw,
dite ifu yoh abte.
Naqboytit aatakuh,
cayla atu yoh tecee.
Yot koysitaanamak,
cayla atu yoh tecee.
Ku giti, ni Goytaw,
manxu qaxa meqeeh,
qellat sinni gita.
YALLIH yab digga le.
Goobuh kaa le mari
reebuh kaa haysitan.
Kay dacayrit yanin.
Naamine YALLAK sah
gersi Yalli mayan.
Nee dacrissam Yalla;
kaak sa reebu mannu.
Qande yoh taceem kaa.
Edde gexa gita
yol taymaaqem Yalla.
Mandafoofola anu.
Qarkumuddoh innal
qaleeli amol an way,
yoo dacrissam Yalla.
Gaadu elle aban inna,
yoo barissam Yalla.
Gayset aba qeebi,
yoo barissem Yalla.
YALLAW, yoo dacrissah,
umaane yok waassah.
Yoh abte dacayrih,
kaxxa num ekke anu.
Andafoofaleemik,
gita yoh missosse.
Maftucinniyo anu.
Naqboytiitik eyseh,
yi gabat ken selte.
Bayissa ken hee'kal
aadem maduudiyyo.
Keenit abe niksoh,
muugutan; masoolan.
Anu sella ken hee.
Qangalaylut raaqen;
yi ibih gubat raden.
Gaaduh gexe saaku,
qande yot haytem koo.
Naqboytiitik eyseeh;
yoo tiysiisem Yalla.
Naqboytit yok kuddeh;
ken kudussem Yalla.
Yoo yinqiben saaku,
yi gabat ken sele.
Cato gorriseeniih,
isinni cattam weenih.
YALLAL cato esseren;
keenik moggolinna.
Bututtukka ken heeh;
siisa ken celsiise.
Giti-kallah innah,
taqqa keenit exce.
Yi maray yoo cinek
yoo waddem koo, Yallaw.
Mangoh tan baaxooxak
amoytah yoo hayte;
uxih ken abbah an.
Anu ken maaxigaay,
yoo yeexege mari
yi xintoh gubat yan.
Marin-baaxoh mari
yi xaagu yoobbe way,
foocal yoh rammiten.
Aba axcem oggolan;
yi yaabah rammitan.
Niya keenik raddeeh;
elle yenen gasok,
cunxitak yamaaten.
YALLI waara Goyta.
Qaley wadbitaana,
yoh tekkem yi Goyta.
Fayla kaah taguude;
Yallah fayla taafay.
Umaanek yoo waddeh
yoo dacrissam Yalla.
Ummatey, warisa.
Yoo niqbah yan marak,
yoo tiysiisem YALLA;
YALLAY yoo dacrisa,
ummat yi gubat hee.
Yoo niqbah yan marak,
yoo tiysiiseh, Yallaw.
Ken amol yoo hayte.
Umaane aba marak
atu isih yoo wadde.
Tonnal koo faylisa;
marin marih foocal,
YALLAW, koo saarisa.
Ku migaq saarisa.
Yoo Dawud dooritteeh,
malikih yoo haytem,
koo kinni, yi Rabbow.
Kaxxa-iisa yoh tecee;
kaxxa nasri kok gee.
Yoo kee yok raddeemih,
waartah tan maqaaney
baye sinni tecee.

Dawud ellecabol abe saare ah teeti.
«Yiisá-Dawud iyya qangor ankacisey;
Yalli kaxxa num abe numih qangor ankacisey.
Yaqkuub doore Dageltay kulliimik nabahiyya, malik yakke'gidih doore numuy
Israayil ummattah nabam meqe saare yeyyeeqehiyya iyyaamah:
YALLIH *Roocaaniyya yot taniih;
edde yaabam teetik gee yaaba.
Yoo yaabissam, YALLI yoh yecee rooci.
Israayil doore Dagelti yaabeeh
ken dacrisa Dagelti yok iyyeemih,
‹Qadaalat ummatta xiinisaah
Yallih meysit xiinisa malik
qamburre sinni wallaqenti bis le;
robti lakal tawqe ayroy
baaxol qayso taysubukeh gide› 'yaanam iyye.
Yi buxa Yallih garil tonnah tanim yot celta.
Macaay inteenik, Yalli yo'lih bica haysiteh,
baye waa xagana yo'lih hee.
Make waan xagana yo'lih heeh,
akak kore waa qahdi yoh cule.
Tonnal kulli waqdi yoo cateleeh,
faxa axcem yoh abele.
Yalli toh duuduselem digga le.
Yallal aamine waa mari baaxot qiden keenaanih gide.
Gabah xageenik sahda mudda keenaanih gide.
Ken xageenik, birta kee macaxut ken xagan.
Maraaqaanay cararak yambaxen» 'yaanam iyye.
Dawud qaskarih addak agiirah ten qaskarih migaq ah kaana. Naharsi agirii, Yoseb-Basseebet deqsitak yeneeh; elle yoobokem, Tahkemon deqsita araca. ‹Yaaxigen Sidoc› deqsita marih abbah yen. Bacra bool yakke marat macaxut qeebi abeeh, inki saakih carbit too bacra boolih num selli hee.
Nammayhaytoh agiri Acowi-gulubuh yooboke Doodó-Alqedar deqsita numuk teneeh, Yaaxigen Sidocuk nammayhaytô numuh yen. Ayrok teena kaa kee Dawud Filistiin maray qeebih gaaboowehiyyat qeebi abeenih; too qeebil Israayil mari qeebik fanak keenik kude waqdi,
Alqedar isi aracak angayye'kal gaba kaak cawalah kaffa intam fan, Filistiin mara seefit selak suge. YALLI too saaku kaxxa nasri keenih yecee. Carbi gaba kale waqdi, Israayil mari Alqedar qeebit elle caben ikke yuduureeniih tokkel rabe marak silac kalen.
Yaaxigen Sidocuk sidochaytuh tenem, Haraar rasul yooboke Aagâ-baxi Samma deqsita agiruk ten. Ayrok teena Laci deqsita rasul, missir elle yoobokeh yen buqreh garil, Filistiin mari qeebih mododeh suge. Israayil mari ken yuble waqdi yoowweh immay,
Samma makudinnay buqreh addal elle yeede. Oson kaat aban atka isik waasak, afah-afah ken qide. Tonnal too ayro kaadu YALLI too qeebil kaa yiysiiseh.
«Yaaxigen Soddom» deqsita agiirak sidooca num daro edde orbisan uddurut Dawud fan yemeeten. Dawud too saaku Qadullam rasul tan gablah addal suge. Filistiin mari kaadu Refaayim Golo deqsitta golol addal yinfiddigeenih yenen.
Too saaku Dawud amô reebu le aracay uqurah meqehiyyal sugeeh; Filistiin mari Beetlacam magaala yibbixeh yen.
Sarrak Dawud isi baaxoh lee kassa heeh, too waqdi iyyeemih, «Beetlacam magaalah afal yan qeelih lee yoh baaha num genniyooy faxe raareh an» iyye.
Too waqdi too sidooca agiri Filistiin-mari elle yan aracak adda-adda gacca 'yeenih too qeelak lee qulla heenih Dawuduh baahen. Dawuduh tu gactek too leek maaqabinnay YALLIH sadgatah baaxot tet caxe.
Sarrak iyyemii, «YALLAW, a lee aaqubem yol matan. A lee a sidiica numuy isi roocih meysite'kah a marak adda gacca 'yeh a lee baahehiyyah qabala yaaqubeenimih bis le» iyye. Tohuk gexxaamah too lee maaqubinna.
Woo sidooca agiruh tu gactek, ken abini wohuk wadir amixxiguk raaqe.
Yowabak toobokoytah yen Abiisay «Yaaxigen-Soddom» deqsita soddomuk abbah yen. Yowab kee Abiisay-ina Xaruya deqsitta barrak ten. Ayrok teena Abiisay inki macaxu luk sidooca bool yakke marat qeebi abeeh; too marak inkih yeyseh ken qideh.
Tonna-leemiik too Soddomih addat yimixxige agiruh raaqeeh, abba keenik yekke. Takkay immay «Yaaxigen Sidocih» inna migaq gexxoh luk mananna.
Yoyadáq-Banaaya kaadu kaak kaxxih yamixxige agiruk ten. Banaaya elle yoobokem, Kabxaqel deqsitta magaalak ten. Banaaya abinnaan taamal qangik ten. Mooyab marak namma agiru qide. Ayrok teena arroqle le rob radak sugeeh; too ayro Banaaya boodoh adda cule waqdi, lubak kaah sugeeh; too lubak qideh.
Tohuk kalah kaadu kaxxam masu naba Masri-num qideeh, too num gabat macaxu luk yene'mmay, Banaaya naharak gabah caxxat kaa yoogoreeh, sarrak gabat luk suge macaxu gabak kaak bukkussa heeh, woo macaxut kaa qide.
Toh agiruh yan Banaaya abe taama. Banaaya Yaaxigen Soddomih adoytak ten. A Soddomih addat migaaqat akak yabba yan numuk tene'mmay, Yaaxigen Sidoc gide migaq-gexxoh luk mananna. Dawud isit dacayrih tan qaskarak abba kaa abe.
Yaaxigen Soddomuk Banaaya deqsita numuk kalih, adoytiitih migaq ah kaana. Yowab toobokoyta Qasahel kee, Doodó-Elcananay Beetlacamal yooboke kee,
Samma kee Aliika deqsitta labhay Carodul tooboke kee,
Feletil yooboke Celex kee, Qikkés-Qiira deqsita agiruy Takooqal yooboke kee,
Qanatot magaalal yooboke Abiqeder kee, Cuusâ rasul yooboke Mabunnay kee,
Ahowil yooboke Xalmon kee, Netoofal yooboke Mahray kee,
Baqná-Celeb deqsita agiruy Netoofal yooboke kee, Riibáy-Ittay deqsita agiruy Benyam rasuk Gibqal yooboke kee,
Banaaya deqsita agiruy Firqaton rasul yooboke kee, Gaqas goloh garil yooboke Hidday kee,
Arbatal yooboke Abiqalbon kee, Bacurim yooboke Qadmawet kee,
Saqalbonul yooboke Elyacba kee, Yaasen xaylo kee,
Sammâ-Yonaatan deqsita agiruy Haraaral yooboke kee, Saarár-Aciyam deqsita agiruy Haraaral yooboke kee,
Acasbúy-Elifalatay Maqkal yooboke kee, Acitoofál-Alyamay Gilô-rasul yooboke kee,
Karmel rasul yooboke Cesro kee, Arbaq rasul yooboke Faqray kee,
Xooba rasul yooboke Naatán-Yigal kee, Gaad rasul yooboke Baani kee,
Qammon marah yooboke Xelek kee, Beerot rasul yooboke Nacarayay Yowab-macaxu akkuquk yenehiyya kee,
Yitra deqsita gulubuh tooboke Qiira kee Gareeb deqsitta labhah nammey kee
Ciitah yooboke Uriyya.
Tittat soddom kee malcina agiru akkuk yenen.

YALLI qagisak Israayil ummatta yinqibeeh, Dawud gabat ken biyaakam faxe. Kaak iyyeemih, «Gexay Israayil kee Yuudah ummattak loowo abaay yakkeenih gide wagit» iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud qaskar abbah yen Yowabah amri yeceeh iyyemii, «Qaskar abbobti lih gacca 'xicay, inkih tan Israayil kedooda elle geytimma 'ta baaxok, woo qaxaay a qaxa fanat, yakkeenih gide keenik looway am. Qadad keenik aaxigem faxak» iyye.
Yowab kaak iyyeemih, «Atu addunyal elle anuk, YALLAY ku Dageltah yanihiyya Israayil mara away yakkeenih gidek bool adda ken yaymaggay. Tonna'mmay annah taniimit macah assa?» kaak iyye.
Takkay immay Malik Dawud, kaa kee kaa'lih tan qaskar-abbobtik, «Anu siinik axcem aba» iyyeeh, too waqdi Israayil-ummatta loowaana'gidih kay garik ugteenih gexen.
Ordon-weeqaytuk tabba 'yeenih, golô-gudel tan magaala kee Qarooqer deqsitta magaalal loowo qimbisen. Sarrak Gaad-rasuk tabeenih, kiblatat raqta Yaqder deqsita arac fan gexen.
Sarrak Gilqad-rasu kee Kaadis deqsitta magaalay Ciitâ-rasul tanihiyya
Too magaalak gabbi-qaxal geytimta Suur-magaalay gaso maroh edde tanihiyya yemeeten. Tokkek Ciiwi kee Kanqaan magaalooli inkih yemeeten. Ellecabol Yuudâ-rasuk gabbi-qaxat raqte Bersabaq deqsitta magaala yemeeten.
Tonnal sagla alsa kee labaatanni ayroh addat inkih tan baaxo gufeenik lakal, Yarusalaam yuduuren.
Sarrak malikik iyyeenimii, «Israayil-rasul qaskarat gacu duuda marih loowo bacra boolih alfih num tekkeeh; Yuudâ-rasuluuy koona boolih alfih num yekken» iyyen.
Dawud ta marih loowok gaba kale waqdi, umam abem kay xagar kaah warse. Too waqdi, «YALLAW, kaxxa dambi lem baaheh aniih, duqur abe waamat aseh anik, qafu yoh ab» iyye.
Dawud saaku xiinik ugutak dumal, YALLI, Gaad deqsita nabiy Dawuduh Yallih farmo baahak yenehiyyak iyyeemih,
«Gexay Dawuduk intaamahaa, ‹Sidoocaamak taysem dooritaay, atu doorittem abeyyo› kaak inxic» iyyeeh; a sidoocam a nabih warissa heeh kaa ruube.
Dawud xiinik ugte waqdi, Gaad kaal yemeeteeh, YALLI kaah ruube farmo kaah warse. Kaak iyyeemih, «YALLI, ‹Sidooca sanatih qulul kee, sidooca alsa naqboytit koo ayraradduk sugtam kee, sidooca ayro tabu le dalka siinit ruubaamak, kol aysinnaanim doorit› kok iyye. Taway intu waytam cubbus; axcinnaanim YALLA fan gacsam faxak» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud iyyeemih, «Anu taway tu edde ceda caalatat anih maana'mmay, sahda yoo digaaltaamak YALLI isi gabat yoo digalsitay. Toh akah axcem, kaxxa racmatta le Dagelta kinnim kaak aaxigeemih axce» iyye.
Tohuk wadir YALLI Israayil rasul dalka ruubeeh; too saakih maacak xabba haanamaay Yalli isih woo lakima eyseedeyya haam fanah, inkih yan Israayil rasul malcina-tabanih alfih num too dalkat rabe.
Too dalkat sahda qidak suge malaykatti, Yarusalaam magaalah mara kaadu edde qidam faxak suge. Too waqdi YALLI a mara digaalaamak qaadeeh; malaykattuk, «Ahaysa qidim eyseedey sinaamak qiddem duddak» iyye. Woo malaykatti woo waqdi Ornan deqsita numuy Yabuusa deqsita marah yoobokehiyyah aracay darok caffa elle kalaanahiyyah garil soolak suge.
Dawud woo malaykattuy ummatta qidahiyya yubleeh, too waqdi YALLAK iyyeemih, «Qellatat asseeh ceele-waytih tanim abtem yook, too qellatah, yoo kee yi buxah mara akah digaal. A masaakiina maca bahteeh macah digaalta?» iyye.
Too ayrot Gaad Dawud fan yemeeteeh, iyyeemih, «Ugutay Ornan le aracay daro caffak elle baxsaanahiyyal, YALLAH sadgat elle abtu wayta arac bicis» kaak iyye.
Dawud YALLI ab kaak iyyem oggoleeh; Gaad kaak gexa iyye ikke gexeh.
Ornan addah wagga hee waqdi, malik kee kay gubal taamita maray kay fanah yamaatehiyya yuble. Too waqdi Dawuduk foocal massakaxxah qansah baaxo xagam fan qununna 'yeeh,
iyyemii, «Yi malikow, akke yoo fan macah temeetee?» iyye.
Dawud kaal gacseemih, «Ku aracay darok caffa elle kaltahiyyal a lakimay sahda selahiyya nek gexa'gidih, YALLIH migaaqal sadgat elle aban arac haam faxaah, too arac kok xaama'gidih emeete» iyye.
Ornan, «Meqeh hay! Elli hay. Yallih migaaqal sadgatah isih faxxa haytam yok beetto. Sadgat elle aban aracal sadgatah qiddu wayta awurwa, ah kaanak, bey. Darok caffa edde kalan coox kee *madmad kaadu, ah kaanaay; sadgatah tasguudu wayta saqih cado elle alaysetto.
Amoytaw, anu tohim inkih koh aceeh an» kaak iyye. Sarrak, «YALLAY ku Dagelta kinnihiyya atu abta sadgat koh oggolay» kaak iyye.
Too tiyak malik kaal gacseemih, «Aleey, foyyah kok mabeyaay, kok xaameyyo. Tu edde ecee wee duyyet, sadgat inni Dageltah maaba» iyye. Sarrak too arac kee awurwa too numuh lakqok kontom garsi elle yecee.
Limok gaba kale waqdi, YALLAH sadgat elle aban arac bicseeh; tohuk lakal woo aracal cado akak carrisan laa sadgatah elle qide. Tonnah kaadu, amaanah xiinaanamih astah aban sadgat abe. Too waqdi YALLI kay sadgat oggoleeh, lakimi Israayil baaxok inkih yeerreh.

Malik Dawud kaxxam bar yembeeh idoolinni kaat yemeete saaku, xagar kaak waacitak yeneeh, sara kaal haanamah kaah xiqtam luk mananna.
Toh yublen waqdi, kay gubal taamitak yen mari kaak iyyemii, «Gexxa inneh baxuwwâ-baxay bikrit taniih amo kok wagittaah garit kok gactaah qaxah gacca 'teh xagar kok waacite kaltahiyya koh gorrisnu wayna» kaak iyyen.
Toh kaak inxicca 'yeeniih, sarrak inkih yan Israayil rasul qax-meqe baxuwwah goranat gacen. Qaxah oson faxan inna le baxuwwa Suunem deqsita aracal geen. Geen awká migaaqah Abiisag deqsitak ten. Malik fan tet baahen.
Awká nabam qax-muquk teneeh; malik garik gexak manannay, amo kaak wagitak ten. Takkay immay usuk fido teetit faxeh mananna.
Dawud xaylok Absalaam ciggiltam, ina akak Caggit deqsitta barrah baxay Qadoona deqsitahiyyak ten. Qadoona kaxxa qax-maqaane luk yen. Kay abba usuk faxem abaamah, kaa assacakkuk mananna. Qadoona malik yakkem faxak yen. Tohuk gexxaamah faras-gaari kee mango faariisa kee kontom numuy dacayrih kaat gactu waytahiyya naharal elle bical haysiteh yen.
Mala Yowab kee Sek-Abiyataaral baaheeh, keenik iyyeemih, «Ahaysa malik anu akkem faxak, maca siinit celtaa?» iyye. Oson too mala yoobben waqdi kaak raabiteenih, «Faxxaamah ku xaqut nan» iyyen. Yowab-ina Xaruya deqsitta barrak ten.
Sek-Saaduk kee Yoyadáq-Banaaya kee Nabi-Naatan kee Simqi kee Reeqi kee Dawudut dacayrih ten qaskar a malat kaa'lih mananna.
Ayrok teena Qadoona, Qenrogel deqsita buyyih garil yen xaay Docelet deqsitahiyyal illiiy awurwa kee, nagay mulkuqusen rugaage sadgatah qide. Too sadgatah Suleemanak kalih tooboko kee, malik gubal taamita maray Yuudâ-rasuk yemeetehiyyah inkih seece.
Takkay immay nabi-Naatan kee Banaaya kee, malikit dacayrih ten qaskar kee, toobokoytah yen Suleemanah woo sadgatah maseecinnaay ken cabeh.
Toh yuble waqdi, Nabi Naatan, Suleeman inay migaaqah Batsabaq deqsittahiyya fan gexeh, teetik iyyeemih, «Qadoona, Malik Dawud aabbe'kal, isih malik is abem maabbitoo?» teetik iyye.
«Taway is kee isi baxih rooci cattam faxxek, koo fayisu waa!
Ta waqdiik Malik Dawud fan gexxa xicay, ‹Yi malikow, yi lakal malik takku waytam ku baxa Suleeman, 'yaanamih qahdi yoh culte way, Qadoona malik elle yekkem manna?› kaak inxic.
Too waqdi atu too yaabat anih, anu amaateyyooh, atu intam numma kinnim kaah warseyyo» teetik iyye.
Too fayu kaak oggolteeh, malik fan gexxeh, xinti qari kaal culte. Too waqdi Malik Dawud kaxxam idooliteh yeneh; Suunem rasuk baahen Abiisag deqsita qax-meqe baxuwwa amo kaak wagitak kay garil sugte.
Batsabaq kay massakaxxah qununna 'te. Too waqdi malik, «Maca faxak temeete?» teetik iyye.
Is kaak inteemih, «Yi malikow, yi baxi ku lakal malik akkeleemih YALLAY ku Dagelta kinnihiyyah migaaqal xagana yoh culteh sugte.
Takkay immay Qadoona, atu aaxige'kal, away malik yekke.
Sadgatah awurwa kee nagay mulkuqusen rugaage kee mango illi qide. Too sadgatah ku xaylooy, sek Abiyataar kee qaskar abbah yan Yowabah seeceh immay, ku Suleemanah maseecinna.
Malikow, Israayil mari yakkeenimiik atu isi lakal malik abtu wayta num ken taysixxigem kok faxan.
Ahat yaabe'kal Yallih amri kol yemeetek, yoo kee yi baxak umeyniti axceloonuuh; toh nel matamqa» axcuk,
too yaabat tan waqdi nabi Naatan yemeeteh.
Malik Dawuduh nabi Naatan yemeetem warseeniih; Naatan addah kaal cule. Malik foocal kay massakaxxah qununna 'yeeh; sarrakaa,
«Yi malikow, ‹Yi lakal malik takku waytam Qadoona› 'yaanam maay intee?» iyye. Sarrak kaadu qagseh iyyeemih,
«Ta saakih ayro sadgatah awurwa kee nagay mulkuqusen rugaage kee mango illi qideeh, too sadgatah ku xayloh inkih seece. Qaskar abbah yan Yowab kee sek Abiyataarah edde seece. Too mari taway too sadgatih makum kee maqubut kaa'lih yaniih, ‹Malik Qadoona ani haay! Malik Qadoona ani haay!› axcuk yanin.
Sadgatah yoo kee sek Saaduk kee Banaaya kee Suleemanah maseecinna.
Hay, ku lakal malik yakku waa num, neey ku gubal taamitahiyyah warse'kal, aham takkay intem koo innaa?» iyye.
Toh yoobbe waqdi Malik Dawud, «Gexay Batsabaqak uduuray addah cula inxica» iyye. Is temeete waqdi,
teetik iyyemii, «Ku baxi Suleeman yi lakal malik akkeleemih, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyah migaaqal abe xiiba, a saaku duuduseyyoomuh, YALLAY waaraah kulli gadaamak yoo yeyyeeqehiyyah migaaqal koh xiibita» teetik iyye.
Too waqdi Batsabaq kay massakaxxah qununna 'te. Sarrak, «Yi amoytih qumri yaxxeeray» kaak inte.
Tohuk lakal Malik Dawud, «Sek Saaduk kee nabi Naatan kee Yoyadáq-Banaaya yoh seeca» iyye. Too mari kaal yemeete waqdi,
keenik iyyemii, «Cokmi abbobti isinni lih hayya haay, yi Suleeman yi bakilit korissi haay Gicoon buyyi fan kaa beya.
Tokkel isin sek Saaduk kee nabi Naatanak, Israayil malik yakke'gidih, kaa uskuta. Tohuk gaba kaltan waqdi, *baanta uguraay anay fayya haay, ‹Malik Suleeman ani haay! Malik Suleeman ani haay!› inxica.
Akke yi dardaarinnih korsil daffeya'gidih yamaate waqdi, kay lakat ama. Yi lakal malik takku waytam kaa. Israayil kee Yuudah ummattak malik yakke'gidih doorem kaa» iyye.
Yoyadáq-Banaaya iyyeemih, «Yi malikow, atu intem abennok, YALLAY ku Dagelta kinni edde yangalay!
YALLAY ko'lih sugehiyya kaadu Suleeman lih gacay. YALLI kay dardaarinni ku dardaarinnak kinni-way nabnah yaysiisay» iyye.
Tohuk lakal sek Saaduk kee nabi Naatan kee Yoyadáq-Banaaya kee, Dawudut dacayrih tan qaskar, Suleeman Malik Dawud bakilil hayya heenih, isinnih lakat kaak gacca 'yeenih, Gicoon buyyi fan kaa been.
Tokkel, Sek Saaduk, Yallih Nabnah-Siraqih addak mingilil baahe caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeytit (saliidit) malik yakke'gidih, Suleeman yuskute. Sarrak baanta yoogoreeniih, too waqdi tokkel suggu 'ye mari inkih anay fayya haak, «Malik Suleeman ani haay! Malik Suleeman ani haay!» iyyen.
Tohuk lakal yakkeenimiik lakak kaa katayak, qililisakaay fooxima fooxisak, baaxo edde engeyya 'ta farcih africuk, Yarusalaam fan yuduuren.
Qadoona kee kay mara maaqok gaba elle kalte ikkel, a xongolo keenil radde. Yowab baantah anay yoobbeeh, «Sugay, a gideh xongolo magaalal akah raddam macaa?» iyyeh esserak suge waqdi,
Sek Abiyataar baxi Yonaatan yemeete. Qadoona kaa yuble waqdi, «Adda culey, meqe num kinnitooh meqe xaagu bahte kook» iyye.
Yonaatan iyyemii, «Ee, meqe xaaguh baaham mayyu. Malik-Dawud Suleeman malik abeeh,
