Sek Saaduk kee nabi Naatan kee Yoyadáq-Banaaya kee kaat dacayrih tan qaskarak, ‹Kaa katayaay, Suleeman yi bakilih amol hay beya› iyye.
Saaduk kee Naatanak, ‹Isin Gicoon buyyih garil kaa uskuta› 'yaanam iyye. Tohuk gaba kalen waqdi, too mari wallitakaay kayyiqtu edde haak magaala yemeeteenih; away aabbuk sugteenim too xongolo.
Suleeman malik yekkeeh, away dardaarinni-korsil daffeya.
Wohoysa kaadu doolat-abbobti Malik Dawud fan gexxeeh; too mari, ‹Ku Dagelti, Suleemanah kok tayse migaq-gexxo kee midir yacaay› kaak iyyen. Too waqdi Malik Dawud isi qarkaytoh amook, Yallih nabnah massakaxxah qununna 'yeh,
sarrak dooqa abe. Dooqah iyyemii, ‹YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinni faylisnay. Kaay anu addunyâ-bagul anih, yi sammok yooboke yi baxa yi lakal malik akkih abali yoo heehiyyah fayla taafay› 'yaanam iyye» keenik iyye.
Toh yoobben waqdi, Qadoonah-sadgatah yemeeteh suge mari meysiteeh, yakkeenimiik ugutta 'yeenih, mariiy isi qaxal keenik gexe.
Qadoona Suleemanak abeh yan meysik gexxaamah, Yallih Nabnah-Siraq fan gexxa 'yeeh, sadgat elle aban aracak affara ruknil tan gaysoosi gabah xabba hee.
Sarrak Malik Suleeman, Qadoona kay meysih too aracak gaysoosit kafimih yanih, «Malik Suleeman yoo qide waamah, yoh xiibite ikkal takkek mawqa» iyye 'yaanam yoobbe.
Too waqdi Suleeman iyyeemih, «Yaaminen num yekkek, gabah kaa xagtam matan. Yaaminen num akke week, rabi kaak raq mali» iyye.
Sarrak Qadoona fan sinam ruubeeh, woo mari too aracak kaa kaleh. Qadoona Suleeman fan yemeete waqdi, massakaxxah qununna kaah iyye. Too waqdi malik kaak iyyeemih, «Ahaysa isi buxah gexxaasit» iyye.

Dawudut rabi xayyoowe waqdi, Suleemanah secca 'yeeh, fayu kaah yecee. Dawud Suleemanak annah iyye,
«Anu ahaysa diikô-num akku waah aniih, tonna'mmay, atu abinnaanimil digga le num tikay, labhaytu tik.
YALLAY ku Dagelta kinnihiyya ab kok axcinnaanim abay, kay gitat gex. Muusal oobe kitaabal tan Yallih xinto kee madqaay, kay baritto kee kay amri inkih duudus. Tonnal abinnaanim gabal kok amqeleeh, elle gexinnaan ikkel abinnaanim gabal kok bicele.
YALLI yok iyyeemih, ‹Ku ramad anu aba axcem baguuk agaagul sinnim abeenik, Israayil amoytit ken abeyyoomuh qahdi koh cula› 'yaanam yok iyyeh yan. Tonna kinnuk atu kay amri oggoltek, YALLI too qahdi koh duudusele» kaak iyye.
«Tohuk kalah koh warsam liyo» kaak iyye. «Toh macaay intek, duma Yowab yol baahem taaxigeh. Israayil qaskarih abbobtik namma num qidem kassa koo. Nér-Abner kee Yetér-Qamasa qiddem kaa. Qeebi addat ken maqidinnaay, baaxo wagarih tan saaku, loowitiik ken qidem atu isih kassittah. Tu baahe wee mara annaak qide. Usuk abe umaane kay fillal raqtaah akah biyaakitam kaal tan» iyye.
«Kaak abtam ahaysa isih taaxige. Amrih rabam kaah maqambaalin.
«Gilqad rasul yooboke Bardillayah xayloh emeqaay amo keenik wagit. Woh akah kok axcem, ku toobokoyta Absalaamak kude saaku yoh yemqeenih yenen.
«Gerá-Simqi deqsita numuy, Benyam kedoh yoobokeeh Bacurim magaalal yoobokehiyya yol baahem mahawweenin. Too num anu Macanaayim deqsita arac fan kudak suge waqdi, kaxxa abaaro yot abe. Takkay immay sarrak Ordon weeqaytih garil nongoorowe saaku, kaa qide waamah YALLIH migaaqal kaah xiibite.
Tahak wadir too num meqe num makkalin. Kasah igintom mantu immay kaak abtam isih taaxige. Amok qabal tif kaak axcuk kabri akah cula'nnah kaak ab» 'yaanam farrintoh kaak iyye.
Sarrak Dawud amrih rabeeh, Yarusalaamal geytimta Dawud-Magaalal yaaxigen caafatal kaa yoogoqen.
Malik Dawud malcina sanat Cebroonul malikih sugeeh, aki soddom kee sidooca sanat Yarusalaamal malikih suge. Sittat morootom sanatih gide Israayil marak malikih suge.
Suleeman, abba lakal malik yekkeeh; dardaarinni kaak kaxxa maqar baahe.
Ayrok teena Qadoona Batsabaq fan yemeete. Batsabaq, Suleeman inak ten. Batsabaq Qadoona teetil yemeetem tuble waqdi, «Akah temeetem nagayna?» kaak inte.
Qadoona, «Nagayna» iyye.
«Nagayna immay, kok axcem faxam liyo» teetik iyye.
«Maca yok intam faxxa?» kaak inte.
«Akah taaxige innah, yi abbah arac ciggiltaah malik takkem yook teneeh; inkih tan Israayil ummat malikih loowitak sugtem yook ten. Tohim makkinnaay, yi toobokoyti malik yekke. Tohim kaadu YALLAK yemeete amrih tekkeemi.
Toh too tiyaay; awayah tu gactek, koo esseram faxam liyo'mmay, ku maganak yok macinin» teetik iyye.
Batsabaq, «Yaabit maca lek?» kaak inte.
«Ku maganak, Suunem baahen Abiisag deqsitta baxuwwa rihimih faxah anik, Malik Suleeman lih atu yabtek, kok macinak, ‹Too awká kaah ab› yoh inxic» teetik iyye.
«Meqeh! Malik lih koh yaabeyyo» kaak inte.
Sarrak Batsabaq malik lih Qadoona qaadat yabta'gidih gexxe. Malik isi ina temeete waqdi, elle suge aracak salaamatta teetih aba'gidih ugutta 'yeeh, massakaxxah qununna teetih iyye. Sarrak isi dardaarinnih korsih yuduure. Teetih kaadu elle daffeyta dardaarinni-korsi bahsiiseh kaak migda le kabul heen. Is too korsil daffeyte.
Tohuk lakal kaak intemii, «Dago caagid-baxa kot faxa'mmay, ku maganah, yok macinin» kaak inte.
Suleeman, «Yi inay, kok aabbu waak, intam faxxam inxicey» teetik iyye.
«Ku saqalah yan Qadoona, Abiisag rihimih abtam faxak, kaah acuy» kaak inte.
«Yi-inay, ah macah yok intaa? Tonnal a dardaarinna kaadu edde kaah ucuya yok intam tayse. Usuk yok saqalah yaniih, sek Abiyataar kee Yowab kay qaxa tanim mataaxiga?» teetik iyye.
Sarrak Suleeman YALLIH migaaqal xiibiteh, iyyeemih, «Qadoona, taham essereemih rabi digaala kaat abe wayya heek, Yalli yot cabe waay!
YALLI yi abbah aracal yoo hayya heeh digga yot hee. Qahdi akah culem duuduseeh, abbootan yoo kee yi ramadah yecee. YALLAY waarahiyyah migaaqal xiibita: Qadoonal, ta saakut edde, rabâ-cokmi kaal abeyyo» iyye.
Tohuk gexxaamah Malik Suleeman Banaayak, «Qadoona qid» 'yaanam iyyeeh; too num gexeh kaa qide.
Tohuk wadir Suleeman sek Abiyataarak iyyeemih, «Ahaysa Qanatotul geytinta isi buxah gex! Rabi kol amaatuk yene'mmay, yi abba lih ten saaku, gibdaabina kaa'lih tubleeh, YALLAY mulki lehiyyah Qahdih Sandug akkaquk sugte. Tohih sabbatah away koo maqida» kaak iyye.
Tohuk wadir YALLAH abak yen seekâ-taamak kaa kaleh. Toh abe waqdi, YALLI, Sek-Qeli kee kay ramadat akkele iyyem nummak maacisse.
Yowab tekkem yoobbeh. Duma Absalaam hinna'mmay, Qadoonâ-qaxa gaceh suge. Too waqdi Yallih Nabnah-Siraq fan gexeeh, tokkel sadgat elle aban aracak gaysoosi gabah xabba hee.
Malik Suleeman, «Yowab kudeeh, YALLIH Nabnah Siraqih addal yan sadgat elle aban aracak xaqut yani» 'yaanam yoobbe waqdi, Banaaya ruubeeh, «Kaa qida» iyye.
Banaaya Yallih Nabnah-Siraq fan gexeeh, Yowabak, «Malik eweq kok iyyah yan» iyye.
Yowab, «Akkel elle rabeyyo ikkal mawqa» iyye. Banaaya wadir yuduureeh, Yowab kaak iyyem malikih warse.
Suleeman, «Wohoysa usuk faxam kaah ab. Qidda kaa haay elle kaa uguqay cab; usuk abem yoo kee yi abbah ramadih fillal maraqtak. Tu baahe wee mara annaak qide.
Yi abba aaxige'kal, kaak yeyse maray tu baahe weehiyya qide. Tohuh YALLI kaa digaalele. Qidem, Israayil qaskarak abbah yen Abner kee, Yuudâ-qaskarih abbah yen Qamasa deqsita numu.
Yowab ta marat abe qidim kaa kee kay ramadih fillal raqtay. Takkay immay Dawud kee kay buxah maraay kaak rade mara kee keenik qarkayto nagrinnaan num, YALLI kulli waqdi amaanah xiinisay» 'yaanam kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal Banaaya Yallih Nabnah-Siraq fan yuduureeh, Yowab qide. Sarrak magaqah kay baaxo kaa beeniih, kay qariy barril geytimahiyyah garil kaa yoogoqen.
Too waqdi Suleeman, Yowab luk suge qaskar abbootan Banaayah yecee. Abiyataar luk suge seekah abbootan Saadukuh yecee.
Tohuk lakal Malik Suleeman Simqih farmo ruubeeh, «Ama» kaak iyye. Kaa baahen waqdi, kaak iyyemii, «Yarusalaamal qari xissa haay buxah gacaay, magaalak mawqin.
Magaalak tewqeeh Kidroon buyyik bisoh iba hayte koo tekkek, raba isih isil tuckumem ixigaay, numuk tu mawan» 'yaanam kaak iyye.
Simqi, «Malikow, meqeh, atu axcinnaanim abeyyo» iyye. Sarrak Yarusalaamal mango wakti suge.
Sidooca sanatak wadir Simqi yeddereh suge naqoosak nammay Gat deqsitta baaxol yen malik fan kuden. Too malik migaaqah Maqká-Aakis deqsitak yen. Simqi naqoosa kaak Gat fan gexxem yoobbe waqdi,
dananal koori haysitta heeh, kaak gexxe naqoosa goranah Gat fan gexe. Tokke gufe waqdi ken geeh gabat ken baahe.
Suleeman Simqi abem yoobbe waqdi,
farmo kaah ruubeeh «Ama» kaak iyye. Kaa baahen waqdi, kaak iyyemii, «Yarusalaamak awqe waytuh YALLIH migaaqal koo xibsiiseh en. Gexxek koo qideyyom koh warseh en. Atu kaadu, ‹Meqeh magexa; gexek rabi yol yamaatay› inteh ten.
Hay, YALLIH migaaqal abte xiibay koo absiisehiyya akah makteeh, yi amri akah cintem maca?
Yi abbal bahtem taaxigeh, hawwen akak mantu. Tohuh YALLI koo digaaleleeh,
yot barkat heeleeh; Dawud-dardaarinna YALLIH foocal baxak baxal waarele» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal malik, Banaayak, «Gexay Simqi qiday am» iyyeeh, too num gexeh kaa qide. Tohuk lakal inkih tan Israayil baaxo Suleeman milkih gacte.

Suleeman Masri-malikik-baxá rihimih abiteeh, qalla kaa'lih haysite. Yarusalaamal isi qari kee YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari xissa heeh, Yarusalaam magaalat gaso maroh haam fanah, Dawud-Caafat deqsita caafatal tet hee.
Too dabaanal, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari xissiimeh manannaay; tonna-leemik ummatta qibaada elle aban aroocay fayyat raqtahiyyal sadgat abak ten.
Suleeman YALLA kicinuk yeneeh, isi-abbah-raat kataatak yen. Takkay immay too qibaada elle aban aroocay fayyat raqtahiyyal sadgatah saq qidak yeneh, qaydarus kaadu sadgatah qeerisak yen.
Sahda kaxxam tassakaxxem, Gibqon magaalal fayya le aracal yen sadgat-araca. Suleeman gexeh, tokkel sadgat abe. Too sadgatih aracal Suleeman saqak alfi takkem cado-akak-carrisan-sadgatah qidak yen.
Too bar YALLI Suleemanah yumbulleeh, kaak iyyeemih, «Maca koh abam faxxaah, yoo esseritey» iyye.
Suleeman YALLAK iyyemii, «Yi-abba-Dawuduy ku naqasuh yenehiyyah kaxxa kacanu luk sugteeh; usuk kaadu baguuk kol yaamineeh, cakki-kee qadaalat-le numuk ten. Atu kaah abak sugte maqaane kaak mayseedinnitooy, a saaku kay baxa kay qarkaytol hayte.
YALLAW, yi Dageltaw, yooy ku-naqasuh-yanihiyya yi abbah aracal hayte. Tonna'mmay anu ahayduma qunxa num kinniyoh, sahda elle xiinisa inna matteexega.
Anu akah table'nnah, atu doorte maray mangah loowo akak duudume waytahiyyah abba yoo abteh tan.
Tonna'mmay ku ummatta qadaalatat edde xiinisaah, umam-kee-meqem-edde-baxisa-kas yoh acuyey. Too kas aalle week, a-axxul le ku mara qadlit xiinisam maduuda» iyye.
Suleemanak Yalli too yab kaxxam yossokooteeh;
tonna leemiik kaak iyyemii, «Qumri xexxar yoh ucuy yok maxaccitooy, gaddaliino yoh ucuy yok maxaccitooy, naqboytit yoh qid yok maxaccito. Tohuk tu maxaccitoy, missah yan cokmit ummatta-edde-xiinisa-kas yoh ucuy yok inteehiiy;
too atu-faxxem koh aceeyyo. Kas kee bagi-cubbiy sahdayti ahayduma gee weeh, sarra gee wayu-waa koh aceeyyo.
Kalah kaadu, atu yoo essere waytem koh abeyyo. Addunyal tanim fan kok kalih malik aalle waa gaddaliino kee nabna kot heeyyo.
Toh lih kaadu, ku-abba-Dawud akah abak suge innah, anu-kok-aba-axcem abteeh yi xinto kee yi amri inkih tugdubek, qumri kok ayxeereyyo» 'yaanam kaak iyye.
Suleeman xiinik ugte waqdi, Yalli soonol kaa'lih yaabem yeexegeh. Sarrak Yarusalaam magaala gexeeh, YALLIH Qahdi-addat-akak-yan-Sanduguk foocal sollu 'yeh, cado-akak-carrisan-sadgatah saq qide. Tonnah kaadu, amaanah-xiinaanamih-asta-yakke-sadgat abeeh, kaa'lih taamita marah inkih xigla abe.
Ayrok teena xiiqareh-xiinah yan agbi malikil yemeete.
Ken nammayak tiyak teena annah kaak inte. «Amoytaw, yoo kee a barra inki qaril naniih; is yo'lih tan waqdi, anu lab-baxa xale.
Namma ayrok lakal is kaadu lab-baxa xalte. Too waqdi tet kee yok sa, woo qaril num mananna.
Barak teena garciik isi baxak bagul korteeh; woo awkiiy ufuy weeh edde rabe.
Too waqdi barat uguttu 'teh anu xiinit an waqdi, yi baxa yi garik beyya hayteh isi qarkaytol hayya hayte. Sarrak rabe awka yi qarkaytoh bagul hayya hayte.
Maaca awka angu aysaaxe'gidih ugte waqdi, rabeh suge. Kaxxam xayyowwa exceh kaa wagte waqdi, yi baxak masuginna» 'yaanam inte.
Nammeyhaytô-barrah tu gactek, annah inte. «Aleeyyah, rabe-awki ku baxaay; nuwwi-awki yi baxa» 'yaanam inte.
Naharat yabte barra, «Aleeyyah, rabe-awki ku baxaay; nuwwi-awki yiimi» inte. Tonnal malik foocal titta weenih.
Too waqdi Suleeman iyyemii, «Kulli tiya siinik, ‹Nuwwi-awki yiimiiy, rabe-awki yim hinna› 'yaanam inteenik,
wonnal, seef yoh baaha» iyyeeh; woo seef baahen waqdi,
«Ama-nuwwi-awka namma'kkel kurra haay tiyahaay garab keenih akak acuya» iyye.
Too waqdi nummah inak afqadot baxi kacni culeeh, «Amoytaw, ku maganak, awka maqidinay teetih acuy» inte.
Aki barraay, «Nek numuh maacanay kaa qiday namma'kkel neh kur» inte.
Tohuk lakal Suleeman annah iyye. «Awka miqidinay naharat yabte barrah acuy; nummah-ina teeti» iyye.
Israayil mari Suleeman a namma barrah yab elle kure'nna yoobben waqdi, kaxxam kaa yessekexxen. Kaa akah yessekexxeenim, usuk too ayrook lakal, Yalli sahdâ tittin-way missat edde bicsa kas kaah yeceem yeexegeenimi.

Suleeman inkih tan Israayilik malikih yen.
Kay gubal taamitak yen maray kaxxa-kaxxa-marih taamah-luk-yenehiyya iyyaay innek, Saadúk-Qadarya diini-abbah yen.
Siisâ-xayloh-nammayay migaaqah Aciiya kee Alicoref deqsitahiyya kutbe-abeenitik ten. Aciilúd-Yacoosafat takkem-yaktubih yen.
Yoyadáq-Banaaya inkih tan qaskarak abbah yen. Saaduk kee Abiyataar diini-abbobtik ten.
Naatán-Qadarya rakaakayitteh-abbobtih abbah yen. Naatán-Xaabud, sek kee malikih-fayu-yecee-kasloytak yen.
Aciisar malik-qarih abbah yen. Abdá-Adoniiram dirkih tamsiisan marih amol yen.
Suleeman dabaanal, inkih tan Israayil baaxol enna 'ta taban kee namma rakaakay, taban kee namma abba luk ten. Too taban kee namma abba sanatal inki alsa, malik kee malik buxah marah, leek maaqo baahak yenen.
Too taban kee namma numih migaq kee reeda elle luk sugen rakaakayitteh migaq ah kaana:
Cuur-baxi abbah elle sugem, Efrayim rasuk qaleela mango aracak ten.
Deker-baxi abbah elle sugem, Makax kee Saqalbim kee Beet-Semes kee Eelon-Beet-Canan deqsitta magaaloolik ten.
Cesed-baxi abbah elle sugem, Arubbot magaala kee Sooko magaala kee inkih yan Ceefar rasuk ten.
Abinadab-baxay Suleeman baxá ginnaaqot abbaxuk yenehiyya inkih yan Door rasul abbah yen. Kay barra migaaqah Taafat deqsitak ten.
Aciilúd-Baqna kaadu Taqnak kee Magiddo deqsitta magaalooli kee Beet-Saqan garil enna 'ta baaxok abbah yen. Beet-Saqan deqsitta baaxo, Yidraqel magaalak xayi tan Xartan deqsitta magaalak xabba haanamaay Aabil-Macoola magaala kee Yokmaqam magaalah amma 'yaanam tan baaxo.
Geber-baxi abbah akak yenem, Gilqad rasul tan magaalay Raamot deqsita kee, Yaaqir-gulubuy Manassek radehiyyah mandarway Gilqad-rasul enni 'ta kee, Basan-rasuk Argob deqsita aracal geytimta lactam takke magaaloolik ten. Too lactam magaala inkih gasoosa maroh edde teneeh; gasoosah alfentah nacaasak bicsen biriita luk ten.
Qiddó-Acinadab, Macanaayim rakaakayak abbah yen.
Suleemanak baxáy Basmat deqsittahiyya abbaxuk yen Acimaax, Naftaalî-rasuk abbah yen.
Cuusáy-Baqna, Aaser-rasu kee Baqlot-magaalak abbah yen.
Faruwác-Yacoosafat kaadu Issakar-rasuk abbah yen.
Eelá-Simqi, Benyam-rasuk abbah yen.
Uurí-Geber, Gilqad baaxok abbah yen. Duma Sicon deqsita malikiy Amoora deqsita marak malikih suge kee, Qoog deqsita malikiy Basan deqsitta baaxok malikih sugehiyya too baaxol xiinisak sugte.
Too taban kee namma numuk kalah kaadu, keenik inkih amol raaqa num heeh.
Yuuda kee Israayil mari mangah arrooqih gide akkuk yeneeniih, isinnih elle faxen innal akamukuuy aaqabuk farcaanak yenen.
Suleeman reedah amol akak yenem, Furaat weeqaytuk xabba haanamaay Filistiin kee Masri cuduuduh amma 'yaanam tan baaxok ten. Too mari gabbara kaah acayuk, usuk addunyal suggu 'yem fanah kay gubat sugen.
Suleeman kee Suleeman-marih fanal kulli ayro maaqok ankammuk tenemii, nabam adda meqe bululuk bool kee labaatanni kiis kee, tonnah kaadu, cabubuk namma bool kee morootom kiis takkem ankammuk ten.
Too daro lih gabâ-maaqoh sugsen awurwak taban kee, qaysoh sugte awurwak labaatanna kee, illi kee wadarak bool takkem kulli ayro maaqoh qidak yen. Toh lih kaadu wayxex kee qarkuddo kee segeeri kee dorrahik mangom keenih baahak yenen.
Suleeman Furaat-weeqaytuk ayrô-culma le kabut raqqa 'ta baaxok, Tifsac-rasuk xabba haanamaay Gaadâ-magaalah amma 'yaanam tan baaxo isi milkih hee. Furaat-rasuk ayrô-culma le kabut raqta baaxol sugte malikwa inkih kay gubat gacte. Cuggaaneh kaak tan baaxooxah mara kee kay fan kaxxam muquk ten.
Usuk suggu 'yem fan, Israayil kee Yuudah yooboke mari amaanah xiinak suge. Kay dabaanal Israayil kee Yuudâ rasul suggu 'ye mari amaanah yeneeh; numtin amol qinab-xalta-caxa kee *sublayto luk yenen.
Suleeman faaris-gasoosay gaari edde beya faaris tabbixehiyyak morootom alfi gaso luk yen. Tohuk kalah kaadu, amot akak gacan faariisak taban kee namma alfi luk yen.
Usuk rakaakayah abbobtih hee taban kee namma numuk, kulli num faxxinta maaqo edde baaha'gidih, kaal yeexegen alsat maqidda kaah ruubak yen. Kaa kee kay buxah mara kee kay buxal maaqo ukumma haa marah maaqok faxxa haanam oson keenih baahak yenen. Maaqok faxximma 'tam xayyoosak sugen.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, kulli num keenik, gabru deqsitta daro kee darok rade caffak isil tanim, gaari edde beyan faaris kee wohuk kalah tan faroosah maaqoh baahak yenen.
Yalli Suleemanah kaxxa kas kee tut xayih radiyya kee loowo sinni ixxiga yecee.
Suleeman kulli numuk kasah aysuk yen. Ayrô-mawqat raaqa mara kee Masri mara tekkek, tikki 'ta ummattak inkih kasah aysuk yen. Etan deqsita numuy Qedra deqsita gulubuh yoobokehiyyak kasah aysuk yen. Macol deqsita numih xayloy migaaqah Heeman kee Kalkol kee Dardaq akak axcuk yeneenihiyyak kasah aysuk yen. Woo deraafil enna 'ta baaxooxal kas kee migaq-gexxo le malikik yen.
Suleeman sidiica alfi takke missilitte yuktubeh cabeeh, alfik amo takke gaditteeta yuktubeh cabe.
Baaxol enni 'ya coox kee qaysot inkih yaabe. Lubnaan rasul tan kaxxa sariida kee gidaar bagul taabuke qaysot inkih yaabe. Kalah kaadu, alluwwa kee kimbiiriiy, garbah baaxok bagul gexxa alluwwa kee kulluumut yaabeh cabe.
Gersi malikway addunyâ-bagul enna 'ta usuk kasah akah yene'nna toobbeeh; too waqdi kaa ankacisu waa mara kaa fan ruuben.

Suur deqsitta baaxoh malik, Curam deqsitak yen. Usuk dumaak Malik Dawud kataysak ten. Curam, Suleeman isi-abbah aracal gacem yoobbe waqdi, farmô-mara kaa fan ruube.
Farmo kaa gufte waqdi, Suleeman woo-farmol farmo kaah ruube. Farmol kaak iyyeemih,
«Atu akah taaxige innah, yi abba Dawud, YALLAY kay Dagelta kinnihiyyah Qibaadâ-Qari xiseh masuginna. Toh akah tekkem, cuggaaneh tan baaxooxah mari aggiriqe sinni qeebih kaa'lih sugeeh; ken lih abak yen qeebik gexxaamah gaba geyak masuginna. Usuk YALLI woo naqboytiitik iysiissa kaa haam fan qambaalak suge.
Awayah tu gactek, YALLAY yi Dagelta kinni deraafil yan mara lih amaanah yoo xiinisa. Naqboytit mayyuuy, akak gadaamitam kaadu mayyu.
Duma YALLI yi abbah qahdi culeh sugeeh; kaak iyyemii, ‹Ku baxa malik abeyyooh; yoo elle yaqbudoonu waan qari usuk xisele› kaak iyyeh yen. Tonna leemiik taway anu too Qibaadah-Qari inni Dageltah xisam niyat liyo.
Ku mari Lubnaan baaxok sariidâ-coox yoh yargiqeeni'gidih, garbo fan ken rubtam kok faxa. Yi marak kaadu tu takkem ken lih taamitta'gid ruubeyyo. Atu akah taaxige'nnah, caxâ-garuq ku mari gersi marak inkih yayse. Cawalah, atu ucuya axcinnaanih gide keenih aceeyyo» kaak iyye.
Curam, Suleeman kaah ruube farmo yoobbe waqdi, kaxxam ruffa 'yeh, iyyeemih, «YALLAH fayla taafay. Macaay inteenik, Dawuduh a xaqan le kasloytah yan baxa, kay lakal Israayil baaxoy nabna lehiyyal malikih hee» 'yaanam iyye.
Tohuk lakal Suleeman kaah ruube farmol gacsah iyyemii, «Atu yoh rubte farmo yoo maaddeeh; atu faxxa haytem abuh bical koh an. Sariida kee gersi coox koh ruubeyyo.
Yi mari yirgiqen coox bad fan baahelon. Tokkel tittat tuuy rikel axaw axawah hayya heenih, baddi-amol, atu yoh ruuba axcinnaan ikke fan, koh akah gufinnaan innah, abelon. Tokkel ifdigga heenih sin maral aceelon. Ahimih gidiyih yoo kee yi marah maaqo aceetto» iyye.
Tonnal Curam, sariida kee gersi cooxuk faxak suge gideh Suleemanah ruube.
Ahih gidyatah, Suleeman, Curamah kulli sanatal morootom alfih kiis kamadik yeceeh, caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeytiy (saliidiy) agle sinnihiyyak kaadu affara boolih alfih litri yecee. Toh isi mara edde yaskame'gidih, kaah yecee.
Curam kee Suleeman fanat wagri yeneh, nammayak isinni fanal bica haysiten. YALLI Suleemanah kas yeceeh; kaah cule xagana kaah duuduse.
Malik Suleeman inkih yan Israayil rasuk soddom alfih numuy baaxoh taamitaanam dirkik elle tenehiyyak migaq yuktubeh warkatal hee.
Too soddom alfih num, wadir tabna-tabna alfih hayya heeh, sidiica gexoh ken kure. Abbah keenik Adoniiram deqsita num hee. A sidiica gexoh heen tabna-tabna alfi yakke marak midu-miduh alsi gide Lubnaan rasul suggu 'yeenik lakal, namma alsa kaadu isinni buxal sugak yenen.
Suleeman wohuk kalah kaadu, qaleela mango rasul bacra-tabanih alfih numuy xeet baaxok tayyaaqeh massossahiyya kee, malcina-tabanih alfih numuy woo xeet yakkuqehiyya luk yen.
Ken tamsiisaah ken taamak amo wagita marak sidiica alfi kee sidiica boolih num amol keenik hee.
Suleeman ken elle amrise innal, baaxok xeet yayyaaqe mari, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih rakiiboh hoonu waan meqe xeetiy nabahiyya yeyyeeqen.
Suleeman maraa kee Curam maray gabâ-naggaarinna luk yenehiyya kee, Biblos-magaalah mari, Qibaadâ-Qari edde xisoonu waan cooxih missoysiyyá kee xeetih-oriyyih bicsat gacen.

Israayil-mari Masri cabeh yemeeteemih affara bool kee bacra tabanih liggidi tikkaay, Suleeman Israayil-marih-malik yekkeemih affara sanat tikka 'ye saakuy, alsak kaadu Diw deqsita alsay nammayhaytoh alsa kinnihiyyat yanin saaku, Suleeman Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih-xisne qimbise.
Too qariy Suleeman xisehiyyak adda woo exxaay a exxah xexxaarah lactam cusul akkuk teneeh, baguh labaatanni cusul akkuk ten. Soddom cusul fayyah akkuk ten.
Qibaadâ-Qari akak culan naharsi goli xexxaarah tabna cusul akkuk ten. Qibaadâ-Qari baguh labaatanni cusul takkeh, tonnah kaadu, a exxa inki gid takke.
Qibaadâ-Qarih taagoota qax elle meqe innal xexxaarinuk afa akak qunxuk cabe.
Qibaadâ-Qarik dariifat qunxa qarwa xiseeh; too qarwa iro le kabuk Qibaadâ-Qarit xakabuh raaqak ten.
Too qarwa sidiica adda ittak amol xisneh ten. Guba raqta qarwa baguh koona cusul akkuk ten. Fanti-qarwa baguh lica cusul akkuk ten. Inkih daga raqta qarwa baguh malcina cusul akkuk ten. Qibaadâ-Qarih gidaar boohaysaanam faxxiime waak teneemih sabbatah, fanat raku akak heen.
Xisne aben waqdi maataka kee godma kee, tonnah kaadu, birtak bicsen mansafitteh xongolo akah antaabbe wayta innah, missat orra heenih baahen xeetik xisen.
Qibaadâ-Qarik gabbi le kabuk xakabuh tan qarwa culaana'gidih, afa ten. Too afak fanti-qarwa kee inkih daga raqta qarwa akak yewqen mawqeena ten.
Malik Suleeman Qibaadâ-Qarih-xisnek gaba kaleh. Qarik adda le kabul amô-tabsi coox kee luucaanah, sariidah caxak heen.
Taaxige sidiica qarway tittak amol tanihiyyak kulli qari fayyah koona cusul akkuk yeneeh; Qibaadâ-Qarik iro le kabuk xakbisaana'gidih, sariidâ coox amô-tabsuh heen.
YALLI Suleeman lih yaabeeh, iyyeemih,
«Anu siinih oobise xinto kee amri oggoltek, a qariy atu away xissahiyyah giddinaamak ku abbah cule xagana duuduseyyo.
Away Israayil ummatay yi mara kinnihiyyah addal gaceyyo. Israayil mara booxal qidda heeh macaba» kaak iyye.
Suleeman Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik gaba kaleh.
Qarik adda le kabuk gidaaraay amo fan sariidak bicseeniih; qari-baaxak bagul kaadu saagan-coox akak hee.
Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goli deqsita goli elle yenem, Qibaadâ-Qarik iqiyak ten. Too golik gambi sariidak bicse. Qibaadâ-Qarik darre le kabuuk woo aracak goli gambi fan, xexxaarah labaatanni cusul akkuk yen.
Woo aracak fooca le kabul yan arac xexxaarah morootom cusul akkuk yen.
Qarik adda qobor kee xalooli taswiir elle heen sariidah cooxut bilqisen. Qari akak bicsen xeet ambulle waa'gidih, qarik bagu inkih sariidat alfen.
Qibaadâ-Qarik iqiyal yen Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goli, YALLIH Qahdih-Sandug elle haana'gidih, bicsen.
Woo arac xexxaarah labaatanni cusul akkuk yen. Baguh kaadu labaatanni cusul akkuk yen. Fayyah kaadu labaatanni cusulih gide akkuk yen. Golik adda inkih, agle sinni dahabak exfen. Sadgat elle aban aracay sariidak bicseenihiyya kaadu agle sinni dahabak exfen.
Qibaadâ-Qarik adda inkih dahabak bileenih yenen. Qibaadâ-Qarik Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Golik adda akak culan afat dahabak bicsen silsilat axawah yen.
Inkih yan qarik addak baaxaay gidaar kee amo inkih dahabak exfeenih yenen. Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Golik adda, sadgat elle aban mansafak inkih dahabak exfen.
Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Golih addal, galwa leemih ceelok nammay wagartok bicsen. Tohum sidooca sahdayti le xexxaarih gide akkuk ten.
Woo nammay masu kee ceelok titta ceelak ten. Kulli tii namma gali luk yen. Kulli gali koona cusul xexxaaarah akkuk yen. Kulli galik a exxaay woo exxa fan xexxaarah tabna cusul akkuk yen.
Sarrak too nammaamay galwa lehiyya Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Golik woo exxa kee a exxal heen. Tiyak teenak gali, golik-gidaar xagak yen; akittuk gali kaadu, golik gersi gidaar xagak yen. Sarrak ken nammayak gali wadir titta xagak yen.
A nammaamay galwa lehiyya dahabat exfeenih yenen.
Qibaadâ-Qarih golittek fanti goli kee Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Golih agantah, gidaarwah bagul, woo nammaamay galwa lehiyyah ceelo kee, nakliita kee, fakimit yan qobor taswiirit bilqiseenih yenen.
Inkih yan Qibaadah-Qarik baaxa dahabat exfeenih yenen.
Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goli akak culaana'gidih afa bicse. Woo afa wagartok bicsen namma alifuy sittat xakabuh yanihiyya luk ten. Woo namma alifuk inkih, daga raqta exxa qunuunusen qansa-caxxa ceelak ten.
Too Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Golik alfentih bagul, galwa leemih ceelo kee, nakliita kee qobor taswiirih akak heen. Sarrak woo namma alifu kee, nakliitah coox kee galwa leemih ceeloy woo namma alifih bagul taswiirih heenihiyya dahabat exfen.
Qibaadâ-Qari akak culan afay affara rukni lehiyya wagartok bicsen.
Tohuk kalah namma alifiy xambaqimahiyya saaganak bicse.
Too namma alifih bagul, galwa leemiiy nakliita kee qobor taswir yen. Bagul dahab exfeenih akak yenen.
Qibaadâ-Qarih-addah-daaratak sidooca xaay oreenihiyyay tittin bagul heenihiyyak lakal, woo xaak amo le kabul sariida coox haak bicsen. Kulli gidaarak daga raaqa aracah amma 'yaanamah tonnal bicsen.
YALLA elle yaqbuden Qarih rakiibo, Suleeman malik edde yekke fereyhayto sanatak nammeyhaytoh alsak Diw deqsitahiyyat aben.
Suleeman malik yekkeemih taban kee inikhaytô-sanatak bacarhaytoh alsak Buul deqsitahiyyat, woo-qarih-xisnek gaba kaleenih. Hununuh kaa lowwa heen xisoh kaa xisen. A-qarih-xisne Suleemanat malcina sanatih gide faxxe.

Suleeman isih kaadu qari xissiteeh; too-qarih-xisne taban kee sidooca sanat kaat faxxe.
A qariy xisehiyyak exxak teenah migaaqah ‹Lubnaan Garboh Kaxxa Goli› 'yaanam yeyyeeqe. Too goli xexxaarah bool cusul akkuk yen; baguh kontom cusul akkuk yen; fayyah soddom cusul akkuk yen. Addal sariidak bicsen qamidway affara rooruh yanihiyya heenih yenen. Too qamidwak amol, morootom kee koona cooxuy sariidak bicseeniy amô-tabsah haanahiyya yen. Kulli roorut taban kee koona caxa akak ten. Qarik kaadu amo akak bicseenim sariidak ten.
Gidaarak namma kabuk kulli kabuk inkih, caacay-culma sidiica rortah cabeenih yenen.
Afa kee alifu akak affara ruknik xiseenih yenen. Namma kabuk gidaarat rooruh yan sidooca alifu titta fan afkanuk yen.
Qamidwâ-Goli deqsita arac xise. Too arac xexxaarah kontom cusul akkuk yen; baguh soddom cusul akkuk yen. Too aracak afal kaadu qamidwa sooliseenih, too qamidwak amol sugte tabsi-cooxuk exxa fulak caben.
Suleeman daffa 'yeh cokmi elle abak yen malik-korsi elle ten goli, migaaqah cokmi-qari deqsitak yen. Too goli gubak xabba haanamay amo fan inkih sariidat exfeenih yenen.
Suleeman dabaaqah elle yan qari, cokmi elle aban qarik darre le kabut yeneeh; too qari-xisnek raqqa 'te qarwah innal xiseenih yenen. Isi barrah kaadu too bis le qari xiseh yen. Kay barra Masri-malikik baxak ten.
A qarwa gubaay dagah akak bicseenim, meqe'nnal missat oren xeetiy saytunihiyyak ten. A xeet missal oren xeetik teneeh; adda le kabu kee iro le kabuk inkih xisnek fule kee uxuxxoote yakkeemik missat oreenih bicsen xeetik ten.
Qari-rakiibo akak bicseenim, bagu naba xeetiy xeet elle yayyaaqen ikkel elle bicseenih baaheenihiyyak ten. Too xeetik garab tabna cusul xexxaarah akkuk yeneeh; garab kaadu bacra cusul xexxaarah akkuk yen.
Woo xeetik amol kaadu cusulul oreenih bicsen xeet kee, sariidak bicsen amô-tabsah haan coox yen.
Malik-qarih-kaxxa-daarat kee, Qibaadâ-Qarih-addah-daarat kee Qibaadâ-Qarih-adda akak culan naharsi goli inkih, sidooca xaay oreenihiyyay tittin bagul heenik xisen. Woo xeetik amo le kabul sariida heen. Kulli gidaarak daga raaqa aracah amma 'yaanamah tonnal bicsen.
Malik Suleeman Curam deqsita numuy gabâ-naggaarinna luk yenehiyyah farmo ruube. Woo num buxa Suur deqsitta magaalal luk yen. Nacaasak mansafwa bicsaanamih ixxiga luk yen.
Kay abba Suur-marah aabakuk yeneeh; addunyal yen saaku kaadu nacaasak mansafitte elle bicsa innah ixxiga luk yen. Kay ina Naftaali deqsitta kedoh tooboke. Curam, kaxxam bagi cubbi leeh yublen xayih raaqisa numuy nacaasak duyye bicsaanamih ixxigal muxxo lehiyyah yen. Suleeman nacaasak bicsan mansafwah taamah abbah kaa hee. Curam toh kaak oggoleh.
Sarrak Curam namma qamidduy nacaasak bicseenihiyya hee. Too qamidwak kulli tiiy taban kee bacra cusul fayyah akkuk yen; galbabbaqinaaneh taban kee namma cusul akkuk yen.
Toh lih kaadu, woo qamidwak nammayak inkih, amot nacaasak bicsen sacni-af-le-duyye hee. Too namma duyyek kulli tii koona cusul xexxaarah akkuk yen.
Woo sacni-af-le-duyyek kulli tii, bagul sudaaducuh tittat yoxeen silsilatih taswiiriy malciin yakke heeh yen.
Tohuk kalah kaadu nacaasak bicsen rummaanat taswiiriy namma rooruh yani heeh yen.
Qamidwah amot heen namma sacni-af-le-duyyek amol kaadu aki mansafway birro weelo luk tenehiyya hee. Kulli tiiy fayyah affara cusul akkuk yen.
Woo mansaf elle heenim, qamidduk silsilat taswiir elle yani ikkek daga raqqa 'ta amoy maroh tanihiyyak ten. Rummaanak namma boolih xayloy namma rooruh tanihiyyah taswiir woo mansafih bagul yen.
Curam too namma qamidduy nacaasak bicseenihiyya Qibaadâ-Qarih adda akak culan naharsi golik foocal hee. Migda le kabul yen qamiddi migaaqah Yaakin deqsitak yen; gura le kabul yen qamiddi Booqas deqsitak yen.
Birro weelo luk yen nacaasak bicsen namma mansaf namma qamiddih amot yen. Qamidwâ-bicak tonnal gaba kalen.
Curam kaadu nacaasak sacni gurral yan kaxxa tanak bicse. Too tanakak adda koona cusul akkuk ten. A kabu kee woo kabuk fidnah tabna cusul akkuk ten. Soddom cusul kaadu inkih yan tattab kaak akkuk yen.
Namma roorul tan xalâ taswiir tanakak a exxaay woo exxal yen. Too tanakak kulli cusulul tabna taswiir heenih yenen. A taswiir yakkeemiik raaqe tanakak baxsa sinni gurral bicseenih yenen. Toh elle abeenim mannaay innekii, naharak boodo tanak missal xagen. Woo boodok tattabat xalâ-taswiiritte bicsen. Tanak kee tasaawir bicsaana'gidih, diyaayisen nacaas elle caxen. Tonnal woo xalooli-tasaawir woo tanakih bagul yewqe.
Too tanak nacaasak bicsen taban kee namma awurih ceeloh amol daffeyseenih yenen. Too awurwak kulli sidocuuy inki kabul afkanuk yen.
Woo tanak masuh gaba gennaqtah gide akkuk yen. Af akak figgaan af ceelak yen. San-san akak xambaqu luk cabeenih yenen. Too tanak leek morootom alfih litri abbaxuk yen.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, tabna gaari nacaasak bicse. Woo tabna gaarik kulli gaari, xexxaarah affara cusul akkuk teneeh, baguh kaadu affara cusul akkuk teneeh, sidooca cusul kaadu fayyah luk ten.
Naharak nacaasak affara rukni bicseeniih, tohuk sarra galdaddaqin nacaas addal heen. Woo galdaddaqin nacaasak bagul lubak kee awuruuy, galwa leemih taswiir aben. Woo affara rukni bicsen nacaasak bagul kaadu woo gurral yan tasaawir heen. Woo taswiirih guba kee dagal silsilat ceela taswiir heen. Tabna gaari elle bicseenim, tonnak ten.
Woo gaarik kulli tiya edde gexxa nacaasak bicsen affara iba luk ten. Woo affara ibi kaadu nacaasak bicsen mansafay gaarih iba yasgayyehiyya luk yen. Kulli gaarih amol kaqaylo sacni yen. Kaqaylo sacnih buxux elle daffeysan birti gaarih addal yen. Woo birtih bagul silsilat ceela taswir heen.
Woo gaarih amol, maroh yan mansafay sacni elle daffeysaanahiyya yeneeh; woo mansaf masuh inki cusul akkuk yeneeh; baguhuu, cusul kee garab akkuk yen. Bagul haxaxa bilqah luk yen.
Kulli gaari affara rukni luk ten.
Gaarik kulli ibak, a san kee woo sanih fan, xexxaarah cusul kee garab akkuk yen. A gaarih iba yasgayye mansaf, gaarit xakabuh yen.
Woo gaarih ibitte faras gaarih ibitteh inna luk ten. Gaari akak bicsen ibitte inkih nacaasak ten.
Kulli gaari ibak gubat elle solta mansafay wadir gaarit xakabuh yanihiyya luk ten.
Kulli gaarih amot maroh yan mansaf yen. Too mansaf xexxaarah cusuluk garab akkuk ten. Gaari amol akak tan mansaf gaarit xakabuh yen.
Gaari amol akak tan mansafak inkih yan xagaral galwa leemih taswiir kee lubak kee nakliita taswiir heeh yen. Afal silsilat ceela taswiir heen.
Too tabna gaarih bici elle yekkem too gurrak ten. A tabna gaarih takkeemiik inki ceelooy inki weelo kee inki masu luk ten.
Curam gaariirak kalah kaadu tabna sacni bicse. Too tabna sacnik kulli sacni, gaarik bagul heenih yenen. Kulli sacnik a exxaay woo exxa affara cusul xexxaarah akkuk ten. Kulli sacni bacra boolih litri leek abbaxuk yen.
Gaarik konooy Qibaadâ-Qarik migda le kabul heeh, aki konooy kaadu gura le kabul hee. Sacni gurral yan kaxxa tanak kaadu Qibaadâ-Qarik gabbi le kabut raaqa tattab kee ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqa tattab elle yangale aracak xaqul hee.
Curam tohuk kalah kaadu gombod elle caxan distiiy, badiilaali kee, rifan qabala kee lee elle haan sacnitte bicse.
Curam Suleeman kaal yecee taamak gaba kaleeh, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih-taama seleh. Usuk bicse duyye ah teeti:
Naharak namma qamiddu bicse.
Sarrak woo namma qamiddih amot haan sacni af le duyye bicse.
Woo duyyek bagul sudaaducuh tittat yoxeen silsilatih taswiir kee
rummaan-taswiiriy affara bool mangah yakkehiyya hee.
Too taswiir, qamiddi amot haan sacni af le duyyeh bagul, kulli tiyak a exxaay woo exxak namma rooruh hayya heenih duuduseenih yenen.
Tohuk kalah kaadu tabna gaari kee tabna sacniiy,
kaxxa lee tanakaay, woo tanak qekuh elle yan taban kee namma awurih ceelooy,
gombod elle caxan distiiy badiilaali kee, rifan qabala kee lee elle haan sacnitte bicse.
Curam YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril heen duyye akak bicseeh, Suleeman kaal yecee taama akak abem, isiffiyya heen nacaasak ten.
Suleemanah a duyye inkih elle bicseenim, Ordon daqaarak Sukkot kee Xartan fanal yan aracay qasa-burta elle geytimahiyyak ten. Tokkelii, too duyyeh weelo qasa-burtak bicseenih, diyaayisen nacaas elle caxen.
Suleeman a duyye qilsak leh gide yable'gidih, miizaanal haamak kaxxam manguk teneeh; tohuk gexxaamah qilsak leh gide taaxigem mananna.
Suleeman wohuk kalah, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih-addal tan duyye dahabak bicsiise. Tohum, sadgatah qerto elle qeerisan aracaay, Yallih sadgatah xayyoosan gaqambo amol akak tan miiz kee,
tabna caxxay faanuswa amol akak haana. Too cooxuy dahabak bicseenihiyya elle heenim, Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Golik fooca; konooy gura le kabuk yeneeh, aki konooy migda le kabul yen. Tohuk kalah, qobor gurral bicsen duyyeey, faanuswa kee maxbaxay xibcin edde yabbixeeni kee,
figaaginiiy, faanuswa edde bargusan afti-xaylooy, sacnitteey, qeerisan qaydarus elle haan mingilwa kee, xikcin elle haan kabaaba inkih, saafik yan dahabak bicsiise. Tohuk kalah kaadu, Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goli kee Qibaadah-Qarik iro le kabuk akak culan albaab tabbixe duyye inkih dahabak bicsiise.
Tonnah abak, Suleeman YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih xisnek gaba kaleh. Too waqdi Suleeman, kay abba Dawud YALLIH qibaadah loowe duyyey rikeek abbaxuk sugehiyya gaabossa heeh, sarrak Qibaadah-Qarik mattacoh yaceen duyye elle daanisan golitteh addal hee. Tohumuu, dahab kee lakqo kee, kaadu wohuk kalah, gersi duyyek ten.

Too dabaanal YALLIH Qahdih Sandug, Dawud Magaalay Siyon deqsitahiyyal sugte. Malcinhaytoh alsay Etaanim deqsittahiyyat yamaate Iraawô-Dabih-Qiid deqsita qiidih ayro, ummatta Yarusalaamal koboxxe waqdi, Malik Suleeman, too Sandug Yallih Qibaadah-Qari fan baahaana'gidih, Israayilik saqoltih yan maraay kedoh abbobti kee makaabonuh seeco abe.
Sarrak Israayil ummattak saqoltih yen mari elle yani ikkel, seeka Qahdih-Sandug ukkuqqa hayteh Yallih Qibaadah-Qari fan beyte. Leewih yooboke mara kee seeka, Yallih Nabnah-Siraq kee tet addal sugte duyye inkih Yallih Qibaadah-Qari fan been.
Malik Suleeman kee inkih tan Israayil ummat Qahdi-Sanduguk foocal solla 'yeenih, tokkel mangah loowo sinni illi kee laa sadgatah yusguuden.
Tohuk gaba kalen waqdi, seeka YALLIH Qahdih-Sandug ukkuqqa hayteh, Yallih Qibaadâ-Qarik addal, Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goliy iqiyat raaqahiyyah addal daffeyseenih, woo galwa leemih ceeloh gubal heen.
Tonnal galwa-leemih galway fakimit tanihiyya YALLIH Qahdih-Sandug kee tet elle yakkuqen cooxuh reebu tekke.
Tet elle yakkuqen cooxih buxuuxak exxaaxi Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goli deqsita aracak foocal soola numuh amballayuk yene'mmay, tohuk kalih kabuk amballayuk mananna. Too coox a saaku fan wokkel elle yan.
Sandug addat geytimak tenem, namma luucuy xeetik bicseenihiyyak ten. Israayil mari Masri rasuk eweqqa 'yeh safarat yan saaku, YALLI Siinâ-qaleh amol Israayil mara lih abe qahdih-yab too luucul yunkuttube. Too namma xaa too Sandugih addat haytem Muusak ten.
Seeka woo Sandug daffessa haytek lakal, Taahirik-Yan-Aracih-addak awaquk sugte waqdi, garciik qamburre qarik adda inkih buulteh; YALLIH nabna yaybulle noori, inkih yan qarik adda ifissa hee. Too waqdi seeka isi taama abtuh adda culaanam maduudinnon.
Sarrak Suleeman dooqa abe. Dooqah iyyemii, «YALLAW, dite kee qamburreh addat gactam dooritte.
Away koh kaxxam naba qariy dabqih kulli way elle gactu wayta xise» iyye.
Sarrak inkih tan Israayil ummatay soltahiyya fan ufkunna 'yeh, dooqa keenih abe.
Tohuk lakal iyyeemihii, «YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya fayla taafay. YALLI isi gabat y'abba abe xagna duuduse» iyye. Kaadu qagseh, iyyemii, «YALLI duma y'abbak,
‹Inni mara Masrik eyyeqqa heemiiy akke, Israayil baaxol yoo elle yaqbuden qari elle xisu waan magaala dooreh masuginniyo'mmay, yi ummatta xiinissa'gidih, Dawudow, koo dooreh› 'yaanam kaak iyyeh suge» iyye.
Yab tokket mayseedinnay, bisoh beeh iyyeemihii, «Yi abba, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya, elle yaqbuden qari xisam faxeh suge waqdi,
YALLI yi abbah yan Dawuduk iyyeemih, ‹Yoo elle yaqbuden qari xissam faxxe waqdi meqem niyatteh tani'mmay,
woo qari xissu waytam koo hinnay, ku baxa. Atu isih xalte ku baxi xisele› 'yaanam kaak iyyeh suge.
«Ta saaku, YALLI iyyeemik cabem maliiy duuduseh. YALLI elle iyye'nnal, Dawud aracal Israayil ummatih malik ekkeh an. YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya elle yaqbuden qari xiseh an.
YALLI isi ummat lih abe qahdi-kutbeh elle yan luuc addat akak yan Sandug too qarih addal heeh an» iyye.
Suleeman toh inxicca 'yeh, gaabowwa 'ye mari kaa elle yable ikkel, sadgatah qidan saqa elle cararisan mansaf gariik solla 'yeh, dooqah namma gaba fayya hee.
Dooqah iyyeemih, «YALLAW, Israayil ummatta doore Dageltaw, kok sa qaran kee baaxol Yalli mayana. Baguuk koo taqbude ku naqoosah litoh tan kacni akak amurruqe waa Dagelta kinnitooh; keenih culte xagana duudusa Dagelta kinnito.
Yi abba Dawuduy ku naqasuh yeneh culte xagana duudusseh. Duma edde yabba intem inkih, tiya tiyah duudusseh.
Taway YALLAW, Israayil ummatta doore Dageltaw, duma yi abbak koh duudusseyyo inteemik inki tiyay raqtehiyya tan. Tohumuu, ‹Kok radu waa mari, atu akah abte innah, anu aba excem dudda luk abe ken tekkek, tonnal ku reeda baxak baxal raqta reeda akkele› 'yaanam inteh ten.
Tonna kinnuk Israayil ummatta doore Dageltaw, atu inxicca 'teeh yi abba Dawuduy ku naqasuh sugehiyyah culte xagni ku gabat dudda geyay.
«Yi Dageltaw, baaxo koo tabbixeemih dudda geelee? Qaran kee qaraanak ellecabot raqta qaraanitte tabbixu dudda akah gee wayta Dagelta kinnitok, hay, xise-qari-baxi mannal koo abbixele?
YALLAW, yi Dageltaw, anu ku naqasu kinniyok, aba dooqa yok oobbeyaay, a saaku koo akah kallacam yoh duudus.
A qarik bar kee loqoh amo wagit. A qariy ku qibaada-elle-takke'gidih doortehiyyah fan ufkunna exceh kulli waqdi abah an dooqa yok raabit.
Yooy ku naqasuh yanihiyya kee ku mara ta Qibaadah-Qari fan ufkunna inneh abna dooqa nek raabit. Qaraanay ku dabqih yanihiyyak ni kallaci oobbeyaay, abne dambih qafu neh ab.
«Sahdaytuk, ‹Qellat bahte›, 'yeenih kaa xiibsisaana'gidih, ta Qibaadah-Qari fan kaa baahen ken tekkek, too num ‹Anuy baahem mayyu› 'yaanam axcuk Qibaadâ-Qaril yan sadgat elle aban aracih foocal xiibite kaa tekkek,
too waqdi, yi Dageltaw, qaraanak ken ankacisaay, cakki le num uybulluy. Qellat le numul celta digaala kaat abaay; qellat baahe wee num currih rub.
«Atu isi mara abte Israayil ummatta kol baahen dambik gexxaamah, naqboytit keenik tiysiise koo tekkek, oson toh ubulla heenih kol yuduureeniih, ta Qibaadah-Qarih fan amma 'yeenih koh rammitta axcuk, ‹Yallaw, abneh nan dambik qafu neh ab› axcuk, dooqa abeenik,
elle tan qaraanaak too dooqa keenik raabit. Ku ummatta abteh sugte dambik qafu keenih abaay; dumaak ken kaxxa abbobtih teceeh sugte ken baaxo fan ken gacis.
«Ku ummatta kol bahte dambik gexxaamah, qaran alfimeeh rob waytimam ubulla heenih; too saaku toobitta 'yeenih koh rammitak, a Qibaadah-Qari fan ufkunna 'yeenih dooqa aben ken tekkek,
too dooqa elle tan qaraanaak keenik raabit. Israayil ummattay ku naqoosah tanihiyya abte dambik qafu keenih ab. Edde gexan meqe-gita ken baris. A baaxo, ku baaxoy ku marah ikoytah teceehiyya kinnuk, rob tet mawaysiisin.
«A baaxol qulul rade kee, dalkay numuk numut tabtahiyya sinaamat rade kee, tooboke daro orongoobitiiy caaco bayse kee, qanayti sele yekkek, naqboytit qeebih magaala keenik marot haytek, biyak ken yabbaxuuy, gibdaabina keenil lem keenit tikka 'tek,
tohuk dooqa aban waqdi dooqa keenik oggol. Yi Dageltaw, ku ummattay atu isih doorittehiyyak faxe num abe dambih baguuk nadaamitta 'yeh, gaba fayya haak a Qibaadah Qarit ufkunna 'yeh dooqa abe kaa tekkek,
ken dooqa raabit. Qaraanay ku dabqah yanihiyyak ken dooqa ankacisaay, dambik qafu keenih abaay ken cat. Sahdayti afqadoh addat yascubem taaxigem, dibuk koo. Tonna-kinnuk, kulli numuh kay abini elle aninnaan innal, keenil uckum.
Tonnal ku mari atu ken kaxxa abbobtih ikoytah tecee baaxol yaniinim fanah ku yab oggolak xiinelon.
«Israayilih aabuke waamah faxe numuuy takkay, ku nabna kee ku qande kee cayla yaabbu waa waqdi kee, ku abini le innak xaagu geyu waa waqdi, a Qibaadah-Qaril dooqa aba'gidih xer baaxok yemeete kaa tekkek,
too dooqa kaak raabitaay koo akah kallacem kaah ab. Isih dabqah elle tan qaraanak kay yab oobbey. Tonnal, Israayil ummattak kaxxih, addunyal enna 'ta ummatta koo aaxigeleeh ku amri duudusele. Toh lih kaadu, a qariy anu xisehiyya koo elle yaqbuden qari kinnim aaxigelon.
«Ku mari, atu ken amrissa waqdi, naqboytiitih isik yan marat qeebi abaana'gidih gaadan waqdi, faxe ikkeliiy yanoonay, a magaalay isih doorittehiyya kee ta Qariy ku qibaadah xisehiyya fan ufkunna 'yeenih kooy YALLAH yanihiyya kallacan waqdi,
elle tan qaraanak ken dooqa oggolaay nasri keenih ucuy.
«Dambit ase waa num mayanaay; tohih sabbatah ku mari dambi lem kol baahen ken tekkeeh, tohuk gexxaamah ku naqbi keenil oobeeh, naqboytit gabal ken hayte koo tekkeh, woo naqboytit xer baaxo takkuu, xayi baaxo takku, seewah ken been ken tekkek,
kaskassoowan waqdi, ‹Yallaw, dambit asneh naniih umam abneh noysommeh nanik, qafu neh ab› axcuk toobiten ken tekkek, too tooba keenik raabit.
Oson too baaxoy seewah-ken-elle-beenih sugeenihiyyal nummaak isinni afqadook toobitta 'yeenih koo kallacan ken tekkekii, too kallaciy kot abaanahiyya kaadu a rasu ken kaxxa abbobtih ikoytah taceehiyya fan ufkunnaay, kaadu ta magaalay atu isih doorittehiyya fan ufkunnaay, tonnah kaadu, ta qariy anu ku qibaadah xisehiyya fanah afkunuk aben ken tekkek,
tonnal, YALLAW, too dooqa keenik oggol. Qaraanay ku dabqah yanihiyyaak dooqa keenik oobbeyaay, keenih racmataay, ku mari abba hee dambi keenih cab.
Kol bahha heen umaane kee dambik qafu keenih ab. Seewah ken bee marih gaba keenil xabbacos.
Israayil mari ku maraay, ku ikoyta. Masri rasuy gira keenil yekkehiyyak addak teyyeeqe ku mara kinnon.
YALLAW, Mulki le Dageltaw, duma ni kaxxa abbobti Masri rasuk teyyeeqe saaku, Muusay ku naqasuh yanihiyyak, ‹A mara inni mara aba'gidih baadal tan ummattah addak ken doore› 'yaanam inteh ten. Akah inte innah, nummah ku maray atu doorittehiyya kinnon. Tonnal, a maray isim abtehiyya kee, yooy ku naqasuh yanihiyya kot abna kallaci nek macinin. Kol esserinnaan im neh oggol» iyyeeh, dooqak gaba kaleh.
Suleeman ta dooqa abe waqdi, namma gaba qaran fan fayya heeh, YALLAH sadgat elle aban aracak foocal gulubuh gaceh abe. Too dooqak gaba kale waqdi, tokkek ugutta 'yeh,
anay fayya haak, «YALLAW, akkel gaaboowe Israayil marat inkih barkat hay» 'yaanam iyye.
Sarrak kaadu qagseh, «YALLI isi naqasuh yan Muusal oobise meqe qahdi inkih duuduseh. YALLAY, akah inxicca 'ye innah, isi ummattah wagari kee amaan yeceehiyya fayla taafay.
«YALLAY ni Dageltah yani, ni kaxxa abbobti'lih akah suge innah, ne'lih yanay. Nee cabe waay ne'lih yanay.
Usuk ni kaxxa abbobtil yecee amri kee madqa dacrisna'gidiiy, kay gita oggolla'gidih, usuk faxam katatnuh digga le afqado net haay.
YALLAY ni Dagelta kinnihiyya anu away a dooqa abe waqdi kaa kallacem hawweene waay. Usuk doorite Israayil mara kee ken malikih yamqay. Cakki ayrook ayro keenih duudusay.
Tonnal, addunyâ-bagul yan mari inkih, Yalli dibuk kaa kinniih; kaak sa gersi Yalli ane waam aaxigelon.
Isin, kay maraw, ta saaku akah abten innah, baguuk YALLAY ni Dagelta kinnihiyyal yaamineeh, kay amri kee usuk nek faxam oggola mara tika» 'yaanam iyye.
Tohuk lakal Malik Suleeman kee wokkel suggu 'ye mari inkih YALLAH sadgat aben.
Amaanah xiinaanamih astah aban sadgatah, Suleeman laak labaatanna kee namma alfi yusguudeh. Illi kee wadarak bool kee labaatanni alfi yusguude. Israayil ummatta kee malik toh akah abeenim, a sadgat, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih orba sadgat yakke'gidik ten.
Too ayroh addat Qibaadâ-Qarih daaratih addal, hununuh Qibaadâ-Qarih foocat raqta fanti exxa Yallih taamah taahirroyseh. Tokkel cado akak inkih cararisu waa saq yusguudeh, sadgatah daro baahe. Kaadu amaanah xiinaanamih astah aban sadgatak xayta cararise. Too sadgat woo aracal akah abem, sadgatah qidan saq elle yasguudeeni'gidih, nacaasak bicsen mansaf a axxul le sadgat bagul akak abaanah gide nabnah akkuk mananna.
Qibaadâ-Qaril Suleeman kee inkih tan ummatta Iraawô-Dabih-Qiid deqsita qiidih YALLAY ni Dagelta kinni aynabukuuy africuk malcina ayro
Bacarhaytoh ayro Suleeman yemeete mara le baaxo fanah rubsuuse. Too ummattay YALLI isih doorehiyya, YALLI Dawuduy kay naqasuh yenehiyya kee Israayil ummattat hee barkat yublen waqdi, kaa faylisak ruffu axcuk yuduuren.

Suleeman, YALLAH bicsam faxak suge Qibaadah-Qari kee, isi qari kee, kalah kaadu, bicsam faxak suggu 'yeemik gaba kalek sarra,
Gibqoonul akah yumbulle'nnah, YALLI nammay haak kaah yumbulle.
YALLI kaak iyyeemih, «Abte dooqa kok oobbeh. Atu xisse qari taahirroyseeh; kulli way yoo elle yaqbudoonu waan qari kinnuk, ahaysa yi inti kee yi afqado kulli waqdi kaa dacrisele.
Ku abba akah abak suge innah, agaagul sinnuk baguuk yoo tuqbude koo tekkeeh, kok aba axcem abteeh yi amri duuduse koo tekkek,
anuy ku abbak ‹Ku reeda baxak baxal raaqeleeh ku nasab Israayil ummattak abbobti akkele› 'yaanam exceh sugeeh; tohim kaak elle inxicca exce'nnal duuduseyyo.
Takkay immay sin takku, sin ramad takku, darre yot cabteenik, aba siinik exceh sin akah amrisem cabba hayteenik, yi aftok gersiimih qibaadat culla 'teenikii,
tonnal a baaxoy anu doore ummattah tan Israayilih ecee sugehiyyak sin ayyaaqeyyo. A Qibaadah Qariy yoo elle taqbudeeni'gidih taahirroyse baaqid luk maraaqa. Israayil ummatta, kulli ikkek yamaate mari elle anqaasah burtan mara akkelon.
Away tablen Qibaadah-Qari kaxxa qari'mmay abur akkeleeh; wokkek gitah gaca mari a abur yabalu waa waqdi wariggiteloonuuh, qagabsitelon. ‹YALLI a baaxo kee a Qibaadah-Qaril annah tanim akah baahem macak tan kaa?› axcuk waagiselon.
Too waqdi tokkel suge mari, ‹Ama marat ah akah tekkem, YALLAY ken kaxxa abbobti Masrik yeyyeeqehiyya cabba heenih gabak bicsen duyyeeya qibaadat gaceenih. Tohih sabbatah YALLI tama-umaane keenil oobise› 'yaanam axcelon» kaak iyye.
Suleeman YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari kee kay qari xisne labaatanni sanat kaak beyte.
Suur rasuk malikih yen Curam deqsita malik a taama edde aba'gidih, Suleemanah saagan coox kee sariidâ coox kee dahabak faxxa haah gide kaah yecee. A taama gaba kalte saaku, Suleeman wohih galtoh Galiil rasul tan labaatanni magaala kaah yecee.
Curam woo magaalooliy Suleeman kaah yeceehiyya wagta'gidih gexeeh yuble waqdi massakootinna.
Sarrak Suleemanak, «Yi toobokoytaw, ta magaaloolik sa yoh teceem waytee?» kaak iyye. Too magaaloolik migaaqah Kabul
Curam, Suleemanah affara alfih kiilok muxxi yakke dahabak ruubeh suge.
Malik Suleeman YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari kee isi qariiy, kalah kaadu, magaalat maroh heen gaso kee, tonnah kaadu, magaalak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta baaxoy ramma luk sugtehiyya edde missoysem, dirkih tamsiisa marih gabak ten. Tohuk kalah, Caxor kee Magiddo kee Geser deqsitta magaalooli kaadu keenit bicsiise.
Dumah yan saaku Masri-malik Geser-magaala qeebit yibbixeh sugeeh, teetil suge mara selli heeh gira teetit ruube. Sarrak woo baaxo Malik Suleeman kay baxá abite saaku ikoytah teetih yecee.
Hay sarra, Suleeman too magaala dirkih tamsiisa marih gabat nammeyhaak xise. Tohuk kalah kaadu, too marih gabat Guba-raqta-Beet-Coron kee,
Baqalat kee, Tamaari deqsitta magaalay Yuudâ rasuk bacarih tan baaxol tanihiyya ken gabat xise.
Lee-kee-qayso akak inxicca 'yaanam kee, faaris kee faarisit beyan gaariira daanah elle hayu waa magaalooli ta marat bicse. Wohuk kalah kaadu, Yarusalaam takkuu, Lubnaan takkuu, hinnay kaadu, kay dardaarinni guffa haa baaxol usuk faxxa haa xisne ken gabat xise.
Suleeman a xisne edde absiisem, duma too baaxol suge maray Israayil mari bayse weehiyyak rade marak ten. Too mari migaaqah Amoora kee Ciita kee Fariida kee Ciiwi kee Yabuusa deqsitta kedoodah yaabuke marak ten. A saaku fanah, Israayil mari too marak rade mara naqoosah tamsiisa.
Suleeman Israayil mara naqoosinnat abbaxuk manannaay; oson kay qaskar kee qaskar abbobti kee gaariira amrisa mara kee faaris amok qeebi abta qaskarah yenen.
Suleemanah xisne abak yen marak amo wagitak ken tamsiisak yen mari koona bool kee kontom num akkuk yen. Too mari Israayilih yaabuke marak ten.
Suleeman, Masri-malikih-baxáy ginnaaqot abbaxuk yenehiyya Yarusalaamal geytimta Dawud-Magaala yaaxigen caafatay duma elle sugtehiyyak tet kaleeh; teetih xise qaril tet hee. Sarrak magaalak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta baaxoy ramma luk sugtehiyya missoyse.
YALLAH sadgat elle abaana'gidih bicse aracal, Suleeman, sanatal sidiica adda YALLIH migaaqal cado akak carrisan saqih sadgat kee, amaanah xiinaanamih astah aban sadgat elle abak yen. Tonnah kaadu, suruy meqe qerto too aracal qeerisak yen. Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril aban taama tonnal abe.
Malik Suleeman, Edom rasuk Agba deqsitta caraatih afal Eelat deqsita aracal xayuk raqta Qexyon-Gabar deqsitta magaalal maraakib bicsiise.
Malik Curam isi taamat luk yen maray badal maraakibit elle gexan innih ixxiga lehiyya, too maraakibit Suleeman mara lih taamita'gidih, catoh kaah ruube.
Too mari Oofir deqsita rasu fan markabat gexeeniih; gacen saaku, taban kee affara alfih kiilok fula le dahab Suleemanah gabat baahen.

Saba deqsitta baaxoh maliká, Suleeman le migaq-gexxo toobbe waqdi, kinni num kaak tabaluuy, gibdi esseroorak mangom kaa essertuh, kaa fan gexxe.
Mango mara wakalih is lih hayyaay, gaalal caxâ-sifaay bilqah haan xeetiy limo gibdihiyya kee, kaxxam mango dahabak eerra hayteh gexxe. Usuk elle yan Yarusalaam fan temeete waqdi, kaa essertam faxak sugte esseroy niyat luk sugtehiyya kaa esserteh.
Too esseroy is kaa essertehiyya tiya-tiyah teetih gacse. Usuk gacsa akah waa esserok masuginna.
Too waqdi Sabâ-Maliká, Suleeman kas tubleeh; usuk xise qariiy,
miizil heenih yanin kay maaqooy, kay doolat abbobti elle daffeyta gurraay, kay buxal kay taamat yan mari missal elle soola inna kee, kay taamah mari edde yan sartan tubleh. Usuk yakme way elle-yaaqube kobbaayiy-kaah-baaha-mari elle yani'nna kee, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril abah yan sadgataay; tah inkih tuble waqdi qagabsitteh hagga-inte.
Too waqdi Suleemanak intemii, «Anu inni baaxoh addal atu abba haytem kee lito kasak mangom oobbeh; oobba heem inkih numma kinnim away ableh an.
Atu lito midir kee kas elle oobbe'nnak fula lem, away ableh an. Awayaay kinni, sahda yoh warissem ahak garaba. Taway inni namma intih ubulla haam fanah, ku giddinaamak sinam yoh warissem innih numma akkaluk masuginniyo. Kas kee midirih bagi cubbi oobbeemik fula litoh tan.
Ku mari maxaqan le nasiib geeh yan! Ko'lih taamita mari kamba nasiib leh yan. Kulli way ko'lih yaniiniih ku afak tawqe tuxxiq le maxco yaabbeenih.
YALLAY ku Dagelta kinni fayla taafay. Yalli isi mara xiinisa malikih koo doore waqdi, kot ruffa iyyem yuybulleeh. Toh akah abem, isi ummatta Israayil kulli way kicnaamih taagah, atu qadli kee cakkit ken xiinissa'gidi» inte.
Is sarrak Malik Suleemanah gabat bahte mattaco kaah teceeh; affara alfih kiilo yakke dahabaay, mango caxâ-sifa kee bilqah haan xeetiy limo gibdihiyya kaah tecee. Caxâ-sifa, kaxxam mango caxâ-sifay ahaydumah Yarusalaam baaxol numuh antacawwime wayteh teneeh sarrah antacawwime waytehiyya.
Curam maraakibit taamita mari, Oofir deqsita rasuk dahab kaah baahen. Too mari tohuk kalah duyyê-xisoh meqe mango coox kee bilqah haan xeetiy limo gibdihiyya baahen.
Suleeman too coox YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari kee isi qarit hayu waa gutqeyna hee. Gad abeenitih kaadu *begena kee kirar akak bicsaana'gidih hee. Too xaqan le coox Israayil baaxo baaheenih masuginnon. Sarrah baahak maraaqinnon.
Malik Suleeman Sabâ-Malikáh is le kabuk mango mattaco yecee. Toh lih kaadu kaa esserra haytem inkih teetih yecee. Sarrak tet kee tet lih yemeete mari isi baaxoy akak yemeetehiyyah fanah yuduuren.
Malik Suleemanah kulli sanatal dahabak labaatanna kee sidiica alfih kiilo takkem baahak yenen.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, duyyê-xaamak beya qusuur kee tellemmô-mari yecee qusuur kee, Qarab baaxoh malikwa tecee gabbara kee, tonnah kaadu, Israayil-rasul tan rakaakay-abbobti tecee gabbara geyak yen.
Suleeman kaxxam naba goobwak namma bool takkem galbabbaqisen dahabak bicseeh, kulli gob malciina kiilo yakke dahabak bicse.
Wohuk kalah kaadu, qunxa goobwak sidooca boolih gide takkem galbabbaqisen dahabak bicse. Too sidooca boolih goobwak kulli gob namma kiilo yakke dahabak bicse. Too goobwa inkih elle abbaxuk yenem, ‹Lubnaan Garboh Kaxxa Goli› deqsita aracih addak ten.
Tohuk kalah kaxxam naba dardaarinni-korsi luk yen. Woo korsi dakni-qaagak bicseenih, agle sinni dahabak exfen.
Suleeman woo korsil gacam faxa waqdi, naharak laca maaqatta takke mawqeenak elle awaquk yen. Too mawqeena namma kabut inkih, lubak ceeloy gabak bicseenihiyyak leceey-leceey luk ten. Tittat taban kee namma lubaakih ceelo akkuk ten. Korsik-darre abur-moyyah innal ten. Too korsi namma gaba elle haan arac luk sugteeh, teetik namma tattabak lubak ceelo ten. Tonnah tanim, kalah tan doolatih dardaarinnih-korsil ahaydumal mabicsinnon.
Malik Suleeman elle yaaqube kobbaayiy inkih dahabak ten. «Lubnaan Garboh kaxxa Goli» deqsita aracih addal ten mingilwa kaadu akak bicseenim saafik yan dahabak ten. Suleeman dabaanal lakqok bicsen duyye hebeltô-tu'xiq luk mananna. Tonna-leemik kay buxal lakqok bicsen duyye masuginna.
Badal gexa maraakibik butta luk yen. Kay maraakib Curam maraakib lih gexak yen. Too maraakibit yan mari sidooca sanatal inki adda dahab kee lakqooy dakni-qaag kee wagaqwa kee qaxa le kaxxa kimbir eerra heenih baahak yenen.
Gaddaliino kee kasah Malik Suleeman innah yan malik baadal mananna.
Baadal tan ummatta, Yalli kaah yecee kas kaak raqsitaanam faxak yenen.
Kaa fan amaatinnaan num mattacoh gabat dahab kee lakqok bicsen duyyeey, xer-sarooy, silacaay, caxâ-sifaay, faaris kee baakil kaah baahak yenen. Kulli sanatal kaal yamaate mari taham abak suge.
Suleeman alfi kee affara bool takke gaariiray faaris beyta kee, taban kee namma alfih farasay qeebi abtahiyya gaabossa hee. Tohuk tu takkem Yarusalaamal abbaxuk yeneeh; wohuk kalihim mango magaaloolil kaak ten.
Suleeman dabaanal lakqo xeet manga luk teneeh; sariidâ coox kaadu, mango-koomaami le baaxol tan *sublah innah qadad cabeh yen.
Malik afak yen mari faariisa akak xaamak yenem, Masri baaxo kee Kiiwu deqsita aracak ten.
Faaris-gaariira kaadu Masrik baahak yenen. Inki gaari lica boolih garsih keenik xaamakaay, faras kaadu bool kee kontom garsih keenik xaamak yenen. A mari sarrak, Ciita kee Suuriyah malikwal inkih, a duyye aylammuk yenen.

Suleeman gersi baaxoh agabuk mangom yikcine. Masri malikih baxá abiteeh, kalah kaadu Ciitaay Mooyabaay Qammonuy Edom kee Sayda deqsitak yen marih agabul digibe.
YALLI dumaak, ‹Israayil ummatey, tama marak madigibina. Rihimten sin tekkek, imaan siinik boolayseloonuuh, yalla akke sinniimih qibaadat sin asiselon› keenik iyyeh suge'mmay, tohuh Suleeman too marih xayloh rihimik mawaasiminna.
Suleeman malikwâ-xaylok malcina bool takkem abiteh yen. Kalah kaadu, sidiica boolih barray caggô-gubih caggoh nikaacat yabbixehiyya luk yen. Too agbi Yallak kaa yeyxeereh.
Suleeman idoolite saaku, kay agbi YALLAY kay Dagelta kinnihiyyak kalah kaadu akiimiy Yallih innah yaqbudeeni ken lih yaqbudem kaal esseren. Tokkel usuk YALLAL luk suge imaanat sakki kaak cule. Kay abba Dawud elle suge gitak hoxxiimeh.
Qastarot deqsittaamay Saydâ mari say yalla axcuk Yallih aftok yaqbudehiyya ken lih yuqbude. Tohuk kalah kaadu, Qammon mari yallah luk yen Milkom deqsittaamay umam yabulih tanihiyya ken lih aqbuduk yen.
YALLAL dambi lem baaheeh; kay abba Dawud baguuk YALLIH gita elle katayak yen innal, kaa makatayinna.
Yarusalaamak ayrô-mawqa le kabu raqta qalel, Kamos deqsitta umâ-yabulih tan duyyey Mooyab mari Yallih aftok aqbuduk sugehiyya elle yaqbudeeni'gidih arac keenih bicse. Tonnah kaadu, Qammon mari yallah le Milkom deqsittaamay umâ-yabulih tanihiyya elle yaqbudeeni'gidih arac keenih bicse.
Toh lih kaadu, allî-baaxoh agabuy ginnaaqot luk sugehiyyah, yallah lon duyyeeyah qibaada elle abaanaah, qaydarus elle qeerisaanaah sadgat elle aban arooca keenik bicse.
YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya namma adda Suleemanah yumbulleeh, «Aki mari Yalla iyyeh yaqbudem maqbudin» kaak iyyeh sugeh immay, Suleeman YALLIH amri moggolinnaay Yallak yexxeereh. Tonnah leemik YALLI Suleeman yinqibeeh,
kaak iyyeemih, «Atu makkook itta lih haysinne bicih bagul geytime wayteeh, yi amri oggole wayteemih sabbatah, away lito malaakinna kok beyya heeh kok gubal yan numuh acee liyom koh warsah an.
Takkay immay ku abbah taagah addunyal tanim fanah aham kok maaba'mmay, ku baxih dabaanal abeyyo.
Tonna'mmay elle dardaara baaxo inkih kaak mabeya. Usuk amol akak dardaaru waa inki kedo kaah cabeyyo. Toh akah abu waam, Dawuduy yi naqasuh yenehiyya kee Yarusalaam magaalay innim abehiyyah taaga» 'yaanam iyye.
YALLI, Hadad deqsita numuy Edom dardaarah mare luk yenehiyya Suleemanak naqboyta abe.
Ah takkeemik naharal Dawud Edom marak qeebil yeyse saaku, kay qaskarak-abbah-yen-Yowab rabe-mara yaaguqe'gidih, wokke gexeh yen. Too saaku kaa kee kay mara Edom rasul laca alsa sugeeniih; sugga 'yaanam fan Edom rasul labhak sugga 'tem selli heen.
Takkay immay Hadad kee kay abbah gubal taamitta abbobtiy saaboh raqtehiyyak tu takkem Masri fan kudde. Too saaku Hadad qunxa awkah yeneeh ken lih gexe.
Miidiyan rasu cabeenih Faaran rasu fan gexen. Tokkel wakalih sinam geen. Ken kee too maraa, wokkek Masri fan gexeeniih, Masri gufen waqdi Masri-malikil yemeeten. Masri-malik, Hadadah baaxo yeceeh, buxah elle gacuh qari kaah yecee. Yakamu waa maaqo kaadu kaah yecee.
Masri-malik kaxxam kaa yikcineeh, digibih isi barrah maqanxá kaah abe. Isi barray Tacfancis deqsittahiyyah maqanxá rihimih kaah abe.
Tacfancis-maqanxá lab-baxa kaah xalte. Woo baxi migaaqah Genubat deqsitak yen. Malik-barra too awka malik-buxal isi xaylo luk teynebe.
Hadad, Malik-Dawud kee Yowab rabtem yoobbe waqdi, Masri-malikik, «Ahaysa anu inni baaxoh aduuru waa» iyye.
Malikiiy, «Kee macaa! Akkel maca wayteeh isi baaxo akah gexxam macaa?» kaak iyye.
Hadad kaal gacseemih, «Anu bas, innih gexam faxa ikkalah, weem mayyu» kaak iyye. Sarrak isi baaxo fan tonnal yuduure.
Yalli kaadu Elyadaq baxa Radon, Suleemanak naqboyta abe. Radon lih taamitak yen malikiy Hadad-Qeder deqsitahiyyak kudeh gexe. Hadad-Qeder Xooba deqsita rasih malikik ten.
Sarrak butta takke gaadileh abba yekke. Annah tanim tekkem, Dawud Hadad-Qeder qeebil yeyseeh kay qaxat yen Suuriyah mara selek sarrak ten. Radon kee kay mara gexxeeh, Damaskoh magaalal gacen. Tokkel, kay mari Suuriyah-malik kaa abe.
Too num Israayil mara yinqibeeh, Suleeman rabba 'yam fanah naqboytah kaak sugeeh; Hadad innah kaa taqbisak yen.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, Nabát-Yarobqam deqsita numuy kay gubal doolat taamat yenehiyya kaadu Suleemanak naqboyta yekke. Yarobqam Efrayim kedoh aabakuk yeneeh; elle catem, Dareeda deqsitta magaalak ten. Kay ina Xaruqa deqsitak teneeh; gubnah ten.
Suleeman kee too numih fanih umaane naharak elle uguttem annak ten.
Suleeman Yarusalaam magaalak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta exxa fayyak ramma cabsiisa'gidih, bullaaqek kibakaay magaalat maroh tan gasok tiddigille exxaaxi elle bicsiisak suge'kkel,
Yarobqam furraynuy taamak taqabe sinnih sinaamak addak inti edde raddahiyya kinnim yuble. Too waqdi Manasse kee Efrayim kedoh rasul, tamsissa haan marak inkih abba kaa abe.
Ayrok teena Yarobqam, Yarusalaam magaalaak gersi arac fan gexak suge waqdi, Aciiya deqsita nabi dibuk yan gital kaat garaye. Aciiya, Siila deqsitta magaalah numuk yeneeh; qusba-sartan xagarat luk suge. Ta nabi xagarat luk suge sartan isik kalla heeh taban kee namma ikkel qanxise.
Too waqdi Yarobqamak iyyeemih, «YALLAY Israayil doore Dageltah yani, ‹Suleeman le dardaarinna kaak beeyyooh, usuk amok akak suge kedok tabna af koh akak aceeyyo› kok iyye» 'yaanam kaak iyye. Sarrak, «Away a saroy qanxisehiyyak tabna af gabat bet» kaak iyye.
Sarrak kaadu qagissa heeh, kaak iyyeemih, «Yalli iyyemii, ‹Dawuduy yi naqasuh yenehiyya kee, Yarusalaam magaalay inkih tan Israayil addak inni magaala abehiyyah taagah, Suleemanah inki kedo cabeyyo.
Toh kaal akah baahu waam, Suleeman yoo cinna heeh gersi baaxoh mari yaqbude duyye yaqbudem baaheeh; yoo yaqbudem cabba hee. Qastarot deqsittaamay Saydâ marih say yalla axcuk too mari yi aftok yaqbudehiyya kee, Mooyab mari yaqbude Kamos deqsittaamay Mooyab mari kaadu yallah lehiyya kee, Milkom akak iyyaanamay Qammon mari yallah lehiyya yaqbudeemit gace. Kay abba Dawud yi gita katayak yeneeh, anu oobise xinto kee amri oggolak sugeh immay, usuk oggolaanam cineh. Suleeman yi gita cabba heeh ceele waytut ase.
Tonna'mmay, tohuh, luk suge reedak inkitanuuk kaa moobisaay, yanim fanah luk suge dardaarinnih qarkaytol yanay kaa axceyyo. Toh akah abu waam, kay maqaane hinna'mmay, yi naqasuh yen Dawuduy anu doorey anu amrisem abak yeneeh, anu oobise xintol tanim kee anu aba axcem duudusak yenehiyyah taaga.
Takkay immay Suleemanak raaqu waa baxak dardaarinna beyya heeh, taban takke kedoh abbootan koh akak aceeyyo.
Yoo elle yaqbudoonuh anu innih doore Yarusalaam magaalal, sarrî dabaanal Dawud ramadak numuk teeni abba yakke'gidih, Suleeman baxah inki kedo cabeyyo.
Yarobqamow! Koo Israayil malik abeyyooh, isih faxxa hayte rasul inkih abba koo abeyyo.
Yi naqasuh yen Dawud akah abak suge innah, anu kok aba axceemik tu cabe'kal duudusseeh, anu oobise xinto aba intam abteeh, anu koo akah amrisam abak, yi garil cakkik tan taamat ase koo tekkek, kulli way ku qaxat gaceyyo. Israayil malik koo abeyyooh, Dawuduh akah abe innah, ku lakal kok radu waa marak numuk teena reediseyyo.
Suleeman abe dambih, Dawuduk radu waa mara digaaleyyo. Takkay immay amurruqe wayta digaalah ken madigaala› » 'yaanam too nabi kaak iyye.
Toh yoobbe waqdi, Suleeman Yarobqam qidam faxeeh; takkay immay Masri malikiy migaaqah Sisak deqsitak yenehiyya fan kaak aleelite. Suleeman rabba 'yam fan tokkel suge.
Taway edde yabba inneemik kalihimiy Suleeman abba heehiyya kee, kay mano elle tene'nnaay, usuk kasak luk yeneh gideh agantah, ‹Suleeman Aydaada› deqsita buukul geytinta.
Suleeman morootom sanatih gide inkih yan Israayilil malikih suge.
Tohuk lakal rabeeh Yarusalaamal Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatal kaa yoogoqen. Kay baxay Racabqam deqsitahiyya kay lakal malik yekke.

Racabqam kiblat le kabut raaqa Israayil mari malik kaa aba'gidih, elle mododeh suge Seekem deqsitta magaala fan gexe.
Nabát-Yarobqam duma Malik-Suleeman-meysih megloh Masri fanah kudeh sugeeh; ta xaagu yoobbe waqdi Masril elle suge.
Guubuh kilbat le kabut raqqa 'ta kedooda farmo Nabát-Yarobqam fan rubteeh; usuk tokke yemeete waqdi, Racabqam fan gexeenih kaak iyyeenimih,
«Ku abba Suleeman duma uma xinto kee kaxxa gibdaabinat nee abbaxuk suge. Usuk nee edde abbaxuk suge gibdaabina nel sahhilossu waytek, ku xintot xiinenno» kaak iyyen.
Racabqam keenil gacseemih, «Inkiimihiiy esserteenimih adda cubbussa heeh, siinil gacsa'gidih, sidiica ayro yoh ucuyaay, tohuk wadir yol uduura» iyye. Too waqdi too mari gexeh.
Malik Racabqam kay abbah taamat sugte idoolay kay abba fayu elle esserak sugehiyya fan fayu essera'gidih gexeeh, «A mari yok iyyeemik maca keenil gacsam tayseeh?» axcuk fayu keenil essere.
Too idoola kaak intemii, «Meqe'nnal ken xiinissam faxxek, meqem keenil gacisaay; tonnal kulli way ku taamat gaceloonuh koo mamakan» 'yaanam kaak iyyen.
Takkay immay oson kaah yeceen fayu cabba heeh, kay fiqmay kaa'lih tembeeh fayu kaah taceehiyya fan gexeeh;
«Taway ta marak maca axcem taysee? ‹Ku abba nee edde abbaxuk suge gibdaabina nel sahhilos› 'yaanam yok iyyeenik, too tiyal maca keenil gacsoo?» keenik iyye.
Too qunxaaneyti fayuh kaak iyyeenimih, «Y'abbah axcak yi qunxa feera nabaah;
y'abba qilsa-le-quuka fillat siinik abbaxuk suge'mmay, anuuy wohuuk gibdim siinil baaheyyo. Usuk qunxa keetalat sin aagaruk suge'mmay, anu faaris edde yaaguren keetalat sin aagureyyo› 'yaanam keenik inxic» iyyen.
Sidooca ayrok lakal, Yarobqam kee inkih tan ummatta, usuk «Yol uduura» keenik elle iyye ayrol, malik Racabqam fan yemeeten.
Malik idoola fayu cinna heeh, furrayna kaa fayisse ceele waa uma yaabat ummatta lih yaabeh, iyyeemih, «Y'abba qilsa-le-quuka fillat siinik abbaxuk suge'mmay, anuuy wohuuk gibdim siinil baaheyyo. Usuk qunxa-keetalat sin aagaruk suge'mmay, anu faaris edde yaaguren keetalat sin aagureyyo» 'yaanam keenik iyye.
Aham duma akkelem YALLI, nabi-Aciiyah-afat Yarobqamah warseh sugeeh; tohuk gexxaamah Racobqam ummatta faxxam abam cineh. Siilol yoobokeh yen Aciiya deqsita nabi iyyem nummak maacisse.
Yemeete mari, malik yab keenik aabbe cinem yublen waqdi, «Ah maca neh xiqee, Dawud kee Dawuduk rade mara? Nee kee keenik maca tangalee? Kata labhay, nee beya! Racabqam ahaysa isih faxem abbaasitay» iyyen. Tohuk wadir Israayil mari woo xintol saduh gacen.
Tohih sabbatah Racabqam dibuk Yuudâ-rasul dabaaqah suge marih abbootan luk raaqe.
Toh yuble waqdi Racabqam, farmoh Adoniiram deqsita numuy dirkisak tamsiisan marih abbah yenehiyya Israayil mara fan ruube. Too mari too numut xeet heeh edde kaa qiden. Racabqam toh yoobbe waqdi, sissikuk faras-gaarit koreeh Yarusalaam fan kude.
Too ayrok wadir, Israayil rasuk kilbat le qaxat raqta ummatta inkih Dawuduk raaqe dardaarinnal saduh gacen.
Israayil mari Yarobqam Masrik yuduurem yoobben waqdi, elle kobxeenih sugen arac fan yamaate'gidih, kaah seeceeniih; tokke yemeete waqdi malik kaa aben. Yuudah yooboke mari dibuk Dawuduk rade marih gubat raaqe.
Racabqam Yarusalaam yemeete waqdi, Yuudah yooboke mara kee Benyam kedok bool kee bacra-tabanih-alfih qaskariitay dooro lehiyyah seeco abe. Too seeco too qaskarah akah abem, Israayil rasuk kilbat le kabut raqta Israayil ummattat qeebi abba heeh isi gubat ken haa'gidik ten.
Takkay immay too qaskar qeebih ruubaamak dumal, Yalli nabi-Samaqya lih yaabeeh,
Malik-Racabqam kee, Yuuda kee Benyaamah yooboke marah farmo ruube.
«Keenik intaamah, ‹Israayil mari sin tooboko'mmay, qeebi keenit maabina. Away tikka 'tem inkih yi fayxik tekkeemi'mmay, takkeenimik inkih isinni buxah uduura› keenik inxic» iyye. Too mari YALLIH amri oggoleenih; yakkeenimik isinni buxah yuduuren.
Israayil malikih yen Yarobqam, Efrayim kedoh qaleela mango aracal ten Seekem deqsitta magaalat maroh gaso heeh, sarrak dago gide wokkel suge. Waqlak wadir wokke cabeh gexeeh, Fanyel magaalat maroh gaso hee.
Too waqdi isi bagul yucsubeemih, «Away tu elle tani'nnak yi mari Yarusalaam fan gexeeh, wokkel Qibaadâ-Qaril YALLIH migaaqal sadgat aben ken tekkek, malik Racabqam mara akkeloonuuh, tonnal yoo qidelon» 'yaanam yucsube.
Toh cisaabisak suggu 'yeh sinaamal fayu essereeh; sarrak dahabak namma daheltih ceelo bicse. Tohuk lakal isi marak iyyeemih, «Akkeek, Yarusalaam magaala fan gexxaanam xexxaarah duuduntam hinnak, ahaysa Masrik sin yeyyeeqe sin Dagelti ah kaana; akkel yaniih, wokke akah taqabtaanam manton» keenik iyye.
Too namma daheltih ceeloy bicsehiyyak tiyak teena Beetal deqsita aracal heeh, akittu Daan deqsita aracal hee.
Ummatta too daheela taqbude'gidih, too arooca gexxeeh dambit asen.
Tohuk kalah qibaada elle aban aroocay fayyat raqtahiyyal qarwa xiseeh, woo aroocah seeka yakku waa maray Leewi-kedoh aabuke weehiyya hee.
Too maray seeka akak iyyaanahiyya kaadu Beetal-magaalal hee. Yuudâ-rasul abak sugen qiidih gurral, sanatak bacarhaytoh alsak taban kee konoyhaytoh ayrot qiidih edde asan ayro doore.
Tonnal, sanatak bacarhaytoh alsak taban kee konoyhaytoh ayro qiidih edde asan ayro abeh; too ayrot Beetal deqsita arac gexxa 'yeh, Israayil marah woo qiidih ayro sadgat elle abuh bicse aracal sadgat abe.

Malik-Yarobqam, Beetal deqsitta magaalal sadgat-elle-aban-aracal qaydarus qeerisa'gidih soolol yan waqdi, Yuudâ-baaxok-yemeete-nabi, YALLI kaak elle iyye innal, yemeete.
Too-nabi, YALLI kaak inxica elle iyye innal, iyyemii, «Sadgat-aracaw, sadgat-aracaw, kok axcem oobbey! YALLI kok inxicca iyyem kok axcu waa. Dawuduk radu waa marak Yoosiyaahu deqsita awki aabukele. Too awki yanabu waa saaku, qibaada-elle-aban-aroocay fayyat raqtahiyyal seekâ-gurral taamita maray ku gari sadgatah qaydarus qeerisaanahiyya qideleeh, ku bagul ken carrisele. Sahdayti-lafa ku bagul carriselon» iyye.
Tohut macabinnay qagseh iyyeemih, «A sadgatih-arac addigillele. Bagul akak yan gombod caxitele. Too waqdi anu away edde yaaba yab YALLIH yab kinnim aaxigetton» iyye.
Malik-Yarobqam toh yoobbe waqdi, «Ama num ibbixa» iyyeeh, gaba kaa fan yescesse. Nabi-fanah-ruube-gaba too waqdiik kaffa kaak inteeh xambaqime cinteh.
Woo sadgatih-arac kaadu garciik baaxol radeeh, sadgat-aracih amol suge gombod baaxol caxite. YALLIH migaaqal nabi iyyem tonnal tekke.
Too waqdi Yarobqam nabik iyyeemih, «Ku maganah, gaba yok akah sugte'nnah gacta'gidih, YALLAY ku Dagelta kinni yoh kallac» kaak iyye.
Nabi YALLA kaah kallaceeh, too waqdi malik gaba akah sugga 'te innah gacte.
Sarrak malik kaak iyyeemih, «Yoh abte maqaaneh galto koh gacseyyok, buxa nee bey, maaqo xagta'gidih» kaak iyye.
Nabi tohuk kaal gacsemii, «Isih lito gaddaliinok garab yoh teceemih ku buxal ko'lih magexa; akkel leek maaqo maxaga.
YALLI, ‹Too aracal tu maxagin; tu maaqabin. Isi buxah taduure waqdi, akak temeete gita hinna'mmay, aki gitak gacca xicay gex› 'yaanam yok iyye ikkal, ku buxah magexa» kaak iyye.
Tohuksa usuk isi buxa yaduure'gidih, akak yemeete gitak magacinna.
Too dabaanal, too-aracal-dabqah-yen-nabiy barak idaltuh yanihiyya suge. Too ayroy tonnah tanim tekkehiyya kay xaylo kaal temeeteeh; Yuudâ-baaxok yemeete nabi too ayro Beetalal abeh cabem kee Yarobqamak iyyem kaah warsen.
Too waqdi a nabi xaylok iyyeemih, «Hay yi xayloy, gitah gace'kke maay taaxigen?» keenik iyye. Kay xaylo nabi gitah gace'kke kaa tescesseh.
Too waqdi, «Dananal koori yoh haa» keenik iyye. Dananal koori kaah heen waqdi,
gitak adda nabik lakat oobe. Sarrak taaxige Yuudâ-baaxok yemeete nabi kaxxa-caxah-gubal daffeyak kaah suge. Kaa yuble waqdi, «Yuudâ-baaxok yemeete nabi koo maay kinni?» kaak iyye.
Yuudâ-baaxok yemeete nabi, «Yoo kinnih» iyye.
Too waqdi idaltuh yan nabi, «Am hay, buxal suginnaanim xagta'gidih, buxah koo beyu waak» kaak iyye.
Yuudâ-rasuk yemeete nabi, «Aleey, qibnaytiinoh buxa ko'lih magexa; akkel kaadu tu ko'lih makmaay maaquba.
YALLI, ‹Tu makminaay tu maqaabin. Buxah taduure waqdi akak temeete gitak magacin› 'yaanam yok iyye ikkal, ko'lih magexa» kaak iyye.
Beetal rasul suge idaltuh yan nabi diraabah kaak iyyeemih, «Anu innih kok kaxxih nabi kinniyooh; YALLII, malaykattu yol ruubeeh; too malaykatti yok iyyeemih, ‹YALLI, Tama-nabi buxah beyaay qibnaytiino kaah ab, kok iyyah yan› 'yaanam yok iyyeeh; koo beyu waa» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Yuudâ-rasuk yemeete nabi, kay buxa kaa'lih gexe. Buxal maaqo kaa'lih akamuk suge waqdi, YALLIH qangara idaltuh yan nabil obte.
Too waqdi idaltuh yan nabi, Yuudâ-baaxok yemeete nabik, anay fayya haak iyyeemih, «YALLI kok iyyaamah, ‹Yi amri cinteeh anu kok aba excem cabba hayteh, maaqo makminay lee maaqubin kok elle exce ikkel, tokmeh, tooqube. Tohuk gexxaamah rabettooh; lafa kok ku buxah marih lafa lih kok matamoogoqa› kok iyyah yan» kaak iyye.
Maaqok gaba kalen waqdi, idaltuh yan nabi Yuudâ-rasuk yemeete nabih dananal koori hee.
Yuudâ-rasuk yemeete nabi tohuk lakal isi gexoh gexak suge waqdi, gital lubak matarra kaa iyyeh kaa qide. Lafa kaak gitak addal qangalayluh raqte. Kay-raysih-garil danan kee lubak namma kabul soolak sugte.
Tokkek gitah gace mari lafa kaak gita addal yubleeniih, lafak garil lubak soolah yublen. Too mari Beetal fan gexak sugeeh, Beetal gufen waqdi yubleenim magaalâ-marah warsen.
Taaxige idaltuh yan nabi toh yoobbe waqdi iyyeemih, «Tohum YALLIH yab cine nabik tanih tan. YALLI akah iyye innah kaak abeh yan. Lubak kaat ruubeeh too lubak kaa qide» iyye.
Sarrak isi xaylok, «Gexay dananal koori yoh haa» iyye. Kay xaylo dananal koori kaah hayteh.
Tokkeek gexe waqdi, taaxige Yuudâ-baaxok yemeete nabih lafay gitak addal taniih lubak kee danan garil akak soolahiyyat fellaqqa 'ye. Too lubak nabik raysa maxaginnaay; dananay kaa'lih soolak sugehiyya kaadu xage'kal, tokkel elle soolak kaah sugen.
Taaxige idaltuh yan nabi lafa kaak aracak ugseeh, dananal hayya heeh, Beetal gacse. Tokkel kaah rookitak suggu 'yeh, sarrak kaa yoogoqeh.
Kaa edde yoogoqem, isi buxah marih *kabrih addak ten. Kaa yoogoqek sarra, kaa kee kay xaylo kaah rookitteh. Nabi weeqeeh, «Woyyow, yi toobokoytaw. Boogeew, toobokoyti yok rabe» iyye.
Sarrak isi xaylok iyyeemih, «Anu rabu waa saaku kaa'lih a kabrit yoo uguqa. Ginaada yok kay gariik haa.
Usuk Beetal elle yan sadgat-arac kee Samaariyah baaxol geytinta magaaloolil qibaada elle aban aroocay fayyat raqtahiyyah qaadak edde yaabe yaabay YALLI kaak inxica iyyehiyya nummak maacisele» iyye.
Nabi takku waytam kaah warseh immay, Yarobqam abak suge dambi le abtok akah maadayinna. Seekâ-gurral qibaada sinam absiisa mara doorru heeh qibaada-elle-aban-aroocay fayyat raqtahiyyal hee. Tohuk kalah, too aroocal too taamat gacam faxinnaan num elle haak yen.
Too umaaney usuk abak sugehiyya ellecabol kaa kee kay dardaarinna baati kee qaasir-umaane xalte.

Too saaku Yarobqam baxi lakmise. Usuk Abiyya deqsitak yen.
Abba toh yuble waqdi isi barrak iyyemii, «Koo elle aaxige waan sartanat gacca 'xicay Siilo fan gex. Aciiya deqsita nabiy duma Israayil malik akketto 'yaanam yok iyyeh sugehiyya tokkel koh sugelek, kaal gexetto.
Tabna gaqamboyta kee gasiita kee malabak-buuti gabat kaah bey. Sarrak baxi nek lakmisam kaah warisaay; qaffootam keh kaa esseray am. Takku waytam koh warselek» teetik iyye.
Kay barra tonnah abteeh, Aciiyâ-buxay Siilol tenehiyya fan gexxe. Aciiya idoolinnah namma inti weeh yen.
YALLI kaak iyyeemih, «Yarobqam barra, baxay lakmisahiyyah caagid koo esserta'gidih tamaateh tan» kaak iyyeeh, teetik iyyu waam kaadu kaah warse.
Is sarrak gersi sahdaytoh weelot gacca 'teh kaal temeete.
Aciiya qarik afak cultaamih karbaaca teetik yoobbe waqdi teetik iyyeemih, «Annah culey, Yarobqam barra kinnitom kok aaxigehik, aki weelot akah gacteh temeetem macaa? Cul annah am; saaha sinni xaagu koh abbixek.
Yarobqamak intu waytam koh warisu waak am» teetik iyye. Qari kaal culte waqdi, «YALLAY Israayil doore Dageltah yani, ‹Ummat addak doorru koo heeh, Israayil ummatay yi marah yanik malik koo abe.
Dardaarinna Dawuduk rade marak beyya heeh koh ecee. Takkay immay Dawuduy yi naqasuh yeneeh anu aba exceemik sah gersim abe waak yi amri afqadook duudusak yenehiyya makkinnito.
Kok duma suge marak gaca dambit assa. Yoo cinna hayteh, coox kee xeetiiy, dahabaay, lakqo kee nacaasak isi gabak bicisse duyyey yalla akak intahiyya hayte. Yot naqabu culusinnaanimit asseeh, darre yot cabte.
Tohuk gexxaamah ku dardaarinnal bala oobiseyyo. Kok radda labhak baacoytit takkuu, gaddaloola takku, inkih ken qideyyo; buxâ-mara kok bayseyyo. Saqi-dacah innah baaxot ken qidelon.
Ku-buxah-marak magaalah addal rabinnaan numih raysa kuuta akmeleeh, barrih raqta baaxol rabinnaan numih raysa guma akmele. Tamahat yabtam, yoo YALLA, kok iyyeh yan› kaak inxic» teetik iyye.
Aciiya yab ahat mayseedeyinnay qagseeh iyyeemih, «Away is buxah uduuraay; lakmisak kok raaqe baxi magaala culla 'ta way, kok rabele.
Israayil mari inkih kay rabah rookitele. Meqe magaqah kaa aaguqelon. Yarobqam buxah marak meqe magaqah tamoogoqu waytam, dibuk too awka. Macaay intek, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya ken addak maqaane edde yublem dibuk kaa.
YALLI Israayilik abba yakku waa malik reedisele. Too malik, Yarobqam luk suge dardaarinna inkitanuuk baysele. Toh xayih akkelem ixig!
YALLI Israayil digaalele. Israayil mari dori-qaxal tooboke bayrey caacay kabuk kabul yasgayyeh innah gacelon. Duma ken kaxxa abbobtih ikoytah yecee baaxoy away elle yaniinihiyyak ken ayyaaqele. Fuurat weeqaytuk woo kabul ken fixixisele. Toh keenik akah abu waam macaay intek, YALLAT naqabu culseeniih, Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurumuuda soolisen.
YALLI Israayil ummatat darre cabele. Toh macaay intek, Yarobqam edde ase dambi kee, Israayil mara edde asise dambih sabbata» teetik iyye.
Nabi too yaabak gaba kale waqdi, malik barra isi buxay Tirxâ-magaalal teneh tuduure. Awki, is isi qarih afa guffa inte waqdi, rabe.
Israayil mari too awkih rabah rookiteeh; YALLI nabi-Aciiyay kay naqasuh yenek elle iyye innal, meqe magaqah kaa yoogoqen.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Malik-Yarobqam abehiyya kee, usuk carbik abeh gideey, sahda elle xiinisak suge'nna, Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Yarobqam labaatanna kee namma karmah malikih suge. Usuk rabeeh kay baxi kay arac ciggiile. Kay baxi migaaqah Nadab deqsitak yen.
Suleeman baxi Racabqam, Yuudâ-malik yekke saaku, morootom kee inki karmat yen. Yarusalaam magaalay YALLI Israayil magaalak inkih isi qibaadah abittoh doorehiyyal, taban kee malcina karma malikih suge. Racabqam ina Naqma deqsitta barrak teneeh, Qammon deqsita marah aabakuk ten.
Yuudâ-mari dambi-lem YALLAL baahe. Ken kaxxa abbobtik fula YALLIH naqabu isinnil oobisen. Uma-taamat asen.
Kulli qaleh amo kee silal le cooxih gubal, duyye elle yaqbuden arooca xiseeniih, taahirik tan qamidwa akak iyyan qamidway xeetik bicseenihiyya sooliseenih, Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurumuuda soolisen.
Wohuk gactaamah abeenimih, woo duyye elle yaqbuden aroocal xiiqareh-xiinak-labim tokkel heen! Yuudâ-mariiy, Israayil-mari yamaateemik naharal woo baaxol suge maray YALLI yeyyeeqehiyya edde asak sugen umâ-yabulih-tan-taamat inkih gacen.
Racabqam malik edde yekke konoyhaytô sanat gufe saaku, Masri-malikiy migaaqah Sisak deqsitak yenehiyya Yarusalaamat qeebi abeeh tet yibbixeh.
Too saaku YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarik duyye elle daanisan aracal sugga 'te duyye kee, malik qaril sugte duyyek Suleemanak-raqte-goobway dahabak bicseenihiyyah agantah inkih bee.
Malik Racabqam woo goobwah aftok nacaasak bicsen goobwa bicissa heeh; sarrak malik qarih afal dacayrih yan maral amaanatah yecee.
Malik YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari fan gexa waqdi, quukah tokke fan baahak yeneeniih; usuk wokkek yaduure waqdi, daanah elle yabbixen malik qari fan gacisak yenen.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Racabqam abba heehiyya Yuudâ-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Racabqam kee Yarobqam abbootanal sugga iyyen dabaanal carbi tittat abak sugen.
Racabqam rabeeh; Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatal malikwâ-buxah mara edde yoogoqen kabrit kaa yoogoqen. Racabqam ina Naqma deqsitta barrak teneeh, Qammon deqsita marah aabakuk ten. Kay lakal kay baxi malik yekke. Migaaqah Abiyya kaak axcuk yenen.
