Yarobqam Israayil malik edde yekke taban kee bacarhaytô sanatat, Abiyya Yuudâ-malik yekke.
Yarusalaamal sidooca sanat malikih suge. Kaak ina Maqka deqsitak teneeh; Abisalaamak baxák ten.
Usuk isi-abba-edde-asak-suge-dambit kaak kaxxih aseh sugeeh, YALLAY kay Dagelta kinnihiyyah garil yeemene numuk mananna. Akak rade Dawud bis le numuk mananna.
Takkay immay YALLI, kay-kaxxa-abba Dawud taagah lab-baxay malik yakku waa kaah yeceeh; tonnah kaadu Yarusalaam saayah xiinise.
YALLI ah akah abemii, Dawud kaa ruffa haytam abak sugeeh; YALLI aba iyyeemik, Ciitah-yooboke-Uriyya-deqsita-numul-baaheemiik kalihimik, YALLI inxicca 'yem inkih abak suge.
Abiyya dardaarinna geemih kaa kee Yarobqam qeebi tittat abak sugte.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Abiyya abba heehiyya inkih, ‹Yuudâ-Malikwah-Aydaada› deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Abiyya elle rabeeh elle yamoogoqem, Yarusalaam magaalak Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafata. Kay baxay migaaqah Aasa deqsitak yenehiyya kay lakal malik yekke.
Israayil malikih yen Yarobqam malik yekkeemih labaatanni sanat yekkek sarra, Aasa Yuudak malik yekke.
Aasa morootom kee inki sanat Yarusalaamal malikih suge. Kay aboyya migaaqah Maqka deqsitak teneeh abbak Abisalaam baxak ten.
Aasa kay kaxxa abba Dawuduk kaxxih, YALLI kicnam abak yen.
Xiiqareh-xiinak lab-maray coox-kee-xeet elle yaqbuden aroocal sugehiyya wokkek xiiriyeeh; kaak duma suge mari heeh suge gabak bicsen duyyey aqbuduk sugeenihiyya bayseh.
Isi aboyyay migaaqah Maqka deqsittaah, ‹Inah tan maliká› 'yaanam akah axcuk sugeenihiyya woo abbootanak kaleh. Tet abbootanak akah kalem, say-yalla akak iyyan duyyey migaaqah Aseera akah iyyaanahiyyah gurmudday umâ-yabulih-tani soolisseh sugte. Aasa too gurmudda kalla heeh Kidroon migaq le goloh addal carrise.
Aasa kaak duma sugga 'te qibaada elle aban aroocay fayyat raqtahiyya inkih mabaysinna'mmay, YALLAL le imaan kaak digga luk yeneeh, rabba 'yam fanah imaan kaak digga luk suge.
Kay abba kaak dumal YALLIH qibaadah orobta'gidih heeh suge duyye kee, usuk isih YALLIH qibaadah taamat asisa'gidih rikeek heeh suge dahab kee lakqo kee gersi duyye bahha heeh, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal hee.
Kaa kee Israayil malikih yen Baqsa deqsita num abbootanal suggu 'yen sanat inkih, qeebi tittat abak sugen.
Malik Baqsa Yuudâ-rasu warareeh; sinam Yuudâ-rasu awqe waytaah afak akah cule wayta innah, Raama deqsitta magaalat maro teetit haam qimbise.
Toh yuble waqdi, Aasa YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih adda kee, isi buxak duyye elle daanisan aracal dahab kee lakqok sugga 'tem weerra heeh beeh, kay gubal doolatat abbootan luk yen marih gabal, Damaskoh magaalal Suuriyah malikih yen Banihadad deqsita malikih acwah ruube. Banihadad Tabrimmon deqsita numuk baxak teneeh; Cedyon deqsita numuk kaadu baxi baxak ten.
Afti farmoh ruubeemiih, «Duma ni abbobti qalla luk sugteeh; tonna'mmay ahaysa koo kee yoo ni abbobtik kaxxih qalla haysinnaama. Ama dahab kee lakqo mattacoh koh ruubah an. Tonna'mmay, Malik-Baqsay Israayil malikih yanihiyyah qaskar yi baaxok akah tawqe innah, kaa'lih lito qalla kaak targiqeemi» 'yaanam farmoh kaah ruube.
Malik Banihadad too yab oggoleeh; sarrak Israayil magaalooli yabbixeeni'gidih, qaskar abbobti kee qaskar kaah ruube. Too qaskar Qiyon kee Daan kee Aabil-Beet-Maqka kee, Galiil badih dariifal ten magaalooli kee, Naftaali rakaakay inkih yibbixen.
Malik Baqsa tekkem yoobbe waqdi, Raamâ dariifat maro haanam cabeh Tirxa fan yuduure.
Tohuk lakal Aasa, inkih yan Yuudah rasul tan ummatak num raaqe'kal, «Baqsa, Raamat maro haa'gidih baaheh suge coox kee xeet wokkek kala» 'yaanam iyyeeh; too xeet kee coox tokkek kaleenih. Too duyyet Benyam rasul ten namma magaalay Mixfa kee Gabaq deqsitahiyya edde maren.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, Aasa abeemik kay agiiranna kee, usuk maro edde hee magaalooliiy, kay aydaad inkih Yuudâ-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan. Sarrak idoolite saaku ibak kaxxa biyaakah biyaakiteeh ellecabol yangayyem gidibuk kaal ten.
Rabe saaku Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatal malik-buxah-mara edde yaaguqen *kabrit kaa yoogoqen. Kay baxi Yacoosafat kay lakal malik yekke.
Malik Aasa Yuudâ-malik edde yekke nammayhaytô sanatat, malik Yarobqam baxi Nadab Israayil malikih gace. Namma sanatah malikih suge.
YALLAL dambi lem baaheeh, kay abba Israayil dambit akah asisak suge'nnah, usuk kaadu dambit ken asise.
Issakar-kedoh yooboke Aciiya baxi Baqsa, Nadab kee kay qaskar Filistiin rasul Gibbaton deqsitta magaala yabbixeeni'gidih maro haak sugen waqdi, raarisak amma 'yeh kaa qide.
Taham edde tekkem, Aasa Yuudâ-malik edde yekke sidochaytô sanatak ten. Sarrak Baqsa kay aracal isih malikih gace.
Too waqdiik Yarobqam-buxah-marih qidimit gaba hee. Aciiya deqsita nabiy Siilol yoobokehiyya Yallih afak yoobbe farmo baahe saaku elle iyye innal, Yarobqam-buxah-mara qideeh, num keenik macabinna.
Toh Yarobqam kee kay buxah marat akah tekkem, isih dambit asakaay, Israayil ummat kaadu dambit asisak, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyah naqabu isil oobiseemih sabbatah kaat tekke.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Nadab abba heehiyya inkih, Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Malik Aasa kee malik Baqsa abbootanal sugga 'tem qeebi tittat abak sugen.
Malik Aasa edde reede sidochaytô sanatat Aciiya baxi Baqsa Israayil malik yekke. Dabqah Tirxâ magaalal gaceeh; labaatanna kee affara sanat malikih suge.
YALLAL dambi lem baaheeh; kaak duma suge Yarobqam Israayil dambit akah asisak suge'nnah, usuk kaadu woo dambit ken asise.

YALLI, Canaani-baxa-Yaahu lih yaabeeh, Malik Baqsa iyyu waam farmoh kaal ruube.
Nabi-Yaahu, too farmo kaal qideeh kaak iyyeemih, «YALLI kok iyyemii, ‹Tu'numuh masuginnitooy; inkih tan Israayil ummattay yi ummat kinnik abba koo abe. Tonna'mmay Yarobqamak kaxxih dambi le taamat asseeh, Israayil ummat dambi le taamat asisse. Oson aban dambih yot naqbi haak suge.
Tohuk gexxaamah koo kee ku buxah mara bayisaamat emeete. Nabát-Yarobqamak abba heem kok abeyyo.
Ku buxah marak magaalah addal rabinnaan numih raysa kuuta akmeleeh, barrih raqta baaxol rabinnaan numih raysa guma akmele› kok iyyah yan» kaak iyye.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Baqsa abba heehiyya kee, luk yen agiiranni inkih Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal yan.
Baqsa rabeeh, Tirxâ magaalal kaa yoogoqen. Kay baxay migaaqah Eela deqsitak yenehiyya, kay lakal malik yekke.
Too farmo YALLI, nabi-Yaahû-gabat Baqsah akah ruubeemik naharsitto: YALLIH garil uma taamat asakaay, YALLIH naqabu isil oobisak sugeemih sabbata. Tonnal Yarobqam abak suggu 'ye umaane abak suge. Nammayhaak kaadu, YALLI a bis le umaane kaal akah baaheemik sabab, Yarobqam-buxah-mara qideeh saabo ken cabsiise.
Aasa Yuudâ-malik edde yekke labaatanna kee leceyhaytô sanatat Baqsa baxay migaaqah Eela deqsitak yenehiyya, Israayil-malik yekke. Dabqah Tirxâ magaalal gaceeh namma sanat malikih suge.
Dimri deqsita numuy malik luk yen faras-gaariirak garabak abbah yenehiyya kaa qidaamih malat gace. Ayrok teena Eela, Tirxâ-magaalal Axxa deqsita numuy malik-qarih abbah yenehiyya'lih, woo numih qaril kamri-maqabat yiskirem kaak yuble waqdi,
Dimri qari kaal culla 'yeh kaa qideeh; kay aracal isih malik yekke. Toh akah tekkem, Aasa Yuudâ-malik edde yekke labaatanna kee malcinhaytô sanatat yen saaku.
Dimri malik akah yekke innaak Baqsâ-buxah-maral qidimih gexxa 'ye. Kaah ramad luk suge lab-mara kee, kay kataysiisih suge marak num macabinnay inkih selli hee.
YALLI nabi-Yaahuk elle iyyeeh; nabi-Yaahu elle warissa hee innal, tekke.
YALLI annah tanim kaa kee kay buxah maral akah baahemii, Baqsa kee kay baxay Eela deqsite bahte dambih sabbata. Oson xeet kee coox aqbuduk sugeeniih, Israayil ummat kaadu dambit asisak sugeeniih, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyah naqabu isinnil oobisen.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Eela abba heehiyya inkih Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal geytinta.
Aasa Yuudâ-malik edde yekke labaatanna kee malcinhaytô sanatat Dimri Israayilik malik yekke. Dimri malikih malcina ayroh gide Tirxâ magaalal suge. Too saaku Israayil mari Gibbaton deqsitta Filistiin magaala yabbixeeni'gidih, tokkel yinfiddigeenih sugen.
Sarrak too mari Dimri malik qideemih xaagu geeniih, too waqdi Qomri deqsita numuy qaskar abbah keenik sugehiyya tokkel elle malikih dooren.
Sarrak Qomri kee kay qaskar Gibbaton cabteh gexxeeh, Tirxâ magaalat maro heen.
Dimri, magaala yibbixeenim yuble waqdi, malik elle gaca qarik iqiyat edde rebsiman golit culeeh qarit gira ruube. Too girat carareh edde rabe.
Too rabah akah rabem, isih abe dambi. Yarobqamay Israayil ummat dambit asisak sugehiyyah gita kataatak sugeeh, YALLIH garil dambi lem baahe.
Tahak kalihimiy Dimri abba hee kee, malik qiduh abeh yan mala, Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Tohuk lakal Israayil mari malikih haan numih dooriyyal titta weenih, namma'kkeh gaceeniih; marak garab keenik Ginat deqsita numih baxay Tibni migaq luk yenehiyya malikih haanam faxen. Aki garab keenik duma heenih sugen Qomri malikih yanay 'yaanam iyyen.
Ellecabol Qomri malikih haam faxa mari yeyseeh, Tibni qideenih. Qomri malik yekke.
Soddom kee inikhayto sanatay Aasa Yuudâ-malik edde yekkehiyyat Qomri Israayil-malik yekkeeh, taban kee namma sanat abbootanal suge. Naharsi lica sanat Tirxâ magaalal ackumuk sugeeh,
sarrak Samar deqsitak yen numuk lica alfih garsih kooma xaame. Woo koomat maro heeh sarrak tokkel magaala xise. Too magaalak migaaqah Samaariya iyyeeh; elle muggaaqisem, kooma akak xaame numuy Samar deqsitak yenehiyyak ten.
Qomri YALLAL dambi lem baaheeh; kaak foocat sugte malikwak inkih lafita dambit asak suge.
Kaak naharat malikih suge Nabát-Yarobqamak kaxxih abak suggu 'yem abeeh; Israayil mara xeet kee coox qibaadat asise. Tonnal YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyat naqabu culse.
Tohuk kalah taniimiy Qomri abehiyya kee abinak edde assa 'yem Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Qomril Yallih amri yemeeteeh; Samaariyah magaalal kaa yoogoqen. Kay baxi Acab kay lakal malik yekke.
Yuudâ-malikih yen malik Aasa reedeemih soddom kee bacarhaytô sanat gufe saaku, Qomri baxi Acab Israayil-malik yekke. Usuk Samaariyah magaalal labaatanna kee namma sanat reede.
Usuk kaadu YALLIH garil dambi le taamat asak sugeeh, kaak naharat sugte amoytittek inkih lafita dambi abak suge.
Kaak dumal malikih suge Nabát-Yarobqam abak suge umaane kay garil inkinnah tuk masuginnaay, dambi abitto wohuk lafittam baahe. Etbaqal-deqsita-numuy Saydâ-marak-malikih yenehiyyak Idebal-deqsitta-baxá rihimih abite. Tohuk lakal Baqal akak iyyaanam diini-maleela Yallih aftok taqbudehiyyah qibaadat gace.
Too Baqal akak iyyaanamay Yallih innah yaqbudeenihiyyah qibaada bicse qaril sadgat-arac bicse. Tohum elle abem, Samaariyah magaalak ten.
Tohut maadayinnay qagseh Aseera migaq le say-yalla akak iyyaanam elle yaqbudoonuh gurmudda hee. Tonnah abak YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyah bagcarra bahta uma taamat asak suge. Too gital kaak duma sugte Israayil-malikwak inkih fula le umaane usuk abak suge.
Acab malikih yen saaku, Beetalal yooboke Ciyel Yerikô-magaala nammeyhaak xise. YALLI Nuún-Yoosuwak elle inxicca iyye'nnal, Ciyel Yerikô-magaala nammeyhaak bicsa'gidih rakiibo akah hee saaku, naharsi-baxi kaak rabe. Too baxi migaaqah Abiiram deqsitak yen. Aki baxay barah kay xaylok inkih wadirit yenehiyya, woo magaala akak culan afah bicsat yan saaku kaak rabe. Too baxi migaaqah Sagub deqsitak yen.

Eliyyas deqsita nabiy Gilqad deqsita rasuk Tisba deqsitta magaalal yenehiyya malik-Acab fan yemeeteeh kaak iyyemii, «YALLAY waaraah Israayil doore Dageltah yanihiyyay anu naqasuh akak anihiyyah migaaqal xiibitah ani immay, anu ahaysa, rob amaatele siinik axceemik dumal, namma sanat akkiiy sidooca sanat akki guffa haam fanah baaxol naafi magaca; rob marada» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal nabi Eliyyasal YALLIH qangara obteeh kaak iyyeemiih,
«Ama arac cabay Karit-buyyiy Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqahiyyah garil ombooqor.
Lee woo buyyik aaqubettooh; maaqo kuranwak, koh baaha exceh aniih, kuranwa koh baahele» kaak iyye.
Eliyyas YALLI aba kaak iyyem oggoleeh gexxa 'yeh Karit-buyyih garil gace.
Leek woo buyyik yooqobeeh; kuranwa kulli bar kee laqo gaqambo kee cado kaah baahak sugte.
Waqlak wadir robti waytik gexxaamah woo buyyi kafeh.
Sarrak YALLIH qangara kaal obteh, kaak iyyemii,
«Saydâ rasul tan Xarafat deqsitta magaala fan gexay wokkel elle idiy. Wokkel tan gubnah tan barrak maaqo koo oskoma yaanam exceh anik, tokke gex» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Eliyyas Xarafat magaala fanah gexeeh; magaalak afa yemeete waqdi, boco gaabossa gubna kaah sugte. Sarrak usuk woo barrak, «Ku maganah yaaquben leeh tu maay lito?» teetik iyye.
A barra lee kaah bahta'gidih gexxa 'te waqdi, teetih seeceh iyyemii, «Gaqamboyta kaadu luk yoh am» teetik iyye.
«Gaqamboyta alle waamah YALLAY waaraah ku Dageltah yanihiyyah migaaqal xiibita. Takkay immay riyen darok gaba-kibba-haytah-gide sacnil liyooh, zeytik (saliidik) tu'baxa kaadu gaanul liyo. Akke akah emeetem, gira-elle-urusa-bocoy gaabossa heeh buxah aduure waqdi, inni kee inni baxah maaqo bicsa'gidih emeete. Maaqok linom too gideey; tohuk lakal nee qambaltam qulul kee raba» kaak inte.
Too waqdi Eliyyas teetik iyyemii, «Wohuh macisabbootinay bicissam faxak sugte maaqo bicis. Takkay immay naharak yoh ama-litoomuk qunxa gaqamboytâ-baxa bicisaay; raqteemit is kee isi baxah gaqambo bicis.
Woh akah axcem, YALLAY Israayil doore Dageltah yanihiyya iyyamaa, ‹Anu rob edde ruubu waa ayrok naharat, sacni addal yan bulul mayambaxaay, gaani addal yan zeyti (saliid) mayambaxak› iyyeh, macisabbootin» 'yaanam teetik iyye.
Too waqdi too gubna gexxa 'teeh Eliyyas teetik ab iyyem abte. Tohuk wadir kulli ayro, kaa kee teetiiy tet buxah mara dudda hayta maaqo luk yenen.
YALLI Eliyyasah afat xagana elle cule innal, sacnik daro mambaxinnay gaanuk zeyti mambaxinna.
Ayrok teena taaxige gubnâ-baxi lakmisak maacise. A lakimi lafak kaa lafeeh; sarrak edde rabe.
Too waqdi is Eliyyasak intemii, «Yallih numow, annah tanim macah yok abte? Akke akah temeetem, anu abeh an dambi Yalla kassisseh baxa yok qidsissa'gidii?» kaak inte.
Too waqdi Eliyyas, «Awka yol baahey» teetik iyyeeh, sarrak awka teetik gabak beyya heeh elle suge qarih amo kaa yeyyeeqe. Wokkel qarkaytô-bagul deerih kaa hee.
Tohuk lakal anay fayya heeh dooqa abe. Dooqah iyyemii, «YALLAW yi Dageltaw, annah tan umaane a gubnal macah bahtee? A barray yoh muquk sugteeh amo yok wagitak sugtehiyyah baxa macah qiddee?» iyye.
Sarrak awkak bagul sidiica adda iba kee gaba rubbu heeh, YALLAK annah iyye, «YALLAW yi Dageltaw, a awkal rooci gacis» iyye.
YALLI Eliyyas abe dooqa oggoleeh, too waqdi awkal ufuy yuduureeh rabak yunuwweh.
Sarrak Eliyyas qari amook awka gabat hayya heeh ina fanah luk oobe. Teetik iyyemii, «Ku baxi ah kaa; yunuwweh!» teetik iyye.
Is too waqdi, «Yallih num kinnitom ta way kok ismiteeh; YALLIH qangaray atu yabta numma kinnim eexegeh» kaak inte.

Qabar radeemih sidiica sanat tikka 'yek lakal, ayrok teena YALLI Eliyyasak annah iyye. «Gexay Malik Acabah umbulluy; anu rob ruubeyyok» iyye.
Eliyyas malikih yambullee'gidih gexe.
Samaariyal ibak-gibdi qulul radeh yan.
Tonna-leemik Acab, Qobadya-deqsita-numuy malik-qarih-abbah yenehiyyah seece. Qobadya YALLIH meysi xagarat le numuk ten.
Idebal Yallih nabuwwa qidak ten saaku, Qobadya bool nabi beyya heeh namma kontomuh ken kurra heeh gablat yooqore numuk ten. Too nabuwwah makmok maaqabu tokke baahak yen.
Acab, Qobadyak annah iyye, «Gexay, qulul kee rabak ken catna'gidih, baakil kee faarisih qaysok tu geytam keh, buyyitte kee weeqayti dariifal gorrisey» iyye.
Sarrak kulli numuuy qaysô-goran keenik elle abu waa kabu tittah warissa heenik lakal, Malik Acab inki kabul goranah keenik gexeeh, Qobadya aki kabul gexe.
Qobadya woo gexoh gexa waqdi, garciik Eliyyasat garaye. Qobadya kaa yeexegeeh, too waqdi addah qununna 'ye. Sarrak, «Yi nabiyow, Eliyyasaw, ah nummaak koo?» iyye.
Eliyyas too waqdi, «Yeey ah yook; gexay ku malikik, ‹Eliyyas akkel yan› inxic» iyye.
Qobadya too waqdi iyyemii, «Kee maca baahee? Malik gabat yoo akah qidsissam faxxam macaa?» kaak iyye.
«YALLAY waaraah ku Dageltah yanihiyyah migaaqal koo xiibitah; malik ku goranah baadal cabba hee ikke mali. ‹Yi baaxol mayana› axcinnaan abba xibsiisak suge.
Hay, taway atu, too numuk, ‹Eliyyas akkel yan, inxic› yok anni'nnal inta?
Anu akkek gexa waqdiik, YALLIH *Roocaaniyya beyya koo hayteh, aaxige waan baaxol koo qiddek, maca abeyyo? Atu akkel tanim kaah warissa heeh akkel koo week, raba yol ackumele. Anu awkah en saakuuy a saaku fanah YALLIH qibaadat yan num kinniyo.
Malik barrah tan Idebal nabuwwa qidak ten saaku, anu bool nabi namma kontomul baxissa heeh gablah addat ken uqurat makmok maqub amoh keenih baahak suge num kinniyom maay toobbee?
Hay tonnal, malikih anu akkel anim waris 'yaanam macah yok intaa? Warsek yoo qidele» kaak iyye.
Eliyyas kaal gacsemii, «YALLAY waaraah Nabaamak Nabahiyyay anu akah taamitahiyyah migaaqal xiibitah aniih, a saaku Malik Acabah ambulleeyyo» kaak iyye.
Sarrak Qobadya Malik Acab fan gexeeh Eliyyas yemeetem kaah warseh. Acab too waqdi Eliyyasat garaya'gidih gexe.
Acab kaat radda 'ye waqdi, «Ah koo innaa? Israayilil umaaneh akak abaanam yeegemen numow» kaak iyye.
Eliyyas too waqdi kaal gacsemii, «Umaane keenil oobissem, yoo hinnay; umaane keenil oobissem, koo kee ku abba. Isin YALLIH amri cineeh Yalla akke sinni Baqal yuqbude mara kinniton.
Taway Israayil marak inkih, Karmel qalel yot ongoorowa inxic. Baqal-nabuwwak affara bool kee kontom gabat bah. Say-yalla akak iyyan duyyey migaaqah Aseera akah iyyaanahiyyay ku barra Idebal cato akah abtahiyyah nabuwwak affara bool gabat bah» kaak iyye.
Acab, Israayil mara kee Baqal-nabuwwak inkih Karmel qale fan ama 'yaanam iyye.
Too mari yemeete waqdi, Eliyyas foocal keenik solla 'yeh keenik iyyemii, «Isinnih taysem aaxige cinteenih, agaagulut rabten. Sin Dagelta YALLA tekkek, YALLA uqbudaay; Baqal tekkek, Baqal uqbuda» keenik iyye. Sahda too waqdi tu kaal magacsinnay tibba inte.
Tohuk lakal Eliyyas iyyemii, «YALLIH nabuwwak raqtem dibuk yoo. Baqal-nabuwwaay affara bool kee kontom takke.
Taway namma awur baaha. Woo namma awuruk Baqal-nabuwwa awuruk teena beyya heenih yasguudoonay niyyassa heek lakal, akak gira sinni bocoh bagul hoonay. Anu kaadu aki awuruk toh abeyyo.
Too waqdi Baqal-nabuwwa isinni yalla kallacoonay, anu kaadu YALLA kallaceyyo. Too dooqa abna waqdi, gira ruubinnaan Yalli nummah Yalla kinnim aaxigenno» iyye.
Ummatta, «Taham meqeemik, takkay» iyyen.
Sarrak Eliyyas Baqal-nabuwwak iyyemii, «Isin mangitoonumih sabbatah, isinni awur naharat beyay usguuda. Too waqdi bocot gira maruubina; isinni yalla kallaca» keenik iyye.
Oson too awur beeniih usgudday niyyassa heenih, maacak xabba haanamaay dohri tikka 'yam fan dooqa abak sugen. Anay fayya haak, «Baqalow, innam nek oobbey, innam nek oobbey» iyyeeniih; toh lih kaadu, woo kaah sadgat elle abaana'gidih xisen aracat meekitak, way kaqitakaay way kaadu argaduk aseeni'mmay, keenil gacsem matan.
Dohri yekke waqdi, Eliyyas keenil anqaaseh iyyemii, «Aykee sin yalli xayuk yaabbeh mayanak, dooqah anay fayya hayteenih abe wayten. Sin yalli away cisaabat aniiy, taamah agxeh aniiy, safarah rikek teena gexe yekke kaa tekkek, anay fayya kaah haa. Inaaqat yanim takkehik, kaadu kaa ugusa» axcuk, anqaasah ken lih yaabe.
Usuk toh keenik iyye waqdi, woo ken qibaadah abitto elle inta innal, qabal keenik caxitam fanah gileela kee balaadit isinnik qanxis, qanxis heen.
Carri barih sadgat edde aban waktih fanah waxxaq axcukuuy goroorocitak sugen. Takkay immay tu keenil gacissam magennoonuuy; hebeltoh anay mantabbinna.
Too waqdi Eliyyas ummattak, «Taway yol ama» iyye. Oson too waqdi inkih kaal gaaboowen. Too mari kaal yemeete waqdi, YALLAH sadgat elle abak sugen aracay yiddigilleh sugehiyyah bicsiyyat gaceeh,
gexxa 'yeh taban kee namma xaa baahe. Woo taban kee namma xaa, Israayil addal tan taban kee namma kedoy Yaqkuub xayloh migaaqal muggaaqiseenihiyyah ceelallok ten. Yaqkuub, YALLI Israayil-'yaanamih-migaq akah yeyyeeqe numuk ten.
A taban kee namma xaak YALLAH sadgat elle abak sugen arac bicse. Woo aracat maroh af qunxa boodooda dage. Woo boodooda leek kiboonuh taban kee affara litri faxak yen.
Sarrak boco bahha heeh, woo Yallih-migaaqal xise aracak bagul hee. Sarrak woo awur asguddaay niyyassa heeh, woo bocoh bagul hee. Too waqdi iyyemii, «Affara gaanu leek kibba haay, woo aracih bagul tan sadgat kee bocol caxa» iyye. Too mari Eliyyas keenik aba iyyem aben.
«Qagisa» keenik iyye. Qagseenih. «Kaadu inki adda qagisa» keenik iyye. Qagseenih.
Too waqdi woo lee Yallih sadgatah bicsen arac kee bocok bagul caxitteeh; dagen af qunxa boodoodat leek kibbiime.
Sadgat edde aban uddur gufe waqdi, nabi Eliyyas Yallih-sadgat-elle-abaana'gidih-bicsen-aracih-garih amma 'yeeh iyyemii, «YALLAW, Abraahim kee Iscaakaay Yaqkuub doore Dageltaw, atu Israayilil Yalla kinnitooh, anu kaadu ku naqasu kinniyom ta saaku ken iysixxig. A saaku anu abah anim atu yok aba intem kinnim ken iysixxig.
YALLAW, a mari atu Yalla kinnitom yaaxige'gidiiy tonna-leemik kol yaduure'gidih, aba dooqa yok oobbeyay yok raabitey» iyye.
Too waqdi YALLIH gira qaraanak obteeh; too waqdi qiden awuruuy xeet kee boco inkih cararisseh, baaxok bisu korisseh woo af qunxa boodooday leek kibbinteh sugtehiyya woo gira kafisseh.
Ummatta ah tuble waqdi baaxol gommoh raddeeh, «YALLIIY Yalla kinnih! Yalli dibuk kaa» iyyen.
Eliyyas too waqdi, «Baqal-nabuwwa ibbixaay baaha. Num keenik gexe kalay ken baaha» iyye. Ummatta woo nabuwwa inkih tibbixeeh; too waqdi Eliyyas, Kisyon-weeqaytu fan beyya ken heeh, weeqayti-garil ken qidsiise.
Tohuk gaba kale waqdi, Eliyyas Malik Acabak iyyemii, «Ahaysa gexay maaqo xag; roobuk angad aabbeh anik» iyye.
Acab maaqo xaga'gidih gexe waqdi, Eliyyas Karmel qaleh amo yewqe. Tokkel qununna 'yeh moyya isik namma gulubih fanat hayya heeh,
kaa'lih yan kay taamat yan numuk, «Gexay bad fan wagit» iyye.
Taamâ-num gexeeh yuduure waqdi, «Tu maballiyo» axcuk yuduure. Eliyyas malcina adda qagamqagisak, «Gexay wagitay am» kaak iyye.
Malcinhaytoh adda gexay gacak suge waqdi, «Qunxa qamburrê-baxay nabnah sahdayti gabak ayse waytahiyya badak addak awaqih uble» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Eliyyas woo numuk, «Malik Acab fan gexay, ‹Rob radam faxaah sarrak gexi koo mahaak; a waqdiik faras-gaarit koray buxah uduur› kaak inxic» iyye.
Dago waktih addat data qamburre qaran bulteeh, kaxxa caacay yemeeteeh. too waqdi kaxxa rob rade. Acab isi gaarih amot gacca 'yeh Yidraqel fan yuduure.
YALLIH qande Eliyyasal gacte. Too waqdi Eliyyas saro isik axcal kariqqa heeh, Acab-gaarik-foocat Yidraqel magaala fan yerde.

Malik-Acab isi barra-Idebalah, Eliyyas abba heem kee, Baqal-nabuwwa elle qidsiise'nna warse.
Too waqdi is Eliyyasah farmo rubteeh kaak intemii, «Beera ta uddur atu nabuwwak abba haytem kok abe week, yallitte foyya yoo abtay» inte.
Eliyyas meysiteeh rooci megloh yoowweh. Is lih taamat yan num luk, Yuudâ-baaxol tan Bersabaq fan gexe. Taamat kaah yen num wokkel cabba heeh,
Eliyyas inkih tan ayro bacarih tan baaxot ankalaquk assa 'yeh, sarrak uli caxay silal lehiyyah gubal daffa 'ye. Isi niyat «Ahak rabam yoh aysuk ten» 'yaanam iyye. Too waqdi dooqa abeeh, «YALLAW, ah duudaanam hinna. Yi abbobtiy yok duma sugtek ayse waak, rooci yok eyyeq» iyye.
Sarrak caxâ-gubal deerih gacca 'yeh xin kaa bee. Too waqdi garciik, malaykatti gabah kaa xagga heeh, «Ugutay maaqo ukum» kaak iyye.
Ugteh wonnah wagga hee waqdi, kaak amô-ginat gaqambo kee leek kibuk yan gaani kaah suge. Woo lee kee gaqambok yokmeh yooqobeeh, qagteh deerih gace.
YALLIH malaykatti too waqdi yuduureeh, nammeyhaak kaa ugseeh kaak iyyemii, «Ugutaay safar kol yaqilseemik maaqo akum» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Eliyyas ugteeh yokmeeh yooqobeh. Too maaqo, Siinâ-qaley taahirik tanihiyya gufam fan, morootom ayro kee morootom bar safarat akah sugu waa qande kaat gacte.
Siinâ-qale yewqe waqdi, barak elle xiina'gidih gablah adda cule.
YALLI garciik kaa'lih yaabeeh, «Eliyyasow, ama'kkel maca abtah?» kaak iyye.
«YALLAW! Nabaamak Naba Dageltaw! Anu kulli way ku taamat aniih, koh dibuk taamita. Takkay immay Israayil mari ko'lih hee qahdi makeeh, ku qibaadah arooca yiggiggileenih ku nabuwwa qidak selli heen. Keenik dibuk raqtem yooy; taway yoo kaadu qidaanam faxan» iyye.
YALLI too waqdi kaak iyyemii, «Wokkek tatre koo sugu waak, eweqay foocal yok sol» kaak iyye. Sarrak YALLI wokkek tatram fan naharat kaxxa caacoy qaleela baqaaqissaah xeet taggiggilehiyya ruube. Takkay immay YALLI too caacoh addat mananna. Woo caaco solteeh, sarrak baaxoh angoyyi yekke. Takkay immay YALLI woo baaxoh-angoyyih addat mananna.
Woo baaxoh-angoyyih lakal gira obte. Woo girah addat kaadu mananna. Too girah lakal tutuctoh innah tanim yoobbe.
Eliyyas a anay yoobbe waqdi, fooca sarot isik qellissa heeh, edde suge gablak afah yewqe. Sarrak gablak afal soole. A anay, «Eliyyasow, ama'kkel maca abtah?» kaak iyye.
Eliyyas too waqdi, «YALLAW! Nabaamak Naba Dageltaw! Anu kulli way ku taamat aniih, koh dibuk taamita. Takkay immay Israayil mari ko'lih hee qahdi makeeh, ku qibaadah arooca yiggiggileenih ku nabuwwa qidak selli heen. Keenik dibuk raqtem yooy; taway yoo kaadu qidaanam faxan» iyye.
Too waqdi YALLI kaak iyyemii, «Akah temeete gita uduur. Damaskoh magaalak sinam elle deedalta'kke fan gexxa 'xicay. Sarrak magaala culaay Cadayel, Suuriyah-malik akah yakke innah, kaa uskut.
Nimsi-baxa-Yaahu kaadu, Israayil-malik akah yakke innah, kaa uskut. Aabil-Macoola deqsitta magaalal yan Saafat-baxa-Eliisaq kaadu, ku lakal nabi akah yakke'nnah, kaa uskut.
Cadayel-gabat rabaamih meysih kude num Yaahû-gabat rabele. Yaahuk kude num kaadu Eliisaq-gabat rabele.
Takkay immay yol imaan luk sugeeh, Baqal-akak-iyyaanamah-qibaada elle abaana'gidih gabak bicsen duyyeeyah gommoh rade weeh, woo ceelo fugute wee maray malcina alfih num yakkehiyya rooci luk ken cabeyyo» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Eliyyas gexeeh, sarrak Eliisaq namma awuruy *madmad edde yanihiyyat abquruk kaah suge. Kaa'lih kaadu *madmadat tittat yoxeen awurwak labaatanna kee namma awuruy nammay nammayah axawah tittat yanihiyyat baaxo yabqure mari yen. Usukuuy salafat keenik tan namma awurut abquruk yen. Sarra Eliyyas saro isik kalla heeh Eliisaqal hee.
Too waqdi Eliisaq awurwa cabba heeh Eliyyas lakal arduk gexxa 'yeeh, iyyeemih, «Naharak yi abba kee yi inak salaamata exceh ken fugutta heek lakal ko'lih gexeyyo» kaak iyye.
Eliyyas, «Meqehik gex; anu koh abem macaay?
Too waqdi Eliisaq uduurra 'yeh isi awurwa yusguudeeh; cado elle alaysa'gidih, buqure edde abak suge *madmad iggilla heeh elle alayse. Woo cado ummattah keefeeh, woo ummatta woo cado tokmeh. Tohuk gaba kale waqdi, kaa cata num yakke'gidih, Eliyyas kataye.

Suuriyah-malik-Banihadad, qaskarak elli haam gaabossa heeh; soddom kee nammay takke baaxoh abbobtiy faaris kee gaariira lehiyya catoh haysitta heeh gexe. Samaariyah magaala gufe waqdi maro teetit heeh qeebi teetit abe.
Too waqdi Israayil-malikih yen malik-Acabay woo magaalal yenehiyyah farmo ruubeeh iyyemii,
«Malik-Banihadad gaba taceemiiy, ama tabbixe lakqooy dahab yoh rub. Kok qax-maqaane le agabu kee xaylok kaadu yim akkele, kok iyyah» 'yaanam farmoh kaah ruube.
Malik Acab tohul kaal gacsemii, «Yi-amoyta-Malik-Banihadadak, ‹Atu intam meqeeh; eelli haam inkih kuumuuy; koh aceeyyo› kaak inxica» 'yaanam kaah ruube.
Sarrak kaadu farmô-mari Malik-Banihadadak Malik-Acabah gersi farmo baahen. Iyyeenimii, «Ama lito lakqo kee dahabaay, agabu kee xaylo yoh rub 'yaanam kok exceh suge.
Awayah tu gactek, woh lih kaadu, ku qari kee ku doolat-abbobtih-qarwah addat suginnaan duyyek aysinnaanim beytu wayta yi qaskarih abbobti ruubeyyo. Oson beera ta waqla sin fan amaatelon» 'yaanam farmoh kaah ruube.
Malik-Acab too waqdi baaxoh-abbobtih inkih kaayya 'yeh keenik iyyemii, «A num nee bayisam faxam tableenii! ‹Ku agabu kee ku xaylooy lito lakqo kee dahab inkih yoh rub› 'yaanamih farmo yoh ruubeeh; woh kaah oggoleh suge» iyye.
Too waqdi ummatta inkih, «Kay yaabah ayti maacanaay, usuk iyyem moggolin» kaak iyyen.
Usuk too waqdi woo maral farmo kaah gacseeh iyyemii, «Yi amoytak intaanamaa, ‹Naharak yoo essertem kok oggoleh immay, nammeyhaak yoo essertem kok cineh› kaak inxica» iyye.
Farmô-mari Banihadad fan farmo luk yuduure.
Sarrak Banihadad wadirih woo marat gersi farmo ruube. Iyyemii, «Ama elle tan ku magaala bayisu waa mara koh ruubeyyo. Riirak gabat beyaanam tu maraqta. Tah abe wayya heek, yallitte yoo bayissay» iyye.
Too waqdi malik-Acab farmo baahe maral gacsemii, «Nummâ-qaskariiti tirtira qeebik naharat maabay, qeebi lakal aba» kaak iyye.
Banihadad kee woo catoh kaah yemeeteh suge baaxoh abbobtih yen mari inkih, malik lih sirooqah addat maqabat yanin waqdi, farmô-mari Acab ruube farmo kaah warsen. Too waqdi Banihadad isi marak «Ugutay magaalâ-qeebih bical gaca» iyye. Too mari too waqdi ugteeh; qeebih bical gacen.
Oson tohut yanin waqdi, malik-Acabal nabi yemeeteeh kaak iyyemii, «YALLI, ‹Ama kaxxa qaskar tablee! A saaku tama qaskarak koo aysiiseyyooh; too waqdi YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigetto› kok iyyah yan» kaak iyye.
Acab too waqdi, «Qeebi foocat iyyi gacele?» iyye.
Nabi kaak iyyemii, «YALLI kok iyyamaa, ‹Rakaakay-abbobtih amrih gubat ten furraynah-ten-qaskar qeebi miraacisele› kok iyyah yan» kaak iyye.
Malik Acab, «Qeebi qimbisaanamih amri tacayu waytam iyyaay?» iyye.
Nabi, «Atu aceetto» iyye.
Too waqdi malik-Acab, woo rakaakayitteh-abbobtih amrih gubat ten furraynah ten qaskaray mangah namma bool kee soddom kee nammay akkuk tenehiyyah seeco abe. Sarrak inkih tan Israayilik malcina alfi qaskariitah seeco abe.
Acab kee kay macaxu carra qeebih temeete waqdi, Banihadad kee kay catoh temeete soddom kee nammay takke baaxoh abbobti isi sirooqah addat tiskireh keenih sugte.
Too waqdi woo furraynah tan qaskar foocah bisoh gexxe. Banihadad wagittoh ruube mari Banihadadak,
«Butta takke qaskar Samaariyah-magaalak temeeteh tan» iyyen. Too waqdi Banihadad iyyemii, «Qeebih amaate kee, hinnay kaadu, wagarih amaate yakkeeni'mmay, woh tu malik, gexay ibbixay ken baaha» iyye.
Woo furraynah tan qaskar qeebi foocat gacteh miraacisseeh; gersi qaskar ken katatte.
Furraynah ten qaskarak kulli numuuy isih lih yoome num qide. Sarrak Suuriyah-mari kudeh, Israayil-qaskar lakak ken yeyreddeeniih; Banihadad too waqdi farasat koreh yisillime. Faariisah amot yan gersi mari kaadu kaa lih gexe.
Takkay immay Malik-Acab raaqe-marat qeebi abeeh, faaris kee gaariira keenik bukkuseh. Suuriyah-marat kaxxa baati abe.
Tohuk lakal nabi, malik-Acabal gexeeh kaak iyyemii, «Gexay uduuray qaskar nagay ugusaay, abinnaan mala cubbil aba. Woh akah axcem, yamaate sanat sugumuh addat Malik-Banihadad nammeyhaak qeebi siinit aba'gidih amaatele» iyye.
Malik-Banihadadak qaskar-abbobti intemii, «Israayil-marih-yallitte, qaleelâ-yallitte kinniimih sabbatah, qeebil nek yeyseenih. Takkay immay booxak-bagul qeebi keenit abnek, keenik aysenno.
Taway woo soddom kee nammay takke abbobti abbootanak kalay; ken aracal qeebi amrissa abbobti hay.
Sarrak woo duma luk sugte qaskarih gide mangah takke qaskarah seeco ab. Faariisa kee gaariirak kaadu too gide gaabos. Tonnal qeebi booxak-bagul keenit abennooh, ta saaku keenik aysenno» iyyen.
Malik Banihadad toh oggoleeh, oson kaak iyyeenim abe.
Dabaybah addat Malik-Banihadad isi marah seeceeh; Israayilit qeebi aba'gidih, Afeek-magaala fan gabat ken luk gexe.
Israayil marah kaadu seeco tekkeh; elle yemeeten ikkel faxxintam keenih aben. Tohuk lakal gaaduh ugutta iyyeeniih ken fanah xayyoowen waqdi, namma ikkeh baxsimma 'yeenih Suuriyah-mara akak yablen ikkel yinfiddigen. Suuriyah-mari baaxo inkih duudeh yeneeh; Israayil-mari ken garil dagnah namma-horta-takke-wadar-baxa ceelak yenen.
Malik-Acab fan nabi yemeeteeh kaak iyyemii, «YALLI iyyaamahaa, ‹Suuriyah-mari yok, qaleelâ-Yalla ikkal booxâ-bagih-Yalla hinna iyyeenimih; tonna-leemiik ken qaskaray kaxxam mangohiyyak qeebil sin aysiiseyyo. Too waqdi koo kee ku marak YALLI yoo kinnim aaxigettoonu› siinik iyyah yan» kaak iyye.
Israayil-mara kee Suuriyah-mari malcina ayroh gide elle yinfiddigen aracak mari mara keenik wagitak suge. Malcinhaytoh ayro qeebi radeeh; too qeebit too ayro dibuk Israayil-mari Suuriyah-marak bool alfih num qiden.
Wohuk raaqe mari Afeek-magaala fan kudeeh; tokkel labaatanna kee malcina alfih qaskariital, magaalat maroh sugte gaso raddeeh edde raben.
Banihadad kaadu woo magaala fan kudeeh qarik darrê golit yombooqore.
Too waqdi kay qaskarih-abbobti kaal gexxeh kaak intemii, «Israayil-mari-le-malikwa racmatta le 'yaanam noobbeh nanik, *qabuudu axcal ninnik uxuyyaay akoota ninnik fillat uxuyya hayneh, Israayil-malikil genxa'gidih idni neh ucuy; tonnal koo qide waam takkehik» kaak iyyen.
Too akah iyyen innah, qabuudu axcat uxuyyaay fillat akoota isinnik hayya heenih, malik-Acab fan gexeeniih kaak iyyeenimii, «Ku-naqsi-Banihadad koo kallacah yaniih, ‹Ahaysa anay yoo 'xicay yoo maqidin› 'yaanam kok iyyah yan» kaak iyyen.
Malik Acab, «Usuk uxih yanii? Usuk yi toobokoyta» keenik iyye.
Banihadad-qaskarih-abbobti meqe qangara Acab afak raddam wagitak sugeeniih, usuk toh inxicca 'ye waqdi, ta qangara kaak yossokooteeniih, «Nummah ku toobokoyta kinnih» iyyen.
Sarrak Acab, «Gexay yol kaa baahay» keenik iyye. Banihadad yemeete waqdi, is lih faras gaaril kaa hee.
Too waqdi Banihadad malik-Acabak annah iyye, «Yi abba ku abbak bee magaalooli inkih koh gacseyyo. Yi abba Samaariyal akah abe innah, atu kaadu Damaskoh magaalal tellemmo elle abta arac heetto» kaak iyye.
Acab too waqdi iyyemii, «Tah abtek currih koo ruubeyyo» kaak iyyeeh bica kaa'lih abba heeh kaa ruube.
YALLIH amrih, butta-takke-nabuwwah-addak, nabi amma iyyeeh isi innah yan nabik, «Yoo utuk» iyye. Woo nabi woh kaak cineh.
Too waqdi yab akak cinen nabi, «YALLIH yab cinteemih sabbatah, yok gexxu wayta waqdi, lubak koo qidele» kaak iyye. Sarrak gexe waqdi, usuk akah iyye innah, lubak yemeeteeh kaa qideh.
Too nabi kaadu gersi numul yemeeteeh, «Yoo utuk» kaak iyye. Too numuuy kaa yootokeh. Kaxxa atka kaat abeh kaa biyaakeh.
Woo nabi too waqdi fooca edde qellisa'gidih, foocat saro isik makka heeh gexe. Israayil-malik tatram fanah usuk akak tabu waa gitih afal gace.
Sarrak malik woo gitak tabam yuble waqdi, a nabi anay fayya haak, kaak iyyemii, «Amoytaw, anu qeebi addat suge waqdi, qaskariiti qeebit yibbixen num yol baaheeh, yok iyyemii, ‹Tama num digga hay; faxe innalaay takkay kok yuftuce kaa tekkek, isi rooci edde aceetto. Woh akke waytek, lakqok sidooca alfi mekletto› yok iyye.
Takkay immay anu innih gersi taamat agxitak sugeeh, woo num yok kudeh» iyye.
Too waqdi malik kaak iyyemii, «Atu kol heen digaalat isi afak yabtah tanik, too digaalah heenim mekeltaamaksah!» kaak iyye.
Nabi saro foocak isik kale waqdi, malik nabuwwak numuk teena kinnim kaak yeexegeh.
Sarrak woo nabi kaak iyyemii, «YALLI kok iyyamaa, ‹Atuu, anu raba akak faxa num yasillimay inteeh; tonna-leemik kay roocit isi rooci meklah aceettooh; kay marih roocit ku marih rooci meklele› kok iyyah yan» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi malik Samaariyah magaala fan cer kee naqabut gexe.

Yidraqel magaalah addal, Malik-Acab buxah garil, qinab-coox elle yaysubuken arac le numuy migaaqah Nabot deqsitahiyya yen.
Ayrok teena Acab, Nabotuk annah iyye, «Ama atu lito qinab elle yaysubuken booxa yi buxah garit tanik, yoh teceemi. Saalot haan duyye elle aysubukem faxaah; tet aftok ahak tayse booxay qinab xala coox elle taysubuke koh aceeyyo, hinnay kaadu, faxxek, celta limoh kok xaamiteyyo» kaak iyye.
Nabot kaak iyyemii, «A aracay inni kaxxa abbobtik nagrehiyya koh aceemik, YALLI yoo catay» kaak iyye.
Acab too waqdi Nabot kaak iyyeemih naqabu kee danni luk buxa fan gexe. Gidaarat foocah gacca 'yeh qarkaytok bagul qaxah gace. Maaqo kaah baahen waqdi, wonnah yufkuneeh maaqo akme cineh.
Sarrak kay barra Idebal arac kaal culteh, kaak intemii, «A gide macah dannittaah maaqo macah cintaah?» kaak inte.
Usuk teetik iyyemii, «Nabotuk, ‹Qinab caxah booxa kok xaamu waah; faxxek kaadu tet aftok gersi arac koh acayu waa› exceeh; yok cineeh; maaqo akah cinam tohih sabbata» iyye.
Idebal too waqdi annah kaak inte, «Meqehik, atu malik kinnitoo hinnito? Katay, qarkaytok ugutay, mawariggitinay maaqo ukum. Nabotuk qinab-booxa anu koh ayyaaqeyyok, ama ikkek ugut» axcuk aytikuma kaah tecee.
Sarrak warkat tuktubeeh; woo warkatal kay migaaqal is firmat hayte. Sarrak kaadu kay yab elle hayya hayteh, qaskar abbobti kee Yidraqel rasih makaabonuh rubte.
Woo warkatal tenemii, «Naharak soom edde abtaana'gidih ayro haysita. Too ayro sahdah inkih seecaay, Nabot kaxxa aracal haa.
Baabuurute marak nammay bahha haay, kay foocal daffessa ken haay, ‹Nabot, Yalla-kee malik xaafe axcuk kaal wada› inxica. Too waqdi magaalak afah kaa eyyeeqay xeetit kaa qida» 'yaanam elle hayte warkat rubte.
Qaskar abbobti kee Yidraqel rasih makaabon Idebal keenik aba iyyem abeenih.
Soom edde aboonu waan ayro heen; ummattah inkih seecen. Nabot kaxxa aracal heen.
Too waqdi woo baabuurute namma num amma 'teh sahda foocal, «Nabot Yalla kee malik abaare» axcuk kaal waden. Sarrak magaalak afah kaa beyya heenih, xeetit kaa qiden.
Too waqdi Nabot rabeemih farmo Idebalah ruuben.
Idebal a farmo akah toobbe'nnaak, Acabak annah inte. «Nabot rabek, away gexay woo kol aylamme cine qinab-booxa bet» kaak inte.
Acab too waqdi sissikuk woo qinab-cooxih-booxa isih haysita'gidih gexe.
Sarrak YALLI nabi-Eliyyasak annah iyye.
«Samaariyah malikih yan Acab fan gex. Usuk Nabot-qinabih-booxa isih haysita'gidih wokkel koh sugele.
Too waqdi yooy YALLAH yani annah kaak axcem kaah waris. ‹Atu num qiddeh, kay midir isih haysitteh. Hununuh kuuta Nabot qabala elle muxuuqak sugte aracal, ku qabala kaadu muxuuqele› kaak inxic» iyye.
Acab, Eliyyas yuble waqdi, «Yi naqboytaw, yoo matarte!» kaak iyye.
Eliyyas too waqdi kaal gacsemii, «Koo matreh anih; atu inkitanuuk YALLI niqbaamat asa num tekke.
Tohuk gexxaamah YALLI kok iyyemii, ‹Bala kol ruubeyyo. Koo qideyyo; kok radda labhak baacoytit takkuu, gaddaloola takku, inkih ken bayseyyo.
Ku buxah marat, Nabat-baxa-Yarobqamay Israayil-malikih yenehiyya kee, Aciiyâ-baxa-Baqsay kaadu Israayil-malikih yenehiyyah buxah marat tekkeemih innah tanim keenit akkele. YALLI woh akah kok iyyamaa, Israayil mara dambit asisseeh naqabu yot culusseemih sabbatah kok axce› iyyah yan» kaak iyye.
«Idebal tiyah tu gactekiiy, YALLI kaadu iyyaamah, ‹Yidraqel magaalah addal raysa teetik kuuta akmele.
Ku buxah marak magaalah addal rabinnaan numih raysa kuuta akmeleeh, barrih raqta baaxol rabinnaan numih raysa guma akmele› 'yaanam kok iyyah yan» kaak iyye.
YALLIH garil, ahayduma Acab gide YALLI niqbaamat ase num mananna. Tohut inkih kaa asissem, nikaacat luk yen kay barrak ten. Tet migaq Idebalak ten.
YALLI Israayil-marih-foocal baaxok keenih yeyyeeqeh yen Amoorah marak kaxxih, Acab, Yallih aftok xeet kee cooxuk sahda bicisse duyyeh qibaadat gaceeh; toh kaxxam qaybik taniimik ten.
Eliyyas yaabak gaba kale waqdi, Acab sara isik qanxiseh baaxot qideeh, sartanah *qabuddat gace. Maaqo cineeh xiinih qabuddal gace. Tohuk wadir fooci kaak dattowwa 'yeh cisabbootak gexe.
Tohuk lakal YALLIH qangara Eliyyasal obteeh; YALLI kaak iyyeemih,
«Acab yoh elle rammita inna tubleh innaa? Yoh rammiteemih sabbatah, addunya bagul yanim fanah bala kaal moobisa. Takkay immay kay baxih waktil bala kay buxah maral oobiseyyo» iyye.

Tohuk lakal yan namma sanatah, Israayil kee Suuriyah-marih fanat wagri gace.
A wagri gaceemih sidochaytô-sanat yuduure waqdi, Yuudâ-malikih-yen-Yacoosafat, Israayil-malikih-yen Acabat yangoorowe'gidih gexe.
Acab isi qaskarih abbobtik iyyemii, «Aham fanah Suuriyah-malikih-gabat tan Gilqad-rasul tan Raamot-magaala gacisna'gidih, tuk teena akah abe waynam macaay? Woo magaala ni magaala kinnim mataaxigaana innaa?» iyye.
Kaadu Acab Yacoosafatak iyyeemih, «Raamot-magaala gaadam faxak, qeebit yo'lih angale mantuu?» iyye.
Yacoosafat kaal gacseemih, «Isin bical gacinnaan saaku neh waris, yoo kee yi qaskaraay faarisih agantah siinik maraqnak.
Takkay immay wohuk naharal YALLAL fayu essernam nel tan» iyye.
Sarrakaa, Acab affara bool takke nabuwwah seeco abeeh; too nabuwwa temeete waqdi ken essereh, iyyeemih, «Raamot magaala nabbixe'gidih gaadu'nna, raaqooh?» iyye.
Oson too waqdi, «Gexay gaad; YALLI nasri koh aceelek» kaak iyyen.
Yacoosafat iyyeemih, «Ahak kalah YALLIH nabiy YALLI aba iyyam neh warisa mayanaa?» iyye.
Acab iyyeemih, «Inki numuy Yimla-Miikayhu deqsitahiyya yani'mmay, usuk kulli way umam akke waytek meqem yoh mayablaay, tonna-leemik kaat mayyu» iyye.
Yacoosafat, «Wonnah maxcin, iyyaanam hinnak» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Acab malik buxat taamitak yen qaskariitah secca 'yeh, «Gexay Miikayhu sissikuk ni fanah bah» kaak iyye.
A namma malikii Samaariyah magaalah-gasok-afal, darok caffa elle baxsan aracalaa malik edde gaca sartanay ibak xibqi gufahiyya yeneeh; malik elle daffeya namma korsil elle daffeyan ikkel, a nabuwwa foocal keenik gacca 'teh; sarra takku waytaamat yaabak sugen.
Woo nabuwwak numuk teeni, Kanaqná-Xidkiya deqsita nabik ten. Too nabi, birtak-bicse gaysoosi luk yen. Iyyeemih, «YALLI ‹A gaysoosit Suuriyah marat qeebi abettoh inkitanuuk ken baysetto› kok iyya» kaak iyye.
Raqqa 'te nabuwway wokkel sugga 'tehiyya usuk iyyem inteeh, «Gexay Raamot magaalat qeebi ab, aysettok. YALLI nasri koh aceele» iyyen.
Oson tohut yanin waqdi, Miikayhu baaha'gidih gexe qaskar-abbah-yen-num kaa geeh kaak iyyeemih, «Nabuwwa inkih malikih meqem tubleh tani'mmayii, atu kaadu oson yubleenim tableemi» kaak iyye.
Miikayhu kaal gacsemii, «YALLAY Waarahiyyah migaaqal xiibitah ani'mmay, YALLI yok inxica iyyeemik kalihim kaak maxca» iyye.
Sarrak malik-Acab fan yemeete waqdi, Malik-Acab kaak iyyemii, «Miikayhuw, yoo kee Malik-Yacoosafat Raamot-magaalat qeebi abna'gidih gaadnu innaa, magaadnuuh?» kaak iyye.
Miikayhu iyyeemih, «Gexay ken gaada. Keenik aysettoonuuh; YALLI nasri siinih aceele» kaak iyye.
Acab essero kaat qagseeh, «YALLI iyyeemit yo'lih yabta waqdi, ‹Nummat yo'lih yab› kok exceh mananniyoo? Nummat macah yo'lih yaabe wayta?» kaak iyye.
Miikayhu too waqdi kaak iyyeemih, «Israayil qaskaray loyna sinni illi innah fixixih tanihiyya ableh an» iyye. Qagissa heeh, «YALLI ‹A mari is miraacisa abba leh mayanak, isinni buxaaxih gexxaasitoonay inxic» 'yaanam axcuk oobbe» iyye.
Too waqdi Malik-Acab Yacoosafatak iyyeemih, « ‹A nabi yoh umaamak sah meqem mayabla› 'yaanam kok maxacciyoo?» kaak iyye.
Miikayhu qagseh iyyeemih, «Taway YALLI iyyem siinih warisu waa. Anu YALLA qaraanal isi amoytiinih korsih bagul daffeyah uble. Kay malaykoota inkih migda kee gurak kaa maraasiyot kaa abbaxih ubleh eneeh;
too waqdi isi malaykootak, ‹Acab, Raamot-magaala gexxa 'yeh wokkel akah raba innah kaa ayrissu duddam iyyaay?› iyye. Too waqdi malaykootak mariiy tu iyye.
Sarrak roocaaniyya fanaak amma 'teh YALLAL xayyowteeh, ‹Anu kaa ayriseyyo› 'yaanam inte.
YALLI, ‹Mannal abettooh?› iyye waqdi, ‹Gexxa exceh Acab nabuwwa diraabat yaabiseyyo› 'yaanam inte. YALLI too waqdi, ‹Gexay, kaa ayris, ku gabal bicelek› 'yaanam axcih uble» kaak iyye.
Miikayhu ellecabol yaabak af edde cabemii, «Taway tekkem tamaha. Ku nabuwwa diraabat yaabiseh; koh tu gactek, YALLI kol oobisu waa bala kol yuckumeh» kaak iyye.
Tah yoobbe waqdi, Xidkiya deqsita nabi garih amma 'yeh xaban kaak yootokeeh, «YALLIH Roocaaniyya yoo cabteeh kot gactem maa saaku?» kaak iyye.
Miikayhu kaal gacseemih, «Qarik darrê golit sasoh cultu wayta saaku, wohim aaxigetto» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal Malik Acab isi qaskarih abbak iyyemii, «Miikayhu uxuyay magaalâ-xintoh abbah-yan-Amon kee malik-baxa-Yooqas fan kaa bey.
Keenik intamaa, ‹Malikii, «Amaanah uduurra axcem fanah tama num casbit sugusaay dago maaqo kee leek biso kaah maacina» siinik iyye› keenik inxic» iyye.
Too waqdi Miikayhu iyyemii, «Atu amaanah uduurra 'tek, YALLI yo'lih yaabe kaa hinna» iyye. Qagseh kaadu iyyemii, «Ummatey, anu axcem oobbeyay yok raaqa» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Malik-Acabay Israayil malikih yenehiyya kee Malik-Yacoosafatay Yuudâ-malikih yenehiyya Gilqad rasul ten Raamot-magaalah gaaduh gexen.
Acab, Yacoosafatak iyyemii, «Carbi booxa fan genxa waqdi, anu a sarak katta exceh aki sarat gacca exceh aki num ceeleyyo'mmay, atu malik sartanak makatinay edde idiy» kaak iyye. Tonnal Israayil-malik kaa elle aaxige waan sartanat gacca 'yeh qeebit cule.
Qeebi rade waqdi Suuriyah malik, faras-gaarih-abbobtiy soddom kee nammay tekkehiyyah amri yeceeh iyyemii, «Gexay dibuk Israayil-malik ibbixa; kaak kalih marat qeebi maabina» iyye.
Oson Malik Yacoosafat yublen waqdi, yakkeenimiik inkih Israayil-malik kaa yekkeleeniih; too waqdi kaa yabbaxoonuh kaa fan yenkeleeleben. Takkay immay usuk xongolo abe waqdi,
oson Israayil-malik hinnam kaak yubleenih, too waqdi qeebik kaak yeedeenih.
Sarrak, garciik Suuriyah-qaskariiti ruubeh yan gaysê-baxi, Acab, fillat-xagar-dacayrih-leh-yan-birtak addak kaa mude. Too waqdi Acab faras-gaari beyak suge numuk, «Mudduumeh! Gaari eykeleelebay nee gacis» iyye.
Carbi laqak laqeeh; takkay immay Acab kay gaarih addal rekuh kaa heenih Suuriyah qaskar fan afkanuk raaqe. Akak mudduume aracak kaak oobah yan qabal gaarî-guba kibba hee. Bari yekke waqdi rooci kaak yewqe.
Ayro cultam faxxa waqdi, Israayil qaskarih abbobti amri tecee. Iyyeenimihii, «Kulli num isi baaxo kee isi magaala siinik yaduuray» 'yaanam iyyen.
Malik-Acab tonnal rabeeh; raysa kaak Samaariyah magaala fan been. Tokkel kaa yoogoqen.
Usuk edde suge faras-gaari Samaariyal yan dorih leet kaqlisen. YALLI akah inxicci 'ye innal, xiiqareh xiina too leey kay qabala edde kaqliseenihiyyat kaqalteeh; kuuta kaadu kay qabal muxuqte.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Acab abba heehiyya inkih, kay qariy dakani-qaagak bilqiseeni kee usuk xissa hee magaaloolih aydaad inkih, Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabal yunkuttube.
Usuk rabe saaku kay aracal kay baxi Acadya gace.
Israayil-malikih yen Acab dardaareemih affara sanat tikka 'ye saaku, Aasa-baxi-Yacoosafat, Yuudâ-malik yekke.
Qumrik soddom kee koona liggidat yeneeh; labaatanna kee koona sanat abbootan luk suge. Kay ina Qaduuba deqsitta barrak teneeh; Silci deqsita numih baxák ten.
Kay abba Aasak kaxxih YALLIH garil cakkik tan taamah taamitak yen. Tonna'mmay diini-maleela elle taqbude arooca kay dabaanal baateh mananna. Ummatta tokkel sadgat abaanam kee qerto ruubaanam cabteh mananna.
Yacoosafat Israayil-malik lih bica haysiteh yen.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Yacoosafat abba heehiyyaay kay agiirinna kee kay carbih abitto inkih Yuudâ-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabal geytinta.
Lab xiiqareh-xiinay Yalla-maleelah yen mari qibaada elle abak suge aroocal sugtehiyya inkih xiiriyeh. Kay abba Aasa, isi dabaanal woo mara inkih maxiiriyinna.
Edom-rasi malik luk mananna. Edom akah xiinak yenem Yuudâ-malik doore kay afak yen numih xintok ten.
Malik-Yacoosafat kaxxa badal gexa maraakib Oofir rasul dahab goranah gexa'gidih bicse. Takkay immay woo maraakib wokkel elle, Qexyon-Gabar deqsita aracal finqiteeh gexak maraaqinna.
Yacoosafat maraakib bicisak suge waqdi, Israayil-malikih yen Malik-Acadya, kaak, «Yi mari ku mara lih maraakibit gexay inxic» 'yaanam kaak iyye. Yacoosafat toh kaak cineh.
Yacoosafatal amri yemeeteh, Dawud-Magaalah malik-buxah-mara edde yoogoqen *kabrit kaa yoogoqen. Tohuk lakal kay baxi Yahooram kay lakal kay arac ciggiile.
Yuudâ-malikih yen Yacoosafat reedeemih taban kee malcina karma tekke saaku, Acab-baxi-Acadya Israayil-malik yekke. Usuk Samaariyah-magaalal Israayil-rasu namma sanat xiinisak suge.
Usuk isi abba Acab kee isi ina Idebal kee, tonnah kaadu, Israayil-malikih yen Nabát-Yarobqamay Israayil mara dambi le abittot asisak sugehiyyah raatat gexeeh, YALLAL dambi lem baahe.
Usuk isi abbak kaxxih, Yallih aftok gabak bicsen ceeloy Baqal deqsita yuqbude. Tonna-leemik YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyat bagcarra ugse.

Malik-Acab rabek lakal, Mooyab-mari Israayil-milkih gacaanam cineh.
Israayil-malikih yen Malik-Acadya isi qarih amol yen qarik taagat boohaahik radeeh, kaxxam biyaakite. Too waqdi Filistiin-magaalay migaaqah Ekron deqsittahiyya Baqal-Dabub-deqsittaamay yalla 'yeenih yaqbudeenihiyyal woo biyaakak uram kee ure wayu waam esseraana'gidih, farmoh sinam ruube.
Takkay immay YALLIH malaykatti Tisbâ-rasih nabih yen Eliyyasal amri oobiseeh, kaak iyyeemih, «Gexay Malik-Acadya farmoh ruube marat mataray, ‹Ekron-magaalal yaqbuden Baqal-Dabub fan macah gexxaanaah? Israayil-rasul Yalli mayanam maay takkalee?› keenik inxicaay,
kalah kaadu, ‹Kaak intaanamaa, YALLI, ama biyaakat rabetto ikkal murta, kok iyyah yan, kaak inxica› 'yaanam keenik inxic» iyye.
Eliyyas Yalli kaak inxica iyyem iyyeeh,
too waqdi farmô-mari wadirih yuduure. Malik yuduureenim keenik yuble waqdi, «Macah tuduuren?» keenik iyye.
Oson iyyeenimii, «Num neh garayeeh, woo num, ‹Kaal uduuray, YALLI, «Ekron-magaalal yaqbuden Baqal-Dabub fayu esseraana'gidih, farmô-mara wokke macah rubtaa? Israayilil Yalli mayanam takkalee? Ama biyaakak murtay edde rabetto» kok iyyah yan, kaak inxica› nek iyye» iyyen.
Malik too waqdi iyyemii, «Woo num maca ceelak yen?» iyye.
Osonuuy, «Saqi arabak bicsen saro xagaral luk yeneeh; arabak bicsen qarumut axawah yen» kaak iyyen.
Malik too waqdi, «Wohuuy Tisbâ-rasih nabih yen Eliyyasak tanih tan» iyye.
Sarrak malik, Eliyyas-baahu-waa-qaskar-abba luk, kontom qaskariita hayya heeh ruube. Too qaskar-abba Eliyyas koomah amol daffeyah yuble. Too waqdi kaak iyyemii, «Yallih-numow, malik kok ‹Ooba› iyyah yan» iyye.
Too waqdi Eliyyas kaal gacsemii, «Anu Yallih-num ekkek, qaraanak gira oobeleeh woo gira koo kee ku mara akmele» kaak iyye. Too waqdiik, gira qaraanak obteeh qaskar abba kee qaskar tokmeh.
Malik too waqdi kaadu, gersi qaskar abba luk, kontom qaskariita hayya heeh ruube. Too mari usuk elle yan koomaytu fan yewqeeh; qaskar abba, «Yallih numow, malik ‹Xayuk ob› kok iyyah yan» iyye.
Eliyyas iyyemii, «Anu Yallih num ekkek, gira qaraanak obteh koo kee ku mara akmele» iyye. Too waqdiik Yalli ruube gira qaraanak obteeh qaskar abba kee qaskar tokmeh.
Malik kaadu qagseh qaskar abba kee kontom num ruube. Woo num woo koomaytu yewqe waqdi, Eliyyasak foocal gulubuh rade. Too waqdi iyyemii, «Yallih numow, yoo kee yi marah racmatay, nee maqidin.
Dumî-namma qaskar abba kee ken mara qaraanak temeete girat tembexe. Tonna'mmay ku maganak, yoh racmat» kaak iyye.
YALLIH malaykatti Eliyyasak iyyemii, «Gexay addah kaa'lih oobay mameysitin» kaak iyye. Too waqdi Eliyyas qaskar-abba'lih malik fan gexeeh,
kaak iyyemii, «YALLI kok iyyamaa, ‹Israayil addal fayu elle esseran Yalli ane waah innah, Ekron-magaalal yaqbuden Baqal-Dabub fayu esserteemih sabbatah, murtay rabetto› kok iyyah yan» kaak iyye.
YALLI Eliyyasah elle warseeh, Eliyyas kaadu Acadyah elle warse'nnal, Acadya rabeh. Acadya lab-xaylo luk mananna. Tonna-leemik kay toobokoyti Yooram kay aracal gace. Yooram malik edde yekkem, Yacoosafat-baxi-Yahooram Yuudâ-malik edde yekkeemik nammeyhaytô-sanatak ten.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Acadya abba heehiyya Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal kutbeh tan.

YALLI, Eliyyas mermerita caacayih addat qaran edde yayyaaqu waa wakti xayyooweh. Eliyyas kee Eliisaq Gilgal magaalak tewqeeh,
gital Eliyyas Eliisaqak annah iyye, «Away YALLI ‹Beetal magaala gex› yok iyyeemih sabbatah gexah anik; atu akkel elle sug» kaak iyye.
Eliisaq kaal gacsemii, «YALLAY waarahiyyah migaq kee ku manol xiibitah ani'mmay, kok maraaqa» kaak iyye. Tonna-leemik titta lih Beetal magaala gexen.
Butta takke nabuwway wokkel dabqih tanihiyya Eliisaq fan amma inteeh, «YALLI a saaku ku kabir kok beelem maay taaxigee?» kaak iyyen.
Eliisaq keenil gacsemii, «Yeey, aaxigeh immay wohut yaabe waynay» keenik iyye.
Tohuk lakal Eliyyas Eliisaqak annah iyye. «YALLI ‹Yeriko fan gex› yok iyyek, atu away akkel elle sug» iyye.
Eliisaq kaal gacsemii, «YALLAY waarahiyyah migaq kee ku manol xiibita'mmay, kok maraaqa» kaak iyye. Tonna-leemik titta lih Yeriko fan safren.
Sarrak butta takke nabuwway dabqih Yerikol tanihiyya Eliisaq fan amma 'teeh, «YALLI a saaku ku kabir kok beelem maay taaxigee?» kaak iyyen.
Eliisaq keenil gacsemii, «Yeey, aaxigeh immay, wohut yaabe waynay» keenik iyye.
Tohuk lakal Eliyyas Eliisaqak iyyemii, «YALLI, ‹Ordon weeqaytu fan gex› yok iyyek, atu away akkel elle sug» kaak iyye.
Eliisaqah tu gactek iyyemii, «YALLAY waarahiyyah migaq kee ku manol xiibita'mmay, kok maraaqa» iyye. Tonna-leemik sitta lih bisoh gexen.
Too waqdi kontom takke nabuwwa Ordon weeqaytu fan ken lakat gexxe. Sarrak Eliyyas kee Eliisaq weeqaytih qaxal solte. Too waqdi woo kontom takke nabuwwa keenik xayi ikkeek solla 'te.
Sarrak Eliyyas rarayto isik kalla heeh gabat makmakka heek lakal woo weeqaytu edde yootoke. Too waqdi woo weeqayti namma'kkel kurruume. Sarrak kaa kee Eliisaq kafin baaxok bagul weeqaytuk woo qaxa fan taben.
Tokkel Eliyyas Eliisaqak iyyemii, «Yoo beyaanamak dumal, maca koh abam faxxaa?» kaak iyye.
Eliisaq kaal gacsemii, «Yalli koh yecee roocaaniyyak aki nabuwwah teceemik, namma gide yoh ucuy» kaak iyye.
Eliyyas kaak iyyemii, «Ah esseraanamah yacoonu duudaanamak tanih matana'mmay, yoo kok beyoonu waan waqdi gexah yoo tublek, geetto. Takkay immay gexah yoo able waytek mageyta» 'yaanam kaak iyye.
Tonnal titta lih bisoh elle gexaanamal walalak gexen. Sarrak garciik girak bicsen gaariy girak bicsen faras giitak beytahiyya ken nammay fan temeeteeh, too waqdi Eliyyas mermeritta caacot qaran fan yewqe.
Eliisaq toh yubleeh; too waqdi Eliyyasah deeriseeh, «Yi abbaw, yi abbaw, Israayil gaari kee faariisah maraw! Gexxeh, gexxeh!» iyye. Tohuk wadir Eliisaq, Eliyyas abaluk maraaqinna.
Sarrak Eliisaqah abe rookah saro namma'kkel isik qanxise.
Tohuk lakal Eliyyas-raraytoy kaak radde yukkuqeh wadirih yuduureh, Ordon weeqaytih qaxal soole.
Too waqdi Eliyyas-raraytot woo weeqaytu yootokeeh, «YALLAY Eliyyas elle yaamine Dagelta kinnihiyya ankel yan?» iyye. Woo weeqaytu yootoke waqdi, weeqayti namma'kkel gace. Sarrak Eliisaq adda akak tabeh weeqaytuk woo qaxal yeede.
Yerikô-magaalal ten kontom takke nabuwwa tekkem tuble waqdi, «Eliyyas luk yen qande Eliisaqah raqteh tan» iyyen. Too waqdi kaat yangooroweeni'gidih, kaal yemeeteeniih, foocal kaak gommoh raden.
Sarrak iyyeenimii, «Cayla le kontomuy akkel yanihiyyak genxeh ku abbah yan num waginnu wayna. Yallih roocaaniyya beyya kaa hayteh qalek teenah amo akki kee, hinnay kaadu, golok teenah addal kaa qiddeh cabtam takkeh» kaak iyyen.
Eliisaq, «Aleey magexina» keenik iyye.
Osonuuy, «Genxam meqe» 'yaanamak yaadiyoonu cineeniih; sarrakaay Eliisaq tibba keenik iyyeh gexoonay ken iyye. Too waqdi yakken kontomuk gexeeniih, sidooca ayroh kay goranah cabba heenih ikke maloonuy gorrisak kaa sugen. Sarrak kaa magennon.
Too waqdi Eliisaq fan yuduuren. Eliisaq Yerikô-magaalal keenih sugeeh, « ‹Magexina› siinik maxacciyoo?» keenik iyye.
Yerikô-magaalah marak tu takkem kaal temeeteeh annah inte. «Atu akah taaxige innah, a magaala meqe aracal xiseeni'mmay, lee akak mameqeey, ta lee daro mataysubuka» iyyen.
Too waqdi iyyemii, «Qusba sacnil qasboyta hayya haay yol baaha» iyye. Kaal baahen waqdi,
woo leeh-raceyna fanah gexxa 'yeeh woo qasboyta addat akak qide. Too waqdi afak iyyemii, «YALLI iyyam aha: ‹A lee saytun lee abeyyooh, ahak wadir sinam maqiddaay a lee daro aysubukele› iyya» iyye.
Too lee too ayrook wadirik xabba haanamaay a saaku fan, Eliisaq akah inxicca 'ye innah, temqeh ten.
Sarrak Eliisaq Yeriko cabeh Beetal-magaalah-gexoh gital yan waqdi, lab-urri magaalak yewqeh kaal yemeeteeh; too waqdi, «Bidaarow, akkek gex! Bidaarow, akkek gex!» axcuk kaal anqaasen.
Eliisaq wonnah wagga heeh ken yuble waqdi, YALLIH migaaqal ken abaare. Too waqdi say-alluwah-nammay coox addak eweqqa 'teh woo urrik morootom kee namma awka kitif kitif hayte.
Tohuk lakal Eliisaq Karmel-deqsitta-qale yewqeeh, sarrak Samaariya fan yuduure.

Yuudâ-baaxoh-Malik-Yacoosafat reedeemih taban kee bacra sanat yekke saaku, Acab-baxi-Yooram Israayil-malik yekke. Samaariyah magaalal taban kee namma sanatah malikih suge.
Usuk YALLAL dambi lem baaheh immay kay abba kee kay inah gide YALLAL dambi lem mabaahinna. Kay abba, Baqal-elle-yaqbuduh-bicseh-suge-qamiddu wokkek oobiseh.
Tohuh, kaak duma malikih suge Nabát-Yarobqam abe uma-taamay Israayil ummat dambit akah asak sugtehiyya abak sugeeh; woo dambi le taamah abitto macabinna.
Mooyab-rasih malikih yen Malik-Meesaq illi yeyderreh yeneeh; Israayil-malikih-gabbarah illi xaylok kulli sanatal bool alfih gide takkem acayuk yen. Kalah kaadu, bool alfi yakke marwah xagor kaah acayuk yen.
Takkay immay Malik-Acab rabe saaku, Meesaq Israayil-milkih gacaanam cineh.
Malik-Yooram sissikuk Samaariyah magaalak yewqeeh, qaskarak eelli haamih gaaboysiyyat gace.
Sarrak Malik-Yacoosafat fan farmo ruube; kaak iyyemii, «Mooyab-rasih-malik qeebi yot abam faxak, atu qeebil yoo cate mantuu?» kaak iyye.
Malik-Yacoosafat kaal gacsemii, «Yeey, yoo kee yi qaskaraay yok faarisih agantah, num nek maraaqaay inkih ko'lih gaadennok,
qeebi abnuh manni gitaak gacennoo?» iyye.
Yooram iyyemii, «Edom baaxol woo bacarih yan gitaak gacenno» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Israayil-malikiy Yooram deqsita kee, Yuuda kee Edom malikwah nammay gaaduh ugten. Malcina ayro gexak sugga iyyeenik lakal, lee keenik tembexeeh, sahda kee merraytit taaqubeemik tu luk maraaqinna.
Too waqdi Malik-Yooram iyyemii, «YALLI, sidocuy nakkek Mooyab-malikih gabal nee haam faxeh yan; ahaysa abnam neh maraaqinna!» iyye.
Malik-Yacoosafataay, «Akkel YALLIH fayu elle esserra nabi mayanaa?» iyye.
Malik-Yooram qaskarih abba iyyemii, «Saafat-baxi-Eliisaq yan. Usuk Eliyyasah catoh yen numu» iyye.
Too waqdi Malik-Yacoosafat iyyemii, «Tohuuy nummâ-nabi kinnih» iyye. Sarrak yakken sidocuk Eliisaq fan gexen.
Eliisaq fan yemeeten waqdi, Israayil-malikik iyyemii, «Anu koo macatak, gexay; ku ina kee ku abba fayu elle esserak ten nabuwwa fan gex» iyye.
Too waqdi Yooram kaak iyyemii, «Nakke sidiica malikik Mooyab-malikih gubat nee qiddem YALLA» iyye.
Sarrak Eliisaq kaak iyyemii, «Inni afqadook akah taamita YALLAY waarah Nabaamak Nabahiyyah migaaqal xiibitah ani'mmay, ama ko'lih wakalih yan Yacoosafat assakaxxe waamal, koh tu abak mananniyo» inxicca 'yeh;
sarrak «Gexay saareh yaaguren duyye digira num yoh baaha» iyye.
Woo num yemeeteh, saareh yaaguren tiya yoogore waqdi, YALLIH *Roocaaniyya Eliisaqal obte.
Too waqdi keenik iyyemii, «YALLI siinik iyyam aha. A daqaarih addal boodoodak mangom daga.
Rob rade waamahaay caacay amaate waamah, tama daqaral leek amaggele. Too lee sin kee saqaay sin merraytu inkih maqabah dudda heele» iyye.
Eliisaq toh lih kaadu keenik iyyemii, «YALLAL ahamih abto kaxxam hinnaay, kalah kaadu Mooyab marak qeebil sin aysiisele.
Gasoosa maroh le magaalooli kee qax-meqe magaalooli keenik abbixetton. Oson elli haan xaylo xala coox argiqettoonuuh; buyyitteh afoofi keenik alfetton. Eelli haan baqureh-baaxoy kullim elle taabukehiyya xeetik kibetton» iyye.
Woo ayrok nammayhaytoh ayro, kulli saaku sadgat elle aban waktil, Edom baaxoh kabuk darah gexxa lee temeeteeh baaxok bagu kibba hayte.
Mooyab rasih mari, woo sidooca malik keenit qeebi aba'gidih yemeeten 'yaanam yoobbe waqdi, silac quuka dudda haa marak idaltuuy furraynuh inkih seeco abeenih, sarrak ken kee woo marih fanal yan cuduudul yinfiddigen.
Woo ayrok gersi ayro maaca xiinik ugten waqdi, ayroh ifi leê-bagul bixiixiqitak suge. Woo ifi woo lee qisih qabala celsiiseh yen.
Toh yublen waqdi «Qabalak tanih tan» iyyen. «Taaxige sidiica malik isik isih toomeh titta qiddeh tanik, arac keenik genxeh dabqi keenik buubnay» iyyen.
Takkay immay ken arac gufen waqdi, Israayil mari qeebi keenit abeeh, wadirih ken gacseh, lakak ken ayradduk sahda keenik qideeniih,
magaalooli keenik bayseenih. Ken buqreh baaxoy kullim elle aysubukuk sugeenihiyyak elle tatraanamal, Israayil marak kulli numuuy wokket xaa qidak woo arooca xeetik kiben. Buyyittek afoofi keenik alfeenih, xaylo xala coox keenik yirgiqeenih. Kiir-Ceras deqsitta inaytâ-magaalak kalih gasoosa-le-magaalooli inkih bayseenih; wanxef-le-qaskar woo inaytâ-magaala marot hayya heenih qeebi edde aben.
Sarrak Mooyab-malik qeebil gacu waam yuble waqdi, malcina boolih numuy gabat seef lehiyya is lih hayya heeh naqboytiitik gude gacca 'yeh Edom-malik fan kudam faxe. Takkay immay woh kaah mabicinna.
Too waqdi naharsi-baxah kaak yan lab-baxay kay arac nagre raarehiyya, magaalat maroh tan gasok bagul, Mooyab yalla deqsittaamay elle yaaminehiyyah sadgatah qide. Israayil mari ah yuble waqdi, naqabut isinni baaxo fanah yuduuren.

Butta takke nabuwwak numuk teenah yen nabik raqte gubna Eliisaq fan temeeteeh kaak inteemih, «Yallih numow, baqli yok rabeh; yi baqli akah taaxige innah, YALLIH meysi le numuk ten. Duma magoh maalu akak beeh suge num, woo magoh aftok, lab-xayloh nammay yok naqoosannuh beyam faxa» inte.
Eliisaq, «Maca koh abooh?» teetik iyye. Sarrak kaadu, «Buxal duyyeh litom teellek, yoh warisey» teetik iyye.
Isiiy, «Buxal caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti (saliid) edde yan gaanuk sah tu mayyu» inte.
Too waqdi Eliisaq teetik iyyemii, «Cuggaaneh kok tan buxaaxi gexay, foyyah tan gaanittey sarrak gacissu waytahiyyak faxxah gide bet.
Sarrak koo kee ku xaylo qari adda culay qari isinnit alifay woo gaanitte zeytik (saliidik) kiba. Kulli gaanu kibinnaan waqdi, inki kabuk hayis» teetik iyye.
Woo barra isi xaylo lih isi qari culteh qari isit alifte. Sarrak qunxa-gaanuy zeyti edde lehiyyaak zeyti cuggaanek bahte gaanittet qulte. Tet xaylo kaadu zeyti sinni gaanitte tiya tiyah teetil tabisse. Too waqdi is kulli gaanu zeytik kibte.
Tonnal kulli gaanu kibba hayte waqdi, «Kibe'kal cabnem maay tan?» inte.
Too waqdi tet xaylok tiyak teeni, «Ama away kibtem ellecabo gaanu» teetik iyye. Tohuk wadir caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti yeede.
Sarrak nabi-Eliisaq fan tuduureeh; usuk teetik iyyemii, «Ama zeyti beyay eylemmaay mago isik edde igdiy. Woo magok raqtem is kee isi xayloh edde sugtaana'gidih haysitay, sin xiqelek» teetik iyye.
Ayrok teena Eliisaq Suunem-magaala fan gexe. Wokkel gaddaleh tan barra ten. Woo barra nabi-Eliisaqah qibnaytiinoh maaqo bicisse. Too ayrok lakal Eliisaq woo gita gexinnaan saaku, maaqo tet buxal akamuk yen.
Too barra baqalak intemii, «Akke kulli way nel yamaate num Yallih numuy taahirik yani kinnim digga haa.
A qarik amol qunxa qari kaah xisnayaay, qarkaytooy miiziiy sirbiya kee faanus kaah elle haynay, nee fan amaatinnaan waqdi elle silaalitelek» inte.
Ayrok teena Eliisaq Suunem yemeeteeh isi qarih addal deerih yan waqdi,
kay kaadintuh yen Gecdi deqsita numuk iyyemii, «Gexay woo barrah seecey» iyye. Woo barra temeete waqdi,
Gecdik, « ‹Nanu faxxa haynaamah neh abte taqabih aftoh maca koh abooh? Malik kee qaskar abbak numuk teenal gexeh meqe qangara ken lih koh maay yaaboo?› teetik inxicey» kaak iyye.
Isiiy, «Anu faxxa haam akkel elle inni marih addal geya» kaak inte.
Eliisaq too waqdi Gecdik, «Hay maca teetih abuu?» iyye.
Gecdi iyyemii, «Is lab-baxa maliiy, teetik baqli idaltu» iyye.
Too waqdi Eliisaq, «Annah ama teetik inxic» iyye. Is temeeteeh qari afal solte.
Too waqdi, «Yamaate sanat ta waqla lab-baxa gabah akkuqetto» teetik iyye.
Isiiy, «Kee macaa, yi qammow. Yallih num kinnito way dirab macah yol tecee?» inte.
Takkay immay Eliisaq toh edde inxicca 'ye nammayhaytô-sanatat lab-baxa xalte.
Woo awki yembe saaku, daro edde orbisan waktit, isi abbay daro orbisa mara luk taamitehiyya fan gexe.
Sarrak abbah deero abeeh, «Moyya yok biyaakitta! Moyya yok biyaakitta» iyye.
Too waqdi awki-abba kaadintuk, «Awka ukkuqay ina fan kaa bee» iyye.
Woo num yukkuqeh ina fan kaa bee. Inaay carri tikka 'yam fan gurumbal kaa sugusse. Awki carri yekke waqdi rabeh.
Too waqdi ukkuqqa kaa hayteh Eliisaq-qari fan kaa beyteeh; qarkaytô-bagul kaa hayteh qarik afa kaat alifteh gexxe.
Sarrak baqalah secteh intemii, «Nabi-Eliisaq fan gexam faxak, taamâ-num kee oklo yoh rub. Duudek xayuk aduureyyo» inte.
Tet baqli, «A saaku akah gexxam macaay? A saaki Sabti-qiidih ayro hinnay, alsi-biloh-qiidih ayro hinnak» iyye.
Isiiy, «Aleey woh tu hinna» inte.
Sarrak oklol koori hayte. Too waqdi kaadintuk intemii, «Anu ‹Oklo caalih bey› kok axce'kal, caalih mabenay, duddah gide iysissik» inte.
Too waqdi woo oklol korteeh Karmel-qaley Eliisaq elle yanihiyya fan gexxe.
Eliisaq xeri ikkek amaatih tet yuble waqdi, kay kaadintuy migaaqah Gecdi deqsitak yenek annah iyye, «Wagitey Suunem magaalah barra tamaateh tan.
Tet fan gexay nagaynah temeetem keeh tet esserey. Tet baqala kee baxa nagay tanim keeh tet esserey» iyye.
Gecdi woh tet essere waqdi kaak, «Inkih nagay tan» kaak inte.
Eliisaq fan temeete waqdi, foocal kaak qununna inteh iba kaak tibbixe. Too waqdi Gecdi tet gutqam faxe. Takkay immay Eliisaq iyyemii, «Tanay tet 'xicay, cisabboowiyyat uma'nnah gacteh tanik. YALLI tet giddinaamak yoh warsem mali» iyye.
Sarrak is kaak intemii, «Yi qammow, baxa yoh ucuy kok maay exce? Niya yot mahaysin, kok maxacciyoo?» kaak inte.
Eliisaq, Gecdi fan ufkunna 'yeh iyyemii, «Isissikay yi caxxa gabat luk gex. Gital edde garayinnaan num lih salaamatta inteh masoolin. Xabba 'xicay buxa fan gexaay, awki amol yi caxxa daffessa hay» iyye.
Barra kaak intemii, «YALLAY waarahiyyah migaq kee ku manol xiibitah ani'mmay, koo cabeh magexa» inte. Too waqdi oson nammayak sitta lih gexen.
Gecdi keenik naharat gexeh sugeeh, woo caxxa awki amol daffessa hee. Takkay immay awkal rooci yendebbeemih astah anay akkii, gersi astooti tumbulleem matan. Too waqdi Gecdi wadir yuduureeh Eliisaqak, «Awki muugutinna» iyye.
Eliisaq wokke gufe waqdi, awki elle yan qari fan dibuk gexe. Too waqdi qarkaytok bagul deerih yan awkay rabehiyya yuble. Toh yuble waqdi qari isit aliffa heeh YALLA kallace.
Sarrak isi af kee inti kee gaba, awki af kee inti kee gabah bagul hayya heeh; awkak bagul gace waqdi, awkak xagar niqna baahe.
Too waqdi Eliisaq ugutta 'yeh qari addal wonnak annah gexam gexxa 'ye. Sarrak kaadu qagteh tonnah awkak bagul gace. Too waqdi awki malcina adda sanite. Sarrak inti fake.
Eliisaq Gecdih secca 'yeh, «Awki inak, ‹Am› inxic» iyye. Awki ina woo qari culte waqdi, «Ku baxi ah kaana» teetik iyye.
Too waqdi is Eliisaqak ibal qansah baaxo xagtam fanah radde. Sarrak isi baxa luk gexxe.
Eliisaq Gilgal-magaala fan yuduure saaku, too baaxol qulul radeh yen. Ayrok teena Eliisaq butta takke nabuwwa barisak suge waqdi, isi taamah numuk iyyemii, «Kaxxa disti giral xikay maaqo neh bicis» iyye.
Keenik numuk teeni maaqo tamu taymaaqe qayso baaha'gidih, garbo fan gexe. Tokkel inki caxah xaylok sarok exxa kibba heeh baahe. Sarrak kinnim aaxige'kal, kitiffa heeh maaqoh addat hee.
Woo maaqo yakmeeni'gidih woo marah distik yeyyeeqeenih tamen waqdi, Eliisaqak iyyeenimii, «A maaqo summi tekkeh tan!» iyyeenih, yakmoonu yeffereenih.
Eliisaq, «Bulul yol baaha» iyye. Woo bulul kaal yeceen waqdi, woo disti addal tan maaqot yesgelle. Tohuk lakal, «Maaqo keenih ucuya» iyye. Woo maaqo keenih yeceen waqdi, summi cabteh sugte.
Ayrok teena num Baqal-Saliisa deqsitta baaxok, woo sanatal naharat orbe gabru deqsitta darok bicsen labaatanni gaqamboyta kaah baahe. Toh lih kaadu woo waqdi yirgiqen daro kaah baahe. Too waqdi Eliisaq isi kaadintuk, «A maaqot woo butta takke nabuwwa adoobis» iyye.
Woo num kaak iyyemii, «Aham bool num adoobiselem kot celtaa?» iyye.
Eliisaq kaal gacsemii, «YALLI, ‹Oson akmeloonuuh geera cabelon› 'yaanam iyyak, maaqo keenil ucuy, yakmeeni'gidih» iyye.
Too waqdi kay kaadinti woo maaqo foocal keenik heeh; YALLI akah iyye innah, woo maaqo yokmeeniih geeri elle raaqe.

Suuriyah-malik, Niqmaan deqsita Suuriyah-qaskarih-abba kaxxam assakaxxayuk yeneeh kaxxa arac kaah abak yen. Woh akah tekkem, YALLI, Niqmaan gabat Suuriyah qaskarah iisa yeceeh yen. Usuk kaxxa qaskariitak ten. Takkay immay arab takme kaxxam uma dalka luk yen.
Israayil lih aben carbit qunxa-Israayil-baxuwwa seewah orbiseenih yenen. Woo awká Niqmaan-barrah taamat gacte.
A baxuwwa ayrok teena Niqmaan-barrak, «Yi qammi Samaariyal yan nabi fan gexinnay, woo nabi a biyaakak kaa urusak yen» inte.
Niqmaan ah yoobbe waqdi, malik fan gexeeh, woo baxuwwa intem malikih warse.
Too waqdi malik iyyemii, «Gexay; Israayil-malikih warkat ruubeyyooh kaal ucuy» iyye.
Niqmaan lakqok soddom alfih garsi takkem kee dahabak laca alfih cabbataay, kalah kaadu sartanak tabna cabbat gabat hayya heeh wokke gexe.
Malik kaal ruube warkatal kutbeh tenemii, «A warkat gabat baahu waa num Niqmaan deqsitaah, usuk yi qaskarih abbah yan. Usuk le dalkak kaa urus» 'yaanam elle tan.
Israayil-malik a warkat yikriye waqdi, sara isik qanxiseh, «Suuriyah-malik a num uruseyyom mannah yakkale? Qidaah wada Yalla yoo maay yakkale? Usuk umaane yok faxam qellu leemik tanih matan» iyye.
Nabi Eliisaq ah yoobbe waqdi, malikih farmo ruubeeh iyyemii, «Isi sara maca qanxisseeh? Ama num yol rub. Israayilil nabi yanim kaa aybulleeyyok» iyye.
Niqmaan, luk yemeete faaris kee gaariira luk, Eliisaq fan gexeeh kay buxah afah amma 'ye waqdi sooleh.
Eliisaq, kaadintu kaa fan ruubeeh; woo num kaak iyyemii, «Ordon-weeqaytut malcina adda kaqal. Toh abtek, dalkak tu ko'lih maraqtay taahirroowetto, kok iyyah yan» kaak iyye.
Takkay immay Niqmaan too waqdi kaxxa naqabu xagarat luk gexe. Too waqdi iyyemii, «Anu akim abe waamah, yol eweqqa 'yeh YALLAY kay Dagelta kinnihiyya kallacca yoh heeh, dale amol gabah fayya heeh yoo qaffoysam ekkeleh suge.
Weeqayti tiyah tu gactek, Israayil tan weeqaytittek Damaskol yok raaqe Abaana kee Farfar weeqayti maay gaca? Woo namma weeqaytut kaqaleh urak en» iyyeeh, naqabut gexe.
Too waqdi kay gubal yan mari kaal gexeh kaak iyyemii, «Yi abbaw, nabi gibdim ab kok iyyek, woh abe raarreh tanik. Away hay, nabi kok akah iyye innah urta'gidih, gexxeh macah kaqale waytaa?» kaak iyyen.
Sarrak Niqmaan Ordon-weeqaytu fan gexeeh, Eliisaq ab kaak akah iyye innah, malcina adda kummatta edde iyye waqdi, xagar inkih kaak qaffoote. Xagar kaak qaafiyat kee maqarah furrayni baxi innah kaak gacca 'ye.
Too waqdi isi mara is lih hayya heeh Eliisaq fan gexeeh kaak iyyemii, «Tawayaay Israayil ummat taqbude Yallak sah Yalli mayanam eexegeh. Tonna'mmay Yallih numow, a mattaco yok oggol» iyye.
Eliisaq iyyemii, «Mattaco kok oggole waamah, anu inni afqadook akah taamita YALLAY waarahiyyah migaaqal xiibita» iyye.
Niqmaan, «Mattaco yok oggoltaama» iyyeh fiirik geerah kaat qagseh immay, Eliisaq woo mattaco kaak cineh.
Too waqdi Niqmaan Eliisaqak iyyemii, «Hay, mattaco yok cintek, buxah gabat luk gexa'gidih, namma bakili eerra heeh ballaaqek beyay yoo inxic» iyye. «Woh akah axcem, anu tahak wadir YALLAK kalihimih sadgat maabaay qerto maqeerisa.
Takkay immay yi amoytah yan Suuriyah malik, yalla akak iyyaanamay Rimmon deqsitahiyya yaqbude'gidih gexa waqdi, kaa'lih gexak qununnu axceemih YALLI qafu yoh abay. Tonnal Rimmonuh qununna axce waqdi, YALLI qafu yoh abay» iyye.
Eliisaq too waqdi, «Salaamata wagri ko'lih gexay» kaak iyye. Sarrak Niqmaan gexeh.
Niqmaan dagoh gide gexxa 'ye waqdi,
Eliisaqak kaadintuh yen Gecdi isi niyal yuscubemii, «Yi abba Suuriyah num kaah yeceem oggolam kaal ten. Tu kaak bee'kal kaa ruubeh yani'mmay, waara YALLIH migaaqal xiibita'mmay, gexxa exceh tuk teena kaak beeyyo» iyye.
Sarrak Niqmaan lakat gexe. Niqmaan, yarde num lakak kaa katayam yuble waqdi, amot akak suge gaarik obba 'yeh kaah garaye. Sarrakaay, «Macaay, tekkem tani'nnaa?» iyye.
Gecdi, «Tekkem matan immay, yi abba yoo ruubeeh, ‹Away Efrayim rasuk woo qaleelah tan baaxol tan nabuwwak namma nabi temeeteeh; tonna-leemik lakqok sidiica alfih garsi kee, xagar meqe sartanak namma saro yoh rub› kok iyyeh yan» iyye.
Niqmaan too waqdi, «Kee, ku maganak lakqok lica alfih garsi yok bey. Too gide bee waytek, matakka» iyye. Sarrak woo lakqo namma kiisit kaah hayya heeh, kalah kaadu sartanak tonnah, namma qaynat isi taamah marak nammayal hayya heeh Gecdik naharat ken ruube.
Kooma gufen waqdi, Gecdi namma kiis keenik beeh buxah adda culse. Sarrak woo marak, «Ahaysa Niqmaan fan uduura» iyye.
Tohuk lakal usuk buxa cule waqdi, Eliisaq, «Ankel sugte?» kaak iyye.
Usukuuy, «Yi abbaw, gexe'kke mayyu» iyye.
Eliisaq kaak iyyemii, «Woo num gaarik oobeh koh garaye waqdi, wokkel yi roocaaniyya ko'lih manannaa? Aham lakqooy sartan kee, hinnay kaadu, *daytuun coox kee qinab caxah buqreh baaxooy, laa kee illiiy naqoosa edde beyan wakti hinna'nnaa?
Taway Niqmaan luk suge dalka kot tabele. Koo kee ku durruyyat tama dalka way macabtan» iyye. Sarrak Gecdi wokkek gexe waqdi, woo dalka kaal obteeh xagar kaak qidih arroqleh innah gace.

Ayrok teena butta takke nabuwway Eliisaq saqalah akak yanihiyya Eliisaqak intemii, «Elle nan arac kaxxam nek qunxa.
Ordon weeqaytih garil nek kulli num arac edde bicisna caxa yargiqay, wokkel dabqih elle gacna arac xisnay nee inxic» kaak iyyen.
Eliisaq «Meqeh hay» keenik iyye.
Keenik numuk teeni, «Atu ne'lih gexxam tayse» iyye. Usuk kaadu meqeh iyyeh ken lih gexe.
Oson too waqdi titta lih gexen. Ordon weeqaytu gufen waqdi coox garuq qimbisen.
Keenik numuk teenak caxa edde argaquk suge godmay birtak bicseenihiyya daabak tewqeh leeh addat radde. Too waqdi woo num, «Eliisaqow, yi kabiirow, taway macaa abu? Sinaamak bee godma leeh addat yok raddek» iyye.
Eliisaq, «Ankeey, edde raddem?» kaak iyye.
Woo num edde radde ikke kaa yuybulle waqdi, Eliisaq caxxi-baxa irgiqqa heeh wokket qide. Too waqdi too godmay birtak bicseeni leeh addak tewqeh.
Eliisaq too waqdi, «Eyyeq away» kaak iyye. Woo num qununna 'yeh godma yeyyeeqeh.
Suuriyah-malik Israayilit carbi abak yen. Usuk isi qaskar abbobtil fayu essereeh, qeebi akak aboonu waan arac bicsiten.
Takkay immay Eliisaq Israayil-malikih farmo ruubeeh iyyeemih, «Ama aracal maxayyoowin; Suuriyah-mari qeebih bical gacca 'yeh sin raarisiyyat yaniinik» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Israayil-malik wokkel yan marak, «Cubbi abitaay ama arac dacrisa» keenik iyye. Aham mango adda aben.
Suuriyah-malik tah yoobbe waqdi, kaxxam yinqibeeh qaskar-abbobtih inkih secca 'yeh annah iyye, «Siinik Israayil-malikih-qaxat tanim miyyaay?» iyye.
Keenik numuk teeni, «Yi malikow, woo numih qaxa num nek mayana'mmay, nabi Eliisaq atu isi buxah addal kinni way sirrih yabta yab Israayil-malikih warsa» iyye.
Too waqdi malik iyyemii, «Usuk elle yani ikke gorrisa; kaa yibbixeh baahu waa mara ruubeyyok» iyye.
Eliisaq Dootan-magaalal yanim kaah warsen waqdi,
mango qaskar kee gaariira kee faariisa ruube. Too mari Eliisaq elle yan magaala barat gufeenih maro heen.
Maaci maacise waqdi, Eliisaq-kaadinti xiinik ugutta 'yeh afah yewqe waqdi, Suuriyah-qaskaray gaariira kee faaris lehiyyay magaala marot tabbixehiyya yuble. Too waqdi yuduureeh iyyemii, «Yi abbaw, gaba nel raddek, maca abnu?» iyye.
Eliisaq, «Mameysitin. Oson loonumuk nanu linom mangok» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi YALLA kallaceeh, «YALLAW, aham yable'gidih kay inti fak» iyye. Too waqdi YALLI kay kallaci oggoleeh; Eliisaq-kaadinti dagaak wagga hee waqdi, koomâ-deraafil faaris kee gaariiray girak bicseeniy Eliisaq marot tabbixehiyya yuble.
Suuriyah-mari qeebi kaat abe waqdi, Eliisaq dooqa abe. Iyyemii, «YALLAW, a marak inti alif» iyye. YALLI kay dooqa oggoleeh inti keenik alfeh.
Tohuk lakal Eliisaq ken fan yemeeteeh, keenik iyyemii, «Isin away temeeteenim aki gita'kkal, faxak temeeten gita hinna. Yoo kataya, isin faxxan num fan anu sin beeyyok» keenik iyye. Too waqdi Samaariyah-magaala fan foocat gacca 'yeh ken bee.
Woo magaala culen waqdi, Eliisaq kaadu dooqa abeeh, «YALLAW, baaxo yableeni'gidih inti keenik fak» iyye. YALLI kay dooqa oggoleeh inti keenik fakeeh, too waqdi Samaariyah-magaala culeenim isinnik yublen.
Israayil malik a Suuriyah-mara yuble waqdi, «Yi abbaw, ken qidoo? Ken qidoo?» iyye.
Eliisaq, «Aleey, ken maqidin; qeebit yibbixen mara maqidaanak. A marah yakmeenim kee yaaqubeenim ucuyaay, isinni malik fan yadaaroonay ken inxic» iyye.
Too waqdi Israayil malik kaxxa qibnaytiino keenih abe. Maaqok ken yoskomeeh maqab ken yefqek lakal, Suuriyah-malik fan ken ruube. Too ayrook wadirih, Suuriyah-mari Israayil-rasu buubaanamak raaqeenih.
Waqlaak wadiril Suuriyah-malik Banihadad inkih tan qaskar Israayilit qeebi abta'gidih, gaabossa heeh Samaariyah-magaalat maro heen.
Too magaalat maro heenimih sabbatah, magaalal kaxxa darô-wayti raddeeh; inki dananak-moyyâ limo lakqok bacra-tabanih garsi tekke. Camaamah-daca namma gabah gide takkem limo lakqok koona garsi tekke.
Malik woo magaalat maroh tan gasoh garil ibah gexa waqdi, barra deero abteeh, «Yi malikow, yoo cat. Yoo cat, yi malikow» inte.
Too waqdi malik teetik iyyemii, «Maca kot tekkeeh? Cato YALLI koh abe week, anu maa cato koh abu? Daro mabbixaay qinab kaadu mayyuk» teetik iyye.
Is kaak intemii, «Ayrok teena akkel tan barra, ‹A saaku ku baxa nakmay 'xicaay, aki saaku yi baxa akmenno› 'yaanam inte waqdi, tohul titta geyneh.
Naharsi saaku yi baxa alasneh nokmeeh. Aki saaku, ‹Ku baxa nakmay› exce waqdi, kaa tooqoreh» inte.
Malik ah yoobbe waqdi, niya kaak tiddigilleh sara isik qanxiseh. Magaalat maroh tan gasoh garil yan mari malik xagaral le sartanak guba *qabudda haah kaa yublen.
Too waqdi iyyemii, «Ayro kortaamak afal Eliisaqak moyya kale week, Yalli yoo bayisay» iyye.
Sarrak Eliisaq baahu waa mara ruuba.
Toh tekke waqdi Eliisaq, kaal temeete idoola lih isi buxal daffeyak yen. Malik ruube mari gufe'kal yan waqdi, Eliisaq woo idoolak, «Woo biileeni yoo qidu waa num ruubeh yan. Usuk akke yamaate waqdi, qari-afa alifay cule kaa kala. Malik kaadu kaak darret yan» iyye.
Usuk a yaabak gaba kale waqdi, malik yemeeteeh iyyemii, «A umaane nel bahtem YALLA kinni way, tuk teena neh abele exceh macah kaa qambaala?» iyye.

Eliisaq kaak iyyemii, «YALLI iyyam oobbey. Beera ta waqla kamadik sidooca-kiilo Samaariyah-magaalat maroh tan gasok culmal, lakqok inki-garsit xaametton. Gabru deqsitta darok kaadu lica-kiilo lakqok inki-garsit xaametton» iyye.
Malik dacayrit yan num Eliisaqak iyyemii, «YALLI qaran afoofi fakka haamah, aham takkem hinna» iyye.
Eliisaq kaal gacsemii, «Amaham akkih abletto'mmay woo maaqok tu matakma» iyye.
Affara numuy arab takme kaxxam uma dalkah biyaakittahiyya Samaariyah-magaalah gasoh afal ten. Oson tittak iyyeenimii, «Rabnam fan akkel abnam macaa?
Magaala cullam neh xiqtam mali, qululuh rabnaamak sa; akkel elle needek kaadu qululuh rabenno. Tohuk Suuriyah-mara fan gennay. Nanay nee iyyeenik, sugennooh; rabak sah nel baahoonu waanam malon» iyyen.
Sarrak bari yekke waqdi, Suuriyah-marih arac gexen. Wokke gufen waqdi, num keenih elle masuginna.
Yalli, Suuriyah-marat mango qaskaray gaariira kee faariisa lehiyya amaatih yaabbeenim keenit celsiise. Too waqdi Suuriyah-mari tittak iyyemii, «Israayil-mari, Ciita kee Masri malikwa kee ken qaskar amma 'yeenih qeebi net abaana'gidih, maalut xaamen» iyyen.
Tonna-leemik too bar, siraqwa kee faariisa kee danoona woo elle sugen aracal elle cabba heenih, tu gabat bee'kal, isinni roocih megloh kuden.
Taaxige affara num woo aracah xayyoowen waqdi, siraq adda culen. Wokkel geenim yokmeeniih, yooqoben. Sarrak lakqo kee dahabaay, sarak geenim beenih yooqoren. Wadirih kaadu yuduureeniih, gersi siraqih adda culeeniih tu beenih yooqoren.
Sarrak tittak iyyeenimii, «Aham abnam nel matan. Away geyne-meqe-xaagu ninnit ayseede waynaama. Maaci maacissa 'yam fan aham warse'kal sugnek, digaala nel amaatele. Tonna-leemik away xayuk genxeh malik-buxah warisnay» iyyen.
Too waqdi wokke cabeenih gexen. Sarrak Samaariyah-magaala yemeeteeniih gasoh afal suge qaskariitah seecen. Iyyeenimii, «Nanu Suuriyah-marih arac genxeeh wokkel num maballinooy, numtin anay kaadu maabbino. Faariisa kee danoona axawat teneeh, siraqwa kaadu Suuriyah mari elle cabba hee innal ten» iyyen.
Qaskar woo xaagu warisseeh; xaagi malik-buxal yontoobbeh.
Maaci maacise'kal maaci-bar, malik xiinik ugutta 'yeh qaskar abbobtik iyyemii, «Anu Suuriyah-mari niyat lem aaxigeh. Oson akkel qulul yanim yaaxigeenih. Tonna-leemik oson, ‹Maaqo goranah akke amaateloonuuh; too waqdi elle yanin innaak ken abbixenno› 'yaanamal magaalak irol ambooqoriyyat yanin» iyye.
Too waqdi kay qaskarih abbak numuk teenah yan num iyyemii, «A magaalal yan-mari rabe-marak kaxxih gaba kaleemih sabbatah, tu elle tani'nna akah naaxige innah, edde gexoonu waan koona farasay away raqtehiyya koona numuh neceeh rubnay» iyye.
Too gexoh sahdak tu takkem dooreeniih; too waqdi malik namma faras-gaarit ken hayya heeh, «Tekkem wagita» axcuk, Suuriyah-qaskarak lakat ken ruube.
Too waqdi too mari Ordon weeqaytuh amma 'yaanam gexeeniih; elle gexxa 'yeenimil, Suuriyah mari kude waqdi qideh cabe sartan kee duyyeeya yublen. Sarrak yuduureeniih, tohim malikih warsen.
Too waqdi Samaariyah-mari arduk gexxa 'yeh, Suuriyah-mari elle suge arac buuben. Tonnal YALLI akah inxicci 'ye innal, kamadik sidooca-kiilo kee, gabru deqsitta darok lica-kiilo lakqok inki garsih xaamen.
Malik woo magaalah culmal, isi dacayrit tan qaskarih abba dacayrih hee. Too waqdi ummatta magaalah culmah temeete waqdi, duufut kaa beyteh itqat kaa qidde. Tohim naharal elle, malik Eliisaq fan yemeete waqdi, Eliisaq akkele akak iyyemiy tekkehiyya kinni.
