Eliisaq too ayro, «Beera ta waqla kamadik sidooca-kiilo kee gabru deqsitta darok lica kiilo takkem Samaariyah-magaalat maroh tan gasok culmal lakqok inki-garsih xaametton» 'yaanam iyye waqdi,
malik dacayrit yan num, «YALLI qaran afoofi fakka haamah, aham takkem hinna» 'yaanam iyyeh yen. Eliisaq too waqdi, «Amaham akkih abletto'mmay woo maaqok tu matakma» 'yaanam kaal gacseh yen.
Hununuh tohim Eliisaq elle iyye innal tekke. Usuk rabeh; magaalak culmeynal ummattah itqat rabe.

Dumih ayro Eliisaq, baxah rooci akak gacse barray dabqih Suunem rasul tenehiyyak iyyeh sugeemih, «YALLI a baaxol malcina sanatih gide sugu waa qulul ruubam faxak, atu is kee isi buxah marah gexay dabqih gersi ikkel gac» 'yaanam teetik iyyeh yen.
Eliisaq teetik elle iyye innal, abteeh; is kee isi buxah mara gexxeh, Filistiin-rasul malcina sanat sugte.
Malcina sanatak lakal Israayil-rasu fan tuduure. Sarrak luk sugte qari kee, ikoytah luk sugte baaxo teetih gacsa'gidih, malik fan gexxe.
Malik, Eliisaq-kaadintuh-yen-Gecdi lih yaabak suge. Malik, «Eliisaq-kaxxa-abitto yoh waris» kaak axcuk sugeeh;
Gecdi, Eliisaq rabe awkal rooci elle gacse innat yaabak suge waqdi, woo barra malikik, «Qari kee baaxo yoh gacis» axcuk temeete. Gecdi too waqdi, «Yi malikow, woo barra amah teetiiy; tet baxay Eliisaq rooci elle gacsehiyya amah kaana» iyye.
Malik woo barra wohim essere waqdi, «Nummah tekkem kinnih» kaak inte. Tonna-leemik malik qaskar abbah secca 'yeh, «Is luk sugtem inkih teetih gacisa. Tet buqreh baaxo is akkel suge wayte malcina karmah addat darok uysubukka haytem inkih teetih ucuya» iyye.
Eliisaq Damasko fan gexeeh; wokkel Suuriyah malik Banihadad lakmisak kaah suge. Malikih Eliisaq yemeetem warsen waqdi, kay qaskar abbobtik numuk teenah yen
Cadayel deqsita numuk iyyemii, «Gexay nabi-Eliisaqah mattaco gabat beyay, ‹Lakimak uru waam kee ure wayu waam YALLA yoh esser› kaak inxic» iyye.
Too waqdi Cadayel morootom rakub Damaskoh magaalal enna 'ta meqe duyyek eerra heeh Eliisaq fan gexe. Kaa fan yemeete waqdi iyyemii, «Ku baxi Banihadad, lakimak ure lem kee ure waam koo essera'gidih yoo ruube» iyye.
Eliisaq kaak iyyemii, «Kaal uduuray, ‹Uretto kok iyye› kaak inxic. Takkay immay YALLI kay raba yoo yuybullee» iyye.
Sarrak Eliisaq, kaa wacarroysam fanah intit foocak adda kaak wagitak suggu 'yek lakal, weeqah hayya hee.
Cadayel too waqdi, «Yi abbaw, macah weqta?» kaak iyye.
Eliisaq kaak iyyemii, «Israayil maral bahtu wayta umaane aaxigeemih sabbatah weeqah an» iyye. Qagteh kaadu kaak iyyemii, «Gaso maroh edde tan magaaloolit keenik gira ruubetto. Furrayna keenik seefit qidetto; qunxa urri-xaylo tafqetto; soolimak xaylo baguk ayyaaqetto» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Cadayel iyyemii, «Anu tu'num hinniyok, a gideh takke qande mankek baaheyyo?» iyye.
Eliisaq too waqdi kaak iyyemii, «YALLI atu Suuriyah-malik akkettom yoo yuybulle» iyye.
Sarrak Cadayel, Banihadad fan yuduure. Banihadad too waqdi, «Eliisaq maca iyye?» iyye.
Cadayel, «Urele yok iyye» iyye.
Takkay immay nammayhaytoh ayro Cadayel guula bahha heeh leet arqussa heek lakal, malik quxuuseh edde qide. Sarrak Cadayel Banihadad arac ciggiileeh malik yekke.
Acab-baxi-Yooram Israayil-malik yekkeemih konoyhaytô-sanat yekke saaku, Yacoosafat-baxi-Yacooram Yuudâ-malik yekke.
Yacooram too saaku qumrik soddom kee namma karmat yen. Yarusalaam magaalal bacra karma malikih suge.
Kay barra Acab baxák ten. Usuk Acab buxah marak kaxxih, Israayil malikwa kataatak sugte uma gita kataatak suge. YALLAL dambi lem baahak suge.
Tohuh, YALLI Yuuda bayisam mafaxinna. Toh akah tekkemii, YALLI kay naqasuh yen Dawuduk, «Ku reeda baxak-baxal raaqele ikkal, bayya m'inta» 'yaanam axcuk, tohul xagna kaah culeh yen.
Yahooram malikih yen saaku, Edom mari gaadileh kaat ugteeh, sarrak isinni amô-baxxaaqqa kaak geenih, isinni malikih gubat xinta doolat yekken.
Tonna-leemik Yacooram faras-gaariiray qeebi abtahiyya haysitta heeh Xaqir fan gexe. Tokkel Edom mari, maro keenit heen. Bari yekke waqdi Yahooram kee kay qaskarih abbobtiy faras-gaariirat qeebi abtahiyya keenik yewqeenih yisillimeenih; kay qaskar fixixxeh isi buxaaxi fan kudde.
Too ayrook lakal, Edom-mari Yuudâ-marak amô-baxxaaqqa geeh raaqe. Tonnah kaadu, too dabaanal Libnâ-magaalah mari gaadileh yewqe.
Ahak raqteemiy Yacooram abehiyya inkih Yuudâ-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Yacooram, Dawud-Magaalak malikwa kee ken mara elle yaaguqen kabri aracal yoogoqen. Kay baxay migaaqah Acadya akak axcuk yeneenihiyya kay aracal malik yekke.
Acab-baxi-Yooram Israayil-malik yekkeemih taban kee namma sanat yekke saaku, Yacooram-baxi-Acadya Yuudâ-malik yekke.
Usuk malik edde yekkem, karmak labaatanna kee nammayat yan saaku. Yarusalaam magaalal inki sanatih gide malikih suge. Kay ina migaaqah Qatalya deqsitta barrak ten. Isiiy Malik-Acabak baxák teneeh; Malik-Qomri kaadu baxi baxák ten. Malik-Qomri Israayil malikik ten.
Acadya kee Malik-Acab xalak ballisih yeneemiih; tonna-leemik Acab buxah mari akah abak suge innah, Malik-Acadya kaadu uma gita kataatak sugeh, YALLAL dambi lem baahe.
Malik-Acadya, Suuriyah malik kee Israayil malikiy Yooram deqsitahiyya qeebi abte saaku, Israayil malikih qaxat gacca 'yeh Suuriyah malikit qeebi abe. Too qaskar Gilqad rasuk Raamot magaalal gaba kee gabah toome. Too qeebit Yooram mudduume.
Sarrakaa, mudumuk uram fanah, Yidraqel magaala fanah yuduure. Acadya kaat boysita'gidih tokke gexe.

Too saaku nabi Eliisaq furraynah tan nabuwwak numuk teenah seeceh iyyemii, «Raamot rasul tan Gilqad deqsitta magaala gexxa'gidih bical gac. A xalay addat akak caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti (saliid) yanihiyya gabat bey.
Wokke gufta waqdi, Yaahu deqsita num gorris. Yaahu, Yacoosafat deqsita numih baxak taniih, Nimsi deqsita numuk kaadu baxi baxak tan. Kaa geyta waqdi, kataysiisik kaa baxissa haay, dibuk yan qari kaa bey.
Too waqdi a caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeytit amo kaak uskut. Sarrak, ‹YALLI kok iyyaamah: Israayil-malik takke'gidih koo askute› kaak inxicay, isih xayuk am; tokkel maadayina» iyye.
Woo furraynuh yan nabi Raamot rasuk Gilqad magaala fan gexeeh;
wokke gufe waqdi, qaskar-abbobti daffeyna hayteh kaah sugte. Too waqdi, «Qaskar abbaw, farmo koh baahe» iyye.
Usuk toh iyye waqdi Yaahu, «Nek iyyah bahte?» iyye.
Too waqdi, «Qaskar abbaw, koh baahe» iyye.
Tohuk lakal nammayak qari adda culeeniih; woo furraynuh yan nabi woo caxâ xaylok bicsan zeyti Yaahu amol caxeeh, kaak iyyeemih, «YALLAY Israayil doore Dageltah yanihiyya, ‹Israayil-maray yim kinnihiyyah malik takke'gidih koo askute› iyyah yan.
‹Ku amoytah yan Acabak buxa qidetto. Tonnal, Idebal yi nabuwwa kee yi naqoosa qiddeemih sabbatah, teetil cane gacseyyo.
Acabak radda 'tem kee kay buxah mari inkih rabam keenil tan. Kaak radda labhak baacoytit takkuu, gaddaloola takku, inkih ken bayseyyo.
Kay buxah maral, Nabat-baxa-Yarobqamay Israayil-malikih yenehiyya kee, Aciiyâ-baxa-Baqsay kaadu Israayil-malikih yenehiyyah buxah maral bahha heem baaheyyo.
Idebal matamoogoqa. Tet xagar Yidraqel rasul kuutâ-gadda akkele› 'yaanam kok iyye» kaak inxicca 'yek lakal, furraynuh yen nabi arduk gexe.
Sarrak Yaahu woo is lih tan qaskar abbobti fan yuduure waqdi, keenik numuk teeni kaak iyyemii, «Nagaynaa? Ama cabuli akah yemeetem macaa?» kaak iyye.
Usuk keenik, «Usuk kinni num maay taaxigeeni? Edde yaabe yab maay teexegen?» keenik iyye.
«Aleey, maaxaginninok, neh warisey» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi usuk keenik iyyemii, « Usukuuy, ‹YALLI kok iyyaamah: Israayil-malik takke'gidih koo askute› 'yaanam yok iyye» keenik iyye.
Oson too waqdiik, usuk elle yawqe mawqeenah bagul, sinni sara qidda heenih *baanta yoogoren. Sarrak anay fayya haak, «Yaahu malik yekke! Yaahu malik yekke!» 'yaanam iyyen.
Tohuk lakal, Yaahu, Malik-Yooramay Yidraqel magaalal yenehiyyak abu waamal malse. Malik-Yooram, Raamot-rasul Cadayel deqsita Suuriyah-malik lih abe qeebit mudduumeeh; qaffoota'gidih Yidraqel fan gexeh yen. Yaahu is innah tan qaskar abbobtih tan labhak iyyemii, «Yi mara tekkeenik, Raamot magaalak num siinik awqe waay; Yidraqel magaalah marah garci num siinik kale waama» keenik iyye.
Tohuk lakal usuk isi faras-gaarit koreh Yidraqel fan daqaarime. Yooram wokkel woo mudumuk ure'kal yeneeh; Yuudâ-malikih yen Malik-Acadya kay bossah wokke kaa fan gexeh yen.
Yidraqel magaalal sinam akak wagtan fayya le aracal suge dacayrih yan qaskariiti, Yaahu kee kay mara amaatih yuble. Too waqdi, «Sinam amaatih able» iyyeh deero abe.
Yooram iyyemii, «Naqboytit kinnoonum kee kacnoytit kinnoonum keenik yubleh yamaatu waa num farasat rub» iyye.
Farasat yan num Yaahu fan yemeeteeh, too waqdi iyyemii, «Malik, ‹Akah, temeetem nagaynaa?› kok iyyah yan» kaak iyye.
Yaahu kaal gacsemii, «Wohut waytam mantuk, darret yok gac» kaak iyye.
Sarrak woo fayya le aracal dacayrih suge qaskariiti iyyemii, «Farasat gaceh gexe num akah gexe mara fan gufeh immay aduurih kaa mabla» iyye.
Too waqdi aki qaskariita ruubeeniih; too num kaadu, «Malik, ‹Akah, temeetem nagaynaa?› kok iyyah yan» kaak iyye. Yaahu woo numuk kaadu, «Wohut waytam mantuk, darret yok gac» iyye.
Dacayrih yan num kaadu qagteh, «Farmoh rubten num sinam fan gufeh immay aduurih kaa ableh maanaay; yamaate marak foocat yan num faras, cabuli innal, yayraddeh yaniih; hununuh Nimsi-baxak-baxi-Yaahu elle ayradduk yene innal yayraddeh yan» iyye.
Too waqdi malik Yooram, «Faras-gaari yoh baaha» iyye. Gaari kaah baaheenih; too waqdi kaa kee Malik Acadyak mariiy isi gaarit keenik koreh, Yaahut matraana'gidih gexen. Sarrak Nabot buqreh baaxo gufen waqdi, kaat garayen.
Too waqdi Yooram, «Akah temeetem nagaynaa?» kaak iyye.
«Ku ina Idebal qimbisse xeet kee coox yaqbudeenim kee sicri abaanam tanim fan, maa nagayna tan?» kaak iyye.
Yooram toh yoobbe waqdi, «Acadyaw, ah gano! Ah ganok tanih tan!» iyyeh, gaari wadir eykeleelebba heeh kude.
Too waqdi Yaahu qandek leemiik gaysê-baxa darre le kabuk buucusut kaak hee. Woo gaysê-baxi afqadot kaak rade. Too waqdi Yooram isi gaarik bagul yinnikisseh edde rabe.
Yaahu, catottah kaa'lih yen Bidkar deqsita numuk iyyemii, «Ginaada kaak beyay Nabot buqreh baaxot qid» iyye. Sarrak kaadu woo numuk, «Koo kee yoo Malik-Yooram-abba-Acab lakat farasat gexak sugne saaku, YALLI,
‹Kimal Nabot kee kay xayloh raba ubleh immay koo kaadu too baaxol digaaleyyo› kaak iyyem hawwentaa?» iyye. «Hay, toh kassittek, Yooram-ginaada beyay, YALLI akah iyyem takke'gidih, Nabot-buqreh-baaxot qid» 'yaanam isi catottah numuy Bidkar deqsitahiyyak iyye.
Yuudâ-malikih yen Acadya tekkem yuble waqdi, Beet-Cagan magaala fan isi gaarit kude. Yaahu lakak kaa yeyredde. Too waqdi isi marak iyyemii, «Kaa kaadu macabinay qida» iyye. Sarrak Acadya, Yiblaqam garit yan Guur-magaala fan yawqe gita gaarih amot kudak suge waqdi, Yaahû-mari kaa mudeh. Takkay immay gaarih amot gacca 'yeh Magiddô-magaala aleelite. Tokke gufe waqdi rabe.
Kay qaskar-abbobti kay raysa faras-gaarit hayya heeh, wadir Yarusalaam fan gacse. Tokkel Dawud-Magaalah addal malik kee malik buxah mara edde yaaguqen kabri aracat kaa yoogoqen.
Acab-baxi-Yooram, Israayil-malik yekkeemih taban kee inki sanat yekkek sarra, Acadya Yuudâ-malik yekke.
Yaahu, Yidraqel magaala gufe. Idebal tekkem toobbeh teneeh; too waqdi intil kucul hayya hayteh amo kaadu bicisitta hayteh, malik qarih taagataak gititte fan wagitak sugte.
Yaahu gasoh afaak yemeete waqdi, «Biili baqalaw, duma Dimri akah qide innah biilu bahtehik, away maca wayta?
Too waqdi Yaahu gubaak wagga hee waqdi, anay fayya heeh, «Yi qaxa yan marak iyyi yan?» iyye. Sidoc yakke maray malik qaril abbootan lehiyya taagatak addah kaa fan wagga heen.
Too waqdi Yaahu, «Addah tet qida» keenik iyye. Osonuuy wokkek addah tet qiden. Qabal teetik qari gidaar kee faariisal caxite. Yaahû-gaari giitak beyta faroosa amot teetik taqqa 'yeh.
Yaahu malik-qari culeh, maaqo woo qarih addal xage. Tohuk gaba kale waqdi, «Ama abaaro leh tan barra beyay uguqa. Is faxe sahdayto takke'mmay, malik baxáh sugtek» iyye.
Sarrak sahda tet taagaqu gexxe waqdi, moyyâ-lafa kee, gaboobi kee ibitteh lafoofik sarrah tu magennon.
Gexeenih Yaahuh toh warsen. Yaahu too waqdi iyyemii, «Tah YALLI akkele iyyem kinniih; Eliyyas Yallih afak aham akkeleemit yaabeh yeneeh; iyyemii, ‹Yidraqel rasih addal Idebal ginaada kuuta akmele.
Tet xagarak raqtem kukkurruh dacah innah baxacah kulli ikkel caxitele. Tonna-leemik tet xagar kinnim num yaaxagu maduuda› iyyeh yeneeh; tohim tekkeh» iyye.

Samaariyah-magaalah addal Malik Acabak rade marak malcina-taban takke labha ten. Yaahu waraakit yuktubeeh; woo waraakit Samaariyah magaalal yen Yidraqelik-saqoltih-yan-mara kee makaabon kee, tonnah kaadu, Acab-duruyyat dacrisa marah inkih ruube. Woo warkatal tunkuttubem annah axcuk ten.
«Isin malikik raaqe durruyyatih dacayrit yan mara kinnitoonuuh; gaso maroh edde tan magaala kee gaariiraay faaris kee silac inkih bical tabbixeeniih; tonna'mmay a warkat sin guffu haa waqdiik,
malikik rade marak inkih yayse num dooray malikih hayisa. Kaa cattaana'gidih qeebi kaah aba» 'yaanam elle ten.
Too waqdi Samaariyah-abbobti kaxxa cunxo tibbixe. Iyyeenimii, «Malik-Yooram kee Malik-Acadyak num duude wee Yaahuh yab cinnam mannal dudna?» iyyen.
Tonna-leemiik malik-gasoh-abbaay magaalâ-xintoh-abbaay makaabon kee malikik-rade-marat dacayrih yen marak inkih, titta geyya heenih farmo kaah ruuben. Iyyeenimii, «Nanu ku taamat gaca mara kinninooh, atu aba axcinnaanim abnuh bical nan. Nanu malikih num mahaynak, atu taysem kot ceelinnaanim ab» 'yaanam farmoh kaah ruuben.
Yaahu kaadu gersi warkat keenih ruube. Too warkatal iyyemii, «Isin yi mara tekkeeniih anu aba axcem aba mara tekkeenik, beera ta uddur Malik-Acab-duruyyatih-moyyaayi Yidraqel-magaala fan yol baaha» 'yaanam keenih yuktube.
Malcina-taban takke Malik-Acabak rade marak Samaariyah magaala miroctih yan mari amo wagitak suge. Oson ken aynabuk sugen.
A warkat ken gufe waqdi, Samaariyah magaalah abbobti woo malcina-taban yakke Acabak rade mara inkih qideeniih, moyya keenik kafaq addat hayya heenih Yidraqel magaalal yan Yaahu fan ruuben.
Yaahu, Acab durruyyatih moyyaayi baaheenim yoobbe waqdi iyyemii, «Ama moyyaayi magaalâ culmeynak afal namma ikkeh kurra haay, tittin bagul hayya haay, maaci maacisam fan wokkel elle tanay 'xica» 'yaanam iyye.
Maaci maacise waqdi, Yaahu magaalah culmeyna fan gexeeh, wokkel suge marak iyyemii, «Malik Yooramal malisseeh kaa qiddem, yooy; wohimih sin essertam matan. Takkay immay a mara inkih qiddem iyyaay?
Aham nee taybulleem, YALLI Acabak rade marih giddinaamak edde yabba 'yem nummak maacissem nee taybulle. YALLI Eliyyasah warseh, ‹Abeyyo› iyyem, nummak maacisse» keenik iyye.
Tohuk lakal, Yaahu, Acabak raqqa 'ye ramad le maray Yidraqel magaalal yenehiyya kee, kay xintoh miracwaay kay kataysis kee kay seekak num macabinnay inkih qideh.
Yaahu, Samaariyah-gexoh Yidraqel-magaala cabeh gexe. Gexak suge waqdi, ‹Saqi Duweeni Maffadaga› deqsita aracal,
duma Yuudâ-malikih suge Malik-Acadyah ramad le mari kaat garaye. Too marak, «Maa mara kinnitoonuuh?» iyye.
Osonuuy, «Nanu Acadyah ramad le mara kinnino. Away Yidraqel magaala fan genxa. Akah genxam, Idebal xaylo kee raaqe tet buxah marak salaamatta inna'gidih genxah nan» iyyen.
Yaahu isi marak, «Nuwwuk ken beya» iyye. Kay mari too waqdi ken yibbixeeh, wokkek xaqul suge qeelih garil ken qide. Oson mangah morootom kee nammay akkuk yeneeniih; keenik num macabinnoonuy inkih qiden.
Yaahu kaadu safarah gexot yan waqdi, Rekab-baxa-Yonadab gital gee. Too waqdi Yaahu salaamatta kaah abba heeh iyyemii, «Anu ko'lih akah ani'nnah, yo'lih tanii?» kaak iyye.
Yonadab, «Yeey, ko'lih an» iyye. Yaahu too waqdi, «Hay tonnal gaba yol ucuy» kaak iyye. Gaba kaal yecee waqdi kaak iyyemii, «Anu YALLIH taamat baguuk elle ani inna, isih table'gidih am» kaak iyye. Yaahu too waqdi isi faras-gaarit kaa korse. Oson nammayak Samaariyah magaala gexen.
Wokke gufen waqdi, Yaahu Acabah-ramad-le-marak num cabe'kal inkih qide. Taham, duma Eliyyas YALLIH kabuk warseh sugem elle tekke innak ten.
Yaahu Samaariyah mara gaabossa heeh iyyemii, «Malik-Acab Baqal-yalla kaxxam hinna'mmay dagoom aqbuduk suge; anuuy kaxxam kaa aqbudeyyok,
Baqal-nabuwwaay kaa yaqbude mara kee kay seekak inkih gaaboowa. Num raaqe waay. Baqalah kaxxa mattaco aceem faxa'mmay, amaate waa numul rabi amaatele» iyye. Taham Yaahu Baqalal yaamine mara inkih qida'gidih, ayrah keenik iyyeemik ten.
Sarrak Yaahu iyyemii, «Baqal edde nassakaxxe ayro neh xaga» iyye. Woo ayro xageenih.
Sarrak Yaahu Israayil-baaxol yan marah inkih farmo ruube. Too farmol Baqal yaqbude marak num raaqe'kal inkih yemeeten. Yemeete mari inkih Baqal elle yaqbuden qari culen. Too qari a exxaay woo exxa kibba heen.
Sarrakaay Yaahu, seeka-hayta-sartanak amo wagitak yen numuk iyyemii, «Baqal qibaadah culsah xagarat haan xer-kameswa baahay, Baqal yaqbude marah keef» iyye.
Sarrak Yaahu, Rekab-baxa-Yonadab is lih hayya heeh Baqal elle yaqbuden qari cule. Too waqdi Yaahu wokkel suge marak iyyemii, «Akke Baqal-yaqbude-marak kalih mari yemeetem kee amaate weem wagita. YALLA yaqbude mari yemeetek, wagita» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Baqalah cado akak carrisan sadgat kee mattaco abaana'gidih addah culen.
Yaahu woo qibaada elle aban qarik afal bacra-tabanih num heeh cabeh yen. Woo marak iyyeh yenemii, «Ta marak num macabinay inkih ken qidaay; keenik inki num caba num yenek, isi rooci edde aceele» keenik iyye.
Yaahu cado akak carrisan sadgat woo aracal akah xayyoose'nnak, woo qaskar kee qaskar abbobtik iyyemii, «Addah culay, yakkeenimiik inkih ken qida. Num keenik asillime kala» iyye. Too waqdi too qaskar kee qaskar abbobti siiben seefwa lih adda culeeniih, suggu 'ye mara inkih qideeniih raysa keenik giitak afah yeyyeeqen. Sarrak qarik saytun-arac deqsita aracak-iqiya fan gexen.
Woo saytun-qamiddu akak axcuk sugen qamidduy wokkel sugehiyya afah yeyyeeqeenih cararisen.
Baqal-elle-yaqbuduh-bicseh-suge-qamiddu bayissaay bututtukka heeniih, Baqal addal akak aqbuduk sugen qari carariseenih. Sarrak woo qari daacoh arac aben. Woo arac uxih a saaku fan daacoh aracah yan.
Yaahu tonnal Baqalah abak sugen qibaada bayseh.
Takkay immay usuk isih, kaak duma malikih suge Nabát-Yarobqam abe uma-taamay Israayil ummat dambit akah asak sugtehiyya abak suge. Malik-Yarobqam dahabak bicsen daheelah ceeloy Beetal kee Daan deqsita aracal bicsehiyya yuqbudeeh, Israayil ummatta inkih too dambit asise. Yaahu kaadu tohim yuqbude.
YALLI Yaahuk annah iyye. «Atu meqem abteeh, Acabak rade marak too anu kok aba excem inkih abte. Tonna-leemik ku durruyyat fereyhaytô hurah amma 'yaanam fan Israayil rasul malikwa abeyyoomuh qahdi koh cula» kaak iyye.
Tonna'mmay Yaahuh tu gactek, YALLAY Israayil doore Dageltah yanihiyyah xinto baguuk moggolinnaay; Malik-Yarobqam abe uma-taamay Israayil ummat dambit akah asak sugtehiyya kataatak suge.
Too dabaanal YALLI Israayil-rasi akkuk sugeemik daggoyseh yen. Suuriyah malikih yen Cadayel, Israayil-baaxok Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqat sugte baaxoy Arnon weeqaytuk Qarooqer deqsitta magaala fan takkehiyya gabat raaqise. Tohumuu, Gilqad kee Basan deqsita rasuy Gaad kee Ruuben kee Manasse mari elle sugehiyyak ten.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Yaahu abba hee inkih, kaak agiiranni-taamah agantah, Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabal tan.
Usuk elle rabeeh elle kaa yoogoqeenim, Samaariyah-magaala. Kay-baxi-Yowaahad kay aracal malik yekke.
Yaahu, Samaariyah-magaalal labaatanna kee bacra sanat Israayil-malikih suge.

Malik-Acadyah-inah ten Qatalya, tet baxa qideenim toobbe waqdi, dardaarinni elle amma axce raare mara inkih qidaanamih amri tecee.
Acadyâ-baxi-Yooqas dibuk raaqe. Aki mara lih kaa qide raareeni'mmay, kay annay Yahoosebqa deqsitta kaa raaqisseh rooci kaak waddeh. Is Acadyak abbâ-baxák teneeh Malik-Yacooram-baxák ten. Is Yooqas kee, inah innal kaa dacrisak sugte barra beyya hayteh, Yallih Qibaadah Qarih addat xinti-aracat ken tooqore. Toh akah abtem, kaa qide waana'gidik ten.
Lica sanatah Yahoosebqa awki-amo dacrisak, qibaadah qarih addat uqrat kaa sugusse. Qatalya too laca sanat malikáh sugte.
Malcinhaytô sanat sek-Yoyadaq malik-buxah marat dacayrih tan qaskar kee, malik buxa dacrissa qaskarak bool-abbah ten qaskarah, «YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari fan ama» 'yaanamih farmo ruube. Oson yemeeten waqdi, usuk niyat lem kaa'lih abe loonumuh titta ken geysiiseeh, YALLIH migaaqal ken xibsiiseh. Too waqdi Malik-Acadyâ-baxa-Yooqas ken yuybulleeh.
Sarrak aba keenik iyyemii, «Sabti ayro taamah tamaaten waqdi, sidochaytô-gaba siinik malik-qari dacrisak sugtaama.
Aki sidochaytô-gaba siinik kaadu Sur-deqsitta-afal dacayrih gactaama. Gersi sidochaytô-gaba woo gasol naharsi qaskarak darret kaadu dacayrih gacaanama.
Sabti ayro taamite waa namma gexoh tan qaskar kaadu, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril yan malikit dacayrih siinik gactaama. Siibten seef haysitta haay Malik-Yooqas dacrisaay gexinnaan ikke kaa'lih gexa. Siinil xayyoowinnaan numuuy qida» keenik iyye.
Qaskar abbobti, Yoyadaq keenik aba iyyem oggoleeniih; qaskarak sabti ayro taamah gexa mara kee gexe waa mara inkih, kaal baahen.
Yoyadaq, Malik Dawud macaxu kee goobuy YALLIH Qibaadah Qaril daanat sugtehiyya qaskar abbobtih yecee.
Sarrak siiben seef gabat le labha, malik dacrisaana'gidih, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih dariifal ken hee.
Sarrak sek-Yoyadaq, Yooqas afah yeyyeeqeeh malik-kalabta kaat heeh, malik rasu elle xiinisa xinto kutbeh elle tan warkat kaal yecee. Tohuk lakal caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeytit kaa yuskuteenih; Yooqas tonnal malik yekke. Tohuk wadir suggu 'ye mari gaba aagaruk anay fayya haak, «Ani hay malik! Ani haay!» iyyen.
Malikáh-sugte-Qatalya qaskar kee ummatta abta xongolo toobbe waqdi, sissikuk YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari fan gexxe. Tokkel gaaboowe mari teetih suge.
Woo baaxol qaadah akah abak sugen innah, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril yan qamiddih garil, soola malik tuble. Bool-abbobtih ten qaskar kee *baanta yaagure maray maraasiyot kaa yabbixehiyya tuble. Farcatak yan maray waxxaq iyya kee baanta yaagurehiyya tuble. Toh tuble waqdi Qatalya niya teetik baxaqteeh sara isik qanxisseeh, «Gano leelaay, gano leelaay! Ah gano!» inte.
Sek-Yoyadaq, Qatalya YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih deraafil tet qidaanam mafaxinnaay; tonna leemiik qaskar abbobti amriseh, «Ama qaskaray rooruh tanik gudeek hayya hay, tet beyaay; tet catam faxa mari yenek, ken qida» iyye.
Too waqdi tet yibbixeeniih, malik-qarih-daarat fan tet beeniih, Faras Culma deqsitta aracal tet qiden.
Sek-Yoyadaq, Malik-Yooqas kee ummatta, YALLIH mara yakkeeni'gidih, YALLA kee ken fanal bica abe. Tonnah kaadu, malik kee ummatta fanal tu'bica abe.
Tohuk wadir tokkel suggu 'ye mari inkih, Baqal elle yaqbuden qari gexeeniih bututtukka heen. Tokkel sugte sadgat elle abak sugen arooca kee, xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyey Yallih aftok yaqbudeenihiyya yiggiggileenih. Mattan deqsita numuy Baqal-yaqbude-mari seekih sugehiyya sadgat elle abak sugen aroocak foocal qiden.
Sek Yoyadaq YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarit dacrissa qaskar heeh.
Sarrak is kee qaskar-abbobtiiy malik buxah marat dacayrih tan qaskar kee, malik-buxa dacrissa qaskar, malik maraasiyya heenih, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qariik malik buxa fan kaa been. Raqqa 'te ummatta inkih lakak ken katayak malik qari fan ken lih gexxe. Wokke gufe waqdi Malik-Yooqas malik-qari qaskar akak culta afak culeeh, dardaarinni-korsil daffee.
Ummatta inkih ruffa 'teeh; Qatalya malik-buxal qideenimih sabbatah, magaalal karbacca intam masuginna.
Yooqas malik yekkem qumrik malciinit yan saakuk ten.

Israayil malikih yen Malik-Yaahu edde dardaareemih malcinhaytô-sanatat, Yooqas Yuudâ-malik yekkeeh; Yarusalaam magaalal morootom karma malikih suge. Kay ina migaaqah Xibya deqsitak teneeh; elle toobokem Bersabaq-magaalak ten.
Malik-Yooqas, suggu 'yem fan, YALLI kicna taamah taamitak suge. Woh akah tekkem, sek-Yoyadaq aba kaak axcinnaanim abak yeneemih sabbatak ten.
Tonna'mmay dumaak qibaada elle abak sugen aroocay fayyat raqtahiyya baateh manannaay; tonna-leemiik ummat woo aroocal sadgat abaanam kee qerto ruubaanam macabinnon.
Yooqas seekah secca 'yeeh annah keenik iyye, «YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril yeceen lakqok dakaatah yeceen lakqo kee, isinni fayxiik yeceen lakqoh agantah inkih daanisa.
Kulli sek siinik lakqo kaal baahinnaan numih lakqo, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qariy raagehiyya edde bicsaana'gidih, daanisam kaal tan» keenik iyye.
Takkay immay woo mari, Yooqas malik yekkeemih labaatanna kee sidiica sanat tikka 'yam fan woo arac bicse'kal sugen.
Tonna-leemiik Malik-Yooqas, sek-Yoyadaq kee gersi seekah secca 'yeh, «Isin a Qibaadah-Qari akah bicse waytaanam macaay?» keenik iyye. Sarrak kaadu keenik iyyemii, «Tahak wadir Qibaadâ-Qari xayuk akah bica innah, siinil yeceen lakqo isin daanah gabat mahana» keenik iyye.
Seeka taham raabitteeh; YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih-bicsa kaadu isinnih abe waanam kaadu oggoleenih.
Tohuk lakal sek-Yoyadaq sandug bahha heeh afa akak boohassa heek lakal, sadgat-elle-aban-aracak garil, sahda YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari akak culta afak migdi kabuk hee. YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih-afal taamat tan seekal qibaadah-yamaate-mari yecee lakqo, seeka woo sandugut qidak sugte.
Sandugut mango lakqo gacinnaan waqdi, malik-kutbe-abeena kee kaxxa sek amma 'teh woo lakqo lowwu heenih sarrak olot haak sugen.
Woo lakqo kinnih gide yuktubeenih raaqiseenik sarra, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih-taamah-bici gabat akak yan marih gabal haak sugen. Woo mari kaadu woo lakqo YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih-bicsih-duyye cooxuk bicsa mara kee xisne aba maraay
xeetik xisa mara kee xeet yaggileh ora marah acayuk sugen. Tonnah kaadu too lakqot, woo qarih bicsah faxxiima sariidâ-coox kee oren xeet kee, gersiimiy faxximma 'tahiyya edde xaamen.
Takkay immay too lakqot, lakqok bicsen kobbaayiy kee sacnitte kee faanus edde bargusan afti-xaylooy, baanta kee, tonnah kaadu, woo Qibaadah-Qarih addal sugte duyyey lakqo kee dahabak bicseenihiyyak tu edde mabicsinnon.
Too lakqo tikki 'taamak inkih YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari bicsa marih cawal kee, bicsah faxxinta duyyeh limot culsen.
Taamak saqoltih yen mari digga leeh yaaminen marak teneeh; tonna-leemiik lakqo looweenih keenil yeceenim faxxiimak mananna.
Edde-asen-qellatih-cakkih-baahan-sadgatih lakqo kee dambi-kalootuh baahan sadgatih lakqo, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih-bicsah acayuk masuginnoonuy; seeka isih haysitak sugte.
Too dabaanal Suuriyah-Malik-Cadayel, Gat-deqsitta-magaala yibbixeh gabat raaqiseh yen. Sarrak Yarusalaam kaadu yabbixeemil malse.
Malik-Yooqas, kaak naharat sugte malikway Yacoosafat kee Yooram kee Acadya deqsitak sugtehiyya YALLIH qibaadah baaheenih sugen mattacot, isi mattaco osissa heeh, kalah kaadu Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril duyye edde daanisan aracat suggu 'ye dahab kee, malik qarit suggu 'ye dahabak tu macabinnay inkih Malik-Cadayelih mattacoh ruube. Too waqdi Malik-Cadayel isi qaskar Yarusalaamak yeyseerreh.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Malik-Yooqas abba heehiyya inkih Yuudâ-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Doolat-saqoltik namma num Malik-Yooqasak abtu waytaamal malisse. A namma num Simqat-baxa-Yodakar kee Soomer-baxa-Yahodbadak ten. Kaa elle qideenim, Silla fan ooba gitak Beet-Millo deqsita caafatak ten. Yooqas, Dawud-Magaalah addal malik kee malik buxah mara edde yoogoqen kabrit yoogoqen. Kay baxi-Amaxya kay lakal malik yekke.

Acadyâ-baxi-Yooqas, Yuudak malik edde yekke labaatanna kee sidochaytô-sanatat, Yaahu-Yowaahad Israayil-malik yekke. Sarrak Samaariyah magaalal taban kee malciina sanat malikih suge.
Yowaahad YALLAL dambi lem baahak sugeeh, kaak duma malikih suge Nabát-Yarobqam abe uma-taamay Israayil ummat dambit akah asak sugtehiyya kataatak suge. Edde suge uma-taama way macabinna.
Tohuk gexxaamah, YALLI Israayil yinqibeeh; Suuriyah malik Cadayel kee kay baxay Banihadad deqsite keenit ruube. Too qaskar Israayil marak mango adda teyse.
Yowaahad YALLA kallaceeh; YALLI, Suuriyah-malik Israayil-ummattat uma'nna xukkutak sugem yuble waqdi, ken cateh.
Suuriyah marih gabak ken yeyyeeqe wadeena keenih ruube. Tonna-leemik Israayil mari dumak kaxxih amaanah gacen.
Tonna'mmay Israayil mari, Yarobqam ken yuybulleeh cabe dambih abittok maraaqinna. Tohuk kalah kaadu, migaaqah Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurmudda Samaariyal elle suge aracak makalinnon.
Yowaahad qaskarak raqtem dibuk kontom qaskariitay faras amok qeebi aba kee, tabna gaariy faaris beyahiyya kee ibi qaskarak tabna alfih numuk ten. Wohuk fulah raqtem Suuriyah malik keenik selli heeh, keenit ballaaqet akah yaaqiten innah aaqatuk suge.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Yowaahad abehiyya kee, usuk luk yen agiiranni Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Rabe saaku Samaariyah magaalal kaa yoogoqen. Kay lakal kay-baxi-Yahoqas malik yekke.
Yooqas Yuudâ-malik edde yekke soddom kee malcinhaytô sanatat, Yowaahad-Yahoqas Israayil-malik yekke. Too malik Samaariyah-magaalal taban kee lica sanatah malikih suge.
Usuk kaadu YALLAL dambi lem baaheeh, kaak duma malikih suge Nabát-Yarobqam abe uma-taamay Israayil ummat dambit akah asak sugtehiyya kataatak suge.
Wohuk kalah taniimik Yahoqas abba heem kee kay agiirinnay Yuudak malikih yen Amaxya deqsita numut abe qeebit yuybulleehiyyah agantah, Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Yahoqas rabe saaku, kay baxi-Yarobqam kay lakal malik yekke. Yahoqas Samaariyah-magaalah-addal malik buxah mara elle yaaguqen magaqat yoogoqen.
Wohuk duma, nabi-Eliisaq kaxxa lakimah lakmiseeh; kaxxam biyaakitaah deerih yan waqdi, Israayil malikih yen Yahoqas kaat boysita'gidih yemeete. Kaa yuble waqdi amol kaak weeqeeh, «Yi abbaw, yi abbaw, Israayil kalaluh lem kook sugte» axcuk boogise.
Too waqdi Eliisaq, «Gexay gayse kee gaysê-xaylo bah» kaak iyye. Yahoqas gexeh kaal baahe waqdi,
«Taway qalaamissa'gidih bical gac» kaak iyye. Malik qalaamah bical gacca 'ye waqdi, Eliisaq gabal gaba kaak hayya hee.
Sarrak malik, Eliisaq kaak elle iyye innal, qari taagatay Suuriyah rasu fan yafkunehiyya fakka hee waqdi, nabi, «Taway gaysê-baxa rub» kaak iyye. Malik too gaysê-baxa akah ruube innaak Eliisaq «So! Teymeeqeh, tahaysa atu YALLIH gaysê-baxay YALLI Suuriyah marak edde yaysu waahiyya akketto. Afeek deqsita aracal qeebi keenit abettooh, keenik aysetto» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal malikik iyyemii, «Gaysê-xaylo qagisay baahay baaxo edde mud» kaak iyye. Malik woo gaysê-baxat baaxo sidiica adda mudeeh sarrak yeyseedeeh;
nabi Eliisaq toh yinqibeeh, too waqdi malikik iyyemii, «Baaxo koona adda akki kee laca adda akki muddam kol teneeh, tonnal, Suuriyah marak agaagul sinni iisah aysuk ten. Awayah tu gactekiiy, sidiica addak biso keenik mataysa» kaak iyye.
Eliisaq rabeeh kaa yoogoqeenih.
Too dabaanal Mooyabah yooboke mari sugum wakti butta tikka 'yeh amaatuk Israayil mara wararak sugen.
Ayrok teena Israayil mari rabe num aagaquk sugen waqdi, taaxige mara amaatih yublen. Too waqdi aagaquk sugen numih ginaada Eliisaq kabrih addat qideenih cabeenih isinnih kuden. Woo raysi Eliisaq-lafa xage waqdi, woo raysal rooci yuduureeh edde ugteh solla 'ye.
Suuriyah malikih yen Cadayel, Yowaahad malikih suggu 'yem fan Israayil marat xukkutak suge.
Takkay immay YALLI kaxxam keenih racmatak sugeemih sabbatah, bayi ken mahanna. Abraahim kee Iscaak kee Yaqkuubuh cule xaganih sabbatah ken catak suge. YALLI, a saaku fanah, isi marat darre macabinna.
Suuriyah malikih yen Cadayel rabek lakal, kay baxi Banihadad malik yekke.
Banihadad kee Israayil-malikih yen Yahoqas qeebi tittat abte saaku, Yahoqas qeebil Banihadadak yeyseh. Yahoqas sidiica adda qeebil kaak yeyseeh; duma Banihadad-abbah yen Cadayel kay abbak qeebit raaqise Israayil-magaalooli, Yahoqas qeebit kaak gacse.

Yowaahad-baxi-Yahoqas Israayil-malik edde yekke nammayhaytô sanatat, Yooqas-baxi-Amaxya Yuudâ-malik yekke.
Malik naharak yekke saaku labaatanna kee koona karmat yen. Sarrak Yarusalaam addal labaatanna kee sagla liggida malikih suge. Kay ina migaaqah Yahoqaddin deqsitak ten. Elle toobokem, Yarusalaam magaalak ten.
Amaxya YALLI kicna taamah taamitak yene'mmay, Yalli yeyyeeqe xinto kee amri, akak rade Dawud elle oggolak yen innal, moggolinna. Isi abba-Yooqas-raatat gexak suge.
Tonna'mmay dumaak qibaada elle abak sugen aroocay fayyat raqtahiyya baateh manannaay; tonna-leemiik ummat woo aroocal sadgat abaanam kee qerto ruubaanam macabinnon.
Amaxya malik tikka 'yeh qande baahe saaku, kay abbay malik sugehiyya qide maray doolatak saqoltih sugehiyya caneh qide.
Takkay immay Yallih xinto elle tan kitaabay Muusal obtehiyya elle inta innal, oson abeenimih ken xaylo maqidinna. Too xintol, «Abba baaheemih xaylo maqidinaay, xaylo bahteemih abbobti maqidina» 'yaanam tan. «Numul rabi elle yamaatem, dagaak num isih baahe umaane» 'yaanam tan.
Amaxya Edomuh yooboke marak tabna alfi qaskariita Qasbo-le-Golo deqsitta golol qide. Silaq deqsitta magaala qeebit yibbixeeh; Yoktaqel 'yaanam migaaqah teetik iyye. Ta saaku fan too migaaqal tet yaaxigen.
Amaxya Israayil-malikih-yen-Yowaahad-baxa-Yahoqasah farmo ruube. Farmoh kaak iyyeemih, «Qeebih yoo duude tellek, bical gacay» 'yaanam farmoh kaah ruube.
Malik-Yahoqas too farmo kaal gacseemih, «Dumah yan saaku Lubnaan rasuk qaleh amol tooboke keenan le caxâ-baxa *sariddoh farmo rubte, iyyen. ‹Ku baxá yi baxah digbis› 'yaanam rubte, iyyen. Tohut yanin waqdi kaxxa ali yemeeteeh taaxige caxah-baxat taqqa 'ye waqdi, itqat edde tet yiggiggile, iyyen.
Hay Amaxyaw, Edom marak qeebih teyseemih hidah rabtam kok ableh an. Yoo qeebih suumuttam, koo kee ku marah baati xalelem mataaxigaa? Maabinay, geyte iisa koo xiqtay inxicaay, is buxal elle idiy, qeebi hinnak» 'yaanam kaah ruube.
Amaxya too yab kaak cineh. Too waqdi Malik-Yahoqas isi kee isi marah gaaduh kaah gexeeh, Beet-Semes deqsita aracal qeebi kaat abe. Beet-Semes Yuudâ-baaxol geytima araca.
Amaxyâ-qaskar qeebil gacteeh, qaskar takkeemik kudak isinni buxaaxih fan gacen.
Israayil malikih yen Yahoqas, Amaxya yibbixe. Tohuk lakal Yarusalaam fan gexxi 'yeeh, Yarusalaam magaalat maroh tan gasok Efrayim-Afak xabba haanamaay Rukni-Afa deqsita aracah amma 'yaanam tan gaso bututtukka hee. Too arac xexxaarah namma boolih gide mitrik akkuk yen.
YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari kee malik-qarik-duyye-elle-daanisan-aracal sugga 'te duyyek limo-gibdi-duyyeey dahab kee lakqok geyya heem tu macabinay, inkih beeh, Samaariyah-magaala fan luk gexe. Tonnah kaadu, carbit yibbixe mara seewah gabat bee.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Yahoqas abba heehiyya kee, kay agiirinnay Yuudak malikih yen Amaxya deqsita numut abe qeebit yuybulleehiyyah agantah, Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Yahoqas rabe saaku, Samaariyah magaalal malik buxah mara elle yaaguqen magaqat kaa yoogoqen. Kay lakal kay baxi-Yarobqam malik yekke.
Yuudak malikih yen Yooqas-baxi-Amaxya, Israayil-malikih-yen-Yahoqas rabek lakal, taban kee koona liggida suge.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Amaxya abehiyya Yuudâ-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Yarusalaamal sahda Amaxya qidimil malisse. Toh yoobbe waqdi Amaxya woo magaala cabeh Laakis deqsitta magaala fan megloh gexe. Takkay immay rabah kaah malse mari lakat kaak gexeh kaa qide.
Ginaada kaak farasal hayya heenih Yarusalaam fanah beeniih, tokkel Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatal malik buxah mara edde yoogoqen kabrit kaa yoogoqen.
Tohuk lakal Yuudâ-mari kay baxay migaaqah Quddiyya deqsitak yeneeh karmak taban kee leceeyit yenehiyya malikih heen.
Quddiyya isi abba rabek lakal, Eelat deqsitta magaalay qeebit raaqiseenihiyya Yuudah gacseeh nammeyhaak tet xise.
Yooqás-Amaxya Yuudâ-malik edde yekke taban kee konoyhaytô liggidat, Yahoqas-baxi-Yarobqam Israayil rasuk Samaariyah magaalal Israayil-malik yekke. Usuk morootom kee inki liggida malikih suge.
Takkay immay usuk kaadu YALLAL dambi lem baaheeh; kaak duma malikih suge Nabát-Yarobqam abe uma-taamay Israayil ummat dambit akah asak sugtehiyya kataatak suge.
Israayilik beenih sugen baaxok kilbat le kabut raqta Camat deqsita daabay gitah gacaanahiyyak xabba haanamaay Rabe-Badah amma 'yaanam tan baaxo inkih gacseh. Tonnah tanim akkelem, dumaak YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya isi naqasuh yan Amittay-baxa-nabi-Yoonasah warseh sugeeh; usuk kaadu ummatah warseh suge. Nabi-Yoonas Gat-Ceefar deqsita aracih numuk ten.
YALLI Israayil-marat yakkeenimik yakkeh yan biyak yubleeh, Yallak sah ken cattam mananna.
Tonna kinnuk, inkitanuuk bayisaah, sarrak akah andarre waan innah, saabo ken cabsiisam mafaxinna. Tonna-leemiik Yahoqás-Yarobqam gabat ken cate.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Yahoqás-Yarobqam abehiyyak kay agiiranni yanu, Damasko kee Camat Israayilih elle gacse inni yanu, Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal yan.
Yarobqam rabe saaku, Israayil-malikwa edde yoogoqen magaqih aracat kaa yoogoqen. Kay lakal kay baxi-Zakariyya kay aracal malikih raaqe.

Yahoqás-Yarobqam Israayil-malik edde yekke labaatanna kee malcinhaytô sanatat, Amaxyâ-baxi-Quddiyya Yuudâ-malik yekke.
Malik naharak yekke saaku, karmak taban kee leceeyit yeneeh, Yarusalaam magaalah addal kontom kee namma karma malikih suge. Kay ina Yakolyaahu deqsitak teneeh; elle toobokem, Yarusalaam magaalak ten.
Quddiyya isi abbah raatat gexak, YALLI kicna taamah taamitak yen.
Tonna'mmay dumaak qibaada elle abak sugen aroocay fayyat raqtahiyya baateh manannaay; tonna-leemiik ummat woo aroocal sadgat abaanam kee qerto ruubaanam macabinnon.
YALLI kaxxam gibdi dalkay arab takmehiyya Quddiyyal ruubeeh; too dalka rabba 'yam fan kaa'lih sugte. Too dalka kaa tibbixeemih, sinaamak baxsimeh dibuk yan qarit yeneeh; kay baxaay Yootam deqsitahiyya kay aftok baaxo xiinisak yen.
Wohuk kalah taniimik Quddiyya abba heem inkih Yuudâ-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Quddiyya rabe saaku, Dawud-Magaalal malik buxah mara edde yaaguqen aracat kaa yoogoqen. Kay lakal kay baxi-Yootam malik yekke.
Quddiyya malik edde yekke soddom kee bacarhaytô sanatat, Yarobqam-baxi-Zakariyya Israayil-malik yekke. Sarrak Samaariyah-magaalal lica alsah malikih suge.
Kay kaxxa abbobtik kaxxih YALLAL dambi lem baaheeh, kaak duma malikih suge Nabát-Yarobqam abe uma-taamay Israayil ummat dambit akah asak sugtehiyya kataate.
Sarrak Yaabes-baxi-Sallum kaa elle qidu waa malah malseeh, ellecaboh sinam foocal kaa qide. Kaa qidek lakal kay aracal isih malikih gace.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Zakariyya abehiyya Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
YALLI duma yan saaku Malik-Yaahuh xagana culeeh iyyeemih, «Ramad kok fereyhaytoh adoh amma 'yam fan Israayil baaxol malikwa akkelon» 'yaanam iyyeh yen. Toh elle iyye innal duudussu hee.
Quddiyya Yuudak malik edde yekke soddom kee sagalhaytô liggidat, Yaabes-baxi-Sallum Israayil-malik yekke. Samaariyah-magaalal inki alsa malikih suge.
Gaddi-baxi-Manacem, Tirxak Samaariya fan gexeeh; Sallum wokkel qideeh kay aracal malik yekke.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Sallum abba heehiyya kee, malik qiduh abeh yan mala Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Manacem Tirxâ-magaalak amaatuk suge waqdi, Tifsac-magaala inkitanuuk bayse. Tet addal suge mara seleh. Toh akah abem, woo magaalal suge mari gaba yacayu cineemih abe. Tet dariifal tan arooca inkih bayseh. Idqa agabuk kinni way bagu fake.
Quddiyya Yuudak malik edde yekke soddom kee sagalhaytô sanatat, Gaddi-baxi-Manacem Israayil-malik yekke. Usuk Samaariyah magaalal tabna sanat malikih suge.
Manacem kaadu YALLAL dambi lem baaheeh; kaak duma malikih suge Nabát-Yarobqam abe uma-taamay Israayil ummat dambit akah asak sugte kataatak suge.
Migaaqah Tiglat-Fileeser deqsita numuy Assuuriyak malikih yenehiyya Israayil rasu warare. Manacem soddom kee affara alfih kiilo lakqok kaah yecee. Too lakqo kaah akah yeceem, woo malik cato kaah yakke'gidiiy, tonnah kaadu, kay abbootan diggoowaah, nagay cayla baaha'gidik ten.
Manacem woo lakqo Israayil gaddaleelak gaaboyseeh, kulli numuluuy kontom garsi keenik hee. Manacem too lakqo kaah yecee waqdi, Assuuriyah-malik Israayil baaxo cabeh, isi baaxo fan yuduure.
Tohuk kalah taniimiy Manacem abehiyya inkih Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Usuk rabe saaku, kay baxi kay aracal malik yekke. Kay baxi migaaqah Fekacya deqsitak yen.
Quddiyya Yuudak malik edde yekke kontomhaytô sanatat, Manacem-baxi-Fekacya Israayil-malik yekke. Sarrak Samaariyal namma sanat malikih suge.
Usuk kaadu YALLAL dambi lem baaheeh; kaak duma malikih suge Nabát-Yarobqamay Israayil mara dambi le abittot asisak sugehiyyah raatat gexe.
Ayrok teena Fekacya-qaskar-abbobtik numuk teenah yen Fekac deqsita num, kontom numuy Gilqad-rasuk temeetehiyya wakalih haysitta heeh, Fekacya Samaariyah addal malik qarik iqiyal edde rebsiman golik addal yan waqdi, amma 'yeenih, kaa kee gersi namma numuy Argob kee Ariye deqsittehiyya qiden. Tohuk lakal Fekac kay aracal isih malik yekke. Fekac Ramalyaahû-baxak ten.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Fekacya abba heehiyya inkih Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Quddiyya Yuudak malik yekkeemih kontom kee nammeyhaytô sanat gufe saaku, Fekac Israayil-malik yekke. Sarrak Samaariyal labaatanni liggida malikih suge.
Usuk kaadu YALLAL dambi lem baahak yen. Kaak duma malikih suge Nabát-Yarobqam abe uma-taamay Israayil ummat dambit akah asak sugtehiyya kataatak suge.
Fekac malikih suge dabaanal, Assuuriyah malikiy migaaqah Tiglat-Fileeser deqsitahiyya Qiyon kee Aabil-Beet-Maqka kee Yanowac kee Kedes kee Caxor deqsitta magaalooli kee, tonnah kaadu, Gilqad kee Galiil kee Naftaali marih baaxo Israayilik raaqiseh. Woo baaxol suge mara Assuuriya fan seewah bee.
Quddiyya-baxi-Yootam Yuudak malik edde yekke labaatanhaytô sanatat, Eela-baxi-Hosiqa, Fekac qidaamal malse. Sarrak kaa qideeh; kaa qidek lakal kay aracal isih malik yekke.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Fekac abba hee inkih Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Fekac Israayil-malik edde yekke nammayhaytô sanatal Quddiyya-baxi-Yootam Yuudâ-malik yekke.
Yootam too saaku labaatanna kee koona karmat suge. Usuk Yarusalaamal taban kee laca sanatah malikih suge. Kay ina Yaruusa deqsitta barrak teneeh; tet abba Saaduk deqsitak yen.
Isi abbah raatat gexak sugeeh, tonna-leemik YALLI kicnam abak suge.
Tonna'mmay dumaak qibaada elle abak sugen aroocay fayyat raqtahiyya baateh manannaay; tonna-leemiik ummat woo aroocal sadgat abaanam kee qerto ruubaanam macabinnon. YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih kiblati-kabih culmah arac xissem, Yootamak ten.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Yootam abehiyya Yuudâ-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
YALLI, Suuriyah-malikiy Raaxin deqsitak yenehiyya kee Israayil malikih yen Fekac, Yuudah-ummatat qeebi aba'gidih ruubem, too saakuk ten.
Yootam rabe saaku, Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatal malikwâ-buxah mara edde yaaguqen magaqat kaa yoogoqen. Kay baxi-Acad kay aracal malik yekke.

Israayil malikih yen Ramalyaahû-baxi-Fekac reedeemih taban kee malcinhaytô sanatat, Yootam-baxi-Acad Yuudâ-malik yekke.
Acad malik yekke saaku qumrik labaatanni karmat yen. Yarusalaam magaalah addal taban kee lica sanat malikih suge. Takkay immay isi kaxxa abba Malik Dawud raatat gexak masuginnay, YALLAY kay Dagelta kinnihiyya niqba taamat asak suge.
Duma sugte Israayil amoytiitik kaxxih, Yalli niqbam abak suge. Ayrok teena Acad girat isi baxa sadgatah qide. Usuk woh akah abem, Israayil-mari yamaateemik naharal woo baaxol suge maray YALLI yeyyeeqehiyyak raaqisen umâ-yabulih-tan qaadah gabbaaqiyyak ten.
Diini maleela qibaada elle abta aroocakaa, koomaamih amo takku, silal le cooxih guba takku, too aroocal Acad sadgatah saq elle qidaah, qaydarus elle qeerisak suge.
Suuriyah-malikih yen Raaxin kee, Israayil-malikih yen Fekac Yarusalaam-magaala gaadeeniih, marot tet heen. Takkay immay Acadak qeebil yaysoonu yeffereenih.
Too saaku Edom-malik, Eelat-magaala qagseh qeebit yibbixeeh, Yuudâ-maray wokkel sugehiyya tet addak yeyyeeqeh. Sarrak Edomuh yooboke mari too magaalal isih dabqih gaceeh, a saaku fanah teetil elle yanin.
Acad sarrak Assuuriyah malikih yen Tiglat-Fileeser fan farmo ruube. Iyyeemih, «Anu atu aba axcinnaanim abaah, ku amrih yan num kinniyo. Tonna'mmay ta saaku yoh amay, Suuriya kee Israayil qaskaray yoh gaaddahiyyak yoo cat» 'yaanam farmoh ruube.
Farmo elle ruube maral YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari kee malikwa dabqah elle gacta qarik duyye-elle-daanisan-aracak bee dahab kee lakqo mattacoh kaah ruube.
Malik Tiglat-Fileeser, Acad kaah ruube farmol, qaskar luk Damasko gaaduh yemeeteeh magaala qeebit raaqise. Sarrak woo magaalah mara Kiir baaxo fan seewah bee. Malik Raaxin qideh.
Tohuk lakal Malik Acad Damasko gexeeh, Tiglat-Fileeserit yongoorowe. Tokkel soolisen mansafay sadgat elle abaana yuble. Too waqdi sek Uriyya deqsita seekih farmo ruubeh, kaak iyyeemih, «Gexay hununuh tama'nnah yan sadgat elle yaceen arac bicisay sug» iyyeeh, isik naharat tohih ceelo kaal ruube.
Uriyya gexeeh, Acad yamaateemik dumal, hununuh too aracih gurral, sadgat arac bicseh kaah suge.
Acad Damaskok yuduure waqdi, sadgat arac biceh kaah suge. Garih akak xayyoowa 'yeh ceela'nna wagga heek lakal,
sadgatah cado akak cararisan saq elle qide. Daro kaadu sadgatah baaheeh, qinabak bicsen kamri faaroh elle caxe. Tonnah kaadu, amaanah-xiinaanamih-asta-yakke-sadgatah saq qideeh, too saqih qabala bagul akak rife.
Dumaak YALLIH qibaadah qiden sadgatah heenih sugen aracay nacaasak bicseenihiyya, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarik foocal, qusba sadgat arac kee Qibaadâ-Qarik fanal gace. Sarrak tokkek kalla heeh, isih xise qusba aracak kilbat le kabut hee.
Tohuk gaba kalla hee waqdi, sek Uriyyak iyyeemiih, «Yi kaxxa sadgatih aracal, saaku saaku cado akak carrisan saq qida; carra carra sadgatah baahan daro cararisa. Kaadu malik kee ummat sadgatah bahta daro kee, saqay cado akak cararisaanahiyya kee, ummat bahta qinabak bicsen kamrih sadgat elle ucuy. Sadgatah qidda haan saqih qabal bagul akak rif. Woo nacaasak bicsen sadgat-aracah tu gactek, Yalli yok faxam elle aaxige astah yoh hay» iyye.
Sek Uriyya toh, malik kaak aba elle inxicca 'ye innal, abe.
Acad kaadu YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril ten nacaasak bicsen gaariirak galdaddaqin nacaas kaleeh, woo gaariirah amol sugte sacnitte wokkek kaleh. Tonnah kaadu, taban kee namma awur ceeloy nacaasak bicseenihiyyah amol yen kaxxa tanakay nacaasak bicseeni wokkek kalla heeh, xaak bicsen rakiiboh amol hee.
Tohuk kalah Assuuriyah malik kaak faxak sugeemih sabbatah, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal xisen iraawo-le-aracay sabti qiidih ayroh heeni wokkek kaleh. Tonnah kaadu YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih afay malikwa dibuk qibaadah akak culta'gidih bicseenihiyya alfeh.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Acad abba heehiyya Yuudâ-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Acad rabe saaku, Dawud-Magaalal malikwâ-buxah mara edde yaaguqen magaqat kaa yoogoqen. Kay baxi kay lakal malik yekke. Migaaqah Ciskiyyaahu deqsitak yen.

Acad Yuudâ-malik edde yekkeemih taban kee nammayhaytô sanatat, Eela-baxi-Hosiqa Israayil-malik yekke. Sarrak Samaariyah-magaalal sagla sanat malikih suge.
Usuk kaadu YALLAL dambi lem baaheh immay kaak duma Israayil-malikwah suge marih gide dambik maabinna.
Assuuriyah-malikiy migaaqah Salmaneser deqsitahiyya Israayil-rasut qeebi abe. Sarrak Hosiqa kay gubal gace. Tohuk lakal kulli sanatal qusuur kaah acayuk yen.
Takkay immay sarrak Hosiqa, Masri-malikiy migaaqah Soo deqsitahiyyah farmo ruubeh, «Yoh amay yoo cat» 'yaanam iyyeeh, kulli sanatal Assuuriyah-malikih ruubak yen qusuur yeyseedeh. Assuuriyah malik toh yoobbe waqdi, «Hosiqa casbit haa» iyyeh casbit kaa haysiise.
Tohuk lakal Assuuriyah-malik Israayil baaxo yibbixeeh, Samaariyah-magaala marot hee. Marot tet abbaxuk sidiica sanat tikka 'yek sarra tet yibbixeh. Tohum, Hosiqa malik edde yekke sagalhaytô sanatak ten. Israayil mara seewah Assuuriya fan beeh, wokkel ken nookise. Garab Calac magaalal nookiseeh, gersi mara keenik Cabor weeqaytih garil Goodan deqsita rakaakayal nookise. Wohuk raqtem kaadu Meediya deqsita marih-magaaloolil nookise.
Toh akah tekkem, Israayil-mari YALLAY ken dooreh Masri malikik ken cateeh Masril edde sugen caalatak ken yeyyeeqehiyyal dambi lem baaheenimih sabbata. YALLA cabba heenih xeet kee coox yuqbuden.
Israayil-mari, woo-baaxol-keenik-duma-suge-maray YALLI ken taagah baaxok yeyyeeqehiyya abak suge dambi abeeniih; tohuk kalah kaadu, kulli malik keenik abak suge uma taama kataaten.
YALLI, «Amah umahak, maabina» keenik akak iyye taama uqurat aben. Eelli haan magaaloolik qunxa magaala takku, kaxxa magaalay gasot maroh tani takku, duyye elle yaqbuden arooca xisen.
Kulli koomay fayya lehiyyah amo kee kulli caxah gubal, xeetik bicsen qamidway taahirik tan akak iyyaanahiyya kee, Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurumuuda soolisen.
Too duyyeeyah qibaadah aroocal qaydarus qeerisak, keenik duma wokkel suge maray YALLI woo baaxok yeyyeeqehiyyah raat kataaten. Kaxxam uma umaanet aseenih, YALLAT naqabu culseeniih,
kay kitaabay, «Yallak kalihim maqbudina» keenik iyyah yab cineenih.
YALLI, isi farmoytit kee nabuwwa, Israayil kee Yuudâ-marah ruubak suge. Too nabuwwa kee farmoytit, «Ummatey, maabitina. YALLI, ‹Yi amri oggola, yi kitaabay sin kaxxa abbobti dabaanaak obtehiyyay nabuwwâ-gabal siinih heehiyya intam aba› siinik iyya» axcuk sugte.
Takkay immay ken yab cinak sugeeniih; isinni kaxxa abbobtik kaxxih, YALLAL maamininnoonuuy, kay yab ayti akak taabbe mara makkinnon.
Tu xiqe sinni xeet kee cooxuy gabak bicseenihiyya yaqbudeeniih, isinnih kaadu tu xiqe sinni mara yekken. YALLI keenih kale aylahut baaqid luk manannoonuy; usuk keenil oobise amri cineeniih, ken kaxxa abbobti lih hee bica xaguroonu cineenih. Toh cabba heenih ken dariifal tan baaxooxah maray YALLI «Oson abeenim maabina» keenik akak iyyehiyya abaanam baahen. YALLI aba iyyem cineenih.
YALLAY ken doorehiyya keenil oobise amri cineeniih, Yallih aftok dahabak bicissa heen namma daheltih ceelo yuqbuden. Migaaqah Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurmudda soolisen. Tohuk kalah, cutuukâ-qibaada kee Baqal-deqsitta-duyyeh-qibaadat gacen.
Too duyyey yaqbudeenihiyyah isinni xaylok labim kee sayim girat sadgatah qidaanam baahen. Kalluwalle kee ramli qida maral fayu esseren. YALLIH garil dambik loowintaamat aseeniih, YALLAT naqabu ugsen.
Tohuk gexxaamah YALLI Israayil-mara yinqibeeh isi garik ken xiiriyeh. Keenik raqtem, dibuk Yuudâ-mara.
Tohuh, Yuudâ-mari kaadu YALLAY ken Dageltah yanihiyyah amri moggolinnoonuy, Israayil-mari abak sugem aben.
Tonnal YALLI inkih yan Israayil mara yinqibeeh; ken digaaleh, ken naqboytiitiy racmatta sinnih gabal ken hee. Ellecabol isi garik ken xiiriyeh.
YALLI, Yuudâ-marak ken baxsek lakal, Israayil-mari Nabat-baxa-Yarobqam malikih haysiteeh; usuk kaadu YALLIH gitak ken yeyyeeqeh kaxxam gibdi dambit ken asise.
Oson Yarobqam-gita kataateeniih; usuk rabek lakal, uxih usuk abba hee dambi aben.
Sarrak ellecabol, isi nabuwwak akah inxicca 'ye innal, isi garik ken xiiriyeh. Tonna-leemiik Assuuriyah-baaxo ken yiskiliqeeh tokke fan seewah ken been. Ta saaku fanah tokkel yanin.
Assuuriyah-malik, Baabelon kee Kuut kee Qiwwa kee Camat kee Safarwayim deqsitta magaaloolik sinam beyya heeh, Israayil-mari akak yiskiliqen Samaariyah-rasul tan magaaloolil nookise. Tonnal too mari Samaariyah-rasul tan magaalooli isinnih raqsiteenih, elle nooken.
Wokke naharak gufen waqdi, YALLIH qibaada abak masuginnon. YALLI toh yuble waqdi, ken takamu wayta lubooka keenit ruube. Too lubooka tu keenik qiddeh.
Too waqdi Assuuriyah-malikih toh warseeniih; kaak iyyeenimih, «Atu Samaariyah magaaloolil nookisse mari, a-baaxoh-yalli faxam yaaxigeenih mayaniinaay; tonna-leemik a-baaxoh-yalli ken takamu wayta lubooka keenit ruube» iyyen.
Malik toh yoobbe waqdi, «Ama seewah orbisne marak seekik teena dooray keenih ruubaay; ‹Samaariyah-baaxoh-yalli xintoh-lem-kee-faxam ummat baris› kaak inxicay kaa ruuba» iyye.
Sarrak too seekiy Israayilih yoobokehiyya wadir Samaariya fan yuduureeh; tokkel Beetal deqsitta magaalal dabqih gace. Tokkel YALLAL elle yaamineeniih kaa elle yaqbuden gita ken barse.
Samaariyal gace marah tu gactek, uxih isinni xeet kee cooxih qibaadat gaceeniih; duma woo baaxol suge mari xiseh cabe qibaadah-qarway fayya-le-aroocal heenihiyyal, too duyyeeyah ceelo heen. Kulli mari keenik elle-gacen-magaalal, too akak-yemeeten-magaaloolil sugen saaku elle aamanuk sugen duyyeeyah ceelo haysiten.
Baabeloonuk yemeete mari Sukkot-Banot akak iyyaanamay yallah loonu elle yaqbudoonu waan arac heen. Kuutuk yemeete mari Nergal akak iyyan duyyey yallah loonuh ceelo haysite. Camatak yemeete mari Asiima akak iyyan duyyey yallah loonuh ceelo haysiten.
Qiwwak yemeete mari Nibcad kee Tartak akak iyyan duyyey yallah loonuh ceelo haysiten. Safarwayimik yemeete mari Adrammelek kee Qanammelek deqsittaamay yalla axcuk elle yaamineenih isinni xaylo sadgatah qideeniih cado akak solal carrisen.
Ta mari YALLA kaadu aqbuduk yeneeh; tohuh, too xeet kee coox elle yaqbuden aracal, qibaada abu waa maray seeka gurrah too aracal sadgatah baahen saq qidu waahiyya isinni addak dooren.
YALLA aqbuduk sugeeniih; YALLA lih kaadu, woo akak yemeeten baaxol aqbuduk sugen duyyey abuk raqtih keenih raqte macabinnoonuy kaadu aqbuduk sugen.
A saaku fanah, too dumaak abuk raqtih keenih raqte duyyeeyah qibaada macabinnoonuy uxih aban. YALLA mayaqbudaanaay; YALLI Yaqkuubuk rade maray Israayil migaq akah yeyyeeqehiyyah ruube xinto kee madqaay amri iyyam maaban.
YALLI duma Israayil mara lih bica heeh yeneeh, amri kaadu keenil oobiseh suge. «Yok sa gersiimil maamanina. Yok sa gommoh qibaadah numuh maradina. Sadgat yi migaaqak kalihimil maabina. Yok kalihimih qibaada maabina.
Yooy Masri rasuk kaxxa qande kee caylat sin baahe uqbuda. Dibuk yoh gommoh radaay sadgat yi migaaqal aba.
Anu siinih acee xinto kee madqaay amriy kitaabal tunkuttubehiyya digga luk duudusa. Yok kalihimih qibaada maabina.
Anu sin lih hee bica mahawweeninaay yok kalihimih qibaada maabina.
Yooy sin Dageltah yanih amri oggolaay; naqboytak anu sin cateyyo» 'yaanam keenik iyyeh yen.
Tohuh, kay yab maabbinnoonuy, taaxige isinni uma-taamat asak sugen.
Tonnal, a mari kaadu YALLA aqbuduk yen saakuuk, kaa'lih coox kee xeetiy gabak oreenih bicseenihiyya aqbuduk yenen. Ta saaku fanah ken ramad too oson abak suggu 'yeenim aban.

Eela-baxi-Hosiqa Israayil-malik yekkeemih sidochaytô sanatal, Acad-baxi-Ciskiyyaahu Yuudâ-malik yekke.
Malik yekke saaku qumrik labaatanna kee konooyut yen. Yarusalaamal labaatanna kee sagla sanatah malikih suge. Kay ina Abiyya deqsitak teneeh, Zakariyyak baxak ten.
Usuk isi kaxxa abba Malik Dawuduk kaxxih, YALLI kicna taamat asak yen.
Qibaada elle abak sugen aroocay fayyat raqtahiyya bayseeh; taahirik tan qamidwa akak iyyan qamidway xeetik bicseenihiyya bututtukka heen. Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurumuuda yiggiggileh. Muusa nacaasak bicseh cabe abeesah-ceeloy migaaqah Nacustan akak iyyeenihiyya kaadu bututtukka hee. Too abeesah ceelo yaggileenimik duma, Israayil mari woo abeesah ceeloh assakaxxiyyah qerto akah ruubak sugen.
Ciskiyyaahu YALLAY Israayil doore Dageltah yanihiyya yeemeneeh; Yuudâ-rasi kay innah yan malik duma luk masuginnaay, sarra kaadu kay lakal magenna.
Usuk YALLAL baguuk aaminuk yeneeh; kaak maxxeerinna. YALLI Muusal oobise xinto intam abak yen.
YALLI kaa'lih yeneeh; usuk abba hannaanim inkih gabal kaak bicak ten. Usuk Assuuriyah-malikih yab oggolaanam kee kay xintoh gubat gacaanam raabite cineh.
Filistiin-marak yeyseeh; oson dabqih elle sugen aroocak qunxa magaalaay kaxxa magaalooliy gasot maroh tanihiyyak, Gaadâ-magaala kee teetik dariifal tan baaxoh amma 'yaanam tan baaxo inkih buube.
Ciskiyyaahu reedeemih fereyhaytô-sanat yekkeeh; Malik-Hosiqa Israayil reedeemih kaadu malcinhaytô-sanat yekke saaku, Assuuriyah-malikiy Salmaneser deqsitahiyya Samaariyah-magaalat qeebi abeeh teetit maro hee.
Samaariyat maro heenimih sidiica sanat yekke saaku, Samaariya boolatteh. Taham edde tekkem, Ciskiyyaahu reedeemih laca sanat tikka 'ye saakuk teneeh; Hosiqa reedeemih kaadu sagla sanat yekke saakuk ten.
Assuuriyah-malik Israayil-mara Assuuriya fan seewah bee. Sarrak keenik tu takkem Calac magaalal nookiseeh, gersi mara keenik Cabor weeqaytih garil Goodan deqsita rakaakayal nookise. Wohuk raqtem kaadu Meediya deqsita marih-magaaloolil nookise.
Israayil-marat tonnah tanim tekkeeh; toh keenit akah tekkem, YALLAY ken Dageltah yanihiyyah amri cineenimih sabbata. Oson YALLI, Muusay kay naqasu kinnil ruube amri cineeniih, YALLI ken lih abe bica xaguraanam maabinnon.
Ciskiyyaahu Yuudâ-malik edde yekkeemih taban kee fereyhaytô sanatat, Assuuriyah-malikiy migaaqah Sanceerib akak axcuk yeneenihiyya, inkih tan Yuudah-magaalooliy maroh gasoosa edde sugtehiyya qeebit yibbixe.
Too saaku Malik-Ciskiyyaahu Assuuriyah-malikiy Laakis magaalal yenehiyyah farmo ruube. Too farmol iyyemii, «Umam bahtem yoo kinnim innik eexegeeh; atu faxinnaanim koh aceeyyok, ahaysa ku maganak qeebik yok sol» 'yaanam kaak iyye.
Malik Sanceerib tohul gacsemii, «Hay tonnal, lakqok tabna alfih kiilo takkem kee, dahabak kaadu alfih kiilo takkem yoh rub» 'yaanam kaal gacse.
Ciskiyyaahu lakqok YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari kee, malik-qarik-duyye-elle-daanisan-aracal sugga 'tem inkih kaah yecee.
Tonnah kaadu, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih-albaabih-bagu kee too albaabih garil usuk isih heeh yen dahab inkih kalla heeh, Malik-Sanceeribih ruube.
Tohuk lakal Assuuriyah-malik Laakis-magaalak Ciskiyyaahuy Yarusalaam magaalal yanihiyya fan mango qaskar ruube. Woo qaskar lih, qaskar abbobtiy kaxxa arac luk tanihiyyak sidoc ruube. Yarusalaam magaala gufen waqdi, daga raqta dorak lee akak tamaate caraata elle obta'kkeh xaqul, «Sara kaqlisa marih Booxa» deqsita arac fan beya gital soolen.
Tohuk lakal Malik Ciskiyyaahuh farmo ruubeeh; too farmol kay marak sidiica num yemeete. Woo sidiica num Cilkiyyá-Elaakimiy malik-qarih-abbah yanihiyya kee, Sebna deqsita numuy malik-qarih kutbe-abeenah yani kee, Asáf-Yowac deqsita numuy tikki 'taamah kutbeh abeenah yanihiyyak ten.
Assuuriyah-qaskar-abbobtik numuk teeni keenik iyyemii, «Gexay Malik-Ciskiyyaahuk, kaxxam naba malikih yan Assuuriyah-malik, ‹Atu kibaal elle litom iyyaay?
Kaxxa-yab carbi-mala kee qaskariinô-dudda koh akkelem maay takkalee? Assuuriyat qeebi abtuh amo elle meqitom iyyaay?
Masri mari yemeeteh koo catelem takkale'mmay, toh bayreyta gabah caxxah haanamih bis le. Bayreyti gabâ-caxxa mayakka; yaddigilleeh, gaba kok qanxiseh caba. Kibaal kaal heenik, Masri-malik toh elle yan'inna› kaak inxica» keenik iyye.
Qagseh kaadu keenik iyyemii, « ‹Amo elle meqinom, YALLAY ni Dageltah yani› yok inteenik, Ciskiyyaahu, Yuuda kee Yarusalaam marak, ‹Yalla dibuk Yarusalaamal yan sadgat aracal uqbuda› inxicca 'yeh, wadirih fayya-le-aroocal heen qibaadah-qarwa kee sadgat-arooca akak yiggilem YALLA kinnim hinnaa?
Anu malik Sanceerib afak sin lih yaabu waa. Isin beya mara akah geyteenik, namma alfih faras siinih baahu waamih xagana sin lih culele.
Masri mari gaariira kee faras qeebi aba mara siinih ruubaanamah, Assuuriyah qaskar abbobtik gacca 'ya num siinik aysele» anqaasah keenik iyye.
Qagisak iyyemii, «A arac baysa'gidih akah emeetem, YALLIH amri'kkal, inni amri maay takkalee? YALLI, ‹Woo baaxo ibbixay bayisa› 'yaanam isih yok iyye, 'yaanam kaak inxica» keenik iyye.
Usuk too yaabak gaba kale waqdi, Elaakim kee Sebna kee Yowac kaak intemii, «Ni abbaw, nanu naaxigem Suuriyah afak woo afat yaabaay ama. Qibraan afay edde yabtahiyya a magaalah-gidaaral yan mari inkih yaabbeh; edde mayaabin» iyyen.
Too waqdi too qaskar abba keenil gacsemii, «Macaa, yi malik farmo yol akah ruubem dibuk sin kee sin malik maay takkalen? Tonna hinna! Farmo yol akah ruubem, isin edde anuk a maray gidaaral daffeyahiyyah kaadu edde ruube. Ama gidaaral daffeya maray siinik kaxxih kaadu isi caara yakamu waah isi daaco yaaqabu waahiyyah kaadu waris yok iyye» keenik iyye.
Tohuk lakal woo qaskar abba sollu 'yeh anay fayya haak Qibraan afat, «Kaxxam naba malikih yan Assuuriyah malik siinih ruube farmo oobbeya.
Ciskiyyaahu sin macata'mmay kay yab maabbina.
Usuk, ‹YALLI nee cateh Assuuriyah-qaskar magaala nek abbixe kalelek, YALLAL eemena› siinik iyyaamah maamanina.
Qagseh yab bisoh beyak iyyemii, «Assuuriyah malik siinik iyyemii, ‹Bica yo'lih abaay, edde tanin ikkek eweqay gaba yol acuya. Toh abteenik, kulli num siinik is qinabih xaylo akmeleeh, isinni *sublak kaadu sublâ-xaylo akmettoonuuh, isinni qelwak lee aaqubetton.
Sarra sin baaxoh bis le baaxo sin beeyyo. Too baaxol darok cayyetton. Qinabak bicsen kamri kibuk elle yan baaxo. Gaqambo kee qinab xala coox kibuk elle yan baaxo. Too baaxo zeyti (saliid) akak bicsan cooxih-xaylo kee malab le baaxo. Tonna-leemik rabak mano dooritaay, malik siinik iyyam oobbeya. Ciskiyyaahu, ‹YALLI nee catele› siinik iyyaamah numma makkalina.
Aki-baaxooxah-yallitte isi baaxo Assuuriyah-malikih-gabak maay cattee?
Camat kee Arfad suge marih yallitte ankel tan? Safarwayim kee Heenaq kee Qiwwal suge marih yallitte ankel tan? Samaariyah yalli keenih xiqem maay le?
Ta mari luk yen yallitte anu a mara ibbixe saaku keenih xiqtem mali. Hay tonnal, YALLI Yarusalaam catelem mannal siinit celtaa?» keenik iyye.
Usuk yaabak gaba kale waqdi, Yuudâ-mari tu maxaccooy tibba iyye. Woh keenik aba intem, Malik-Ciskiyyaahuk ten.
Sarrak Elaakim kee Sebna kee Yowac aben rookah sara isinnik qanxiseenih Assuuriyah-qaskar-abbah-yan-num keenik iyyem malikih warsen.

Malik-Ciskiyyaahu a yab akah yoobbe innaak, sara isik qanxiseeh sartanah *qabuddat gacca 'yeh YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari gexe.
Malik-qarih-abbah yan Elaakim kee, malik-qarih kutbe-abeenah yan Sebna kee, seekah abbobtih yan mara ken lih hayya heeh, Amox-baxa-nabi-Yasaqya fan farmoh ken ruube. Oson kaadu sartanah *qabuudut gaceenih gexen.
Malik keenil ruube farmo kaah warseeniih iyyeenimii, «Malik ku fanah farmo nel ruubeeh, nek iyyemii, Nabi Yasaqyak, ‹A saaki nek biyak ayrooy digaala net tekkeh tan. Addat akak nanim, qaybih taniimi; lacawat tan barray xaltu taffarehiyya nekkeh nan.
Assuuriyah-malik waara Yalla xaafa'gidih, qaskarak abbah-yan-num ruube. YALLAY ku Dagelta kinnihiyya a xaafu yoobbem takkeeh; tohuh ken digaalele. Tonna'mmay ni marak raaqe marah dooqa ab» 'yaanam farmoh kaah ruube.
Nabi-Yasaqya Ciskiyyaahu ruube farmo kaa gufte waqdi,
woo yaabal gacsemii, «Sin amoytak intaanamaa, ‹YALLI, Assuuriyah-malik ruube urri-xayli yoo xaafak siinih baahe farmok mameysitina, 'yaanam kok iyyah yan› inxica.
Toh lih kaadu kok iyyaamah, ‹Assuuriyah-malikil roocaaniyya ruubeyyo. Too waqdi asmat sinni xaagu aabbeleeh, isi baaxo fanah aduurele. Tokkel seefit kaa qidsiiseyyo› kok iyyah yan, kaak inxica› 'yaanam farmo baahe maral ruube.
Tohuk lakal taaxige qaskar-abbay Assuuriyah-malikih farmo baahehiyya, Assuuriyah-malik Laakis-magaalak gexeeh, wokkel xayi Libna-deqsitta-magaalal qeebit yan 'yaanamih xaagu yoobbe waqdi, wokke fanah gexe.
Assuuriyah malikik migaq Sanceeribik ten. Ta malik, «Masri-malikiy Tirhaaka deqsitaah Kuusuh yaabukehiyya foocat-akak-yan-qaskar, kay qaskarat qeebi abta'gidih tamaate» 'yaanamih xaagi yemeete. Assuuriyah-malik tah yoobbe waqdi, Malik-Ciskiyyaahu fanah qagseh farmo ruube.
Warkatal kaak iyyeemihii, «Atu elle taamine yalli, Yarusalaam-magaala Assuuriyah-malikih-gabat maradda, kok iyyaamah numma makkalin.
Assuuriyah-malikwa mango doolatwal bahtem toobbe koo. Too-doolatwa inkitanuuk baysen. Kot kaadu toh akkelem maagamin.
Yi kaxxa abbobti duma yan daban, Goodan kee Caaran kee Resef migaq luk ten magaalooli qeebit xabba heenih bayseeni'mmay, woo mari elle aamanuk suge yallitte keenih xiqtem mali. Talassar deqsitta'kkel suge Qadan mara seleh immay, too marih yalli kaadu tu keenih maxiqinna.
A saaku Camat kee Arfad kee Safarwayim kee, tonnah kaadu, Heenaq kee Qiwwa malikwa ankel tanim kot celta? Ta saaku ta amoytittek num mayan» 'yaanam warkatal yuktubeh, farmoh kaah ruube.
Ciskiyyaahu ta warkat kaa maadde waqdi, yubleeh, addal tanim yikriyeh. Sarrak too warkat gabat hayya heeh, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari gexe. Tokkel too warkat YALLIH foocal hayya heeh,
YALLA kallace. Dooqah iyyemii, «YALLAW, Israayil doore Dageltaw, ku dardaarinnih korsi galwa leemik daga raqta. Addunya xiinissam, kooy; kook sah Yalli mayan. Qaran kee baaxo gintem koo.
YALLAW, ayti yoh ucuyaay yaaba yab yok oobbey. YALLAW, net takkem ubul. Sanceerib kooy waara Yalla kinnihiyyak xaafuh inxicca iyyem oobbey.
YALLAW, Assuuriyah-amoytitte nummah mango doolatwa bayisseeh; ken baaxooxa abur abeenih caben.
Too mari Yallih aftoh luk suge duyye keenik carriseenih foyya abeenim numma. Takkay immay woh sahdayti isi gabak xeet kee cooxuk bicse duyye ikkal, Yalla hinna.
Tonna'mmay ta saaku, YALLAW, ni Dageltaw, ta numih gabat rade nee kal. Ta numih gabak nee teyyeeqek, YALLAW, kok sa Yalli ane waam, baadal tan doolatwa inkih aaxigele» 'yaanam dooqah iyye.
Tohuk lakal Amóx-Yasaqya, Malik-Ciskiyyaahuh farmo ruubeeh, kaak iyyemii, «YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya kok iyyamaa: ‹Sanceerib giddinaamak abte dooqa kok raabiteeh,
tonna-leemiik kaat takku waytam koh warisu waa› kok iyya. YALLI Sanceeribik iyyam ah teeti:
«Siyon-qaley taahirik yani koo buruteleeh kol anqaasele;
Yarusalaam-magaala atu kudda way burah af kol raqeeqisele.
Atu xaafteeh qayto edde abtem iyya takkalee?
Kaxxiinah amo qaraanal haak tanim iyyaay?
Ceele wayta umaane akak intem iyyaay?
A ceele-waytam akak axcuk sugtem,
Israayil doore Dageltay saytuniih, *kudduusuk yanihiyya kinnim mataaxiga'nnaa?
Farmo elle rubte maral Yallih qayto ruubak sugte.
‹Faras gaariirat gacca inneh
yoo kee yi qaskar Lubnaan-qaleelay fayya le awaquk sugne.
Lubnaan-qaleelak kaxxa fayya le qaleela awaquk sugne› yaanam inte.
‹Teetil yen kaxxa coox irgiqeh.
Qax muquk ten sariida ragidik irgiqe.
Kaxxam xer ikkel tan kaxxa garbo fanah gufeh en.
Marin baaxol qelwa dage.
Too qelwah leek ooqobe.
Masri-baaxol yan weeqaytut abe itqak gexxaamah kaffa 'te›
'yaanam inteeh tohul tirtirissah.
«Anu aham dumaak takku waytaamal malseh sugem maabbito'nnaa?
Away woh absissem yoo.
Woo gasoosa maroh edde tan magaalooli
riira edde abte qande koh teceem yoo.
Wokkel dabaaqah suge mari cayla luk masuginnon.
Tohuk gexxaamah woo mari wariggiteeh gahangahiteh.
Gubbil tooboke qaysoy kaftehiyya yekken.
Qari-amol tooboke qaysoy laqaymumtehiyya yekken.
Takkay immay anu atu abba haytaamih iggima mayyu.
Elle tan ikke kok aaxigeh.
Gexxa ikke kee akak tamaate ikke kok aaxigeh.
Yoh abta bagcarra kee afqadot kok tan kaxxiinah xaagu kok liyoh.
Tohuk gexxaamah sanat santiita kok hayyaay
afat cakkam kok hayya heeh
akak temeete gitat koo gacseyyo,
'yaanam Assuuriyah malikik iyyah yan» iyye.
Qagisak Amóx-Yasaqya Ciskiyyaahuk iyye: «Toh elle taaxagu waytamaa: a sanat abqure wayten daro akmetton. Ciggiila sanat kaadu woo daroh aracal isih tooboke daro akmetton. Takkay immay sidochaytô-sanatal isinnih tubquren buqreh daro akmetton. Qinab coox aysubukettoonuuh xaylo akak akmetton.
Yuudâ-rasul baatik saaboh raaqe mari, xaylo xaltaah buxux baaxot akak nagay daabime caxay wir intahiyya akkelon.
Macaay intek, Siyon-qale kee Yarusalaam-magaalah addak baatik saaboh raaqe mari anele. Taham YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya keenih le kaxxa kacanuk gexxaamah abele» iyye.
Tonna leemiik YALLI, Assuuriyah-malikit takku-waytam koh warsaah iyyamaa, «Usuk a magaala macula. Gaysê-baxa elle maqalaamisa. Gob luk a magaalal maxayyoowa. Tet adda cula'gidih xeet tittin bagul mahaa.
Edde amma 'ye gitat aduurele'kkal tet macula. Ahamat yabtam yoo YALLA.
A magaala, anu inni nabnah sabbatah, umaanek raaqiseyyo. Toh akah abu waam, inni naqasu Dawuduh cule qahdih sabbata› 'yaanam iyyah yan» kaak iyye.
Too bar YALLIH malaykatti Assuuriyah-mari elle yan ikke amma 'yeh bool kee bacra-taban kee koona alfih num yiggifeh maacise. Saaku sinam xiinik ugutte waqdi, too gide yakke marih ginaada yublen.
Assuuriyah malik tah yuble waqdi, isi qaskar luk wokke cabeh, wadir Nanawê magaala fan yuduure.
Ayrok teena yalla iyyeh yaqbude duyyey Nisrok deqsittahiyya, wohuh bicsen qarih addal aqbuduk suge waqdi, kay xayloh nammayay migaaqah Adrammelek kee Sarxer deqsitta amma 'teh seefit kaa qiden. Sarrak Araarat deqsita rasu fan yoowwen. Kay aracal Isar-Caddon deqsita kay baxi malik yekke.

Toh edde tekke uddurut, Malik Ciskiyyaahu kaxxa biyaakah biyaakite. Rabi kaat xayyooweh suge. Amox-baxi-nabi-Yasaqya kaal yemeeteeh kaak iyyemii, «YALLI, ‹Ahaysa rabi kot xayiih; ama lakimak murta'mmay, buxâ-mara farriimitay cab› kok iyyah yan» 'yaanam kaak iyye.
Toh yoobbe waqdi, Ciskiyyaahu foocah gidaarat ufkunna 'yeh dooqa abe.
Dooqah iyyemii, «YALLAW, inni bagu kee afqadook ku qibaada kee ku taamat sugem atu yok taaxigeh. Ku garil meqem abittoh yok orobtaamat asak suge» 'yaanam dooqah inxicca 'yeeh, namma intik kaxxa ximo kaak akah caxitte weeqah weeqe.
Nabi Yasaqya kaak gexeh, Malik-Ciskiyyaahuh-buxah gasoh-afa gufe'kal yan waqdi, YALLIH qangara kaal obteeh,
«Malik Ciskiyyaahuy yi-ummattah amoytah yani fan uduuray kaak intaamah, ‹Yoo YALLAY ku kaxxa abbah yan Dawuduk Dagelta kinnihiyya atu abte dooqa kok oobbeeh, namma intik caxxe ximo kok uble. Koo uruseyyooh, sidiica ayroh addat woo yoo elle yaqbuden qari fan gexetto.
Taban kee koona sanat qumrik koh osisah an. Ahak sarra taban kee koona sanat sugetto. Carbik koo cateyyo. Ama magaala kaadu Assuuriyah malikih gabat radi mahaa. A magaala inni taaga kee inni naqasu Dawuduh cule qahdih sabbatah dacriseyyo kok iyyah yan› inxic» kaak iyye.
Yasaqya toh kaah warsek lakal, Malik Ciskiyyaahut dacayrih yan marak iyyemii, «Ama duddubay lehiyya kaak qaffoota'gidih, sublâ-xaylo utukka haay aruqta waqdi edde duuga; tonnal qaffootelek» iyye.
Sarrak Malik-Ciskiyyaahu nabi-Yasaqyak iyyemii, «YALLI sidiica ayrok lakal yoo urusem elle aaxagu waah, sidooca ayrok lakal kaadu YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari gexu duudeyyom innik elle aaxagu waam mannaay? Aham elle aaxige astah maca tan?» kaak iyye.
Yasaqya kaal gacsemii, «YALLI isih iyyem duuduselem elle taaxigu wayta asta koh aceelek; atu iraawo tabna maaqatta foocah gexxam kee tabna maaqatta wadir gexxaamak maca koh tayse?» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Ciskiyyaahu, «Iraawo tabna maaqatta foocah gexxam sahalih taniimikih, tabna maaqatta wadir gacis» iyye.
Too waqdi Yasaqya YALLA kallaceeh; YALLI, Malik-Acad bicse mawqeenal radda iraawo tabna-maaqatta wadirih akah taduure innah abe.
Too dabaanal Baabelon-malikiy migaaqah Maroodak-Baldan deqsitahiyya Malik-Ciskiyyaahu lakmisam yoobbeeh; too waqdi yuktube warkat kee mattaco kaah ruube.
Ciskiyyaahu farmo elle ruuben mara arcibiseeh; sarrak duyye edde daanah haan makdanwa ken yuybulle. Too makdanwah addal lakqooy dahabaay caxâ-sifa kee qatrik suggu 'tem inkih ken yuybulle. Kalah kaadu, qaskar silaacih agantah tu cabe'kal ken yuybulle. Ciskiyyaahu isi qarih adda kee isi xintoh gubat taniimik ken aybulle wayya heem mali.
Sarrak nabi-Yasaqya Malik-Ciskiyyaahu fan yemeeteeh kaak iyyemii, «Too mari akak yemeetem ankeey? Kok iyyeenim macaay?» kaak iyye.
Ciskiyyaahu kaak iyyemii, «Akak yemeeteenim, xer baaxoy Baabelon deqsittahiyya» iyye.
Nabi Yasaqya, «Hay, ku qarih addal abaluk sugeenim macaa?» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Ciskiyyaahu, «Yi qarih addal tanim inkih yubleeniih; duyye edde daanah haan kadnoonih addal taniimik ken aybulle wayya heem mayyu» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal Yasaqya kaak iyyemii, «Hay tonnal, YALLI kok iyyam koh warisu waa.
‹Ku qarit duyyek enna 'tam kee, ku kaxxa abbobti a saaku fan gaabosse duyye inkih, Baabelon fan edde weeroonu waan wakti xayyooweeh; caboonu waanam malon.
Ku abuusay kok radu waahiyya seewah beeloonuuh; ken seelabba heenih Baabelon-malikih gasoh addal ken tamsiiselon.› Taham intam YALLA» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Ciskiyyaahu iyyemii, «Ta way atu edde yabta YALLIH yab meqe yaaba» 'yaanam iyye. Toh akah iyyem, «Anu innih anim fanah baaxo amaan akkele» 'yaanam niyal hayya heeh iyye.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Ciskiyyaahu abba heehiyyaay kay agiirinnaay, lee raaqisa dora elle bicisseh, magaalah addal lee culsa'gidih lee edde obta gita boolô-bagul elle dage inna, Yuudâ-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Ciskiyyaahu rabeeh kay aracal kay baxi malik yekke. Kay baxi migaaqah Manasse deqsitak yen.

Manasse malik yekke saaku qumrik taban kee namma karmat yen. Sarrak Yarusalaam magaalal kontom kee koona sanatah malikih suge. Kay ina migaaqah Cifxiba deqsitak ten.
Manasse, Israayil-mari yamaateenik naharal woo baaxol suge maray YALLI yeyyeeqehiyya edde asak sugen umâ-yabulih-tan-taama kataateeh, YALLAL dambi lem baahe.
Kay abba Ciskiyyaahu bayseh suge aroocay diini-maleela qibaadah luk sugtehiyya wadir nammeyhaak xise. Baqal elle yaqbudeeni'gidih, sadgat elle aban arooca bicse. Kaak dumal Israayil-malikih yen Acab akah abe innah, migaaqah Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurmudda soolise. Manasse cutuuka kaadu edde aqbuduk yen.
YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal, diini-maleela taqbude sadgat elle aban arooca bicse. Woo sadgat arooca elle bicsem, YALLI duma «Yarusalaamal yi qibaada elle takke'gidih doore» akak iyye aracak ten.
Qibaadâ-Qarih-gasok adda le kabuk namma daaratal inkih, cutuuka elle yaqbuden arac bicse.
Girat isi baxa sadgatah qide. Ramli-qidiyya kee sicri taamah haysiteeh; ginnili kee kalluwallel takku-waytam essere. YALLAL kaxxa dambi lem baaheeh; YALLIH naqbi kay sabbatah lafitak lafte.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal woo migaaqah Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heeh suge gurmudda hee. Woo ceelo elle heem, YALLI Malik Dawud kee Suleemanak, «Yi qibaada kulli way elle takke'gidih, Israayil taban kee namma kedo elle tan rasuk inkih Yarusalaam addal doore araca» akak iyye aracak ten.
YALLI Dawud kee Suleemanak iyyemii, «Israayil mari inkih Muusay yi naqasuh yanih gabat keenih ruube amri oggoleenih too xinto intam abeenik, ken kaxxa abbobtih ecee baaxok ken mayyaaqa» 'yaanam iyye.
Takkay immay Manasse, Yuudâ-mara, duma woo baaxol suge maray YALLI ken taagah woo baaxok yeyyeeqehiyya abak suge dambik lafita dambit ken asise.
YALLI, nabuwway kay taamat tanih kabuuk keenik iyyemii,
«Yuudâ-malikih yan Manasse gacca 'ta taamay Kanqaan mari abeemik kaxxam lafittahiyya abeeh; Yallih-aftok yaqbude duyyet, Yuudâ-mara kaadu Yalla-maleela edde gexxa gitat bee.
Tonna-leemiik yoo YALLAY Israayil doore Dageltah yani, siinik axceemih, Yarusalaam kee Yuudâ-maral, yaabbu waa mari akak wariggitta iyyu waa bala ruubeyyo.
Samaariya kee Israayil-malikih yen Acab kee kay buxah mara akah digaale innah, anu sin kaadu digaaleyyo. Yarusalaam-magaala, teetil suge marak foyyah tet cabba heeyyo. Bagul sugtem akak duugeeniih deeriik afah korsen sacnih innah, foyyah tet cabba heeyyo.
Tahak raaqu waa marat darre cabeyyo; naqboytit gabal ken heeyyo. Woo mariiy qeebil keenik ayseleeh; yeddereenim keenik buubelon.
Anu inni marak toh abeyyooh; toh keenik akah abu waam, ken kaxxa abbobti Masrik tewqem kee akkeh fanah yol dambi lem baaheeniih; ken sabbatah yi bagcarra lafitak lafitte» keenik iyye.
Manasse, Yuudah-ummatta Yallih-gita cabba hayteh YALLAL dambi lem baahaanamat asise. Too dambik kalah kaadu ossotinah, Yarusalaam-gitittel qabal weeqi innah caxitam fan mango masaakiinay tu baahe wayte qide.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Manasse abba heehiyyak dambiy edde asehiyyah agantah, Yuudâ-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Manasse rabeeh; malik qarik bustaan aracay Quddâ-bustaan deqsitahiyyal kaa yoogoqen. Kay baxi kay aracal malik yekke. Kay migaq Amonuk ten.
Amon Yuudâ-malik yekke saaku labaatanna kee namma karmat yen. Yarusalaam magaalah addal namma sanatah malikih suge. Kay ina Masullemat deqsitta barrak ten. Teetik abba migaaqah Carus deqsitak yen. Elle yookokem, Yotba deqsitta magaalak ten.
Amon isi abbah raatat gexak, YALLAL dambi lem baahe.
Abba abak sugem abeeh; kay abba aqbuduk suge xeet kee cooxuy gabak orra heenih bicseenihiyya kaak kaxxih yuqbude.
YALLAY usuk akak rade kay kaxxa abbobti doorehiyya cinna heeh usuk aba iyyam abam cineh.
Amon gubal saqoltih yen mari kaa qidaamal malse. Too mari ayrok teena, malik isi buxal yan waqdi, amma 'yeenih kaa qiden.
Yuudâ-mari kaa qide mara qideeniih; kay-baxa-Yoosiyaahu kay lakal malikih heen.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Amon abehiyya Yuudâ-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Amon rabe saaku, Quddâ-bustaanih addal yen kay kabrit kaa yoogoqen. Kay baxi Yoosiyaahu kay lakal malik yekke.

Yoosiyaahu naharak malik yekke saaku bacra karmat yen. Soddom kee inki sanat Yarusalaamal malikih suge. Kay ina migaaqah Yadiida deqsitak ten. Teetik abba Boxkat deqsitta magaalal yoobokeeh; migaaqah Qadaaya deqsitak yen.
Yoosiyaahu YALLI kicna taama abak yen. Isi kaxxa abba Dawuduk kaxxih, Yallih gita kataatak yeneeh, agaagul sinnim Yallih xinto intam abak yen.
Yoosiyaahu malik edde yekke taban kee bacarhaytô sanatat, malik-buxal kutbe-abeenah suge Safan deqsita num, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari fan farmoh ruube. Safan, Axalyaahu deqsita numuk baxak teneeh, Masullam deqsita numuk baxi baxak ten.
Farmoh kaah ruubeemih, «Kaxxa seekih yan Cilkiyya fan gexay, intaamah, ‹YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari akak culan culmal tan seeka, ummatak lakqok gaabossem kinnih gide esserra ken haay;
too lakqo YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarik tiddigille arooca bicsa mara tamsiisa maral ucuya› keenik inxic. Too marak kaadu, ‹Ta lakqo qarit haan coox maraay, qari xisa mara kee, xeetik qarwa xiso yaaxige marih-cawalah ucuya. Tonnah kaadu ta lakqot, woo qarih bicsah faxxiima coox kee, oren xeet edde xaama› keenik inxic.
‹Qari xisne absiisa mari yaaminen mara kinnuk, ken gabat tan lakqok loowoh faxxintam mali› Cilkiyyak inxic» 'yaanam farmoh kaal ruube.
Safan, malik kaal ruube farmo Cilkiyyah warseh. Too waqdi Cilkiyya, farmo-baahe-Safanak iyyeemih, «Yallih-xinto elle tan kitab, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal geeh; taway too kitab koo ayballayu waa» kaak iyye. Sarrak too kitab baaheh kaa yuybulleeh; Safan too kitab yikriyeh.
Tohuk lakal Safan malik fan yuduure. Too waqdi malikik iyyeemih, «Ku gubal yan mari, Qibaadâ Qaril sugte lakqo beenih, taama aba marih amo wagta maral yeceenih.
Tonna'mmay Cilkiyya yol yecee kitab gabat baaheeh, away gabat abbixe» kaak iyye. Sarrak kitaabal tanim fayya haak malikih yikriye.
Malik, Yallih-xinto elle tan kitab iyyam yoobbe waqdi, hagga 'yeh wariggah saro isik qanxise.
Sarrak Cilkiyya deqsita numuy seekih yeneey, Safan baxa Acikamaay, Miikayhu baxa Qakboruuy, malik buxal kutbe-abeh suge Safan kee, malik buxal malik faxaamih taamat yen Qasaaya deqsita numul amri oobise.
Keenik iyyeemih, «Gexay yoo kee inkih tan Yuudah ummatta tanim naaxige'gidih, YALLAL fayu yoh essera. A kitaabal taniimih maqna nagay ismitay ama. Ni kaxxa abbobti YALLI iyyeemiy a kitaabal tanihiyya abe weenimih sabbatah, YALLAK naqbi nee geeh yan» iyye.
Cilkiyya kee Acikam kee Qakboruuy, Safan kee Qasaaya tikka 'yeenih, Culda deqsitta barray nabih tenehiyyay, Yarusalaam magaalak qusbih xisen exxal buxa luk tenehiyya fan gexeeniih, fayu esseren. Tet baqli Sallum deqsitak yeneeh; kay abbak migaaqah Tikwa axcuk yenen. Kay abbah abba Carcas deqsitak yen. Sallum Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril edde gacan sartanak amo wagitak yen. Too mari ta-nabih-tan-barra fan yemeeteeh; malik keenil ruube farmo teetih warsen.
Too waqdi is keenik inteemih, «Malik fanah uduuraay, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyak obtem kaah warisa.
‹Yarusalaam kee teetil yan mara digaaleyyo. Ama kitaabay koh yikriyeenihiyya elle iyya'nnal, bala oobiseyyo› iyyah yan» inte.
«Kalah kaak intaanamahaa, ‹Toh akah abu waam, oson yoo cineeniih xeet kee cooxuk isinni gabak bicsen duyye yaqbuden. Anu inqibba haam aban. Yi naqbi Yarusalaamal oobeh ikkal, ahaysa maxamaca› 'yaanam iyye kaak inxica» inte.
Qagitteh, «Malik tiyah tu gactek, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya kaak iyyaamah, ‹Atu a kitaabih yab oggolteeh,
toobitteeh, yoh isi nabsi rammisse. Yarusalaam kee Yarusalaam maral baahu waam toobbe waqdi, nadaamah sara isik qanxisseeh weqteh. Too waqdi abteh tan dooqa kok oggoleh. Yarusalaam tiyah tu gactek, Yarusalaam ableh-uma ceelot gacele. Sahda titta abaarta way, Yarusalaamat tekkem siinit takkay, akak inxicca 'ta umaane teetil baaheyyo.
Takkay immay, Yarusalaam magaalat abu waah an digaala, atu addunyal tanim fanah, maaba. Atu tanim fanah ku baaxo amaanah xiineleeh; amaanah koo xiiniseyyo› 'yaanam YALLI kaak iyyem kaah warisa» 'yaanam farmoh keenil gacisse.
Too mari too farmo luk malik fan yuduure.

Sarra ta farmo yoobbe waqdi, Malik Yoosiyaahu, Yarusalaam kee Yuudâ rasuk abbobtih yan marah farmo ruube.
Too mari yemeete waqdi, gabat ken luk YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari fan gexen. Ken lih seeka kee nabuwwaay, raqqa 'te ummatak gaddaliiy baacoyta axce'kal yakkeenimiik inkih tokke gexen. Too ummat inkih elle gaabowte ikkel malikii, a kitaabay YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril geytimehiyyal yan yab keenih yikriye.
Sarrak malik elle soola qamiddih garil solla 'yeh, «YALLIH amri oggoluh, Yalla kee xagana culah an. Too kitaabal elle enna 'ta innal, YALLIH xinto kee amri inni afqado kee dudda haamal abeyyo» 'yaanam axcuk qahdi cule. Inkih tan ummatta kay lakal xagana culte.
Tohuk lakal malik kaxxa seekih yan Cilkiyya kee, kay gubal tan seeka kee, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih culmak afal dacayrih yen marak iyyeemih, «Gexay, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal tan duyyey Baqal kee Aseera akak iyyaanamay yallah loonuh qibaadah heenihiyya, wokkeh addak eyyeeqa. Cutuukah qibaadah heen duyye kaadu wokkek addak kala» iyye.
