Too duyye tokkek yeyyeeqen waqdi, beyya heenih, magaalak afal Kidroon deqsitta goloh addal gira edde ruuben. «Too girak raaqe gombod Beetal fan beya» iyye.
Qibaada elle aban aroocay fayyat raqtahiyyay Yuudâ-magaaloolih adda kee Yarusalaam garil geytimtahiyya elle suge maray, seekâ-gurral qerto ruubak sugehiyya, wokkek xiiriyeh. Kaak duma Yuudâ-malikwa, too mara, Baqal-akak-iyyan-duyyey yallah loonu kee, ayro kee alsa kee qaran-cutuukah seekâ-gurral qerto ruubaana'gidih, heenih sugen.
YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih-addak, Aseera akak iyyaanamay say-yallah luk sugeenihiyyah-ceelo wokkek kaleh, magaalak afal Kidroon-Golo deqsitta goloh addal gira edde ruube. Too girah gombod sahda elle yaaguqen aracal caxe.
YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril heen aroocay xiiqareh-xiinak-lab-mari elle sugehiyya wokkek kaleh. Agbi, Aseera akak iyyan say-yallah-qibaadah seeka edde gacta kameswa elle bicisak yenem, tokkek teneeh; too arac tokkek kaleh.
Yuudâ-magaaloolil sugga 'te seeka Yarusalaam fan baahe. Inkih tan Yuudah baaxol sugte mansafittey too seeka qerto elle ruubak sugtehiyya foyya keenik abe. Tonnah kaadu, magaalâ-xintoh abbah yen Yoosuwa xise culmak foocal hee qibaadah-aroocay magaala akak culan culmak gura le qaxak tenehiyya wokkek kaleh.
Too maray woo aroocal qerto ruubak sugehiyya, Yarusalaamal yen aracay YALLAH sadgat elle abaanahiyya aben taamat seeka lih angaluk manannoonu'mmay, kamiir-sinni-maaqo ken lih akamuk yenen.
Hinnom deqsitta goloh addal, yalla axcuk yaqbuden duyyeh qibaadah heen aracay Toofet deqsita foyya keenik abe. Toh keenik akah abem, too aracal duma Molok deqsitaamih sadgatah isinni xaylo girat qidak sugen. Toh elle abe waana'gidih, too arac foyya keenik abe.
Tonnah kaadu, Yuudâ-malikwa ayrô-qibaadah hayteh sugte faroosa, elle sugte aracak kaleh. Gaariiray kaadu Yuudâ-malikwa ayrô-qibaadah heenih sugeenit gira ruube. A faaris kee gaariira elle sugtem, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih-daaratah akak culan afak ten. Tohum, Naatan-Melek deqsita numuy abbootan lehiyya qarik xayi aracak ten.
Yuudâ-malikwa, Malik-Acad buxah amol hayteh sugte mansafittey xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh qibaada elle abak sugeenihiyya kaleh. Tonnah kaadu, Malik-Manasse qibaadah hee suge mansafittey YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih namma daaratal sugtehiyya kaleh. Too mansafitte bututtukka heeh, riira keenik Kidroon deqsitta goloh addal qide.
Tonnah kaadu, Malik-Suleeman duma Yarusalaam magaalak ayrô-mawqal, Umaane-le-qale deqsitta qalek gabbi-qaxat raqta'kkel, ableh-uma duyyeeyah-qibaadah, axcihiiy, Sayda-marak-say-yallay Qastarot deqsitta kee, Mooyab-marih-yallay Kamos deqsita kee, Qammon-marih-yallay Milkom akak iyyaanah qibaadah heeh suge mansafitte foyya abe.
Yoosiyaahu taahirik tan qamidwa akak iyyan qamidway xeetik bicseenihiyya yiggiggileh. Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurumuuda yiggileh. Too duyyeeya elle sugte arac sahdayti lafoofit buule.
Yoosiyaahu, Nabát-Yarobqamay Israayil mara dambit asisehiyya, Beetal deqsita aracal, gabak bicsen duyyeh-ceelo elle yaqbudoonuh heeh suge arac kee sadgat elle aben mansaf yiggileh. Too duyyeh qibaadah aracay tokkel hee sugehiyya butukku heeh, xeet akak iggiggilla heeh, gomboduh gacissa hee. Aseera akak iyyan duyyey say-yallah luk sugeenihiyyah soolisen gurmuddat gira ruube.
Sarra wonna wagga hee waqdi, koomah amol kabaara yuble. Woo kabaarak lafoofi yeyyeeqeh tokkel suge mansafay sadgat elle abeenihiyyak amol cararise. Tonnah abak mansaf foyya keenik abe. Toh akkelem duma Yarobqam, too mansafal sadgat aba'gidih soolak suge waqdi, YALLI nabih afak kaak iyyeh suge. Sarrak Yoosiyaahu kaadu wonnah wagga hee waqdi, aham akkeleemit dumî dabaanal yaabe suge nabih kabri yuble.
Too waqdi, «Ah iyyin kabriiy?» iyye.
Too waqdi kaa lih suge mari, «Amah, duma Yuudâ-rasuk yemeete nabiy a mansaf baysettoomut dumal elle yaabeh sugehiyyah kabri. Usuk ta saaku ta mansaf, elle bayissa hayte innal, baysettom, dumal elle warseh suge» iyyen.
Too waqdi malik, «Kay lafa num xage waay, kay kabri yanay 'xica» iyye.
Usuk toh iyyek sa, kaa kee kaak kalah yan nabiy dabqih Samaariyal suggu 'yeeh kay garil yoogoqeenihiyyah kabri maxaginnoonuy yanay, iyyen.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, Yoosiyaahu, Israayil-malikwa Samaariyah rasuk magaaloolih addal, gabak bicsen duyye elle yaqbudoonuh bicsen arooca bayse. YALLIH naqbi too aroocat aban qibaadah sabbatah keenil oobak suge.
Woo aroocal sugte mansafittel, seekâ-gurrah sadgatah baahan duyye gabal akak acayuk sugen mara inkih yusguudeeh, woo mansafittel sahda lafa cararise. Tohuk gaba kale waqdi, Yarusalaam fanah yuduure.
Malik-Yoosiyaahu, ummattak inkih, «YALLIH Qahdih-kitab elle inta innal, Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiid YALLAY sin Dageltah yani edde kassitak aba» 'yaanam iyye.
Too saaku aben Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiidih bis le qiid, Israayil kee Yuudâ rasu makaabon xiinisak ten saakuk wadir makkinna. Israayil-malikwa kee Yuudâ-malikwa edde reedisak yen wakti, too bis le qiidit maasinnon.
Too qiid YALLIH massakaxxah abeenim, Yoosiyaahu malik edde yekke taban kee bacarhaytô karmak sugte.
Kaxxa seekih yen Cilkiyya YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril gee kitaabal yan yab abinal akah asa'nnah, Yoosiyaahu Yuudâ-baaxo kee Yarusalaam addal sugga 'te ginnilitteey kalluwalleey faal-abeenit kee, buxah addat aqbuduk sugen duyye kee, wohuk kalah tan duyyey yaqbudeenihiyya kee, umâ-yabuli enni intaamak tu macabinnay inkih kale.
Kaak duma kay inna le malikiy Yalli-Muusal-oobise-kitab inxicca 'yam inkih abahiyya masuginnaay; usuk dudda haam kee niyak elli haamak isi Dagelta yuqbude. Kay lakal kaadu kay inna le malik magacinna.
Takkay immay kaak dumal suge Manasse abeh suge dambik gexxaamah, YALLIH naqbi Yuudâ-maral oobeh sugeeh, maxabbacoowinna.
Tohuk gexxaamah YALLI iyyeemih, «Duma Israayil-marak abba heem Yuudâ-marak abeyyo. Yuudâ-mara inni foocak kaleyyo. Yarusalaam-magaalay inni magaala akak exceh suge kee, Qibaadâ-Qariy yoo elle yaqbudoonuh doore excehiyya yim hinna» 'yaanam iyye.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Yoosiyaahu abba heehiyya Yuudâ-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Ayrok teena Masri malikiy migaaqah Nako deqsitak yenehiyya, Assuuriyah-malikih catoh, qaskar Fuurat-weeqaytu fanah ruube. Yoosiyaahu toh yuble waqdi, Magiddo deqsita aracal ken yayseede'gidih, keenih matre. Sarrak too qeebit edde rabe.
Kay gubal yen mari kay ginaada faras-gaarit hayya heenih Yarusalaam fan been. Tokkel malik kee malik buxah mara edde yoogoqen *kabrit kaa yoogoqen.
Yuudâ-mari kay baxa Yowaacad dooreeniih; Yarusalaamal malik yakke'gidih kaa yuskuten.
Yowaacad Yuudâ-malik yekke saaku, labaatanna kee sidooca sanatat yen. Yarusalaam magaalal sidiica alsa malikih suge. Kaak ina Camutal deqsitta barrak ten. Teetik abba Libna deqsitta magaalal yooboke Ermiyaas deqsita numuk ten.
Kay kaxxa abbobtik kaxxih, Yowaacad kaadu YALLAL dambi lem baahe.
Nako deqsita Masri-malik xabba kaa heeh seewah kaa bee saaku, kay reeda gaba kalte. Malik-Nako Ribla deqsitta magaalay Camat-rasul geytintahiyyal casbit kaa hee. Nako Yuudâ-marak sidiica alfi kee affara boolih kiilo qado lakqok beeh, soddom kee affara kiilo dahabak gabbarah ken mekelsiise.
Sarrak Malik-Nako, Yoosiyaahu-baxa-Elaakim kay abbah aracal malik abe. Migaq kaak korseeh Yahoyaakim kaak iyye. Yowaacad Masri fan beeh, sarrak tokkel rabe.
Sarrak Yahoyaakim Masri malik keenik igdiya iyye gabbarah kulli numuk leh gidel lakqo gaaboysek lakal, too gabbara Masri-malikih yecee.
Yahoyaakim malik yekke saaku qumrik labaatanna kee koona karmat yen. Sarrak Yarusalaamal taban kee inki sanat malikih suge. Kay ina Dabudda deqsitak ten. Teetik abba Ruuma deqsitta magaalal yooboke Fadaaya deqsita numuk ten.
Yahoyaakim isi kaxxa abbobtik kaxxih, YALLAL dambi lem baahak suge.

Yahoyaakim malikih suge saaku, Baabelon-malikih suge Nabkadnessar Yuudâ-rasu warare. Tohuk wadir Yahoyaakim Nabkadnessar-milkih gace. Sidooca sanatak lakal, kay milkih gacaanam cineh.
Too waqdi YALLI, isi nabuwwak dumaak akah iyyeh suge innah, Baabelon kee Suuriya kee Mooyab kee Qammon qaskar Yuudâ-rasu bayissa'gidih kaat ruube.
Tah YALLIH fayxih tekkeemiiy; YALLI, Manasse abe dambi kee, axcihiiy, tu baahe wee marat abe qidiyyak gexxaamah, YALLI Yuudâ-mara isi garik xiiriyeh. YALLI, Manasseh too dambi macabinna.
Tohuk kalah taniimiy Yahoyaakim abba heehiyya inkih Yuudâ-Malikwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Yahoyaakim rabeeh; kay baxi Yahoyaasin kay aracal malik yekke.
Baabelon-malik, kaak dumal Masri-milkih gubat ten baaxok, Fuurat-weeqaytuk xabba haanamaay Masri cuduudul yan daqaarih amma 'yaanam takke baaxo yibbixeeh; tohih sabbatah Masri malik kee kay qaskar Masrik gaaduh magexinnon.
Yahoyaasin Yuudâ-malik yekke saaku, sanatak taban kee bacaarat yen. Sarrak Yarusalaamal sidiica alsa malikih suge. Kay ina Nacusta deqsitta barrak ten. Teetik abba Yarusalaamal yooboke Elnaatan deqsita numuk ten.
Yahoyaasin isi abbah raatat gexak, YALLAL dambi lem baahe.
Usuk malikih yen dabaanal, Baabelon-qaskar Yarusalaam fan gaaduh gexxeeh magaalat maro hayte. Too gaadu absissem, Baabelon-malikik teneeh; gabat akak absiisem, kay qaskar abbobtih yen marak ten.
Qaskar magaala marot tabbixe saaku, Baabelon-malik isih wokke yemeete.
Too waqdi Malik-Yahoyaasin kee, kay inaay kay buxal taamita-maraay kay doolat-abbobti kee kay qaskar-abbobti Baabelon malikil gaba yeceen. Baabelon-malikiy Nabkadnessar deqsita edde dardaare bacarhaytô-sanatat, Yahoyaasin casbit hee.
YALLI dumaak akah iyyeh suge innah, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril sugga 'te duyye kee malik-qarih-addal sugga 'te duyyek tu macabinnay weerra heeh bee. Duma Malik-Suleeman YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih-addal heeh suge dahabak bicsen duyyek tu macabinnay iggillaay weerra heeh bee.
Yarusalaamal suggu 'ye marak abbobtih suge mara kee, qaskar-abbobti tittat seewah tabna alfih num bee. Gabâ-naggarinna luk yen mara kee, wohuk kalah tan gabâ-taamah ixxiga luk yen mara inkih seewah bee. Raqtem dibuk masaakiinah yan mara.
Yahoyaasin kee kay inaay kay agabuuy kay gubal doolat abbobtih yen mara kee Yuudal abbobtih yen marih agantah inkih seewah Yarusalaamak Baabelon fanah bee.
Tonnal, qaskarak malciina alfih num kee, taama nagay yaaxigeeh naggaarinna le marak alfi num Baabelon fan bee. Oson inkih masu le maray qaskariinot bicak ten.
Nabkadnessar, Yuudâ-malikih Yahoyaasinik-qammih-yan-numuy Mattanya deqsitahiyya hee. Migaq kaak korseeh Xidkiya kaak iyye.
Xidkiya malik yekke saaku, labaatanna kee koona karmat yen. Sarrak Yarusalaamal taban kee inki sanat malikih suge. Kay inak migaaqah Camutal axcuk yenen. Teetik abba Libna deqsitta magaalal yooboke Ermiyaas deqsita numuk ten.
Xidkiya Yahoyaakimik kaxxih, YALLAL dambi lem baahe.
YALLI, Israayil kee Yuudah ummat yinqibeeh, ellecabol isi garik ken xiiriyeh.
Xidkiya Baabelon malikiy Nabkadnessar deqsitahiyyah gubat xiinaanam cineh.

Toh yuble waqdi, Baabelon-malik qaskarak tu cabe'kal beyya heeh, Xidkiya malik edde yekke sagalhaytô-sanatak tabanhaytoh alsak tabanhaytoh ayrot, Yarusalaam wararen. Magaalak irol megdebih edde gacan arac haysitta heeniih, sarrak magaalal yan mari akah awqe waa innah, dariifat maro teetik xisen.
Xidkiya edde reede taban kee inikhaytô-sanat guffa haam fan marot tet sugsen.
Tohih sabbatah magaalal kaxxa qulul radeeh; ellecabol too sanatak fereyhaytoh alsak sagalhaytoh ayro ummatak maaqo tembexeeh, magaalal xagaanam waytinteh.
Too waqdi magaalat maroh yan gidaar boohayseenih. Baabelon-mari magaala marot abbaxuk yene'mmay, tohuh, Yuudâ-malik kee qaskar inkih barat edde kudde. Kuden waqdi gitah malik buxah bustaan elle yen aracak namma gidaarak fan-fan gacca 'yeenih Ordon weeqaytu fan gexen.
Takkay immay Baabelon-qaskar Malik-Xidkiyak lakal gexeeniih, Yerikô-magaalah garil tan booxak bagul kaa yibbixen. Kay qaskar inkih kaa cabteh isih kudde.
Kaa Malik Nabkadnessar fan beeniih; Nabkadnessar too waqdi Ribla deqsitta magaalal yen. Tokkel Malik Nabkadnessar digaala kaal hee.
Xaylo kaak foocal elle yusguudek lakal, «Kaak namma inti eyyeeqa» iyyeh; yeyyeeqeenih. Sarrak nacaasak bicsen silsilat kaal hayya heeh, Baabelon fan seewah kaa bee.
Malik Nabkadnessar Baabeloonul edde reede taban kee sagalhaytô-sanatak konoyhaytoh alsak malcinhaytoh ayrol, Nabudardan deqsitak yen numuy Nabkadnessarat dacayrih tan qaskarak abbah raaqahiyya Yarusalaam magaala yemeete.
Too waqdi YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari kee malik-qari kee kaxxa-marih-qarwat inkih gira ruube. Meqe xisne le aroocat inkih gira ruube.
Kay gubal tan qaskar, Yarusalaamat maroh ten gidaarwa inkih bututtukku heen.
Tohuk gaba kale waqdi, Nabudardanay qaskar abbah yenehiyya magaalah addal raaqeh suge mara kee, gabâ-naggarinna luk yen mara kee, qeebi yekke way Baabelon qaxat gaceh suge Yuudah-mara inkih, Baabelon fan seewah bee.
Takkay immay Yuudâ-rasul kaxxam masaakiinah yan mara qinab-cooxih-taama kee baqurê-taamah cabe.
Baabelon-mari YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril addal ten qamidway nacaasak bicseenihiyya kee, wokkel ten gaariiray nacaasak bicseeni bututtukku heen. Tonnah kaadu, nacaasak bicsen kaxxa tanakay Qibaadâ-Qaril yenehiyya yiggiggileenih. Too nacaas inkih Baabelon fan been.
Tonnah kaadu, nacaasak bicissa heen duyyey Qibaadâ-Qarih-taama edde abak sugeenihiyyak gombod elle caxan mingilwaay badiilaali kee faanuswa edde bargusan afti-xaylooy qaydarus elle qeerisan mingilwa kee, wohuk kalah tan duyyey nacaasak bicseenihiyya Yallih-Qibaadah-Qarih addak weerra heeh bee.
Wohuk kalah, qaskar abbah yen num, dahab kee lakqok bicissa heen duyyey sugga 'tek xikcin elle haan kabaabaay qunxa sacnitte kee disti agantah, tu macabinnaay inkih beeh.
Malik-Suleeman YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih bicseh suge duyyek namma qamiddu kee, gaariira kee, kaxxa tanakay kaxxa qilsa luk yenehiyya loowo sinni nacaasak bicsen.
Been namma qamiddi titta ceelak yen. Kulli tii fayyah taban kee bacra cusul akkuk yeneeh, amot akak heen namma mansaf sidiica cusul fayyah akkuk yen. Kulli qamidduk amot bilqah heenim, nacaasak bicsen tittat-yoxeen-silsilatih-taswiir kee rummaan-taswiir maroh heenih yenen.
Qaskar abbah yen Nabudardan wohuk kalah, Seraaya deqsita kaxxa sek kee, Seraayal kataata nammeyhaytoh-seekiy migaaqah Xafanya deqsitahiyya kee, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih afal dacayrih tan qaskarih sidoc seewah gabat luk gexe.
Magaalal raaqe marak, qaskar abbay qaskarak foocat yanihiyya kee, malikih fayu acayuk yen koona numuy saqoltih tenehiyya kee, tonnah kaadu, qaskar abbah cato abak yen numuy qaskar migaaqih kutbet yenehiyya kee, wohuk kalah yan marak lactam numuy muxxo lehiyya geeh,
Baabelon-malikiy Riblâ-magaalal yenehiyya fan bee.
Ribla Camat deqsita rasul tan magaalak ten. Tokke ken baahen waqdi, malik ken qidsiiseh.
Yuudâ mara seewah elle beenim tonnak ten.
Malik-Nabkadnessar, Acikám-Gedalya, Yuudâ-rasul xintoh-abba kaa abeeh, Yuudâ-rasul elle raaqe maray seewah bee weenihiyyak inkih abba kaa abe. Acikám-Gedalya, Safan deqsita numuk baxi-baxak ten.
Yuudâ-qaskarih-abbobti kee qaskar ta xaagu toobbe waqdi, Gedalya fan yemeeten. Gedalya too saaku dabaaqah Mixfa deqsitta magaalal suge. Too saaku Gedalya fan temeetem, Natanyá-Ismaaqil kee Kareyyác-Yohanan kee, Tancumét-Seraayay Natoofâ-magaalah yooboke kee, Yaadanya deqsita numuy Maqkâ-magaalal yoobokehiyyak ten.
Gedalya keenik iyyeemih, «Baabelon marak akah meysittaanam manton. Ta qangara yok eemena. Baaxol elle idiyaay, malik siinik aba iyyam aba. Tonnal tu siinil bahtam matan» keenik iyye.
Too sanatak malcinhaytoh alsat, Natanyá-Ismaaqiliy Yuudâ-malikik nasab luk yene, tabna num gabat hayya heeh Mixfa yemeeteeh, tokkel Gedalyat qeebi abeeh kaa qideh. Kaa'lih suge Yuuda kee Baabeloonuh yooboke mara edde qide. Natanyá-Ismaaqil, Alisamaq deqsita numuk baxi-baxak ten.
Toh yuble mari, qunxa num kee kaxxa numu axce'kal qaskar abbobtih agantah, Baabelon marih meysih Masri fan kuden.
Awil-Maroodak, Baabelon-malik edde yekke sanatat, Malik-Yahoyaasinih xuwaawak sugeeh, casbiy edde sugehiyyak kaa yeyyeeqe. Taham edde tekkem, seewah kaa edde been soddom kee malcinhaytô-sanatak taban kee nammeyhaytoh alsak labaatanna kee malcinhaytoh ayrok ten.
Tohuk lakal meqem kaah abakaay, Baabelon fan seewah been malikwak inkih, tayse kunnabna kaah abak suge.
Tonna leemiik, casbi-sartanay edde sugehiyyak katta 'yeh, meqe sarat gacak, rabba 'yam fanah malik adoobita maaqo kaa'lih adoobitaamih idni malikik geeh yen.
Tohuk kalah, faxxa haam edde xaamituh, kulli ayro lakqo kaah acayuk sugen. Rabba 'yam fan tonnal suge.

Adam Seet xaleeh; Seet Enos xaleeh; Enos Keenan xaleeh;
Keenan Mahalalel xaleeh; Mahalalel Yaared xaleeh;
Yaared Canok xaleeh; Canok Matuslac xaleeh; Matuslac Laamek xaleeh;
Laamek Nuuc xale. Nuuc xalem: Sem kee Caam kee Yaafeti.
Yaafet xaylok xalem: Goomaraay, Magooguuy, Madayaay, Yaawanaay, Tuubalaay, Mesek kee Tiiras deqsitta labhak ten.
Goomar xaylok xalem: Askanadaay Diifat kee Torgama deqsitak ten.
Yaawan xaylo Aliisaay, Tarsisiiy Kittim kee Rodaanim deqsitak ten.
Caam xaylo, Kuus kee Masriiy, Liibiya kee Kanqaan deqsitak ten.
Kuusuk rade mari, Sabaay Cawiilaay Sabtaay Raqma kee Sabtakak ten. Raqmâ-xaylo Seeba kee Dadan deqsitak ten.
Kuus Nimrud deqsita kaxxa numuy baaxô bagul qeebil mayso geytol naharsi numuh sugehiyya xale.
Masrik rade mari, Luudaay Qanamaay Lahabaay Naftucuuy
Fatrus kee Filistiin mari akak rade Kasluc kee Kaftor deqsitak yen.
Kanqaanak naharsi baxi Sayda deqsitak yeneeh; ciggiila baxi kaadu Ciit deqsitak yen.
Kalah kaadu Kanqaanak raddem, Yabuusa deqsita maraay, Amoora deqsita maraay, Girgaasa deqsita maraay,
Ciiwi deqsita maraay, Qarka deqsita mara kee Sina deqsita maraay,
Arwaada deqsita maraay, Xamaara kee Camata deqsita marak ten.
Sem xaylo, Qeelamaay Assuur kee Arfaksadaay, Lud kee Aramaay Quuxuuy, Cuuluuy Geter kee Mesek deqsitak ten.
Arfaksad Saalec xale. Saalec Qeebar xale.
Qeebar namma baxa xale. Baxak teeni kay saaku baaxô bagul tan maritteeta baxambaxsinteh teneemih sabbatah, migaaqah kaak Feelag iyyen. (Feelag iyyaanama baxsiyya iyyaanama.) Akittiiy Yoktaan deqsitak yen.
Yoktaan xaylo, Almodadaay Selef kee Caxarmaawit kee Yeracaay
Hadooram kee Udaal, Diklaay
Qeebalaay, Abimaayil kee Seebaay
Oofiriiy Cawiila kee Yobaaba. Ta mari inkih akak radem Yoktaan deqsita numu.
Sem Arfaksad xale. Arfaksad Saalec xale.
Saalec Qeebar xale. Qeebar Feelag xale. Feelag Raaqu xale.
Raaqu Sarug xale. Sarug Nacor xale. Nacor Terac xale.
Terac Abram xale. Sarra Abram migaaqah Abraahim deqsite.
Abraahim lab-xaylo, Iscaak kee Ismaaqili.
Ismaaqil xale lab-xaylo ah keeniiy: Nebaayotuy Ismaaqilik naharsi-baxah yene kee, Keedaraay Adbeeliiy Mibsamaay
Mismaqaay Duumaay Massaay Hadadaay Teemaay
Yatuuruuy Nafis kee Kedma.
Abraahim caggô-gubih caggoh nikaacat abbaxuk yen barray Katuura deqsitak ten. Is Dimraanaay, Yoksaanaay, Medaanaay Miidiyanaay Yisbak kee Suwac kaah xalte. Yoksan, Seeba kee Dadan xale.
Miidiyan xaylo, Qeefaay Qeeferiiy Canokuuy Abiidaq kee Aldaqa. Taham inkih Katuurak rade mara.
Abraahim Iscaak xale. Iscaak lab-xaylo, Qiiso kee Israayili.
Qiisok lab-xaylo, Elifadaay Reqweliiy Yaqusuuy Yaqlam kee Koraca.
Elifad lab-xaylo migaaqah Teman kee Omar kee Xafi kee Gaqtam kee Kanad kee Timnaq kee Qamaalek deqsitak yenen.
Reqwel lab-xaylo, Nacat kee Dara kee Samma kee Midda deqsitak yenen.
Seeqir lab-xaylo ah keeni: Lootan kee Sobalaay, Xibqon kee Qanaay Dison kee Qader kee Disan. Lootan lab-xaylo, Coori kee Hoomam deqsitak yenen. Lootan kaadu Timnaq deqsitta maqanxá luk yen. Sobal lab-xaylo, Qalyan kee Manacataay Qeebal kee Safi kee Onam deqsitak yenen. Xibqon lab-xaylo, Ayya kee Qana deqsitak ten. Qanâ-baxi Dison deqsitak yen. Dison lab-xaylo, Cemran kee Esban kee Itran kee Keran deqsitak ten. Qader lab-xaylo, Bilhan kee Daqwan kee Yaqkan deqsitak ten. Disan lab-xaylo, Quux kee Araan deqsitak ten.
Israayil baaxol malik reedaamak dumal, Edom baaxol dardarte abbobti ah keeni. Baqór-Belaq deqsita num elle dardaare magaala Dinhaba deqsitak ten.
Belaq rabe saaku, Bosra deqsitta magaalal yooboke Derac deqsita numih baxay migaaqah Yobab deqsitahiyya kay lakal dardaare.
Yobab rabe saaku, Teman deqsitta kedoh baaxol yooboke Cusam kay lakal dardaare.
Cusam rabe saaku, Miidiyan marak Mooyab deqsitta baaxol qeebil yeyse Bedád-Hadad deqsita num kay aracal dardaare. Usuk elle dardaarem, Qawit deqsitta magaalak ten.
Hadad rabe saaku, Masreeka deqsita aracal yooboke Samla kay lakal dardaare.
Samla rabe saaku, Furaat weeqayti xaqut ten Racoobot deqsitta magaalal yooboke Saawul kay lakal dardaare.
Saawul rabe saaku, Qakbór-Baqalcanan deqsita num kay lakal dardaare.
Baqalcanan rabe saaku, Hadad kay lakal dardaare. Hadad elle dardaarem, Faqi deqsitta magaalak ten. Kay barra Mahetbel deqsitak teneeh, kay ballo Matred deqsitak ten. Matred-ina Meedahab deqsitak ten.
Hadad rabe.
Edom deqsitta meela akak radde marih migaq Timnaq kee Qalwa kee Yatet kee
Ohlibaama kee, Eela kee Finoon kee,
Kanad kee Teman kee, Mibxar kee
Magdel kee Qiiram deqsitak yenen. Ta marak inkih kaxxa abbah raqtam, Edomuk ten.

Yaqkuub xale lab-xaylo ah keeni: Ruuben kee Simqaanaay, Leewi kee Yuudaay, Issakar kee Dabloonuuy, Daan kee Yuusufuuy, Benyam kee Naftaaliiy, Gaad kee Aaseri.
Yuuda, Kanqaanah tooboke barray abba akak Suqa deqsitehiyyat lab-xaylok sidoc xale. Migaaqah Qeer kee Onanaay, Saalec deqsitak yenen. Qeer YALLIH garil uma numuk teneeh, tonna leemiik YALLI xayih kaa qide.
Yuuda kay baxih gubnay Tamaari deqsittat Fares kee Dara xale. Lab-xaylo kaak sittat konoy tekke.
Fares xale lab-xaylo: Cesram kee Camulu.
Dara xale lab-xaylo konoy tekkeeh; migaaqah Dimriiy Etanaay Heemanaay Kalkol kee Dardaq deqsitak yenen.
Karmi, Qaakar xale. Yalli isi marak, Mahaysitinay bayisa akak iyye duyyek tu, Qaakar haysitta heeh, Israayil maral umam baahe.
Etan, Qadarya xale.
Cesram xale lab-xaylo, Yaracmaqil kee Raamaay, Kalubay deqsitak yenen.
Raam Qamnadab xaleeh, Qamnadab Nacson xale. Nacson Yuuda deqsitta kedoh abbak ten.
Nacson Salmon xaleeh, Salmon Booqas xaleeh,
Booqas Yoobad xaleeh, Yoobad Yiisa xale.
Yiisa xale lab-xaylo ah keeniiy, migaq keenik bari keenik elle yani'nnal yan. Aliyabaay, Abinadabaay, Simqaay
Netaneliiy, Raddayaay,
Oxem kee Dawud deqsiten. Sittat malciin yekken.
Maqanxix keenik, Xaruya kee Abiigala. Xaruya lab-xaylok sidoc xalteeh; Abiisay kee Yowabaay, Qasahel deqsiten.
Abiigal Qamaasa xalteeh, abba kaak Yeteriy Ismaaqilto deqsita marah aabakuk yenehiyya.
Cesrám-Kaalib, isi barray Qaduuba deqsittahiyyat, Yeeser kee Soobabaay Ardon xale. Tohuk kalah, Yariqot deqsitta say baxá luk yen.
Qaduuba rabte waqdi, Kaalib Efrat abteeh; is Cuur kaah xalte.
Cuur Uuri xaleeh, Uuri Baxalal xale.
Cesram qumrik lactam gufe saaku, Makir-baxát Sagub xale. Makir, Gilqadak abbak ten.
Sagub, Yaaqir xale. Yaaqir Gilqad-rakaakayal labaatanna kee sidiica magaala luk yen.
Tohuk lakal Gasur kee Aramal dardarte abbobti Gilqadat qeebi abteeh; lactam magaala yibbixen. Yaaqir wokkel luk suge gaandoodi kee Kenat deqsitta magaala kee tet dariifal tan mandarwa inkih yibbixen. Woo baaxol suge mari inkih, Makirik rade mara.
Cesram, Kaalib-Efrata deqsita aracal rabe. Usuk rabek lakal, kay barray Abiyya deqsitta, Ascur kaah xalte. Ascur, Takooqa deqsita aracal abba yekke.
Cesramak naharsi-baxah yen Yeracmaqil deqsita numih xaylo ah keeni: Raamay naharsi-baxah yene kee, Buunaay Ooreniiy Oxem kee Aciiya.
Yeracmaqil kaadu nammayhaytô barra luk yeneeh; tet migaq Qataarak ten. Is Onam kaah xalte.
Yeracmaqilik naharsi-baxi Raam, Maqax kee Yaaminiiy, Qeker xale.
Onamak lab-xaylo, Samma kee Yadaq deqsitak ten. Samma, Nadab kee Abiisur xale.
Abiisur barra, Abicayil deqsitak ten. Is Acban kee Moolid kaah xalte.
Nadabak lab-xaylo, Seled kee Affayim deqsitak ten. Seled xale'kal rabe.
Affayim Yisqi xaleeh; Yisqi Seesan xaleeh; Seesan Aclay xale.
Samma toobokoyti Yadaq xale lab-xaylo, Yeter kee Yonaatan deqsitak ten. Yeter xale'kal rabe.
Yonaatan lab-xaylo, Feelat kee Daada deqsitak ten. A mari inkih Yeracmaqilik rade.
Seesan lab-xaylo luk manannaay, dibuk say-xaylo xale. Usuk Masrih yooboke naqasuy Yarcaq deqsitehiyya luk yeneeh,
woo naqasuh rihimih baxák teena yecee. Is Yarcaqah lab-baxay Qattay deqsita xalte.
Qattay Naatan xaleeh, Naatan Dabad xale.
Dabad Eflal xaleeh, Eflal Yoobad xale.
Yoobad Yaahu xaleeh, Yaahu Qadarya xaleeh,
Qadarya Celex xaleeh, Celex Elaasa xale.
Elaasa Sismay xaleeh, Sismay Sallum xaleeh,
Sallum Yakamya xaleeh, Yakamya Alisamaq xale.
Yaracmaqilik toobokoytah yen Kaalib xale naharsi-baxi Meesaq deqsitak yen. Meesaq Diif xaleeh, Diif Mareesa xaleeh, Mareesa Cebron xale.
Cebron lab-xaylok ferey luk yeneeh; migooqa keenik Korac kee Taffuwac kee Rekem kee Samaqa.
Samaq Racam xaleeh, Racam Yorkaqam xale.
Rekem Sammay xale. Sammay Maqon xaleeh, Maqon Beet-Xur xale.
Kaalib caggô-gubih caggoh nikaacat abbaxuk yen barra Qeefa deqsitak ten. Is Caaran kee Mooxa kee Gaded kaah xalte. Caaran kaadu Gaded deqsita lab-baxa xale.
Yahday lab-xaylo ah teeti: Regem kee Yootamaay, Gesan kee Feletiiy, Qeefa kee Saqafa.
Kaalib kaadu gersi caggô-gubih caggoh nikaacat abbaxuk yen barray Maqka deqsitta luk yen. Is Seber kee Tircana xalte.
Sarra kaadu Saqaf kee Sawa xalte. Saqaf Madmanna xale. Sawa Makbeena kee Gibqa xale. Kaalib kaadu Qaksa deqsitta baxá luk yen.
Aki maray Kaalibik radehiyyah migooqa ah teeti. Kay barray Efrata deqsittahiyyak naharsi-baxi Cuur deqsitak yen. Cuur Sobal xale. Kiryat-Yaqaarim deqsitta magaala xissem Sobala.
Cuuruk nammayhaytô baxi, Salma, Beetlacam xise. Sidochaytô baxi, Caraf, Beet-Gader deqsitta magaala xise.
Kiryat-Yaqaarim xise Sobalak rade mari, Haroqe deqsita aracal gace. Manacat deqsita aracal yan marak garab kaadu kaak rade mara.
Wohuk kalah kaadu, Kiryat-Yaqaarim deqsitta magaalal yan marak, Yitra deqsita gulub kee, Fuut deqsita gulub kee, Summa kee Misraaqi deqsitta guluubah mari inkih kaak rade mara. Xorqa kee Estool deqsitta magaaloolil yan mari kaadu woo guluubah marak yen.
Beetlacam xise Salmak rade mari, Natoofa kee Qatrot-Beet-Yowab deqsita namma aracal gacen. Kaadu Manacat deqsita aracal gace namma gulubuk Xorqi deqsita gulubuh yooboke mari, Salmak rade mara kinni.
Wohuk kalah kaadu, Yaabex deqsita aracal gace maray Tiqra kee Simqat kee Sukat deqsita gulubuk inkih kaxxa abbah tenem, Salma deqsita numuk ten. Woo mari inkih kutbe-abeenittek teneeh; Cammat deqsita numuk rade maray Keena akak iyyeenihiyyak yenen. Cammat, Rekab akak iyyan marih kaxxa-abbak ten.

Dawud Cebron deqsitta magaalal daffeyak yen saaku xale lab-xaylo, ah keeni. Naharsi-baxi kaak migaaqah Amnon deqsitak yen. Too awkih ina Acinooqam deqsitak ten. Is elle toobokem, Yidraqel deqsitta magaalak ten. Nammeyhaak xale baxi Daaniyel deqsitak yen. Too awkih ina Abiigal deqsitta barrak ten. Ta barra elle tembem, Karmel deqsita araca.
Sidochaytô-baxi kaak migaaqah Absalaam deqsitak yen. Ta awkih ina Maqka deqsitta barrak ten. Tet abba Gasur deqsitta baaxoh malikik teneeh; migaaqah Talmayi kaak axcuk yenen. Fereyhaytô-baxi migaaqah Qadoona deqsitak yen. Kay ina, migaaqah Caggit deqsitak ten.
Konoyhaytô-baxi kaak Safatya deqsitak yen. Ta awkih ina Abiital deqsitta barrak ten. Laceyhaytô-baxi kaadu Yitraqam deqsitak yen. Too awkih ina Qegla deqsitta barrak ten.
Ta lica awki inkih elle yoobokem, Cebron deqsitta magaalak ten. Dawud Cebron deqsitta magaalal daffeyak, malcina sanat kee garab malikih suge. Tohuk lakal kaadu Yarusalaam magaalal daffeyak, soddom kee sidooca sanat malikih suge.
Yarusalaam magaalal lab-xaylok xalem, Simqa kee Soobab kee Naatan kee Suleeman. A affara awka kaah xaltem, Batsabaq deqsitta barraay; tet abba Qammiyel deqsitak yen.
Dawud wohuk kalah kaadu, Yarusalaamal lab-xaylok sagaal xale. Migooqa keenik, Yibcar kee Alisamaq kee Elifalat kee
Nooga kee Nefeg kee Yafiyaq kee,
Alisamaq kee Elyadaq kee Elifalatak ten.
Ta mari inkih Dawud lab-xaylok ten. Wohuk kalah kaadu, caggô-gubih caggoh nikaacat yabbixe agbi lab-xaylo kaah xale. Dawud kaadu Tamaari deqsitta baxá xale.
Suleemanak rade marih migooqa ah teeti. Suleeman Racabqam xaleeh, Racabqamaay Abiyya xaleeh, Abiyya Aasa xaleeh, Aasa Yahoosafat xaleeh,
Yahoosafat Yahooram xaleeh, Yahooram Acadya xaleeh, Acadya Yooqas xaleeh,
Yooqas Amaxya xaleeh, Amaxya Quddiyya xaleeh, Quddiyya Yootam xaleeh,
Yootam Acad xaleeh, Acad Ciskiyyaahu xaleeh, Ciskiyyaahu Manasse xaleeh,
Manasse Amon xaleeh, Amonuuy Yoosiyaahu xale.
Yoosiyaahu lab-xaylok ferey xaleeh; Yocanan kee Yahoyaakim kee Xidkiya kee Sallum deqsitak yenen.
Yahoyaakimiiy, Yahoyaasin kee Xidkiya xale.
Baabelon mari Yahoyaasin seewah bee. Kaak rade mari ah keeni. Usuk lab-xaylok malciin luk suge. Migooqa keenik, Saltiyal kee
Malkiram kee Fadaaya kee Senaxxar kee Yakamya kee Hosaamaq kee Nadabyak ten.
Fadaaya lab-xaylok nammay xaleeh; Darabbabel kee Simqi deqsitak yenen. Darabbabel kaadu lab-xaylok nammay xaleeh; Masullam kee Cananya deqsitak yenen. Baxá kaak Seloomit deqsitak ten.
Wohuk kalah kaadu, lab-xaylok konoy luk yen. Osonuuy Casuuba kee Ooheliiy Barkiyya kee Casadya kee Yusab-Cesed deqsitak yenen.
Cananyak rade mari ah keeni: Falatya kee Yasaqya kee, Rafaayâ-xaylooy Arnan-xaylooy Qobadyâ-xaylo kee Sekanyâ-xaylo.
Sekanya Samaqya xale. Samaqya xalem, Cattus kee Yigalaay, Bariyac kee Naqarya kee Saafat deqsitta lab-xaylo. Sittat lecey yakken.
Naqarya lab-xaylok sidoc xaleeh; Elyoqeenay kee Cidkiya kee Qadrikam deqsitak yenen.
Elyoqeenay lab-xaylok malciin xaleeh; Hodawya kee Elyaasibaay, Falaaya kee Qakkubuuy, Yocanan kee Dalaaya kee Qanaani deqsitak yenen.

Fares kee Cesramaay, Karmi kee Cuur kee Sobal, Yuudak rade marak ten.
Sobal Rayya xale. Rayya Yacat xaleeh, Yacat Acuumay kee Lahad xale. Xorqa deqsita gulub keenik rade.
Qetam lab-xaylo, Yidraqel kee Yisma kee Yidbas deqsitak yeneeniih; maqanxá keenik Haxxalfooni deqsitak ten.
Gadorik abba Fanyel deqsitak yen. Cuusak abba Qader deqsitak yen. A mari Cuuruk rade maraay; Cuur, Efrata xalte naharsi-baxay Beetlacamak abbah yenehiyyak ten.
Takooqah-abbah yen Ascur, Cela kee Naqra deqsitta namma barra luk yen.
Naqra kaah xaltem, Acuddam kee Ceefaraay, Temni kee Hacastari.
Cela kaah xaltem, Xeret kee Xocar kee Etnan deqsitta lab-xaylo.
Koox deqsita num Qanub kee Xobeeba xaleeh; kaadu Harúm-Acarcelik radde gulubwak kaxxa abbah yen.
Yaabex deqsita num isi toobokok fula le massakaxxa gee numuk teneeh; kay ina migaaqah Yaabex
Yaabex dooqa abeh iyyemii, «Israayil doore Dageltaw, barkat yot haay baaxo farakka yoh hayis! Ku gabat umaane kee biyaakak yoo cateey» 'yaanamah dooqa abe. Yalli kaadu usuk kaa akah kallacem abe.
Sucak toobokoytah yen Kalub Macir xaleeh, Macir Eston xale.
Eston Beet-Raafa kee Faseeyac kee Tacinna xale. Tacinna Qirnacas xale. A mari inkih Reekâ-magaalal daffeyak yen.
Kenad, Qotniyel kee Seraaya xale. Qotniyeliiy Catat kee Maqonootay xale.
Maqonootay Qofra xale. Seraaya Yowab xale. Yowaabaay Gabâ-naggarinna deqsitta golol yan marak abbah suge. Gabâ-naggarinna nagay yaaxige mari too aracal daffeyak yen.
Yafunné-Kaalib lab-xaylok sidoc xaleeh; Qiru kee Eela kee Naqam deqsitak yenen. Eelaay Kanad xale.
Yacalalel xalem, Diif kee Diifa kee Tirya kee Asareli.
Qedra xale lab-xaylo, Yeter kee Mared kee Qeefer kee Yaalon deqsitak yenen. Mared Masri-malikih-baxáy Bitya deqsittal digibe. Is Miriyam kee Sammay kee Yisba kaah xalte. Yisba Estamowaqak abbah yen. Mared kaadu Yuudah tooboke barra luk yen. Is Gadorak abbah yen Yered kee, Sookok abbah yen Ceebar kee, Danowacak abbah yen Yakutyel kaah xalte.
Hoodiya, Nacam-maqanxál digibe. Keenik rade mari, Garmi deqsita gulubuy Kaqiila deqsita aracal daffeyak yenehiyya kee, Maqka deqsita gulubuy Estamowaqal daffeyak yenehiyya.
Simon xale lab-xaylo, Amnon kee Rinna kee Bencanan kee Tiilon deqsitak ten. Yisqi deqsita num, Doocet kee Bendocet xale.
Yuudâ-baxi Saalecik rade mari ah keeni. Leekak abbah yen numuy Qeer deqsita kee, Mareesak abbah yen numuy Laqda deqsitahiyya kee, *baftak bicsen meqe sartan elle bicsan innih ixxiga le maray Beet-Asbeqa deqsita aracal elle taamitaanahiyya.
Saalecik raddem kaadu, Yookim deqsita num kee, Kodeeba deqsita aracal daffeya maraay, wohuk kalah kaadu, Yooqas kee Saraaf deqsitta namma numuy Mooyaabah yooboke agabu abitte. Sarra Beetlacamal gacen. Aham inkih dumî-dabaanal tunkuttube.
A marak rade mari, Nataqim kee Gadeerot deqsitta magaaloolil gaceeniih; malikih taamitak, buutitte bicisak yen marak ten.
Simqaan xale lab-xaylo, Namwil kee Yaaminiiy, Yaarib kee Dara kee Saawul deqsitak yenen.
Saawuluuy Sallum xaleeh, Sallumuuy Mibsam xaleeh, Mibsamaay Mismaq xale.
Mismaqaay Cammuwel xale; Cammuweliiy Dakkur xale; Dakkuruuy Simqi xale.
Simqi lab-xaylok taban kee lecey xaleeh; say-xaylok kaadu lecey xale. Takkay immay kay tooboko mango xaylo maxalinna. Tonna leemiik Simqaanak rade mari, Yuudak rade marak daguk yen.
Dawud dardaare waktik duma, Simqaanak rade mari elle gacem, Bersabaq kee Moladaay, Caxar-Suqal kee Bilhaay, Qexem kee Tooladaay Betwel kee Cormaay, Xiklag kee Beet-Markabotuuy, Haxar-Susim kee Beet-Biri kee Saqrayim deqsitta magaalooli.
Wohuk kalah kaadu elle gaceenim, Qetam kee Qayiniiy Rimmon kee Tooken kee Qasan deqsitta koona magaala kee,
too magaaloolik dariifal sugte gaandoodi Baqalat deqsita aracah amma 'yaanam fan elle gaceenih yenen. Ken baaxo too gideey; kaadu akak raden marih migaq keenik aktubuk yenen.
Guluubah abbobtih migaq ah kaana. Masoobab kee Yamlek kee Amaxyá-Yoosa kee
Ayyuqel kee Yosibyá-Yaahu. (Yaahuk kaxxa-abba Seraaya deqsitak yeneeh; kay abba Qasyeli.)
Wohuk kalah kaadu, Elyoqeenay kee Yaqkoba kee Yasocaaya kee Qasaaya kee Qadiyel kee Yasimyel kee Banaaya kee,
Sifqí-Diida, Semaqyâ gulubih abbah yen. (Sifqi Allon deqsita numih baxaay, Allon Yadaqyâ baxaay, Yadaqya Simri-baxaay, Simri Semaqyâ baxak ten.)
Woo marak rade mari amagguk yemegge waqdi, Gador deqsitta magaala elle tan golok ayrô-mawqa le kabu raqta baaxoh amma 'yaanam fan, illi elle yaloole aracay qayso lehiyya gorrisak gexen.
Too baaxo akadah (agdah) tan baaxoy meqe qayso luk sugtehiyyak ten. Baaxo kaadu kaxxa baaxoy amaan kee wagari lehiyyak ten. Duma Caamak rade mari too baaxol suge.
Ciskiyyaahu Yuudâ-malikih yen dabaanal, Simqaan-kedoh-abbobti too baaxo temeeteeh; Caamak rade maray isi siraaqat elle sugeenihiyyat qeebi aben. Maquunim deqsitak yen marat kaadu qeebi aben. A saaku fanah elle tablen innah, too mara inkih selli heen. Sarra too baaxo meqe qayso luk sugteemih sabbatah tokkel gacen.
Simqaanak rade marak koona boolih num kaadu, Edom rasuy qaleela lehiyya wararen. Keenik saqoltih tenem, Yisqi-xayloy Falatya kee Naqarya kee Rafaaya kee Quddiyeel deqsitta.
Oson Qamaalekih yooboke maray too qaleela le baaxo fan kudehiyya inkih qideenih, a saaku fanah too baaxol elle yanin.

Israayilik naharsi-baxi Ruuben deqsitak yen. Naharsi-baxi kaa'mmay, isi abbah barrat fido faxeemih sabbatah, naharsi-saqoolinna Yuusuf deqsite baxa kee kay xayloh tontocowweh ten. Tonna leemiik, Ruuben Israayilik naharsi-baxa loowimak mananna.
Yuuda, toobokoh addal muxxo le numuk teneeh, dardaarinna le num kaak rade'mmay, naharsi-saqoolinna nagartem, Yuusufuk ten.
Israayilik naharsi-baxi Ruuben xale lab-xaylo, Canok kee Fallu kee Cesram kee Karmi deqsitak yenen.
Ayyuqel Samaqya xaleeh, Samaqyaay Goog xaleeh, Googuuy Simqi xaleeh,
Simqiiy Miika xaleeh, Miikaay Rayya xaleeh, Rayyaay Baqal xaleeh,
Baqalaay Beera xale. Beeraay Ruubenik rade marak saqalah yen numuuy; Tiglat-Fileeser deqsita numuy Assuuriyak malikih yenehiyya seewah kaa bee.
Ruubenik nasab elle yan kitaabal tunkuttube gulubuk abbobtih migooqa ah teeti: Yaqiiyal kee Zakariyya kee
Qadád-Belaq. Belaqak kaxxa-abba Samaq deqsite numuy Ayyuqel marak radek ten. Ta mari elle gacem, Qarooqer deqsita aracak xabba haanamaay Nabo kee Baqal-Maqon deqsitta aroocah amma 'yaanam takke baaxo.
Woo mari mango midir luk sugeemih sabbatah, Gilqad deqsitta baaxok ayrô-mawqa le kabul raqta bakarroytah tan baaxo amma 'yaanam fan elle gacen. Too bakarroytah tan baaxo Fuurat weeqaytu fan gufta.
Saawul dardaarak yen dabaanal, Ruubenik rade mari, Hagrih-yooboke-marat qeebi abeeh; ken qideenih, ken baaxoy Gilqad deqsita rasuk ayrô-mawqa le kabul geytimtahiyyal gacen.
Gaad deqsitta kedo, Basan deqsitta baaxoy Salka deqsita aracah amma 'yaanam fan elle gacen. Too baaxo Ruuben-mari elle suge rasuk garit ten.
Ayyuqel deqsita num ken kedoh abbah yeneeh; kaak gubal tenem, Safam deqsita numu. Wohuk kalah kaadu Yaqnay kee Saafat deqsita mari, kedoh abbobtih yenen.
Gaad deqsitta kedok raqte exxaaxih abbobti malciin tekkeeh; migaaqah Mikaayil kee Masullam kee Seeba kee Yooray kee Yaqkan kee Diqa kee Qeebar deqsitak yenen.
A mari inkih Cuurí-Abicayil deqsita numuk rade. Cuuri Yarowac deqsita numih baxaay, Yarowac Gilqad baxaay, Gilqad Mikaayil baxaay, Mikaayil Yasiisay baxaay, Yasiisay Yacdô baxaay, Yacdo Buux baxak ten.
Qabdiyél-Aci too marak abbah yen. Aci kaxxa-abba Guuna deqsitak yen.
Gaad deqsitta kedo elle sugtem, Gilqad kee Basan kee too rasuk dariifal tan baaxo kee, inkih tan Saron deqsitta baaxoy saq elle yaloolehiyya.
A marih migooqa kitaabal elle tunkuttube wakti, Yootam Yuudâ-malikih yen daban kee Yarobqam Israayil-malikih yen dabaana.
Ruuben kedo kee Gaad kedoh yooboke mara kee, Manassê-kedoh yooboke marak garabak tittat, morootom kee affara alfi kee malcina bool kee lactam qaskariitay gob kee seef kee gayse kee gaysê-baxat qeebi elle aban innah baritto nagay lehiyya luk yen.
Osonuuy Hagrih-yooboke-mara kee, Yatuur kee Nafis kee Noodabak rade marat qeebi aben.
Too qeebih addat, «Nee cat» axcuk Yallal weeqen waqdi, Yalli ken cateh, Hagrih-yooboke-mara kee carbil ken catak yen marak qeebil ken yiysiiseh. Yallal aaminuk yeneenimih sabbatah, usuk ken kallaci yoobbe.
Yalli, Hagrih yooboke mari a qeebil gacam looweh yeneemih sabbatah, keenik mango mara qeebih addat qideeniih; luk suggu 'yeenim dannabah keenik been. Dannabah beenim gaalak kontom alfi kee, illik namma bool kee kontom alfi kee, danoonak namma alfi. Tohuk kalah kaadu, sahdak bool alfi seewah been. Tohuk lakal Ruuben kee Gaad kee ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta Manasseh kedoh yooboke mari ken baaxol gaceeniih; Assuuriyah mari seewah ken beyaanam fan tokkel sugen.
Ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqte Manasseh kedoh yooboke mari manguk yeneeh; Basan deqsita rasuk Baqal Cermon kee Senir kee Cermon-qale deqsitta arooca amma 'yaanam fan elle sugen.
Kedoh abbobti keenik migaaqah Qeefer kee Yisqi kee Alyel kee Qadriyel kee Ermiyaas kee Hodawya kee Yacadiyel deqsitak yenen. Oson inkih qande le qaskaray migaq-gexxo lehiyyak ten.
Takkay immay Yallay ken kaxxa abbobti aqbuduk tenehiyyal dambi lem baaheeniih; kaa cabba heenih; oson yamaateenik naharal, woo baaxol suge maray Yalli baysehiyya aqbuduk suge duyyeeya yuqbuden.
Tonna leemiik Israayil doore Dagelti, Assuuriya deqsitta baaxoh malikiy Ful deqsitahiyyat ken baysaamih fayxi hee. Woo malik kaadu Tiglat-Fileeser deqsita migaaqal amixxiguk yen. Too waqdi Ruuben-kedo kee Gaad kedoh yooboke mara kee Manassê-kedoh yooboke marak garab seewah beenih, Calac kee Cabor kee Haara kee Goodan deqsita weeqayti garil tan baaxol ken gacsen. A saaku fanah tokkel yanin.

Leewi lab-xaylok sidoc luk yen. Ken migaq Gerson kee Kohat kee Maraari deqsitak yen.
Kohat affara lab-baxa luk yen. Ken migaq Qamram kee Yixharaay, Cebron kee Quddiyeelik ten.
Qamram xaylo, Haaruun kee Muusa kee Miriyam deqsitak ten.
Haaruun affara lab-baxa luk yen. Ken migaq Nadab kee Abiihuuy, Alqedar kee Itaamarak ten.
Alqedaraay Fincas xaleeh, Fincasaay Absuwaq xaleeh,
Absuwaqaay Bukki xaleeh, Bukkiiy Quddi xaleeh,
Quddiiy Daracya xaleeh, Daracyaay Maraayot xaleeh,
Maraayotuuy Amarya xaleeh, Amaryaay Aciitub xaleeh,
Aciitubuuy Saaduk xaleeh, Saadukuuy Acimqax xaleeh,
Acimqaxaay Qadarya xaleeh, Qadaryaay Yocanan xaleeh,
Yocananaay Qadarya xale. Qadarya, Suleeman Yarusalaamal xise Qibaadah-Qaril Yallih seekih yen.
Qadaryaay Amarya xaleeh, Amaryaay Aciitub xaleeh,
Aciitubuuy Saaduk xaleeh, Saadukuuy Sallum xaleeh,
Sallumuuy Cilkiyya xaleeh, Cilkiyyaay Qadarya xaleeh,
Qadaryaay Seraaya xaleeh, Seraayaay Yahuuxadak xale.
YALLI, Nabkadnessar-gabat Yuuda kee Yarusalaam mara seewah ruube saaku, Yahuuxadak ken lih seewah been.
Leewi lab-xaylok sidoc luk yen. Ken migaq Gerson kee Kohat kee Maraarik ten.
Gerson lab-xaylo, Libni kee Simqi deqsitak ten.
Kohat affara lab-baxa luk yen. Ken migaq Qamram kee Yixharaay, Cebron kee Quddiyeelik ten.
Maraari namma lab-baxa luk yen. Oson migaaqah Macli kee Muusi deqsitak yenen.
Ken aydaadi elle yascasse'nnal, Leewî-kedok exxa akak radde mara kee ken abbobtih yen marih migooqa ah teeti.
Gerson Libni xaleeh, Libniiy Yacat xaleeh, Yacataay Dimma xaleeh
Dimmaay Yowac xaleeh, Yowacaay Qiddo xaleeh, Qiddooy Dara xaleeh, Daraay Yatray xale.
Kohatak rade marih migooqa ah teeti. Kohataay Qamminadib xaleeh, Qamminadibiiy Korac xaleeh, Koracaay Assir xaleeh,
Assiriiy Elkaana xaleeh, Elkaanaay Ibiyaasaf xaleeh, Ibiyaasafaay Assir xaleeh,
Assiriiy Tacat xaleeh, Tacataay Uriyel xaleeh, Uriyeliiy Quddiyya xaleeh, Quddiyyaay Saawul xale.
Elkaana, Qamaasay kee Aciimot xaleeh,
Aciimotuuy Elkaana xaleeh, Elkaanaay Xoofay xaleeh, Xoofayaay Nacat xaleeh,
Nacataay Aliyab xaleeh, Aliyabaay Yaroocam xaleeh, Yaroocamaay Elkaana xale.
Samuwel lab-xaylok nammay luk yen. Naharsi-baxi Ayyuqelik teneeh; nammayhaytô baxi Abiyyak ten.
Maraarik rade mari ah keeni. Macli Libni xaleeh, Libniiy Simqi xaleeh, Simqiiy Qudda xaleeh
Quddaay Simqa xaleeh, Simqaay Caggiya xaleeh, Caggiyaay Qasaaya xale.
YALLIH Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug Yarusalaam fan baaheenik lakal, Malik Dawud, Yallih qibaada elle aban ikkel, woo qibaadak foocat gacca 'yeh saare absiisu waa mara doore. Suleeman Yarusalaamal Yallih Qibaadah-Qari xisaamak dumal, too mari Yallih Nabnah-Siraqih foocal takke saare elle aban inna yascasse amri akah iyya'nnal aben. Too marih migooqa ah teeti. Ken xaylo saarel ken catak ten.
Kohatak rade marak, Heeman deqsita saare-abe yen. Heeman akak rade marih migooqa ah teeti. Heeman Ayyuqel-baxaay, Ayyuqel Samuwel-baxaay
Samuwel Elkaanâ-baxaay, Elkaana Yaroocam-baxaay, Yaroocam Alyel-baxaay, Alyel Towac-baxaay,
Towac Xuuf-baxaay, Xuuf Elkaanâ-baxaay, Elkaana Macat-baxaay, Macat Qamaasay-baxaay
Qamaasay Elkaanâ-baxaay, Elkaana Ayyuqel-baxaay, Ayyuqel Qadaryâ-baxaay, Qadarya Xafanyâ-baxaay
Xafanya Tacat-baxaay, Tacat Assir-baxaay, Assir Ibiyaasaf-baxaay, Ibiyaasaf Korac-baxaay
Korac Yixhar-baxaay, Yixhar Kohat-baxaay, Kohat Leewi-baxaay, Leewi Israayil-baxak ten.
Heemanah ramad le numuy Asaf deqsitak migda le kabuk kaak soolak kaa catak yen. Asaf akak rade marih migooqa ah teeti. Asaf Barkiyyâ-baxaay, Barkiyya Simqâ-baxaay
Simqa Mikaayil-baxaay, Mikaayil Baqseeyâ-baxaay, Baqseeya Malkiyâ-baxaay
Malkiya Etni-baxaay, Etni Darâ-baxaay, Dara Qadaayâ-baxaay
Qadaaya Etan-baxaay, Etan Dimmâ-baxaay, Dimma Simqi-baxaay
Simqi Yacat-baxaay, Yacat Gerson-baxaay, Gerson Leewi-baxak ten.
Keenih ramad le maray Maraarik radehiyya Heemanak guri kabul soolak ken catak yenen. Keenik foocal yan num Etan deqsitak yen. Etan Keesi-baxaay, Keesi Qabdi-baxaay, Qabdi Malluk-baxaay
Malluk Casabyâ-baxaay, Casabya Amaxyâ-baxaay, Amaxya Cilkiyyâ-baxaay
Cilkiyya Amxi-baxaay, Amxi Baani-baxaay, Baani Samar-baxaay
Samar Macli-baxaay, Macli Muusi-baxaay, Muusi Maraari-baxaay, Maraari Leewi-baxak ten.
Keenik kalah yan Leewik rade marah tontocowwe taama, Qibaadâ-Qaril saarek kalah tan taama. Siraq qaada wagga haytam ken gabal sugte.
Muusay Yallih naqasuh yenehiyya keenih warse Yallih amri elle iyya innal, Haaruun kee kaak rade mari, Israayil marih dambi kalaana'gidih, sadgat elle cararisan aracal sadgat abaanam kee, qaydarus elle qeerisan aracal qerto ruubaanam kee, Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Golil wohuk kalah enna 'taamay faxxintahiyya aben.
Haaruunuk rade mari ah kaana. Kay baxi Alqedar Fincas xaleeh, Fincasaay Absuwaq xaleeh,
Absuwaqaay Bukki xaleeh, Bukkiiy Quddi xaleeh, Quddiiy Daracya xaleeh,
Daracyaay Maraayot xaleeh, Maraayotuuy Amarya xaleeh, Amaryaay Aciitub xaleeh,
Aciitubuuy Saaduk xaleeh, Saadukuuy Acimqax xale.
Naharak baaxo akah yeceenim, Kohat deqsita gulubuy Leewi akak iyyan numuk radehiyyak Haaruunuk rade marak ten. Keenih yeceen magaalooli ah teeti.
Yuudâ-rasul geytimta Cebron magaala kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo keenih yeceen.
Tonna'mmay woo magaala deraafil tan baqurê-baaxo kee tet dariifal tan gaandoodi Yafunnê-baxa Kaalibih yeceen.
Megloh elle gexan magaalooli Haaruunuk rade marah yeceen. Tohum, Cebron kee Libna kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo kee, Yattir kee Estamowaq kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo kee,
Ciilen kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo kee, Dabiir kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo kee,
Qasan kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo kee, Beet-Semes kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxok ten.
Wohuk kalah kaadu Benyam-kedo luk sugte baaxol, Gabaq kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo kee, Qalemet kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo kee, Qanatot kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo keenih yeceen. Sittat taban kee sidoc takke magaalooli Haaruunuk rade marah yeceen.
Kohat gulubuk Haaruunuk rade marak kalih marah, ayrô-culma le kabut raqta Manasseh baaxol saami caxxa qidak tabna magaala keenih yeceen.
Gersonuk rade marah Issakar kee Aaser kee Naftaali kee Basan deqsita aracal gacte Manasseh baaxok taban kee sidiica magaala takkem keenih yeceen.
Maraarik rade marah yeceenim, taban kee namma magaalaay; akak yeceenim, Ruuben kee Gaad kee Dablon deqsita marih baaxok ten.
Tonnal Israayil mari, Leewî-kedok rade marah magaalooli kee ken dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo yeceen.
Tonnah kaadu, Yuuda kee Simqaan kee Benyam gufta baaxol saami caxxa qidak migaq akak xagen taban kee sidiica magaala Leewî-kedok rade marah yeceen.
Leewî-kedok Kohat deqsita marak garabah kaadu, Efrayim marih magaaloolik tu takkem yeceen.
Megloh elle gexan magaalooli keenih yeceen. Tohumuu, Seekem-magaalay Efrayimik qaleela le baaxol geytimtahiyya kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo keenih yeceen. Geser kee
Yokmaqam kee Beet-Coron kee
Ayyaalon kee Gat-Rimmon deqsitta magaalooli kee lacti malaalah baaxoy woo magaaloolih dariifal tanihiyya keenih yeceen.
Manassek ayrô-culma le kabuk tan baaxok namma magaala keenih yeceen. Tohuu, Qanar kee Bilqam deqsitta namma magaala kee woo namma magaalah dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo keenih yeceen.
Leewih yooboke marak Gerson deqsita gulubuk rade marah, ayrô-mawqat raqte Manasseh baaxok Goolan deqsitta magaalay Basanal geytimtahiyya kee Qastarot deqsitta magaala kee a namma magaalah dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo keenih yeceen.
Issakar kedo le baaxok affara magaala keenih yeceen. Tohumuu, Kedes kee Dabrat kee Raamot kee Qanam kee, a affara magaalah dariifal tan baaxoy lacti qayso lehiyya keenih yeceen.
Aaser kedo le baaxok affara magaala keenih yeceen. Tohumuu, Maasal kee Qabdon kee Cukok kee Racob deqsitta magaalooli kee woo magaaloolih dariifal tan baaxoy lacti qayso lehiyya keenih yeceen.
Naftaali kedo le baaxok sidiica magaala keenih yeceen. Galiil addal tan magaalay Kedes deqsittahiyya kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo kee, Cammon kee Kiryatayim deqsitta magaalooli kee tet dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo keenih yeceen.
Leewî-kedok wohuk raaqe maray Maraari-gulubuk radehiyya Dablon kedo le baaxok namma magaala keenih yeceen. Tohumuu, Rimmoona kee Taabor kee woo magaaloolih dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo keenih yeceen.
Ordon-weeqaytih garil tan Yerikô-magaalak ayrô-mawqa le kabul, Ruuben kedo le rasuk affara magaala keenih yeceen. Tohumuu, bacarih tan baaxol ten Bexer kee Yahxa kee Kadeemot kee Mefaqat kee tet dariifal tan lacti qaysoh baaxo keenih yeceen.
Gaad kedo le rasuk affara magaala keenih yeceen. Tohumuu, Gilqad baaxol geytimta Raamot deqsitta magaala kee Macanaayim kee Cesbon kee Yaqder kee woo magaaloolih dariifal tan lacti malaalah baaxo keenih yeceen.

Issakar lab-xaylok ferey xaleeh; Toolaq kee Fuuwa kee Yaasub kee Simron deqsitak yenen.
Toolaqak rade mari, Quddi kee Rafaaya kee Yaryel kee Yacmay kee Yibsam kee Samuwel deqsitak yenen. Oson inkih gulubwah saqoltih yen maray qande le qaskarah yenehiyyak ten. Dawud edde dardaare dabaanal, Toolaqak rade maray qeebih bical yene, labaatanna kee namma alfi kee lica boolih num akkuk yenen.
Quddi Yidracya xaleeh, Yidracya Mikaayil kee Qobadya kee Ayyuqel kee Yissiya xale. Too koona num gulubwah saqoltik ten.
Ken migooqa elle tunkuttube kitab elle yascasse'nnal, too mari mango agabu luk yeneeh; mango xaylo xaleenimih sabbatah, keenik rade marak qaskarah yen mari soddom kee lica alfih num akkuk ten.
Issakarak rade mari ittat, bacra-taban kee malciina alfih qaskariita akkuk yenen. Tohum, Issakarak rade marih migooqa elle tan kitaabal tunkuttubeemi.
Benyam, Belaq kee Bekar kee Yadiqeel xale.
Belaqak rade mari, Axbon kee Quddi kee Quddiyeel kee Yareemot kee Qiiri deqsitta koona numuk yenen. Oson inkih gulubwah saqoltih yen maray qande le qaskarah tenehiyyak ten. Ken migooqa elle tan kitaabal, keenik rade marak qaskarah yen mari labaatanna kee namma alfi kee soddom kee affara num akkuk yen.
Bekarak rade mari, Damiira kee Yooqasaay, Elqeedar kee Elyahoqeenay kee Qomriiy, Yareemot kee Abiyyaay, Qanatot kee Qalemet deqsitak yenen. A mari inkih kaak radeeh,
gulubwah saqoltih yen marak ten. Ken migooqa elle tan kitaabal, keenik rade marak qaskarah yen mari labaatanna alfi kee namma bool akkuk yen.
Yadiqeel Bilhan xaleeh; Bilhan Yaqus kee Benyaamaay, Eehud kee Kanaqnaay, Deetam kee Tarsis kee Acisacar xale.
A mari inkih Yadiqeelik radeeh; gulubwah saqoltih yen maray qande le qaskarah yenehiyyak ten. Ken migooqa elle tan kitaabal, keenik rade marak qaskarah yen mari taban kee malcina alfi kee namma bool akkuk ten.
Qiir, Suffim kee Cuffim xaleeh, Acer Cuusim xale.
Naftaali, Yacxeel kee Guunaay Yaaxir kee Sallum xale. Naftaalih ina, Bilha deqsitak ten.
Manasse, Aramah tooboke barray caggô-gubih caggoh nikaacat yabbixet Asriyel kee Makir xale. Makir Gilqad xale.
Makir, Cuffim kee Suffimih baxuw digibih abe. Kay maqanxá Maqka deqsitak ten. Kaak nammayhaytô baxay Xalofcad deqsitehiyyak xaylo inkih say-xaylok ten.
Makir-barray Maqka deqsittehiyya baxa kaah xalteeh; migaaqah kaak Feres inte. Kay toobokoyti Seres deqsitak yen. Seresiiy Uulam kee Raakem deqsita lab-xaylo xale.
Uulam Badan xale. A mari inkih Manassê-baxih baxa Makír-Gilqadak rade.
Gilqadak maqanxáy Hammoleket deqsitta, Ishod kee Abiqeder kee Macla xalte.
Samiidaq, Aciyya kee Seekemiiy Likci kee Aniiqam xale.
Efrayim Sutlac xaleeh, Sutlacaay Bered xaleeh, Berediiy Tacat xaleeh, Tacataay Elqada xaleeh, Elqadaay Tacat xaleeh,
Tacataay Dabad xaleeh, Dabadaay Sutlac xale. Efrayim kaadu Qader kee Elqad xale'mmay, too namma num Gat-rasuh yooboke marak saq buubaana'gidih gexen saaku, Gat-mari ken qide.
Efrayim ken rookat mango saaku suge. Kay mari inkih a rooka kaa hawweenisoonuh kaa fan yemeeten.
Tohuk lakal Efrayim isi barrat fido faxe. Is teedeqeeh, baxa kaah xalte. Kay abba isi buxat umam tekkeemih sabbatah migaaqah kaak Beriiqa
Efrayim kaadu Seera deqsitta baxá xale. Is Daga-raqta-Beet-Coron kee, Guba-raqta-Beet-Coron kee Udden-Seera deqsitta magaalooli xisse.
Tonnah kaadu lab baxa xaleeh, migaaqah Refa deqsitak yen. Refaay Resef xaleeh, Resefiiy Telac xaleeh, Telacaay Tacan xaleeh,
Tacanaay Laqdan xaleeh, Laqdanaay Qammihud xaleeh, Qammihuduuy Alismaq xaleeh,
Alismaqaay Nuun xaleeh, Nuunuuy Yoosuwa xale.
Efrayim kedo elle gactem, Beetal-magaala kee tet dariifal sugte gaandoodiy ayrô-mawqa le kabul ten Naqranak xabba haanamaay ayrô-culma le kabul ten Geser kee tet dariifal sugte gaandoodih amma 'yaanam fan takkehiyya kee, tonnah kaadu, Seekem kee tet dariifal sugte gaandoodik xabba haanamaay Qayya kee tet dariifal sugte gaandoodih amma 'yaanam takke baaxok ten.
Manassek rade mari, Beet-Saqan kee Magiddo kee Taqnak kee Door kee too magaaloolih dariifal sugte gaandoodil gacen.
Israayil-baxi Yuusufuk rade mari elle gacem too baaxo.
Aaser lab-xaylok ferey xaleeh; migaaqah Imna kee Yiswa kee Iswi kee Beriiqa deqsitak yenen. Ken maqanxá Serac deqsitak ten.
Beriiqa, Ceebar kee Malkeel xale. Malkeel, Birdawit deqsitta magaala xise.
Ceebar, Yaflet kee Soomer kee Cootam deqsitta lab-xaylo xale. Kaadu Suqa deqsitta baxá xale.
Yafletiiy, Faaxak kee Bimhal kee Qaswat xale.
Soomeriiy, Aci kee Rohga kee Yacubba kee Aram xale.
Kay toobokoyti Celem, Xoofac kee Imnaq kee Seelis kee Qaamal xale.
Xoofacaay, Suwac kee Carnefer kee Suqal kee Beeri kee Yimra kee
Bexer kee, Cood kee, Samma kee, Silsa kee, Itran kee Beera xale.
Yeter, Yafunne kee Fisfa kee Ara xale.
Qulla, Arac kee Canwiyel kee Rixya xale.
A mari inkih Aaserik rade maraay; oson inkih yeexegen gulubwah saqoltih sugeenih, qande le qaskarah yeneeniih, timixxigeh miroctih yenen. Ken migooqa elle tan kitaabal, keenik rade maray qeebih bical yene labaatanna kee lica alfi akkuk yen.

Benyaamak naharsi-baxi Belaq deqsitak yen. Nammeyhaytô-baxi kaak Asbeeliiy, sidochaytô baxi Acracaay,
fereyhaytô baxi Noocaay, konoyhaytô baxi kaak Raafa deqsitak yen.
Belaq-xaylooy, Addar kee Geraay, Abiihud kee
Absuwaqaay, Niqmaan kee Acowiiy,
Gera kee Safufam kee Curam deqsitak yenen.
Eehud xaylo, Niqmaan kee Aciiya kee Gera deqsitak teneeh; Gabaq deqsita aracal gulubwah saqoltih sugen. Sarra Manacat deqsita arac fan xiiriyak ken been saaku, Gera keenik abba yekke. Geraay Qudda kee Aciicud xale.
Sacrayim isi agabuy Cuusim kee Baqra deqsita cabe. Sarra Mooyab baaxol gace saaku,
Codes deqsitta barra abteeh; is, Yobab kee Xibyaay, Meesaq kee Malkamaay
Yaqux kee Sakya kee Mirma kaah xalte. Woo xaylo inkih gulubwah saqolti tekke.
Sacrayim kaadu Cuusim deqsitte barrat, Abiitub kee Elfaqal xale.
Elfaqalaay, Qeebar kee Misqam kee Samed xale. Samediiy, Oono deqsitta magaala kee Lood deqsitta magaala kee tet dariifal tan gaandoodi xise.
Baraaya kee Samaq gulubwah saqoltih teneeh, Ayyaalon deqsitte magaalal gaceeniih; kaadu Gat-magaalal suge mara wokkek xiiriyen.
Baraayaay, Acyo kee Sasakaay, Yareemot kee Dabadyaay, Qarad kee Qaderiiy, Mikaayil kee Yisfa kee Yooca xale.
Elfaqalaay, Dabadya kee Masullam kee Cidka kee Ceebar kee Yismaray kee Yidliya kee Yobab xale.
Simqi xale lab-xaylo, migaaqah Yaakim kee Dikriiy, Dabdi kee Aliqeenayaay, Xillatay kee Alyeliiy, Qadaaya kee Baraaya kee Simrat deqsitak yenen.
Sasak-lab-xaylo, migaaqah Yisfan kee Ceebaraay, Alyel kee Qabdonuuy, Dikri kee Caananaay, Cananya kee Qeelamaay, Antotya kee Yifdaya kee Fanyel deqsitak yenen.
Yaroocam lab-xaylo, migaaqah Samsaray kee Sacaryaay, Qatalya kee Yaqresyaay, Eliyyas kee Dikri deqsitak yenen.
Too mari inkih gulubwah saqoltih yen maraay; Yarusalaamal daffeyak yenen. Ken migooqa kitaabal tunkuttubeh ten.
Gibqon-magaalak abbah yen num isi barray Maqka deqsittehiyya luk Gibqon-magaalal suge.
Naharsi-baxi kaak Qabdon deqsitak yen. Kay lakal Xuur kee Keesiiy, Baqal kee Nadabaay,
Geder kee Acyooy, Daker kee
Miklot deqsitta lab xaylo xale. Miklot Simqa xale. Oson Yarusalaamal keenih ramad le mara lih gacen.
Ner Kees xaleeh, Keesiiy Saawul xaleeh, Saawuluuy Yonaatan kee Malkisuwaqaay, Abinadab kee Esbaqal xale.
Yonaatanaay Maribaqal xaleeh, Maribaqalaay Miika xaleeh,
Miikaay Fitom kee Melekiiy, Tareeyaq kee Acad xale.
Acadaay Yahoqadda xaleeh, Yahoqaddaay Qalemet kee Qadmawet kee Dimri xale. Dimriiy Mooxa xaleeh,
Mooxaay Binqa xaleeh, Binqaay Raafa xaleeh, Raafaay Elaasa xaleeh, Elaasaay Aaxel xale.
Aaxel lab-xaylok lecey xaleeh, migaaqah Qadrikam kee Bokruuy, Ismaaqil kee Saqaryaay, Qobadya kee Caanan deqsitak yenen.
Kay toobokoytay Qeshek deqsitahiyyak naharsi-baxi Uulam deqsitak yeneeh; nammeyhaytô-baxi kaak Yaqus deqsitak yeneeh, sidochaytô-baxi Elifalat deqsitak yen.
Uulam xaylo inkih qande le qaskaray gaysê-baxi qidimil timixxigehiyyak ten. Ken xaylo kee xayloh-xaylo manguk yeneeniih; bool kee kontom akkuk yenen.
Too mari inkih Benyaamak rade mara.

Israayil marih migooqa inkih yuktubeeniih; Israayil Malikwah Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan. Yuudâ-mari Yallal baahen makok gexxaamah, Baabelon-baaxo seewah ken been.
Naharaak isi baaxo kee isi magaalooli fan gactem, seeka kee Leewih yooboke mara kee Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit taamah suge marih durruyyat kee keenik kalah yan Israayil mara.
Yuuda kee Benyam kee Efrayim kee Manasse deqsitta kedoodah yooboke mari Yarusalaamal gace.
Baani Imri xale; Imri Qomri xale; Qomri Qammihud xale; Qammihud Quutay xale. Quutay Yuudâ-baxa-Faresik rade marak abbah yeneeh, dabqih Yarusalaamal gace.
Yuudah yooboke Siilok rade marak abbah yen num, Qasaaya deqsitak yen. Kaa kee kay xaylo tokkel gacen.
Yuudá-Darak rade marak kaadu Yaqwel deqsita num wokkel gace. Yuudah yooboke maray Yarusalaamal gacehiyya sittat lica bool kee sagla taban akkuk yen.
Benyaamah yooboke marak Sallu deqsita num wokkel gace. Sallu Masullam-baxaay, Masullam Hodawyâ-baxaay, Hodawya Hasnuwâ-baxak ten.
Keenik kaadu Yaroocám-Yibnaya kee Quddí-Eela deqsita mari Yarusalaamal gace. Eelak kaxxa-abba Mikri deqsitak yen. Safatyá-Masullam deqsita num kaadu wokkel gace. Masullamak kaxxa-abba Reqwel deqsitak yeneeh; Reqwel Yibniyâ-baxak ten.
Ta mari inkih gulubwah saqoltih yen. Benyaamah yooboke maray Yarusalaamal gacehiyya sittat sagla bool kee kontom kee lecey akkuk yenen.
Seekah yooboke maray Yarusalaamal gacehiyyak migooqa ah teeti:
Yadaqya kee Yehoyaarib kee Yaakin kee
Qadarya. Qadarya Cilkiyyâ-baxaay, Cilkiyya Masullam-baxaay, Masullam Saaduk-baxaay, Saaduk Maraayot-baxaay, Maraayot Aciitub-baxak ten. Aciitub Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal seekak abbah yen.
Wohuk kalah kaadu seekah yooboke marak Yaroocám-Qadaaya kee Qadiyél-Maqsay deqsita mari Yarusalaamal gace. Qadaayak kaxxa-abba Fascur deqsitak yeneeh; Fascur Malkiyâ-baxak ten.
Maqsayak kaxxa-abba Yacdeera deqsitak yen. Yacdeera Masullam-baxaay, Masullam Masilleemit-baxaay, Masilleemit Immar-baxak ten.
Seekah yooboke maray gulubwah saqoltih yene sittat alfi kee malcina bool kee lactam akkuk yenen. Oson inkih dudda le maraay; Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal aban taama ken gabat ten.
Keenik kalah yan Leewih yooboke maray Yarusalaamal gacehiyyak migooqa ah teeti:
Maraari-gulubuk Cassúb-Samaqya deqsite numuk ten. Kay kaxxa-abba Qadrikam deqsitak yeneeh; Qadrikam Casabyâ-baxak ten.
Bakbakkar kee Ceeres kee Galal kee Mattanya deqsita mara. Mattanya Miikâ-baxaay, Miika Dikri-baxaay, Dikri Asaf-baxak ten.
Samaqyâ-Qobadya deqsita numuk ten. Kay kaxxa-abba Galal deqsitak yeneeh, Galal Yedutun baxak ten.
Aasâ-Barkiyya deqsita numuk ten. Kay kaxxa-abba Elkaana deqsitak yen. Elkaana Natoofâ-magaala dariifal ten baaxol geytimta gaandoodil daffeyak yen numu.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit dacayrih suge maray Yarusalaamal gacehiyyak migooqa ah teeti: Sallumuy keenik abbah yene kee Qakkub kee Talmon kee Aciman kee keenih ramad le mara.
Sallum a saaku fanah, Malik Afa deqsitak ten Culmay ayrô-mawqa le kabul geytimtahiyyat dacayrih yan. Dumah yan dabaanal oson akak raden mari, Leewih yooboke mari elle yinfiddige aroocat dacayrih suge marak ten.
Sallum Koorê-baxaay, Koore Ibiyaasaf-baxaay, Ibiyaasaf Korac-baxak ten. Dumah yan dabaanal Korac akak rade mari, YALLIH mari elle yinfiddigen aracat dacayrih elle yenen innal, Sallum kee kaah ramad le maray Koracak radehiyya YALLIH Nabnah-Siraqih afat dacayrih yen marak ten.
Dumah yan dabaanal, Alqedár-Fincas keenik abbah yeneeh; YALLI kaadu kaa'lih yen.
Maselemyá-Zakariyya kaadu Yallih Nabnah-Siraqih afat dacayrih yen numuk ten.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih afat dacayrih yan mari sittat namma bool kee taban kee namma num akkuk yen. Ken migooqa kee akak raden marih migooqa, oson elle sugen mandarwal kitaabal tunkuttubeh ten. Malik Dawud kee nabi Samuwel a taamak amo wagtaanam, oson akak raden marih gabal heen.
Tonna leemik, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih afat dacayri, adok ado fanah abak sugen.
Too mari, Yallih Qibaadah-Qari affara kaalibit inkih dacrisak yen.
Ken toobokoy mandarwal sugtehiyya midu-miduh amaatuk yeneeniih, ayyam gide woo taamat ken luk angaluk yenen.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril duyye elle daanisan golitte kee aki golitteh qaada wagga hayta taama, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit dacayrih suge marak affara numuy keenik abbobtih yenehiyyah gabal heen. Too mari Leewih yooboke marak ten.
Osonuuy bar Qibaadâ-Qari dacrisak xiinak yeneeniih; saaku culma akak fakak yenen. Too qarih maftac ken gabat yen.
Leewih yooboke marak garabah, qibaada elle aban aracal faxxinta taama edde aban mingilwah amo wagtaanamih taama keenih tontocowwe. Edde daanisan golittek beyan waqdi kee addal gacsan waqdi too duyye loowak yenen.
Leewih yooboke marak gersi garabah, gersi duyyey taahirik tanihiyya kee, tonnah kaadu, bulul kee kamriiy, faanus-zeyti (saliid) kee sukti-zeyti kee suruy meqe qerto akak bicsen duyyeh amo wagtaanam gabal keenik heen.
Takkay immay suruy meqe qerto bicisak sugtem seekak ten.
Sadgatah tantacawwu wayta gasiitah bicsiyya, Leewih yooboke numuy Mattitya deqsitahiyya gabal heen. Mattityaay Koracak rade marah yooboke Sallum deqsita numuk naharsi-baxak ten.
Keenih ramad le maray Kohat gulubuh yoobokehiyya, taahirroysen-gaqamboy kulli sabti qiidih ayrol Qibaadâ-Qaril yen miizih amol haanahiyyah bicsiyya ken gabal heen.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal saare abak yen mari, Leewih yooboke marak ten. Too marak abbobtih yen mari bar kee saaku too taama luk yeneemih sabbatah, gersi taama keenih maacannon. Too mari Qibaadâ-Qaril ten golitteh addal dabqah gacen.
Too mari inkih Leewih yooboke marih samadak yenen. Kaadu saqoltik yenen. Dabaaqah elle yeneenim, Yarusalaamak ten. Ken migooqa akak raden mari yaakumik ciggiilih elle yan innal tunkuttubeh ten.
Yaqiiyal Gibqon-magaalak abbah yeneeh; isi barray Maqka deqsittahiyya luk Gibqon-magaalal suge.
Naharsi-baxi kaak Qabdon deqsitak yen. Kay lakal Xuur kee Keesiiy, Baqal kee Ner kee Nadabaay,
Gador kee Acyooy, Zakariyya kee Miklot deqsitta lab-xaylo xale.
Miklot Simam xale. Oson Yarusalaamal isinni ramad le mara lih gacen.
Neriiy Kees xaleeh, Keesiiy Saawul xaleeh, Saawuluuy Yonaatan kee Malkisuwaqaay, Abinadab kee Esbaqal xale.
Yonaatanaay Maribaqal xaleeh, Maribaqalaay Miika xaleeh,
Miikaay Fiton kee Melekiiy, Tacreeyaq kee Acad xale.
Acadaay Yaqra xaleeh, Yaqraay Qalemet kee Qadmawet kee Dimri xale. Dimriiy Mooxa xaleeh,
Mooxaay Binqa xaleeh, Binqaay Raafaya xaleeh, Rafaayaay Elaasa xaleeh, Elaasaay Aaxel xale.
Aaxel lab-xaylok lecey xaleeh, migaaqah Qadrikam kee Bokruuy, Ismaaqil kee Saqaryaay, Qobadya kee Caanan deqsitak yenen.

Filistiin mari, Israayil marat Gilbowaq-Qale deqsitta qaleh amol qeebi aben. Too qeebit Israayil marak mangom rabteeh wohuk raqtem toowweh.
Takkay immay lakak ken ayradduk eybeebexxa heenih Saawul-lab-xaylok Yonaatan kee Abinadab kee Malkisuwaq deqsitta labha qiden.
Qeebi rade waqdi Saawul elle suge kabul kaxxam qilsuk yeneeh; tonna-leemik Filistiin qaskar rubteh tan gaysê-baxat kaxxam mudduumeeh madaluh raaqe.
Too waqdi silac kaah akkuquk suge furraynuh yan numuk iyyeemih, «A diini-maleelah tan Filistiin ummatta yoo qiddeh yol tirtirissaamak, ama tikyal lito seefit yoo qid» kaak iyye. Takkay immay woo furrayni seefit kaa qidu meysih yeffereh. Toh yuble waqdi Saawul isi seef siibba heeh is edde qide.
Taaxige furrayni Saawul rabem yuble waqdi, isi seef siibeh isit heeh edde rabe.
Tonnal Saawul kee Saawul lab-xayloh sidoc inkih rabteeh; kay dardaarinni tokkel gaba kale.
Israayil maray Yidraqel-Daqar deqsita daqaral dabaaqah sugehiyya Israayil-qaskar kuddeeh, Saawul kee kay xaylo rabteh 'yaanam yoobben waqdi, dabaaqah elle sugen magaalooli cabba heenih kudeenih. Sarrak Filistiin-mari yemeeteh woo magaalooli keenik yibbixe.
Qeebi gaba kalek lakal ciggilta ayro Filistiin mari qeebit rabe marak duyye seelebaana'gidih yemeeten waqdi, Saawul kee kay xayloh sidocuy Gilbowaq-qaleh amol qangalaylut tanihiyya keenih sugte.
Too waqdi moyya kaak kallaay xaqul kaak suge silac seelabba heenih gexen. Yalla 'yeenih yaqbuden duyyeeyay sahda gabak bicissehiyya elle yaqbuden qaril yan mara kee, isinni ummatah a xaagu warisu waa mara ruuben. Too mari ta xaagu beya'gidih gexeeh, a xaagu ummatat qiden.
Sarrak kay silac, oson xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh qibaada elle aban qarwak tiyak teenal heeniih, kay moyya Dagon akak iyyaanamay yallah loonuhiyya elle yaqbuden qarit takaren.
Yaabes deqsitta magaalay Gilqad rasih addal geytintahiyyal yan mari, Filistiin mari Saawul lafak abeenim yoobben waqdi,
agiirah keenik yan mari doorimma 'yeeh Saawul kee kay xayloh lafa elle tani ikke gexeenih, Yaabes-magaala fanah baahen. Too marih lafa, too magaalal ten kaxxa caxah gubal yoogoqen. Sarrak ken rabih rookah malcina ayro soomuh sugen.
Saawul wonnah yan raba akah rabem, YALLAL faxxiimak yen imaan agaagul kaak yekkeemih rabe. YALLIH amri cineeh, YALLAL imaan haam hinna'mmay, rabe marih roocaaniyyal fayu esseraanam taamah haysite.
YALLAL fayu messerinna. Tonna leemiik YALLI uma rabah kaa qiddaay kay dardaarinna Yiisâ-baxa Dawud gabal hayya hee.

Israayil mari yakkeemiik Cebron deqsitta magaala fan Dawudul yemeeten. Kaak iyyeenimih, «Nanu ku qabalaay, ku cadoyta kinnino.
Duma Saawul malikih suge saaku kinni way, gaadi faxxiima saaku foocat nek gacca 'teh carbi booxa fanah nee beyak sugtem koo. YALLAY ku Dagelta kinni, isi marak miraac akkettooh ken xiinisa num koo abeleemih qahdi koh culem nanu naaxigeh» axcuk kaal yemeeten.
Israayilik saqoltih yan mari toh axcuk Cebroonul kaal yemeete saaku, Dawud kee Israayil ummatak saqoltih yen mari YALLIH foocal xagana tittah culen. Sarrak Dawud yuskuteeniih; usuk tohuk wadir Israayil malik yekke. YALLI dumaak Samuwelik elle iyyeh suge'nnal, Dawud too saaku malik yekke.
Ayrok teena Malik Dawud kee inkih tan Israayil ummatta, Yarusalaam magaalat qeebi abta'gidih gexxe. Too saaku Yabuusa akak axcuk yenen kedoh yooboke mari woo magaalal dabaaqah yeneeh; magaala kaadu migaaqah Yaabus deqsitak ten. Yabuusâ mari woo baaxol naharak nooke marak ten.
Too mari Dawuduk, «A magaala faxem takke way cultu madudda» iyyen. Dawuduh tu gactek, Siyon qalel sugte megdebwa keenik raaqiseeh, tohuk wadir migaaqah Dawud-Magaala deqsitte.
Too qeebi aben saaku, Dawud, «Yabuusah yooboke num naharal qidinnaan num inkih tan qaskarih abbah akkele» 'yaanam iyyeh suge. Yowab deqsita numuy Xaruya deqsitta barrak baxah yenehiyya gaaduk foocat gacca 'yeh miraaciseeh, qaskar abbootan gee.
Dawud woo qalel sugte megdebwa le aracal buxah yeneeh; tonna-leemiik too aracak ‹Dawud Magaala› 'yaanam iyyen.
Dawud, naharak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta baaxoy ramma luk sugte missoysak baahak, woo qalel sugte megdebwa le arac dariifal magaala xise. Magaalak wohuk raqte exxa Yowab, akah sugte innal, nammayhaak xise.
YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya Dawud lih yeneeh; tonna-leemik Dawud qandeh ayrook ayro aysuk yeyse.
Dawud agiirah tan qaskar luk yeneeh; too qaskar Israayil ummatta lih gacca 'teh, YALLI elle iyye'nnal, Dawud malik yakke'gidih, cato kaah yekken. Kay dardaarinna maqar bahsiisen.
Too agiirak numuk teeni Yaasobqam deqsita agiruy Cakmoon deqsita gulubuh yoobokehiyyak teneeh; too agirii, ‹Yaaxigen Sidoc› deqsitta buttak abbah yen. Ayrok teena sidooca bool yakke mara lih, inki macaxut qeebi abeeh; too sidooca booluk inkih qeebil iissaay sella ken hee.
Kay lakal ‹Yaaxigen Sidocuk› ciggiila saqalah tenem, Doodó-Alqedar deqsita agiruk ten. Too agirii, Acowi deqsita gulubut raaqak yen.
Filistiin-mari qeebih Fas-Dammim deqsita aracal gaaboowe saaku, Alqedar Dawud xaquuk qeebi abe. Gabru deqsitta daro elle toobokeh ten buqre ten. Israayil mari Filistiin marak awyah baaxo cabe waqdi,
kaa kee Dawud too buqrel qeebi abak elle raqte. Oson Filistiin marak gudel gacca 'yeenih qeebi keenit abak raaqeenih ken qiden. Too saaku too qeebil YALLI kaxxa nasri keenih yecee.
Ayrok teena «Yaaxigen Soddom» deqsita agiirak sidooca num Dawud fan yemeeten. Dawud too saaku Qadullam rasul tan gablah garil tan kaxxa xaal suge. Filistiin mari kaadu Refaayim Golo deqsitta golol yifdigeenih yenen.
Too saaku Dawud amô-reebu le aracay uqurah meqehiyyal sugeeh; Filistiin mari kaadu Beetlacam magaala yibbixeh yen.
Sarrak Dawud isi baaxoh lee kassa heeh, too waqdi iyyeemih, «Beetlacam magaalah afal yan qeelih lee yoh baaha num genniyooy faxe raareh an» iyye.
Too waqdi too sidooca agiri Filistiin-mari elle yan aracak adda-adda gacca 'yeenih too qeelak lee qulla heenih Dawuduh baahen. Dawuduh tu gactek, too leek maaqabinnay, YALLIH sadgatah baaxot tet caxe.
Sarrak iyyemii, «Yalli yol yascarramay! A lee aaqubem yol matan. A lee a sidiica numuy isi roocih meysite'kah a marak adda gacca 'yeh a lee baahehiyyah qabala yaaqubeenimih bis le» iyye. Tohuk gexxaamah too lee maaqubinna.
Woo sidooca numuh tu gactek, agiirinni keenik too bis luk yen.
Yowabak toobokoytah yen Abiisay «Yaaxigen Soddom» deqsita soddomuk abbah yen. Ayrok teena inki macaxu luk sidooca bool yakke marat qeebi abeeh too marak inkih yeyseh ken qideh.
Tonna-leemiik too Soddomih addat yimixxige agiruh raaqeeh, abba keenik yekke. Takkay immay «Yaaxigen Sidocih» inna migaq-gexxoh luk mananna.
Yoyadáq-Banaaya kaadu kaak kaxxih yamixxige agiruk ten. Banaaya elle yoobokem, Kabxaqel deqsitta magaalak ten. Banaaya abinnaan taamal qangik ten. Mooyab marak namma agiru qide. Ayrok teena arroqle le rob radak sugeeh; too ayro Banaaya boodoh adda cule waqdi lubak kaah sugeeh; too lubak qideh.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, kaxxam masu naba Masri-num qide. Too num xexxaarah namma mitrik amo gexak yeneeh, silaacah kaxxa masu le macaxu luk yen. Banaaya naharak gabah caxxat kaa yoogoreeh, sarrak gabat luk suge macaxu gabak kaak bukkussa heeh, woo macaxut kaa qide.
Toh, agiruh yan Banaaya abe taama. Banaaya «Yaaxigen Soddomih» adoytak ten. A Soddomih addat migaaqat akak yabba yan numuk tene'mmay, «Yaaxigen Sidoc» gide migaq-gexxoh luk mananna. Dawud isit dacayrih tan qaskarak abba kaa abe.
Tohuk kalah ten labhay qaskariinol timixxigehiyya ten.
Yowab toobokoytah yen Qasahel kee
Beetlacam magaalal yooboke Doodóh-Elcanan kee
Carod magaalal yooboke Sammot kee
Felon magaalal yooboke Celex kee
Takooqa deqsitta magaalal yooboke Qikkés-Qiira kee
Qanatot magaalal yooboke Abiqeder kee
Cuusâ magaalal yooboke Sibkay kee
Acowi-magaalal yooboke Qilay kee
Netoofâ magaalal yooboke Mahray kee
tonnah kaadu Netoofâ magaalal yooboke Baqná-Celed kee
Benyam rasul geytimta Gibqah magaalal yooboke Riibáy-Itay kee
Firqaton magaalal yooboke Banaaya kee
Gaqas deqsitta magaalah xaqul tan goloolah addal yooboke Curay kee
Arbatal yooboke Abiiyel kee
Bacurimil yooboke Qadmawet kee
Saqalbonul yooboke Elyacba deqsita num kee
Gixonul yooboke Hasem deqsita numih xaylo kee
Haraaral yooboke Sagée-Yonataan kee
Haraaral yooboke Sakár-Aciyam kee
Ur baxi Alifal kee
Makeeral yooboke Ceefar kee
Felon magaalal yooboke Aciiya kee
Karmelil yooboke Cesro kee
Edbay baxi Naqray kee
Naatan toobokoytah yen Ayyuqel kee
Hagrí-Mibcar kee
Qammon-marah yooboke Xelek kee
migaaqah Nacaray deqsitaah, ubka Beerotul abe numuy Yowab-silac akkuquk yenehiyya kee
Yitra deqsita gulubuh tooboke Qiira kee Gareeb deqsitta labhah nammey kee
Ciitâ-marah yooboke Uriyya kee
Aclay baxi Dabad kee
Siidá-Qadiina deqsita qaskariitay Ruuben deqsitta kedoh aabakuk yenehiyyay wakalih soddom qaskariita is lih abbaxuk yenehiyya kee
Maqká-Cannan kee
Mitan magaalal yooboke Yosafat kee
Qastarot magaalal yooboke Quddiya kee
Cootam deqsita numih xayloy Samma kee Yaqiiyal migaq luk teneeh ubka Qarooqer magaalal abtehiyya kee
Simrí-Yadiqeel kee kay toobokoytah yen Yoocay Tiixil yoobokehiyya kee
Macwal yooboke Alyel kee
Elnaqam deqsita numih xayloh nammayay migaaqah Yaribay kee Yosawya kee
Mooyab-marah yooboke Yitma kee
Alyel kee Yoobad kee, Xoobal yooboke Yaqsiyel deqsita numuk ten.

Dawud Xiklag deqsitta magaalal Saawuluk megloh yen saaku, mango qaskaray qeebi ixxiga kee labhaytinaane luk tenehiyyat yengele.
Too mari akah yoobokem, Benyam kedoy Saawul akah yoobokehiyyak ten. Guri gaba kee migdi gabah inkih gaysê-baxa elle qidan gura kee wanxefit xeet elle qidan inna nagay aaxaguk yenen.
Gibqâ-magaalal yooboke Samaaqa deqsita numih xayloy migaaqah Aciiqeder kee Yooqas deqsittahiyya qaskar abbobtih keenik ten. A qaskarih migooqa ah teeti:
Qadmawet deqsita numih xayloy Yadyel kee Felet deqsittahiyya kee
Qanatot magaalal tooboke namma qaskariitay Beraaka kee Yaahu deqsitak tenehiyya kee
Gibqon magaalal yooboke Yismaqyaahu deqsita qaskariitay yimixxige agiruk yeneeh Yaaxigen Soddomuk numuk teenah yenehiyya kee
Gadeera magaalal tooboke qaskaray Ermiyaas kee Yacadiyel kee Yocanan kee Yoodabad migaq luk tenehiyya kee
Carif magaalal tooboke qaskaray migaaqah Elquday kee Yarimot kee Balya kee Samarya kee Safatya deqsitak tenehiyya kee
Korac deqsita gulubut raqta qaskaray Elkaana kee Yissiya kee Qadaral kee Yoqeder kee Yaasobqam migaq luk tenehiyya kee
Gador magaalal yooboke Yaroocam deqsita numih xayloy Yoqela kee Dabadya deqsittahiyyak ten.
Dawud bacarih tan baaxok amô-reebu le aracay uqurah meqehiyyal yen saaku, Gaad kedoh tooboke qaskaray qeebil kulsa lehiyya Dawud abe qeebit kaa'lih sugte. Too qaskar gob kee macaxut aban qeebil fula luk yeneeniih, lubak innah inti-qasin agiirak yeneeniih, sissikaaneh qaleelah amol qarkuumud innah gexak yenen.
Too qaskarih migooqa ah teeti:
Keenik abbah yen Qader deqsita num kee
kaak gubal yen Qobadyaay;
ken lakal Aliyab yeneeh, kay lakal Mismanna yeneeh,
kay lakal Ermiyaas yeneeh, kay lakal Qattay yeneeh,
kay lakal Alyel yeneeh, kay lakal kaadu Yocanan yeneeh,
kay lakal Eldabad yeneeh, kay lakal kaadu Ermiyaas yeneeh,
kay lakal Makbannay deqsita num yen. Sittat taban kee inki num akkuk yenen.
A maray Gaadah yooboke inkih, qaskar abbobtik teneeh; keenik gacca 'ya num bool numuk yeyseh yeneeh, keenik cayla le num, alfi numuk yeyseh yen.
Sanatak inikhaytoh alsay Ordon weeqayti emegga 'yeh aruk amo korak yenehiyyat, too weeqaytuk tabba 'yeeniih, elle taben ikkel weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa kee ayrô-culma le kabul suge mara inkih xiiriyeenih.
Benyam kee Yuudâ kedoh yooboke marak garab Dawud elle yan aracay amô-reebu lehiyya yemeeten waqdi,
Dawud kaa gufaanam afal garayya keenih iyyeh, «Qeebil yoo cata'gidih yemeete mara tekkeenik arciba. Takkay immay yoo ganuh yemeete maray yi naqboytih gabal yoo haa'gidih yemeetehiyya tekkeenik, Yallay ni kaxxa abbobti elle aamanuk sugtehiyya sin ableleeh sin akah digaalele» 'yaanam keenik iyye.
«Yaaxigen Soddomuk» qaskar abba yakku waa numuy Qamaasay deqsitahiyya too marak numuk teenak ten. Too waqdi Yallih *Roocaaniyya kaal obteeh, isi milkih kaa hayte. Too num too waqdi anay fayya haak yaabeeh,
«Yiisâ-baxa Dawudow,
nanu ku mara kinninoh, ko'lih nan.
Yalla kinni ku Dagelti ku qaxat yaniih;
amaan kee wagari ko'lih yanay.
Qeebil koo cata mari nasri geyay» iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud ken arcibiseeh isi qaskarak abbobtih ken hee.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, Manasseh yooboke marak garab, Dawud kee Saawul toome saaku, Dawud qaxat gace. Too saaku Dawud Saawulut qeebi aba'gidih Filistiin mara lih Saawul gaaduh gexe. Takkay immay Filistiin mari woo gaadul Dawud maamaninnoonuuy; akah kaa aamine weenim, «Duma kay amoytah suge Saawul yabalu waa waqdi, nee cabba heeh kaa fan nek korek, bayenno» 'yaanamak ten. Tonna-leemiik, «Atu ahaksa Xiklag fan uttuduur» kaak iyyen. Tonna-leemiik too gaaduh ken lih magexinnay Xiklag magaala fanah yuduure.
Too saaku Manasseh yooboke marak tu takkem kaa'lih tuduure. Too marih migaq Qadna kee Yoodabad kee Yadiqeel kee Mikaayil kee Yoodabad kee Aliihu kee Xillatay deqsitak yen. Kulli num keenik alfi takke qaskaray Manasseh yoobokehiyyak abbah yen.
Ta labha nagay yan gidmi le labhak teneeh, Dawud-mara meqe'nnal cateeniih; tonna-leemiik Dawud qaskar abbobtih ken abbaxuk yen.
Kaa cataana'gidih, Dawud qaskarat kulli saaku qusba mari culak yeneeh; tonna-leemiik mangah amagguk yemeggen.
Dawud Cebron magaalal yen saaku, carbil nagay tan ixxiga le qaskar, dumaak luk suge qaskarat tengele. Too mari, Saawul luk suge dardaarinna Dawud elle geya'nnah, cato kaah aben. Toh dumaak Yalli Dawuduh qahdi akah culeh suge qaadak ten. Ta qaskarak loowo ah kaana:
Yuudâ-kedok lica alfi kee bacra boolih qaskariitay silacat tikyah leeh, gob kee macaxut axawah tanihiyya kaal yemeeten.
Simqaan-kedok kaadu malcina alfi kee bool qaskariitay qeebil agiirak tenehiyya kaal temeete.
Leewî-kedok tonnah kaadu affara alfi kee lica boolih num kee,
Haaruunuk rade marak abbah yen Yoyadaq deqsita num kee katatta qaskarak sidiica alfi kee malcina boolih num kee,
Saaduk deqsita furraynuy carbil qangih yenehiyya kee kaah mare luk ten qaskarih abbobtik labaatanna kee namma num kaal temeete.
Benyam-kedok sidiica alfih qaskariita kaal temeete. Saawul akah yoobokem, Benyam kedok teneeh; tonna-leemiik too ayro fanah, too qaskarak mango mari Saawul-xinto luk sugen.
Efrayim-kedok labaatanni alfi kee bacra boolih qaskariitay kedoh addal kaxxa ossobba lehiyya edde ten.
Ayrô-culma le kabut raqta Manassê-kedoh yooboke marak taban kee bacra alfih qaskariita kaal temeete. Too mari inkih, Dawud malik abaana'gidih doorimeenih yenen.
Issakar-kedok namma boolih numuy qaskar abbobtih tenehiyya kee oson abbah akak yanin qaskar kaal temeete. Ta maray abbobtih yenehiyyaa, Israayil rasul abaanam faxxintam kee edde abeh meqe wakti yaaxige marak ten.
Dablon-kedok kontom alfi qaskariitay kulsa leeh, qeebih bical tanihiyya agaagul sinnuk, baguuk kaa cataana'gidih, kaal yemeeten. Ta mari, tohuk kalah kaadu, silaacat carbi elle aban inna nagay barte marak ten.
Naftaalî-kedok kaadu alfi numuy qaskar abbobtih tanihiyya kee soddom kee malcina alfih qaskariitay gob kee macaxut axawah gexxahiyya kaal yemeeten.
Daan-kedok kaadu labaatanna kee bacra alfi kee lica boolih qaskariitay qaskariinô-baritto lehiyya kaal temeete.
Aaser-kedok kaadu morootom alfih qaskariitay kulsa leeh, qeebih bical tanihiyya kaal temeete.
Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqa rakaakayal tan Ruuben kee Gaad kee ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta Manasseh kedoh yooboke marak tittat bool kee labaatanni alfih qaskariitay kulli qaynatih silac gabat lehiyya kaal temeete.
Ta axxul le qaskaray qeebih bical tanihiyya Dawud Israayil-malik abaana'gidih, Cebron magaala fanah gexen. Too qaskarak kalah kaadu raqqa 'ye Israayil mari yakkeenimik Dawud malik abaanamal titta geenih yenen.
Tokkel Dawud lih sidooca ayro aseeniih, ken toobokoy baaxo ken lih lehiyya qibnaytiinoh keenih bicisse leek-maaqo adoobitak sugen.
Kilbat le kabut raqta baaxoy Issakar kee Dablon kee Naftaali kedo elle tanihiyyay Cebroonuk xeeruk raqtahiyyaak, danoona kee gaala kee baakil kee awurwal, riyen bulul kee sublâ-xayloy kafseenihiyya kee kafsen qinab-xaylo kee qinabak bicsen kamri kee caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti (saliid) eerra heenih tokke baahen. Tohuk kalah kaadu, laa kee illiy yasguudoonu waanahiyya baahen. Ta axxul le bica kee mattacoy ummatta bahtehiyya Dawud dardaareemih fayxih farcatah aben.

Malik Dawud alfi-alfi kee bool-boolul kurrunte qaskarak abbobtih yen mara lih malloysiteeh,
sarrak inkih tan Israayil ummatta yiysixxigeemih, «Isin oggolteeniih, YALLAY ni Dageltah yani kaadu ne'lih edde yengeleh yenek, inkih yan ayyuntay neh yaabukehiyyay aham fanah ahat ne'lih ane waa kee, seeka kee Leewih yooboke marah, ken magaalooli kee lacah meqe baaxo fanah farmo keenih rubba hayneh, ‹Akke nee fanah amaay, inki aracal gaabownay› 'yaanam keenik innay.
Sarrak kaadu Yallih-Qahdih-Sanduguy Saawul dardaare saaku amo akak wagte weenihiyya akke fan bahnay» 'yaanamah mala keenil baahe.
Ta mala yoobben waqdi yossokooteeniih, «Nabam meqe» 'yaanam iyyen.
Tohuk wadir Dawud Israayil ummatak, Masri cuduuduk gabbi-qaxat raaqa aracak, Camat deqsita daabay kilbat le kabut raqtahiyyah amma 'yaanam tan dabaaqah yan marak, «Gaaboowa» 'yaanamih seeco abe. Too seeco keenih akah abem, Yallih-Qahdi edde yan Sandug Kiryat-Yaqaarim magaalak Yarusalaam fan baahaana'gidik ten.
Sarrak Dawud kee too mari YALLIH-Qahdih-Sandug baahaana'gidih, duma Baqla deqsitak ten magaalay sarra Kiryat-Yaqaarim 'yaanam migaaqah akah yeyyeeqeenihiyya gexeeniih; too Sandug Yarusalaam fanah baahen. Kiryat-Yaqaarim elle tenem, Yuudâ-rasuk ten. Too sanduguy Yarusalaam fanah baaheenihiyya migaq akak lem, YALLAY dardaarinni-korsi akak galwa leemik daga le kabu raqtahiyya.
Sandug elle sugem, Abinadab deqsita numih qarik teneeh; too qarik eyyeqqa heeniih, qusba gaariy awurwa giitak beytahiyyah bagul heen. Gaarik foocat Qudda kee Acyo deqsitta namma num gacte.
Takkay immay Dawud kee raqqa 'ye mari a sandug elle beyaanamal, Yallih-massakaxxah quuruk loonumuuk argaduk yemeeten. Afak Yallih saare edde haakaay wallitakaay *begena kee kiraraay giyaagib kee karambooy *baanta aagaruk yemeeten.
Kidon deqsita num luk suge aracay darok caffa elle baxsaanahiyya gufen waqdi, Sandug edde tan gaari giitak beyak sugte awurwa tondofoofole. Too waqdi Qudda gaba akah matriseh Sandug radaamak gabah yibbixe.
Takkay immay a Sandug gabah xagem YALLIH bagcarra kaah xalteeh, edde rabe. Tokkel elle Yallih foocal rabe.
Dawud, YALLI bagcarriteh Qudda digaalem yuble waqdi yinqibeh. Tohuk wadir too aracak Fares-Qudda
