Tohuk wadir Dawud Yallak meysitak raaqeeh, «Ahaysa, YALLIH Qahdi adda akak yan Sandug yi magaala fan beyam matakka» iyye.
Sarrak woo Sandug Yarusalaam fanah beyaamak raaqeh; Yoobad-Edom deqsita numuy Gat magaalal yoobokehiyyah buxal cabe.
Too numih buxal too sandug sidooca alsa suge. YALLI Yoobad-Edom kee kay buxah maraay usuk edderra heemit barkat hee.

Malik Curam deqsita malikiy Suur magaalal malikih yenehiyya doolat abbobti Dawud fan ruube. Woo mara luk, qarwa edde xisan sariidâ-coox kee, xeetik qarwa elle bicsa'nna yaaxige mara kee, cooxuk duyye elle bicsa'nna yaaxige mara kaah ruube. Too mara kaah akah ruubem, kay qari kaah xisaana'gidik ten.
Too saaku Dawud YALLI Israayil-malik kaa abeh yanim yismiteeh; Israayil ummattah taagah, YALLI kay dardaarinna fayya heem yeexegeh.
Yarusalaam magaalal suge saaku, duma luk suge agabuk kalah abite agabut say-xaylo kee lab-xaylo xale.
Yarusalaam magaalal xale xayloh migaq ah kaana: Sammuqa kee Soobab kee Naatan kee Suleeman kee
Yibcar kee Alisuwaq kee Elfalet kee
Nooga kee Nefeg kee Yafiyaq kee
Alisamaq kee Balyadaq kee Elifalat deqsitak yenen.
*Filistiin-mari Dawud inkih yan Israayil rasul malik yekke 'yaanam yoobben waqdi, kaa yabbixeeni'gidih gaaden. Dawud toh yoobbe waqdi, qeebih gital keenih matra'gidih gexe.
Filistiin-mari Refaayim Golo deqsitta golo gufen waqdi, ummatta buubaanam qimbisen.
Dawud Yallal fayu essereeh iyyemii, «Yi Dageltaw, Filistiin marat qeebi maay aboo? Qeebi keenit abek, nasri yoh maay acee litoo?» axcuk Yallal essero essere. YALLI kaal gacseemih «Yeeyik, keenik koo aysiiseyyok, gexay qeebi keenit ab» 'yaanam kaal gacse.
Yallak too gacsa gee waqdi, Baqal-Faraadim deqsita aracal qeebi keenit abeeh keenik yeyseh. Keenik yeyse waqdi, «Yalli yi naqboytit weeqi innah yi duufut bayse» 'yaanam iyye. Too aracak Baqal-Faraadim
Filistiin-mari kude waqdi Yallih aftok aqbuduk sugen duyye elle cabeenih kuden. Sarrak Dawud, «A duyye cararisa» iyyeh; carariseenih.
Filistiin mari kibu suge'kal, taaxige golo fanah qagteeniih, tokkel suge marih duyye buuben.
Dawud kaadu qagteh, Yallal fayu essere. Too saaku Yalli kaak iyyeemih, «Akkel qeebi keenit maabinay; gexxa xicaay woo coox elle yani'kke gufta waqdi, qeebih bical gac.
Tokkek coox amook ibi maaqattah anay kol radu waa waqdi, qeebih gaba qid. Macaay intek, Filistiin-marak tayse'gidih, foocat anu kok gaceyyo» 'yaanam kaal gacse.
Dawud Yalli kaak elle inxicca 'ye innal abeeh; tohuk gexxaamah, Filistiin-mara Gibqon-magaalak xabba haanamaay Geser-magaalah amma 'yaanam salafak xiiriyak been.
Dawud migaq kulli baaxol yontoobbeeh; YALLIH fayxi edde teneemih taagah, kulli doolat kaak meysitak xinte.

Dawud isi magaalay Dawud-Magaala akak iyyaanahiyyal qarwa xise. Too qarwak kalah kaadu, Yallih Qahdih Sandug edde daanisan Siraq soolise.
Tohuk lakal usuk iyyeemih, «Qahdi Sandug Leewih yaabuke mari yakkuqay. Macaay inteenik, YALLI iyyeemih, ‹A Sandug yakkuqeenim kee, daayiman yoo yakdumeenimih taamah doorem, keeni› » 'yaanam iyye.
Sarrî-saaku Dawud inkih yan Israayil marah Yarusalaam magaala yamaateenimih farmo ruube. Woo farmo akah keenih ruubem, Qahdi-Sandug Yarusalaam magaala fanah baahaana'gidik ten.
Sarrak kaadu Leewih yooboke marah seeco abe. Tonnah kaadu Haaruunuk rade marah seeco abe. Gaaboowen waqdi,
Leewî-kedok Kohat deqsita gulubuk abbah yen Uriyel deqsita num kee, kaa'lih bool kee labaatanni numuy kay gulubut raqtahiyya temeete.
Maraari deqsita gulubuk abbah yen Qasaaya deqsita num kee, kaa'lih namma bool kee labaatanni num temeete.
Gerson-gulubuk abbah yen Ayyuqel deqsita num kee, kaa'lih bool kee soddom num temeete.
Alixafan-gulubuk kaadu Samaqya deqsita num yemeete. Kaa'lih usuk abbah akak yan marak namma boolih num temeete.
Cebron-gulubuk kaadu Alyel deqsita num yemeete. Too num lih usuk abbah akak yan bacra-tabanih num temeete.
Quddiyeel-gulubuk Qamnadab deqsita num yemeete. Kaa'lih usuk abbah akak yan bool kee taban kee namma num temeete.
Dawud sek Saaduk kee Abiyataar kee, tonnah kaadu, too Leewih yooboke laca numuy migaaqah Uriyel kee Qasaayaay, Ayyuqel kee Samaqyaay, Alyel kee Qamnadab akak axcuk yeneenihiyya is fanah seece.
Too mari kaal yemeete waqdi keenik iyyeemih, «Isin Leewih marak saqoltih tantoonuuh; tonna-leemiik isinni kee isinni kedoh xayloh taahirik gactaanama. Tohuk gaba kalla haytan waqdi, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyah Qahdih Sandug elle yani'kkek gexxeenih anu akah bicse siraq fanah baahetton.
A saaku ah siinik akah axcemii, ahak duma a Sandug bahnam fanxe waqdi, isin masuginnitoonuuy; Yallih assanabbiyyah nek faxxintam elle abna'nna maaxaginninooy; tonna-leemiik YALLAY ni Dageltah yanihiyyah digaala nee maadde» 'yaanam keenik iyye.
Dawud toh keenik iyyek wadiril, seeka kee Leewih yooboke mari, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyah Qahdih Sandug Yarusalaam fan baahaana'gidih, taahirik gacen.
Leewi-mari Yalli Muusah-afat ken elle amrise'nnal, too Sandug wassaakâ-gurral Sandug elle yakkuqen cooxul sunkul hayya heenih been.
Dawud kaadu Leewih abbobtih amri yeceeh iyyeemih, «Leewih yooboke marak Yallih saare abu waa mara ixiga. Tonnah kaadu, *begena kee *kiraraay giyaagib tassa axcuk yaaguru waa mara ixiga» 'yaanamih amri yecee.
Saare abak yen marak nacaasak bicsen giyaagib yaagureeni'gidih dooreenim: Ayyuqél-Heeman deqsita num kee, kaah ramad luk Barkiyyah-Asaf deqsita num kee, Kusayaahúh-Etan deqsita numuk ten. Etan, Maraari deqsita gulubuh yooboke. Too marih catohuu, Leewih marak kurrubaaheh anay le xongolot kirar nagay yaagure mara dooren. Tohumuu, Zakariyya kee Yaqdiyel kee Samiraamot kee Yaciyel kee Qunni kee Aliyab kee Maqseyaahu kee Banaaya deqsita num dooren.
Begenah inin xongoloh anayat yaagure maray kaadu Leewih yoobokehiyya dooren. Tohumuu, Mattitya kee Alifleehu kee Mikneya kee Qadadyaahu kee, Qibaadâ-Qarit dacayrih ten Yoobad-Edom kee Yaqiiyal deqsitta labhak ten.
Kananya deqsita num, saare elle aban inna ixxiga kaxxam luk yeneeh; tonna-leemiik a marak inkih abba kaa aben.
Barkiyya kee Elkaana deqsitta namma num, Yoobad-Edom kee Yaciiya deqsitta namma num lih gacca 'yeenih Qahdi-Sandug dacrisaanamih taama keenih yeceen. Seekah yooboke maray migaaqah Sabanya kee Yosafat kee Netanel kee Qamaasay kee Zakariyya kee Banaaya kee Elqeeder deqsitak yeneenihiyya, Qahdi-Sandugih foocal *baanta yaagureenim taamah luk yenen.
Tohuk gaba kalla heen waqdi, Dawud kee Israayil abbobti kee qaskar-abbobti YALLIH Qahdih Sandug baahaana'gidih, Yoobad-Edom deqsita numih buxay woo Sandug elle yanihiyya fanah gexen. Too ayro kaxxa qaffayda kee farcat aben.
Leewih yooboke maray a Sandug baahehiyyal Yallih cato geenimih sabbatah, sadgatah malcina awur kee malcina maruw yusguuden.
Dawud nabam xagar meqe *baftak bicsen sartanat gaceeh; Leewih yooboke maray Sandug akkuquk yenehiyya kaak kaxxih, too bis le sartanat gacen. Tonnah kaadu, saare abak yen mara kee, keenik abbah yen Kananya too xaqan le sartanat gacen. Dawud too sartanak kalah *baftak bicsen saroy rikeek tanihiyya isit heeh yen.
Tonnal Israayil ummatta takkeemiik, YALLIH Qahdih-Sandug too bical baaheeniih, Yarusalaam guffa haam fanah qililisakaay, baanta kee gaysaay giyaagib kee begenaay kirar aagaruk afracuk baahen.
Sandug Yarusalaam magaala culsan waqdi, Saawuluk raqte baxáy migaaqah Miikala deqsitak teneeh Dawud abbaxuk yenehiyya taagatak afah wagga hayte. Too waqdi tet baqalay YALLIH massakaxxah wonnak annah farcatah yargideeh gubak falita tuble. Toh tuble waqdi, «Ah tu'numuk tanih matan!» 'yaanam niyal hayteeh kaa burutteh.

Sandug magaala maadisen waqdi, Dawud Sandug elle hoonuh sooliseh suge siraqih addal heen. Tohuk wadir Yallih-sadgatah cado akak carrisan saq qideeniih, kaadu amaanah xiinaanam taybulle asta takke'gidih Yallah sadgat aben.
Dawud sadgatak gaba kalla hee waqdi, YALLIH migaaqal tokkel suge marah inkih dooqa abe.
Sarrak Israayil marak lab-mara kee say marah inkih, gaqamboh ikke kee solal alaysen cadoh ikke kee, kafsen qinab-xaylok tu'baxa takkem keenih keefe.
Leewih yooboke marak garabak Dawud iyyeemih, «Qahdi-Sandugih foocal, ummat YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya taqbude waqdi, isin dooqa abak, YALLA saarisakaay kaa faylisak foocat gacaay; tahak wadir sin taama tohu» keenik iyye.
Tohuk abbah Asaf heeh kay gubal Zakariyya hee. Yaqiiyal kee Samiraamot kee Yaciyel kee Mattitya kee Aliyab kee Banaaya kee Yoobad-Edom kee Yaqiiyal *begena kee kirar yaagureenimih taama keenih yecee. Asaf kaadu giyaagib yaagureenim taamah luk yen.
Tohuk kalah kaadu namma seekiy Banaaya kee Yacadiyel deqsittahiyya kulli way *baanta yaagureenim taamah luk yenen. A baanta elle yaagureenim Yallih-Qahdih-Sandugih foocak ten.
Dawud, Asaf kee kaa'lih yen Leewih yooboke mari saare abem naharaak taama keenih yeceem, too ayrok ten.
Saareh iyyeenimii,
YALLAH candu gacisay
kaak cato esserak kaa fan deerisa.
Kay nabna sinaamah warisa;
usuk abem sahdah warisa.
YALLAH fayla aba;
usuk abe qajaaqibatat yaaba.
Kay migaaqay *kudduusuk yanit ruffu xica;
YALLA faxa mari baguuk ruffu iyyay.
YALLAL cato essera; qande siinit haa'gidih,
hangi kaah ucuyay; kabba kaat inxicay.
Isin, Israayiliy kay naqasuh yenek rade maraw,
isin, Yaqkuubuy usuk dooritek rade maraw,
YALLI abe ablewaynu kassa haa;
usuk yecee cokmi kassita.
YALLI ni Dagelta kinni.
Usuk amri elle lem, kulli baaxo.
Kay qahdi kulli way kassita;
usuk adok ado alfih amma 'tam fan cule xagna kassita.
Abraahimih cule qahdi kassita;
Iscaakak, «Ku abba luk cule qahdi abeyyo»
axcuk xiibite.
Yalli, Yaqkuub lih woo qahdiy baye waahiyya
diggoyse; kaak iyyemii,
«Kanqaan baaxo ku gabal heeyyo;
woo baaxo kum akkele» 'yaanam kaak iyye.
Woo saaku Israayil mari,
Kanqaan baaxol daguk yeneeh;
woo baaxol qibinah yenen.
Oson baaxook baaxo safarah gexen;
malikwaak malikwa fan gexen.
Yalli num keenit xukkute kaleeh;
isih ken dacrisa'gidih, malikwa keenih yessecekke.
«Yi ummatay anu doorel umam mabaahina;
yi nabuwwa maxagina» keenik iyye.
Ummatey inkih, YALLA saarisa.
Nee waddem kaak, ummatah warisa;
nee wadem kulli saaku warisa.
Usuk le nabnat yaabay warisa.
Kay kaxxa abto kulli marat qida.
YALLI nabaah, naba fayla lem kaa.
Sinam uqbudda haytaamak inkih
fuli meysi akah taguudem YALLA.
Kaak sa gersiimih qibaada foyya.
Qaraanal geytimtem gintem YALLA.
YALLI nabna leeh, misliino luk yan.
Kay aracal tanim, qandeey farci.
Addunyal enna 'ta kedooda inkih
YALLIH nabna kee qande saarissay.
YALLIH-migaaqay nabna let yaaba.
Sadgat baahay, YALLIH-qarih ama.
Kudduusuk yan YALLI yambullee way,
kaa essekexxeyay gommoh kaah rada.
Kaak cunxitaay, ummatey, meysita.
Baaxo daabinteh angoyya mabta.
Qaran kee baaxoy ifric; tassa xic!
YALLI malik kinnim baxxaqisaay,
kulli baaxol yan marah warisa.
Bad kee rooci leemiy badal tanik,
ifrica isin, qililisa farcih.
Buqre-aba buqre elle abtah tan baaxooy
tet bagul geytintaamak kaadu inkih,
isin tassa xicaay ruffa xica.
YALLI baad xiinisuh amaatele.
Xiinisa'gidih yamaatu waa ayro,
garbo kee coox inkih qililsele.
YALLI maqaane lek, candu kaah gacisa!
YALLIH-kacni mayambaxak,
tohul candu kaah gacisa.
«Yallaw, ni Wadeenaw, nee cat.
Candu koh akah gacisnaah,
ku migaaqay *kudduusuk yanihiyya faylisna'gidih,
a aki marih addak nee gacisaay keenik nee wadey» dooqah kaak intaama.
YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya faylisa.
Away kaa faylisa; daayiman kaa saarisa.
Too saarek gaba kalla heen waqdi, sugga inte ummatta «Aamiin, aamiin! YALLA fayla taafay!» axcuk yukkuqeenih.
Dawud, Asaf kee kay wadayah yen Leewih yooboke mara YALLIH Qahdih-Sandug elle tani'kkel aban dooqak abbobtih ken hee. Oson too aracal kulli saaku Yallih taama abaanam taamah luk yenen.
Yedutun baxay Yoobad-Edom deqsita kee lactam kee bacra numuy usuk akah yooboke kedok kay gulubut raaqak tenehiyya a taamal Asaf-gubal kaa catak yenen. Coosa kee Yoobad-Edom kaadu Qibaadâ-Qarih-afoofi dacrisak yenen.
Sek Saaduk kee kaah ramad le seekah tu gactek, Gibqon magaalal, YALLIH qibaada elle takke siraqih addal, abbootan luk yenen.
Maaci elle maacisinnaanimil, bari elle akinnaanimil, YALLI Israayil-ummattal ruube kitaabal elle tani'nnal, sadgat elle cararisan mansafal YALLIH migaaqal inkitanuuk cado akak cararisan sadgat aben.
Oson toh aban waqdi, Heeman kee Yedutun deqsitta namma num kee ken lih yeexegen maray YALLA saarisaana'gidih dooreenihiyya tokkel too saare abak ten. YALLIH kacanuy waarahiyya faylisak yenen.
A namma num, ahak kalah kaadu, Yallih saare aban waqdi baanta kee giyaagib kee wohuk kalah tan duyyeeyay Yallih saareh yaagureenihiyyah abbootan luk yen. Yedutunuk lab-xaylo Qibaadâ-Qarih-afoofi dacrisak ten.
Tohuk wadir kulli num isi buxa fanah yuduure. Dawud kaadu isi buxah marah dooqa aba'gidih, isi buxah yuduure.

Tohuk wadir Malik Dawud buxah isi qaril yen. Ayrok teena nabi Naatanak iyyemii, «Anu akkel akah table'nnah, innih, sariidâ-cooxuk bicsen qarih addal ani'mmay, YALLIH Qahdih-Sandug uxih siraq addat yanik. Ahak maca abam tayse?» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Naatan kaal gacsemii, «Yalli lih yanim kook, kot ceelinnaanim ab» kaak iyye.
Takkay immay too bar Yalli Naatan lih yaabeeh iyyeemih,
«Gexay, yi naqasu Dawuduk intaamah, ‹YALLI anu addat akak gacu waa qari yoh xissu waytam koo hinna, kok iyyah yan› kaak inxic.
Israayil mara Masrik eyyeqqa heemiiy a saaku fanah Qibaadâ-Qarit magaciyyo. Kulli way siraq addat sugeeh, aracaak arac too siraq addat gexak suge.
Israayil mara lih mango safar abe immay, ahaydumah Israayil abbobtiy innih reedisehiyyak, ‹Qibaadâ-Qariy sariidâ-cooxuk bicseenihiyya macah yoh bicise waytan?› akak exce abba mayyu.
«Tonna'mmay taway yi naqasu Dawuduk intaamah, ‹YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya kok iyyaamah, Edde sugte illi duwak kalla koo heeh, Israayil ummatay yi marah tanihiyyah abba koo abe.
Atu gexinnaan ikke ko'lih gexak suge. Atu fooca fanah akah gutuqta'nnah, naqboytiitik qeebil koo aysiisuk suge. Uxih a addunyah bagul kaxxa migaq-gexxo le marak kaxxih, kaxxa migaq kot heeyyo.
Israayil ummattay inni mara abehiyya sinam keenit xukkute'kal, elle gacoonu waan aracal ken nookiseh an. A baaxo culeenim kee akke fan umeynit qeebi keenit abak sugte'mmay, ahak wadir woh gaba kalele. Koo kaadu naqboytiitik iysissa koo heeh, buxa innih koh xiseyyooh, ramad kok aymaggeyyo.
Atu rabtaah isi kaxxa abbobti lih tamoogoqu wayta saaku, ku xaylok numuk teena malik abeyyooh, kay reeda qande bahsiiseyyo.
Qibaadâ-Qari yoh xissu waytam, ku xaylok too numu. Kay reeda baxak baxal akah raqta'nnah abeyyo.
Anu innih abba kaah akkeyyooh; usuk kaadu baxi gideh yok gacele. Saawuluy atu arac akak raaqissehiyyak akah abe'nnah, abak suge cato kaak margiqa.
Inni mara kee inni dardaarinnak abbah kaa heeyyo; kay dardaarinni baxak baxal raaqele; kay doolat kulli way waarele› kaak inxic» iyye.
Sarrak Naatan amma 'yeh Dawuduh YALLI ta wacyil kaak iyyem warse.
Tohuk lakal Malik Dawud siraq adday YALLA-elle-yaqbudeenihiyya culla 'yeeh, tokkel daffa 'yeh fayla kee dooqa abe. Iyyeemih, «YALLAW, yi Dageltaw, anu a axxul le maqaaney yoh abtehiyya geyam caddik le num hinniyo. Yoo kee yi buxah marak atu neh abteh tan maqaane, ni caddik fulta maqaane.
Yallaw, a saaku inkinnah duma neh abteh sugte maqaanek giffa 'ta maqaane neh abte. Yi ramadah kaadu sarrî-dabaanal abtu waytaamat yabteh. YALLAW, yi Dageltaw, kaxxa numuh yoo tablem asmiteh an.
Yooy ku naqasuh yanihiyya isih taaxigeeh, kinniyo num yok tasmiteh immay, YALLAW, toh aaxagih kaxxa num yoo abte. Anu ahak maca axco!
Aham, atu xagnisseeh isih yoh faxxeemiy yoh abtu waytaama. Sarrah yan dabaanal yok radu waa mara kaxxa mara abettom isi fayxiik yoh warisseh.
YALLAW, ku bis lem matan. Yalli dibuk koo kinnim dumaak aaxaguk sugne; kok sah Yalli mayana.
Israayil ummattay isi mara abta'gidih naqoosinnak teyyeeqehiyyah bis le doolat addunyâ-bagul matan. Atu keenih abte kaxxa taama ku migaq addunyâ-bagul fayya hayte. Ku maray duma Masril edde suge naqoosinnak teyyeeqehiyya qeebil bisoh gutuqak elle yamaateenimil, ken taagah kalih mara baaxok teyyeeqe.
YALLAW, Israayil mara isi maray way ayxeere waytahiyya abte; isih Dagelta keenih tekke.
«YALLAW, yoo kee yi marah culte xagana xagur. Abeyyo intem neh ab.
Tonnal ku migaq antaabbeleeh, sahda inkih, ‹YALLAY Nabaamak Nabaah, Israayil ummatak amol yanihiyya, Israayil doore Dagelta kinni› 'yaanam axcelon. Yi dardaarinna kaadu baxak baxal ku foocal raaqa dardaarinnay baye waahiyya abetto.
Yi Dageltaw, yoh abtu waytam yoh warisseeh, yi durruyyat dardorti abtu waytam yoh warisse. Tonna-leemiik a dooqa edde aba niya yot gacte.
YALLAW, atu Yalla kinnitooh; yooy ku naqasu kinnihiyyah muxxo le xagana culte.
Yok radda inteemih reeda baxak baxal akah raqta innah, isi barkat keenit hay. YALLAW, tah kaadu atu isih xagana akah culteemi. Tonna-leemik, atu elle inte innal, yooy ku naqasuh yanik radda 'ya marat barkat kulli way heettom aaxigeh» 'yaanam iyye.

Waqla suggu 'yeenik lakal, Malik Dawud Filistiin marat qeebi abeeh too qeebil keenik yeyse. Filistiin mari elle suge Gat magaala kee tet dariifal tan mandarwa keenik raaqiseeh isi gabat hee.
Too marak kalah Mooyab marat qeebi abeeh, isi gubat ken hee. Tohuk wadir too mari gabbara kaah acayuk yenen.
Suuriyah malikiy migaaqah Hadad-Qeder deqsitak yenehiyya Furaat weeqaytuk daga raqta exxat raqta baaxo isi gubat gacsa'gidih gexak suge waqdi, Dawud qeebi kaat abe. Hadad-Qeder, Xooba deqsita rakaakayak abbah yen. A rakaakay elle geytimam Cammat deqsita rakaakayih xaquk ten.
Dawud qeebi edde aban gaariirak alfiiy, tonnah kaadu, malcina boolih qaskaritay faras amok qeebi abahiyya kee, ibi qaskarak malcina alfih num kaak yibbixe. Woo faarisik bool takkem gaari edde beya'gidih raaqiseeh, raqqa 'te faariisa xukcuunul yiggileeh iba waysiise.
Dabaaqah Damaskol yen Suuriyah mari, Malik Hadad-Qeder catoh qaskar ruubeeniih; Dawud qeebil labaatanna kee namma alfi takke qaskar keenik qide.
Sarrak Damaskoh-rasih addal isi qaskar hee. Tohuk wadir too mari kay gubat gaceeh gabbara kaah acayuk raaqe.
Dawud qeebi elle abinnaan ikkel, YALLI nasri kaah yecee.
Dahabak bicsen mango goobway Hadad-Qederit dacayrih ten qaskar luk sugtehiyya Yarusalaam magaala fan dannabah keenik bee.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, nacaasak bicsen duyyek mangom raaqise. Too duyye akak beem, Tibhat kee Kun deqsitta namma magaalay Hadad-Qeder malikih elle sugehiyyak ten. Suleeman, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal ten qamidwa kee kaxxa tanak kee, tonnah kaadu, nacaasak bicissa heen duyyeeyay Qibaadâ-Qarih-taama edde abak sugeenihiyya woo nacaasak bicsiise.
Sarrak Hamat-rasul yen malikiy Tooqi deqsitahiyya, Dawud, Hadad-Qeder qaskarak inkih yeyseh 'yaanam yoobbe waqdi,
isi baxay migaaqah Yooram deqsitahiyya kaal ruube. Too baxak iyyeemih, «Naharak, ‹Salaamata kok iyye› kaak inxicaay, sarrak ‹Unkaq kok iyyeh, Hadad-Qederik qeebil teyseemi kok iyye› kaak inxic. A duyyey dahab kee lakqo kee nacaasak bicseenihiyya gabat kaah beyaay, ‹Mattacoh koh ruube› kaak inxic» iyye. Hadad-Qeder mango waqdi Tooqi deqsita malikit qeebi abak suge.
Malik Dawud too duyyey too malik kaah ruubehiyya YALLIH qibaadah tuxxiiqit elle assa'nnah abe. Tohuk kalah Edom kee Mooyab kee Qammon kee Filistiin kee Qamaalek deqsita maray qeebil akak yeysehiyyak dannabah orbise dahab kee lakqo, ta duyye lih hayya heeh, YALLIH qibaadah tuxxiiqit elle assa innah abe.
Xaruya deqsitta barrah baxay migaaqah Abiisay deqsitak yenehiyya, ‹Qasbô-Golo› deqsita aracal Edom marat qeebi abeeh, too qeebil taban kee bacra alfih num keenik sele.
Sarrak inkih yan Edom rasul qaskar heeh, tohuk wadir tokkel suggu 'ye mara Dawud gubat hee. Dawud elle gexinnaan ikkel abinnaan qeebil YALLI nasri kaah acayuk yen.
Tonnal Dawud inkih yan Israayil rasuk amoyta yekkeeh; abbah akak yan mara inkih cakki kee qadaalatat xiinisak suge.
Yowabay Xaruya deqsitta barrah baxah yenehiyya qaskarak inkih abbah yen. Aciilúd-Yacoosafat deqsita num tikka intem yaktube numuk ten.
Aciitúb-Saaduk kee Abiyatáar-Acimalek diini abbobtih ten. Sawsa deqsita num kaadu malikik kutbe-abeenah yen.
Yoyadáq-Banaaya kaadu Dawud dacayrih tan qaskar abbah yen. Woo qaskar marin marak ten. Tohuk kalah kaadu, Dawuduk lab-xaylo kay gubal kaxxa abbootan luk ten.

Waqla suggu 'yeenik lakal, Qammon rasih malikih yen Nacas rabeeh; kay baxay migaaqah Cannun akak iyyaanahiyya kay aracal malik yekke.
Dawud too malikih raba yoobbe waqdi, «Usuk meqem yoh abeemih; anu away kaadu kay baxah amqeyyo» iyye. Sarrak kaah le bagi maqaane kaah warisu waa mara Nacas baxah farmo ruube.
Farmoh ruube mari kay baxay malik yekkehiyyal gexen.
Too mari Qammon-baaxo gufe waqdi, Qammon marih abbobti malikik inteemih, «Amoytaw, away Dawud a mara akah ruubem nummah ku abbah assakaxxiyyah kot celtaa? Ku abbah taqdiyyah ken maruubinnay; sarrak qeebil nek akah yayse'nnah, ni baaxo elle tani'nna gibittaay cubbussa heenih gexaana'gidi» kaak iyyen.
Cannun too yab yoobbe waqdi, Malik Dawud ruube marak deben mollaay sartanay edde sugeenihiyya xiiqarel keenik qanxissa heeh ken xiiriye.
Too marat toh tekke waqdi, isinni baaxol woo ceelot yaduureenim kaxxa wacarriy keenil tekke. Dawud a xaagu yoobbe waqdi, «Annah, buxa fanah maaduurinay, deben siinih ubukka 'yam fanah Yerikô-magaalal suga» 'yaanam keenih ruube.
Sarrak Cannun kee kay mari, Dawud naqabu xaamiteenim isinnik yeexegen. Tohuk gexxaamah, Daga raqta Mesbotaamiyah rasu kee, tonnah kaadu, Suuriyah mari elle suge Maqka kee Xooba deqsita namma rasuk faras-gaari kee woo gaarih amok qeebi abta labha bahsiisen. Too mara lakqot xaameeniih, soddom kee affara alfih kiilo lakqok akah yeceen.
Soddom kee namma alfih faras-gaariy kirah baaheeni kee, Maqka deqsita rasih malik kee kay qaskar temeeteeh, Medaba deqsitta magaalah xaqul yiffidigen. Qammon mari kaadu, elle enna 'ya ikkek, qeebih yewqeeh bical gace.
Dawud a mari aba bica kee tikki 'taamih xaagu gee waqdi, Yowab kee qaskar inkih qeebih ruube.
Qammon mari qeebih daqaarimeeh, Rabba deqsitta magaalay inaytâ-magaalah luk yeneenihiyyah culmal qeebi akak aboonu waan aracal gacen. Ken catoh temeete malikwah tu gactek, qeebih barrih tan baaxoy qeebi akak aboonu waanahiyya yibbixen.
Tohuk lakal Yowab, naqboytit-qaskar fooca kee salafak gacca 'teh qeebi keenit abtu waytam yuble waqdi, Israayil qaskarak inkih tayse qaskar doorru heeh, Suuriyah qaskarat fooca kee foocah eyseddi hee.
Raqqa 'te qaskarak Abiisay deqsita kay toobokoyta abbah akak hayya heeh, Qammon-qaskarat foocah raaqa arac ken yibbixsiise.
Too waqdi Yowab toobokoytak iyyemii, «Suuriyah mari qeebil yok yaysem tublek, catoh yoh amaatetto. Qammon mari kok yaysem ublek, catoh anu koh amaateyyo» iyye.
Kaadu qagseh kaak iyyeemih, «Agiru tikay digga xic. Ninni mara kee ni Dageltih magaaloolih nagay yan qeebi abnaama. Ellecabol YALLI isih loowem akkele» iyye.
Yowab kee kay mara qeebih dadahte waqdi, Suuriyah mari kudeh.
Suuriyah mara kudah yublen waqdi, Qammon mari kaadu Abiisayak yoowweeh, magaalah adda culen. Tohuk wadir Yowab Yarusalaam magaala fan yuduure.
Suuriyah mari qeebil gacem isik yuble waqdi, Suuriyah maray Furaatak woo kabul sugehiyyah farmo ruubeenih, qaskar baaheeniih; too qaskarak abbah Soobak deqsita numuy Malik Hadad-Qeder qaskarak abbah yanihiyya heen. Hadad Qeder akak yemeetem, Xooba deqsita aracak ten.
Malik Dawud ta xaagu elle gee'kkel, Israayil qaskar gaabossa heeh, Ordon weeqaytuk woo qaxa raqta exxal, Suuriyah qaskarat fooca kee foocah gacca 'yeenih, qeebi elle aban arac ken yibbixsiise. Tohuk lakal qeebi radeeh;
sarra, Suuriyah qaskar wadir-wadirih toowwe. Too qeebil Dawud kee kay qaskar, faaris-gaariirat qeebi aba marak malcina alfih qaskariita qideeniih, ibi qaskarak kaadu, morootom alfih qaskariita keenik qiden. Suuriyah qaskarak abbah suge Soobak kaadu edde qiden.
Malik Hadad-Qeder gubat sugte malikwa Israayil mari carbil keenik yeysem yoobben waqdi, Dawud lih bica haysiteeniih, kay gabah gacen. Tohuk wadir Suuriyah-mari Qammon-mara carbil cataanamak raaqen.

Ciggiila sugumih adday dardorti xeflih qeebih edde gexxahiyyat Yowab qaskarak foocat gacca 'yeh Qammon marih rasuh gaaduh gexeeh yibbixeh. Too gaaduh Malik Dawud magexinnaay, Yarusalaamal elle raaqe. Yowab abbah akak yan qaskar, Rabba deqsitta magaalay keenik inaytâ-magaalah tenehiyyat maro heeniih; sarrak tet yibbixeeniih tet bayseenih.
Qammon-mari yalla iyyeh aqbuduk suge Milkom deqsitta ceeloh amot suge dahabak bicsen kalabta bee. Too kalabta miizaanal heen waqdi, qilsah soddom kee affara kiilo tekkeh ten. Woo kalabtah bagul bilqah qax-meqe xaa teneeh; Dawud too xaa beyya heeh isi kalabtah addat hee.
Magaalal suge mara yeyyeeqeeh, sarra miisaar kee maataka kee godmat aban taamat ken tamsiisak yen. Too marak kalah kaadu, Qammon magaalooliy yibbixeenihiyyal suge marak kaadu toh abe. Tohuk gaba kalla hee waqdi, Dawud kee kay mara Yarusalaam fan tuduure.
Sarrî-dabaanal Filistiin kee ken fanal qeebi qagte. Qeebi elle qagtem, Geser deqsitta magaalak ten. Too qeebil Sibkay deqsita numuy Cuusâ-magaalal yoobokehiyya, migaaqah Siffay akak iyyan numuy kaxxa masu luk yenehiyya qide. Tonnal Israayil-mari qeebil Filistiin-marak yeyse.
Tohuk kalah kaadu Filistiin mara kee ken fanal kaxxa carbi rade. Too qeebil Israayilih yooboke Yaaqír-Elcanan deqsita numu, Gat magaalal yooboke Golyaadak toobokoytah yen numuy Lacmi deqsita qide. Too numih macaxi kaxxa masu luk yen.
Gat-magaalal kaadu gersi qeebi radeeh; too qeebit kaxxam masu le num suge. Gabak kulli gabat laca feera luk yeneeh, namma ibak kulli ibat laca feera luk yen. Usuk akak radem, dumî-daban suge maray kaxxam xagar masu luk yenehiyyah samadak ten.
Too num Israayil ummatta kaxxam bursute. Sarra Dawuduk saqalah yen Samma baxay Yonaatan akak axcuk yeneenihiyya kaa qide.
Ta sidooca numuy Dawud kee Dawud qaskarih gabat rabtehiyya, Gat deqsitta magaalal yooboke marak teneeh; masi nabna lagok luk yenen.

Seetan Israayil ummatah bala baaham faxeeh; toh, Dawud Israayil ummatih loowo abaamat asise.
Too waqdi Dawud, Yowab kee qaskar abbobtih yen marak iyyeemih, «Israayil mari elle eneyya 'ya ikke gexay, yakkeenih gide keenik looway am. Qadad keenik aaxigem faxak» iyye.
Yowab kaak iyyeemih, «YALLI isi mara away yakkeenih gidek bool adda ken yaymaggay. Tonna'mmay, yi malikow, taway ta loowot akah cultaah, ummat qellat le mara akah abtam macaa? Israayil mari ku maraay; koo yakdume marah yanin» kaak iyye.
Takkay immay Malik Dawud, «Anu siinik axcem aba» kaak iyye. Sarrak Yowab sinam loowa'gidih, inkih tan Israayil ummatih adda gexeeh, yakkeenih gide lowwa keenik heeh, Yarusalaam fan yuduure.
Sarrak Yowab Dawuduk, «Israayil-rasul qaskarat gacu duuda marih loowo inki malyoon kee bool alfih num tekkeeh; Yuudâ-rasuluuy, affara bool kee malcina-tabanih alfih num yekken» iyye.
Yowab a loowo faxe cineh sugeeh; tonna-leemiik abeh yen loowot Leewi kee Benyam mara edde masgallinna.
Yalli a loowo tekkem mafaxinna. Tonna-leemiik Israayil mara akah digaale.
Sarrak Dawud abeemit isik radeeh; tonna-leemiik, «Yi Dageltaw, kaxxa dambi lem baaheh aniih, duqur edde ase waamat aseh anik, qafu yoh ab» iyye.
Tohuk lakal YALLI, Gaad deqsita nabiy Dawuduh Yallih farmo baahak yenehiyyak iyyeemih,
«Gexay Dawuduk intaamah, ‹Sidoocaamak taysem dooritaay; atu doorittem abeyyo› kaak inxic» iyyeeh; a sidoocam a nabih warissa heeh ruube.
Sarrak a nabi Dawudul yemeeteeh YALLI kaah ruube farmo kaah warse.
Kaak iyyeemih, «YALLI, ‹Sidooca sanat qulul siinil ruubam kee, sidooca alsih gide naqboytit kok yan mari koo ayradduk sugam kee, wonna hinnay, kaadu sidooca ayro YALLI qeebi isi siinit abaah, isi malaykattih gabat inkih yan rasul sinam qidda dalka siinit ruubaamak koh tayse tiya dooritay yol rub› 'yaanam kok iyyek, YALLAL maca gacisuu?» 'yaanam kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Dawud iyyeemih, «Anu taway tu edde ceda caalatat anih maana'mmay, sahda yoo digaaltaamak YALLI isi gabat yoo digalsitay. Toh akah axcem, kaxxa racmatta le Dagelta kinnim kaak aaxigeemih axce» iyye.
Tohuk wadir YALLI Israayil rasul dalka ruubeeh; too dalkat Israayil ummatak malcina-tabanih alfi rabe.
Yarusalaam magaala bayisu waa malaykattu ruubeeh; sarrak fanaak, abeyyo iyyeh suge baatik qaadeeh, malaykattuk «Ahaysa idiy. Abtem duddahak» iyye. Woo malaykatti woo waqdi Ornan deqsita numuy kedok Yabuusa deqsita marah yoobokehiyyah aracay darok caffa elle kalaanahiyyah garil soolak suge.
Dawud YALLIH malaykattuy qaran kee baaxok fanat gabat seef luk soolahiyya yuble. Malaykatti too waqdi Yarusalaam magaala baysam faxak yen. Dawud a malaykattu yuble waqdi, kaa kee Israayil makaabon xagaral *qabuudut gacca 'yeenih baaxok bagul qansa baaxo keenik xagtam fanah gommoh raden.
Dawud too waqdi dooqah iyyeemih, «Yi Dageltaw, a qellatat assem yoo ikkal num hinna. ‹Sinam loowa› inteeh loowo absissem yoo kinni way a masaakiina maca bahte? YALLAW, yi Dageltaw, a qellatah yoo kee yi buxah mara digaalitaay ku masaakiina maqidin» iyye.
Too waqdi YALLIH malaykatti Gaadak iyyeemih, «Dawuduk intaamah: ‹Ugutay, Ornan-le-aracay daro caffak elle baxsaanahiyyal, YALLAH sadgat elle abtu wayta arac bicis› kaak inxic» kaak iyye.
Dawud YALLI ab kaak iyyem oggoleh, Gaad kaak gexa iyye ikke gexe.
Tokkel daro caffak elle baxsan aracal, Ornan kee kay lab-xayloh ferey kamadik caffa anfiyak sugeeniih; sarrak a malaykattu yublen waqdi, kay xaylo kuddeeh tombooqoreh.
Ornan, Dawud kaa fanah yamaatem yuble waqdi, daro caffak elle baxisak suge aracaak kaa fan yemeeteeh, kay massakaxxah qansa baaxo kaak xagga haytam fanah qununna 'ye.
Too waqdi Dawud Ornanak iyyeemih, «A lakimay sahda selahiyya nek gexa'gidih, ama daro caffa elle baxissa aracal, YALLIH sadgat elle aboonu waan arac elle haam faxak, yol xaam; dudda le limo koh edde abeyyok» kaak iyye.
Ornan kaal gacseemih, «Yi amoytaw, beetek maca le! Beetay isih faxxem elle abbaasit» kaak iyye. Kaadu qagseh iyyemii, «Sadgatah tasguudu wayta awurwa ah kaanaay; daro caffak edde baxisak suge coox kaadu cado Yallih sadgatah akak cararissa sadgat elle alaysettok, kaadu bet. A kamadi kaadu Yallih sadgatah aceettok bet» kaak iyye.
Too tiyak malik kaal gacseemih, «Aleey, ku ikoyta foyyah kok mabeyaay, kok xaameyyo. Dudda le limo koh elle abeyyo. Tu edde ecee wee duyyet, sadgat YALLAH maaba» iyye.
Sarrak too aracal dahab-garsik laca bool kaah elle yecee.
Tohuk wadir YALLAH sadgat elle abu waa arac tokkel xiseeh; cado akak carrisan sadgat kee amaanah xiinaana'gidih aban sadgat too aracal YALLAH abe. Too sadgatah saqa usgudda hee waqdi dooqa abe. YALLI too dooqa kaak raabiteeh, yusguude saqih cado elle alaytu wayta gira qaraanak ruube.
Sarra YALLI, malaykattul amri oobiseeh kaak iyyeemih, «Ama gabat tabbixe seef sibat gacis» kaak iyye. Malaykatti toh oggoleh.
Dawud toh yuble waqdi, YALLI, abe dooqa kaak oggolem yeexegeh, Yallah sadgat abe. Too dabaanal, YALLIH Nabnah-Siraqay duma Muusa bacarih tan baaxol yen saaku bicseh sugehiyya kee, carrisan sadgat elle aban mansaf Gibqon magaalal elle yen. Tonna'mmay Dawud, YALLIH malaykattih seefik abeh yan meysik gexxaamah, Yallal tuk teena essera'gidih too arac gexak maraaqinna. Tohuk lakal Ornan darok caffa elle baxisak suge aracal, Yallah sadgat elle aba'gidih hee aracal, Yallah sadgat abak suge.

Tohuk gexxaamah Dawud iyyemii, «Dageltah yan YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari elle xissiimu waam akke. Israayil ummat cado akak carrisan saq sadgatah elle yasgaadoonu waanam ta araca» 'yaanam iyye.
Ayrok teena Malik Dawud allî-baaxoh maray Israayil addal yanihiyya inki aracal gaaboyseeh, aboonu waan taama keenil yecee. Too marak garab Yallih Qibaadah-Qari edde xisoonu waan xeetih bicat hee.
Dawud isih, bisaamir kee alifu tabbixe duyye edde bicsaana'gidih, mango biriita keenih yecee. Toh akah abem, Qibaadâ-Qarih-afoofi edde bicsaana'gidik ten. Tohuk kalah nacaasak loowo sinnim yecee.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, Suur kee Saydah magaalah mari mango *sariidâ-coox kaah baahaana'gidih, bica ken lih haysite.
Dawud isi niyal heemih, «Yi baxi Suleeman xisu waa Yallih Qibaadah-Qari kaxxam meqeeh addunyal edde yabba 'yan qari yakkeemi» 'yaanam niyat heeh yen. «Yi baxi ahayduma qunxa numuy taama elle aban inna aaxige waahiyya kinnuk, anu naharal bica kaah abeh sugam tayse» 'yaanam yucsubeh yeneeh; a bica naharal akah abem tohuk ten. Tohuk gexxaamah rabaamak dumal, Qari-bicsah faxxinta duyyek mangom aracal heeh suge.
Sarra isi baxah farmo ruubeeh, «YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyah Qibaadâ-Qari xis» 'yaanam kaak iyye.
Too farmol kaak iyyeemih, «Yi baxaw, YALLAY yi Dagelta kinnihiyyah nabnah, Qibaadâ-Qari kaah xisam faxak suge.
Takkay immay YALLI yok iyyeemih, ‹Atu mango mara qiddeeh, mango carbit asseeh; tonna-leemiik too qabalay atu caxxehiyyah sabbatah, yi Qibaadah Qari xisi koo mahaa.›
Takkay immay toh iyyeemih qahdi yoh culeeh yok iyyeemih, ‹Lab-baxay baaxo amaanah xiinisu waahiyya xalettooh; too amaan anu innih kaah aceeyyo. Naqaboytiitik amaanah kaa xiiniseyyo. Migaq kaak Suleeman
Yoh Qibaadâ-Qari xissu waytam, ku xaylok too baxa. Usuk baxa yoh akkeleeh; anu abba kaah akkeyyo. Kay reeda Israayil rasul baxak baxal raaqele› 'yaanam yok iyyeh yan» kaak iyye.
Qagissa heeh kaak iyyeemih, «Tonna'mmay, yi baxaw, YALLAY ku Dagelta kinnihiyya isih xagana akah culla 'ye'nnah, kay Qibaadah-Qarih-xisne ku gabat bicsa'gidih, ko'lih yanay.
Israayil ummat kay xinto elle inta'nnal akah xiinissa'nnah, YALLAY ku Dagelta kinnihiyya bagi cubbi kee kas koh yacaay.
YALLI, Israayil ummatah Muusal ruube xinto duudussek, tonnal, yi baxaw, kullim gabal kok bicele. A taamal digga xicay agaagul akak cab; tuk mameysitinaay, niya kok baxqe waytay.
Qibaadâ-Qarih xisneh tiyakaa, innih akah taqabba exceh; a qaril haytu wayta dahabak sidiica malyoonih kiilok fula yakke dahab kee, soddom malyoonih kiilok fula takke lakqo gaabossa heeh cabeh an. Tohuk kalah kaadu, loowo sinni nacaas kee biriita a qarih xisneh gaaboyseh an. Tonnah kaadu xisnê-coox kee xeetik mangom gaaboyseh ani'mmay ahak raqtam atu isih edde osissaama.
Atu taamâ-marak mangom lito. Xeet yayyaaqe mara rikeek lito; xeetik qari bicsa mara kaadu kibuk lito. Cooxuk kaadu qari xisa coox bicsa mara rikeek lito. Tonnah kaadu, gabâ-naggarinna le mango maray
dahab kee lakqo kee nacaas kee birtak mansafwâ-bicsa yaaxigehiyya kaadu lito. Tahak wadir taama qimbissaamaay, YALLI koo elle catay» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal Israayil makaabonuk, «Suleeman cata» 'yaanam iyye.
Too makaabonuk iyyeemih, «YALLAY sin Dagelta kinni aham fanah sin lih yaniih, kulli kabuk inkih amaanah sin yabbixe. A baaxol suggu 'ye marak yoo yiysiiseeh; too mari ta saaku YALLA kee sin gubat yan.
Tohuk gexxaamah, taway YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyyal isinni afqado kee niyaak taduureenimi. YALLIH Qahdih-Sandug kee Yallih qibaadah nabbixe duyyey taahirik tanihiyya addal akak haytaana'gidih, Dageltah yan YALLIH nabnah Qibaadâ-Qari xisa» 'yaanam keenik iyye.

Dawud idooliteeh, qumrik kaxxa caddo gufe saaku, isi baxa Suleeman Israayil rasul reediseeh malik kaa abe.
Dawud, Israayil makaabon kee seeka kee Leewih yooboke marah seeco abeeh ken bahsiiseh.
Sarrakaa, Leewih yooboke marak labhak qumri akak soddom kee wohuk fula mara lowsiise. Too marak loowo soddom kee bacra alfi tekke.
Too waqdi Dawud iyyemii, «Too marak labaatanna kee affara alfih num taamah yaallu waam, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal tan taamaay; kaadu too soddom kee bacra alfi yekke marak laca alfih num taamah yaallu waam, qaada yaktubeenim kee ummatta cakki tittak wayta waqdi, ken kuraanama.
Kaadu too soddom kee bacra alfik affara alfih num taamah yaallu waam, Qibaadâ-Qarih afah dacayri kee, affara alfih num kaadu YALLA saarisu waa mara akkele. Kaa saarisan waqdi, yaaguren duyyey anu keenih bicsehiyya aagaruk abelon» iyye.
Dawud Leewih yooboke mara gulub-gulubuh sidooca ikkel kure. Tohumuu, Gerson kee Kohat kee Maraari deqsita sidooca gulubuk ten.
Gerson lab-xaylok nammay luk yen. Migaaqah Laqdan kee Simqi deqsitak yenen.
Laqdan kaadu lab-xaylok sidoc luk yen. Oson migaaqah Yaciyel kee Deetan kee Ayyuqel deqsitak yen. Yaqiyal barah inkih afat keenik yen.
Simqi lab-xayloh sidoc luk yen; migaaqah Seloomot kee Cadiyel kee Caaran deqsitak yenen. Too mari inkih Laqdan-migaaqal-aaxaguk-yenen-gulub akak rade marak ten.
Simqi kaadu lab-xayloh ferey luk yen. Migaaqah Yacat kee Diida kee Yaqus kee Beriiqa deqsitak yenen.
Yacat naharsi-saqalah keenik yeneeh; kay lakal Diida ciggiilak yen. Diidâ lakal Yaqus anuk yeneeh, Yaqus lakal kaadu Beriiqa yen. Yaqus kee Beriiqak rade mari daguk yeneeh, tonna-leemiik inki gulubuh loowimak yenen.
Kohat lab-xayloh fereey xale. Migaaqah Qamram kee Yixhar kee Cebron kee Quddiyeel deqsitak yenen.
Naharsi-baxi kaak Qamram deqsitak yeneeh; Haaruun kee Muusa xaltem kaak ten. Haaruun kee kaak rade mari seekay dibuk Yallih taamat tanihiyya yakkeeni'gidiiy, Yallih duyyey taahirik enna 'tahiyyah abbootan daayiman yaalleeni'gidih, zeytik (saliidik) yuskuten. Tonnal, YALLIH qibaadat yanin waqdi, qaydarus qeerisaanam kee, kay taamat gacaanam kee, kay migaaqal ummatah «YALLI maqaane siinit haay»
Muusay Yallih naqasuh yenehiyyah xayloh tu gactek, gersi maray Leewih yooboke migaaqal loowime.
Muusâ-xaylo nammay akkuk teneeh; migaaqah Gersom kee Elqeeder deqsitak yenen.
Gersom xale xaylok saqalay foocat yanih tenem, Sabuuwel deqsita baxak ten.
Elqeederih tu gactek, dibuk inki lab-baxa luk yen. Migaaqah Recabya deqsitak yen. Takkay immay Recabya mango durruyyat cabe.
Kohat xale lab-xaylok nammayhaytô-baxay migaaqah Yixhar deqsitak yenehiyya lab-baxa luk yeneeh; too baxi isi gulubuk saqalay foocat yanihiyyah yen. Migaq kaak Seloomitik ten.
Kohatak sidochaytô-baxi kaadu Cebron deqsitak yeneeh; lab-xaylok fereey luk yen. Migaaqah Yeriyaahu kee Amarya kee Yacadiyel kee Yekamqam deqsitak yenen.
Kohatak fereyhaytô-baxay Quddiyeel deqsitak yene kaadu lab-xaylok nammay luk yeneeh; migaaqah Miika kee Yissiya deqsitak yenen.
Maraari lab-xaylok nammay luk yen. Migaaqah Macli kee Muusi deqsitak yenen. Macli lab-xayloh nammay luk yen. Migaq keenik Alqedar kee Keesik ten.
Alqedar say-xaylok sah, lab-xaylo xale'kal rabe. Say-xaylo kaak abittem qammih xaylok ten. Kees xayloh rihimih ken aben.
Maraari xaylok nammayhaytô-baxay migaaqah Muusi deqsitak yenehiyya lab-xayloh sidoc xale. Too urri migaaqah Macli kee Qeeder kee Yerimot deqsitak yenen.
Leewî-kedok yen mari ta marak yeneeh; kulli numuk keenik buxâ-mari yakkeh gide kee edde raaqan gulub yunkuttubeh keenik yen. Ta marak radda 'ye numuy qumrik labaatannaak daga lehiyya YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril isi taama luk yen.
Dawud iyyeemih, «YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya isi marah amaan yaceeh yaniih; YALLI Yarusalaamal isi marih addal isih ken lih anele.
Tohuk gexxaamah, tahak wadir Leewih yooboke mari, Yallih Nabnah-Siraq kee tet duyyeh quukat magacan» 'yaanam iyye.
Dawud ken elle farrimma hee'nnal, tohuk wadir Leewih mari qumrik labaatanna guffa haa saaku, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih-taamat akah gacan innah, migaq isinnik aktubuk yenen.
Taamah keenih yeceenim: Qibaadâ-Qaril YALLIH qibaada aban waqdi, Haaruunuk rade maray seekâ-lago lehiyya faxxinta taamal cataanam kee, Qibaadâ-Qarih daaratwa kee qunxa qarwa dacrisaanam kee, taahirik enna 'ta duyyey Qibaadâ-Qaril tanihiyya saytunusaanam kee, raqqa 'ta taamay Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal faxximma 'tahiyya abaanam
Yallih sadgatah xayyoosen gaqamboh amo wagtaanam kee, tonnah kaadu, Yallih sadgatah baahan bululih amo wagtaanamih taama keenih yeceen. Tonnah kaadu, kamiir maleh alaysen gasiita kee saliidit yesgellen bulul kee alaysen gaqamboy Yallih sadgatah baahaanahiyyah abbootan ken gabal heen. Qibaadâ-Qaril aban sadgatih duyye miizaanal haanam kee,
saaku-saaku kee bar-baraay sabti ayro YALLIH sadgatah yusguuden saqih cado carrisan waqdi kee, alsih biloh aban sadgat kee, wohuk kalah tan ayrooray kaadu qiidih asaanahiyya, YALLA faylisaanaah, kay migaaqay nabna le saarisaanamih qaada kaadu ken gabal heen. Yallih qibaada aban waqdi, oson ta taama elle aboonu waan inna kee, abu waa marih loowo yakku waah gide keenih warseeniih; too qaada wagittam elle aboonu waan madqa keenih yeyyeeqen.
Tonnal Yallih Nabnah-Siraq kee, qibaada edde aban duyyey taahirik tanihiyyah amo wagtaanaah dacrisaanam keenil caben. Tohuk kalah kaadu, Haaruunuk radde seekay keenih ramad luk tenehiyya YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal abtah tan Yallih taamal ken cataanamih tiya kaadu ken wagitak ten.

Haaruun kee Haaruunuk rade marih nasab elle yan inni, ah kaana. Naharak Haaruun lab xaylok ferey luk yen. Too ferey, Nadab kee Abiihu kee Alqedar kee Itaamar deqsitak yenen.
Nadab kee Abiihu, abba keenik addunyal yan saaku rabeeniih; xaylo macabinnon. Ken toobokoh nammay, Yalli elle iyye'nnal, seeka yekken.
Dawud, Haaruunuk radde seeka butta-buttah hayya heeh aboonu waan taama keenih warse. Ta marah aboonu waan taama yaaxigeenim kee, woo taama ken gabal haanamih tiyal, Haaruunuk baxah yen Alqedarak rade Saaduk deqsita sek kee, Haaruunuk baxah yen Itaamarak rade Acimalek deqsita sek kaa elle cate.
Sek-Alqedar-duruyyat taban kee laca gexoh kuren. Itaamar-duruyyat kaadu bacra gexoh kuren. Alqedar-duruyyat taban kee laca gexoh akah kureenim, kaak rade gulub Itaamarak rade gulubuk manguk yen.
A namma marih addat inkihii, Qibaadâ-Qarih abbobti kee, awliyah yan mari yeneeh; tohuk gexxaamah ken gabal taama haanamak naharal aboonu waan taamah saami caxxa qiden.
Saami caxxa, marahaay, waqdi keenih qiden. Tohuk lakal Netanél-Samaqya deqsita numuy Leewih yoobokehiyya ken yiysibixen taama migooqa keenik yuktube. Malik Dawud kee kay gubal ten doolat abbobti kee, sek Saaduk kee Abiyatáar-Acimalek kee seekâ-kedoh-abbobti kee, Leewih yooboke maray wokkel suggu 'yehiyya inkih, tohumul sumaaqah raaqen.
Saami caxxi elle yewqe marih migooqa ah teeti.
Naharsi num migaaqah Yehoyaarib deqsitak yen.
Nammeyhaytô-num migaaqah Yadaqya deqsitak yen.
Sidochaytô-num migaaqah Caarim deqsitak yen.
Fereyhaytô-num migaaqah Seqoorim deqsitak yen.
Konoyhaytô-num migaaqah Malkiya deqsitak yen.
Leceyhaytô-num migaaqah Miyyamin deqsitak yen.
Malcinhaytô-num migaaqah Hakkox deqsitak yen.
Bacarhaytô-num migaaqah Abiyya deqsitak yen.
Sagalhaytô-num migaaqah Yaasuwa deqsitak yen.
Tabanhaytô-num migaaqah Sekaniya deqsitak yen.
Taban kee inikhaytô num migaaqah Elyaasib deqsitak yen.
Taban kee nammeyhaytô num migaaqah Yaakim deqsitak yen.
Taban kee sidochaytô num migaaqah Cuffa deqsitak yen.
Taban kee fereyhaytô num migaaqah Yesebqab deqsitak yen.
Taban kee konoyhaytô num migaaqah Bilga deqsitak yen.
Taban kee leceyhaytô num migaaqah Immar deqsitak yen.
Taban kee malcinhaytô num migaaqah Ceedir deqsitak yen.
Taban kee bacarhaytô num migaaqah Haffixxex deqsitak yen.
Taban kee sagalhaytô num migaaqah Fatacya deqsitak yen.
Labaatanhaytô-num migaaqah Yacedkel deqsitak yen.
Labaatanna kee inikhaytô num migaaqah Yaakin deqsitak yen.
Labaatanna kee nammeyhaytô num migaaqah Gamul deqsitak yen.
Labaatanna kee sidochaytô num migaaqah Dalaaya deqsitak yen.
Labaatanna kee fereyhaytô num migaaqah Maqadya deqsitak yen.
Akak raden Haaruun keenih yeyyeeqe madqa elle inta'nnal, ta mari midu-miduh YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal faxximta taama abeeh; YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya isih, Haaruun ta taama elle aban inna amriseh suge.
Raaqe maray Leewih yoobokehiyyak migooqa, ah teeti. Qamram xaylok Sabuuwel deqsita numu; Sabuuwel xaylok Yecdayaahu deqsita numu.
Recabyak rade marak saqalay foocat yanih tenem Yissiya deqsita numuk ten.
Yixharak rade marak Seloomot deqsita numu; Seloomot rade marak Yacat deqsita numu.
Cebron xale xaylok Yeriyaahu barah inkih afat keenik yeneeh; kay lakal Amarya ciggiilak yen. Amarya lakal Yacadiyel anuk yeneeh, Yacadiyel lakal kaadu Yekamqam yen.
Quddiyeel xaylok, Miika deqsita numu; Miikâ-xaylok Saamir deqsita numu.
Miika toobokoytah yen Yissiya; usuk xale xaylok Zakariyya deqsita numu.
Maraari lab-xaylooy Macli kee Muusi kee Yaqdiyaahu deqsitak yenen.
Maraari rade Yaqdiyaahu-xaylok Sooham kee Dakkur kee Qibri deqsitta labha.
Macli xale xaylok Alqedar deqsita numuuy, lab-xaylo luk mananna.
Keesik rade marak Yeracmaqil deqsita numu.
Maraari xaylok nammayhaytô-baxay migaaqah Muusi deqsitak yenehiyya Macli kee Qeeder kee Yerimot xale.
Ta mari inkih Leewi deqsitta kedoh abbobtih yen.
Keenih ramad le maray Haarunuk radehiyya elle aben innal, saami caxxa keenih qiden. Saqalah yen numuk rade mara takkuu, qunxa toobokoytah yen numuk rade mara takkuu, taama abaanamak naharal saami caxxa elle qidda haanah saami elle awqinnaan mari abak yen. Malik Dawud kee Saaduk kee Acimalek kee, seekah abbobti kee Leewî-kedoh-abbobtiy wokkel sugga 'tehiyya inkih, tohumul sumaaqah raaqen.

Malik Dawud kee kedoh abbobti,
Naharak dooreenim, Asaf xaylok lab-xayloh fereeyi. Too mari migaaqah Dakkur kee Yuusuf kee Natanya kee Asareela deqsitak yenen. Ta mara amrissaah elle aban inna ken taybulleem, Asafak ten. Asaf Yalli iyyem saarê-gurral warsa'gidih, doorime numuk ten. Asaf amrissam, malikik ten.
Ta marak kalah kaadu tahah doorintem, Yedutun deqsita numih lab-xayloh laceeyik ten. Migaaqah Gedalya kee Xeri kee Yasaqya kee Simqi kee Casabya kee Mattitya deqsitak yenen. Foocat keenik gacca 'teh ken absiisak tenem, ken abbak ten. Oson Yalli iyyem saarê-gurral ummat aysixxiguk yenen. Toh yaysixxigen waqdi begena aagaruk Yalla faylisak candu kaah gacisak yenen.
Tonnah kaadu too saaku doorintem, Heeman deqsita numih lab-xaylok taban kee fereeyik ten. Migaaqah Bukkiyaahu kee Mattanya kee Quddiyeel kee Sabuuwel kee Yerimot kee Cananya kee Canaani kee Eliyaata kee Giddalti kee Romamti-Qeder kee Yosbakaasa kee Mallooti kee Cootir kee Macdiyot deqsitak yenen.
Heeman deqsita nabiy Yallih farmo Dawuduh baahak yenehiyyat Yalli hee barkatah xaylok tama gide luk yen. Say-xaylok kaadu sidoc luk yen. Yalli Heemanak rade marah qande aceeleemih xagana kaah culeh yeneeh; too xaganah xaylok tama gide kaah yeceeh yen.
Kaak lab-xaylo inkih giyaagib kee kirar kee begena digirak teneeh; usuk isih foocat keenik gacca 'yeh, Qibaadâ-Qaril YALLA yaqbuden waqdi, ken absiisak yen. Asaf kee Yedutun kee Heeman ta taamay keenil yeceenihiyya amrissam malikik ten.
Ta mara kee wohuk kalah yen maray keenih ramad lehiyya tittat mangah namma bool kee bacra-taban kee bacra num akkuk yenen. Oson inkih tahimih abittol nagay tan ixxiga luk yeneeniih; Yallih saare aban waqdi yaaguren duyye nagay barteenih yenen.
Ta taamah abittoh yamaaten waqdi, qunxa furraynu yakkay, idaltu yakkay, hinnay kaadu, a taamah abitto dumaak aaxaguk suge num takkay, woo way qusbih barta num takkay, taama abaanamak naharal saami caxxa elle qidda haanah saami elle awqinnaan mari abak yen.
Ta namma bool kee bacra-taban kee bacra num gulub-gulubuh labaatanna kee affara exxah heenih yenen. Kulli exxa taban kee namma num keenik akkuk teneeh, kulli exxaay isi abba keenik luk ten. Ken migooqaay saami caxxi elle qiden inni, ah kaa.
1. Yuusufuy Asaf buxah marak rade
2. Gedalya
3. Dakkur
4. Xeri
5. Natanya
6. Bukkiyaahu
7. Asareela
8. Yasaqya
9. Mattanya
10. Simqi
11. Qadarel
12. Casabya
13. Sabuuwel
14. Mattitya
15. Yerimot
16. Cananya
17. Yosbakaasa
18. Canaani
19. Mallooti
20. Eliyaata
21. Cootir
22. Giddalti
23. Macdiyot
24. Romamti-Qeder.

Leewih yooboke maray Yallih Qibaadah-Qari dacrisahiyya heen. Too dacayrit tenem, Korac deqsita gulubuk Koré-Maselemya deqsita num yen. Kaxxa abba kaak Asaf deqsita numu.
Maselemya lab-xaylok malciin luk yen. A malciinik barah afat tenem Zakariyya deqsita numu. Kay lakal Yadiqeel ciggiilak yen. Yadiqeel lakal Dabadya ciggiilak yen. Kay lakal Yatniyel ciggiilak yen. Yatniyel lakal
Qeelam yen. Qeelam lakal Yahoocanan yen. Yahoocanan lakal Elyahoqeenay yen.
Too dacayrit kaadu tenem, Yoobad-Edom deqsita numu. Yalli lab-xaylok bacaar kaah yeceeh yen. Too xaylok barah afat tenem, Samaqya deqsita numuk ten. Kay lakal ciggiltem, Yahodbad deqsita baxak ten. Kay lakal tenem, Yowac deqsita baxak ten. Kay lakal kaadu Sakar deqsita baxi yen. Sakar lakal Netanel yen.
Netanel lakal Qammiyel yen. Qammiyel lakal Issakar yen. Issakar lakal Faqultay yen. Toh akah tekkem, Yallak mango xaylo xalaamih barkat geemih taagak ten.
Yoobad-Edomuk naharsi-baxay migaaqah Samaqya akak axcuk yeneenihiyya lab-xaylok laceey luk yen. Migaaqah Qotni kee Rafaayil kee Yoobad kee Eldabad kee Eliihu kee Samakyaahu deqsitak yenen. A mari, isinni gulubih addat loonuh yan ixxigak gexxaamah, fula le marak ten. Eddeey edde Eliihu kee Samakyaahu edde yabba yan ixxiga kee bagi cubbi luk yenen.
Yoobad-Edom buxah mari, Qibaadâ-Qarih-dacayri abu waa maray dudda lehiyyak lactam kee namma num yekken.
Maselemyâ-buxah mari kaadu dudda le marak taban kee bacra num yekke.
Maraari gulubuk Coosa yen. Usuk lab-xaylok ferey luk yen. Too fereeyih abba Simri deqsita baxa foocat yan saqal abe. Barah toobokok inkih saqalah mananna'mmay, abba saqalah kaa akah heemi.
Raqte xayloh migaq Cilkiyya kee Tabalyaahu kee Zakariyya deqsitak yen. Coosâ-marak Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih dacayrit tenem, tittat taban kee sidooca numuk ten.
Qibaadâ-Qarit dacayrih yan mara gulub-gulubul kurra heenih; mariiy isi gulubih saqoolinna keenik luk yen. Gersi Leewih yooboke marak kaxxih, Qibaadâ-Qaril aboonu waan taama keenih yeexegeenih yenen.
Gulub-gulubul kurrumma iyyan waqdi, Qibaadâ-Qari fan akak culan mango afak dacayrih elle gacoonu waan afal, saami caxxa keenih qidak yenen.
Selemyal saami caxxah ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta afa tewqe. Kay baxay migaaqah Zakariyya deqsitak yeney meqe fayu sinaamah yeceehiyyal kaadu kilbat le kabut raqta afa tewqe.
Yoobad-Edomul gabbi-qaxat raqta afa tewqe. Kaak lab-xaylol kaadu Qibaadâ-Qarih makaadan dacrisaana'gidih saami caxxi keenil yewqe.
Suffim kee Coosa kaadu ayrô-culma le kabut raqta afa dacrisaanamih saami caxxi keenil yewqe. Tohuk kalah kaadu, Salleket deqsitta afay Qibaadâ-Qarik daga raaqa gitat fan afkunuk raqtahiyyah dacayrih kaadu saami caxxi keenil yewqe. Ta mari dacayrih tokket gacak yeneenim, hununuh keenih yeexegen waktik ten. Naharsi numuh yeexegen wakti gaba kala waqdi, woo numul gersi num ciggiilak, tonnal kulli numuuy isih heen waktil dacayrih edde gacak yen.
Ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta afat kulli ayro laca num dacayrih gacak ten. Kilbat le kabut raqta afat affara num dacayrih gacak ten. Gabbi-qaxat kaadu affara num dacayrih gacak ten. Qibaadâ-Qarih makaadanat kulli ayro affara num gacak teneeh; too fereeyik nammayaay waqdi makaadanat keenik gacak yenen.
Ayrô-culma le kabut raaqa daaratat affara numuy giti xaqut raqtahiyya dacayrih gacak ten. Namma num kaadu woo daaratih addat dacayrih gacak ten.
Korac kee Maraari deqsita gulubut raaqak yen mari, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih dacayri elle abak yeneenim, tama gurrak ten.
A marak kalih maray kaadu Leewih yoobokehiyyah, Qibaadâ-Qarih-duyye kee Yallih sadgatah baahan duyye elle haan makaadan-abbootan keenih yeceen.
Yaciyelik lab-xayloh nammayay migaaqah Deetam kee Ayyuqel deqsitak tenehiyya, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarik duyye elle daanisan golitteh abbootan luk yenen. Yaciyel akak radem, Laqdan deqsita numuy Gerson deqsita numuk baxah yenehiyya. Isi gulubuk abbah yan numuk ten.
Tonnah kaadu, Qamram kee Yixhar kee Cebron kee Quddiyeel deqsita marak rade marah, aboonu waanaah edde gacoonu waan taama yeexegen.
Sabuuwel Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih mattacoh yeceen duyye elle haan qarik tu edde taade saqalah yen. Sabuuwel Gersom kedoh aabakuk yen. Gersom Muusak baxah yen.
Gersom, Elqeederak toobokoytak ten. Seloomit keenik rade marak ten. Elqeedar Recabya xale. Recabya Yasaqya xale. Yasaqya kaadu Yooram xale. Yooram kaadu Dikri xale. Dikri kaadu Seloomit xale.
Seloomitiy Elqeedar samadah yenehiyya kee kay gulubut raqqa 'ye mari, Yallih sadgatah Qibaadâ-Qari baahan duyyeh abbootan luk yenen. Too duyye teceem, Malik Dawud kee kedoh abbobti kee gulub-gulubuk abbobtih yan mara kee qaskar abbobtih yan mara.
Woo mari qeebik dannabah orbisen duyyek garab beyya heeniih, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal woo qari edde bicsaana'gidih heen.
Wohuk kalah kaadu, nabi Samuwel kee Kées-Saawul kee Nér-Abner kee Xaruya deqsitta barrah baxay migaaqah Yowab deqsitahiyya, Yallih migaaqal bahha haan duyyeeyak inkih abbah tenem, Seloomit kee kay buxah marak ten. Seloomit kee kay buxah mari, Yallih Qibaadah-Qari Yallih migaaqal bahha haan duyyek inkih abbootan gabat luk yenen.
Yixharak rade marak Kananya kee kay xayloh addak, Qibaadâ-Qari hinna'mmay, xinto wagitta qaadoodi gabal akak heen mari yen. Too mari Israayil ummattak xintô saqoolinna kee, ummat fanat takke umaane bicsoonuh doorimen.
Cebron deqsita numuk rade marak, Casabaya kee kaah ramad le marak alfi kee malcina boolih numuy nagay tan ixxiga kee cubbi lehiyyah kaadu edde gacoonu waan taama yeexegen. Toh macâ-taamaay inteenik, Ordon weeqaytuk ayrô-culma le kabut raqqa 'ta Israayil ummatah diini wagitta qaadoodi kee, xinto wagga haytaamih qaada keenih abaana'gidi kee, keenih yableenimih tiyat ken heen.
Yeriyaahu deqsita num kaadu Cebroonuk radda 'ye marih abbootan kee saqoolinna luk yen. Dawud malik edde yekke morootomhaytô sanatat, Cebroonuk rade marih qaadak adda wagita mara heen. Too numih durruyyat elle tani'nna yaaxigeeni'gidih aben kusaaqisiyyal, Yaqder deqsitta magaalay Gilqad deqsitta baaxol geytintahiyyal, kaxxa ixxiga kee cubbi le maray Cebroonuk raddehiyya yanim geytinte.
Malik Dawud, namma alfi kee malcina boolih numuy Yeriyaahuh ramad luk yenehiyya, Israayil kedoodak Ruuben kee Gaad kee Manassek-garab guubuh elle tan rasul, diini kee xinto wagitta tiya woo marah abaana'gidih, abbootan ken gabal hee. Yeriyaahuh ramad luk yen mari inkih, buxâ-marak abbobtih yan maray ixxiga kee bagi cubbi lek ten.

Israayilih yooboke maray malikih taamitak yenehiyya yen. Osonuuy kedo kee gulub-gulubuk abbobti kee, alfi-alfi kee bool-boolul kurrunte qaskarak abbobtih yen mara kee, xintoh-abbobtih yenen. Ken taama macaay inteenik, qaskariino wagitta qaada abbootan luk yenen. Sanatal kulli alsa sissin exxay loowoh labaatanna kee affara alfih qaskariita takkehiyya taamitak ten.
Too marak naharsi alsat heen marak abbah dooreenim, Dabdiyél-Yaasobqam deqsita numuuy; ta num Yuudah aabakuk yeneeh, Fares deqsita gulubut raaqak yen. Naharsi alsat qaskar-abbobti inkih kay gubat ten.
Nammayhaytoh alsa Dooday deqsita num doorime. Too num Acowi deqsita numih samadak ten. Miklot deqsita num kay gubal abbah heen.
Sidochaytoh alsat sek Yoyadaq baxay Banaaya deqsitahiyya abbah heen. Too num kaadu «Yimixxige-Soddomul,» yaaxigen marak abbah yen. Kay baxay migaaqah Qammidabad deqsitak yenehiyya kay gubal abbah heen.
Fereyhaytoh alsat Qasahel abbah dooren. Qasahel, Yowab toobokoytak ten. Kay lakal kay baxay migaaqah Dabadya deqsitahiyya usuk abbah akak suge marak abba yekke.
Konoyhaytoh alsat Samhut abbah heen. Samhut, Yidrac deqsita numuk rade marak ten.
Laceyhaytoh alsat Qikkés-Qiira deqsita num abba yekke. Too num elle yoobokem, Takooqa deqsitta magaalak ten.
Malcinhaytoh alsat Celex deqsita num abbah heen. Too num akah aabakuk yenem, Efrayim deqsitta kedok ten. Elle yoobokem, Felon deqsitta magaalak ten.
Bacarhaytoh alsat Sibkay deqsita num abbah heen. Too num elle yoobokem, Cuusa deqsitta magaalak ten. Akah aabakuk yenem, Yuudâ-kedooy; Dara deqsita gulubut raaqak yen.
Sagalhaytoh alsat abbah dooreenim, Abiqeder deqsita numuk ten. Too num elle yoobokem, Qanatot deqsitta magaalak ten. Akah aabakuk yenem, Benyam deqsitta kedok ten.
Tabanhaytoh alsat Mahray deqsita num abbah heen. Too num elle yoobokem, Natoofa deqsitta magaalak ten. Gulubuk edde raaqak yenem, Dara deqsitta gulubuk ten.
Taban kee inikhaytoh alsat kaadu Banaaya deqsita num abbah heen. Too num elle yoobokem, Firqaton deqsitta magaalak ten. Akah aabakuk yenem, Efrayim deqsitta kedok ten.
Taban kee nammayhaytoh alsat abbah heenim, Celday deqsita numuk ten. Elle yoobokem, Natoofa deqsitta magaalak teneeh; gulubuk edde raaqak yenem, Qotniyel deqsita gulubuk ten.
Israayil ummat xiinissu wayta xintoh abbobti kaadu reedisen.
Ruuben deqsitta kedoh, Dikrí-Elqeeder migaq luk yen num xintoh abbah heen.
Simqaan deqsitta kedoh, migaaqah Maqká-Safatya deqsitak yen num xintoh abbah heen.
Leewi deqsitta kedoh Kamuwél-Casabya deqsitak yen num kee, Haaruunuk rade marah Saaduk deqsitak yen num xintoh abbobtih heen.
Yuuda deqsitta kedoh, Dawud saqalah yen Eliihu deqsitak yen num xintoh abbah heen.
Issakar deqsita kedoh, Mikaayíl-Qomri deqsitak yen num kee,
Dablon akak iyyan kedoh, Qobadyá-Yismaqyaahu deqsitak yen num kee,
tonnah kaadu, Naftaali deqsitta kedoh, Qadriyél-Yareemot deqsita num kee,
Efrayim deqsitta kedoh, Qadadyaahû-Hosiqa deqsita num xintoh abbobtih heen.
Ayrô-culma le kabut raqta Manasse deqsitta kedoh, Fadaayá-Ayyuqel deqsitak yen num kee
ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta Manasseh kedoh, Zakariyyá-Qiddo deqsita num kee,
Benyam deqsitta kedoh, Abnér-Yaqsiyel deqsita num kee,
Daan deqsitta kedoh, Yaroocám-Qadaral deqsita num xintoh abbobtih heen.
Ta mari inkih Israayilik kedoh abbobtik ten.
YALLI, Israayil ummat mangah qaraanal tan cutuukah gide abeyyo 'yaanam iyyeh yeneeh; tohuk gexxaamah Malik Dawud Israayil marak labaatanni sanatak addah yan qumri le marih loowok raaqeh yen.
Yowab deqsita numuy Xaruya deqsitta barrah baxak yenehiyya, ayrok teena, Israayil ummat mangah takkeh gide yable'gidih loowo qimbise. Takkay immay amo akak tabba 'yeh duudussa mahanna. Too loowok gexxaamah, Yalli Israayil ummat digaaleh. Tohuk gexxaamah Israayil ummat mangah takkeh gide hununuh aaxaguk manannaay; tonna-leemiik ellecabo fanah, kulliimih caagid elle yaktuben kitaabal loowok yakkeenih gide tunkuttubeh mananna.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, malik dabaq kee duyye wagga haytaamak abbootan akah yeceen mari yen. Too marak addal kulli num isi taama keenik luk yen.
Qadiyél-Qadmawet akak iyyan num malik-makdanwak inkih abbah yen.
Qudiyyá-Yonaatan akak iyyan num inaytâ-magaalak afal raqta magaaloolih adda takkuu, gaandoodih adda takkuu, hinnay kaadu, megdebwah adda takku, duyye daanah elle yabbixen golittek abbah yen.
Kalúb-Qedri akak iyyan num buqret taamitta 'ya marih cawal kee qasbi wagitta taamak abbah yen.
Simqi deqsita numuy Raama akak iyyan magaalal yoobokehiyya, qinab xala cooxuk abbah yen.
Dabdi deqsita numuy Safam deqsitta magaalal yoobokehiyya, kaadu qinab xala cooxih xaylok bicsan kamrih abbootan luk yen.
Baqal-Caanan deqsita numuy Geder deqsitta magaalal yoobokehiyya, ayrô-culmat raqta mango koomaami le baaxol yan *daytuun xala coox kee *sublak abbah yen.
Yooqas deqsita num caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti elle gaaboysan aracak abbah yen.
Saaron deqsita aracal yooboke Sitray deqsita num kaadu Saaron-booxal yaloole laak inkih abbah yen.
Qadláy-Saafat deqsita num kaadu daqoorul yaloole laak abbah yen.
Oobil deqsita numuy Ismaaqilto deqsita marah aabakuk yenehiyya gaalak inkih abbah yen.
Yecdayaahu deqsita numuy Meronot deqsitta magaalal yoobokehiyya inkih tan danoonah abbootan luk yen.
Yaadid deqsita numuy Hagri-marah yoobokehiyya inkih tan illi kee wadarak abbah yen.
Yonaatan deqsita numuy Malik Dawud qammih yenehiyya fayu yecee kasloytah yeneeh; tonnah kaadu kaxxa baritto le numuk ten. Cakmooní-Yaciyel deqsita num malikik lab-xayloh barittoh abbootan luk yen.
Acitoofal deqsita num kaadu malikih fayu yecee kasloytak ten. Qarka deqsita gulubuh yooboke Cuusay deqsita num kaadu malikik kataysay malik mala elle baahahiyyak ten.
Acitoofal rabek wadir, Abiyataar kee Banaayá-Yoyadaq malikih fayu yecee mara yekken. Yowab malik qaskarak abbah yen.

Malik Dawud inkih tan Israayil abbobtih seeco abe. Keenih akah seecem, Yarusalaam magaalal gaaboowaana'gidik ten. Too seecol kedoh abbobti kee, kay dardaarinni maadda haa baaxol doolat abbobtih yan mara kee, gulub-gulubuk abbobtih yan mara kee, malik kee kaak lab-xaylo edderra hayte midirik amo wagitak yan mara kee, kay qaril abbootan luk yan mara kee, qaskarak foocat tan qaskar kee, wohuk kalah yan maray muxxo lehiyyak num maraaqinnay, inkih Yarusalaam magaalal gaaboowen.
Too mari inkih elle gaaboowe ikkel, Dawud foocal keenik solla iyyeh ken lih yaabe. Keenik iyyeemih, «Yi baaxoh ummatey, siinik axcem yok oobbeya. YALLIH Qahdih-Sanduguy kay ibih mattaaqatta kinnihiyya elle hayna'gidih, Qibaadâ-Qari xisam faxak suge. Inni Dageltah nabnah, kay Qibaadah-Qarih cato, bica naharal elle abeh suge.
Takkay immay xisam faxak suge waqdi, Yalli, ‹Atu qaskariita kinnitooh, mango qabal caxxe ikkal, yi Qibaadah Qari xisi koo mahaa› 'yaanam yok iyyeeh xise yoo kaleh.
Tonna'mmay YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya yi abbah buxak Israayil dardaarah gaca'gidih yoo dooreeh; yi durruyyatih reeda baxak baxal tabe leemih, YALLI qahdi neh culeh yan. Dardaarinna Yuudâ-kedoh yeceeh, Yuuda addak kaadu yi buxah marah dardaarinna geyaanamih nasiib yecee. Yi buxah marak addak kaadu yoo doorru heeh, inkih tan Israayil ummatih amoyta yoo abe.
Lab-xaylok mangom yoh yecee. Xalla hee xalaayak addak kaadu yi lakal Israayil ummatih amoytiinuh Suleeman doore. Isih, abbah akak yan Israayil-ummattal yi lakal malikih Suleeman hee leemih, xagana yoh culeh yan.
«YALLI yok iyyeemih, ‹Yoo elle yaqbudoonu waan Qari kee daaroota xissu waytam, ku baxa Suleemana. Baxa yoh yakke'gidih kaa dooreh an. Anu kaadu abba kaah akkeyyo.
Taway akah aba'nnah, anu ruube amri xagureeh, too amri iyyaamak tu cabe'kal duudusek, tonnal kay dardaarinni way akah baye waa'nnah abeyyo› 'yaanam yok iyye.
«Hay taway, yi ummatey, ni Dagelti yoo elle yaabbeeh, siiniy YALLIH ummat kinnihiyya yoo elle tablen ikkel, yaabah aniih; YALLAY ni Dageltah yani nee amrissa heem cubbusak abtaanam siinil cabah an. Tah duudussa hayteenik, ta baaxoy usuk siinih yeceehiyya sin ikoyta akkeleeh; baxak baxal ikoytah siinik raaqele» 'yaanam iyye.
Too waqdi Suleemanak iyyemii, «Yi baxaw, atu kaadu isi abba aqbuduk suge Dagelta taaxigeemiiy namma kalbi aalle'kal kaah taamittaamih fayxi taalleemi. Kaak kalih imih taamittam cabba hayteh dibuk kay taamat gactaama. YALLI nanu nacsubem kee niyatnam nek yaaxigeh. Niya kaa fanah haytek, kaa gee lito. Takkay immay darre kaat cabtek, darre kot cabeleeh; way kol mayaduura.
YALLI isi Qibaadah-Qarih xissa'gidih koo doorem kassa haay mahawweenin. Tahaysa kay qarih xisnet cultaamaay gaba kalla haytam fanah, fanat akak aade waytaama» 'yaanam kaak iyye.
Dawud, Qibaadâ-Qari elle xisu waa gurra Suleemanah yescesse. Qibaadâ-Qari akak culan arac kee, Qibaadâ-Qarih addal duyye elle daanisoonu waan golitte kee, Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goliy dambi-cabsuh culaanahiyya elle xisu waa inna kaah yescesseeh, tohuk kalah tan golittey raqqa 'tehiyya elle xisu waa innih gurra kaah yescesse.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih daaroota kee, woo daarootah dariifal faxxinta qarwa elle xiseh meqe innih tiyakaa, isit cella haytam inkih kaah yescesse. Qibaadâ-Qarih duyye edde haan golitte kee ummatta Yallih sadgatah bahta duyye elle haan golitte elle xisan innak isit celtam kaadu kaah warse.
Tohuk kalah kaah warsem macaay inteenik, seeka kee Leewih yooboke mara exxa-exxal akah kurra hee innaay; YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril keenil tan taama akah aban innaay; wohuk kalah kaadu, Qibaadâ-Qarih addal Yallih sadgat wagga hayta taama edde aban mingilwa kee duyyeeyah amo akah wagtan innah ken missoysaanaah bical haanamih tiyak kaadu isit celtam kaah warse.
Too duyye kee mingilwa edde bicsaana'gidih, dahabak faxxintah gide kee lakqok faxxintah gide kaah warse.
Tohum, dahabak bicsen faanuswa kee, faanuswa elle haan mansafitteey, lakqok bicsen faanuswa kee, faanuswa elle haan mansafitteey,
dahabak bicsen miizway Yallih sadgatah baahen gaqambo elle haanahiyya kee, lakqok bicsen miizwaay;
wohuk kalah kaadu, dahabak bicsen feeraari le malaakiq kee sacnitte kee gaanitte kee daasatwâ bicsah faxxiima dahab kee lakqok ten. Ta duyyeeyah-bicsah inkih, dahab kee lakqok faxxintah gide kaah warse.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, qaydarus elle ruuban mansafih bicsah saafih yan dahabak faxxintah gide kee, dahabak bicsan gaariy galwa leemiy YALLIH Qahdih Sanduguk daga raqtahiyya kinni akah bicsan gurra kaah yescesse.
Tohuk lakal kaak iyyeemihii, «Taway koh warisak sugga excem inkih, ta qarih xisne kee teetih faxxinta duyye elle bicsan gurraay, taham yoh warissem YALLAAY; usuk yok aba elle iyye'nnal tunkuttubeh tan» kaak iyye.
Tohuk gaba kale waqdi kaak iyyeemih, «Tahaysa, yi baxaw, niya haysitaay abtaamak agaagul cabba haay digga 'xic. YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih-taama qimbisaay, faxem takkeemih fanat akak maadayin. Dageltah yan YALLAY yi Dagelta kinni koo elle catele. A taamak gaba kalla haytam fan kol macabay koo elle catak sugele.
Qibaadâ-Qari xissu wayta saaku, seeka kee Leewih yooboke mari kaadu addal akak aboonu waan taamah bical yanin. Gabâ naggaarinna elle haah taamah ixxiga elli haa mari a taamal cataanamih fayxih qambaxxaagitak yanin. Wohuk raqqa 'te ummat kee ken abbobti a taamal atu ken akah amrisinnaanim abelon» 'yaanam kaak iyye.

Malik Dawud inkih tan ummatak iyyeemih, «Yalli malikih siinih doorem, yi baxa Suleemana. Takkay immay usuk ahayduma qunxa numuuy; taama elle aban innih ixxiga mali. Away xisneh kaa qambaltam, malik-qari hinnaay, Dageltah yan YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari. Tonna-kinnuk mango taama faxxiimele.
Qari-xisne kee, sarra Yallih qibaada elle aban saaku, faxxinta duyye naharal elle missoyseh cabah an. Toh maa duyyeey inteenik, faxximtam akak bicsaana'gidih, dahabaay lakqooy nacaasaay biriita kee yirgiqen coox cabah an. Tohuk kalah kaadu, limo gibdi xeetiiy, bilqah haan qaxmeqe xeetiy mango bisu lehiyya kee, qado-xeetik mangom cabah an.
Taham inkih ta Qibaadah-Qari bicsaana'gidih gaabossa heeh; tahak kalah kaadu, a Qibaadah-Qarih liyoh an kacanuk gexxaamah, inni buxal liyo dahab kee lakqo edde aceeh an.
Tohum, agle sinni dahabak bool alfih kiilok fula takkem eceeh, tonnah kaadu, saafik tan lakqok namma bool kee morootom alfih kiiloh gide ecee. Ta duyye akah eceem, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih gidaar edde bilqisaana'gidiiy,
a Qibaadah-Qarih faxxinta mansafwa gabâ-naggaarinna le mari akak bicsa'gidi. Anu tah abek, taway ta qarih xisneh mattaco yaceem faxa mari siinik iyyaa?» iyye.
Malik Dawud toh keenik iyye waqdi, kedoh abbobti kee doolat kabuk kedoh abbobtih yan mara kee, alfi-alfi kee bool-boolul kurrunte qaskarak abbobtih yan mara kee, malik taamah abbobtih yan mari inkih, «Meqeh, aceenno» 'yaanam iyyen.
Too mari tittat yecee duyye; dahabak bool kee malcina-tabanih alfih kiilok fula takkem kee, lakqok kaadu sidooca bool kee morootom alfih kiilok fula takkem kee, nacaasak laca boolih alfi kee labaatanni kiilo takkem kee, biriitak kaadu sidiica malyoon kee affara alfih kiilok fula yeceen.
Limo gibdi xeet le mari kaadu too xeet mattacoh Qibaadâ-Qarih yecee. Sarra too qarih abbootan le Yaciyel deqsita numuy Gerson gulubut raaqehiyyah gabal yeceen.
Ummat isi fayxiik, num ken dirkise'kkal, mango duyye yeceeniih; mango duyye YALLAH tontocowweemih kaadu tassa iyyen. Malik Dawud tah yuble waqdi, kaadu ruffu iyye.
Tokkel inkih tan ummat elle gaabowte aracal Malik Dawud YALLA faylise. YALLIH faylah iyyeemih,
«YALLAW, nanu akak radne Israayil doore Dageltaw,
ku migaq kulli way fayla le.
Qaran kee baaxol tanim inkih kuumu.
Nabna leeh diifu lem kooy; qande kee nasri lem kooy;
hayba dibuk lem koo.
YALLAW, abbootan lem koo;
kulliimik fula leeh daga raaqa dardar koo.
Gaddaliino kee midir akak temeetem koo; mulki lem koo;
kullim inkih isi cayla kee qandet xiinissa.
Sahdaytu kaxxa num abtah, celem abtam koo.
Tonna leemiik, ni Dageltaw, candu koh gacisna.
Ku migaaqay kulsa le faylisna.
«Yi Dageltaw, yoo kee yi mara a axxul le maqaane geynam caddik le mara hinnino. Acwah koh naceem mannuuy; linom, kok geyne ku maqaaney wadir koh gacisnahiyya.
YALLAW, ni kaxxa abbobtik kaxxih, addunyal nan way, marin baaxol baaxo-maleelah sugna. A saaku nanim cellaamah, sahdayti mano saakih iraawih gideey rabah yan mara kinnino.
YALLAW, ni Dageltaw, a saaku a gid takke duyye bahneeh, gaabosne. Akah bahnem, kooy *kudduusuk yanihiyyah migaaqih nabnah qari xisna'gidi. Takkay immay a duyye neh teceem kooy; akak geynem koo.
Yi Dageltaw, kulli numuk afqado tagirribem kok aaxigeh; afqado akak digga le num table waqdi ruffu iyya Dagelta kinnitom kok aaxigeh. A duyyey anu inni le kabuk eceehiyya qado-baguuk eceeh inni fayxiik kaadu tet ecee. Tonnah kaadu, ku maray a duyye akke baahehiyya isi fayxiik bagu edde emeqqa 'yeenih baaheenim keenik ubleh an.
YALLAW, ni kaxxa abbobtih yen Abraahim kee Iscaak kee Israayil elle aamanuk sugte Dageltaw, a saaku lino meqe niya kulli way isi marih afqadot haay. Ken afqado koo fan hayisay.
Yi baxa Suleeman ku xinto kee amriiy atu intem baguuk aba'gidih, fayxi kaah ucuyaay; a Qibaadah-Qariy xisnê-duyye akah eceehiyya xisa'gidih, fayxi kaah ucuy» 'yaanam axcuk Yalla luk yaabe.
Too yaabak gaba kale waqdi ummatak, «YALLAY sin Dagelta kinni faylisa» iyye. Too waqdi suggu 'ye mari, YALLAY oson akak raden ken kaxxa abbobti doorehiyya fayliseenih. Qununna 'yeenih, baaxol gommoh radeenih, YALLA yessekexxeeniih; isinni malik kaadu yessekexxen.
Nammeyhaytoh ayro YALLIH sadgatah saqa yusguuden. Awurwak alfi yusguudeeniih; marwak alfi yusguudeeniih; anaaqek kaadu alfi yusguuden. Too saqih cado inkih sadgat elle aban mansafih bagul cararisen. Qinabak bicsen kamrih sadgat kaadu baahen. Tohuk kalah kaadu, YALLIH sadgatah mango saqa yusguudeeniih; too saqih cado ummatah inkih keefen.
Tohuk gexxaamah, uqubba heeniih, maaqo akamuk, farcatat YALLIH qiidih asen.
Dawud baxa Suleeman nammeyhaak malik aben. Too saaku YALLIH migaq edde xagak, malik yakke'gidih kaa yuskuteeniih isinni malik kaa aben. Kaxxa-seekih kaadu Saaduk yuskuten.
Tonnal Suleeman, isi abbah aracay YALLI keenih yeceehiyyal, malik yekke. Suleeman malik yekkek wadiril, abinnaanim gabal kaak bicteeh, Israayil mari kaadu kaah rammitakaay amri kaak oggolak yenen.
Doolat abbobti kee qaskar kee kay toobokoh agantah, «Malik Suleeman nek aba axcinnaanim abennooh, kaal mamakna» 'yaanam axcuk xiibiten.
YALLI, inkih tan ummat akak cunxitta numuy hayba le kaa abe. Israayilil dardaare marak, Yalli Suleeman gide nabna kee haybak akah yecee malik mananna.
Kay abba Yiisâ-baxa Dawud inkih tan Israayil ummatak malikih suge.
Morootom sanatih gide malikih sugeeh; too morootomuk Cebron magaalal malcina sanat malikih sugeeh; wohuk raaqa soddom kee sidooca sanat Yarusalaam magaalal malikih suge.
Barak nagay idaltuh yan saaku rabe. Yanim fanah gaddaliino kee caddi wee'kal rabe. Kay lakal kay aracal kay baxi Suleeman malik yekke.
Kay aydaadak qimbooy ellecabo Samuwel kee Naatan kee Gaad deqsita sidooca nabih aydaadi elle yan kitoobal geytinta.
Too kitoobal tanim macaay inteenik, usuk ummat elle xiinisak suge inna kee, usuk qandek luk yene inna kee, kaa kee Israayil ummat kee kay dariifal ten doolatwat tikka 'tem inkih, too kitoobal geytinta.

YALLAY Dawud baxa Suleeman doorehiyya, Suleeman lih yeneeh, kaxxa num kaa abe. Tonna-leemiik usuk kaadu is le kabuk isi abbootan nagay maqar bahsiise.
Ayrok teena Suleeman, Israayilik alfi-alfi kee bool-boolul kurrunte qaskarak abbobtih yen mara kee, cokmi-abeenit kee inkih yan Israayilik kedoh abbobtih yan marah inkih seeco abe.
Too waqdi Gibqon deqsita magaalal yen aracay Yalla elle yaqbudeeni fan ken lih gexe. Tokke fan akah gexeenim, Yallih Nabnah-Siraq tokkel yen. YALLIH naqasuh yan Muusa addunyâ-bagul yen saaku, bacarih tan baaxol woo siraq bicseenih yenen.
Yallih Qahdi addat akak yan Sandug Yarusalaam magaalal Malik Dawud soolise siraq addat daanat yen. Malik Dawud a Sandug Kiryat-Yaqaarim deqsitta magaalay elle sugehiyyak bahha heeh, Yarusalaam magaalal hee.
Takkay immay nacaasak bicsen mansafay Yallih sadgat elle abaanahiyya Gibqon deqsita aracal Yallih Nabnah-Siraqih foocal sooliseenih yenen. Too mansaf bicissem, Baxalal deqsita numuk ten. Baxalal, Uuri akak iyyan numuk baxak teneeh, Cuur akak iyyan numuk baxi baxak ten. Suleeman kee kaa'lih temeete Israayil ummatta Yalla elle taqbudem too aracak ten.
Suleeman Yallih Nabnah-Siraqak foocal yen nacaasak bicsen mansafak bagul YALLAH sadgat abe. Inkitanuuk cado akak cararisan sadgatak alfi takkem YALLIH sadgatah woo mansafih bagul cararise.
Too bar Yalli Suleemanah soonol yumbulleeh, kaak iyyeemih, «Maca koh abam faxxaah, yoo esseritey» iyye.
Suleeman Yallak iyyemii, «Yi abba Dawuduh kaxxa kacanu luk sugteeh, yoo kaadu kay lakal kay aracal malikih hayte.
Dageltah yan YALLAW, naharak yi abbah culte xagna yoh duudussam kok faxa. Ku ummattay mangah loowo akak duudume waytahiyyah abba yoo abteh tan.
Tonna-kinnuk, Dageltah yan YALLAW, ta mara inkih edde xiinissa haa kas kee ixxiga yoh ucuy. Too kas aalle week, a axxul le ku mara qadlit xiinisam maduuda» iyye.
Yalli too waqdi kaak iyyemii, «Meqem dooritte. ‹Gaddaliino faxa› maxaccitooy, ‹Mango midir faxa› maxaccito. ‹Migaq-gexxo faxa› kaadu maxaccitooy, hinnay kaadu, ‹Naqboytiitih yok yan mara yoh qid› yok maxaccito. Kaadu ‹Qumri yok eyxeer, yi Dageltaw› 'yaanam yok maxaccito. Tohuk tu yoo messerinnitoy, ‹Atu abba yoo akak abteh tan ku mara edde xiinisa'gidih kas kee ixxiga yoh ucuy› yok inte.
Too atu faxxe kas kee ixxiga koh aceeyyooh; toh lih kaadu, faxe malik duma luk suge weeh, sarra geyak raaqe wayu waa mango gaddaliino kee kaxxa midir kee migaq-gexxo koh aceeyyo» kaak iyye.
Sarrak Suleeman Yallih Nabnah-Siraq elle yen Gibqoonuk Yarusalaam magaala fan yuduure. Tokkel anuk Israayil mara xiinisak yen.
Suleeman alfi kee affara bool takke gaariiray faaris beyta kee, taban kee namma alfih farasay qeebi abtahiyya gaabossa hee. Tohuk tu takkem Yarusalaamal abbaxuk yeneeh, wohuk kalihim mango magaaloolil kaak ten.
Suleeman dabaanal lakqo kee dahab xeet manga luk teneeh; *sariidâ coox kaadu, mango-koomaami le baaxol tan *sublah innah qadad cabeh yen.
Malik afak yen mari faariisa akak xaamak yenem, Masri baaxo kee Kiiwu deqsita aracak ten.
Faaris-gaariira kaadu Masrik baahak yenen. Inki gaari lica boolih garsih keenik xaamakaay, faras kaadu bool kee kontom garsih keenik xaamak yenen. A mari sarrak Ciita kee Suuriyah malikwal inkih a duyye aylammuk yenen.

Malik Suleeman, YALLA elle yaqbuden qari xisam faxeeh; isih kaadu elle gaca malik-qari xisam faxe.
Too xisne abaana'gidih, faxxinta duyyeeya xayyoosa marak malcina-tabanih alfih num bical hee. Bacra-tabanih alfih num kaadu qaleela mango rasul xisnê-xeet oraah missoysa'gidih bical hee. Ken taamak amo wagita marak sidiica alfi kee lica boolih num amol keenik hee.
Sarrak Suur deqsitta magaalah malikiy migaaqah Curam deqsitak yenehiyyah farmo ruubeeh, kaak iyyemii, «Duma yi abba Dawud isi qari xise saaku edde xise sariidâ-coox kaah rubteh teneeh; a saaku kaadu yoh tonnah tanim abtam kok faxa.
Anu YALLAY yi Dagelta kinnihiyyah massakaxxah qari xisam faxa. Xisu waa qari taahirik yan qariy kaa elle yaqbudeeni akkele. Suruy meqe qerto YALLAH elle ruubennooh; kulli ayro kaadu taahirroysen-gaqambo too qaril heenno. Kulli ayro maaca kee carra kaadu kay sadgatah cado akak carrisan saq too qaril asguudenno. Tonnah kaadu sabti ayro kee alsi biloh qiid kee, wohuk kalah tan ayrooray YALLIH qiidih edde asaanahiyya YALLIH migaaqal cado akak cararisan sadgat too qaril abenno. YALLI Israayil ummatak, ‹Taham waarta madqa› 'yaanam iyyeh yan.
Ni Dagelti, nek kalih mari yalla axcuk yaqbuden duyyek inkih, muxxo le Dagelta kinniimih sabbatah, kaah xisu waa qari kaxxam naba qari akkele.
Tonna'mmay Yalla tikka 'ya qaran kinni-way yabbixu maduuda. Tonna-leemiik sahdayti kaa yabbixe qari xisu maduuda. Tonna-kinnuk, anu kaah sadgat elle abaanamak fula qari xisam maduuda.
Toh too tiya'mmay taway kok axcemii, duyyeeyâ-bagul kutbe haah, dahab kee lakqooy nacaas kee birti bicsa yaaxigeeh, tonnah kaadu, kuclinan kee qasdiiminaanaay qisik sari bicsa yaaxige num yoh rubtaama. Too num rubta waqdi, yi abba dumaak abbaxuk suge gabâ naggaarinna le maray Yuudâ-baaxo kee Yarusalaam magaalal yanihiyya lih taamitele.
Ku mari, coox-garuq kee missoysiyyal nagay tan ixxiga loonum keenik aaxigeh immay, Lubnaan rasuk sariida kee saagan kee gersi coox irgiqay yoh ruubetto. Anu inni kabuk ken catu waa mara ruubeyyo.
Ta mari, coox-bicsa ku mara luk abele. Xisam faxa qari qax-meqe weeloy nabahiyya aalleleeh; mango coox faxxiimele.
Too taamat yoh tamsissu wayta marah qasbih, namma malyoonih kiilo takke kamadi kee, namma malyoonih kiilo takke gabru deqsitta darooy, affara boolih alfih litri yakke kamriy qinabak bicseenihiyya kee, caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeytik affara boolih alfih litri ruubeyyo» 'yaanam farmoh kaah ruube.
Malik Curam too farmol raddi kaal gacseeh iyyeemih, «YALLI isi mara kicna Dagelta kinniimih sabbatah, koo ken malik abe.
YALLI, Malik Dawuduh kas le baxay bagi cubbi leeh, ixxiga akak dudda lehiyya yeceeh yan. Tonna-leemiik kay baxi YALLA elle yaqbuden qari xisaamat yemeeteeh; isih kaadu malik-qari xisaamat yemeeteh yan. YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyay qaran kee baaxo yuklukehiyyah fayla taafay.
Taway yoh rubte farmo yoo gufteeh, kaxxa kas leeh gabâ-naggaarinna kaadu kaxxam le numuy migaaqah Curam-abi deqsitahiyya koh ruubah an.
Ta num abuusam, Daan deqsitta kedooy; kay abba elle yoobokem, Suur deqsitta magaala. Dahab kee lakqooy nacaas kee biriita elle bicsan inna nagay yaaxige. Xeet elle oran inna kee qari xisnet bica coox elle yargiqen inna nagay yaaxige. Tohuk kalah kaadu, kuclinan kee qasdiiminan kee qisik sara elle bicsan inna nagay yaaxige. Tonnah kaadu, *baftak meqe sara elle bicsan inna yaaxige numu. Xeetik bagul taswiir kee kutbe elle haan inna yaaxigeeh, aba kaak axcinnaan taama elle faxxa haan innal abam yaaxige. Ta num yamaate saaku ku maray naggaarinna lehiyya kee duma ku abbah taamitak suge mara lih taamitay kaa axcetto.
Toh tiyaay, tonna leemik anu a num koh ruubah ani'mmay, atu koh ruubeyyo inte kamadi kee gabru deqsitta daro kee qinabak bicsen kamri kee caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti (saliid) neh ruubetto.
Lubnaan qaleelal yan sariida kee gersi cooxuk atu faxxa haytah gide irgiqqi heenih koh ruuba, axceyyo. Too coox tittat uxuyya heenih damâ-gurral badal akah tamaate innah abelon. Yaffâ-magaala fan badal koh amaatele. Tokkel matarra akah inteenih, tokkeek Yarusalaam fan ku mari beele» 'yaanam raddih kaah ruube.
Sarrak Malik Suleeman duma kay abba akah abe innah, Israayil addal tan allahih-baaxoh marak loowo takke gide, loowo akak abu waa mara ruube. Too mara lowwa heen waqdi, bool kee kontom kee sidiica alfi kee lica boolih num akkuk sugen.
Too marak malcina-tabanih alfih num a namma qari edde xisan duyye baahaanamih taamat heeh; bacra-tabanih alfih num kaadu qaleelak xeet yaggileeniih missoysaanamih taamat hee. Too mari meqe innah missat taamitem kee taamite weem wagtu waa marak amol, sidiica alfi kee lica boolih num keenik hee.

Suleemanak abba Malik Dawud, Yallih Qibaadah-Qari elle xisoonu waan arac dumal elle bicseh suge. Too arac, Yarusalaam magaalal tan Mooriya deqsitta qalek ten. Too arac, tohuk dumal Ornan deqsita numuy Yabuusa deqsitta kedoh aabakuk yenehiyya, daro kee caffa tittak elle baxisak yen araca. Suleeman qari-xisne qimbise.
Taama edde qimbisem, waktik malik edde yekke fereyhaytô sanatak nammeyhaytoh alsak ten.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qariy Malik Suleeman xisehiyya xexxaarah too saaku aaxaguk yenen cusuluk lactam akkuk yeneeh, labaatanni cusul baguh akkuk yen.
Qibaadâ-Qari akak culan naharsi goli baguh Qibaadâ-Qari'nnal, labaatanni cusul akkuk yen. Fayyah kaadu bool kee labaatanni cusul akkuk yen. Qarik adda agle sinni dahabay saafih yanit exfeenih yenen.
Qibaadâ-Qarik kaxxa qarih bagu saagan-cooxut exfeenih yenen. Too saaganak bagu nabam qax-meqe dahabat exfeenih yenen. Too dahabak bagul mango nakliita kee silsilatwa tasaawir heenih yenen.
Tohuk kalah, inkih yan qarik baguu, kaxxam qax meqe xeet kee Farwayim deqsitta baaxok baahen dahabat bileh yen.
Adda le kabuk gidaar akak dahabat exfeenih yenen. Toh lih kaadu, amô-tabsih coox kee qari culmah ranko kee albaabitte inkih, dahabak exfeenih yenen. Gidaarak bagul galwa leemih tasaawir bileenih yenen.
Adda le kabu raaqa goli, Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goli deqsitak yen. Too goli labaatanni cusul xexxaarah akkuk yeneeh, baguh labaatanni cusul akkuk yen. Tonnal inkih yan qari baguh yakkeh gide akkuk yen. Labaatanni alfi kiilok fula yakke dahabay agle sinnik woo Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goli edde exfeenih yenen.
Kiilô-garabak fayya 'ya dahabak bisaamir bicsen. Qarik amoh golittek adda le kabu kaadu dahabat exfeenih yenen.
Malik tohuk kalah, taamâ-marak iyyeemih, «Galwa leemih ceelok nammay bicissa haay bagul dahab akak exefaay, sarrak Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Golil haa» iyye.
Too tasaawir too aracak tittak xaqut soolissa heenih, fooca akak woo arac akak culan culma fan afkunuk caben. A tasaawirik kulli tii namma gali luk yeneeh, kulli gali xexxaarah koona cusul akkuk yen. Tittak xaqut elle soolan ikkel, namma galiy fakimit yanihiyya woo kabu kee a kabuk titta keenik aleelak yen. A kabu kee woo kabuk kaadu, Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Golih gidaar gufak yen. Tittat labaatanni cusuluh gide baguh yakke arac gufak yen.
