Too golih afat wanxeexit sugte reebi-saro akak bicseenim, *baftak bicsen meqe saro kee kuclinan kee qasdiiminan kee qisi le tafulwak ten. Woo tafulwa kee saro titta lih meqe'nnal bicseenih; too sarok bagul galwa leemih tasaawir heenih yenen.
Kalah kaadu namma qamiddu bicsiiseeh; kulli qamiddi soddom kee koona cusul xexxaarah akkuk yen. Too namma qamiddu bahha heeh, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik foocal soolise. Too qamidwak amot tan duyye fayyah koona cusul akkuk ten.
A qamidwak amo, silsilat kee bool takke rummaanat-ceeloy woo silsilatih bagul tenehiyyak bilqiseenih yenen.
A namma qamiddu elle sooliseenim, Qibaadâ-Qarih culmak a gambi kee woo gambik ten. Qari akak culan afak migdi kabuk soolisen qamiddi migaaqah Yaakin

Tohuk kalah kaadu nacaasak sadgat-elle-aban-mansaf bicseh yen. Too mansaf xexxaarah labaatanni cusul akkuk yen. Baguh kaadu labaatanni cusul akkuk yeneeh, fayyah kaadu tabna cusul akkuk yen.
Curam kaadu nacaasak sacni gurral yan kaxxa tanak bicse. Too tanakak adda koona cusul akkuk ten. A sanaak woo san farakkah tabna cusul akkuk yen. Soddom cusul kaadu inkih yan tattab kaak akkuk yen.
Namma roorul sittak bagul tan kulli cusulul tabna awur ceeloh taswiir tanakak a exxaay woo exxal akak yen. A taswiir yakkeemiik raaqe tanakak baxsa sinni gurral bicseenih yenen.
Too tanak nacaasak bicsen taban kee namma awurih ceeloh amol daffeyseenih yenen. Too awurwak kulli sidocuuy inki kabul afkanuk yen.
Woo tanak masuh gaba gennaqtah gide akkuk yen. Af akak figgaan af ceelak yen. San-san akak xambaqu luk cabeenih yenen. Too tanak leek lactam alfih litri abbaxuk yen.
Tonnah kaadu tabna sacni bicsen. A tabanak konoy Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik migdi le kabut heeniih, aki konoy guri kabul akak heen. Too sacnitte akah heenim, sadgatah qidan saqih cado elle kaqlisaana'gidik ten. Sacni gurral yan kaxxa tanakah tu gactek, seeka edde kaqalta lee elle haak yenen.
Kitab elle inxicca 'ye innal, tabna caxxay faanuswa amol akak haanahiyya dahabak bicsen. Too cooxuy dahabak bicseenihiyya Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik giffa 'ya golih addal heen. A tabanak konooy tattabak teenal heeniih, aki konooy kaadu gersi tattabal heen.
Tonnah kaadu tabna miiz bicsen. Qibaadâ-Qarih addal konooy tattabak teenal heeniih, aki konooy kaadu gersi tattabal heen. Tohuk kalah kaadu, dahabak qunxa sacnittey rifan qabala kee lee elle haanak bool bicsen.
Seeka elle gacta'gidih, Qibaadâ-Qarik adda le kabul daarat bicsen. Tonnah kaadu iro le kabuk kaxxa daarat bicsen. Daarat-alfintitte bicseenih; too alfintitte nacaasak exfen.
Sacni gurral yan kaxxa tanak elle heenim, Qibaadâ-Qarik gabbi le kabut raaqa tattab kee ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqa tattab elle yangale aracak xaquk ten.
Curam tohuk kalah kaadu, gombod elle caxan mingilwaay, badiilaali kee, rifan qabala kee lee elle haan sacnitte bicse.
Curam Suleeman kaal yecee taamak gaba kaleeh, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih-taama duuduse.
Usuk bicse duyye ah teeti:
Namma qamiddu kee
woo namma qamidduh amot heen sacni af le duyye kee
too duyyey sacni af lehiyyak bagul bilqah heen sudaaducuh tittat yoxeen silsilatih tasaawir kee
rummaanat tasaawiriy affara bool mangah yakkehiyya bicse. Too tasaawir qamiddi amot tan duyyey sacni af lehiyyak bagul, tittat yoxeen silsilatih bagul, kulli mansafak a exxaay woo exxak namma rooruh hayya heenih duuduseenih yenen.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, Curam tabna gaari kee tabna sacni kee
sacni gurral yan kaxxa tanakaay,
woo tanak qekuh elle yan taban kee namma awurih ceelooy,
gombod elle caxan mingilwaay, badiilaali kee feeraari le malaakiq bicse.
Naggaarinna abba haa marak inkih foocat yan Curam ta duyye inkih akak bicsem, isiffiyya heen nacaasak ten. «Ta duyye YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih tannal bicisa» kaak intem, Malik Suleemanak ten.
Suleeman ta duyyeeya elle bicsiisem, Ordon weeqaytuk Sukkot kee Xareeda deqsitta namma magaalak fanal yan aracay qasa-burta elle geytimtahiyyak ten. Tokkel, too duyyeh weelo qasa-burtak bicseenih, diyaayisen nacaas elle caxen.
Duyyek bicseenim mangoomuk teneeh, tohuk gexxaamah a duyyeh bicsaah nacaasak faxxinteh gidek loowo yaaxige num mayan.
Tohuk kalah Malik Suleeman Qibaadâ-Qarih addal heen duyye bicsiise. Tohumuu, sadgatah qerto elle qeerisan mansafay dahabak bicseeni kee, Yallih sadgatah xayyoosan gaqambo elle haan miizwa kee,
Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Golik foocal, Muusal obte xinto elle inta innal, faxxiima waqdi ursan faanuswa kee faanuswa elle daffeysan coox agle sinni dahabak bicsen.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, kaxxam meqe dahabak qobor gurral bicsen tasaawiriiy, faanuswa kee, xikcin elle haan kabaaba kee,
faanuswa edde bargusan afti-xaylooy, rifan qabala elle haan sacnitteey, qeerisan qaydarus elle haan mingilwa kee, xikcin elle haan kabaaba inkih, saafik yan dahabak bicseenih yenen. Tohuk kalah kaadu, Yallih Qibaadah-Qari akak culan iro le kabut raqta culmah alfintitte kee Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goli akak culan alfintitte dahabat exfeenih yenen.

Tonnah abak, Suleeman YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih xisnek gaba kaleh. Too waqdi Suleeman kay abba Dawud YALLIH qibaadah loowe duyye rikeek abbaxuk sugehiyya gaabossa heeh, sarrak Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik mattacoh yaceen duyye elle daanisan golitteh addal hee. Tohumuu, dahab kee lakqo kee, kaadu wohuk kalah, gersi duyyek ten.
Too dabaanal YALLIH Qahdih Sandug, Dawud-Magaalay Siyon deqsitahiyyal sugte. Malcinhaytoh alsat yamaate Iraawô-Dabih-Qiid deqsita qiidih ayro Yarusalaamal kobxen waqdi, Malik Suleeman too Sandug Yallih Qibaadah-Qari fan baahaana'gidih, Israayilik saqoltih yan maraay kedoh abbobti kee makaabonuh seeco abe.
Sarrak Israayil ummattak saqoltih yen mari elle yan ikkel, Leewih yooboke mari Qahdi-Sandug ukkuqqa heeh,
Yallih Qibaadah-Qari fan been. Leewih yooboke mara kee seeka, Yallih Nabnah-Siraq kee tet addal sugte duyye inkih, Yallih-Qibaadah-Qari fan been.
Malik Suleeman kee inkih tan Israayil ummat Qahdi-Sanduguk foocal solla 'yeenih, tokkel mangah loowo sinni illi kee laa sadgatah yusguuden.
Tohuk gaba kalen waqdi seeka, YALLIH Qahdih-Sandug ukkuqqa hayteh, Qibaadâ-Qarik addal Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goliy iqiyat raaqahiyyah addal daffeyseeniih, woo galwa leemih ceeloh gubal heen.
Tonnal galwa-leemih galway fakimit tanihiyya YALLIH Qahdih-Sandug kee tet elle yakkuqen cooxuh reebu tekke.
Tet elle yakkuqen cooxih buxuxwak exxaaxi Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goli deqsita aracak foocal soola numuh amballayuk yene'mmay, tohuk kalih kabuk amballayuk mananna. Too coox ta saaku fan tokkel elle yan.
Sandug addat geytimak tenem, namma luucuy xeetik bicseenihiyyak ten. Israayil mari Masri rasuk eweqqa 'yeh safarat yan saaku, YALLI Siinâ-Qaleh amol Israayil mara lih abe qahdih-yab too luucul yunkuttube. Too namma xaa too sandugih addat haytem, Muusak ten.
Seeka woo sandug daffessa haytek lakal, Taahirik-yan-Aracih-addak tewqe. Woo saaku, seeka akak inxicca iyyan mari faxe gulubuh yaabukoonay inkih gaaboowwa 'yeh, isinni taahirik heen.
Leewih ubukka 'ye marak saare abak ten Asaf kee Ceeman kee Yedutun akak axcuk yenen labha kee, oson akah yooboken gulubut raaqak yen mari inkih, too saaku sartanah *baftak bicsen meqe sarot gaceeniih; sadgat elle aban mansafak ayrô-mawqa le kabut, kirar kee *begena digirak giyaagib aagaruk soolen. Bool kee labaatanni seekiy *baanta aagaruk ken xaqut soolak yenen.
Yakkeenimiik inki adda akkaquk YALLA saarisan waqdi, *baanta kee giyaagib kee, wohuk kalah tan duyyey saareh yaagureenihiyya luk aagaruk aben. YALLIH saareh iyyeenim,
«YALLI maqaane le Goytak,
candu kaah gacisa, ummatey!
YALLIH kacni mayambaxak,
tohul candu kaah gacisa» axcuk Yalla faylisen.
Too waqdi, garciik qamburre YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarik adda inkih bulteh.
YALLIH nabna yaybulle noori, inkih yan qarik adda ifissa heemih sabbatah, seeka isinni taama abtuh, adda culaanam maduudinnon.

Too waqdi Malik Suleeman dooqa abeeh, dooqah iyyemii, «YALLAW, dite kee qamburreh addat gactam dooritte.
Away koh kaxxam naba qariy dabqih kulli way elle gactu wayta xise» 'yaanam iyye.
Sarrak inkih tan Israayil ummatay soltahiyya fan ufkunna 'yeh, dooqa keenih abe.
Tohuk lakal iyyeemih, «YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya fayla taafay. YALLI isi gabat yi abbah abe xagna duuduse. Yalli dumah yan saaku yi abbak iyyeemih,
‹Inni mara Masrik eyyeqqa heemiiy akke, Israayil baaxol yoo elle yaqbuden qari elle xisan magaala dooreh masuginniyo. Yi mara miraacisu waa num duma dooreh masuginniyo.
A saakuh tu gactek, yoo elle yaqbuden qari xisaana'gidih, Yarusalaam magaala dooreh aniih; kaaduuy, Dawudow, yi ummat xiinissa'gidih koo doore› 'yaanam kaak iyyeh suge» iyye.
Yab tokket mayseedinnay bisoh beeh iyyeemih, «Yi abba, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya, elle yaqbuden qari xisam faxeh suge waqdi,
YALLI yi abbah yan Dawuduk iyyeemih, ‹Yoo elle yaqbuden qari xissam faxxe waqdi meqem niyatteh tani immay,
woo qari xissu waytam koo hinnay, ku baxa. Atu isih xalte ku baxi xisele› 'yaanam kaak iyye.
«Ta saaku, YALLI iyyeemik cabem maliiy duuduseh. YALLI elle iyye'nnal, Dawud aracal Israayil ummatih malik ekkeh an. YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya elle yaqbuden qari xiseh an.
YALLI isi ummat lih abe qahdi-kutbeh elle yan luuc addat akak yan Sandug too qarih addal heeh an» iyye.
Suleeman toh inxicca 'yeh gaabowwa 'ye mari kaa elle yable'kkel, sadgatah qidan saqa elle carrisan mansaf gariik solla 'yeh, dooqah namma gaba fayya hee.
Suleeman fayya 'ya aracay nacaasak bicseenihiyya Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih daaratih gudel heeh yen. Too aracay nacaasak bicseenihiyya affara kabuk tittat koona cusul akkuk yen. Fayyah kaadu sidooca cusul akkuk yen. Sarrak too mansafal bukka 'yeeh, kulli num kaa elle yable ikkek gulubuh nokka 'yeeh, dooqah qaran fanah namma gaba fayya hee.
Dooqah iyyeemih, «YALLAW Israayil ummatta doore Dageltaw, kok sa qaran kee baaxol Yalli mayana. Baguuk koo taqbude ku naqoosah litoh tan kacni akak amurruqe waa Dagelta kinnitooh; keenih culte xagana duudusa Dagelta kinnito.
Yi abba Dawuduy ku naqasuh yeneh culte xagana duudusseh. Duma edde yabba intem inkih tiya tiyah duudusseh.
Taway YALLAW, Israayil ummatta doore Dageltaw, duma yi abbak koh duudusseyyo inteemik inki tiyay raqtehiyya tan. Tohumuu, ‹Kok radu waa mari, atu akah abte innah, anu aba excem dudda luk abe ken tekkek, tonnal ku reeda baxak baxal raqta reeda akkele› 'yaanam inteh ten.
Tonna kinnuk, Israayil ummatta doore Dageltaw, atu inxicca 'teeh yi abba Dawuduy ku naqasuh sugehiyyah culte xagni ku gabat dudda geyay.
«Yi Dageltaw, baaxo koo tabbixeemih dudda geelee? Baaxô-bagul sinam fanal dabqah maay gactaa? Qaran kee qaraanak ellecabot raqta qaraanitte tabbixu dudda akah gee wayta Dagelta kinnitok, hay, xise-qari-baxi mannal koo abbixele?
YALLAW, yi Dageltaw, anu ku naqasu kinniyok, aba dooqa yok oobbeyaay, koo akah kallacam yoh duudus.
A qarik bar kee loqo amo akak wagit. A qaril «Yoo aqbudeloonu» 'yaanam inteh teneeh; tonna kinnuk, anu a qari fan ufkunna exceh abah an dooqa yok raabit.
Yoo kee ku maray Israayilih yoobokehiyya ta Qibaadah-Qari fan ufkunna inneh abna dooqa nek raabit. Qaraanay ku dabqih yanihiyyak ni kallaci oobbeyaay abne umaanek qafu neh ab.
«Sahdaytuk qellat bahte 'yeenih, kaa xibsisaana'gidih a Qibaadah-Qari fan kaa baahen ken tekkek, too num ‹Anuy baahem mayyu› 'yaanam axcuk Qibaadâ-Qaril yan sadgat elle aban mansafih foocal xiibite kaa tekkek,
too waqdi, yi Dageltaw, qaraanak ken ankacisaay, cakki le num uybulluy. Qellat le numul celta digaala kaat abaay, qellat baahe wee num currih rub.
«Atu isi mara abte Israayil ummatta kol baahen dambik gexxaamah naqboytit keenik tiysiise koo tekkek, oson toh ubulla heenih kol yuduureeniih, ta Qibaadah-Qarih fan amma 'yeenih koh rammitta axcuk, ‹Yallaw, bahneh nan dambik qafu neh ab› axcuk dooqa abeenik,
elle tan qaraanaak too dooqa keenik raabit. Ku ummatta abteh sugte dambik qafu keenih abaay; oson midirih loonuuh dumaak ken kaxxa abbobtih teceeh sugte baaxo fan ken gacis.
«Ku ummatta kol bahte dambik gexxaamah, qaran alfimeeh rob waytimam ubulla heenih, too saaku toobitta 'yeenih koh rammitak a qibaadah qari fan ufkunna 'yeenih dooqa aben ken tekkek,
too dooqa, elle tan qaraanaak keenik raabit. Israayil ummattay ku naqoosah tanihiyya abte dambik qafu keenih ab. Edde gexan meqe-gita ken baris. A baaxo, ku baaxoy ku marah ikoytah teceehiyya kinnuk, rob tet mawaysiisin.
«A baaxol qulul rade kee dalkay numuuk numut tabtahiyya sinaamat rade kee, tooboke daro orongoobitiiy caaco bayse kee, qanayti sele yekkek, naqboytit qeebih magaala keenik marot haytek, biyak ken yabbaxuuy, gibdaabina lem keenit tikka 'tek,
tohuk dooqa aban waqdi dooqa keenik oggol. Yi Dageltaw, ku ummattay atu isih doorittehiyyak faxe num abe dambih baguuk nadaamitta 'yeh, gaba fayya haak a Qibaadah Qarit ufkunna 'yeh dooqa abe kaa tekkek,
ken dooqa raabit. Qaraanay ku dabqah yanihiyyak ken dooqa ankacisaay, dambik qafu keenih abaay ken cat. Sahdayti afqadoh addat yascubem taaxigem, dibuk koo. Tonna-kinnuk kulli numuh kay abini elle aninnaan innal keenil uckum.
Tonnal ku mari atu ken kaxxa abbobtih ikoytah tecee baaxol yaniinim fanah ku yab oggolak xiinelon.
«Allî-baaxoh mari ku nabna kee ku qande kee cayla yaabboonu waan waqdi kee, ku abini le innak xaagu geyoonu waan waqdi, a Qibaadah-Qaril dooqa abaana'gidih xer baaxok yemeeten ken tekkek,
koo akah kallaceenim keenih ab. Qaraanay elle tantohiyyak ken dooqa raabitaay, kot faxak akah yemeeteenim keenih duudus. Tonnal, Israayil ummattak kaxxih, addunyal enna 'ta ummatta koo aaxigeleeh, ku amri duudusele. Toh lih kaadu a qariy anu xisehiyya koo elle yaqbuden qari kinnim aaxigelon.
«Ku mari, atu ken amrissa waqdi, naqboytiitih isik yan marat qeebi abaana'gidih gaadan waqdi, faxe ikkeliiy yanoonay, a magaalay isih doorittehiyya kee, ta Qariy ku qibaadah xisehiyya fan ufkunna 'yeenih, kooy YALLAH yanihiyya kallacan waqdi,
elle tan qaraanaak ken dooqa oggolaay nasri keenih ucuy.
«Dambit ase waa num mayanaay; tohih sabbatah ku mari dambi lem kol baahen ken tekkeeh, tohuk gexxaamah ku naqbi keenil oobeeh, naqboytit gabal ken hayte koo tekkeh, woo naqboytit xer baaxo takkuu, xayi baaxo takku, seewah ken been ken tekkek,
kaskassoowan waqdi, ‹Yallaw, dambit asneh naniih umam abneh noysommeh nanik, qafu neh ab› axcuk toobiten ken tekkek, too tooba keenik raabit.
Oson, too elle yanin baaxok nummaak isinni afqadook toobitta 'yeenih koo kallacen ken tekkek, too kallaciy kot abaanahiyya kaadu a rasu ken kaxxa abbobtih ikoytah teceehiyya fan ufkunnaay, kaadu ta magaalay atu isih doorittehiyya fan ufkunnaay, tonnah kaadu, ta qariy anu ku qibaadah xisehiyya fanah afkunuk aben ken tekkek,
tonnal, YALLAW, too dooqa keenik oggol. Qaraanay ku dabaaqah yanihiyyaak dooqa keenik oobbeyaay keenih racmataay, ku mari abba hee dambi keenih cab.
«Yi Dageltaw, a arac dacrisay; a aracal aban dooqah ayti ucuyaay aban kallaci macinin.
Dageltah yan YALLAW, qibaadah xisen qari fan amey, tokkel dabqih gaceey!
Ku qahdi addat le sanduguy ku qandeh asta yascasse, tokkel dabqih gaceey!
Dageltah yan YALLAW, ku seekah yan mari, sartan innah, cakkit gacoonay.
Imaan kol le mari ku maqaanet ruffu inxicay.
Dageltah yan YALLAW, isih dooritte malik macinin.
Dawuduy ku naqasuh yenehiyyah luk sugte kacanuy amurruqe sinnihiyya kulli way kassita» 'yaanam axcuk dooqa abe.

Suleeman dooqak gaba kalla hee waqdi, qaraanak temeete gira sadgatah yusguudeenih sugen saqih cado carrisse. YALLIH nabna yaybulle noori, inkih yan Qibaadah-Qarik adda ifissa hee.
A ifi YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari inkih dudda heeh; tohuk gexxaamah seeka addah cultam maduudinna.
Israayil ummatay wokkel sugtehiyya qaraanak gira oobah tubleeh, YALLIH nabna yaybulle noori qari duudusem yublen waqdi, baaxok bagul Yallih qibaadah gommoh radeeniih, sarrak kaa fayliseeniih,
«YALLI maqaane le Goytak,
candu kaah gacisa, ummatey!
YALLIH kacni mayambaxak,
tohul candu kaah gacisa» axcuk kaa saarisen.
Tohuk lakal Malik Suleeman kee wokkel suggu 'ye mari inkih YALLAH sadgat aben.
Suleeman sadgatah laak labaatanna kee namma alfi yusguudeh. Illik bool kee labaatanni alfi yusguude. Israayil ummatta kee malik toh akah abeenim, a sadgat, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih orba sadgat yakke'gidik ten.
Too waqdi seeka, keenih yeexegen aracal solteeh, Leewih yooboke mari kaadu foocah keenit afkanuk soole. Too waqdi Leewih yooboke mari saareh yaaguren duyyeeyay Dawud keenih bicsiise yoogoren. Dawud abeh cabe saare edde heen. Saareh iyyeenimii,
«YALLIH kacani mayamurruqa,
kay kacani waarah yan kacanu» axcuk YALLA saarisen.
Too waqdi raqqa 'ye mari soolak yeneeh; seeka baanta aagaruk ten.
Suleeman Qibaadâ-Qarih daaratih addal, hununuh Qibaadâ-Qarih foocat raqta fanti exxa Yallih taamah taahirroyseh. Tokkel cado akak inkih cararisu waa saq yusguudeh, sadgatah daro baahe. Kaadu amaanah xiinaanamih astah aban sadgatak xayta cararise. Too sadgat woo aracal akah abem, sadgatah qidan saq elle yasguudeeni'gidih, nacaasak bicsen mansaf a axxul le sadgat bagul akak abaanah gide nabnah akkuk mananna.
Suleeman kee inkih tan ummatta Iraawô-Dabih-Qiid deqsita qiidih kaa aynabuk africuk malcina ayro qiidih asen. Too qiidih gaaboowe mari kaxxam manguk yeneeh; Camat deqsitta daabak xabba haanamaay Masri cuduudul yan daqaarah amma 'yaanam baaxok inkih, mango mari woo qiidih yemeete.
Tokkel yemeete mari naharsi malcina ayro Yallih qibaadah sadgat elle aban mansaf taahirroysak saqa qidak sugeeniih, ciggilta malcina ayro kaadu Iraawô-Dabih-Qiidih asen. Tohuk ellecaboh ayroy qiidik gaba kaleenihiyya qibaadah inki aracal gaaboowen.
Tohul ciggilta ayroy sanatak malcinhaytoh alsaay ayrok labaatanna kee sidochaytoh ayro kinnihiyyat Suleeman, yemeete mara, le baaxo fanah rubsuuse. Amma 'ye mari inkih, YALLI Israayil ummatay isi marah tanihiyya kee, Dawud kee Suleemanat hee barkat yubleenimih sabbatah, kaxxam ruffa iyyen.
Suleeman YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari kee isi qari kee, tama-qarwah-xisney niyat luk sugehiyya dudda luk gabal kaak bicca intek wadir,
YALLI barak teena kaah yumbulle. YALLI kaak iyyeemih, «Abte dooqa kok oobbeh. A qari yi sadgat elle aban qari yakke'gidih, yol abte kallaci kok oggole.
Rob keenik ayseede kee, tooboke daro selu waa qanaytu ruube kee, hinnay kaadu, numuk numut tabta dalka keenit ruubam yablen waqdi,
yi maray yi migaaqal yaaxigeenihiyya yoh rammitak yoo kallaceeniih, abak sugen umaane cabba heenih toobiten ken tekkek, tonnal aban dooqa, elle an qaraanak keenik aabbeyyooh, abeenimik qafu keenih abeyyo. Ken baaxol suggu 'ye niqmat wadir keenih gacseyyo.
Yi migaq elle waara'gidih, innih dooriteeh taahir abe qari kinnuk, ta qari yi dacayrih xiineleeh; a qaril abba haan dooqah ayti aceeyyo. Yi inti kee yi afqado kulli waqdi kaa dacrisele.
Ku abba Dawud akah abak suge innah, agaagul sinnuk baguuk yoo tuqbude koo tekkeeh, anu kok aba axcem abteeh, yi amri duudusse koo tekkek,
ku abbak, ‹Ku reeda baxak baxal raaqeleeh; ku nasab Israayil ummattak abbobti akkele› 'yaanam exceh sugeeh; tohim kaak elle inxicca exce'nnal duuduseyyo.
Takkay immay sin takku, sin ramad takku, darre yot cabteenik, aba siinik exceh sin akah amrisem cabba hayteenih, yi aftok gersiimih qibaadat culteenikii,
tonnal a baaxoy anu doore ummattah tan Israayilih ecee sugehiyyak sin ayyaaqeyyo. A Qibaadah Qariy yoo elle taqbudeeni'gidih taahirroysehiyya baaqid luk maraaqa. Kulli mari a qari yabloonu waan waqdi, anqaasah elle rabeloonuh, burtelon.
«Away tablen Qibaadah-Qari a xaqan le nabna leh yan qari'mmay, abur akkeleeh; wokkek gitah gaca mari a abur yabalu waa waqdi, qagabsiteloonuh, ‹YALLI a baaxo kee a Qibaadah-Qaril annah tanim akah baahem macak tan kaa?› axcuk waagiselon.
Too waqdi tokkel suge mari, ‹Ama marat ah akah tekkem, YALLAY ken kaxxa abbobti elle aamanuk sugteeh Masrik ken yeyyeeqehiyya cabba heenih gabak bicsen duyyeeyah qibaadat gaceenih. Tohih sabbatah YALLI tama-umaane keenil oobise› 'yaanam axcelon» kaak iyye.

Suleeman YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari kee kay qari xisne labaatanni sanat kaak beyte.
Kalah kaadu, Curam deqsita malik kaah yecee magaalooli nammeyhaak xiseeh, xisnek gaba kalla hee waqdi, Israayil mari elle gacaana'gidih tokke ken ruube.
Camat kee Xooba deqsita rasu qeebit yibbixe.
Tonnah kaadu, Tadmor deqsitta magaalay bacarih yan aracal tene nammeyhaak xiseh uqusbussa hee. Leek-maaqo kee saqi-qayso daanah elle hayu waa magaalooliy duma Camat deqsita rasul xisehiyya kaadu uqusbussa hee.
Tohuk kalah Suleeman Daga-raqta-Beet-Coron kee, Guba-raqta-Beet-Coron deqsitta namma magaala nammeyhaak bicseeh; maroh ten gasoosa kee, woo gasoosat magaala akak culan afoofay faxan way fakaanaah faxan way alfaanahiyya bicse.
Baqalat deqsitta magaala kee, leek-maaqoh enna 'tam elle abbaxuk yen magaalooli kee, isi gaariira kee faaris elle abbaxuk yen magaalooli kaadu nammeyhaak xise. Wohuk kalah kaadu, Yarusalaam takkuu, Lubnaan takkuu, hinnay kaadu, kay dardaarinni guffa haa baaxol, usuk faxxa haa xisne xise.
Suleeman, a xisne edde absiisem, duma too baaxol suge maray Israayil mari bayse weehiyyak rade marak ten. Too mari migaaqah Ciita kee Amoora kee Fariida kee Ciiwi kee Yabuusa deqsitta kedoodah yaabuke marak ten. A saaku fanah, Israayil mari too marak rade mara naqoosah tamsiisa.
Suleeman Israayil mara naqoosinnat abbaxuk manannaay; oson kay qaskar kee qaskar abbobti kee gaariira amrisa mara kee faaris amok qeebi abta qaskarah yenen.
Suleemanah xisne abak yen marak amo wagitak ken tamsiisak yen mari namma bool kee kontom num akkuk yen. Too mari Israayilih yaabuke marak ten.
Suleeman, Masri-malikih-baxáy ginnaaqot abbaxuk yenehiyya Yarusalaamal geytimta Dawud-Magaalal yaaxigen caafatay duma elle sugtehiyyak tet kaleeh, teetih xise qaril tet hee. Too qarit tet hee saaku iyyeemih, «YALLIH Qahdih-Sandug elle sugte arooca taahirik tanik, tonna leemiik yi barra Malik Dawud elle suge qaril dabaaqah gactam mameqe» iyye.
Suleeman YALLAH sadgat elle aban mansafay Qibaadâ-Qarik foocal bicseh yenehiyyak bagul, cado-akak-carrisan-sadgoota YALLAH abak yen.
Yalli-Muusal-oobise-xinto elle inta'nnal, Suleeman kulli sabti qiidih ayro kee, kulli alsih biloh akah asan qiid kee, tonnah kaadu, sanatal inki adda akah asan Kamiir-Sinni-Gaqamboh-Qiid kee, Daro-edde-Orbisan-Ayroh Qiid kee, Iraawô-Dabih-Qiid yamaate saaku, cado akak cararisan sadgat abak yen.
Isi abbah raatat gexakaay usuk fiiriseh cabe gita kataatak, kulli saaku seekal tan taama kee, Leewih yooboke maray Yallih saare abta kee tonnah kaadu seeka elle catehiyyah, too taama elle kuran innal, keenih warse. Tonnah kaadu, duma kay abba Dawuduy Yallih numuh yenehiyya fiiriseh cabe gita kataatak, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih afal dacayri abu waa mara heeh, too marah Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih afoofak kulli afal gacu waa maral, taamak tanim kee elle aboonu waan inna keenih yescesse.
Duma kay abba, seeka kee Leewih yooboke mara wagitta qaadak duyye elle haan golitte kee, wohuk kalah taniimiy usuk edde yaabeh cabe inkih Suleeman yugdubeh.
Tonnah abak Suleeman too taamak gaba kaleh. YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril rakiibo hayyaay xissaay, gaba akak kalla haanam fan faxximma 'ta taama akah abak, xisne gaba akak kalla heeh.
Tohuk gaba kale waqdi Suleeman, Qexyon-Gabar kee Eelat deqsitta namma magaalay booruh tenehiyya fanah gexen. Too namma boor elle yenemii, Agba deqsitta caraatak teneeh; Agbâ-caraata elle tenem, Edom rasuk ten.
Curam deqsita malik, maraakib kee woo maraakib amrissa abbobti, maraakib badal nagay beytu taaxige labha lih hayya heeh ruube. Too maraakibit sarrak Suleeman mara lih Oofir deqsitta baaxo fan gexen. Tokkek, dahabak taban kee koona alfih kiilok fula takkem baahen.

Saba deqsitta baaxoh maliká, Malik Suleeman le migaq-gexxo toobbe waqdi, kinni num kaak tabaluuy gibdi esseroorak mangom kaa essertuh kaa fan gexxe. Mango mara wakalih is lih hayyaay, gaalal caxâ-sifaay bilqah haan xeetiy limo gibdihiyya kee kaxxam mango dahabak eerra hayteh gexxe. Kaa fan temeete waqdi, kaa essertam faxak sugte esseroy niyat luk sugtehiyya kaa esserteh.
Too esseroy is kaa essertehiyya tiya-tiyah teetih gacse. Usuk gacsa akah waa esserok masuginna.
Too waqdi Sabâ-rasih-Maliká, Suleeman kas tubleeh; usuk xise qariiy
miizil heenih yanin kay maaqooy, kay doolat abbobti elle daffeyta gurraay, kay buxal kay taamat yan mari missal elle soola inna kee, kay taamah mari edde yan sartan tubleh. Usuk yakme way elle-yaaqube kobbaayiy-kaah-baaha-mari elle yani'nna kee, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril abah yan sadgataay; tah inkih tuble waqdi, qagabsitteh hagga-inte.
Too waqdi Suleemanak intemii, «Anu inni baaxoh addal atu abba haytem kee lito kasak mangom oobbeh. Oobba heem inkih numma kinnim away ableh an.
Atu lito midir kee kas elle oobbe'nnak fula lem away ableh an. Awayaay kinnih, sahda yoh warissem ahak garaba. Taway inni namma intih ubulla haam fanah, ku giddinaamak sinam yoh warissem innih numma akkaluk masuginniyo. Kas kee bagi cubbih oobbeemik fula litoh tan.
Ku mari maxaqan le nasiib geeh yan! Ko'lih taamita mari kamba nasiib leh yan! Kulli way ko'lih yaniiniih ku afak tawqe tuxxiq le maxco yaabbeenih.
YALLAY ku Dagelta kinnihiyya fayla taafay! Kay migaaqal Yalli isi mara xiinisa malikih koo doore waqdi, kot ruffa iyyem yuybulleeh; toh akah abem, isi ummatta Israayil kicnaamih taaga. Tonnah kaadu, daayiman ken fayya hayuuy, atu qadli kee cakkit ken xiinissa'gidi abeemi» inte.
Is sarrak Malik Suleemanah gabat bahte mattaco kaah teceeh, affara alfih kiilo yakke dahabaay, mango caxâ-sifa kee bilqah haan xeetiy limo gibdihiyya kaah tecee. Too saaku is Suleemanah tecee caxâ-sifa bis le caxâ-sifa wohuk duma masuginna.
Malik Curam kee Malik Suleeman mari, Oofir deqsita rasuk dahab kaah baahen. Too mari tohuk kalah duyyê-xisoh meqe coox kee bilqah haan xeetiy limo gibdihiyya baahen.
Suleeman too cooxuk YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari kee isi qarik elle yawqeeniih culan mawqeena bicse. Gad abeenitih kaadu, *begena kee kirar akak bicsaana'gidih hee. Kaak dumal inkih yan Yuudâ rasul a xaqan le bicaa kee taama tekkeh masuginna.
Malik Suleeman Sabâ-Maliká kaa esserra haytem inkih teetih yecee. Is kaah bahte mattacok naba mattaco teetih yecee. Sarrak tet kee tet lih yemeete mari isi baaxoy akak yemeetehiyya fanah yuduuren.
Malik Suleemanah kulli sanatal dahabak labaatanna kee sidooca alfih kiilo takkem baahak yenen.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, limo kee badaaqat aba marak gabbara beyak yen. Qarab baaxoh malikwa kee Israayil rakaakayittel abbobtih yen mari kaadu lakqo kee dahooba kaah baahak yenen.
Suleeman kaxxam naba goobwak namma bool takkem galbabbaqisen dahabak bicseeh, kulli gob malcina kiilo yakke dahabak bicse.
Wohuk kalah kaadu, qunxa goobwak sidooca boolih gid takkem galbabbaqisen dahabak bicse. Too sidooca boolih goobwak kulli gob sidiica kiilo yakke dahabak bicse. Too goobwa inkih elle abbaxuk yenem, ‹Lubnaan Garboh Kaxxa Goli› deqsita aracih addak ten.
Tohuk kalah malik kaxxam naba dardaarinni korsi luk yen. Woo korsi dakni-qaagak bicseenih, agle sinni dahabak exfen.
Suleeman woo korsil gacam faxa waqdi naharak laca maaqatta yakke mawqeenaak elle awaquk yen. Too mawqeena namma kabut inkih lubak ceeloy gabak bicseenihiyyak leceey-leceey luk ten. Tittat taban kee namma lubaakih ceelo akkuk ten. Tohuk kalah kaadu iba elle haysita mansafay dahabak bicseenihiyya woo korsit xakabuh yen. Too korsi namma gaba elle haan arac luk sugteeh, teetik namma tattabak kaadu lubak ceelo ten. Tonnah tanim kalah tan doolatih dardaarinnih-korsil ahaydumal mabicsinnon.
Malik Suleeman elle yaaqube kobbaayiy inkih dahabak ten. «Lubnaan Garboh Kaxxa Goli» deqsita aracih addal ten mingilwa kaadu akak bicseenim, saafik yan dahabak ten. Suleeman dabaanal lakqok bicsen duyye hebeltô-tu'xiq luk mananna.
Badal gexa maraakibik butta luk yen. Kay maraakib Curam maraakib lih gexak yen. Too maraakibit yan mari sidooca sanatal inki adda dahab kee lakqooy dakni-qaag kee wagaqwa kee qaxa le kaxxa kimbir eerra heenih baahak yenen.
Gaddaliino kee kasah Malik Suleeman innah yan malik baadal mananna.
Baaxol eneyya 'ta malikwa, Yalli kaah yecee kasak faxaanamal ken fayisa'gidih, kaal amaatuk ten.
Kaa fan amaatinnaan num mattacoh gabat dahab kee lakqok bicsen duyyeey, xer-sarooy, silacaay, caxâ-sifaay, faaris kee baakil kaah baahak yenen. Kulli sanatal kaal yamaate mari taham abak suge.
Tohuk kalah gasoosak affara alfi takkem luk yeneeh; toh akah abbaxuk yenem, faaris kee faaris giitak beyan gaariira. Tonnah kaadu taban kee namma alfih farasay qeebi edde abaanahiyya luk yen. Too faroosak garab Yarusalaam magaalal abbaxuk yeneeh; wohuk raqtem kaadu gersi magaaloolih addal abbaxuk yen.
Furaat weeqaytuk xabba haanamaay Filistiin rasu kee Masri cuduuduh amma 'yaanam tan baaxol enna 'ta malikwak abbah raqtaah keenil ackumuk tenemii, Malik Suleemanak ten.
Suleeman dabaanal Yarusalaam magaalal lakqo xeet manga luk teneeh; *sariidâ coox kaadu, mango-koomaami le baaxol tan *sublah innah qadad cabeh yen.
Malik Suleeman faaris akak bahsiisak yenemii, Masri kee wohuk kalah tan gersi baaxooxak ten.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Malik Suleeman abak yenehiyya qimbok xabba haanamaay ellecabot akak amma 'yaanam yan aydaadi elle geytimam, Nabi Naatan Aydaada deqsita kitab kee Siilô magaalal yen nabi Aciiya yuktube kitab kee, nabi Qiddo, Nabát-Yarobqam giddinaamak yuble wacyih kitaabal geytinta.
Suleeman Yarusalaamal morootom sanatih gide inkih yan Israayilil malikih suge.
Tohuk lakal rabeeh; Yarusalaamal Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatal kaa yoogoqen. Kay baxay Racabqam deqsitahiyya kay lakal malik yekke.

Racabqam, kilbat le kabut raaqa Israayil mari malik kaa aba'gidih elle mododeh suge Seekem deqsitta magaala fan gexe.
Nabát-Yarobqam duma Malik-Suleeman-meysih megloh Masri fanah kudeh suge. Ta xaagu yoobbe waqdi Masrik yuduure.
Guubuh kilbat le kabut raqqa 'ta kedooda farmo Nabát-Yarobqam fan rubteeh; usuk tokke yemeete waqdi, Racabqam fan gexen. Kaak iyyeenimih,
«Ku abba duma kaxxa gibdaabinat nee abbaxuk sugeeh; usuk nee edde abbaxuk suge gibdaabina nel sahhilossu waytek, ku xintot xiinenno» kaak iyyen.
Racabqam keenil gacseemih, «Inkiimihiiy sidiica ayrok lakal yol uduura; tuk teena siinil gacseyyok» iyye. Too waqdi too mari gexeh.
Malik Racabqam kay abbah taamat sugte idoolay kay abba fayu elle esserak sugehiyya fan *fayu essera'gidih gexeeh, «A mari yok iyyeemik maca keenil gacsam tayseeh?» axcuk fayu keenil essere.
Too mari kaak iyyeemihii, «A marah meqem abteeh, ceela yab keenil gacisseeh ruffa ken haytek, tonnal kulli way ku taamat gaceloonuh kol mamakaanak, toh ab» kaak iyyen.
Takkay immay oson kaah yeceen fayu cabba heeh, kay fiqmay kaa'lih tembeeh fayu kaah taceehiyya fan gexeeh,
«Taway ta marak maca axcem tayse? ‹Ku abba nee edde abbaxuk suge gibdaabina nel sahhilos› 'yaanam yok iyyeenik, too tiyal maca keenil gacsoo?» keenik iyye.
Too qunxaaneyti fayuh kaak iyyeenimih, «Yi abbah axcak yi qunxa feera nabaah; yi abba qilsa-le-quuka fillat siinik abbaxuk suge'mmay, anuy wohuuk gibdim siinil baaheyyo. Usuk qunxa keetalat sin aagaruk suge'mmay, anu faaris edde yaaguren keetalat sin aagureyyo› 'yaanam keenik inxic» kaak iyyen.
Sidooca ayrok lakal, Yarobqam kee inkih tan ummatta, usuk «Yol uduura» keenik elle iyye ayrol, Malik Racabqam fan yemeeten.
Malik idoola fayu cinna heeh, furrayna kaa fayisse ceele waa uma yaabat ummatta lih yaabeh, iyyeemih «Yi abba qilsa-le-quuka fillat siinik abbaxuk suge'mmay, anuuy wohuuk gibdim siinil baaheyyo. Usuk qunxa-keetalat sin aagaruk suge'mmay, anu faaris edde yaaguren keetalat sin aagureyyo» 'yaanam keenik iyye.
Aham duma akkelem YALLI, nabi-Aciiyah-afat Yarobqamah warseh sugeeh; tohuk gexxaamah Racobqam ummatta faxxam abam cineh. Siilol yoobokeh yen Aciiya deqsita nabi iyyem nummak maacisse.
Yemeete mari, malik yab keenik aabbe cinem yublen waqdi, «Ah maca neh xiqee, Dawud kee Dawuduk rade mara? Nee kee keenik maca tangalee? Kata labhay, nee beya! Racabqam ahaysa isih faxem abbaasitay» iyyen. Tohuk wadir Israayil mari woo xintol saduh gacen.
Tohih sabbatah Racabqam dibuk Yuudâ-rasul dabaaqah suge marih abbootan luk raaqe.
Toh yuble waqdi Racabqam, farmoh Adoniiram deqsita numuy dirkisak tamsiisan marih abbah yenehiyya Israayil mara fan farmoh ruube. Too mari too numut xeet heeh edde kaa qiden. Racabqam toh yoobbe waqdi, sissikuk faras-gaarit koreeh Yarusalaam fan kude.
Too ayrok wadir, Israayil rasuk kilbat le qaxat raqta ummatta inkih Dawud durruyyatih dardaarinnal saduh gacen.

Malik Racabqam Yarusalaam magaala gufe waqdi, Benyam kee Yuudâ kedoh addak bool kee bacra-tabanih alfi takke qaskaray dooro lehiyyah seeco abeeh, inki'kkel ken gaaboyse. Toh akah abem, kilbat le kabut raqta Israayilih ummattah amol malikih gacam faxak yen.
Takkay immay too qaskar qeebih ruubaamak dumal, YALLI nabi-Samaqya lih yaabeeh,
Malik Racabqam kee, Yuuda kee Benyaamah yooboke marah farmo ruube.
«Keenik intaamah, ‹Israayilih mari sin tooboko'mmay, qeebi keenit maabinaay; away tikka 'tem inkih yi fayxik tekkeemi'mmay, takkeenimik inkih isinni buxah uduura› keenik inxic» iyye. Too mari YALLIH amri oggoleenih, yakkeenimik isinni buxah yuduuren.
Tohuk wadir Racabqam Yarusalaamal elle raaqe. Tokkel gacca 'yeh Yuuda kee Benyam magaaloolit gaso maroh hee.
Gaso maroh edde heemii, Beetlacam kee Qetam kee Takooqa kee
Beet-Xur kee Sooko kee Qadullam kee
Gat kee Mareesa kee Diif kee
Adoraayim kee Laakis kee Qadeeka kee
Xorqa kee Ayyaalon kee Cebron deqsitta magaaloolik ten.
Too magaaloolit hee gasoosa kaxxam maqar luk ten. Kulli magaalak abbah qaskar abbobti hee. Kulli magaalal leek maaqok xagga hoonu waanam keenih hee. Tohuk kalah caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti kee qinabak bicsen kamri kulli magaalah adda keenih bahsiiseh yen.
Gob kee macaxuk faxxintah gide too magaalah addal abbaxuk yen. Tohuk gexxaamah Yuuda kee Benyam mara kee ken baaxo isi gubat abbaxuk yen.
Israayil rasul sugga 'ta Leewih yooboke mara kee seeka tokke cabba hayteh, gabbi-qaxat raqta Yuudah baaxo fanah yemeeten.
Leewih yooboke mari, Israayil-rasul luk sugen qarwa kee lacti malaalah baaxo cabba heenih, Yuudâ rasu kee Yarusalaam fanah yemeeten. Toh akah abeenimii, wokkel malikih suge Yarobqam deqsita malik kee kaak ciggilte malikwa, seekay YALLIH taamat sugtehiyya a taama abe kaleeniih; tohih faxe waytih Israayil rasu cabeenih Yuudâ-rasu fan yeerren.
Malik Yarobqam isih malikih elle suge baaxol, Yallih aftok duyyeeya elle yaqbuden aroocay fayyat raqtahiyyal isih doorite maray seeka akak iyyahiyya hee. Too aroocal dabeela kee daheltih ceelo aqbuduk yenen. A ceeloola akak bicseenim, cooxuuy xeet kee dahabak ten.
Inkih yan Israayil marih addakaa, isi afqadook YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya yaqbudem faxa mari, YALLAY oson akak raden ken kaxxa abbobti doorehiyyah sadgat abaana'gidih, Leewih yooboke marih lakat Yarusalaam magaala fan gexen.
Too mari malikih suge Suleemán-Racabqam cateeh; tohuk gexxaamah, Yuudâ-baaxo maqar baahak maacisse. Tonnal, sidooca sanatah, Dawud kee Suleeman raat katayak xiinen.
Racabqam Mahlat deqsitta barra digibih abite. A barra Yerimot deqsita numih baxák ten. Yerimot Dawud baxak ten. Mahlat Dawuduk baxi baxák ten. Ina teetik Abicayil deqsitta barrak ten. Abicayil kaadu Aliyab akak iyyen numih baxák teneeh; Yiisa deqsita numuy Dawud xalehiyyak baxi baxák ten.
Racabqam a barrat xaylok sidoc luk yen. Migaaqah Yaqus kee Samarya kee Daham deqsitak yenen.
Sarrak kaadu Absalaam baxá abteeh; too awká migaaqah Maqka deqsitak ten. Too barrat lab-xayloh fereey xale. Migaaqah Abiyya kee Qattay kee Diida kee Seloomit keenik axcuk yenen.
Racabqam-agbi tittat taban kee bacra akkuk yeneeh, wohuk kalah kaadu, caggô-gubih caggoh nikaacat yabbixe agabuk lactam luk yen. Xaylok kaadu lab-urrih labaatanna kee bacra kee say-urrih lactam luk yen. Nikaacat abbaxuk yen agabuk inkihii, kacanuh Maqkah lafitak yen.
Xaylok kaadu Abiyya deqsita lab-baxah lafitak yeneeh; kay lakal malik yakke'gidih xaylok addak kaa doore.
Racabqam abam kasat abak yen. Xaylo elle gactu wayta arooca kee abbootan meqe innal keenih kureeh; Yuuda kee Benyam rasul tan magaalooliy gasoosi maroh edde tanihiyyak kulli numuh elle gacu waa magaala kee yaallu waa abbootan naharal elle keenih yecee. Cindah mango mattaco keenih yeceeh, mango agabu digibih keenih abe.

Racabqam malik tikka 'yeh abbootan maqar bahha kaak hee saakuuk xabba haanam, kaa kee usuk amol akak reede mari YALLIH xinto cinaanam baahen.
Malikih koona sanat suggu 'yek sarra, kaa kee kay mara YALLAL aamine weenimih sabbatah, YALLI ken digaaleh. Sisak deqsita numuy Masrik malikih yenehiyya alfi kee namma boolih faras-gaariy carbi edde abaanahiyya kee, lactam alfih qaskariitay faras amook qeebi abahiyya kee, Liibiya kee Sukutti kee Kuus rasuk baahe qaskaray loowo sinnihiyya luk amma 'yeh Yarusalaam magaalat qeebi abe.
Naharak gasoosa maroh edde ten Yuudah magaalooli yibbixeeh, sarrak bisoh gutuqak Yarusalaam magaala fan yemeete.
Ayrok teena Samaqya deqsita nabi, Racabqam kee Yuudâ makaabonuy Masri malikih meysik gexxaamah Yarusalaam magaalal gaaboweh sugehiyya fanah yemeete. Too nabi keenik iyyeemih, «YALLAK temeete farmo siinih abbixeeh; YALLI, ‹Isin yoo cinteeniih, anu kaadu sin cineh an. Tonna-leemiik Sisak deqsita malikih gabat sin digaaleyyo› siinik iyye» 'yaanam keenik iyye.
Malik kee malik lih sugte makaabon abak sugte dambit too waqdi isik raddeeh; too waqdi YALLAH rammiteeniih, «YALLI nel baaham faxam, ni umaaneh net takkeemi» iyyen.
YALLI woh keenik yuble waqdi, nabi lih qagseh yaabeeh, «Away yoh rammiteenimih sabbatah, ken mabaysa. Sisak Yarusalaamat qeebih abeleeh; takkay immay ken kee Yarusalaam magaala bayi mahaay ken baatik innih cateyyo. Yi naqbi elle yani'nnaak keenil mooba'mmay,
Sisak-gabat gacelon. Too waqdi yoh taamitaanam kee baaxoh abbobtih taamitaanamak taysem isinnih ablelon» 'yaanam farmoh kaal keenih ruube.
Sarrak Sisak Yarusalaam yibbixeeh, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal sugte duyye kee malik buxal sugte duyye buubeh bee. Malik Suleeman yen saaku bicseh cabeh suge goobway dahabak bicseenihiyyah agantah beeh.
Racabqam woo goobwah aftok nacaasak bicsen goobwa bicissa heeh; sarrak malik qarih afal dacayrih yan maral amaanatah yecee.
Malik YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari fan gexa waqdi, quukah tokke fan baahak yeneeniih; usuk wokkek yaduure waqdi, daanah elle yabbixen malik-qari fan gacisak yenen.
Malik Racabqam YALLAH rammiteeh; tohuk gexxaamah YALLIH bagcarra kaal xabbacowteh; ummat kaxxa baatik cattinteh. Tonnah kaadu Yuudâ-baaxol caalat muquk yen.
Racabqam Yarusalaamal malikih elle raaqeeh, qandeh lafitak lafte. Naharak malik yekke saaku qumrik morootom kee inki sanatat yeneeh, taban kee malcina sanat Yarusalaam magaalal malikih suge. Yarusalaam magaala, YALLI inkih yan Israayil rasuk kay qibaada elle abaana'gidih doore magaalak ten. Racabqam ina migaaqah Naqma deqsitak teneeh; Qammon deqsita marah aabakuk ten.
Racabqam uma taamat akah sugeemik sabab, baguuk YALLIH gital masuginnaay, umaane akah abak yenem, tohuk ten.
Racabqam qimbooy ellecabo fanah abba heem kee kay buxah marak nasab elle geytintam, Nabi-Samaqya-Aydaada kee Nabi-Qiddoh-Aydaada deqsitta namma kitaaba. Racabqam kee Yarobqam addunyal yenen saaku, kulli way carbi tittat abak sugen.
Racabqam rabeeh; Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatal malikwâ-buxah mara edde yoogoqen kabrit kaa yoogoqen. Kay lakal kay baxi malik yekke. Migaaqah Abiyya kaak axcuk yenen.

Yarobqam Israayil malik edde yekke taban kee bacarhaytô sanatat, Abiyya Yuudâ-malik yekke.
Yarusalaamal sidiica sanatah malikih suge. Kaak ina Mikaaya migaq luk teneeh, tet abba Uriyel deqsita numuy Gibqa deqsitta magaalal yoobokehiyyak ten.
Ayrok teena Abiyya kee Yarobqam fanal carbi rade.
Abiyya too carbih affara boolih alfih qaskariita ugseeh; Yarobqam kaadu is le kabuk bacra boolih alfih qaskariita ruube.
Carbi keenik elle radem, Efrayim rasuk qaleela mango aracak ten. Malik Abiyya Xamaraayim migaq le qaleh amol bukka 'yeeh tokkeek Yarobqam kee Israayil marah deerise. Keenik iyyeemih, «Israayil maraw, yoo ankacisa.
YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya, Dawud kee Dawuduk rade marah way baye waa xagana culeeh, ‹Sin durruyyat baxi-baxih dabaanah Israayil-malikwa akkele› keenik iyyem kassa mahaytaana?
Nabat baxa Yarobqam duma Malik Suleemanay isi amoytah sugehiyyak qaduwwih suge.
Sarrî-daban kaadu anfiqe sinni maritteeta gaabossa heeh, kaak raaqe baxay woo saaku qunxaaneey ixxiga boola kee kasih dagna lehiyyat qeebi abe.
Ta saaku kaadu isin Dawuduk rade maray YALLI isih dardaarinna akah yeceehiyyat qeebi abtaanamal malissen. Kaxxam mango qaskar haysittaay dahabak bicissen daheelah ceeloy Yarobqam siinih bicseeh yalla axcuk taqbudeenihiyya haysitta hayteeniih,
YALLIH seekay Haaruunuk raddehiyya baaxok xiiriyteenih Leewih yooboke mara kaadu baaxok teyyeeqeenih, ken aftok Yalla maleela akah abta innah, isinnih dooritten maray seekâ-samad alle waahiyya yallah liton duyyeeya elle taqbuden aracal seekah haysitten. Dahaltu kee malcina maruw baahinnaan numuk, ‹Isin seeka tekkeenih› intan.
«Ni tiyah tu gactek, YALLAY ni Dageltah yanihiyya naqbudeeh kaak maxxeerinnino. Sek Haaruun-duruyyat uxih seekah linooh, Leewih yooboke mara ken catot nabbixe.
Kulli saaku kee carra carra YALLIH qibaadah qaydarus qeerisnaah kay sadgatah inkih tan cado akak carrisna saq nasguude. Seeka YALLIH sadgatah miiz amol haak yenen taahirroysen-gaqambo uxih hayta. Magribik wadir dahabak bicsen caxxay daabiseenihiyyah bagul tan faanusway kaadu dahabak bicseenihiyya ursan. Nanu YALLAY ni Dagelta kinni nee akah amrisem abnah immay isin kaa cine mara tekken.
Qeebil Yalli isih nee miraaciseleeh; kay seeka qeebi sin lih abnu wayna waqdi, taaguru wayta *baanta taagure'gidih bical tan. Tanna'mmay Israayil ummatey, siinik axceemihii, YALLAY isin akak radden sin kaxxa abbobti doorehiyya lih qeebih abtaanam maduddaanak mataqabina» 'yaanam keenik iyye.
Usuk too yaabat yan waqdi, Yarobqam isi qaskarak tu takkem ruubeeh, «Gexay darre le kabuk gacca 'xicay qeebi keenit elle abtoonu waytan ikket sasot suga» iyye. Yuudâ-mari Yarobqam fanah afkunuk sugeeh, darre le kabuk tamaate qaskar garciteenih. Sarrak wonnah darre le kabu wagga heen waqdi, Israayil-qaskar marot ken tabbixem yublen. Too waqdi, «YALLAW nee cat» axcuk Yallat xaaqimen. Seeka qeebi qimbisa 'yaanamih astah baanta toogoreeh;
qaskar qeebih tirtirisse. Too waqdi too qeebil Yalli, Abiyya kee Yuudâ mara, Yarobqam kee Israayil qaskarak yiysiiseh.
Israayil-mari, Yuudah yooboke marak yoowwe. Yalli Yuudâ-marih gabal ken hee.
Abiyya kee kay qaskar kaxxa qawwalayla keenit abteeh, Israayil qaskarak koona boolih alfi takkem qiden.
Too qeebil Yuudâ mari kaxxa nasri geeh; too nasri akah geenimii, YALLAY ken kaxxa abbobti doorehiyyal imaan heenimik ten.
Abiyya Yarobqam qaskar lakak ayradduk xiiriyya ken hee. Yarobqam abbootanah amol akak yen magaaloolik tu takkem yibbixeh. Tohumuu, Beetal kee Yasaana kee Qefron kee too magaaloolih dariifal ten gaandoodik ten.
Yarobqam tohuk wadir Abiyya malikih suggu 'yem fanah, luk suge milki luk maraaqinna. Sarrak YALLI uma rabah kaa qide.
Abiyyah tu gactek, abbootanah aysuk yeyse. Addunyal suge saaku xaylok lab-xayloh labaatanna kee nammay kee, say-xayloh taban kee lecey xale. Agabuk taban kee affara barra abite.
Tahamak kalihimiy Abiyya abba heehiyya kee edde yaabe yab Nabi-Qiddoh-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal tan.

Malik Abiyya rabe saaku, Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatal kaa yoogoqen. Kay baxi kay lakal malik yekkeeh; migaaqah Aasa deqsitak yen. Malik Aasa malikih suge tabna sanatih addat kay baaxo amaanah xiinak sugte.
Aasa YALLAY kay Dagelta kinnihiyya kicnam abakaay cakki gitat gexa malikik ten.
Kaak duma sugte mansafittey sadgat elle abak sugeeni kee fayyat raqta aroocay duyyeeya elle aqbuduk sugeenihiyya wokkek kaleh. Taahirik tan qamidwa akak iyyan qamidway xeetik bicseenihiyya kee Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurumuuda bayseh.
Yuudâ-marak, «Ummatey, YALLAY nanu akak radne ni kaxxa abbobti doorehiyya faxam aba. Kay xinto intam kee kay amri duudusa» axcuk yen.
Yuudâ-magaaloolik kaak duma sugte diini-maleela qibaada-elle-aban-aroocay fayyat raqtahiyya kee qaydarus elle qeerisak sugen arooca bayisak sugeeh; tohuk gexxaamah usuk malikih suge saaku kay baaxo amaanah sugte.
Baaxo amaanah sugte sanoota Yuudâ-magaaloolit gasoosa maroh hee. YALLI kay baaxo amaan kaah abeemih sabbatah, too sanoota kay rasul qeebi kee carbi masuginna.
Yuudâ marak iyyeemihii, «Ninni magaaloolit gaso maroh haynaay; fayya 'ta aroocay takkem akak nablehiyya amol akak xisnaay; gasot magaala akak culan afay fanxa way faknaah fanxa way alifna akah haynay. Tonnal faxe waynam magaalah adda culi mahayna» iyye. Qagseh keenik iyyeemih, «Ninni baaxo ninni milkih nabbixeeh; toh akah kinnim, YALLAY ni Dageltah yanihiyyah amri duudusneemih taaga. Kay fayxi oggolneemih taagah kulli kabuk dacayrit nee yabbixe» keenik iyye. Too mari toh oggoleeh; xiseeniih, ken gabal bicteh.
Sidooca boolih alfi qaskariitay Yuudah yoobokehiyya luk yeneeh; yakkeenimiik gob kee macaxu tikiyah luk yenen. Benyam kedoh yooboke marak kaadu namma bool kee bacra-tabanih alfih qaskariita luk yeneeh; silaacah gob kee gaysê-baxa luk yenen. Yakkeenimiik nagay tan qaskaray baritto kee agiirinna lehiyyak yenen.
Ayrok teena Dara deqsita numuy Kuusuh yoobokehiyya malyoon qaskariita kee sidiica boolih faras-gaariy qeebi edde abaanahiyya haysitta heeh, Yuudâ-rasu yabbixe'gidih, Mareesa deqsitta magaala xaqu yemeete.
Aasa qeebi kaat aba'gidih, elle suge ikkek yemeete. Sarrakaa, Dafaata-Golo deqsita aracay Mareesâ magaalat xayuk raaqahiyyal fooca kee foocah gacca 'yeenih qeebih bicsiten.
Tokkel qeebi radaamak dumal, Aasa YALLAY isi Dagelta kinnihiyya fan dooqa abeeh; dooqah iyyeemih, «YALLAW, boola-le-qaskar cayla-le-qaskarak qeebil taysiisem koo. Nanu, ni Dageltaw, kibaalah linom koo kinnuk, a gid takke qaskaray loowo sinnihiyyat qeebi abna'gidih ku migaaqal ugunneh nan. YALLAW, nee cat; nee doortem koo. Kok taysem matana» iyye.
Sarra qeebi radeeh; Yuudâ-qaskar ken dadahteeh qeebi keenit abte. YALLI qeebil Kuus marak ken yiysiiseenih; Kuus mari kudeh.
Aasa kee kay qaskar lakak ken ayradduk Giraar-magaala ken baahen. Kuus qaskarak mangom rabteemih sabbatah, amo sittal gacissa heenih wadir qeebi elle aban inna luk maraaqinnon. YALLIH qande ken lih teneemih sabbatah, Yuudâ-mari keenik yeyseeh mango duyye keenik buuben.
Tohuk lakal Giraar dariifal ten magaalooli keenik bayseeniih; wokkel suge mari YALLIH abitto yoobbeenih yeneenih, tonna-leemiik cunxoh axaxitak gaba gacsitoonu yeffereenih. Qaskar magaalal sugga 'te duyye keenik buubeeniih mangom dannabah keenik orbisen.
Tohuk kalah gaala kee illi elle orbisak sugen arooca buubeeniih, gaala kee illik mangom dannabah keenik orbisen. Tohuk wadir Yarusalaam magaala fanah yuduuren.

Ayrok teena Qooded baxa Qadaryal Yallih Roocaaniyya obteeh;
too num tohuk lakal malik Aasat matra'gidih gexe. Anay fayya heeh deero kaah abeeh, «Malik Aasaw, yoo ankacis. Yuuda kee Benyam maraw, kaadu yoo ankacisa. Isin YALLIH mara tekkeenik, YALLI kaadu sin lih anele. Niya kaa fanah hayteenik, kaa gee liton. Takkay immay darre kaat cabteenik, darre siinit cabele.
Mango dabaanah Israayil mari nummâ-Yallak yexxeereenih sugeeniih, kay xintok kaadu yexxeereenih sugen. Kay xinto ken barissa seeka luk masuginnon.
Takkay immay gadaama ken tibbixe saaku kaal yuduureeniih, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya fan niya haysiten. Kaal yuduureeniih, kaa geen.
Too dabaanal kulli baaxol mango gibdaabina kee amaan-sinna teneeh; tonna-leemiik akak gexe ikke amaanah yaduure num masuginna.
Doolat doolatat xukkutakaay, magaalak teenal yan mari, gersi magaalal yan maral umam baahak yen. Tohum akah akkuk tenem, Yalli isi makkok gadaama kee gibdaabina sinaamal oobisak sugeemih sabbata.
A saakuh tu gactek, agiira takkeenim siinil taniih; niya siinik baxaqe waytaama. A saaku abtan taamah galto Yallak geetton» keenik iyye.
Aasa a nabi edde yaabe yab yoobbe waqdi, niya kaat gacteeh; tonna-leemiik Efrayim rasuk qaleela le aracal tan magaalooliy qeebit yibbixe kee, Yuuda kee Benyam rasul sugga 'te duyyeeyay gabak bicissa heenih aqbuduk sugeenihiyya wonnah baaxot qide. Sarrak YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih daaratal suge mansafay YALLIH sadgatah saqa elle asguuduk sugeenihiyya yuqusbuuse.
YALLAY kay Dagelta kinnihiyya kay xaqut yanim yublen waqdi, Efrayim kee Manasse kee Simqaanal suggu 'ye mari usuk malikih elle yan baaxo yemeeteeniih, dabqah tokkel gacen. Sarra, Aasa too mara kee Yuuda kee Benyaamah yooboke marah seeco abe.
Too mari, Aasa malik edde yekke taban kee konoyhaytô sanatak sidochaytoh alsat Yarusalaam magaalal gaaboowen.
Too ayro dannabah orbisen laa kee illi kee wadar YALLIH sadgatah qiden. Laak malcina boolih saga kee, illi kee wadarak kaadu malcina alfi yusguuden.
Tokkelii, «Tahaysah, YALLAY nanu akak radne ni kaxxa abbobti doorehiyya baguuk aqbudenno» 'yaanam iyyeeniih, too tiyal sittin-gey haysiten.
Barak qunxa num takkay, idaltu takkay, say-num takkay, lab-num takkay, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya aqbude waa numul rabi cokmi haanamal titta geen.
Anay fayya haak, «Ta saaku titta elle geyya hayneh madaqnemii, arac xagisennoomuh YALLIH migaaqal xiibinnah nan» 'yaanam axcuk xiibiten. Sarrak qaffaydah baanta yoogoren.
Too ayro gaabowwa 'ye mari, inkim axcuk ta tiyal isinni afqadook titta geenimih sabbatah, kaxxam ruffa iyyen. YALLA yaqbudeenim kaxxa rufto keenil tekkeeh; YALLI oson aban qibaada keenik raabiteh. Tonna-leemiik elle yanin baaxok kulli exxa amaan keenih abe.
Malik Aasak aboyyah ten barray migaaqah Maqka deqsitak teneh ‹Inah tan maliká› 'yaanam akah axcuk sugeenihiyya woo abbootanak kaleh. Tet abbootanak akah kalem, say-yalla akak iyyan duyyey migaaqah Aseera akah iyyaanahiyyah gurmudday umâ-yabulih-tani soolisseh sugte. Woo duyye wokkek kallaay iggiggilla heeh, Kidroon-goloh addal girat carrise.
Israayil baaxol kaak duma sugga 'te qibaada elle aban aroocay fayyat raqtahiyya inkih mabaysinna'mmay, addunyal sugem fanah, YALLAL leh yan imaan digga kaak luk yen.
Kay abba kaak dumal Yallih qibaadah orobta'gidih heeh suge duyye kee, usuk isih Yallih qibaadah taamat asisa'gidih rikeek heeh suge dahab kee lakqo kee gersi duyye bahha heeh, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal hee.
Tohuk wadir Aasa malik edde yekke soddom kee konoyhaytô sanat guffa haam fanah baaxol carbi masuginna.

Aasa malik yekkeemih soddom kee leceyhaytô sanat guffu hee saaku, Malik Baqsa Yuudâ-rasu warareeh, sinam Yuudâ-rasu awqe waytaah afak akah cule wayta innah, Raama deqsitta magaalat maro haam qimbise.
Toh yuble waqdi, Aasa isi qarih adda kee YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal daanat sugte lakqo kee dahooba wokkek yeyyeeqeeh, Damaskoh magaalal Suuriyah malikih yen Banihadad deqsita numuh ruube.
Afti farmoh ruubeemiih, «Duma ni abbobti qalla luk sugteeh; tonna'mmay ahaysa koo kee yoo ni abbobtik kaxxih, qalla haysinnaama. Ama dahab kee lakqo mattacoh koh ruubah an. Tonna'mmay Malik-Baqsay Israayil malikih yanihiyyak qaskar yi baaxok akah tawqe innah, kaa'lih lito qalla kaak targiqeemi» 'yaanam farmoh kaah ruube.
Malik Banihadad too farmo kaak oggoleeh, sarrak Israayil magaalooli yabbixeeni'gidih, qaskar abbobti kee qaskar ruube. Too qaskar Qiyon kee Daan kee Aabil-Beet-Maqka deqsitta magaalooli kee, inkih tan Naftaalih kedoh magaalooliy leek maaqo akak inxicca 'yaanam daanah elle sugtehiyya yibbixen.
Malik Baqsa a xaagu yoobbe waqdi, Raamâ-magaalay maro edde haak sugehiyya fanak cabe.
Baqsa gexek sarra, Aasa inkih yan Yuudah rasul tan ummattah seeco abba heeh, Baqsa Raamâ-magaalat maro haa'gidih baaheh suge xeet kee coox weerra heeh; sarrak Gabaq kee Mixfa deqsitta namma magaalah gaso maroh edde xise.
Too dabaanal, Canaani deqsita nabi malik Aasal yemeeteeh, kaak iyyeemih, «Atu YALLAY ku Dagelta kinnihiyyal hinna'mmay, Suuriyah malikih qaskaral kibaal hayteemih, Suuriyah malikih qaskar kok tisillimeh.
Macaa, mangah tu gactek, Kuus kee Liibiya loowo sinni gaariiray qaskar qeebi edde abtahiyya kee mango qaskaray faras amok qeebi abtahiyya luk tene'mmay, woo saaku YALLAL kibaal hayteemih sabbatah, YALLI keenik koo yiysiseh.
YALLI afqadook kaa yaamine marah qande yecee'gidih, inkih yan baadat cubbi le. Tonna'mmay ku tiyah tu gactek, duqur-taamat asseeh; tonna-leemiik ta saakuuk wadir carbi ku amok makata» kaak iyye.
Malik Aasa toh kaak iyye waqdi, nabam yinqibeh. Too waqdi, «Silsilatat kaa uxuya» iyyeeh kaa casbiseh. Too ayrok wadir sinaamak garabal umam baaha num yekke.
Aasa reedda 'yeemiy rabba 'yam fanah abba heemii, ‹Yuuda kee Israayil Malikwah Aydaada› deqsita kitaabih addal tan.
Malik edde yekke soddom kee sagalhaytô sanatat, ibak gibdi biyaakah biyaakiteeh, ellecabol aracal yekke. Woo biyak kaa yibbixe saaku kinni-way, catoh YALLAL makibalsitinnay dayla-aba fan gexe.
Namma sanatak lakal rabeeh,
Yarusalaamak Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatal, boolok gubat isi bicsiteh suge kabrih addat kaa yoogoqen. Kaa yaaguqeenimik dumal, ginaada kaak qatri kee saliidit yuskuteeniih; kaxxa gira kay massakaxxah ursen.

Yacoosafat isi abbah Aasa lakal malik yekkeeh, Israayil marak saduh amot gace.
Isi qaskar Yuudâ-magaalooliy gaso maroh edde sugga 'tehiyya kee Yuudâ-rasuk barrih tan baaxol bicat hee. Tonnah kaadu, kay abba Aasa Efrayim rasuk qeebit yibbixeh suge magaaloolil kaadu qeebi abtu wayta qaskar bicat hee.
Yacoosafat isi abba qimbol kataatak suge Yallih gita kataata num yekkeeh, Baqal migaq leemiy sahda aqbuduk sugehiyya maqbudinna. Tohuk gexxaamah YALLI barkat kaat hee.
Kay abba aqbuduk suge Dageltah qibaada abeeh, Yallih amri iyyam abak yen. Israayil malikwa Yallih gitak tewqeh sugte'mmay, usuk ken innah mawqinna.
Yacoosafatah YALLI Yuudâ-rasul-milkiino yeceeh; tonna-leemiik Yuudâ rasi kay milkih yen. Yuudah-ummat inkih mattaco kaah bahteeh; tohuk gexxaamah gaddaliy ummat tassakaxxehiyya yekke.
YALLAT abah yan qibaada kibaalah luk yeneeh, Yalla-maleela elle aqbuduk sugte aroocay fayyat raqtahiyya bayseh. Diini-maleela Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah sooliseenih sugen gurumuuda Yuudâ-rasuk bayseh.
Isih reedda 'yeemih sidooca sanat guffu hee saaku, Yuudal tan magaaloolil, Yalli Muusal ruube xinto barissa abbobti ruube. Too saaku ruubem, Bencayil kee Qobadya kee Zakariyya kee Netanel kee Miikayhu deqsita marak ten.
Ta mara lih wakalih ruubemii, Leewih yooboke marih sagaal kee seekâ-nammayak ten. Leewih yooboke marak ruubemii, Samaqya kee Netanya kee Dabadya kee Qasahel kee Samiraamot kee Yahonaatan kee Qadoona kee Tobyaahu kee Toobadoniyya deqsita marak ten. Seekâ-nammayak gexxem, Alisamaq kee Yahooram deqsita namma seekik ten.
YALLIH xinto elle tan kitab gabat hayya heenih, inkih tan Yuudah magaalooli fanah gexak, ummat barsen.
Yacoosafat dariifal enna 'ta rasuk cuggaaneh enna 'ta malikwa carbi kaat abtaamak, YALLI kay cunxo keenit ruube.
*Filistiin marak tu takkem mattacoh lakqo kee kalah tan duyyeeya kaah bahte. Qarab marak baali tonnah, mattacoh illik malciina alfi kee malcina boolih maruw kee, wadarak kaadu malciina alfi kee malcina boolih dabeela takkem baahen.
Tohuk gexxaamah maqarah aysuk yeyse. Inkih yan Yuudah rasul megdebitte kee duyye daanah elle hayu waa magaalooli xise. Tonnah kaadu, leek maaqo akak inxicca 'yaanamak kaxxam mangom Yuudâ-magaaloolil daanah abbaxuk yen. Yarusalaam magaalal gulub-gulubul kurra heeh, kas kee bagi cubbi leh yan mara qaskar-abbobtih hee.
Too marakaa, Qadna akak iyyan numuy kedok Yuudah taabuke qaskarak abbah hee. Too numuu, sidiica boolih alfi takke qaskarak abbah yen.
Kay lakal saqalah heem, Yahoocanan deqsita numuk ten. Ta num kaadu namma bool kee bacra-tabanih alfih qaskariitak abbah yen.
Sidochaak abbah tenem, Dikrí-Qamasya deqsita numuk ten. Namma boolih alfih qaskariitak abbah yen. Qamasya isi fayxik YALLAH too taama abam faxa numuk ten.
Benyam kedoh tooboke qaskarak abbah tenem, Elyadaq deqsita qaskariitay kas kee bagi cubbi luk yenehiyyak ten. Too numuu, namma boolih alfih qaskariitay gob kee gaysê-baxa silaacah lehiyyak abbah yen.
Kay gubal kaadu qaskar abbah tenemii, Yahodbad deqsita numuk ten. Ta num kaadu bool kee bacra-tabanih alfi takke qaskaray qeebih tikiyal tanihiyyak abbah yen.
Ta mari inkihii, Yarusalaam magaalal malik taamat yenen. Tahak kalah, Yuudâ-rasul ten magaalooliy gaso maroh edde enna 'tahiyyal qaskar abbaxuk yen.

Malik Yacoosafat gaddaliino kee migaq-gexxo geeh. Sarrakaa, isi buxah mara kee Israayil malikih yen Acab fanal rihim qaada elle abbaasitan gita bicse.
Dago sanootak wadir, Yacoosafat Malik Acabat boysita'gidih, Samaariyah magaala fanah safare. Yacoosafat yemeete waqdi, Malik Acab kay qibnaytiino kee assakaxxiyyah kaa kee kaa'lih yemeete marah mango laa kee illi qide. Sarrak Gilqad rasul tan Raamot magaalat abam faxa gaadut kaa yasgallem faxe.
Yacoosafatak iyyeemih, «Raamot-magaala gaadam faxak, qeebit yo'lih angale mantuu?» iyye.
Yacoosafat kaal gacseemih, «Isin bical gacinnaan saaku neh waris, yoo kee yi qaskarih agantah siinik maraqnak.
Takkay immay wohuk naharal YALLAL fayu essernam nel tan» kaak iyye.
Sarrakaa, Acab affara bool takke nabuwwah seeco abeeh; too nabuwwa temeete waqdi ken essereh, iyyeemih, «Raamot magaala nabbixe'gidih gaadu'nna, raaqooh?» iyye.
Oson too waqdi, «Gexay gaad, Yalli nasri koh aceelek» kaak iyyen.
Yacoosafat iyyeemih, «Ahak kalah YALLIH nabiy YALLI aba iyyam neh warisa mayanaa?» iyye.
Acab iyyeemih, «Inki numuy Yimlá-Miikayhu deqsitahiyya yani'mmay, usuk kulli way umam akke waytek meqem yoh mayablaay; tonna-leemiik kaat mayyu» iyye.
Yacoosafat, «Wonnah maxcin, iyyaanam hinnak» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Malik Acab malik buxat taamitak yen qaskariitah secca 'yeh, «Gexay Miikayhu sissikuk ni fanah bah» kaak iyye.
A namma malikii, Samaariyah-magaalah-gasok-afal, darok caffa elle baxsan aracalaa, malik edde gaca sartanay ibak xibqi gufahiyya yeneeh, malik elle daffeya namma korsil elle daffeyan ikkel, a nabuwwa foocal keenik gacca 'teh, takku waytaamat ken lih yaabak sugen.
Too nabuwwak numuk teeni Kanaqná-Xidkiya deqsita nabik ten. Too nabi, birtak bicse gaysoosi luk yen. Iyyeemihii, «YALLI, ‹A gaysoosit Suuriyah marat qeebi abettooh inkitanuuk ken baysetto› kok iyya» kaak iyye.
Raqqa 'te nabuwway wokkel sugga 'tehiyya usuk iyyem inteeh, «Gexay Raamot magaalat qeebi ab, aysettok. YALLI nasri koh aceele» iyyen.
Oson tohut yanin waqdi, Miikayhu baaha'gidih gexe qaskar-abbah-yen-num kaa geeh kaak iyyeemih, «Nabuwwa inkih malikih meqem tubleh tani'mmayii, atu kaadu oson yubleenim tableemi» kaak iyye.
Miikayhu kaal gacsemii, «YALLAY waarahiyyah migaaqal xiibitah ani'mmay, Yalli yok inxica iyyeemiik kalihim kaak maxca» iyye.
Sarra Malik-Acab fan yemeete waqdi, Malik-Acab kaak iyyemii, «Miikayhuw, yoo kee Malik-Yacoosafat Raamot-magaala qeebi abna'gidih gaadnu innaa, magaadnuuh?» kaak iyye.
Miikayhu iyyeemih, «Gexay ken gaada. Keenik aysettoonuuh nasri geetton» kaak iyye.
Acab essero kaat qagseeh, «YALLI iyyeemit yo'lih yabta waqdi, ‹Nummat yo'lih yab› kok exceh mananniyoo? Nummat macah yo'lih yaabe wayta?» kaak iyye.
Miikayhu too waqdi kaak iyyeemih, «Israayil qaskaray loyna sinni illi innah fixixih tanihiyya ableh an» iyye. Qagissa heeh, «YALLI, ‹A mari is miraacisa abba leh mayanak, isinni buxaaxih gexxaasitoonay inxic» 'yaanam axcuk oobbe» iyye.
Too waqdi Malik-Acab Yacoosafatak iyyeemih, « ‹A nabi yoh umaamak sah meqem mayabla› 'yaanam kok maxacciyoo?» kaak iyye.
Miikayhu qagseh iyyeemih, «Taway YALLI iyyem siinih warisu waa. Anu YALLA qaraanal isi amoytiinih korsih bagul daffeyah uble. Kay malaykoota inkih migdaa kee gurak kaa maraasiyot kaa abbaxih ubleh eneeh;
too waqdi isi malaykootak, ‹Acab Raamot magaala gexxa 'yeh wokke akah raba innah kaa ayrissu duddam iyyaay?› iyye. Too waqdi malaykootak mariiy tu iyye.
Sarrak roocaaniyya fanaak amma 'teh YALLAL xayyowteeh, ‹Anu kaa ayriseyyo› 'yaanam inte. YALLI, ‹Mannal abettooh?› iyye waqdi,
‹Gexxa exceh Acab-nabuwwa diraabat yaabiseyyo› 'yaanam inte. YALLI too waqdi, ‹Gexay, kaa ayris, ku gabal bicelek› 'yaanam axcih uble» keenik iyye.
Miikayhu ellecabol yaabak af edde cabeemii, «Taway tekkem tamaha. Ku nabuwwa diraabat yaabiseh; koh tu gactek, YALLI kol oobisu waa bala kol yuckumeh» kaak iyye.
Tah yoobbe waqdi Xidkiya deqsita nabi garih kaak amma 'yeh xaban kaak yootokeeh, «YALLIH *Roocaaniyya yoo cabteeh kot gactem maa saaku?» kaak iyye.
Miikayhu kaal gacseemih, «Qarik darrê golit sasoh cultu wayta saaku, wohim aaxigetto» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal Malik Acab isi qaskarih abbak iyyemii, «Miikayhu uxuyay magaalâ-xintoh abbah-yan-Amon kee malik-baxa-Yooqas fan kaa bey.
Keenik intaamah, ‹Malikii, «Anu amaanah uduurra axcem fanah tama num casbit sugusaay, dago maaqo kee leek biso kaah maacina» siinik iyye› keenik inxic» kaak iyye.
Miikayhu iyyeemihii, «Atu amaanah uduurra 'tek, YALLI yo'lih yaabe kaa hinna» iyye. Qagseh kaadu iyyemii, «Ummatey, anu axcem oobbeyay yok raaqa» iyye.
Tohuk lakal Malik-Acabay Israayil malikih yenehiyya kee Malik-Yacoosafatay Yuudâ malikih yenehiyya Gilqad rasul ten Raamot-magaalah gaaduh gexen.
Acab, Yacoosafatak iyyemii, «Carbi booxa fan genxa waqdi, anu a sarak katta exceh aki sarat gacca exceh aki num ceeleyyo'mmay, atu malik sartanak makatinay edde idiy» kaak iyye. Tonnal Israayil-malik kaa elle aaxige waan sartanat gacca 'yeh qeebit cule.
Qeebi rade waqdi Suuriyah malik, faras-gaarih-abbobtih amri yeceeh iyyemii, «Gexay dibuk Israayil malik ibbixaay, kaak kalih marat qeebi maabina» iyye.
Oson Malik-Yacoosafat yublen waqdi, yakkeenimiik inkih Israayil malik kaa yekkeleeniih; too waqdi kaa yabbaxoonuh kaa fan yenkeleeleben. Takkay immay usuk xongolo abe waqdi YALLAK cato geeh, Yalli aki kabul ken yuyfukune.
Faras-gaarit qeebi abta qaskarak abbah yen mari Israayil-malik hinnam kaak yubleeniih; too waqdi kaa makataatinnoonuuy yanay kaa iyyen.
Sarrak, garciik Suuriyah-qaskariiti ruubeh yan gaysê-baxi Acab, fillat-xagar-dacayrih-leh-yan-birtak addak kaa mude. Too waqdi Acab faras-gaari beyak suge numuk, «Mudduumeh! Gaari eykeleelebay nee gacis» iyye.
Carbi laqak laqeeh; takkay immay Acab kay gaarih addal rekuh kaa heenih, Suuriyah qaskar fan afkanuk raaqe. Ayro korte waqdi, rooci kaak yewqe.

Sarra, Malik Yacoosafat amaanah isi buxay Yarusalaamal tanihiyya fan yemeete.
Canaaní-Yaahu deqsita nabi kaal yemeeteeh too waqdi kaak iyyeemih, «Uma-taama abaah YALLIH naqabu xagarat le mara lih gacaanam gitah abtem kot celtaa? A saaku atu abtem YALLIH naqabu koh xalteh tan.
Tohu'mmay away uxih Yallih garil maqaanek baxaysite num hinnito. Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah sooliseenih sugen gurumuuda bayisseh. Yallih gita katayak sugte» kaak iyye.
Malik Yacoosafat dabqah Yarusalaamal yene'mmay, inki aracal maadayinnay ummattah adda gexam gexak yen. Gabbi-qaxak Bersabaq magaalak xabba haanamaay kilbat le kabuk Efrayim rasuk qaleela mango aracak ragidih amma 'yaanam tan baaxo fan fiiruk geerah safarak suge. Elle gexaamal ummatak, «YALLAY isin akak radden sin kaxxa abbobti doorehiyyal uduura» axcuk ummatah seeco abak suge.
Yuudâ-magaalooliy gaso maroh edde tanihiyyak kulli magaalal cokmaaba hee.
Sarrak taama elle aboonu waan inna keenih warse. Keenik iyyeemih, «Cokmi abtan waqdi cubbusak aba. Sin gabal heem, num isih elle faxe innal cokmi akak aba abbootan hinnaay, aham YALLIH taama kinnukuu, cokmi elle teceen aracal, YALLI sin lih yanim mahabbaalina.
Cokmi abtan waqdi, YALLIH meysi taalleenimi; abtan cokmi cubbusak abtaanama. Macaay inteenik, YALLAY ni Dageltah yani cokmil sinam yadlumeenim kee, isinnih akah faxen marah iyyaanam kee, guqul beyaanam maqansiisa» 'yaanam keenik iyye.
Yarusalaam addal Yacoosafat Leewih yooboke mara kee seeka cokmaaba reedise. Tohuk kalah, baaxô-xaylok tu takkem cokmaaba abe. Too reeda keenih akah yeceemii, YALLIH xinto intam abe cinee kee, hinnay kaadu, magaalah addal yan marak titta waa mari yenekii, yab keenih abaana'gidih ken hee.
Too marah kaadu too taama elle aboonu waan inna warse. Keenik iyyeemih, «A taama abtan waqdi YALLIH meysi xagarat taalleenim faxxintaah, abba haytaanam isinni afqadook qadaalatat abtaanama.
Sin toobokok faxe num takkuu, faxe magaalak takku, nabsit aseh suguu, hinnay kaadu, faxe madqa kee Yallih xinto intaamak amo koreh sugek, sin fan ken baahan waqdi, isin cokmi abtan waqdi YALLIH garil qellat le mara akah akke waan innah meqe gita ken barisa. Toh abe wayya hayteenik, Yallih naqbi sin kee ken maade'kal maraaqa. Takkay immay isinni taama meqe innal gexsisseenik, qellatak cattiimetton.
Kaxxa seekih yan sek Amarya diini qaada wagga haytaamak abbah siinik yan. Yuudâ-kedoh abbah yan Ismaaqíl-Dabadya ayyunta wagga hayta qaadak tu edde taadee saqalah siinik yan. Leewih mari yekke cokmi abinal asem kee ase weem wagita marah yanin. Tonna'mmay tahaysa niya siinik salace ikkal ta taama digga luk abtaanama; YALLI cakkih taamita mara lih siinik yanay» keenik iyye.

Ayrok teena Mooyab kee Qammon qaskar Maquunim deqsita maray qalla lih luk yeneenihiyya lih gacca 'yeenih, Yuudâ-rasu wararen.
Farmoh sinam temeeteeh, Yacoosafatak iyyeenimih, «Kaxxam mango qaskar Edom baaxok Rabe badih tattabak gacca 'yeenih qeebi siinit abaana'gidih yemeeteenih yanin. Caxaxon-Tamaari deqsitta magaala gufeenih» kaak iyyen. Ta arac kaadu Qengeedi migaq luk suge.
Toh yoobbe waqdi Yacoosafat cunxo hayteeh, YALLAL gita essereemit yemeete. Sarrak inkih yan rasul sinaamak sooma iyyeeh amri yecee.
Inkih yan Yuudah rasuk sinam Yarusalaam fanah temeeteeh; akah temeetem, YALLAL cato esseraana'gidik ten.
Too magaalal YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarik qusbih bicsen daaratal gaaboowen. Malik Yacoosafat gaaboowe marih foocal solla 'yeh,
anay fayya haak dooqa abe. Dooqah iyyeemih, «YALLAW, nanu akak radne ni kaxxa abbobti doore Dageltaw, qaraanal cokmi lem kooy; inkih yan baad xiinissam koo. Qande leeh cayla le Dagelta kinnitooh; kot missowtaah koo aleltam matana.
Ni Dageltaw, Israayil ummatay isi mara abtehiyya a baaxo fanah yemeete saaku, akkel suge mara eyyeqqa hayteh, isi maray isi kataysa Abraahimik radehiyyah ikoytah tecee.
Akkel dabaaqah gaceeniih, koo elle yaqbudeeni'gidih ku Qibaadah-Qari xisen.
Xisen waqdi iyyeenimihii, ‹Digaalah carbi net yekkek, dalkay sahdat taban-tabtahiyya nee tibbixek, hinnay kaadu, qulul nel rade yekkekii, a Qibaadah-Qariy koo elle yaqbudeenihiyyah foocal solla inneh dooqa abenno. Gadaama nee tabbixe saaku koo kallacitnek, atu woo kallaci neh oggolettooh, nee wadetto› 'yaanam iyyen.
«A saaku hay, Qammon kee Mooyab kee Edom mari titta geyya heeh qeebi net abah yan. Nanu akak radne ni kaxxa abbobti Masrik tewqeeh akke temeete saaku, too marih baaxol culaanam oggolteh masuginnito. Ni kaxxa abbobti dariifa keenik gacca 'yeenih gexeeniih immay ken mabaysinnon.
A saaku wohuh galtoh atu neh tecee baaxok nee yayyaaqeenim faxan.
Ni Dageltaw, a axxul le qaskaray qeebi net abahiyyat edde kalalinna qande mannu immay, ken neh digaal. Kook sah nee cattam matanaay; abnam manaaxigaay, catoh waginnam koo» iyye.
Too waqdi Yuudâ-marak ginnaaqot yan agabu kee urrih agantah num raaqeh manannaay, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih afal soolak yenen.
Gaabooweh suge marih addak Leewih yooboke numuy migaaqah Yacadiyel deqsitahiyyal YALLIH *Roocaaniyya obte. A num Asaf akak iyyan gulubut raaqak yen. A gulub elle muggaaqiseenim, Asaf deqsita numuk teneeh; Asafak rade Mattanya Yaqiiyal xaleeh, Yaqiiyal Banaaya xaleeh, Banaaya Zakariyya xaleeh, Zakariyya ta numuy YALLIH Roocaaniyya elle obtehiyya xale.
Too waqdi Yacadiyel iyyeemih, «Amoytaay, Yuuda kee Yarusalaam ummatey, YALLI siinik iyyamaa, ‹A qaskaray kaxxam mangohiyyak mameysitinaay niya siinik addigille waytaama. Carbi Yalli siinih abele'kkal isin mabtan.
Beera Xiix gitak gaceenih yamaatoonu waan waqdi, qeebi keenit abtaana'gidih foora. Yaruwel magaalah deraafil tan bacarih tan baaxo edde taade exxal tan golo guffu haan waqdi ken geetton.
A carbih qeebi maabinay, inki aracal missowwa 'xicay elle idiya. Too waqdi YALLI siinih yacayu waa nasri isinnih abletton. Tonna'mmay Yuuda kee Yarusalaam magaalah maraw, meysi kee bagbaggoowiyya cabba haay, qeebih eweqa; YALLI sin lih yanik» 'yaanam keenik iyye.
Toh yoobbe waqdi, Yacoosafat Yallih assakaxxah qansa kaak baaxo xagtam fanah qununna 'yeeh; gaabooweh suge mari kaadu usuk abba heem aben. Tokkel suggu 'ye mari gommoh radeeh YALLA yuqbude.
Leewî-kedok Kohat kee Korac akak iyyan mari anay fayya haak, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya faylisen.
Nammeyhaytô-saaku dibroh ugutta 'yeenih, Takooqa deqsitta magaala elle tan bacarih tan baaxo fan gexoh ugten. Gexo qimbisen waqdi, Malik Yacoosafat ken lih yaabeeh keenik iyyeemih, «Yuuda kee Yarusalaam magaalah ummatey, siinik axceemihii, YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyyal kibalsita. Tonnal maqar baahetton. Away kay nabuwwa sin lih edde yabte yab eemenaay, tonnal nasri geetton» keenik iyye.
Yacoosafat isi mara lih malissa heek lakal, Yallih saare aba marak, «YALLIH Qiidih ayro edde gactan sarat gacca 'xicay qaskarak foocat,
‹YALLIH kacni mayambaxak,
tohul candu kaah gacisa›,
axcuk YALLA saarisak gexa» iyye.
Ta mari Yallih saare qimbissa hee waqdi, qeebih keenih amaatuk sugte qaskarat YALLI badit abe.
Qammon kee Mooyab qaskar Edom qaskarat qeebih gexxa 'teeh bayissa ken heen. Tohuk wadir qeebih tittal ufkunna iyyen. Ibak gibdi qeebi tittat aben.
Yuudâ-qaskar woo bacarih tan baaxo akak yablen ikke guffu heenih, taaxige qeebih keenih tamaate qaskar fanah wagga heen waqdi, yakkeenimiik baaxok bagul qangalaylut yan maray rabehiyya yublen. Num keenik raaqe'kal yembexeenim keenik yublen.
Toh yublen waqdi, Yacoosafat kee kay qaskar ken fanah gexxeeh, keenik raqte duyye buuben. Mango laa kee maaqiddaay, sartan kee, wohuk kalah tan duyyey mango tuxxiq lehiyya keenit geen. Sidooca ayro too duyyeh gaaboysat sugeeniih, ellecaboh duyyê-mangak gexxaamah onkoysoonu efferra heenih elle caben.
Fereyhaytoh ayro Beraaka deqsitta golol gaabowna heeniih; too ayro tokkel YALLI keenih abeemih kaa faylisak asen. Too arac tohuk wadir Beraaka
Yacoosafat kee kay qaskar YALLI naqboytiitik keenih yecee nasrih afracuk Yarusalaam fanah yuduuren.
Magaala guffu heen waqdi, *begena kee kirar aagarukuuy *baanta kaayisak, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari fan gexen.
Israayil naqboytiitil YALLI baahem toobbe doolatwa inkih cunxitak raaqen.
Tohuk gexxaamah Yacoosafat isi baaxol amaanah ackumuk yeneeh; Yalli kulli kabuk kay baaxo amaan abe.
Yacoosafat malik yekke saaku qumrik soddom kee koona liggidat yeneeh, labaatanna kee koona sanat Yarusalaam magaalal abbootan luk suge. Kay ina Qaduuba deqsitta barrak teneeh, Silci deqsita numih baxák ten.
Kay abba Aasak kaxxih, YALLIH garil cakkik tan taamah taamitak yen.
Tonna'mmay diini-maleela elle taqbude aroocay fayyat raqtahiyya kay dabaanal baateh mananna. Ummat kaadu, isi afqadook ken kaxxa abbobti doore Dageltah qibaadat gaceenih manannon.
Ahak kalah taniimiy Yacoosafat malik tikka 'yeemiy rabba 'yem fanah abba heehiyya, Canaaní-Yaahuh Aydaaday Israayil Malikwah Aydaada deqsita kitaabak exxak teenah yanihiyyal geytima.
Yacoosafat kaadu Acadya deqsita numuy Israayil malikih yeneeh qamal umaane luk yenehiyya lih qalla haysiteh yen.
Qexyon-Gabar deqsita boorul kaxxa badal gexa maraakib bicsen.
Too waqdi Elqeeder deqsita numuy Mareesâ magaalal yooboke Doduwaahu baxak yenehiyya Yacoosafak iyyeemih, «Acadya lih qalla haysitteeh, tohuk gexxaamah YALLI atu xissem kok baysele» 'yaanam axcuk garci kaah kale. Woo maraakib yiddigilleeh, badal gexak maraaqinna.

Yacoosafatal Yallih amri yemeeteeh; Yarusalaamak Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatal malikwâ-buxah mara edde yaaguqen magaqat kaa yoogoqen. Kay lakal kay baxay migaaqah Yahooram deqsitahiyya malik yekke.
Yahooram lica toobokoyta luk yen. Migaaqah Qadarya kee Yaciyel kee Zakariyya kee Qadariyaahu kee Mikaayil kee Safatya deqsitak yenen.
Ken abba mango dahab kee lakqo kee wohuk kalah tan duyyey mango tuxxiq lehiyya keenih yecee. Kulli num keenik Yuudâ magaalooliy gaso maroh edde tanihiyyah abba abe. Barah keenik inkih Yahooram saqalah yeneeh; tonna-leemiik ken abba isi lakal malik kaa abe.
Yahooram isi abbootan maqar bahsiisek lakal, lab-tooboko inkih kee Israayilil abbobtih yen marak tu takkem qidsiiseh.
Yahooram qumrik soddom kee nammayhaytot yan saaku malik yekkeeh, Yarusalaamal bacra liggida malikih suge.
Malik Acab kee wohuk kalah tan Israayil malikwak kaxxih, Malik Yahooram uma-taama abak suge. Tohut akah asem, Acab baxá rihimih abiteemi. YALLAL dambi lem baahe.
Takkay immay YALLI, Dawuduk raaqe dardaarinni samad cabsiisam mafaxinna. Toh akah tekkemii, YALLI, Dawudukuu, «Ku reeda baxak baxal tabele ikkal bayya m'inta» 'yaanam axcuk tohul xagna kaah culeh yen.
Yahooram malikih yen saaku, Edom mari gaadileh kaat ugteeh, sarrak isi amô-baxxaaqqa kaak geenih isinni malikih gubat xinta doolat yekken.
Tohuk gexxaamah Yahooram kee kay qaskar qeebi abta faras-gaariira lih Edom rasuh gaaden. Edom mari maro keenit hee'mmay bari yekke waqdi, Yacooram kee kay qaskar keenik tuftuceh tisillime.
Tohuk wadirih, Edom mari currih gace. Tonnah kaadu too dabaanal Libnâ-magaalah mari gaadileh yewqe. Toh akah tekkem, Yahooram YALLAY usuk akak rade kay kaxxa abbobti doorehiyya cineh yeneemih taaga.
Yuudâ-rasuk fayya le baaxol, Yalla maleela xeet kee coox elle taqbude arooca bicse. Yuuda kee Yarusalaam magaalah ummat, Yallih garil dambik keenil loowintu waytaamat asise.
Nabi Eliyyas warkat kaah ruube. Too warkatal kaak iyyeemihii, «YALLAY ku kaxxa abba Dawud aqbuduk yenehiyya atu abta umaane kok niqbah. Macaay intek, ku abbah yen Malik-Yacoosafat katayak suge gita makatayinnitooy, ku kaxxa abbah yen Malik-Aasa katayak suge gita makatayinnito.
Ken gita cabba hayteh, Israayil malikwa abak tenem abta. Yuuda kee Yarusalaam magaalah mara Yallak teyxeereh. Malik Acab kee kay lakal malikwa yekke mari Israayil mara Yallak akah yeyxeeren innal, atu Yuuda kee Yarusalaam mara Yallak teyxeereh. Tohut macabinnitoy ku toobokoy kok aysuk tenehiyya qidde.
Tohuk gexxaamah YALLI ku maraay ku xaylooy ku agabu kee edderri hayteemil bala oobisele.
Atu isih ulqi-lakimah biyaakitettooh; too biyak ayrook ayro lafak koo lafele» kaak iyye.
YALLI, Filistiin mara kee Qarab marak tu takkemiy Kuus mari dabqah elle yan ikkeh xaqul tenehiyya, Yahooram-marat qeebi akah aban innah ken uguuguse.
Too mari Yuudâ-baaxo warareeh malik qari buuben. Malik gennaaqoh agabu kee lab-xaylo seewah kaak orbisen. Raqtem dibuk kay xaylok barah inkih qunxuk yen awkay migaaqah Acadya deqsitahiyya.
Toh inkih kaat tikka 'tek sarra, YALLI ulqi lakimay kaxxa biyak lehiyya kaat ruube.
Too biyak namma sanatih gide kaxxa biyaakah kaa biyaakak sugeeh, ellecabol uma-rabah akah rabe. Duma kay kaxxa abbobtih akah abak yenen innah, kay rabah gira muurusinnon.
Yahooram soddom kee nammayhaytot yan saaku malik yekkeeh, sarrak Yarusalaamal bacra sanat malikih suge. Rabe saaku kay rabah rookittem matan. Magaalak Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatal kaa yoogoqeeni'mmay, malikwa edde yaaguqen magaqat kaa maaguqinnon.

Duma Qarabak tu takke maritteeta Yuudâ-baaxo warar abte waqdi, Yahooram xaylok Acadya deqsita baxay barah inkih salafat yanihiyyak kalih xaylo inkih qideenih sugen. Tonna leemiik Yarusalaam magaalah mari, kay abbah aracal malikih kaa heen.
Acadya qumrik labaatanna kee nammayhaytot yan saaku malik yekke. Yarusalaam inki sanat malikih suge. Acadya kaadu Malik Acab buxah marih raatat gexe. Toh akah abemii, Qatalya deqsitta barray Malik Acabak baxáh teneeh Malik-Qomri kaadu baxi baxák tenehiyya kaak inah ten. Is uma fayuy Yallak kaa yayxeerehiyya kaa fayisak ten.
Kay abba rabek sarra, Malik Acab buxah mari kaadu uma fayuh kaa fayisak yenen. Tonna-leemik, Acab buxah mari akah abak suge innah, Malik-Acadya kaadu YALLAL dambi lem baahe. Toh sarra baati kaah xalte.
Too marih fayuh Suuriyah malikiy Cadayel deqsitahiyya kee Israayil malikiy Yooram deqsitahiyya qeebi abte saaku, Israayil malikih qaxat gacca 'yeh Suuriyah malikit qeebi abe. Too qaskar Gilqad rasuk Raamot magaalal gaba kee gabah toome. Too qeebit Yooram mudduume.
Sarrakaa, mudumuk uram fanah Yidraqel magaala fanah yuduure. Acadya kaat boysita'gidih tokke gexe.
Acadya tokke Israayil malikit boysita'gidih abe gexo, Yalli baati kaal akah takke innah, abe. Usuk tokkel gexe waqdi, Yalli, kaa kee Yooramat, Nimsí-Yaahu deqsita num ruube. YALLI too num akah ruubem, Acab durruyyatih dardaarinna a numih gabat bayisa'gidik ten.
Yaahu, YALLI elle iyye innal, Malik Acab durruyyatih dardaarinnal taguude digaalat elle abak suge ikkel, Yuudâ doolatih abbobti kee Acadyâ nangaltay Acadya lih wakalih temeeteh sugtehiyya yubleeh, too waqdi yakkeenimiik ken qide.
Sarrak Acadya gorriseeniih Samaariyah magaalal yombooqoreh suge. Kaa geeniih, Yaahu fanah kaa beeniih tokkel raba kaal yuckumen. Takkay immay kay kaxxa abba Yacoosafat cormatah meqe magaqah kaa yoogoqen. Iyyeenimihii, «Kay kaxxa abba YALLI kicna taamah baguuk taamitak suge numuk ten» iyyen.
Acadyâ-xaylo kee ramaday kay lakal dardaarahiyya maraaqinna.
Malik-Acadyah-inah ten Qatalya, tet baxa qideenim toobbe waqdi, Yuudâ marak dardaarinni elle amma axce raare mara inkih qidaanamih amri tecee.
Takkay immay Acadya lih abba le barray migaaqah Yahoosebqa deqsittahiyya ten. Too barra abbaxuk tenem, Yoyadaq deqsita seekik ten. Too barra, Acadyâ-xaylok numuk teenay migaaqah Yooqas deqsitaah qide raareenihiyya kee, inah innal kaa dacrisak sugte barra beyya hayteh, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addat xinti-aracal ken hayte. Tokkel kaa tooqoreeh, Qatalyâ-gabat rabaamak kaa waddeh.
Qatalya malikáh sugte laca sanat, tokket uqurat kaa sugusse.

Laca sanat tokket kaa sugseenik lakal, sek-Yoyadaq, «Tahaysa kay qaadak tuk teena abnam tayse» 'yaanam iyye. Sarrak qaskar abbobtik laca num lih bica haysite. Tohumuu, Yaroocám-Qadarya kee Yahoocanán-Ismaaqil kee Yoobád-Qadarya kee Qadaayá-Maqseyaahu kee Dikrí-Alisafat deqsitta qaskar abbobtik ten.
Ta mari, inkih tan Yuudah magaalooli gexxa 'yeh Leewih yooboke mara kee gulubwak abbobtih yan mara Yarusalaam fanah baahen.
Too mari inkih, Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril gaabooweeniih, malikik raaqe Yooqas lih Yalla-kee-xagana haysiten. Tokkel Yoyadaq keenik iyyemii, «Dumî-malikih baxi ah kaana. YALLI dumaak Dawuduh xagana culeh sugeeh, ‹Dawudow, ku reeda baxak baxal raaqele› 'yaanam kaak iyyeh suge. Ta saaku ta num too xaganal malik yakkeemi.
Taway abnu waynam macaay inteenik, seeka kee Leewih yooboke mari sabti ayro taama aba'gidih yamaate waqdi, sidooca afah ken heenno. Naharsi afa keenik Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih afal dacayrih gacele.
Nammayhaytoh afa keenik malik qarih dacayrit gacele. Raqqa intem Rakiibô-Culma deqsita aracal gacele. Ummat inkih Qibaadâ-Qarih daaratal mododele.
Too waqdi a taamah taahirik tan seeka kee Leewih yooboke marak kalih mari Qibaadâ-Qari macula. Keeniy ta taamat yanihiyyak kalih mari macula. A mari a taamah taahirroowe mara kinnuk, culam tu mali'mmay, keenik kalih mari macula. Aki mari, YALLI elle iyye innal, Qibaadâ-Qarih afal aadelon. YALLIH yab oggolaanam faxxinta.
Leewih yooboke mari siiben seef lih malik dariifa kee kay xaquk kate waanama. Usuk angayyinnaan ikke kaa'lih gexaanama. Qibaadâ-Qarih adda culam faxa num yenek, kaa qidaanama» keenik iyye.
Leewi kee Yuudâ mari, sek-Yoyadaqah yab yukkuqeenih keenik akah iyye innah abe. Sabti ayrol labhak sabti ayro taamah gexa mara kee gexe waa mara inkih kaal baahen. Taama gaba kale mara isi buxaaxi fan gexe kalen.
Yoyadaq, Malik Dawud macaxu kee goobuy Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril daanat sugtehiyya qaskar abbobtih yecee.
Sarra siiben seef gabat le labha malik dacrisaana'gidih, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih dariifal ken hee.
Sarrak sek-Yoyadaq, Yooqas afah yeyyeeqeeh malik-kalabta kaat heeh, malik rasu elle xiinisa xinto kutbeh elle tan warkat kaal yecee. Yooqas tonnal malik yekke. Sarrak sek Yoyadaq kee kay xaylo kaa tuskuteh. Tohuk wadir suggu 'ye mari anay fayya haak, «Ani hay malik! Ani haay!» iyyen.
Qatalya, malik assakaxxiyyah, anay fayya haak yaaba mara toobbe waqdi, sissikuk YALLIH Qibaadah Qari fan gexxe. Tokkel gaaboowe mari teetih suge.
Woo baaxol qaadah akah abak sugen innah, Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril yan qamiddih garil, soola malik tuble. Bool-abbobtih ten qaskar kee *baanta yaagure maray maraasiyot kaa yabbixehiyya tuble. Kaadu farcatak yan maray waxxaq iyya kee baanta yaagurehiyya tuble. Qibaadâ-Qaril saare aba mari elle digran duyye luk a qaffaydak foocat yen. Toh tuble waqdi, Qatalya niya teetik baxaqteeh sara isik qanxisseeh, «Gano leelaay, gano leelaay! Ah gano!» inte.
Sek-Yoyadaq, Qatalya YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih deraafil tet qidaanam mafaxinnaay, tonna leemik qaskar abbobti amriseh, «Ama qaskaray rooruh tanik gudeek hayya hay, tet beyaay, tet catam faxa mari yenek, ken qida» iyye.
Too waqdi tet yibbixeeniih, malik-qarih-daarat fan tet beeniih, Faras Culma deqsitta aracal tet qiden.
Sek-Yoyadaq, Malik Yooqas kee ummatta YALLIH mara yakkeeni'gidih, YALLA kee ken fanal bica abe. Sitta fanah xayyossa heeh, YALLIH mara akkeloonumuh Yalla-kee xagana ken culse.
