Tohuk wadir tokkel suggu 'ye mari inkih, Baqal elle yaqbuden qari gexeeniih bututtukka heen. Tokkel sugte sadgat elle abak sugen arooca kee, xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeeyay Yallih aftok yaqbudeenihiyya yiggiggileenih. Mattan deqsita numuy Baqal yaqbude mari seekih luk sugehiyya Baqalah sadgat elle abak sugen aroocak foocal qiden.
Sarrak Yoyadaq seeka kee Leewih yooboke mara YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril aban taamah abbootanat hee. Ta mari Malik Dawud ken edde hee taama kee, Muusal obte xinto elle inta innal, YALLIH sadgatah baahan saqih cado cararisaanam taamah luk yenen. Tohuk kalah, Malik Dawud elle iyye'nnal, Yallih saare qiidih asan saakih qaffaydah abbootan keenih yecee.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, Qibaadâ-Qari taahir maliinoh yamaate mara waasu waa maray Qibaadâ-Qarik culmal dacayrih gacu waahiyya doore.
Tohuk inkih gaba kalla hee waqdi, qaskar abbobti kee makaabonuuy doolatak saqoltih yan mara kee wokkel suggu 'ye ayyunti inkih, sek Yoyadaq lih gacca 'yeh, Qibaadâ-Qarik malik dabaaqah elle gaca qari fanah maraasiyot kaa baahen. Malik-qarik kaxxa afay akak culaanahiyyak culla 'yeeniih, malik elle gaca rikeek tan korsil kaa heen.
Ummatta inkih ruffa 'teeh; Qatalya qideenimih sabbatah, magaalal karbacca intam masuginna.

Yooqas malik yekke saaku karmak malcina sanatat yen. Sarrak Yarusalaam magaalal morootom liggida malikih suge. Kay ina Xibya deqsitta barrak teneeh; elle toobokem, Bersabaq-magaalak ten.
Yooqas, sek Yoyadaq addunyal yanim fanah, YALLI kicna taamat asak suge.
Sek Yoyadaq namma barra doorru heeh rihimih kaah abe. Too agbi lab-xaylo kee say-xaylo kaah xale.
Malik Yooqas waqlak wadir, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari yaqusbuuseemit yemeete.
Too waqdi seeka kee Leewih yooboke marah seeceeh, keenik iyyemii, «Yalla kinni sin Dageltih Qibaadah-Qarih aqusbuusiyyah sanatal faxxinta lakqo kobxissaana'gidih, Yuudâ-rasul enna 'ta magaalooli fan xayuk gexxa xicay, tama lakqo gaaboysa» keenik iyye. Takkay immay Leewih mari gexok udurruteh.
Tah yuble waqdi, sek Yoyadaqay keenik abbah yanihiyyah secca 'yeeh, «Leewih marak, ‹YALLIH naqasuh yen Muusa amriseh cabe lakqoy ummatta Yallih Nabnah-Siraqih catoh gabbarah tayyaaqehiyya, Yuudâ-rasul yan mara kee Yarusalaamal yan marak gaaboysay baaha› keenik exceeh; too mari uxih magexinnay elle yanik; ahak tuk teena m'intaa?» kaak iyye.
Too dabaanal, Qatalya deqsitta barray taama akak toomehiyyah gita kataatak suge mari, Yallih Qibaadah Qari abuuruseenih sugeeniih, addal akak sugte duyyey taahirik tanihiyya wokkek beyya heenih, Baqal akak iyyaanamay yallah loonuhiyyah qibaadah heenih yenen.
Sarrak Malik Yooqas Leewih marak iyyeemih, «Gexay gabbarah yayyaaqen lakqo edde qidan sandug bicissa haay woo Qibaadah-Qarik culmal haa» keenik iyye.
Sarrak, Yarusalaam magaala kee inkih yan Yuudah rasu fan farmo ruube. Iyyemii, «Yallih naqasuh yen Muusa, Israayil mari bacarih tan baaxol yen saaku, Yallih Nabnah-Siraqih catot assa'gidih ummatak salaqe lakqo, a saaku salaqqa haay ruuba» 'yaanam farmoh ruube.
Ta farmo akah ruuben ummatta kee baaxoh abbobti ruffa 'teeh, lakqo salaqqa heenih baaheeniih, a lakqoh Qibaadâ-Qarih culmal heen sandug kibeenih.
Kulli ayro sahda gexxa 'te waqdi, Leewih mari sandug malik gubal taamita maral acayuk yenen. Sandug lakqok kibbiiminnaan waqdi, malik kutbe-abeena kee kaxxa seekih afak yan num sanduguk lakqo eyyeqqa hayteh, sandug elle suge ikkel gacisak yenen. Tonnal abak mango lakqo gaaboysen.
Malik kee sek Yoyadaq too lakqo YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari bicsa marih amol yan marih gabal haak yenen. Qarik tiddigille arooca xeetik xisa maraay coox bicsa mara kee biriita kee nacaasak tu bicsa mara a taamah doortem keenik ten.
Ta taamat hayya heen mari Yallih Qibaadah-Qari meqe innal bicseeniih, duma xisen saaku elle suggu 'ye innah heen.
Bicsak tonnal gaba kalla heen waqdi, lakqo kee dahabak raqtem malik kee sek Yoyadaqal yeceeniih; malik kee sek too lakqo kee dahabak sacnitte kee faxxinta mingilwa YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril haana'gidih akak bicsen.
Sek Yoyadaq addunyal suggu 'yem fanah, Qibaadâ-Qaril sadgat kulli saaku abak yenen.
Sek Yoyadaq barak bool kee soddom liggida guffu heeh kaxxam idoolite saaku, Yallih amri kaal yemeete.
Sek Yoyadaq rabe saaku, Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatal malikwa elle yoogoqen ikkel kaa yoogoqen. Toh akah abeenimii, usuk Israayil marah meqem abeh, Yalla kee Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih meqem abe.
Sek Yoyadaq rabek wadir Yuudah abbobti malikit culla 'teh, sekti gita hinna'mmay, isinni malah kaa heen.
Tonna-leemiik ummatta YALLAY oson akak raden ken kaxxa abbobti elle aamanuk sugtehiyyah xisen qaril abak sugen qibaada cabba heenih, xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeeya kee Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah soolisen gurumuudah qibaadat gacen. Oson too umaanet aseenim, Yuuda kee Yarusalaam maral Yallih naqabu bahte.
YALLI, uma gitak ken waasaana'gidiy kay fan ken gacsaana'gidih, nabuwwa keenil ruube'mmay, ummatah tu gactek, ken yab aabbe cineenih.
Sarrakaa, seekik raaqe baxay Zakariyya migaq luk yenehiyyal Yallih Roocaaniyya obte. Too sek sinam kaa elle table ikkel solla 'yeeh, anay fayya haak, «YALLI siinik iyyaamah, ‹Ummatey, yi amri akah cintaanaah bala isinnil akah oobissaanam macaa? Yoo cinteeniih anu kaadu sin cineh› siinik iyyah yan» iyye.
Malik Yooqas edde anuk, ta seekik aboonu waanamal malissa heeniih; tohuk wadir malik «Kaa qida» 'yaanamih amri yecee. Too mari YALLIH Qibaadah Qarih daaratal kaa qiden.
Malikii, Zakariyyah abba maqaanek kaah xiqeh gide hawwenna heehii, kay baxa qidsiisaamat ase. Zakariyyal rooci kaxkaxah yan waqdi, anay fayya heehii, «Abtaanam YALLI siinik yabalay! Sin akah digaalay» 'yaanam iyye.
Too sanatat sugum yemeete waqdi, Suuriyah qaskar Yuudâ-rasu kee Yarusalaam magaalat qeebi abeeniih, abbobtih suggu 'ye mara inkih qiden. Mango duyye keenik dannabah Damasko fan orbisen.
Suuriyah qaskar Yuudâ-qaskarak daguk tene'mmay, YALLI makkok keenik ken yiysiiseh. YALLAY ken kaxxa abbobti aqbuduk tenehiyya toh keenik akah abem, kaa cineemih sabbata. YALLI, Malik-Yooqas tonnal digaale.
Qeebit kaxxam mudduumeh raaqe. Sarra Suuriyah qaskar baaxok tewqe waqdi, kay gubal doolat abbobtih ten namma num kaal malisseeh; Sek-Yoyadaqah baxat abe qidimih caneh, isi kaqaadal yan waqdi kaa qiden. Magaq magaalak Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatal kaa yoogoqen. Takkay immay dardortih aracat kaa maagaqinnon.
Kaal malisseh kaa qiddemii: Dabad deqsita numuy Qammon marih barrah baxah yeneyii ina akak Simqat deqsitak tene kee, Yahodbad deqsita numuy Mooyab barray migaaqah Simrit deqsittahiyya baxak tenehiyyak ten.
‹Malikwah Abina› deqsitta kitaabih maybalaalaqal, Malik Yooqas xayloh aydaad kee, kaat takku waytaamih giddinaamak nabuwwa edde yabte yab kee, usuk Yallih Qibaadah-Qariy yiddigilleh sugehiyya elle bicsiise innih aydaadi yan. Kay lakal kay baxay migaaqah Amaxya deqsitak yenehiyya malik yekke.

Amaxya qumrik labaatanna kee konoyhaytot yan saaku malik yekke. Sarrak Yarusalaam magaalal labaatanna kee sagla sanat malikih suge. Kay inah migaq Yahoqaddinik teneeh; elle toobokem, Yarusalaam magaala.
YALLI kicna taamah taamitak yene'mmay, baguuk abak mananna.
Amaxya malik tikka 'yeh qande baahe saaku, kay abba qide maray doolat saqoltih sugehiyya caneh qide.
Takkay immay Yallih xinto elle tan kitaabay Muusal obtehiyya elle inta innal, oson abeenimih ken xaylo maqidinna. Too xintol, «Abba baaheemih xaylo maqidinaay; xaylo bahteemih abbobti maqidina» 'yaanam tan. «Numul rabi elle yamaatem, dagaak num isih baahe umaane» 'yaanam tan.
Malik, Yuuda kee Benyaamah yooboke mara gulub-gulubul baxissa heeh qaskarat ken hee. Sarrak alfi-alfi kee bool-boolul kurra ken heeh ken amrissa abbobti keenih hee. Qaskarat hee mari qumrik labaatannaak amo gufa marak ten. Tittat sidiica boolih alfih num qaskarat hee. Ta mari inkih qeebih bical yaniih, macaxi-qido kee goobut isinni akah raaqisan inna nagay yaaxige marak ten.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, Israayil rasuk qasbih sidiica alfi kee affara boolih kiilo lakqok akah yeexege qaskarak bool alfi takkem baahe.
Sarrak nabi kaal yemeeteeh kaak iyyeemih, «Amoytaw, Israayil qaskar is lih mahan. A maray kilbat le kabih xintok yemeetehiyya YALLI kicna mara hinnon.
A mari carbil kaxxam koh xiqeloonum takkale koo immay, nasri koh teceeh qeebil naqboytak koo taysiisem, Yalla ikkal, a mara hinna. A mari sin lih gexek, Yalli naqboytit siinik aysiisele» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi Amaxya iyyemii, «Hay meqehik, a gide takke lakqoy keenil meklehiyyak maca aboo?» kaak iyye.
Nabi kaak iyyemii, «YALLI wohuuk fula koh aceele» kaak iyye.
Toh yoobbe waqdi, Amaxya taaxige qaskaray lakqot limmoyseh sugehiyyak, «Ahaysa isinni baaxo uduura» axcuk xiiriye. Too qaskar isi baaxo tuduureh immay, Yuudâ-mara kaxxa naqabuh niqibuk gexen.
Sarrak Amaxya niya gacissa heeh, isi qaskarak foocat gacca 'yeh Qasbo le Golo deqsita arac fan ken been. Tokkel qeebi abeeniih, too saaku Edom qaskarak tabna alfih num qiden.
Tabna alfih qaskariita kaadu yibbixeenih. Too qaskar Silaq deqsitta qalek amo beyya heenih boolok amok ken qiden. Too qalek kombobbolak obba 'yeenih boolok gubat yan kaxxa xixxooqal radeeniih, tonnal yembexen.
Oson tohut yanin waqdi, duma Amaxya xiiriye Israayil qaskar amma 'teh, Samaariya kee Beet-Coron fanal enna 'ta Yuudah magaaloolit qeebi abeeniih, sidiica alfih num keenik qiden. Mango duyye kaadu dannabah keenik orbisen.
Amaxya Edom marak yeyseh elle yemeete ikkel, oson aqbuduk sugen coox kee xeetik bicsen duyyeeya gabat keenih baahe. Too duyye inki soolissa heeh yuqbude. Woo aracal qibaadah sadgat too duyyeh migaaqal abe.
Taham YALLIH naqabu kaah bahte. Tonna-leemiik YALLI nabi kaa fan ruube. Too nabi kaal yemeete waqdi, kaak iyyeemihii, «Ta duyyey elle gexxe baaxoh mari aqbuduk sugehiyya yaqbudeenimit koo bahtem macaa? Aham tu xiqta way, le maray aqbuduk sugehiyya wadak ten kaak; koo tahat asissem macaa?» kaak iyye.
Yaabak fanat kaak radda 'yeh, too tiyak malik kaal gacseemihii, «Malikih fayu yecee num koo abtem iyyaay? Ahaysa yab eyseed; cintek, rabi gadda akketto» kaak iyye.
Nabi fayuk kaak yeedeeh immay, qangara kaat heeh, iyyeemihii, «Ta saaku Yalli baati koh loowem ableh an. Toh elle ablemii, umaanek ta axxul lem abba hayteh, away yi fayu cintaamal kok ableh an» kaak iyye.
Ayrok teena malik Amaxya kee kaah fayu yecee marak titta geyya heenih, Israayil malikil malsen. Abeenih yanim malahaa, too malikih farmo ruubeeniih, «Qeebih yoo duude tellek, bical gacay» axcuk qeebih kaa niyaataanam kaah warsen. Israayil malikik migaq Yahoqasak ten. Kay abba Yowaahad deqsitak yen. Kay kaxxa abba Yaahu deqsitak yen.
Sarrak Israayil malik a farmol kaal gacseemih, «Dumah yan saaku Lubnaan rasuk qaleh amol tooboke keenan le caxâ-baxa *sariddoh farmo rubte, iyye. ‹Ku baxá yi baxah digbis› 'yaanam rubte, iyyen. Tohut yanin waqdi, kaxxa ali yemeeteeh taaxige caxah-baxat taqqa 'ye waqdi, itqat edde tet yiggiggile, iyyen.
Hay taway too missilah, duma Edom-marak teysek sah, geyte iisa koo maxiqtay kaxxiinah qubbuy intaa? Yoo qeebih suumutaanam koo kee Yuuday ku marah yanihiyyah baati xalelem mataaxigaa? Maabinay isi aracal elle idiy, qeebi hinnak» 'yaanam kaah ruube.
Amaxya a fayu kaak cineh. Yalli Amaxyah a qeebil gacam looweh yen. Duma Edom marak kaa yiysiiseh immay, a saaku a qeebil kaa gacsiisaamal gaba kaleh yen. Toh akah kaak abaamat akah yemeetem, Edom marih baaxok baahe duyyey xeet kee cooxuk bicseenihiyya yuqbudeemih sabbata.
Sarrak Yahoqas fayu kaak cinem yuble waqdi, qeebih kaah gexe. Yuudâ rasuk Beet-Semes deqsitta magaalal yongoorowen.
Amaxyâ-qaskar qeebil gacteeh, qaskar takkeemik kudak isinni buxaaxih fan gacen.
Israayil malikih yen Yahoqas, Amaxya yibbixeeh, Yarusalaam fanah kaa bee. Yarusalaam magaalat maroh tan gasok Efrayim-Afak xabba haanamaay Rukni-Afa deqsita aracah amma 'yaanam tan gaso butukka hee. Too arac xexxaarah namma boolih gide mitrik takke baaxok ten.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal suggu 'ye dahab kee lakqo Samaariyah magaalah fan dannabah orbise. Yoobad-Edom deqsita numuk dacayrih edde suge duyyey Qibaadâ-Qaril sugga 'te kee, malik-qarik-duyye-elle-daanisan-aracal sugte duyye weerra heeh bee. Tohuk kalah kaadu, carbit yibbixe mara seewah Samaariyah magaala fan gabat bee.
Malik Amaxyay Yuudâ-malikih yenehiyya, Israayil malikih yen Yahoqas rabek sarra, taban kee koona sanat suge.
Tahak kalih qaaday Amaxya reedda 'yeemiiy rabba 'yam fanah abba heem inkih, ‹Yuuda kee Israayil Malikwah Aydaada› deqsita kitaabal tan.
Yallih yab cinna heeh isih faxaamih abittot gace ayrook wadir, Yarusalaam magaalal sinam kaak abta waytaamat malisak sugte. Sarrak Laakis deqsitta magaala fanah awyah gexe. Takkay immay kaa niqibuk yen mari tokke fanah lakal kaak gexxa 'yeenih kaa qiden.
Ginaada kaak farasal hayya heenih Yarusalaam fanah beeniih, tokkel Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatal malik buxah mara edde yoogoqen kabrit kaa yoogoqen.

Yuudâ mari yakkeemiik Amaxyah baxay migaaqah Quddiyya deqsitak yenehiyya abbah aracal malikih dooren. Too saaku Quddiyya qumrik taban kee lica karmat yen.
Quddiyya isi abba rabek lakal, Eelat deqsitta magaalay qeebit raaqiseenihiyya Yuudah gacseeh nammeyhaak tet xise.
Quddiyya malik yekke saaku qumrik taban kee leceyhaytot yeneeh; Yarusalaam magaalal kontom kee namma sanat malikih suge. Kay ina migaaqah Yakolyaahu deqsitak teneeh; elle toobokem, Yarusalaam magaalah addak ten.
Quddiyya isi abbah raatat gexak, YALLI kicna taamah taamitak yen.
Zakariyya akak iyyan seekiy Yallih gita kaa barisak yenehiyya addunyal suggu 'yem fanah, kay fayu oggolakaay YALLI kicna taamah baguuk taamitak suge. Tonna-leemiik Yalli barkat kaat hee.
Quddiyya Filistiin marih gaaduh ugteeh, Gat kee Yabne kee Asdood akak iyyan magaalooli yiggileh. Asdood xaqu kee raqqa 'te Filistiin rasul magaalooliy gasoosa maroh edde tanihiyya xise.
Filistiin-mara kee, Gurbaqal deqsitta magaalal ten Qarab kee, Maquunim deqsita marat abe gaadul Yalli nasri kaah yecee.
Qammon mari qusuur kaah mekelak yen. Qandeh lafitak lafteeh; tonna-leemiik kay migaq Masri baaxoh agantah gexeeh; too baaxol kinni way yontoobbeh.
Yarusalaam magaalat maroh edde heen gasoosa maqar bahsiisa'gidih, Rukni-Afa deqsita arac kee Goloh-Afa deqsita aracih amol, allak tamaatem akak yablen qari xise. Gaso akak makkinta aracal kaadu tonnah yan qari xise.
Tonnah kaadu, sinam isinni aroocal allak tamaatem akak yablen fayya le qarwak mangom xise. Ayrô-culmat raqta mango koomaami le baaxo kee booxaaxah tan baaxol mango laa luk yeneeh; leê-raaqisso mangom dage. Buqre kaxxam kicinuk yeneeh; tonna-leemiik taamita marak, «Qaleelah tan baaxol qinab xala coox ubquraay; lee le baaxoy buqre elle bictal daro qida» iyye.
Qaskarak kaadu mango qaskaray qeebih bical tanihiyya luk yen. A qaskarih migaq kee qaada Yaqiiyal kee Maqseyaahu deqsita namma numih gabat yen. Ken nammayih amo wagitiyyi qaadaa, kaadu Cananya deqsita numuy malik awlaytittek numuk teenah yanihiyyah gabat yen.
Qaskarak abbobtih yan mari mangah namma alfi kee lica boolih num akkuk yen.
Ta qaskarih abbobti amri elle luk ten qaskar mangah sidiica bool kee malcina alfi kee koona boolih qaskariita akkuk ten. Oson malik carbil catoonuh cayla leeh, qaskariino-baritto abe suge marak sugte.
Quddiyya silaacak gob kee macaxuuy amot haan birti-kalabtaay birta isinnik edde waasan birtak bicsen kameesiiy gayse kee gaysê-xaylo kee wanxefit qidoonu waan xeetik ken yitkiyeh yen.
Silac kaah bicsa maray kaxxa ixxiga lehiyya Yarusalaam-magaalat marot heen gasoh amol, allaak yamaate mara akak yablen fayya-le-qarwa kee, too gaso akak makkinta aroocaak qidoonu waan gaysê-xaylo kee kaxxa xeet qiddu wayta wanxefih-siba bicsen. Quddiyya Yallak gee cato luk yeneeh, tonna-leemiik migaq kulli ikkel kaak yontoobbeeh; kaxxa cayla-li yekke.
Tonna'mmay qandeh lafitak elle lafitak maacise ikkal, kaxxiina xagarat kaak gacteeh; toh baati kaah xalte. YALLAY kay Dagelta kinnihiyya kaa akah amrise weem abeeh; YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril qaydarus elle qeerisan mansaf gexxa 'yeh qaydarus qeerise.
Qadarya kee bacra-tabanih seekiy meysi sinnihiyya tah abah kaa yublen waqdi, tokke gexxa 'yeeniih,
«Aham maabin, Quddiyyaw» kaak iyyen. «Aham ku taama hinna, YALLAH qaydarus qeerisaanam koo wagintam hinna» kaak iyyen. Qagseenik kaak iyyeenimih, «A taama abtaamih cakki lem, dagaak Haaruunuk rade marak tan. Akkel qaydarus rubteemih YALLIH naqabu isil oobisse. A taahirik yan aracak eweq. Tahak wadir YALLI barkat koo waysiisele» kaak iyyen.
Toh kaak iyyen waqdi, Quddiyya Qibaadâ-Qarik qaydarus elle qeerisan mansafal xaqul soolak yeneeh, qaydarus elle qeerisan girgira gabat abbaxuk yen. Seekay toh kaak intehiyya yinqibeeh; tonna-leemiik, too waqdiik qansal kaak kaxxam gibdi biyaakay arab yakmehiyya kaak yewqe.
Too waqdi Qadarya kee raqte seeka aham tubleeh; «Qibaadâ-Qarik xayuk eweq» axcuk kaa yiysissiken. Quddiyya kaadu YALLIH digaala yuble waqdi, sissikuk yewqe.
Tohuk wadir rabba 'yam fanah a dalkah sabbatah taahirik manannaay, Qibaadâ-Qari culaamak waasot yen. Tonna leemik sinaamak baxsimeh dibuk yan qarit yeneeh; kay baxay Yootam deqsitahiyya kay aftok baaxo xiinisak yen.
Nabi Yasaqya ahak kalihimiy usuk abehiyya yuktube.
Quddiyya rabe saaku malik nasab le mara edde yaaguqen kabrit kaa maagaqinnon. Takkay immay too kabrih xaqul kaa yoogoqen. Toh akah abeenimii, Yalli kaal ruube dalkah sabbata. Kay lakal kay baxi malik yekke. Migaaqah Yootam deqsitak yen.

Yootam malik yekke saaku qumrik labaatanna kee koona sanatat yen. Yarusalaam magaalal taban kee lica liggida malikih suge. Kay ina Yaruusa deqsitta barrak ten. Tet abba Saaduk deqsita numuk ten.
Yootam isi abbak kaxxih, YALLI kicna taama abak yen. Takkay immay kay abba akah abe innah, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril qaydarus maqeerisinna. Takkay immay ummat dambi abittok maadayinna.
YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih kiblati-kabih culmah arac xissem, Yootamak ten. Yarusalaam magaalak Qoofal deqsita aracal sugte gasot, mango taama edde abtem, kaak ten.
Yuudâ qaleelal magaalooli xise. Garbo le baaxol kaadu xeri ikkek tamaatem akak yablen fayya-le-qarwa kee megdebitte xise.
Qammon malik kee kay qaskarat, kaa kee kay mara qeebi abteeh; too qeebil keenik yeyseenih. Qeebil keenik yeysek wadir, qusuur ken mekelsiise. Sidiica sanatak kulli sanatal sidiica alfi kee affara boolih kiilo lakqok kaah acayuk sugen. Kamadik alfih tonni kaah acayuk sugen. Alfih tonni kaadu gabru deqsitta darok kaah acayuk sugen.
Yootam YALLAY kay Dagelta kinnihiyyal kaxxa imaan heeh, YALLI aba iyyem abak yen. Tonna-leemiik cayla Yalli kaah yecee.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Malik Yootam abba heehiyyak usuk abe carbi yanuu, kay xinto tanuu, reedda 'yeemiy rabba 'yam fan abba heem, ‹‹Israayil kee Yuudâ Malikwah Aydaada›› deqsita kitaabal tan.
Malik yekke saaku qumrik labaatanna kee koona sanatat yeneeh; taban kee lica sanat Yarusalaamal malikih suge.
Yootam rabe saaku, Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatal malikwâ-buxah mara edde yaaguqen magaqat kaa yoogoqen. Kay baxi-Acad kay aracal malik yekke.

Acad malik yekke saaku qumrik labaatanni karmat yen. Yarusalaam magaalah addal taban kee lica sanat malikih suge. Takkay immay isi kaxxa abba Malik Dawud raatat gexak masuginnay, YALLI niqba taamat asak suge.
Duma sugte Israayil amoytiitik kaxxih, Yalli niqbam abak suge. Baqal deqsittaamay Yallih aftok yaqbudeenihiyyah weelol birtak bicse.
Hinnom deqsitta golol gabat bicsen duyyeh qaydarus qeerisak suge. Kaadu girat isi xaylo sadgatah qide. Woh akah abem, Israayil-mari yamaateemik naharal woo baaxol suge maray YALLI yeyyeeqehiyyak raaqisen umâ-yabulih tan qaadah gabbaaqiyyak ten.
Diini maleela qibaada elle abta aroocakaa, koomaamih amo takkuu, silal le cooxih guba takku, too aroocal Acad sadgatah saq elle qidaah, qaydarus elle qeerisak suge.
Usuk abah yan dambih, YALLAY kay Dagelta kinnihiyya Suuriyah malik kaat ugse. Too malik qeebil kaak yeyseeh, sarrak too malik Yuudâ-marak mangom seewah Damasko fan gabat bee. Tonnah kaadu, Israayil malikiy Ramalyaahû-Fekac deqsitahiyya kaat ruubeeh; too malik Yuudâ-qaskaray kaxxa agiirah tenehiyyak bool kee labaatanni alfih num inki ayroh addat qide. YALLI tah keenil akah baahem, kaay oson akak raden ken kaxxa abbobti doorehiyya cabba heenih dambi le taamat asak sugeenimih sabbata.
Dikri deqsita qaskariitay Israayilik yemeetehiyya, malikik baxah yan numuy migaaqah Maqseyaahu deqsitahiyya kee malik buxah xintok abbah yen Qadrikam deqsita num kee Elkaana deqsita numuy malikik elle oobaanahiyya qide.
Yuudâ mari ramad keenih le marak tene'mmay, tohuhuu, Israayil qaskar keenik urru kee agabuk namma boolih alfi takkem xabba hayteh casbih keenik beyte. Too mara Samaariya fanah been. Tohuk kalah mango duyye dannabah keenik orbisen.
Samaariyah magaalal Qooded deqsita num yen. Too num YALLIH nabik yen. Too nabi, a qaskar Samaariyah magaala tuduure waqdi, keenit matra'gidih yemeete. Too nabi keenik iyyeemih, «YALLAY isin akak radden sin kaxxa abbobti doorehiyya Yuudâ-mara yinqibeh sugeeh, tonna-leemiik sin gabat ken qide. Takkay immay isin keenit abten uma qidim, a saaku Yalla fan gufe.
A saaku Yuudâ-rasu kee Yarusalaam magaalal agabu kee labhak rabak raqtem isinni naqoosa abtaanam faxxan. Tonnal hay, isin isinnih, YALLIH garil dambit ase mara takkeenim siinih matambullaa?
Taway hay, siinik axceemihii, YALLIH naqbi siinil oobaamak. ama maray seewah tabbixeenihiyya sin tooboko kinnim ixigga hayteenih, ken baaxo fanah ken ruuba» keenik iyye.
Tohuk wadir Efrayim abbobtik Yahoocanán-Qadarya kee Masilleemót-Barkiyya kee Sallúm-Yahidkiya kee Cadláy-Qamaasa deqsitta labha, titta geyya hayteh, Israayil maray carbik andabbuk sugehiyyat matarra 'yeenih,
«A maray seewah orbiseenihiyya gacisaay, YALLIH garil dambi nel takku waytaamat maasina. Duma abne dambi nee xiqahak, YALLIH naqbi nel oobeh yaniih; gersi dambi net moosisinna» keenik iyyen.
Toh keenik iyyen waqdi, qaskar abbobti seewah abbaxuk sugen mara kee, dannabah beenih sugen duyye, doolat-abbobti kee ummat elle gaabowte aracal cabeenih.
Taaxige Efrayim-abbobti seewah abbaxuk sugen mara rubsusaanak duma, qasunuk suge mara keenik dannabah been duyyek sarisen. Sartanaay ibi kabeeliiy leek-maaqo kee dayla keenih yeceen. Boolaateh suge mara danoonal hayya heenih ruuben. Too maray seewah orbiseenih sugeenihiyya Yerikô-magaalay nakliita caxa elle tanihiyyal ken mari elle suge aracah fan ken gacsen. Isinnih Samaariyah magaalay akak yemeeteenihiyya fanah yuduuren.
Edom mari qagteh yemeeteeh, Yuudâ-marat qeebi aben. Sinam seewah been. Too saaku Malik Acad Assuuriyah malikik, «Yoo cata» 'yaanamih farmo ruube.
Filistiin mari kaadu Yuudâ rasuk gabbi-qaxat raaqa rakaakay kee ayrô-culmat raqta mango koomaami le baaxol tan magaalooli wararen. Ta mari, Beet-Semes kee Ayyalon kee Gadeerot deqsitta magaalooli qeebit xabbaay isinni gabat raaqissa heen. Tonnah kaadu, Sooko kee Timna kee Gimdo deqsitta magaalooli kee ken dariifal sugte gaandoodi edde yibbixen. Sarra, wokkel elle nooken.
YALLI, Malik Acad sabbatah, Yuudâ-mara sinaamak gaca mara abe. Malik Acad YALLAL imaan sinni num sugeeh; isih leh yan umaane Yuudâ-marat tabseeh; too mari kay gita kataatak suge.
Tiglat-Fileeser deqsita Assuuriyah malikiy usuk farmo akah ruubehiyya yemeeteh immay, usuk kaak faxe cato hinnay, gibdaabina kaal baahe.
Acad, tuxxiq le duyyek malik elle gaca dabqal sugtem kee, kay gubal taamita mari luk sugem kee, tonnah kaadu, YALLIH Qibaadah Qaril sugtem beyya heeh Assuuriyah malikih yecee. Takkay immay tohut catoh tu magenna.
Too saaku too gadaamah addat anuk, YALLA kassa mahannaay; umaane kaak dumak lafitteh.
Too waqdi, Acad isi bagul «A mara qeebil cattem, Suuriyah mari yaqbude yallak tanih tanikii, sadgat oson yaqbuden yallah abaama» 'yaanam heeh; qeebil akah gacem, a duyye yuqbudem kinnim yeegemeh. Damaskoh mari yalla axcuk yaqbude duyyeh sadgat abe. Takkay immay too duyyeh qibaada kaa kee Yuudâ-marah baati xalte.
Acad kaadu YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril sugte duyye wokkek beeh, rike-rikeh kureeh, Qibaadâ-Qarih afoofi alfe. Yarusalaam magaalah gitittek xaqul sadgat elle aban arooca xise.
Sadgat elle abaana'gidih, Yuudal enna 'ta magaaloolil duyye elle yaqbuden aroocay fayya lehiyya xise. YALLAY kaak duma usuk akak rade kay kaxxa abbobti doorehiyyah naqabu isil oobise.
A malik abeh yan taamak ahak kalih qaadoodi, ‹Yuuda kee Israayil Malikwah Aydaada› deqsita kitaabal tan.
Rabe saaku kaa elle yoogoqeenim, Yarusalaam addak ten. Takkay immay malikwa edde haan kabrit kaa mahannon. Kay lakal kay baxi malik yekke. Kay migaq Ciskiyyaahu deqsitak yen.

Ciskiyyaahu qumrik labaatanna kee konooyut yan saaku Yuudâ-malik yekke. Yarusalaamal labaatanna kee sagla sanatah malikih suge. Kay ina Abiyya deqsitak teneeh; Zakariyyak baxák ten.
Usuk isi kaxxa abba Malik Dawuduk kaxxih, YALLI kicna taamat asak yen.
Ciskiyyaahu malik edde yekke sanatal, sanatak naharsi alsat YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari akak culan iro le kabut raqta culmah alfintitte fakka heeh bicsiise.
Qibaadah-Qarih daaratak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqa aracal seeka kee Leewi-mara gaaboyse.
Tokkel ken lih yaabeh keenik iyyemii, «Isin Leewî-maraw, siinik axcem yok oobbeya. Taahirik isinni haa; YALLAY sin kaxxa abbobti doorehiyya elle yaqbuden qari taahirroysa. Kay Qibaadah-Qari wassakossa haytam inkih wokkek kala.
Ni kaxxa abbobti YALLAY ni Dageltah yanihiyyal luk ten imaan cabeeniih; YALLI anqibinnaanim abak sugen. YALLA hawweeneeniih, kaa elle yaqbuden aracat darre caben.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih afa alfeenih, addal sugte faanuswa bargusen. Qibaadâ-Qarih addal qaydarus qeerisaanam kee cararisen sadgat yeceenim cabeenih.
Tonna-leemiik YALLI, Yuuda kee Yarusalaam magaalah marat bagcarriteeh; usuk keenil baahem kulli numut axaxo kee cunxo qidde. Isin ahim digga haytan.
Ni abbobti carbit rabteeh, ni agabu kee xaylo seewah been.
«Anu taway YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya net bagcarrite waa'gidih, bica kaa'lih abam faxa.
Yi xayloy, tamahat isissika. YALLI kay taamat gacoonuuy, kay qibaada elle aban aracal taamitoonuuy, tonnah kaadu sadgat kaah xayyoosoonuh doorem siini» keenik iyye.
Too saaku too gaabownal
Kohat gulubuk Qamaasay baxi Macat kee
Qadarya baxi Ayyuqelik ten.
Maraari-gulubuk kaadu, Qabdi baxi Kees kee
Yahalleleel baxi Qadarya sugte.
Gerson gulubuk kaadu, Dimma baxi Yowac kee
Yowac baxi Qadan sugte.
Alixafan gulubuk kaadu, Simri kee Yaqwel sugte.
Asaf gulubuk tonnah, Zakariyya kee Mattanya sugte.
Heeman gulubuk kaadu, Yahuwel kee Simqi sugte.
Yedutun gulubuk Samaqya kee Quddiyeel sugte.
Ta mari isi innah yan Leewih yooboke marah daffeyna hee. Aham keenih warseenih isinni kaadu taahirroyseenih. Sarrak malik keenik akah inxicca 'ye innah, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari taahirroyseenih. Tohim Yallih xinto inte innal aben.
Seeka YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari taahirrossa'gidih, Qibaadâ-Qarih adda culteeh; taahir sinnuk sugtem inkih, woo Qarih addak daarat fanah yeyyeeqen. Leewî mari too duyye inkih tokkek magaalak iroh Kidroon golo fan been.
Wohimih taama qimbiseenim, sanatak naharsi alsak naharsi ayrok ten. Bacarhaytoh ayro woo Qibaadah Qarih adda akak culan naharsi goli taahirroysaana'gidih yemeeten. Gersi bacra ayroh gide kaadu taahirroysiyya abak sugeeniih, sarrak tittat taban kee laca ayrot taahirroysiyyak gaba kaleenih, too Qari qibaadah bical heen.
Leewî mari Malik Ciskiyyaahuk iyyemii, «Inkih yan YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari taahirrosne. Sadgat elle aban arac kee edde aban duyye kaadu taahirrosneh. Tonnah kaadu, taahirroysen-gaqambo elle haan miiz kee elle xayyoosan duyye taahirrosne.
Malik Acad Yalla cine saaku beeh suge duyye gacisneh. Too duyye inkih Yallih taamah gacisne. Woo duyye inkih YALLIH sadgat elle aban mansafih foocal hayne» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi Malik Ciskiyyaahu sissikuk gexxa 'yeh, magaalak saqoltih yan marah seeceeh; too mari titta lih gacca 'yeenih, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari fan gexen.
Malik buxah marih dambi kaloot kee, Yuudâ-marih dambi kaloot takke'gidiiy, tonnah kaadu, Qibaadah-Qarih-taahirroysiyyah sadgatah yasguudeeni'gidih, malcina awur kee malcina maruwuuy malcina anaqtu kee malcina dabeela yusguuden. Too waqdi malik wokkel sugte seekay Haaruunuk raddehiyyak iyyemii, «Isin ama saq, sadgat elle aban aracal YALLIH migaaqal sadgatah usguuda» keenik iyye.
Too waqdi too seeka naharat awurwa tusguudeeh, sarrak kaadu marwa tusguudeeh, lakal anaaqe tusguude. Usgudda heen saqak inkih, qabala ummattâ-dambi kalootuh, woo sadgat elle aban aracal rifen.
Sarrak, woo dabelwa malik kee wokke qibaadah yemeete mara fan beeniih; woo mari woo dabelwak xagaral gaba rubbu heen.
Too waqdi seeka woo wadar tusguudeh. Malik, «Cararisan sadgat kee dambi-kaloot-sadgat Israayil marah inkih aba» 'yaanam iyyeemih sabbatah, woo wadarih qabala woo sadgat elle aban aracal caxen.
Malik Ciskiyyaahu, Gaad deqsita nabiy YALLI Malik Dawuduh ruubehiyya kee nabi Naatan Malik Dawuduk ab axcuk sugtem abe. Ciskiyyaahu, Leewî mara kirar kee *begena digirak, giyaagib aagaruk, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal hee.
Woo mari, Malik Dawud gabat luk yen duyyey Yalla faylisan waqdi yaagureeni gabat heen. Seeka gabat *baanta luk, ken garik solte.
Too waqdi Ciskiyyaahu, «Cado akak cararisan saq sadgatah xayyoosa» iyye. Woo sadgatih duyye yusguuden waqdi, saare abe mari YALLA faylise. Saareh yaaguren duyye yaagure mari kaadu baanta kee saareh yaaguren duyye yoogoren.
Toh abak sugen waqdi, wokkel suggu 'ye mari inkih baaxok bagul Yallih qibaadah gommoh raden. Cararisan sadgat cararra 'yam fan, YALLIH saare aba mari saare abak sugeeh; baanta kee gersi duyye yaagure mari tonnah, too duyye aagaruk suge.
Too waqdi Malik Ciskiyyaahu kee raqqa 'ye mari inkih gulubuh gacca 'yeh YALLA yuqbuden.
Malik kee baaxoh abbobti, Leewî marak, «Malik Dawud kee nabi Asaf tuktube YALLIH saare aba» iyyen. Too mari inkih gulubuh gacca 'yeh ruffa axcuk too saare abeeniih, YALLA yuqbuden.
Sarrak Ciskiyyaahu ummattak iyyeemih, «Isin away taahirrowteenihik, YALLAH fayla elle gacissan sadgat baaha» keenik iyye. Too mari too amri oggoleh baaheeh; gersi mari kaadu, «Baaha» keenik axce'kal, sadgatah cararisan duyye isinnil yeexegeenih baahen.
Awurwak malcina-tabanaay marwak booluuy illi-xaylok namma bool takkem cararisan sadgatah baahen.
Toh lih kaadu laca boolih awur kee, sidiica alfi yakke illi kee wadaray cado akak yakmeeni sadgatah baahen.
Mangah woo saq inkih tasguude seeka wokkel masuginnaay; tonna-leemiik Leewî mari woo saq inkih usgudda haanam fan kee gersi seeka taahirih gactam fan masgaadal seeka catak sugen. Leewî mari imaanak gexxaamah, seekak fula taahirik isinni abbaxuk sugen.
Woo sadgatah baahan mango saq cararisaanam luk, seeka qinabak bicsen kamriy woo sadgat lih baahaanahiyya sadgat elle aban aracal caxaanam kee, amaanah xiinaanamih astah qidan sadgatah baahan saqih xayta carrisaanamih taama luk yenen.
Tonnal abak Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril duma abak sugen qibaada nammeyhaak qimbisen.
Malik Ciskiyyaahu kee ummatta, Yalli a taama xayih gabal keenik bicseemih sabbatah, kaxxam ruffu iyyen.

Ummatta Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiid naharsi alsay kaa elle abeh meqehiyyat abaanam maduudinnon. Woh akah takkem, seekak faxxintah gide taahirik masuginnaay; tonnah kaadu Yarusalaamal mango mari gaabooweh masuginna. Tonna-leemiik Malik Ciskiyyaahu kee kay gubal taamita mara kee raqqa 'te ummatta, woo qiid ciggiila alsat abaanamat caben. Too waqdi Malik Ciskiyyaahu inkih tan Israayil kee Yuudah ummattah farmo ruube. Efrayim kee Manasse kedoh meqe innal yuktube warkat ruubeeh iyyeemih, «Yarusalaamal yan YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyah nabna edde kassinna Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiid abna'gidih ama» 'yaanam keenih yuktube.
Malik kee raqqa 'te ummatta ahamah aben mala isinnik nabam yossokooten.
Tonna-leemiik inkih tan Israayil ummattay kilbat le kabuk Daan deqsita rasul taniiy gabbi-qaxak kaadu Bersabaq deqsitta magaalal tanihiyyak num raaqe'kal, Muusal obte xinto elle inta innal, woo qiidih asaana'gidih, duma akkuk amaatuk sugeenimik manguk akah yamaaten innah, farmo keenih ruuben.
Farmoh ruuben mari, malik kee malik gubal taamita mari keenik elle iyye innal, inkih tan Yuuda kee Israayil rasu gexeeniih; yuktuben warkat akriyuk, keenik iyyeenimih,
«Israayil maraw, YALLAY Abraahim kee Iscaakaay Yaqkuub doorehiyyal uduura; toh abteenik, siiniy away Assuuriyah marih gabak cate mara kinnihiyyal aduurele.
Sin kaxxa abbobti kee sin innah yan Israayil mari akah suge innal, YALLAY sin kaxxa abbobti doorehiyyal imaan sinni mara makkina. Isin akah tablen innah, YALLI wohuh ken uma'nnah digaaleh.
Oson akah sugen innal, aabbe cina mara makkinay; YALLIH amri oggola. Away Yarusalaamal yan Qibaadah-Qariy YALLI kulli way taahir abehiyyal ama. YALLIH bagcarrak cattintaana'gidih, kaay sin Dagelta kinnihiyya uqbuda.
YALLAL tuduureenik, sin mara seewah bee mari keenih xuwaaweleeh, isinni buxah yaduuroonay ken axcelon. YALLI maqaane kee racmatta le Yallaay; kaal tuduureenik, sin oggolele» 'yaanamih farmo keenit waden.
Farmoh ruuben mari too farmo Efrayim kee Manassê-kedoh rasul tan magaalooli kee Dablon kedoh rasuk kaadu kilbat le kabuh amma 'yaanam yakke marah inkih warsen. Takkay immay too mari too farmo yoobbe waqdi, asal kee furkacatah ken haysite.
Takkay immay Aaser kee Manasse kee Dablon kedoh addak tu yakke maray YALLAH rammitehiyya gexe. Too mari farmo oggoleh Yarusalaam fan gexe.
Yalli, Yuudah ummatta titta geyya hayteh usuk faxam abtuuy, malik kee malik gubal yan marih amri edde duudussa digga keenit hee.
Nammeyhaytoh alsat Kamiir-Sinni-Gaqamboh Qiid abaana'gidih, Yarusalaamal mango mari gaaboowe.
Woo mari, Yarusalaamal sugga 'te mansafittey sadgat elle abak sugeenihiyya kee, tonnah kaadu, qaydarus elle qeerisak sugen mansafitte inkih beyya heenih Kidroon-Goloh addat qiden.
Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiid edde aben nammeyhaytoh alsak taban kee fereyhaytoh ayro, qiddi sadgatah marqa qiden. Seeka kee Leewî-marak taahirik keenik suge wee mari wohut wacarriyeeh, tonna-leemiik isinni taahirik hayya heenih, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih fooca le kabul cararisen sadgat baahen.
Too waqdi Muusay Yallih num kinnih xinto elle inta innal, Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril kulli way elle gacoonu waan arac haysiten. Leewî-mari sadgatah qiden saqih qabala seekal yeceeniih; seeka woo qabala sadgat elle xayyoosan aracal caxxe.
Mango mari taahirik manannaay; tonna-leemiik sadgatah baahen saq qidaanam maduudinnon. Tohih sabbatah Leewî-mari woo saq keenih yusguude.
Toh lih kaadu Efrayim kee Manasseey Issakar kee Dablon kedoh yooboke mari taahirik suge weemih sabbatah, Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiidih maaqo, kitaabal elle ane wayta innal, yokmen. Malik Ciskiyyaahu too marah Yalla kallaceeh iyyeemih, «YALLAW, ni kaxxa abbobti doore Dageltaw, a mari taahirik ane waamah isinni baguuk koo yuqbudeemih sabbatah, isih lito maqaanet qafu keenih ab» iyye.
YALLI, Ciskiyyaahu abe dooqa oggoleh. YALLI wohuk qafu keenih abeeh, tu keenil mabaahinna.
Kamiir-Sinni-Gaqamboh Qiidih Yarusalaamal gaaboowe mari woo qiidit malcina ayroh gide farci luk assakaxxuk sugen. Leewî-mara kee seeka kulli ayro YALLA baguuk faylisak sugte. Saareh yaaguren duyye kaadu meqe'nnal yoogoren.
Ciskiyyaahu, Leewî-mari YALLIH qibaadah taama elle aban innah ixxiga loonum keenik yuble waqdi, wohul ken fayliseh.
Malcina ayroh gide amaanah xiinaanamih astah qidan sadgat abakaay YALLA faylisak sugeenik sarra,
kaadu aki malcina ayro qiidih asaanamal malsen. Tonnal ruffa axcuk aben.
Malik Ciskiyyaahu woo mari yakme'gidih, alfi awur kee illiiy wadarak kaadu tittat malcina alfih gide keenih baahe. Tonnah kaadu, malik gubal taamita doolat mari, alfi awur kee illiiy wadarak kaadu tittat tabna alfi takkem keenih baahen. Seekah mangom taahirrowte.
Tonna-leemiik Yuudah ummattaay seekaay Leewî-maraay kilbat le kabuk yemeete mara kee gersi baaxoh maray Israayil kee Yuudâ baaxol dabqih yenehiyya inkih ruffu iyyen.
Yarusalaam magaalah mari Dawud baxah yen Suleeman dabaanaak wadiril, annah tanim yubleh masuginnaay; tonna-leemiik kaxxam ruffa iyyen.
Leewî-mara kee seeka a qiidih yemeete marat barkat gaca'gidih, Yalla kallacen. Too dooqa Yalli dabqih elle yan qaraanaak, keenik yoobbeehiiy keenik oggoleh.

Qiid gaba kalek lakal, tokkel suge Israayil mari yakkeemiik, Yuudâ rasul enna 'ta magaalooli fanah gexeeniih, taahirik tan qamidwa akak iyyan qamidway xeetik bicseenihiyya yiggiggileh. Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurumuuda bututtukku heeniih, sadgat elle aban arooca kee Yalla maleela qibaada elle abak sugte aroocay fayyat raqtahiyya bayseenih. Raqqa 'te Yuudah-baaxol inkih tonnah tanim abeeniih; tohuk kalah kaadu, Benyam kee Efrayimiiy Manassê rasul inkih, tonnah tanim aben. Tohuk gaba kalen waqdi, isinni buxaaxih yuduuren.
Ciskiyyaahu, seeka kee Leewî mara mango ikkel kurra heeh, kulli marahaay aboonu waan rikek tan taama keenil yecee. Tohumuu, cararisan sadgat xayyoosaanam kee, laa kee illi mattacoy amaanah xiinaanamih astah qidaanahiyya xayyoosaanamaay, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal aban qibaadat yangaleenimiiy, woo Qibaadah-Qarik mango culmal Yallah fayla kee candu gacsaanam taamah keenih yecee.
Ciskiyyaahu isi illi kee wadarak, kulli maaca kee magrib waqla, cararisan sadgatah qidan saq acayuk yeneeh; tohuk kalah kaadu sabti ayroh qiid kee alsi bila saakih qiidiiy; tonnah kaadu gersi qiidway Yallih xintol tanihiyyah inkih sadgatah saq acayuk yen.
Malik Ciskiyyaahu kaadu Yarusalaamal yan marak iyyeemih, «Seeka kee Leewî-mari kulli waqdi Yallih xinto aba inta taamat akah gacan innah, keenih taguude galto keenih baaha» iyye.
Yarusalaam mari toh yoobbe waqdi, sissikuk darok tayse daro kee qinabaay saliidiiy malab kee buqreh addal ubukka 'ye murtik tayse exxa keenih yeceen. Tonnah kaadu, isinnih luk suggu 'yeenimik taban haytoh af inkih keenih yeceen.
Yuudâ magaaloolil suggu 'ye mari isinnih luk sugen laa kee illik taban haytoh af kaadu keenih yeceen. Toh lih kaadu, YALLIH migaaqal mattacoh rikeek daaniseenih sugen duyyek taban haytoh af keenih yeceen. Too duyye ittin amol haak koomâ-gide aben.
A mattacoh macuw sidochaytoh alsa tekke saaku baahaanam qimbiseenih, affara alsa baahak sugen.
Malik Ciskiyyaahu kee kay gubal taamita mari, mattacok tontocowweh gide yublen waqdi, YALLA fayliseeniih kay mara kaadu fayliseenih.
Malik, seeka kee Leewî-mara «Mattacok sittin bagul haak koomâ-gide akah raqtem macaay?» ken essere waqdi,
Saadukuk rade kaxxa seekiy migaaqah Qadarya deqsitahiyya kaak iyyemii, «Ummatta mattaco YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari bahteemih sabbatah, maaqok duddam taniih fultem kaadu elle tan. YALLI isi marat barkat heemih sabbatah, taham inkih raqteh tan» iyye.
Tonna-leemiik Malik keenik elle iyye innal, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril duyye edde daanisan arac bicseeniih;
ummatta elle haytaamak mattaco kee tabanhaytoh af tokket daanah keenih hayte. Too duyyek dacayrih abbah Konanyaahu deqsita Leewih yooboke num heeniih; kay gubal kay toobokoytay migaaqah Simqi deqsitahiyya heen.
Ken gubal taamitu waa Leewih yooboke labhak tabna num heen. Woo mari migaaqah Yaciyel kee Qadadyaahu kee Nacat kee Qasahel kee Yerimot kee Yoodabad kee Alyel kee Yismakyaahu kee Macat kee Banaaya deqsita marak ten. Tah inkih absissem, Malik Ciskiyyaahu kee sek Qadarya deqsita kaxxa seekih yen numuk ten.
Leewih yooboke Imna deqsita numih baxay migaaqah Koore deqsita Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta afa dacrisak yeneeh; Yallih migaaqal baahan mattaco kee wohim elle kuran innih abbootan usuk luk yen.
Gersi magaalooliy seeka elle sugtehiyyal too taamal Leewih yooboke mari meqe'nnah kaa cate. Too maray kaa catehiyya migaaqah Qadan kee Minyaamin kee Yaasuwa kee Samaqya kee Amarya kee Sekanya deqsitak yen. Oson, keenik taama elle tani'nnal, keenik kaxxih Leewih yooboke marak qunxam kee kaxxaamak tu raaqe'kal, maaqo missal keenih meklen.
Oson labhak karmak soddomut yan mara kee wohuk fula le maray Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addah taama kulli saaku luk yenehiyyah, oson luk yenen taamah caddol, inkih ken afto keenih yecee.
Seeka isi taama gulub-gulubul baxsimma 'teh abak sugteeh; Leewih yooboke marah tu gactekiiy, qumrik labaatanna gufeenik sarra, butta-buttah gacca 'yeenih abak sugen. Too marah inkih ken afto yecee.
Oson yakkeenimik, isinni kee isinni xaylooy agabu migooqa isinnik yuktubeenih; toh akah abeenim, woo mari inkih imaanak gexxaamah taahirik isinni abbaxuk sugeenimik ten.
Tonnah kaadu, too mari ken magaaloolik dariifal tan gaandoodil sugte seekay Haaruun abuusat loowoh yanihiyya kee, Leewî-kedoh yooboke maray migaq akak yunkuttubehiyyah inkih maaqo yaceenimih taama luk yen.
Ciskiyyaahu inkih tan Yuudâ-baaxol YALLAY kay Dagelta kinnihiyya kicnaah kay garil cakkik loowinta taamah taamite.
Usuk, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih abba haa taama kee Yallih xinto elle inta'nnal abe taama inkih, isi Dageltah baguuk abak yeneeh; kalah kaadu Yallih qibaadat dibuk yan numuk ten. Tohuk gexxaamah abinnaan taama inkih missat kaah gacte.

Ciskiyyaahu Yallah ahim baguuk abak sugek sarra, Assuuriyah malikiy Sanceerib deqsitahiyya Yuudâ-rasu warare. Gaso maroh edde ten magaaloolit maro hayya heeh sarrak, qaskarak, «Woo magaalat maroh tan gasoosak iggilaay addah cula» iyye.
Ciskiyyaahu, Sanceerib Yarusalaam yabbixem faxam yuble waqdi,
kaa kee kay gubal taamita mari magaalak irol sugte buyyitte inkih alfeeh, darah oobak sugte lee kaadu oobe kale. Woh akah abeenim, Yarusalaam magaala xayyowwa haan waqdi lee akah gee waan innah keenik aben. Malik Ciskiyyaahuh gubal taamita, mari mango mara is lih hayya heeh, magaalak iroh gexxa leelwah raceynaani inkih alfeenih. Tohuk gexxaamah lee magaalak afah gexak maraaqinna.
Sarrak Ciskiyyaahu magaalat maroh tan gasoosa yuqusbuuseeh; woo gasoosah amol fayya le aroocay xeri'kkel tanim akak yableenihiyya bicse. Kalah kaadu magaalat qusba gasoosa maroh hee. Too magaalah koosit tonnal abe. Yarusalaamak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta baaxoy ramma luk sugtehiyyal burtak kibakaay, koositih xiseenih sugen arooca yuqusbuuseh. Toh lih kaadu gob kee silaacak mangom bicsiise.
Ciskiyyaahu kaadu, magaalal yen mari ken abbootanih gubat gacoonuh, qaskar abbobti doore. Too marah inkih magaalak culmak bacarih yan aracal seeco abeeh, tannah axcuk ken agiirisak yen. Keenik iyyeemih,
«Abtaanamal digga 'xicaay agaagul akak caba; Assuuriyah malik kee usuk miraacisa qaskarak mameysitinaay niya haysita. Kay qaxat yan marak ni qaxat yan mari qandeh yayse.
Usuk catoh sahdaytu leeh; nanu catoh YALLAY ni Dageltah yani lino. Ni aftok qeebi neh abtu waytam kaa» keenik iyye. Ummatta ken malik a yaabat yaabam toobbe waqdi niya keenit gacte.
Sanceerib kee kay qaskar Laakis deqsitta magaalal yanin waqdi, ahak gubal tan farmo Ciskiyyaahu kee Yuudâ maray Yarusalaam magaalal kaa lih yanihiyyah ruube. Farmoh ruube abbobti keenik inteemih,
«Assuuriyah malikih yan Sanceerib siinik iyyaamah: Yarusalaam magaalay maro edde haynek addal yan maraw, amo elle miqtoonum macaay?
Ciskiyyaahu, ‹YALLAY ni Dageltah yanihiyya Assuuriyah malik le qandek nee catele› siinik iyya'mmay, numma makkalina. Ciskiyyaahu sin ganam faxaah, bakar kee qululuh rabtaanam siinik faxa.
Yallih sadgat elle aban arooca kee diyaarah arooca bayisseeh; sarrak Yuuda kee Yarusalaam marak, ‹Qibaada kee qerto qeerisiyya dibuk inki aracal aba› intem kaa» keenik iyyen.
«Yi kaxxa abbobtih daban kee yi dabaanal mango baaxoh maral bahnem maabbitoonuu? Assuuriyah malikih gabak isi mara catte yallitte maay tan?
Ta gid takke baaxooxah yallitte ni gabak ken mara catte saaku maay lee? Hay tonnal, sin yalli sin catelem mannal siinit celtaa?
Ciskiyyaahu sin duquuruse waay, gitak sin ayyaaqe waay. Kay yab maamanina. Assuuriyah malikih gabak ahaydumah faxe baaxoh yalli sinam macatinna. Tonnah kaadu a sin yalli catoh siinih xiqu waam mali» 'yaanam keenik iyyen.
Assuuriyah malik ruube abbobti, Dageltah yan YALLA kee kay naqasuh yan malik Ciskiyyaahuk wohuk gactam iyyen.
Assuuriyah malik kaadu YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya elle xaafa warkat yuktube. Iyyemii, «Mango baaxoh yallitte isi mara yok macatinnaay, tonnah kaadu, Ciskiyyaahuh yalli isi mara yi gabak macata» 'yaanam yuktube.
Kay qaskar abbobti kaadu anay fayya haak Qibraan afat, gidaaral suge mari meysita'gidiiy niya keenik taddigille'gidih, magaala xayuk akah culan innah, tonnah tanim keenik iyyen.
Yarusalaam cata Yalla kee, gersi mari yalla iyyeh yaqbudeemiy gabak bicseeni, inki intit yublen.
Too waqdi Malik Ciskiyyaahu kee Amox baxa nabi Yasaqya Yalla kallaceeniih kaal weeqeeniih cato kaa esseren.
YALLI, malaykattu ruubeeh; woo malaykatti Assuuriyah qaskar abbobti kee qaskar qide. Assuuriyah malik tohut wacarriy kaa yibbixeeh, Assuuriya fan yuduure. Ayrok teena Assuuriyah malik, Yallih aftok yalla axcuk Yalla akke sinnim elle yaqbude qarih addal yan waqdi, kay xaylok tu seefit kaa qidde.
YALLI, Malik Ciskiyyaahu kee Yarusalaam mara, Assuuriyah malik kee gersi naqboytittek tonnal ken cate. Israayil ummatta ken cuggaaneh tan ummatta lih amaanah xiinise.
Mango mari Yarusalaam fan Yallah sadgat baahen. Ciskiyyaahuh kaadu tuxxiq le mattaco baahen. Tohuk gexxaamah too ayrook wadir, kulli rasih mari Ciskiyyaahu assakaxxayuk raaqen.
Toh edde tekke uddurut, Malik Ciskiyyaahu kaxxa biyaakah biyaakite. Rabi kaat xayyooweh suge. Too waqdi YALLA kallace. YALLI woo biyaakak qaffootu waam kaa taybulle asta kaah yecee.
Tonna'mmay Malik Ciskiyyaahu YALLI kaah abeemil, YALLAH candu gacsaamak kaxxiiniteeh; tonna-leemiik kay kaxxiinah sabbatah, YALLI kaa kee Yuuda kee Yarusalaam baaxoh marat bagcarrite.
Sarrak Ciskiyyaahu kee Yarusalaam mara YALLAH rammiteeniih; tonna-leemiik Ciskiyyaahu addunyal yanim fan YALLI woo ummatta madigaalinna.
Malik Ciskiyyaahu kaxxa gaddaali yekkeeh; ummatta kaxxam kaa tessekexxe. Dahab kee lakqooy bilqah haan xeetiy limo gibdihiyya kee caxâ-sifa akak inxicca 'yaanamaay goobwa kee kalah kaadu raqqa 'te duyye elle daanisan golitte bicsiise.
Toh lih kaadu, darooy, qinab xaylok bicsen kamri kee, caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti (saliid) inkih edde daanisan makdan bicsiiseh yen. Laa edde gaca arac rikeek luk yen. Tonnah kaadu illih hee gaso rikek luk yen.
Yalli kaxxam mango gadda kaa yeceeh yeneeh; tohih sabbatah mango magaalooli xiseeh, laa kee illiiy gersi midir xaame.
Ciskiyyaahu Gicoon buyyih leek daga raqta afa aliffa heeh, woo lee dagga hee caraatak Yarusalaam magaalah gidaarittek adda gacca 'teh darah akah gexxa innah abe numuk ten. Usuk abba heem inkih kay gabal bicteh.
Baabelon rasuk temeete farmoytit woo baaxol tekkeemiy duma suge waytehiyya esseraana'gidih yemeeten saakuuy kinnih, Yalli usuk kinni num yable'gidih, isih faxem abitay, kaa iyye.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Ciskiyyaahu abehiyya YALLAH abe qibaadah agantah, Amox-Yasaqya Yuble Wacyih Kitab kee, Yuuda kee Israayil Malikwah Aydaadih kitaabal tan.
Ciskiyyaahu rabe saaku malikwa elle yaaguqen aracak fayya le aracal kaa yoogoqen. Usuk rabe saaku inkih tan Yuudah ummatta kee Yarusalaam mari inkih kay magaqah massakaxxah yemeete. Kay aracal kay baxi Manasse malik yekke.

Manasse malik yekke saaku qumrik taban kee namma karmat yen. Sarrak Yarusalaam magaalal kontom kee koona sanatah malikih suge.
Manasse, Israayil-mari yamaateemik naharal woo baaxol suge maray YALLI yeyyeeqehiyya edde asak sugen umâ-yabulih-tan-taama kataateeh; YALLAL dambi lem baahe.
Kay abba Ciskiyyaahu bayseh suge aroocay diini-maleela qibaadah luk sugtehiyya wadir nammeyhaak bicse. Baqal elle yaqbudeeni'gidih sadgat elle aban arooca bicse. Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurumuuda soolise. Manasse cutuuka kaadu edde aqbuduk yen.
YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal, diini-maleela taqbudeemih sadgat elle aban arooca bicse. Woo sadgat arooca elle bicsem, YALLI duma, «Yarusalaamal kulli way yi qibaada elle takke'gidih doore araca» akak iyye aracak ten.
Qibaadâ-Qarih-gasok adda le kabuk namma daaratal inkih, cutuuka elle yaqbuden arac bicse.
Girat isi lab-xaylo sadgatah Hinnom-Goloh addal qide. Ramli qidiyya kee sicri taamah haysiteeh, ginnili kee kalluwallel takku-waytam essere. YALLAL kaxxa dambi lem baaheeh; YALLIH naqbi kay sabbatah lafitak lafte.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal gabak bicsen ceeloy yaqbudeenihiyya hee. Woo ceelo elle heem, Yalli Malik-Dawud kee Suleemanak, «Yi qibaada kulli way elle takke'gidih, Israayil taban kee namma kedo elle tan rasuk inkih Yarusalaam addak doore araca» akak iyye aracak ten.
Yalli Dawud kee Suleemanak iyyemii, «Israayil mari inkih Muusay yi naqasuh yanih gabat keenih ruube amri oggoleenih too xinto intam abeenik, ken kaxxa abbobtih ecee baaxok ken mayyaaqa» 'yaanam iyye.
Takkay immay Manasse, Yuudâ mara, duma woo baaxol suge maray YALLI ken taagah woo baaxok yeyyeeqehiyya abak sugen dambik lafita dambit ken asise.
YALLI, Manasse kee Manassê-marak, «Ahat maasina» 'yaanam iyyeh immay, oson woh moggolinnon.
Tonna-leemiik YALLI Assuuriyah qaskarih abbobti Yuudâ rasu akah yabbixen innah abe. Too mari Manasse yibbixeeniih, sanat santiita kaak hayyaay nacaasak bicsen silsilatat uxuyya kaa heenih, Baabelon rasu fan kaa been.
Tokkel too marih gabat biyaakite saaku, YALLAY kaak duma usuk akak rade kay kaxxa abbobti doorehiyyah rammiteeh, isi Dageltal yuduureeh catoh kaa kallace.
YALLI, Manasse abe dooqa oggoleeh, Yarusalaamal akah suge malikih gaca'gidih, Yarusalaam fan kaa gacse. Tohuk gexxaamah Manasse, YALLI dibuk Yalla kinnim yeexegeh.
Tohuk lakal Manasse, Dawud-Magaalak irol ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta baaxol goloh addal yan Gicoon buyyik xabba haanamaay Kullum-Culma deqsita arac kee, magaalak Qoofal deqsitta exxah deraafih amma 'yaanam tan baaxol sugte gasoosa yuqusbuuseeh; xexxaarah duma akah sugte innak fayya hee. Yuudâ-magaalooliy gasoosa maroh edde tanihiyyal inkih dacayrih qaskar-abbobti hee.
Yallih aftok aqbuduk suggu 'yen duyyeeya kee gabak bicsen ceeloy Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal isih heeh sugehiyya wokkek kaleh. Kalah kaadu, diini-maleela taqbudeemih sadgat elle aban aroocay Qibaadâ-Qari elle yan koomah amol tenee kee, tonnah kaadu, Yarusalaamak gersi aroocal tenehiyya wokkek kaleh. Woo duyye magaalak iroh eyyeqqa heeh baaxot qide.
YALLAH sadgat elle aben mansaf yuqusbuuseh. Tokkel amaanah xiinaanamih astah aban sadgoota kee YALLAH fayla elle gacsa sadgoota abe. Yuudâ-rasih marah inkih YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya uqbuda 'yaanamih amri yaceen.
Ummatta Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik kalih aroocay fayyat raqtahiyyal sadgat abak sugteh immay, YALLIH migaaqal abak sugen.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Manasse abehiyyak Yalla fan abe kallaci kee YALLIH migaaqal kaa'lih yabte nabuwwah qangor inkih Israayil-Malikwah-Aydaadih kitaabal tan.
Malik Manasse abe dooqa kee Yalli woo dooqa kaak elle oggole'nnaay; toobitaamak duma dambi kee umaanek abeh gide inkih Nabuwwah-Aydaada deqsita kitaabal yan. Usuk toobitaamak duma, bicsiiseh suge diini maleela qibaada elle abta aroocay fayyat raqtahiyyaay, Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurumuuda elle soolise arooca kee, gabak bicsen duyyeeyay yaqbudeenihiyya elle hee arooca inkih, kaadu woo kitaabal yan.
Manasse rabe saaku malikwâ-gasol kaa yoogoqen. Kay aracal kay baxay migaaqah Amon deqsitahiyya malik yekke.
Amon Yuudâ-rasul malik yekke saaku qumrik labaatanna kee namma karmat yen. Yarusalaam magaalah addal namma sanatah malikih suge.
Amon isi abbah raatat gexak, YALLAL dambi lem baahe. Kay abba aqbuduk suge xeet kee cooxuy gabak orra heenih bicseenihiyya inkih yuqbude.
Takkay immay kay abbah innah, rammita numuy YALLA fan yaduurehiyya makkinna. Dambi abittoh isi abbak lafitta axcuk suge.
Amon gubal saqoltih yan mari kaa qidaamal malse. Too mari ayrok teena malik isi qaril yan waqdi, amma 'yeenih kaa qiden.
Yuudâ-mari kaa qidaamal malse mara inkih qideeniih; kay baxa Yoosiyaahu kay lakal malikih heen.

Yoosiyaahu naharak Yuudâ malik yekke saaku bacra karmat yen. Soddom kee inki sanat Yarusalaamal malikih suge.
YALLI kicna taama abak yen. Isi kaxxa abba Dawuduk kaxxih Yallih gita kataatak yeneeh, agaagul sinnim Yallih xinto intam abak yen.
Malik yekkeemih bacarhaytô sanat gufe saakuy qunxa furraynuh yanihiyya isi kaxxa abba Dawuduk kaxxih, Yallih qibaadat gace. Affara sanatak lakal, diini-maleela qibaada elle abak sugte aroocay fayyat raqtahiyya baysam qimbise. Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurumuuda kee, tohuk kalah tan duyyeeyay Yallih aftok aqbuduk suggu 'yeenihiyya baysam qimbise.
Baqal akak iyyaanamay yaqbudeenihiyyah heenih sugen sadgatih arooca kee too aroocak garil sugte qaydarus elle qeerisan mansafwa, kay foocal, bayissaay bututtukka heen. Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurumuuda kee, wohuk kalah tan duyyeeyay xeet kee cooxuk bicseenihiyyay Yallih aftok aqbuduk sugeenihiyya bututtukkay riira abba heenik wadiril, woo duyyeh qibaadah sadgat abak suge marih kabril caxen.
Woo duyyeeyay yaqbudeenihiyyah seekah luk sugen marih lafoofi kaadu woo duyyeh qibaadah sadgat elle abak sugen mansafwal cararisen. Tonnah abak, Yoosiyaahu Yuudâ rasu kee Yarusalaam duma akah suge taahiriino gacse.
Tohut macabinnaay, a taahiriino bisoh beyak, Manasse kee Efrayim kee Simqaan kee, tonnah kaadu, Naftaalî rasuk kilbat le kabut raqta baaxoh amma 'yaanam yan rasu fan enna 'ta magaalooli kee aroocal sugga 'te duyyeeyay Yallih aftok aqbuduk sugeenihiyya bayseh.
Inkih tan kilbat le kabut raqta Israayil baaxol sugga 'te duyyeeyah heen sadgatih-aroocak kee, Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurumuuda kee, gabak bicsen duyyey yaqbudeenihiyya bututtukkaay riira abba hee. Too duyyeh qibaadah qaydarus elle qeerisak sugen arooca kaadu riira abe. Tohuk gaba kale waqdi, Yarusalaam magaala fanah yuduure.
Malik yekkeemih taban kee bacarhaytô sanat gufe saaku, inkih tan baaxo kee YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari taahir abeeh; sugga 'te duyyeeyay Yallih aftok aqbuduk sugeenihiyya ragid cabsiiseh. Tohuk gaba kale waqdi, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari nagay bicsaana'gidih, sidiica num ruube. Too sidocuy ruubehiyya Axalyaahû-Safan kee Maqseyaahu deqsita numuy Yarusalaam magaalak xintoh abbah yenehiyya kee Yowaacád-Yowaca deqsita numuy tikki 'taamah kutbeh abeenah yanihiyya ruube.
Leewih yooboke maray Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit dacayrih sugehiyya wokkel gaaboyse lakqo Cilkiyya deqsita kaxxa seekih gabal heen. Too lakqo akak gaaboyseenim, Efrayim kee Manasseey raqqa 'te kilbat le kabut raqta baaxo kee, tonnah kaadu, Yuuda kee Benyam kee Yarusalaam magaalah marak ten.
Sarrak a lakqo Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih bicsa gabal akak heen maral yeceen. Too mari too lakqo qari bicsa marah yeceen.
Cooxuk duyye bicsa mara kee Yallih Qibaadah-Qari xeetik bicsa maral yeceeniih; too mari xeet edde xaamen. Cooxuk duyye bicsa mari kaadu Qibaadah-Qari bicsan coox edde xaamen. Yoosiyaahuk duma sugte Yuudah malikwa, a qari edde xisen xeet kee coox gaba kaltem abalih tibbat sugen.
A qarih xisne abe mari amaanat kee digga le marak ten. Leewih yooboke marak affara num oson aben taamak amo wagitak ten. Too affara numuk namma num migaaqah Yacat kee Qobadya deqsitak ten. Maraari deqsita gulubuh aabakuk yenen. Gersi namma numuh tu gactekiiy, migaaqah Zakariyya kee Masullam deqsitak yenen. Kohat deqsita gulubuh aabakuk yenen. Leewih yooboke mari yakkeemiik fayla wagga haytaamal dudda le ixxiga le marak ten.
Wohuk kalih mariy Leewih yoobokehiyya xisne edde aban duyyeh beyto kee, mango qaynatah tan taamat yan marih amô-wagittot yenen. Wohuk kalah yan mari kaadu taamak tekkeemih kutbe kee Qari dacayrit yenen.
Ayrok teena duyye edde daanisan golik lakqo ayyaaquk sugen waqdi, Cilkiyya YALLIH xintoy Yalli Muusal oobisehiyya elle tan kitab gee.
Too waqdi malik-buxak kutbe-abeenah yen Safan deqsita numuk iyyeemih, «Yallih xinto elle tan kitab Qibaadâ-Qarih addal gee» iyyeeh; sarrak woo kitab kaal yecee.
Safan woo kitab malikil bee. Malikik iyyeemih, «Kok gubal yan mari atu keenik aba intem abeeniih,
YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal sugte lakqo beeniih, taama aba mara kee ken taamak amo wagita marih gabal heen.
Cilkiyya kitab geeh, woo kitab kol baaheeh; ah kaa» inxicca 'yeeh kitaabal tenem malikih yikriye.
Malik a kitab iyyam yoobbe waqdi, hagga 'yeh wariggah saro isik edde qanxise.
Sarrak ahaak gubal yan amri, Cilkiyya deqsita numuy seekih yenehiyyaay, Safan baxa Acikam kee, tonnah kaadu, Miikayhu baxa Qabdonuuy, malik buxal kutbe-abeh suge Safan deqsita num kee malik buxal malik kaadintuh yen Qasaaya deqsita numul yecee.
Keenik iyyeemih, «Gexay yoo kee Yuuda kee Israayil ummattal tanim naaxige'gidih, YALLAL fayu yoh essera. A kitaabal taniimih maqna nagay ismitay ama. Ni kaxxa abbobti a kitaabal yan Yallih yab abe weenimih sabbatah, YALLAK naqbi nee geeh yan.
Cilkiyya kee too mari, malik keenik elle iyye'nnal, Culda deqsitta barray nabih tenehiyyay Yarusalaam magaalak qusbih xisen exxal buxa luk tenehiyya fan gexeeniih fayu esseren. Tet baqli Sallum deqsitak yeneeh, kay abbak migaaqah Tikwa axcuk yenen. Kay abbah abba Carcas deqsitak yen. Sallum Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril edde gacan sartanak amo wagitak yen. Too mari ta nabih tan barra fan yemeeteenih malik keenil ruube farmo teetih warsen.
Too waqdi is keenik inteemih, «Malik fanah uduuraay, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyak obtem kaah warisa.
‹Yarusalaam kee teetil yan mara digaaleyyo. Ama kitaabay koh yikriyeenihiyya elle inta'nnal bala oobiseyyo› iyyah yan.
Kalah kaak intaanamahaa, ‹Toh akah abu waam, oson yoo cineeniih, xeet kee cooxuk isinni gabak bicsen duyye yaqbudeeniih; anu inqibba haam aban. Yi naqbi Yarusalaamal oobeh ikkal, ahaysa maxamaca› 'yaanam iyye kaak inxica» inte.
Qagitteh, «Malik tiyah tu gactek, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya kaak iyyaamahaa, ‹Atu a kitaabih yab oggolteeh,
toobitteeh, yoh rammitte. Yarusalaam kee Yarusalaam maral baahu waam toobbe waqdi, nadaamah sara isik qanxisseeh weqteh. Too waqdi abteh tan dooqa kok oggoleh.
Tonna-leemiik Yarusalaam magaala kee teetil yan marat abu waah an digaala atu addunyal tanim fanah maaba. Atu tanim fanah ku baaxo amaanah xiineleeh; amaanah koo xiiniseyyo› 'yaanam YALLI kaak iyyem kaah warisa» 'yaanam farmoh keenil gacisse.
Too mari too farmo luk malik fan yuduure.
Sarra ta farmo yoobbe waqdi, Malik Yoosiyaahu, Yarusalaam kee Yuudâ rasuk abbobtih yan marah farmo ruube.
Too mari yemeete waqdi, gabat ken luk YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari fan gexen. Ken lih seeka kee Leewih yooboke mara kee raqqa 'te ummatak gaddaliiy baacoyta axce'kal yakkeenimiik, inkih tokke gexen. Too ummat inkih elle gaabowte ikkel malikii, a kitaabay Qibaadâ-Qaril geytimahiyyal yan yab keenih yikriye.
Sarrak malik elle soola qamiddih garil solla 'yeh, «YALLIH amri oggoluh, Yalla kee xagana culah an. Too kitaabal elle enna 'ta innal, YALLIH xinto kee amri inni afqado kee dudda haamal abeyyo» 'yaanam axcuk qahdi cule.
Benyam mara kee Yarusalaamal suggu 'ye mara aham abu waamah xagana culse. Tonna leemik Yarusalaam mari Yalli ken kaxxa abbobti lih heeh yen qahdih faxximma 'taamah amrisimen.
Malik Yoosiyaahu Israayil mari bicseh suge xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyey ableh umahiyya ken rasul bayseh. Isih addunyal suggu 'yem fanah ummatak, «YALLA uqbuda» axcukuuy, ken kaxxa abbobti doore Dageltah fan ken gacse.

Malik Yoosiyaahu Yarusalaam addal Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiid YALLIH cormatah yessekexxeeh too ayro qiidih ase. Sanatak naharsi alsak taban kee fereyhaytoh ayro too qiidih saqa qiden.
Seeka YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih addal qiddi taama abta'gidih abbootan keenih yecee. Niya keenit gacta'gidih, aytikuma keenih abe.
Tonnah kaadu, Leewih yooboke maray YALLIH garil taahirik yan mara kinniih Israayil ummat Yallih diini barisak yenehiyyah a taama elle aban inna warse. Keenik iyyeemih, «Yallih Qahdih Sandug, Suleeman xise Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal haa. Tahak wadir a sandug aracaak arac quukah mabena. Takkay immay, YALLAY sin Dageltah yani kee Israayil ummatay kay marah kinnihiyya ukduma.
Dawud kee kay baxa Suleeman duma sin elle kurte innal, gulub gulubuh gacca xicay, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih taamah, mariiy isi arac siinik yabbaxay.
Israayil ummatak kulli buxah cato takkeeni'gidih a taamah bical gaca.
Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiidih maraaqe sadgatah qiddaanama. Tahaysa taahirik gacca xicay sadgatah qidan saqa missoysa. Toh abtan waqdi, Israayil mari YALLI Muusal oobise xinto intam abelon» keenik iyye.
Tokkel sugte ummatta Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiidih sadgatah qidda'gidih, Yoosiyaahu isi midirik soddom alfi maraaqe kee girgirwak yeceeh; awurwak kaadu sidiica alfi yecee.
Kay gubal ten doolat abbobti kaadu isinni le kabuk ummat kee seeka kee Leewih yooboke marah sadgat migaaqal laa yeceeniih; tonnal Cilkiyya kee Zakariyya kee Yaciyeliy Qibaadâ-Qarih abbootan luk yenehiyya tittat illi kee wadarak namma alfi kee lica bool sadgatah seekal yeceen. Kaadu sidiica boolih awur gaabossa heenih sadgatah seekal yeceen.
Toh lih kaadu, Leewih yooboke marak Konanyaahu kee kay toobokoy Samaqya kee Netanel deqsittahiyya kee, Casabya kee Yaqiiyal kee Yoodabad deqsita maray abbobtih yenehiyya, is le kabuk illi kee wadarak koona alfi baahen. Kaadu awurwak koona bool baahen. Sarra sadgatah Leewih yooboke marih gabal heen.
Tonnal Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiidih yacoonu waan sadgatih bicak gaba kaleenik wadir, seeka kee Leewih yooboke mari, malik keenik elle iyye innal, kulli numuuy isi arac keenik yibbixe.
Yesketten illi kee wadar yusguudeenik lakal, arab mayyuq Leewih mari abe. Seeka yusguuden saqih qabal, sadgat elle aban aracal rifte.
Sarra cado akak carrisan sadgatih mattacoh qaada ummattâ-gabal heenih; too mari gulub-gulubuh baxsimma 'yeh, too sadgat YALLI Muusal oobise xinto elle inta innal, YALLAH xayyoosen. Tonnah kaadu yesketten awurwa sadgatah xayyoosen.
Leewih mari Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiidih sadgat, madqa elle inta innal, solal alaysen; taahirik yan sadgat buuti kee distil alassa heenih ummatah sissikuk keefen.
Tohuk gaba kalen waqdi, Leewih mari isinni kee Haaruunuk rade maray seekâ-nasab lehiyyah cado bicsen. Toh akah abeenim, seeka bari tikka 'yam fanah carrisan sadgat xayyoosak, xayta cararisak sugen.
Leewih marak Asaf gulubut raaqa maray Yallih fayla abahiyya dumaak Dawud kee Asaf kee Heeman kee Yedutun keenih heeh suge aracal gacen. Yedutun Malik Dawuduh Yallak temeete farmo baahak yen nabik ten. Qibaadâ-Qarih afal dacayrih mari isi arac macabinnay dacayrit elle yeedeeh; Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiidih taama Leewih mari ken aftok keenih abe.
Tonnah abak too ayro, Malik Yoosiyaahu ken elle amrissa hee innal, too qiid missal aben. Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiidih assakaxxiyya kee cado akak carrisan sadgat tonnal missal aben. Too ayro abba heenim inkih, YALLIH qibaadah aben.
Tokkel too saaku gaabowwa 'ye mari Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiid kee Kamiir-Sinni-Gaqamboh Qiid malcina ayroh tokkel abak sugen.
Nabi Samuwel ayrok wadir, a xaqan le Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiidih asen ayro masuginna. Malik Yoosiyaahuu, too saaku seeka kee Leewih yooboke maraay Yuuda kee Israayil-rasuk yemeete mara kee Yarusalaam magaalah mara luk, qiid elle abe innal, kaak duma sugte malikwa inkinnah abteh masuginna.
Taham edde tekkem, Yoosiyaahu edde reede taban kee bacarhaytô sanatak ten.
Malik Yoosiyaahu tahak gaba kalla hee saaku, Masri malikiy migaaqah Nako deqsitahiyya gaaduh Karkamis deqsitta magaalay Furaat weeqaytih xaqul tenehiyya fanah yemeete. Yoosiyaahu toh yoobbe waqdi, a qeebik kaa raaqisam faxe.
Takkay immay Nako woo qangaral farmo kaah ruube. «A gaaduy abam faxahiyya edde abam faxam koo hinna. Ku qeebih mamattiyyo'mmay, inni naqboytiitit qeebi abam faxa. Ta qeebit Yalli yok isissika iyye. Yalli yi xaqul yan. Tonna-leemiik a tiyal saduh yol magacin. Toh cintek, Yalli koo baysele» 'yaanam kaah ruube.
Takkay immay Yoosiyaahu qeebi kaat abaamal malseeh; tonna-leemiik Yallih yaabay Nako kaah warsahiyya cinna heeh qeebi gexoh ugte. Sarrak Magiddo deqsitta booxa fanah, kaa yaaxigeenimik aki num cella heeh, carbih gexe.
Qeebi rade waqdi, Masri mari qideh yan gaysê-baxat uma innah mudduume. Isi qaskarak, «Gaysê-baxi kaxxam yoo biyaakek, buxa fanah xayuk yoo beya» iyye.
Edde suge gaarik kalla kaa heeniih, nammeyhaytô-gaarit korissa kaa heenih Yarusalaam fanah kaa been. Wokkel rabeh; malik kee malik buxah mara edde yaaguqen kabri aracat kaa yoogoqen. Yuuda kee Yarusalaam ummat yakkeenimik rookat kaah sugen.
Nabi Ermiyaas nadaamah yan qadar kaah abe. Tohuk wadir Israayil rasul kaah rookitan saaku, agabu kee labha a qadar edde haytam qaadah haysitteh raqte. Woo qadar, rookâ-qadar elle gaaboysan kitaabal geytima.
Yoosiyaahu abba heemik YALLAH abe qibaada kee Yallih amri elle oggolak suge inna kee, tonnah kaadu, qimbooy ellecaboh usuk abba heem inkih, «Israayil kee Yuudâ-Malikwah Aydaada» deqsita kitaabih addal tan.

Yuudâ-mari kay baxa Yowaacad dooreeniih, Yarusalaamal malik yakke'gidih kaa yuskuten.
Yowaacad Yuudâ-malik yekke saaku, labaatanna kee sidooca sanatat yen. Yarusalaam magaalal sidiica alsa malikih suge.
Nako deqsita Masri-malik xabba kaa heeh seewah kaa bee saaku, kay reeda gaba kalte. Nako Yuudâ-marak sidiica alfi kee affara boolih kiilo qado lakqok beeh, soddom kee affara kiilo dahabak gabbarah ken mekelsiise.
Nako, Yowaacad toobokoytay migaaqah Elaakim deqsitak yenehiyya Yuudâ-malik abe. Migaq kaak korseeh Yahoyaakim kaak iyye. Yowaacad Masri fan seewah bee.
Yahoyaakim, Yuudâ-malik yekke saaku qumrik labaatanna kee koona karmat yen. Sarrak Yarusalaam magaalal taban kee inki sanat malikih suge. YALLAY kay Dagelta kinnihiyyal dambi lem baahak suge.
Nabkadnessar deqsita malikiy Baabelon malikih yenehiyya Yuudâ-baaxo warare. Yahoyaakim nacaasak bicsen silsilatat uxuyya heeh, Baabelon fan seewah kaa bee.
Sarrak too malik YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril sugte duyyek tu takkem Baabelon fan dannabah beeh, isi qarih addal hee.
Wohuk kalah taniimiy Yahoyaakim abba heehiyyak umâ-yabulih tanim kee aaminnaanimiy edde asehiyyah agantah, ‹‹Israayil kee Yuudâ Malikwah Aydaada›› deqsitta kitaabal tan. Kay lakal kay baxay migaaqah Yahoyaasin deqsitak yenehiyya malik yekke.
Yahoyaasin Yuudâ-malik yekke saaku taban kee bacra sanatat yen. Yarusalaam magaalal sidiica alsa kee tabna ayro malikih suge. Usuk kaadu YALLAL dambi lem baahe.
Sugum rade waqdi Baabelon malik yemeeteeh, Yahoyaasin Baabelon fanah seewah bee. YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril sugte duyye kaadu dannabah bee. Sarrak Yahoyaasin qammiy migaaqah Xidkiya deqsitak yenehiyya Yuudâ-mara kee Yarusalaam marak malik abeh cabe.
Xidkiya malik yekke saaku qumrik labaatanna kee inki sanatat yen. Sarrak Yarusalaamal taban kee inki sanat malikih suge.
Too num kaadu YALLAY kay Dagelta kinnihiyyal dambi lem baahak sugeeh, nabi Ermiyaas kaa'lih edde yaaba YALLIH yab ankacisak mananna.
Baabelon-abbay Nabkadnessar deqsita Xidkiya malik abe saaku, kay yab yaabbu waamih tiyal, Yallih migaaqal dirkih kaa xibsiiseh suge'mmay, Xidkiya kay yab moggolinna. Fiirik geerah YALLAY Israayil doore Dageltah yanit baaqid mahannaay; toobitta 'yeh kaal yaduureenim cineh.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, Yuudah abbobti kee seekah abbobti Yalla cinna hayteh, cuggaaneh keenik yan mari edde ase umâ-yabulih-tan-taama inkih kataateeniih, xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeeyah qibaadat gacen. YALLI isih taahir abe Qibaadah-Qari nadaasa aben.
Ken kaxxa abbobtiy oson akak radeenihiyya aqbuduk sugte Dagelti fiiruk geerah nabuwwa keenih ruubak sugeeh; too nabuwwa kulli way keenit takku waytam naharal elle keenih warisak sugte. YALLI too nabuwwa keenih akah ruubak sugem, ken kee isi Qibaadah-Qari baatik cata'gidik ten.
Takkay immay Yalli ruuba Yallih farmoytiitil asuuluk keenil anqaasakaay Yallih yab maaqilak sugen. Ellecabol YALLIH naqabuy kaxxam gibdihiyya keenil oobeh; kay naqabuk num macattiiminna.
YALLI Baabelon-malikiy qeebit ken selu waahiyya keenit ruube. Too malik furrayna sella keenik heeh Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal sugte furraynah agantah sella keenik hee. Qunxa num takkuu, idoolite num takku, lab-num takkuu, say-num takku, num keenik macabinnaay, numuh keenik maracmatinna. Yalli makkook ta malikih gabal ken hee.
A malik Qibaadâ-Qarih addal sugte duyye kee, a qarik makaadanal sugte duyye kee, malik Xidkiyah buxal sugte edderra heemik tu macabinnay dannabah Baabelon fan orbise. Kay gubal sugte doolat abbobtih buxaaxi kaadu buubeeh, tonnah kaadu dannabah bee.
Magaalat maroh sugte gasoosa bututtukka hee. Magaalaay, Yallih Qibaadah Qariiy, magaalal suge doolat-buxaaxi kee addal akak sugte duyye cararise.
Rabak raaqe mara Baabelon rasu fan seewah orbiseeh; tokkel Fursi-malik reedda 'yam fanah, Baabelon malik kee kay marih gubal ken akdamuk sugen.
Nabi Ermiyaas iyyem tonnal tunguddube. Too nabi ah keenit akkelem duma keenih warseh suge. Iyyeemihii, «A baaxol malcina-tabanih sanatah num dabaaqah elle magacaay, baaxo affoofele» 'yaanam iyyeh yen.
Duma Nabi Ermiyaas, «YALLI annah tanim abele» axcuk edde yaabeh sugem numma takke'gidih, Fursi-malikiy Kooris deqsitahiyya edde dardaare naharsitto sanatat, isi baaxol enna 'ya marah farmo warsaana'gidih, sinam ruube. Kaadu, warkatal too farmo yuktubeh ruube. Toh abaamih fayxi kaat haytem, YALLA.
Too warkat axcuk teneemih,
«A warkatal yan amri taceem, yooy Kooris migaq leeh Fursi-malik kinnihiyya. YALLAY qaraanal yan Dagelta kinnihiyya inkih yan baadak abba yoo abeeh; Yuudâ-rasuk Yarusalaam magaalal kay Qibaadah-Qari xisaamih abbootan yoh yecee. Tonna'mmay ta saaku YALLIH maraw, tokke gexaay; YALLI muquk sin beyay» 'yaanam elle ten. Taham akkelem kaadu YALLI dumaak nabi Ermiyaas afat warseh suge.

Duma Nabi Ermiyaas, «YALLI annah tanim abele» axcuk edde yaabeh sugem numma takke'gidih, Fursi-malikiy Kooris deqsitahiyya edde dardaare naharsitto sanatat, isi baaxol enna 'ya marah farmo warsaana'gidih, sinam ruubeeh; kaadu warkatal too farmo yuktubeh ruube. Toh abaamih fayxi kaat haytem YALLA.
Too warkat axcuk yeneemih,
«A warkatal yan amri taceem, yooy Kooris migaq leeh, Fursi-malik kinnihiyya. YALLAY qaraanal yan Dagelta kinnihiyya inkih yan baadak abba yoo abeeh; Yuudâ-rasuk Yarusalaam magaalal kay Qibaadah-Qari xisaamih abbootan yoh yecee.
Kay ummattak, Yalli sin lih yanay! Tonna'mmay Yarusalaam fan gexxa xicay, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyay Yarusalaam magaalal yanihiyya luk suge qari nammeyhaak xissaanamah idni siinih acee.
Yallih marak elle yanin marin rasuk isi baaxo yaduurem faxa mari yenek, ken cuggaaneh yan marak, isinni baaxoh akah yaduuren innah, cato keenih aba. Dahab kee lakqo kee, taama edde aban duyyeey, merraytu kee saq keenih ucuya. Tonnah kaadu, Yarusalaam magaalal Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih isinni fayxiik ruuban duyye mattacoh keenih ucuya. Ah tuktubem yoo Fursi-maliki» 'yaanam yuktubeh ruube.
Tohuk lakal Yuuda kee Benyam kedoh abbobtiiy, seekaay, Leewih yooboke mara kee, tonnah kaadu, Yalli fayxi edde hee mari inkih, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qariy duma yiddigilleh sugehiyya xisaana'gidih, gexoh bical gacen.
Ken cuggaaneh suge mari mango duyye catoh keenih yeceeh; lakqok bicsen duyyeey, dahabaay, taama edde aban duyyeeyaay, merraytu kee saq kee, kalah tan duyyey limo gibdihiyya keenih yeceen. Tohuk kalah kaadu, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih isinni fayxiik ruuban duyye keenih yeceen.
Nabkadnessar deqsita malik, duma YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarik beeh suge mingilwa, usuk isih Yalla axcuk aqbuduk yen duyyeeyah qibaadah qaril heeh suge. Malik Kooris too duyye wadir woo qarik bahsissa heeh keenih gacse.
Malik Kooris too mingilwa bahsissa heeh Mitradat deqsita numih gabal hee. Mitradat qibaadâ-qarwak kadna gabat akak yan numuk ten. Too num too mingilwa lowwa heeh Sesbaxxar gabal hee. Sesbaxxar, Yuudâ-kedok abbah yan numuk ten.
Looweenih Sesbaxxar gabal heen duyyek, dahabak bicsen kaxxa sacnitte soddom akkuk ten. Lakqok bicsen kaxxa sacnitte alfi akkuk ten. Lakqok bicsen distitte labaatanna kee sagal akkuk ten. Dahabak bicsen qunxa sacnitte soddom akkuk ten. Lakqok bicsen qunxa sacnitte affara bool kee taban akkuk ten. Wohuk kalah tan duyye alfi akkuk ten.
Sesbaxxar kee kaak kalih maray duma seewah beenih sugeenihiyya, Baabeloonuk Yarusalaam magaala fan gexen waqdi, dahab kee lakqok bicsen mingilwak tittat koona alfi kee affara bool takkem luk gexen.

Duma seewah been marak rade marak, Yarusalaam kee Yuudâ rasu fan yuduure marih migooqa ah teeti. Ta mari akak rade mara yakkeemiik inkih, Nabkadnessar deqsita malik Baabelon baaxo fan seewah beeh suge. Too saakuk xabba haanam too baaxol baaxo caboytiitih sugen. Isinni baaxo gufen waqdi, kulli numuuy isi magaala fan keenik gace.
Keenik saqoltih tenem, Darabbabel kee Yaasuwa kee Nacmiya kee Seraaya kee Reelaaya kee Mordakay kee Bilsan kee Misfar kee Bigway kee Racum kee Baqna deqsita marak ten.
Elle sugen baaxok isi baaxo yuduure Israayil-marak-gulub-migaq kee mangah akkuk yeneenih gide ah teeti:
Farqos deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari namma alfi kee bool kee malcina-taban kee namma num akkuk yenen.
Safatya deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari sidiica bool kee malcina-taban kee namma num akkuk yenen.
Arac deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari malcina bool kee malcina-taban kee koona num akkuk yenen.
Facat-Mooyab deqsita gulubuk, Yaasuwa kee Yowab deqsita namma numih durruyyat tuduure. Too mari namma alfi kee bacra bool kee taban kee namma num akkuk yenen.
Qeelam deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari alfi kee namma bool kee kontom kee affara num akkuk yenen.
Dattuq deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari sagla bool kee morootom kee koona num akkuk yenen.
Dakkay deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari malcina bool kee lactam num akkuk yenen.
Baani deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari lica bool kee morootom kee namma num akkuk yenen.
Beebay deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari lica bool kee labaatanna kee sidiica num akkuk yenen.
Qadgad deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari alfi kee namma bool kee labaatanna kee namma num akkuk yenen.
Adonikam deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari lica bool kee lactam kee lica num akkuk yenen.
Bigway deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari namma alfi kee kontom kee lica num akkuk yenen.
Qaadin deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari affara bool kee kontom kee affara num akkuk yenen.
Aatar deqsita gulubuy kaadu Ciskiyyaahu deqsita migaaqal yaaxigeenihiyyak yuduure mari sagla taban kee bacra num akkuk yenen.
Bexay deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari sidiica bool kee labaatanna kee sidiica num akkuk yenen.
Yoora deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari bool kee taban kee namma num akkuk yenen.
Casum gulubuk yuduure mari namma bool kee labaatanna kee sidiica num akkuk yenen.
Gibbar deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari sagla taban kee koona num akkuk yenen.
Tonnah kaadu, dumah yan saaku Israayil rasuk mango magaaloolil kaxxa abbobti akak sugte marak, mango mari yuduure:
Duma Beetlacam deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak bool kee labaatanna kee sidiica num tuduure.
Duma Natoofa deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak kontom kee lica num tuduure.
Duma Qanatot deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak bool kee labaatanna kee bacra num tuduure.
Duma Qadmawet magaalal suge marak rade marak morootom kee namma num tuduure.
Duma Kiryat-Yaqarim kee Kafiira kee Beerot deqsitta magaaloolil suge marak rade marak malcina bool kee morootom kee sidiica num tuduure.
Duma Raama kee Gabaq deqsitta magaaloolil suge marak rade marak lica bool kee labaatanna kee inki num tuduure.
Duma Mikmas deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak bool kee labaatanna kee namma num tuduure.
Duma Beetal kee Qaay deqsitta magaaloolil suge marak rade marak namma bool kee labaatanna kee sidiica num tuduure.
Duma Nabo deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak kontom kee namma num tuduure.
Duma Magbis deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak bool kee kontom kee lica num tuduure.
Kalah tan gersi Qeelam deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak alfi kee namma bool kee kontom kee affara num tuduure.
Duma Caarim deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak sidiica bool kee labaatanni num tuduure.
Duma Lood kee Caadid kee Oono deqsitta magaaloolil suge marak rade marak malcina bool kee labaatanna kee koona num tuduure.
Duma Yeriko deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak sidiica bool kee morootom kee koona num tuduure.
Duma Senaaqa deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak sidiica alfi kee lica bool kee soddom num tuduure.
Seekah aabakuk suge marak tuduurem ah teeti:
Yaasuwa kaxxa abbah akak raaqa gulubuy Yadaqya deqsitahiyyak sagla bool kee malcina-taban kee sidiica sek yuduure.
Immarak rade marak alfi kee kontom kee namma sek yuduure.
Fascuruk rade marak alfi kee namma bool kee morootom kee malcina sek yuduure.
Caarimik rade marak alfi kee taban kee malcina sek yuduure.
Leewih yooboke marak yuduure marih loowo ah teeti:
Hodawyak rade marak migaaqah Yaasuwa kee Kadmiyal deqsita namma gulubuk tuduurem malcina-taban kee affara numuk ten.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril saare abak yen marak rade marak tuduurem bool kee labaatanna kee bacra numuk ten. Too mari Asaf deqsita gulubuk rade marak ten.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit dacayrih suge marak bool kee soddom kee sagla num yuduure. Too mari Sallum kee Aatar kee Talmon kee Qakkub kee Catiita kee Soobay deqsita marih samadak yenen.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih taamat duma suge marak rade marak yuduure marih gulubuk migaq ah kaana:
Xiica kee Casuufa kee Tabaaqot kee Keeros kee
Siqaha kee Fadon kee Labaana kee Cagaaba kee Qakkub kee
Haagab kee Samlay kee Canaan kee Giddal kee Gacar kee
Rayya kee Raaxin kee Nakooda kee Gaddam kee Qudda kee
Faseeyac kee Besay kee Qasna kee Maquunim kee
Nafiisim kee Bakbuk kee Cakuufa kee Carcur kee
Baxlut kee Maciida kee Carsa kee Barkus kee
Sisra kee Temac kee Naxiya kee Catiifa deqsita gulubuk ten.
Suleemanah taamitak yen marih gulubuk yuduure mari akak rade marih migaq ah kaana:
Sootay kee Hassofrat kee Faruuda kee Yaqla kee
Darkon kee Giddal kee Safatya kee Cattil kee
Fokret-Haxxabaayim kee Aami deqsita numuk ten.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit taamah yen mara kee Suleeman-taamat yen marak rade marak tuduurem, tittat sidiica bool kee sagla taban kee namma numuk ten.
Dalaaya kee Toobiya kee Nakooda deqsita sidiica gulubuy Tel-Melac kee Tel-Carsa kee Karuub kee Addan kee Immar deqsitta magaaloolik yuduurehiyya lica bool kee kontom kee namma num akkuk yen. Takkay immay too mari Israayilik rade mara kinnoonumih digga mageytiminna.
Seekah yooboke marak Cabaaya kee Hakkox kee Bardillay migaq luk yen gulub, seeka gacsaanamih digga mageytiminna. Bardillay deqsita gulubuy seekah gacsahiyya akak rade num, digibe saaku balli gulubul kaa muggaaqiseeniih, Bardillay kaak axcuk yenen. Ta mari inkih akak rade marih migooqa keenik mageytiminnaay; tonna-leemiik taahir ane waa maray seekat gacu duude waahiyyat ken loowen.
Tohuk gexxaamah Yuudâ-baaxoh abba, «Urim kee Tummim deqsitta duyye
Marin baaxoy elle sugeenihiyyak Israayil marak yuduure mari tittat morootom kee namma alfi kee sidiica bool kee lactam num akkuk yenen.
Oson taamat luk yenen maray ken lih yuduurehiyya sayim kee labimih fanal malcina alfi kee sidiica bool kee soddom kee malcina num akkuk yenen. Say mara kee lab maray gad kee saare abahiyya namma boolih num akkuk yuduure.
Faaris malcina bool kee soddom kee lecey akkuk yeneeh; baakil namma bool kee morootom kee konoy akkuk yen. Gaali kaadu affara bool kee soddom kee konoy akkuk yen. Danoona kee okaale lica alfi kee malcina bool kee labaatanna akkuk ten.
Ta mari Yarusalaamay YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari elle yanihiyya gufen waqdi, gulubwah saqoltik garab, Qibaadâ-Qari duma elle suge aracal nammeyhaak edde xisoonu waan mattaco yeceen.
Too taama takke'gidih, dudda haanam abeeniih, tohih cato yeceen. Ta duyye tittat dahabak koona boolih kiilo kee, lakqok kaadu namma alfi kee bacra boolih kiilo kee, bool dallaabiyyay seeka haytahiyya mattacoh yeceen.
Seeka kee Leewih yooboke mara kee, tonnah kaadu, gersi marak tu takkem dabqih Yarusalaam dariifa kee Yarusalaam addal gacen. Gad kee saare aba mara kee, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit dacayrih yen mara kee, tonnah kaadu, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit taamah yen mari dabqih Yarusalaam dariifal ten magaaloolil gacen. Tohuk raqqa 'ye mari duma ken kaxxa abbobti dabqih elle sugte magaaloolil gacen.

Malcinhaytoh alsat kulli num isi magaalal keenik dabaaqah gace. Tohuk lakal yakkeenimiik Yarusalaamal gaaboowen.
Yahuuxadák-Yaasuwa kee kaa'lih ten seekaay, Saltiyál-Darabbabel deqsita num kee kay ramad, cado akak carrisan sadgat Yallah abaana'gidih, Yallih naqasuh yen Muusal oobe kitab elle iyya'nnal, Israayil doore Dageltah sadgat elle aboonu waan arac nammayhaak soolisen.
Oson wokkel guubuh suge marak meysiteenih immay, tohuh, too aracay Yallih migaaqal sadgat elle aboonu waanahiyyah bicsak akah maraaqinnon. Too arac duma elle suge aracal bicsen. Tohuk lakal kulli ayro saaku kee carra tokkel sadgatah saq qidak yeneeniih, woo sadgatih cado cararisak yenen.
Kitab elle iyya'nnal Iraawô-Dabih-Qiid deqsita qiid abeeniih, too qiidih kulli ayro lacak faxxintah gide sadgatah qiden.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, kulli ayro cado akak carrisan saq sadgatah qideeniih, tonnah kaadu, alsi bila waqdi aban sadgataay, wohuk kalah tan YALLIH qiidih ayroora aban sadgat kee, kalah kaadu, isinni fayxik YALLIH migaaqal aban sadgatak tu cabe'kal abak yenen.
YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih-xiso qimbiseenih manannoonuuy; takkay immay malcinhaytoh alsak inikhaytoh ayro, YALLIH migaaqal sadgat elle aban aracal, cado akak cararisan sadgat aben.
