Tonna leemiik, Fursi-malikiy Kooris migaq luk yenehiyya Israayil marak «Aba» elle iyye'nnal, Lubnaan rasuk Yaffa deqsitta magaala fan *sariidâ-coox badal baahen. Sarrak too sariidah meklah darooy, qinabak bicsen kamri kee caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti (saliid) Suur kee Sayda deqsitta namma magaalal yen mara fan ruuben. Xisne aba mara kee xisnê-coox yaysorooroce marah cawalah lakqo yaceen.
Yuduure mari Yarusalaamay Yallih Qibaadah-Qari elle suge arac kinnihiyya gufeenimih nammayhaytô-sanatak nammeyhaytoh alsat, Yarusalaamal gaabooweenih, Qibaadâ-Qarih-xisne duma elle suge'kkel nammeyhaak xisaanam qimbisen. Saltiyál-Darabbabel kee Yahuuxadák-Yaasuwa kee, wohuk kalah yan ken marak seekaay, Leewih yooboke mara kee, elle sugen marin baaxok yuduure marak num raaqe'kal, yakkeenimik inkih, too taamat gaba yessegellen. Leewih yooboke marak labaatanni karma akke kee wohuk fula aalle yakke mari inkih, woo qarih xisoh taama elle takke'nna amo wagitak yenen.
Yaasuwa kee kay xaylooy, kaah ramad elli haa maraay, Kadmiyal deqsita num kee, Binnuy deqsita num kee, Hodawya deqsita num sittat Yallih Qibaadah-Qari xisa marih amô-wagittot yenen. Cendad deqsita gulubuh yooboke mari woo taamal ken cate. Too mari inkih Leewî-kedoh aabakuk yen.
Xisne aba mari, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarik rakiibo heen saaku, seeka dallaabiyat gacca teh, *baanta gabat luk, elle sooloonu waan arac yibbixen. Leewi deqsitta kedok Asaf deqsita gulubuh yooboke mari kaadu, giyaagib gabat luk, keenih heen aracal soolen. Too waqdi Dawud dabaanak raqte qaadal akah abak yenen innal, YALLA saarisen.
YALLA faylisaah candu kaah gacisa mara kee, yakkuqe mara yekken. Faylah iyyeenimih,
YALLI maqaane le Goyta;
kay kacani mayambaxa.
YALLI Israayilih le kacni
daayiman yan; mayambaxa» iyyen.
Too saaku YALLIH Qibaadah-Qarih-xisneh-rakiibo heenih yeneeniih; tohih sabbatah YALLA faylisen. Ken ankacisak yen mari kaadu anay fayya haak qililise.
Takkay immay mango idoolah tan seeka kee Leewih yooboke mara kee gulubwah saqoltiy duma suge Qibaadâ-Qari aaxaguk yeneenihiyya, away nammeyhaak xisaana'gidih rakiibo heenim yublen waqdi, kaxxam weeqen. Raqqa 'ye mari farcih qililise.
Qilila kee weeqi xongolo tittat tengeleemih sabbatah, qililo kee weeqa ittak cedak manannon. Xongolo keenik allal radak ten.

Yuuda kee Benyaamah yooboke marih naqboytitteh yen mari, elle suge marin baaxok yuduure mari YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyah qari nammeyhaak xisaanam yoobben.
Too waqdi Darabbabel kee gulubwah saqolti fanah yemeeteeniih iyyeenimih, «Sin kee nee naqbudem inki Yalla. Assuuriyah malikih yen Isar-Caddon, dabaaqah akkel gacna'gidih, akke nee rubbu heemiiy akke fan, sin Dageltih-migaaqal sadgat abak sugne. Away kaadu Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih xisnel sin catnuh nemeete» iyyen.
Darabbabel kee Yaasuwa kee raqqa inte Israayil-abbobti keenil gacisseemih, «Sin kee nee titta lih qari xisnam neh midnisinta. Fursi-malikih yan Kooris nee elle amrise innal, numtin cato faxe'kal, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyah qari ninnih xisenno» keenik iyyen.
Tohuk lakal too baaxol dabaaqah suggu 'ye mari, Yuudâ-maray Yallih Qibaadah-Qari xisak sugek niya butukku heenih, tonnah kaadu, qari xisok meysiteenih akah raaqan innih gabbatiyyat gacen.
Fursih doolatih abbobti a taama abe ken akah kalta'nnah, guqul keenih yeceen. Kooris kee Daryawes dardaarinnih waktil, oson elle ackamuk sugen baaxol abbobtih suggu 'ye marah guqul acayuk, a qarih xisok ken elle yayseeden malat gacen.
Tonnal, Ekserkas deqsita num malik edde yekke sanat, Yuuda kee Yarusalaam magaalal yan marak naqboytiitih yen mari, wayto keenik elle yuktuben warkat malikil ruuben.
Tonnah kaadu Artacsasta deqsita malik Fursi-rasul dardaare dabaanal, Bislam kee Mitradat kee Tabqel kee ken waday too malikih warkat uktubba hayteh kaah rubte. Too warkat edde yuktubeenim, Suuriyah afak teneeh; sarra warkat intam kaah warsen.
Baaxoh abbah yen Racum deqsita num kee kutbe-abeenah yen Simsay deqsita num, Malik Artacsastah, Yarusalaam magaalah xisne akke wayta'gidih, warkat yuktubeenih ruuben. Too warkatal yuktuben yab annah axcuk yen:
«A warkat tuktubem, xintoh abbah yan Racum kee kutbe-abeenah yan Simsay kee, ken adoytitte kee cokmi abeenit kee raqqa 'ta doolat-abbobti kee, tonnah kaadu, Erek kee Baabelon kee, Qeelam rasuk Suusa deqsitta magaalak yemeete mara. Ken lih gacak a warkat tuktubem, nabna kee massakaxxa luk yen Osnaffar deqsita malik le baaxok rubba heeh Samaariyah magaala kee Furaat Weeqaytuk Ayrô-culma le kabut Raaqa Rakaakayal nookise mara kinni.
«Nabna le Amoyta Artacsastaw, a warkat koh taktubem ku taamat yan maray Furaat Weeqaytuk Ayrô-culma le kabut Raaqa Rakaakayal yanihiyya.
Nabna le amoytaw, koh warisnaamah, Yahuud-maray koo le'kkek nee le'kke fan yemeetehiyya a saaku Yarusalaam magaalal nookeenih yanin. Taaxige uma magaalay umeynitih yan mari elle sugehiyya nammeyhaak xisaanam faxan. Oson woo magaalah rakiibo bicseenih gasok kaadu xayih gaba kalaanam faxan.
A magaala nammeyhaak xissinteeh, teetit maroh gactu wayta gasoh xisnek gaba kalen ken tekkek, gabbarat geyak ten lakqo mageyta.
Nanu ku amrih gubat yan mara kinnuk, qaybik koo qidaanam mafanxa. Tonna-leemik a warkat koh rubnah nan.
Tonna kinnuk taway abtaamahaa, duma ku kaxxa abbobtih dabaanal tekkem elle yuktuben kitaabal tanim wagtetto. Tonnal too magaalal dumî-dabaanal suge mari qamalleelak sugeeniih, malikwa kee rasih abbobtil saduh akkuk suge mara kinnoonum too kitoobal keenik geetto. Too magaala kulli waqdi gaadile kee umeynit dabqik sugtem geetto. Magaala duma akah baatem, tohih sabbata.
Tonnal ta magaala nammeyhaak xissinteeh, teetit maroh gaso heen ken tekkek, Furaat Weeqaytuk Ayrô-culma le kabut Raaqa Rakaakay ku abbootanih gubat raaqe wayu waam naharal elle koh warisna» 'yaanam elle yuktuben warkat kaah ruuben.
Malik too warkat kaa gufte waqdi, tohul raddih yab yuktubeh ruubeeh iyyeemih,
«A warkat akah ruubam, xintoh abbah yan Racum kee kutbe-abeenah yan Simsay kee, tonnah kaadu, sin adoytittey Samaariyah magaala kee Furaat weeqaytuk ayrô-culma le kabut raqqa 'tahiyyah inkih ruuba. Takkeenimik inkih salaamatta siinil qida.
«Isin yoh rubten warkat yoo gufteeh; yoh yikriyeeniih, maqna akak yoh warseenih.
A caagidik adda wagtu waa mara ruubeeh; Yarusalaam mari dumî-dabaanaak malik xintol saduh sugeeh, Yarusalaam magaala gaadile kee umeynit dabqik sugtem teetik geytinteh.
Cayla leelah tan malikwa Yarusalaam kee inkih yan Furaat Weeqaytuk Ayrô-culma le kabut Raaqa Rakaakay reedisak yenen. Too rasih marak gabbara kee mango lakqo beyak sugen.
Taway isin, anu nagay yan amri siinih aceem fanah gexay, ‹Ahaysa ama magaalah xisne eyseedeya› keenik inxica.
Nanu faxe waynam edde akke'kal, a waqdiik gexay keenih warisa» 'yaanam yuktubeh keenih ruube.
Racum kee Simsay kee ken adoytitte ta warkatay Malik Artacsasta ruubehiyya yikriyen waqdi, arduk Yarusalaam fan gexeeniih, magaala xisak suge mara xisnê-taamak caylat yeyseeden.
Yallih-Qarih-xisne kaadu fanal teedeeh, Fursi-malikiy migaaqah Daryawes deqsitahiyya edde dardaare nammayhaytô sanat fan, xisne akak elle yeyseeden aracal elle teedeeh sugte.

Too dabaanal Caggay kee Qiddó-Zakariyya deqsita namma nabi suge. Too nabuwwa, Israayil doore Dageltay ken amol yenehiyyah migaaqal, Yuudâ-rasu kee Yarusalaam magaalal suggu 'ye Yahuud mara lih yaaben.
Saltiyál-Darabbabel kee Yahuuxadák-Yaasuwa too namma nabi yab yoobben waqdi, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih xisne wadir qimbisen. Too namma nabi xisol kaadu ken catteh.
Sarrak, Furaat Weeqaytuk Ayrô-culma le kabut Raaqa Rakaakayih abbah yen Tattanay deqsita num kee Satar-Bodnay deqsita num kee ken waday Yarusalaam fan temeeteeh, iyyeenimih, «A qari ‹Xisa› siinik inteeh, ‹A duyye edde haa› siinik intem iyyaay?
A qari xisa mari maa migaq le?» keenik iyyen.
Yalli Yahuud-marih idoolak amo isih dacrisak yeneemih sabbatah, Fursi-doolatih taamat yen mari, naharak malikih warse'kal hebeltô-maaqatta bee waanamal gaba kaleeniih; tonna leemiik Yahuud mari woo taama elle beyak raaqe.
Sarrak Furaat Weeqaytuk Ayrô-culma le kabut Raaqa Rakaakayih abbah yen Tattanay kee Satar-Bodnay kee ken waday malikih warkat yuktubeenih ruuben.
Too warkatal iyyeenimih,
Malik Daryawesow, naharak ku xinto amaanah tanay.
Nabna le malikow, koh warisnaamah, «Nanu Yuudâ-rakaakay genxeh sugneeh, too waqdi kaxxa nabna le Yallah bicsen Qibaadâ-Qari naba xeetiy affara ruknik yanihiyya kee coox soolisah nuble. Xisne xayuk gaba kalta'gidih kaxxa taamah taamitaanaah, meqe'nnal akkuk ten.
«A marak saqoltih yan marak, ‹A qari «Xisa» siinik intem iyyaay? «A duyye edde haa» siinik intem iyyaay?› keenik inne.
Tonnah kaadu, ‹Qari xisa marih migaq neh warisa› keenik inne. Toh ken akah esserrem, a taamak foocat yan mara neexegek lakal koh warisna'gidi.
«Too waqdi nek iyyeenimih, ‹Nanu qaran kee baaxoh abbah yan Dageltih naqoosa kinninooh, away xisnam dumaak xissiimeh suge Yallih Qibaadah-Qariiy; a duyye addal akak hayteeh kaa xissem, duma suge Israayil malikiy kaxxa massakaxxa luk sugehiyya.
Ni kaxxa abbobti Yalli niqba taamat asseemih sabbatah, qaraanal yan Yalli, Kaldayah yooboke Nabkadnessaray Baabelon baaxok malikih yenehiyyak qeebil ken gacsiise. Too saaku Yallih Qibaadah-Qari yiggileeniih; tokkel suggu 'ye mara seewah Baabelon rasu fan been.
Sarra Malik Kooris inkih yan Baabelon rasuk malik edde yekke sanatal, Yallih Qibaadah-Qariy yiddigilleh sugehiyya nammeyhaak xisa 'yaanamih amri yecee.
Nabkadnessar duma Yarusalaamal-yen-Qibaadah-Qarik dahab kee lakqok bicsen mingilwa beeh sugeeh, Baabeloonul usuk isih Yalla axcuk aqbuduk yen duyyeeyah qibaadah-qarih addal heeh suge. Malik Kooris too mingilwa tokkek bahsissa heeh wadir gacseeh, Sesbaxxar deqsita numih gabal hee. Too num kaadu Yuudâ-rasih abba abe.
Sarrak too numuk, «Tama mingilwa beyay Yarusalaamal yan Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih gacis. Yallih Qibaadah-Qari duma elle suge aracal xis» 'yaanam iyye.
Too num Yarusalaam yemeeteeh, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih rakiibo hee. Sarrak xiso akak too saaku qimbiseeniih, ta saaku fan too xisot nan. Xisok uxih gaba makalinna› 'yaanam nek iyyen.
«Tawayah tu gactek, atu oggoltek, away Yarusalaamal xisan Yallih Qibaadah-Qari nammeyhaak xisa intem Malik Kooris kinnim kee akke waytam elle naaxige'gidih, Baabelon-magaalal kok duma sugte malikwa abba haytem inkih elle yuktuben waraakit gorrisu waa mara rubtaama. Yab tama'nnaay; awayah tu gactek, a caagidik abeh meqem kee, neh tascassem tellek, nee iysixxigey» 'yaanam elle yuktuben warkat kaah ruuben.

Tohuk lakal inkih tan baaxok malikih yen Daryawes, «Baabelon rasul malik kutbeh buxal duma tekkem elle yuktuben kitooba tanik wagita» 'yaanam iyyeh amri yecee.
Too goran yekkeeh; sarrak Meediya deqsita rakaakayal geytinta Acmata deqsitta inaytâ-magaalal, yuktuben arabay xambaqut yani geen. Too arabih bagul kutbeh tenemiiy ahak ten:
«Malik Kooris malik edde yekke sanatat amri yeceeh iyyeemih: Yarusalaamal yan Yallih Qibaadah-Qariy yiddigillehiyya sadgatah saq elle qidaana'gidih, nammeyhaak xisaanama. Too qarih rakiibo haanama. Yallih Qibaadah-Qari xisan waqdi fayyah lactam cusul kaa abaanama. Baguh kaadu lactam cusulih gide kaa abaanama.
Gidaar akah xisaana'gidih naba xeetiy affara ruknik yanihiyyak sidooca xisne xisaanama. Sarra fanat inki xisneh gide cooxuk xisaanama. Tohuk lakal kaadu sidooca xisneh gide xeetik xisak, sarrak kaadu, gudet inki adda cooxuk xisak, gaba kalla haanam fanah too gurral xisaanama. Ta xisneh faxximma 'tam malik-makdanak yacoonay.
Duma Malik Nabkadnessar Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik Baabelon fan beeh suge dahab kee lakqok bicsen mingilwa Yarusalaamal yan Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih duma elle sugte'kkel gacsaanama» 'yaanam kutbeh elle sugte.
Malik Daryawes tah yoobbe waqdi, yuktube warkat ruube. Too warkatal iyyeemih,
«Furaat Weeqaytuk Ayrô-culma le kabut Raaqa Rakaakayih abbah yan Tattanay kee Satar-Bodnay kee, Furaat weeqaytuk Ayrô-culma le kabut Raaqa Rakaakayal doolat taamat sin lih yan marak inkih, siinih ruuba farmol siinik axceemih, ‹Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril maxayyoowina.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih caagidit feera mahana. Yahuud-xintoh abba kee Yahuud-marih-idoola Yallih Qibaadah-Qari duma elle suge aracal xisoonay.
Oson too qari xisan waqdi, ken elle cattaanam siinil tan. Taama keenik gaba kalla haytam fanah, fanat akah aade wayta innah, taamita marah Furaat Weeqaytuk Ayrô-culma le kabut Raaqa Rakaakayak doolat gabbarah beyta lakqo dudda luk, waqlal elle ucuya.
Kulli ayro Yarusalaamal tan seekah faxxa hannaanim keenih ucuya. Qaraanal yan Yallih migaaqal sadgatay cado akak carrisaanahiyyah dahaltu akkiiy, marwa akkiiy, anaaqe akki taceenim siinil tan. Toh lih kaadu kamadi akkiiy, qasbo akkiiy, tonnah kaadu, qinabak bicsen kamri kee caxâ xaylok bicsan zeyti (saliid) too sadgatah taceenim siinil tan.
Toh siinik akah axcem, ta sadgat aban waqdi qaraanal yan Yalli ruffa axcuk a sadgat oggola'gidiiy, yoo kee yi xaylot barkat haa'gidih, seeka dooqa abta'gidih axce.
« ‹Tah cina num yenek, qari kaak iggillaay, caxxay kay qarik yiggileenihiyya mudeeni gurral af bahsissa heenih, kaa edde mudaanama. Qari kaak guddaafa elle haan arac abaanama.
A amri cinaah Yallih Qibaadah-Qari yaggilem faxa malik yenek, doolat tenek, too malik kee too doolat Yallay Yarusalaam isi elle yaqbuden aracah doorehiyya ken bayisay. Ta amri teceem, yoo Daryawesi. Tama warkat inxicca 'tam inkih xayih duudussaanama›» 'yaanam elle tan warkat yuktubeh keenih ruube.
Too warkat ken gufe saaku, baaxoh abbah yen Tattanay kee Satar-Bodnay kee ken waday hununuh malik keenik aba elle iyye'nnal aben.
Nabi Caggay kee Qiddó-Zakariyya ken aydikumusak, Yahuud marih idoola kaadu is le kabuk, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih xisnet tisissikeeh, meqe'nnal taamitak xisen. Israayil doore Dagelti elle amrissa hee innal, tonnah kaadu, Fursi deqsita rasuk malikwah ten Kooris kee Daryawes kee Artacsasta deqsitta malikwa keenik elle inxicca 'yen innal, Israayil doore Dageltah-qari xiseenih, gaba kalen.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih xisnek, Daryawes deqsita malik edde dardaare laceyhaytô sanatak Adar deqsita alsak sidochaytoh ayrot gaba kalen.
Tohuk lakal seeka kee Leewih yooboke mara kee, wohuk kalah tan Israayil-ummattay marin baaxoy elle sugtehiyyak tuduurehiyya kaxxam ruffu 'yeenih; too ayro Qibaadah-Qari Yallih taamah taahirroyseenimih farcatah asen.
Too ayro awurwak bool takkem qideeniih, illik namma boolih maruw kee, anaaqek kaadu affara bool sadgatah yusguuden. Tonnah kaadu wadarak taban kee namma dabeela dambi kalootuh yusguuden. Too taban kee namma dabeela taban kee nammay takke Israayil kedoh migaaqal dambi kalootuh sadgatah yusguuden.
Muusal oobe kitab elle inxicca iyya'nnal, seeka kee Leewih yooboke mara, butta-buttah hayya heenih Yarusalaamal Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit aboonu waan taama keenih warsen.
Elle sugen marin baaxok yemeete mari, ciggiila sanatak inikhaytoh alsak taban kee fereyhaytoh ayro Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiidih asen.
Too ayro seeka kee Leewih yooboke mari inkih taahirik gacca 'yeh ase. Leewih yooboke mari Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiidih, marin baaxok amma 'ye mara kee toobokoh keenik tan seeka kee isinni migaaqal, maraaqe sadgatah yusguuden.
Israayil maray marin baaxok yuduure kee, baaxol elle suge maray cuggaaneh keenik yan mari abah yan taahirik ane sinni taamak yexxeereh sugehiyya inkih woo maaqo yokme. Too mari, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya yaqbude'gidih, cuggaaneh keenik yan mari aba taamak yexxeereenih sugen.
Malcina ayroh Kamiir-Sinni-Gaqamboh Qiidih farcatah sugen. Assuuriyah malik oson faxaanam aba num YALLI kaa abeeh, Yallay Israayil doore Dagelta kinnih Qariy yiddigilleh sugehiyya nammeyhaak xisaana'gidih cato keenih yekkeemih sabbatah, kaxxam ruffu iyyen.

Aham tekkeemih mango sanat suggu 'yeenik lakal, Artacsasta Fursi-malik edde yekke dabaanal, Qedra deqsita num yen. Too num akak radem, kaxxa seekih yen Haaruunu. Qedrah abba Seraaya deqsitak yen. Seraayah abba Qadarya deqsita numuk ten. Qadaryah abba Cilkiyya deqsita numuk ten.
Cilkiyyah abba Sallum deqsita numuk ten. Sallum abba kaadu Saaduk deqsita numuk ten. Saaduk abba Aciitub deqsita numuk ten.
Aciitub abba Amarya deqsita numuk ten. Amaryah abba Qadarya deqsita numuk ten. Qadaryah abba kaadu Maraayot deqsita numuk ten.
Maraayot abba Daracya deqsita numuk ten. Daracyah abba Quddi deqsita numuk ten. Quddih abba kaadu Bukki deqsita numuk ten.
Bukkih abba Absuwaq deqsita numuk ten. Absuwaq abba Fincas deqsita numuk ten. Fincas abba Alqedar deqsita numuk ten. Alqedar abba Haarunuk ten.
Qedra YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya Muusal oobise kitaabih addal tunkuttubem digga luk yaaxige numuk ten. Qedra YALLAY kay Dagelta kinnihiyyak barkat gee numuk teneemih sabbatah, malik esserra heem inkih kaah abeh. Artacsasta edde dardaareemih malcinhaytô-sanatat, Qedra, Baabelon rasuk Yarusalaam magaala fan yuduure. Seeka kee Leewih yooboke mara kee, Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril saare aba mara kee, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit dacayrih yan mara kee edde taamita mara kee, kalah yan Israayilih yooboke mari kaa'lih yuduure.
Qedra too mara luk, sanatak naharsi alsak naharsi ayrot Baabelon rasuk gexoh ugte. Safaral Yalli ken cateemih sabbatah, konoyhaytoh alsak naharsi ayrot Yarusalaam magaala gufen.
Yalli ken akah catem, Qedra Muusâ-kitaabal tunkuttubem baritak, tohim abinal asisa numuk yen. Tohimih addâ-faknu kee maqna Israayil mara barsaamat wakti isik rubsuusak suge.
Amoyti Artacsasta, YALLI Israayil ummatah Muusal ruube xinto intaamih adda digga haa Qedra deqsita numuy tohul kaxxa ixxiga lehiyyah yuktube warkat yecee.
Too warkatal axcuk yeneemih,
«A warkat rubtam, yoo kaxxa amoytah yan Artacsasta. Akah ruubam, sek Qedray qaraanal yan Yalli ruube xinto intam yaaxigehiyya. Naharak salaamatta kol qida.
«Anu malikih elle an rasul enna 'ta Israayil ummat kee Leewih yooboke mara kee seekak, Yarusalaam fan ko'lih gexam faxa marah ruksat keenih eceeh anik, gexxaasitoonay.
Yoo kee yo'lih yan malcina numuy fayu elle baahahiyya inkih, titta elle geyya hayneh: Yuudâ-rasu kee Yarusalaam addal tan ummatta, ku Dagelti ruube xintoy ku Dagelti koo akah yeemenehiyya intam, abaanam kee abe waanam wagitta'gidih koo rubnah nan.
Yoo kee anu fayu elle baaha mara titta elle geyya hayneh: Israayil mari yaqbude Dageltay Qibaadah-Qari akak Yarusalaam magaalal yanihiyyah migaaqal, acwah tacayu wayta dahab kee lakqo kol rubna.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, Baabelon rasuk gaabosseh sugte dahab kee lakqok tu cabe'kal gabat beyay; toh lih kaadu, Israayil ummatta kee seeka ken Dagelta elle yaqbuden qariy Yarusalaamal yanihiyyah isinni fayxiik ruuben acwa gabat bey.
«Tama lakqo anu axceemik tu cabe'kah edde duudus. Awurwa kee marwaay anaaqe kee, too saqa lih sadgatah yeceen daro kee qinabak bicsen kamri edde xaamma haay, Yalla kinni sin Dageltih Qibaadah Qariy Yarusalaamal xissiimehiyyak sadgat elle aban aracal sadgatah ucuya.
Lakqo kee dahabak raqqa 'tem, sin Dagelti elle faxxa haa innal, koo kee ko'lih tan seeka akah lowtaanamat culusa.
Yarusalaamal yan Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih taamah kol yaceenih sugen mingilwa kaadu too taamat culus.
Wohuk kalah Yalla kinni sin Dageltih Qibaadah-Qarih tu xiqta duyyey faxxahiyya tellek, doolat makdanak beytu duddah.
«Furaat Weeqaytuk Ayrô-culma le kabut Raaqa Rakaakayal tan doolat duyye dacrisa marak, ‹Sek Qedray qaraanal yan Yallih xintoh adda nagay yaaxigehiyya sin esserra heemik,
lakqok sidiica alfi kee affara boolih kiilo kee, tonnah kaadu, kamadik tabna alfih kiilo kee, qinabak bicsen kamrik kaadu namma alfih litrih amma 'tam fan kee, qasbok kaadu faxxa haah gide kaah ucuya› 'yaanam amrih siinil oobiseh an.
‹Tonna'mmay qaraanal yan Yallih naqbi yoo kee yi lakal dardaara maral akah oobe waa innah, Yalli isi Qibaadah-Qarih loowe duyye, usuk elle iyye innal, taamal asissaanamih qaadal digga xica.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih taamat yan marak seeka takkuu, Leewih yooboke mara takkuu, hinnay kaadu, saare aba mara takkuu, dacayrih yanoonuu, hinnay kaadu, kalah tan taama wokkel aba mara takkuu, hinnay kaadu, a qarih taamak faxe taamah taamitta 'ya marak qusuur numuk mabena. Tah intam yoo Amoyta Artacsasta.›
«Qedraw, Yalli koh yecee kasat, Furaat Weeqaytuk Ayrô-culma le kabut Raaqa Rakaakayal Yalla kinni ku Dageltih amri yaaxige marah, cokmaaba kee makaabon isih keenih hay. Yallih xinto intam aaxige waa mara baris.
Ku Dageltih xinto intam abe waa num yenekiiy, hinnay kaadu, rasi madqa cina num yenek, too numul digaalah rabi amaate kee, hinnay kaadu, baaxok kaa ayyaaqe kee, buxal luk suge yeddere duyye kaak bukkuse kee, woh akke wayteh casbit kaa hee yakkeenimi» 'yaanam elle tan warkat kaal yecee.
Qedra too warkatal tanim yuble waqdi iyyeemih, «YALLAY ni kaxxa abbobti elle aamanuk sugte Dagelta kinnihiyya fayla taafay. Yarusalaamal yan kay Qibaadah-Qari malik akah yassakaxxe innah abtem YALLA.
Yallih kacanuy digga lehiyyak gexxaamah, malik kee malikih fayu yecee mara kee, kay gubal yan cayla-leelah tan doolat marih garil, meqe intit yablen num ekke. YALLAY yi Dagelta kinni niya yot heeh, Israayil marak mango gulubuh yaabuke mari yo'lih yaduure'gidih ken lih yaabe yab yok oggoleh» 'yaanam iyye.

Artacsasta malikih yen dabaanal, Baabelon rasul baaxô-caboytiitih sugte abbobtiy Yarusalaam magaala fan Qedra lih tuduurehiyya akah aabakuk yen gulub kee, ken migaq ah kaana.
Fincas deqsitta gulubuh aabakuk yen Gersom deqsita num kee
Itaamar deqsitta gulubuh aabakuk yen Daaniyel deqsita num kee
Dawuduk rade marih numuy Sekanyah-Cattus deqsitahiyya yuduure.
Zakariyya deqsita numuy gulubuk Farqos deqsita marah yoobokehiyya, nasab akak amixxiguk yen bool kee kontom num luk yuduure.
Daracya baxa Elyahoqeenay deqsita numuy gulubuk Facat-Mooyab deqsita marah yoobokehiyya, namma boolih num luk yuduure.
Yacadiyel baxa Sekanya deqsita numuy Dattuq deqsita gulubuh gacisak yenehiyya, sidooca boolih num luk yuduure.
Yonaatan baxa Qebed deqsita numuy Qaadin deqsitta gulubuh yoobokehiyya, kontom num luk yuduure.
Qatalya baxa Yasaqya deqsita numuy Qeelam deqsitta gulubuh yoobokehiyya, malcina-tabanih num luk yuduure.
Mikaayil baxa Dabadya deqsita numuy Safatya deqsitta gulubuh yoobokehiyya, bacra-tabanih num luk yuduure.
Yaciyel baxa Qobadya deqsita numuy Yowab deqsitta gulubuh yoobokehiyya, namma bool kee taban kee bacra num luk yuduure.
Yosifya baxa Seloomit deqsita numuy Baani deqsitta gulubuh yoobokehiyya, bool kee lactam num luk yuduure.
Beebay baxa Zakariyyay Beebay deqsitta gulubuh yoobokehiyya, labaatanna kee bacra num luk yaduure.
Hakkatan baxa Yocanan deqsita numuy Qadgad deqsitta gulubuh yoobokehiyya, bool kee tabna num luk yuduure.
Tonnah kaadu Elifalat kee Yaqwel kee Samaqya deqsita sidooca numuy Adonikam deqsitta gulubuh aabakuk yenehiyya, lactam num luk Yarusalaam yuduure. Ta mari edde yuduurem, sarrî dabaanak ten.
Quutay kee Dakkur deqsitta namma numuy Bigway deqsita gulubuh aabakuk yenehiyya kaadu, malcina-tabanih num luk yuduure.
Acawa deqsitta magaala fan caxita dorih garil, Qedra yakkeenimiik ken kobxiseeh, tokkel sidooca ayroh gide sugen. Safarah ugte marih addat seeka tanim kee ane waytam gorrise waqdi, Leewih yooboke maray seekah gacsahiyya yemeeteh suge'mmay, gersi mari keenik mamattinna.
Saqoltih yen marak sagla numuh, «Ama» 'yaanamih farmo ruube. Tohum, Elqeeder kee Ariyal kee Samaqya kee Elnaatan kee Yaarib kee Elnaatan kee Naatan kee Zakariyya kee Masullam kee, kalah kaadu, Yoyyaarib kee Elnaatan deqsitta namma kabiirik ten.
Ta mari yemeete waqdi, Qiddo deqsita numuy Kasifya deqsita rasih marak abbah yenehiyya fan ken ruube. Ken akah ruubemii, kaa kee kay wakaliitittey Yalla kinni ni Dageltih Qibaadah-Qarit taamittahiyya, Qibaadâ-Qarit Yallih taamat taamitu waa mara neh ruubaana'gidik ten.
Yalla kinni ni Dagelti nee cateemih taagah, Sereebiya deqsita numuy Leewî kedok Macli deqsita gulubuh gacisak yeneeh, isi taamal dudda luk yenehiyya, xaylo kee tooboko fanal sittat taban kee bacra num akkuk ruuben.
Tonnah kaadu, Casaabiya kee Yasaqya deqsita namma numuy Leewî kedok Maraari deqsita gulubuh gacissahiyya kee, keenih ramad le labaatanni num ken lih hayya heenih ruuben.
Toh lih kaadu, namma bool kee labaatanni numuy Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit taamitak yenehiyya ruuben. Ta marak kaxxa abbobti, dumah yan saaku Leewih yooboke marah taamitaana'gidih doorimteh ten. Too taamah ken doortem, Malik Dawud kee kay gubal doolat taamat yen kaxxa-kaxxa mara. Too marih migaq inkih yuktubeenih yenen.
Acawa fan caxita dorih garil elle kobxen ikkel, ummattal amri oobiseeh, keenik exceemih, «Yalla kinni ni Dagelti a safar nel yaymaaquuy, nee kee ni xaylooy neddereemik inkih Yarusalaam fan amaanah nee gufsa'gidih, kaah soomaay rammita» keenik exce.
Kaadu keenik exceemih, «Anu dumah yan saaku Malikik, ‹Ni Dagelti isil yaamine marat barkat haah, darre isit caba mara fan mawagitaay, ken digaalah› 'yaanam exceh sugeemih sabbatah, sarra qaskaray faaris amok qeebi abtahiyya gital umeynitik nee dacrissa'gidih ‹Neh ucuya› 'yaanam, malikik axcem wacarriy yol tekke» exce.
Tonna leemiik soomneeh, abna safaral Yalla kinni ni Dagelti nee dacrisa'gidih, dooqa abne. Yalli kaadu too dooqa nek raabiteh.
Tohuk lakal, saqoltih ten seekah addak taban kee namma sek kee, kalah kaadu Leewih yooboke marak Sereebiya kee Casaabiya kee keenih ramad le tabna num doore.
Too waqdi malik kee kay gubal taamita maraay, fayu kaah yecee mara kee Israayil mari, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih taamat assa'gidih, yeceeh suge dahab kee lakqo kee kalah tan duyye miizaanal hayya heeh, kinnih gide ublek wadir too marih gabal hee.
Ken gabal hee duyye akkuk teneh gide ah teeti.
Lakqo labaatanna kee namma toon akkuk ten.
Taama edde aban mingilway lakqok bicseenihiyya bool akkuk teneeh; qilsah malcina-tabanih kiilo akkuk ten.
Dahab kaadu sidooca alfi kee affara boolih kiilo akkuk yen.
Dahabak bicsen sacni mangah labaatanna akkuk yeneeh; qilsah bacaar kee garab kiilo akkuk yen.
Nacaasak bicsen namma sacniy tuxxiiqik dahab gide lehiyya keenil ecee.
Too waqdi keenik exceemih, «YALLAY sin kaxxa abbobti doorehiyyah garil taahirik yan mara tekken. Ta dahab kee lakqo kee kalah tan duyyey isinni fayxiik YALLIH mattacoh baaheenihiyya kaadu, taahirik tan duyye tekke.
YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari guffa haytaanam fanah, ta duyye meqe innal daanisay amo akak wagita. Yarusalaam guftan saaku seeka edde tan golih adda beyay miizaanal haa. Tokkel seekak saqoltih yan mara kee, Leewî-kedok saqoltih yan mara kee, tonnah kaadu, Israayil ummattak saqoltih yan marih gabal heetton» keenik exce.
Tonna leemiik seeka kee Leewî-mara, Yallih Qibaadah Qariy Yarusalaamal yanihiyya fan guffu haanam, too dahabaay lakqo kee wohuk kalah tan duyyeh dacayrit gacen.
Sanatak inikhaytoh alsak taban kee nammeyhaytoh ayro Acawâ-Dora deqsita dorak ugunneeh, Yarusalaam fan haysinne. Safaral ni Dagelti ne'lih yeneeh, naqboytit kee gital raarisak sugta umeynitik nee cate.
Sarrak Yarusalaam gufne. Too waqdi sidooca ayroh gide gexô-taqabik ufuy rubsutak sugne.
Fereyhaytoh ayrol Yalla kinni ni Dageltih Qibaadah-Qari fan genxeeh, lakqo kee dahab kee kalah tan duyyey bahnehiyyak tu raaqise'kal miizaanal hayya hayneh, Mereemot deqsita seekih gabal hayne. Mereemot Uriyya baxak ten. Kaa'lih inki sek kee Leewih yooboke marih nammay suge. Tohum Fincas baxa sek Alqedar deqsita sek kee Leewih yooboke namma numuy migaaqah Yaasuwá-Yoodabad kee Binnúy-Noqadya akak axcuk yeneenihiyyak ten.
Bahha hayne duyye inkih miizaanal haynek lakal, lowwa hayneh takkeh gide akak warkatal nuktube.
Allî-baaxok uduurra ye mari, Israayil doore Dageltih migaaqal cado akak cararisan saq sadgatah baahen. Sadgatah inkih tan Israayil ummattah migaaqal saqak baaheenim, taban kee namma awur kee marwak sagla-taban kee lica maruyuuy, anaaqek malcina-taban kee malcina anaqtuk ten. Too saq inkih yusguudeenih, cado akak cararisen. Tohuk kalah, isinni dambi kalootuh wadarak taban kee namma dabeela baahen.
Sarrak malik yuktubeh nel yecee warkatay gabat bahnehiyya Furaat Weeqaytuk Ayrô-culma le qaxat Raaqa Rakaakayah abbobtih gabal hayne. Too abbobti ummat kee Yallih Qibaadah Qaril aban qibaadah catoh qaadah faxximma 'tam aben.

Tohum inkih abeenik lakal, Israayilik saqoltih yan marak garab yemeeteeh, yok iyyeenimih, «Seeka kee Leewih yooboke mara kee kalah tan ummatta, a cuggaaneh keenik yan mara kee oson edde asan umâ-yabulih tan qaadoodik yaxxeeroonu cineenih. Too maray keenik cuggaaneh yanihiyya duma a baaxol sugen Kanqaan kee Ciita kee Feriida kee Yabuusa kee Qammon kee Mooyab kee Masri kee Amoora mari abak suggu 'ye umâ-yabulih tan taama aban.
Israayilih yooboke mari isi kee isi xayloh, allî-marih baxuw rihimih abitaanam baahen. Yalli doore maray taahirik yanihiyyak sugeeni'mmay caraamiteenih. Kedoh abbobti kee doolatak kaxxa aracat yan mari ta uma taamak foocat gace» 'yaanam yok iyyen.
Toh oobbe waqdi, yot tekke niyâ-diglok gexxaamah sara innik qanxiseeh, amô-xagorta kee deben innik mugseh, abeh an haggah gomboduk bagul daffee.
Bari radda 'yeh magrib waqla aban sadgatah sahda amma 'tam fan, tokkel elle wariggat sugeeh; Yalli marin baaxok yuduure mari abe dambik iyyeh sugem aaxaguk suge mari, ahak maca net akkeleh kaxxam cunxiteeniih; yol gaaboowen.
Sarrak magrib yekkeeh, sadgat edde aban wakti xayyoowe waqdi, Yallah rammitak nadaamah daffeyak elle suge aracak, qanxixe sara xagarat luk, solla exce. Tohuk lakal gulubuh gacca exceh, YALLAY yi Dagelta kinnihiyyal dooqah gaba ruube.
Too waqdi dooqah exceemih, «Yi Dageltaw, wacarriye waytam yoo ikkal, ni dambi mangah caddo cabeeh xexxaarah qaran eleele. Tonna kinnuk, yi Dageltaw, koo kallacam wacarriy yol tekke.
Ni kaxxa abbobtih dabaanaay, akke, neey ku mara kinnihiyya dambi abittok way maadayinnino. Nanu abne dambik gexxaamah, neey ni malikwa kee seekak nakkeemiik, marin malikwah milkih gacneeh; nee buubeeniih, nee qideeniih, seewah casbit yabbixen marih gurral nee been. Caddi akah abe waan maray qaybit radehiyya nekkeh sugneeh, uxih too marah akah nan.
«Tonna'mmay YALLAW, ni Dageltaw, dago uddur kinni way, maqaaneh addat nee sugusse. Baatik saaboh raaqe marak edde sugne naqoosinnak nee kalteh. A baaxoy taahirik tanil amaanah nee tabbixe. Edde sugne naqoosinnak dagom kalla nee hayteh, qusba manot nee hayte.
Naqoosah sugne'mmay, kooy ni Dagelta kinnihiyya nee mamaaqilinnaay, ku kacanuy aggiriqe sinnihiyya nee dacrisak, Fursi-malik ni yab oggola num abte. Ku qariy yiddigilleh sugehiyya xisnuuy, akkel Yarusalaam kee Yuudâ-rasul amaanah xinna'gidih, akke nee ruubaamih taama too malikih gabat absisse.
«Hay, taway tekkeemik maca innuu, ni Dageltaw? Duma ku naqoosah ten ku nabuwwah gabat neh rubte amri cinneh. A saaku kaadu ku amri cinaanamat qaginneh. Too nabuwwa, ‹Ama dabaaqah elle gactoonu waytan baaxo, tet addal yan marih sabbatah, nadaasa tekke› 'yaanam nek iyyeenih yenen. ‹Ta mari ama rasuk woo exxaay a exxa umâ-yabulih tan taamat baysen› 'yaanam iyyeenih yenen.
‹Tonna leemiik, ama baaxol sin doolat qande bahtam faxxeeniih, isin kaadu meqe'nnal xintaanam faxxeeniih, sin baaxo nagrah baxak baxal raqtam faxxeenik, tet addal yan marih sayyol marihimina; isinni xaylo kaadu keenit rihime kala. Amaan geyi ken mahana; abaanam faxaanam gabal bici keenik mahana› 'yaanam too nabuwwa duma nek inteh ten.
Ni Dageltaw, abneh nan kaxxa dambi kee umaanek gexxaamah, digaala net tekkek sarra kinni way, ni umaane takkeh gidel nee madigaalinnitooy, baye marak saaboh sinam cabte.
Hay, taway, ku amri cinaanamat qagtaanam bictam kinnii? A maray umâ-yabulih tan taamat asahiyyak digibnam bictam kinnii? Ku amri cinne nee tekkek, ku kaxxa bagcarra nee aleelele. Nee baysettooh, addunyal saaboh num nek macabta.
YALLAY Israayil ummatta doorehiyyaw, qadli lem kooy; tonna'mmay ta saaku fan abne umaaneh saabo nee macabsiisinnito. Abba hayne umaane ninnik away qaddosnah nan. Ku foocah elle namaate inna mannu» 'yaanam exce.

Qedra baaxok bagul afah radda 'yeh, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih foocal aben umaanet yaabakaay, weeqak dooqa abak suge waqdi, Israayil ummattak labha kee agabu kee urruk mangom xaqul kaak gaabowwa 'yeenih kaxxam weeqen.
Sarrak Yaciyél-Sekanya deqsita numuy Qeelam gulubuh gacsahiyya Qedrak iyyeemih, «Marin agabuk digibne waqdi, Yallay ni Dagelta kinnihiyyal imaan hee waynem deqsitta. Tohu'mmay uxih Yallal niya linoh.
Tanna kinnuk, taway ta agabuy ginnaaqot nabbixe kee keenit xalle xaylo buxak ninnik ken xiiriyennoomuh, Yallah qahdi cullay. Koo kee kok kalah yan maray Yallih amri yassakaxxehiyya aba nek axcinnaanim abenno. Yalla kinni ni Dageltih amri iyyam abenno.
A taama absiisaanam kol tan. Nanu koo katayennok, atu nee absis; a taamal digga 'xic» iyye.
Too waqdi Qedra, Sekanyak iyyem abaana'gidih, seekah abbobti kee Leewih yooboke mara kee kalah raqqa 'ye mara xibsiise.
Sarrak Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih foocay elle sugehiyyak ugutta 'yeeh, Qibaadâ-Qarik Elyaasib baxa Yahoocanan le goli fan gexe. Tokkel inkih yan bar, marin baaxok yuduure mari abeh yan umaaneh kaxxam qaadeh, maaqok ligat xiineeh, leek bakaarat xiine.
Sarrak, «Marin baaxoy elle sugehiyyak yuduureeh, away Yarusalaam kee Yuudâ rasul enna 'ya maraw, tikki 'taanamak Yarusalaam fanah ama» 'yaanamih farmo ruuben.
«Gulubwah saqolti titta geytaamah: ta amri oobba heeh sidooca ayroh addat amaate wee numuk edderra heem kaak beelon. Toh lih kaadu Israayil numuh maraaqay kedok awqele» 'yaanam axcuk keenih ruuben.
Sidooca ayroh addat, sanatak sagalhaytoh alsak labaatanhaytoh ayro, Yuudâ rasu kee Benyam rasul sugga 'te labha inkih Yarusalaam fan temeeteeh; Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih daaratal mododen. Too ayro kaxxa rob radeeh; takkay immay akah yemeeten qaadak maca net akkeleh kaxxam cunxiten. Kabuk teenak rob keenil radeeh; kabuk teenak maca net akkele meysih axaxo keenit hayte.
Qedra yemeeteeh foocal keenik sollu 'yeeh, keenik iyyeemih, «Isiniiy Yallak texxeereeniih, marin agabul rihimten. Duma abten umaanek gibdi umaane abten.
Taway, abten dambik YALLAY sin kaxxa abbobti doorehiyyal uduura. Yalli faxam aba. Baaxol sin lih yan marin marak exxeera. Ken agabuy ginnaaqot tabbixeeni xiiriya; nikac keenik kala» 'yaanam keenik iyye.
Usuk too yaabak gaba kale waqdi, kobxeh suge mari inkih anay fayya haak, «Atu nek inxicca 'tam inkih abnam nel tan.
Tonna'mmay ummatta mangoh taniih, rob kaadu radah yaniih, akkel gubbik bagul sollam dudnah manan. Ah kaadu mango mari gaba edde le dambi kinnuk, inki ayro kee namma ayrot gaba akak kalaanam hinna.
Tonna kinnuk abeh meqeemih, a caagid nek saqoltih yan mari Yarusalaamal elle raqqa 'yeh adda akak wagtam tayse. Sarrak marin marih agabu ginnaaqot le mari, keenih heen waktil, isih elle yan magaalak abbobtih yan mara kee cokmaaba gabat luk yamaatay. Tonnal Yallay ni Dageltah yanihiyya ahimih giddinaamak neh abe kaxxa naqabu neh cabele» iyyen.
Ta mari baahe mala, Qasahál-Yonaatan kee Tikwâ-Yacdeeya deqsitta labhak kalih mari inkih oggoleh. Masullam deqsita num kee Sabbatay deqsita numuy Leewih yoobokehiyya too namma numih qaxat gacen.
Ta marak kalih maray elle suge baaxok yuduurehiyya ta mala oggoleeh; too waqdi sek Qedra gulubwah saqoltih addak yeexegen mara doore. Sanatak tabanhaytoh alsak inikhaytoh ayro too maray dooreenihiyya ken akah dooren taama qimbisen.
Sidooca alsih addat marin marah yooboke agabu ginnaaqot yabbixe marih qaadak adda tabba 'yeenih yemeeten.
Marin marah yooboke agabu ginnaaqot abbaxuk suge marih migaq ah kaana.
Seekak marin marah yooboke agabu ginnaaqot abbaxuk sugtem, Maqseyaahu kee Elqeeder kee Yaarib kee Gedalya deqsitta labha. Too mari Yahuuxadák-Yaasuwa kee kay toobokok rade marak ten.
Ta mari marin marah yooboke agabuy ginnaaqot abbaxuk sugeeni cabeloonumih xagana culen. Edde asen dambih kaqalso takke'gidih, kulli num keenik maruw sadgatah yusguude.
Immar deqsita gulubuk Canaani kee Dabadya deqsita namma num kaadu abbaxuk sugte.
Caarim deqsita gulubuk Maqseyaahu kee Eliyyas kee Samaqya kee, Yaciyel kee Quddiyya deqsita mari abbaxuk suge.
Fascur gulubuk Elyoqeenay kee Maqseyaahu kee Ismaaqil kee Netanel kee Yoodabad kee Elqasa deqsita mari abbaxuk suge.
Leewî-kedoh yooboke marak, Yoodabad kee Simqi kee, Keelaya deqsita numuy bagulleytah Kaliita deqsitahiyya kee, Fatacya kee Yuuda kee Elqeeder deqsita mari abbaxuk suge.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril saare abak yen marak Elyaasib deqsita num abbaxuk suge.
Qibaadâ-Qarih dacayrit yen marak Sallum kee Teelem kee Uuri deqsita mari abbaxuk suge.
Wohuk kalah tan ummatak:
Farqos gulubuk Ramiya kee Yiddiya kee Malkiya kee Miyyamin kee Alqedar kee gersi Malkiya kee Banaaya deqsita mari abbaxuk suge.
Qeelam deqsita gulubuk Mattanya kee Zakariyya kee Yaciyel kee Qabdi kee Yareemot kee Eliyyas deqsita mari abbaxuk suge.
Dattuq gulubuk, Elyoqeenay kee Elyaasib kee Mattanya kee Yareemot kee Dabad kee Qadiida deqsita mari abbaxuk suge.
Beebay gulubuk Yahoocanan kee Cananiya kee Dabbay kee Qatlay deqsita mari abbaxuk suge.
Baani deqsita gulubuk Masullam kee Malluk kee Qadaaya kee Yaasub kee Saal kee Yareemot deqsita mari abbaxuk suge.
Facat-Mooyab deqsita gulubuk Qadna kee Kalal kee Banaaya kee Maqseyaahu kee Mattanya kee Baxalel kee Binnuy kee Manasse deqsita mari abbaxuk suge.
Caarim deqsita gulubuk Elqeeder kee Yissiya kee Malkiya kee Samaqya kee Simqoon kee Benyam kee Malluk kee Samarya deqsita mari abbaxuk suge.
Casum deqsita gulubuk kaadu Mattanay kee Mattatta kee Dabad kee Elifalat kee Yareemay kee Manasse kee Simqi deqsita mari abbaxuk suge.
Baani deqsita gulubuk Maqdi kee Qamram kee Uuwal kee Banaaya kee Beedaya kee Kaluhi kee Wanya kee Mareemot kee Elyaasib kee Mattanya kee Mattanay kee Yaqsaw deqsita mari abbaxuk suge.
Binnuy deqsita gulubuk Simqi kee Selemya kee Naatan kee Qadaaya kee Maknadbay kee Sasay kee Saray kee Qadrel kee Selemya kee Samarya kee Sallum kee Amarya kee Yuusuf deqsita mari abbaxuk suge.
Nabo deqsita gulubuk kaadu Yaqiiyal kee Mattitya kee Dabad kee Dabiina kee Yaddaw kee Ayyuqel kee Banaaya deqsita mari abbaxuk suge.
Ta mari inkih ginnaaqot abbaxuk yenem, marin marah yaabuke agabuk ten. Nikac keenik kaleeniih, keenit xalen xaylo kaadu buxak xiiriyeenih.

Cakliyah baxi Nacmiya dudda luk abe taama ah teeti.
Anu, Artacsasta Fursih malik edde yekke labaatanhaytô sanatat, Kislaw deqsita alsat, Suusa deqsitta inaytâ-magaalal en.
Canaani deqsita yi toobokoyti Yuudâ-rasuk dago mara luk yemeete waqdi, Baabelon rasu fan seewah beenih sugen maray Yarusalaam fan yuduurehiyya
Too mari yok iyyemii, «Baabeloonuk saaboh isi baaxo fan yuduure mari kaxxa gadaamah addat yaniih; woo baaxol suge mari ken bursutah. Yarusalaam magaalat maroh tan gasoosay tiddigillehiyya uxih bicsa mali. Magaalah adda akak culan culmay duma carriseenihiyya uxih bica magenna» 'yaanam yok iyyen.
Too xaagu oobbe waqdi, daffa exceh weeqe. Dago ayroora rookat sugeeh, too ayroora maaqo xage'kal suge. Yalla kallaceeh,
exceemih, «YALLAW, Qaraanal yan Dageltaw, atu naba Dagelta kinnitooh; nanu kok meysinnah. Koo kicna mara kee ku amri oggola mara lih abte bica xagura Dagelta kinnito. Woo mara luk lito kacani mayambaxa.
Yooy ku naqasu kinni wagga heey! Anu ku naqoosah bar kee laqo aba dooqah ayti ucuyaay yok oobbey. Nanu Israayil marak dambi le taamah taaminnem aaxigeh. Yoo kee anu akak rade yi kaxxa abbobti dambi le taamat asne.
Ceele-waytam kol bahneeh, atu aba inteh nee akah amrissem maabinnino. Muusay ku naqasuh yanih gabat neh rubte xinto aba intam maabinnino.
Yallaw, duma Muusak intem kassa heey! ‹Kee Israayil ummatey, imaan yol hee wayteenik, marin marih addat sin fixixiseyyo.
Tonna'mmay tohuh, yol tuduureenik, aba siinik axcem oggolla hayteenih abteenik, inkih yan baadal sin fixixisaamah, yoo elle taqbudoonuh doore arac fan sin gacseyyo› nek inteh ten.
«Goytaw, ta mari ku maraay ku naqoosa. Isi kaxxa qande kee caylat ken waddeh.
Yooy ku naqasuh yani kee ku naqoosay ku migaq taynabehiyya abta dooqa nek macinin. A saaku faxam yoh aba'gidih, malik bagu yoh xabbacos» 'yaanam exce.
Too saaku taamah luk enem, malikih qinab elle yaaqube kobbaaya xayyoosa marak abbah en.

Tu edde taade Artacsasta deqsitak yen malik edde reede labaatanhaytô sanatak migaaqah Niisan deqsita alsat, malik qinab kamri elle yaaqube'kkel, too kamri gabal kaak hee. Dumak kay foocal farcatal taamitak suge. Woo saaku faxe waynaan ceelo yok yubleh.
Too waqdi «A saaku maca geytee? Yambulle biyak way mantuk, litom maca faxe waynaanaay? Atu litom niyâ xiglo yot celta» yok iyye.
Too waqdi warigga exceeh,
sarrak kaak exceemih, «Yi malikow, qumri kok yaxxeeray. Yi kaxxa abbobtih kabri elle yan magaala abur tekkeeh, tet akak culan culma carriseenih; tah inkih aaxagih faxe-waynaan mannal sinniyo?» exce.
Malik too waqdi, «Away hay, maca koh abam yok faxxaah?» yok iyye.
Too waqdi qaraanal yan Yalla kallaceeh,
sarrak malikik exceemih, «Yi malikow, yooy ku naqasuh yanih temqeeh, anu koo esseram oggoltek, Yuudâ-rasu kee anu akak rade yi kaxxa abbobtih kabri elle yan magaala gexxa exceh nammeyhaak xisa'gidih, yoo rubtam kok faxa» exce.
Malik too waqdi isi barra luk daffeyak sugeeh, anu inxicca excem yoh oggoleh. Sarrak «Hay, ta safarat magide sugettoo? Maa waqdi aduuretto?» yok iyye. Toh kinnih gide kaah warseh.
Sarrak kaak exceemih, «Yi malikow, yoh idnissek, Furaat Weeqaytuk Ayrô-culma le kabut Raaqa Rakaakayih abbobtih yan marah, Yuudâ-rakaakay gexa'gidih, warkat yoh taktubem faxa.
Tonnah kaadu, ku garbot dacayrih yan numuy Asaf deqsitahiyyah warkat yoh aktubetto» kaak exce. Woo warkatal farmoh intaamah, ‹Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik xaqut yan reebuk xisen qarih afah alifuh edde heen coox kee, magaalat maroh yan gidaar edde xisan coox kee, kalah kaadu, anu dabaaqah edde gacu waa qarih coox yoh ucuya› 'yaanam kaak yoh inxic» kaak exce. Yalli yo'lih yeneemih sabbatah, malik anu kaa esserem yoh abeh.
Tohuk kalah qaskar abbobti kee faaris amok qeebi abta qaskar wakalih yoh yecee. Sarrak safarah Furaat Weeqaytuk Ayrô-culma le kabut Raaqa Rakaakay fan gexe. Tokke gufe waqdi malikik baahe warkat too rasih abbobtil ecee.
Sanballat deqsita numuy Beet-Coron deqsita magaalal yooboke kee Toobiya deqsita numuy Qammon rasul doolat saqalah yenehiyya, Israayil ummatah meqe taamat asam faxa num yemeete 'yaanam yoobben waqdi, kaxxam faxe cineenih.
Sarrak anu tokkeek Israayil rasu fan gexeeh, Yarusalaam gufe. Sidooca ayroh gide Yarusalaam xisney Yalli yi gabat absiisam faxehiyya numuh mawarsinniyo. Sarrak barak gude ugutta exceeh, wakalih dago mara inni lih hayya heeh gexe. Amot akak en merraytuk sah kalah merraytu mabennino.
Barat edde, Goloh-Afa deqsitta afak gacca exceh magaalak tattab-tattab gexeh, Gawi-Buyyi deqsita aracak gacca exceh, Guddaafâ-Qidim deqsitta afa guffa haam fan, magaalat maroh ten gasoy tiddigille kee magaalah afoofiy carartehiyya cubbusak gexe.
Sarrak Raceynah Afa deqsitta afak Amoyti-Dora deqsita arac fan gufe. Tokke gufe waqdi, amot akak gexak suge merrayti gita weeh;
tohih sabbatah Kidroon-Golok adda oobba exceh, gaso elle tani'nna wagitak gexe. Sarrak akak emeete gitaak gacca exceh, Goloh-Afa deqsitta afak magaala cule.
Anu elle suge ikke kee abak sugem, baaxoh abbobtik num aaxaguk mananna. Anu kaadu taham fan, yok kaxxih Yahuuduh yooboke maraay seekaay saqoltih yan maraay baaxoh abbobti kee wohuk kalah yan maray a taama yo'lih abu waahiyyak, a gasoosa xisam faxam numuh mawarsinniyo.
Takkay immay magaala wagtek lakal keenih warseeh, keenik exceemih, «Labhay, edde nan gibdaabina wagitay. Yarusalaam abur tekkeeh, tet akak culak yenen afoofi gira edde ruubeenih cararte. Away magaalâ-gasoosa xissa hayneh, edde nan qaybik ninni nayyaaqay› keenik exce.
Sarrak Yalli yoh abem kee yoo elle cate'nna keenih warseeh, malik kaadu yok iyyem keenih warseh.
Oson too waqdi «Hayya hay xiso qimbisnay» iyyeeniih, gasoosa xisaana'gidih bical gacen.
Sanballat kee Toobiya kee uli Qarabtoytay migaaqah Gesam deqsitahiyya nanu abnam fanxam yoobben waqdi, asalah nel hayya heeniih, «Away abtaanam takkaleenim macaay? Malikik naqboytit isinni abtaanam faxxaanam hinna!» anqaasak iyyen.
Too waqdi anu keenil gacseemih, «Qaraanal yan Yalli abnam fanxam gabal nek bicsele. Nanu kay naqoosa kinninooh, a magaala xisenno ikkal, fanat manaadiya. Sin tiyah tu gactek, Yarusalaam magaala siinih dumaak takkem luk masuginnaay, a way uxih siinih takkem mali» keenik exce.

Magaalak gasoosa elle xisnem annak ten. Eliyaasib deqsita num kee kaal luk tan seeka taama qimbisak, Illi-Afa deqsitta afa xisen. Too afah xisnek gaba kalen saaku, afa Yallah taahirroyseeniih; culmah alifih edde haan coox edde heen. Seeka, sahda akak yabloonuh xisen Bool-Qari deqsita qarik xabba haanamaay sahda akak yabloonuh xisen Cananal-Qari fanah amma 'yaanam, a gaso Yallah taahirroysen.
Yerikô-mari woo gasok seeka xisse exxal katayta exxa xisen. Imrí-Dakkur kaadu ciggilta exxa xise.
Hassana-gulubuh yooboke mari Kullum-Afa deqsitta afa xisen. Sarrak too culmah alifih edde haan coox kee woo alifik adda le kabuk tabtabbih haan coox kee birta akah bicsen.
Uriyyá-Mareemot deqsita numuy Hakkox deqsita numuk baxi baxah yanihiyya woo exxal katayta exxa bicse. Barkiyyá-Masullam deqsita numuy Masedbal deqsita numuk baxi baxah yanihiyya ciggilta exxa bicse. Baqná-Saaduk kaadu ciggilta exxa bicse.
Takooqa deqsitta magaalak yemeete mari kaadu ciggilta exxa akak bicsen. Takkay immay woo magaalak abbobtih yen mari, ken akah amrisen quukat axawah raqta taama cineenih.
Faseeyác-Yoyaadaq kee Basodyá-Masullam deqsita num Yasaanah-Afa deqsitta afa bicsen. Sarrak too mari too culmah alifih edde haan coox kee woo alifik adda le kabuk tabtabbih haan coox kee birta akah bicsen.
Gibqon magaalak yemeete Malaatiya deqsita numuuy, Meerom magaalak yemeete Yaadon deqsita numuuy, tonnah kaadu Mixfa kee Gibqon magaalak yemeete mari ciggilta exxa bicsen. Mixfa, Furaat Weeqaytuk Ayrô-culma le Kabut Raaqa Rasih abbah qari elle yen araca.
Carhayá-Quddiyal deqsita numuy dahab bicisak yenehiyya ciggilta exxa bicse. Qatri bicisak yen Cananiya deqsita num ciggilta exxay Kaxxa-Gidaar deqsita arac fan guftahiyya bicse.
Cuúr-Rafaaya deqsita numuy Yarusalaam magaalak exxak teenak abbah yenehiyya kaadu ciggilta exxa bicse.
Carumáf-Yadaqya too exxal katayta exxay isi buxat xayuk tene bicse. Casabnayá-Cattus kaadu ciggilta exxa bicse.
Caarím-Malkiya kee Facat-Mooyab baxay Cassub deqsitahiyya nammayak titta lih, aki exxa kee gasoh amol sahda yabloonuh xisen Muufê-Qari deqsitak yen arac bicsen.
Hallocás-Sallum deqsita numuy Yarusalaam magaalak exxak teenak abbah yenehiyya kaadu ciggilta exxa bicse. Too taamal say-xaylo kaa catte.
Dannowac deqsita aracal dabaqah suge mara kee Cannun deqsita num Goloh-Afa deqsitta afa bicisse. Too culmah alifih edde haan coox kee woo alifik adda le kabuk tabtabbih haan coox kee birta akah bicsen. Tokkek Guddaafâ-Qidim deqsitta afa fan raqta exxay xexxaarah alfi cusul takkehiyya bicsen.
Rekáb-Malkiya deqsita numuy Beet-Cakkarem deqsita aracih abbah yenehiyya Guddaafâ-Qidim deqsitta afa bicse. Sarrak too culmah alifih edde haan coox kee woo alifik adda le kabuk tabtabbih haan coox kee birta akah bicsen.
Kolhadá-Sallum deqsita numuy Mixfa deqsita rasuk abbah sugehiyya Raceynah Afa deqsitta afa bicse. Sarrak culmah alifih amo xiseeh; alifih edde haan coox kee woo alifit tabtabbih haan coox kee birta akah bicse. Saalec-Dora deqsita aracay malik bustaanak elle yamaateenihiyyal sugte gaso, Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatak akak ooban mawqeena fan, bicisak baahe.
Qadbúk-Nacmiya deqsita numuy Beet-Xur magaalak exxak teenak abbah yenehiyya kaadu ciggilta exxay malikwâ-kabri elle yenehiyya kee gabak bicsen dora elle yan ikke kee Agiirâ-qari elle yan arac fan bicse.
Leewih yooboke mari kaadu gasoosak wohuk raqte exxaaxih bicsat gacen. Baaní-Racum exxak teena bicse. Casaabiya deqsita numuy Kaqiila deqsita rakaakayak garabak abbah yenehiyya tokkel, buxah yen marih afak, katayta exxa bicse.
Cendád-Bawway deqsita numuy kaadu woo rakaakayak garabak abbah yenehiyya ciggilta exxa bicse.
Yaasuwá-Qeder deqsita numuy Mixfa magaalak abbah yenehiyya silac qari elle yawqen gitat foocah raqta exxa xise. Toh, daaba le arac kinni.
Dabbáy-Baaruk wohul katayta exxa bicseeh, Elyaasib deqsita kaxxa seekih yen numih buxah culma fan xisak baahe.
Uriyyá-Mareemot deqsita numuy Hakkox deqsita numuk baxi baxah yenehiyya tokkeek Elyaasib qari edde yaade exxa fanah bicse.
Tohul katayta arooca seeka bicisse. Naharak Yarusalaam magaalak dariifal buxah ten seeka ciggilta exxa bicisse.
Benyam kee Cassub kaadu wohul katayta exxay ken buxat foocah raqtahiyya bicsen. Maqseyaahû-Qadarya deqsita numuy Qananya deqsita numuk baxi baxah yenehiyya, wokkeek elle yamaaten exxay kay buxak foocat raqtahiyya bicse.
Cendád-Binnuy wohul katayta exxa bicse. Tohuuy, Qadaryah buxaak gaso akak makkinta araca. Tohuk lakal, daaba luk yen arac fan xise.
Udáy-Falal kaadu wokkel katayta exxa bicse. Tohumu, daaba le arac kee, fayya le aracat raaqa malik-qarih-daaratal qaskar-elle-gacta-aracih amol yan qariy sahda akak yabloonuh xiseenihiyyak foocat raqta exxak ten. Farqós-Fadaaya wokkek elle yamaaten exxa bicseeh, xisne ayrô-mawqa le kabuk Leeh-Afa deqsitta afa kee sahda akak yabloonu xisen qari fanah abe. Too taamal kaa catak tenem, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit taamah yen maray guubuh magaalak Oofal deqsita caafatal sugehiyyak ten.
Takooqâ-mari wohuk elle yamaaten exxah bicsat gacen. Oson too taamah taamiteenimih, tah nammeyhaytoh addak ten. Tohum akak qimbiseenim, kaxxam amo xer qariy dacayri amook akak abaanahiyyat foocah raaqa aracak xabba heenih, Oofal deqsita caafatal tan gasoh xaquh amma 'yaanam fan yan aracak ten.
Tonnah kaadu, seekay hoor takkehiyya wokkel katayta exxaaxi bicisse. Oson bicsa akak qimbiseenim, Faras-Mawqa deqsitta afa. Tokkek xabba heenih kulli num keenik isinni buxak foocat tan ikke bicisak baahen.
Immár-Saaduk kaadu wokkel katayta exxa bicse. Tohum kay qarit foocah yan aracak ten. Sekanyá-Samaqya deqsita numuy Yallih Qibaadah Qarik Ayrô-Mawqah Afa dacrisak yenehiyya ciggilta exxa bicse.
Selemyá-Cananya kee Cannun deqsita numuy Xalaf deqsita numuk lab xaylok leceyhaytô-baxah yenehiyya wokkel katayta exxa bicsen. Oson taamiteenimih, tah nammeyhaytoh addak ten. Barkiyyá-Masullam deqsita num kaadu wokkel katayta exxay kay qarik foocah tanihiyya bicse.
Malkiya deqsita numuy dahab bicisak yenehiyya wokkek elle yamaaten exxa bicse. Too num tokkeek Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit taamita mara kee tellemmo mari edde suge qariy Mafdaga-Afa deqsitta afat foocah raaqahiyya kee gaso akak makkinta aracay amol qari akak yanihiyya fan bicse.
Dahab bicisak yen mara kee tellemmo abak yen mari ellecaboh exxa bicsen. Gaso akak makkinta aracay amol qari akak yanihiyyaak, Illi-Afa deqsita arac fan bicsen.

Sanballat deqsita numuh tu gactek, nanu Yahuud marak tiddigille gaso xisnam yoobbe waqdi, bagul nabam yinqibeeh, too waqdi nel anqaaseh.
Isi kataysis kee Samaariyah qaskarih foocal, «A Yahuud-gulalwa abtam macaay? A magaala nammeyhaak xiseloonum maay yakkalen? Sadgat abeenik sa inki ayrot xisnek gaba kaleloonum yakkaleeni innaa? Tittin bagul yan yiddigille xeetiy cararehiyyak gasoosa xiseloonum yakkaleeni innaa?» iyye.
Toobiya deqsita num kaadu kay garik soolak suge. Too num iyyeemih, «Taway gasok teena xissoonu waanam yoh ceelan. Wakri ibah yewqek raqta gaso hinna» iyye.
Toh oobbe waqdi dooqa abeeh exceemih, «Ni Dageltaw, a mari net aba anqas oobbey. Oson net aban xaafi keenil yadaaray. Edderri heenim marin gadda keenik takkay. Marin baaxo seewah ken beyoonay.
Neey xisnet yanihiyya xaafen. Yallaw, a qellat kee dambik qafu keenih maxcin» exce.
Sarrak wadir ninni taama fan gacne. Ummatta xisnet baguuk taamitteeh tisissikeemih sabbatah, xisne gudel nabbixe.
Sanballat kee Toobiya deqsita marih nammay kee Qarabah yooboke mara kee Qammon mara kee Asdood-magaalah-marah tu gactek, nanu Yarusalaamah gasoh xisne meqe innal abnaah, fanaafanat sugte foxooxa kibneh duudusnem yoobben waqdi, kaxxam keenit toome.
Tonna-leemiik Yarusalaam fan amma 'yeenih qeebi net abaanaah, ummatta akah baditta innah abaanamal malsen.
Nanu ninni kabuk kaadu ni Dagelta fan dooqa abak sugneeh; bar kee laqoh ken mamaata wagtu waa mara dacayrih hayne.
Yuudâ-mari aba qadar luk yen. Qadarah axcuk yenemii:
«Taamita mari nek taqbeeh,
maqar cabeenih, taaneenih.
Abuuruh raaqe gidaarih
xeetik weero nee taqbisse;
tamurruqe taama hinna» iyyen.
Ni naqboytit kaadu iyyeemih, «Garcik keenil gexxaay, maysattaka keenit abbaay, taama akah solta innah qidda ken haynam fanah, mayaaxigaanaay mayablan» iyyen.
Takkay immay buxa ken garil luk yen Yahuuduh yooboke ni mari kulli waqdi, «Nee fanah uduuraay, naqboytak isinni cata» nek axcuk yenen.
Tohuk gexxaamah ummatta tikyal hayya heeh, gulub-gulubul ken kurra heeh, taama gaba elle kale'kah tan aroocak darre le kabul, seef kee macaxuuy gayse kee gaysê-xaylo luk, dacayrih ken hee.
Taham cubbusek lakal, ugutta exceh, saqoltih yan maraay, baaxoh abbobti kee wohuk kalah tan ummattak exceemih, «Naqboytiitik mameysitina. Isinni tooboko kee isinni xaylooy isinni agabu kee isinni buxah taagah qeebi keenit abtaanama. YALLAY nabna leeh cunxo sahdat qidahiyya kassa haay, mameysitina» keenik exce.
Sarrak ni naqboytit neh malisak sugen mala keenik geyneemih xaagu geenih; edde sugen mala Yalli keenil bice kalem yeexegeenih. Tohuk lakal nanu nakkeemik ninni taamah nuduure.
Too ayrok wadir yi marak garab taamita waqdi, raaqe garab gob kee macaxuuy gaysê-baxa kee qeebil silaacak waasoh xagarat sartanah haan birta haysitta heenih dacayrih gacak yenen. Yuudak saqoltih yen mari kaadu xisot yan marak darre le kabut gaceeniih, cato neh yekken.
Quuka beya mara kinni way, xisne edde aban duyye gabak teenah abbaxukuuy, gabak teenat silac luk, quuka beyak yenen.
Xisnet yan mari taamite waqdi, numtin amol seef tikyah luk yenen. Baanta yaagure num yi garik yen.
Sarrak saqoltih yen mara kee baaxoh abbobti kee raqqa 'ye marak yakkeenimiik keenik exceemih, «A taama kaxxam mango taama kinnuk, tittak xer aroocal, mariiy isi gasoh taamat nek yan.
Tonna kinnuk, too baantah anay taabben waqdi nel ama. Qeebi ni aftok neh abtu waytam, Yallay ni Dagelta kinni» keenik exce.
Tonnal, saaku maaci maacissa 'yaamak xabba haanamaay bar dite radda 'teh cutuuka eweqqa intam fanah, gasô-xisne aba garab kee macaxu gabat luk dacayrih gaca garabah sugne.
Sarra taamak foocat yan marak exceemih, «Sin kee taamat enna 'ya marak inkih, laqô-taamak kalah, bar kaadu magaala akah dacrisna innah elle xinnaama» keenik exce.
Anu innih, bar kinni way, laqo xagarat luk asa sara bar kalak masuginniyooy; yi kataysis kee yoh taamita mara kee yot dacayrih yan mari kaadu toh abak suge. Silac ninnik ayxeeruk masuginnino.

Waqlak wadir lab mara kee ken agabuk mangom yakke mari, Yahuud maray ken toobokoh yanihiyyak wayto malkiten.
Garab keenik annah iyyen: «Mango maray ahli yani kinninooh; rooci wadu geyna'gidih maaqo geynam faxxinta» iyyen.
Garab keenik kaadu, «Qululuh nambaxeemik daro neh ucuya keenik inna waqdi, abuuduh daro neh yecee mari, damaanatah baaxo kee qinab elle nabqure arac kee qarwa nek beya» iyyen.
Aki garab kaadu annah iyyen: «Malik gabbaray baqurê-baaxo kee qinab elle yabquren baaxok naceehiyya edde nagdiye'gidih, abuuduh sinaamak beyne» iyyen.
«Nanu Yahuud mara kinninooh, ken kee nee inki ginsik nani'mmay, tohuh, ninni xaylo naqoosa takke'gidih dirkisna; say urri naqoosannuh limmosne. Baqurê-baaxo kee qinab elle nabqure baaxo nek beeniih; nee cattam magennino» iyyen.
Ken malkit oobbe waqdi, nabam inqibeeh,
tu akak exceeh abaamal malse. Saqolti kee abbobtih keenik yan marak abto ilqeeh, keenik exceemih, «Isin, abuuduh siinik been maaqo kee lakqoh aftoh, say xaylo kee qarwa kee baqurê-baaxo akak beytaanam, sin tooboko kinnim mataaxigaana innaa?» keenik exce.
Sarrak ahak tuk teena akah abna'nnah, daffeyna keenih hee.
Too aracal keenik exceemih, «Nanuuy, Yahuud maray naqoosannuh marin mari xaamak sugehiyyah wadir lakqo ucuyya hayneh currih ayyaaquk sugnek, ta saaku isin isinni tooboko xaamtaanaah, naqoosah ken haytaanaa! Tonna'mmay isin naqoosannu teylemmen mara wadir currih nayyaaqem nel tan» keenik exce. Too waqdi saqolti kee abbobtih yen mari tibba yeeh, iyyaanam magennon.
Sarrak keenik exceemih, «Isin abtaanam celtam hinna. Yallay ni Dageltah yanik meysittaanaah, cakkih tanim abtaanam siinil tan. Tonnal Yahuud akke waa maray naqboytah nek yani nel manqaasa.
Away yoo kee yi kataysis kee yoh taamita marak ummattah daro kee lakqo abuuduh nacee'mmay, abuuduh keenih naceemik amot tu keenil essere waynay.
Isin kaadu ken buqreh baaxo kee, qinab kee *daytuun coox elle abqaruk sugten ken baaxo kee ken qarwa, ta waqdiik xayuk keenih gacisa. Lakqo kee daro kee qinabak bicsen kamri kee zeyti (saliid) abuuduh keenih teceen waqdi, amot keenil esserteenim keenih gacisa» exce.
Too waqdi saqolti kee abbobtih keenik yen mari, «Meqeh; atu aba axcinnaanim abenno. Damaanatah keenik beyne duyye keenih gacsennooh, magoh beenim ken messerra» iyyen.
Too waqdi seekah seeceeh, wohul yoo yangaddeenimik, seeka foocal ken xibsiise.
Sarrak bagul tikiyah luk suge saro ifdigga heeh gabah urguffa tet hee. «Ta saaku oggolteenim sarra siinik cina num Yalli tannah haay. Yalli, ta xiiba makteenik, liton qarwa kee edderra hayteenimik inkih foyyah sin cabele» keenik exce. Wokkel suggu 'ye mari inkih, «Aamiin! Takkay!» iyyen. Sarra YALLA faylisen. Sarrak too xiiba mamakinnon.
Woo taban kee namma sanatay anu Yuudâ-rasuk xintoh abba edde ekkehiyya, yoo kee yi mari, yok duma sugte abbobti maaqo kee duyye keenit akah faxak sugte innah, keenit mafaxinnino. Tohum, Malik Artacsasta edde reede labaatanhaytô sanatak xabba haanamaay, too malik reedal edde suge soddom kee nammayhaytô sanatah amma 'yaanam yan udduruk ten.
Yok duma sugte abbobti ummattal kaxxa quuka hayteh teneeh; maaqo kee qinab kamri keenik beenih, wohuk amol fula ummattak ayrol morootom garsi beyak sugen. Keenik gubal taamita mari kinni way ummatat umuk sugen. Anu Yallih meysi luk eneeh, ken innah yan numuk mananniyo.
Gasô-xisok gexxaamah, akiimih gaba geyak mananniyooy; yi mari kaadu too gasoh taamat yo'lih yen. Baqurê-baaxo kee qarwa neddereh masuginnino.
Yahuuduh yooboke mara kee kaadu keenih yooboke ken saqoltih yan marak ayrol bool kee kontom num inni buxal adoobisak en. Tohuk kalah, dariifal nek tan baaxok qibnaytiinoh sahda yol amaatuk teneeh; too mara inkih inni buxal adoobisak en.
Kulli ayro, awur kee gabul le illik leceey kee mango dorrahiiha keenih qidak en. Tabna ayroh addat kaadu qinabak bicsen qusba kamri inni buxal sinaamah acayuk en. Takkay immay baaxoh-abbah gabbarah acayuk ten maaqo kee lakqo ummatak mafaxinniyooy; dumî-mari keenik faxak sugem oson duudaanam hinnam aaxaguk en.
«Yi Dageltaw, a marah baguuk abam foyya yok maabin» axcuk Yalla kallace.

Sanballat kee Toobiya kee Gesam kee kalah yan maray naqboytiitih nek yenehiyya yakkeemiik, a gasoh xisnek gaba kallem yoobbeeniih, mango gasoosak gudet ten faxo duudusnem kaadu yoobbeenih. Takkay immay akak culan afoofi edde haan coox uxih edde hayneh manannino.
Sarrak Sanballat kee Gesam farmo yoh rubte. Iyyeenimih, «Oono deqsitta booxal tan qunxa magaalal net ongoorow» yaanam yoh ruuben. Too farmo yoh akah ruubeenim, ayrissa yoo heenih umam yol baahaana'gidik ten.
Sarrak anu kaadu farmô-mara keenih ruubeeh keenik exceemih, «Edde anim kaxxa taama kinnuk, amaatem madudda. Sin fan emeeteh, abah an taama fanal cabam mafaxa» 'yaanam keenih ruube.
Tohuk sarra kaadu affara adda too bis le farmo yoh ruubeeniih; anu kaadu naharsi adda keenik inxicca excem keenik exce.
Sanballat konoyhaytoh adda kaadu kay gubal taamita numul farmo yoh ruubeeh; too saaku yuktubeh ruube warkat alifit manannay fakimit yen.
Too warkatal iyyeemih,
«Yahuud akke waa marih baaxooxal, ‹Koo kee Yahuud mara umaane abtaanam faxxan› iyya mari yan. Gesam kaadu toh numma kinnim yoh warseh. ‹Tiddigilleh sugte gaso nammeyhaak akah xissaanam wohu› siinik iyyan. ‹Atu kaadu ken malik takkem faxxa› 'yaanamih xaagi yan.
Yarusalaam addal Yuudâ-malik takku waytam ummattah warissu wayta nabuwwa bicsitteh tabbixe kok iyyan. Malik ta xaagu aabbele kaay; tonna leemiik koo kee yoo tahak tuk teena innam tayse» 'yaanam elle yuktubeh ruube.
Toh uble waqdi kaal gacseemih, «Ta inxicca 'tam inkih tekkem hinna; atu isih isi amok bicisse yaaba ikkal» 'yaanam kaah ruube.
Naqboytit toh akah abtem, meysinneh abna taama nayseede'gidik ten. Toh uble waqdi dooqa abeeh, ‹Yallaw, qande yot hay› exce.
Ayrok teena Dalaayá-Samaqya deqsita numuy Maahetbal deqsita numuk baxi baxah yenehiyyah buxa gexe. Too num buxah addak yawqem duudak mananna. Buxa kaak emeete waqdi yok iyyeemih,
«A mari koo qidam faxak,
Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril nangooroway;
Taahirik-yan-Aracat nambooqoray;
Qibaadâ-Qarik afa ninnit alifnay.
Koo qidaanam faxaanaah;
bar amma 'yeenih koo qidaanam faxan» yok iyye.
Too waqdi kaak exceemih, «Kudaah ambooqorem, yi migaq hinna. Inni roocih megloh Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit ambooqoreyyom kot celta? Mambooqora!» kaak exce.
Sarrak cubbussa hee waqdi, ah Yalli kay afat hee yab hinnay, Toobiya kee Sanballat guqul kaah teceeh, kaak inxica intem kinnim geeh.
Oson ah akah abeenim, anu meysiteh dambit asa'gidiiy migaq innik bayseh qaybit asa'gidik ten.
Sarrak dooqa abeeh, «Yi Dageltaw, Toobiya kee Sanballat abtam ubul. Ahah ken digaal. Noqadya deqsitta barray nabih tanihiyya kee raqqa 'teh tan gersi nabuwwa yot abta meysisso ubul» exce.
Kontom kee namma ayro taama abak sugnek lakal, Alul deqsita alsak labaatanna kee konoyhaytoh ayro, inkih tan gasoh xisnek gaba kalleh.
Nek naqboytiitih yan mara kee nek dariifal dabaaqah yan mari, a taama Yalla kinni ni Dageltih cato edde tengeleemih sabbatah gaba kaltem yeexegen waqdi, meysiteenih wacarriy ken yibbixe.
Tah inkih tikka tam fanah Yuudak saqoltih yan mari Toobiya deqsita numih qalla yirgiqeenih manannonuuy, waraakit kaah aktubuk yenen. Usuk kaadu keenih aktubuk yen.
Toobiya Yuudah yooboke numih baxá abbaxuk yeneemih sabbatah, Yuudah yooboke mari mangih kay qaxat yen. Usuk baxá akak abbaxuk yenem, Arác-Sekanya deqsita numuk ten. Kay baxi Yahoocanan kaadu Barkiyyá-Masullam deqsita numih baxá abite.
Mango mari, «Toobiya woh abeeh ah abe» axcuk kay maqaanet yi garil yaabak yen. Anu too waqdi excem kaadu beyya heenih kaah warisak yenen. Tohuk gexxaamah usuk meysisso elle tan waraakit kulli way yoh ruubak yen.

Gasô-xisne gaba kalteeh, gasoh afoofit haan coox kaadu le aracat akak hayne. Sarrak culmah afat dacayrih gacu waa mara kee, Yallih saare abu waa mara kee, gersi Leewih yooboke marah inkih, aboonu waan taama warisne.
Tohuk lakal anu Yarusalaam magaalah adda xiinisu waa namma num xintoh abbah hee. Too namma numuk tiyak teeni, yi toobokoyta Canaanik ten. Akitti kaadu megdebik abbah yen Cananya deqsita numuk ten. Cananya imaan digga kee Yallih meysih kay innah yan num mananna.
Ken nammayak exceemih, «Maaci meqe innah maacissa 'yeh ayro eweqqa 'tam fan, Yarusalaam magaalah afoofa mafakinaay; ayro cultam faxxa waqlay dacayrih qaskar gexxahiyyak duma alifay; adda le kabuk tabtabbih edde alfan coox haysita» keenik exce. Tohuk kalah kaadu keenik exceemih, «Yarusalaam addal buxah yan marih addak dacayrih gacu waa mara dooraay; too marak tu takkem elle taamitan aracal dacayrih gactay, raqtem kaadu isinni qarwah dariifal dacayrih gacoonay» exce.
Yarusalaam kaxxa magaalak tene'mmay mango mari tet addal mananna. Mango qarwa tet addal xise'kal yenen.
Tonna leemiik Yalli yoo elle yuybulle innal, saqoltih yen mara kee baaxoh abbobti kee raqqa 'ye marak yakkeenimiik mododissa ken heeh, nasab keenik elle yan innih kusaaqisiyya abe. Sarrak seewah ken akak beenih sugen baaxok naharak yuduure marih migaq elle yan kitab gee.
Duma seewah been marak rade marak, Yarusalaam kee Yuudâ rasu fan yuduureh suge marih migaq ah kaana. Ta mari akak rade mari yakkeemiik inkih Nabkadnessar deqsita Baabelon-malik seewah beeh suge. Too saakuk xabba haanam too baaxol, baaxo caboytiitih sugen. Isinni baaxo gufen waqdi, kulli numuuy isi magaala fan keenik gaceh yen.
Yuduuren saaku keenik saqoltih tenem, Darabbabel kee Yaasuwa kee Nacmiya kee Qadarya kee Raqmiya kee Nacmani kee Mordakay kee Bilsan kee Misfarat kee Bigwa kee Nacum kee, tonnah kaadu, Baqna deqsita numuk ten.
Israayilih yooboke marak gulub-gulubul loowimak, seewah ken elle been baaxok yuduure mari ah kaana.
Farqos deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari mangah namma alfi kee bool kee malcina-taban kee namma num akkuk yen.
Safatya deqsita gulubuk kaadu sidiica bool kee malcina-taban kee namma num tuduure.
Arac deqsita gulubuk tuduurem, lica bool kee kontom kee namma numu.
Facat-mooyab deqsita gulubuk namma alfi kee bacra bool kee taban kee bacra num tuduure. Ta gulub akak rade kaxxa abbobti, Yaasuwa kee Yowab deqsita namma numuk ten.
Qeelam deqsita gulubuk rade mari alfi kee namma bool kee kontom kee affara num akkuk tuduure.
Dattuq deqsita gulubuk bacra bool kee morootom kee koona num tuduure.
Dakkay deqsita gulubuk malcina bool kee lactam num tuduure.
Binnuy deqsita gulubuk lica bool kee morootom kee bacra num tuduure.
Beebay deqsita gulubuk lica bool kee labaatanna kee bacra num tuduure.
Qadgad deqsita gulubuk namma alfi kee sidiica bool kee labaatanna kee namma num tuduure.
Adonikam deqsita gulubuk lica bool kee lactam kee malcina num tuduure.
Bigway deqsita gulubuk namma alfi kee lactam kee malcina num tuduure.
Qaadin deqsita gulubuk lica bool kee kontom kee koona num tuduure.
Aatar deqsita gulubuk sagla taban kee bacra num tuduure. A gulub a migaaqak kalah Ciskiyyaaha deqsita migaaqal aaxaguk yenen.
Casum deqsita gulubuk kaadu sidiica bool kee labaatanna kee bacra num tuduure.
Bexay deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari sidiica bool kee labaatanna kee ferey akkuk yen.
Carif deqsita gulubuk bool kee taban kee namma num tuduure.
Gibqon deqsita gulubuk yuduure mari sagla taban kee koona num akkuk yen.
Dumah yan saaku Israayil rasuk mango magaaloolil kaxxa abbobti akak sugte marak, mango mari yuduure.
Duma Beetlacam kee Netoofa deqsitta namma magaalal suge marak rade marak, bool kee bacra-taban kee bacra num tuduure.
Duma Qanatot deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak, bool kee labaatanna kee bacra num tuduure.
Duma Beet-Qadmawet deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak, morootom kee namma num tuduure.
Duma Kiryat-Yaqaarim kee Kafiira kee Beerot akak iyyan magaaloolil suge marak rade marak, malcina bool kee morootom kee sidiica num tuduure.
Duma Raama kee Gabaq deqsitta magaaloolil suge marak rade marak, lica bool kee labaatanna kee inki num tuduure.
Duma Mikmas deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak, bool kee labaatanna kee namma num tuduure.
Duma Beetal kee Qaay deqsitta namma magaalal suge marak rade marak, bool kee labaatanna kee sidiica num tuduure.
Duma Nabo deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak, kontom kee namma num tuduure. A magaalay Nabo deqsittak kalah kaadu gersi magaalay Nabo deqsittahiyya tan.
Duma Qeelam deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak, alfi kee namma bool kee kontom kee affara num tuduure. A magaalak kalah kaadu gersi magaalay Qeelam deqsittahiyya tan.
Duma Caarim deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak, sidiica bool kee labaatanni num tuduure.
Duma Yeriko deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak, sidiica bool kee morootom kee koona num tuduure.
Duma Lood kee Caadid kee Oono deqsitta sidooca magaalal suge marak rade marak, malcina bool kee labaatanna kee inki num tuduure.
Duma Senaaqa deqsitta magaalal suge marak rade marak, sidiica alfi kee sagla bool kee soddom num tuduure.
Seekah aabakuk suge marak tuduurem ah teeti:
Yaasuwak rade gulubuy Yadaqya deqsitahiyyak sagla bool kee malcina-taban kee sidiica sek yuduure.
Immar deqsita gulubuk tuduurem, alfi kee kontom kee namma seeki.
Fascur deqsita gulubuk tuduurem, alfi kee namma bool kee morootom kee malcina seeki.
Caarim deqsita gulubuk tuduurem, alfi kee taban kee malcina seeki.
Leewih yooboke marak yuduure marih loowo ah teeti:
Yaasuwa kee Kadmiyal akak iyyan namma numih durruyyatak tuduurem, malcina-taban kee affara numuk ten. Kaxxa abba keenik Hodawya deqsita numuk ten.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal saare abak yen marak bool kee labaatanna kee bacra num tuduure. Too mari Asaf deqsita gulubuk rade marak ten.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit dacayrih yen marak tuduurem, bool kee soddom kee bacra numu. Ta mari akak radem, migaaqah Sallumuuy, Ataraay, Talmoonuuy, Qakkubuuy, Catiit kee Soobay deqsita numuk ten.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit taamah suge marak rade marak yuduure marih gulubuk migaq ah kaana:
Xiica kee Casuufa kee Tabaaqot kee Keeros kee
Siiqa kee Fadon kee Labaana kee Cagaaba kee
Salmay kee Canaan kee Giddal kee Gacar kee
Rayya kee Raaxin kee Nakooda kee Gaddam kee
Qudda kee Faseeyac kee Besay kee Maquunim kee
Nafussim kee Bakbuk kee Cakuufa kee Carcur kee
Baxlit kee Maciida kee Carsa kee Barkus kee
Sisra kee Temac kee Naxiya kee Catiifa deqsita gulubuk ten.
Suleemanah taamitak yen marih gulubuk yuduure mari akak rade marih migaq ah kaana:
Sootay deqsita numuuy, Sofrat deqsita numuuy, Feriida deqsita numuuy,
Yaqla deqsita numuuy, Darkon deqsita numuuy, Giddal deqsita numuuy
Safatya deqsita numuuy Cattil deqsita numuuy
Fokret-Haxxabaayim deqsita num kee Amon deqsita numuk ten.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal diini taamat yen mara , Suleeman buxah addal Suleemanah taamitak yen marih nasabak yuduure mari tittat sidiica bool kee sagla taban kee namma num yekken.
Dalaaya kee Toobiya kee Nakooda deqsita sidiica gulubuy Tel-Melac kee Tel-Carsa kee Karuub kee Addon kee Immar deqsitta magaaloolik yuduurehiyya, lica bool kee kontom kee namma num akkuk yen. Takkay immay too mari Israayilik rade mara kinnoonumih digga mageytiminna.
Seekah yooboke marih addak Cobaaya kee Hakkox kee Bardillay migaq luk yen gulub, seekah gacsaanamih digga mageytiminna. Bardillay deqsita gulubuy seekah gacsahiyya akak rade num, digibe saaku balli gulubul kaa muggaaqiseeniih, Bardillay kaak axcuk yenen. Ta mari inkih akak rade marih migooqa keenik mageytiminnaay; tonna-leemiik taahir ane waa maray seekat gacu duude waahiyyat ken loowen.
Tohuk gexxaamah Yuudâ-baaxoh abba, «Urim kee Tummim deqsitta duyye qida sek yamaatem fanah
Israayil maray marin baaxok yuduurehiyya sittat morootom kee namma alfi kee sidiica bool kee lactam num akkuk yenen. Keenih taamitak yen mari labha kee say marih fanal malcina alfi kee sidiica bool kee soddom kee malcina num akkuk yenen. Saare abak yen marak kaadu, labha kee say marih fanal yuduure mari namma bool kee morootom kee koona num akkuk yenen. Faarisik gabat baaheenim, malcina bool kee soddom kee lica faras akkuk ten. Baakilik kaadu, namma bool kee morootom kee koona bakil gabat baahen. Gaalak kaadu, affara bool kee soddom kee konoy takkem baahen. Danoona kee okaalek kaadu, lica alfi kee malcina bool kee labaatanna takkem gabat baahen.
Taama abaana'gidih mango mari lakqo yecee.
Baaxol xintoh abbah yen num bacra kiilo dahabak yeceeh,
tonnah kaadu qiddi saaku lee kee qabal elle haan sacnittek kontom kee,
seeka edde gacta dallaabiyak soddom kee
lakqok kaadu namma bool kee kontom kiilo yecee.
Gulubwah saqolti dahabak bool kee lactam kee bacra kiilo teceeh,
lakqok kaadu alfi kee namma boolih kiilo yeceen.
Raqqa 'ye mari dahabak bool kee lactam kee bacra kiilo yecee;
lakqok kaadu alfi kee bool kiilo takkem yeceen;
seeka edde gacta dallaabiyak lactam kee malciini takkem yeceen.
Seeka kee Leewih yooboke maraay, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit dacayrih yen maraay, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal saare abak yen mara kee, gersi maray Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih taamat yenehiyya kee raqqa iyye mari yakkeemiik isinni magaaloolil nookeeniih, dabaaqah elle gacen.
Malcinhaytoh alsat Israayil marak uduurra ye mari yakkeemiik mariiy isi magaalal keenik nookeh yen.

Too alsak inikhaytoh ayrot yakkeenimiik Yarusalaamal Leeh Afa deqsitta culmak foocal gaaboowen. Too waqdi YALLI Israayil ummatah Muusal ruube xinto elle tan kitab sek Qedrak, «Neh baaha» iyyen. Qedra too xinto intam digga haah yaaxige numuk ten. Qedra too waqdi too kitab baaheeh; too ayro tokkel labhaay agabu kee kaskassoowe urrih foocal yikriye.
Tokkel magaalak akak yawqen afal booxak bagul, maacak xabba haanamaay carri tikka 'yam fanah, Qedra too kitab intam keenih akrayuk sugeeh; oson kaadu baguuk kaa ankacisak asen.
Too ayro aben gaabownal, Qedra too kitab keenih elle yikriyem, bocok bicsen fayya 'ya aracih amok ten. Usuk too kitab keenih yikriye waqdi migdi kabut kaak sugtem, Mattitya kee Samaq kee Qanaaya kee Uriyya kee Cilkiyya kee Maqseyaahu deqsita numuk ten. Guri kabuk kaak tenem, Fadaaya kee Misaayel kee Malkiya kee Casum kee Casbaddana kee Zakariyya kee Masullam deqsita numuk ten.
Qedra kaah heen aracay keenik fayya 'ta ikkel yanihiyyal solla 'yeh waqdi, inkih kaa fan wagten. Sarrak kitab fake waqdi, yakkeenimiik inkih soolen.
Too waqdi Qedra iyyeemih, «YALLAY Naba Dagelta kinnihiyya fayla taafay» iyye.
Tokkel suge mari inkih, usuk toh iyye waqdi, gaba qaran fan fayya haak, «Aamiin, Aamiin» iyyen. Sarrak inkih YALLA yassakaxxeeni'gidih, gommoh raden.
Tohuk lakal solla 'yeeniih soolol elle yeeden. Sarra Leewih yooboke mari xinto elle tani'nna keenih warse. Keenih warissem, Yaasuwa kee Baani kee Sereebiya kee Yaamin kee Qakkub kee Sabbatay kee Hoodiya kee Maqseyaahu kee Kaliita kee Qadarya kee Yoodabad kee Canaan kee Felaaya deqsita numuk ten.
Yallih Xintoh Kitaabal tanim nagay kawseeniih; ummattah Yallih xinto intaamak maqna nagay warsen.
Ummatta ta xinto aba intam yoobben waqdi, weeqeenih. Yuudâ-baaxoh abbah yen Nacmiya kee, Yallih xintoh addal tanim nagay aaxaguk yen sek Qedra kee, Leewih yooboke maray xinto intam barisak yenehiyya ummattak iyyeenimih, «A saakih ayro YALLAY sin Dageltah yanihiyyah garil taahirik tan ayro kinnuk, weeqa kee arkitiyyi mafaxxiima» iyyen.
«Ahaysa isinni buxa gexaay, meqe maaqo akumaay salfa le maqab aqubaay, qiidih asa. Liton maaqo kee maqab tu aalle waa marah acuya. A saaki ni Goytah garil taahirik tan ayrok markitina. Sin cayli, YALLI siinih yecee rufto» keenik iyyen.
Leewih yooboke mari, ummattak iyyeemihii, ‹Annah taahirik tan ayro cisabbottaanam meqem hinnak, kata tibba xica» iyyen.
Too waqdi suggu 'ye mari inkih yakkeemiik buxah yuduureeh; kitaabal taniimit radeenimih sabbatah, walamwallitak maaqo yokmeeniih yooqobeenih, luk sugeenim tu aalle waa marah yeceen.
Ciggilta ayro gulubwah saqoltih yen mari, seeka kee Leewih yooboke mara lih gacca 'yeh, Yallih xintol taniimih addâ-faknu kee maqna bartaana'gidih, Qedra fan gexen.
Qedra keenih elle yikriye innal, woo xinto axcuk teneemihii, Iraawô-Dabih-Qiid deqsita qiidih ayro, «Israayil ummatta woo qiid gaba kalam fanah daboyti-baxi addat gactay» axcuk ten.
Kalah kaadu, «Inkih tan Yarusalaam kee wohuk kalah tan magaalooli kee mandarittel yan marah farmo ruubaay; ‹Qaleela fan gexaay; daboyta akak xissaana'gidih, madertooy, alay kee, nakliita kee kalah yan cooxuy mango ayyuufa le irgiqay baaha› » axcuk ten.
Too waqdi ummatta gexxeeh, too luud bahte. Sarrak qarwak amol booxah tan arooca kee, buxah addah daarat kee Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih daarat kee, Leeh Afa kee Efrayim Afa deqsitta culmak foocal booxah tan aroocal daboyta xisen.
Seewah ken elle beenih sugen baaxok yuduure mari inkih daboyta xissite. Tannah tanim Nuun-Yoosuwa yen dabaanak wadir ummatta abteh masuginnaay, too saaku ummatta kaxxam ruffu 'teh asse.
Too qiidih edde asen ayrok xabba haanamaay, qiid gaba kalla haam fanah, Tawraatal yan Yallih yaabak ayrooy rike akrayuk sugen. Too qiidih malcina ayro sugen. Malcinhaytoh ayro akah aseenik lakal, bacarhaytoh ayroy qiidik gaba kaleenihiyya, kitab elle inta'nnal, qibaadah inki aracal gaaboowen.

Too alsak labaatanna kee fereyhaytoh ayro, Israayil ummatta aben dambih nadaamah soomaana'gidih gaaboowen. Ken akke waa marin marak yexxeereeniih, sartanah *qabuudut gacca 'yeenih, abeenih yanin nadaamak gexxaamah, amol bullaaqe isinnik caxen. Sarrak solla yeenih ken kee keenik dumal ken kaxxa abbobti abba hayte dambit yaaben.
Inkih tan ayrok rubqi gide fanah, inki aracal sollu 'yeenih YALLAY ken Dagelta kinnihiyya ruube kitaabal tanim keenih yikriyen. Tonnah kaadu, inkih tan ayrok rubqi gide takkem, abeenih yenen dambih tooba kee YALLAY ken Dagelta kinnihiyyah qibaadat sugen.
Leewih yooboke mari mawqeenah amol soolak yen. Tokkeh amol Yaasuwa kee Baani kee Kadmiyal kee Sabanya kee Bunni kee Sereebiya kee Baani kee Kanaani deqsita mari anay fayya haak YALLAY ken Dagelta kinnihiyyah kallacen.
Leewih yooboke marak Yaasuwa kee Kadmiyal kee Baani kee Casabnaya kee Sereebiya kee Hoodiya kee Sebanya kee Fatacya deqsita num iyyeemih, «Ugutay YALLAY sin Dagelta kinnihiyyay kulli way waarahiyya faylisa» iyyen.
Dooqah iyyeenimii,
«Kooh taguude fayla sahdayti afat takke faylak nabuk raqta'mmay
tohuh, ku migaaqay nabna lehiyya kulli way faylisoonay.
YALLAW, Yalli dibuk koo.
Qaran ginteeh; qaraanal tan cutuuka inkih gintem koo.
Baaxo kee baaxol tanim inkih ginte;
bad kee badat tanim inkih ginte.
Rooci leemit inkih rooci haytem, koo.
Qaraanal eneyya 'tam qibaada koh abta.
«Dageltah yan YALLAW, atu Abram doorteeh,
Ur deqsita aracay Baabelon rasul yanik kaa teyyeeqeh.
Migaaqah Abraahim kaak inte.
Abraahim ku garil digga le num kinnim tubleh;
xagana kaa'lih haysitte.
Kaak rade marah baaxo ikoytah aceettoomih xagana kaah culte.
Too baaxo, Kanqaan kee Ciitaay Amoora deqsita maraay
Feriida kee Yabuusaay Girgaasah yooboke marih baaxo.
Inteemil digga le Dagelta kinnitooh, xagana akah cultem abteh.
«Ni kaxxa abbobti Masril taqabik geytem tubleh.
Qasa badih xaqul cato keenih takke'gidih, aben dooqa keenik raabitteh.
Masri malikil ablewayni astooti kee qagabak tanim bahte.
Kay gubal yan mara kee kay baaxoh maral yakkeenimik
qagabah tan able waynuh tanim bahte.
Toh keenik akah abtem, kaxxiinah filla qaraanal heeniih
ku ummattal umam baahak sugeenimih sabbata.
Tohuk wadir too saaku kok yontoobbe migaq
uxih ta saaku fan yantaabbeh.
Ku mara badak gude keenih baxisseh, ken teyyeeqe.
Bacarih raqte baaxok bagul badak gude ken tabisse.
Ken ayradduk suge mara badat qiddeeh,
kaxxa badat qiden xaa badat elle suta'nnal, badat ken sutusse.
«Laqo elle gexaanamal,
qeera-qamiddu foocat keenik hayte.
Bar kaadu edde gexan gita yabloonuh,
ura qamiddu foocat keenik hayte.
Qaraanaak Siinâ Qalel obteeh;
isi mara lih isi afak yabte.
Qadaalat kee numma le xinto kee madqaay;
meqe amri kee baritto keenih warisse.
‹Sabti ayro xaguraay, taahirik tan ayroh tet ubula› keenik inte.
Isi xintooy, madqa kee baritto isi naqasuh yan Muusal keenih rubte.
Satqiten saaku, qaraanak maaqo keenih oobisse.
Bakaariten saaku, xixxaqak baguk lee keenih teyyeeqe.
‹Ikoytah siinih aceeyyo axcuk, xagna siinih akah cule baaxo qeebit ibbixa› keenik inte.
«Ni kaxxa abbobtih tu gactek, ku yab moggolinnoonuuy,
kaxxiinah filla qaraanal heeniih isinnih faxeenim aben.
Koo yaabbeenim cineeniih,
atu abte ablewaynuh tan taama hawweeneenih.
Kaxxiinak gexxaamah, wadir Masri naqoosinnah ken gacisu waa abba dooren.
Atu tohuh, yi Dageltaw, racmatta kee maqaane le Dageltay qafu abahiyya kinnito.
Naqabut asissike waah, sahdah kaxxa kacanu yaybulle Dagelta kinnito.
Tohih sabbatah booxal qidda heeh darre keenit macabinnito.
Yaqbudoonuh beqri-ceelo bicseeniih,
too beqrih ceelok, ‹Masrik nee bahtem, ta ceeloy yallah yan ni dagelta kinnihiyya› iyyen.
Tonna kinnuk, koo celta nabna kot maabinnoonuy, ku galto yeegemeenih.
Tohuh, yi Dageltaw, ku racmatta caddo sinni racmatta kinniimih taagah,
bacarih tan baaxol ken macabinnito.
Laqo gita keenih tascasse qamburre keenih hayte.
Bar gita keenih tascasse gira keenih hayte.
Litoh tan maqaaneh, abeh meqem keenih warisse.
Yakmoonuh manna deqsitta maaqo qaraanak keenih oobisse.
Yaaquboonuh lee keenih tecee.
Bacarih tan baaxol morootom sanatah
oson faxxa haanam keenih acayuk sugte.
Sartanak maqarradinnon;
iba keenik maduddubinna.
«Mango baaxô-doolatwa qeebil ken tiysiise.
Too baaxooxak kulli'kkel suge marih baaxol ken nookisse.
Sicon abbah elle suge Cesbon deqsitta baaxo ken gabal hayte.
Qoog abbah elle suge Basan deqsita rasu kaadu ken gabal hayte.
Qaraanal cutuuka takkeh gide xaylok keenih tecee.
Ken abbobtih xagana akah culteh sugte baaxol, dabaaqah ken hayte.
Kanqaan baaxol suge marak qeebil ken tiysiiseh.
Wokkel suge mara isi marih milkih hayte.
Kanqaan malik kee kay marak isinnih faxeenim abitaana'gidih,
ken gabal ken hayte.
Maroh gaso edde tan magaalooli yibbixen.
Rob elle radaah kullim elle taabuke baaxo kee
kullim addal akak tan qarwa keenik raaqisen.
Lee edde raaqisan boodooda kee, *daytuun xala coox kee, qinab xala coox kee,
kalah yan caxâ-miru xala coox keenik raaqisen.
Isinnih faxxa haanam yokmeenih, ariiqo baahen.
Atu keenih ucuyya hayte maqaanek inkih cayyen.
«Tohuh, ku mari ku yab cineeh, koo cineh.
Atu aba keenik inteemit darre caben.
‹Aham maabina, meqem hinnak› keenik inte nabuwwa qideenih.
Too nabuwwa toh keenik akah intem, oson kol yaduureeni'gidi.
Koo ceele sinni migaq koh aben.
«Too waqdi ken naqboytiitih gabat radoonay ken inte.
Too mari uma xukkot ken abbaxuk suge.
Gadaamiteenim yublen waqdi, kol weeqen.
