Atu qaraanal ken weeqa toobbeeh;
kaxxa racmatta le Dagelta kinnuk, ken cattu wayta saqoltiy
naqboytit gabak ken tayyaaqu waytahiyya keenih rubte.
Too mari naqboytit gabak ken cateh.
Takkay immay amaanah xiinak sugen waqdi, dambit qagteenih.
Too waqdi kaadu ken naqboytiitih gabat radoonay ken inte.
Naqboytit gabal ken hayte.
Oson toobiteeniih cato kol esseraanam tuble waqdi,
qaraanak ken weeqa toobbe.
Litoh tan racmattak gexxaamah, koo esseren cato keenih oggolteeh;
cato koo esserinnaan waqdi, ken catak sugte.
Atu aba intam abe weenik, keenit takku waytaamih garci keenih kalteh.
Ku xinto kataata mari isinni rooci wadele'mmay,
too mari, ku xintok sah giti ane waam aabbih, kaxxiinitak ku xinto cineenih,
keenih warisah darre kot caben.
Mango sanootal litoh tan sabrih keenil tisbireeh,
nabuwwat hayte isi Roocaaniyyah kabuk garci keenih kalak sugte immay,
ku ummatta, tohuh, ayti maleelah innah aabbe waytam celte.
Too waqdi ken naqboytiitih gabat radoonay ken inte.
Ku racmatta caddo maliiy, tohuk gexxaamah
darre keenit macabinnitooy, bayi ken mahannito.
Kaxxa maqaane kee racmatta le Dagelta kinnito.
«Yallaw, ni Dageltaw, nabna lem koo.
Qande leeh hayba lem koo.
Amurruqe sinni kacanu le Dagelta kinnitok,
abeyyo inteh xagana akah cultem abtah.
Nanu biyaakak geyneh gide neh ubuley.
Assuuriyah malikwa xukkot nee abbaxuk ten dabaanaay
akke fanah, kaxxa biyaakah biyaakinne.
Ni malikwa kee ni miracwaay, nabuwwa kee seekaay
ni kaxxa abbobti kee ni ummatta inkih biyaakitteh.
Tonnal hay, nanu biyaakak geyneh gide neh ubuley!
Nee digaalte waqdi, cakkih tan digaala net abte.
Atu kulliimil digga lito'mmay, nanu umam abne.
Ni kaxxa abbobtiiy, ni malikwaay ni saqolti kee seeka
ku xinto intam abak masuginna.
Atu ken elle amrissam kee atu keenih abta garci-kalootut baaqid luk manannon.
Ikoytah keenih tecee kaxxa baaxo xiinak sugen waqdi, koo maqbudinnon.
Niqmatak tan baaxol, maqaane luk ken xiinisak sugte'mmay, koo maqbudinnon.
Edde yanin dambih abitto cabba heenih kol yaduureenim maabinnon.
Ta saaku atu ni abbobtih tecee baaxol marin naqoosah nan.
Atu neh tacee baaxoy meqe innah nee adoobisak tenehiyyal naqoosah nan.
Taway taham neh maay table hay!
Baaxok geytima niqmat atu ni amol hayte amoytitte nek betta.
Tah net akah takkem ni dambi.
Nee kee nanu neddere lacak isinnih faxeenim aban.
Nanu a saaku kaxxa gadaamah addat nan» 'yaanam dooqah iyyen.
Tohuk lakal «Net tikka 'teemik gexxaamah, Israayil ummattak nanuu, titta elle geyne tittin-gey kutbeh haysinnah nan. Too kutbel nek saqoltiiy, Leewih yooboke mara kee seeka firma heelon» iyyen.

Naharsi firma haytem, baaxoh-abbah yen Nacmiyak ten. Nacmiyak abba Cakliya deqsita numuk ten. Nacmiya-lakal firma haytem, Xidkiya deqsita numuk ten.
Seekak kaadu firma haytem:
Seraaya kee Qadariyya kee Ermiyaas kee
Fascur kee Amarya kee Malkiya kee
Cattus kee Sebanya kee Malluk kee
Caarim kee Mareemot kee Qobadya kee
Daaniyel kee Ginnaton kee Baaruk kee
Masullam kee Abiyya kee Miyyamin kee
Maqadya kee Bilgay kee Samaqya deqsita seekik ten.
Leewih yooboke marak firma haytem:
Yaasuwa deqsita numuy Adanya deqsita numih baxak tenehiyya kee
Cendad deqsita gulubuh yooboke numuy migaaqah Binnuy deqsitahiyya kee
Kadmiyal kee Sebanya kee Hoodiya kee
Kaliita kee Felaaya kee Caanan kee
Miika kee Racob kee Casaabiya kee
Dakkur kee Sereebiya kee Sebanya kee
Hoodiya kee Baani kee Beninu deqsita numuk ten.
Ummattak saqoltih yen marak firma haytem:
Farqos kee Facat-Mooyab kee Qeelam kee
Dattuq kee Baani kee Bunni kee Qadgad kee
Beebay kee Qadoona kee Bigway kee
Qaadin kee Aatar kee Ciskiyyaahu kee
Qaddur kee Hoodiya kee Casum kee
Bexay kee Carif kee Qanatot kee
Nebay kee Magfiqas kee Masullam kee
Ceedir kee Mesedbal kee Saaduk kee
Yadduqa kee Falatya kee Canaan kee
Qanaaya kee Hosiqa kee Cananiya kee
Cassub kee Hallocas kee Filca kee Soobik kee
Racum kee Casabna kee Maqseyaahu kee
Aciyya kee Canaan kee Qanan kee Malluk kee
Caarim kee Baqna deqsita numuk ten.
Israayilih yooboke marak, seeka kee Leewî-mara kee Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit dacayrih yan mara kee Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril saare aba mara kee Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih taama aba mari, too maray nek saqoltih yanihiyya lih gacen. Wohuk kalah kaadu, Yallih xinto intam oggolaana'gidih, marin baaxoh maray ni addal yanihiyyak yexxeere mari too saqoltih yan mara lih gacen. Woo yuktuben warkatay titta elle geenim elle yuktubeenihiyya axcuk teneemih, «Tahak wadir nee kee ni agabuuy ni xayloy kas kassoowehiyyak labim kee sayim inkih nakkeemik
nek saqoltih yan mara lih gacca inneh, ‹Yallih xintoy isi naqasuh yan Muusal ruubehiyya intam cinna haynek, digaalah abaaro nee tabbaxay› 'yaanamal xiibinnah nan. YALLAY ni Dageltah yanihiyya nee akah amrisem oggolenno. Kay amri kee usuk nek aba iyyem abenno 'yaanamal titta geynah nan.
Tonna leemiik, akkel ni rasul ne'lih yan marin baaxoh maral rihime waynaah, nek kaadu rihmise waanama.
Marin baaxoh mari daro akkiiy, hinnay kaadu, wohuk kalah tan duyye sabti ayro akkiiy qiidih edde asna ayro nee fan baahen ken tekkek, keenik maxaanna.
Malcinhaytô-sanat gufa saaku, sanat fanah buqre abe'kal sugennooh, tonnah kaadu sinaamat lino mago sinaamah cabenno.
Kulli sanatal Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih taamah lakqok affara giraam takkem numtin amol yaceenim fardih nel tan.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih taamah faxximtam: taahirroysen-gaqambooy, kulli ayro xayyoosan daro kee, cado akak sadgatah cararisan saqaay; alsi biloh aban sadgataay, sabti qiidih aban sadgat kee, wohuk kalah yan qiidih aban sadgat kee, wohuk kalah yan sadgatay taahirik yanihiyya kee, Israayil marih dambi kalootuh aban sadgat kee, wohuk kalah tan duyyey Qibaadâ-Qarih taamah faxxintahiyyak ten.
Nanu inkih tan Israayil xaylooy, axcih kaadu, Israayilih taabuke seeka kee Israayilih yooboke Leewih marak, Yallih xinto elle inta innal, YALLAY ni Dageltah yanihiyyah sadgatah qidan saqih cado elle carartu wayta boco baahu waa marah saami caxxa gulub-gulubul qidenno. Too boco kulli sanatal yaaxigen waktil baahenno.
Kulli sanatal darok naharat orobta daro kee, caxâ-miruk naharat yooboke caxâ-miraytu YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari fan sadgatah beyaanam fardih nel tan.
Naharsi-baxak lab-baxa kee naharat yooboke dahaltu kee illi kee wadarak kaadu naharat yooboke saq, Yallih xinto elle inta'nnal, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal taamitta seeka fan beenno.
Qibaadâ-Qaril tan seekah kulli sanatal naharat orobte darok riyne buluula baahennooh; tohuk kalah kaadu, qinabak bicisne kamri kee caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti kee caxâ-miru keenih aceenno.
Leewih yooboke mari ni mandar kee ni buqreh ardil tooboke darok taban haytoh af gaaboysak sugeemih taagah, taban haytoh af dakaatah keenih aceenno.
Seekak, Haarun deqsita kaxxa seekik rade mari, Leewih yooboke mara luk gacca 'yeh, woo diini qaadah gaaboysan duyye gaaboysoonay. Too duyyey gaaboyseenihiyyak tabanhaytoh af, Leewih yooboke mari Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik duyye edde daanisan golih addat daanisoonay.
Israayil kee Leewih yooboke marii, darooy, qinab-kamri kee caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti, Yallih Qibaadah Qarih faxxinta duyye elle daanisan makdanal hoonay. Tohuu, Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril Yallih taama abta seeka dabaaqah elle taniih, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit saare aba mari kee dacayrih yan mara kaadu dabaaqah elle yanihiyya.
Ni Dagelta elle naqbude qari dibu kaa mabna› 'yaanam elle ten.

Abbobtih yan mari Yarusalaamal nooke. Too saaku, tabna numih addak inki numuy taahirik tan Yarusalaam magaalal dabaaqah gacu waahiyyah saami caxxa qiden. Wohuk raqqa 'ye mari elle suggu 'ye magaaloolil elle raaqe.
Wohuk kalah, saami caxxi elle awqe'kah, is amook Yarusalaamal dabaaqah gacam faxa numut «Yalli barkat haay» iyyen.
Seeka tanuu, Leewih yooboke mari yanuu, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit taamita mari yanuu, Suleeman buxah taamitak yen marih ramad yanuu, wohuk kalah, raqqa 'ye maray Israayilih ubukka iyyak numuuy isi kaxxa abbak raqte magaalal isi guubul keenik gace.
Yuudâ-rakaakayak saqoltih yen maray Yarusalaamal dabqih gacehiyya ah kaana.
Yuudah yooboke marak Qataaya deqsita numuy abba akak Quddiyya deqsitaah kaxxa abba akak Zakariyya deqsitahiyyak ten. Zakariyyah abba Amarya deqsitak yen. Amaryah abba Safatya deqsitak yen. Safatyah abba Mahlalel deqsitak yen. Ta mari inkih akak radem, Fares deqsita numuy Yuuda xalehiyyak ten.
Tohuk kalah Maqseyaahu deqsita num yen. Kaak abba Baaruk deqsitak yen. Baaruk abba Kolhoda deqsitak yen. Kolhodah abba Cadaya deqsitak yen. Cadayah abba Qadaaya deqsitak yen. Qadaayah abba Yoyyaarib deqsitak yen. Yoyyaarib abba Zakariyya deqsitak yen. Ta mari inkih akak radem, Saalec deqsita numuy Yuuda xalehiyyak ten.
Fares deqsita numuk rade marak Yarusalaamal dabaaqah gactem, affara bool kee lactam kee bacra numuk ten. Ta mari inkih kaxxa agiirak yenen.
Benyam deqsitta kedok rade marak noktem kaadu Sallu deqsita numuk ten. Salluh abba Masullam deqsita numuk teneeh, Masullam abba Yoqed deqsita numuk ten. Tohuk kalah ta num akak radem, Fadaaya kee Kolaaya kee Maqseyaahu kee Itiyal kee Yasaqya deqsita numuk ten.
Gabay kee Sallay kaadu Yarusalaamal nooke marat yenen. Ta namma num Sallu deqsita numuk xayi ramadak yenen. Benyaamah yooboke marak Yarusalaam magaalal nooke mari tittat sagla bool kee labaatanna kee bacra num akkuk yen.
Ayyuqel deqsita num ta marak inkih saqalak yeneeh; kay abba Dikri deqsitak yen. Yuuda kaadu Ayyuqel gubal magaalah abbak yen. Yuudah abba Hasnuwa deqsita numuk ten.
Seekak kaadu Yarusalaamal dabaaqah gactem, Yadaqya deqsita seekik teneeh, kaak abba migaaqah Yoyyaarib deqsitak yen. Ta seekik kalah kaadu Yaakin deqsita sek Yarusalaamal dabaaqah gace.
Seraaya deqsita sek, Yarusalaamal dabaaqah gacte seekak numuk teenah yen. Kay abba Cilkiyya deqsitak yen. Cilkiyyah abba Masullam deqsita numuk ten. Ta num akak radem Saaduk kee Maraayot kee Aciitub deqsita numu. Aciitub kaxxa seekik ten.
Ta mari akak rade gulubuy Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal taamitak yenehiyyak Yarusalaam magaalal dabaaqah gactem, tittat bacra bool kee labaatanna kee namma numuk ten.
Ta marak kalah seekak Yarusalaamal dabaaqah gactem, Qadaaya deqsita seekik ten. Ta seekik abba Yaroocam deqsita numuk teneeh, Yaroocam abba Falalya deqsita numuk ten. Ta num akak radem, Amxi kee Zakariyya kee Fascur kee Malkiya deqsita numuk ten.
Ta mari akah yaabuke gulubuk saqoltih yan marak tittat namma bool kee morootom kee namma num Yarusalaamal dabaaqah gace.
Qamassay deqsita sek kaadu dabaaqah Yarusalaamal gace marak numuk teenak yen. Qamassay abba Qadaril deqsita numuk ten. Qadaril abba Acday deqsita numuk ten. Acday abba Masilleemot deqsita numuk ten. Masilleemot abba Immar deqsita numuk ten.
Ta mari akah yaabuke gulubuk Yarusalaamal dabaaqah gactem, tittat bool kee labaatanna kee bacra qaskariitak teneeh; oson yakkeenimiik kaxxa agiirah tan qaskarak yenen. Saqalah keenik tenem, Dabdiyal deqsita numuk ten. Dabdiyal abba Haggedolim deqsita numuk ten.
Leewih yooboke marak kaadu Yarusalaamal dabaaqah gactem, Samaqya deqsita numuk teneeh, too numih abba Cassub deqsita numuk ten. Cassub abba kaadu Qadrikam deqsita numuk ten. Qadrikam abba Casaabiya deqsita numuk ten; Casaabiyah abba Bunni deqsita numuk ten.
Sabbatay kee Yoodabad deqsita namma numuy Leewih yoobokehiyya kaadu Yarusalaamal dabaaqah gace marih addat yenen. Samaqya kee ta namma num Leewih yooboke marak saqoltih yenen. Taama elle luk yeneenim, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik iroh raaqa aracak ten.
Mattanya kaadu Yarusalaamal dabaaqah gace marak numuk teenah yen. Mattanyah abba Miika deqsita numuk teneeh; Miikah abba Dabdi deqsita numuk ten. Asaf deqsita numih gulubuk yenen. Mattanya Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril Yalla faylisak aban saare edde haa numuk ten.
Bakbukya deqsita num kaadu Yarusalaamal dabaaqah gace marat yen. Mattanya kee kaa'lih yan mari saare edde haa waqdi, Bakbukya kee kaa'lih yan mari saare kaah akkaquk yen.
Leewih yooboke marak Qabda deqsita num kaadu Yarusalaamal dabaaqah gace marat yeneeh, abba kaak Sammuqa deqsita numuk ten. Sammuqa abba Galal deqsita numuk ten. Akak radeenim, Yadutan deqsita numuk ten.
Ta mari inkih Leewih yooboke marak yeneeh; ta kedok Yarusalaam magaalay taahirik tanihiyyal dabaaqah gactem, tittat namma bool kee bacra-taban kee affara numuk ten.
Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit dacayrih yen marak kaadu Yarusalaamal dabaaqah gactem, Qakkub kee Talmon kee keenik ramadah yen maraay; mangah tittat bool kee malcina-taban kee namma num akkuk yenen.
Raqqa 'ye maray Israayilih yaabukehiyyak, seeka kee Leewih marih agantah, kulli num keenik Yuudâ-magaaloolik isinni kaxxa abbobti elle sugte aracal dabaaqah gacen.
Takkay immay Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril taamitak yen mari Yarusalaam magaalak Qoofal deqsitta exxal dabaaqah gace. Ta marak abbobtih tenem, Xiica kee Gisfa deqsita namma numuk ten.
Leewih yooboke maray Yarusalaamal dabaaqah yenehiyyak amo wagitak tenem, Quddi deqsita numu. Quddih abba Baani deqsita numuk ten. Baanih abba Casaabiya deqsita numuk ten. Casaabiya akak radem, Mattanya kee Miika deqsita maraay; akah gacsaanam, Asaf deqsita gulubu. Asaf deqsita gulubuk Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril aban Yallih saare absiisa marak yenen.
Malik buxah gasok amri yewqeh yeneeh; too amri, kulli ayro midu-miduh ta mari Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril takke saare elle aban inna yascasse amrik ten.
Fatacya deqsita num Fursi-Malikih garil Israayil ummatih awlaytuh yen. Fatacyah abba Mesedbal deqsita numuk ten. Fatacya Yuudâ-kedok Dara deqsita gulubuh gacisak yen.
Buqre elle lon aracal xayi magaaloolil dabaaqah gace mara kee ken magaaloolih migaq ah kaana. Yuudah yaabuke mari dabaaqah elle gacem, Kiryat-Arbaq deqsitta magaala kee Dibon kee Yakabaxal deqsitta magaala kee woo magaaloolih dariifal tan gaandoodik ten.
Tohuk kalah ta mari dabaaqah elle gacem, Yaasuwa kee Moolada kee Beet-Falat kee
Caxar-Suqal kee, Bersabaq kee tet dariifal tan gaandoodik ten.
Ta magaaloolik kalah kaadu, Xiklag kee, Makoona kee tet dariifal tan gaandoodil dabaaqah gacen.
Qenrimmon kee Xorqa kee, tonnah kaadu, Yarmut kee
Danowac kee Qadullam deqsitta magaala kee a sidiica magaaloolih dariifal tan gaandoodil dabaaqah gacen. Ta magaalooli kee gaandoodik kalah kaadu, Laakis deqsitta magaala kee a magaalah dariifal tan baqurê-baaxol dabaaqah gacen. Qadeeka deqsitta magaala kee woo magaalah dariifal tan gaandoodil kaadu dabaaqah gacen. Tonnal, Yuudah yooboke mari elle nooke baaxo, gabbi le qaxak Bersabaq kee kilbat le kabuk Hinnom Golo deqsita namma aracih fanat ten.
Benyaamah yooboke mari dabaaqah elle gacem, Gabaq kee Mikmas kee Qayya deqsitta magaala kee, Beetal-magaala kee tet dariifal tan gaandoodik ten.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, Qanatot kee Noob kee Qananya kee
Caxor kee Raama kee Gittayim kee
Caadid kee Xiboyim kee Neballat kee
Lood kee Oono deqsitta magaala kee Naggorti-Golo deqsitta golol guubuh gacen.
Leewih yooboke marak garabay Yuudâ-rasul dabaaqah duma sugehiyya Benyaamah yooboke mara lih dabaaqah heen.

Ahaak addah migaq akak yanim, seeka kee Leewih yooboke maray seewah ken elle been baaxok yuduurehiyya. Ta mara lih tuduurem, Saltiyal baxa Darabbabel kee kaxxa seekih yen sek Yaasuwak ten.
Seekak tuduurem:
Seraaya kee Ermiyaas kee Qedra kee
Amarya kee Malluk kee Cattus kee
Sekanya kee Racum kee Mareemot kee
Qiddo kee Ginnatoy kee Abiyya kee
Miyyamin kee Maqadya kee Bilga kee
Samaqya kee Yoyyaarib kee Yadaqya kee
Sallu kee Qamok kee Cilkiyya kee Yadaqya deqsita seekik ten.
Ta mari yakkeemiik seekak saqoltih raqta seekak yenen. Too waktil, kaxxa seekih tenem, Yaasuwa deqsita seekik ten.
Leewih yooboke maray Yalla saarisak candu Yallah gacisak yenehiyya kaadu ah kaana.
Yaasuwa kee Binnuy kee Kadmiyal kee Sereebiya kee Yuuda kee Mattanya deqsita numuk ten.
Yallih saare aban waqdi woo saare akkuquk tenem, Bakbukya kee Qunni kee raqqa 'ye maray Leewih yaabukehiyyak ten.
Yaasuwa, Yoyaakim xale; Yoyaakim Elyaasib xale; Elyaasib Yoyaadaq xale;
Yoyaadaq Yonaatan xale; Yonaatan, Yadduqa xale.
Tahaak addah migaq akak yan mari, Yoyaakim kaxxa seekih yen dabaanal, seekak kulli gulubuk saqoltih yen marak yeneeh; migaq keenik ah kaana.
Sek Meraaya deqsita seekiy Seraaya deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Cananiya deqsita seekiy Ermiyaas deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Masullam deqsita seekiy Qedra deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Yahoocanan deqsita seekiy Amarya deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Yonaatan deqsita seekiy Malluki deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Yuusuf deqsita seekiy Sebanya deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Qadna deqsita seekiy Caarim deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Celkay deqsita seekiy Maraayot deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Zakariyya deqsita seekiy Qiddo deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Masallum deqsita seekiy Ginnaton deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Dikri deqsita seekiy Abiyya deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Uli seekiy Minyaamin deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Filtay deqsita seekiy Moqadya deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Sammuqa deqsita seekiy Bilga deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Yahonaatan deqsita seekiy Samaqya deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Mattanay deqsita seekiy Yoyyaarib deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Quddi deqsita seekiy Yadaqya deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Kallay deqsita seekiy Sallay deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Qeebar deqsita seekiy Qamok deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyya kee,
Casaabiya deqsita seekiy Cilkiyya deqsita gulubuh gacse kee,
Netanel deqsita seekiy Yadaqya deqsita gulubuh gacsehiyyak ten.
Sek Elyaasib kee sek Yoyaadaq kee sek Yocanan kee sek Yadduqa deqsita sek addunyal elle anih, Leewi kee seekah yaabuke marih migaq yunkuttubeh yen. Ta affara sek addunyal anih, kaxxa seekak yenen. Takkay immay Daryawes deqsita num, tu edde taade Fursih malik yekke ayrok wadir migaq kutbe gaba kalte.
Leewih yooboke marak abbootan luk yen marah tu gactekiiy, migaq keenik edde yuktubeenim, Eliyaasibik baxi baxah yen Yocanan deqsita num addunya bagul edde yen uddur kee kaak dumih udduruk dibuk ten.
Casaabiya kee Sereebiya kee Yaasuwa kee Binnuy kee Kadmiyal deqsita num Leewih yooboke marak foocat anuk, ken missoyseeniih butta-buttal ken heen. Ta mari namma buttah gacca 'yeh, Malik Dawuduy Yallih numuh yenehiyya elle abak yen innal, Yallih saare aba mara kee yakkuqe marah gacca 'yeenih, Yalla faylisak yenen.
Mattanya kee Bakbukya kee Qobadya kee Masullam kee Talmon kee Qakkub deqsita num Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik culmal yen makaadiniy duyye edde daanisaanahiyyat aban dacayrik saqoltih yenen.
Ta mari inkih elle yenem, Yaasuwá-Yoyaakimiy kaxxa seekih yenehiyya kee Nacmiyay baaxoh abbah yenehiyya kee sek Qedray Yallih xinto intam kaxxam aaxaguk yenehiyya addunyal yenen saakuk ten. Yaasuwá-Yoyaakimik kaxxa abba Yahuuxadak deqsita numuk ten.
Yarusalaamat maroh ten gasoy tiddigilleh sugtehiyyah xisnek gaba kalen saaku, Leewih yooboke marah seeco aben. Keenih akah seeceenim, ruffa axcuk edde asaana'gidiiy, Yallah candu edde gacsaana'gid kee Yalla edde saarisaana'gidik ten. Too saarel, kirar kee begenaay giyaagib aagaruk Yalla saarisak, candu Yallah gacsen.
Leewih yooboke maray Yalla saarisahiyya Yarusalaam dariifal isinni gaandoodi xiseenih yenen. Too saaku, elle sugen Yarusalaam dariifa kee Natoofa deqsitta magaalah dariifaay, Beet-Gilgal deqsitta magaala kee Gabaq kee Qadmawet deqsitta namma magaalah dariifak gaabooweenih yemeeten.
Tohuk lakal seeka kee Leewih yooboke mari, isinni nabsi taahirroyseeniih; sarra kaadu ummatta kee Yarusalaam magaalat maroh sugte gasoy xiseenihiyya kee woo gasoh afoofi taahirroysen.
Sarrak anu Yuudak saqoltih yan mara magaalat maroh tan gasoh amol hee. Too waqdi saare-abay mangohiyya namma exxah hayya heeh, «Yalla faylisak, gexa» keenik exce. Naharsi roorut suge marak, «Guddaafâ-Qidim deqsitta afay migdi kabut raqtahiyya fan foora» exce.
Hosaqya deqsita num kee Yuudâ-saqoltik garab yakke mari too maray Yalla saarisak gexahiyyah lakat yen.
Too mara lih *baanta aagaruk gexxem, sek Qadarya kee sek Qedra kee sek Masullam kee sek Yuuda kee sek Benyam kee sek Semaqya kee sek Ermiyaas deqsita seekik ten. Too seekah lakal kaadu Yonaatán-Zakariyyak ten. Zakariyya-kaxxa abba Samaqya deqsita numuk ten. Zakariyya akak radem, Mattanya kee Miikayhu kee Dakkur deqsita numuk ten. Ta mari Asaf deqsita gulubuh gacisak yenen.
Zakariyya-lakat tenem, kaah ramad le maray Samaqya kee Qadarel kee Millay kee Gillay kee Maqay kee Netanel kee Yuuda kee Canaani deqsitahiyya. Ta mari inkih, Dawuduy Yallih numuh yenehiyya Yallah saare edde abak yen duyye gabat luk yenen. Ta maray rooruh gexehiyyak foocat tenem, Qedra deqsita numuy Yallih xinto intam nagay aaxaguk yenehiyyak ten.
Raceynah Afa deqsitta afa gufen waqdi, Dawud-Magaala deqsita caafatih mawqeenal yewqen. Sarra, Dawud-xise qarik taturra 'yeenih, magaalak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta afay Leeh-Afa deqsitahiyyah xaqul yeeden.
Saare-abak nammayhaytô-butta, gasok gura le kabut raqta exxak amo gacak, Yalla faylisak tatren. Yoo kee sahdak garab ken katayne. Gasoh amol sahda akak yabloonuh xisen Muufê-Qari deqsitak yen qaril taturra inneh, Bagu-naba Gaso deqsitta gaso fan nemeete.
Tokkeek Efrayim-Afa deqsitta afa kee Yasaanah Afa deqsitta afaay, Kullum-Afa deqsitta afaay, sahda akak yabloonuh xisen Cananal-Qari deqsitta qari kee, sahda akak yabloonuh xisen Bool-Qari deqsita qaril taturra inneh, Illi Afa deqsitta afah nemeete. Ta gexoy rooruh gacca 'yeenih abak sugeenihiyyak, Dacayrih Marih Afa gufen waqdi yeeden.
Ta saare-abay namma exxah gacca 'teh Yalla faylisak gexxehiyya ellecabol Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril elle sooloonu waan arac yibbixen. Yoo kee yo'lih suge mari kaadu Qibaadâ-Qarik foocal solle.
Yo'lih ta gexot ten saqoltik kalah,
a gexot yo'lih tenem, baanta hayta seekak ten. Ken migaq ah kaana. Sek Elaakim kee sek Maqseyaahu kee sek Minyaamin kee sek Miikayhu kee sek Elyoqeenay kee sek Zakariyya kee sek Cananiya deqsita seekik ten.
Ken lakal tenem kaadu, Maqseyaahu kee Samaqya kee Alqedar kee Quddi kee Yahoocanan kee Malkiya kee Qeelam kee Qader deqsita numuk ten. Too waqdi saare-aba anay fayya haak, Yalla faylisen. Saqalah keenik tenem, Yidracya deqsita numu.
Too saaku mango sadgat abeeniih, kaxxam ruffa iyyen. Akah ruffa iyyeenim, Yallak geen kaxxa farcik ten. Too saaku aben qaffaydat agabu kee urri yengeleeh; oson ruffok gexxaamah aban xongolo xer baaxo fan antaabbuk ten.
Too saaku, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih gaaboysan duyye kee, Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril gaaboysan dakaat kee, kulli sanatal darok naharat orobte daro kee, naharal alaye caxâ-miru elle daanisan qarih dacayrih taamat labha heen. Ta mari magaaloolil xayi buqreh baaxok ta maaqo seeka kee Leewih yooboke marah gaaboysaanam taamah luk yenen. Toh kitab elle iyya'nnal abak yenen. Yuudah yooboke mari inkih, seeka kee Leewih yooboke mari abe taama yossokooteh yen.
Ken akah yossokooteenim, seeka kee Leewih yooboke mari Yallah qibaadah kullim taahirik hayyaay, qibaadah faxximta taama Yalli elle iyye'nnal abak yeneenimih taaga. Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal saare aba mara kee Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit dacayrih yan mari, Malik Dawud kee kay baxa Suleeman teyyeeqe madqa kataatak yenen.
Dawud kee Asaf dabaanal, Yallih fayla kee Yallah candu gacsan waqdi, miraacisah yan saqal suge.
Duma Darabbabel deqsita numih daban kee, tonnah kaadu Nacmiya deqsita numih dabaanal, Israayil mari yakkeemik inkih Qibaadâ-Qaril saare aba mara kee Qibaadâ-Qarit dacayrih yan marah, kulli ayro catoh mattaco acayuk yenen. Tonnah kaadu Leewih yooboke marah taahirik tan mattaco acayuk yenen. Leewih mari kaadu seekah, Yallih xinto elle inta'nnal, keenih yeexegen afto keenih acayuk yenen.

Too saaku Yalli Muusal ruube xinto fayya haak yikriyen waqdi, kitab addak «Qammon kee Mooyab deqsitta kedoh yooboke mari, Yallih mari diini qaadah elle gaaboowe arac amaate waama»
Kitaabal toh akah tunkuttubem, Israayil mari Masri baaxok yewqe saaku Qammon kee Mooyab deqsitta kedoh yooboke mari gital lee kee maaqo keenil cineemik ten. Lee kee maaqo keenil cinaanamat macabinnoonuy, Balqam deqsita numuh, Israayil mara abaara'gidih, lakqo yeceen. Tohih sabbatak tunkuttubeh ten. Takkay immay ni Dagelti woo abaaro dooqa neh abe.
Israayil mari tohim keenih yikriyen waqdi, marin baaxoh maray ken addal suggu 'yehiyya inkih isinni addak ken yeyyeeqeenih.
Sek Elyaasib deqsita sek Toobiya deqsita num lih qalla luk yen. Eliyaasib Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik duyye edde daanisan golittek abbah yeneeh; tonna leemiik Toobiyah kaxxa goli yecee. Kaah yecee goli, sadgatah baahan daro kee qaydarusuuy, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih duyyeey, seekah mattacoh yeceen duyyeey, dakaatah baahen daro kee qinabak bicsen kamri kee, tonnah kaadu, zeyti (saliid) duma daanah elle haak sugen golik ten. Too dakaatah gaaboysen duyye, Yallih xinto elle inta'nnal, Leewih yooboke mara kee Yallih Qibaadah Qaril saare aba mara kee, tonnah kaadu, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit dacayrih yan marah yeceen duyyek ten.
Toh tekke saaku anu Yarusalaamal masuginniyooy, Malik Artacsasta Baabelon malik edde yekke soddom kee nammayhaytoh ayrot kaa fan gexeh suge. Dago wakti sugek lakal, ruksat kaak geeh,
Yarusalaam fanah uduure. Uduure saaku, Elyaasib abe umaane oobbe. Toh macaay inteenik, Toobiyah Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih qarwak qarik teena yecee 'yaanamak ten.
Toh kaxxam inqibeeh; Toobiya woo qarih addal daanat luk suggu 'ye duyye inkih afal kaak qide.
Sarrak, «Woo duyye addal akak sugte qari taahirroysa» 'yaanam exce. Wohuk gaba kalen waqdi, «Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih duyyeey, sadgatah daaniseenih sugen daro kee qaydarus wadir elle suge qarih gacisa» 'yaanam exce. Gacseenih.
Tohuk kalah kaadu, Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril saare aba mara kee Leewih yooboke marah acayuk yenen afto keenik yirgiqeenim oobbe. Tonna leemiik too mari Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih taama cabeeh isinni buqreh baaxo fan gexe.
Too waqdi doolat taamat yan mara essecekkeeh; «Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih taamah amo akah wagte wayteenim macaay?» keenik exce. Sarrak Leewih yooboke mara kee Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril saare abak yen mara gexeh baaheeh, edde sugen taamah ken gacse.
Tohuk lakal Israayil mari, dumak akah abak suge innah, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih dakaatah darooy qinabak bicsen kamri kee caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti keenih baahen.
Tohuk lakal too gaaboysen duyye elle tan qarwah taamak abbobtih, sek Selemya kee xinto elle tan innah adda aaxaguk yen Saaduk kee, Leewih yooboke Fadaaya deqsita num hee. Tohuk kalah Dakkúr-Canaan deqsita num ken cata'gidih hee. Canaan, Mattanya deqsita numuk baxi baxak ten. Ta mari aamanti le marak teneeh; ken toobokoh gaaboysen maaqo ken wadbise loonumuh ken eemeneh en.
«Yallaw, anu abam yoh ubulaay; koo elle yaqbuden qari kee tet addal koo yaqbudoonuh baguuk abah an taama foyya maabin» exce.
Too dabaanal Yuudâ-baaxol sabti ayro, maqab akak bicsaana'gidih, qinab xaylot yaaqite mara uble. Aki maray kaadu sabti saaku daro kee qinab xaylooy qinabak bicsen kamri kee salfa le caxâ-miru kee kalah tan duyye danoonal eerra heeh beyahiyya uble. A duyye inkih sabti qiidih ayro Yarusalaamal culusak yenen. Too waqdi «Sabti ayro hebeltohim maylammina» 'yaanam keenik exce.
Suur deqsitta magaalah marak tu yakke mari Yarusalaam magaalal dabaaqah sugeeh, kullum kee wohuk kalah tan duyyek mangom sabti qiidih ayro Yarusalaam baahakaay, ni maral xaamak sugen.
Toh uble waqdi Yuudak saqoltih yan mara essecekkeeh. Keenik exceemih, «Away abtan umaane isinnik maay tablen? Sabti ayroy taahirik tani nadaasa abten!
Yalli duma isi magaala akah bayseeh, nee kaxxam akah digaalem, hununuh sin abbobti isin taway abtan taamah innah tanim abeenimih sabbata. Uxih kaadu isin sabti ayro taahirik ane sinni taamah taamittaanaah, Yallih naqabu nel oobissaanam faxxaanam maay tablen?» keenik exce.
Sarrak, «Sabti
Inki adda akkiiy namma adda akki, tellemmô-duyye baaha mari bar yemeeteeniih, inkih yan bar magaalak afal xiineeni'mmay,
too marak, «Maaci maacissa 'yam fan akkel akah xintaanam macaay? Ahak wadir temeeten sin tekkek, umam siinil baaheyyo» keenik exce. Too ayrok wadir sabtih duyye tellemmoh baahak maraaqinnon.
Tohuk lakal Leewih yooboke marak, «Taahirrowwa 'xicay, sabti ayro taahirik tan ayro kinnuk, sahda qiidih akah assa innah, magaalah afat dacayrih gaca» keenik exce.
Tohuk gaba kale waqdi, «Yallaw, tahal yoo kassit. Ku kacni kaxxa kacanu. Tonna kinnuk, yoo wad» exce.
Too dabaanal kaadu Yahuud-mari Asdood kee Qammon kee Mooyab agabu rihimih abiteenim eexegeh.
Ken xaylok garab Asdood afat yaabak yeneeh, wohuk kalah kaadu aki afah yaabak yenen; ni af aaxaguk manannon.
Too mara kaxxam essecekkeeh; abaaro keenit abeeh; keenik garab oogoreeh; moyyak xagor keenik muguse. Sarrak, «Tahak wadir sin kee isin xalten xaylo marin baaxoh marat rihim faxe waytoonuh Yallih migaaqal xiibita» exceeh ken xibsiiseh.
Sarrak keenik exceemih, «Malik Suleeman dambit asissem, marin baaxoh agabu.
Hay, nanu sin abto katatneh marin agabul rihimak, ni Dageltih gitak awaquk, a kaxxa umaanet maay asnoo?» keenik exceeh ken sahiteh.
Yoyaadaq kaxxa seekih yen Elyaasib baxak yen. Takkay immay kay baxi Sanballat deqsita numuy Beet-Coron deqsitta magaalal yoobokehiyyah baxál digibe. Tohuk gexxaamah Yoyaadaq Yarusalaam magaalah addak eyyeeqeh.
Tohuk lakal, «Yallaw, seeka luk ten seekinna nadaasa isik abte. Leewih yooboke mara kee seeka ko'lih luk ten qahdi nadaasa isinnik abeenim ubuleey» 'yaanam exce.
Tonnal ummat marin qaadak taahirroyseeh; Leewih yooboke mara kee seekak kulli num, isil tanim akah yaaxige innah, abeh meqem keenih warse.
Tonnal kaadu, sadgatah qiden saqih cado elle alaysan boco, yaaxigen waktil baahaanam bicsiteeh; ummat kaadu naharat luuqusen daro kee naharat alaye caxâ-miru sadgatah baahaanam bicsite.
Sarrak «Yallaw, ta abba haam inkih yoh ubulaay, tahimih galto yoh ixig» exce.

Malik Ekserkas deqsita malik, dardaarinni korsi elle luk yen Fursi-rasuk inaytah-ten-magaalay Suusa-deqsitak-tenehiyyal gacca 'yeh Hindi-rasuk xabba haanamaay, Kuus-rasuh amma 'yaanam tan baaxoy bool kee labaatanna kee malcina rakaakay takkehiyyal ackamuk yen.
Too malik edde dardaare sidochaytô sanatat, qaffaydah kay gubal doolat-taamak-saqoltih yan mara kee, xintoh-abbobtih yan marah inkih kaxxa xigla abe. Too xiglah Fursi-rasu kee Meediyah-rasul tan qaskar kee, rakaakayittel xintok abbobti kee muddaqiyitte inkih temeete.
Lica alsih gide, usuk dardaarah elle enna 'ya rasul gaddaliinok leh gide kee, kay nabna kee misliino takkeh gide, xiglah yemeete mara ayballayuk suge.
Tohuk gaba kale saaku, gaddaleela kee masaakiinah inkih, inaytâ-magaalay migaaqah Suusa deqsitak tenehiyyal, kaxxa xigla abe. Too xigla ayyaamah malik qarih gasok bustaan elle yen aracal akkuk sugte.
Kay qarih daaratal qidi kee kuclinan bisu le sara, qado *baftak bicsen tafulwa kee qasdiimin bisu le tafulwat, lakqok bicsen ferranway qadoo-xaluq bicsen qamidwal edde tanihiyyat oobak caben. Too sari too ayro daarat kaxxam qaxa yeymeeqe. Tonnah kaadu too daaratih bagul, qisiiy qidii kee walqin bisu le xeetiy qax-meqeeh liliq iyyahiyya heen. Tohuk bagul elle daffeyan duyyey dahab kee lakqok bicseenihiyya heen.
Qinabak-bicsen-kamri dahabak-bicsen-kobboyaayil sinaamah yeceeniih, too kobboyaayi tii tiyak qaxah akak lafitak yen. Malik, «Kamrik kulli numuh faxeh gide acuya» 'yaanam iyye.
Malik, xiglah akah seece marah faxxa haanah gide maqabak keenih ucuya 'yaanam axcuk, malik-gasot-taamita-akdaamah amri yecee. Tohuk gexxaamah yemeete marah caddo sinni maqab yeceen.
Kay barray migaaqah Wasti deqsitak tenehiyya kaadu is le kabuk, malik qarih addal, agabuh xigla abte.
Malcinhaytoh ayro malik qinabak bicsen kamri yooqobeeh, sarrak xagar kaak dagoom laqte waqdi, seelabu le marih malciiniy dibuk kay farmot yenehiyyah seece. Too mari migaaqah Mahuman kee Bidta kee Carboona kee Bigta kee Abagta kee Deetar kee Karkas deqsitak yenen.
Too malcina num yemeete waqdi, «Gexay Maliká-Wastik, ‹Dardaarinni-kalabta amot hayya haay akke am› teetik inxica» iyye. Is kaxxa qax-maqaane luk teneeh, malik tet qax-maqaane kay gubal tan doolat abbobti kee yemeete qibini kaah yableenim faxe.
Ta farmo teetih warsen waqdi, kay barra, «Maamaata» yaanam kaal gacisse. Malik taham yoobbe waqdi, kaxxam bagcarrite.
Malik, xinto intam kee qadaalatah tanim aba'gidih, tu-yaaxigil fayu esseraanam qaadah luk yeneeh, tonna-leemiik tahak abeh meqeemih fayu kaah yacayu waa marah seece.
Mango waqdi fayu elle esserak yenem, Karsena kee Sesar kee Admaata kee Tarsis kee Mares kee Marsana kee Mamukan deqsita marak ten. Ta malcina num, Fursi kee Meediyah rasul doolat taamak kaxxa aracal yan marak yenen; malik xaqu yamaatoonuh idni luk yenen.
Ta mari yemeete waqdi, malik keenik iyyeemih, «Anu inni barrah, inni-taamat-liyoh-an-maral ‹Yol am› 'yaanamih farmo teetih ruube'mmay, too farmo yok cintek, ahak maca abnam taysee? Xinto tannah taniimik maca abaanam tayse intaah? keenik iyye.
Too waqdi Mamukan, malik kee malik gubal taamita doolat marak iyyeemih, «Ku barra xaaftem dibuk koo hinnay, ku gubal taamita doolat mara kee, atu dardaarinnah amol akak enna 'ta labha inkih xaafte.
Ahak wadir ku barra ah abtem agbi yoobbek, kulli barra isi baqala buruttam baahele. ‹Malik isi barrak am iyyeh farmo ruube waqdi, kay barra kay amri cinteh› 'yaanam axcelon.
Doolat taamat kaxxa arac le marih agbi, a saakuk wadir, isinni baqoltik toh iyyoonu waanama. Ahaysa kulli ikkel agbi baqolti-yab yaabbem raaqeleeh; baqolti isi agabu lih qaduwwuttam qaada akkele.
<<Yi malikow, kot bictek, ahaysa amri ucuyaay, ‹Wasti ahak wadir yi foocal ambulle waytay› 'yaanam inxic. Aham, sarrah Meediya kee Fursih rasih marak way kore wayta xinto akah takke innah, warkatal hayis. Ta xinto way kore wayta xinto nek takkay. Tet aftok teetik tayse barral rihimaay, is akah sugte malikáh qusba barra gactaama.
Atu amoytah elle tan baaxoy nabnah a gid takkehiyyal, a madqay atu teyyeeqehiyya yaabboonu waan waqdi, nikaacat yan agbi isi baqala assakaxxele. Baacoyta yakkay, gaddaali yakkay, barra baqala assakaxxele» 'yaanam kaak iyye.
Malik kee kay gubal taamita doolat mari tah yoobbe waqdi, ta fayu kaak yossokooteeniih; tonna leemik malik too usuk inxicca 'yem abe.
Kay dardaarinnih gubat enna 'ta rakaakayitteh inkih farmo ruubeeh, ruube farmol kulli mari le af kee kulli rasih le kutbet yuktubeh ruube. Farmoh ruubeemih, «Barra isi baqlih milkih gactay, buxah-amri baqli-gabat gacay» 'yaanam iyye.

Malik bagcarra cabba heek sarra, kay barra kaal bahtem kee usuk tet giddinaamak iyyem cisab kaal tekke.
Malikih fayu acayuk yen maray kaak baxsime waak yenehiyya iyyeemih, «Qax meqe baxuwway bikrit tanihiyya macah gorrise waytaah?
Atu abbah akak tan baaxol, kulli rakaakayal abbobtih yan mara dooritaay, qax-meqe baxuwwa atu dabaaqah elle tan inaytâ-magaala fanah baaha keenik inxic. Too agabu inkih seelabu-le numuy migaaqah Hegay deqsitaah ku agbih dacayrit yanihiyyah gabal hoonay. Tokkel oson qax elle yamqen diwa keenih heelon.
Sarrak too baxuuwuk atu isih faxxa hannaan baxuwwa maliká abetto» kaak iyyen. Toh yoobbe waqdi malik, «Taham way meqe fayuk tanih tan» 'yaanam isi bagul yucsube. Sarrak oggoleh.
Inaytâ-magaalah addal Yahuud numuy Yaaqír-Mordakay deqsitahiyya yen. Too num akah aabakuk yenem, Benyam kedok teneeh; Kees kee Simqi deqsita marak rade numuk yen.
Malik-Nabkadnessar deqsite Baabelon-malik, Yuudâ-malikiy Yahoyaasin deqsitehiyya carbit yibbixe mara lih hayya heeh Baabelon rasu fan seewah bee saaku, Mordakay woo seewah been marak numuk teenah yen.
Too num nabam qax-meqe qammih baxáy migaaqah Aster deqsittahiyya luk yen. Qibraan qaadal migaaqah Hadassa teetih axcuk yenen. Tet xaleena rabte saaku, Mordakay is fan tet baaheeh isi baxáh innal tet yeynebe.
Malik yecee amrih, baxuw inkih Suusa deqsitta magaalay inaytah tenehiyya fanah beeniih, tokke been baxuuwut Aster edde ten. Baahen baxuw malik qarih addal agabu elle haan aracal heeniih, tokkel Hegay deqsita seelabu-li ken dacayrit gace.
Hegay, Aster kaxxam yikcineeh, is abba hannaanim kaat muquk ten. Tohuk wadir nagay qaxa tamqe'gidih, xagar edde dugta sukuti kee rikeek tan maaqo teetih acayuk yen. Agabuh heen aracal malcina baxuwway dibuk tet taama abtahiyya teetih hee. Agabu elle haan aracal, inkih yayse aracal tet hee.
Mordakay, «Yahuuduh toobokem numuh mawarsin» teetik iyyeh yeneeh, tohuk gexxaamah kinni sahdayto numuh mawarsinna.
Mordakay kulli saaku, agbi elle yan qarih daaratak foocal, is akah tan innah wagittoh wonnak annah gexak yen.
Baxuw qaxa edde yamqen diwa-haytit inkih yan sanat suge. Too sanatak laca alsih gide coofaalik bicsen sukutit xagar keenik duugak sugen. Aki laca alsa kaadu, qatri kee arab xabbacoysaah qaxa yaymaaqe caxâ-sifat ken askatuk sugen. Tohuk gaba kalen saaku kulli baxuwwa midu-miduh malik fanah gexak ten.
Kulli baxuwwa agbi elle yan aracak malik buxah fan gexxa waqdi, isih faxxa hayte sara kee bilqah haan duyyet gacca teh gexak ten.
Magrib malik qari fan gexak teneeh, aki saaku aki aracay malik caggô-gubih caggoh nikaacat yabbixe agbi elle yanihiyya tet beyak yenen. Wokkel seelabu luk yen numuy migaaqah Sagasgad deqsitak yeneeh, malik agbih dacayrit yenel tet cabak yenen. Tohuk lakal malik tet ikcinna heeh migaaqal teetih seecam fanah, kaa fan gexak mananna.
Ayrok teena, malik fan gexaanam Asteril miduh temeete. Abicayil baxá Aster, Mordakayak qammih baxák ten. Tet teynebem, tet qammih yen Mordakay deqsita numuk ten. Aster yuble mari inkih tet yossokooteh. Is malik fan gexxe waqdi, Hegay deqsita seelabu-liy malik qarih addal agabu dacayrit yenehiyya teetik edde gaca iyye sartanat gacteh gexxe.
Ekserkas malik edde yekke malcinhaytô-sanatak taban haytoh alsay migaaqah Teebet deqsitahiyyat, Aster malikiy isi gasoh addal yanihiyyah fan baahen.
Malik tet yuble waqdi tet yikcineeh, gersi agabuk fula tet yossokoote. Gersi agabu kee baxuuwuk inkih teetih lafte. Sarrak malik-barrat haan dardaarinni-kalabta tet amot hee. Duma barrah luk suge Wastih aftok, tet malikáh haysite.
Tohuk lakal Aster-migaaqal, malik isi gubal taamita mara kee xintoh abbobtih kaxxa xigla abe. Inkih tan ummatay usuk amol malikih akak raaqahiyyah too ayro qaffayda abeeh, ummattah mango mattaco yecee.
Baxuw nammayhaak gaaboysen saaku, Mordakay malik qarih taamah abbootan luk suge.
Aster Yahuuduh toobokem teetik yaaxigeenimik kaxxam cubbi abitak ten. Mordakay, «Yahuuduh toobokem sahdah mawarsin» teetik iyyeh sugeeh, is qunxuk ten saaku kay yab akah oggolak tene'nnah, kay yab oggolte.
Mordakay malik qarih taamah abbootan gee dabaanal, Bigtaana kee Teres deqsita namma numuy seelabu lehiyya malik addal akak xiina golit dacayrih yenen. Too namma num Malik-Ekserkasat kaxxam bagcarritteeh, tonna leemiik nammayak kaa qidaanamal malsen.
Mordakay ah keenik yuble waqdi, Asterih warse. Aster kaadu malikih warisseeh; ahamat raddeeh teetih warissem, Mordakay kinnim malikih warisse.
Malik too waqdi taham numma kinnim kee akke waytam yasmite mara hee. Too mari Mordakay iyyem numma kinnim yismiteeniih; too waqdi too namma num takayrut qiden. Sarrak malik, «Taham elle tekke inna Fursi-Dardaarinni-Aydaada deqsita kitaabih addal uktuba» 'yaanam iyye.

Ayrok teena Malik-Ekserkas, Haaman deqsita num reedah inkih tan muddaqiyittek daga raaqa aracal hee. Haaman Hammadaata deqsita numih baxak yen. Oson Agag deqsita numuk rade marak yenen.
Malik kay gubal taamitta 'ya marak inkih, «Haaman yamaate waqdi, massakaxxah gulubuh gacca 'teenih gommoh kaah rada» 'yaanam iyye. Mordakayak kalih mari, malik keenik akah iyye innah, kaa ubulla haan waqdi, gommoh kaah radak yenen.
Malik buxal yan doolat mari Mordakayak, «Sugay, malik amri akah cintam macaay?» kaak iyyen.
Ta mari kulli ayro kaa kallaceeh, «Maabinay sahda kok intam oobbey» kaak iyyen. Usuk keenik iyyeemih, «Anu Yahuuduh ooboke ikkal, Haamanah gulubuh magacaay, gommoh marada» keenik iyye. Sarrak too mari, Yahuuduh yoobokem kaak yoobbe waqdi, tu kaat takku waytam keh yaaxigeeni'gidih, keenik iyyem Haamanah warsen.
Haaman, Mordakay kaah gulubuh rade waah, gommoh rade waam yeexege waqdi, kaxxam bagcarrite.
Sarrak kaadu Mordakay Yahuuduh yoobokem yoobbe waqdi, Mordakay dibuk digaalam hinna'mmay, digaala wohuk tatrusam faxe. Inkih yan rasul enna 'ya Yahuuduh ubukka 'ya mara qidaamal malse.
Malik Ekserkas edde reede taban kee nammeyhaytô-sanatak inikhaytoh alsay migaaqah Niisan deqsitahiyyah addat, woo-elle-malsem edde-abeh-meqe-ayro yaaxige'gidih, ramli qide. Too ramlik migaaqah ken afat Fuurim axcuk yenen. Sarrak Yahuud mara edde qiduh, ramlih sanatak taban kee nammayhaytoh alsay Adar deqsitahiyya tewqe.
Too waqdi Haaman malikik iyyeemih, «Akkel atu malikih elle tan baaxoh addal fixixih yan mari yaniih, too mari elle ane wayya haa rakaakay maloonuuy, akkel keenik sah num alle waa qaada loonuuh, atu malikih elle tan baaxol amrissam moggolan. Tonna leemiik tibba keenik intam mafaxxinta.
Tonna'mmay hayba le malikow, kot bictek, a maral rabi elle yamaate madqa tayyaaqem tayse. Anu kaadu sidiica boolih alfih kiilo takke lakqo ku kadnat culsaana'gidih, ku doolat-abbobtih aceeyyo» iyye.
Toh iyye waqdi, malik feerat luk suge ferranto eyyeqqa heeh; Yahuud marih naqboytah yan Hammadaatá-Haaman gabal hee.
Sarrak kaak iyyeemih, «Too lakqo isih daanis; ahaysa too mara kuumuk, isih faxxem keenik ab» kaak iyye.
Tohuk wadir sanatak naharsi alsak taban kee sidochaytoh ayro, Haaman kutbe-abeenitih inkih seeceeh; yemeeten waqdi amri gurrah keenik iyyeemih, «Malik amol akak enna 'ya rasul yan marih af kee feerat, malik amri elle yan warkat uktubaay; too warkat xintoh-abbobti kee doolat-taamak-fayya-inta-exxal-yan-mara kee doolat-gubal-rasi-abbobtih-yan-marah inkih ruuba. Ta amri rubtam, Malik-Ekserkas kinnuk, usuk ruubeemih astah kay ferranto bagul astah akak haa» iyye.
Kutbe-abeenit toh uktubba heenih gaba kalen waqdi, a farmoy yuktubeenihiyya gabat le mari, farmo-elle-tan-waraakit gabat luk, rakaakayitte fan arduk gexen. Too yuktuben farmoy too mari gabat beehiyyal tenemii, «Sanatak inikhaytoh alsay migaaqah Adar deqsitahiyyak taban kee sidochaytoh ayroh addat Yahuuduh ubukka 'ye marak furrayna takkuu, baxuw takkuu, idoola takkuu, agabu takkuu, urru takku num keenik macabinay yakkeenimiik ken qida» 'yaanam elle ten. «Oson edderra heenim keenik buuba» 'yaanam kaadu elle ten.
Tohim edde takku wayta ayroh bical akah gacan innah, too kutbe kulli rakaakayal enna 'ya maray mango rasuh yaabukehiyyah amri kinnim yeexegeh akah suga innah, kulli ikke ruuben.
Woo amri kaadu Suusâ magaalay inaytah tanihiyyal yan marah malik amrisem ascassuk, kay gubal yan mari yiysixxige. Arduk farmo beya mari kaadu kulli rakaakay fanah gexak taham yiysixxigen. Suusâ magaalah mari tah yoobbe waqdi, kinni inna waagiseh. Takkay immay malik kee Haaman too ayro titta lih daffa iyyeenih, maqab aaqabuk yenen.

Mordakay tekkem yoobbe waqdi, sara isik qanxise. Sarrak sartanah *qabuddat gaceeh, amol gombod isik caxe. Tohuk lakal boogisak magaalak adda gacca 'yeh gexe.
Sarrak malik qarih afa yemeete. Takkay immay addah maculinnay afal elle yeede. Addah akah cule weem, sartanah qabudda xagaral le num malik qari culam bictaamak manannaay, tohuk gexxaamah maculinna.
Inkih tan rakaakayitteh adday aham amrih elle oobiseenihiyyal yan Yahuuduh ubukka 'ye mari inkih tah yoobbe waqdi, kaxxa rookah rookiten. Yakkeenimiik soomeeniih, weeqeeniih, boogiseenih. Mango mari keenik sartanah qabuudut gacca 'yeh, gomboduk bagul deerih gacen.
Aster taamat ten baxuwwa kee seelabu le maray tet lih sugehiyya Mordakay elle yan inna teetih warsen waqdi, abtam aaxige cinteh. Sara xagaral haa'gidih, sartan kaah rubte. Takkay immay Mordakay woo sara xagaral hayu cineh.
Sarrak Hatak deqsita seelabu luk yen numuy malik tet farmoyta yakke'gidih doorehiyya Mordakay fanah rubteeh, « ‹Geytem macaay? A ceelot akah gactem maca kot tekke?› kaak inxica» inte.
Hatak, Mordakayay magaalak maglallah yan aracay malik qarih afa akak culan aracak foocal yanihiyya fan gexxa 'yeh, Aster intem kaah warse.
Mordakay too waqdi Haaman Yahuud mara elle qidam faxa inna kee, Yahuud mara qideenik malikih lakqok culsam faxah gide kee, tohuk kalah tu elle tikka itte'nna inkih kaah warse.
«Yahuud mara qida» 'yaanamih amriy Suusâ magaalal yewqehiyya kutbeh elle tan warkat kaa yuybulle. Sarrak woo numuk iyyeemih, «Gexay a warkat Asteril beyaay, ta way anu kok excem inkih teetih waris. Teetik intaamah, ku marah nacruura'gidih malik kallacaay, <Qidim keenit maabin› 'yaanam kaak inxic» 'yaanam farmoh teetih ruube.
Too num gexeeh, Asterih toh inkih warse.
Aster too farmo toobbe waqdi, kaadu farmo kaah rubteeh, inteemih,
«Malik akah seece'kah, gasoh adda cule num labhaytu takkuu, barra takkuu, rabi keenil yamaate. Xinto toh inta. Taham malikih fayu yecee mara kee, inkih yan rasul yan mari inkih yaaxige qaada. Takkay immay toh taniimih malik gabat-haa-dahab-caxxa dagah fayya hee kaa tekkek, too num rabak cattiimah. Tonna'mmay malik away alsi gide farmo yoh maruubinnaay, yol ama yok maxaccinna» 'yaanam farmoh too numul kaah rubte.
Mordakay ta farmo kaa gufte waqdi,
Asterih kaadu gersi farmo ruubeeh iyyemii, «Away malik buxah addal taniimih, Yahuudut tekkeemik nagay raaqettom makkalin.
Annah taniimik tibba 'tek, Yahuud ummattah cato gersi ikkek amaateleeh, cattiimeloonu'mmay, koo kee ku abbak raaqe mari inkih ambaxele. Kaadu malik barra akah tekkem, tannah yan waktit tuk teena abta'gidi takkem bictah» 'yaanam farmoh teetih ruube.
Aster too farmo toobbe waqdi, kaadu too yaabal yab kaah rubte.
Inteemih, «Suusâ magaalal yan Yahuud marak inkih mododa inxic. Soomaay yoh kaadu dooqa aba inxic. Sidooca bar kee laqoh tu maaqabinaay makmina keenik inxic. Yoo kee yi taamat yan baxuw kaadu toh abenno. Tohuk lakal xintol umam kinnim aaxigeh immay, tohuh, malik fanah gexeyyo. Tohuh, rabi yol yemeetek, yamaatay» 'yaanam kaah rubte.
Too farmo kaa gufte waqdi Mordakay gexeeh, Aster kaak inxicca 'tem abe.

Sidooca ayroh too soomut sugga 'teh; gaba kalte saaku, ugutta 'teh malikwâ-sarat gacca 'teh gexxeeh, malik qarih daaratak adda le kabuk dardaarinni korsi addal akak tan qarik foocah temeete waqdi, sollu inte. Malik too waqdi dardaarinni-korsih amol daffeyak suge.
Tet soolah yuble waqdi, tet yossokooteeh; too waqdi malik gabat-haa-dahab-caxxa tet fan fayya hee. Too waqdi kaal temeeteh, caxxak moyya gabah xagte.
Malik, «Asterey maca faxxaa? Faxxa haytam yoh waris; geettok. Anu malikih elle an baaxok inkih yan garab faxxa way geettok; maca faxxaa?» teetik iyye.
Too waqdi Aster kaak inteemih, «Malikow, atu raabittek, away koo kee Haamanah buxal afxago siinih bicsam faxak, buxah yol ama» kaak inte.
Malik toh yoobbe waqdi Haamanah, «Aster buxal afxago neh bicisseh tanik, xayuk am» 'yaanam farmoh ruube. Malik kee Haaman, Aster fan afxagoh gexen.
Tokkel qinabak bicsen kamri yaaquben waqdi, malik Asterik, «Faxxam yoh warisey; geettok. Atu faxxek, anu malikih amol akak an rasuk garab kinni way geettok; maca faxxa?» teetik iyye.
Too waqdi Aster kaak inteemih, «Hayba le malikow, anu koo esseram yoh abtam faxxek, koo kee Haaman beera kaadu buxal siinih abu waa xiglak maraaqinay amaay, faxam tokkel koh warseyyo» kaak inte.
Haaman wokkek eweqqa 'yeh farcaanak isi buxah gexak suge waqdi, Mordakay malik qarih culmak foocal kaah suge. Kaal tatreh gexeeh, too waqdi Mordakay massakaxxah kaah masoolinnaay, baaqid kaat mahanna. Haaman toh kaak yuble waqdi, kaxxam yinqibe.
Takkay immay nabsiyya isik xabba heeh, isi buxa fan gexe. Buxa gufe waqdi kataysiisih buxah seeceeh, isi barrak kaadu «Amay ne'lih daffey» iyye. Kay barra migaaqah Dares deqsitak ten.
Sarrak hidah gaddaliinok leh gide kee, xaylok xaleh gide kee, malik kaadu reedah kaa elle hee arac kee, tonnah kaadu, malik gersi marak fula kaa elle yossokoote inna keenih warse.
Haaman tohut macabinnay, kaadu qagseh iyyeemih, «Malik-barra malik lih xiglah yok sarra numuh maseecinna. Beera kaadu gersi xiglah ama 'yaanam nek inteh tan.
Takkay immay Yahuuduh yooboke Mordakay malik qarih afal yanim fanah, tah inkih tu yot macelta» iyye.
Kay barra kee kay kataysis ta yab toobbe waqdi, «Sahda edde takran caxxay xexxaarah labaatanna kee namma mitri yakkehiyya macah bicse wayta? Beera malikik, ‹Mordakay a caxxat takram faxa› inteh takartaamak sah! Kaa takarsissa hayteh, isih farcaanak woo xiglah gexxaama» kaak iyyen.
Haaman too fayu yoobbe waqdi, «Tah meqe malak tanih tan» 'yaanam isi bagul yucsubeeh, too waqdi sahda edde takran caxxa bicsiise.

Too bar malikit xin yamaatu cineh. Sarrak malik, «Fursi-dardaarinni-aydaadi elle yan kitaabay elle dardaara baaxol duma tekkem elle yuktubeenihiyya yol baaha» iyyeh, bahsiise.
Woo waraakit yikriyen waqdi, duma malik qidam faxak suge seelabu le namma numut Mordakay elle rade'nna elle yuktuben warkat gee. Too namma numuy malik qarit dacayrih yenehiyya, migaaqah Bigtaana kee Teres deqsitak ten.
Too waqdi malik, «Mordakayay ah abehiyyah galtoh abnem maay lino?» iyye.
Kay taamat yan mari, «Tama numuh abeenim matan» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi malik, «Daaratal iyyi yanii?» iyye. Haaman too way Mordakay edde takra'gidih bicsiise caxxih bagut, malik gabat kaa takkarsiisa'gidiiy, tohim malikih warsa'gidih wokke yemeeteh suge.
Malik taamat yan mari malikik, «Daaratal tanim Haamana» kaak iyye.
Malik «Kaa culusa» iyye.
Too waqdi Haaman malikil cule. Cule waqdi malik kaak iyyeemih, «Saraf lem akah abam faxa num yanik, too numuh maca abam tayse?» iyye.
Toh yoobbe waqdi, Haaman, «Toh yook tan kaay; yok kalih numuy saraf lem akah abam faxahiyya mali» 'yaanam isi bagul hayya hee.
Malikik, «Tonnah yan numuh, malik-edde-gaca-sartanay atu isih xagaral haytahiyya kaat haanama. Malik farasay bila edde heeni bical kaah haanama.
Sarrak ku xintoh muddaqiyittek kaxxa numuk woo sartan kaat hayyaay, farasat kaa hayya hayteh farasak foocat gacca 'xicay, ‹Malik isih faxe numuh saraf lem elle aba'nna ubula› axcuk, magaalak gudel sahdah warisak gex iyyaanam inxic» iyye.
Too waqdi malik kaak iyyeemih, «Hay, tonnal isissikay gexay, woo warissa sartan kee faras bahha haay, tama massakaxxa Yahuuduh yooboke Mordakayah ab. Taway axcuk sugga 'tem inkih, elle inxicca inte innah, atu kaah ab. Yi qarik afal daffeyak koh sugelek, xayuk gexay, kok akah inxicca exce'nnah, ab» kaak iyye.
Haaman gexeh sartan kaah baaheh xagarat kaak heeh, sarrak farasat kaa hayya heeh, isih foocat kaak gacca 'yeh, magaalak gudet foocat kaak elle gexaamal, «Malik isih faxe numuh saraf elle aba'nna ubulaay» axcuk gexe.
Tohuk gaba kalen waqdi, Mordakay malik qarik afa fan gexeeh, Haaman wacarriyih namma gaba amol luk isi buxah arduk yuduure.
Kaat tikka 'tem isi barra kee kataysiisih warse. Too waqdi kay barra kee kay kataysis kas luk teneeh, «Ahaysa luk sugte assobbiyyi Mordakay gabal kok gacam faxa. Mordakay Yahuuduh yooboke numuuy; qeebih koh mayaabbaay, kok aysele» kaak iyyen.
Oson too yaabat yanin waqdi, malik buxat yan seelabu-leelah yen mari, «Aster bicissa maaqoh koh seecaana» iyyeeh, Haaman gabat malik buxah been.

Malik kee Haaman qagisseh, Aster bicisse maaqo xagaana'gidih tokke gexen.
Tokkel kaadu qinabak bicsen kamri yaaquben waqdi malik, «Asterey, faxxam yoh warisey; geettok. Atu faxxek, anu malikih amol akak an rasuk garab kinni way geettok; maca faxxaa?» teetik iyye.
Too waqdi is kaal gacisseemih, «Anu koo esserah anim gibdim kinni way, kok faxam yoo kee yi mara qide waytaama.
Yoo kee yi marih qidimil gaba kaleeniih; naqoosannuh ken xaamaanamal tibba axcuk eneeh, koo akah taqbisak mananniyo'mmay, ah woh hinna. Nee qidaanaah, ragid nee cabsiisaanamal, gaba nek kaleenih» inte.
Too waqdi Malik-Ekserkas, «Woh abtu talliilem iyyaay? Woh aba iyye num ankel yaniih?» iyye.
Too waqdi Aster inteemih, «Ni naqboytay nee qidsiisam faxahiyya amah kaa; ama umeeni, Haamana» kaak inte.
Haaman too waqdi hagga yeeh, way malikik intik adda waggaay, way Aster fan wagga hee.
Malik toh yoobbe waqdi kaxxam bagcarriteeh, edde ugteh, qarik afah bustaan elle yan ikke fan gexe. Haaman toh yuble waqdi, malik kaa digaalu waam yeexegeeh; tonna-leemiik Aster rooci kaak wadda'gidih, tet kallacuh qari addal tet lih raaqe.
Malik yemeete waqdi, rooci kaak wadda'gidih, kallacih is elle tan qarkaytô-bagul gommoh radda 'yeh tet kallacak suge. Malik toh yuble waqdi, «A num yi buxah addal yi barra caylisam faxa kunna!» axcuk kaat kaaye.
Tonna-luk wokkel suge mari Haamanak foocal saro heen.
Tokkel suge marih numuy migaaqah Carboona deqsitak yenehiyya, «Ah Haaman hinnaa! Inkinnah yi amoytaw, Mordakayay ku rooci catehiyya edde takaruh isi buxal takayrih arac bicsiiseh yan. Kaa edde takaruh bicsiise arac xexxaarah labaatanna kee koona mitri yakke» iyye. Malik toh yoobbe waqdi, «Too aracat beyay Haaman takara» iyye.
Sarrak Haaman, Mordakay edde takaruh bicsiiseh suge aracat takaren. Tohuk wadir malik bagcarrak xamceh.

Too ayrot edde, Malik-Ekserkas Yahuuduk-qaduwwih-suge Haaman buxal luk suggu 'ye duyye inkih Asterih yecee. Sarrak Aster, Mordakay teetih ramad lem kaah warisseeh; tohuk wadir Mordakay malik elle yan ikke culaamih ruksat malikik geeh raaqe.
Malik sarrak isi ferrantoy duma Haamanah yeceeh sugehiyyay malik asta elle tanihiyya Mordakayah yecee. Aster kaadu Haamanak raqte duyyeh abbah Mordakay hayte.
Tohuk lakal Aster malikik ibak gubal raddeeh, weeqah sinkibitak kaak inteemih, «Agag deqsita malikik rade Haaman, Yahuud marah looweh suge umaane akah raaqisinnaan innah ab» kaak inte.
Too waqdi malik gabat abbaxuk suge dahabak bicsen malik caxxa tet fan fayya heeh, too waqdi ugutteh.
Sarrak inteemih, «Atu raabitteeh, yot maqal telleeh, anu kaadu away koo esserah anim, tanim kinnim cubbussa hayta waqdi, Agag deqsita malikik rade Hammadaatá-Haaman yeceeh cabe amri abinal akah ase waa innah ab. Usuk, ‹Yahuuduh ubukka 'ye maray atu malikih elle tan rasul enna 'yahiyya inkih qida› 'yaanam iyyeh yan.
Tannah tanim inni intih abalih yi mara kee yi ramadat takkeeh, ken qidaanam abalih tibba axcem yoh matakka» inte.
Toh yoobbe waqdi Malik-Ekserkas, Aster kee Yahuuduh yooboke Mordakayak iyyeemih, «Asterih, Haaman buxal luk suggu 'ye duyye eceeh, usuk Yahuud marah looweh suge umaaneh sabbatah kaa takkarsiiseh.
Awayah tu gactek, malik migaaqal yewqe amri kee kay asta elle tan warkat korsaanam mabicta. Tonna'mmay away isinnih elle faxxa haytan gurral, Yahuud marah waraakit aktubaay, taktuben waqdi, yi migaaqal uktubay malik asta edde haa» iyye.
Aham edde tekkem sanatak sidochaytoh alsay Siiwan deqsitahiyyak labaatanna kee sidochaytoh ayrok ten. Mordakay malik kutbe-abeenitih secca yeeh, malik gubat xinta baaxoy Hindi-rasuk xabba haanamaay, Kuus-rasuh amma 'yaanam takkehiyyah addal tan bool kee labaatanna kee malciin takke rakaakayittel tan xintoh-abbobti kee doolat-saqolti kee doolatat-kaxxa-arac-le-marah yaktuboonu waanam keenih warse. Too mari too baaxol enna 'ya marak kulli marah le marih af kee feerat yuktuben waraakit ruuben. Yahuud marah kaadu isi af kee feerat too waraakit ruuben.
Mordakay woo yab malik-migaaqal yuskutubeeh, sarrak malik-asta kay migaaqal elle hee. Ta waraakit gabat le mari sissik-faarisiy malik qaril faarisih aben dagget yanihiyyat xoxbisak gexen.
A waraakitiy yuktubeenil tenemii, Yahuud mari elle aninnaan ikkel umam keenil baaha marat koysitaanah bical gacaanamih ruksat malik keenih yeceeh 'yaanamak ten. Faxe rasukuuy yanoonay, gabat silac le mari Yahuud marat qeebi aben ken tekkek, lon silaacat qeebi keenit abinnaan mara seloonay, hinnay kaadu ken xaylo kee agabu qidoonay, ken duyye isinnih haysitoonay.
Ta amri Adar deqsita taban kee nammeyhaytoh alsak taban kee sidochaytoh ayroy duma Yahuud mara edde qida iyyeenihiyya abinat asay» 'yaanamak ten.
Taham, ahak wadir, inkih yan rasul timixxige xinto akkele. Yahuud mari too ayro qeebi keenit abu waa marah bical sugelon 'yaanam elle ten.
Malik elle amrissa hee innal, too waraakit elle ruuben mari malik-buxah-faarisil koori hayya heenih amot akak gacca 'yeenih kaxxam xoxbisak gexen. Too amri kaadu inaytâ-magaalah ten Suusal inkih yontoobbe.
Sarrak Mordakay kuclinan kee qidik yan ibak lifiq gufa kameesit gacca 'yeh, xagar meqe *baftak bicsen saroy qasdiiminan bis lehiyyak bicsen koot haysitta heeh, dahabak bicsen kalabtay kaxxahiyya amot luk, malikwa elle saritta'nnal saritta heeh, malik qarik yewqe. Suusâ gitittel kaa yublen waqdi, sahda kaxxam tifriceeh, qililiseenih.
Yahuud mari kaadu kaxxam yifriceeh, duma luk sugen meysik yoffoofeenih, nasri geenim yeexegeenih.
Kulli rakaakay kee kulli magaalah addal suggu 'ye Yahuud-mari, baahen-waraakitil-tanim keenih yikriyen waqdi, farcatah kaxxa xigla aben. Ummatta mangih Yahuuduk meysitteemih sabbatah, akah aabuke ween Yahuud yekken.

Adar deqsita alsak taban kee sidochaytoh ayroy duma Yahuuduh yooboke mara qida 'yaanamih amri edde yeceenihiyya toofeeh; Yahuud niqibuk suggu 'ye mari too alsat isinni gubat ken haanam faxak yenen. Takkay immay toh makkinnay, wohih aftok Yahuud-mari keenik yaysem tibbixe.
Yahuud mari elle aninnaan magaalak gudel keenit qeebi abuh amaatinnaan marat qeebi aboonuh ittikiyya 'yeeniih, bical gacen. Sahda elle aninnaan ikkel meysik gexxaamah, num keenit koysite cineh.
Rakaakayittel doolat saqoltih yen maraay, ken xintoh abbobti kee malik taamak saqoltih yen mari inkih, Mordakay-meysik gexxaamah, Yahuud marih kabu gacen.
Mordakay kaxxa arac le numuy abbootan geyak geya yekkem malik abbah elle enna 'ya baaxol inkih tontoobbe.
Tonna leemiik Yahuud-mari duma naqboytiitih keenik suge marak isinnih faxxa haanam aben. Seefit ken yusguuden.
Suusâ-magaalay inaytah-tanihiyyal Yahuud-mari koona boolih num qide.
Too maray qideenihiyyak taban Haaman xaylok ten. Migaaqah Farsandata kee Dalfon kee Asfata kee Foraata kee Adalya kee Aridaata kee Farmasta kee Arisay kee Ariiday kee Waydaata deqsitak yenen. Yakkeenimiik Israayil qaduwwik yenen. Takkay immay qiden marih duyye mabuubinnon.
Too ayrot edde Suusâ magaalal sahdak qideenih gide malikih warsen.
Sarrak malik Asterik iyyeemih, «Suusah addal dibuk Yahuud mari koona boolih num qide. Haaman xayloh agantah seleenih. Dibuk Suusâ magaalal ta gide akak qideeni aki magaaloolil wohuk fula qide'kal maraaqaanam digga le. Taway hay maca faxak raqte? Uxih faxxam tellek geetto. Kalah faxxam tellek yoh waris, koh abeyyok» teetik iyye.
Aster too waqdi kaak inteemih, «Malikow, atu raabittek, ta saaku abeenim kaadu Suusâ-magaalal beera qagsaana'gidih, ruksat keenih ucuy. Haaman xayloh tabanak raysa takara inxic» inte.
Malik is inxicca intem oggoleeh, absiiseh. Haaman xayloh tabanak ginaada gubbik bagul sahda elle table ikkel takaren.
Adar deqsita alsak taban kee fereyhaytoh ayro Yahuud mari yakkeemiik gaabowwa 'yeh Suusâ magaalah addal kaadu sidooca boolih num qiden. Too saaku kaadu duyye keenik mabennon.
Yahuuduk rakaakayitteh addal yen mari kaadu yittikiyeh bical gace. Ken niqibuk suge marak malcina-taban kee koona alfih num qideenih immay, duyye keenik mabuubinnon.
Tah edde tekkem, Adar deqsita alsak taban kee sidochaytoh ayrok ten. Taban kee fereyhaytoh ayroy ciggiltahiyya qidimik yeedeenih. Too ayro farcatak gacca 'yeenih qiidih asen.
Takkay immay Yahuuduk Suusa deqsitta kaxxa magaalal suge mari, too alsak taban kee konoyhaytoh ayro qiidih farcatak asen. Toh akah abeenim, taban kee sidochaytoh ayro kee taban kee fereyhaytoh ayrot naqboytiitih keenik suge mara selak suggu 'yeenih, taban kee konoyhaytoh ayrot qidimik yeedeenih. Too ayro qiidih asen.
Tohuk gexxaamah tohuk wadir, Yahuuduh yooboke maray qunxa magaaloolil sugehiyya taban kee fereyhaytoh ayro africuk qiidih edde asaah; kulsa le maaqo tittah edde yecee ayro tekke.
Mordakay tekkem inkih kitaabah yuktubeeh, sarra kaadu waraakit uktubba heeh Fursi-rasul enna 'ya Yahuud maray xeri'kke kee xayi'kkel yanihiyyah inkih ruube.
Too waraakitil ken yiysixxigeemih, Adar alsak taban kee ferey kee taban kee konoyhaytoh ayrot kulli sanatal qiidih asa.
Ta namma ayro Yahuud mari naqboytit edde bayse ayro; ta alsat akke raarte rooka kee niyâ-digloh aftok africuk kee ruffu edde iyyen ayro. Tonna-kinnuk tama namma ayro qiidih asaay, kulsa le maaqo tittah ucuya. Masaakiinah kaadu acwa ucuya 'yaanam elle tan warkat keenih ruube.
Tohuk wadir Yahuud mari Mordakay inxicca 'yem kataateeh, too ayrok lakal kulli sanatal too namma ayrot qiidih asan.
Hammadaatá-Haaman deqsita numuy Agag deqsitta kedoh yoobokeeh, Yahuuduh yooboke marak naqboytah sugehiyya ramli qideeh, ramli ken afat Fuurim deqsitak yen. Ramli akah qidem Yahuud bayisuh ramli edde yawqe ayro yaaxige'gidik ten. Yahuud mara inkitanuuk saabo cabsiisam faxe.
Takkay immay Aster malikil gexxeeh, too saaku malik amri yecee. Haaman Yahuuduh loowe umaane kaal tuduure. Kaa kee kay xaylo takkartinteh.
Toh edde tekke ayroorak Fuurim qiidi akah iyyeenim, tohih sabbata. Mordakay yuktube warkat kee keenit tekkeemik gexxaamah, Yahuud-mari too ayroorak Fuurim-qiidi iyye.
Yahuud mari isi kee isik rade mara kee Yahuud yekke maral inkih, kulli sanatal ta namma ayro, Mordakay elle inxicca 'ye innal, qiidih asaanam tohuk temeete.
Tohuk wadir kulli way sanatal ta namma ayro Yahuuduh ubukka 'ye num elle aninnaan magaala kee rakaakayal qiidih asay 'yaanamal gaba kalen. Too qiidik migaaqah Fuurim qiidi iyyen.
Malikáh ten Aster warkat taktubeeh, too warkatal leh tan abbootanak ugutak, duma Mordakay yuktubeh suge Fuurim qiidih qaada akah maaqile waan innah keenil diggosse.
Too warkatay yuktubeenil, Malik-Ekserkas xintoh gubat yan rasul enna 'ya Yahuuduh yooboke marah yuktuben warkata 'yaanam bagul akak ten. Yahuud marah amaan kee wagari gacay 'yaanam addal akak ten.
Toh lih kaadu, «Ahak duma soom kee rookah ayroh massakaxxah madqa eyyeqqa heenih too ayro assakaxxayuk elle sugen gurral, Fuurim deqsita qiid gufa saaku sin kee siinik radu waa mara too ayro tassakaxxeenimiiy qiidih asaanama» 'yaanam elle ten. Taham amrisseeh tuktubem, Mordakay kee Asterik ten.
Aham diggoysa amriy Aster tuktubehiyya xambaqu le warkatal yuktubeenih yenen.

Malik-Ekserkas, rasi addal yan mara kee baddâ-dariifal yan maral gabbara yaceenim faxxintam amrih oobise.
Malik abba hee kaxxa abtoy qagabak tanihiyya kee Mordakayah kaxxa reeda elle yacee inna yascasse aydaadi, Fursi kee Meediyah Malikwah Aydaada deqsita kitaabal yan.
Yahuuduh yooboke Mordakay, Malik-Ekserkasak kalih marak inkih, reedah amol raaqa numuk yen. Yahuud kaxxam kaa assakaxxuk teneeh, kaxxam kaadu kaa kicinuk ten. Usuk kaadu isi marah amqinnan taamah abitto kee ken amo dacrisaanam taamah luk yen.

A kitaabal tanim, Yuudâ-rasu kee Yarusalaam magaalal tan ummattah Yalli, Amóx-Yasaqya le kabuk ruube wacyi. Yalli a farmo ruubem, Quddiyya kee Yootamaay, Acad kee Ciskiyyaahu deqsita mari malikwah suge dabaana.
YALLI iyyeemih, «Sin lih yabtem, YALLAK; qaran kee baaxoy, ankacisa. Anu innih qarise urri yab yok cineh; xaylo yoo cinteh.
Laahi is le mara yaaxigeeh; danoona ken yeddere mari qayso keenih elle yecee arac taaxigeh immay, Israayil maray yi mara kinnihiyya ta gide yaaxagu yeffereh. Tahat radoonu cineenih» iyye.
Dambi-le-ummattey, mako-le-maray, umaane-raceynittey, taama akak toome urrow, YALLA cabba hayteenih, Israayil doore Dageltay *kudduusuk yanihiyya bursutteenih darre kaat cabten.
Yalli faxe waamak macah aade waytan? Uxih digaalak macayyinnitoonuu? Moyya siinik uxih bakaq leeh; afqado kee misinkaca ahaydumah siinik muurinna.
Ibak lifiqiiy amok xagortah amma 'yaanam xagar inkih siinik biyak le. Inkih yan xagaral siinik wara kee daleeli yan. Ahaydumah liton dale af kaawut leeh, nadiifik tan baasima akah magenniton; dayla akah magenniton.
Elle sugtan baaxo siinik baateeh, magaalooli siinik cararteh. Isin abalih, marin mari tubqureenim baysaah, baaxo siinik abur aban.
Yarusalaam, gubbil xisen daboyta kee cabcab elle yooboke aracal xisen seenan-qari kee naqboytit maraasiye magaalah innah, dubuk tekke.
YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya, Yarusalaamal yekkeh yan wararak marak garabak rooci cate waamal, Yarusalaam magaala Sodom kee Gomorrak kaxxih, inkitanuuk baye rarte.
Sodom marih bis le reedonow, YALLI siinik iyyam ankacisa! Gomorrâ-marih bis le ummattey, ni Dagelti siinik aba iyyam oobbeya!
YALLI iyyamaa, «Isin, ‹Yallah abna› axcuk abtan mango sadgoota yot tu xiqtam maay takkalen? Isin, sadgatah abna axcuk, cado akak cararissan illih sadgat kee aroodissen saqih xayta akak carrissan sadgatak cayyeh. Laa kee illi kee wadar qabalay kulli way caxxaanahiyyat ruffu maxca.
Yoo taqbudeeni'gidih yi foocal temeeten waqdi, yi qarih addal annal iqita iyyi siinik iyye?
Abba haytan sadgat inkih siinik foyya. Isin rubtan qaydarus niqibyooh; tohuk kalah kaadu, alsi bila waqdi abtan qiid kee sabti ayroh abtan qiid kee diini migaaqal abtan gaaboowiyyi inkih, abtan dambik gexxaamah nadaasa yekkeh; siinik mafaxa.
Alsi edde bile ayroh abtan qiid kee tangoorowen ayro abtan qiid siinik baguuk niqibyo. Isin edde assen qiid quuka yol yekkeh; ahak wadir annah tanim ablem maxiqa.
Dooqah kulli way gaba fayya haytaanamah gaboobi siinik qabalat tutlukeh tani'kkal, siinik moggolaay racmatta le intih sin mabla.
Xagar isinnik taahirroysay, tahaysa taahirik yan mara takkeenimi. Anu abah sin able uma taama caba. Umaane maabina.
Meqem abtaanam barita. Qadlih tanim aba. Sahda maskintut xukkutte kala. Qayxiixah cakki qayxiixah ixiga. Gubuunuh cato tika» siinik iyya iyye.
YALLI qagseh iyyeemih, «Tahaysa yol amaay, tahat itta lih yaabenno. Isin abten dambit kaqalteenih immay anu woo dambik sin kaqliseh cankaxi qidih innah sin heeyyo. Dambik abteenimih mangah xagar siinik yoomeh yani'mmay, qado illi xagoorih innah akak gacetton.
Isinni fayxiik dibuk yi amrih gacteenik, baaxok tooboke daro kee caxâ-miruk aysinnaanim sinim akkele.
Takkay immay yi yab cinteenih a umaanet gexak raqteenik, carbi siinit akkeleeh edde bayetton» iyyah yan. «Aham siinik intam yoo YALLA» iyye.
Duma Yallal teemene magaala a saaku xiiqareh xiinah caalat bahteh tan. Duma qadli le xintoh xiinak cakki-taamah taamita mari teetil yene'mmay, a saaku biileenit teetil raqte.
Yarusalaamey, duma lakqoh innah fula luk sugte'mmay, a saaku foyya tekke. Duma qinabak bicsen maqabih tamu luk tene'mmay, a saaku foyyâ-lee tekke.
Ku addal abbobtih yan mari qamallitte yekkeeniih, siftâ-kataysiisih yanin. Oson kulli way guqul yakmeeniih, cokmi-aracal qayxiixah le cakki mayaaxigaanaay; gubuunut tekkeemih adda mawagtan.
Tonna'mmay YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya, Israayil doore Dageltay Mulki le kinni. Kaay Goytah yani iyyam leh, «Yi naqboytiitey, ahaysa cane siinil gacseyyooh; tahak wadir taqabi yol matakkan.
Amah siinit macabaay, liton nadaasak sin kaqliseyyo. Saabunut kaqlisen saroh innah nadaafatah sin heeyyo.
Duma luk sugten abbobti kee makaabonuh bis le mara sin addal heeyyo. Tonnal Yarusalaam magaala cakki leeh, imaan Yallal le magaala akkele» iyyah yan.
Yalli qadli kee cakki leemih sabbatah, Yarusalaam kee tet addal yan maray toobite waddiimele.
Takkay immay YALLIH yab cina maray dambit asahiyya baysele. Kaa cabba hee mara selele.
Too saaku, Yallih aftok xeet kee cooxuk bicseenim elle taqbuden ikkel dooritten garsa kee bustaanat nadaamitetton.
Laqaymuume coox kee lee sinni bustaan innah gacetton.
Caffaytu girat qidan way elle carara innal, cayla leela isinni uma-taamat cararele. Ta baatik num sin macata.

Aham, Yalli Yarusalaam kee Yuudâ-rasih giddinaamak Amóx-Yasaqyah-gabat ruube farmo. Too farmo intaamah:
Tamaatu wayta ayroorah addat
YALLIH Qibaadah-Qari elle yan qale
kulli'kkek fayyah giffa axcele.
Kulli qalek fayyah giffa luk raaqele.
Kulli koomak fayyah giffa luk raaqele.
Baadal tan ummatta tet fan amaatele.
Mango baaxol yan mari too saaku iyyu waamah,
«Qibaadâ-Qari elle yan YALLIH-Qale fan nee beya» tittak axcelon.
«Israayil ummat doore Dageltih-Qibaadah-Qari elle yan arac nawaqu wayna.
Yalli tokkel isih faxem nee barsele.
Usuk faxe gitat gexenno» 'yaanam axcelon.
YALLIH-baritto elle tanim, Yarusalaam magaalaay;
Siyon qalek isi ummat lih yaaba.
Mango doolatwah fanat bica abeleeh;
baaxooxal yan tittin-way bicsele.
Qeebi edde abak sugen seefwa
buqre edde aban biriitah korselon.
Qeebi edde abak sugen macaxu
caxak luud edde yargiqen gileelah gacselon.
Tahak wadir doolatwa gaaduh tittah magexxa;
ahaysa qeebi tittat aboonuh masilaacsitan.
Tonnal hay! Yaqkuubuk rade maraw, YALLI neh yecee ifut genxa'gidih ama.
Yallaw, Yaqkuubuk rade isi marak texxeereh. Oson ayrô-mawqa le kabul yan mara kee Filistiinih yooboke mari ken barse baab taamah haysiten. Isinni qaada cabba heenih marin qaadah tanim aben.
Ken baaxol dahab kee lakqo kibuk tan. Oson yedderen duyye kaxxam mango. Ken baaxol mango faaris yan. Oson lon gaariirak loowo matamixxiga.
Ken baaxol xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeeyay yaqbudeeni kibuk tan. Too duyyey isinni gabak bicseenihiyya yaqbudeenih, gabat oren duyyeh gomboh radan.
Tohih sabbatah kulli num keenik qaybit radeleeh, gaca mara akkelon. YALLAW, keenih maracmatin.
YALLA kee kay kaxxa nabnah meysih, xixxaq le qaleela kee baaxô-bagul dagen boodoodah addat ombooqora.
Sahdâ-kaxxiina kee anaani gaba edde kalta wakti amaatele. Too ayro nabna luk raqtu waytam, dibuk YALLA.
Macaay inteenik, YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya ayro le. Too ayrot qande leemiiy kaxxiina kee qubbuy intam inkih wacarroysele.
Lubnaanal tan sariida kee Basan rasul tan garsa baysele.
Amo xer qaleela kee koomaamiiy,
xer ikkek yamaate mara akak yabloonuh bicsen fayya 'ta arooca kee megdebih bicsen gasoosa elle sugte baaxo booxah cabba heele.
Kaxxa nabna kee qaxa le maraakib finqisele.
Sahdayti kaxxiina kee anaani gaba kaleleeh; Yallih aftok aqbuduk sugen xeet kee coox bayele. Too ayro nabna luk raqtu waytam, dibuk YALLA.
Usuk baaxo yasgayye'gidih yamaatu waa saaku, YALLA kee kay kaxxa nabnah meysih, ummat gablah addat tambooqorem kee booriimah addat tambooqorem akkele.
Too ayro dahab kee lakqok bicsen duyyey yalla 'yeenih aqbuduk sugeenihiyya baaxot qideloonuuh; woo duyye elle qiden arac gablâ-kimbir kee hantuuti-dabqi akkele.
YALLI baaxo yasgayye'gidih yamaatu waa saaku, ummatta kaa kee kay kaxxa nabnah meysih, gabla kee booriima le qaleelah bagut ambooqorelon.
Tonna'mmay sahdaytuy rabah yakkehiyyal kibaal mahana. Sahdayti ma tuxxiq leh?

YALLAY Dagelta kinnih Nabaamak Nabahiyya, Yarusalaam kee Yuudâ-rasuk ummatta kibaal elle luk sugte mara kee duyye beele. Lee-kee-qaysoh edde sugeenim keenik beele.
Ken agiira kee ken qaskaraay ken cokmaaba kee ken nabuwwaay, ken ramli-qida kee doolat abbobtiiy,
ken qaskar abbobti kee ummattah abbobtiiy, xintô-miracwa kee gabâ-naggaarinna le mara kee sicri aba mara inkih, ragid cabsiisele.
Abbootanah, ummat amol kas baahe wee urru heeleeh; oson isinni elle faxinnaan innal ken xiiniselon.
Mari marat keenik xukkutele. Qunxa urri barah naba mara mayassakaxxa. Tut loowoh suge wee mari, isik naba mara mayassakaxxa.
Inki gulubuk rade mari isinni addak numuk teenah secca 'yeenih, «Sartanah xagaral haa saro litoh tanik, a abuuruk yan aracak abba nek tik» edde iyyan wakti amaatele.
Toh akak iyyan num, too ayro, «Aleey, ah anu duudam hinnaay, anu innih xaga maaqo mayyuuy, xagaral haan sara mayyuuy, sin catam maduudak, abbah yoo mahana» 'yaanam keenil gacsele.
Hay tonnal Yarusalaam baatih lagaq intaah, Yuudâ-rasi finqah gexam faxa. Abba haanam kee inxicca 'yaanam inkih, Yallal saduh taniimi. YALLA qaduk xaafan.
Oson aban qadli-sinna keenit aamele. Sodom magaalah mari wacarriye'kal dambi akah abe innah, a mari kaadu wacarriye'kal dambi leemit asan. Woyyow keenit takku waytaama! Baati isinnih isinnil baahan.
Cakki bagul yan marak, «Kullim siinil amqele» inxica. Akah taamiteenim geeloonuuh, ruffu edde axcelon.
Woyyow, uma marat takku waytaama! Umam aba num bayeleeh; kullim kaat aamele. Sinaamal baahem kaal baahelon.
Urri yi ummattat xukkutah yanih; agbi ken amol yan. Yi ummatey, sin miraacisa mari sin duquurusah, makot sin beyan.
YALLI mackamatal isi aracal gacele. Ummattal cokmi abuh ugtele.
YALLI isi marak idoola kee abbobtih yan maral cokmi abele. Keenik iyyu waamah: «Yi baaxoy qinab xala coox elle aabakuk sugehiyya bayissen.
Yi ummat xukkot tabbixeeni'mmay, masaakiinah yan marat taaqiteenim cakkik manton. Aham siinik intam, yoo YALLAY Dagelta kinnih, Nabaamak Nabahiyya» keenik axcele.
YALLI kaadu iyyaamah: «Yarusalaam-agbi kaxxiinah le inna wagitay. Kaxxiinah filla qaraanal beyan. Gexan way mellekkiy axcuk gexan. Intiita sahdal yabbixen. Ibat bilqah lon biriita gexan way sasac inta.
Takkay immay anu ken digaaleyyooh, amo keenik molla heeh daleela keenik elle ayyaaqeyyo» iyyah yan.
Yarusalaam-agbi elle kaxxiinita duyye Yalli keenik edde beyu waa wakti yemeeteh. Oson bilqah filla kee amooy ayti kee iba kee carayat lon bila keenik edde kalu waa wakti yemeeteh. Amot lon musaan kee seedar kee, ibat lon birtaay, bagul lon caleytitte kee, tonnah kaadu, kitooba kee gaaxoytitteey, feerat lon ferran kee sanat lon dumam kee qatri edde haan karaaratay gabat beyaanahiyya keenik bukkusele. Toh lih kaadu xagar meqe sartanay culsah xagarat haanahiyyaay, xagaral haan maklabaay, lakqo edde haan oloy gabat beyaanaay, isinni elle yablen miraayataay, bandiiliiy, amô-sara kee saaxi kee, xagar addak yaybulle saray sartaanahiyya inkih keenik kalele.
Qatri suruy ruubak elle yenen ikkel, xagar keenik abcele. Bagul luk yenen caleytih aftok, qax-umaane le akoota bagul heelon. Qax-meqe amô-xagooruy luk yeneenik, moolah raaqelon. Xagaral luk yenen qax-meqe sarih aftok, *qabuudut gacelon. Luk sugen qax-maqaaneh aftok, qax-umaaneh wacarriyelon.
Yarusalaamal tan labha seefit qideloonuh; celeemah tan qaskar qeebit ambaxele.
Magaala gasoosah afal yan mari rookiteleh weeqeleeh, oson elle sugen magaala, qasunuk heen barray baaxok bagul daffeytahiyyah bis aallele.

Woh takku wayta ayro malcina barra inki numuk gaba xabba hayteh, «Maaqo kee sartanak ninni duudennooh, kot fanxam mannuk, baqala loonuh neh iyyaana'gidiiy qaybik cattinna'gidih nee abit» kaak axcelon.
YALLIH Luddi
Too wakti baatik saaboh raaqe maray Yarusalaamal yani, taahirik yan mara akkele. Too maray Yalli Yarusalaamal raaqaana'gidih doore, migooqa akak tunkuttube mara.
YALLI isi qandet ummattal mekleleeh; gira birta akah taahirroysa'nna ken taahirroysele. Yarusalaam-agbi le sakkik tan taamak keenik taahirroyseleeh; Yarusalaamal caxita qabalak tet kaqlisele.
Tohuk lakal YALLI, Siyon qale kee tet xaqul gaaboowe mari elle yani ikkel, laqo qamburre ruubeleeh, bar kaadu qer kee habug iyya ifu ruubele. Yallih nabna inkih tan magaala buuleleeh, umaanek tet waasele.
Kay nabna ayrok silaalo teetih akkele. Rob kee kaxxa caacayak reebu teetih akkele.

Kiciyyo numuh aba qadar yok ankacisa. Akah abam, kiciyyo num kee qinab elle yuysubuke buqre.
Yi kataysa caxa luk yen,
woo caxa qinab xalak ten.
Qalek ten, elle toobokem;
woo qale niqmat le qale.
A caxa yaysubuke'gid,
elle yaysubuke aracak,
xeet kaleh meqe'nnal dageh.
Tet akak dacrisa'gidih,
amo xer qari akah xise.
Yuysubukem meqe caxa.
A caxa xalta qinabat
yaaqite'gid boodo dage.
Qinab teetik alayam fan,
tet qambaalak teetih suge.
A qinab alaye saaku,
qeero baaheh; mulcu luk yen.
Yi kataysa toh yuble way,
iyyem leeh, edde yaabem le;
«*Yarsalaam addal yan maraw,
dabaaqah Yuudal yan maraw,
caxat anu abe taqabi,
ubulay tu akak inxica.
A caxa taabuke'gidih,
meqe xaylo xalta'gidih,
abe akah weem maay liyo?
Meqe xayloy xaltam faxe;
maxalinnaay; mabaahinna.
An' cube weeh, acsube wee
mulcu le xaylo yoh xaltem
macâ-sabbata? Sabab le?
«Aysa mala teetih malsah,
reebuh teetih xise gaso
butukka teetik hee liyo.
Tet dariifat reebuh yan coox
bayseyyoh; dibuk raaqele.
‹Alluwwa tet tattakambay,
ken gadda takkay› axceyyo.
Ibah teetit aaqitelon.
‹Sibaasib teetil yaabakay;
amo teetik aysa buulay.
Taabuke'gidi 'yaanamah
aysa amo teetik margaqaay,
sissib kee keenan tet buulay›
axceyyo'kkal tet mawagta.
Rob hinna'mmay gaanib kinnih,
amol teetik wessa m'iyya.»
Hay, YALLAY Nabaamak Naba
yuysubuke qinab caxa
kinnim Israayilik xaylo.
YALLI yuysubuke cooxuy,
ruffu edde haak yene kinnim
Yuudah yoobokeh yan mara.
YALLI, meqem aba mara
yakkeenim keenik faxak yen.
Takkay immay woh makkinnon;
sahda qida mara yekken.
Cakkik tanim aba mara,
yakkeenim keenik faxak yen.
Takkay immay woh makkinnon;
amot akak gacan mari,
«Qadaalat waynah nan» iyyan.
Dumaak luk sugen qarwat ossotinah osisaana'gidih, gersi qarwa kee baqurê-baaxo xaamita maraw, woyyow, siinit takku waytaamow! Sinaamah dabaaqah elle gacan arac macabinnitoonuuy, baaxol isinnih dibuk haysiten.
Anu YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyyak inni aytih oobbeemih, «Ama kaxxa qarwa abuuruh raaqeleh, sahdayti addal akak maraaqa.
*Madmadat nammay nammayah yoxeen labaatanni awurut ayrol yubquren baaxo, qinabak labaatanni litrik fula mabahta. Dariyyuk bool kiilo qideenik, darok tabna kiilok fula mabahta.
Kamrih-maqabah dibroh ugtaah inkih yan carra askiruk kassoowa maraw, woyyow, siinit takku waytaamow!
Qaffaydah digirtan saaku, *kiraraay karambo kee fooxima fooxissaanaah, qinabak bicsen kamri taaqubeenih. Takkay immay YALLIH taamat baaqid mantoonuy, YALLI abam mataaxigan.
Kaa mataaxigan. Tonna-leemiik, casbit yan marih innal sin beelon. Sin miraacisa mari qululuh ambaxele. Raqqa 'ye mari bakaarah ambaxele.
Akeera ken qambaalak sugele. Edde gacoonu waan kabaara af kaawut keenih luk sugele. Yarusalaamal tan muddaqiyi kee raqqa 'ye maray qaffaydah digiraah waxxaq iyya selele.
Kulli num keenik qaybit radeleeh, gaca mara akkelon. Kaxxiina leela aqunxeele.
Too waqdi YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya gitah tanim abeleeh, tonnal leh yan nabna kaak ambulleele. Isi ummattal yackume waqdi, *kudduusuk yan Yalla kinnim kaak ambulleele.
Gaddaleelah-qarwa elle sugte aracay abuuruh raaqehiyyal beedi gacele. Illi-xaylo kaadu taloole qayso elle geele.
Diraabat yaabah dambik raaqu duude waa maraw, woyyow, siinit takku waytaamow! Edde yabtan dirab umaane siinih xalele.
Isin, «Yalli abeyyo iyyem sissikuk abam kaak nabalu wayna!» intan. «A Israayil doore Dageltay *kudduusuk yani abam faxam duudusam keh, kaak waginnu wayna» intaana'mmay, woyyow, siinit takku waytaama!
Meqeemik umaama iyyaah, umaamak meqeemi iyya maraw, woyyow, siinit takku waytaamow! Ditek ifu intaanaah, ifuk dite intan. Qeero leemik salfa le intaanaah, salfa leemik qeero le intan.
Kaxxa kas lem isik yakkaleeh, kaxxam bagi cubbih is dareema maraw, woyyow, siinit takku waytaamow!
Qinab kamrih agiiray! Yesgellen kamrih maqabah sin aleltam matana'mmay, woyyow, siinit takku waytaamow!
Guqul taagah tablen umeynit gexxay intaanaah, qellat sinni mara cakki gee kaltan.
Tonna leemiik caffa kee qayso elle kafta innal kafettoonuuh, girat cararetton. Ragid siinik soxkele. Qobor siinik kafeh caacay beele. Toh siinit akah takku waytam, YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya isi xintol siinih warsem cinteeniih, Israayil doore Dageltay *kudduusuk yanihiyya aba nek iyyem cinteenimih sabbata. Kay barittot maqal mahaysitinniton.
Tonna leemiik YALLI isi marat bagcarriteeh, isi gaba ken yuybulleeh ken digaale. Qaleeli yengeyyeeh, rabe marih raysi guddaafah innah gititteh addal rade. Tohuh, Yallih naqbi maxamcaay, ken edde digaaluh ruube gaba wadir magacsa.
Yalli xer baaxol yan marah seeco abeeh, baaxô-maggaraqal yan mari yamaate'gidih seeco abe. Woo mari ah keeniiy; sissikuk ardat yamaateenih yanin.
Num keenik macawalinnaay num keenik mandafoofolinna. Qundugul kee xin num keenik maabinna. Bagi qarum keenik masalacinnaay kabellak sanaaga keenik maggaraqinna.
Gayse kee gaysê-xaylo qeebi edde aboonuh bical tan. Gaysê-xaylo keenik af le. Ken faariisih ibitte gibdah qado-xeetih inna le. Ken faariisa beyta gaariira qaana fuluk haak tamaate.
Ken qaskar, lubookay qidde lac sahda keenik bukkussaamak garadak kuddahiyyah xaw xawta.
Too qaskar Israayil marat, bad haffo baaha way dub elle iyya innal, keenit kaayoonu waan wakti amaatele. A baaxo wagga hayteenik, ditet yan maray abam waagisaah yankikkiqehiyya abletton. Qamburre ifu qellisele.

Malik Quddiyya edde rabe sanatih addat Goyta uble. Usuk isi dardaarinni korsiy fayya kee nabna lehiyyal daffeyak yeneeh; xagarat culsah le sartan inkih yan Yallih Qibaadah Qari duudeh yen.
Kaak daga rooci leemiy hadig intahiyya haadak ten. Wohimik kulli tii lica gali luk yen. Keenik kulli tii kaadu fooca namma galit isik qellisak yen. Ibitte kaadu namma galit isik qellisak yeneeh, raaqa namma galit haadah ken uble.
Tittah seecak yeneeniih,
«YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya *kudduusuk yan.
YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya *kudduusuk yan.
YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya *kudduusuk yan.
Kay nabna inkih tan addunya duddah» iyyen.
Ken anay Yallih Qibaadah-Qari akak culan culma yesgeyyeeh; woo qari qeerik yembegge.
Anu too waqdi exceemih, «Woyyow yi nabsow! YALLAY Nabaamak Nabaah malik kinnihiyya inni intih uble'mmay, edde yaabinnaan yab yok taahirik mayanay; addat akak anim, taahirik ane waa yab yaaba marih fanak tanih tanik, baati yot tekkeh tan» exce.
Sarrak woo rooci leemik tiyak teeni maxbaxat yabbixe xibciniy sadgat elle aben aracak beehiyya gabat luk haadak yol oobe.
Too waqdi woo urta xibcintot sokto yok xagga heeh, iyyeemih, «Taway taham sokto kok xagteeh; tahak wadir edde sugte umaane kok katteeh; abte dambik qafu geyteh» yok iyye.
Sarrak «Farmoh iyya ruubaah? Ni farmoyta takku waytam iyyaay?» 'yaanam YALLA axcih oobbe.
Anu too waqdiiy, «Anu akkeyyok yoo rub» exce.
