Too waqdi, «Gexay a farmo ummattah gabat bey» yok iyye. Farmoh yok iyyemii, «Faxeh gide taabbeenimih edde maraddan. Faxeh gide tableenimih takkem kinnim mataaxigan keenik inxic» yok iyye.
Sarrak kaadu yok iyyeemih, «Hawri ken cabsiisaay, ayti maleela kee inti maleelay tu able wayta ken ab. Tonnal tu mayablaanaay, tu mayaabbaanaay tut maradan. Intih yubleeniih, aytih yoobbeeniih, tut rade ken tekkek, yol yaduureenim takkeeh, yol yuduureenik urelon» yok iyye.
Too waqdi anu kaak exceemih, «YALLAW, ah magide fan sugtu waytaamaay?» exce.
Too waqdi usuk yok iyyeemih, «Magaalooli inkih abuuruh raqqaay foyya tikka intam fanah akkuk sugeleeh, tonnah kaadu, qarwa sinaamak foyyah raqqaay baaxol sugtem inkih bayya intam fanah akkuk sugele.
Sarrak ummatta inkih xer baaxo askiliqeyyo. Baaxo inkih dibuk raaqele.
Baaxô-bagul bool yakke marak tabna num raqtaamah, naqboytit qagitak baaxo warareleeh, baaxot gira ruubelon. Takkay immay yirgiqen caxak buxux elle raaqe'nnal, taahirik yan dariyyuy sarra yaabuku waa raaqele» yok iyye.

Qudiyyâ-Yootam baxay Malik Acad deqsitahiyya Yuudâ-rasul malikih yen dabaanal carbi rade. Suuriyah malikih suge Raaxin kee Israayil malikih suge Ramalyaahû-Fekac Yarusalaam magaala tabbixem faxxe. Takkay immay yabbixoonu yeffereenih.
Yuudâ-malikiy Dawuduk radehiyya Suuriyah qaskar Israayil rasih adda cultem yoobbe waqdi, kaa kee raqqa 'ye mari kaxxam cunxiteeh, caacay yasgayye caxah innah gacen.
YALLI, Yasaqyak iyyeemih, «Ku baxay Siir-Yasub
Too waqdi ‹Cisabbootiyyak isi dacrisaay mameysitinay mawariggitin› kaak inxic» iyye. «Malik Raaxin kee kay mara kee, tonnah kaadu, Ramalyaahû-baxih kaxxa bagcarra, namma caxxat gexxa girah qeerih gide.
Suuriya, Israayil ummatta kee ken malik lih gacca 'teh kol bahtu waytaamal malisseh tan. Iyyaanamah:
‹Yuudâ-rasu wararennooh Yuudâ-mara meysiisennooh, ken baaxo ninnih abbixenno. Sarrak Tabqel deqsita numih baxa malikih heenno› iyyan.
Takkay immay yoo YALLAY Mulki le aham akke kaleyyom diggoysa.
«Macaay inteenik, Suuriya tet inaytah magaalay Damasko deqsittak qandeh mataysaay; Damasko kaadu malik Raaxiinik qandeh mataysa. Israayil ummattah tu gactek, lactam kee koona sanatih addat, doolat wadirik akak akke waan niksoh annikisselon.
Israayil tet inaytah magaalah tan Samaariyak qandeh mataysa. Samaariya kaadu Ramalyaahû-baxak qandeh mataysa. Imaanal digga axce wayteenik, isin kaadu digga mantan» 'yaanam Yasaqyak iyye. Yasaqya too farmo Acadah warse.
YALLI kaadu Acad fanah gersi farmo ruube.
Too farmol YALLI iyyeemih, «Qaran takkuu, akeeral takku, tuk teenah asta koo aybulleem keh yok esser 'yaanam YALLAY ku Dageltah yanihiyya kok iyyah yani kaak inxic» iyye.
Acad kaal gacseemih, «Asta yoo uybulluya maxcaay, YALLA maagirriba» iyye.
Tohuk gexxaamah Yasaqya kaak iyyeemih, «Malik Dawuduk rade maraw, yok oobbeya! Labhâ-sabri waysissaanam meqem maay takkalen? Hay yi Dageltih sabri waysissaanam maay faxxan?
Tonna'mmay YALLI asta isih sin aybulleele. Baxuwwah tan barra aadiqeleeh, lab-baxa xaleleeh, too awki migaaqah Ammaanuwel
Usuk yanabu waah umam kee meqem tittak baxisu duuda saakuk duma, hobbo nakeleeh malab akmele.
Woo ayro tamaateemik naharat, woo uma'nnah sin meysiisa namma malikih baaxo sinaamak foyyah raaqele.
YALLI, koo kee ku ummatta kee ku buxah maral, Israayil Yuudak baxsinte saakuk wadir akke wee taqabi kee gibdaabina ruubele. Assuuriyah malik siinit ruubele.
«Too ayro YALLI Masri mari Niil weeqayti akak qimbisa ikkek kaaqayti innah edde yamaateeh; Assuuriyah mari kaadu isi baaxok diidaaleh innal edde yamaaten fooxay kaxxa asta keenih takku waytahiyya keenih abele.
Too waqdi yakkeenimik goloh addaay gabloolih addaay coox guba kee, tonnah kaadu, qayso le aroocal mododelon.
«Toh takku wayta saaku YALLI, xagor sinaamak moola Assuuriyah malik, Furaat weeqaytuk woo kabuk siinit ruubele. Too num deben kee amô-xagor kee xagaral yan xagor inkih siinik moolele.
«Toh takku wayta saaku, num dibuk inki saga kee namma reyta luk raaqele'mmay, canak faxxa haam keenik geele. Baaxol raaqu waa mari nakoonuh hobbo geeleeh, yakmoonuh malab geelon.
«Toh takku wayta saaku, qinab buqreh cooxuk alfi caxay kulli caxa garsi akak baahak sugtehiyya elle sugte aracal, eqeb kee sibaasib aabukele.
Ummatta wokke gayse kee gaysê-baxa luk alluwwah admoh gexele. Inkih tan baaxo eqeb kee sibaasibik amaggele.
Koomaamih-amoy ummatta daro elle aysubukuk sugtehiyyal, sissib kee eqeb aabukeleeh; tohih sabbatah tokke num magexa. Too aracay abuuruh raaqehiyya laa kee illi elle yaloole arac akkele.»

YALLI yok iyyeemih, «Kaxxa luuc baahay, ‹Xayuk Ibbixa Sissikuk Buuba› 'yaanam kaxxa kutbeh elle uktub» iyye.
«Sumaaqah sek Uriyya kee Yaberkiyâ-Zakariyya haysit. Oson aamanti le mara kinnon» yok iyye.
Waqlaak wadir barra yok teedeqeh. Ni baxi yooboke saaku YALLI yok iyyeemih, «Xayuk-Ibbixa Sissikuk-Buuba» 'yaanamal kaa muggaaqis.
Yooboke awki ‹Yi inay› 'yaanam kee ‹Yi abbaw› 'yaanam afak ayyaaqe'kal yan saaku, Damasko kee Samaariyah mari edderra heem inkih Assuuriyah malik buubele» yok iyye.
YALLI kaadu yo'lih yaabeh iyyeemih,
«Too mari Siloc deqsita sila le lee-arac cineeh, malik Raaxin kee Ramalyaahû-baxah yifriceenimih sabbatah,
tonnal yooy Goytah yani, Assuuriyah-malik kee usuk elli haa qaskar ken radaana'gidih baaheyyo. Furaat kaxxa weeqaytuy sissikuk gexay dariifal caxittah innah amaatelon.
Tohuk lakal Yuudâ-rasu fanah, sahda filla fanah yanxuqe weeqih innah, kullim duufut beyak amaatelon. Ammaanuwelow, too qaskar fakimit tan kaxxa galway baaxo inkih duddahiyya akkele» yok iyye.
Isin baadal tan ummatey, titta lih gaca'mmay baysetton. Baaxok xer ikkel yan maraw, ankacisa! Qeebih bical gaca'mmay baysettoonuuh, finqitetton.
Abtoonu waytaanamal malisa'mmay siinil mabicta. Faxxeenih gide yaabita'mmay toh inkih tu maxiqta. Macaay inteenik, Yalli ne'lih yan.
YALLI isih le kaxxa qandet a ummatta katatta gita kataye waa'gidih, aylahu yoh kaleh. Iyyeemih,
«Oson aban malat ken lih mangalin. Oson akak meysitaanamak mameysitinaay, akak cunxitaanamak macunxitin.
Yoo YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya *kudduusuk yan Dagelta kinniyom mahawweenin. Akak meysiteh meqem dibuk yoo. Akak cunxitaanam yoo.
Yi *taahiriino siinih reebu akkele. Takkay immay Yuuda kee Israayil marah, xaay sahda adafa kinniyoh; ken yannikisse xaa kinniyo. Yarusalaam mari edde radu waa oflo kinniyo.
Mango maral adaf heeleeh; annikisseloonuh addigillelon. Tonnah kaadu ofloh addat radelon» yok iyye.
Isin yi darsay, Yalli yol ruube farmo dacrisaay tet daanisa.
YALLI isi marak is yooqoreh immay anu niyak kaa aamineeh; niya elle liyom kaa.
YALLI yoh yecee xaylo luk akkel aniyo. YALLAY Nabaamak Nabaah dardaarinni korsi Siyon-qaleh amol akak tanihiyya yoo kee yi xaylo Israayil ummatta fanah asta nakkuh nee ruube.
Takkay immay sahda, «Ramli qida mara kee kalluwalley tutuc intak xaagu aba» siinik intu wayta waqdi, isin, «Xaagu kalluwallek abtaanamak, Yallak macah abe waytan? Yan marih xaagu rabe marih roocik macah abtan?» 'yaanam keenik axcetton.
Too waqdi keenik intaanamah, «YALLI siinik iyyem abay kay farmo ankacisa» keenik inxica. Ta qangara cina maral, maaci mamaacisa.
Niya akak tiddigilleeh qululte ummatta baaxot meekitele. Qulul ken yabbaxu waa waqdi bagcarriteloonuuh isinni malik kee Yalla xaafelon. Qaran gubaak wagga heeloonuuh
baaxo fan addah wagga heelon. Too waqdi laqô-bar keenil radeleh; keenit takku wayta gadaama kee gibdaabina ablelon. Dite le aracay ableh umahiyyat gutuqak ken heelon.

Too maray too gide gadaamat sugehiyya tohuk wadir kaxxa diteh addat maraaqaay gadaamitak maraaqan.
Yalli duma, Dablon kee Naftaalih yooboke marih rasi gaca-rasu abak suge'mmay, sarra yan saakuh kaxxa rasu kaa abele. Too rasi, Maditraaniyah badak ayrô-mawqa le kabuk xabba haanamaay Ordon weeqaytuk woo qaxa raaqa Galiil baaxoh maray Israayilih aabuke waahiyya elle yanih fanah, kaxxa nabna le rasu akkele.
Ditet tan ummat kaxxa ifu ablele.
Duma silal elle radak suge rasul yan maral away ifi gacele.
YALLAW, ken teyderreh mango mara ken abetto.
Kaxxam ruffu ken heetto.
Sahda buqrek daro orbissa waqdi kee
dannabah orbiseenim kurrasitan waqdi elle wallitan gurral, ku foocal wallitelon.
Woh akah kinnim, luk sugen quuka keenik kalettooh,
sunku keenik edde aagaruk sugen caxxa aggilele.
Keenit xukkutak sugeeh ken adlumuk suge mara
duma Miidiyan mara elle bayisse innal baysele.
Sinam gaada qaskarih kabel kee
ken sartanay qabalat yutlukehiyya inkih
girat carariselon.
Macaay inteenik, awki neh yooboke. Baxi neh yontocowwe.
Usuk abbootan gabat le.
Migaaqah «Qajiibik yan Fayisi»,
«Nabaamak Naba Dagelta», «Waara Abba»,
«Amaan Yamliki» 'yaanam kaah axcelon.
Kay abbootan osak oseleeh,
ambaxe sinni amaan gacele.
Dawud korsil gaceleeh, kay baaxol ellecaboh ayro fanah
dardaarah anuk, qadli kee cakkih yan gitat xiinisele.
Taham YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya isi mara yaysiiseemih fayxi kee, keenih le kaxxa kacanuk akkele.
Yalli Israayil doolat kee Yaqkuubuk rade maral farmo ruubeh; cokmi keenil abele.
Israayil ummatta kee Samaariyah magaalal yan mari, kaxxiina kee anaani xagarat hayya heeh, «Kallak bicsen xisne tiddigilleh immay wokke xeetik bicsen xisne ciggiilisenno. Sublâ-cooxuk bicsen qarwa tiddigilleh immay, wokke nabam meqe sariidak bicsen qarwa ciggiilisenno» iyyaana'mmay, oson inkih takku waytam Yallih cokmi kinnim aaxigelon.
YALLI, Malik-Raaxin le naqboytit qeebi keenit abta'gidih bicat heeh; ken naqboytit keenit uguuguse.
Suuriyah mari ayrô-mawqa le kabuk gaccaay *Filistiinih yooboke mari ayrô-culma le kabuk gacca 'yeh Israayil yanxuqoonuh af fakka teetit heen. Tohuh, Yallih naqbi maxamcaay, ken edde digaaluh ruube gaba wadir magacsa.
Yallih-marah tu gactek, dambik matoobitinna. YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya ken digaaleh immay, tohuh kaal maaduurinnon.
YALLI inki ayroh addat Israayilik kaxxa mara kee qunxa mara digaaleh, amo kee geera keenik yirgiqe.
Amo keenik idoolay oson assakaxxuk sugeeniiy; geerah keenik tanim, nabuwwa kinnino iyya maray dirab acayuk sugehiyya.
A ummatta miraacisa mari ken edde beyaanam, gita maliinooy; ken edde yabbixeenim, badambadisiyya.
Tonna leemiik Yalli furraynak num keenik asillimi mahannaay, ken qayxiixa kee gubuunuk numuh maxuwaawinna. Macaay inteenik, oson inkih Yalla maloonuuy, uma marah yaniiniih; oson edde yabba 'yaanam inkih umaane. Tohuh, Yallih naqbi maxamcaay, ken edde digaaluh ruube gaba wadir magacsa.
Macaay inteenik, oson lon umaane, eqebto kee sibaasibit gexxa girah gide. Ken umaane garbot gexxa giray qer qaran fan akak yawqehiyyah gide.
YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya bagcarriteemih sabbatah, kay digaala girah innah baaxo inkih carariseeh, ummatta inkih bayseeh; num numul saduh gace.
Inkih tan baaxol ummatta maaqo tittak bukkusseeh; maaqok geennaan im yakmeeni'mmay tohuh macayyan. Isinni gabah cado kinni way yokmen.
Manasse kee Efrayim mari qeebi tittat abeenih, tonnah kaadu, titta lih gacca 'yeenih Yuudâ-marat qeebi aben. Tohuh, Yallih naqbi maxamcaay, ken edde digaaluh ruube gaba wadir magacsa.

Woyyow siinit takku waytaamow! Qadlit mataamittaanay, yi ummatta biyaakittaana'gidih, gitah ane sinni madqa abtan.
Tu maleelah le cakki mataaxigan. Ken cakki ken geyi mahaytan. Xukko elle tan marah cakki mabtan. Gubun kee qayxiixah im gita maliinot beytan.
Hay, Yalli sin digaalu waa saaku macaa abetton? Yalli xer baaxok temeete bala siinil oobisek, maca abetton? Catoh iyya fan ardetton? Teddereenim anket aaquretton?
Carbit ambaxe kee casbit yan marih innah seewah sin bee akkelon.
Tohuh, Yallih naqbi maxamcaay, ken edde digaaluh ruube gaba wadir magacsa.
YALLI iyyeemih: «Woyyow, Assuuriyat takku waytaama! Inqibe mara edde digaalu waa caxxih aftoh Assuuriya liyo. Yi bagcarra, gabat le caxxa keenik tan.
Assuuriyah-mara, Yalla-maleelay yoo bagcarrissehiyya edde digaaluh ruubeyyo. Ummatta radoonuuy ken garqoonuuy, tonnah kaadu, gital sugte guddaafah innah taqqa keenit iyyoonuh ken ruubeyyo.
«Assuuriyah malikih tu gactek, isi bagul malseemih amol yaniih, mango baaxo baysam faxak yani'mmay,
annah axcuk tirtirisaah, ‹Yi qaskarih abbobtik kulli num maliki.
Kalnu kee Karkamis magaalah marak carbil eyseh. Tonnah kaadu Camat kee Arfad magaalah marak carbil eyseh. Samaariya kee Damaskoh magaalah marak kaadu eyseh.
Yarusalaam kee Samaariyak fula, muxxo le yallitteh-ceelo yaqbude doolatal gaba heeh ken ibbixe.
Samaariya kee tet addal yaqbuden yallitteh-ceelo bayseeh; tonnah kaadu, Yarusalaam kee tet addal yaqbuden yallitteh-ceelo bayseyyo› axcuk tirtirisa» iyye.
Tonna-leemiik, Yalli Siyon-qale kee Yarusalaamal abah yaniimik gaba kalu waa saaku, Assuuriyah malik abah yan tirtiraay leh yan kaxxiina kee hidak gexxaamah kaa digaalele.
Assuuriyah malik, «Abba heem inkih inni qandet abeeh, qandeey kas kee bagi cubbi liyooh, ummatak qeebil eyseeh, inki ikkeh ken gacse. Oson daaniseenih sugen duyye keenik bee» axcuk tirtiriseh. Tonnah kaadu, «Wokkel tan malikwak, celem akah aba innah, amot taqqa exceh gexeeh,
baaxol enna 'ta doolatwa kimbiro qari gideey, oson edderra heenim, naala elle gaaboysan innal, taqabi sinnim gaaboyse. Faxe qawi gali masgayyinnaay; faxe qawi af fakaamah yot kaayu malliilinna» axcuk tirtirisa.
Takkay immay godma gabat tet le numuk nabiyoh intam bictaa? Miisar tet gabat le numuy duyye teetit yargiqehiyyak maay yayse? Gabâ-caxxi num mayakkuqa; num gabâ-caxxa yakkuqe ikkal.
Tonnal hay, YALLAY Dagelta kinnih, Nabaamak Nabahiyya kay qaskaray masu nabahiyyat xagar selta dalka ruubele. Usuk le massakaxxak gubal xagarat urta giray baruge waytahiyya ruubele.
Yallay Israayil ifuh yani girah innah akkele. Israayil doore Dageltay *kudduusuk yanihiyya habug inta giray inki ayroh addat eqeb kee sibaasib cararissa akkele.
Mango coox le garbo kee baqurê-baaxo agantah, uma dalka sahda elle baysa'nnal, baysele.
Dago cooxuy qunxa urri kinni-way loowo akak yaaxigehiyya raaqele.
Too ayro, Israayil marak raqte saabo, ken bayse maral kibaal mahaysitta. Oson nummaak kibaal elle hoonu waanam, YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyyay *kudduusuk yani.
Israayil-marak baatik saaboh raaqe mari, isi Dageltay qande lehiyyal aduurele.
Away Israayil mari mangah baddi afih qiddeh gide yakkeemih dago mari aduurele. YALLAY Dagelta kinnih, Nabaamak Nabahiyya inkih tan baaxooxat «Abeyyo» iyye baati elle inxicci 'ye innal abe leemih sabbatah, Israayil-ummattat «Abeyyo» iyye baati bical taniih; a baati keenih elle taguude innal keenit akkele.
Tonna'mmay YALLAY Dagelta kinnih, Nabaamak Nabahiyya iyyaamah, «Yi-ummattay Siyoonul tanihiyyaw, Assuuriyah-marak mameysitina. Dumî dabaanal Masri mari akah abe innah siinit xukkutaanamah mameysitina.
Tah akah axcem, siinit liyo naqbi xayih gaba kaleleeh; yi bagcarrat ken bayisu waamih sabbata.
Yoo, YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya duma Miidiyan-mara Qoreb-Xixxaq deqsita aracal oogoreh eneeh, Assuuriyah mara kaadu inni keetalat aagureyyo. Masri mara bad fanah caxxa escesse waqdi elle digaale innal, Assuuriyah mara digaaleyyo.
Too ayro Assuuriyah marih gabak sin ayyaaqeyyooh, sunkul siinik abbaxuk sugen quuki siinil maraaqa. Kaxxam filli-cayla litoonumih sabbatah,
Naqboytit qaskar Qaay deqsitta magaala yibbixeeniih, Migroon magaalak tatreenih gexen. Sakayi Mikmas magaalal caben.
Qaleelak tabeena tatreenih gexeeniih; «Bar xiinih Gabaq deqsita arac orbenno» iyyan. Raamâ-magaalal suge mari wariggiteeh; Malik-Saawul-magaalay Gibqa deqsittal suge mari kude.
Gallim magaalah maraw, deero aba. Laysah maraw, ankacisa. Woyyow, Qanatot maraw!
Madmenâ-mari kudmat yan. Geebim mari kaadu kudmat yan.
A saaku naqboyti elle anfiddigelem, Noob magaala. Tokkeek Siyon-qaley Yarusalaam magaalal tanihiyyal meysissoh feera ascasselon.
YALLAY Dagelta kinnih, Nabaamak Nabahiyya, isih qandey kaxxa cunxo sahdat qiddahiyyat caxak yirgiqen luddi innah ken baysele. Ken addak kaxxiina kee nabnah lafitta 'ya mari bayeleeh qaybit radele.
YALLI, caxa godmat elle yargiqen innal, ken argiqele. Cooxuk inkih yayse Lubnaan cooxih innah radelon.

Yiisak rade maray
YALLIH *Roocaaniyya kaal gaceleeh; kas kee ixxigaay, fayu kee dudday isi ummatta edde xiinisu waahiyya kaah aceele. Tonnal YALLIH fayxi aaxigeleeh kaa aynabele.
YALLIH amri duuduseleeh; kaa aynabuk kay amri duudusaanamat ruffu axcele. Num irok elle yable innal kay adda aaxige'kal, wonnaay annah yan numu mayya; hinnay kaadu, marin-texce-texceh kaal mayackuma.
Masaakiinah cakkik-yan-cokmi ackumele. Tu-maleelah cakkik-tan-mekla abele. Iyyem akke leh: digaala elle amrise mari diggalsimeleeh umeynit ambaxele.
Isi mara qadli kee nummâ-bagul tan xintoh xiinisele.
Too saaku, suula kee illi amaanah titta lih xiinele. Kabqi wadar lih xiinele. Rugaage kee lubak xaylo kee aroode saqi titta lih aseleeh, awki-baxa kinni way ken dacayri duudele.
Laa kee kabqi titta lih aloolele. Laahi-xaylo kee kabqî-xaylo titta lih gacele. Lubak laahi gurral aloolele.
Cambabbariya awki abeesâ-boodoh amol digreleeh; qunxa-urri afat summi le abeesas xagaamah keenil bahtu waytam mali.
Lee bad akah kibta'nnah, Yalla yaaxige mari inkih tan baaxo kibeleemih sabbatah, Yallih qaley taahirik tanihiyyah amol sahda biyaaku waah meqem bayisu waa num mayana.
Too ayro Dawud abbah yan Yiisak rade num, baadal tan ummattah inkih asta yakku waa simbil akkele. Mango mari kas kee fayu kaak beetelon. Usuk elle yan ikkel muxxo le nabna gacele.
Too ayro YALLI qagisak isi-qandet isi-maray baatik-saaboh-raaqehiyya le baaxol gacsele. Assuuriya kee Masriiy; Fatros deqsita aracay Masrik gabbi-qaxat raaqahiyya kee Kuusuuy; Qeelam kee Baabelon baaxooy; Camat kee baddi dariifal tan baaxooxak ken baahele.
Yalli, asta-yakku-waa-qalam baadal-tan-ummattah heeleeh; Israayil kee Yuudâ-maray fixixeh sugehiyya baadak affara kaalibik gaaboysele.
Israayil ummatta Yuudah lon kuuxewaynaan kee naqabu cabelon. Yuudâ-mari kaadu Israayil marah kuuxewaynaan kee naqabu bagut maha.
Oson titta geyya heenih ayrô-culma le kabul tan Filistiin-ummattat qeebi abeloonuuh; ayrô-mawqa le kabul tan ummatta kaadu buubelon. Edom kee Mooyab-ummattak qeebil ayseloonuuh; Qammon-ummatta ken yab oggolelon.
YALLI, Qasa badih exxay Masrit xayihiyya bayseleeh; Furaat weeqaytu kafsa'gidih laqin caacay ruubele. Ummatta ibah akak tabta'gidih kaxxam qunxaamak malcina buyyi raaqele.
Yalli, isi-marak saaboh raaqe marah, duma Israayilih Masri rasuk akak yawqen gita elle bicse innal, keenih kaadu Assuuriyah rasuk akak yawqen gita bicsele.

Too ayro siinik kulli num saare abele. Saareh annah axcetton.
«YALLAW, faylise koo liyo.
Yoo niqibtom kok eexegeh,
darre yot cabtem kok ubleh
immay away yoh racmatteh,
luk sugte naqabu cabteh.
YALLAW, yot niya hayteh tan.
Wadeenah yok tanim Yalla;
toh aaxigeh; digga liyo.
Kaa aamineh, tuk mameysita.
Qande akak geem YALLA kinni;
kay dacayrih guba edde anim.
YALLAY yoo wade kaa kinni.
Faylisam YALLAY yoo wada>>
'yaanam axcetton.
Xamcin leey, sillaateh tanik
yooqobe num ruffo geya.
Yallih wadu geytan waqdi,
isin tonnah ruffu axcetton.
Yallih mari saare abu waa saaki diggah amaatele.
«Ummatey, YALLA saarisa;
candu kee fayla kaah aba;
YALLAW, axcuk, kaa'lih yaaba.
Sahdah addal kaat yaaba.
Usuk abe meqe taamaay
kay migaq le kaxxa nabna
baadal yan marah warisa.
Usuk abe kaxxa taamah
YALLA faylisa; saarisa.
Muxxo le Yallih abina
inkih yan baad oysobbeya.
Siyoonul geytima maraw,
qililisa; ruffa 'xica.
Israayil doore Dageltay
*kudduusuk yanihiyya yan.
Ni fanat tanim kaa kinni.
Nabna leeh, muxxo lem kaa»
'yaanam axcuk too-ayroora
Yallih mari Yallih migaq
fayliseleeh, saarisele.

Yalli Baabeloonuh giddinaamak Amóx-Yasaqyal ruube farmo ah teeti.
YALLI iyyeemih, «Tu elle aabuke wayta qaleh amol, qeebi yanim elle yaaxigen qalaamat hayisa. Makaabon elle tani'kkel gaaboowaana'gidih, qeebi abtu wayta qaskarah amri ucuya. Qeebi aboonu waanamih astah gaba ken fan fayya hayisa.
Anu innih, yi bagcarra yaybulleeni'gidih, celeemah tan yi qaskaray yi taamah doorehiyyah seece. Oson yi iisa yafrice mara kinnon» iyye.
Qaleh amok rada anay ankacisa. Mango maray gaaboowehiyyah anay kee, gaabowte doolatway waxqaxitahiyyak anay rada. Nabaamak Naba YALLI, mango qaskar qeebih bical haa.
Inkih yan baad baysaana'gidih, YALLA kee, isi bagcarra gabat le qaskar baad edde yaadiye xer baaxok yamaaten.
YALLIH ayro amaatelek, boogisa! Qande le Dagelti baati edde baahu waa ayro xayih.
Too ayro kulli numih gaba axaxiteleeh, kulli numuk niya addigillele.
Yakkeenimiik wariggiteloonuuh; biyak ken abbixele. Xalay edde xayyoowe barrah innah emreqeeqedelon. Wariggah mariiy mara keenik wagga heeleeh wacarriyih fooci keenik gombod ceelele.
YALLIH ayro amaatele. Toh, Yallih-naqabuy kaxxam gibdi edde yakku waa ayroy racmatta sinnihiyya. Dambi elli haa mari inkih bayeleeh, baad abuuruh raaqele.
Cutuuka kee cutuukah-egla ifak maraqta. Ayro tawqe waqdi dattoowele. Alsa kaadu ifu cabele.
Yalli annah iyye. «Ken umaaneh sabbatah, baadal bala oobiseyyooh; umaanet asa mara ken umaanek gexxaamah digaaleyyo. Kaxxam isit yakkale mara ayqunxeeyyo; racmatta-maleelay anaani lehiyya ramma heeyyo.
Tohuk saaboh raaqu waa mari, agle sinni dahabay kulli waqdi geytime waa akkele.
Yoo YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya bagcarritu waa saaku, qaran axaxiteleh, baaxo elle sugte aracak angayyele.
«Loyna sinni illi elle fixixe'nnal, fixixelon. Admoh yemeete marak sageeri elle kudda innal, kulli num isi baaxo fan kudeleeh, isi mara fan gacele.
Geyinnaan num gilet qideloonuh; yibbixen mara seefit qidelon.
Xaylo oson abalih ken foocal duubuyak qidelon. Buxa keenik buubelon; agabu keenik cayliselon» iyye.
YALLI kaadu iyyeemih, «Baabelon yabbixeeni'gidih, Meediyah-maray lakqot tu wee waah dahab yeceenimih ayra oggole waahiyya keenit ruubeyyo.
Ta mari gayse kee gaysê-baxat furrayna qidele. Salaadah maracmataanaay qunxa urruh maxuwaawan.
Baabelon magaala, baaxooxak inkih qaxah tayse magaala. Tet mari teetit kaxxam yakkale. Takkay immay anu Sodom kee Gomorrak akah abe innah, deerik afah tet koriseyyo.
Sahdayti sarrah, dabqih teetil magacaay; sahda elle gace wayta abuuruh raaqele. Gexak yemeete Qarabtoyti siraq teetil maha. Illi le num illi teetil mayayloola.
Dubaali dabqih elle yaniih, inin qarwa elle xissita arac akkele. Goroyyak dabqi akkele; dabeeli-ceelo le ginni addal akak meekitele.
Teetil tan qarwa kee doolat buxaaxil yangula kee wakrih anay qalê-berri innah elle xongolele. Baabeloonut wakti yemeeteh, ahaysa kaxxam masugta» iyye.

YALLI Israayil ummattah racmateleeh, isih doorite mara nammeyhaak ken abele. Dabqah elle sugen isinni baaxol gacoonay ken axcele. Aki baaxok yemeete mari wokke ken lih angaleleeh, dabqah ken lih gacele.
Gersi-baaxoh-mari, Israayil marah isi baaxo fan yaduureeni'gidih cato abelon. Tokkel, YALLI isi le baaxol, woo marak labim kee sayim Israayil marih buxaaxih addal taamitelon. Duma Israayil mara qeebit yibbixeh suge mari, ta saaku ken gabat antixibbixele. Tonnal Israayil mari duma keenit xukkutak suge marak reedah amol gacelon.
YALLI, isin luk sugten biyaakak sin urseleeh; cisabbootiyyak amaanah sin xiinisele. Dirkih sin absiisak sugen gibdi taamak sin ayfoofele.
YALLI toh siinih abu waa waqdi, Baabelon baaxoh malik missilah haysittoonuuh, intoonu waytaanamah, «Racmatta sinni malik yinnikisseeh, ahaysa sahdat maxukkuta.
YALLI keeniy umeynitih yanihiyyah xintok gaba kaleh.
Ken malik ummattat naqabut xukkutak sugeh, akak yeyse baaxoh mara xakaake kalaamak maadayinna.
Taway ellecabol sahda inkih toffoofeeh ruffu 'teeh amaan geyteh. Kulli num ruffu 'yeeh gad abe.
Yinnikisse malikih rabah, saagan coox kee Lubnaan baaxol tooboke sariida ruffu 'teh, ‹Ahaysa atu rabteh ikkal, nee yargiqe mari mayan› iyyen.
«Akeeral yan mari Baabelon-baaxoh-malik yamaatu waa waqdi, kaa arcibisaana'gidih bical sugelon. Addunyâ-bagul yen saaku cayla-leelah yen marih-roocitte uguugutak, malikwâ-roocitte isi qarkaytok uguugutak, kaa arcibisaana'gidih bical gacelon.
Oson yakkeenimiik kaah seeceloonuuh, ‹Atu away nek kaxxih boolatteeh a saaku ni bis lito› kaak axcelon.
‹Luk sugte nabna gaba kalteh; ku massakaxxah kirar aagaruk sugeeni'mmay, a saaku ah kooy akeera gexe mara lih tan. Bagul akak tanim xaariyaay; xagaral kok luultem, baaxô-xaariya› kaak axcelon.
«Maaci maacissoh cutuktaw! Elle sugte qaraanak radde! Duma mango baaxok qeebil teyseeh, a saakuuy baaxol radde.
Atuuy, isi-niyal intemii, ‹Qaran ewqeh abbootanah kulliimik daga raqta cutuukak dagal, dardaarinni korsil gaceyyo. Kilbat le kabut raqta angaaraw qalel malikih gaceyyo.
Qamburrek daga ciggiileyyooh, kulliimik daga raaqa Dageltah innah gaceyyo› 'yaanam inte'mmay,
toh makkinnay akeerak iqiyal rabe mara lih gacte.
«Rabe mari koo yable way wagga koo haak koo asseleeleqele. ‹A num baaxo asgayyuk yeneeh doolatwat meysi qidak yen num hinnaa?
Aham magaalooli bayisak sugeeh inkih tan baaxo abuur abe num hinnaa? Aham yoxen mara casbik awqe kalak sugeeh buxa gexe kalak suge num hinnaa?› axcuk sitta esserelon.
Addunyal sugga 'te malikwak kulli malikih kabrih garit, ken elle kassitan asta heeloonu'mmay
koh kabri madagaanaay; ku raysa caxak yirgiqen luddi innal baaxot qideloonuh, teetit ummatta aaqitele. Ku raysih bagul carbit rabte qaskarih raysitte gacele; sitta lih akeerak iqiya fan oobetton.
Macaay intek, atu isi baaxo foyya abteeh; isi mara qide num kinnito. Tonna leemiik gersi malikwa elle yoogoqen innal matamoogoqa. Ku buxah mari inkih umaane leela kinnoonuuh; ken migooqa kassite way!
Masgaada qimbisa! A malikih xaylo, ken kaxxa abbobti abte dambik gexxaamah, ambaxele. Keenik num xintoh abba mayakkaay, hinnay kaadu, baaxô-bagul mango magaala maxisan.
YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya iyyeemih, «Baabelon magaalat qeebi abeh abur tet abba heeyyo. Migaq teetik bayseyyo. Addal teetik num maraaqaay, rooci-elli-haytaamak tu macaba. Taham intam yoo YALLA.
Baabelon magaala inin dabqi abeyyooh, Baabelon elle suge arac xooka abeyyo. Baabelon magaala kullim duufut beya fiyeynat fiyeyyo. Taham intam yoo YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya» 'yaanam iyye.
YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya xiibiteeh, «Anu ucsubem abeyyo. Akkele akak excem akkele.
Assuuriyah maray yi baaxol yanihiyya bayseyyo; inni qaleh amol keenit aaqiteyyo. Inni mara Assuuriyah marih xukkok ayyaaqeyyo; fillal keenik suge quuka keenik kaleyyo.
Inkih yan baadak abam faxam tamahaay, baadal tan ummatta edde digaalu waa gaba fakeh» iyye.
YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya taham abaamal gaba kaleeh; ummatta edde digaalu waa gaba fakeh immay, aham abe kaa kaltam matan.
Malik Acad edde rabe sanatat temeete Yallih-farmo ah teeti.
Isin *Filistiin maraw, ruffu maxcina. Sin aatakuk suge birti yiddigilleh immay, abeesak teena rabtaamah wohuk gacta abeesa ciggiilele. Abeesa xalte naalaytih addak haada baadeysi awqele.
YALLI isi marak masaakiinah yan marah, elle yaffoofen baaxo aceeleeh, amaanah xiinelon. Takkay immay YALLI, Filistiin maraw, siinil kaxxa qulul ruubeleeh, takkeenimiik too qululut ambaxetton.
Gasoosa maroh edde tan magaalooliy, boogisaay cato esserita! Filistiin maraw, takkeenimiik meysita. Kilbat le kabuk qamburre celta siisah innah tanim tamaate. Tohum, qaskaray bexxi addat akak ane waa.
Filistiin rasuk farmo baaha maral maca gacsenno? YALLI Siyon-magaala xiseeh, kay ummattay xukko elle tanihiyya tokkel amaan geeloonum keenih warsenno.

Mooyab marih giddinaamak ruuben farmo ah teeti.
Qaar kee Kiir magaalooli inki barih addat baateh! Too magaaloolil kaxxa haan yekke.
Dibon mari qibaada-elle-aban-qale yewqeenih, sadgat elle aban aracih garil weeqan. Mooyab mari, Nabo kee Medabâ-magaalah-marah boogisaanaah rookitan. Rookah amo kee deben isinnik mooleenih.
Woo mari, gititteh addal, sartanah *qabuddat gaca. Magaalak maglallah yan arac kee qarwah amol yan mari weeqaah rookita.
Cesbon kee Elqaale-mari weeqat yan. Oson aban weeqi Yahax fan yontoobbe. Qaskar agantah axaxitteeh, niya keenik tiddigille.
Mooyab-marah afqado yok danantah. Macaay inteenik, yasillimem faxa mari Xooqar kee Qeglat-Selisiya fan kuda. Marak teeni weeqak Lucit fan beya gita gexan. Marak teeni anay fayya haak boogisak Coronyim fanah kudan.
Nimrim garil yen buyyi kafeeh, woo buyyih xaqul toobokeh sugte qayso laqaymumteeh anxaxinimik tu maraaqinna.
Tonna-leemik ummatta luk sugte duyye gabat luk Saagan deqsita Golo fan kudan.
Mooyab-cuduud guffa haa aroocal deero aba marih xongolo radda. Eglaayim kee Beer-Eelim magaalal deero aba marih xongolo radda.
Dibon magaalal yan dori qabalat qassoowe. Anu Mooyabah yooboke marah wohuk gacta umaane daanal abbixe. Tohumu, lubaakay raaqa mara selu waahiyya kinni.

Silaq deqsitta magaalak, bacarih tan baaxo tabak, acwah anaaqe gabat luk, farmô-mara Yarusalaam magaalal xintoh abbah yan numuh rubnam meqe.
Qarwak xiiriyen qunxa-kimbiirih innah, Mooyab say-mari, Arnon weeqaytih-tabeenak xaqul, koboxut yan.
Farmoh ruuben mari Yuudâ-marak iyyoonu waanamah, «Abnam neh warisa; abtaanam nek inxica. Carra dahan elle yani'kkel xamcin iraawo qidda caxah innah, nee cataay; ku silaalol silaalinnay nee inxic. Nanu dabbô-mara kinninok, num nee akak gee waa ikket nee uqur.
Ku baaxol nanay nee inxicaay, nee bayisam faxa marak nee cata» axcelon.
Xukko kee baati gaba kaleleeh; baaxooxa baysa mari baaxo cabele.
Tohuk lakal Dawuduk rade marak numuk teeni malik akkele. Usuk ummatta digga kee kacanut xiinisele. Cakkik tanim sissikuk abeleeh, qadlih taamitaanam kee taamite waanam cubbusele.
Mooyab mari kaxxiinah akah yani'nna noobbeeh, oson anaani kee kaxxiinah qubbuy iyya mara kinnoonum naaxigeh immay, ken tirtira foyya.
Tonna-leemiik, Mooyab mari keenit yakke taqabih weeqan. Kiir-Ceras magaalah addal yokmen meqe maaqo kassitan waqdi, yakkeenimiik weeqaanah, niya keenik taddigille.
Cesbon garit tan buqre kee qinab-buqrey Sibma deqsitta kafte. Mango baaxooxah abbobti woo qinab-cooxut teeqete. Woo qinab-coox duma yan saaku Yaqder deqsitta magaala fan gufak sugeeh, ayrô-mawqa le kabuk bacarih tan baaxo fan gufak sugeeh, ayrô-culma le kabuk kaadu, tonnah, Rabe Bad deqsita bad taturak sugen.
Tohuk gexxaamah, Yaqder-mari Sibmâ-qinabah akah weeqa innah, anu kaadu weeqah. Cesbon kee Elqaaleh ximo yok tamaate. Macaay inteenik, ummatta ruffo hayta daroy orbisaanahiyya mabla; ummatta ruffo haa kudaar mayan.
Mangom elle aabakuk ten baaxoh mari ruffa lem mali. Qinab elle aabakuk yen baaxoh mari gad abtam mali. Kamri akak bicsoonuh edde yaaqiten qinab mayana. Anu, oson wallitak abak yenen waxxaqto tibba hee.
Tohuk gexxaamah, Mooyab kee Kiir-Ceras marah, bagi yok kaxxam qaadah.
Mooyab mari dooqa elle aba'gidih, fayyat raqta aroocay qibaada elle abaanahiyya gexot taqbeloonu'mmay, tu edde mageyan.
Duma YALLI Mooyab marih giddinaamak ruubem, tama farmo.
Awayah tu gactek, YALLI iyyaamah, «Mooyab marih kaxxa nabna hununuh sidiica sanatih addat bayele. Mooyab maray manguk yenehiyyak dago mari raaqeleeh; woo mari boola le mara akkele» 'yaanam iyyah yan.

Damaskoh giddinaamak ruuben farmo ah teeti. YALLI iyyemii, «Damaskoh magaala ahak wadir magaala matakkay abur akkele.
Qarooqeril tan magaalooli abur akkeleeh; illi kee laa elle taloole baaxo akkele. Woo illi kee laa wokkek num maxiiriya.
Gasoosa maroh edde tan magaalooli, Israayilik bayeleh; Damaskoh-magaala amô-baxxaaqqa weele. Suuriyah marak rabak raaqe mari Israayil marak kaxxih dago mara akkelon. Taham intam yoo, YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya» iyye.
YALLI iyyaamah, «Too ayro Israayil marih nabna gaba kalele. Xagar keenik boolatakaay qakkootak qakkootelon.
Israayil, daro elle tooboke baaxoy woo daro akak orbiseenihiyyah innah gacele. Refaayim Golo deqsitta golol sugte buqrey daro orbisa mari cabem akak yifiileenih foyyah raqtehiyyah innah gacelon.
Dago mari keenik raaqele. Israayil mari *daytuun caxay xaylo inkih akak ifiilla heenih, namma *daytuun akkeey sidooca *daytuun akke amot akak raqte akke kee, hinnay kaadu, gubi luddat dago xaylo akak raqtehiyya innah gacelon. Ah intam yoo YALLAY Israayil doore Dageltah yanihiyya kinni» iyye.
Too ayro sinam, Yallay kulli num ginahiyya fan wagteleh; Israayil doore Dageltay *Kudduusuk yanil kibaal haysitelon.
Isinni gabak bicsen aroocay sadgat elle abaanahiyyal kibaal haak maraaqan. Tonnah kaadu Aseera deqsittaamay yaqbudeenihiyyah astah heenih sugen gurumuuda kee, qaydarus elle qeerisan aroocal kibaal haak maraaqan.
Too ayro ken magaalooliy meqe innah gaso maroh edde heenihiyya, duma elle suge marih magaalooliy Israayil marak kuden waqdi garbo tekkehiyyah innah, foyya akkeleeh abuuruh raaqele.
Toh macah sabbatah akkeleemih inteenik, Yallay, kaxxa qale akah eleelitan innah aleelo siinih yakkeeh sin wadahiyya, hawwenteenih. Kaa cabba hayteenih, taahirik yan cooxu axcuk, isinni gabak coox tuysubukeenih, marin baaxok baahen coox tuysubuken.
Woo coox daabissen ayrok ciggilta ayrot yambeeh qobor baaha way, akak orbissaanam manton. Takkay immay gadaama kee akak ure waan biyak siinih baahele.
Ankacisey! Baadal tan ummatta, badal sabo raddaah bad haffita waqdi elle xongola'nnal, xongolta.
Doolatwa baddi haffoh innah habbuy inta. Takkay immay Yalli ken yassacakku waa waqdi, qaleh amok caacay baahe siisah innah, wadir gacelon. Silayti baahe caffih innah wadir aduurelon.
Bari yakke waqdi cunxo sinaamat qideloonuuh; maaci maacisa waqdi masugan. Ni baaxo buuba marih ellecabo tamah teetiiy; tamah keenit akkele.

Ankacisey! Kuus weeqaytitteh qaxat raqta baaxoy galwah anay elle yantaabbehiyyak,
doolat farmo baaha mari bayrek bicsen doonikit gacca 'yeh badal amaatele.
Farmot sissiki maraw! Qande le doolat le maray xeeriih, tonnah kaadu, xagar arab akak xamciniih addunyal inkih akak meysitaanahiyya fan farmo beya. Ken baaxo weeqaytitte adda akak radde baaxo.
Baaxô-bagul yan maraw ankacisa! Qaleh amol qalaamat ugsoonu waan waqdi wagita! Baanta yaaguroonu waan waqdi oobbeya!
Macaay inteenik, YALLI yok iyyaamah, «Dabqih elle an aracal gacca exceh, dahan yan barih saldah innah tibbat ken wagta; laqo takke waqdi tan ayroh innah, tibbat ken wagta» iyyah yan.
Qinab xaylo yifiileenik duma, qobor radaah, qinab xaylo alayta saaku, Yalli, qinab caxah luud gilet elle yargiqen innal, ken argiqele.
Ken qaskarih raysi guma kee alluwwâ-gadda akkele. Ken raysa, cagay guma akmeleeh, alluwwa gilal akmele» 'yaanam iyye.
Toh tekke saaku, weeqaytitte adda akak radde baaxo le maray qande le doolat leeh, tonnah kaadu, xeeriih xagar arab akak xamciniih addunyal inkih akak meysitaanahiyya, YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyyah acwa baahelon. Woo mattaco Siyon-qaley YALLAY Nabaamak Naba elle yaqbudeenihiyya fan baahelon.

Masri giddinaamak ruuben farmo ah teeti.
YALLI qamburreh addat sissikuk Masri fan yamaate. Masri addal yalla 'yeenih aqbuduk sugen coox kee xeetik bicsen duyyeeya kay foocal axaxitele. Masri marak niya addigillele.
YALLI iyyaamah, «Masri addal sahda kee sahda qeebih tittat ruubeyyooh; toobokoyta kee toobokoytaay, cuggaane kee cuggaane qeebih tittat ruubeyyo. Namma magaalah mara qaduwwih tittin amot heeyyo. Doolatwa tittat ruubeyyo.
Masri marih mala foyya abeyyooh, niya keenik aggileyyo. Yalla 'yeenih yaqbudeenimil cato esserelon. Ginnili kee kalluwallel fayu essereloonuuh, rabe marih roocaaniyyak, ‹Maca neh taysee?› 'yaanam axcelon.
Masri mara racmatta sinniih xuwaw sinni malikiy uma xintoh ken xiinisu waahiyyah gabal heeyyo. Aham intam yoo, YALLAY Dagelta kinnih, Nabaamak Nabahiyya» iyye.
Niil weeqaytih lee daggooweleeh, weeqayti ayrook ayro daggoowak daggooweleeh, ellecabol kafele.
Kanaalat gexxa lee ayrok ayro elle daggowtaamal abiceleeh, bayre kee qunga kafele.
Niil weeqaytih dariifal tooboke daro laqaymumteh kaffa 'teh baaxot radele. Coox edde yuysubuken siisa caacot gexele.
Niil weeqaytih kulluumuh xiinak suge mari boogiseleeh weeqele. Oson kullum edde abbaxuk sugen sabak kee gillaab foyya akkele.
Talbi-qaalak meqe sara bicisak suge marak niya addigillele.
Sara bicsa mara kee cawalah taamita mari abaanam waagiseloonuuh, niya keenik boolaatele.
Xooqan magaalal yan doolat mari duquura. Masri-malikih fayu yecee marak kaxxa-mari tu xiqe sinni *fayu kaat aba. Masri malikik, «Nanu dumî-dabaanal Masril sugte ixxiga leela kee malikwah arac raaqise mara kinnino» iyyoonu anni'nnal yaaxigen!
Masri malikow, ku tu-taaxaguy fayu koh acayuk tene mankel tan? Oson duudeenik, YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya Masri marah loowam koh warsoonay.
Xooqan kee Mooful tan abbobti, duquurusen duquura. Sinam baaxo miraacisu waa mara ken tekkeleh sugte. Takkay immay oson too baaxoh mara makot been.
YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya sahda badsa fayu yecee mara ken abe. Tohuk gexxaamah Masri mari baditit yaniih, yiskire numuy isi alliyoh bagul xiinah innah lagaq iyyen.
Gaddali akke kee, hinnay, baacoyta yakkeemih, hinnay kaadu, kaxxa num akke kee amixxige waa num yakkeemih Masri marak num tu keenih maxiqa.
Too ayro, Masri mari agbi innah gilic leela akkele. YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya ken digaala'gidih gaba fakem yabloonu waan waqdi, cunxitelon.
Masri mari YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya keenik abu waam kassa haan waqdi, Yuudâ-marak meysitelon. Yuudâ-marak xagarxagol kinni way meysitelon.
Too ayro, Masri addal tan koona magaalah addal Qibraan afat yaabelon. Wokkel yan mari Nabaamak-Naba-YALLIH migaaqal xiibitelon. Woo magaaloolik tiyak teena migaaqah «Baatî-magaala»
Too ayro, Masri rasuk gudet, YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyyah sadgat elle aban arac heelon. Masri cuduudul kaadu xeetik bicsen qamidduy kaa elle kassitaanahiyya heelon.
Too aracay sadgat elle abaana kee qamiddi, YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya Masril yaniimih asta akkele. Tokkel yan marat xukko takku waytaah YALLAL cato esseroonu waan saaku, wakiiliy ken catu waa keenih ruubele.
Tonnal, YALLI Masri marah ambulleeleeh; too waqdi kaa aaxigelon. Kaa yaqbudoonuh, sadgat kee mattaco kay migaaqal abeloonuuh; YALLAH nadri culeloonuuh woo nadri duuduselon.
YALLI Masri mara digaalele'mmay, sarrak ken aymaaqele. Oson kaal aduureloonuuh; usuk kaadu oson aban dooqa keenik oggoleleeh ken qaffoysele.
Too ayro, Masri mara kee Assuuriyah marih fanat kaxxa giti gacele. Too namma rasih marak mariiy maral safarah gexeleeh, ken namma rasih mari titta lih YALLA aqbudelon.
Too ayro, Israayil mari nabnah Masri kee Assuuriyah marat missoowele. Ta sidiica rasih mari addunyal enna 'ya marah barkat akkele.
YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya barkat keenit heeleeh, keenik iyyu waamah, «Masri maraw, yi mara kinnitoonuuh; Assuuriyah maraw, yi gabah taama kinniton. Israayil maraw, isin kaadu yi ikoyta kinniton» keenik axceleeh, barkat keenit heele.

Assuuriyah malikih yan Sargon yecee amril, Assuuriyah qaskar abbah yen num Filistiin magaalay Asdood deqsittahiyya yibbixe.
Sidiica sanatak naharat, YALLI, Amóx-Yasaqyak, «Ibat lito kabel kee ama xagaral lito *qabudda isik kal» 'yaanam kaak iyyeh suge. Too saaku usuk Yalli kaak iyyem oggoleeh, xagaral saro maleh ib-qassih gexak suge.
Asdood yibbixen saaku, YALLI iyyemii, «Yasaqyay yi naqasuh yanihiyya sidiica sanatah xagaral saro maliiy ibat kabella maliiy ibah gexe. Taham Masri kee Kuusut takku waytaamih asta.
Assuuriyah malik woo namma rasuk carbit yibbixe mara qasunuk beele. Qunxaamaay kaxxam inkih gambi qassih, iba qassih, deega qassih beeloonuuh, Masri mari qaybit radele.
Kuus kee Masril kibaal luk suge mari hagga axceleeh, niya keenik addigillele.
Too saaku Filistiin baaxoh badih dariifal yan mari iyyu waamah, ‹Assuuriyah malikik nee cateloonu inneh kibaal elle hayneh sugne marat tekkem wagitay. Hay, tahaysa anke kudnah nan!› axcelon» iyye.

Yalli, badak garil tan baaxoy sahda dabaaqah elle deedaltahiyyah giddinaamak, ruube farmo ah teeti.
Gabbi-qaxak tamaate caacoh innah, bacarih tan baaxoy sinam kaxxam akak meysittahiyyak tu amaatih able.
Kaxxam uma wacyi yol oobeeh; ublem, ganoleelay gano abtahiyya. Qamalleelay sinam radda uble. «Qeelam maraw, qeebih gaba qida. Meediyah maraw, magaalat maro haa. Is sinaamal bahte umaane teetik gacseyyo» iyye anay oobbe.
Taham acsube waqdi, xagar yok kaxxa biyaakah biyaakita. Lacawat tan barrah innah biyaakita. Aytik oobbeemik meysi yoo tibbixeeh; intih ubleemik cunxita.
Cissit maan. Meysi xagar yok timlikeh. Bari yakkem assexeeruk suge'mmay, meysih axaxitak xiinam baahe.
Wacyih miiz missoysa able. Qibinah seenan fidisah able. Maaqo yakmeeniih, maqab aaqabih able. Too way, ‹Qaskar abbobtiy, uguta. Gob zeytit (saliidit) duuga› iyyan.
Macaay inteenik, YALLI yok iyyemii, «Dacayrih gacu waa num rub. Too num yabalu waamat yaabaama.
Tittak xaqut faras amot yan maray kulli num nammayhaytô faras gabat lehiyya kee, gaala kee danan amot yamaate mara yable waqdi, kaxxam cubbi abitaama. Yeey, kaxxam cubbi abitam kaal tan» iyye.
Dacayrih hee num iyyemii, «Yi amoytaw, kulli ayro akkel a fayya le aracih amol dacayrih asa. Bar kaadu dacayrih soolak xiina.
Away ken ableh anih: faras amot yan maray kulli num nammayhaytô faras gabat lehiyya yamaateh yan. Too waqdi, ‹Baabelon baateh! Oson yalla axcuk aqbuduk sugen duyye baateeh, riira tekkeeh baaxô-bagul qangalaylut tan› 'yaanam iyyen» iyye.
Yi maraw, daro caffak baxsan waqdi elle tuman innal, sin tumeeni'mmay, away Israayil doore Dageltay Nabaamak Nabahiyyak oobbe farmo siinih warseh an. Tama siinih warsem too xaagu.
Yalli Duumah
Edomuk num yoh seece. «Dacayrih yan numow, barak maca raqteeh, barak maca raqteeh?» 'yaanam iyye.
Too waqdi anu kaal gacsemii, «Maaci maacisele'mmay, bari siinit qagtele. Ahak sa essertam tellek, uduuray esser!» kaak exce.
Yalli, Qarab marih giddinaamak ruube farmo ah teeti.
Arhoh yemeete Dadan maraw, Qarab baaxok garbo elle tan aracal a bar anfiddigetton.
Teema mari, bakaarita marah lee baaheeh; maaqo gabat luk, dabboh ken fan yemeete marat garayen.
A mari akak yoowwem, seefiy ken edde qidaanam faxak sugeeni. Siiben seefik kudeenih yemeeten. Gaysê-baxay ken edde mudoonuh qalaamiseenik kudeenih yemeeten. Rada carbik addak kudeenih yemeeten.
Macaay inteenik, YALLI yok iyyemii, «Keedar deqsita kedo a saaku le nabna sanat addat gaba kalele.
Keedarah tooboke agiiray qeebi gayset abak sugtehiyyak dagoom raaqele. Ahat yabtam, yoo YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinni» iyye.

Yalli, Sirri-goloh giddinaamak ruube farmo ah teeti.
Sugay isin inkih qarwah amo akah tawqeenim macaay?
Kaxxa waxxaqto elle takkeh tan magaalay! Kaxxa xongolo kee digir elle takkeh tan magaalay! Kok rabe mari way qeebit kok marabinna. Yekke carbih addat seefit kaadu marabinnon.
Sin abbobti inkih kuddeeh, qeebi abe'kal ken yibbixen. Xer ikkel kude marih agantah, siinik geen mara inkih yibbixen.
Tohuk gexxaamah excemii, «Kaxxa weeqah weeqam faxak, wonnah yok gaca. Anay yoo 'xica; inni maray rabehiyyah weeqay yoo inxica. Weeqe yoo makalina» exce.
Macaay inteenik, YALLAY Dagelta kinnih Nabaamak Nabahiyya ayro le. Too ayro xayyowtem able. Too ayro, Sirri-Golol kaxxa-waxxaqto kee ib-itqaay ummat badit edde tan ayrooy; gasoosa taddigilleeh, qaleela fanah catoh deerisan.
Qeelam-rasih-qaskar, faras amol anuk, gayse kee gaysê-baxa luk tamaateeh, faaris-gaariira luk tamaate. Kiir qaskar gooba luk tamaate.
Yuudâ-baaxoy niqmatak tanihiyya too naqboytit le faaris-gaariirak temeggeeh, faaris amot tan qaskar Yarusalaam magaalah culmah afal soolan.
Yalli, Yuudâ-mari reebuh luk sugem kale. Too ayro isin silac edde daanisan makdanat suge silac teyyeeqen.
Yarusalaam magaalak bica faxxa gaso wagitten. Yarusalaam addal tan qarwa mangah takkeh gide lowten. Tiddigille gasoosa edde xissaana'gidih, qarwak tu'baxa tiggilen. Gubi kabu raaqa dorat lee akah gaabowtaah,
duma suge dorih lee akah caxite wayta innah, magaalah addal dora bicsen. Takkay immay aham takke'gidih, naharal bicissa hayteh aracat sugusseh abtem, Yalla kinnim maloowinnitoonuy, kaa fan mawagitinniton.
Too ayro YALLAY Dagelta kinnih, Nabaamak Nabahiyya iyyemii, «Weeqaay boogisa. Amo isinnik moolaay sartanah *qabuddat gaca» 'yaanam siinik iyye.
Siinih tu gactekii, Yalli siinik aba iyyem cabba hayteenih digir kee farcit culten. Laa kee illi usgudda hayteenih cado akak tokmen. Qinabak bicissen kamrih maqabat gacten. «Beeraak rabennok, a saaku nakamay naaqubay» inten.
YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya isih yo'lih yaabeeh, iyyemii, «A umaanek rabba 'yaanam fan qafu mageyan» axcuk xiibite. Ah intam, YALLAY Dagelta kinnih, Nabaamak Nabahiyya.
YALLAY Dagelta kinnih, Nabaamak Nabahiyya iyyemii, «Malik buxak abbah yan yaaloy Sebna deqsitahiyya fan gexay kaak intamaa,
‹Fiiruk atu iyya is takkaleeh? Qalê-bagut fayya le'kket xissa kabri kok xisa intem iyyaay? A kabri daggasita kok intem iyyaay? Ku-buxah-mari akkel kabri maay lon?
Atu kaxxa numuh is lowta koo'mmay, YALLI ukkuqqa koo heeh baaxot koo qidele.
Ukkuqqa koo heeh, koqosoh innah kaxxam naba baaxok bagul koo qidu waa waqdi, kombobbolettooh, tokkel rabetto. Elle kaxxiinitak sugte faras-gaariira elle kok raaqele. Atu malik-buxak migaq baysa num kinnito!› kaak inxic» yok iyye.
YALLI kaadu Sebnak iyyemii, «Away lito abbootanak koo kaleleyyo; qunxa num akketto.
Aham takku wayta saaku, Cilkiyyá-Elaakimiy yi naqasu kinnihiyyah seeceyyo.
Atu luk sugte dallaabiya kee bagi boor kaat heeyyo. Atu luk sugte abbootan kaah aceeyyo. Yarusalaam kee Yuudâ-rasuk abba kaa abeyyo.
Dawud nasab le malikih gubal, yaabbeeh yaysaabbe num kaa abeyyo. Usuk iyyeeh usuk madqem, gersi mari maciggiila.
Siraq edde daabisan birtih innah, digga le aracal kaa daabiseyyo. Isi ahlih migaq kee kunnabna akkele» iyye.
Takkay immay kay ahli inkih kay gaba wagta mara akkele. Quukah kay fillal gacelon. Quuka kaal akkelon.
YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya iyyamaa, «Toh takku wayta saaku, digga le aracal daabisen birta salaceleeh, too way usuk annikissele. Fillal kaak suge quuki radeleh, bayele. Tah intem yoo YALLA» 'yaanam iyyah yan.

Yalli, Suur magaalah giddinaamak ruube farmo ah teeti.
Suur baateeh; Suurul amaatuk yen maraakib edde culak yen marso kee qarwa bayteh immay, maraakib maraw, weeqaay boogisa. Sin maraakib Kobroosuk yuduure saaku, sin qambaltam ta xaagu.
Baddi-afal yan maraw, tibba 'xicay rookitaay arkita. Saydâ-maray badat gaddalite mango duyye sin fan baahak suge.
Masrik orobta tellemmô-daro Suur magaala amaatuk sugteeh; baadal tan ummat duyye elle yaylammeeniih xaamaanam ta magaalak sugte.
Saydah magaalay wacarriy! Ku bad yaabeh, iyyemii, «Lacaw kee xalay able wayteeh, xaylo aynabe wayte barra ekkeh an» iyyek!
Suur magaala baatem yaabboonu waan waqdi, Masri mari kaxxam waagiseleeh wariggitele.
Isin baddi-afal yan maraw, rookitaay boogisa. Isbaaniyah baaxo fan kuddaanam gabbata.
Dumî dabaanaak xissinteeh, kaxxa farcat elle akkuk yenem, Suur magaala. Teetik mango mari safarah gexak yeneeh, tellemmo elle aban baaxooxal dabqih gacak yen.
Suur inaytâ-magaalay malikwa akak temeetehiyyak ten. Teetil tellemmo abak ten muddaqiyitte baadal migaq-gexxo le marak ten. «Annah tanim teetil bahtem iyyaay?» innek,
ta magaalal tah oobissem, YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya kinni. Akah abem, teetiy sahda elle kaxxiinitak sugte bayisa'gidiiy; baadal migaq-gexxo le mara inkih wacarroysa'gidih abe.
Ahaysa Suur maraw, booruy duyye siinih elle obta mantoonuk, Niil-weeqaytih garil yan marih innah, baaxo ubqura.
Yalli bad fanah gaba ruube. Inkih tan baaxo meysih axaxxe. YALLI, «Kanqaan baaxol koositih bicsen arooca bayisa» 'yaanamih amri yecee.
Yalli iyyemii, «Saydah magaalay ku farcat gaba kaleh. Ku mari xukkot yan. Kobros fanah kudaanamah, wokkel kinni, amaan mayan.
Baabelon mari edde yan caalat wagitay. Too mari ta saaku hebeltô-loowot mayan. Assuuriyah mari ta baaxo dubaali dabaq abe. Baabelon yabbixeeni'gidih fayya le aroocay tet akak yabbixoonu waanahiyya bicsen. Baabelon mari koositih bicsen arooca foyya keenik aben. Inkih tan magaala abuuruh cabba heen.
Badal maraakibit gexa maraw, boogisa. Wadbah luk sugten Suur baateh.
Away edde yaabeh suge daban yakku waa waqdi, Suur malcina-tabanih sanat hawwentimele. Malcina-taban, malik qumrih sugah gide. Too malcina-tabanih sanatak lakal, Suuruh xiiqareh-xiinah abak yenen gad teetih abelon.
«Hawweenen xiiqareh-xiinaytoy *kirar gabat haay, aagaruk magaalat meekit. Kirar uguraay gad ab. Tonnal koo kassitelon» teetik axcelon.
Woo malcina-tabanih sanatak lakal, YALLI Suur-magaalah-mari abak yen tellemmo abitay ken axcele. Addunyâ-bagul tan doolatwah isi nabsi kirah aceele.
Tohuh tellemmot geyta maksab yenek, taamat geyta lakqo tenek, magaadanat madaanisaanay; YALLIH taamat assa'gidih, YALLA-yaqbude-marih meqe maaqo kee meqe sartan edde xaamelon.

YALLI addunyâ-bagul tanim foyya abeleeh, kaxxa baatih baysele. Baad bayseleeh tet bagul yan mara fixixisele.
Seeka kee seekak kalih maraay, kaadintu kee kaadintu le numuuy, kaddaama kee kaddaama le barraay, duyye xaama num kee yaylamme numuuy, abuud faxa num kee abuud yecee numuuy, mago edde tan num kee mago le num inkih, inki digaalah digaalimelon.
Baaxo inki gexook bayele. Tet bagul yan marat kaxxa buuba akkele. Tahat yabtam YALLA. YALLI iyyem raq mali.
Baaxo kafeleeh, coox laqaymuumele. Addunyâ-bagul yan mari boolaatele. Kaxxa marah yan mari aqunxuyuk maacisele.
Baaxo nadaasa abtem sinaama. Macaay inteenik, Yalla cinaanaah, usuk aba iyyem abe waanaah, Yallih Qahdiy daayiman waarahiyya makan.
Tonna-leemiik Yallih-abaaro addunyal obte. Tet bagul yan mari akah biyaakitam, isinnih aben umaane. Addunyâ-bagul yan mari isih abe umaanek gexxaamah, bayak maaciseleeh dago mari raaqele.
Qinab xala coox kafele. Qinabak bicsen kamri waytimele. Tohuk gexxaamah duma farcatat suge mari qaadele.
*Kirar kee karambo aagaruk afracuk abak yenen gad gaba kaleh.
Qinabak bicsen kamrih amol abak yenen gad ahak wadir yumurruqeh; kamri qeero keenit baahe.
Magaalah addal uluuluka kee umaane amaggeleeh, sinam meysih qarwa isit alfele.
Qinab kamrih waytih ummat «Woyyow» axcele. Duma akkuk yen farcat amurruqele. Farcat kee ruffa ahaysa addunyal gaba kalele.
Magaala abuuruh raaqeleeh, akak culan afa bututtukkay riira tet abelon.
Addunya kee addunyal enna 'ta ummatat, tamah takku waytaama. Caxâ-miru akak yifiilen caxah amot, akak aylahiten caxâ-miri tiya-tiyah akah raqta innah, addunyay baatehiyyah bagul num-num saaboh raaqele.
Woo saaku rabak raaqe mari africeleeh qililisele. Ayrô-culma le kabul yan mari YALLIH misliinot yaabelon.
Tonna leemiik ayrô-mawqa le kabul yan marak, isin YALLIH nabnat yaaba. Baddi-xaqul yan marak, YALLIH migaq essekexxeya. YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya essekexxeya.
Baaxô-maggaraqak saareh-anay nel rada. «Qadaalat kee cakki le Dageltah fayla takkay» inta xongolo nel radah oobbe.
Sarrak ganoleelay sinam gantahiyya uble. Too waqdi, «Woyyow yi nabsow, woyyow yi nabsow, unsumuumeh maana! Ganoleela uxih sinam gantah matanaa!» 'yaanam exce.
A addunyal tan ummatey! Siinit raddu wayta cunxo kee, edde raddaana'gidih boodo kee oflo bical siinih tan.
Cunxo sinaamat qidda xongoloh anay yoobbeh kudu waa mari boodot radele. Woo boodok yewqe num oflot radele. Macaay inteenik, qaran-afoofa fakkinteeh, qaraanak kaxxa rob rada. Baad-rakiibo tangayyeh tan.
Baaxo kaxxa angoyyah angayyeleeh, rike rikeh kurruumeleeh xuumele.
Baaxo yiskire numih innah kabuk kabul lagaq axcele. Digga sinni siraqih innah angayyele. Abte Yallih-cinak gexxaamah annikisseleeh, abte niksok sarra muugutta.
Too ayro YALLI qaraanal taniimiy cayla lehiyya qaraanal digaalele. Baaxô-bagul tan amoytitte kaadu digaalele.
Casbi gurrah boodot titta lih ken heele. Too boodoh addat mango ayro sugga iyyeenik lakal, ken edde digaalan ayro amaatele.
Sarra, YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya reedele. Tohuk gexxaamah alsa kee ayrô-diifi amballayuk maraaqa. Too saaku YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya Yarusalaam magaalal Siyon-qalel reedele. Yarusalaamal sugtu wayta makaabon too saaku kay nabna ablelon.

YALLAW, yi Goyta kinnito.
Litom muxxo le diggah ten.
Dumaak elle malisse'nnal,
ku diggay dudda lehiyyat,
akke-waynuh tanim abte.
Toh abaluk koo aynabeyyo;
fayla kaadu koh abeyyo.
Magaala huna abte, YALLAW,
suge wayteh innal cabte.
Gasot maroh tan magaalay
naqboytak waaso luk sugte
abuuruh cabteh, huna abte.
Marin marih kaxxa qarwa
duma elle sugte magaala
suge wayteh innal cabte.
Too magaala tohuk wadir
nammeyhaak way maxissimta.
Toh abaluk, toh aaxaguk
cayla-leelah tan ummatta
koo aynabele; assakaxxele.
Sahdat xukkutta doolatwa
elle dardarta magaala
kok meysitak koo aynabele.
Baaciteeh yossomme marah
reebu kinnito, Dageltaw.
Gadaama kaa tabbixe way
gabat tu sinni miskintuh
reebu kinnito, Dageltaw.
Too maray ayro carrissah
caaco kee rob qayyaawise,
reebissah, ken silaalissa.
Xuwaw maleelah umaane
kaxxa caacoy xeet taggileh
inna le'mmay tu mabahta.
Xuwaw maleela xongolta.
Ken tirtira kee xongolo
tibba hayteeh, kacca hayte.
Dahanay bacaril yani
iraw radek, xabbacoowah.
Allahî-marih xongolo
too gurral xamcisse, YALLAW!
Xuwaw-maleela abta saxxaq
bayisseh tibba haysisse.
YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya addunyâ-bagul enna 'ta ummattah, a Siyon qalel, kaxxa xigla abele. Too xiglah kulsa le maaqo kee qinabak bicsen kamriy kulsa lehiyya bicsele.
Tokkel gacca 'yeh, kafanay addunyâ-bagul enna 'ya mara qambaalahiyya katele. Raba 'yaanam wadiriik baysele. Baadal tan ummatta inkih abak sugteh tan qaadiyyak ayyaaqele. YALLAY Mulki le kulli numuk ximo duugeleeh, kay ummatta kulli baaxol edde sugte qaybik ayyaaqele. Tahat yabtem YALLA.
Aham takku wayta saaku kulli num, «YALLI ni Dagelta kinnih, kibaal kaal hayneh, nee wadeh. Yalli kaa kinnih, kaa naamineh. Nee waddem kaa kinnuk, nafriceemiiy wallinnaama» axcelon.
Macaay inteenik, YALLI Siyon-Qale amaanah xiinisele.
Takkay immay Mooyab marat laahi robbi addat suge caffat akah yaaqiten innah aaqitelon.
Mooyab mari giiru aba numih innah gaba asgayyelon. Takkay immay woh tu keenih maxiqtaay; Yalli qaybik ken qidele.
Mooyab mari reebu le aroocay kaxxa gasoosa le bayele. Addigilleleeh, bullaaqet angalele.

Too saaku Yuudâ-rasul qadar abelon. Qadarah iyyoonu waanamaa,
«Ni magaala qandeey maqar le;
Yalli isih maro teetit heeh yan;
tet wada'gidih maro edde hee;
is Yallih dacayri geyteh tan.
Numma le mari cula'gidih
tet gasoh afa faka, ummatey.
Imaan le mari akak cula'gid
tet gasoh afa faka, ummatey.
Kibaal Yallal digga le mari
cula'gid gasoh afa faka.
Isi gital digga 'ye mara
cooca sinni amaanal xiinissa.
YALLAW, too mari kol kibaal haak,
wagriiy amaanal ken xiinissa.
YALLIH dacayri daayiman tan;
daayiman amo nek wagtele.
Kulli waqdi YALLA naaminay,
YALLAL eemena; kibaal kaal haa.
Kaxxiina leela qaybik qide;
ken magaalay nabna luk sugte
yiggileh abuuruh tet cabe.
YALLI bullaaqet tet yesgelle.
Xukkot suge marih itqah tan;
tu maleela kee masaakiina
itqa kee gitah tet haysiten.
«Numma le marih giti meqe.
Qadaalatlow, qadli le marah,
gita missossah, makok kaltah.
Ku gitat genxa waqdi, YALLAW,
kibaal elle haynam koo, YALLAW.
Amo-elle-meqinom koo, YALLAW.
Fanxam ku massakaxxa, YALLAW.
Baral koh maxhaxah, Dageltaw,
maaca kaadu ku raksit liyo.
Addunyal ku cokmi yablen way,
sinam qadli kinnim baritta.
Dambileelah meqem abta way,
tonnal qadli kinnim mabartan.
Cakkit-gexah yan marih-baaxol,
umam aban; dambi lem baahan.
YALLI le misliino kee heebat
macubbusan; toh mayaaxigan.
YALLAW, isi-gaba ugusse'mmay,
toh mayablan; edde maradan.
Isi marah lito kacanu,
ableloonuh; wacarriyelon.
Koo niqbam girat ambaxele.
«YALLAW, wagari neh taceem koo.
Nanu abneeh nugdube taamoomi,
'kak geynem koo; nee xiqsissem koo.
YALLAW, ni Goytaw, ni Dageltaw,
ku cato geyak, naqbudem koo.
Kok sah reedonwa ni-amol sugte.
Mayanin, alqo, boodo oobeeniih;
Mayaduuran; kabrik muugutan.
Ken digaalteh ken bayisse'kkal,
aysa rooci keenil magaca.
Ahak wadir ken kassam matan.
Ni baaxo kaxxa rasuh hayte;
YALLAW, tet kaxxa rasuh hayte.
Baaxo dumak baguh teymeggeh.
YALLAW, atu litoh tan nabna,
baadal doolatwa takkeemik,
aaxaguk maacisele, YALLAW.
«Ku mari gadaamite saaku,
ken digaalteeh adbisse saaku,
catoh koo fan yemeeten, YALLAW,
isinni bagut dooqa abiten.
Lacawat tan barray boogissa,
elle weqtaah boogissa gurral,
ku foocal boogisneh nen, YALLAW.
Booget neneeh, lacawat neneh;
immay xallem, dubuk caacaya.
Baadah tuxxiq lem mossiminna.
Gibdaabinaay gadaamah addak,
ummat nayyaaqu maduudinno.
Baadal nasri mabaahininno.
«Ku marak rabtem anuwwele;
ken xagaral rooci gacele.
Kabri culteeh diiko nagartem
anuwweeleeh, qilila abele.
Kafte qayso naafi doogisaah,
Yalli rabtem tonnal doogise.
«Yi ummatey, buxah addah cula;
qarwak afa isinnit alifa.
Yalli naqabuk xamacam fan
dago gide kaak ombooqora.
Addunyâ-bagul yan mara inkih
ken umaaneh digaala'gidih,
YALLI dabqik yawqeh yamaate.
Sinam rooci yeyyeeqe mara,
aysa baaxo ken mataaqura;
qiden marih qabal awqele.

Too ayro YALLI isi seefiy nabam gibdiih, qande kee nabna let, Leyyatan qidele. Leyyatan deqsita kaxxa abeesay makmakitak gexxa digaalele. Leyyatan deqsita kaxxa abeesay kudak sugte digaaleleeh, kaxxa alay baddi addal yaloolehiyya qidele.
Too ayro, meqe qinab xalta caxah qadar aba. Qadarah intoonu waytaanamaa:
«YALLI qinab-caxak iyyam le:
‹Qinabak dacayri anu abeyyo;
amo teetik anu wagteyyo.
Fiiruk geerah leek tet afqeyyo.
Naqboyti gabak dacriseyyo.
Bar kee laqoh tet dacriseyyo.
Ahaysa tet naqabuk raaqeh
immay sissib tet addat yenek,
hinnay keenan tet addat yenek,
woysa tittat ken carriseyyo.
Toh hinna'mmay yoo wadbiteenik,
yo'lih bica mara yakkoonay;
yo'lih bica mara yakkoonay›
'yaanam YALLI keenik axcele.
Ahak sarra tamaate ayroora
Yaqkuubuk samad daabimele.
Israayilik ummat saadele;
caxâ-miri baad duudusele.
Israayil ummat qide mari,
duma yan saaku akah rabe'nnah,
Yalli Israayil ummat maay qide?
Keenit qeebi abe marak abem
hay, Yalli keenik abeh maay yan?
Ken tinqibeeh, baaxok teyyeeqe.
Ayrô-mawqak silisse caacot,
baaxok, YALLAW, ken tiskiliqeh.
Tonnal dambi keenik katele.
Israayil mari edde ase umaanek
qafu geen saaku aham akkele:
sadgatah xeetik bicsen mansaf,
bardak bicsen xisneh innah,
iggilla heelon; riira akkele.
Aseeral yaaxigen gurmuuday
qibaada akah abak sugeeni,
qaydarus elle ruuban mansaf
soolak maraaqa; bayele'kkal.
Maroh gaso edde tan magaala
hunah raaqele; dibu akkele.
Num sinniih dibuk yan bacari
akkeleeh, abuuruh raaqele.
Laahi dabqih elle gacele;
noktimah tokke haysitele.
Qayso noktimal aloolele;
noktimal coox ludwak yaloole.
A cooxuk ludwa kafta saaku,
butukka 'teh taddigille way,
agbi girâ-bocoh haysita.
Tut radaah geya mara hinna.
Ken Kaalik keenih maracmata;
ken Dageltay ken yukluke
aysa maqaane keenih maaba»
'yaanam qadarah axcetton.
Too ayro YALLI, Furaatak xabba haanamaay Masri cuduudul yan daqaarah amma 'yaanam fan, Israayil ummat gaaboysele. Isi mara gaaboysele. Kamadik caffa elle baxsan innal, ken baxisak ken gaaboysele.
Too ayro, kaxxa *baanta aagureloonuuh tet kaayiselon. Masri kabuk gitah been mara kee, Assuuriyal baatit yan marah seecaana'gidih tet aagurelon. Too baanta aabbeloonuuh amaatelon. Yarusalaam-qaley saytunil YALLA aqbudeloonuuh, kaa aynabelon.

Efrayimih yooboke maraw,
kamri taaqube sakaareenow,
able liton; woyyow axcetton.
Amo elle miqiton magaala,
qobooruk bicisen kalabtaay;
elle kaxxiinittaanam teeti.
Woyyow, teetit takku waytaamow!
Niqmatak tan kayrih tan golok
daga raqta magaala siinik
birroh innah laqaymuumele.
Qaxa liton bilqa litoonuh
immay bayettoonum digga le.
Dagelti gabat lem oobbeya.
Qande le celemiy kuwwat le,
atkaay qeebi keenit aba'gid
gabat leeh; bical yabbixeh yan.
Usuk mamaata abu waa saaku,
arroqley kaxxam gibdih gurrah,
kullim bayissa caacoh innah,
kullim duufut beya weeqi'nnah,
amaatele, gufele tokke.
Toh inkih baaxol oobisele.
Israayilik kamri taaqabok
amot lon kalabta radele.
Ibitteh teetit taqqa axcelon.
Laqaymumte birroh inna leh,
niqmatak tan kayrih tan golok
daga raqta magaala keenik
xayi waktih addat bayele.
Is luk sugte qaxa kee bilqa
suge wayteh innah gacele.
Kusrah amot tooboke xayloy
alayte waqdi num ifiillaay
ukumma heeh innah bayelon.
Too ayro, YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya
kay maray baatik saaboh raaqeh
qaxa kee bilqaay nabna akkele.
Yab kuraah, cokmaabah yan marah
qadaalat kinnim barisele.
Magaalâ culma beya gita
wagtaah, dacayri edde aba marat
niya heelem, YALLAY nabna le.
Seekaay nabuwwa abte sikratah
ibi keenik lagaggaq iyya.
Kamrit aben sikratih taagah
annikissuk yandafoofolen;
baditak gita malit radan.
Nabuwwa kamrit tiskireh tan.
Suwaawuruy oson yableenit
radoonu cineenih; yefferen.
Seeka kaadu kaxxam tiskire;
sinam amoh keenik bahta yab
mekloonuuy kuroonu yefferen.
Maaqô-mingilwa alliyot baysen.
Abcise'kah cabeenim matan.
A mari anqaasah yok iyyaamah:
«Usuk iyyaay? Iyya is yakkaleeh?
A farmo iyyah warsam yakkale?
Anguk molla 'yeh yan qunxa urruh
warsitaamaay ken geysiisaama»
'yaanam axcuk yok wayto yaceen.
«Usuk uma'nnal nee barsah yan.
‹Wonnah abaay annah aba› iyya.
‹Naharsi amril gersi amri osisa;
Away tu-aba, sarra tu edde osa›
'yaanam urri innah nee barsah yan»
'yaanam axcuk wayto yok yaceen.
Faxe waytaanam yi yab tekkek,
marin maray beedi-afat yaaba
sin barisuh Yalli ruubele.
«Offoofiyaay, ahaysa uqrufa;
taqbe marak uqrufa inxica»
siinik axcuk sugtem Yalla'mmay,
takkeenimik Yallih-yab cinten.
Tahak wadir YALLIH qangaray
keenih yacee, tonnal akkele:
«Annah abaay wonnah kaadu aba;
Naharsi amril gersi amri osisa;
Away tu aba, sarra tu osisa»
'yaanam axcuk ken amrisele.
Tonnal too qangara too saaku
ken beyak, deerih ken qidele.
Mudduumelon; oflot radelon;
mudduumelon; ken abbixelon.
Kulliimil qangaasalah rabah!
*Yarsalaamal xiinisa maraw,
tahaysa YALLIH iyyem oobbeya.
«Nee kee rabi fanal qahdi yan.
Nanu akeera lih bica hayne» intan.
«Duufut sinam beya weeqayti
yamaate way nee mabeya» intan.
«Silac nek duquurusiyya» intan.
«Dirab kibaalah nek yan» intan.
«Bala qaraanak tamaate way,
nee maxagta tu mabahta» intan.
Tirtirissan; tahal falmittan.
YALLAY Mulki le tohuh iyyamaa, «Siyoonul yigirriben xaay limo mangooh, digga le rakiibo yakkehiyya heeyyo. Yoo yaamine num mabadita.
A magaala edde massowtu waytam, qadaalata. Sekexih gexxaamak cakki kee qadaalat tet sooliseyyo. Diraabay isin elle taamineenihiyya bayseyyo. Isin uqurah liton arac weeqi duufut beele.
Sin kee rabi fanal yan qahdi bayele. Akeera lih hayten bici gaba kalele. Duufut sinam beya weeqayti yamaate way duufut sin beele.
Bala qaraanak siinit elle amaatinnaanimil sin baysele. Bar siinit amaateleeh, laqo siinit amaatele'mmay saabo sin cabsiisele» iyye.
Ta farmok maqna teexegeenik, kaxxa hagga siinil akkele.
Missilah, «Qunxa qarkayto iba kok cabiiy, amo kok cabe'kah inkih koo matabbixaay; dudda sinni guula num mataybududda» iyyaana'mmay,
YALLI duma Faraadim-qalel akah abe innah siinit ugtele. Gibqon-Golol akah bagcarrite innah siinit bagcarritele. Isi taamay isin kaak akkaluk suge waytaana abele.
Ahaysa anqas tayseedeenimi. Cinna hayteenik, axawah edde tanin silsilat kiriqqa siinil heelon. YALLAY Dagelta kinnih, Nabaamak Nabahiyya siinil oobisu waa baati siinil yuckumem yoh warseh yani'mmay, anqas cabtaanam siinih tayse.
Ankacisaay yi yab oobbeya. Yi yab cubbusaay ayti akah ucuya.
Buqre-abe baaxo yabqure waqdi, yabqure baaxo kulli way madaga. Yabqure'gidih baaxo kulli way macota.
Naharak buqre elle aba ikke missossa haa. Tohuk lakal kammuun kee kudbara kee, tonnah kaadu, kamadi kee gabru deqsitta daro elle yabqure. Kulli dariyyu le aracal yabqure.
Yalli kaah yecee ixxiga leeh, tohuk gexxaamah isi taama meqe innal aba.
Data filfil kee kudbara tuma waqdi, kaxxa caxxat akkiiy, qunxa caxxat akki, tuma.
Kamadi akak bahta'gidih, fiiruk geerah caxxat matuman. Kamadi aame'kal faras gaari bagul akak elle beyan inna yaaxigeh.
Tah inkih YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyyah baritto. Kay kas qajiibih yaniih, kay ixxiga kaxxa nabna le.

Yarusalaam-magaalay, kum tekkeh tan! Dawud dabqah elle sugeeh, Yallih sadgat elle aben mansaf elle yan magaalay, sanatat sanat osisaay, abtan qiidittek maadiyina'mmay,
isin faxe qiid abtaanamah, Yalli, «Anu a magaala biyaakiseyyo» 'yaanam iyyah yan. «Yarusalaam boogiseleh, rookitele. Sadgat elle aban aracal qabal elle caxita innah, magaalal qabal caxitele.
Yarusalaamat qeebi abeyyo. Maro teetit haysiiseyyooh, tokkeek qeebi teetit absiiseyyo.
Yarusalaam-magaala ramma axceleeh, tet xongolo kabrik addak tawqe xongoloh xaw aallele. Is maqar cabeleeh, siisah addak hunnuy inta xongoloh xaw xaawele.
«Takkay immay mango naqboytiitiy kot qeebi abahiyya siisa akkele. Koh racmate waa mari caffay caaco beyte akkele» iyye. Tah sissikuk takku waytaama.
YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya qaran-kakkaqooy baaxoh-angoyya kee ibak-gibdi-xongolo ruubele. Tonnah kaadu, kaxxa caaco kee caacay kee sinam takme gira ruubele. Yarusalaam mari tohuk cattiimele.
Mango baaxoh maray qeebi siinit abuh maro siinit heehiyya, siinil bar tublen soono akkele.
Satqite numuy soonot maaqok cayyehiyyah bis le. Woo num xiinik ugta waqdi, woo cayi edde abem soonok sugta. Bakaarite numuy soonot leek cayyehiyyah bis le. Woo num woo xiinik uguta waqdi, woo bakaarat edde suga. Mango maray mango baaxok yemeeteh Siyon-qalet qeebi abu waahiyyat, takku waytam tamaha.
Ama tekken xangi-maleelay akah taniinihiyya tika. Akah tanin inti maleela tika. Qinabak bicsen kamri aaqube'kal lagaggaq intan. Gambiik gambil lagaq intaana'mmay, toh kamri maqubih sabbatah abtaanam hinna.
YALLI kaxxa xin siinil ruube. Nabuwwa sahdah addah inti takkem faxxiimak ten. Takkay immay YALLI namma inti keenik alfeh. Sirri yable mari sahdah kas kee misinkaca yakkeenim faxxiimak ten. Takkay immay YALLI misinkaca keenik alfeh tut rade ken kaleh.
Sin yuybulle wacyi maceddaanaay; alifit yan kitaabih addal yan yaabih gide siinil akkele. Woo kitab numuk teenay yakriyehiyyal beyya hayteh, «A kitaabal tanim macaay? Ikriyey!» intek, woo num «Anu aham akriyu mabicsa. Macaay intek alifit taniih, fakiimeh akak wayta asta le'kkah makriya» axcele.
Akriye waa numul beyteeh kaadu, «Yoh ikriyey» intek, «Aleey anu kawsa maaxiga» 'yaanam axcele.
Yalli iyyamaa, «A mari afak yoo yaynabem ceela'mmay, afqado keenik yoo matassanabba. Oson yot aban qibaada yi garil hebeltô-maqna mali. Diinih loonum, sahda teyyeeqe madqa kee abuk-raqtih luk sugen qaada.
Tohuk gexxaamah anu ta maral ablewaynuh taniimiy kaxxa cunxoh akak cunxutoonu waanahiyya baaheyyo. Oson kasloytiitih lon marih kas foyya abeyyo. Ken maray bagi cubbi luk yenek woo cubbi foyya abeyyo» iyye.
Edde tanin mala YALLAK yaaqurem yakkale maraw, sinim tekkeh! Uma-taama bar ditet abaah, «Nanu abnam iyyi nek yableeh, iyyi yaaxige?» 'yaanam intan.
Sugtem deerik afah korissaanam faxxan! Kallak buuti bicse num kee, kallak bicsen buuti inkim celsissan. Buuti is bicse numuk, «Yoo mabicisinna. Isi gabak yoo maabinna» iyyam bictaa? Woh iyyaamih dudda maay le? Buuti, gabak is bicse numuk, «Woh tu yaaxige num hinna!» iyyam maay duudaa? Maduuda.
Dago waqlak wadir kaxxa-garboh sugte baaxo niqmatah tan buqreh-baaxo akkeleeh, woo buqreh-baaxo kaxxa-garboh innah gacele.
Too ayro, kitab addal tanim ayti-mali aabbele. Inti-mali kaxxa diteh addak awqele; inti geele.
Rammita mari, YALLAT kaxxam ruffa axcele. Israayil doore Dageltay kudduusuk yanihiyyat, masaakiina ruffa axcele.
Macaay inteenik, racmatta maleela baatih gexele. Kulliimil qangaasalah raba mari mano luk maraaqa. Umaaneh abittoh sangeelak yen marih baati akkele.
Cakki-bagul-yan-maral diraabah-sumaaqita-mari bayele. Cokmi-buxal, cakki-le-mara cakki-waysiisa-mara baati qambalta. Qellat-sinni-mara-cakki-gee-kala-mari bayele.
Tohuk ugutak, YALLAY Abraahim gadaamak yeyyeeqe Dagelta kinnihiyya, Yaqkuubuk rade marih giddinaamak iyyamaa, «Yaqkuubuk rade mari ahaysa akah wacarriyam mali. Ahaysa cunxoh fooci keenik maburraacita.
Macaay inteenik, anu siinih acee xaylo tabloonu waytan waqdi yoo aqbudetton. Yaqkuub doore Dageltay kudduusuk-yani kinniyom yok aaxigetton. Yi migaq aynabetton. Yi meysi xagarat siinik culele.
Too saaku yab ayti akak cule waak sugte hawri-maleela yaabat radele; bagi cubbi geelon. Kulli way ceele-wayto baahak suge mari meqem bartele» iyyah yan.

YALLI iyyeemih, «Yabti-cina le xayloy, sinim tekkeh! Anu faxam cintaanaah, isinnih faxxen mala malsittan. Yi idni maleh bica sinam lih haysittaanaah, dambit dambi osissan.
Anu faxam yoo essere'kal, Masri fan gexxan. Catoh Masri amoytal kibaal haysitteeniih kaa aleelitten.
Takkay immay isin aleeloh liton Masri baaxo, qaybi siinih xalele. Masrit faxxen reebi qaybi siinih xalele.
Xintoh-abbobti Xooqanal loonuh, farmoh afat ruuben mari Caanis deqsitta magaala gufeenim aaxigeh immay,
Yuudâ-mari cato faxak maacisu waa saaku, Masri marih cato soono kinnim ablelon. Too waqdi, ‹A maray tuxxiq sinnil cato macah esserre?› 'yaanamal kaxxam nadaamitelon» iyye.
YALLI bacarih tan baaxoy gabbi-qaxat raqtahiyyal tan alluwwah giddinaamak farmo ruubeeh iyyeemih:
Ta makaabonuy farmoh afat gexxehiyya gexen saaku, gibdaabina le baaxoy lubooka kee afat summi le abeesas kee haadda baadeysitte elle tanihiyyak adda gacca 'yeenih gexen. Merraytuh qarik garab danoonal luk gexen. Garab kaadu gaalal luk gexen. Too merraytul heenim, limo mango duyyek ten. Too duyye akah beenim, catoh edde qaagan marih mattacok ten. Takkay immay oson catoh edde qaagen mari, hebeltô-cato keenih abu duuda marak mananna.
Too duyye akah beenim, Masri mara'mmay, Masri marak geyoonu waan catotta malon. Tohuk gexxaamah Masri marak ‹Summi sinni abeesa› 'yaanam exceh an» iyye.
«Aham hawwentime wayta'gidih, kulli way sumaq keenil takke'gidih, ta farmo ummatak foocal luucul uktub; warkatal kaadu uktub» 'yaanam Yalli yok iyye.
Macaay inteenik, oson kulli way Yalli faxe waam aban. Aamanti-sinni-xayloy YALLI keenik iyyam oggole waytahiyya kinnon.
Takku waytam sirrih table awliyak, «A sirrih mabuluk raaqa» iyyan. Yallih farmo bahta nabuwwak kaadu, «Hununuh taniimik bagul hayya mahanay, ceetaalissa haay, nanu naabbem elle fanxa innal neh warisa» iyyan.
«Gitak darifih neh raaqa. Gita nek maalifina. Israayil doore Dageltay kudduusuk yanihiyyat nee mataqbisinay, nanay nee inxica» 'yaanam iyyan.
Isin toh inteenik, Israayil doore Dageltay *Kudduusuk yani siinik iyyamaa, «Anu sin lih yaabe yab cinna hayteenih duquurusiyyal yeemeneh, ayrisiyyal kibaal haa mara takkeenim siinih teysek,
ama dambi, tonkommeeh bokokte gasoy maqar cabba hayteh raddam faxxahiyya siinil akkele. Isin tonnal garciik radetton.
Raddoonu waytan waqdi, uma'nnah yiddigille buutih innah akketton. Too buutik raaqe galqi yiddigillek wadir xiqam mali. Gombod edde weeraanam luk maraaqa. Lee edde kumsan mingil mayakka» iyye.
Mulki le YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinniih *Kudduusuk yanihiyya iyyaamah, «Amay yol uduuray yol eemena; tonnal waddiimetton. Macisabbootinay kibaal yol hayisa; tonnal qande geetton» 'yaanam iyya'mmay, isin wohim cinteenih.
Tohih aftok isin, «Kaxxa arda le faariisit gacca 'neeh kudenno» inten. Nummah kudetton! Sin faariisa kaxxa arda lem takkaleeni'mmay, ama lakak sin yayradde mari siinik aakumele.
Keenik inki qaskariiti siinik alfi num ayraddele. Keenik koona qaskariiti, takkeenimik sin ayraddele. Qaleh amol takarten sinbiilik sah, qaskarak tu siinih maraqta.
Tonna'mmay YALLI, tohuh, isi niqmat siinil oobisam faxaah; kaadu siinih racmata'gidih ugtele. Macaay inteenik, YALLI cakki le Dagelta kinni. Kaal kibaal haa mari ruffu iyya mara.
Isin Yarusalaamal yan marak ahaysa ruffa inteenih maweqtan. Yalla kallactan waqdi, siinih amqeleeh; cato kaal essertan waqdi, sin catele.
Yalli gadaama kee gibdaabina siinil ruubele'mmay, isih siinik mabaxsimaay; nagay kaa aaxigetton.
Edde gexxan gitak guri kabul afkune kee, migdi kabul afkune takken waqdi, kay xongolo aabbettoonuuh, «Giti ah kaak; akkek gacay gexa» 'yaanam axcih aabbetton.
Dahab kee lakqo bagul akak hayten duyyey aqbuduk sugteenihiyya beyya hayteenih, guddaafa elle qidan gurrah baaxot qidettoonuuh, foocak nek kala 'yaanam axcetton.
YALLI rob siinih ruubeleeh; buqre elle abinnaan ikkel, qidinnaan daro siinih aabukele. Mango daro orbisetton. Laahi siinik mango qayso geeleeh amaanah aloolele.
Buqre edde abak sugten awurwa kee danoona kaxxam meqe qayso kee daro siinik geele.
Sin naqboytiitit kaxxa sugudi yakku waah, ken kaxxa megdebwa taddigillu wayta saaku, kulli qaleela kee koomaamik lee darah oobele.
Alsa ifuh ayroh innah gaceleeh, ayro kaadu ifuh malcina adda dumak lafitta axcele. Malcina ayroh ifuy yesgelleenihiyyah bis aallele. Aham takku waytam, YALLI isi mara abeh yan biyaakak edde qaffoysu waa saaku.
YALLI allak yambullee. Kay naqbi habug inta girah bis leeh; woo girak kaxxa qeeriy datahiyya yawqe. Kay afak yawqe yab habug inta giray sahda takmehiyyah bis le.
Kay ufuy kaxxa weeqay kullim duufut beyahiyyah bis le. Baadal tan doolatwa yaqiyyireh, finqa ken abele. Baadal tan ummatta badseleeh, santiitat hayya ken heeh makot ken beele.
Takkay immay Yallih ummatey, isin ruffa axcetton. Qiddi bar abak yenen saare abetton. YALLA elle yaqbuden qalel, YALLA saarissaana'gidih, fooxima gabat luk tawqen waqdi, farcatah yassallen inna assalletton. Israayil-ummat dacrisa Dageltih-qale yamaate mari farcatah yassalle inna assalle lon.
YALLI, isi xongoloy kaxxa nabna lehiyya akah tantaabbe innah abele. Kay bagcarra qandek leh gide ablelon. Yallih-cayli habug inta giraay; kaxxa rob kee kaxxa caaco kee, tonnah kaadu, kaxxa arroqleh gurral amaatele.
YALLI isi cayla Assuuriyah mara yayballayu waa saaku, kaxxa xongoloh xongoleleeh; too xongolo yaabben waqdi, Assuuriyah-maray sin aatakuk suge birti inna le caxxat amuttukele.
Yalli fiiruk geerah ken yaagureemih karambo kee *kirar kanniyto yaabbeenimik maadayinnon. Tonna leemiik YALLI isih Assuuriyah-maral-yuckume-digaalat ken digaale le.
Assuuriyah malikih raysi edde carara'gidih, kaxxa gira dumaak bical sugte. Ta arac, kaxxa adda leeh baar le araca. Mango boco sittin bagul akak heen araca. YALLI isi ufuy urta *danih innah habug iyyahiyya too bocot ruubele.

Masri fan catoh gexa maraw, sin ikke tekkem ixiga. Isin cato Israayil doore Dageltay *kudduusuk yanil messertan; YALLAL kibaal mahaytaana'mmay, Masri-marih-fariisa kee, mango faras-gaariiray oson loonuhiyya kee, ken maray faras-amok-qeebi-abahiyyal kibaal haan.
YALLI kas leeh; bala oobissem kaa. Usuk iyyem aba. Tonna-leemiik sarri-leelal gaba qideleeh, umaane aba marah cato yakke maral kaadu gaba heele.
Tonna'mmay Masri mari sinaamak kaxxih sahda ikkal, Yalla hinnoonum taaxigeenimi. Oson lon faaris, gersi faariisak kaxxih akak yaniinim, cado kee xagara ikkal, malayka hinnon. YALLI gaba siinil qidu waa saaku, cato elle essertan mara kee cato essera marak inkih baati sin qambaltam ixiga.
Macaay inteenik, YALLI yok iyyemii, «Lubak admoh baahe laahih cado yakme waqdi, lacti duwat suge mari yakkeemiik kaa fan dadha way, kaat kaayan way, keenik mameysita. Lac kaak raaqisaanam faxan way, hinnigga keenih m'iyya. Nabaamak Naba Dagelti kaadu too lubaakih innah, Siyon-qalel qeebi abuh yamaate waqdi, kaa akak waasu waa num mayan.
Kimbiro isi qari galwat akah reebissa'nnal, YALLAY Nabaamak Nabahiyya Yarusalaam-magaala umaanek reebiseleeh, tet wadele» yok iyye.
Israayil maraw, YALLAL uduura. YALLAT darre cabteenih taniinik, YALLAL uduura.
Macaay inteenik, too ayro, lakqo kee dahabak dambi-le-gaboobit bicissen duyyey Yalla axcuk taqbudeenihiyya baaxot qidetton.
«Assuuriyah mari seefit ambaxele'mmay, toh sahdayti bicse seef hinna. Ken mari too seefik kudele. Ken furrayna naqoosay dirkih tamsiisaana akkele.
Ken malikiy ken dacayrih yene cunxot bayele. Carbi-abbobti meysik gexxaamah, carbi qalaamatih sinbil baaxot qideenih cabelon. Ahat yabtam, yoo YALLAY Siyon-qaleh amol solal girah innah urahiyya.

Ayrok teena cakkik tanim aba malik reedele.
Too dabaanal abbobtih gacu waa mari qadli le mara akkelon.
Keenik kulli num caacok edde rebsiman reebu akkele.
Kaxxa roobuk edde yaggarren reebu akkele.
Bakarroytal geen darah gexxa leeh bis aallele.
Caxa-sinniih reebu-sinni bacarik-bagul,
silal le boolok baguk radda iraawoh bis aallelon.
Tohuk wadir inti le marak inti fakkiimele;
ayti le marak ayti aabbele.
Sabri maleela tut radak maaciseleeh, aaxigele.
Iriro le mari yab nagay qidele.
Duquurak «Kasloytiiti» m'iyyan.
Xuwaw sinni anaani-leela mayassakaxxan.
Macaay inteenik, duquruk yab saaha mali.
Aaminnaanimil malsaanam taamah le.
Tonna leemik, YALLA cina num yakkeeh;
YALLIH giddinaamak, qellat le yaabat yaaba.
Qulula mara mayaskama; bakaarita mara mayafqa.
Xuwaw sinni anaani-leela umaanet assa.
Tu maleela edde baysan dirab kee
masaakiina cakki edde waysiisan malat gacan.
Saraf le num sarafat malsaah,
saraf le taamah abittol digga 'ya; tonnal marada.
Isin cisab sinniih kulli way farcatat tan sayyoy,
siinik axcem ankacisa.
A saaku cayit taniinim siinik ableh immay,
sanat kee abxa gufe'kal gadaama sin abbixele.
Qinab coox xaylo maxala.
Kudaar morbissan.
A saaku farcaanak yan agabow, meysita!
A saaku nagay yanim isik yakkale agabow, gadaamitettoonum ixiga!
Sara isinnik kalay *qabuudut gaca.
Buqre elle abak tanton meqe baaxo waak sugettoonuh,
qinab xaylo xalak yan coox waak sugettoonu'mmay,
rookitay alil isinnik ugura.
Ummat afracuk addal akak tan qarwa kee,
too qarwa elle tan magaalay farci kee wallitiyyat abak sugtahiyyah weeqay rookita.
Yi ummat elle tan baaxol sissib kee keenan le coox aabukele'mmay weeqay rookita.
Macaay inteenik, malik qari foyya akkele.
Mango xongolo elle radak ten magaala abur akkele.
Amo xer qariy magaala akak dacrisak sugeenihiyya foyyah raaqele.
Too aracal dabookalwa kee laa aloolele.
Takkay immay sarra yan saaku, *Yallih-Roocaaniyya baaxol oobeleeh,
bacarih tan baaxo baqurê-baaxo akkele.
Baaxol niqmat gaceleeh mango murti orbele.
Qadaalat kee cakkik tan maqaane inkih tan baaxol gacele.
Kulli num cakkik-tan-maqaane le gitat gexeleeh,
tohuk gexxaamah cisab mayalla; daayiman baaxol amaan gaceleeh nagay aniina anele.
YALLIH mari isi buxal cisaabak amaanah xiineleeh; gadaamak affoofele.
Garbol kaxxa arroqle raddaamah,
magaala abuuruh raqtaamah,
tohuh isin, isinni baaxol niqmatat gacetton.
Leek garil qidinnaan daro siinih aabukeleeh;
laa kee danoona maatah gaceleeh aloolele.

Sinam baysew, woyyow kot takku waytaamow!
Ku baati tekkeh masuginna'mmay ahaysa akkele.
Sinam ganak sugte'mmay, koo gana mari masuginna.
Takkay immay sinam edde ganak ten wakti gaba kalla heeh,
sinam koo edde ganta wakti amaateleeh,
sinam edde bayisak ten wakti gaba kalla haa waqdi,
baati kot akkele.
YALLAW, neh emeq. Ku maqaaneh qambaalat nan.
Maaci elle maacisinnaanimil maqar net hay.
Gadaaminna saaku nee cat.
Ku xongolo radda waqdi, baadal tan ummat kudele.
Atu ugutta saaku doolatwa fiik faak akkele.
Tonna luk ken duyye dannabah beeloonuuh,
caben duyyel sinam qanayti innah luulele.
YALLI fayya le aracal yan Dageltaay; nabna lem kaa.
Siyon-qalel qadaalat kee cakkik-tan-maqaane heele.
Tet doolatah digga akkele. Teetih dacayri akkele.
Kas kee ixxiga keenih aceele.
Kaxxa acwa akak 'yaanam, YALLA meysitak yassanabbeenimi.
Ama tableeniih gitittel kaxxa weeqah weqtam, kaxxa agiira.
Amaan fanxa axcuk rubne mari edde yanim, kaxxa weeqa.
Kaxxa gitittel lac mayanaay num mayana.
Meysih, num woo gitittet magexa.
Sitta elle geenim makot cabte; magaalooli yibbixeenih;
yassakaxxen num mayana.
Baaxo kafteeh, coox laqaymuume.
Lubnaan garbo kafte.
Saronuy qaxmeqe-baaxoh sugte bakarroyta tekke.
Basan rasu kee Karmel qalel yan cooxuk ayyuufi luuqa.
YALLI iyyamaa, «Away anu ugteyyo.
Away, yi nabna kee yi qande sin aybulleeyyo.
Bicat gactem kee sin taama inkih,
kafte qaysoy hebeltô xiq sinnih bis le.
Sin ufuy girah innah sin cararisele.
Baadal tan ummatta, girat carrisen bocok rade qadô-gombodih innah gacele.
«Isin allal yan maraw, anu abem wagita!
Garil yan maraw, yi cayla ixiga!» iyya.
Siyon-qalel tan dambileelat kaxxa cunxo hayte.
Yalla-maleela meysih axaxitte.
«A giray muxuq intak iyyi yalliile?
Daayiman urta girat carariyya iyyi faxa?» iyyan.
Cakkit taamitaah nummat yaabaah,
bukko kee rado niqbaah, guqul bee waah,
sinam qidim kee umaaneh abittol malisa marat angale waah,
umam abittot yan marat angale waa num fayya le arac geya.
Reebuh, num aleele waa boolot gacele.
Yakme maaqo kee yaaqube lee mawaa.
Inti siinik qaxa-le-malik ablele.
Usuk reedah elle yan baaxo kulli kabuk ambulleele.
Duma luk sugten kaxxa cunxo luk maraqtan.
«Marin baaxoh maray gabbara nek beyak yenehiyya maca abe?
Nee gibitak yen mari mayanaa?
Amo xer qarwa nek loowak yen mari maca abe?»
'yaanam axcelon.
Ahaysa woo maray kaxxiinah qubbuy axcuk yenehiyya matablan.
Isin aaxige waytaanaah edde rada waytan afat yaaba marin mara tahaysa matablan.
Siyon-qaley qiidih elle asak nenehiyya wagitay;
Yarusalaam magaalay qiidih elle asak nenehiyya wagitay.
Yarusalaamay amaanak tanihiyya namma inti siinik ablele.
Yarusalaam, siraaqay elle daabisan ikkek kate waahiyya kinni.
Tet akat mayaggiriqaay masalaca.
YALLAY Misliino le tokkel ni amo wagtele.
Mango weeqaytuy darah gexahiyya le magaala akkele.
Takkay immay kaxxa maraakib elle magexa.
YALLI ni cokmaabe; madqa isih neh yayyaaqe.
Ni malik kaa; nee waddu waytam kaa.
Isiniiy gexu duude waa markabay dagal kee siraq
edde haan akoota salacak akak tanihiyyah bis liton.
Takkay immay too waqdi mango duyyey qadad sinni ni naqboytiitik buubenno.
Iba-mali kinni-way gaba akak maraqsitay kaa duddam akak beele.
Too saaku ni marih addat biyaakita num mageytima.
Wokkel woo saaku dabaaqah sugu waa marih dambik Yalli qafu abele.

Baaxol enna 'ta doolatway, inkih yoo fanah ama!
Xayyoowaay, axcem yok ankacisa!
Baadal tan ummatey, yi yaabah ayti ucuya!
Baaxo axcem yok taabbay;
