YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyaamah, «Yarusalaam mara kee ken midir edde baysa'gidih, inni kaxxa digaala keenil ruubeyyo. Carbiiy qululuuy alluwwa kee dalka keenit ruubeyyo.
Too marak dago agabu kee labhay too digaalak raqqa 'tehiyya, sin fan amaateloonuh; nagay ken cubbussan waqdi, uma mara kinnoonum keenik abletton. Too waqdi Yarusalaam marat abe digaala celta digaala kinnim elle aaxigetton.
Abba heem akah abeh meqe sabab too saaku yok aaxigetton. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.

YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, saaru kee caxa inkim tekke saaku mali. Saaroyti caxat missoysaanam bictam kinnii?
Saaruk gersim hinnak, duyye edde takran fallakka le caxxa akak bicsaanam maay duudan?
Kafta waqdi girah urse weenik, tohoysa xiqtam mali. Hay girat qidan waqdi, buxux akak yonkommeeh, gude akak raqte saaroyti xiqtam maay le?
Dumaak girat qide'kal, sahdah xiqtam luk masuginnaay; awayay girat qideenihiyya, xiqtam luk maraqta» yok iyye.
Tonna'mmay taway YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyaamah, «Too saaroytay garboh addak irgiqqa heenih girat qideeni elle carara'nnal, Yarusalaam ummatta too bis le digaalah, ken digaaleyyo.
Naharsi girak yisillimeenih immay, away gersi girat cararelon. Anu ken digaala saaku, YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigetton.
Yol luk sugen imaan cabeeniih; tonna-leemiik baaxo keenik abur abeyyo. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.

YALLIH qangara kaadu yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Yarusalaam abteh tan umam-yabuli teetil qaddos.
Teetik intaamah, ‹YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kok iyyeemih,
« ‹Elle toobokem, Kanqaan rasuuy; abba kok Amoorâ-numuuy; ina kok Ciita deqsita marih barra.
Tooboke saaku cundub koh yargiqe num magennito; koo kaqlisa num magennito. Qasbot xagar koh uskutta heeh, xagaral saro kok hayya haa num magennito.
Tahak tu koh abaah, koh xuwaawa num magennito. Tooboke saaku kok sakkiteenih; tonna-leemiik baaxot koo qidda heenih sugen.
« ‹Anu gita gexa waqdi, isi qabalat abrakuk yoh sugte. Xagar inkih ku qabalat kok bayeh sugeh immay, rabak koo cateh.
Yaysubuken caxah innah, meqe'nnal koo qarise. Dadalteeh tembeeh kaxxa qax-maqaane bahte. Kaqooni kot keenah innah gace. Qummi-xagor kok yoobokeh yen. Takkay immay qasunuk teneeh; xagaral saro luk manannito.
« ‹Sarra aki saaku wokkek gaca waqdi, dadalteeh baxuwwa tekkem kok uble. Qasunuk kok yan xagaral inni saroh exxa koh hayya heeh, koo kiciyyom koh warseh. Tokkel kol digibeyyoomuh qahdi koh culeeh; koo abiteeh yim tekke. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya› iyye.
«Tohuk lakal xagaral luk sugte qabala kok leet kaqlissa heeh, xagar zeytit (saliidit) uskuttu koh hee.
Dilwa le kamesiy qax-meqe kot heeh; xagar meqe addaytih kabel kot hee. Qax-meqe musaan amol haysitta'gidih, koh ecee. Cariirik bicsen sartanat koo hee.
Qax-meqe bila koh heeh; gabat lakqo koh heeh, fillat dahab koh hee.
Sanat hayta dumam kee aytit hayta duyye kee amot hayta duyye koh baahe.
Mango bilay dahab kee lakqok bicseenihiyya luk ten. Talbi-qaala kee cariirik bicsen sartanay mango dilwa lehiyya luk ten. Adda meqe darok aben gaqambooy, malab kee caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti ku maaqoh sugte. Qaxah wir axcuk teneeh; tohih sabbatah malikáh innah gacte.
Kaxxam qaxa koo eymeeqeeh; tonna-leemiik litoh tan kaxxa qax-maqaaneh mango baaxol koo yoobben. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
«Takkay immay a litoh tan qaxa kee migaq-gexxo isik ubulla hayte waqdi, kol amaatinnaan numih mareyta takkem bahte.
Isi sartanak tu takkem beyya hayteh, isi aroocay qibaada elle abtahiyyat bilqah hayte. Tokkel xiiqareh-xiinah innah, kulli num lih dalwa abte. Tannah tanim takkem faxxiimak mananna.
Anu koh ecee lakqo kee dahab beyya hayteeh, lab-numih-ceeloy yaqbudeenihiyya akak bicsissa hayteeh woo ceeloh mareyta tekke.
Woo anu koh ecee dilwa le sartan bahha hayteeh, woo lab numih ceeloh bagul hayte. Anu koh ecee caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti (saliid) woo ceeloh sadgatah teceeh; anu koh ecee qaydarus wokkel sadgatah rubte.
Adda meqe darooy zeyti kee malabay anu koh eceehiyya xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh sadgata axcuk tecee. Tah intam YALLAY Mulki lehiyya.
«Yoh xalte xaylok say-urru kee lab-urru xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh sadgatah tecee. Yol luk sugte imaan cabtem koo maxiqinnaay;
yi xaylo beyya hayteh, xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyey taqbudeenihiyyah sadgatah tusguude.
A dalway edde tanihiyya, duma qunxuk ten saaku elle sugte'nna kassite koo kalteh. Qunxuk ten saakuy isi qabalat abrakuk sugtehiyya elle sugte'nna kase cinteh» iyye.
«Yoo YALLAY Mulki le kok axceemih, ‹Woyyow! Kot takku waytaamow! Ta axxul le umaanet assek wadir,
kulli gitih xaqul too duyye elle taqbude arooca hayya hayteeh;
luk sugteh tan qaxa nadaasat isik bayisse. Amaatinnaan num lih dalwitak, qaxa isik bayisseh.
Woo dalweenitih yan Masri maray cuggaaneh kok yanihiyya lih dalwa abak sugte. Dalwa abak akah sugtem, anu anqibe'gidi.
«Tonna leemiik koo digaaluuy, ku baaxoy barkat lehiyya koo waysiisuh ugteh en. Koo niqba *Filistiin maray atu abtah tan umâ-yabuli xiqe waahiyyah gabal koo hee.
Assuuriyah mara lih kaadu dalwa abte. Ken mareytá tekke'mmay, koo cayisoonu yeffereenih.
Baabelon maray badaaqat abahiyyah mareytáh sugte. Sugteh immay, too mari kaadu koo macayisinna.›
«Yoo YALLAY Mulki le kok axceemih: ‹Kaxxam walfitak, wacarriye wayta xiiqareh-xiina akah abta'nnah, wacarriyih taniimit asse.
Giti elle aninnaanih xaqul, xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyye elle yaqbuden arooca hayteeh; tokkel dalwa abte. Takkay immay abta dalwal, timixxige xiiqareh-xiina akah abta'nnah, lakqo elle mabennito.
Isi baqala cabba hayteh marin mara lih dalwa abta barrah caalatat gacte.
Duma xiiqareh-xiinah mareytit lakqo acayuk ten. Koh tu gactek isih keenih tecee. Kulli kaalibik sahda kol temeeteeh; mareytit kok takke'gidih, guqul keenih acayuk sugte.
Tonna-leemiik atu xiiqareh-xiina elle tani'nnal tan barra hinnito; rikeek tan xiiqareh-xiina kinnito. Koo faxxam matanaay, atu isih ken lakat tarde. Koh yeceen lakqo matanaay, atu sinaamah tecee. Rikeek tan kacba kinnito.›
«Tonna'mmay Yarusalaam kacbay, YALLI kok iyyam oobbey.
«YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kok iyyaamah: Sara isik kalla hayteh, isi mareytit kee woo Yalli niqba xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyey taqbudehiyyah isi xagar teceeh; too xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh sadgatah isi xaylo qidde.
Tonna-leemiik duma mareytiitih kok suge marak niqibtom kee kicintom inkih, bahha heeh foocal kok xayyoyseyyo. Too mari maraasiyya koo heele. Too waqdi oson koo elle yablen ikkel, qasunuk koo cabeyyo.
Abtah tan dalwa kee sahday qiddahiyya kok weeyyo. Abah an bagcarrah rabi digaalah koo digaaleyyo.
Ken gabat koo heeyyooh, xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyye elle aqbuduk sugte arooca kee, mareytáh koo elle luk sugen aroocay fayya le ikkel tanihiyya aggiggilelon. Xagarat lito sartan kee bila kok kalla heenih, qasunuk koo cabelon.
«Xeetit koo qidaah, seefit xagar kok kuramkuru waa mara kot ugselon.
Buxa kok carriselon; kot takku wayta digaalak agbi asseleeleqele. Tonnal abtah tan dalwa koo cabsiiseyyo. Mareytiitih dalwah mekeltah tan lakqo tonnal koo waysiiseyyo.
Tohuk lakal abah an bagcarrat xabbacooweyyooh; aysinu cabeyyooh; sahha axceyyo.
Qunxuk ten saaku koo elle abbaxuk suge inna hawwenteh. Abteh tan uma taamak gexxaamah, naqbi yot hee. Tonna-leemiik abba hayte umaaneh akah diggalsinta innah kok abe. Abba hayte uma-taama koo maxiqinnay, wadir dalwa edde osisse. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
Yalli iyyeemih, «Yarusalaamey, sahda missilah koo haysitte. Kok iyyaanamah, ‹Baxá lem inah caala› kok iyyan.
Nummah, atu isi inah baxá tekke. Ku ina isi xaylo kee baqala niqibuk ten. Ku maqanxiixiy kaadu isi baqolti kee xaylo niqbahiyyah bis lito. Ku ina Ciitâ barrak teneeh; ku abba Amoorâ numuk ten.
Barah kok naba ku maqanxáy Samaariya deqsittahiyya kee tet xaylo dabaaqah-elle-tanim, atu elle tani'kkek kilbat le kabut raaqa araca. Kok qunxa maqanxá kee dariifal tan gaandoodiy gabbi-qaxat kok raqtahiyya, migaaqah Sodom deqsitta.
Atu kaadu ken raat katatteeh; oson abak sugen uma taamat asse. Atu uma taama qimbissem qusba saaku'mmay, keeniy dumaak abak sugehiyyak lafissa hayte.
«Waara YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kinniyooh; inni migaaqal xiibita'mmay, ku maqanxá Sodom kee tet dariifal tan gaandoodi, koo kee kok dariifal tan gaandoodi abtem maabinnon.
Tet kee tet xaylo ken dudda maaqo geyyaay amaanah gacca iyyen waqdi, kaxxa kaxxiina xagarat keenik gacte. Takkay immay masaakiina kee tu sinni marah cato abak masuginnon.
Kaxxiina luk yeneeniih anu niqbiyom abak yenen. Tohih sabbatah, atu akah tuble'nnah, bayissa ken hee.
«Samaariyah tu gactek, dambik atu bahteemik garab maabinna. Teetik fula kaxxa dambit assem koo. Koo kee ken abto tittal wagga haan waqdi, oson ku garil tu abe weenih gide.
Tonna-leemiik isih abte qaybih isih lakmisetto. Ku dambi kaxxa dambi kinnuk, ku maqanxix abem kee ku qaybi tittal wagga haan waqdi, ku dambih garil ken dambi foyya. Ku maqanxix ku garil tu'qellat sinni marak loowimem abaluk, abte umaanet wacarriyaay; isih abte qaybih lakmis» iyye.
Yalli iyyeemih, «Sodom kee tet dariifal tan gaandoodiiy Samaariya kee tet dariifal tan gaandoodit barkat hayu waa ayro, Yarusalaamey, kot kaadu barkat heeyyo.
Abteemit wacarriyetto; Sodom kee Samaariya maray ku innah dambih ane waak sugehiyyal rooci aduurele.
Nammeyhaak gaddaleela akkeloonuuh; koo kee kok dariifal tan gaandoodit kaadu barkat heeyyo.
Kaxxiinitak ten saaku, Sodomul anqaasak sugte.
Abte umaane kok qaddowtaamak dumal, keenil asaaluk sugte. A saaku atu kaadu miduh elle yasuulen sahdaytó tekke. Edom kee Filistiin mari elle yasuulem koo. Ku deraafil yan mari koo bursuta.
Abteh tan umâ-yabulik gexxaamah, celta digaalah diggalsimtam kol tan. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLA» iyye.
«Yoo YALLAY Mulki le axceemih, ‹Abeyyo intem duuduse cinteeh; titta elle geynem yol makteemih sabbatah, koo celta digaalah koo digaaleyyo.
Yoh tu gactek, qunxuk ten saaku rihimih koh cule qahdi kol mamaka.
Kaxxa maqanxix kee qunxa maqanxix xayloh innal kol gacisu waa saaku, duma abtem kassa haak wacarriyetto. Duma haysinne bical exceh suge weemiiy, away kok axcem, ken ku xaylo abeyyom koh warsa.
Ko'lih haysite qahdi wadir aqusbuuseyyo. Too saaku abba hayte umaane koh cabeyyo. Koh tu gactek, abba hayte umaane isik aaxaguk tut mayabta. Too saaku YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigetto. Ahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.

YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih,
«Bani-adantow, Israayil marah anu taway kok axcem ceelallol keenih waris.
Keenik intaamah, ‹YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik iyyaamah: Dumah yan saaku kaxxa qawiy nabam qaxa-meqe xagor leeh kaxxa galwa lehiyya tene, iyyen. Ayrok teena too qawi Lubnaan fanah haaddeeh; tokkel *sarid-caxah amol nookteeh sariidik ludda tiggile, iyyen. Sarrak woo qawi woo caxah ludda bahha hayteeh mango badaaqat elle aban baaxo fanah beyteeh; tellemmo aba mari mangom elle yan magaalal hayte.
Sarrak Israayil baaxok dariyyu beyya hayteeh; mango lee elle taniih caxa nagay elle taabuke aracal daabisse.
Taaxige dariyyi qinab caxa yekkeeh; kaxxam fayya maxcinnay, elle yani'kkel baxacah gexeeh, ambuk maacise. Ludwa akak, gubaak taaxige qawi elle tani'kke fan fayya 'te; ramiida akak baaxot addah gexxe. Mango ludwa kee ayyuufa bahte.
« ‹Tohuk kalah kaadu, kaxxa galwa kee mango xagor le qawiy masu nabahiyya temeete. Taaxige qinab caxay toobokehiyyah ramiida qusbih yemeete qawi fanah rubte. Ayyuufa kaadu woo qawi fan rubte. Toh akah abtem, a qawiy temeetehiyya mango leey duma elle tooboke aracal deedaltahiyya isih aceelem tekkele.
Takkay immay dumaak elle toobokem, lee le aracay ayyuufi nagay teetih elle yaabukeeh, meqe xaylo xaltu elle dudda aracak tene, iyyen› keenik inxic» yok iyye.
«Keenik intaamah, ‹YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik iyyaamah: A qinab rabe waah, dadalam maay duudaa? Naharal suge qawi ragidiik kaa masiiba'nnaa? Tooboke caxak xaylo maluuqusa'nnaa? Ludwa akak mayaggiggilaay ayyuufa akak makafsa'nnaa? A caxa ragidik siiba'gidih mango qandeh faxxintam maliiy, mango marah faxxintam mali.
Ubkak toobokeh immay mango saaku kafe'kal maay sugelee? Ayrô-mawqak yamaate caacay tet yaagure way, malaqaymumta'nnaa? Woo elle tani ikkel makafta'nnaa?› siinik iyya» iyye.
YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Ama yabti-cina-leela a ceelalloy baahehiyyak maqna yaaxigeenim keh ken esserey. Baabelon malik Yarusalaam fanah amma 'yeh, malik kee kay maray kay gubal abbootan luk sugehiyya Baabelon fan beem keenih waris.
Malikih ramad le num bahha heeh, kaa make waamah kaa xiibissa heeh xagana kaa'lih heeh, malik aracat kaa cabe. Mango makaaban gabat bee.
Toh akah abem, woo baaxoh mari wadiriik akah uguugute waah, kaa'lih haysiten bica kaal akah make waana'gidik ten.
Takkay immay Yuudâ-malik qeebi kaat abuh ugteeh, Masri malikih farmo ruube. ‹Mango qaskar kee faaris yoh rub› 'yaanam kaah ruube. Tonna'mmay yakkaleh ikkal elle yakkale'nnal, annah tanim aba num yasillimu maay duudaa? Yalla-kee-xagana make num maay yasillimee?» iyye.
«Waara YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kinniyooh, inni migaaqal xiibita'mmay, a malik Baabeloonul rabele. Macaay inteenik, malik kaa abtem, Baabelon malikiiy; kaa'luk abe xiiba kee xagana kaal makeemih sabbatah rabele.
Baabelon mari magaalat maroh xissen gasoosak amo kora'gidih mango mara qidaana'gidih, burtak eded bicseloonuuh megdebih edde gacan boodooda bicselon. Too waqdi Masrik agiirah tan qaskar tamaateemih, qeebil kaah tu maxiqta.
Abe xiiba kee Yalla-kee-xaganay heehiyya makeemih sabbatah, rike asillimi kaa mahaanay kaa qidelon» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kaadu iyyeemih, «Waara Dagelta kinniyooh inni migaaqal xiibita'mmay, yi migaaqal abeh yan Yalla-kee-xagana makeemih sabbatah, kaa digaaleyyo.
Sahdah admoh qidan oflo kaah qideyyooh, too oflot kaa abbixeyyo. Baabelon fan kaa beeyyooh, tokkel kaa digaaleyyo. Toh kaal akah baahu waam, imaan yol heeh masuginna.
A carbit kaak mango qaskaray agiirah tanihiyya edde rabele. Rabak raqtem kulli kabul fixixih gexele. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLA kinnim too saaku aaxigelon» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyaamah, «Anu innih woo xexxaarin sariidik amok ruqa irgiqqa heeh beeyyooh; amo xer qalel daabiseyyo.
Israayil rasul tan amo xer qalel daabiseyyo. Tokkel dadleleeh, ludwa baaheleeh xaylo xalele. Kaxxam qaxa baahele. Mango kimbir amol teetik silaalitele.
Baaxol yan coox inkih YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigele. Xer caxa targiqeeh; ux caxa tayxeerem yoo. Anxaxinuk sugte caxa kafsaah; kafinuk sugte caxa anxaxxoosem yoo. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLA. Abeyyo excem aba Dagelta kinniyo» iyye.

YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«A Israayil rasul kulli way edde yaabaanaah missilah haysiteenih yaniinim maca maxcooy?
‹Qeero le qinabih xaylo tokmem xaleena'mmay;
qeero akak tammossem xaylo›
iyyaanak, tah macaay akah iyyaanam?
«Waara YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kinniyooh; inni migaaqal xiibita'mmay, tahaysa ta maxcot qagitah ken matablan.
Kulli numih rooci edde yanim yi gaba. Xaleena kee xaylo rooci edde yanim, yi gabah adda. Dambit ase num isih raba» iyye.
Yalli kaadu qagseh iyyeemih, «Maqaane le numuy amaanat leeh gitah tanim abahiyya yen kaa tekkek,
Israayil mari yaqbude xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyye mayaqbuda. Woo duyye elle yaqbudeeni'gidih heen aroocal, sadgatah yusguuden saqih cado mayakma. Marin agabut fido mafaxa; wasaktut tan barrat fido mafaxa.
Sahda maduquurusa. Marin cakki mabeya. Lakqo abuuduh sinaamah yecee waqdi damaanatah luk raaqa duyye, abuuduh been duyye kaah gacsan waqdi, beeh suge duyye gacsa. Satqita mara yaskameeh, qarrade mara sarsah.
Abuuduh kaak been lakqo kaah gacsan waqdi ossotina edde mafaxa. Baatilit maasa. Yoome mara qadaalatal mekla.
Yi amri duudusaah, yi xintol tanim aba. Cakki bagul tanim tannah yan numuuy; waarele. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
«Takkay immay ta num qamallih yan baxa yelleeh, too baxi sinam buubeeh, sinam qideeh,
isi abba abe weem abeeh, xeet kee coox elle yaqbuden aracal sadgatah qidan duyyeh cado yokmeeh, marin agabut fido faxeeh,
masaakiina yudlumeeh, sahda buubeeh, abuuduh tu kaak bee num damaanatah kaal cabem gacse weeh, gabat bicsen duyyey Yalla 'yeenih yaqbudeenihiyyah qibaadah heen arooca gexeeh, duyye yuqbudeeh,
abuuduh yecee lakqo gacsan waqdi ossotina edde faxek, ta num maay waarelee? Mawaara. Ta axxul le uma taamat aseemih sabbatah rabele. Too rabi usuk isih isil baahe raba deqsita.
«A num kaadu isi uddurul lab-baxa xale kaa tekkeeh, kay abba abah yan uma-taama abalih kay abto kataate weeh,
Israayil mari yaqbude duyyey gabat bicseenihiyya aqbude weeh, woo duyyeh qibaadah heen aroocal yasguuden saqih cado akme weeh, marin agabut fido faxe weeh,
faxe num adlume weeh, faxe numih duyye buube weeh, abuuduh tu kaak le mari damaanatah kaal cabe duyye woo abuuduh been duyye kaah gacsan waqdi gacseeh, satqita mara yoskomeeh, qarrada mara sarseeh,
baatilit ase weeh, abuuduh kaak been lakqo gacsan way ossotina elle faxe weeh, yi xintol tanim abeeh, yi amri duudusek, kay abba abe dambih usuk marabaay waarele.
Kay abbah tu gactek, sahda duquurusakaay sahda buubak suge. Baatil abak sugeeh, tonna-leemiik isih baahe dambih isih rabele.
«Hay, baxi abba baahe umaaneh akah diggalsime waam macaay intan siini? Kay baxi gitah tanim abakaay, anu ‹Ab› kaak excem abak, yi xintol tanim duudusak suge. Tonna leemiik usuk waarele ikkal, abba baahe dambih maraba.
Rabi akah yaguudem, dambit asa mara. Abba baxi baaheemih madiggalsimaay, baxi abba baaheemih madiggalsima. Meqem abite num meqem geyaah, umam abe numuh umam sugta.
«Uma num dambi abitto cabba heeh, anu aba axcem abeeh, yi xinto inxicca 'tam kataatak, amaanat leeh gitah tanim abek, tonnal marabaay waarele.
Dumah abeh suge dambi kaah cabeyyo. Gitak tanim abeemih sabbatah waarele.
Uma num rabaamah, anu maa rufto geyam siinit celta? Yoo ruffu haytam, dambik toobitaah waara num ableemi. Tah intam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
«Meqe num abak suge maqaane cabbaay, uma mari abak suge umaane kee taamat cule kaa tekkek, tonnal waaru waam maay takkalen? Waar hinna'mmay, woo duma abe maqaane kaak baata. Luk suge imaan cabak, yok yexxeereeh dambit aseemih sabbatah, rabele.
«Wonnal, ‹Yalli qadaalat leh mayan› intan. Israayil maraw, ankacca yoo haay, anu abam gitah ane waytam takkaleenih immay, gitak ane sinnim sin taama.
Meqe num abak suge maqaane cabba heeh uma taamat gaca saaku rabe kaa tekkek, akah rabem isih abe uma taamak tan teeti.
Uma num edde suge umaane cabba heeh, amaanat leeh gitah tanim abak, meqe taama fan yuduure kaa tekkek, isi rooci catah.
Abak sugem umaamaay dambi kinnim yismiteh, edde suge uma taamat raaqe kaa tekkek, marabay waarele.
Hay Israayil ummatey, isin, ‹Yalli qadaalat leh mayan› intan. Israayil maraw, ankacca yoo haay, anu abam gitah ane waytam takkaleenih immay, gitak ane sinnim sin taama.
«Away yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik axceemih: kulli numuluuy abba hee umaanek abba heeh gidel kaal ackumeyyo. Tonna'mmay edde tanin dambik uduura. Abtan dambit isinni mabaysina.
Edde tanin uma taamak uduuraay qusba niya kee afqado haysita. Maabinay yi gabat isinni maqidina.
Anu nummaak siinik axceeh, anu sahdâ raba kicna Dagelta hinniyo. Toobitaay dambik endebba» iyye.

Yalli, Israayilik namma malikih nadaamah yan weeqa yok ‹Aba› iyye.
Ku ina gibdi moltak tene.
Isi baxa elle qarissem,
qeebi le lubookah adda.
Baxak teenay qarissehii
admoh elle gexu waa'nna
isi gabal kaa barisse.
Too lubak sahda qidak yen.
Sahda kaak too xaagu toobbeeh
xagen boodot kaa yibbixen.
Sanat birta kaak hayya heen;
Masri fan kaa hirriigisen.
Kay ina kay qambaaliyyak
niya kalla haytam fanah
mango uddur raksitak sugte.
Qunxa xaylok aki baxa
bahha hayteeh kaa qarisse.
Kaxxa lubak kaa abteh ten.
Yembeeh kaxxa lubak yekke.
Lubooka lih gexam baahe;
sahda qideh yakmem baahe.
Megdebwa inkih yiggiggile;
magaalooli abur abeh yen.
Kaak gardo yaabbeh yen mari
elle yani'kkel cunxite.
Ummatta kay admoh gexxuh
yakkeenimik titta geyte.
Kulli kabuk gaabooweenih,
kaa edde yabbixeeni'gidih,
kaxxa sabak kaah qiden.
Dagen boodot kaa yibbixen.
Sanat birta kaak hayya heen;
birti qarit kaa hayya heen;
Baabelon malik fan kaa been.
Israayil fan 'kah gexe waah,
kay gardo antaabbe wayta'gid,
casbik addat kaa yoxeenih.
Buyyik xaqul tan qinabay
xaylo xaltah bis luk tenem,
ku inak teneh, teetik tene.
Mango lee geyteemih taagah,
ayyuufak mangom luk teneeh
xaylok kaadu mangom xalte.
Ludwa akak kaxxam digga le;
malik caxxa akak yirgiqen.
A caxa kaxxam tenbeh ten,
qamburre fan guftam faxxe.
Mango luud kee xexxar teetik
kulli numih inti tuble.
Yallak naqabuk gexxaamah,
bagcarritak suge mari
buxuxuk sibba tet heeniih;
wonnah baaxot tet qideeni.
Bacarih yan rasih kabuk
amaatuk sugeh yan caacay
xaylo teetik kafissa hee.
Tet ludway maqar luk tene
bututtukku teetik inte;
kafteeh girâ-boco tekke.
Away kaadu Yallih gabak
bacarih tan baaxoh addal,
lee sinnih yan bakarroytal
tet daabiseeniih toobokeh.
Caxak ludwak tewqe gira
xaylo teetik selli hayte.
Malik caxxa akak aben luud
away mayan; maraaqinnon;
'yaanam axcuk yen. Nabi Yacedkel tama weeqay nadaamah yanihiyya yuktubeeh; kay mari mango waqdi abak yenen.

Seewah nee edde been malcinhaytô sanatak konoyhaytoh alsak tabanhaytoh ayrot, Israayil-idoola Yallih fayxi yoo esseraana'gidih, amma 'yeenih foocal yok daffeen.
Too waqdi YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya axcem keenih waris» yok iyye. Keenik intaamah, «Isin akah temeeteenim, yi fayxi essertaana'gidi inna? Anu waara Dagelta kinniyooh, fayu yok essertaanam siinik mafaxa. Tah intam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
Yalli yok iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, a maral cokmi ab. Cokmih tuk teena keenik inxic. Ken kaxxa abbobti abak sugte uma taama ken kassis.
Keenik intaamah: YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik iyyaamah, Anu Israayil mara doore saaku, qahdi keenih cule. Masri rasul inni ken uybulle. Keenik exceemih: ‹Yaqkuubuk rade maraw, anu YALLAY sin Dagelta kinniyo› keenik exce.
Tohuk lakal, ‹Masrik eyyeqqa sin heeh, woo elle sugten baaxok tayse baaxoy niqmatak tanihiyyay ikoytah siinih acayu waahiyya fan sin beeyyo'mmay,
ama xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyey taqbudeenihiyya wonnah baaxot qida› keenik exceeh; ‹Sin Dagelta yook, Masri mari yalla axcuk yaqbude duyye maqbudinaay nadaasa isinni maabina› keenik exce.
Takkay immay yi yaabat carra mahannoonuuy; anu excem mankacisinnon. Qiday caba keenik exce gabat bicsen duyyey yaqbudeenihiyya macabinnon. Woo Masri marak kaxxih gabat bicsen duyye aqbuduk raaqeeniih, caba keenik exceemih macabinnon. Tonna-leemiik Masri elle yanin saakuuk yi naqbi le'nna ken aybulleem faxxa hee.
Takkay immay addal akak sugen marih foocal, ‹Masrik amaanah sin ayyaaqeyyo› 'yaanamal xagana keenih culeh suge. Tonna-leemiik, inni migaaqih taagah inni naqabu keenil oobisaamak wadir eedeh.
«Masrik ken eyyeeqeeh, bacarih tan baaxo fan ken baahe.
Duuduse num waar akak geya'gidih, amri keenil oobiseeh, xintoh haysitoonu waan madqa keenih ruube.
Ken dambik taahir abtam yoo ken Dagelta kinnim yaaxigeeni'gidiiy, tohih asta keenih takke'gidih, ‹Sabti ayro mataamitina› keenik exce.
Keenih tu gactek, bacarih tan baaxol sugen saaku kinni-way, anu aba keenik axcem cinak sugen. Yi amri kee yi xintoy duuduse marah waar teceehiyya cinak sugen. Sabti ayro xaguraanam inkinnah cineenih sugen. Tonna-leemiik too saaku yi naqbi le'nna ken aybulleem faxxa heeh, too bacarih tan baaxol elle ken baysam faxeh suge.
Takkay immay woo ken beyah yoo yuble marih foocal, Yalli ken bayseh 'yaanam innit cabam mafaxinniyo. Tonna-leemiik, inni migaaqih taagah inni naqabu keenil oobisaamak wadir eedeh.
Tohu immay too bacarih tan baaxol sugen saaku, can kee malab darah elle gexa baaxoy taysehiyyay ikoytah keenih eceeh sugehiyya keenil kalitaamal xiibite.
Toh akah abem, xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyye aqbuduk, anu keenil oobise amri cineeniih, keenih oobise xinto kataatoonu cineeniih, sabti ayroh massakaxxa cineenimih keenik abe.
Inkitanuuk ken baysam duudak ene'mmay, bacarih tan baaxol ken baysam mafaxinniyo. Keenih xuwaaweh.
«Ken xayloy bacaril tenek exceemih, ‹Ama sin abbobti kataatak sugte gabak bicsen ceelo makataatina; ken xinto kaadu makataatina. Xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh ceelot, isinni nadaasa maabina.
Anu YALLAY sin Dagelta kinniyooh; yi amri duudusaay, yi xintol tanim aba.
Anu YALLAY sin Dagelta kinni taaxigeeni'gidiiy tohih asta siinih takke'gidih, sabti ayro taamitaanamak xaggursuma. Too ayro yi qibaadak kalihim maabina› exce.
«Takkay immay ken xaylo kaadu yi yab cinaanam bahte. Yi amri kee yi xintoy duuduse numuh waar teceehiyya cineenih. Sabti ayro nadaasa aben. Too saaku kaadu woo bacarih tan baaxol inni naqabu keenil oobiseh ken baysam faxe.
Takkay immay, Israayil mara Masrik ayyaaqih yoo yuble mango baaxoh marih garil, inni migaq darraqoysam mafaxiyyooy; tohih sabbatah, ken baysaamak raaqeh.
Tohuk kalah bacaril elle anih, ummat addat fixixih ken ruubaamal, aaxige waan marih fanat ken fixixisaamal xiibiteh suge.
Toh akah abem, yi madqa cinak sugeeniih, yi amri maaqilak sugen. Sabti ayroy mataamitina keenik exce, taamitak sugen. Ken abbobti aqbuduk sugte xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh qibaadat gacen.
Too waqdi waar akak gee waan amri kee xintoh xiina mara ken abe.
Isinni xaylok naharsi-xaylo, umâ-yabulih xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh qibaadah arac sadgatah baahah ken abalih, yanoonay ken axcuk suge. Toh keenik akah abak sugem, abeenimik xagar keenik wacarriya'gidiiy ken Dagelta dibuk yoo kinnim yaaxigeeni'gidi.
«Hay, bani-adantow, yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kok axcem keenih waris. Ken kaxxa abbobti tohuk kalah imaan sinnat yoo elle xaafen tiya tan.
Duma ken abbobtih cule xagana duudusa'gidih, woo ikoytah keenih aceeyyo exce baaxo fan ken bee. Takkay immay too baaxol qale able kee ayyuufa le caxa yablen waqdi, tokkel sadgat abaanam baahen. Qaydarus qeeriseeniih, qinabak bicsen kamri kaadu woo aroocal sadgatah baahen. Tonnah abak bagcarra yot culsen.
Anu too waqdi, ‹A fayya le aroocay gexxaanahiyya macah gexxan arooca?› keenik exce. Too arooca tohuk wadir fayya le arooca deqsitak raqte» iyye.
Tonna leemiik Israayil marak intaamah: «YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik iyyaamah, ‹Isin kaadu sin abbobti abak sugte uma-taama macah abtaanaah; isinni nabsi nadaasat macah culsaanah? Oson aqbuduk sugen xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh lakat macah tarden?
A saaku kinni way too duma sin abbobti akah abak sugga 'te innah, too bis le sadgat abtaanaah, keenik kaxxih isinni xaylo sadgatah girat carrissan. Tonnal isinni nabsi nadaasa abtan. Tannah tanim abba hayteenik sarra, wadir yi fayuh esseroh yol tamaaten. Waara YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kinniyooh inni migaaqal xiibita'mmay, tahak wadir tu yoo esseri sin maha.
« ‹Isin aki rasih maray xeet kee coox yaqbudehiyyah innah gactaanam faxxan. Toh inkinnah matakka.
Waara YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kinniyooh inni migaaqal xiibita'mmay, abeh an bagcarrah gaba digga siinil heeyyom sin aysixxige. Yi milkih gacetton.
Ama fixixih elle tanin baaxok sin bahha heeh inki aracah sin gacisu waa saaku, yi gabay qande le kee, abeh an bagcarra sin aybulleeyyo.
Gersi ummatta aalle wayta bacari fan sin baahu waa saaku, namma inti siinik abalih siinil ackumeyyo.
Masrik xaqul yan Siinah bacaril sin kaxxa abbobtil akah uckume innah, siinil ackumeyyo› 'yaanam iyye YALLAY Mulki lehiyya.
‹Gaba nagay digga siinil heeyyooh; yo'lih hayten bica akah duudussan innah siinik abeyyo.
Yi yab cinaah anu axcem abe waa mara sin fanak ayyaaqeyyo. Away elle yanin baaxok ken ayyaaqeyyo'mmay, ahaysa Israayil rasu aduuri ken maha. Too saaku YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigetton› 'yaanam iyye.»
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kaadu iyyeemih, «Taway Israayil maraw, xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyye taqbudeenim ableh ani'mmay, tamahat geytaanam ablettoonuk abbaasita. Tamahah, gexak teneeniik, yi amri duudusettoonuuh, xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh abtan sadgootak aadetton. Yi migaaqay taahirik yanihiyya nadaasa mabtan.
Yi qaley taahirik tanih amol, Israayil maraw, yoo aqbudetton. Fayya le Israayil qaleh amol, Israayil mari inkih yoo aqbudelon. Too saaku sin assakooteyyooh, sadgat kee muxxo le mattaco kee taahirik tan acway gabat bahtoonu waytaanahiyya siinik oggoleyyo.
Isin fixixih elle sugten baaxok sin eyyeqqaay titta fanah sin gacissa heek sarra, isin teceen sadgatay yoo ruffa heehiyya akah oggole'nnah, sin oggoleyyo. Sin addal abu waamat, gersi baaxol yan mari taahirik anim yok aaxigele.
Israayil rasuy sin kaxxa abbobtih eceeyyo exceh sugehiyya fanah sin gacisu waa saaku, YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigetton.
Abba hayten umâ-yabuli, too saaku siinih ambulleele. Isinni nadaasa elle abten inni, too saaku siinih ambulleele. Abba hayten uma taama kassittoonu waytan waqdi, isinni nabsi inqibba heetton.
Inni migaaqih dacayrih abah an abtol, YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigetton. Macaay inteenik, sin uma taama kee abto elle tani'nnal sin digaale weem, yok too saaku aaxigetton. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, gabbi-qaxa wagga heey; gabbi-qaxat takku waytaamat yab. Gabbi-qaxat raqta garbot takku waytam waris.
Gabbi-qaxat raqta garbok, yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya inxicca axcem waris. Intaamah, ‹Gira ruubam faxa. Too gira ku addal enna 'ya coox, kafin coox yakkuu, uyni coox yakku, carrisele'mmay, num tet mabargusa. Gabbi-qaxaak xabba haanam baaxo carrisak kilbat le kabu fan amaatele. Too girah huuri num macaba.
A gira akah baruge waytam, yooy YALLAH yani ruube gira kinnim, sinam inkih aaxigele› inxic» yok iyye.
Takkay immay, anu too waqdi, «YALLAW, Mulki le Dageltaw, a mari, ‹Sugay, a num kulli way addah af le yaabat ne'lih akah yaabam macaay?› yok iyyaanak, ta farmo bey yok maxcin» kaak exce.

YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Yarusalaam ummat qibaada elle abta aroocat takku waytaamat yab. Yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya axcem keenih waris; Israayil rasuh garci kal.
Intaamah: YALLI, ‹Anu naqboytah kok aniih, seef sibak siibeh kol aniih; gitat yan mara kee umeynit tittak baxse'kal filla keenik kaleyyo.
Seef sibak eyyeqqa heeh, gabbi-qaxak xabba heeh kilbat le kabuh amma 'yaanam fan, uma num kee meqe num tittak meexe'kal bayseyyo.
Yoo YALLI siibeh an seef ahaysa sibah gacse waam, kulli num yok aaxigele› iyya.
«Tonna'mmay, Bani-adantow, sinam koo elle table'kkel, xiiroonuk rade numih innah gac. Kaxxam tu edde toome numih innah gac.
‹Macaay akah gomomtaah tu edde toome num akah celtam?› kok iyyan waqdi, keenik intaamah, ‹Tu edde toome num akah ceelam, sarra yamaatu waa uma xaagih sabbata› keenik inxic. Woo xaagi yamaatu waa saaku, afqado keenik cunxoh dub axcele. Gaba keenik axaxitele. Niyâ xiglo ken abbixeleeh, gulub keenik kadiidimitele. Wakti xayyooweh yaniih xayuk akkele. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, takku waytaamat yab. Yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kok axceemit yab.
Af leh yan siibot yan seefi
arbaqeeniih samliseenih.
Kaa abak yenen arbaqiyyat
sinam qidimih bical yan.
Kaat abeenih yanin duugoh
cankaxi innah liliq iyya.
Yi marak maabina 'yeeniih
digaalooli keenit tekkeeh;
tohuh akah maaduurinnon.
Ruffu 'yaanam gaba kalteh.
Seef qidimih duugol yaniih,
arbaqiyyak gaba kale.
Kay duugok gaba kaleenih;
ummat edde qida'gidih,
qida numih gabal heelon.
Bani-adantow, weeqaay, boogis.
A seef bical akah yanim,
yi mara kee ken abbobti
sela'gidiiy qida'gidi.
Yi mara kee ken abbobtih
qaagitaanam maraaqinnak,
boogew inxic; woyyow inxic.
Yi ummat agirribuk anyo.
Uma gita cabe weenik
tamah keenil baahu waah an.
Tahat yabtam YALLAY Mulki lehiyya.
«Bani-adantow, gaba uguraay takku waytaamat yab. Seef sahdat fiiruk geerah radele. A seef, sahda qidu waa seefiy mango kabuk keenit amaatuk ken yarciidu waahiyya.
Yi ummatat cunxo qidu waa seefi. Cankaxi innah bixiq iyya seefiy sahdah qidimih bical yanihiyyah gabat, a magaalat qawwalayla ruubam faxa.
Af le seefik anu axceemih, ‹Af le seefow, migdak gural ufkunay irgiggiq. Elle afkuninnaan kabul irgiq.›
Anu kaadu gaba aagureyyooh, naqabuk xamacca axceyyo. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLA» iyye.
YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Baabelon malik seef gabat luk edde gexu duuda namma gita fiiris. Woo namma giti akak ugtam, inki baaxo. Too namma giti elle yangale ikkel, astah coox soolis. Malik yamaatu waa waqdi akah yaaxige innah, too cooxuk caxxak teeni Rabba deqsitta magaalay Qammon deqsita mari addal akak yanihiyya fanah esces. Aki caxxa kaadu Yuudâ-rasul tan Yarusalaam magaalay kaxxa gidaara lehiyya fan esces.
Baabelon malik giti elle yangale ikkel, astah soolisen cooxih xaqul sollu axcele. Elle gexa kabu yaaxige'gidih, saami-caxxah gaysê-baxa qideleeh; Yallih aftok yaqbude duyyek, maca abam tayse axcuk, fayu essereleh, sadgatah qiden lactih tiro wagtele.
Migdi gabat Yarusalaam 'yaanamih asta elle tan gaysê-baxa heele. Too waqdi, ‹Tet gidaarwa edde taggalu wayta gutqeyna bicisaay, qeebil tirtirisu waa mara bical hayisa. Culmeyna edde taggalu wayta gutqeyna xayyoosa. Ballaaqe tittak bagul hayisak eded bicisa. Megdebih edde gacan boodo bicisa› 'yaanam axcele.
Israayil mari, tah nummah net takku waytaama, 'yaanam maxaccinnon. Toh akah kinnim, duma aben bical amo muquk yeneenimih sabbata. Takkay immay ah keenih akah warsam, aben dambi kassitaana'gidiiy antixibbixe loonum naharal elle yeexegeenih sugaana'gidi.
Hay, taway yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik axceemih, ‹Abba hayten dambi siinik qaddooweh. Umeynit kinnitoonum sinam inkih siinik teexege. Abba haytan abtol dambileela kinnitoonum tamixxigeh. Tohuk gexxaamah cokmih xayyoowetton. Naqboytit gabal sin heeyyo.›
«Uma-taama kee nadaasat baye Israayil abbaw, ellecabol digaala kot edde takku wayta wakti xayyooweh.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyaamah, ‹Qumaamat kal. Dardaarinni kalabta kal. Ahaysa dumih inni gaba kaleh; masaakiina abbootan geeleeh; abbobtih suge mari gaca mara akkelon.
Baati temeeteh! Finqi yemeeteh! Ahaysa akah tani'nna bayseyyo. Takkay immay too baati, dardaarinnah doore num yamaatem fanah sugele. Usuk yamaatu waa saaku, too dardaarinna kay gabal heeyyo› 'yaanam iyya.
«Bani-adantow, takku waytaamat yab. Ama Israayil mara xaafa Qammon marak, yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya axcem, keenih waris. ‹Baysa seef bical yan! Qiduuy cankaxi innah bixiq iyyuh, kaa duugeenih yanin.
Tableenim deedala wacyi. Akkele intaanam diraaba ikkal takkem hinna. Umeynit kinniton; uma taama sinimi. Ellecabo digaala siinit takkuh, kabba 'teh tan. Filla siinik edde yargiqoonu waan seef yan.
Seef le sibah gacisa. Elle tooboken baaxol siinil ackumeyyo.
Yi naqabu siinil oobisu waa waqdi, kaak yawqe girah huuri le inna abletton. Racmattak tifa sinniih, umaane abaanamak meysite sinni marih gabal sin heeyyo.
Girat sin bayselon. Qabal siinik sin baaxoh addal caxitele. Wadiriik sin kassita mari maraaqa. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLA› » iyye.

YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, a sahda qida mari kibuk elle yan Yarusalaam magaalal cokmi ab. Cokmih tuk teena teetik inxic. Is abba hayte umam-yabuli teetih waris.
Teetik intaamah: YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kok iyyaamah, ‹Isi marak mangom qiddeeh; xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh qibaadat isi nabsi nadaasa abteemih sabbatah, edde baatu wayta wakti xayyooweh.
Sahdat abte qidimik gexxaamah, umeena tekke. Xeet kee cooxuk bicisse duyyey taqbudehiyyah sabbatah, nadaasa is abte. Tonna-leemiik edde baatu wayta wakti xayih. Inkinnah kaxxam xayi. Tohih sabbatah baadal tan ummatta kee doolat elle anqassa sahdayto koo abeyyo.
Gitak tewqeemih sabbatah, xer ikke kee xayi ikkel enna 'ya mari inkih, qunxa intit koo ableleeh; kol asuulelon.
Israayil abbobtiy ku addal tanihiyya, abbootan loonum isinnik abaluk, ummat qidan.
Yarusalaamey, isi xaleena yassakaxxe num ku addal mayana. Marin baaxoh maray addal kok yani duquurussa. Gubun kee qayxiixa tadlume.
Taahirik tan qibaadah caagid elle aban arooca maxagurta. Sabti ayro maxagurta.
Yarusalaamey, ku addal yan marak garab, sahda qidsiisa'gidih diraabat yaaba. Marak garab kaadu xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh sadgatah qiden saqih cado yakmen. Marak garab dalwah abtot agxita.
Marak garab abbah agabu lih xiina. Marak garab kaadu wasaktut yan agabut fido faxa.
Marak garab cuggaaneh keenik yan marih agabu lih xiina. Marab garab isi xayloh agabut fido faxa. Garab kaadu abba ken lih le maqanxiixit fido faxa.
Ku addal yan marak garab, lakqo akah ucuyya haan waqdi, qida iyyen mara qida. Marak garab abuuduh yeceeh yan lakqot gacsal ossotina faxa. Isinni cuggaaneh lakqo dulmih beyan. Ku mari yoo hawweeneh yan. Tahat yabtam, yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya› teetik inxic.
«Yarusalaamey, sahdat abta bukko kee qidiyyah abeh an naqabuk gexxaamah, gaba kol heeyyo.
Anu koo digaalu waa saaku gaba yot maay gacsetto? Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya; excem duudusa Dagelta kinniyo.
Ku mara fixixih marin baaxo kee aaxige waan marih addat baxciseyyo. Uma-taama koo cabsiiseyyo.
Marin mari qawratak koo qidele. Atu too waqdi YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigetto» iyye.
YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Israayil mari yot haam mali. Ta mari, lakqo girat yasiffiyen waqdi, nacaas kee dingo kee birtay baaxot qidaanahiyyah gide yol yanin.
Tonna-leemiik keenik intaamah: YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik iyyaamah, ‹Tu xiqe sinni duyyeh gideh yol taniinik, takkeenimik sittat Yarusalaam fan sin baaheyyo.
Lakqooy nacaas kee birta yasiffiyeeni'gidih girat akah diyaayisan innah, yi bagcarra tonnal sin diyaayisele.
Gaabossa sin heeh inni naqabu siinil oobiseyyooh, magaalah addal elle sin carriseyyo.
Lakqo girat akah diyayta'nnah, Yarusalaam addal diyaayettoonuuh; too saaku yi naqbi le'nna abletton› keenik inxic» iyye.
YALLIH qangara kaadu yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Yuudâ-baaxok intaamah: ‹Yi naqabih sabbatah, atu taahirik ane wayta baaxoy rob elle rade waahiyya tekke› inxic.
Too baaxol tan abbobti, qiden saqih amol garadda lubookah bis lon. Ummatta uma qidimih qiden. Lakqo yellekiiy duyye yellek, keenit macabaanay keenik beyaanah. Oson sahdat aban qidimih, mango agbi gubuunuh raaqe.
Seeka yi xinto intam mabtaay, taahirik tan qibaadah caagid elle aban arooca maxaguran. Caraamak tanim kee calaalak tanim ummatah mawarsan. Sabti ayro maxaguran. Tonna leemik Israayil mari yoo mayassakaxxan.
Israayil abbobti, barugi amol tongoorowe suulay mariiy kabuk akak yakmeh innah abitan. Gita maleh gaddalitaanamih fayxih sahda qidan.
Nabuwwa qari irok noorat yaskute marih innah, ta umaaney takkehiyya yastureenih; able ween wacyi nubleh iyyaanaah, akke waytu waytam akkele iyyan. Toh Yallak geyne xaagu iyyan. Yoh tu gactek, anu tu keenik maxacciyo.
Baaxol yan mari kaadu, sahda duquurusakaay duyye keenik buuba. Masaakiina kee tu maleelat xukkutaanah. Allî-baaxoh maray addal keenik yanihiyyah cakki mayaaxigan.
Abeh an bagcarrah baaxo baysaamak dumal, magaala edde cata'gidih maroh sugte gaso xisaah woo gasoy tiddigillehiyyah garil soola num gorrise'mmay weeh.
Tonna-leemiik, abeh an bagcarra keenil oobiseyyo. Abba heen umaanek gexxaamah, inni balat ken bayseyyo. Tahat yabtem yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.

YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, dumah yan saaku inki ina le namma maqanxá sugte.
Too namma maqanxá qunxuk ten saaku Masril sugeeniih; too Masriy elle sugeenihiyyal, angu keenik soocaarak, bikiri qunxih keenik kalla heenih, sarrak xiiqareh xiina yekkeenih sugen.
Keenik barah naba maqanxá migaaqah Ohola deqsitak ten. Ohola, Samaariya deqsitta magaala kinni. Qunxa maqanxá Oholiba deqsitak teneeh, is kaadu Yarusalaam magaala kinni. Anu ken nammayal rihimeeh, xaylo yoh xalen.
Ohola yi nikaacat anih, dalwa abak sugteeh; Assuuriyah marih kacani kaxxam tet yibbixe. Too maray is kacanuh akah rabak tenehiyya, sartanah qaskar saray qasdiiminit yeneeniih, baaxoh abbobti kee qaskar abbootan luk yenen. Too mari furrayniino kee qax-maqaane luk yeneeniih, faaris amok qeebi abta labhak yenen.
Ohola Assuuriyah marak inkih mareytá tekkeeh; tet dalwa, Assuuriyah mari xeet kee cooxuk bicissa hee duyyey yaqbudeenihiyya ken lih taqbudeemit, tet asisse. Toh kaadu, isi nabsi nadaasa abaanamih gadda tet abte.
Baxuwwah ten saaku labha angu teetik xagam-xagak xiiqareh xiinah tet dalwisak yenen. Masriy bikiri teetik elle kaleenihiyyal abak sugga 'te dalwa cabtu cinteeh, beyak raqte.
Tonna-leemiik, anu is kicinuk ten Assuuriyah marih gabal tet hee.
Too mari xagarak saro teetik kalla heenih qasunuk tet caben. Say-xaylo kee lab-xaylo teetik seewah been. Tet seefit qiden. Agbi elle aninnaan ikkel, tet camit gace.
«Tet maqanxá Oholiba kaadu ah tuble'mmay, dalwa kee uma-taamah isi maqanxak lafittam bahte.
Is kaadu, Assuuriyah maray baaxoh abbobti kee qaskarat yeneeh kaxxam ifu le qaskar sarat yenehiyyah kacani tet yibbixe. Too qaskar kaadu qax-maqaane luk teneeh; qeebi faras amok abta labhak yenen.
Oholiba adabik tu luk manannaay; isi maqanxak kaxxih, dalwa kee nadaasat baatem teetik uble.
«Dalwat bisoh gexak gexxe. Baabelon qaskar abbobtih ceeloy gidaar bagul taswiirih yanihiyya tuble waqdi, kacni tet yibbixe. Too mari kaxxa qisi le sara kee booruy axcal isinnik malmaaleenihiyya kee qax-meqe qumaamat amot luk yenen.
Ken taswiiriy gidaar bagul yanihiyya tuble waqdi, kacni tet yibbixeeh; sarrak mareytá keenih takke'gidih, oson dabaaqah elle yanin Baabelon-baaxo farmo keenih rubte.
Baabelon mari dina tet lih aba'gidih, tet farmol yemeeten. Kaxxam tet haysiteeniih, sarrak nadaasa tet abeenik lakal, is keenik cayteh ken tinqibeh.
Qasunuk gubbil is hayteeh, xiiqareh xiina kinnim kulli mara isik tuybulle waqdi, tet maqanxak akah sakkite'nnah, anu teetik kaadu sakkiteh.
Duma baxuwwah ten saaku Masril abak sugga 'te dalwa kassitak, dinah abtot bisoh gexxe.
Tokkel yan maray labna danan labnah gid akak takkeeh, sahwatak faras sahwatih gide akak tawqehiyyah kacani tet yibbixe.
‹Oholibay, Masri rasul baxuwwah sugte saaku, labha angu kok xaganxagak bikiri kok kaleenik sarra abak sugte dalwa uxih abtam faxxa.›
«Away Oholibay, yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kok axceemih, atu woo koo kicinuk yen marih kacanuk cayteh tani'mmay, anu ku naqboytit ken abeyyooh; marot koo heelon.
Baabeloonuh yooboke mara kee Kaldayah yooboke maraay, Fakod kee Sowaq kee Kowaq yooboke mara kee Assuuriyah mara baaheyyo. Oson inkih, qax-maqaane le furraynay farasak qeebi abtahiyya. Baaxoh abbobti kee qaskar abbobtiiy, kaxxa-kaxxa abbootan le mara kee agiirah tan qaskar kinnon.
Too mari mango silac kee faras-gaariiraay, awurut beyan gaariira kee mango qaskarak foocat gacca 'yeenih, kilbat le kabuk amaatelon. Gob kee amot haan birta luk marot koo heelon. Anu kaadu ken gabal koo heeyyo. Too waqdi too mari, ken madqa elle inta'nnal, kol ackumelon.
Anu koo inqibeemih sabbatah, oson koo yinqibeenih faxem kok abitoonay axceyyo. San kee aytiita kok argiqelon. Seefit koo qidelon. Say-xaylo kee lab-xaylo kok seewah beeloonuuh, kok raqtem girat carriselon.
Xagaral lito sara kok kalelon. Xagarat bilqah haysitte bila kok kalelon.
Tonnal Masril baritte dalwa kee uma taama, anu koo cabsiiseyyo. Tohuk wadir xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh qibaadak raaqetto. Masrik niya kaletto» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Atu niqibtooh, faxe wayta marih gabal koo heeyyo.
Too mari koo niqbaamih sabbatah, atu edde taamitta 'teemiy isi cawalal geytehiyya kok beeloonuuh, foyyal koo cabelon. Xiiqareh xiinah innah, qasunuk koo cabelon.
Dalwa fayxi kee abteh tan xiiqareh xinto, amahah koo tecee. Kulli baaxoh mari tu edde faxa kacba tekkeeh; xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh qibaadat nadaasa is abte.
Isi maqanxah raat katatteeh; tonna-leemiik too teetih ecee digaalah-kobbayyay is akak tooqobek koo afqeyyo» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Ku maqanxa akak tooqobe kobbaayak aaqubetto. Too kobbaaya, nabna kee adda le kobbaayay kibuk tanih tani; tonna-leemiik ummat kaxxa anqas kee digirih koo haysitele.
Too kobbaayay ku maqanxa Samaariya akak tooqobe, umaane kee cunxo addat le. Koo askiriseleeh koo biyaakele.
Fuqqa heettooh tu akak macabta. A kobbaaya butukka hayteh, tiddigille exxaaxit akak isi angu argiqetto. Tahat yabtam YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
Yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kaadu axceemih, «Yoo hawwenteeh darre yot cabteemih sabbatah, ama litoh tan sammô-xagit kee abtah tan dalwak gexxaamah, biyak kol oobele» iyye.
YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, Ohola kee Oholibal cokmi ab. Cokmih tuk teena keenik inxic. Abeenih yanin uma taamah ken istikiy.
Ama namma kacbat biili yan. Dalwa lih abeenim, xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeey; qiddeenim, yoh xalen xaylo. Yoh xalen lab-xaylo xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh bagul sadgatah qiden.
Oson aben dambi amahat taadeem hinna. Too saaku yi qariy yoo elle yaqbudeenihiyya nadaasa aben. Anu yoo edde uqbuda exce Sabti ayro xagure waanam baahen.
Xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh sadgatah yi xaylo qidda heenik sarra, yi qariy yoo elle yaqbudeenihiyya yemeeteeniih, nadaasa aben. Yi qaril toh aben.
«Allî-baaxok labha keenih baahaana'gidih, farmoh sinam ruuben. Woo maray farmo akah ruubeenihiyya keenih yemeeteh; too waqdi taaxige namma maqanxá kaqallaay intil kucul hayyaay qax-meqe bilat gacca 'te.
Sarrak qax-meqe kaqaadiidik amol, keenik foocal daffa iyyen. Anu keenih ecee qaydarus kee *daytuun zeytih agantah, meqeemik tu macabinnoonuy inkih foocal keenik heen.
Bacarih tan baaxok temeete labha gaabowwa 'teeh, waxxaq axcuk yeneeniih; taaxige barra kee maqanxah carayat bila heeniih, amot qax-meqe kalabta heen.
Toh uble waqdi, ta mari madabaanaak dalwat xagar akak yembexe barra lih xiinaanah, 'yaanam inni niyal hee.
Taaxige bacarih tan baaxok yemeete mari dalwa aba'gidih, Ohola kee Oholibah buxa gexen; a namma kacbah buxa fiiruk geerah gexen.
Cakki gital yan mari a namma barra abta dalwa kee qidiyyah keenik malkitelon. Macaay inteenik, dalwa kulli way abaanaah; sahda qabalat gaba keenik tutlukeh tan» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Cunxo keenit qiddu waytaah, ken buubtu wayta butta uguugusay keenit ruuba.
Too mari xeetit ken rekkaaqiyaama. Seefit ken mudoonay; xaylo keenik qidoonay; buxaaxi keenik carrisoonay.
A namma maqanxak, ‹Isin abten dalwah agbi sin gabbaaqah abaamak, ahaysa dalwa kee dina baaxok akah baata innah abeyyo.
Sin nammayat uble adbi-sinna kee xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh abak sugten qibaadah sin digaaleyyo. YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kinniyom too saaku yok aaxigetton› » iyye.

Seewah nee edde been sagalhaytô sanatak tabanhaytoh alsak tabanhaytoh ayrot, YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, a saakih ayro alsi edde yanih gide uktub. Macaay intek, Baabelon malik Yarusalaam magaala yabbixe'gidih maro teetit edde hee ayro temeeteh.
Ama yi maray yabti cina lehiyyah a yab ceelalloh waris. Keenik intaamah, YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik iyyaamah: ‹Buuti leek kibba haay giral xik.
Gabul le maruwuk lak kee carayay cadoh inkih taysehiyya irgiqqa haay, lafoofik tayse lafa kee, cadok kaadu tayse exxa doorru haay, woo buutit qid.
Gubal gira akak meqe'nnah urus. Lee nagay factay inxic. Lafof kee cado inkih meqe'nnah alaytay inxic› siinik iyya, keenik inxic.
«YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyaamah, ‹Sahda qida marih magaala baateh; dicil baahek sah akak duugume waa distih gide tekkeh tan. Tet addal cado awqa-awqah beeloonuuh tu macaban.
A magaalah addal sahda qidaanam temeggeh tan. Takkay immay qidan marih qabal elle caxitam, ballaaqet elle buuluma arac hinna. Elle caxitam xixxaqak bagu.
Too qabal tokkel elle yanay exceh an. Yanay akah axcem, a qabala able waqdi naqbi yot haa'gidi› iyye.
«YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, ‹Biileenit magaalay, kot takku waytam abletto. Gira edde urussa boco anu innih baaheyyok,
atu woo boco girat qiday uyburruc. Cado alas; maragi akak caxâ-sifat tamu eymeq. Lafa akak cararis.
Too waqdi nadaasa akak diyaytuh, bagul akak suge dicil akak carara'gidih, woo nacaasak bicsen buutiy addal tu sinni giral xik. Qassowwa 'yam fanah laqay inxic.
Abba heen taqabi foyya yakkeeh, tet wasak girat kinni-way makatinna. Tet kee teetil yan dicil girat qid!
Yarusalaamey, atu abte caraami nadaasa koo abe. Taahirik koo haam faxeh immay nadaasak taduuru cinteh. Ahaysa yi naqbi le'nna able'kal, nadaasak mataahirrowta.
Tahat yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya yaabeh an. Ahaysa gaba edde qidu waa wakti xayyooweh yan. Abta umaane abalih tibba kok maxca. Koh maxuwaawa. Abteemih diggalsimetto. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya› » iyye.
YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, atu kicintoh tan sahdayto inki addah atkal rabal kok tet baxseyyo. Tohu'mmay tohuh, ‹Yallaw, ah macah?› axce waytaamaay, weeqe waytaama. Intik ximo caxe waytaama.
Sinkibitah koo aabbe waama. Rookat taniimih asta koh takke'gidih, amok qumaamat makalin. Ibak kabella makalin. Foocal saro isik mahan. Rookita mari yakme maaqo maxagin» yok iyye.
Too saaki ayro Yallih diini sahda barisak sugeeh; carri bar yi barra rabte. Nammeyhaytô saaku anu Yalli yok akah inxicca 'ye innah abe.
Tah yuble mari, «Annah akah abtam macaay?» yok iyyen.
Anu too waqdi keenik exceemih, «Ah yok aba intem YALLA. YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
Israayil marak intaamah, ‹YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik iyyaamah: Ama yi Qibaadah-Qarit kaxxam takkaleeniih intih wagittaanam siinit meqeeh, kaa fan gexxaanam kaxxam kicintoonuh immay, yooy YALLAH yani ama qari nadaasa abba heeleeh; too magaalal raqta say xaylo kee lab xaylo siinik seefit ambaxele.
Too saaku ama Yacedkel abem abetton. Foocal sara isinnik mahaytan. Rookita mari adoobita maaqo matakman.
Qumaamat amok makaltan. Kabel ibak kalla hayteenih ib-qassih magexxan. Maweqtaanaay ximo macaxxan. Kaxxa rookah marookittan. Abten dambih, qakuh uma innah gacca axcetton. Mariiy marat tekkeemih siinik iihisele.
Too waqdi Yacedkel asta siinih akkele. Usuk abba heem abetton. Axcem inkih takku wayta saaku, YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kinniyom yok aaxigetton› 'yaanam siinik iyya» keenik exce.
Yalli yok iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, oson kaxxam edde akkaluk yenen yi Qibaadah-Qari keenik beeyyo; intih wagtaanam kee adda akak culaanam keenit muquk tene'mmay intik keenik kaleyyo. Say-xaylo kee lab-xaylo ken waysiiseyyo.
Tah takku wayta saaku, tahak yoowweh yemeete num tekke baati siinih warsele.
Too ayro afay yabtu edde affaruk sugtehiyya koh fakkiimeleeh yaabetto. Too waqdi too numuy xaagu koh baahehiyya lih yaabetto. Ummatah asta akkettooh; oson anu YALLA kinniyom aaxigelon» iyye.

YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Qammon marat takku waytam waris.
‹Mulki le YALLIH yab oobbeya› keenik inxic. ‹Yi Qibaadah-Qari nadaasa yekkem siinit temqeh; Israayil rasi bayem siinit temqeh; Yuudâ mari seewah gexam kaxxam siinit temqe.
Tahat ruffu inteenimih sabbatah, ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta bacarih tan baaxok yemeete mari baaxo siinik akah yabbixe innah, siinik abeyyo. Too mari isinni duyye luk amaateleeh; dabaaqah sin baaxol nookelon. Isin akme rarten caxâ-miri kenim akkeleeh; isin nake rarten can, sin baaxol, oson nakelon.
Rabba deqsitta magaala gaali elle yaloole guubuh gacseyyooh; Qammon marih baaxo inkitanuuk illi elle yaloole guub abeyyo. Anu YALLA kinniyom too waqdi aaxigetton› keenik inxic» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya qagseh Qammon marak iyyaamah: «Farcatak gexxaamah gaba taagureeniih kaqittaanam ubleh. Israayil rasu uma intit tablen.
Tohih sabbatah sin buubu waah sin radu waa marih gabal sin heeyyo. Sarrah doolat akah akke waytaanaah, baaxo akah alle waytan innah, inkitanuuk sin bayseyyo. Anu YALLA kinniyom too saaku yok aaxigetton» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya qagseh iyyeemih, «Mooyab kee Edom mari, ‹Yuudâ mari gersi marak edde yayseenimih loonum malon› 'yaanam iyyeeniih; tohih sabbatah,
Mooyab rasih cuduudul tan magaaloolik, ken rasih dacayrih tan Beet-Yasimot kee Baal-Maqon kee Kiryatayim deqsitta magaalooliy timixxigehiyyah agantah, akah tantixibbixe innah abeyyo.
Ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta bacarih tan baaxoh mari, Mooyab kee Qammon marat qeebi abba heenih akah yaysen innah abeyyo. Toh akah abu waam, Qammon wadiriik doolatah raaqe wayta'gidi.
Tonnah kaadu Mooyab digaaleyyooh; too saaku YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigelon» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyaamah, «Edom-mari Yuudâ-maral canê-gacsah umam baaheeh; too umaaney oson canê-gacsah abeenihiyya, Edom maral ken cabe wayta umaane tekke.
Tonna-leemiik ahaysa Edom mara digaalu waah, too rasul enna 'ya mara kee saq inkih bayisu waam aysixxigeh an. Teman deqsitta magaalak xabba haanamaay Dadan deqsitta magaalah amma 'yaanam yan rasu sahda elle deedalta abur abeyyo. Tohiital yan mari inkih carbit ambaxele.
Israayil ummatay yi ummat kinnihiyya yi aftok Edom maral cane gacselon. Yi naqbi le'nna ken aybulleelon. Yi digaala elle obta maral le inna ablelon. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyaamah, «*Filistiin mari, mango dabaanah naqboytiitih keenik sugen Israayil maral, canê gacsah kaxxam umam baaheeniih, keenih lon naqabuh ken seleenih.
Tonna-leemiik Filistiin marat qeebi abeyyooh ken bayseyyo. Filistiin booxal raqqa iyyu waa mara suge weeh innah heeyyo.
Yi naqbi le'nna ken ayballayuk, uma digaalah ken digaaleyyo. Agaagul sinni canê-gacsa keenit abeyyo. Too waqdi YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigelon» iyye.

Seewah edde nee been taban kee inikhaytoh sanatak naharsi alsat inikhaytoh ayrot, YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Suur magaalal yan mari akah wallitam macaay intek, kinnim koh warisu waa. Ahaysa, ‹Yarusalaam tiddigiiggilleeh; tellemmoy teetil akkuk tenehiyya gaba kalteh ikkal, gaddaliinoh net mamissowta› 'yaanamah wallitan.
«Tonna'mmay yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya tohuk iyyeemih, ‹Suur maraw, naqboyta siinik ekkeh anim siinih warsa. Qeebit sin yabbaxu waa mara siinit ruubeyyo. Too mari baddi haffoh innah kullim duufut beyak amaatelon.
Suur-magaalat maroh hayteenih tanin gasoosa siinik butukku heeloonuuh, amo xer qarway magaala akak dacrissaanahiyya siinik aggiggilelon. Too magaala xixxaqah akah raqta innah, buuri baguk akak fikka heeyyo.
Magaala baddi gudel kullum yabbaxuh yemeete mari sabooka elle kafisa xixxooqah raaqele.› Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya. Suur buubu waa mara ruubeyyo.
Teetik baddi-afal raqtah tan mandarittel yan mara seefit selelon. Suur mari YALLA kinniyom too saaku yok aaxigelon» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kaadu qagseh iyyeemih, «Suur aysibixe'gidih, Baabelon-malikiy malikwak inkih nabahiyya baaheyyo. Kay migaq Nabkadnessar. Ta malik kilbat le kabuk kaxxa qaskar kee, faras amok qeebi abta qaskar kee, faaris-gaariira luk amaatele.
Suur magaalak baddi afal raqtah tan mandarittel yan mari qeebit ambaxele. Nabkadnessar mari boodod dageleeh, bullaaqek megdebitte xiseloonuuh, eded bicselon. Gooba mangak gexxaamah siinik isinni dacrisak wadir sin biyaakelon.
Gaso edde yaggilen gutqeenat magaalat maroh tan gasoosi aggilelon. Godmat amo xer qarway magaala akak dacrissaanahiyya siinik aggiggilelon.
Ken faroosa mangak gexxaamah, faarisih gexot tawqeh tan siisa sin buulele. Faaris-gaariira kee faras amok qeebi abta labha edde tan faariisa, tiddigille magaala cultu wayta waqdi, radah yan anayat gidaarwa engeyya axcele.
Faariisat qeebi aba mari magaalak kulli gital ummat seefit qidelon. Kaxxa-kaxxa qamidwa bututtukka heeloonuuh ballaaqeh gacissa heelon.
Baaxol luk sugten gaddaliino kee tellemmô duyye siinik beelon. Magaalat maroh tan gasoosa siinik bututtukku heelon. Kaxxa qarwa siinik aggilelon. Woo qarwa edde xisseenih sugten xeet kee cooxuuy raqqa 'te duyye inkih badat qidelon.
Suur mari abak yen gad kee gadah yaaguren duyye haysitta heenih luk sugen kaalayta gaba kalele.
Kullum yabbixe mari kullum edde yabbixe sabooka elle hawwalisa xixxooqah tet cabeyyo. Suur nammeyhaak maxissinta. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya Suur magaalal yan marak iyyeemih, «Nabkadnessar mari sin yabbaxu waa saaku, baddi afal yan mari siinit yakkeh yan ricidih abtan booge kee qawna aabbeleeh, too xongolo warigga ken heele.
Baddi xaqul tan baaxooxah amoytitte dardaarinni koraasih baguk obba 'yeenih, xer-kameswa kee dilwa le sarak katta 'yeenih, baaxok bagul gacelon. Siinit tekkem abaluk kaxxa cunxoh cunxitelon. Xagar keenik axaxoh mayaada.
Tohuk lakal siinih weeqelon. Weeqah iyyoonu waanamah:
‹Woyyow kaxxa magaala baateh tan.
Maraakib badal teetik baye.
Badal reeda luk teneeh
baddi afal enna 'ya mari
teetik cunxo kee meysih rabak yen.
A magaala baate saaku
gadiirwal tan ummatta
baati teetik tuble waqdi
kaxxa cunxoh cunxiteeni›
'yaanam axcuk boogisan.»
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Suurey, sarrah num dabqah elle gace waa baaxo koo abeyyo. Kaxxa baday adda lehiyyat koo buuleyyo.
Rabe mara fan obba 'teh dumî dabaanal suge mara luk akah gacta innah kok abeyyo. Dumaak baate duyyey abuuruh raqqa 'teh woo boodo fanah obtehiyya lih oobetto. Tohuk wadir mataduuraay addunyal manoh maraqta.
Akak aduure wayta finqah koo finqiseyyo. Manoh maraqta. Sinam koo gorrissaamah koo mageyta. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.

YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Suur magaalah boogis.
Bad akak culan culmal tan Suur magaalay baddi afal enna 'ya mara lih badaaqat abtahiyyak, yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya axcem liyok, waris. Teetik intaamah: Suur magaalay, hidah qax-meqiyo 'yaanam intaah, kaxxam isit takkale.
Dabqah baddi-amol tan. Koo xise mari qax-meqe markabih innah koo hee.
Luucaan koh akak baaheenim, Cermon deqsitta qaleh amol yen saagana. Markab gudel daabisen dagalay markab edde tangayyehiyya koh akak bicseenim, Lubnaan rasuk baahen *sariidâ-cooxu.
Koo edde seeban coox, Basan deqsita rasuk yirgiqen garsâ-caxak bicsen. Markab waqina akak bicseenim, Kobros rasuk baahen *sariidâ-cooxu. Dariifa akak dakani moddiinit exfen.
Ku markabih siraaqay dilwa le *baftak bicseenihiyya Masrik baaheeniih; simbil innah allaak yambulle. Markab amoh saroy Kobros gadiirik baaheenihiyya kuclinan kee diiminan bisu le.
Markab seebak yen mari Sayda kee Arwad deqsitta namma magaalak yemeeten. Bacriyya kee naakudah luk tenem, koh yooboke maray kaxxa cubbi lehiyyak ten.
Markab addat Gabal rasuk yemeete naggaarinna le mari yeneeh, too maray kaxxa ixxiga lehiyya, markabat luucaan fanak lee cultaamak, dubaalat edde heen. Badal gexxa 'ya maraakibit yan bacriyya-mari, tellemmô duyye kok xaamitoonuh kol amaatuk sugen.
Fursi kee Liidiya kee Liibiyak amma 'ye mari ku qaskarah yenen. Gob kee amot haan birta ku qaskarih aracal daanat yabbixen. A mari, migaq kok fayya haa mara kinni.
Arwad deqsita aracak yemeete mari magaalat maroh tan gaso dacrisak yenen. Gammad deqsita aracak yemeete mari amo xer qarway magaala akak dacrisaanahiyyal dacayrih yenen. Isinni goobwa woo gasol takayrut abbaxuk yenen. Qaxa koo teymeeqem, too mara.
«Isbaaniyah rasu lih badaaqat abak ten. Caddo sinni duyyey keenil teylemmehiyyat milaaguh (libaakih), lakqooy biriitaay dingo kee qarar geyak sugte.
Giriik mara kee Tuubal kee Mesek yemeete marat kaadu tellemmô duyye kalak sugte. Too marak naqoosa kee nacaasak bicsen duyye beyya hayteh, woo duyyeh milaaguh (libaakih) tellemmô duyye keenih acayuk sugte.
Beet-Togarmak bacarih tan baaxoh faariisaay qebti faariisa kee bakilwa beyya hayteh, tellemmo keenih abak ten.
Roodes deqsita mara kee koo tellemmo titta lih abak sugten. Baddi afal suge mari duyye kok abuuduh beyya haanaah, woo duyyet milaaguh (libaakih), dakani-qaag kee data gurmud le caxak yirgiqen coox koh edde acayuk sugen.
Suuriyah mari kaadu tellemmo ko'lih abak sugeeh; atu lito mango tellemmô-duyye kok xaamak sugen. Too duyyet milaaguh (libaakih), anxaxin unxux kee diimin saraay, dilwa le sara kee *baftak bicsen xagar meqe sarooy, baddi arul geytima uwway gacro deqsitahiyya kee, qasa unxux koh edde milaagak sugen.
Yuuda kee Israayil maray badaaqat abahiyya kaadu, kok beyan duyyet milaaguh, Minnit deqsita rakaakayak baahen kamadi kee malabaay saliid (zeyti) kee dayla koh edde acayuk sugen.
Damaskoh mari kaadu badaaqat duyyet koh milaaguh (libaakih), Celbon rasul yooboke qinab caxah xaylok bicsen kamri kee, Saahar deqsita rasuk baahen illih xagor koh edde acayuk sugen.
Tohuk kalah, Daanah yooboke mara kee, Udaalak yemeeten Giriik mari duyyet milaaguh, yisiffiyen birta kee caxâ-sifa koh acayuk yenen.
Dadan mari, tellemmô duyyet milaaguh, koori bagul haan gilaas-fido koh baahak yenen.
Qarab kee Keedar rasih marak saqoltih yan mari, atu tellemmoh keenit kalta duyyet milaaguh, anaaqe kee marwa kee wadar edde acayuk sugen.
Saba kee Raqmak yemeete badaaqat-aba-mari kaadu, ko'lih badaaqat abak yenen. Atu tellemmoh keenit kalta duyyet milaaguh, giffa 'ya caxâ-sifa kee limok mangoomuh yan xeet kee dahab koh edde acayuk sugen.
Caaran kee Kanne kee Qadan deqsitta magaaloolil yan mara kee, Sabak yemeete badaaqat-aba-mara kee, Assuur kee Kilmad magaalal yan mari inkih, badaaqat ko'lih abak yenen.
Too mari qax-meqe sartan kee diimin bisu le saraay, dilwa le sara kee mango bisu le guulak bicsen fidooy, meqe'nnal qaxen sudaaduc kee akoota kot kalak yenen.
Ku tellemmoh duyye kaxxa maraakibit hayya heenih beyak sugen.
«Atu kaadu kaxxa duyye quukah le markabay badal gexxahiyyah bis luk sugte.
Seebit koo beya mari bad fanah koo beeh, ayrô-mawqak yamaateh yan caacay badak gudel butukku koo hee.
Too ayroy baati kot tekkehiyyal, gadda kee tellemmô-duyyeey, markab beyak suge mara kee, markab seeba maraay, naggarwa kee qaskaraay, raqqa 'ye maray markab addat enna 'yahiyya inkih sute.
Ku markabih maray badal gexak sugehiyya badat sute waqdi, abeenih yanin xongolot badak afal tan baaxo axaxisen.
«Maraakib seebak yan maraay, bacriyya kee naakuda inkih baddi afa fanah kudeeniih, maraakib foyyah raaqe.
Too mari inkih, siisa amol caxak, weeqeeniih; gombodut yubruken.
Kot tekkeemih rookah, amo isinnik molla heenih sartanah qabudda haysiten. Kot tekkeemih kaxxam koh qaadelon.
Koh weeqeloonuuh, weeqah iyyoonu waanamah,
‹A saaku badak addal tan Suur magaalay,
ku gid takkeeh koo alelta magaala masuginna.
Ku badaaqat badak yamaate saaku,
kulli mara faxan duyyek cayisak ten.
Ku badaaqatat geyan duyyet mango malikwa gaddalitte.
A saaku badak addal tiddigilleeh,
badak ragid fanah sutte.
Badaaqatah beyak sugte duyye kee
ku taamat suge mari inkih ko'lih badat bayen.
Badak afal guubuh yan mari wariggiteh.
Koo tibbixe bala yoobbeenih wariggiten.
Ken malikwah agantah cunxo keenit hee.
Meysik gexxaamah fooci keenik dattoowe.
Atu ahaysa gaba kalteeh, mataduura.
Baadal enna 'ya limo-aba-mari,
Kot tekkem net akkele 'yaanamal nabam meysite›
axcuk koh boogisen.»

YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Suur magaalah malikik intaamah: YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kok iyyaamah, ‹Kaxxiinah qaffuddaah yalla is takkale. «Yalla kinniyooh bad maroh edde yan korsil an» 'yaanam inta. «Kasah Yallih innah an» intaah, Yalla is celsissa'mmay, sahdaytu kinnito ikkal Yalla hinnito.
Daaniyelik kasah taysem isik takkale. Kok qellittam matanam takkale.
Litoh tan kas kee ixxigat mango dahab kee lakqo kobxisitte.
Tellemmol kaadu kaxxa ixxiga luk sugteeh; tohih sabbatah mango fayda geyte. Tohut geyte gaddaliino kaxxam kaxxiina koo bahsisse.
« ‹Hay tonnal yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kok axceemih, «Kasah Yallih innah an» 'yaanam inteemih sabbatah,
racmattak tu sinniih naqboytit kok yakku waa mara kot ruubeyyo. Too mari atu isi ixxiga kee kasal geyte qax-maqaane inkih kok bayselon.
Koo qideloonuuh, adda le badat koo qambiselon; akeera fan gexetto.
Hay, koo qidoonuh yamaaten saaku, anu Yalla kinniyo keenik maay axcettoo? Koo qidu waa mari kol yamaatu waa saaku, Yalla hinnitoy bani-adantu kinnitom koh ambulleele.
Diini maleelah yan allî baaxoh marih gabat, kuti rabah rabetto. Taham akkele intam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya› 'yaanam kaak inxic» yok iyye.
YALLIH qangara kaadu yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, darraqah takke boogey Suur-malikih abu waahiyya ah teeti. Kaak intaamah: YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyaamah,
‹Dudda le mara elle yaaxigen numuh ten.
Kas kee qaxa kok bisoh gexak mananna.
Qadan bustaanay Yalli isim abehiyyah addal sugte.
Qax amqinnaan luul qax koo yeymeeqe.
Qisi kee anxaxinan kee kuclinan kee walqin bisu le bila xagaral le sartanat sugte.
Dahabak bicsen duyye bilqah xagaral luk ten.
Koo bicsen saaku, too duyye koh yeceen.
Dacrisa malaykattuy kaxxa galwa le koo abe.
Yallih qaley saytunihiyyal dabqah ten.
Habug iyya xeetik gudel gexam-gexak sugte.
Uma taamat asse ayrok dumal,
akkey ubukku 'tem caalat kok cooca luk masuginna.
Duyye limo kee aylammiyyat taamah gacteeh;
toh baatilit koo asisseeh too baatil dambi kol yekke.
Ahak gexxaamah, dacrisak yen malaykattow,
taahirik tan yi qale koo cabsiiseh.
Woo liliq iyya xeetih fanak koo eyyeeqe.
Litoh tan qax-maqaane kaxxiina koo bahsisseeh,
migaq-gexxoy luk sugte hawri koo cabsisseh.
Tohuk gexxaamah xabba koo heeh, baaxot koo qide.
Kot tekkem tuble malikwa, tah net akkeleh, axcuk,
akah meysitta 'ta digaalah koo digaale.
Tellemmol abtah tan baatilik gexxaamah,
qibaadah arooca inkih kok nadaasa tekke.
Tonna-leemiik kok tewqe gira urseh;
inkih tan magaala edde carrise.
Koo fan wagtu waa mari gomboduk sah
kok raqtem ane waytam yublen.
Tahaysa baateh, wadiriik koo mageyan.
Koo aaxaguk yen baaxooxah mari wariggat yan.
Kot tekkem keenit takkeemik meysitan› kaak inxic» iyye.
YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow Saydat takku waytaamat yab.
Keenik intaamah: YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik iyyaamah, ‹Saydah ummatey, anu sin naqboyta ekkeh an› keenik inxic. ‹Siinik abu waam yok yabalu waa mari yoo faylisele. Sin addal yan marat abah an digaalat taahirik anim innik ayballayu waa saaku, YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigelon.
Dalka siinil ruubeyyo. Qabal gitittel darah innah siinik akah caxita'nnah abeyyo. Kulli kabuk qeebi siinit abeloonuuh, ummatta siinik ambaxele. YALLA kinniyom tonnal yok aaxigetton› keenik inxic» iyye.
YALLI iyyeemihii, «Faxe baaxooxay dariifal geytimma 'taah, ken bursutak sugtehiyya tahak wadir Israayil ummatal ada matakka. Too waqdi YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kinniyom aaxigelon.»
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Israayil ummat fixixih elle abbixe baaxooxak gacseyyo. Addal keenik anu waa waqdi, woo baaxooxah mara Kudduus kinniyom aybulleeyyo. Israayil mari isi baaxoy anu yi naqasuh yan Yaqkuubuh eceehiyya fan aduurelon.
Too baaxol amaanah xiinelon. Tokkel buxaaxi xissiteloonuuh, qinab coox abqurelon. Cuggaaneh keenik yan maray ken bursutak suge digaaleyyooh; Israayil amaanah xiinele. Too waqdi anu YALLAY ken Dagelta kinniyom aaxigelon.

Seewah nee edde been tabanhaytô-sanatak tabanhaytoh alsak taban kee nammeyhaytoh ayrot, YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Masri malikit takku waytaamat yab. Kaa kee inkih yan Masri-rasut digaala akkelem kaah waris.
Kaak intaamah, ‹YALLAY Mulki lehiyya, «Weeqayti gudel yan kaxxa xabaado ceela numow, anu naqboyta kok ekkeh an» kok iyyah yan› kaak inxic. «Niil weeqayti yiimiiy; anu innih kaa bicse» 'yaanam inta.
Tonna'mmay sanat santiita kok hayya heeh, ama ku weeqaytih addat yan kullum xagarat kok akah xakbima innah kok abeyyo.
Koo kee too kullum inkih bacarih tan baaxol qideyyo. Tokkel ginaada kok gubbil elle cabeyyooh; koo yaaguqe mara mageyta. Ginaada kok guma kee alluwwâ gadda abeyyo.
Masril yan mari inkih YALLA kinniyom tohuk lakal yok aaxigelon› » iyye.
YALLI iyyeemih, «Masri maraw, Israayil mari catoh niya siinil luk suge. Takkay immay qandeh bayre caxxak maysinniton.
Rakuh siinil gacen waqdi tiddigilleenih, xabqe keenik biyakteeniih, xiiron keenik tiggilen.
Hay tonnal, yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya qeebi seefit kot abu waa mara kot baaheyyo. Too mari sinam kee lac kok qidele.
Masri rasi abuuruh raaqele. YALLA kinniyom too saaku yok aaxigelon» iyye.
« ‹Niil weeqayti yiimiiy; anu innih kaa bicse› inteemih sabbatah,
inkih yan Masrik, Migdol deqsitta magaalay kilbat le kabut raqtahiyyak xabba haanamaay, Aswaan deqsitta magaalay gabbi-qaxat raqtahiyyak Kuusuh cuduuduh amma 'yaanam inkih, foyya abeyyo.
Num sinniih lac sinni abuuruh cabeyyo. Morootom sanatah lac elle wessa m'iyya; sahdayti elle mayangayya.
Masri baaxo kulli baaxok lafitta 'ya bacari abeyyo. Masri magaalooli morootom sanatah abur abeyyo. Kulli magaalak abuuruh laffa tet heeyyo. Masri mara marin baaxo aysaarreyyooh, tokkel dabboh gacelon. Marin marih addal gacelon» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Morootom sanatak lakal, Masri mara fixixih elle abbaxuk suge rasuk, le baaxo fanah gacseyyo.
Tohuk lakal oson akak raden mari elle suge Masrik gabbi-qaxi fan ken gacseyyo. Tokkel boola-le doolatah gacelon.
Doolatwak inkih boolah gacta doolat akkeloonuuh; marin doolatih abbootanak raaqelon. Hebeltô tuxxiq sinni mara ken abeyyooh, tonna-leemiik tohuk wadir doolatwa isinni gubat mahaan.
Israayil tohuk wadir ken catol kibaal haanamak raaqele. Israayil, Masrik ellecabo tabalu wayta saaku, Masril hayteh sugte kibaal qellat kinnim isik aaxigele. Israayil mari YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kinniyom, too saaku yok aaxigele» iyye.
Seewah nee edde been labaatanna kee malcinhaytô sanatak inikhaytoh alsak inikhaytoh ayrot, YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Baabelon malikih yan Nabkadnessar Suur-magaalal qeebih gaba qideh yan. Isi qaskar amo xagortak muxcah raqqaay sunku keenik dalletta 'tam fanah, quukat yabbixe. Takkay immay a gid yakke cawalay edde yaniinihiyyah kaa kee kay qaskarak galto num mageya.
Tonna-kinnuk, taway yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya axceemih, Masri baaxo Malik Nabkadnessarah aceeyyo. Masri baaxol sugga 'te duyye buubbaay radda heeh beeleeh, tokkel isi qaskarih cawal agdiyele.
Ken akah aceem macaay inteenik, kay qaskar yoh taqabak yi taamat sugte. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
«Too saaku Israayil mara cayla-leela abeyyo. Yacedkelow, koo kaadu sahda koo elle taabbe ikkel yaaba num koo abeyyo. Tonnal YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigelon» iyye.

YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, takku waytaamat yab. ‹YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyaamah: Boogisay, «Woo saaku takku waytaamow!» axcuk, anay fayya hayisa› inxic.
Intaamah, ‹Umaane edde takke ayro xayih. YALLIH abto edde tamballayu wayta ayro xayih; baadal tan ummatta gadaama edde tabbaxu waytaah, qamburre baaxo edde buultu wayta ayro xayih.
Masril qeebi radele. Mango mari edde rabeleeh, rado amaggeleeh, abuuruh cabba tet heelon. Too waqdi Kuusul sinam kaxxam ankikkiqele.
Too qeebit, Kuus kee Liibiyaay, Liidiyaay Qarab kee Kuub deqsita rasuk kirah baaheenih sugen qaskar rabele. Masri lih bica abe mari too qeebit rabele› 'yaanam inxic» iyye.
YALLI iyyeemih, «Kilbat le kabuk Migdol deqsitta magaalak xabba haanamaay, gabbi-qaxat raqta Aswaan deqsitta magaalah amma 'yaanam tan baaxol, Masri marah qande acayuk tenem bayele. Masri mari kaxxam edde yakkalem inkih foyyaatele. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya.
Masri rasi, abuuruh-raqte-baaxooxak kaxxih, abuuruh raaqeleeh; ken magaalooli abur-tekke-magaaloolik kaxxih abur akkele.
Masri magaaloolit gira ruubu waah, is dacayrih luk sugte qaskar selu waa saaku, YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigelon.
Too ayroy Masri finqa yakku waahiyyal, amaanah xiinak suge Kuus marat cube waak sugen cunxo qidu waa farmoytit markabat ruubeyyo. Too ayro xayyowteh taniih; xayuk amaateleeh; cunxo keenit heele.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Masri marih gaddaliino Malik Nabkadnessar gabat bayseyyo.
Nabkadnessar racmatta sinni qaskar gabat hayya heeh, Masri rasu bayisa'gidih amaatele. Oson Masri seefit bayselon. Inkih tan baaxo raysak kibbiimele.
Niil weeqaytu kafseyyo. Masri mara uma marih gubat heeyyo. Marin marih gabat, baaxo kee baaxol sugga 'tem keenik bayseyyo. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLA» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Moof deqsitta magaalal tan gabat bicsen duyyey yaqbudeenihiyya kee, yalla axcuk elle yaaminem keenik bayseyyo. Masri ahaysa abba mageya. Inkih yan rasut cunxo ruubeyyo.
Fatros deqsita aracay gabbi-qaxat raaqahiyya foyya abeyyo. Xooqan magaalay kilbat le kabut raqtahiyyat gira ruubeyyo. Teebes magaalal cokmih digaala ruubeyyo.
Masri-qaskar amô-reebu le aracay migaaqah Baslus deqsitahiyyal, inni naqabu oobiseyyo. Teebes marih gaddaliino kee midir bayseyyo.
Masrit gira ruubeyyo. Baslus magaala kaxxam ankikkiqele. Teebes magaalat maroh tan gaso addigillele. Moof magaalat kaxxa umaane akkele.
Awen kee Bubastis magaaloolil yan qunxaaneyti inkih carbit ambaxele. Tohuk raqtem seewah beelon.
Masri mari kaxxam edde akkaluk suge qande keenik bayisu waah, Masri mara maqar cabsiisu waa saaku, Tacfancis deqsitta magaalal dite radeleeh; qamburret buulumele. Tet mandarittel enna 'ya mara inkih seewah beelon.
Masri too digaalah digaalu waa saaku, YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigelon» iyye.
Seewah nee edde been taban kee inikhaytoh sanatak inikhaytoh alsak malcinhaytoh ayrot, YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Masri malikik gaba iggileeh; too gabak ahak wadir qaffotta 'yeh seef edde yabbaxu maduuda. Macaay intek, anu kaak iggile gabal baasima kaah haah, kaah daylisa num mageya.
Tonna-leemiik taway yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya axceemih, Masri malikik naqboyta ekkeh aniih, duma tiddigille gaba kee nagay tan gaba inkih kaak aggileyyo. Tonna-leemiik seef gabak addak kaak radele.
Masri mara, ummat addat, baxacah ruubeyyooh; aaxige waan marih fanat fixixih ken ruubeyyo.
Baabelon malikih gaba qande bahsiiseyyo. Inni seef kay gabat heeyyo. Masri malikih gaba butukku heeyyo. Isi naqboytih foocal uma rabah rabele.
Kaa boolaaseyyooh, Baabelon malik qande bahsiiseyyo. Inni seef kaah aceeyyooh; usuk yi seef Masri fana yascassu waa saaku, sinam inkih YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigele.
Masri mara fixixih ruubeyyoh; YALLA kinniyom too saaku yok aaxigelon» iyye.

Seewah nee edde been taban kee inikhaytoh sanatak sidochaytoh alsak inikhaytoh ayro, YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Masri malik kee kay marak intaamah: Qandek litom qunxam hinna! Koo aleltam iyyaay?
Ceelalloh, Assuuriya Lubnaan-rasul tooboke caxay mango ludway silal meqehiyya leeh, xexxaarah qamburre guftahiyyah bis luk sugte.
A caxa racta leek tooboke. Too leeh sabbatah, woo caxah dariifal tan baaxo inkih allaggowte. Too lee dariifal enna 'ta garboh fan caxitte.
A caxa lee nagay geyteemih sabbatah, xexxaarah cooxuk xagar gexak ten. Ludwa teetik nabna kee xexxar luk ten.
Kimbir akak inxicca 'yaanam ludwal akak qarwa xissitte. Alluwwa kee dubaala inkih xaylo tet gubal xalte. Baadal enna 'ya mari tet silaalal iraawite.
A caxa xexxar kee naba ludwa leemih sabbatah, kaxxa qax-maqaane luk sugte. Ramid teetik baaxok ragidil tan leey ractahiyya gufe.
Yallih bustaanih addal yan kaxxa coox tet xaqam luk masuginna. Saaganto kee *subla tet gide alginaanah luk mananna. Faxe caxay Yallih bustaanal tenehiyya woo gide qaxak luk mananna.
A caxa, yooy YALLAH yani Qadanay yi bustaan elle sugehiyyal uysubuke cooxuk, ludwa kee qaxah lafitta inte. Anu qaxa tet eymeeqe.
«Tonna-leemiik yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyaamah, Too caxa dadalah qamburre guftam faxxa hayte. Tembe saaku kaxxiina bahteemih sabbatah,
tet cineeh marin abba tet beetay exce. Is bahte umaaneh tet celtam teetik abe.
Racmatta sinni maray allî baaxok yemeete tet irgiqqa heeh elle tet qideh cabe. Luud akak baaxoh addal tan qaleelah amo kee goloola kee daqaral radeh. Baadal tan ummattay woo caxah gubal silaalitak sugte wokke cabteh gexxe.
Kimbir amma 'yeh teetiy raddehiyyal daffee. Alluwwa kaadu teetik radde ludwat taqqa 'teh gexxe.
Tahak wadir faxe caxa leek faxeh gide geytaamah, dadal kee xexxaarah too caxah innah magacta. Xexxaarah qamburre gufta caxa tahaysa mataabuka. Toh akah axcem, rabeeniih dite le kabri oobe marat yengeleeniih woo boodo fanah oobelon» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kaadu iyyeemih, «Too caxa dite le kabri obte saaku, baaxo inkih arkite. Baaxoh addak racta lee gexi haak masuginniyo. Buyyitte darah oobi haak masuginniyo. Too caxa rabteemih sabbatah, Lubnaan qaleelal dite qideeh; garbol enna 'ya coox kafse.
Too caxa dite le kabri oobe marat tengele saaku, is radde waqdi abteh ten xongoloh mango baaxoh mari gilite. Inkih tan Qadanal suge coox kee, leek meqe innah allaggoowak suge Lubnaan cooxuy woo boodo fanah oobehiyya, a caxah raddem yublen waqdi ruffu iyyen.
Too coox kee tet gubal reebime suge maray cato tet abak sugehiyya tet lih kabri oobeeniih; qeebit qide marat yengelen.
«Masri malikow, Qadan cooxih addak xexxar kee hayba le caxa koo maay aleltaa? Meelelta'mmay, ahak wadir atu Qadanal suge cooxuk kaxxih Gahannab oobetto. Tokkel diini maleela kee carbit rabe marat angaletto.
Masri malik kee kay marat akkelem tamah teeti. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.

Seewah nee edde been taban kee nammeyhaytô sanatak taban kee nammeyhaytoh alsak inikhaytoh ayro, YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, darraqah takke boogey Masri marah aboonu waanahiyya ah teeti.
Doolatwa fanat qande le lubak is takkale.
Takkay immay dori addat ibak gaba tasgayye xabaadoh gide kinnito.
Lee ibat kalla abteeh, darraqosseh.
Mango rasih mari elle gaaboowe ikkel, inni sabakat xabba koo heeh,
weeqayti afal giitak koo yayyaaqoonay axceyyo.
Weeqaytuk afal bukka koo heeh
baadal enna 'ta alluwwa kee kimbir yakamay koo axceyyo.
Qaleela kee goloola ku raysay abicahiyyak kibba heeyyo.
Qabal siinik qaleela bullaay dorwa kibba haam fanah caxeyyo.
Koo bayisu waa saaku, qaran kee cutuukal dite qideyyo.
Ayro qamburrek darret gacele. Alsa ifu cabele.
Qaraanal yan ifu bayissa heeh, baaxo dite kol akah takke innah abeyyo.
Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
Yalli kaadu qagseh iyyeemih, «Atu baytu waytaamih xaagu
atu aaxige wayta baaxooxal yaabboonu waan waqdi,
yaabbe mari wariggitele.
Anu kol baahu waam ummatal hagga akkele.
Yi seef ken fan kinisu waa saaku malikwa meysih axaxitele.
Celemih elle tan aracak koo kalu waa saaku
ken roocih meysi ken abbixele» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Baabelon malikih seef koo geele.
Agiirah tan qaskaray racmattak tu sinnihiyya sibte seefit
sahda kee mansafay amo elle miqito saabo kok cabsiiseyyo.
Mango lee elle aninnaan ikkel sugu waa laa siinik asguudelon.
Lee darraqoosa mara kee laa maraaqa.
Leelwa darraqootiyyak cattiimele.
Daqarwa amaanah caxitta'gidih abeyyo.
Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
«Masri abuuruh cabbaay tet addal yan mara selli hayu waa saaku,
YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigelon» iyye.
«Taham mango baaxoh yooboke agbi Masri kee tet marah abu waa darraqah takke booge. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
Seewah nee edde been taban kee nammeyhaytô sanatak inikhaytoh alsak taban kee konoyhaytoh ayro, YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, a axxul le Masri marah boogis. Keenik kalah yan mara lih ken hayya haay, akeera fan ken rub. Dite le kabri oobe marat yengeleeniih, woo boodo fanah oobelon.
Keenik intaamah, ‹Isin sahdak qaxah tayseenim maay takkalen? Ahaysa akeera fan gexettoonuuh, tokkel diini-maleela lih gacetton.
Masri mara edde qidoonu seef siibot yaniih; Masri mari qeebit rabeleeh, keenik mango mari rabele.
Masri mari akeera gexu waa saaku, ken kee ken qaxat gacca 'ye mara akeeral geyoonu waan waqdi, tokkel tan agiiray duma qeebi abak tenehiyya keenik, ‹Diini-maleelay qeebit rabtehiyya a saaku temeeteh taniih; akeeral ginaada keenik qangalaylut tan› keenik axcelon.
«Assuuriya kaadu teetik rabte qaskarih kabaara marot tet tabbixe. Too qaskar inkih teetik edde rabtem carbi.
Ken kabaara elle tanim, akeerak adda le araca. Woo qaskarih kabri teetit maroh yen. Keeniy ta saaku tonnal yanihiyya, addunyal sahda akak meysitta marah sugen.
«Qeelam kaadu wokkel taniih, carbit teetik rabte qaskarih kabaara maroh teetit tan. Addunyal sugen saaku sahda akak cunxitta marak yeneeni'mmay, a saaku too diini maleelah yen mari akeera gexe. Akeera gexe uma marat tikka 'ye qaybi keenit yekke.
Tokkel ginaada keenik qangalaylut taniih, Qeelam carbit rabe mara lih tan. Tet qaskaray carbit rabtehiyyah kabaara tet dariifal tan. Raben saaku diini-maleelah sugeenih diini maleh raben. A saakuh tu gactek, edde sugen qaybit edde akeera gexeeniih, carbit qiden marat yengelen.
«Meesek kee Tuubal ummat kaadu, ken qaskarih kabaara maroh keenit taniih, wokkel yanin. Oson diini-maleelah sugeenih; addunyal yenen saaku sahda akak cunxitta marah sugeenimih sabbatah, edde rabeenim carbi.
Dumî dabaanal agiira rabta saaku carbi silac luk ken aagaquk yeneenih, seef lacdi addal ginaadak amô-ginat haak yenen. Ta mari addunyal yen saaku sahda akak meysitta marah sugeeni'mmay, tonnal ken maaguqinnon. Ken dambih digaala ken lafal raqta.
«Masri maraw, isin kaadu carbit rabte diini maleela lih elle baytoonu waytaanam tonna.
«Edom kaadu isi malikwa kee abbobti lih wokkel tan. Too mari kaxxam qande le qaskarak yeneeni'mmay, a saaku diini maleelay carbit rabtehiyya lih, akeeral yanin. Tokkel ginaada keenik qangalaylut tan.
«Saydâ mara kee kilbat le kabut raqta abbobti inkih kaadu wokkel tan. Duma sahdat cunxo qidak yenen. A saakuh tu gactek, diini-maleelah rabeenih; carbit rabe mara lih akeera isinni qaybi xagarat luk gexen. Akeeral yan marat tikka 'ye qaybi keenit yekke.
