Masri malik kee kay qaskar carbit rabele'mmay, usuk akeeral carbit rabe mara yabalu waa waqdi, a marat kaadu aham tekkem kaat amqele. Ahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
«Dumah yan saaku Masri malik a addunyal enna 'ya mari akak cunxita num abeh suge. Takkay immay kaa kee kay qaskar rabeleeh, tohuk wadir diini maleelay carbit rabtehiyya lih gacelon. Tahat yabtam YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.

YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, ku baaxoh mara lih yaabaay, baaxol carbi yakku waa saaku takku waytam keenih waris. Baaxô-mari isi addak ken dacrisu waa numuy dacayrih gaca dooritaama.
Woo num naqboyti xayyoowem yable waqdi, ummatah garci kala'gidih baanta yaagure.
Ta anay yaabbe num aabbih tibba 'yeeh, too waqdi naqboyti amma 'yeh kaa qide kaa tekkek, too raba isik wee week, numuk wee waama.
Macaay intek, astah xongolo oobba heeh cubbil gacaamal kudeh yasillimem duudak yen.
Takkay immay dacayrih yan num naqboyta amaatih ubullaay astah baanta aagure wayya heek, tonnal naqboytit amma 'teh a marak tu qideenik, too mari isi uma-taamah rabele'mmay, too marih raba gaaxah yan numuk weeyyo.
«Hay ta way, bani-adantow, kok axceemih: Israayil marat dacayri hayu waam koo. Anu kok excem keenih warisaay garci keenih kal.
Uma-taama le numuk, ‹Atu uma-taama litooh isi qamalah rabetto› kaak axce waqdi; woo num rabak cattiima'gidih, ‹A edde tan uma taama cab› 'yaanam kaak axce wayya haytek, usuk too abak suge uma-taamat edde rabele'mmay, too numih raba kok weeyyo.
Uma-taama le num, woo uma taamak uduura 'yaanam kaak axcih, ku fayu cinna heeh woo uma taamah rabe kaa tekkek, kay rabah messertinta» yok iyye.
YALLI kaadu qagseh, yok iyyeemih, «Israayil marak intaamah: ‹Isin, «Nanu abne dambi kee qellat nel yemeggeh yan. Edde nanim baati. Taway tahak mannal catimnu dudnaah?» 'yaanam intan› keenik inxic.
‹Waara YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kinniyooh, inni migaaqal xiibita'mmay, uma taama le num isi uma taamah rabam kaak mafaxa. Woo uma taama cabba heeh mano kaak faxa. Israayil-xayloy, uma taama cabaay, manok raba madooritina› keenik inxic» iyye.
Kaadu yok iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, ku marak intaamah, Duma meqe taama luk yen num uma taamat asam baahek, duma abak suge meqe taama kaah xiqtam mali, inxic. Uma num uma taamak yeedeek, digaala kaal matamaata. Meqe taama luk yen num woo meqe taama cabba heeh uma taamat asek, duma abak suge maqaaneh sabbatah qafu kaah maxca. Kaa digaaleyyo.
Meqe num waareleemih qahdi kaah culek lakal, usuk isih ‹Duma abe maqaane yoo xiqtah› 'yaanam niyat hayya heeh, uma-taama qimbise kaa tekkek, duma abba hee maqaanek tut baaqid kaak maha. Takkay immay isih abe uma-taamah isih rabele.
Uma numut umam akkeleemih garci kaah kalek lakal, woo num woo umaane cabba heeh meqe taama fan gacek, rabi cokmi kaal mayamaata.
Masalan, sahda abuuduh duyye kaak beyte saaku, damaanatah luk raaqe duyyey kaak been duyye kaah gacseenik sarra luk raaqehiyya gacse kaa tekkek, hinnay kaadu, garqoh sahdak bee duyye gacseeh, uma-taama cabba heeh mano akak geyu waa xinto kataate kaa tekkek, tonnal marabay; rabi cokmi kaal mayamaatay qumri kaak raagah.
Dumah abeh suge dambi kaah cabeyyo. Meqeemit ase kaa tekkeeh, cakkik tanim abe kaa tekkek tonnal waarele.
«Tonna'mmay ku mari, ‹YALLI abam gita hinna› 'yaanam iyyan. Takkay immay gitat tanim abe waytam, yoo hinna keeni'kkal.
Duma cakkik tanim abak suge num woo cakki cabba heeh uma taamah abittot gacek, too umaaney edde asahiyyak gexxaamah rabele.
Uma-taamah abittot suge num woo umaaneh abittok raqqa 'yeh meqeemit ase kaa tekkek, tonnal too num isi rooci rabak catem deqsitele.
Hay, Israayil maraw, isin ‹YALLI abam qadlik tanim hinna› intan. Takkay immay anu sin abto elle tani'nnal siinil mekla» keenik iyye.
Seewah nee edde been taban kee nammahaytô sanatak tabanhaytoh alsak konoyhaytoh ayro, Yarusalaamak yoowweh yemeete num yol yemeeteeh, «Yarusalaam makko tekkeh» 'yaanam iyye.
Carra woo num yamaatek dumal, YALLIH gaba yol gacah yoh tumbulle. Saaku too num yol yamaatek dumal, akah suge duudak YALLI af yoo geysiiseh. Tohuk wadir yaabay affaruk sugehiyya yaabam qimbise.
Tohuk wadir YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Israayil rasuy abuuruh yanihiyyak addal yan mari iyyaamah, ‹A axxul le baaxo Abraahimiy inki numuh yenehiyyah ikoytah tontocowweeh; nanu manginooh, elle nani ikkel neh kaadu ikoytah akah antacawwe waytam mali› 'yaanam iyyan.
Tonna'mmay keenik intaamah, ‹YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik iyyaamah, Isin qabal akak tif iyya cado takmen. Xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyye taqbuden. Sahda qiddan. Hay, tonnal, ta baaxo sinim akkelem mannal siinit celtaa?
Isinni seefit kaxxiinittan. Umâ-yabulih taniimit assan. Kulli num siinik cuggaaneh siinik yan numih barrat fido faxa. Hay, too way, baaxo sinim akkelem mannal siinit celtaa?› keenik inxic.
«Wohuk kalah keenik intaamah, ‹Yoo waara YALLAY Mulki lehiyya inni migaaqal xiibita'mmay, ama abuuruh tan magaaloolih addal yan mari ambaxele. Magaalak irol yan mara alluwwâ-gadda abeyyo. Qaleela kee gablah addat yombooqoreh yan mara biyak gadda abeyyo.
Inkih yan rasu num sinniih lac sinni abur abeyyo. Oson kaxxam edde akkaluk sugen qande keenik bayseyyo. Ken qaleela dibuh yan aracay sahdayti gitah gace waa abeyyo.
Oson aben dambih, ken digaalu waah baaxo keenik bacari abu waa saaku, YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigelon› » iyye.
YALLI kaadu iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, ku mari magaalat maroh tan gasoh xaqu kee isinni qarwah afal yangoorowen waqdi, ku yaabat yaabaanaah, ‹YALLAK yemeete yab ankacisnu waynak nee beya› sittak iyyan.
Yi mari atu keenik intaamih ankacsah kol kobxan; elle daffeyan. Takkay immay atu aba keenik intam maaban. Atu edde yabta yab kicnoonum ceelan. Takkay immay lon inti-xeera macaban.
Ku yab kaalayta meqe num kacanuh aba gadah lon. Fooximâ-gurrah aytih yaabbeeni'kkal, abinal maasisan.
Atu keenik inxicca 'tem, raq lem hinna, akkeleemiiy; too saaku nabi ken addat sugem aaxigelon» iyye.

YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
Bani-adantow, Israayil abbobtit takku waytam keenih waris. Keenit takku waytam keenih warisaay keenik intaamah: YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik iyyaamah, «Israayil-loynittey, finqi sin yibbixeh! Isinni amo wagittaanah illi amo mawagittan.
Can naktaanaah, illi xagooruk bicsen sarat gactaanaah; ariiqo bahsiisen illi doorru hayteenih takmen. Takkay immay illi madacrissan.
Boola le numuk amo wagitak masuginniton; biyaakita mara daylisak masuginniton. Mudduume marak dale daylisak masuginniton. Buxak badite mara le buxah gacisak masuginniton; finqite mara gorrisak masuginniton. Aaminnaanim keenil baahak sugten; keenit xukkutak ken xiinissen.
Illi loyna luk masuginnaay, tohih sabbatah fixixih yan. Tonna-leemiik alluwwa qiddem kee tokmem yekke.
Yi illi kaxxa koomaami kee qaleelah amol meekot yen. Inkih yan baadal finqiteeniih immay ken gorriseeh ken baahe mari masuginna.
«Siini bas loynittey! Yoo YALLI siinik axcem ankacisa.
Yi illi duweena weeh, kulli num kaa haysiteeh alluwwâ gadda yekke. Yi illit duwah yan mari kaa madacrisinnaay amo kaak mawagtinnay; isi amoh dacayrih raaqe.
Tohih sabbatah illi duweenitow, yooy YALLAH yani siinik axceemih,
Waara YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kinniyooh inni migaaqal xiibita'mmay axceemihii, yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya sin naqboyta kinniyom yok ixiga. Inni illi siinik beeyyo'mmay, tahak wadir duwah siinil maaca. Ahak wadir isinni amo dacrissoonay siinik maxcay, inni illi siinik cateyyooh, akami sin mahaa.
«Yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik axceemih, Inni illih goran innih abeyyooh, innih ken dacriseyyo.
Illit duwah yan num baye illi gorrissa heeh elle gaaboysaah elle dacrisa gurral, anu inni illik kaadu toh abeyyo. Kaxxa dite le baatih ayro edde sugen baatik ken gacseyyo.
Marin baaxok ken gacseyyooh, inki aracal ken gaaboyseyyo. Wadir ken baaxo ken gacseyyo. Israayil baaxoy qaleela leeh buyyitte lehiyya ken gacseyyooh; akadah (agdah) yan arac ken beyya heeh, ken aylooleyyo.
Israayil rasul akadah tan qaleela kee goloola beyya ken heeh, wokkel ken aylooleyyo. Tokkel meysi maleh akah yaloolen innah keenik abeyyo.
Inni illi innih dacriseyyo. Yolooleenik lakal, elle nookan arac innih keenih heeyyo. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
«Baatem innih gorriseyyo; buxak baditit tanim innih gacseyyo. Muddumtem innih dayliseyyo; lakmissam innih qaffoyseyyo. Takkay immay gabul leeh qande lem bayseyyo. Macaay inteenik, anu qadlih aninnaanim aba loyna kinniyo.
«Tonna'mmay yi illow, yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik axceemih, kulli numul siinik ackumeyyo. Umam kee meqem tittak siinik baxseyyo. Illi kee wadar tittak baxseyyo.
Meqe qayso yakmeemih cayye waa illi siinit yan. Akme waamat taqqa 'teenih gexxan; sila le lee taaqubeeniih, isinnih aaqube waytan lee darraqossan.
Isin ibah edde teeqeteenih cabten qayso yi illi yakmeeh, isin darraqossen lee yi illi yaaqube.
«Tonna-leemiik yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya qande le illi kee qande sinni illih fanal cokmi abeyyo.
Biyaakitta ida tenek, ganaysaqtaanaah tet giqak, illik addak xiiriyak tayyaaqen.
Ahaysa inni illi tahak cateyyooh; umam keenil baahi mahaa. Inni illik kulli lacal cokmi abeyyo. Meqe lac kee uma lac tittak baxseyyo.
Malik Dawuduy yi naqasuh yanihiyyah innah yan loynaytu keenih heeyyo. Too loynayti ken dacrisele.
Yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya, innih, ken dacrisa Dagelta akkeyyooh; Malik Dawud innah yan malik ken xiinisa'gidih abba keenik abeyyo. Taham exceh, edde maqagita.
Ken amo amaanah akah xinta'nnah, inni kee ken fanal xagana haysiteyyo. Ken baaxol enna 'ta alluwwa bayseyyo. Tonnal yi illi inkih meysi maleh bacarih tan baaxo kee garboh addal amaanah xiineleh dacrele» iyye.
YALLI kaadu qagseh iyyeemih, «Barkat keenit heeyyooh yi qaleelay taahirih tanih xaqul dabaaqah ken heeyyo. Tokkel faxxiima uddur rob keenih ruubeyyooh, niqmat keenil oobiseyyo.
Coox caxâ-miru keenih xalele; buqrek daro orbisitelon. Kulli num isi baaxol amaanah keenik xiinele. Yi marak axawah edde yanin silsilat kalla heeh, naqoosah ken le marak currih ken ayyaaqu waa saaku, YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigelon.
Irô baaxoh mari ahaysa ken mabuuba. Ahaysa alluwwa ken maqiddaay ken matakma. Sahda ken mameysissay, ahaysa amaanah xiinelon.
Qidinnaan daro elle taabuke baaxo keenih aceeyyooh; ahaysa maqululan. Irô baaxoh mari anqaasah af keenil maraqeeqisa.
Israayil ummat dacrissam yoo kinnim kulli num aaxigeleeh; oson yi mara kinnoonum kulli num aaxigele. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya.
«Isin yi illow, innih ayloole illow, yi mara kinnitoonuuh, anu sin Dagelta kinniyo. Tahat yabtam YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.

YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Edom deqsitta qaleela le baaxot takku waytaamat yab.
Yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya ummatah waris kok axcem waris. Keenik intaamah, Edom qaleelay, anu naqboyta siinik ekkeh an. Lac sinniih num sinni baaxo koo abeyyo.
Magaalooli kaadu abur siinik abeyyo. Baaxo siinik abuuruh cabeyyo. YALLA kinniyom too saaku yok aaxigetton.
«Isin dumaak Israayil ummatah qaduwwih sugteeniih; Israayil ummat isih bahte dambih digaala keenil temeete saakuy kaxxa gadaamat sugeenihiyya, isinni le kabuuk ken qidaana'gidih absissen.
Tonna-leemiik waara YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kinniyooh, inni migaaqal xiibita'mmay, rabal sin digaaleyyo. Too rabak tasillimen ikke mageytan. Baatil kee sahdâ qidimih yimixxige mara kinniton. Sin kaadu woo baatil abbixele.
Edom rasuy qaleelah tanihiyya num sinniih lac sinni baaxo abeyyooh; tokke safarah gexinnaan num qideyyo.
Qaleelah amo sahda raysak kibbiimeleeh; carbit rabu waa marih ginaada koomaami kee goloolaay daqor buulele.
Magaalooli siinik wadirik num elle gace waa abur abeyyo. Too saaku YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigetton.
« ‹Yuuda kee Israayil baaxo yiimiiy; oson kaadu, ikoytah lino mara› inteenih; yooy YALLA kinnihiyya elle yen baaxo isinnih haysittaanam faxxen.
Hay tonnal, waara YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kinniyooh inni migaaqal xiibita'mmay, yi marat abten bagcarra kee keenih luk sugten kuuxewaynaan kee keenih luk sugten naqabih, cane siinil gacseyyo. Too saaku sin akah digaalam, keenil bahten umaaneh sabbatah kinnim aaxigelon.
Isin kaadu ken burutak, ‹Israayil qaleela niimiiy; abuuruh raqteeh, ni gabal gacte› axcuk, yabteenim siinik oobbem aaxigetton.
Tirtirisak yi giddinaamak edde yabten yab kee ceele-waytoy inteenihiyya siinik oobbeh.
«Tonna-leemiik yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik axceemih, isin Israayil maray yok sah numtin mara akke waahiyyat kaxxa baati tekke saaku, farcatah akah gacca 'ten innah, anu kaadu inkih yan baad akah ifricca 'ya baati siinit abeyyo. Seeqir qaleela kee inkih yan Edom rasu num sinniih lac sinni bacarih tan baaxo abeyyo. Anu YALLA kinniyom too saaku kulli num aaxigele» iyye.

Yalli iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, Israayil qaleelat takku waytaamat yab. Yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya ken lih yaaba yab ankacisa keenik inxic. Israayil naqboytit kaxxiinat, ‹A qaleeli niimi› 'yaanam iyyen.
«Hay tonnal takku waytaamat yaabaay, keenik intaamah: YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyaamah, Israayilik cuggaaneh yan mari Israayil qaleela yibbixeeh ken buube saaku, ken gabal gacteenih; too mari sin bursuteeh anqaasah af siinil raqeeqise.
Tonna-leemiik dariifal yan mari elle anqaasaah buuben qaleelaay koomaamiiy, daqooruuy, gololwa kee abuuruh raqte aroocaay, tonnah kaadu, abur aben magaalooliy, takkeenimiik, yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik axcem oobbeya.
«Yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya dariifal tan baaxooxah mara luk naqabut yaabah aniih, axcihiiy Edom lih naqabut yaaba. Yi baaxo been saaku farcatah rabakaay, iyyi maca nek abele 'yaanamah beeniih, saqi elle yaloole arooca isinnih haysiten.
«Tohih sabbatah taway Israayil baaxot takku waytaamat yaabaay, qaleela kee koomaamiiy daqor kee goloolah, yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya sahda keenit abte bura ubleemih sabbatah, edde an naqabu luk axcem waris.
Dariifal enna 'ta baaxooxa qaybit ken qideyyoomuh, kaxxa xiibah xiibita'mmay,
yi Israayiliy, qaleela ayyuufa siinih baaheleeh, caxâ-miru siinih xalele. Ahaysa isinni baaxo xayuk gacetton.
Anu kaadu sin qaxat aniih, baaxol buqre abqurettoonuuh, away kaadu darqi elle aabukelem siinih diggoysa.
Israayil ummatey, sin aymaggeyyooh, magaalooli fan sin gacseyyo. Tiddigille qarwa nammeyhaak xisetton.
Ummat kee lac aymaggeyyo. Mango xaylo xalettoonuuh, dumak amaggetton. Dumak akah sugten innah tanoonay sin axceyyo. Dumak fuli gaddaliino siinit heeyyo. YALLA kinniyom too saaku yok aaxigetton.
Yi Israayilih ummatey, sin baaxo fanah sin gacseyyo. Tahaysa ta baaxo sin ikoyta akkeleeh, xaylo siinik rabi mahayta» iyye.
«YALLAY Mulki lehiyya qagseh iyyaamah: sahda a baaxok intaamah, ‹A baaxo sinam takmeeh, isi marih xaylo selteh› 'yaanam iyyan.
Ta tiyak yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya axceemih, Ta baaxo tahak wadir, sinam takmeeh sin xaylo selta baaxo matakka. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya.
Tahak wadir a baaxo ummat makot mabeytaay; sahda anqaasah elle rabtaah, ummat burah af elle raqeeqissa baaxo matakka. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
Kaadu YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Israayil mari isi baaxol suge saaku, ken qamal kee ken uma-taama a baaxo nadaasa abte. Ken qamal yi garil wasaktuk taahirroowe wayte barrah gide yol luk suge.
Isinni baaxoh addal, sahdat abak sugen qidiyya kee, xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeeyah aban qibaadah sabbatah, yi naqbi le'nna yabloonay ken exce.
Oson abak sugen umaane kee ken qamalal keenil mekle. Ummat addat baxacah ken ruubeeh, aaxige waan marih fanat ken fixixise.
Elle gexinnaan baaxol yi migaaqay taahirik yanihiyya baysen. Toh mannalaay intek, ‹Ama mari YALLIH marak tene'mmay, a saaku kay baaxo cabeenih gexaanah yanin› 'yaanam iyyaanaah; yi migaq keenil xagan.
Oson gexinnaan baaxol ken sabbatah yi migaaqay taahirik yani xaggiimaah, toh yol umah.
«Tonna'mmay taway Israayil marak intaamah, ‹YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyaamah: Taway abu waam akah abu waam, Israayil marih taaga hinna'mmay, inni migaaqay taahirik yanih taagah aba› keenik inxic. ‹Isin elle gexinnaan baaxol yi migaq bayisak sugten› keenik inxic.
Yi migaaqay taahirik yanihiyyay isin bayisak sugteenihiyya ummatah qaddoysu waa saaku, anu YALLA kinniyom aaxigelon. Siinih abu waamat, gersi baaxol yan mari saytun Dagelta kinniyom yok aaxigelon. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya.
Macaay inteenik, kulli doolat kee baaxoh addak bahha sin heeh, sin baaxo sin heeyyo.
Xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyey aqbuduk sugteenihiyyah nadaasak taahirrowtaana'gidih, taahirik tan leet sin rifeyyo. Liton nadaasak sin kaqliseyyo.
Qusba afqado kee qusba misinkaca siinit heeyyo. Xaak yan lubbi siinik kalla heeh, algin lubbi siinit heeyyo.
Inni Roocaaniyya siinit heeyyo. Siinil ecee amri kee madqa duudusa mara sin abeyyo.
Sin kaxxa abbobtih ecee baaxol nooketton. Yi mara akkettoonuuh; sin Dagelta akkeyyo.
Nadaasa sin abba haytaamak, innih sin waaseyyo. Qulul sin akah gee waa innah, daro siinih tamaggay axceyyo.
Coox-xaylo kee buqrek daro siinih aymaggeyyooh; tohuk gexxaamah, ummat addal qawratak sin qida qulul matablan.
Isinni uma-qamal kee qellatay edde asak sugteenihiyya siinih ambulleele. Too waqdi abak sugten dambi kee ceele-waytoy edde sugteenihiyyak gexxaamah, isinni nabsi inqibba heetton.
Tonna'mmay Israayil ummatey, aaxigeh meqeemih, tahak wadir abba haam inkih akah abam, sin taaga hinna'mmay, inni migaaqih taaga kinni. Abteenimik gexxaamah qaybi kee wacarriy sin yabbixay! Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Naharak sin taahirrossa heek sarra, isinni magaalah addal gacca 'teenih tiddigille qarwa akah xissittan innah siinih abeyyo.
Duma buqre elle abak tenen baaxoh xaquk, gitah gaca mari woo buqre baatem abaluk sugen. Ahak wadir woo arooca abqurettonuuh, daro elle aysubuketton.
Tah yabalu waa mari, ‹A baaxoy bacari tekkeh sugtehiyya a saaku Qadan bustaan celteh tan. A magaalooliy buubba heenih bututtukku heenih abur abeenih cabeenihiyya, a saaku ummat elle gacteh taniih gasoosa maroh leh tan› axcelon.
Too saaku a baatik nagay raqte ummatay cuggaaneh siinik tanihiyya, tiddigille magaalooli bicisseeh toomeh tan baaxoy bacari tekkehiyya bicissem yoo kinnim aaxigelon. Yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya taham abeyyoomuh xagana culaah, abeyyo» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Israayil mari ahak sarra cato yol essereleeh, too waqdi illi innah ken aymaggeyyo.
Yarusalaam magaalal duma qiddi ayro sadgatah qidan illi mangah akkuk yeneh gide, abuuruh raqteh sugte magaaloolil elle yan mari mangah woo gide akkele. Too saaku YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigelon» iyye.

YALLIH gaba xagaral yok gacteeh, isi Roocaaniyyat beyya yoo heeh, golok gudel daffessa yoo hee. Woo goloh addal mango lafoofi ten.
Too waqdi Yalli too goloh addal woo qaxak a qaxah yoo meekiseeh, mango lafoofiy kaffa karacca 'tehiyya uble.
Too waqdi yok iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, a lafoofi ahak wadir anuwweelem kot maay celtaa?» iyye.
Anu too waqdi «YALLAW, Mulki le Dageltaw, woh atu taaxige ikkal, anu maaxiga» exce.
Too waqdi Yalli yok iyyeemih, «Ama lafoofiy kaftehiyyak, ‹YALLIH yab ankacisa› inxic.
Keenik intaamah: YALLAY Mulki le siinik iyyaamah, ‹Ufuy siinit heeyyooh, rooci siinit gacseyyo.
Ramoodaay cadoyta kee arab xagaral siinih gacseyyo. Rooci siinit gacissa heeh aynuwwee sin liyo. YALLA kinniyom too saaku aaxigetton› keenik inxic» iyye.
Anu too waqdi YALLI yok elle iyye'nnal, too lafoofi lih takku waytaamat yaabe. Too yaabat an waqdi, sasac intaamih anay yol rade. Too waqdi lafoofi tittat xakbinte.
Annah wagga hee waqdi, lafoofiy tittat xakbintehiyyal cadoyta kee ramooda aduurih uble. Sarrak arab keenil gace. Takkay immay rooci keenil gaceh mananna.
Too waqdi Yalli yok iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, ama caacaya lih yaabaay intaamah, YALLAY Mulki lehiyya: ‹Caacayow, kulli kabuk amay, ama xagaray tablehiyyat yanuwweeni'gidih ufuy hay, kok iyyah yan› inxic» yok iyye.
Too waqdi caacayak, too YALLI yok inxic akah iyye'nnah, exce. Anu toh exce waqdi, too lafoofiy naharak xagar tekkehiyyat ufuy culeeh, too waqdi rooci keenil gaceeh, solla 'yen. Too mari sittat, dudda le macaxih gide yekke.
Too waqdi Yalli yok iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, tama lafoofi Israayil marah ceelallo. Israayil mari, ‹Nanu lafoofih innah kafneh karacca inneh nani'kkal, tahaysa xiqnam linoh manan› 'yaanam iyyan.
Tonna'mmay Israayil marah takku waytaamat yaabaay, keenik intaamah: YALLAY Mulki lehiyya siinik iyyaamah, ‹Yi maraw, kabri siinik fakkaay eyyeqqa sin heeh, sin baaxo sin gacseyyo.
Kabri adda siinil fakkaay sin eyyeqqa heeh, sin baaxo sin gacisu waa saaku, yi maraw, YALLA kinniyom yok aaxigetton.
Inni ufuy siinit heeyyo. Rooci siinit gacseyyo. Tohuk lakal isinni baaxol dabaaqah gacetton. Too saaku yooy YALLAH yani abeyyo iyyam duudusa Dagelta kinnim yok aaxigetton. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya› keenik inxic» iyye.
YALLIH qangara kaadu yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, caxxa baahay, ‹Yuudâ doolat kee kaa'lih yan Israayilih yooboke mara› 'yaanam bagul akak uktub. Kaadu gersi caxxa baahay, ‹Yuusuf-Efrayim kee kaa'lih yan Israayilih yooboke mara› 'yaanam elle uktub.
Sarrak too namma caxxi ku gabah addat, inki caxxa akah ceela'nnah, sanah tittat xakbis.
Ku mari, ‹Ah macah abte?› kok iyyeenik,
keenik intaamah: YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyaamah, ‹Yuusuf-Efrayim migaq elle yan caxxa, Yuuda migaq elle yan caxxa lih haam faxa. A namma caxxa tittat gaadissa heeh inki caxxah gacissa heeh inni gabat heeyyo› keenik inxic.
«Tama namma caxxa gabat haay sinam tabalay inxic.
Sarrak keenik intaamah: YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyaamah, ‹Israayil mara elle gexen baaxok bahha heeh, tittal ken kobxissa heeh ken baaxo ken gacseyyo.
Israayil baaxoh qaleelal inki doolat ken abeyyo. Ken titta lih xiinisa malik aallelon. Ahak wadir namma doolat mayakkan. Ken doolat namma'kkel makurrunta.
Tohuk wadir, anu niqibyo xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh qibaada kee, dambi abittot nadaasa isinni maaban. Yoo hawwenna heenih abak sugen dambik qafu keenih axceyyo. Ken taahirroyseyyooh; yi ummat akkeloonuuh, anu ken Dagelta akkeyyo.
Yi naqasuh yan Dawud innah yan malik, malik keenik akkele. Inki loynaytih gubat xiineloonuuh, yi amri kee yi xinto intam digga luk duuduselon.
Dabaaqah, yi naqasuh yan Yaqkuubuh ecee baaxoy oson akak raden ken kaxxa abbobti duma elle sugtel gacelon. Tokkel keeniiy ken xaylo kee ken ramad guubuh gacele. Too rasi kulli way kenim akkele. Yi naqasu Malik Dawud innah yan malik tokkel ken xiinisele. Kulli way abbah keenik waarele.
Anu qahdi ken lih haysiteyyooh, too qahdi amaanah ken xiiniseyyoomuh digga keenih akkele. Ken xiseyyooh, ixxima keenik aymaggeyyooh; inni Qibaadah-Qariy tokkek way kate waahiyya too baaxol heeyyo.
Innih ken addal gaceyyo; innih ken Dagelta akkeyyooh, oson kaadu yi mara akkelon.
Yi Qibaadah-Qariy way kate waahiyya tokkel hayu waa saaku, irô baaxoh ummat inkih, Israayil mara isi mara abtem yoo YALLA kinnim aaxigelon› 'yaanam iyya, keenik inxic» yok iyye.

YALLIH qangara yol obteeh; yok iyyeemih:
«Bani-adantow, Magoog rasuk Mesek kee Tuubal deqsitta namma kedoh abbah yan Goog deqsita numih abina ilaaqaay, kaat takku waytaamat yab.
Kaak intaamah: YALLAY Mulki lehiyya, ‹Naqboyta kok ekkeh an› kok iyyah yan.
Sanat santiita kok hayya heeh, koo kee ku qaskar qusba yaahatal ayfukuneyyo. Qaskaray faaris amok qeebi abtahiyyak mangom lito. Kulli qaskariiti gob kee seefit tikyah yan. Takkay immay koo kee ku qaskar fixixiseyyo.
Fursi kee Kuus kee Fuut rasuk yemeete mari ken lih yan. Too mari inkih gob loonuuh amot dacayrih haan birti-kalabta lon. Koo catoonuh bical yanin.
Qeebi abta labhak Goomar kee kilbat le kabuk xer rikel yan Beet-Togarma mari inkih ko'lih yan. Wohuk kalah mango baaxoh mari ko'lih yan.
Bica kok axce. Qaskar inkih, atu ken amrisa waqdi, bical gactay.
Uli baaxoy mango baaxol sugte ummatta tittal uduurra 'teh titta lih elle tanihiyya tan. Ta baaxoh mari carbi meysi mali. Mango sanatak lakal, too baaxo akah tabbixe innah koo ruubeyyo. Toh Israayil rasuuy; mango dabaanah Israayil qaleeli dibuk suge. Num sinniih lac sinni rasuh suge'mmay, a saaku woo mari woo qaleelal amaanah xiinan. Takkay immay too marat atu qeebi abetto.
Koo kee ku qaskar kee, wohuk kalah, mango baaxok yemeete mari sin lih gacca 'yeh, caacoh innal, ken wararetton. Inkih tan baaxo qamburreh innah buuletton» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya Goog giddinaamak iyyaamah, «Too ayro gufta saaku, uma malah malsetto.
Cato sinni baaxoh maray carbi able weeh, amaanah xiinaah, gaso sinni magaaloolil yanihiyya qeebit tabbixeemil malsetto.
Dumî dabaanal abuuruh sugte baaxol a saaku amaanah xiina mara wararettoh buubetto. Too warartu wayta mari, mango marih addak yemeete mara. A saaku mango lac kee duyye lon. Dabaaqah baadak cundubul yanin.
Saba kee Dadan deqsita rasuk yemeete mara kee, wohuk kalah, Isbaaniya rasuk yemeete badaaqat aba mari kok iyyu waamah, ‹Qaskar luk amma 'teh qeebi sinaamat akah abtem, duyye keenik buubta'gidi innaa? Dahab kee lakqo kee lac kee duyye buubba hayteh gabat luk gexxam maay faxxaa?› kok axcelon» iyye.
Tohuk gexxaamah Yalli Goog warisu waa farmo yol ruube. Yok iyyeemih, «Yi Israayilih ummat amaanah elle xinta ikkel,
atu kilbat le kabuk dabaaqah elle tani'kkek texxeereh gexetto. Mango macaxuy celeemah yanihiyyay mango baaxok yemeetehiyya yakkeemiik faras amot amaateloonuuh ko'lih gexelon. Too waqdi ta mara wararetton.
Yi Israayilih ummatat caacoy baaxok baaxo gexxah innah, elle temeete innaak qeebi abetto. Sarrah yan dabaanah, yi baaxo tabbixe'gidih, koo ruubeyyo. Toh akah abu waam, raqqa 'te baaxooxah mari yoo yaaxige'gidiiy, tonnah kaadu, kol baahu waamak gexxaamah, taahirik yan Dagelta kinniyom yok yaaxigeeni'gidi» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Atu, dumaak Israayilih tooboke inni nabuwwah afat, wakti gufa saaku Israayil marat qeebi aba num ruubeyyo akak exceh suge num kinnito» iyye.
«Goog Israayilit qeebi abu waa saaku, yi naqabuy gibdihiyya ambulleele. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya.
Too saaku Israayil rasul ibak gibdi baaxoh angoyyi akkelem inni bagcarray gibdihiyyah addat aybeleeleqeyyo.
Kullunta takkuu, kimbir takku, naba ala takku, qunxa ala takkay, baaxol ibah gexxa 'tam takku, a baadal enna 'ya bani-adanti takku, yi meysik gexxaamah axaxitele. Qaleeli radele. Boolal bokokele. Magaaloolit maroh tan gasoosa addigillele.
Googul umaaneh innah tanim baaheyyooh, akak cunxitta 'ya umaane kaal ruubeyyo. Taham intam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya. Kay mari qeebih tittal aduureleeh seefit titta qidelon.
Toh lih kaadu dalka kee qabala tittak caxeloonuuh, tohul ken digaaleyyo. Kaa kee kay qaskar kee, wohuk kalah yan maray kay xaquk gacca 'yeh qeebih gulguluh yanihiyyal, kaxxa roobuy gira kee dani (xalol kibrik) agleh yanihiyya keenil ruubeyyo.
Nabna le Dageltay taahirik yanihiyya kinniyom mango baaxoh mara tonnal aybulleeyyo. Oson YALLA kinniyom tonnal yok aaxigelon» iyye.

Yalli kaadu yok iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, Goog abina ilaaqaay, kaat takku waytaamat yab. Kaak intaamah, ‹YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kok iyyaamah, Mesek kee Tuubal deqsitta namma kedoh abbah yan Googow, anu naqboyta kok ekkeh an.
Elle gexak sugte kaalib kok makka heeh, elle tan kilbat le kabuk xer rikek koo miraacisak, Israayil qaleelal tan Israayil ummat gaadda'gidih koo baaheyyo.
Tohuk lakal koo aatukeyyooh, gayse guri gabak kok akah radaah gaysê-baxi kaadu migdi gabak kok akah radda'nnah abeyyo.
Koo kee ku qaskar kee, ku qaxat gacca 'teh ko'lih qeebi abta'gidih temeete qaskar ambaxeleeh; raysi siinik Israayil qaleelal raaqele. Raysa siinik haada kee alluwwâ maaqo abeyyo.
Kaxxa booxak bagul ginaada kok raaqele. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya› inxic» iyye.
«Magoog rasu kee baddi afal amaanah xinta ummat elle tan rasut gira ruubeyyo. Too saaku anu YALLA kinniyom kulli num yok aaxigele.
Yi migaaqay taahirik yani Israayil ummatay yi ummatah tanihiyyah addal akah yamixxige'nnah abeyyo. Tahak wadir ceele-waa migaq yoh abaanam maqansiisa. Tohuk wadir gersi baaxol yan mari inkih, anu Israayil rasul taahirik yan Dagelta kinniyom yok aaxigelon.
Amaatele exce ayro amaateleeh raq matalla. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya› » iyye.
Qagseh YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Israayil magaaloolih addal tan ummat, carbi silaacay baaxot radehiyya onkossa heenih girâ-bocoh heelon. Tohumuu, qunxa gob kee kaxxa goobwaay, gayseesa kee gaysê-xaylo kee, qeebi edde aban coox kee macaxwa inkih, gaabossa heenih bocoh haysitelon. Too silaacay girâ-bocoh haysiteenihiyya malcina sanatah bocoh dudda ken heele.
Too silac girâ-bocoh haysiteloonuuh; tohuk gexxaamah bocô-goranah coox elle yan booxa magexaanaay, garbok bocoh coox mayargiqan. Ken warare mara warareloonuuh, ken buube mara buubelon. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
«Toh inkih takku wayta saaku, Rabe Bad deqsita badak ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta Safarah Gacan-Golo deqsitta goloh addal, Goog elle yaaguqeeni'gidih, arac aceeyyo. Goog kee kay qaskar too aracal aaguqeloonuuh; tohuk lakal sinam tokke safarah magacan. Too arac Goog le Mango Qaskarih Golo deqsitele.
Israayil marat too axxul le raysa uguqqaay, too arac fiyya haanam malcina alsa keenik beele.
Woo baaxol enna 'ya mari woo raysa aaguqelon. Oson toh abeenimih sabbatah, yi nabna ayballayu waa ayrot, oson migaq geelon. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
«Woo malcina alsi gaba kalek lakal, baaxol raaqe raysa aagaquk baaxo taahirroysa'gidih, raysa gorrisu waa mara doorelon. Too mari malcina alsih gide too goranat gacele.
Woo baaxoh addal elle meekitaanamal sahda lafa geyan waqdi, xaqut kaak asta heenih cabelon. Tonnal kabri daga mari yamaate waqdi, too lafa Goog le Mango Qaskarih Goloh addal aaguqelon.
Tohiital Caman deqsitta magaala anele. Caman 'yaanamak maqna Mango 'yaanama. Tonnah abak baaxo taahirroyselon.»
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya yok iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, anu keenih bicse sadgat yattakammeeni'gidih, haada kee alluwwah sec. ‹Israayil qaleelah amol kaxxa sadgat akkele. Tokkel alluwwa kee haaday, sahdâ qabal kee cado yakmeeni'gidih ama› keenik inxic.
‹Qaskar raysak cado akmettoonuuh, baad abbobtih qabala aaqubetton. Yakkeenimiik, maruw akkiiy ida akki reyta akkiiy, hinnay kaadu, ariiqo bahsiisen awur akki elle yasguuden innal, ken asguudelon.
Ta mara anu sadgatah qidu waa saaku, isin gabul le cadok dudda haytaanam keenik akmetton. Qabalak keenik cayya intaanam fan aaqabuk sugetton.
Anu siinih xayyoosa maaqok faras takku, faras amot gexa marih cado takku, qaskar takku, wohuk kalah tan labhay qeebi abtahiyyah cado takku, dudda haanaah gide akak akmetton. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya› 'yaanam keenik inxic» iyye.
Yalli iyyeemih, «Inni nabna irô baaxoh mara aybulleeyyo. Inni cokmi aybulle'gidih gaba qida saaku, yi gaba le'nna aybulleeyyo.
Israayil mari tohuk wadir YALLAY ken Dagelta kinniyom yok aaxaguk raaqele.
Israayil mara seewah marin baaxo akah beenim, ken umaane kee yol baahen ceele wayto kinnim, gersi baaxoh ummat inkih aaxigele. Anu too waqdi darre keenit cabeeh, ken naqboytit carbil keenik akah tayse'nnah abe. Qeebit raben.
Darre keenit cabeeh, oson aben umaane kee dambik gexxaamah ken celta digaala keenit abe» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Anu a saaku, Yaqkuubuk rade marah racmateyyo. Ahak sarra akah sugen gaddaleela ken abeyyo. Inni migaaqay taahirik yani dacriseyyo.
Anu taahirik yan Dagelta kinniyom sahda aybulle'gidih, inni mara naqboytit lih elle yanin aracak ayyaaqeyyo. Ahak sarra isinni baaxoy num ken elle meysiise waahiyya uduurra 'yeenih amaanah xiinoonu waan saaku, duma yok yexxeereenim kassa haan waqdi wacarriyelon.
Too waqdi yi mari anu YALLAAY; ken Dagelta yoo kinnim aaxigelon. Ah elle yaaxigoonu waanam, duma innih seewah ken ruubeeh a saaku wadir gaabossa ken heeh, num keenik cabe'kal, inkih ken rasu ken gacsaamal yok aaxigelon.
Israayil marat inni Roocaaniyya heeyyo. Tahak wadir darre keenit macaba. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.

Seewah nee edde been labaatanna kee konoyhaytô sanat tikkaay, allî baaxoh mari Yarusalaam yibbixeemih taban kee fereyhaytô sanat tikka 'yeh, qusba sanat culeemih tabanhaytoh ayro tikka 'te saaku, YALLIH qande maqar luk yol gacteeh, too qande fayya yoo hayteeh yoo beyteh.
Yalli isi wacyih Israayil rasu fan yoo beeh, Yarusalaam magaalal tan kaxxa qaleh amol yoo hee. Too qalek gabbi-qaxat magaalah innal xissinte qarwa uble.
Tokke fanah yoo bee. Too waqdi nacaas innah liliq iyya num uble. Too num qarih akak culan daaratih afal soolah uble. *Baftak bicsen boor kee baaxo edde yamittiren caxxa gabat luk yen.
Woo num yok iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, akke akah temeetem, anu koo aybulleem nagay ankacissuuy cubbusseh raqta'gidi kinnuk, intih wagitaay tublem Israayil marah waris» yok iyye.
Anu ublem, Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik ten. Too Qibaadah-Qarit gaso maroh ten. Too num baaxo edde yamittiren caxxay sidiica mitri xexxaarah yakkehiyya bahha heeh, Qibaadâ-Qarit maroh heen gaso edde yimittire. Too gasok gidaar fayyah sidooca mitri akkuk yeneeh, masuh sidooca mitri akkuk yen.
Tohuk gaba kalla hee waqdi, daarat akak yawqen afay ayrô-mawqa le kabut af cabtahiyya fanah gexe. Tokkek mawqeena yewqeeh; amo guffu hee waqdi, dagaak guba fanah culma takkeh gide yimittire. Sidooca mitri xexxaarah tekke.
Culmak gitak akak gacan aracak gura kee migdi le kabut sidooca aracay dacayri-mari elle soolahiyya yen. Woo arooca sittat lecey akkuk teneeh; kulli arac affara kaalib luk yen. Woo *ruknittek kulli *rukni sidooca mitri akkuk yen. Ken fanal ten gidaar masuh namma mitri kee garab akkuk yen. Woo dacayrih yan mari elle soola arac kee Qibaadâ-Qarik afa le kabut raaqa daarat fan akak yawqen goliy Qibaadâ-Qarit afa cabahiyyak fanat, akak taban aracay xexxaarah sidooca mitri yakkehiyya yen.
Too goliy akak yawqeenihiyya yimittire waqdi, affara mitri xexxaarah yekke. Too goli, too culmal raqte aroocak Qibaadâ-Qarit xayuk yeneeh; woo golik gidaarwa masuh inki mitri akkuk ten.
Dacayrih yan marih aroocay woo gitah gacan aracak tattabat raqtahiyya nabnah inki gide akkuk ten. Keenik fanal tan gidaarwa kaadu masuh inki gide akkuk ten.
Tohuk lakal culma le kabuk raqta gitah akak gacan arac baguh yakkeh gide yimittire waqdi, tittat laca mitri kee garab tekke. Fakimit tan culmah akak culan namma afak fanat tan faxo yimittire waqdi koona mitri tekke.
Woo dacayrih yan marih sidooca aracak foocat, qunxa gidaaray amok fayyah mitrik garab yakkeeh, masuh kaadu mitrik garab yakkehiyya yen. Too aroocak kulli arac affara kaalib luk yeneeh, kulli *rukni xexxaarah sidooca mitri akkuk yen.
Dacayri-marih aracak tiyak teenak xabba haanamaay, nammeyhaytô dacayrih yan numih aracak gitah gacan foxok foocat raaqa aracak ellecabo fan yimittire waqdi, taban kee nammay kee garab mitri yekke.
Culmak ellecabot raaqa arac daarat fanah beyak yen. Too arac kaadu yimittire waqdi baguh tabna mitri yekke.
Culmak afal tan gidaarak xabba haanamaay ellecaboh arac edde raaqa ikkeh amma 'yaanam, labaatanna kee koona mitri tekke.
Woo aroocak afa le kabut raqta gidaarwa qunxa afoofî-xaylo luk ten. Tonnah kaadu adda le kabu raqta gidaarway aroocak fanal tanihiyya qunxa afoofi luk ten. Gitah akak gacan aracak foocat tan adda le kabu raqta gidaarwa, bilqah heen nakli-tasaawirih bagul luk ten.
Sarrak too num Qibaadâ-Qari akak culan afak daarat fanah yoo bee. Tokkel woo irô-kabu raqta gasot xakabuh xisen soddom goli yen. Too soddom golik foocat xeet qalumuh elle heen arac yen.
Too aracay qalumuk bicseenihiyya xexxaarah daaratak a kabuuy woo kabu akkuk yen. Qibaadâ-Qarik afa le kabut raaqa daarat, adda le kabut raaqa daaratak ramma axcuk raaqa.
Adda le kabut raaqa daaratih fan koo beyta culma fayya le aracal ten. Woo num woo namma culmak fanal raqta baaxo xexxaarah takkeh gide yimittire waqdi, kontom mitri tekke.
Tohuk lakal, woo num kilbat le kabut raqta culmay afa le kabu raaqa daarat fan beytahiyya yimittire.
Gitah akak gacan aracak gura kee migda le kabut raaqa dacayrih yan marih sidooca aracaay, woo lica aracak kulli aracat tan gidaarwa kee, Qibaadâ-Qari akak culan naharsi goli yakkeemiik inkih, ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqqa 'ta culmak kaxxih, inki gide akkuk ten. Culma xexxaarah labaatanna kee koona mitri akkuk teneeh, baguh taban kee nammay kee garab akkuk ten.
Qibaadâ-Qarih adda akak culan naharsi goli kee taagoota kee nakli-tasaawir inkih ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta afah innah akak ten. Malcina rankok lakal mawqeena bukka inta way, woo culma fanah tamaate. Too culmak ellecabot raaqa arac daaratat af luk raaqa.
Ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta culmal akah tene'nnah, kilbatak adda le kabut raaqa daarat fanah beyta gersi culma ten. Too num too namma culmak fanal raqta baaxo xexxaarah takkeh gide yimittire waqdi, kontom mitri tekke.
Sarrak woo num gabbi-qaxal yoo bee. Tokkel kaadu culma uble. Too culmaak addah akak culan naharsi goli kee, gura kee migdak tan gidaarwa yimittire waqdi, gersi culmah gide akkuk ten.
Duma kaxxih, a culmah kabuk tan golitte taagat luk ten. Culmak afa xexxaarah labaatanna kee koona mitri akkuk ten. Baguh taban kee nammay kee garab akkuk ten.
Wokke mawqeenay elle yawqeenihiyyak malcina ranko tawqe. Too culmak ellecabot raaqa arac daaratat af luk raaqa. Tonnah kaadu, adda le kabut raqta gidaarwak bagul, nakliita tasaawir yen. Too gidaarwa gitah akak gacan aracat afkunuk raqta.
Tokkeek kaadu adda le kabut raaqa daarat fan beyta culma ten. Woo num woo namma culmak fanal raqta baaxo xexxaarah takkeh gide yimittire waqdi, kontom mitri tekke.
Too num gabbi-qaxat raqta culmaak adda le kabut raaqa daaratih fan yoo bee. A culma takkeh gide yimittire waqdi, gersi culmah gide akkuk ten.
Dacayrih yan marih arooca kee, adda akak culan naharsi goli kee, Qibaadâ-Qarih adda le kabut raqta gidaarwa inkih, too naharak uble culmah innah ten. A culmah addal tan arooca kaadu taagoota luk ten. Ta culma xexxaarah tittat labaatanna kee koona mitrik teneeh, baguh taban kee nammay kee garab ten.
Akak culan naharsi goli, afa le kabu raaqa daarat fan afkunuk yen. Bilqah heen nakli-tasaawir gitah akak gacan arac gexxa 'yam gidaar bagul taswiirih yen. Afa le kabu raaqa daaratak bacra rankok lakal mawqeena bukka inta way, woo culma fanah tamaate.
Tokkeek too num ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta culmaak, Qibaadâ-Qarik adda le kabut raaqa daarat fanah yoo bee. Too culma takkeh gide yimittireh. Too culma nabnah gersi culmah gide akkuk ten.
Dacayrih yan marih arooca kee, culma akak culan naharsi goli kee, adda kabut raqta gidaarwa inkih, too duma yimittire dacayri-marih arooca kee, culma akak culan naharsi goli kee, adda kabut raqta gidaarwa gide tekke. Dariifat inkih taagoota akak teneeh; addah akak culan naharsi goli kaadu dariifat taagoota luk yen. Tittat xexxaarah labaatanna kee koona mitri akkuk yen. Baguh taban kee nammay kee garab mitrik akkuk yen.
Akak culan naharsi goli, afa le kabu raaqa daaratih foocal yen. Gitah akak gacan arac gexxa 'yam tan gidaarwah bagul bilqah heen nakli-tasaawir yen. Daarataak bacra ranko bukka inta way, too culma fanah tamaate.
Tokkeek too num kilbat le kabut raqta culma fanah yoo beeh, tokke kaadu yimittireh. Too culma nabnah gersi culmah gide akkuk ten.
Aki culma kaxxih, dacayrih yan marih aroocaay, adda le kabut raqta gidaarway bilqah heenihiyya kee, akak culan naharsi goli kee, rooruh tan taagoota luk ten. Tittat xexxaarah labaatanna kee koona mitri akkuk ten. Baguh taban kee namma mitri kee garab akkuk ten.
Akak culan naharsi goli, afa le kabu raaqa daaratat afkanuk raaqa. Gitah gacan arac gexxa 'yam tan gidaarwah bagul bilqah heen nakli-tasaawir yen. Daarataak culma akak culan naharsi goli fan, koo tayyaaqe bacra ranko le mawqeena ten.
Culma akak culan naharsi golik garit, xisen qari yen. Cado akak carrisan saqih cado, naharal elle kaqlisaanam tokkek ten.
Culma akak culan naharsi golih addal, affara miiziy titta fanah yafkunehiyya yen. Woo affara miizik nammayay kabul yen. Cado inkih akak carrisan saq kee, dambi-kalootuh-baahan-sadgat kee, edde-asen-qellatih-cakkih-baahan-saqa elle asguuduk yeneenim, ta miizwah bagu.
Too qarik iro le kabul, affara miiziy titta ceelahiyya yen. Too affara miizik nammay qari akak culan mawqeenak kabuk teenal yeneeh; aki nammay mawqeenak gersi kabul yen.
Tonnal sadgatah baahan saq elle yasguuden miizwa tittat bacaar akkuk ten. Woo bacaarak fereey qari addal yeneeh, fereey kaadu afal daaratal yen.
Cado akak carrisan saq elle yasguuden miizway fereey akkuk tenehiyya akak bicseenim, orra heen xeetik ten. Woo miizwak kulli miiz fayyah mitrik garab akkuk yen. Baguh inki ibih faraaqoh gid yakke affara kaalib luk yen. Saq sadgatah qidan waqdi edde taamitta 'yan duyye inkih, woo miizih amol ten.
Gidaarwal duyye edde takran duyyey fallakka lehiyyak kulli tiy akak gaba gennaqtah gide takkehiyya ten. Sadgatah qidan saqih cado elle haak yeneenim, miizwah amok ten.
Sarrak too num adda le kabut raaqa daarat fanah yoo bee. Tokkel adda kabu raaqa daaratat namma goli uble. Too golik tiyak teeni kilbat le kabut raqta culmak garit yeneeh, gabbi-qaxa fanah afkunuk yen. Tiyak teeni kaadu gabbi-qaxat raqta culmak garit yeneeh, kilbat le kabu fanah afkunuk yen.
Too num yok iyyeemih, «Ama gabbi-qaxa fan yafkune goli, a Qibaadah-Qarih addal Yallih taamat tan seeka elle taamitta goli» yok iyye.
Kilbat le kabu fanah yafkune goli, sadgat elle aban aracat tan seeka elle taamitta goli. Seeka inkih, Leewi deqsitta kedok migaaqah Saaduk deqsitak yen numuk rade mara. YALLIH xaqul YALLIH taamat gacaanam akah oggolsintem, dibuk keeni.
Sarrak a num adda le kabut raaqa daarat yakkeh gide affara kaalib akak yimittire waqdi, kontom mitri yekke. Qibaadâ-Qari elle yenem, ayrô-culma le kabuk teneeh; foocat kaak sadgat elle aban arac yen.
Tohuk lakal Qibaadâ-Qarih adda akak culan naharsi goli fanah yoo bee. Addah akak culan afa yimittire waqdi, xexxaarah namma mitri kee garab tekkeeh, baguh malcina mitri tekke. Gura kee migdak tan gidaarwak kulli gidaar masuh mitri kee garab akkuk yen.
Tokkeek Qibaadâ-Qari akak culan naharsi goli fan koo tayyaaqe mawqeena ten. Too goli baguh tabna mitri akkuk yeneeh, xexxaarah lica mitri akkuk yen. Too culmak gura kee migdal namma qamidduy sooliseenihiyya yen.

Wohuk gaba kale waqdi, gudel raaqa goli fanah yoo bee. Tohuu, Taahirik Yan Aracak ten. Too arac fan beya gita yimittire. Too arac xexxaarah sidooca mitri yekkeeh,
baguh koona mitri yekke. Gura kee migdat kaak tan gidaarwak kulli gidaar, masuh sidooca mitri kee garab akkuk yen. Woo golik xexxar labaatanni mitri akkuk yeneeh, baguh tabna mitri akkuk yen.
Tohuk lakal Qibaadâ-Qarik iqiyal yan goli cule. Wokke fanah gexan waqdi, gitah akah gacan arac yimittire. Too arac xexxaarah inki mitri yekkeeh, baguh sidooca mitri yekke. A kabu kee woo kabut kaak tan gidaarwak kulli gidaaraay, masuh sidooca mitri kee garab yekke.
Iqiyat yan goli yakkeh gide affara kaalib yimittire waqdi, tabna mitri yekke. Ta goli woo fanti golik aki-qaxat raaqak yen. Sarrak yok iyyeemih, «Aham Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goli» iyye.
Sarrak kaadu Yallih Qibaadah Qarik adda le kabu raaqa gidaar masuh yakkeh gide yimittire waqdi sidooca mitri yekke. Too gidaarak bagut Qibaadâ-Qari gexxa 'yam qunxa qarwâ-xaylo teneeh; too qarwa baguh namma mitri akkuk ten.
Ta qarwa, sidooca qari fanah tittak amol xisen qarwak ten. Daga raqta qarwa mangah soddom tekke. Fanti qarwa kaadu soddom qari tekke. Kulliimik guba raqta qarwa, tonnah kaadu, soddom qari tekke. Qibaadâ-Qarih gidaar boohaysaanam faxxiime waak teneemih sabbatah, ta qarwa soolisaana'gidih raku akah heen.
Qibaadâ-Qarih gidaarwa afak yablen waqdi, guba raaqa qarik xabba haanamaay amol raaqa qarih amma 'yaanam, masuh inki gide takkem ceelak ten. Mawqeenal woo guba raaqa qariik amo raaqa qari fanah awqe kee, hinnay kaadu, gudet raaqa qari fanah awqe yakkeenim sahalih ten.
A qarwak irô-kabut raqta gidaarwa, masuh namma mitri kee garab akkuk ten. A qarwa culaana'gidih, kilbat le kabul inki afa teneeh; afak teena kaadu gabbi-qaxal ten. Qibaadâ-Qarik afal, baguh namma mitri kee garab takke baranda ten. Woo baranda ardik sidooca mitri fayya axcuk teneeh; woo Qibaadah-Qarik xaqut tan qarwa fayyah misoowak ten. Seeka elle bicsitta'gidih heen qarwa kee a barandak fanal, Qibaadâ-Qari gexxa 'yam yakke arac yen. Too arac a exxak woo exxa fanah, xexxaarah tabna mitri akkuk yen.
Qibaadâ-Qarik ayrô-culma le kabut tu elle xise ween aracak ten. Too arac edde yaade ikkel qari yen. Too qari morootom kee koona mitri xexxaarah akkuk yeneeh, bagbaggi akak soddom kee koona mitri akkuk ten. Gidaarwa kaak namma mitri kee garab masuh akkuk ten.
Qibaadâ-Qari yimittire waqdi, kontom mitri tekke. Qibaadâ-Qarik darre le kabut raqta xisnek xabba haanamaay tu elle xise ween aracay foyyah yanii kee ellecabot raaqa qari xexxaarah sittat, kontom mitri akkuk yen.
Qibaadâ-Qarik foocat raaqa arac kee, Qibaadâ-Qarik namma tattabat yan foyyah yan arac kaadu xexxaarah sittat kontom mitrik yen.
Ayrô-culma le kabul yan qari-xexxaarah yakkeh gide kee, akak namma tattabak ten baranda xexxaarah takkeh gide tittal bahha haan waqdi, kontom mitri akkuk ten.
Qibaadâ-Qarih adda akak culan naharsi goliiy, Taahirik-yan-Arac kee Qibaadâ-Qarik iqiyal yan Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goli inkih,
qari-baaxak taagoota fan inkih, bagu akak cooxut exfeenih yenen. A taagoota reebut ten.
Too cooxuy too aroocak culmah afak amô-ginat raaqa aracah amma 'yaanamat exfeenih yanihiyya inkih, oren cooxuk bicsen taswir bilqiseenih yenen.
Tohum nakli-tasaawir kee galwa-leemih tasaawirik ten. Too ceeloy galwa lehiyya kee nakli-tasaawir tiiy tii lakal haak, inkih yan qarik adda duuduseenih yenen. Galwa le ceelok kulli tii namma fooca luk yen.
Too foocak tiyak teenay sahdayti fooca ceelahiyya nakliitâ-taswiir fanah afkunuk yen. Aki foocay lubak fooca ceelahiyya kaadu gersi kabuk tan nakliita fanah afkunuk yen.
Qari-baaxak xabba haanamaay qari afak amoh amma 'yaanam inkih tonnal ten.
Qibaadâ-Qarih akak culan afa fayya kee baguh inki gidel bicseenih yeneeniih; woo affara *rukni inkih inki gide akkuk yen.
Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goli akak culan afak, sadgat elle aban aracih gurral bicseenih inna lem ten.
Tohum xexxaarah, mitri kee garab akkuk teneeh, mitri baguh akkuk ten. Woo *rukni qekuh elle yan gambi kee rakiibo inkih akak bicseenim cooxuk ten. Too num sarrak, «Aham YALLIH foocal yan miizi» yok iyye.
Taahirik yan Arac kee Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Goli inkih, namma alfeena le albaab luk yen.
Too albaabwa fakan waqdi, xambaqinta fakeyna luk yen.
Woo gidaarwak bagul akah tan gurrah, Qibaadâ-Qarih afoofil kaadu nakli kee galwa leemih ceelo tasaawirih ten. Akak culan naharsi golih afak iro raqta afak daga le kabut, qunxa aracay qari afal silal qidahiyya yeneeh; too arac akak bicseenim cooxuk ten.
A qarik tattabat taagoota ten. Gidaar akak nakli-tasaawirit bilqiseenih yenen. Qibaadâ-Qarih golitte tonnah too tasaawirit bilqiseenih yenen.

Sarrak amittiruk suge num afa le kabu raaqa daarat fanah yoo beeh; wokkeek Yallih Qibaadah Qarik kilbat le kabut raaqa qari fanah yoo bee. Too qari Qibaadâ-Qarik ayrô-culma le kabut raaqa qarit xeeruk mananna.
Too qari xexxaarah kontom mitrik yeneeh, labaatanna kee koona mitri baguh akkuk yen.
Kabuk teenak tu elle xissiime wayta arac yen. Too arac Qibaadâ-Qari gexxa 'yam xexxaarah akkuk yen. Tabna mitri baguh akkuk yen. Kabuk teenak kaadu qalumuk xisen daaratat af cabak yen. Qari akak xissiimem sidiica rankok ten. Kulli rankoy daga raqtahiyya guba raqta rankok qunxuk raaqak ten.
A qarik kilbat le kabuk gitah gacan arac yen. Too arac koona mitri baguh akkuk yen. Kontom mitri xexxaarah akkuk yen. Akak culan afa kilbat le kabut raaqak ten.
Woo qarik fayya le caddot raqta aroocal xisen golitte, gubak fanti golitte kee rammat raqta golittek qunxuk ten. Toh akah kinnim, xissinte waqdi gitah elle gacan arac ken foocal yen.
Woo golittey sidiica rankok xissintehiyya elle xissintem barandak ten. Qamiddul rakuh mananna. Aki qarway daaratal tenehiyya gubak qamiddul xissinteh ten.
Qarik irô-kabu xexxaarah labaatanna kee koona mitri tikka 'ye gidaar yen. Too gidaar golittek fooca le kabut yen.
Macaay inteenik, Qibaadâ-Qarik fooca le kabut ten golitte xexxaarah kontom mitri tekke'mmay, afa le kabu raaqa daaratak fooca le kabut ten golitte xexxaarah labaatanna kee koona mitri akkuk ten.
Ayrô mawqa le kabut raaqa daaratak too golitte fan culaana'gidih, gitah gacan arac kee albaab yen.
Qibaadâ-Qarik gabbi-qaxat too qari ceela qari yen. Too qari kaadu ayrô-culma le kabuk Qibaadâ-Qari edde yaade aracal yen qarik xeeruk mananna.
Golittek foocat hununuh kilbat le kabut raqta qarwah gurral yan aracay akak gacaanahiyya yen. Qarik golitte xexxar kee bagu kee elle xisen gurraay akak culan afoofi inkih, kilbat le kabut raqta golitte ceelak ten.
Tonnal, ayrô-mawqa le kabuk gidaar akak qimbisa ikkek, gabbi-qaxat xissinte golittek gubat culma ten.
Too num yok iyyeemih, «Tama namma qari, taahirik yan namma qari» yok iyye. «Yallih Qibaadah Qari culta seeka kaxxam taahirik tan maaqo elle yakmeenim, tama araca. YALLIH garil taahirik tan maaqok daroy-sadgatah-baahaanahiyya kee, dambi-kalootuh baahan-sadgat kee, edde-asen-qellatih-cakkih-baahan-sadgat elle haanam tokke» iyye.
«Seeka tama qarik afah tawqe waqdi, Yallih taama edde abak sugen saray xagaral loonuhiyya eyyeqqa heenih, ta'kkel cabba heenik lakal, yawqen. Woh akah abaanam, a arac taahirik yan arac tekkek sah aban. Wohuk raqqa 'ye marih arooca gexan waqdi, isinni sarat gaceenih gexan» iyye.
Qibaadâ-Qarih daaratal ten qarwa xexxar kee baguh takkeh gide yoo yuybullek lakal, ayrô-mawqa le kabuk raqta afak yoo yeyyeeqe. Woo qarik iro tan aroocay qarwa elle deedaltahiyya nabnah takkeh gide yimittire.
Ayrô-mawqa le kabi namma bool kee kontom mitrih gide yakkem, caxxah ascassuk yoo yuybulle.
Kilbat le kabu raqta exxa kaadu tonnah, namma bool kee kontom mitri xexxaarah akkuk ten.
Gabbi-qaxat raqta exxa kaadu, namma bool kee kontom mitri xexxaarah akkuk ten.
Ayrô-culma le kabut raqta exxa kaadu tonnah, namma bool kee kontom mitri akkuk ten.
Tonnal affara kaalibik yakkeh gide yoo yuybulle. Dariifat gaso akak ten. Too gasoosa baguh namma bool kee kontom mitri akkuk teneeh, xexxaarah kaadu namma bool kee kontom mitri akkuk ten. Too gasoosa, taahirih tan arooca kee ane sinni aroocak fanal ten.

Woo yimittire num ayrô-mawqa le kabut af cabta culma fan yoo bee.
Tokkeek Israayil doore Dageltih nabna yaybulle ifuy diifu le uble. Yallih anay baddi haffoh innah xongoleeh, Yallih ifuy diifu lehiyya baaxo inkih duude.
Woo waqdi wacyih ublem, Yalli Yarusalaam bayisa'gidih yemeete saaku ublem ceelak ten. Kabar deqsita weeqaytih garil uble wacyi kaadu, ta wacyi ceelak yen. Too waqdi gomboh baaxol rade.
Too ifuy YALLIH nabna yaybulleehiyya Qibaadâ-Qarik ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta afa fanah gexeeh; tokkeek Qibaadâ-Qarih adda cule.
Too waqdi Yallih *Roocaaniyya ukkuqqa yoo hayteeh, adda le kabu raaqa daarat fan yoo culusse. Tokkel YALLIH nabna yaybulle nooriy inkih yan Qibaadah-Qari ifsahiyya uble.
Tokkel too yimittire num xaqut yok soolak suge waqdi, Qibaadâ-Qarik addak yo'lih yaaba anay oobbe.
Yok iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, amah yok dardaarinni korsih araca. Anu ta'kkel Israayil mara lih aneyyo. Abbootanah innih ken amol gaceyyo. Israayil mara kee ken malikwa ahak wadir xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh qibaadat yi migaq mabaysan. Ken malikwah raysitte fayya le aroocay xeet kee coox elle yaqbudeenihiyyal aagaquk migaq yok mabaysan.
Malikwa isinni qarwa akak culan afa, yi qari fan akak culan afah xaqut heenih yaniiniih; tonnal ken kee yi fanat dibuk inki gidaarak sah tu masuginna. Tonnah abak yi migaaqay taahirik yanihiyya wassakoyseenih. Tohih sabbatah abeh an bagcarrat ken bayseh.
Taway, too yok sa yaqbuden duyyey yallah loonuhiyyah aban qibaada kee isinni malikwah lafa, a aracak wonnah yok beyoonay. Tah abeenik, ken addal gaceyyooh, way keenik mabaxsima» iyye.
Kaadu iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, Israayil marah wacarriyaana'gidih, Qibaadâ-Qarih xisne elle tani'nna waris. Elle xisan innih ekraar bartoonay.
Abba heenimit wacarriyaanam tublek, tonnal Qibaadâ-Qari elle yani'nnah adda ken uybullay. Xisne elle aben innaay, culma kee mawqa akak tan kabuuy, ceelok le innaay, tet xinto kee bici elle yani'nna keenih waris. Tah inkih uktubba haay keenih acuy. Tonnal kullim elle tani'nna aaxige loonuuh, xinto intam abelon.
Qibaadâ-Qarih xinto ah teeti. Qaleh amol Qibaadâ-Qari kee too qarih dariifal yan arac saytuniih, elle yani'nnaak Yallih taamah haysitelon» iyye.
Sadgat elle abaana'gidih bicsen arac mitrik yakkeh gide ah kaana. Ta arac edde yimittireenim, too Qibaadâ-Qari edde imittirra heen mitrik ten. Woo sadgat elle abaana'gidih bicsen aracak rakiiboh elle yan affara tattabat, addah mitrik garab yakkeeh, mitrik garab kaadu baguh yakke kanaalak ten. Iro le kabu raaqa kanaalak san, fayyah inki mitrik rubqi akkuk yen.
Ardik xabba haanamaay rakiibo edde taade ikkeh amma 'yaanam, inki mitri xexxaarah akkuk ten. Wokkel ciggilta exxa mitrik garab gide wadirih salaf le kabuh iissa axcuk ten. Xexxaarah namma mitri akkuk ten. Wohuk lakal tan exxa kaadu fanti-exxak mitrik garab gide salaf le kabuh wadir iissa axcuk ten.
Too exxay sadgat elle carrisaanahiyya fayya namma mitri akkuk yen. Woo aracak affara *ruknit tan solta gayse aki duyyey daga raqtak inkih fayya axcuk ten.
Kulli tattab akak xexxaarah laca mitri akkuk yen.
Fanti exxa tonnah affara gambi luk ten. Kulli gambi akak malcina mitri akkuk yen. Fanti exxak iro le kabu raaqa kanaalak exxa, fayyah inki mitrik rubqi akkuk ten. Sadgat elle aban arac fanah elle yawqen mawqeena ayrô-mawqa le kabu fan afkunuk ten.
Tohuk lakal yok iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, anu YALLAY Mulki lehiyya, kok axcem oobbey. Sadgat elle aban arac bicseenik lakal, amol akak sadgatah qiden saqih cado carrisaana'gidih, tonnah kaadu, qabal affara ruknil akak rifaana'gidih, abtam faxximtam taha.
Yi foocal gacca 'yeh Qibaadâ-Qarih addal yi taama abtu waytam, dagaak Leewî-kedok Saaduk deqsita numuk rade mara. Aham amrissam, yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya. Too saaku yekke dambih cabsuh sadgatah yeceen dahaltu, a maray Leewi yoobokehiyyal ucuy.
Too dahaltu qidan waqdi, atu qabalak tu'baxa beyya haay woo sadgatah bicsen mansafak daga raqta gaysoosi kee, fanti exxal tan *ruknitte kee too exxa le sanal inkih hay. Tonnal dibuk yoh heen mansaf yakke'gidih dambik taahirros.
Tohuk lakal woo dambi kaloot yakke'gidih sadgatah yeceen dahaltu beyya haay, Qibaadâ-Qarik iro le kabu raaqa aracay ahamah rikeek yabbixeenihiyyal cado akak cararis.
Ciggilta ayro dabeelay hebeltoh ayma sinnihiyya bahha haay dambi kalootuh sadgatah qid. Naharak woo dahaltih qabalak akah abte innah, a dabeelih qabal beyya haay, sadgat elle aban mansaf a dabeelih qabalat taahirros.
Tohuk gaba kalla hayta waqdi, dahaltu kee maruwuy hebeltoh ayma sinnihiyya yol bah.
Too waqdi seeka too saqih cadol qasbo caxeleeh; yoh orba sadgat yakke'gidih, cado akak carriselon.
Malcina ayroh gide kulli ayro dambi kaloot yakke'gidih, dabeela sadgatah baahetto. Tonnah kaadu, dahaltu kee maruw sadgatah baahetto. Ta saqay bahtu waytahiyya hebeltoh ayma alle waama.
Tahim sittâ lakleh malcina ayroh gide abak sugetton. Tonnal dibuk yoh heen mansaf yakke'gidih taahirroyselon.
Too ayyam gaba kalek lakal, seeka sadgat elle aban mansafal cado-akak-carrisan-saqih-sadgoota kee, amaanah-xiinaanamih-astah-baahan-sadgoota yoh orobta sadgootah xayyooselon. Too waqdi ruffa axceyyooh, sin oggoleyyo. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.

Too num Yallih Qibaadah Qarik iro le kabu raqta culmay ayrô-mawqa le kabut tanihiyya fanah yoo bee. Too culma alifit ten.
YALLI yok iyyeemih, «Tama culma alifit aneleeh, mafakkinta. YALLAY Israayil doore Dagelta kinnihiyya akak cule arac kinnuk, gersi mari akak macula. Tohih sabbatah alifit edde aadele.
Takkay immay ummatak abba yi foocal taahirroysen-gaqambo yakme'gidih, wokkel daffeyu duudah. Culma akak culan naharsi goliik culmah afak culla bukka 'yam duudah» iyye.
Sarrak woo num kilbat le kabut raqta afaak beyya yoo heeh, Qibaadâ-Qarih fooca fanah yoo baahe. Wagga hee waqdi, YALLIH nabna yaybulle nooriy inkih yan Qibaadah-Qarik adda ifsahiyya uble. Too waqdi gomboh baaxok bagul rade.
YALLI yok iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, ubulla haytam kee oobba haytam nagay cubbus. Qibaadâ-Qarih xinto kee wokkel abeh meqem koh warseyyo. Qibaadâ-Qarih addah culma akah taguude mara kee, akah aguude wayta mara tittak cubbus» yok iyye.
Kaadu qagseh iyyeemih, «Israayil maray yabti-cina lehiyyak intaamah: abtan dambi ahaysa sin xiqah.
Allî-baaxoh maray salot sinnihiyya yi Qibaadah-Qari culussaanaah, nadaasa kaa abten. A maray isin bahteeni, yi yab oggola mara hinna. Sadgatah qiddan saqih xayta kee qabal sadgatah bahtan waqdi, a mara yi qariy taahirik yanihiyya gabat bahtan. Tonnah abak sin kee yi fanal yen xagana bayisseenih.
Yi qibaada elle aban innak amo mawagtinnitoonuh immay, dacayrih marin gabal hayten.
Tohuk gexxaamah, yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya sin aysixxigeemih: faxe allî-baaxoh maray solot sinni takkuu, yi yab cina mara takku, yi Qibaadah-Qari cule waanama. Tonnal yan allî-baaxol maray Israayil marih addal yanihiyya kinni-way cule waama» iyye.
YALLI yok iyyeemih, «Anu Leewih yooboke maray Israayil mara lih gacca 'yeh yoo cabba heeh xeet kee coox yaqbudehiyya digaaleyyo.
Tohuk lakal Qibaadâ-Qarih afah taama kee Qibaadâ-Qarih addal tan gaba-taama aboonu duudaanaah; ummat sadgatah bahtah tan cado akak carrisan saq kee sadgatah baahan saq inkih qidaanam tu maliiy qibaadah temeete ummat cataanam meqe.
Takkay immay yi qibaada cabba heenih xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh qibaadat gaceeniih, sahda dambit asisen. Tohuk gexxaamah, yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya xiibita'mmay, tahamah ken digaaleyyo.
Tahak wadir seekâ migaaqal yi taamat maraaqan. Yi qibaada elle aboonuh, rikeek baxsah taniimik garih amaate waanama. Hinnay kaadu woo Kulliimik-Taahiriinoh-Yayse-Golil xayyoowe waanama. Oson aben umaaneh keenih taguudem, tama digaala.
Tahak wadir gaca marih taamay Qibaadâ-Qarih addal abaanahiyyat ken heeyyo.»
«Takkay immay woo Leewih yooboke maray Saaduk deqsita numuk radehiyya Israayil ummat takkeemik yoo cinte saaku, Qibaadâ-Qaril yi taamat raaqeeniih, yi qibaada baguuk abak sugen. Tonna-kinnuk ta saaku, Qibaadâ-Qarih addal yok foocal xayta kee qabal sadgatah bahtu waytam ta mara. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya.
Yi Qibaadah-Qari culak yoh baahan sadgat qidan mansafih taama gabat akak hayu waah, Qibaadâ-Qarih addal yi qibaadah taama akak gactu waytam, dibuk ta mara.
Qibaadâ-Qarik adda le kabut raaqa daaratih afaak adda culan waqdi, *baftak bicsen meqe sartanat gacoonay. Qibaadâ-Qarih adda takku, daaratal, Yallih taamat yanin waqdi, illi xagooruk bicsen sarak hebeltoh im isinnil hee woonay.
Ken qumaamat kee guba haan caari-kala *baftak bicseenim faxximta. Toh akah kinnim, gersi sara xagaral haan waqdi, xooqaanamih sabbata.
Qibaadâ-Qarik afa le kabut raaqa daaratay sinam elle tanihiyya fanah yamaaten waqdi, Qibaadâ-Qarih addal taamat sugen waqdi xagaral luk sugen sara kalla heenih, woo taahirik yan aracal caboonay, gersi sarat isinnit hoonay. Toh akah kinnim, woo saray xagaral loonuhiyya taahirik yan sara kinnuk, woo afal suga mara biyaake waa'gidi.
«Seeka amo isik moole waytaama. Hinnay kaadu amo xagor isinnik aynabe waanama. Fanal elle meqe'nnal yanay iyyaanama.
Qibaadâ-Qarik addâ kabu raaqa daarat culan waqdi, qinabak bicsen kamri aaqube waanama.
Seeka cabtentoh tan barra digibe waanama. Israayilih tooboke baxuwway bikirit tanihiyya akkiiy, hinnay kaadu, seekik raqte gubnak kalih agabul rihime waanama.
«Yi ummat taahirik tanim kee ane waytam barsaanama. Saytunim kee nadaasa lem ken barsaanama.
Ummat fanal yi xinto wagga haytaamal tittin way rade kaa tekkek, yi xinto elle inta'nnal ken kalkaalaanama, seekak siinih raqta tiya. Qiddi ayro yi xinto elle inta'nnal abaanama. Sabti ayro essekexxeya.
«Sekti abba kee ina akkiiy, hinnay kaadu, baxá kee lab-baxa akkiiy, toobokoyta kee digibe wayte maqanxá rabtek, nadaasa kaa abaanamah, keenil gexaama. Wohuk kalih marih rabah gexe waama.
Ta marak numuk teeni garih yemeetek, taahirrowwa 'yeh malcina ayro sugan kaal tan.
Tohuk lakal Qibaadâ-Qarik adda le kabu raaqa daarat culla 'yeh, taahirrooweemih sadgat Yallah abay. Tonnal woo yi Qibaadah-Qarih addal abak suge Yallih taamah gacam duudah. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
«Israayil marah baxak baxal nagrah raqta baaxo ikoytah keenih eceeh. Takkay immay seekah Israayil rasul ikoytah ecee baaxo matana. Oson faxxa haanamah, anu innih keenih an.
Sadgatah baahan daro kenimi. Dambi-kalootuh-baahan-sadgat kenimi. Ummat edde asse qellatih-cakkih-bahta-sadgat kenimi. Tohuk kalih imiy ummat Israayil rasul yi qibaadah daanissa haytahiyya inkih kenimi.
Daro orobta waqdi naharat yargiqen daro kenimi. Kalah kaadu yi migaaqal sadgatah bahha hannaanim kenimi. Gaqambo alaysinnaan waqdi, too gaqambok naharsi gaqambo seekah yacoonay. Tonnal toh aba marih buxal barkat ruubeyyo.
Isih rabeey, hinnay kaadu, ali qide yekke kimbiro kee lacti cado, seeka akme waytaama» iyye.

Baaxo sahdah kedo kedol kuran saaku, afak teena YALLAH cabaanama. Too baaxoy YALLAH cabaanahiyya xexxaarah taban kee namma kiilomitri kee garab takkeemi. Baguh tabna kiilomitri takkeemi. Too baaxo inkitanuuk saytunuk tan baaxo takkeemi.
Too baaxoy YALLAH cabaanahiyyal, affara kaalibih yan aracay kulli kaalib namma bool kee kontom mitri akak yakkehiyya Qibaadâ-Qarih taamah dessoh haanama. Too aracat maroh baguh labaatanna kee koona mitri takke booxa anele.
YALLAH caban baaxok garabay taban kee namma kiilomitri kee garab xexxaarah yakkeeh koona kiilomitri baguh yakkehiyya dessoh heelon. Yallih Qibaadah-Qariy saytunaanah lafitta 'yahiyyah arac elle hoonu waanam tokke.
Ta arac, inkih tan baaxol taahirik yan aracay Qibaadâ-Qarih addal Yallih taamah taamitta seekah qarwa elle xisoonu waanahiyya. Too arac kaadu Qibaadâ-Qarih xisneh deeselon.
YALLAH caban baaxok gersi garabay taban kee namma kiilomitri kee garab xexxaarah yakkeeh koona kiilomitri baguh yakkehiyya, Leewih yooboke maray Yallih Qibaadah-Qarih addal taamitahiyya ikoytah antacawwimele. Too mari dabaaqah elle gaca magaalooli tokkel xissiimele.
YALLAH caban baaxoy taahirih tanihiyyah gariik, gersi baaxoy magaala elle xisoonu waanahiyya baxsaanama. Israayilih yooboke marak faxe num too magaalal elle gacu duuda. Too baaxo xexxaarah taban kee namma kiilomitri kee garab takkeemiiy, baguh namma kiilomitri kee garab takkeemi.
Baaxo xiinisah yan abbah kaadu baaxo tantacawweemi. Too baaxo, taahirik tan baaxo kee magaala elle xisoonu waan baaxo edde taade ikkek xabba haanamaay, ayrô-culma le kabul Maditraaniyah badah amma 'yaanam kee, magaala kee taahirik tan baaxok ayrô-mawqa le kabut raaqa cuduuduk xabba haanamaay, baaxo edde idiyya 'ta cuduud fanah gufta. Xexxaarah Israayil kedoodak inki kedoh yeceen baaxoh gide akkele.
Too baaxo Israayil abba yakku waa numih ikoyta akkele. Too baaxok taturra 'yeh Israayil marih baaxo maxaga. Keenit maxukkuta.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Israayil abbobtiy, isin mango dambit assen. Ahaysa sinaamal baatil baahaanam kee xukkutaanam cabtaanama. Cakki kee qadlih tanim aba. Tahak wadir yi mara le baaxok ayyaaqe waytaanama. Tahat sin lih yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya.
«Kulli num siinik duyye mako sinni miizaanal keexaanama.
« ‹Eefa› deqsita miizaanay kafnaan le duyye elle keexaanahiyya kee ‹Baas› deqsita miizaanay caxittam elle keexaanahiyyah gide yakke. Ta nammam inkih elle keexaanamak ‹Hoomar› deqsita miizaan yan.
Inki hoomar tabna eefa yakkeeh, kaadu tabna baas yakke.
«Miizaan elle haytan duyye:
Labaatanni gerah inki sekil yakke.
Lactam sekil inki mina yakke.
«Sadgatah teceenim kexxan way abtaanamaa:
orobte darok kamadi (sirray) tekkek, lactam gabak inki af sadgatah teceenimi.
Gabru deqsitta darok lactam gabak inki af sadgatah ucuya.
Caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti (saliid) kaadu booluk inki af sadgatah ucuya.
Ta duyye ‹Baas› deqsitta keexol haa:
tabna baas inki hoomar yakkeeh
inki hoomar inki kor yakke.
Israayil baaxol yaloole illi kee wadarak namma booluk inkittu sadgatah ucuya.
«Anu dambi siinih caba'gidih, sadgatah baahan daro kee cado akak carrisan sadgat kee, amaanah xintaana'gidih astah abtan sadgat akah tacoonu waytaanam, tama inna. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.
«Baaxol enna 'ta Israayil-ummat, ta sadgat, abbah yan numul baahoonay.
Usuk too waqdi cado akak carrisan saq kee sadgatah baahan daro kee qinabak bicsen kamri, alsi biloh yakke qiid kee Sabti ayroy qiidih edde asaanahiyya kee, wohuk kalah tan ayrooray ummat qiidih edde assahiyya baaham kaal tan. Dambi kalootuk aban sadgat kee, sadgatah yeceen darooy, cado akak carrisan saq kee, amaanah xintaana'gidih astah abtan sadgat inkih, abba baahaama. Ta sadgat Israayil-ummatah dambi kalootuk orbele» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Sanatak inikhaytoh alsak inikhaytoh ayrot, aymak tu sinni dahaltu Qibaadâ-Qari taahirroysaana'gidih sadgatah qidoonaay.
Sek too dahaltuy dambi-kaloot-sadgatah qideenihiyyah qabalak tu takkem beyya heeh, Qibaadâ-Qarih albaab dagah amook tani'kkel caxay. Sadgat elle aban mansafak affara *ruknil kaadu caxay, adda le kabut raaqa daarat adda akak culan culmal, tonnah kaadu caxaama.
Alsak malcinhaytoh ayro garciik cube'kal dambit asa num yenek, hinnay kaadu edde asem dambi lem kinnim aaxige'kal dambit asa num yenek, woo numih aftok dambi kaloot kaah takke'gidih toh aba. Tonnah abteenik, Qibaadâ-Qari taahir abetton.
«Sanatak inikhaytoh alsak taban kee fereyhaytoh ayrot, Elle-Tatriyyi-Qiid assakaxxetton. Malcina ayroh kamiir maleh bicsen gaqambo ukuma.
Qiid naharak yakke ayro baaxoh abba sadgatah awur yeceem kaal tan. Too sadgat usuk isih edde ase dambi kee Israayil mari edde assa 'ye dambi kalootuk orbele.
Ta malcina ayrok kulli ayro, YALLAH sadgatah malcina awur kee malcina maruw qidak sugay. Too awurwa kee marway qidahiyya hebeltoh ayma alle waytaama. Tusguudek sarra cado akak inkih carrisaama. Tonnah kaadu, dambi kalootuh, dabeela kulli ayro qidaama.
Kulli awur kee maruwuy sadgatah qiddeenihiyya lih, darok sagla kiilo takkem kee caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeytik (saliidik) kaadu sidiica litri takkem taceenimi.
«Iraawô-Dabih-Qiidiy sanatak malcinhaytoh alsak taban kee konoyhaytoh ayrot abaanahiyya kaadu, baaxoh abba dumî qiidih akah abe innah, malcina ayrok kulli ayro cado-akak-carrisan-sadgat kee, dambi-kalootuh-baahan-sadgatah, saqak too dumî qiidih gide qidaama. Tonnah kaadu dumak kaxxih, daro kee caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti sadgatah baahaama» iyye.

YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Adda le kabut raaqa daarat fanah akak culan afay ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqtahiyya, lica ayroy taama edde abaanahiyyat alifut sugtaama. Takkay immay Sabti-ayro kee alsi edde bila ayroy qiidih edde asaanahiyya fakkintay.
Baaxoh abba afa le kabut raaqa daaratak gacca 'yeh, adda le kabut raaqa daaratih culma akak culan naharsi golik culla iyyeh, sarra culmal tan qamidwa le kabuuk solla iyyay. Too waqdi cado akak cararisan sadgat kee amaanah xiinaanamih astah baahe sadgat, sek kay aftok cararisaama. Sarrak too culmah garil dooqa abba heeh yawqeemi. Ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta culma bari tikka 'yam fanah alfe woonay.
Kulli sabtii kee alsi elle bilinnaanimil, ummat inkih too culmak afal gommoh radak, YALLA yaqbudeenimi.
Sabti ayro Yallih sadgatah baaxoh abba hebeltoh ayma sinni saqak anaaqê-leceey kee maruw baahaama. Ta saqak cado inkih carrisaanama.
Maruw lih sadgatah darok sagla kiilo baahaama. Anaaqe lih isih faxxa heeh gide baahay. Tonnah yan sadgatay daro akah baahaanahiyya aba saaku, daroy sadgatah baahahiyyak kulli sagla kiilol, caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeytik (saliidik) sidiica litri takkem lih baahaama.
Alsi bila saakih qiidih, dahaltu kee anaaqê-laceey kee maruw baahaama. Ta saqi hebeltoh ayma alle waama.
Dahaltu kee maruw lih darok sagla kiilo baahaama. Kulli anaqtu lih darok isih faxinnaanih gide baahaama. Darok sagla kiilo yaceen waqdi, caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeytik daro lih sidiica litri yacoonay.
Baaxoh abba tahak inkih gaba kalla haa waqdi, akak cule afaak gacca 'yeh yawqay.
«Ummat Yallih qibaadah qiddi saaku Qibaadâ-Qari tamaate waqdi, too dooqak gaba kalla haan waqdi, kilbat le kabuk cule mari gabbi-qaxat af cabta afak yawqay. Gabbi qaxak cule mari kilbat le kabut af cabta afak yawqay. Akak culen afak awqe woonay, foocat tan afak yawqoonay.
Baaxoh abba ummat culta waqdi culay. Ummat tawqe waqdi yawqay.
Sadgat aban saaku kee qiddi saaku, kulli dahaltu kee maruw lih darok sadgatah yacoonu waanam sagla kiilo. Tonnah kaadu, qibaadah yemeete num anaqtu lih darok isih faxinnaanih gide baahaama. Darok sagla kiilo lih caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeytik sidooca litri baahoonay.
«Baaxoh abba isi fayxiik YALLAH sadgat abam faxeeh; too sadgatah cado akak carrisan saq akki kee, hinnay kaadu, amaanah xiinaanamih astah aban sadgat abe kaa tekkek, ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta afa kaah fakoonay. Sadgat too Sabti ayro akah abba haa innah abaama. Usuk gexxa 'ya way too afa alfoonay» iyye.
YALLI kaadu iyyeemih, «Kulli maaca, sanatat yan maruwuy hebeltoh ayma sinnihiyya Yallih sadgatah qidoonay. Too maruwuk cado carrisoonay. Ta sadgat kulli ayro yakkay.
Tonnah kaadu burrik namma kiilo takkem, caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeytik (saliidik) inki litrit esgelli heenih, sadgatah kulli ayro baahoonay. Taham sadgatah baahinnaan waqdi xintoh raaqele.
Kulli saaku maruwuy cado akak carrisaanahiyya kee burriiy caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti Yallih sadgatah baahaanamaay, ta sadgat way cabe waanama» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya kaadu iyyeemih, «Abbah yan num isi baaxok tu takkem kurra heeh isi baxah ikoytah yecee kaa tekkek, too baaxo too baxihim akkele.
Takkay immay isih taamitah yan marak numuk teenah isi baaxo kurra heeh yecee kaa tekkek, too baaxo too akah yecee num ‹Farcat sanatay xaamen baaxo edde gacsaanahiyya
Baaxoh-abba ummat-baaxo ummatak bee waama. Ken baaxok ken xiiriye waama. Isi xayloh baaxo yeceem faxek, isi baaxok yeceemi. Yi marat xukkute waama» iyye.
Tokkeek woo num kilbat le kabut raqta golitteh culma fanah yoo baahe. Tohum, adda le kabut raaqa daaratak gabbi-qaxat tan culmah garit raqta golitte. Taham seekâ-golittey taahirik tanihiyyak ten. Too golittek ayrô-culma le kabut raaqa arac yoh yescesse.
Too waqdi iyyeemih, «Seeka dambi-kalootuh-baahen-saqih-cado kee edde-asen-qellatih-cakkih-baahan-saqih-cado sadgatah elle alaysaanam, tama araca. Bululuy sadgatah baahaanahiyyah gaqamboyta elle alaysaanam, too araca. Yallih Qibaadah Qarik afa le kabut raaqa daaratay sinam elle tanihiyya mayayyaaqan. Toh akah kinnim, too sadgatay taahirik yani afah yeyyeeqen ken tekkek, ummat biyaakam takkeh 'yaanama» iyye.
Tohuk lakal afa le kabut raaqa daarat fanah yoo beeh, too daaratak affara *ruknik kulli *ruknitiiy inki daaratay qunxahiyya yen. Too daarat-baxi xexxaarah labaatanna mitri akkuk yeneeh, baguh taban kee koona mitri akkuk yen.
Kulli daaratat gaso maroh ten. Tonnah kaadu gira elle urusan arac woo gasot xakabuh yen.
Woo num yok iyyeemih, «Amaham, Qibaadâ-Qarih addal Yallih taamat yan marah, ummat sadgatah bahta saqih cado elle alaysan araca» iyye.

Woo num Yallih Qibaadah Qarih culma fan yoo gacse. Too culmak lee awaquk teneeh; too lee Qibaadâ-Qarik exxak teenay gabbi-qaxat raqtahiyyak amma 'teh sadgat elle aban aracak gabbi-qaxa le kabu darah gexak, ayrô-mawqa le kabuy Qibaadâ-Qari edde yafkunehiyya fanah darah oobak ten.
Tohuk lakal woo num kilbat le kabut raqta afaak beyya yoo heeh, afah yoo yeyyeeqeeh, tokkeek ayrô-mawqat raqta culma fanah yoo bee. Too culmak gabbi-qaxa raqta exxak qunxa buyyi-baxi caxitak yen.
Too num edde yimittire akattat, ayrô-culma fanah caxitta lee elle gexxaamal, koona boolih mitri yimittire. Too waqdi «Tama buyyit ibah gex» yok iyye. Too buyyih addat ibah gexe waqdi, lee ibak xibqi yok gufte.
Sarrak kaadu caxitta lee elle gexxaamal, qagisak koona boolih mitri yimittire. Too waqdi too lee gulub fanah yok temeete. Koona boolih mitrih gide kaadu dori gexxa 'yam yimittire. Too waqdi lee xonko fanah yok gufte.
Kaadu koona boolih mitrih gide yimittire. Too waqdi buyyi leek kaxxam yemeggeeh; addat akak gexam maduudiyyo. Giiru akke waytek, kalah elle taban inni maraaqinna.
Too waqdi yok iyyeemih, «Bani-adantow, tamah inkih cubbus» yok iyye.
Sarrak weeqayti xaqu fan yoo baahe.
Wokke gufe waqdi weeqaytuk a qaxa kee woo qaxal mango coox uble.
Too waqdi yok iyyeemih, «A weeqayti ayrô-mawqa le kabuuk addah Ordon weeqaytu fan ooba. Tokkeek Rabe Bad deqsita bad fanah ooba. Rabe Bad fanah ooba waqdi, woo bad luk sugeh yan qasbo cabaah badliitah maraaqa.
A weeqayti darah elle gexaamal alak alaakulleyta kee kullum mawaytima. A weeqayti Rabe Badih leey badliitah sugte qasbo cabsiisah. Elle gexaamal rooci lem taloole.
Rabe Badak Qengeedi raceynak xabba haanamaay Qen-Qeglayim raceynah amma 'yaanam yakke badal, kullum yabbixe mari baddi-af macaba. Akke kullum mabbuuxuh yamaate mari sabooka elle hawwalisa ikke akkele. Kullum qaynatak Maditraaniyah badal enna 'ya qaynatih kullum akkele.
Takkay immay natqa le leey, dori lee kee dariifal tan natqah agantah yasiffiyem maduuda. Qasbo way macabsiisa.
Weeqaytuk namma xaqul maaqo akak geyan coox aabukele. Too cooxuk ayyuufi malaqaymuuma; kulli alsal xalele. Ta coox Qibaadâ-Qarih gubak racta lee yaaqubeemih sabbatah, kulli way xaylo xalele. A coox xala xaylo maaqo sinaamah akkeleeh, ayyuufi dayla sinaamah akkele» iyye.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Taban kee namma kedoy Israayilih toobokehiyya kurrusuttu wayta baaxoh cuduud ah kaana. Yuusufuh yooboke marah namma exxa akak acuya.
Isin akak radden sin kaxxa abbobtih a baaxo aceeyyoomuh xagana culeh suge. Away too baaxo isin inki gidel kurraasita.
«Kilbat le kabuk Maditraaniyah badak xabba haanamaay Cetlon deqsitta magaala kee Camat deqsita daabay gitah gacaanahiyya kee Xadad deqsitta magaalah amma 'yaanamaay
Beroota kee Sibrayim magaalah amma 'yaanam takke baaxo kenimi. Ta namma magaalooli elle geytintam, Damasko kee Camat doolatih cuduuduk fana. Tokkek xabba haanamaay Caxar-Hattikon deqsitta magaalah amma 'yaanam tan baaxo kenimi. Caxar-Hattikon elle geytintam, Cawran deqsita rakaakayih cuduudu.
Tonna-leemiik kilbat le kabut raaqa cuduud Maditraaniyah badak xabba haanamaay Caxar-Qeenan deqsitta magaalah amma 'yaanam fan yakke. Damasko kee Camat too cuduuduk kilbat le kabut geytimta. Kilbat le kabut raaqa cuduud tonna.
«Ayrô mawqa le kabu raaqa cuduud akak ugtam, kilbat qaxat raqta exxay Damasko kee Cawran fanal geytintahiyya. Toh kaadu, Ordon weeqaytuy ayrô culmak Israayil rasu kee ayrô mawqak Gilqad rasih fanal geytinta exxat raaqahiyya. Tokkeek, Tamaari deqsita aracay Rabe badih xaqul geytimahiyya gufa.
«Gabbi qaxat raaqa cuduud akak qimbisam, gabbi-qaxat raaqa Tamaari deqsita araca. Tokkeek Kaadis-Mariiba deqsita illalta kee Masri cuduudul yan daqaarah amma 'yaanamaay Maditraaniyah bad fan yakke.
«Ayrô culma le kabut raaqa cuduud Maditraaniyah bad kinni. Kilbat le kabuk Camat deqsita daabay gitah gacaanahiyyak foocat yan arac fan yakke.
Ta baaxo Israayil kedoodah kuramkura.
Sin ikoyta akkele. Allî-baaxoh maray sin addal yaniih xaylo sin addal xaleeh qarsitehiyya, tama baaxo kurta saaku, ken akak macabinaay ken afto keenih akak ucuy. Israayilih yooboke marih intit ken ubulaay, baaxo kurta saaku Israayil xaylok kaxxih, baaxol saami caxxa keenih qidaay, ken afto keenih ucuy.
Tama marah, addat akak lih yanin kedok kaxxih, isinni afto baaxok geyaanama. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLAY Mulki lehiyya» iyye.

Baaxok afto geytuh migaq akak yunkuttube kedo ah teeti. Daan deqsitta kedoh yooboke mari, baaxok kilbat le qaxat raqta exxat isinni afto geelon. Too baaxoy keenih tantacawwu waytahiyya ah teeti. Cetlon deqsita magaalak xabba haanamaay Camat deqsita daabay gitah gacaanahiyyaay, tokkeek kaadu, Hadar-Qeenon deqsita aracay Damasko kee Hamat doolatih cuduudul geytimahiyyah amma 'yaanam tan baaxok, Daan deqsitta kedoh cuduuduh raaqele. Oson geyan exxa, baaxok ayrô-mawqak xabba haanamaay ayrô-culmah amma 'yaanam tan exxak tan.
Aaser kaadu ayrô-mawqak xabba haanamaay ayrô-culmah amma 'yaanam Daan luk cuduuduk elle yangalen baaxo aallelon.
Naftaali kaadu ayrô-mawqak xabba haanamaay ayrô-culmah amma 'yaanam Aaser baaxo lih cuduuduh elle yan rasu haysitelon.
Manasse tonnah, ayrô-mawqak xabba haanamaay ayrô-culmah amma 'yaanam, Naftaali lih cuduuduh elle yangale baaxo aallele.
Efrayim tonnah, ayrô-mawqak xabba haanamaay ayrô-culmah amma 'yaanam, Manasse lih cuduuduh elle yangale baaxo haysitele.
Ruuben deqsitta kedo kaadu, ayrô-mawqak xabba haanamaay ayrô-culma fanah gufta baaxoy Efrayim cuduuduh elle yangaleenihiyya aallele.
Yuuda kaadu ayrô-mawqak xabba haanamaay ayrô-culmah amma 'yaanam takke baaxoy Ruuben cuduuduh elle yangaleenihiyya haysitele.
Rikeek heen baaxo kaadu ayrô-mawqak xabba haanamaay ayrô-culmah amma 'yaanam takke baaxoy Yuudâ cuduuduh elle yangaleenihiyya haysitelon. Tonnal xexxaarah kedoodah yeceen baaxoh gide akkele. Too baaxo kilbat le kabuk xabba haanamaay gabbi-qaxah amma 'yaanam, taban kee namma kiilomitri kee garab baguh akkele. Yallih Qibaadah Qari too rikeek heen baaxok gudel anele.
Ta baaxoy baxseenih yimittireenik fanal, xexxaarah taban kee namma kiilomitri kee garab takkeeh, baguh tabna kiilomitri takke baaxoy Yallih taamah deeseenihiyya anele.
Too taahirik yan aracay dessot gacu waahiyyak garab seekah antacawwele. Seekah yacoonu waanam, ayrô-mawqak xabba haanamaay ayrô-culmah amma 'yaanam takke baaxok taban kee namma kiilomitri kee garab takkeeh; kilbat le kabuk xabba haanamaay gabbi-qaxa le kabuk koona kiilomitri takke baaxo keenih aaxigelon. Ta aracak gudel Yallih Qibaadah-Qari xissiimele.
Ta aracay taahirik yanihiyya akah yacoonu waanam, sek-Saadukuk radde seeka. Ta mari, gersi Leewih yooboke mari akah abe'nnah, Israayil mara lih gacca 'yeenih uma-taamat maasinnoonuy; yol imaan heeniih too imaanal digga axcuk yi taamat gacen.
Tohih sabbatah, ta marah tantacawwu waytam, inkih yayse aracay kulli aracak taahiriinoh fula luk raaqahiyya. Too arac ken kee Leewih fanal cuduuduh yen aracak ten.
Gersi Leewih yooboke marah, seekak gabbi-qaxa raaqa aracak garil deesen baaxo keenih aaxigelon. Too arac ayrô-mawqak xabba haanamaay ayrô-culma fan taban kee namma kiilomitri kee garab yakkeeh; kilbat le qaxak xabba haanamaay gabbi-qaxa raqta baaxoh amma 'yaanam koona kiilomitri takke baaxo kinni.
Yallah deesen arac, kulli aracak inkih fula le arac yakkem faxxinta. Too aracak exxa kurra heenih aylamme kee, hinnay kaadu, gersi aracat milaaguh ecee (libaakise) yakkeenim inkinnah umaama. Faxe num nagrah loowite kee xayloh nagre yakke arac hinna. Ta arac dibuk Yallah rikeek baxsah deesen arac kinnuk, num tu edde mali.
A rikeek yan aracay deeseenihiyyak raqte baaxoh exxa, baguh taban kee namma kiilomitri kee garab xexxaarah yakkeeh, namma kiilomitri kee garab baguh yakke. Ta arac taahirik yan arac hinnay, ummatah caben araca. Ummat too aracal dabqih gactam duddaah; hinnay kaadu, saqi elle yaloole arooca akkele. Magaala ta arac gudel gactam faxxinta.
Ta magaala xissintu wayta waqdi affara gaco aalleleeh, kulli derfa xexxaarah namma alfi kee namma bool kee kontom mitri akkele.
Magaalak dariifal kulli gambik, bool kee labaatanna kee koona mitri baguh takke baaxoy foyyah cabeeni anele.
Ummatah caben aracak raqta exxa magaalah addal yan marah buqreh antacawwele. Too exxa magaala elle xissimta exxak ayrô-mawqa le kabuk koona kiilomitri xexxaarah takkeeh, namma kiilomitri kee garab baguh takkeeh; ayrô-culma le kabuk, tonnah kaadu, koona kiilomitri xexxaarah takkeeh, namma kiilomitri kee garab baguh takke.
Faxe kedohuuy yaabakay, a magaalah addal enna 'ya num, woo booxal buqre abbaasitu duudah.
Tonnal, a aroocay deeseenihiyyak affara gaco aalleleeh, kulli dariifa xexxaarah taban kee namma kiilomitri kee garab akkele. Tohim taahirik tan exxa kee too magaala elle xissinte araca.
Yallih Qibaadah Qari kee seekah yontocowwe arac kee Leewih yooboke marah yeceen baaxo kee, tonnah kaadu, magaala elle tan aracak, ayrô-mawqa kee ayrô-culma le kabut raqta exxa baaxoh-abbah im akkele. Kay baaxo deesen aroocak ayrô-mawqat raqta baaxoh cuduud fan gufeleeh; ayrô-culma le kabuk kaadu Maditraaniyah badah amma 'yaanam akkele. Tonnah kaadu, kilbat le kabuk Yuuda deqsitta kedoh yeexegen baaxot cuduuduh raaqeleeh, gabbi-qaxak kaadu Benyam deqsitta kedoh yeexegen baaxot cuduuduh raaqele.
Tohuk kalih marah baaxo elle kuroonu waanam anna. Benyam ayrô-mawqaak ayrô-culma gufta baaxo geele.
Simqaan tonnah, ayrô-mawqaak ayrô-culma gufta baaxoy Benyam lih cuduud tangalehiyya aallele.
Issakar ayrô-mawqak xabba haanamaay ayrô-culmah amma 'yaanam takke baaxoy Simqaan baaxot cuduuduh raqta aallele.
Dablon ayrô-mawqak xabba haanamaay ayrô-culmah amma 'yaanam takke baaxoy Issakar baaxot cuduuduh raqta aallele.
Gaad kaadu ayrô-mawqak xabba haanamaay ayrô-culmah amma 'yaanam takke baaxoy Dablon baaxot cuduuduh raqta aallele.
