Gaadah yeceen baaxoy gabbi qaxat raqtahiyyak cuduud Tamaarik xabba haanamaay Kaadis-Mariiba deqsita illaltah amma 'yaanam takkeeh, tokkek Masri cuduudul yan daqar gexxa 'yam kee Maditraaniyah badah amma 'yaanam takke.
YALLAY Mulki lehiyya iyyeemih, «Israayil marah ikoytah tantacawwu wayta baaxo elle kurruntu waytam tama'nna» iyye.
«Yarusalaam magaala akak culan afoofa taban kee nammay akkele. Affara *rukni akak xisen gasok kulli derfa xexxaarah namma alfi kee namma bool kee kontom mitri akkeleeh, kulli derfakaay sidooca culma aallele. Kulli culma, kedooy takkek tiya tiyal muggaaqiselon. Kilbat le kabut raqta afoofi Ruuben kee Yuuda kee Leewi muggaaqiselon. Ayrô-mawqa le kabut raqta afoofi Yuusuf kee Benyam kee Daan kedoodal muggaaqiselon. Gabbi-qaxat raqta afoofi kaadu Simqaan kee Issakar kee Dablon kedoodal muggaaqiselon. Ayrô-culma le kabut raqta afoofi Gaad kee Aaser kee Naftaali muggaaqiselon.
Inkih tan magaalah gaso affara tattabak xexxaarah sagla alfih mitri akkele. Ta magaalah migaq tahak wadir ‹YALLI-akkel-yani› deqsitele» 'yaanam iyye Yalli.

Yahoyaakim Yuudâ-malik yekkeemih sidochaytô-sanat yekke saaku, Malik Nabkadnessar deqsita numuy Baabelon malikih yenehiyya, Yarusalaam magaalat qeebi abeeh marot tet hee.
Goyti, Yuudâ-malikih yen Yahoyaakim kee Yallih Qibaadah Qarih addal sugte duyyek garab, Baabelon malikih gabat akah tantixibbixe innah abe. Too malik sahdak tu takkem seewah gabat beeh, dannabah kaadu Yallih Qibaadah Qarik been duyye orbise. Too duyye yalla axcuk yaqbudeemih xise qarik duyye elle daanisan aracal hee.
Sarrak malik kay gubal taamita Asfanad deqsita numuk iyyeemih, «Gexay ama Israayil maray seewah gabat bahneh addak, malik nasab le furrayna kee muddaqih tan furrayna dooray bah.
Ta mari yi qarih addal taamita'gidih, xagar qax-maqaane leeh hebeltoh ayma aalle waa maray kas kee cubbiiy ixxiga kee baritto lehiyya yakkeenim faxxinta» iyye. Asfanad, Baabelon marih af kee woo afat tunkuttubem, too mara barsam faxximta.
Toh lih kaadu malik iyyeemih, «Anu elle akme aracak maaqo kee qinab-kamri keenih acuyaay, sidiica sanat nagay ken barseenik lakal, doolat-taamat ken culusa» iyye.
Tohuh dooren marak addat, Daaniyel kee Cananya kee Misaayel kee Qadarya deqsita maray Yuudâ-kedoh yoobokehiyya edde yen.
Malik gubal taamita num woo marah qusba migaq yeyyeeqe. Migaaqah keenik, Daaniyel deqsita numuk, Beltasaxxar iyyeeh; Cananyak Sadrak iyyeeh, Misaayelik Meesak iyyeeh, Qadarya deqsita numuk Qabednago 'yaanam keenih yeyyeeqe.
Daaniyel, malik buxah maaqo kee maqab nadaasak yanim yeexegeeh; tohih sabbatah, malik gubal yan numuy Asfanad deqsitahiyyah a maaqo faxe waam warse.
Too waqdi Yalli woo malik gubal yen numih bagut maqaane kee xuwaw kaah hee.
Takkay immay a numuy malik gubal yenehiyya malikik meysitak yeneemih sabbatah, Daaniyelik iyyeemih, «Malik ukuma siinik iyye maaqo akme wayteeniih, gersi furraynah innah xagarah gace wayteenik, wonnal malik yoo qidele» kaak iyye.
Malik gubal yan num, Daaniyel kee kay kataysiisih sidocut dacayrih num heeh yen. Daaniyel tohuk lakal woo numih fan gexeeh, iyyemii,
«Ku maganah kudra kee lee tabna ayroh neh ucuyaay; tohuk sarra xagar nek akah gaca'nna nek wagtetto.
Sarrak nee kee woo malik-buxah-maaqo-yakme-mara tittal wagga haay, cella inna tublek wadir, kot ceelinnaanim abetto» kaak iyye.
Woo numuuy, usuk kaa esserem tabna ayroh gideh keenih oggoleh.
Tabna ayro suggu 'yeenik lakal, qaafiyat kee qandeh malik-buxah-maaqo yakme marak aysuk sugen.
Tohuk gexxaamah woo ayrok wadir, dacayrih keenit yan num, malik yacee maaqo hinna'mmay, caxâ-miru yakmoonay ken iyye.
Yalli woo affara numuh falsafat kee kitaabal tunkuttubeemih ixxiga keenih yecee. Toh lih kaadu Yalli Daaniyelih suwaawur kee soonok maqna elle yaaxige'nna kaah yecee.
Keenih heen wakti gufe waqdi, malik gubal yan num woo furrayna inkih malikil xayyoose.
Malik yakkeenimik inkih ken lih yaabeh immay, gersi marak inkih Daaniyel kee Cananya kee Misaayel kee Qadarya yossokoote. Tonna-leemiik doolat-taamat culen.
Malik faxe essero esseraah, waagiseenimik faxem taniimih, a affara num, baab-abeenit kee faal-qiday woo baaxol sugga 'tehiyyak inkih, tabna adda tayse ixxiga luk yenen.
Daaniyel Malik-Kooris deqsita malik Baabelon rasul dardaare saaku fanah doolat taamal elle suge.

Nabkadnessar malik yekkeemih nammeyhaytô-sanatat soono yubleeh, woo soonoh sabbatah waagiseeh xin kaat amaate cineh.
Tonna-leemiik soonitem kaah warsaana'gidih, soono yafdige maraay faal-qidaay baab-abeenitiiy cutuk-beya kee ramli-qida-marah amma 'yaanam inkih seeco abe. Oson yemeeteeniih foocal kaak soolen waqdi, keenik iyyemii,
«Soono ubleeh, woo soono cisab yol tekkeeh; away teetik maqna aaxigem faxa» keenik iyye.
Oson too waqdi Suuriyah afat kaal gacseenimih, «Malikow, ku qumri waaray. Tuble soono neh waris, maqna akak koh warsennok» kaak iyyen.
Malik keenik iyyeemih, «Uble soono isin yoh warisaay, maqna teetik kaadu isin yoh warisa. Toh abe wayteenik, iba kee gaba rike-rikeh siinik argiggiqeyyooh, buxa siinik kaadu abuuruh cabeyyo. Takkay immay uble soono yoh warisseeniih maqna kaadu yoh akak warisseenik, wohih galtoh meqe mattaco siinih aceeyyooh, naba mara sin abeyyo. Uble soono yoh warisaay maqna akak kaadu yoh warissaanamal, inni bagul gaba kaleh» keenik iyye.
Too waqdi a mari kaal gacseemih, «Naharak atu tuble soono neh warisaay maqna nel akak cab» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi malik iyyemii, «Tahaay ekkelem kinnih! Isin away a soonoh maqna yoh warse wayteenik, inkih inki digaalah sin digaaleyyo 'yaanamal gaba kalem tublen waqdi, wakti rubtaanam faxxan. Wakti kulli way inki innal masuga yaanamah dirab yol teceenim faxxan. Toh hinnak, soonok maqna taaxigeenim elle aaxaguh, uble soono naharak yoh warisa» keenik iyye.
A mari kaal gacsemii, «Malikow, atu faxxam addunyâ-bagul warisu duuda num mayan. Ahaydumah annah tanim, kaxxa qande kee nabna le malikwa kinni-way, faal-qida kee baab-abeenitiiy cutuk-beyal messerinna.
Annah tanim kaxxam gibdiimiiy; yallittek kalih mari yaaxagu maduuda. Yallitteh tu gactek, sahdayti addal mageytinta» kaak iyyen.
Malik toh yoobbe waqdi naqabuh gira yekkeeh, «Baabelon baaxol sugga 'te tu-taaxago inkih qida» iyye.
Tonna-leemiik malik amrisem kay gubal yan marah ascassuk yiysixxige. Rabaanamih cokmi elle aben marat loowoh, Daaniyel kee kay kataysis yesgelleenih yenen.
Too waqdi Daaniyel, malik qaskarak abbah yen numuy, tu taaxago qida akak iyyeenihiyyal gexe. Too num migaaqah Ayruk deqsitak yen. Sarra edde yaaba yab isik cubbusak, Daaniyel too numuk iyyeemih,
«Malik annah yan gibdi amri akah yeceem macaay?» iyye. Aryuk aham elle tekke'nna kaah warse.
Daaniyel too waqdi malik fan gexeeh, «Soonok maqna koh warsa'gidih, wakti yoh ab» kaak iyye. Malik woh kaah oggoleh.
Sarrak Daaniyel buxah gexeeh, Cananya kee Misaayel kee Qadaryay kay kataysiisih tanihiyyah tikka 'tem inkih keenih warse.
Keenik iyyeemih, «Nee kee kalah tan tu-taaxago cattimna'gidih, Yalli a soonoh maqna nee yayballayuh, qaraanal yan Yalla kallaca» keenik iyye.
Too bar Yalli Daaniyelih too soonoh maqna wacyi gurral kaa yuybulle. Too waqdi Daaniyel qaraanal yan Yallah candu gacseeh, kaa saariseeh, iyyeemih:
Kas kee qande lem Yalla;
fayla kulli way kaah takkay.
Kulli wakti tamlikem kaa;
malik abtaah kaltam Yalla.
Kas le marah kas taceem kaa;
numuh ixxiga taceem kaa.
Qellittaah sirrik tanim qaddossam kaa.
Diteh addat qellittam tablem kaa.
Ifi maroh edde yanim Yalla.
Yi kaxxa abbobti tuqbude Dageltaw,
kas kee qande yoh teceem koo.
Candu koh gacsah koo faylisa.
Koo esserrem atu yoo tuybulleeh;
malikih warisnu waynam nee tuybulleeh;
candu koh gacsah koo faylisa»
axcuk Yalla faylise.
Sarrak Daaniyel, Aryuk deqsita numuy malik woo mara akak qida iyye fan gexe. Kaak iyyeemih, «A soono anu kaah warseyyok, malik fan yoo beyaay; Baabelon baaxol tan tu-taaxago maqidin» kaak iyye.
Aryuk woo waqdiik, Daaniyel malik fan beeh, kaak iyyeemih, «Malikow, Yuudâ-baaxok seewah bahne marih numuy atu tuble soono yaaxigehiyya geeh» kaak iyye.
Malik too waqdi Daaniyeliy Baabelon-mari migaaqah Beltasaxxar akak iyyehiyyak iyyeemih, «Anu uble soono kee woo soonoh maqna yoh afdigettom duddaa?» kaak iyye.
Daaniyel kaak iyyeemih, «Malikow, aham tu-taaxago kee faal-qidaay baab-abeenit kee cutuk-beyak num yaaxagu duudam hinna.
Takkay immay Yallay qaraanal yanihiyya sirrih tanim yableeh yaybulle. Yalli, atu xiinit sugte waqdi, sarra yan saaku takku waytam koo yuybulleeh yan. Tublem aham teeti:
Malikow, qarkaytol deerih tan waqdi, sarra takku waytam cisaabisak teneeh; Yallay sirrih tanim yaaxige, sarra takku waytam koo yuybulle.
Yoh tu gactek, away a soonoh maqna yoh tumbulleeh; akah yoh tumbulleem, sinaamak kasah maysa. Takkay immay, atu a soonoh maqna taaxige'gid kee, kol yemeete cisaabak maqna taaxige'gidi.
«Taway tuble soono koh warisu waa. Malikow, gabak bicsen ceeloy kaxxam nabahiyya foocal soolah isik tuble. Woo-ceeloh-ifi bixiq axcuk yeneeh, intih yabloonu xiqaanamak manannon.
Amo akak nabam meqe dahabak bicseenih yenen. Alil kee gaboobi akak lakqok bicseenih yenen. Axca kee mayxay akak nacaasak bicseenih yenen.
Lak akak birtak bicseenih yeneeniih; ibittek garab akak bicseenim, birta kee kallak ten.
Atu woh wagitak sugte waqdi, kaxxa xaa, num gabah kaa xage'kal, qalek baxsimma 'yeeh, rade. Woo ceeloh-ibay kalla kee birtak bicseenihiyyat boodeeh butukku hee.
Woo waqdi woo birta kee kallaay, nacaasaay lakqo kee dahab inkih, inki-adda caffa tekkeeh, caacay woo caffak raat cabe'kal inkih beeh. Takkay immay woo kaxxa xaa, baaxo inkih dudda qale yekke.
Tuble soono tamah teetiiy; taway maqna akak koh warisu waa.
«Malikow, atu kulli malikwak naba malik kinnito. Qaraanal yan Yalli baaxok inkih amoyta koo abeeh, qande kee milkiiy migaq inkih koh yecee.
Baaxô-bagul tan ummattaay, alluwwe kee haadah abbootan inkih koh yecee. Woo soonol tuble dahabak bicsen amo, koo.
«Kok lakal gersi doolat amaatele'mmay, ku doolatih gide nabnak matalla. Ku lakal tamaatu wayta sidochaytô doolatay nacaas inna le, inkih tan baaxo xiinisele.
Tohuk lakal fereyhaytô doolat amaatele. Too doolat qandeh birti innah gaceleeh, teetik duma sugte doolatwa aggiggile leeh bututtukku heele.
Woo ceelok ibittey birta kee kallak yesgelleenihiyya tuble. Tohuk maqna too doolatih addal sittin-way akkele 'yaanama. Kalla kee birtay agleh tanik, woo doolatak garab caylah birti inna aallele.
Ibi-feeraarik garab kallaay, aki garab birtak bicseenih yeneeniih; tohuk maqna woo doolatak garab qanxaffe le doolat akkeleeh, aki garab boola le doolat akkele.
Tonnah kaadu birtay kallat yesgelleenihiyya tubleeh; tohumuk maqna kaadu, woo doolatih malikwa doolat qande bahsiisaana'gidih, baxak ballis akkelon. Takkay immay wohim birta kee kalla yasgalleenimih bis aallele.
«Too malikwah dabaanal, qaraanal yan Yalli baye wayta doolat xisele. Too doolatak faxe doolat mataysaay; sugte doolatwa bayissa hayteh elle raaqeleeh waarele.
Gabah num xage'kal qalek baxsimma 'yeh rade xaay soonol tublehiyyak maqna toh teeti. Too xaa, birtaay nacaasaay kallaay lakqo kee dahabak bicsen ceelo aggilih tuble. Yallay Nabahiyya sarra takku waytam koh warseh yan. Atu soono elle tublem, hununuh tama'nnaay; teetik nummâ-maqna koh warseh» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal Malik Nabkadnessar Daaniyel foocal gommoh radeeh, kaa yeynebe. Sarrak, «Daaniyelih sadgat abaay mattaco kaah acuya» iyye.
Tohuk lakal kaadu iyyemii, «Ku Dagelti yallittek naba Dageltaay; malikwâ Malik kinnih; sirrih tanim taybulleem kaa» iyye. «Woh elle aaxigem, sirrih taniimik adda yoh warisseh» kaak iyye.
Tohuk lakal malik Daaniyelih kaxxa arac yeceeh, mango mattacoy nabam meqehiyyak mangom kaah yecee. Baabelon-rakaakayih abba kaa abe. Kalah kaadu, malikih fayu yecee marak inkih abba kaa abe.
Daaniyel malikik, «Sadrak kee Meesak kee Qabednago deqsita mara, Baabelon-rakaakayih caagiidah abbobti ken aba» iyyeeh, malik toh abe. Daaniyelih tu gactek, malik-qaril elle raaqe.

Malik Nabkadnessar dahabak bicsen ceeloy xexxaarah lactam cusul takkeeh, baguh kaadu lica cusul takkehiyya bicseh, Baabelon rasuk Duura deqsitta booxal soolise.
Tohuk lakal, kay gubal taamita marak, malik xaylooy xintoh-abbobtiiy, xintoh abbobtih gubal taamita maraay, makaabonuuy, cokmaabaay, cokmaabak gubal yan maraay, doolat lakqo daanah gabat akak tan mara kee baddah abbobtih inkih, seeco abe. A seeco akah tekkem, malik soolise ceelo yaqbudeeni'gidik ten. Ama malik gubal taamita mari inkih woo ceeloh foocal soole waqdi,
xaagu sinaamah yaysaabbe num sollu 'yeeh anay fayya haak annah iyye. «Kulli rasih ummatta kee mariiy, isi nasab kee isi af akak le ummattak inkih,
*baanta kee fooximaay kirar kee *begenaay karambo kee gersi duyyey gadah yaagureenih anay taabboonu waytan waqdi, Malik Nabkadnessar soolise ceeloy dahabak bicseenihiyyah qibaadah, takkeenimik inkih gommoh radetton.
Gommoh rade wee num, woo waqdiik, habug inta kaxxa-muufeh innal bicsen aracah addat kaa qidelon» iyye.
Too ummatta inkih too duyyey gadah yaagureenih anay toobbe waqdi, woo ceeloy malik soolisehiyyah gommoh raden.
Too waqdi Baabelon rasih marak garab, Yahuud maral qellat edde baahaanam geen.
Malikik iyyeemih, «Malikow, qumri kok waaray!
Atu isih, ‹Baanta kee fooximaay kirar kee begenaay karambo kee gersi duyyey gadah yaagureenih anay oobba haan waqdi, kulli num dahabak bicsen ceeloh gommoh raday!
Rade waa numuuy, habug inta kaxxa-muufeh addat qidelon› 'yaanam inte.
Malikow, Yahuud marak Baabelon rasih baddah abbootan akah tecee maray migaaqah Sadrak kee Meesak kee Qabednago deqsitahiyya, kooy malikih yanihiyyah amri cineeniih, ku yalla mayaqbudaanaay; atu soolisse ceeloh gommoh maradan» iyyen.
Toh yoobbe waqdi, malik kaxxam bagcarriteeh, «Gexay woo sidooca num yol baaha» iyye. Ken baaheeniih;
too waqdi malik keenik iyyeemih, «Sadrak kee Meesak kee Qabednagok, isin nummah yi yallitte aqbude cinteeniih, anu soolise dahabak bicsen ceeloh gommoh raddoonu cinteenii?
Taway meqek, a gadah yaaguren duyyeh anay taabben waqdi, gommoh raday, ama ceelo uqbuda. Gommoh rade wayteenik, urta muufeh addat sin qideloonu'mmay, yi gabak kalah sin cata yalli mayana» keenik iyye.
Too waqdi woo sidiica num kaal gacisseemih, «Malikow, nek abtu waytaamak, edde koysinnam mannu.
Takkay immay muufek addat nee qiddaamah, nanu naqbude Dagelti nee yayyaaqu duudaah, ku gabat nee biyaakite kalam duudah.
Takkay immay nee cate waamah, atu yallah litom manaqbudaay, atu soolisse ceeloh gommoh maradna» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi Nabkadnessar bagcarriteeh, naqabuk gexxaamah inti qabal innah kaak gacte. Isi marak iyyeemih, «Muufet gira urusaay dumak malcina adda laqnah lafitta 'xica» iyye.
Sarrak qaskar addak celeemah yan marak, «Uxuyya ken haay muufek addat ken qida» iyye.
Too mari, a sidiica num amot kalabtaay dallaabiyat kee xagarat haan gersi sartan luk uxuyyu ken heeniih, girat ken qiden.
Takkay immay malik, «A muufe xayuk urusaay laqna kaxxam bahsiisa» iyyeemih sabbatah, woo gira muufet ken qide mara alelteh tokmeh.
A sidiica numuy yooxeenihiyya woo girah addat raden.
Sarrak Nabkadnessar garciik waaga tibbixeeh, gubaak kaqqa 'yeh, fayu kaah yecee marak iyyeemih, «Noxeeh muufeh addat qideenim sidiica num hinnaa?» iyye. Osonuuy, «Sidiica num qidnem digga le» iyyen.
Too waqdi malik iyyeemih, «Hay, a girah addat affara num wonnak annah gexah ablek, ah macaay? Axawat kaadu mayaniinaay xagaral keenik cararow kee biyaakak tambulleem matan. Fereyhaytô-num yallittek tiyak teenah tan kaa» iyye.
Sarrak Nabkadnessar urta muufek afah amma 'yeh iyyeemih, «Sadrakow! Meesakow! Qabednagow! Yallay kulliimik daga raaqahiyyah naqoosay eweqay!» keenik iyye. Oson too waqdi xayuk yewqen.
Malik-xaylooy, xintoh abbobtiiy, ken gubal taamita mara kee malikih fayu yecee mari inkih, woo sidiica numuy gira tu elle baahe waytehiyya yable'gidih yemeete. Xagorta kinni-way keenik carareh manannaay, sari kaadu keenik carareh mananna. Xagaral keenik qerti suruy kinni-way mananna.
Too waqdi malik iyyeemih, «Sadrak kee Meesak kee Qabednago taqbude Dagelta faylisa. Ken Dagelti malaykattu keenih ruubeeh, keeniy kaal yaamineeh kaa yaqbudehiyya cateh. Oson yi amri cineeniih, yalla 'yeenih gersim yaqbudeenimik, faxem keenit takke way, isinni Dagelta yaqbudeenimil gaba kalen.
Hay, taway, anu sin aysixxigeemih: Faxe baaxoh num yakkuu, hinnay faxe nasabak yanuu, hinnay kaadu, faxe afah yaaba num takku, a sidiica numih Dagelta xaafek, iba kee gabal kaa argiqeyyooh buxa kaak abuuruh cabeyyo. Ken Dageltih innah cata gersi yalli mayana» iyye.
Sarrak malik, Sadrak kee Meesak kee Qabednagoh dumak yayse abbootan Baabelon rasih baddal keenih yecee.

Malik Nabkadnessar kulli baaxol tan ummattay mango afah yabtaah mango kedoodah tanihiyyah inkih, farmo ruubeeh keenik iyyeemih, «Naharak salaamatta siinil qida. Gaddi siinik amagguk yamaggay.
Anu uble qagabak tanim kee ablewaynuy Yallay kulliimik daga raaqa yoo yuybulleehiyya siinih warsam yoh rufto le.
Yalli nee yaybulle qagabak tanim manxu nabna le;
usuk abe ablewaynuh tanim kaxxa cayla le.
Waara malikih tanim, Yalla.
Kulli way mulki lem, Yalla.
«Anu buxah addal tu wee'kal innih elle faxe'nnal suge.
Barak teena qarkaytô-bagul xiinit an waqdi, kaxxam cunxo yot qida suwaawur uble.
Sarrak a soonok maqna yoh warsaana'gidih, Baabelon baaxol tan tu-taaxagoh inkih seeco abe.
Too seecol faal-qidaay baab-abeenitiiy cutuk-beya kee ramli-qidak num raaqe'kal inkih temeete. Too waqdi anu uble soono keenih warseh immay, too soonoh maqna keenik num yoh warisu yeffereh.
Ellecabol Daaniyeliy anu migaaqah Beltasaxxar akak excehiyya yol xayyoowe. Too migaq akak geem, anu liyo yalla. *Kudduusuk tan yallitteh roocaaniyya kay xagarat tan.
«Anu kaak exceemih,
‹Beltasaxxaraw, tu-taaxago-miraacow, kudduusuk tan yallitteh roocaaniyya kot tanim aaxigeeh, atu iginto sirri mayan. Anu uble soono koh warisu waak, teetik maqna yoh warsetto› kaak exce.
Sarrak woo soono kaah warseh excemii, ‹Xiinit an waqdi baaxok gudel kaxxa caxa uble. Woo caxa qaran guffa hayteh, addunyâ-bagul yan marah inkih umbulluyyu 'tam fan, ambuk tembe.
Teetik ayyuufi nabam qaxa-muquk yeneeh, addunyâ-bagul enna 'ya mara dudda hayta caxâ-miru luk ten. Dubaala akak inxicca 'yaanam inkih woo caxah silaalol silaalitte. Kimbir tet luudittet qarwa xissite. Rooci elle haytam inkih, maaqoh tet xaylo tokme.
Uxih xiinit an waqdi, woo soonol qaraanak kulli waqdi bical yan malaykattu amaatih uble.
« ‹Too malaykatti anay fayya haak iyyeemih: «Ama caxa irgiqay luudwa teetik kala. Ayyuufa teetik luuqusaay, tet caxah miru baaxot caxa. Tet gubal silaalitta alluwwa kee, tet luuditteh amot yan kimbir xiiriya.
Takkay immay caxak buxux kee ramiida elle caba. Birta kee nacaasak bicsen birti-axaw too raaqe buxuxut uxuyay; woo booxal tan qaysoh bagul elle tanay 'xica. Taway naafi kaal oobay, dabqih alluwwe kee coox lih gacay.
Usuk malcina sanatih gide hawri cabeleeh, kas kaak alluwwê-kas akkele.
Aham tiysixxigem, kulli waqdi bical tan malayka. Akah tiysixxigem, sahdayti xinto tamlikem, Yallay inkih daga raaqahiyyaay; tet isih faxe numuh yeceem ummatta inkih taaxagay; isih faxek abbootan ramma le numuh yecee» iyye› kaak exce.
Malik, «Anu ublem ta soono kinnih» 'yaanam iyye. «Ta way Beltasaxxaraw, teetik maqna yoh waris. Yi baaxol tan tu-taaxagok, aham num yoh warisu maduudinna. Takkay immay kot yallittê-roocaaniyya taniimih sabbatah duudetto» iyye.
Daaniyel tah yoobbe waqdi wariggiteeh, dago waktit iyyam magenna. Malik kaak iyyeemih, «Beltasaxxaraw, a soonok intu waytaamak mameysitin» iyye.
Too waqdi Beltasaxxar kaal gacseemih, «Malikow, a soono edde yabtam koo hinnay ku naqboytiitit takkem faxak en!
Atu tuble caxay, qaran guffa hayteh addunyâ-bagul yan marah inkih umbulluyyu 'tam fan ambuk tembeeh
ayyuufi akak qaxa-muquk yeneeh kaadu tonnah xaylo akak addunyâ-bagul enna 'ya mara adoobissahiyyay alluwwa gubal akak nookittaah kimbir luudut qarwa akak xisahiyya, koo.
Malikow, too caxa koo kinni. Atu naba malikiy kaxxa qande le tekke. Kaxxam tembeeh, abbootan kok qaran gufeeh, qande kok addunyâ-bagul fixixxeh.
Atu qaraanak yemeete malaykattuy kulli waqdi bical yani tubleeh; woo malaykatti iyyeemih, ‹Caxa irgiqaay kala. Buxux kee ramiida teetikiiy makalina. Birta kee nacaasak bicsen birti axaw, woo raaqe buxuxut uxuyay, qayso elle tooboke booxal elle caba. Kaal naafi raday malcina sanatih gide alluwwa lih dabqih gacay› iyye.
«Malikow, tahak maqna, Yallay inkih daga raaqa, kot takku waytaamat yaabem nee taybulle.
Sahdak koo baxseloonuuh; alluwwa lih dabqih gacetto. Malcina sanatih gide laahi innah qayso akamuk, gubbik bagul xiinetto. Qaraanak ooba naafi xagar kok arqusele. Too waqdi sahdayti le abbootan tamlikem, Yallay inkih daga raaqahiyya kinnim aaxigettooh, tet kaadu isih faxe marah yacayu waam aaxigetto.
Malaykatti, ‹Caxak buxux baaxol elle cab› akah iyyeemik maqna: addunya inkih xiinissam, Qaraanal yan Yalla kinnim taaxagu wayta saaku, akah sugte malikih gacetto.
Hay, tonnal malikow, ku maganak anu koh acee fayu oobbey. Dambi lem maabinaay gitah tanim ab. Umaane cabaay, xukkot yan marah xuwaw. Tonnal gaddaliino koo cabe waytam takkeh» kaak iyye.
Malik Nabkadnessarat soonol ubulla heem tekkeeh,
tohim kaat tekkem, taban kee namma alsa sugek sarrak ten. Ayrok teena Baabelon magaalal isi qarih amol gexak suge waqdi,
iyyeemih, «Baabelon magaala manxu nabaah! Anu inaytâ-magaalah tet akah xisem, inni qande kee inni caylaay; inni nabna kee inni hayba elle aybulle'gidi»
'yaanam iyyuh too yab afat abbaxih, qaraanak xongolo kaal raddeeh, woo xongolo inteemih, «Malik Nabkadnessarow, kok axcem oobbey. Malaakinnu kok beenih,
sahdak koo baxissa heenih dabqih alluwwa lih gacetto. Malcina sanatih gide laahi innah qayso akamuk sugetto. Sarrak Yallay inkih daga raaqahiyya a addunyah abbootan yamlikeeh, isih faxe marah yacayu duudam aaxigetto» kaak iyye.
Too yab too waqdiik numma yekke. Nabkadnessar ummattah addak yewqeeh, laahi innah qayso yokme. Naafi xagaral kaak oobeeh, xagor kaak xexxaarah qawî-galih innah gace. Ibi lifiq kaak kimbiroh ibih lifiqih gid yekke.
Woo malcina sanat tatrek lakal malik iyyeemih, «Qaraanay Yalli elle yani wagga hee waqdi, kas yol gaceeh, too waqdi Yallay inkih daga raaqahiyyah candu gacseeh; kaay waarahiyya fayliseeh, essekexxeh.
Kay mulki kulli way waara;
Kay xinto ummaan waarele.
Baaxol enna 'ta ummatta kay garil tu hinna.
Qaraanal tan malayka kee baaxol tan ummatta inkih
kay milkih gubat tan.
Usuk faxeemil saduh gacu duuda num mayan.
Usuk abem macah tekkeeh, iyyu duuda num mayan.
«Maqaane yol tuduure saaku, luk suge muddaqiyinnuuy, luk suge haybaay luk suge nabna kee luk suge abbootan yoh yuduureh. Yi doolatih abbobti kee yi xintoh gexso miracwa, emeete way, yoh garayteh, duma malikih suge saaku luk suge migaaqak yayse migaq gee.
Tonna leemiik yoo Nabkadnessar qaraanal yan Malik faylisaah kaa assakaxxeh. Usuk le nabnat yaabah, usuk abba heem inkih cakkik taniimiiy, kay giti cakki gita. Kaxxiina le marak kaxxiina kalu dudda le» 'yaanam iyye.

Ayrok teena malik Belsaxxar alfi yakke maray kay xintoh miracwah yanihiyyah, isi buxal qibnaytiinoh kaxxa afxago keenih xage. Belsaxxar qinabak bicsen kamri ken lih aaqabuk suge.
Maqabat yanin waqdi, kaa kee kay xintoh-miracwaay kay agabu kee caggô-gubbih caggoh ginnaaqot le agabu elle yaaqubeeni'gidih, Belsaxxar amri yeceeh iyyeemih, «Gexay yi abba Yarusalaamal yan Yallih Qibaadâ-Qarik baahe dahab kee lakqok bicsen kobbaayiy kee sacnitte annah addah culusa» iyye.
Too waqdiik dahabak bicsen kobbaayiy kee sacnittey Yarusalaamal yan Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik dannabah orbiseenihiyya kay qarih adda baahen. Too waqdi too duyyel, kaa kee kay maray xintoh miracwah yanihiyya kee kay agabu kee caggô-gubbih caggoh ginnaaqot le agabu tooqobe.
Oson woo qinabak bicsen kamri yooqoben waqdi, Yallih aftoh lon duyyey dahab kee lakqooy nacaas kee birtaay xeet kee cooxuk bicseenihiyyah saare aben.
Oson tohut yanin waqdi, garciik kay qarih gidaarih bagul, sahdayti gaba tumbulleeh; woo gaba gidaarak noorâ-bagul axcih faanus elle ifisak suge aracal aktubih yublen. Malik too gaba aktubih yuble waqdi,
wariggiteeh; abeh yan wariggak gexxaamah fooci kaak burraaciteeh, guluuba kaak axaxxeh, yinnikisseh.
Too waqdi, «Faal-qida kee baab-abeenit kee cutuk-beyah yoh seeca» iyyeh xongole. Woo mari yemeete waqdi, malik keenik iyyeemih, «A kutbe yakriyeeh teetik maqna yoh warisu waa numuh, malik buxah mari haa qasdiimin sartan kee dahabak bicsen silsilatay massakaxxah fillat haanahiyya aceeyyo. Abbootanah kaadu yok gubal sidochaytô-num akkele» iyye.
Too mari inkih kutbe fan xayyooweh; takkay immay aham num keenik yakrayu yeffereh. Malikih a kutbe intaamih maqna warsa num keenit mageytiminna.
Tahak iyyaanaah abaanam waagiseenih. Too waqdi malikik fooci burraacinaanah dumak lafteh, kaxxam meysite. Kay xintoh miracwa kaadu tahak iyyaanaah abaanam aaxige cineenih.
Malik-ina, malik kee kay muddaqiyyi abah yan waxxaqto toobbe waqdi, afxago elle xagak sugen qari culte. Too waqdi, «Malikow, qumri kok waarayik, a gide mankakkaqinaay annah magacin.
Ku xintoh gubat tan baaxoh addal, *Kudduusuk tan yallitteh roocaaniyya xagarat akak tan num yaniih; ku abba malikih yen saaku, a num tut xayih radiyyaay ixxiga kee yallitte-kas le num kinnim kaak tumbulleh sugte. Ku abbah yen Malik Nabkadnessar, faal-qida kee baab-abeenitiiy cutuk-beya kee ramli-qidak inkih abba kaa abeh suge.
Num aalle waa kas kee ixxiga leeh; soonok maqna warisuh dudda akah le. Missilak kaadu maqna yaaxigeeh, sirrih taniimik maqna yafdige. Too numuh farmo rub. Kaak migaq Daaniyeli. Malik migaaqah Beltasaxxar kaah yeyyeeqeh suge. Usuk ahamih maqna koh warsele» kaak inte.
Daaniyel woo waqdiik malik buxah baaheeniih; too waqdi malik kaak iyyeemih, «Yi abba Yuudâ-baaxok seewah baaheeh Daaniyel akak 'yaanam koo innaa?» kaak iyye.
Qagseh kaadu kaak iyyemii, «Yallittê-roocaaniyya kot taniih, atu duddaay ixxiga kee kas lito 'yaanam oobbe.
Tu-taaxago kee faal-qida akke baaheenih sugeeniih, ‹Aham ikriyaay maqna akak yoh warisa› 'yaanam keenik exceh immay, num keenik yoh warisu maduudinna.
Takkay immay too maral gibdaabina lem kol sahlih taniih; sinam gita akah wayteemih atu gita geyta 'yaanam kok iyyan. Tonna leemiik atu a kiraati tikriyeeh maqna akak teexegek, malik buxah mari haa qasdiimin sartan kee dahabak bicsen silsilatay massakaxxah fillat haanahiyya koh aceeyyo. Abbootanah kaadu yok gubal sidochaytô-num akketto» kaak iyye.
Daaniyel kaal gacseemih, «Anu mattaco faxam mayyu immay, gersi marah taceek muuma. Tonna'mmay malikow, akkel tunkuttubem kee teetik maqna koh warseyyo.
Malikow, Yallay kulliimik daga raaqahiyya ku abbah yen Nabkadnessar kaxxa malik abeeh migaq kee heebatiiy nabna kaah yecee.
Usuk nabna le numuk yeneemih sabbatah, mango baaxoh mara kee mango meelah yoobokeeh mango afah yaaba mari kaak aben meysi kaak axaxitak sugen. Qidam faxa num qidak sugeeh, wadam faxa num wadak suge. Qawratat qidam faxa num qidak sugeeh; yassakaxxem faxa num assakaxxuk suge.
Takkay immay kaxxa kaxxiina kee isih iyyeemih fayxi baahe waqdi, malikannuk oobeeh luk suge nabna weeh.
Ummattah addak yewqeeh, kas kaak saqi kas yekke. Dabqih dibookalwa lih gaceeh laahi'nnah qayso yokme. Xiina waqdi qaraanak ooba naafi xagar kaak arquse. Sarra ellecabol Yallay kulliimik daga raaqahiyya a addunyah abbootan yamlikeeh, isih faxe marah yaceem yeexegeh.
«Takkay immay kooy kay baxah yanihiyya aham aaxagih, Yallah marammitinnitooy,
qaraanal yan Goytak giddih tan taamah taamitteeh; kay qarik dannabah orbisen kobbaayiy kee sacnittel, koo kee ku xintoh miracwaay ku agabu kee caggô-gubbih caggoh ginnaaqot lito agabu, qinabak bicsen kamri tooqoben. Too waqdi yalla axcuk dahab kee lakqooy nacaas kee biriitaay coox kee xeetik bicissen duyyey tu aabbe waytah tu able waytah tu aaxige waytahiyya faylisse. Yallay koo wadaah koo qidaah atu abba haytem inkih gabat lehiyya massakaxxinnito.
Tonna leemiik, Yalli taktube gaba akah ruubem, tohih sabbata.
«Tunkuttube kutbe, ‹Loowo. Loowo. Qilsa. Baxsa› 'yaanam inta.
«Loowo 'yaanamak maqna: Yalli ku abbootan sugu waah gide loowak sugeeh, ellecabo teetik xayyoyse, 'yaanama.
«Qilsa 'yaanamak maqna: qilsak takkeh gide kok yaaxigeeni'gidih miizaanal koo heenih immay, tu'qilsa luk masuginnito.
«Baxsa 'yaanamak maqna kaadu: ku doolat baxambaxsinteh Meediya kee Fursih yooboke marah tontocowwe» 'yaanam kaak iyye.
Too waqdiik malik isi marak, «Daaniyelih malik buxah mari haa sartanay ibak lifiq gufay qasdiimini kee, dahabak bicsen silsilat fillat kaak haa» iyye. Abbootanak kaadu isi gubal sidochaytô-num kaa abe.
Malik isih, too barat edde, marin gabat rabe.
Daryawesiy Meediyah yoobokeh barak lactam kee nammayat yenehiyya, kay aracal gaceh Baabelon-baaxoh-malik yekke.

Daryawesiy kay xintoh gubat tan baaxooxal, bool kee labaatanna takke abbobti reedise.
Toh lih kaadu woo abbobti abta taama wagtaana'gidih, Daaniyel kee gersi namma num reedise. Malik isih taqbe waa'gidih, xinto meqe'nnal gexxa'gidih, woo sidiica num reedise.
Daaniyel gersi marak kasah aysuk yeneemih sabbatah, xayi saakih addat, kaa'lih sinam wagittot heen mara kee baaxoh abbobtik, inkih tayse taamah taamitam kaak tumbulle. Tonna leemiik malik inkih tan baaxoh abba kaa abam faxe.
Tohih sabbatah kaa'lih sinam wagittot heen mara kee baaxoh abbobti, Daaniyel baaxo meqe'nnal xiinisuh abah yan taamat qellat kaak geyaanamih goranat gacen. Takkay immay Daaniyel qellat kee ayrisiyya celtaamak tu'bagul geytimak manannay, tonna leemiik hebeltô-qellat kaat magennon.
Too waqdi tittak iyyeenimih, «Diini kabuk kaat amaate waynek, gersi innak qellat kaal elle hayya hayna'nna nableh manan» 'yaanam tittak iyyen.
Tonnal kaak aboonu waanamal malissa heeniih; tohuk wadir Malik Daryawesil yemeeteeniih, iyyeenimih, «Malikow qumri kok waaray!
Neey ku xintoh gubal abbootan lehiyyay garab akak taamita marih amô-wagittot yaniih garab xintoh abbobtih akak yaniih garab kaadu xintoh abbobtih gubal yan mara kee doolat abbootan elli haa marak titta elle geyneemih: soddom ayroh gide koo akke waytek, gersi mara kee faxinnaan yallal num tu essere waamal bicnek, atu toh xintô-madqa takke'gidih amri ucuy. Ta amri cininnaan num lubooka edde tan boodoh addat nek qid» iyyen.
«Toh kulli num dirkih akah oggolaah; aham Meediya kee Fursih xintoy kore waytahiyya akah takke'nnah, isi asta elle hayte warkatal nee amris» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi malik Daryawes isi milikkit elle hee warkatay wohim elle amrisehiyya yuktube.
Daaniyel a amri yontocowweem yeexege waqdi, isi buxah gexeeh amô-qari yewqe. Too qarih taagat Yarusalaam magaala fan afkunuk yen. Too taagataak dumaak akah abak yene'nnah, fakimit yan taagatih garik gulubuh gacca 'yeh, kulli saaku ayrol sidiica adda Yalla kallacak dooqa abak suge.
Daaniyel naqboytit yakkeenimik temeeteeh; Yalla kallacam kaak yublen waqdi,
kaak malkitaani'gidih malik fan gexen. Too waqdi malikik iyyeenimii, «Malikow, atu soddom ayroh gide, koo akke waytek, gersi mara kee faxinnaan yallak tuk teena essera num, lubooka elle tan boodot qidenno, 'yaanam elle tan warkatay ku milikkit elle tanihiyya tunkuttubem hinnaa?» iyyen.
Malik keenil gacseemih, «Tunkuttubeh. Woo amri gibdiih, Meediya kee Fursih marih amriy kore waahiyya» keenik iyye.
Oson too waqdi kaak iyyeenimii, «Hay tonnal, Daaniyeli iyyaanah Yuudâ-baaxok seewah baahen numuy akkel yanihiyya koo mayassakaxxaay atu tecee amri cinna heeh, kulli ayrol sidiica adda dooqa aba» kaak iyyen.
Malik toh yoobbe waqdi faxe cineeh; Daaniyel elle catta haa gurra geyam gabbate. Carri tikka 'yam fan, kaa elle cata'nnih malat gace.
Sarrak taaxige mari butta tikka 'yeh, nammeyhaak kaal yemeeteeniih kaak iyyeenimih, «Malikow, Meediya kee Fursih marih xinto elle inta'nnal, inki adda yewqe amri nammeyhaak milaagaanam mabicta» kaak iyyen.
Too waqdi malik, «Daaniyel baahay boodot kaa qida» 'yaanamih amri yeceeh; toh aben. Takkay immay malik Daaniyelik annah iyye. «Ku Dageltay atu baguuk taqbudehiyya koo catay» kaak iyye.
Daaniyel woo boodot qideenik lakal, num kaa akah fake waa innah, malik-milikkit kee kay doolatih asta bagul akak tan kaxxa-xaat, woo boodok afa alfen.
Tohuk lakal malik isi buxah yuduureeh, inkih yan bar maaqo yakamu cineeh, sinam lih walalu cineeh, xin kaadu kaat rade cineh.
Maaci maacise waqdi, malik ugutta 'yeh sissikuk woo boodo fan gexe.
Tokke yemeete waqdi meysitak Daaniyelih seeceh, «Daaniyelow, waara Yallih naqasow, atu baguuk taqbude Yallay ku Dagelta kinnihiyya lubookak koo catee?» kaak iyye.
Daaniyel kaal gacseemih, «Malikow, qumri kok waaray!
Yi Dagelti a lubooka tu yol baahe wayta'gidih, af keenik taxee malayka ruube. Yalli woh akah abem, anu qellat baahe weeh kol umaamat ase weem aaxaguk yeneemih sabbata, malikow» kaak iyye.
Too waqdi malik kaxxam ruffu yeh, «Boodok kaa eyyeeqa» iyye. Daaniyel boodok yeyyeeqen waqdi, Yalla yeemeneemih sabbatah, xagaral anxaqa kaak mananna.
Tohuk lakal malik, «Baatil kaak malkite maraay ken agabuuy ken xaylo inkih, woo boodoy lubooka edde tanihiyyah addat qida» iyye. Woo boodot ken qiden waqdi, lubooka boodok iqiya gufe'kal kaqqa inteh xagaral keenik raddeeh, lafof keenik butuk butuk hayte.
Tohuk lakal Malik-Daryawes kulli rasih ummatta kee mariiy isi kedooda kee isi af akak le ummattay isi xintoh gubat tan baaxooxal geytimtahiyyah inkih, warkat ruubeeh iyyeemih, «Naharak salaamatta siinil qida. Gaddi siinik amagguk yamaggay axcih!
Yi xintoh gubat yan maraw, kulli num siinik Daaniyel yaqbude Dageltak meysitaah kaa yassakaxxem siinil amrisa.
Waara Yalli kaa kinniih;
ummaan way waarele.
Kay xinto way mabaata.
Kay abbootan mayamurruqa.
Umaanek cattaah waddam kaa.
Able weeniih aabbe weenim,
qaran kee baaxô-bagul abtam kaa.
Lubookah afak Daaniyel cattem
usuk yaqbude Dagelta» 'yaanam iyye.
Daaniyel, Daryawes kee Koorisiy Fursih yooboke dardaarinni-dabaanal, kullim gabal akak bicta num yekke.

Baabelon baaxok malikih yen Belsaxxar edde dardaare sanatat, Daaniyel bar qarkaytol deerih yan waqdi, soono kee wacyi innah tanim yuble. Soonoh yublem warkatal yuktubeh raaqise.
Daaniyel yuble soonot yaabeeh iyyeemih, «Bar annah wagga hee waqdi, affara gambik yamaate caacayay bad kaxxa caffo bahsiisahiyya uble.
Too badak fereey takke alluwway nabam nabahiyya amaatih uble. A alluwwa titta ceelak manannaay, tiiy isi ceelo keenik luk yen.
«Naharsi ali lubak ceelak yen. Takkay immay gabilleemah innah galwa luk yen. Woo ala wagitak suge waqdi, galwa kaak kalen. Sarrak woo ala xinkiyya heeniih, too waqdi sinam innah salafti namma ibah soole. Tohuk lakal sahdayti-le-kas kaat heen.
«Aki ali yemeeteeh; woo ali uma-alay sahda qidahiyya ceelak yeneeh; salafah daffeyak yen. Too ali masangalê-lafoofuk sidoc afat luk yen. Too waqdi too alak, ‹Ugutay cadok dudda haytah gide akum› kaak iyyen.
«Anu too alih wagittot an waqdi, gersi ali yemeete. Woo ali kabqi ceelak yen. Buucusul kimbir galwa celtaamak fereey luk yen. Affara moyya luk yen. Abbootan too alah yontocowwe.
«Anu tohih wagittot an waqdi, too wacyil fereyhaytoh ali yemeete. Too ali kaxxa qande luk yeneeh kaxxam akak meysitan alay cunxo sinaamat qidahiyyak ten. Kaxxa moddiiniy biriitah yanihiyyat qide mara kitif kitif heeh yokme. Sarrak wohuk raqteemik amot taqqa 'ye. Too ali gersi alluwwah inna hinna'mmay tabna gaysa luk yen.
«Anu woo gaysoosi kaxxam wagitak suge waqdi, qunxa gaysa keenik addak awaqih uble. Too gaysa arac geyta'gidih, duma sugte gaysoosik sidoc buxuxuk yeyyeeqen. Too gaysa sahdayti intiita kee af luk ten. Afak hida ceela yaabat yaabak ten.
«Anu wokke fan wagitak suge waqdi,
makaabon daffeynah koraasi uble.
Woo koraasik tiyak teenal ‹Kulli Waqdi Yaní›
Sari kaak cankaxi qidih inna luk yeneeh;
xagor kaak qado illi xagoorih inna luk yen.
Kay korsih ibittey koramkortahiyya akak bicseenim
girak ten.
Too korsi girah innah urak ten.
Muxxa giray weeqi innah caxittahiyya
kay foocal caxitak ten.
Tokkel alfitte yakke mari kaah taamitak yen.
Mangah loowo akak amixxige wayta mari
kay foocal soolak kaah taamitak yen.
Too waqdi cokmi buxal daffeyna tekkeeh kitooba fakeenih.
«Qunxa gaysa hida ceela yaabat yabtaah tirtirissaamih sabbatah, anu wohim wagitak raaqe. Fereyhaytoh-ala anu abalih qideenih, raat kaak baysaana'gidih, raysa kaak urta girah addat qiden.
Aki alluwwak luk sugen abbootan beenih. Takkay immay dago waktih gide rabe'kal yanoonay ken iyyen.
«Anu bar woo soonoh addat an waqdi, sahdayti-baxi ceeloh innal tanim uble. Ta sahdayti ceelot yan numuy qamburre marot tabbixe amaatih uble. Sarrak woo ‹Kulli Waqdi Yaní› wokkel sugehiyya fan gexeeh, kay foocal kaa xayyoysen.
Too waqdi mango baaxoh tooboke ummatta kee mango kedoodah tan ummattaay, tonnah kaadu, mariy isi afat akak yaaba inkih, kaa akah taqbude'nnah, too sahdaytuh ceelot yan numuh, nabna kee malikanni qande tontocowweeh ten. Usuk le abbootan waara abbootanak ten. Kay dardaarinni gaba kala dardaarinna hinna.
«Yoh tu gactek, too wacyiy ublehiyya kaxxam yoo wariggiseh kinni'nna aaxige cineh.
Wokkel soolak suge marak numuk teenal amma exceh, ‹Ahak maqna yoh warisey› kaak exce.
«Usuk tohih maqna yoh warseh. Yok iyyeemih,
‹Fereey takke alluwway nabam nabahiyya, affara doolatay addunyâ bagul reeddu waytahiyya.
Takkay immay keenik lakal, Yallay inkih daga raaqahiyyah ummatta too abbootan geeleeh; woo abbootan ken gabak way makata› yok iyye.
«Tohuk lakal woo fereyhaak uble alay, gersi alluwwah ceelo luk suge weeh kaxxam sinam akak meysitta ceelo luk yenehiyyay nacaasak yan iba kee birtak yan moddin luk yeneeh qide mara bututtukku heeh taqqa edde iyyeh gexehiyya, kinnim aaxigem faxe.
Tonnah kaadu woo tabna gaysay woo alak amot tene kee, gersi gaysay sarrak tewqeeh sidiica gaysa tiggilehiyyah qaada kaadu aaxigem faxe. Too gaysa intiita kee af luk ten. Gersi gaysoosik elle baxsintaamah, keenik giffa 'ta ceelo luk teneeh, kaxxiinah hiddootak yaabak ten.
Anu too wagittot an waqdi, too gaysa Yallih marat qeebi abteeh keenik teyseh.
Sarrak woo ‹Kulli Waqdi Yaní› yemeeteh cokmi abeh, ‹Cakki lem, Yallay inkih daga raaqahiyyah mara› iyye. Yallih mari abbootan edde gee wakti gufe.
«Lih yaabak en num, ‹Tohuk maqna ah teeti› yok iyye. ‹Fereyhaytoh ali, fereyhaytô-doolatay tamaatu waytahiyyaay; too doolatat gersi doolatwak baxsa aallele. Baaxol suggu 'teemit inkih ibah aaqatuk baysele.
Tabna gaysa kaadu tabna malikiy woo doolat xiinissu waytahiyya kinni. Wohuk kalah aki malik amaatele. Too malik duma sugte malikwak inkih baxsa le malik akkeleeh; sidooca malik abbootanak oobisele.
Yallay inkih daga raaqahiyyak aaminnaanim axceleh, Yallih ummattat xukkutele. Muusa keenih yecee xinto kee qiddi ayroora elle suge wayte'nnal korisam keh gabbateleeh; wakti kee waktitte kee waktik garab gide
Sarrak qaraanal tan cokmih buxal cokmi yakke'gidih daffeyna heelon. Too daffeynal usuk luk suge qande kaak beeloonuuh inkitanuuk kaa bayselon.
Addunyal enna 'ya marih xintoh qande kee nabna, Yallay inkih daga raaqahiyyah ummattah aceelon. Ken daadarinni, ambaxe sinniih waara daadarinna. Xintoh abbobtiy a addunyah bagul enna 'tahiyya inkih ken akdumelon, amri keenik oggolelon› yok iyye.
«Ublem tama gide. Tohuk lakal anu innih kaxxam meysiteeh, fooci yok burraaciteh. Ubulla heem inkih baguh raaqise.»

«Belsaxxar malik yekkeemih sidochaytô-sanat yekke saaku, anu nammeyhaytô-soono uble.
Soonoh ubleemih: Anu innih Qeelam baddak Suusa deqsitta magaalay gaso maroh edde tanihiyyah addal, Uulay deqsita weeqaytih garil soolak suge.
Wagga hee waqdi, woo weeqaytih qaxal maruw soolah uble. Too maruw namma gaysay xeerihiyya luk yen. Woo namma gaysak tiyak teena xexxar kee qusbaaneh akittok lafitak ten.
Woo maruwih gaysoosi ayrô-culmaay kilbat le kabu kee gabbi-qaxat inkih gufteh ten. A maruwut koysittaah kaak tasillimem mananna. Ta maruw isih faxem abitak sugeeh, tohuk gexxaamah kaxxa cayla baahe.
«Taham kinniimih waagat an waqdi, ayrô-culma le kabuk kaxxam yarde dabeeli, inkih tan baaxooxal tabak yemeete'mmay, abah yan kaxxa ardak gexxaamah ibi kaak baaxo xagak mananna. Namma inti-fanat kaxxam giffa 'ta gaysa luk yen.
Woo dabeeli weeqayti-xaqul-soolah-uble-maruyuy namma gayse luk suge fan quuruk leemiik ardih uble. Sarrak woo maruwut qeebi abah kaa uble.
A dabeeli kaxxam bagcarriteeh, maruw ingiqqi heeh namma gaysa kaak yiggileh. Maruw woo dabeelat edde koysita qande luk manannaay; dabeeli baaxok bagul kaa qideh amot taqqa kaak iyye. Too waqdi a maruw a dabeelak is cattam magenna.
Taaxige dabeeli tohuk lakal kaxxiinah lafitak lafte. Usuk qande baahak elle baahaamal, gaysa kaak tiddigilleh. Too gaysa akak tiddigille aracat kulsa le gaysoosi tooboke. Too affara gaysak tiyaay kabul afkanuk ten.
A affara gaysak tiyak teenah addak qunxa gaysê-baxa tooboke. Too gaysak qande gabbi-qaxaay ayrô-mawqa le kabu kee Baaxooxak-qaxa-tayse-baaxol
Qaraanal tan qaskar kee cutuukat qeebi edde aba qande baahe. Cutuukak tu takkem baaxol qideeh amot taqqa akak iyye.
Qaran qaskarih Mirac lih kinni way qeebi abam faxeeh, kulli ayro kaah abak sugen sadgat abe kaleh. Yallih Qibaadah-Qari nadaasa abe.
Yallih ummatta too gaysah gubat gacteeh; gitat yan sadgat abaanam cabba heenih, wokkel umaane leemit asen. Nummâ-diini baaxot rade. A gaysah abinnaanim gabal bicte.
Tohuk lakal malaykattuk teeni, aki malaykattuk, «Ahamay away wacyih tanihiyya annal magide fan sugelee?» axcih oobbe. Woo malaykatti kaadu essereemih, «Kulli ayrol Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril aban sadgatih aftok, a wacyih nuble umaane magide fan sugelee? Qaraanal tan qaskar kee Yallih Qibaadah-Qarit yaaqiteenim gaba kaltu waytam, maa saakuuy?» iyye.
Too waqdi aki malaykatti kaal gacsemii, «Aham namma alfi kee sidiica boolih carri-bar kee saaku taturtam fan akkuk sugele. Tohuk lakal Yallih Qibaadah-Qari taahirroyseenih, akah suge'nnah aduurele» iyye.
Anu ta wacyik maqna aaxigem faxak suge waqdi, garciik numtin ceelo lem foocal yok soolah uble.
Uulay-weeqaytu le kabuuk, «Jibriilow, ama yubleemih maqna kaah waris» inta xongolo oobbe.
Too waqdi Jibriil yemeeteh, xaqut yok soole. Anu too waqdi kaxxam wariggiteeh, baaxol gommoh rade. Jibriil too waqdi yok iyyeemih, «Atu cagal bani-adantu kinnito'mmay, ahamak maqna ixig. A soono edde yabtam, ellecabô-wakti» iyye.
Usuk yaabak suge waqdi, baaxok bagul afah radeeh inni kasat maraaqiyyo. Too waqdi xabba yoo heeh yoo ugse.
Iyyeemih, «Yallih naqbih ellecabo edde cabtam koh warisu waa. A suwaawur, kulliimik ellecaboy Yalli edde yaabe ayro tamaatu waytahiyya neh yascasse.
Woo tuble maruyuy namma gaysa luk yenehiyyak maqna Meediya kee Fursih marih xinto.
Dabeelak maqna Giriik baaxoh abbootan 'yaanama. Kay namma intih fanak tewqe gaysay gersi gaysoosik giffa 'tahiyya keenik naharsi maliki.
Woo affara gaysay naharsi gaysa tiddigille waqdi temeetehiyyak maqna, naharak sugte doolatay affara ikkel kurruntehiyya. Too doolat qandeh duma sugte doolatih innah magacta.
Woo doolatih xinto gaba kalti gexxah, oson umaaneh lafitak lafitan saakuy digaala keenil tamaatu waytahiyya, isih iyyeemik sah tu oggole waah racmatta sinniih ummatta duquurusa malik amaatele.
Ta malik kaxxa qande baahele'mmay, woo qande isih le qande hinna. Ta malik kaxxam gibdi baatil baaxoh addal uguuguseleeh; abba haam gabal kaak bicele. Qande le mara kee Yallih ummatta kaadu baysele.
Usuk sahda ayriseleh, sahda elle ayrisinnaanim gabal kaah bicele. Kaxxam isit akkeleleh, mango maritteetah aylahu kale'kal annaak ken qidele. Kulliimik daga raaqa malikih yab kinni way cinele. Takkay immay sarrak sahdayti qande akke sinni qandeh gabat bayele.
A wacyiy carri bar kee maaca aban sadgat edde abe waan waktik ko'lih edde yaabeenihiyya nummak maacisele. A wacyil tanim sarrah yan dabaanal akkelek, tuktubem alifay alif asta edde hay» yok iyye.
Anu tohuk lakal dago ayroora boolaateeh, biyaakitak suge. Sarrak ugutta exceh, malik yoo edde hee taamah gexe. Takkay immay ta wacyik gexxaamah, cisabbootiyyat sugeeh; usuk elle yani'nnih adda cedu effereh.

Meediya deqsita marah yooboke Daryawes Baabelon rasul malikih yen. Kay abba migaaqah Ekserkas deqsitak yen.
Usuk edde reede naharsi sanatat, anu taahirik tan kitooba akrayuk, Yarusalaam abuuruh edde raqtu waytaamay YALLI nabi Ermiyaas lih edde yaabeh sugehiyyah acsubuk suge. Abuuruh malcina-tabanih sanat sugtu waytam uble.
Too waqdi dooqa abeh, Yalla kallace. *Qabuddat sartanah gaccaay soomuh assa exceh, gomboduk addat daffa exce. Sarra abne umaanet yaabeeh, Yallay yi Dagelta kinnihiyya kallace. Exceemih,
«Goytaw, atu naba Dagelta kinnito; nanu kok meysinnah. Koo kicna mara kee ku amri oggola mara lih abe bica xagura Dagelta kinnito. Woo mara lih lito kacni mayambaxa.
Nanu dambi le taamat asneh, mako lem bahne. Umam abneh nan. Koo cinneh, atu nek aba intem abnu cinneeh, gitak taniimiy atu nee tuybulleehiyya maaqilleh.
Ku migaaqal yabte nabuwway ku naqoosah tanihiyya, ni malikwaay ni miracwa kee ni kaxxa abbobtiiy ni ummattah inkih warissem cinneh.
Goytaw, atu kulli way cakkik tanim abta. Neh tu gactek, nanu kulli way qaybih aninnaanim ninnil bahna. Neey Yuudah yooboke mara kee Yarusalaam mara kee, tonnah kaadu, inkih yan Israayil maray xayi'kke kee xer ikkel yanihiyyay ko'luk yen imaan cabeemih sabbatah atu baaxot fixixih rubtehiyyak inkih, qaybit radnam numma.
YALLAW, nee kee ni malikwaay ni miracwa kee ni kaxxa abbobti dambi lem kol bahneemih sabbatah, edde nanim wacarriyi.
Yallaw, ni Goytaw, koo cinneh ku nabuwway ku naqoosah tanihiyya Yallih xintol eemena axcuk ne'lih yabte yab oggole cinneh immay, atu racmatta kee qafu le Dagelta kinnito.
Israayil mari inkih gitah taniimiy atu nee tuybulleehiyya maaqileh ku xinto intam abu cineeh ku yab cineh. Nanu dambi lem kol bahne. Tonna leemiik atu ku xintoy Muusay ku naqasuh yanihiyya baahel tunkuttube abaaro nel oobisse.
Nee kee ni abbobtik abeyyo intem abteh. Yarusalaam magaala a addunyah bagul enna 'ta magaaloolik inkih digaalah lafteh.
Muusa baahe xintol warissa hayte digaalah nee digaalte. Takkay immay YALLAW, ni Dageltaw, nanu uxih nummâ gita katayakaay, edde sugne dambik uduurra 'neh, koo ruffa mahannino.
YALLAW, ni Dageltaw, ni digaalah bical gacteeh, kulli way cakkik tanim abtaamih sabbatah, nee digaalteh. Nanu atu aba intem cinneh.
Goytaw, ni Dageltaw! Isi qande ayballuk Masrik nee teyyeeqeemih a saaku fan, ku migaq yaabben migaq yekke'mmay, dambi lem abneeh qellat bahne.
Nanu bahne dambi kee ni kaxxa abbobti abak sugte umaanek gexxaamah, Yarusalaam magaalak cuggaaneh yan mari Yarusalaam kee ku ummatta bursuteh. Goytaw, duma kulliimik nee catak sugte. Uxih Yarusalaam magaalah maral ahaysa isi kaxxa bagcarra xabbacos. Yarusalaam ku magaala. Is ku qaley taahirik tanihiyya kinni.
Goytaw, ni Dageltaw, anu ku naqasuh anik, aba kallaci yok oobbey! Ku qariy yiddigillehiyya meqe intit wagit. Atu Yalla kinnitom kulli mari akah yaaxige'nnah, ku qari meqe intit wagit.
Yi Dageltaw, ayti yoh ucuyaay axcem yok oobbey! Nanu edde nan gadaama ubul! Ku magaalay abuuruh raqtahiyya wagit. Nanu koo akah kallacnam, cakki bagul yan mara nekkek sah hinnay, atu racmatta le Dagelta tekkek sah koo kallacna.
Goytaw, innam nek oobbey! Goytaw, qafu neh ab; nee fan haysit; tibba nek maxcin. Yi Dageltaw, atu Yalla kinnitom kulli num yaaxige'gidih, a dooqa xayuk ugdub. A magaala kee a mari inkih kuumu» axcuk dooqa abe.
Dooqa wohut mayseedeyinniyoy, qagseh innih abe dambi kee Israayil mari abba hee dambit inkih yaabeh; YALLAY yi Dagelta kinnihiyya isi qari akah suge'nnah gacsa'gidih, kaadu dooqa abe.
Anu too dooqat an waqdi, Jibriiliy duma soonoh ublehiyya haadak anu elle ani'kke fan yemeete. Usuk yemeetem carri-barih sadgat edde aban waktik ten.
Too waqdi iyyeemih, «Daaniyelow, akke akah emeetem, takku waytaamih adda koo barsa'gidi.
Atu Yalla kallactam qimbisse waqdi, Yalli woo kallaci koh oggoleh. Yalli kaxxam koo kicnah; tonna leemiik anu away atu abte dooqa Yalli kok oggolem koh warsa'gidih emeete. Taway Yalli Ermiyaas yuybulleemik maqna koh warseyyo'mmay, nagay yoo ankacis.
Ku magaalay taahirik tani kee ku ummattah, waktik malcina-tabanih waqdi malciin-gide
Taaxigem meqemii, Yarusalaam nammayhaak xisoonuuy, elle sugte'nnal tet gacsoonuh amri yeceenim kee, Yalli doore mirac yamaateemik fanat, waktik malcina waqdi malciin-gide kee, lactam kee namma waqdi malciin-gide tatrele. Gititte kee qande le megdeb luk tet xiseloonuh immay too waktil kaxxa gadaama akkele.
Too waktih ellecabot Yalli doore mirac tu luk suge waak,
Too malik inki malciin-gide mango marah bica abele. Woo malciinik garab taturra 'ya waqdi, ummatta abak sugte sadgat kee mattaco inkih abe ken kalele. Yalli faxe baati too ikke amma 'tam fanah, kaxxam umâ-yabulih tanim Yallih Qibaadah-Qarik fayya 'ta aracal heelon. Tamah nagay cubbusay mahawweenin» yok iyye.

Kooris Fursi-malik yekkeemih sidiica sanat yekke saaku, Daaniyelil farmo temeete. Malik, Daaniyelih migaaqah Beltasaxxar yeyyeeqeh suge. Kaal temeete farmo nummâ-farmok tene'mmay, xayih edde radoonu duudan farmok mananna. Yalli woo farmok maqna wacyi gurral kaa yuybulle.
Anu sidooca ayyam rookat suge waqdi,
meqe maaqo maxagiyyooy, cado kaadu akme'kal suge. Qinabak bicsen kamri maaqabiyyooy, too sidooca ayyam gaba kalla haam fan amo file'kal suge.
Sanatak naharsi alsak labaatanna kee fereyhaytoh ayro, Tigras deqsita kaxxa weeqaytih xaqul soolak suge.
Wonnah wagga hee waqdi, *baftak bicsen meqe-sarot sartanah yan numuy agle sinni dahabak bicsen qarum bagul lehiyya uble.
Xagar kaak diifuh bilah inna luk yen. Fooci kaak cankaxi qidih innah urak yen. Intiita kaak urta girah inna luk ten. Ibitte kee gaboobi kaak isiffiyya heen nacaasih innah liliq axcuk ten. Anay kaadu kaak mango marih xongoloh inna luk yen.
Taham suwaawur gurral tublem dibuk yoo. Yo'lih yen mari tahak tu maballinna. Takkay immay kaxxa cunxo keenit hayteh, kudeenih yombooqoreenih.
Tonna leemiik anu tokkel ta suwaawur innah taniimiy qajiibik tanihiyya wagitak dibuk elle raaqe. Boolaateh, qande luk maraaqiyyo. Fooci yok gombod ceelot gace.
Kay anay oobbe waqdi, baaxok bagul afah radeeh inni kasat maraaqiyyo.
Sarrak gaba yoo tibbixeeh gulub kee gabah yoo cabte. Too waqdi axaxitak suge.
Tohuk lakal malaykatti annah yok iyye. ‹Daaniyelow, Yalli koo kicnak, ugutaay anu kok axcem ankacis. Ku fanah yoo ruube›. Toh iyye waqdi axaxitak ugte.
«Sarrak yok iyyeemih, ‹Daaniyelow, mameysitin. Kol temeete farmoh adda ceddi hayteeh, Yalla kinni ku Dageltih meysih rammitteeh miskiinitte ayrok wadirih, ku dooqa oggolsimtem koh warsa'gidih emeete.
Fursih doolatat dacayrih yan malaykatti labaatanna kee inki ayroh gide amaate yoo kalak suge. Woo Fursih-doolatak gexe yoo kalak yeneenimih sabbatah, Mikaayiliy malaykah abbobtik numuk teena kinni, yoo cata'gidih yemeete.
Away akah emeetem, sarra yan saaku ku marat takku waytam koh warsa'gidi. Ah sarra takku waytaamih wacyi› yok iyye.
«Usuk toh iyye waqdi, anu guduqqa maxcinniyoy baaxok addah wagte.
Sarrak sahdayti ceelo luk yen malaykatti sokto gabah yok xageeh; too waqdi yaabam duudeh. Foocal yok soolak suge malaykattuk exceemih, ‹Yi goytaw, a wacyiy ublehiyya kaxxam yoo biyaakeemih sabbatah boolaateh an.
Away qande luk maraaqiyyoy, ufuy qandeh ruubah anik, yi goytaw, yooy ku naqasu kinni ko'lih manni'nnal yaabu duuda?› exce.
«Sahdayti ceelo luk yen malaykatti kaadu qagisak gabah yoo xageh, too waqdi xagar yok qande baahe.
Too waqdi yok iyyeemih, ‹Yalli kaxxam koo kicnahak, atu tuk mameysitin. Yallih nagayna ko'lih tanayak, niya haysitaay digga inxic› yok iyye. Usuk ah iyye waqdi anu nagay ekkeh; kaak exceemih, ‹Intam faxxam inxicey, away nagay yoo abtek› kaak exce.
«Usukuuy, ‹Anu koo fan akah emeetem maay taaxige? Woo Nummâ-Kitaabal tanim koh qaddoysa'gidi. Taway uduurra exceh, Fursih marat dacayrih yan malaykattut qeebi abeyyo. Woo malaykattuk gexa waqdi, Giriik marat dacayrih yan malaykatti amaatele. Mikaayiliy Israayil marat dacayrih yani, kalih malayka yoo macatta.

Meediya deqsita marah yooboke Daryawes edde reede naharsi sanatat, anu innih Mikaayil catak kaa agiirise› yok iyye.
Qagseh iyyeemih, ‹Anu taway koh warisu waam numma.
« ‹Ahak sarra Fursi-rasul sidiica malik reedele. Keenik lakal yamaatu waa fereyhaytô-malik gaddaliinoh keenik inkih aysele. Usuk leh yan qande kee gaddaliinok gexxaamah, Giriik xintot qeebi abam faxele.
Tohuk lakal agiruh yan malik amaatele. Too malik kaxxam naba abbootan luk sugeleeh; isih faxxa heem abele.
Usuk kaxxa qande elle baaha ikkel, kay doolat addigilleleeh, affara ikkel gacele. Kay durruyyatak ane waa mari, kay aracal reedele'mmay, qandeh kay inna mayallan. Tonnal kay doolat kurruumeleeh, aki mari elle reedele.
« ‹Masril gacu waa malik kaxxa qande baahele. Kay qaskar abbobtik tiyak teeni, kaak naba qande baaheleh, kaxxa doolatih abba akkele.
Dago sanootak lakal Masri malik Suuriyah malikit qalla haysiteleeh; baxá digibih kaah aceele. Takkay immay ken qalli kaxxam masuga. Tet qande maraqtaay; baqli-qande kaadu gaba kalele. Woo waktih addal tet kee, tet baahak qalla haysite mara kee, tet abba kee qande teetih acayuk yen num inkih bayelon.
« ‹Sarrak teetih ramad le marak numuk teeni, tet abbah aracal malik akkele. Woo malik Suuriyah malikih qaskarat qeebi abele. Ken megdebitteh adda culeleeh; qeebil keenik aysele.
Oson yalla 'yeenih yaqbuden duyyeey birtak bicsen ceeloola kee, dahab kee lakqok bicsen duyye Masri fan dannabah beele. Tohuk lakal dago sanootah Suuriyah malikit qeebi maaba.
Sarra Suuriyah malik Masri wararele. Takkay immay wadir kaa gacselon.
« ‹Suuriyah malikih xaylo qeebih bica abeleeh mango qaskar gaaboysele. Keenik numuk teeni, weeqi'nnah duufut beyak warareleeh, ken naqboytiitih megdeb elle yani ikke fan qeebi abak amaatele.
Too waqdi Masri malik bagcarritak, Suuriyah malikit qeebi abeleeh; kay qaskaray mangohiyya qeebit abbixele.
Too waqdi woo marak abeh yan iisak gexxaamah kaxxiina baaheleeh; mango alfitte takke qaskar qidele. Takkay immay tohuk wadir iisa geyak maraaqa.
Macaay intek, Suuriyah malik uduurra 'yeh duma luk suge qaskarak ixximah mango qaskar gaaboysele. Bica geya saaku, mango qaskaray nagay tan tikya lehiyya haysitta heeh kaadu gexele.
Too saaku mango mari Masri malikit qeebi abele. Ku baaxoh marak Daaniyelow, inkinki qamalleelah yan mari yublen soonoh sabbatah, kay milkih gacaanam cineloonu'mmay, abaanam ken gabal mabicta.
Suuriyah malik gaso maroh edde tan magaalat maro hayya heeh tet abbixele. Too saaku Masri qaskar qeebih gacak gacele. Keenik qeebil agiirah tan qaskar kinni way, qeebi edde abta qande luk maraqta.
Suuriyah malikiy qeebi keenit abahiyya isih faxxa heem abeleeh; num kaat makoysita. Baaxooxak qaxa inkih tayse baaxo isi gabat heeleeh, too baaxo edde bayisu duuda qande luk sugele.
« ‹Tohuk lakal Suuriyah malik inkih tan qaskar haysitta heeh Masri fan gexaamal malsitele. Masri doolat baysa'gidih, qalla malikit haysiteleeh, baxá digibih kaah aceele. Takkay immay too malay usuk malsehiyya kaa macattaay, gabal kaak mabicta.
Tohuk lakal baddaafal tan baaxooxal yan marat qeebi abeleeh, mango marak keenik aysele. Takkay immay aki baaxok yemeete makaabanti kaak ayseleeh; luk suge kaxxiinat kaa macaba. Too num sinaamat abak suge kaxxiinak gexxaamah, sinam kaal akah kaxxiinitta'nna kaak abele.
Malik too waqdi isi baaxol tan magaalooliy gaso maroh edde tanihiyya fan aduurele'mmay, qeebil gaceh amaatele. Toh kaak ellecabo akkele.
Too malikih lakal gersi malik amaatele. Usuk isi baaxol gaddaliino fayya inta'gidih, sahdat xukkutaah gersi maral gabbara osisa num ruubele. Too malik maraagay, xayih bayele. Elle kaa qidan inna sinam kaak mataaxigay, yambulle carbit maraba› yok iyye.
«A malaykatti kaadu qagseh yok iyyeemih, ‹Wohuk lakal Suuriyal malik yakkeemih, cakki alle waa malikiy umâ-yabulih tan taama lehiyya reedele. Num kaa cube'kal, garciik amma 'yeh sahda ayrisak malik akkele.
Naqboytiitih kaak tan qaskarat qeebi abeleeh baysele. Too qaskar dibuk hinna'mmay, kaxxa seekih agantah baysele.
Lih bicca 'ye doolat wadir ganele. Abbah akak yakku waam qunxa doolata'mmay, toh kinniimih qandeh aysuk aysele.
Kaxxa maalu le rasu garciik wararele. Kay kaxxa abbobti ahayduma abe waytem abele. Dannabah orbise duyye kee gadda, kaa kataata marih fanal kurele. Megdebitte elle tan aroocat qeebi abaanamih malat gacele'mmay, tohim inkih yimixxige wakti sugele.
« ‹Sarrak Masri malikit qeebi aba'gidih kaxxa qaskar ugsele. Too waqdi Masri malik canê-gacsah nabam mangoh qande le qaskar haysitta heeh qeebi kaat abele. Takkay immay kaa ganeloonuh, tohih sabbatah faxem gabal kaah mabicta.
Kay maray maaqo kaa'lih akamuk sugehiyya kaa ganele. Qaskarak mangom kaak duufut beeloonuuh; ambaxele.
Sarrak a namma malik maaqo titta lih takme'gidih inki ikkel daffeele. Num numuh umam keenik acsubeleeh, num numul dirab keenik aceele. Wakti akak gufe'kal sugeemih sabbatah, faxak sugeenim mageyan.
Suuriyah malik dannabah bee duyye luk isi baaxo fan adaaruk gitat yan waqdi, Yallih diinih mara baysaamal gaba kalele. Isih faxxa heem abak yeneek, isi baaxol gacele.
« ‹Yalli doore waktil, Masri kaadu qagitak wararele. Too saaku caalat dumî bis kaal mayalla.
Roomah mari maraakibit amaateleeh, saduh kaak gaceloonuh, tohih sabbatah meysi kaat radele. Tohuk lakal bagcarritak aduureleeh, Yallih marih diini baysam gabbatele. Yallih diini cine marih fayu aabbele.
Usuk ruube qaskar, megdeb kee Yallih Qibaadah-Qari culak, nadaasa abele. Kulli ayro aban sadgat abe ken kaleleeh, sadgat elle abak yenen aracal Kaxxam Umâ-Yabulih-Tanim elle heele.
A malik Yallih diini cine mara ayrisele. Too mari kay xaqut gacele. Takkay immay, Yalla oggole mariiy digga axcuk, qeebi kaat abele.
Kasloytit isi kas ummatta lih haysitele. Keenik tu yakke mari, dago waktit carbit rabe kee girat ken carrise akkelon. Garabak kaadu midir buubeloonuuh seewah ken beelon.
Sinam tittin qidiyyat tan waqdi, Yalla oggole mari catok dagoom geele. Mango mari isinni nabsih catoh keenit angalele.
Ummatta agirribuk taahirrowta'gidih, woo kasloytiitih tan miracwak tu takkem annikissele. Taham ellecabô-waktiy Yalli yaaxigehiyya tamaatem fan akkuk sugele.
« ‹Suuriyah malik isih faxxa heem abak sugele. Yallitte akak inxicci 'yaanamak nabiyoh axcuk tirtirisele. Yallittek naba Dagelta kinni way, uma'nnal xaafele. Yalli kaa digaalla haam fan toh abak sugele'mmay, Yalli hununuh abeyyo inxicca 'yem abele.
A malik kay kaxxa abbobti yalla axcuk aqbuduk sugte duyye kee, agbi faxaamat baaqid mahaa. Yallitte 'yeenih yaqbudeenim maaqileleeh, wohuk inkih anu nabiyo axcele.
Takkay immay megdebitte dacrisa yalla akak iyya yalla assakaxxele. Kay kaxxa abbobti aqbuduk sugtem hinnay, gersiimiy yalla akak iyyah, dahab kee lakqooy bila kee gersi duyye acayuk assakaxxele.
Tonna leemiik, aki baaxoh mari yaqbudem kaa catak, qande le megdebitte qeebit abbixele. Atu nummah abba kinnitoh 'yaanam kaah axcinnaan marah, kaxxa arac abeleeh, kaxxa taama kee buqre keenih aceele.
« ‹Ellecabô-wakti xayyoowa waqdi, Masri malik qeebi kaat abeleeh, too waqdi Suuriyah malik gaariira kee faariisa kee mango maraakib haysitta heeh kaa'lih aamele. Mango baaxo weeqi'nnah duufut beyak wararele.
Baaxooxak qaxa inkih tayse baaxo kaadu wararele. Mango alfitte yakke mara qidele. Takkay immay Edom kee Mooyab rasih mara kee, tonnah, Qammon rasih marak raqtem asillimele.
Masri agantah warareleeh abbixele.
Masri mari yooqoreh suge dahabaay lakqo kee gersi duyyey kaxxa limo lehiyya buubele. Liibiya kee Kuus rasuk qeebil aysele.
Tohuk lakal ayrô-mawqa le kabu kee kilbat le kabuk yamaatu waa xaagi cunxo kaat qidele. Tonna leemiik kaxxa naqabu xagarat luk qeebi abeleeh mango mara qidele.
Usuk isi kaxxa sirooqa bad kee taahirik tan qaley qaxmeqehiyyak fanal heele. Ellecabol rabele'mmay, rabak num kaa macata› yok iyye.

«Too malaykattuy meqe-sarot sartanah yani yok iyyeemih, ‹Too saaku woo qande le malaykattuy Mikaayil deqsitaah ku ummatta dacrisahiyya amaatele. Kaxxa gibdaabini edde yan wakti sugele. Ummatta tunkullukeemik xabba haanamaay akke, sinaamat way akke wayte gadaama akkele. Too saaku ku ummattak migooqa Yallih kitaabal akak tunkuttube mari inkih cattiimele.
Mango maray rabeh yomoogoqeh sugehiyya ugteleeh wadir gacele. Garab keenik ambaxe sinni waarah waarele. Aki garabaay amurruqe sinni qaybi kee ilaq-gadda akkele.
Kas le miracwa qaraanal yan ifih innah ifele. Too maray sinaamak cakkih tanim aba axcuk fayu acayuk sugehiyya, kulli way cutuukah innah ifelon› yok iyye.
«Kaadu yok iyyeemih, ‹Daaniyelow, ama kitab alifay ellecabo edde takke wakti fanah alifay asta edde hayis. Mango mari takkeemih maqna yaaxige'gidih, kaxxam taqabelon› iyye.
«Tohuk lakal namma malaykattuy weeqayti xaqul soltahiyya uble. Keenik tiyaay woo weeqaytuk a qaxa kee woo qaxal soolah uble.
Keenik numuk teeni, *baftak bicsen meqe-sarot sartanah yen malaykattuy weeqayti amol soolak yenehiyyak iyyeemih, ‹A qajiibik tanim maa saaku fan sugeleeh?› iyye.
«Too malaykatti namma gaba fayya haak, waara Yallih migaaqal xiibitah kaa oobbe. Iyyeemih, ‹Wakti kee waktitte kee waktik garab
Usuk iyyem maxcok oobbeh immay maqna akak macediyyo. Tonna leemik, ‹Yi amoytaw, ahim inkih mannal gaba kalele?› exce.
Too waqdi usuk yok iyyeemih, ‹Daaniyelow, aham ellecabô-wakti yakkem fanah uqurat sugteh, num aaxige waama.
Mango ummatta amqiyyiruk taahirroowele. Uma mari tahat maradaay, akah sugen umeynitih raaqelon. Ahat raddu waytam, kas le mara.
Kulli ayro acayuk sugen sadgat edde yeyseeden ayroy woo kaxxam umâ-yabulih tanim edde hoonu waanak, wadirih alfi kee namma bool kee sagla-tabanih ayro tatrele.
Alfi kee sidiica bool kee soddom kee koona ayro taturra 'tam fan asbiruk sugu waa mari, ruffa le mara.
Tonna'mmay, Daaniyelow, atu lito imaan ellecabo fan boolaate'kal kok sugay. Rabettooh, isi galto ellecaboh ayro geyta'gidih ugtetto› yok iyye».

Quddiyya kee Yootam kee Acad kee Ciskiyyaahu Yuudâ-rasul malikwah sugteeh, Israayil rasul kaadu Yahoqás-Yarobqam malikih suge dabaanal, YALLI Beqeerí-Hosiqal farmo ruube. Ruube farmo ah teeti.
YALLI naharak Hosiqal ruubem, Israayil marih giddinaamak ruube farmok ten. Iyyeemih, «Hosiqaw, gexay digib. Digibih abittu wayta barra, xiiqareh-xiinayto. Is xaltu wayta xaylo kaadu teetik kaxxih imaan maleela akkelon. Macaay intek, yi mari yot darre cabeeh, xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyye yaqbuden» kaak iyye.
Hosiqa Goomar deqsitta barral rihime. Goomar-abba Diblayim deqsita numuk ten. Naharsi-baxa kaah xalte saaku,
YALLI kaak iyyeemih, «Ama yooboke awkak migaaqah Yidraqel
Yidraqel-Daqarih addal Israayil qaskar le qande selsiiseyyo» iyye.
Goomar qagisak teedeqeeh baxá xalte. Too saaku YALLI kaadu Hosiqak iyyeemih, «Tama awkák migaaqah Racmat-Wayti inxic. Macaay intek, Israayil marah tahaysa maracmata. Qafu kaadu keenih maaba.
Yuudâ marah tu gactek, keenih xuwaaweyyo. Yoo YALLAY ken Dagelta kinni ken cateyyo. Ken elle catu waam, carbi abitto hinnaay, seef kee gaysê-baxa hinnaay, faaris kee faaris amot yan mara hinnay, inni qandet ken cateyyo» iyye.
Goomar too baxá anguk teyyeeqek lakal, kaadu teedeqeeh lab-baxa xalte.
Too waqdi YALLI kaadu kaak iyyeemih, «Tama awkak kaadu migaaqah Yi-Mara-Hinnon, 'yaanam inxic. Macaay intek, Israayil mari ahaysa yi mara hinnoonuuy, anu kaadu ken Dagelta hinniyo» iyye.
YALLI iyyeemih, «Takkay immay Israayil mari loowo akak duudume waytah gide akkeloonuuh; mangah baddi-afih qiddeh gide akkelon. Anu, ‹Yi mara hinniton› keenik elle exce ikkel, wadir inni mara ken abeyyooh, Yallay waarahiyyah xaylo akkelon.
Yuudâ mara kee Israayil-mari wadir kaadu angaleleeh inki mara akkelon. Inki amoyta haysitelon. Isinni baaxol gaddaleela akkelon. Yidraqel-ayro,

Tonna kinnuk Israayilih yooboke maray sin toobokoh yanik, Yallih maray Yalli akah racmata, inxic>> 'yaanam yok iyye.
«Yi xayloy, sin ina ahaysa yi barra hinnaay, anu tet baqala hinniyo'mmay, ama abtah tan dalwa kee caraamu maabina teetik inxicaay tet kallaca.
Siinik cintek, sara teetik kalla heeh, tooboke saaku qasunuk akah sugte'nnah, qasunuk tet heeyyo. Kafte baaxoy tu elle aabuke waytah innah tet heeyyo. Bakaarah rabele.
Tet xayloh kaadu maracmata. Ken ina dalweenaay; abta dalwat mawacarriyta. ‹Inni mareytit fan gexeyyooh, lee kee maaqo oson yoh aceelon. Xagar meqe sartanay illi xagor kee *baftak bicseenihiyya oson yoo sariselon. Caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti (saliid) kee qinabak bicsen kamri oson yoh aceelon› 'yaanam is isih inteh ten.
Tohih sabbatah keenan le daggek bicsen gasot tet heeyyo. Gititte gee wayta'gidih, xiseh an gasot tet alfeyyo.
Mareytit lakal ardele'mmay, ken maalelta. Ken gorrisele'mmay ken mageyta. Too waqdi intu waytaamah, ‹Ahaysa inni baqala fan aduuru waa. Away edde an caalatak, duma elle suge inni yoh yayse› axcele.
«Maaqooy qinabak bicsen kamri kee caxâ xaylok bicsen *zeyti teetih teceem yook tene'mmay woh yoh maaxaginna. Baqal axcuk yaqbuden duyyeh qibaadah hayte lakqo kee dahab teetih teceem yook tene'mmay; toh yoh maaxaginna.
Daro kee qinab orobta saaku, inni daro kee qinab xaylo teetik gacsiteyyo. Sarittuh teetih ecee illi xagor kee *baftak bicsen sartan teetik beeyyo.
Tet mareytiitik garil qasunuk tet cabeyyo'mmay, yi gabak num tet macata.
Kulli alsih bilooy kulli sabtih diini migaaqal abta qiid kee gersi qiiditte abta farcat ahaysa teetik raaqiseyyo.
Tet qinab xala coox kee tet sublâ-cooxuy is, ‹Yi mareytit yoh tecee› akak intahiyya teetik bayseyyo. Qinab coox kee bustaan elle tuysubuke arooca garbo teetik abeyyo. Too cooxuy qinab xala kee bustaan alluwwa baysele.
Yoo hawwenna hayteh Baqal akak iyyan duyyeh qaydarus qeerisseh; bilqitta inteh mareytit lakat gexxe'mmay, toh teetit macabay, tet akah digaaleyyo. Tahat yabtam yoo YALLA» 'yaanam iyye.
YALLI kaadu qagseh iyyeemih, «Wadir woo elle sugte bacarik tan baaxo fan tet gacseyyo. Tokkel teetih liyoh an kacanu teetih warisu waa waqdi, yol aduurele.
Duma luk sugte qinab xala coox teetih gacseyyo. Gadaamâ Golo deqsitta golo, niya elle moqon golo akkele. Tohoysa baxuwwah Masrik tet eyyeeqe saaku akah yoo oggolte'nnah, yoo oggolele.
Tohuk wadir ‹Yi Baqalaw› yok axcele ikkal, Baqal deqsitta duyyek elle inte'nnal, ‹Yi Wannaw› yok m'inta.
Ahak wadir Baqal
«Too saaku alak alaakulleyti yi mara xage waa'gidih, qahdi heeyyo. Carbi edde abba haan silaacak seef kee gaysê-baxa baaxok ayyaaqeyyo. Yi ummat amaanah xintay 'yaanam axceyyo.
Israayil ummatey, num barral akah rihima'nnah, anu innih sin haysiteyyo. Cakki kee qadaalatat sin xiiniseyyo. Ahaysa kulli way kacanu kee xuwaawat sin xiiniseyyo.
Siinih cule xagna siinil mamaka. Akah exce'nnah, inni mara sin abeyyo. Too saaku YALLA kinniyom yoh aaxigetton» iyye.
«Yi mari yot aban kallaci keenik oggoleyyo. Rob keenih baaheyyo. Baaxol daro kee qinab xaylo kee *daytuun keenih aysubukeyyo. Yidraqel-Daqarih xaqul daro kee coox aysubukeyyo.
Inni mara le baaxol nookiseyyooh, ken gaddaliseyyo. Racmat-Wee akak axcuk suge marah racmateyyo. Yi mara hinnon akak axcuk sugen mara, inni mara abeyyo. Yi mara kinniton keenik axceyyo. Ni Dagelta kinnitoh yok axcelon» iyye.

YALLI kaadu Hosiqak iyyeemih, «Gexay woo mareyta lih dalwa abta barra fan gexay, tet kicintom teetih waris. Anu Israayil mara uxih akah kiciyyo innah, atu tet takcinem kol tan. Israayil mari yalla akke sinni gabat bicsen duyyeh sadgatah qinab-xayloy kafseeni yeceen immay, tohuh, ken kiciyyoh» kaak iyye.
Hosiqa iyyeemih, «Tet geya'gidih, qado lakqok taban kee koona cabbat kee, gabru deqsitta darok bool kee kontom kiilo ecee.
Sarrak ‹Caraamu kee dalwat ase waytaamaay mango wakti yoo qambaltaama; anu kaadu koo qambaaleyyo› teetik exce.
Israayil mari kaadu tonnah malik haysite'kal, abbah num hee'kal, sadgat abe'kal, xeetik bicsen qamidway yaqbudeenihiyya kee Yalla 'yeenih tu elle esseran duyye aalle'kal, mango wakti qambaalak sugelon.
Tohuk lakal Israayil mari YALLAY ken Dagelta kinni kee ken malikih yen Dawuduk rade amoytih fan edde yaduuroonu waan wakti amaatele. Too saaku YALLIH meysi xagarat keenik gaceleeh; YALLIH maqaane geelon» iyye.

Israayil ummatey, YALLI siinik iyyaah sin akah sahitam oobbeya. YALLI siinik iyyaamah, «A baaxol yan mari imaan cabeh yan. Kacni keenik yeerreh yan. Yalla kinniyom yok mayaaxigan.
Xagana akah culeenim maduudusan. Diraabat yaaban. Sahda qidan. Garqa abaanah dalwat asan. Biili biiluk yembeggeh. Sahda kulli ayro titta qidak assa.
Tohih sabbatah baaxo kafele. Baaxô-bagul sugga 'tem inkih boolaatak boolaatele. Alak alaakulleyti inkih ambaxele. Kimbir kee kullum selliimele» iyye.
YALLI kaadu iyyeemih, «Cubbi abita. Sinaamak inkih tu waa mara makkina. Yoh tu gactek anu seekak wayto liyo.
bar kee laqo adaf sin geeleeh; nabuwwa kaadu sin innah andafoofele. Inâ baaxo siinik bayseyyo.
Yi mari yoo aaxige weenimih sabbatah bayele. Isin kaadu seekak, yooy sin Dagelta kinnihiyya siinih eyyeeqe xinto cinteenih yoo cinteenih. Tohih sabbatah anu kaadu sin cineeh, sin xaylo yi seeka matakka.
«Isin seekak, elle andarruk tandarreenimil, abtan dambi siinik amagguk yamagge. Tohih sabbatah meqe migaq elle luk tenen ikkel qaybik sin qideyyo.
Yi mari abah yan dambi kalootuh orba sadgat siinih gaddaliino xale. Tohih sabbatah uxih mango dambit asaanam keenik faxxan.
Sinaamak kaxxih digaala siinit akkele. Sin inkih digaaleyyooh, abba hayten umaane siinil gacseyyo.
Maaqo geettoonu'mmay, qulul sin macaba. Xalay fayxih, gabak bicsen duyyey yallah litoonuhiyyah qibaadah aracal dalwa abak sugteeni'mmay, xalay mageytan. Macaay inteenik, yoo cabba hayteenih yalla axcuk duyyeeya tuqbuden» iyye.
YALLI kaadu qagseh iyyeemih, «Qinabak bicsen qusba kamri kee suge kamri yi marak kas beeh.
Caxxak-kuren-exxa, Yallak tu keenih bahtam yakkalen. Caxxi oson faxaanam keenih warselem yakkalen. Ken Dagelta cabba heenih, kacoobuh lon kacanu kee, xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyet aban qibaada, makot ken beyte.
Qaleelah amol tan aroocal sadgat aban. Koomaamih amol silal meqeeh ayyuufa le caxah gubal qaydarus qeerisan. Too qaydarus woo cooxih gubal akah qeerisaanam, woo cooxih silal keenit yemqek sa. Tonna kinnuk siinik say-xaylo kacob tekke. Sin xayloh agbi dalwa aba.
Tohuh, anu ahah ken madigaala. Macaay inteenik, isin isinnih qibaadah qarih addal xiiqareh-xiina lih xintaanah, tonnah kaadu, ken lih gabak bicsen xeet kee cooxuh sadgat abtan. Missilah, ‹Hawri sinni mari finqitah› 'yaanam tan. Toh numma.
«Isin Israayil maraw, yoo ganteenih. Yuudâ mari sin akke way! Gilgal kee Beet-Awen
Israayil mari yabti cinah lac yekken. Hay, ta mara qayso yayloolen marqih innah mannal ken aylooleh dacrisaa?
A mari yi aftok xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyet aban qibaadah milkih gacen. Ahaysa yanoonay ken inxica.
Qinabak bicsen kamrik cayya iyyan waqdi, dalwa abaanaah farcaan yakken. Meqe migaaqay luk sugeenik qaybik radaanam dooriten immay, kaxxa caacayih gadda akkeloonuuh, xeet kee cooxuy yalla 'yeenih yaqbudeenihiyyah aban sadgatat wacarriyelon» iyye.

«Seekay, ankacisa. Israayil ummatey, axcem oobbeya. Malikwa kee keenih ramad le maraw, edde yaaba yab ayti yoh acuya. Abtan cokmi qadaalatat abtaana'gidih, siinil yontocowweh immay, woh maabinnitoonuuy; tonna leemiik isin abba haytan cokmi siinil aduurele. Mixfa deqsita aracal, sahdah oflo tekken. Taabor qaleh amol, sabakat kullum elle yabbixen innal sahda tabbixen.
Tikible-magaala deqsitta magaalah addal, sahda addat akak radda adda xer boodo tekkeeni'mmay, takkeenimik sin digaaleyyo.
Israayil addal tekkem nagay aaxige. Israayil yok edde tambooqore'kke mali. Imaan keenik yeerreh yi qibaadah mabican. Nadaasa is abte» iyye.
Hosiqa iyyeemih, «Ummat abtam Yalla fan adaari ken haytah matan. Oson xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyyeh abak sugen qibaada Yallak ken teyxeereh. YALLA yaaxagoonu cineenih.
Israayil mari le kaxxiina, kinnon mara keenik taybullee. Ken dambi ken yaydafoofoleeh, ken yankiseh. Yuudâ mari ken lih annikissele.
Yallih sadgatah illi kee laa qideloonu'mmay, toh tu keenit mahayta. YALLI ken cabeh ikkal, kaa mageyan.
Oson xalan xaylo ilmu kinnuk, YALLA lih luk sugen xagana makeenih. Tohih sabbatah ken kee oson elle sugen baaxo alsi-bilot bayele» iyye.
Hosiqa kaadu qagseh iyyeemih, «Gibqal baanta ugura! Raamal turumba kaayisa! Beet-Awen deqsita aracal qeebih tirtirisa! Benyam maraw, qeebih ittikiya!
Israayil ummatey, digaala siinit edde takku wayta ayro xayih. Israayil foyya akkele. Israayil ummatey, tah nummaak takku waytaama» iyye.
YALLI iyyaamah, «Yuudâ marih abbobti Israayil baaxo geyta'gidih, cuduudul suge xeet kala marih innal tekke. Tohih sabbatah yi bagcarra weeqi innah keenil oobiseyyo.
Israayil mari tu xiqe sinni xeet kee cooxuk bicsen duyye kaxxam faxaanamih sabbatah, xukkot yaniiniih, too digaalah biyaakat yanin.
Irimbi caxa elle baysa'nnal, Israayil ummat bayseyyooh; Yuudâ maral abicte dale innah keenil aameyyo.
«Israayil ummat biyaakittu waytaah, Yuudah ummat daleela lem isik tabalu wayta saaku, Israayil catoh Assuuriyah malikil gexele. Takkay immay biyaakak ken macatay; daleelak ken muurusa.
Israayil kee Yuudâ marat lubak qeebi elle aba'nnal keenit abeyyo. Anu innih rike rikeh kurra ken heeh ken cabeyyo. Ken hirriigisu waa waqdi, num ken macata.
Yi mari dambik abeenimil yoo qaddoowe'kal, keenil maaduura. Gadaamah addat yanin waqdi, yoo kassiteloonuuh yoo gorriselon» iyye.

Ummat intaamah, «Ahaysa YALLAL nadaaru wayna. YALLI nee biyaakeh immay nee qaffoysele. Nee mudeh immay dale neh urusele.
Namma ayro kee sidiica ayrot, mano net gacseleeh; kay xaqul anenno.
YALLA naaxagay. Kaa naaxige'gidih, digga innay. Tonnal, barak lakal maaci maacisam akah naaxige'nnah, YALLI nel amaatelem digga hayna. Dabayba kee sugum rade rob baaxo akah doogisa'nnah, YALLI rooci nek aqusbuusele» iyyan.
Takkay immay YALLI iyyeemih, «Israayil kee Yuudah ummatey, maca siinik abu? Yoh liton kacni saaki-silaalo elle gexxa'nnal, siinik gexa. Ayro laqta way taarre saldah innah, siinik yeerreh.
Inni nabuwway farmo gabat le sin fanah ruubeeh, uma cokmi kee baati siinit akkelem siinih akah warsem tohu. Anu siinik faxam qellu lem hinna.
Anu siinik faxam, kulli way yoo takcineenimi'kkal, saq sadgatah yoh qiddaanam hinna.
«Adamak kaxxih
Gilqad deqsitta magaala, umeynit kee biileenit dabaq tekke.
Seeka, siftay sinam qidimih raarissa tekke. Seekem magaala fan beya gitih addal kinni way sahda qidan.
Israayil addal, ableh uma umaane akkih able. Yi mari duyyeeyâ-qibaadat gaceeh nadaasa is abe.
«Tonna'mmay sin tiyah tu gactek Yuudâ maraw, sin edde digaalu waa wakti eexegeh aniih, abba haytaanamah sin digaaleyyo» iyye.

YALLI iyyeemih, «Israayil ummatay yi marah tani catam faxaah, maqaane keenih abam faxinnaan waqdi, aaminnaan taama kee gacca intaamat asah ken able. Titta ayrisan. Sahdâ-buxaaxi garqan. Sahda giti addal radan.
Anu oson abba heen umaane aaxigem mayaaxigan. Oson abba heen dambi marot ken yabbixe. Oson aban taama yok maqellitta» iyye.
YALLI iyyeemih, «Ummat uma-taamat assa waqdi, malik kee kay gubal tan doolat abbobti inkih ruffa intaah, ken dirab kicnon.
Ummat inkih makô-mara tekkeeh, yaamineenim cabteh. Oson, gaqambo elle alaysaana'gidih yoskonoonocen giray barge waytahiyyah bis lon.
Malik xigla edde abe ayro, kaal malse mari kaa kee kay gubal tan abbobti qinab-kamrit iskirra 'teh hangi keenik akah gexa innah aben. Usuk kaal malse mari abah yan anqaasat gaba yessegelle.
Oson muufê girah bis lon. Gidiidin bar inkih ken naqbi ankonoonocuk xinna 'tah, saaku urta girah gide.
Abeenih yanin bagcarrah isinni abbobti qideenih. Isinni malikwak numuuy way keenik qideeni'mmay, num keenik cato yol messerinna» iyye.
YALLI kaadu iyyeemih, «Israayil mari gambi akak alaye wee gaqamboh gide. Dariifal keenik yan mara lih gacca 'yeenih yoomen.
Too mari qande ken waysiiseemit isinnik maradan. Qumri keenik sugu waam dagoh gide kinniimit maradan.
Israayil maral, loonuh yanin kaxxiina sumaaqitta. Mangom keenit tekke'mmay, tohuh, yooy YALLAAY keenik kaadu Dagelta kinnihiyyal maaduurinnon.
Israayil mari hawri cabeeh, kimbir innah meekita. Way catoh Masri mara fan yardeeniih, way kaadu Assuuriyah mara fan yarden.
Takkay immay kimbir innah oflo keenih qideh, too oflot ken abbixeyyo. Inki ikkel gaabooweenih aben yaabal, ken digaaleyyo.
Bayeenih! Yi yab cineeniih, yoo cineenih. Ken catam faxeh immay finqitelon. Makot yoo yuqbudeeniih, tohih sabbatah bayelon.
Afqadook yoo maqbudinnon. Dooqa aban waqdi, gitat tet maaban. Takkay immay daffa 'yeenih diini-maleela akah abta'nnah, waxxaq axcukuuy boogisak aban. ‹Baaxol daro kee qinab nee mawaysiisin› axcuk dooqa aban waqdi, diini-maleela akah abta'nnah, xagar isinnik qanxisan. Yoo cineeniih darre yot caben.
Ken teynebeeh, ken qande bahsissem yook tene'mmay, yok aboonu waanamah malat gacen.
Yoo cabba heenih, yoo akke sinniimiy hebeltohim xiqe waytah qibaadat gaceenih, makot tan gaysey tu anfiqe wayta yekken. Ken abbobti kaxxam kaxxiinitta'mmay, uma rabah rabeloonuuh, Masri mari keenil anqaasah rabelon» iyye.

YALLI kaadu qagseh iyyeemih, «Baanta nagay kaayisa. Qawi qaraanak raarisak elle yamaate'nnal, naqboytit baaxol raarisak yi marat tamaate. Yi ummat anu ken lih hee bica yol makteeh, anu aba keenik exceemit darre cabte.
Israayil mari, ‹Ni Dageltaw, nanu koo naaxigeh› yok iyyaanah immay,
meqeemit maasan. Tohih sabbatah naqboytit ken tayradde.
«Yi mari malikwa keenih yekke mara isinnih dooriteeni'mmay, woo dooro yoo maleh, isinni amok aben. Abbobti keenik yakku waa mara dooriteenih immay, woo dooro keenik moggoliminna. Buxal luk sugen qado lakqo kee dahabak, yalla axcuk yaqbuden duyye bicsen. Too duyye baati keenil baahele.
Samaariyal yan maraw, dahabak bicsen daheltih ceeloy taqbudeeni ablem mafaxa. Tah aba mara anqibeh. A mari taahirik tan taama abu waam, maa saakuk tan kaa?
Israayil mari yaqbudem, num gabak bicse duyye ikkalah Yalla hinna. Samaariyal yan mari yaqbude daheltih ceelo bututtukku heelon.
Umaane yaysubukeenih, kaxxa umaane ken geele. Orbise ween darok gaqambo mabicsan. Daro orbiseenih gaqambo akak bicseenik, marin baaxoh marih gadda keenik akkele.
Gersi rasih mari Israayil yunxuqe. Israayil mari gersi rasih marih innal gaceemih, kallak bicsen buutiy yiddigille yekken.
Yabti cinah dabookali yekkeeniih, isinnih faxen gitat gexa mara yekken. Assuuriyah rasu fan catô-goranah gexeeniih, doolatwak nee catah guqul yeceen.
Tonna'mmay ta saaku yakkeenimik gaabossa ken heeh, ken digaaleyyo. Assuuriyah malik keenit xukkutu waa saaku, keenit yakkeh yan biyaakah iihiselon.
Dambi-kalootuh sadgat elle aboonuh, mango qibaadah-arooca elle xisaanamal, dambi keenik amagguk yamagge.
Ummat mango baritto barsa. Takkay immay tu xiqe waytaah foyyâ-baritto tet aban.
Yi migaaqal sadgatah saq qidan. Qiden saqih cado yakmen. Takkay immay yooy YALLA kinni ken inqibeh, ken faxah maan. Oson baahen dambi aaxaguk ken akah digaaleyyo. Akak yemeeten Masri fan ken gacseyyo.
Israayil mari malik qarwah xiso yeexegeh immay, ken gine Dagelta hawweeneenih. Yuudâ mari, meqe magaalooli dacayrih xisen. Oson malikwah xisen qarwa kee magaalooli keenik bayissa gira keenil ruubeyyo» iyye.

Hosiqa iyyeemih, «Israayil ummatey, qiidih assan saaku diini-maleela akah abta'nnah maabinaay; kaxxam ruffa maxcina. Isinni Dageltak texxeereeniih, kaal luk sugten imaan siinik yeerreeh; qusbih orbisen daro kee caffa tittak elle meexxan aroocal, migaaqah Baqal akak intaanamay raabitteenihiyyah qibaadat gacten. Daro Baqal siinih yeceem takkalen; yoo cinten.
Takkay immay ama away liton daro kee *daytuun kee qinab edde waytoonu waytan wakti maxeeri.
Israayil mari a YALLIH rasul maraaqay, ahak sarra Masri fanah aduurelon. Assuuriyal caraamak tan maaqoh gacelon.
Too baaxoy kenim akke waytahiyya gexoonu waan saaku, qinabak bicsen kamri YALLIH sadgatah acayuk maraaqan. Sadgatah saq qidaanamah YALLI keenik maraabita. Tonnah yan sadgat woo saaku akminnaan numul caraamu akkele. Rabe numih migaaqal yakmen maaqoh gide keenil akkele. Satqak bagi kibah yakmen maaqoh gidek keenih loowimele. Oson sadgatah qidan saqih cado, YALLIH Qibaadah-Qaril aban sadgatah keenik moorobta.
YALLIH qiidih ayro ta mari maca migaqsitele?
Ken baaxo bayisu waa saaku, yasillimu waa mari Masri baaxol gexeleeh, magaqah Moofu deqsita aracal ken aaguqelon. Oson duma yedderen qado-lakqo elle luk sugen arooca kee, dabaaqah edde sugen buxaaxi elle ten aroocal, keenik waaqex kee sissib aabukele.
«Digaala siinit edde takku wayta uddur xayyooweh. Too saaku siinih taguude digaala siinit akkele. Sin garil nabi duquruuy; Yallih wacyi elle oobe num cissit ane waa numuh tablen. Kaxxa dambit asseenimih sabbatah, nabi kaxxam niqibton.
Nabi, Yalli Israayil ummatay kay marah tanihiyyah aylahu kaleh, takku waytam keenih warsa'gidih ruube numu. Tohuh isin kaa ablinnaan waqdi, kimbiro oflot elle yabbixen innal, kaa tabbixeenim faxxaanaah, Yallih Qibaadah-Qaril kaa tinqibeenih.
Gibqa deqsita rasul akah abak sugga iyyen innah, umaanet badih innah sutta 'ten.
Yalli iyyeemih, «Israayil ummat naharak gee saaku, bacaril tooboke qinab caxah bis luk yenen. Sin kaxxa abbobtiy isin akak raddeenihiyya, coox elle yaabuke waktil naharat xalte *sublaytoh bis luk yenen. Takkay immay Faqor deqsitta qale yemeeten saaku, Baqal akak iyyan duyye Yallah haysiten.
